UMAZI KAHLE KANGAKANANI UNKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukuthi ukuqaphela uJehova kuhilela okwengeziwe kunokwazi amaqiniso athile ngaye. Kusho
ukujwayelana ngokuseduze nezinjongo zakhe, izenzo, izimfanelo, nemizwa. Kusho ukwenza ngokuvumelana nalololwazi
nokusiza abanye ukuba benze kanjalo. Gxilisa isifiso esijulile sokwazi uJehova ngokuseduze
SINETHEMBA LOKUPHILA OKUPHAKADE NGOKWAZI UNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Kusho ukuphila okuphakade ukwazi, noma ‘ukungenisa ulwazi,’ ngoNkulunkulu neNdodana (Funda uJohane 17:3, uqhathanise
neNW)
Kumelwe ukuba uJesu wayesho okungaphezu nje kokwazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona
Ukuba nje nolwazi oluthile ngoJehova nokuthi ayamkhulekela kwakunganele ekwenzeni amaSamariya amukeleke kuNkulu-
nkulu (Joh 4:7-26 [funda ivesi 22]; wZU71 6/15 273-8 [w70 679-83])
Ngokufanayo, abaningi namuhla abalazi igama likaNkulunkulu; baphambanisa uNkulunkulu neNdodana yakhe (wZU86
10/15 22-3 [w84 8/1 20])
Zibuze: ‘Ngiyamazi yini uNkulunkulu neNdodana yakhe ngomqondo odingekayo ukuze ngibe nethemba eliqinile lokuphila oku-
phakade?’
Singamazi kanjani uNkulunkulu ngalomqondo? Singabasiza kanjani abantwana bethu nezifundo zethu zeBhayibheli ukuba be-
nze kanjalo?
LOKHO OKUHILELEKILE EKWAZINI UMUNTU (5 imiz.)
Ukumazi ngempela umuntu kusho okungaphezu nje kokukholwa ukuthi ukhona
Ukwazi umuntu kusho ukuqonda ukuthi unjani nokujwayelana kahle nobuntu bakhe, imizwa yakhe
Lokhu kufuna ukujwayelana okuseduze nokuhlangenwe nakho kwesikhathi eside (rsZU 261  ̊4)
UmAmaleki owathi wayebulele uSawule ngokuqinisekile wayengamazi uDavide (2Sa 1:1-16)
Wayengawazi umbono kaDavide ngogcotshiweyo kaNkulunkulu (1Sa 26:3-11)
Ungase uzibuze: ‘Ngingamazi kanjani uJehova? Akasho yini ukuthi izindlela zakhe nemicabango kuphakeme kakhulu kunokwe-
thu?’ (Isa 55:8, 9)
Amazwi akuIsaya 55 ayeqondiswe kumaJuda ayehlehla, ahlubukayo ayezishiyile izindlela zikaNkulunkulu
Ngisho nawo ayengabuyela kuJehova futhi aphinde amazi (Funda amavesi 6, 7)
Kodwa singamfuna futhi simazi ngaziphi izindlela?
INDLELA NESIZATHU SOKUBA ABANTU BAMAZI NGEMPELA UNKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Enye indlela esingamazi ngayo iwukuba silwele ukumlingisa
Kungenzeka ukuba simlingise, futhi lokho kuyintando yakhe ngathi (Gen 1:26-28; funda eyabaseKolose 3:10)
Izimfanelo ezinhle esizibonakalisayo—uthando, isihe, ukuhlakanipha, ubulungisa, njll.—zimane zibonakalisa lokho ayikho
Lapho sithethelelana, sibonakalisa izindlela zikaNkulunkulu (Funda eyabase-Efesu 4:32–5:1)
Isono sichaphazela indlela umuntu abonakalisa ngayo isimo sikaNkulunkulu, kodwa lapho sikhula ekumazini, kuba yilapho
sikwazi khona ukuyibonakalisa ngokwengeziwe inkazimulo kaJehova (2Kor 3:18; it-1 964  ̊1; wZU90 7/15 17  ̊6)
IBhayibheli lisisiza ukuba simazi ngezindlela esingaziqonda (it-2 13  ̊6-8)
Nakuba engumoya, uJehova kuthiwa unamehlo, izindlebe, nobuso (1Pet 3:12)
Ukusebenzisa lezizinkulumo ezijwayelekile kubantu kusisiza ukuba siqonde; ukuchaza ngendlela yezidalwa zomoya beku-
ngafana nokuzama ukuchaza imibala kumuntu owazalwa eyimpumputhe
Incazelo yeBhayibheli ngemizwa kaJehova nendlela asabela ngayo isisiza ukuba simazi (Hu 78:36-41)
Akafani nathi; kunalokho, ubonisa ukuthi thina senziwe ngomfanekiso wakhe ngezinga elingakanani
Khona-ke, ngokutadisha iBhayibheli singamazi uNkulunkulu—izenzo zakhe, izinjongo, izimfanelo, imizwa
Kuyinselele lapho ufunda futhi utadisha hhayi nje ukuze uthole amaqiniso athile ngaye kodwa ukuba umazi uNkulunkulu
Lapho ufundisa abanye iBhayibheli, ingabe uyakudonsela ukunakekela kulokho indaba ekwembulayo ngoNkulunkulu ngokwa-
khe? (wZU85 3/15 30  ̊17, 18 [w84 8/1 16  ̊17, 18])
Singasizwa ukuba simazi uNkulunkulu ngokuba nobuhlobo bomuntu siqu naye
Kungabonwa emazwini kaNkulunkulu okuthi ‘wajwayelana’ noAbrahama, ngokusekelwe ekusebenzelaneni kwabo (Gen 18:19,
NW; it-2 181  ̊2)
Ngokufanayo, uAbrahama wayesemazi uNkulunkulu, wayeqiniseka ngothando lwaKhe, isihe, nobulungisa (Gen 18:25)
Ngokukhuluma njalo noNkulunkulu ngomthandazo ngezinto ezisikhathazayo nangokufuna isiqondiso sakhe, siba ngabamazi
kangcono (wZU85 3/15 30  ̊19 [w84 8/1 16  ̊19])
Ukwazi uJehova uNkulunkulu kusho futhi ukuqaphela isikhundla sakhe negunya nokwenza ngokuvumelana nalokho esikwazi-
yo ngaye (wZU75 8/15 367  ̊15, 16 [w75 117  ̊15, 16])
Ngokuqondene negama lesiHeberu elisho “ulwazi” ngokuphathelene nokwazi uNkulunkulu, iTheological Dictionary of the
New Testament ithi: “Ngakho kuwukuwavuma ngenhlonipho nangokulalela amandla nomusa nalokho okufunwa uNkulunku-
lu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ulwazi alubhekwa njengokuba nokwaziswa okuthile. Uba nalo kuphela ngokulusebenzisa” (Umq. 1,
k. 698)
UJehova wawalahla amaIsrayeli ngenxa yokuntula kwawo ulwazi, okungukuthi, ukumqaphela nokumlalela (Funda uHoseya
4:1, 6)
Ngokusobala, ayazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungubani kodwa awazange enze ngokuvumelana nalokho (Ivesi 2; it-2 181  ̊3)
Umlando wabonisa ukuthi aphikisa lokho ayekusho okukuHoseya 8:2 (Funda)
No. 1-ZU
3/91Lokhu kugcizelela ukuthi sidinga okungaphezu kolwazi lwasekhanda; ukuphila kwethu kufanele kubonise ukuthi siyamazi
uNkulunkulu
Sibonile ukuthi abantu bangamazi uNkulunkulu kanye nezindlela abangakwenza ngazo lokhu (ukufunda ngaye, ukuba nobuhlobo
naye, ukuqaphela igunya lakhe nokwenza ngokuvumelana nalokho), kodwa imibuzo ebalulekile yilena: Ngingaqiniseka kanjani
ukuthi mina siqu ngiyamazi uNkulunkulu? Ingabe zikhona izimpawu ezinokwethenjelwa?
ZIHLOLE UBONE UKUTHI UMAZI KAHLE KANGAKANANI UNKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Okunye onganquma ngakho ukuthi umazi kahle kangakanani uNkulunkulu kuwukuthi yena ukubheka njengowamukelekayo yini
Ukwazi kukaNkulunkulu othile ngokuvamile kusho ukumqaphela njengowamukelekayo nofanele ukuba anakwe nguye (Fu-
nda uAmose 3:1, 2) (wsZU 137  ̊4)
Ukukubeka ngalendlela nakho kuyiqiniso: Umuntu akaziwa uma uNkulunkulu noJesu bengamqapheli noma bengamamukeli
(Funda uMathewu 7:21-23) (wZU75 8/15 368  ̊18 [w75 118  ̊18])
Ngakho-ke, ukuze umazi ngokugcwele uNkulunkulu, kumelwe aqale azi wena (Gal 4:8, 9)
Umuntu ophendukela kuNkulunkulu ngokholo nangesisekelo sesihlengo angaziwa, aqashelwe
Ngokukhula okholweni nangokugwema ukungabi namthetho, ungaqhubeka waziwa uNkulunkulu
Okunye ongalinganisa ngakho ukuthi umazi kahle kangakanani uNkulunkulu kuwukuthi uyayilalela yini ngothando imiyalo ya-
khe (1Jo 2:3-6)
Uma enhliziyweni yakhe umuntu ecabanga ukuthi angalalela umyalo owodwa kuphela, njengokushumayela, kodwa angayina-
ki eminye, njengokuthi ahlanganyele ekuziphatheni okubi, ukukhohlisa, noma ukuqamba amanga, akamazi uNkulunkulu
noma uJesu; ungumqambimanga
Umuntu ozama ngobuqotho ukulalela yonke imiyalo esiyinikezwe uNkulunkulu ufinyelela ekumazini uNkulunkulu
Eminye imiyalo eqondene nomuntu siqu ibaluleke ngendlela efanayo ukuze umuntu amazi kahle uNkulunkulu
Ndoda, uyalwa ukuba uthande umkakho njengomzimba wakho, ungabi nokhahlo noma ube ngophoqelelayo (Efe 5:28)
Uma wena njengendoda umphatha kahle umkakho nangokubekezela (ungabonisi ukucasuka), kubonisa ukuthi uyamazi
uNkulunkulu, owakunikeza isiqondiso esinjalo
Mfazi, uyalwa ukuba uhloniphe umyeni wakho, ngisho noma engase angakwenzi konke okulindele (Efe 5:33; w69 1/1 31)
Ukubonisa inhlonipho kubonisa ukuthi ufinyelela ekumazini uNkulunkulu, oye wasibeka ngokucacile isimiso sokuzitho-
ba okulinganiselwe
MaKristu asemasha, nibonisa isifiso sokwazi uNkulunkulu ngokulalela abazali, njengoba eyala (Efe 6:1, 2)
Ngokulalela imithetho yabazali engawuphuli umthetho kaNkulunkulu, nithuthukela ekumazini uNkulunkulu (ypZU
11-12)
Uma nilwela ukugwema ukuba nabangane abangewona amaKristu, nibonisa ukuthi niyamazi uNkulunkulu
Uma sikhetha abangane abangewona amaKristu, uNkulunkulu akanakuba umngane wethu (Hu 15:1-5; wZU89 9/15 26-30)
Ngokuba ngabakhethayo nabenza ubungane namaKristu eqiniso, nibonisa ukuthi niyamazi uNkulunkulu
Phendukelani kuNkulunkulu njalo ngomthandazo, kanjalo nibonise ukuthi nithembela kuye futhi niyamazi
Umuntu omazi ngempela uNkulunkulu uyaqonda ukuthi uyayamukela imithandazo yethu; ngakho noma yikuphi ukwesaba
ukusondela kuye kuyaphela (wZU71 1/1 21-2 [w70 415]; it-2 605  ̊2, 3)
Ingabe imithandazo yakho ibonisa ukuthi uyamazi uNkulunkulu? Ungamazi ngokwengeziwe ngokwandisa izikhathi otha-
ndaza ngazo kuye nangokumthululela isifuba ngokwengeziwe
Uma wona, njengoba sonke sona, bonisa ukuthi uyamazi futhi uyamethemba uNkulunkulu ngokukusho emthandazweni, ufu-
ne futhi wamukele intethelelo (Hu 26:1, 2)
Kodwa ingabe ukwazi uNkulunkulu kuyinto nje ephakathi kwenu nobabili, noma ingabe kuhileleke okwengeziwe?
SIZA ABANYE UKUBA BAHLANGANYELE NAWE EKUMAZINI KAHLE UNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Njengoba kuphawuliwe, singabasiza abanye ukuba bamazi uNkulunkulu ngokugcizelela izimfuneko zakhe, izinjongo, nezimfane-
lo (Funda uDaniyeli 11:32, 33a) (wZU71 6/15 283-5 [w70 689-90])
Kusebenza manje lapho abaningi bekhulekela inhlangano yokuthula esungulwe abantu
Abanye abantu bazi izindaba eziyisisekelo zeBhayibheli, kodwa ungabenza yini ukuba babe nokuqonda, ubasize ukuba bama-
zi ngempela uNkulunkulu?
Ekushumayeleni nasekufundiseni, donsela ukunakekela ezizathwini zokuthi kungani uNkulunkulu enza lokho akwenza nge-
sikhathi esidlule; khuthaza ukwethembela ezenzweni zakhe zesikhathi esizayo ezisekelwe ezimfanelweni zakhe eziboni-
swe ezenzweni zakhe zesikhathi esidlule
Ngokuphila ngezimiso nezindinganiso zeBhayibheli nsuku zonke, sisiza abanye ukuba babone ukuhlakanipha kokufinyelela ekwa-
zini uNkulunkulu nokumkhonza
UPawulu wathi uJehova wenza “iphunga lokwazi kwakhe [liqashelwe, NW] ezindaweni zonke” (2Kor 2:14)
Ulwazi luyasakazwa ngendlela amaKristu aphila ngayo—ebonisa ulwazi nemiphumela yalo emihle, ebonisa ubuntu obusha
Nxusa ngesibindi abanye ukuba bamukele ukukhulekela kweqiniso, bafinyelele ekwazini uJehova futhi babe nengxenye ezinjo-
ngweni zakhe (1Kr 28:9; Joh 17:3)
Manje nasesikhathini esizayo, ngeke sibe nolwazi nje lwasekhanda ngokuqondene nendlela yokuphila kodwa siyozizwela ngo-
kwethu ukuthi injani leyondlela ejabulisayo
IBhayibheli lisiqinisekisa ngokuthi ‘ukwazi uNkulunkulu kuyogcwala emhlabeni’; akusho nje ukwaziswa, kodwa ukusetshe-
nziswa kolwazi ngokwenza intando yakhe ngenxa yokumazi (Isa 11:9)
Ngempela, kukhona isizathu sokwaneliseka nesokuthokoza ekwazini uJehova kanye nendlela yokuphila; siwukuba nolwazi olu-
holela ekuphileni okuphakade
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 1-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UYOSINDA EZINSUKWINI ZOKUGCINA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Dlulisela ukuphuthuma kwezikhathi zethu. Nikeza ubufakazi obuqand’ ikhanda bokuthi sisezinsukwini zokugcina. Bonke bashu-
kumisele ukuba bathathe isinyathelo esiqondile ukuze babe phakathi kwabayosinda
KUMELWE SIKUKHATHALELE UKUSINDA EZINSUKWINI ZOKUGCINA (4 imiz.)
Umuntu ongasinaki ngamabomu isixwayiso esicacile bese kuthi ngalokho alahlekelwe ukuphila kwakhe uyisiwula (g87-ZU 7/8 3)
Namuhla, oFakazi BakaJehova bashumayela emhlabeni wonke ngezinsuku zokugcina
Ingabe ngempela sisezinsukwini zokugcina? Ingabe bukhona ubufakazi? Buyokuthinta kanjani wena nabathandekayo bakho?
Ekhulwini lokuqala leminyaka C.E., ukusinda ezinsukwini zokugcina kwakufanele kube yinto amaJuda ayeyikhathalela ngokuyi-
nhloko
Isimiso sezinto sobuJuda, nethempeli kanye nobupristi baso, kwangena ezinsukwini zokugcina ngo-29 C.E. (w82-ZU 10/15 13-14
[w82 5/1 13])
UJohane uMbhapathizi noJesu kanye nabafundi bakhe bawaxwayisa amaJuda ngokuthi imbubhiso yayizofika kulesosizukulwane
Iningi lalawomaJuda lahluleka ukulalela isixwayiso esicacile (Funda uLuka 19:43, 44)
Lawo aziqaphela izinsuku zokugcina futhi athatha isinyathelo esifanele asinda embubhisweni
Kuwukuhlakanipha ukuhlola lokho okwenzeka ngekhulu lokuqala leminyaka C.E. bese sibona ukuthi asikho yini isifundo esi-
ngasithola kulokhu
AMAJUDA KWAKUFANELE AZI NGEZINSUKU ZOKUGCINA (12 imiz.)
Ngesiprofetho uJehova wawaxwayisa ngokucacile amaJuda ngezinsuku zokugcina, ezihlobanisa nokuza kukaMesiya (Funda uDa-
niyeli 9:25a, umongo wamavesi 26, 27) (it-2 899-904; w82-ZU 10/15 13-14 [w82 5/1 13])
Onke amathemba amaJuda nalokho ayekulindele kwakugxile kuMesiya, ngakho lesiprofetho kwakufanele sibe okuthile okutha-
kazelisa kakhulu, hhayi into amaJuda ayengezukuyinaka
Isiprofetho samasonto angu-70 ayiminyaka sakhomba onyakeni uMesiya ayezofika ngawo, u-29 C.E.
Ubufakazi bubonisa ukuthi amaJuda amaningi ngalesosikhathi ayelindele ukuba kubonakale uMesiya (Luk 3:15; w84-ZU 12/1
9-10)
Kusukela ngo-29 C.E., banqwabelana ubufakazi obubonisa ukuthi uJesu wayenguMesiya
Lokhu kwabonisa ukuthi isimiso sezinto sobuJuda sasingene ezinsukwini zokugcina
Kwafakazela ukuthi iziprofetho ezazibonakalisa uJesu njengoMesiya zagcwaliseka
Izimangaliso nokufundisa kwakhe kwafakazela ukuthi wayenguMesiya (Joh 7:39-41; 9:17, 31-33)
Ngokucabangela uDaniyeli 9:26, 27, amaJuda kwakufanele aqonde ukuthi ayesengene ezinsukwini zokugcina
UJesu wakubikezela ngokusobala ukubhujiswa kwesimiso sezinto sobuJuda futhi wazibalula zonke izenzakalo ezazizokwenzeka ezi-
nsukwini zokugcina ezazizokwandulela (Funda uMathewu 23:37, 38; 24:1-8) (w70-ZU 7/15 318-21 [w70 42-5])
Ingabe isiprofetho sikaJesu sagcwaliseka, kuqinisekisa ukuthi isimiso sobuJuda sasisezinsukwini zokugcina? Ingabe uMathewu
isahluko 24 wasebenza ngalesosikhathi? (g81-ZU 3/8 6-7 [g80 9/8 17-18]; kc 106-8)
Ukuthululwa komoya ongcwele ngePentekoste lika-33 C.E., kanye nezipho zokwenza izimangaliso ezihambisana nawo, nakho kwa-
bonisa ukuthi amaJuda ayephila ezinsukwini zokugcina (Jow 2:28-32)
Ephendula umbuzo wamaJuda ngokuqondene nalokho okwakushiwo okwakwenzekile, uPetru wabonisa ukuthi kwakusho uku-
thi lezo ‘kwakuyizinsuku zokugcina’ (Funda IzEnzo 2:12, 16, 17, 20)
Izindaba eziphathelene nalokhu kumelwe ukuba zasakazeka ngokushesha, ngakho umuzi wonke wawuyoxwayiswa
AmaJuda ayezwe lezixwayiso ayenobufakazi obanele; kwakufanele athathe isinyathelo futhi aqhubeke ephila
Isixwayiso sahlanganisa neseluleko sokubaleka lapho iJerusalema lizungezwa (Luk 21:20-22)
Lapho amaRoma efika ngo-66 C.E. eholwa uCestius Gallus, amaJuda ayesengakwazi ukuthatha isinyathelo sokusindisa ukuphila
Amabutho amaRoma abuyela emuva; ngakho, labo ababeziqaphela izinsuku zokugcina baba nethuba lokubaleka
AmaJuda ayekwezinye izindawo ayengasilalela isixwayiso ngokuba angayi eJerusalema
Ngo-70 C.E., amaRoma abuya futhi aletha izinsuku zokugcina emvuthwandaba obhubhisayo
Kwasho inhlekelele ngalawomaJuda ayengasinakanga isixwayiso esiphathelene nezinsuku zokugcina (g81-ZU 3/8 5-8 [g80 9/8
16-18])
Ukuntula ukholo, hhayi ukuntula ubufakazi, kwaholela amaJuda amaningi ekubeni angasinaki isixwayiso sezinsuku zoku-
gcina
Ukuqaphela kwawo izinsuku zokugcina nokuthatha kwawo isinyathelo esifanele noma ukungenzi kanjalo kwakuhilela
ukuphila
Nokho, sisabhekene nalombuzo: Ingabe ukusebenza kwesiprofetho kwangalesosikhathi kwadlulela esikhathini sanamuhla?
ISIPROFETHO ESIPHATHELENE NESIPHELO SESIMISO SIYASEBENZA NANAMUHLA (8 imiz.)
Amaqiniso omlando abonisa ukuthi ingxenye enkulu kaMathewu 24 yagcwaliseka ngezinga elincane ngokuqondene nezinsuku zo-
kugcina ezaqala ngo-33 C.E. kuya ku-70 C.E. (Uvule iBhayibheli, xoxa kafushane ngoMathewu 24:4-22) (rs-ZU 181-91)
Izingxenye ezithile zalesiprofetho azizange zigcwaliseke, okwakubonisa ukuthi zazizogcwaliseka esikhathini sakamuva
(kc 108-9)
IsAmbulo isahluko 6 naso sikhomba phambili ekuthwesweni kukaJesu umqhele ngesikhathi sempi, ukuntuleka kokudla, nenhlu-
pheko emhlabeni (re-ZU 93-8)
Salotshwa eminyakeni engaphezu kwengxenye yesine yekhulu leminyaka ngemva kokuphela kwesimiso sobuJuda
No. 2-ZU
9/07Ukuvumelana kwemininingwane ekusAmbulo 6 nekuMathewu 24 kufakazela ukuthi isiprofetho sikaJesu esikuMathewu 24 sa-
siyosebenza nasesikhathini esizayo
Kuwushiya ungaphenduliwe lombuzo: Siqala nini ukusebenza noma ukugcwaliseka ngokwesibili?
OFakazi BakaJehova baye babonisa ngokusekelwe eBhayibhelini nasemlandweni ukuthi ukusebenza okukhulu kukaMathewu 24
bekulokhu kuqhubeka kusukela ekumisweni koMbuso ezulwini ngo-1914
Izimpi zezwe, ukuntuleka kokudla, ukuzamazama komhlaba, ukushumayela, kuqinisekisa ukusebenza kwalesosiprofetho (gm-
ZU 136-42, 147-8)
Lombuzo usasala: Izinsuku zokugcina zisho ukuthini kithi?
SIPHILA EZINSUKWINI ZOKUGCINA (14 imiz.)
Lapho kukhulunywa ‘ngezinsuku zokugcina’ eBhayibhelini akukhulunywa kuphela ngezinsuku zokugcina zesimiso sezinto sobu-
Juda
Esinye isiprofetho esiphathelene ‘nezinsuku zokugcina’ sitholakala kweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-7 (Funda ivesi 1, umongo wamavesi
2-7)
UPawulu uchaza inkambo nezimo zengqondo ezazizovama phakathi kwalabo abathi bangamaKristu ezinsukwini zokugcina
UPawulu wayengabhekiseli ezinsukwini zokugcina zesimiso sezinto sobuJuda (kc 105-6; it-2 206-7; w77-ZU 2/15 95 [w76 512])
Ingabe empeleni lesiprofetho ‘sezinsuku zokugcina’ esikweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-7 siyasebenza manje?
Uma nakanjani sisebenza manje, inkambo yokusindisa ukuphila nayo iyadingeka manje
Umfanekiso kaJesu wamabele nokhula usisiza ukuba siqonde futhi sibone ukuthi zibhekiselaphi ‘izinsuku zokugcina’ okukhulunywa
ngazo kweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1 (Khulumela uMathewu 13:24-30)
“Amabele” avela embewini enhle ayesho “abantwana bombuso,” abalandeli bakhe abathembekile (Mat 13:37-43)
“Ukhula” lwalungamaKristu mbumbulu ayeyozihlanganisa nabathembekile; lwaluyovunyelwa ukuba lukhule ngokwanele, luye-
kwe kuze kube isikhathi “sokuvuna”
Njengoba kunjalo nangeyesi-2 Thimothewu 3, ‘lolukhula’ lwalukhomba phambili ekuhlubukeni
Kodwa “isiphelo sesimiso sezinto” okubhekiselwe kuso kuMathewu 13 (NW) sasingenakusho isimiso sobuJuda, ngisho nangendle-
la yokwandulela; kumelwe ukuba kwakungesinye isiphelo, isiphelo sesikhathi esizayo sesinye isimiso
Ukubhujiswa kweJerusalema ngo-70 C.E. kwathinta amaJuda, hhayi abantu ababesho ngokungeyikho ukuthi balandela “iNdo-
dana yomuntu,” uJesu Kristu
AmaKristu mbumbulu nayizihlubuki awazange asheshe abonakale kwaze kwaba kamuva kakhulu
Ngakho “isiphelo” okukhulunywa ngaso kuMathewu 13 kumelwe sisebenze esikhathini esasizofika ngemva kokufa kwaba-
phostoli; ‘lesisiphelo’ esasibikezelwe yileso esaqala ngo-1914 (w82-ZU 1/15 23 [w81 8/1 22])
Sonke singavuma ukuthi manje, phakathi nesiphelo sesimiso esibi sezinto sikaSathane, imiphumela yokuhlubuka kwabantu aba-
bezisholo ngamanga ukuthi bangamaKristu ibonakala ngokusobala, njengoba ukhula lubonakala kalula ngesikhathi sokuvuna,
lapho selukhule ngokwanele
Lesithelo esesivuthiwe sobubi kumaKristu okuzisholo sichazwa kweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-7
Ngakho kufanelekile ukuthi isiprofetho esikweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-7 sisebenza manje
Manje, njengoba kunamaKristu okuzisholo (ukhula) amaningi kunanini ngaphambili, sibona izinga lokungabi namthetho, ubu-
bi, elingakaze libonwe
Umehluko phakathi ‘kokhula’ (amaKristu okuzisholo) ‘namabele’ (amaKristu eqiniso) usobala
Ngakho isiprofetho seBhayibheli sikuveza ngokusobala ukuthi siphila ezinsukwini zokugcina
Isiprofetho sikaPawulu sihlangana nomfanekiso kaJesu wamabele nokhula ukuze sifakazele ukuthi ukuphela kobubi kuzofika
ngokushesha
KUDINGEKA ISINYATHELO UKUZE SISINDE EZINSUKWINI ZOKUGCINA (7 imiz.)
Kudingeke ngempela ukuba sibonise ngokuziphatha kwethu kokwesaba uNkulunkulu nangokuzinikela kwethu ukuthi siyaqaphe-
la ukuthi lezi ‘yizinsuku zokugcina’ (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:3, 4, 10a, 11, 12a, qhathanisa neNW) (w06-ZU 12/15 16-18)
Abahleki bosulu baningi, njengoba kumelwe ukuthi babebaningi naseJerusalema ngaphambi nje kokubhujiswa kwalo ngo-70 C.E.
Kubantu abaningi abaqotho abakuqaphelayo ukuthi ukubhujiswa okuwumvuthwandaba kwalesimiso kuyasondela, kudingeka
izinguquko endleleni yabo yokuphila (w89-ZU 10/1 13)
“Izenzo ezingcwele zokuziphatha” zibalulekile; zingase zisho ukwenza indlela yomuntu yokuphila ivumelane nezindinganiso
eziphakeme zikaNkulunkulu ezitholakala eZwini lakhe
“Izenzo zokuzinikela kokwesaba uNkulunkulu” zifunwa uNkulunkulu; zihilela ukuhlanganyela ekushumayeleni ngoMbuso
uJesu akubikezelela lesikhathi (Mat 24:14)
OFakazi BakaJehova bangakujabulela ukukusiza ngesifundo seBhayibheli samahhala ekhaya lakho
Ngalabo kakade asebekhonza uJehova kulezinsuku zokugcina, kudingekile ukuba bahlale beqaphile, bangabi matasa ngeminako yo-
kuphila kwansuku zonke
Kudingeka sizibuze: ‘Ingabe ngiyashiseka ekushumayeleni nasekufundiseni, ngazi futhi ngikholelwa ukuthi lezi yizinsuku zoku-
gcina? Ingabe ukuba ngokoqobo kwezinsuku zokugcina kuyakuthinta ukuphila kwami kwansuku zonke namacebo ami esikha-
thini esizayo?’
NoJesu waveza ingozi yokuba matasa ngezinto ezivamile zokuphila—ukudla, ukuphuza, ukushada; wagcizelela isidingo sokuqa-
pha (Mat 24:38, 42)
Kakade sinesibusiso esikhulu ngenxa yokuthi siyazi ukuthi sisezinsukwini zokugcina, siphila esiphelweni sesimiso sezinto, futhi
kakade senza intando kaNkulunkulu; manje kumelwe siqaphe futhi siqine ukuze sisinde (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:14) (w86-ZU 5/1
15-20)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 2-ZU—ikhasi 2
5 1991 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUKUKHONZA NENHLANGANO KAJEHOVA ENOBUNYE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe y isikhulumi:
Yakha ukwazisa ngenhlangano kaJehova yasemhlabeni nendima ebalulekile eyifezayo ebuhlotsheni bethu naye. Bo-
nisa ukuthi ukwamukela le nhlangano kubalulekile, njengoba injongo kaJehova ‘iwukuphinde abuthele ndawonye
zonke izinto kuKristu.’ (Efe 1:10) Yenza kukhanye ukuthi yilabo abangena futhi bahlale ebunyeni noJehova nenhla-
ngano yakhe kuphela abayothola ukuphila
UMKHAYA WABAKHULEKELI BAKAJEHOVA UJABULELA UBUNYE BANGEMPELA (5 imiz.)
UJehova unguNkulunkulu ojabulayo, akayena uNkulunkulu ozihlukanisayo (1Thim 1:11)
Uyakujabulela ukuzungezwa yizixuku zezikhonzi ezithembekile azidala (IHu 103:20, 21)
UMdali wethu unguBaba wasezulwini onomkhaya omkhulu wabantwana abadalwe ngezindlela ezihluka-
hlukene nabanobuntu obungafani—amaserafi, amakherubi, izingelosi, nabantu (Dan 7:9, 10; it-1 106-8,
431-2; it-2 896-7)
Bonke benza umkhaya ojabulayo, onobunye
Izinceku zikaJehova zasemhlabeni namuhla zingafaniswa nomkhaya womhlaba wonke onobunye (1Pet 5:9;
w96-ZU 7/15 10-15)
Ziwumthombo wokuthula nobunye ezweni eligcwele izingxabano nokungezwani
Ubunye nenhlala-kahle engokomoya kuthuthukiswa ukuhlangana njalo nokuhlanganyela enkonzweni
Ukuba nomoya ongcwele kaNkulunkulu kuveza izithelo zawo ezisenza sibe nobunye (Gal 5:19-23)
Ngokuzithoba entandweni kaNkulunkulu nangokubonisa uthando, umkhaya kaJehova wembulunga yonke
ulondoloza ubunye bawo (1Joh 4:16; 5:3)
INHLANGANO KAJEHOVA YASEZULWINI IFANISWA NOMFAZI (7 imiz.)
UJehova ushade nenhlangano yakhe yasezulwini yezidalwa zomoya (re-ZU 10, 177-8; it-2 1198)
Inhlangano yakhe enjengomfazi izala abantwana (Isaya 54:1, 5, 6)
Njengoba uJehova enguBaba, “umfazi” wakhe ungumama (Gal 4:26; w85-ZU 3/15 12  ̊16 [w85 3/15 14  ̊16])
Injabulo yangempela ihilela ukuvumelana ngokugcwele noBaba nomama (IzA 1:8, 9)
Abantwana abahlubukayo bayenqaba ukuthi uJehova unguYise nokuthi inhlangano yakhe enjengomfazi ingu-
nina
USathane nenzalo yakhe bayizihlubuki; bazimisela eyabo inhlangano (Joh 8:42-44; w85-ZU 3/15 13-16 [w85
3/15 15-18])
Sekuyiminyaka eminingi kunobutha phakathi kowesifazane kaNkulunkulu noSathane (Gen 3:15; IsAm 12:
1, 17)
U-Israyeli wemvelo wayeyinhlangano kaJehova yasemhlabeni ngaphansi kwesivumelwano soMthetho iminyaka
engu-1 500 (Eks 19:5, 6)
Sekuyiminyaka engu-1 900 u-Israyeli ongokomoya eyinhlangano kaJehova ebonakalayo ngaphansi kwesivume-
lwano esisha (Gal 6:15, 16; it-1 1234)
Insali egcotshiwe yakha “inceku ethembekileyo neqondayo” (Math 24:45-47)
Isixuku esikhulu sezinye izimvu sihlanganyela nensali ekwakheni inhlangano kaJehova ebonakalayo namuhla
(w85-ZU 10/15 31)
UKUBA MUNYE AKUSHO UKUFANA (2 imiz.)
Izinhlangano ezenziwe abantu zizama ukwenza bonke ukuba bafane, njengamarobhothi (w88-ZU 8/15 30)
Ukwakha ubunye kusho ukuhlanganisa, ukuletha labo abanobuntu obuhlukahlukene ekuvumelaneni
Kunjengomzimba womuntu ovumelana kahle (1Ko 12:14-18)
Ubunye busho ukusebenza ndawonye njengeqembu nivumelana ngokugcwele
Bonke banenhloso efanayo, umbono, umgomo, nenjongo eyodwa ekuphileni
Basebenza ngobunye (Efe 4:2-6, 11-13)
UJEHOVA ULUNGISELELA UKUHLANGANISWA FUTHI KWESINTU ESINESONO (13 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu, uMhlengi, uwukuphela kwendlela yokubuyiselwa kwesintu (Math 20:28; Ro 5:18)
UJehova usinikeza iketanga lokuba siphinde sihlanganiswe naye ngokuqinile
UJesu Kristu usebunyeni, noma yena noYise, uJehova, banenjongo eyodwa (Joh 10:30; kuyi-Kingdom Inter-
linear, phawula ukuthi elithi “munye” liyisimo esisho [into] engenabulili)
Ubunye abusho ukuba nesiqu esisodwa (sowesilisa) njengengxenye kankulunkulu onguziqu-zintathu, ko-
dwa busho ubunye ngokuphathelene nenjongo, ubunye bezindinganiso (obungenasimo sobulili) (rs-ZU 436;
ti-ZU 24)
Abalandeli bakaKristu abagcotshiwe abangu-144 000, ‘abayizinto ezisezulwini,’ benziwa babe nobunye obufa-
nayo (isimo esingenabulili) (Efe 1:9, 10; Joh 17:21, Kingdom Interlinear; w75-ZU 10/15 466-9 [w74 618-21])
No. 3-ZU
9/07Isinyathelo esilandelayo siwukubenza babe nobunye labo abayoba isigaba sasemhlabeni, ‘izinto ezisemhlabe-
ni’ (w75-ZU 10/15 470-1 [w74 622-3])
“Ezinye izimvu” zilethwa emhlambini munye nabagcotshiwe (Joh 10:16; w95-ZU 2/1 10-11  ̊4-10)
Abagcotshiwe abasemhlabeni bakha “inceku ethembekileyo neqondayo” (Mat 24:45-47; je-ZU 9)
Namuhla, “isixuku esikhulu” sezinye izimvu kumelwe sikhonze ngobunye nensali ‘yomhlambi omncane’ ka-
Kristu (IsAm 7:9; Luka 12:32; Mika 2:12; Zak 8:23; w85-ZU 3/15 17-18 [w85 3/15 19-20])
Ngaleli ketanga lokuhlanganisa futhi, insali egcotshiwe nesixuku esikhulu ngobunye banikela inkonzo engcwe-
le kuJehova
Kusukela ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-19, kuye kwavela inhlangano ephawulekayo yasemhlabeni futhi iye
yasakazekela emazweni angaphezu kuka-230 (Math 5:14; je-ZU 8-11)
KUYINGOZI UKUBHEKA INHLANGANO KAJEHOVA YASEMHLABENI NGOMBONO WABANTU (6 imiz.)
Abanye bayagxeka, bethi uJehova akanayo inhlangano
Bangase bathi okubaluleke ngempela ukuthanda umakhelwane noma bathi ukuba nobuhlobo noNkulunkulu
noma ngisho nokuthi ukuzifundela iBhayibheli kwanele (rs-ZU 103-5)
Labo ababa nemibono enjalo banjengoSathane
Bayahlubuka kuYise, uJehova (1Thim 1:19, 20; 2Thim 2:16-19)
Ngokwenqaba inhlangano kaJehova, abanjalo benqaba isivikelo sikaMalusi Omuhle, ‘onomhlambi’ owodwa ku-
phela (Joh 10:16)
Abantu abanjalo bagcizelela ukusindiswa komuntu siqu, hhayi ukulwelwa kukaJehova (w88-ZU 1/15 17-18;
hp 191)
KHONZA EDUZE NENHLANGANO KAJEHOVA ENOBUNYE (12 imiz.)
Ukuze siqhubeke sikhonza uNkulunkulu ngokukhuthazela, kudingeka siyazi inhlangano kaJehova (rs-ZU 98-9)
Kudingeka sihlangane njalo emihlanganweni yebandla (Heb 10:23-25)
Kudingeka siqinise nobuhlobo bethu noJehova ngomthandazo (w89-ZU 5/15 21)
Sikhule okholweni, sithembele ekuholeni kukaKristu (Math 23:10)
Sihlanganyele ngokuqhubekayo ekunikeleni inkonzo engcwele (IsAm 7:15)
Sizithobe ngenjabulo ‘esimisweni sokuqondisa’ sikaJehova sokubuthela ndawonye emhlambini owodwa onobu-
nye kokubili abasele besigaba sasezulwini nesixuku esikhulu sesigaba sasemhlabeni (Efe 1:10)
Sibasekele ngokwethembeka abadala enhlanganweni kaJehova (w02-ZU 8/1 13-14  ̊18-20)
Ukusinda enhlekeleleni yezwe siyokuthola kuphela ngokuhlala sisebunyeni noJehova noMbuso wakhe omiswe
ngaphansi kukaKristu Jesu kusukela ngo-1914 (Heb 12:28; w89-ZU 9/1 19)
Kwenze lokhu ngokwamukela ngokwazisa amalungiselelo angokomoya enziwa inhlangano kaJehova (wt-ZU
134-5)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUBUFAKAZI BOKUBA KHONA KUKANKULUNKULU EZWENI ELISIZUNGEZILE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Kokubili indalo neBhayibheli kunikeza ubufakazi bokuba khona kukaNkulunkulu. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuphila kwalabo
ababa amaKristu eqiniso kufakazela ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu ngenxa yoshintsho abalwenzayo ngosizo lweBhayibhe-
li. Khuthaza bonke ukuba bangakholelwa kuphela ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona kodwa benze ngokuvumelana naleyonkole-
lo ngendlela abaphila ngayo
INDALO INIKEZA UBUFAKAZI BOKUTHI UNKULUNKULU UYAPHILA, FUTHI YEMBULA IZIMFANELO ZAKHE
(22 imiz.)
Ukungakholelwa kuNkulunkulu kuthinta izigidi zabantu (gZU80 5/8 3-5 [g79 11/8 3-4])
Abaningi baphika ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu ngokuqondile, bethi uNkulunkulu akekho
Abanye bathi uNkulunkulu akaziwa, bethi abaqiniseki ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona yini noma cha
Mhlawumbe abantu abaningi bathi bayakholelwa kuNkulunkulu kodwa baphikisa lokho abakushoyo ngokuziphatha kokungame-
sabi uNkulunkulu
Ngisho nomkhulekeli kaJehova kumelwe aqaphele ukuthi akasho ukuthi ukholelwa kuNkulunkulu kodwa ngasese enze se-
ngathi uNkulunkulu akekho
Abaningi abaphika ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu nabathi uNkulunkulu akaziwa benza kanjalo ngenxa yokuthi izazi zefilosofi
‘ezidumile’ noma ‘abantu abahlakaniphile’ bezwe nabo bayakungabaza ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu (ce 179-83)
Kodwa kunengqondo yini ukuholwa abantu abanjalo?
Bheka izwe ‘abantu abahlakaniphile’ abasenzele lona, ligcwele ubugebengu, indlala, impi
Ukucabanga ngendalo kuholela esiphethweni sokuthi yenziwa uMuntu othile
Ukucabanga okunjalo kusekelwe kokuhlangenwe nakho, lokho thina noma abanye esiye sakubona, sakuzwa, noma sakuphawula
Sisebenzisa ukucabanga okuyisisekelo kokuthi umphumela ubangelwa okuthile, siphetha ngokuthi akukho lutho oluzivelela ngo-
kwalo; lunembangela (LmnZU 8-10; gZU86 5/8 10-11 [g86 5/8 16-17])
IBhayibheli libhekisela esimisweni esinjalo: “Yileyondlu yakhiwa ngothile” (Heb 3:4)
Ingabe iwashi lakho laba khona ngokwalo nakho konke ukusebenza kwalo okuyinkimbinkimbi?
Kunalokho, ingabe iwashi aliwona umkhiqizo wengqondo ehlakaniphile, nehlelekile? (wZU73 7/15 315 [w73 35-6])
Ngokufanayo, bheka izindikimba zasezulwini okwabekwa ngazo amawashi esikhathini ngokunembile
Ingabe nazo ngokufanayo bezingeke zibe noMenzi ohlakaniphile?
Ukuba khona komklamo emzimbeni womuntu kubonisa ukuthi kunoMklami ohlakaniphile (g90 7/22 27; gZU88 6/8 3-10 [g88 6/8
3-12])
Njengoba sazi ukuthi ukuhlakanipha akubi khona ngaphandle komuntu, kumelwe siphethe ngokuthi indalo ibonisa ukuba kho-
na komdali noMenzi, uMuntu Ohlakaniphile—uNkulunkulu!
Ukucabanga ngendalo futhi kwembula izimfanelo zikaMenzi ngezinga elithile (Funda abaseRoma 1:20)
Ngokwesibonelo, ukuhleleka nokuhlakanipha kuyabonakala emklamweni wendawo yonke (ce 122-5)
Ngokuvelele, izimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu zothando nobuhle ziyabonakala endalweni (Mat 5:45; IzE 14:16, 17)
Bonke abantu—abahle nababi—baye bazuza elangeni nasemvuleni
Imizimba yethu yayingadalelwanga nje ukuba siphile kodwa ukuba sijabulele ukuphila (peZU 37-8)
UMdali wayengaphoqelekile ukuba asenze ngaleyondlela, kodwa wasenza ngoba muhle
Ingabe lokhu akubona ubufakazi bokuba khona kukaNkulunkulu nobobuhle bakhe?
Ngaphandle kobufakazi obunjalo bangaphandle, ngisho nathi, njengengxenye yendalo, sinikeza ubufakazi bokuba khona kukaNku-
lunkulu nobezimfanelo zakhe; kungani kunjalo?
Imfanelo kaNkulunkulu yobulungisa yembuliwe kunembeza asinike wona sonke (Funda abaseRoma 2:14, 15) (wZU73 7/15 316-17
[w73 36-7])
Nomaphi futhi noma nini lapho abantu beye baphila khona, kuye kwaba nomuzwa wemvelo wokulungile nokungalungile
Unembeza ngokungaguquguquki ulahla ukona okufanayo okuyisisekelo kuyo yonke imiphakathi; uvikela abantu ukuba banga-
yonakalisi ngokuphelele indalo engabantu
Ingabe lokhu akubonisi ukuba khona koMdali, uNkulunkulu wobulungisa?
Nokho, abanye baphikisa ngokuthi ababulali, abadlwenguli, nezidlova ezinonya bayaphikisana nalesiphetho; ingabe kunjalo?
Ukuphendukezelwa kwezimfanelo zokwesaba uNkulunkulu akumelwe kusolelwe kuMenzi
Izinkulungwane zingase zilambe engxenyeni ethile yomhlaba phakathi nesikhathi sendlala, kodwa akungenxa yokuntuleka
kobuhle ngasohlangothini lukaNkulunkulu
Ubugovu obungokwezomnotho babantu nemingcele engokobuzwe eyenziwe ngabantu okumelwe kusolwe (gZU86 7/8
19 [g86 6/22 19])
Ukuthi izigidi zabantu abangenacala zahlupheka lapho amaNazi ecoboshisa abantu ngokungemthetho akufakazeli ukuthi
uNkulunkulu wobulungisa wenza abantu bengenawo unembeza
Lona kanye iqiniso lokuthi sisabela ngokwethuka empathweni yonya yamaNazi lifakazela ukuthi ayephendukezela
umuzwa womuntu kanembeza nobulungisa
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ukuqulwa kwamacala kwaseNuremberg kwalahla izelelesi zempi zamaNazi ngokwephula
“umthetho wemvelo ophakeme wobulungisa”
Ukuzindla ngezimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu kusiphoqelela ukuba siphethe ngokuthi uyobususa ububi
Ukubheka indalo kuye kwembula uNkulunkulu onothando, omuhle onomuzwa wobulungisa
Ngokunengqondo, ukuba khona kwezimo ezimbi, ezingalungile kumelwe kuphele ngelinye ilanga
UNkulunkulu omuhle nolungile ngeke akubekezelele phakade ukuba khona kwazo
Ngokunengqondo, ingabe uMuntu omuhle kanjalo wayengeke asazise isizathu sokuba khona kobubi, ukuthi kungani abantu befa,
nokuthi kuyophela kanjani futhi nini? (Amo 3:7; 1Kor 2:8-10)
Yebo, futhi ukwenza lokho ngeBhayibheli; ukulitadisha kungayiphendula leyomibuzo
No. 4-ZU
3/91Kodwa ukuze ukukholelwe lokho, ake sibone indlela iBhayibheli ngokwalo elisinikeza ngayo ubufakazi obengeziwe bokuba kho-
na kukaNkulunkulu futhi libonakalise izimfanelo zakhe ezibabazekayo
NEBHAYIBHELI LINIKEZA UBUFAKAZI BOKUBA KHONA KUKANKULUNKULU (13 imiz.)
Ukutadisha iBhayibheli ngokucophelela kufakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona, ukuthi liyiZwi lakhe
Iziprofetho ezitholakala eBhayibhelini zazingavela kuphela emthonjeni ophakeme kunomuntu (gmZU 117)
Emakhulwini eminyaka ngaphambili, iziprofetho zeBhayibheli ezinembile zabhalwa ngokuzalwa, ukuphila, nokufa kukaJesu nje-
ngoMesiya (gZU88 8/8 24-5 [g88 8/8 26-7]; ce 221)
Ingabe uJesu wayengazilawula lezizici, noma kunalokho ingabe iziprofetho azinikezi ubufakazi bokuba khona koMuntu waphe-
zulu?
Kokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho, ingabe ukhona yini umuntu omaziyo owayengabikezela izinto eziningi zaloluhlobo, emakhu-
lwini eminyaka ngaphambili, futhi enze ukuba zonke zigcwaliseke?
Kanjalo iziprofetho zeBhayibheli zifakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona; zibonisa futhi ukuthi iBhayibheli liyindlela yakhe
yokudlulisela injongo yakhe kubantu, liphendula imibuzo yabo ngokuphila (2Ti 3:16)
Izimiso zeBhayibheli lapho zisetshenziswa ngokoqobo zifakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona nokuthi iBhayibheli liyiZwi lakhe
Akukhulunywa ngogwayi eBhayibhelini, kodwa izimiso zibonisa ukuthi kungani kungamelwe usetshenziswe (gmZU 165-74)
Kuwukuzingcolisa umzimba nezingubo nomoya (2Kor 7:1)
Ukusebenzisa kabi ugwayi kubangela ukufa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwabantu abangaphezu kwesigidi unyaka ngamunye
Uyalutha; uma umuntu engakwazi ukuyeka umkhuba kagwayi, ‘ubuswa yiwo’ (1Kor 6:12)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli sihlangene nenhlala-kahle yethu engokomzimba nengokomzwelo
IBhayibheli lithi umuntu akumelwe aqambe amanga (IzA 6:19; IsAm 21:8)
“IU.S. ibhekene nokugqashuka okubi kakhulu kokuphamba, ukukhohlisa nobunye ubugebengu obuhlobene nakho emlandwe-
ni wayo” (Changing Times, July 1986, k. 26)
ImiBhalo ithi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena” (Mat 22:39)
“Khona-ke, kubonakala ukuthi ukuba nendaba nabanye abantu cishe kuyingxenye yemvelo yobuntu njengokuzinakekela
thina” (Psychology Today, October 1988, kk. 38-9)
Izindinganiso zeBhayibheli ngomshado nokuziphatha ziqinile (Mat 19:4-7; 1Kor 7:12-15)
Namuhla, imikhuba yokuziphatha okungenamingcele iyaphikisana neziyalezo zeBhayibheli
Lokhu kuye kwaletha ukungajabuli, hhayi injabulo; kuphumela emakhayeni ahlukene, izifo, ubufebe, nabantwana aba-
ngafunwa
IBhayibheli linikeza iseluleko esingcono kakhulu kubantu abashadile ngokuphathelene nokuxazulula izinkinga zasemshadweni
Leluleka ngokwethembeka komuntu kumlingane wakhe
Futhi leluleka kokubili umfazi nendoda ukuba baqaphele indawo yomunye nomunye (1Kor 11:3; Efe 5:28, 29, 33; 1Ti 2:11-14)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli sisiza ekubhekaneni nobumpofu (IzA 6:6-11; 23:19-21)
Izixwayiso zalo zisiza umuntu ukuba angaphendukeli ebugebengwini noma ekugembuleni (Hu 37:1)
Ngempela, iBhayibheli linosizo; iseluleko salo siyasebenza, futhi lokhu kufakazela ukuthi livela eMthonjeni ophakeme kakhulu ku-
namakhono abantu
BONISA EKUPHILENI KWAKHO UBUFAKAZI BOKUTHI UNKULUNKULU UKHONA (8 imiz.)
Akubona bonke abantu ababonisa ngokuzithandela ekuphileni kwabo ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona
Abaningi bathi bayakholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona, bathi yilabo abaphika ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu nabathi uNku-
lunkulu akaziwa kuphela abangakungabaza lokho
Nokho, bangase bebe, baziphathe ngokuxekethile, noma baqambe amanga, bezibonakalisa ‘beyiziwula’ (Funda iHubo 14:1)
Igama lesiHeberu elihunyushwe ngokuthi “isiwula” libonisa ukuntuleka kokuziphatha, hhayi okwengqondo (gZU73 12/8 20
[w73 451])
Ngabanye, abaningi abangamaKristu manje baye banikeza ubufakazi bokuba khona kukaNkulunkulu ngoshintsho abaye balwenza
ekuphileni kwabo
Lokhu kwenzeka kubantu ekhulwini lokuqala leminyaka C.E. (1Kor 6:9-11)
Nanamuhla, abantu baye balwenza lolushintsho oluyinhloko; ngokunokwenzeka ngisho nawe uye walwenza (Ungase uthande uku-
nikeza isibonelo) (wZU89 8/1 30-1; gmZU 177-8)
Lokhu kunikeza ubufakazi kwababukele bokuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona ngempela futhi uyabasiza abantu abakholelwa ngoko-
qobo kuye futhi bafune usizo lwakhe
Uma wazi ngesidingo soshintsho olunjalo ekuphileni kwakho—ukuqeda imikhuba emibi noma yokuziphatha okubi, ukulahla uba-
ndlululo lobuhlanga—ungazuza isibindi ngesibonelo sabanye
Njengabantu abakholelwayo ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasungula izimiso zeBhayibheli eziphakeme, siyosebenzelana ngokufanele na-
banye
Siyosebenzisa izimiso ezingokomBhalo ngokuqondene nobuhlanga ekuphileni kwethu ngabanye
Futhi, siyolalela imithetho kaKesari futhi sibonise inhlonipho ngeziphathimandla zikahulumeni
Amalungu emikhaya ayosebenzelana ngothando elinye nelinye, azi ukuthi lokhu kuyintando kaNkulunkulu
Akukhona ukwamukela ngengqondo kuphela ukuba ngokoqobo kukaNkulunkulu nokuvuma izimfanelo zakhe ezinhle kodwa ubu-
fakazi bomuntu siqu ukuze abanye babone ukuthi siyazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona (wZU89 8/1 28)
KONKE OKUPHILAYO KUZOKWAZI NGOKUSHESHA UKUBA NGOKOQOBO KUKANKULUNKULU (2 imiz.)
Ngokushesha sonke isihlamba esinqwatshelaniswe egameni likaNkulunkulu ngabantu namademoni sizobe singasekho
Ngalesosikhathi ukukhathalela kwakhe kozwela ngazo zonke izingxenye zendalo kuyoba sobala ngisho nangokwengeziwe
Injongo kaNkulunkulu iyokwenziwa ize iphelele futhi iyokwaziswa indalo yonke ehlakaniphile
Ngokuhlakanipha manje sitadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, sizindle ngokuba khona kwakhe nobuhle bakhe kithi, futhi sizibeke ohlwi-
ni lwabayothola izibusiso ezingapheli nabantu bakhe
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 4-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUPHILA KOMKHAYA OKUJABULISAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Bonisa ukuthi imikhaya ayimane ibe nobuhlobo obuseduze ngokuzenzekelayo kodwa kudingeka isikhathi nomzamo. Ye-
nza izilaleli ziqiniseke ngokuphelele ukuthi izinkinga zingaxazululwa ngokubambelela ngokuqinile ezimisweni zeBhayi-
bheli. Le nkulumo ungayibeki njengendaba nje emnandi eqanjiwe; kodwa yenze isebenze ngokoqobo futhi ibe usizo ezi-
lalelini zakho
UKUBA NOMKHAYA OJABULISAYO FUTHI OHLONIPHEKAYO KUWUFANELE UMZAMO (4 imiz.)
Imikhaya esebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli, ephila ngokuvumelana nobuKristu beqiniso, ijabula ngokwengeziwe futhi ihloni-
pheka kakhulu kunemikhaya evamile (w99-ZU 1/1 3-5)
Ungase uqaphele izici okudingeka umkhaya wakho uzithuthukise—ukuxabana kwamalungu omkhaya, izinkinga ezinga-
dingekile ezivelayo, ukungavumelani
UNkulunkulu walungiselela iseluleko esiphelele eBhayibhelini ukuze sisisize sifinyelele umgomo wokuba nomkhaya ojabu-
layo
UnguMsunguli womshado ngakho wazi kahle ukuthi yini eyenza umkhaya uphumelele nokuthi yini ewenza uhluleke fu-
thi ungajabuli (Gen 1:28; 2:18, 22-24)
Manje sizoxoxa ngendima yendoda, yomfazi kanye neyabantwana; sizoxoxa nangengxenye ngamunye angayifeza ukuze enze
ikhaya libe nenjabulo futhi libe elihloniphekayo
Sizocabangela nendlela okungaxazululwa ngayo izinkinga ezithile ezingase zivele
UMBHANGQWANA ONGENABUGOVU, ISIHLUTHULELO SEKHAYA ELINENJABULO (12 imiz.)
Indoda yabelwe ukuba ibe yinhloko yomkayo kodwa kufanele imphathe ngothando futhi ingabi nobugovu (fy-ZU 31-4)
Njengenhloko yomkhaya, inomsebenzi onzima wokuhola nowokwenza izinqumo ezibalulekile
Kumelwe ‘yazise umkayo’ (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 3:7) (g94-ZU 10/8 19-21)
Lokhu kwenza umkayo ahlonipheke (okuyisici esimenza abe nedumela elihle nezimfanelo ezinhle) futhi uba udumo,
noma ‘inkazimulo’ yangempela kumyeni wakhe (1Kor 11:7)
Bobabili, umfazi nendoda bayamukeleka kuNkulunkulu; kodwa umfazi kumelwe azithobe kumyeni wakhe (Funda eyo-
ku-1 Petru 3:1, 5, 6)
Incwadi kaGenesise ayisitsheli ngokuqondile ukuthi uSara wayebiza u-Abrahama ngokuthi “nkosi” ngokuzwakalayo ko-
dwa ithi wayembiza kanjalo “ngaphakathi” (Gen 18:9-12)
Umfazi ongumKristu kufanele asekele umyeni wakhe futhi ahlakulele imfanelo yokumhlonipha ngokusuka enhliziyweni
(w03-ZU 11/1 14-15; fy-ZU 34-5)
Kubalulekile ukuba umbhangqwana ungabi nabugovu, ngoba lokho kuwenza ukwazi ukusibekela ukungapheleli kobuntu
(w93-ZU 9/1 20; w85-ZU 11/1 17-18)
Ukusondelana kwendoda nomfazi kubanikeza amathuba amahle okubona ngokoqobo iqiniso lamazwi encwadi yezEnzo 20:
35 (Funda)
Ukungabi nabugovu kuhilela ukuba umuntu acabangele imiphumela eyolethwa indlela ajabulisa ngayo lowo ashade naye
Ngokwesibonelo, kungaba umusa ongalungile ngenkosikazi uma iphekela umyeni wayo okhuluphele ukudla okunama-
futha, ngoba leso senzo somusa singadala umonakalo omkhulu kunokuba simzuzise
Indoda nomfazi abashadile kudingeka bakhulumisane ngaso sonke isikhathi (w99-ZU 7/15 21-3; g01-ZU 11-13)
Ukukhulumisana okunjalo kushukumisela ukuba ngamunye abonise uthando, olungazifuneli okwalo (1Ko 13:5)
Ngokuvamile ngumfazi oyothanda ukuxoxa kunendoda kodwa udinga isiqinisekiso sokuthi umyeni wakhe ulalela ngo-
kucophelela nangenjabulo lapho eveza umbono wakhe
Ngaphezu kwalokho, indoda kudingeka yazi ukuthi iziphi izinto umkayo azithandayo nangazithandi; ngokuvamile inge-
nza umkhaya ujabule ngokusho amazwi ambalwa abonisa ukuqonda nokuthi iyakhathalela
Lapho umbhangqwana oshadile ukhulumisana, kuba nomoya wokwenama endlini, ngoba uyasondelana uthandane unga-
bi nezinkinga ezinkulu ezibangela ukuba ucindezeleke
ABANTWANA ABASONDELENE NABAZALI BABO BAYISIBUSISO EMKHAYENI (9 imiz.)
Abantwana bawumvuzo (Funda iHubo 127: 3-5)
Ukuba nabantwana kuba isibusiso esikhulu nakakhulu lapho abazali nabantwana bekwazi ukukhulumisana kahle (fy-ZU
65-6)
Akukho okujabulisa ngaphezu kokuba nengane ekuthandayo nekwethembayo futhi akukho okujabulisa kakhulu ku-
nokubona indlela oyiqeqesha ngayo iyisiza ukuba ikhule ibonisa ukuhlakanipha nokholo
Kufanele uyazi ngempela ingane yakho (w03-ZU 2/15 23-7)
Ukuze ukwazi ukukufinyelela lokhu, kudingeka isikhathi, umzamo nesithakazelo esiqotho (Dut 6:6, 7; w88-ZU 5/1 5; g85
1/8 8)
Nikeza ingane yakho isikhathi ukuze ikwazi ukuveza imizwa yayo futhi njengoba iveza imibono yayo, yinake ubonise
ukuthi ulalele ngempela
Ukuze ingane ikwethembe, kudingeka okwengeziwe kunokukhuluma nje nawe ngezinto ezivamile
Uma ikwethemba iyoshukumiseleka ukuba ikutshele ngisho nezinto eziyimfihlo, izinto ebingenakulokotha izitshele
abanye
Ukuze yakhe lokho kukwethemba kudingeka ulalele ngisho nalapho ikutshela izinto ezibonakala ziwubala kuwe (g93-ZU
7/22 4)
Ungalokothi kamuva wenze ihlaya kwabanye ngombono wengane noma ngalokho ekutshele kona, ngoba lokho kuyo-
yenza ingabe isakwethemba nhlobo
Ingane yakho iyokwethemba nakakhulu lapho ikuzwa uthandaza (fy-ZU 70)
Izinto ezingakusiza ukuze ingane yakho ihlale ikwethemba: Ungayijezisi lapho usathukuthele; bonisana nayo; ungayipha-
thisi okosana uma seyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili
No. 5-ZU
1/05Abazali bangenza kuheleze umoya wothando ekhaya ngokuhlela ukwenza izinto ezijabulisayo kanye nezingane zabo (w89-ZU
10/1 29; w86-ZU 8/1 28-9)
AmaKristu ayaqaphela ukuthi awanakuvumela abantwana bawo ukuba bahlanganyele ezintweni eziningi zezwe zokuzili-
bazisa
Isimiso esigcwele somsebenzi webandla esihlanganisa nokuzilibazisa njengomkhaya kanye nokujabulela ubudlelwane
obakhayo namanye amaKristu kuyozisiza izingane ukuba zimelane nokucindezela kokuba zihileleke emibuthanweni,
emaphathini nasekuzilibaziseni okubonisa “umoya wezwe” (1Ko 2:12)
Yenza izingane zazi ukuthi ziyingxenye yomkhaya ngempela; cabangela imibono yazo nezinto ezizithandayo
Nakuba abazali kumelwe benze isinqumo sokugcina, ngokuvamile kuhle ukubuza izingane ukuthi yini ezingathanda
ukuyenza ngamaholide, noma lapho umkhaya ushaywa umoya
NQOBA IZINSELELE EZIVELA EMKHAYENI WAKHO, UPHUMELELE (18 imiz.)
Awukho umkhaya ongenazinkinga namuhla, kodwa ngemizamo esiyenzayo singaphumelela ekwakheni umkhaya onothando
futhi onenjabulo
Ake sicabangele ezinye zezinkinga ezivamile nezinyathelo ezingathathwa ukuze zixazululwe
1. Ukukhulisa ingane eyihlongandlebe
2. Ukufundisa izingane esezevile kakade eminyakeni eyishumi nambili lapho abazali bethola amaqiniso
3. Ukufundisa izingane lapho abazali bengakhulekeli ndawonye
Uma ubhekene nesithiyo esihlukile, izinto esizokhuluma ngazo kanye nezimiso ezilandelayo zingaba usizo nakuwe
Inselele yokukhulisa ingane eyihlongandlebe inganqotshwa uma abazali bengaguquguquki, bengakhohliseki kalula futhi be-
bonisa uthando (fy-ZU 76-89)
Ukuyekelela ingane eyihlongandlebe akuyona indlela yokwenza isimo sasekhaya sibe ngcono (g03 5/8 20)
Akulula ukusebenzisa lesi seluleko—kudingeka ukubekezela kanye nokuzithiba—kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ku-
ngaveza ushintsho olujabulisayo
Ningavumeli ingane yenu ukuba kube iyona elawula injabulo yawo wonke umkhaya
Siza ingane yakho ukuba ibone ingxenye engayifeza ukuze yenze umkhaya ujabule
Ngezinye izikhathi abazali baba amaKristu ngemva kokuba izingane sezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili
Ungalindeli ushintsho olusheshayo
Isimiso esisencwadini yabaseGalathiya 6:7 siyasebenza; mhlawumbe nina njengomkhaya nabangane sekuyiminyaka ni-
hlwanyela “ukhula”
Manje kumelwe uqale ukuhlwanyela imbewu enhle futhi uyivumele ukuba ikhule kancane kancane ukuze ithathe inda-
wo yezindlela zangaphambili (w76-ZU 2/15 95 [w75 319-20]; fy-ZU 67-75)
Khuthaza izingane zakho ngesineke ukuze zikwazi ukuba nenhlonipho ngoNkulunkulu neZwi lakhe (Funda eyabaseKo-
lose 3:21)
Kungayidumaza kakhulu ingane uma ulokhu uyibelesela ngokugxeka imikhuba yayo emidala, ulindela ukuba ishintshe
ngokuphazima kweso
Siza lona osemusha abone ukuthi awukhathaleli nje kuphela ukumshumayeza kodwa umkhathalela kuzo zonke izici zo-
kuphila kwakhe
Lokhu kuyomenza angakuxwayi futhi angakubheki njengokungenangqondo ukumkhathalela kwakho kakhulu enda-
beni yokukhulekela uNkulunkulu
Le ndlela iyisisekelo senjabulo yomkhaya, ngoba ingenza umkhaya wonke ube nobunye (Gal 6:9)
Lapho umbhangqwana oshadile ungakahlangani ekukhulekeleni kweqiniso, lowo ongumKristu angaphumelela ekwenzeni
ukuba umkhaya ube nenjabulo (fy-ZU 129-32)
Lapho indoda isingumKristu, izindlela zayo ezithuthukile zingenza umkhaya uzinze nakakhulu zenze nomkayo aneliseke
Iba isisebenzi esingcono nomondli ongcono, izikhathalela ngokwengeziwe izingane, ayizinikeli kakhulu otshwaleni fu-
thi imcabangela ngokwengeziwe umkayo
Umfazi okholwayo angaba yithonya elihle ezinganeni zakhe okungenza ukuba ukuphila komkhaya wonke kujabulise ka-
khulu
AmaKristu kufanele aqaphele ukuba angabi ongqoshishilizi, abantu abangalinganiseli endabeni yokusebenzisa izimiso ze-
Bhayibheli
Amadoda kumelwe asebenzise ubuhlakani njengoba eseqala ukusebenzisa isimiso sobunhloko
Umfazi kufanele agweme ukubelesela indoda ngalokho ehluleka ukukwenza; kufanele abe usizo
Ukushintsha kancane kancane ukuze uphile ngokuvumelana nezimiso zeBhayibheli kuyokwenza zamukeleke kalula
Kungenzeka ukuba ekugcineni usize lowo oshade naye ukuba abe umKristu futhi ahlanganyele nawe kulo msebenzi wo-
kwenza ukuphila komkhaya kube nenjabulo
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kuvela yiphi inselele emkhayeni wakho, ungaqiniseka ngokuthi ngosizo lukaNkulunkulu ungayi-
nqoba futhi uphumelele, njengoba nje kuye kwenzeka nakwabanye
UNKULUNKULU UFUNA UKUBA UMKHAYA WAKHO UJABULE—LALELA (3 imiz.)
Umkhaya wakho ungakwazi ukufeza injongo kaNkulunkulu ngokuba ube umkhaya onothando futhi ojabulayo
Sonke sikhinyabezwa ukungapheleli nokucindezela okuvela esimisweni sikaSathane, kodwa uma sifunda iBhayibheli bese
sizama ngobuqotho ukusebenzisa lokho elikushoyo, imikhaya iyaqina, ubuntu buyathuthuka futhi kugwenywa amaphu-
tha amaningi
Iseluleko seBhayibheli siwusizo ngempela; izimiso zeBhayibheli zisebenza kuwo wonke umuntu (fy-ZU 12)
Ngeke sigcine ngokuthola injabulo manje kodwa singalindela ngokulangazela ukuphila phakade ngenjabulo ezweni elisha
elizayo
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibha-
lo okudingeka ifundwe noma ichazwe)
No. 5-ZU—ikhasi 2
