KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUZAMCOLO WOSUKU LUKANOWA USHO OKUTHILE KITHI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Kholisa izilaleli ukuthi (1) uZamcolo wawuyisenzakalo esingokoqobo, esingokomlando; (2) uJehova uzobhubhisa izwe lama-
nje ngesikhathi ‘sosizi olukhulu’; (3) ukuze sisinde, kumelwe sithathe isinyathelo futhi silahle omubi ngokholo oluqinile.
—IsAm 7:14
UZAMCOLO WEMBULUNGA YONKE WAWUYISENZAKALO ESINGOKOQOBO, NESINGOKOMLANDO (15 imiz.)
Enye yezindaba zeBhayibheli ezaziwa kakhulu iphathelene noZamcolo wosuku lukaNowa
Kungenzeka wake wazibuza noma wezwa kubuzwa: ‘Ingabe uZamcolo waba khona ngempela? Singaqiniseka kanjani?’
Siyazi ukuthi kwaba khona uzamcolo wembulunga yonke ngoba iBhayibheli lifundisa ngawo ngokucacile njengesenzakalo
esiyiqiniso
Indaba yawo ilandiswa njengomlando ongokweBhayibheli eZwini likaNkulunkulu
UGenesise isahluko 6 ukhuluma ngezwe langaphambi kukaZamcolo neziqondiso zikaNkulunkulu zomkhumbi azinika uNo-
wa; futhi ubonisa ukuthi uZamcolo wawuzoba owembulunga yonke, hhayi indawana nje (Nikeza amaphuzu avelele kaGe-
nesise isahluko 6) (it-1 609)
Isahluko 7 sichaza ukulayishwa komkhumbi noZamcolo ngokwawo
UGenesise 8:1–9:19 ulandisa ngokoma kwamanzi emhlabeni, ukukhishwa kwezinto ezazisemkhunjini, nesivumelwano si-
kaNkulunkulu asenza nayo yonke imiphefumulo ephilayo emhlabeni
Ingxenye esele yeBhayibheli ikhuluma ngoZamcolo njengesenzakalo esingokoqobo, nesingokomlando
Abaprofethi uIsaya noHezekeli bavuma ukuthi uNowa wayengumuntu ongokomlando futhi babhekisela kuye (Funda uIsa-
ya 54:9 noma uHezekeli 14:14)
UJesu, uPawulu, noPetru bavuma ukuthi uZamcolo wawungokomlando futhi bawusebenzisa njengesixwayiso (Funda uMa-
thewu 24:37, 38) (Heb 11:7; 2Pet 3:5-7)
Isiphetho kumelwe sibe esicacile: IBhayibheli alilandisi ngoZamcolo wembulunga yonke njengomfanekiso noma inganekwa-
ne, kodwa njengesenzakalo esingokoqobo, nesingokomlando
Ukwamukela uZamcolo kusiza ekuchazeni amaqiniso amaningi angenakuchazwa ngenye indlela
Ukuvubukula emhlabeni wonke kuye kwavumbulula amathambo nezidumbu zezinkulungwane zezilwane ezangcwabeka,
ngokuvamile izilwane ezazingenakuklaba ndawonye (isZU 39-40; gZU75 12/8 9-10 [g75 6/8 7])
Okumangazayo futhi izidumbu zamashumi ezinkulungwane ezilwane ezavubukulwa enyakatho ebandayo; okungezona izi-
lwane manje ezitholakala kuleyondawo (ce 203; it-1 610; gmZU 114-15)
Ngokusobala, ngisho nalezozindawo zazinesimo sezulu esifudumele (wZU77 11/15 509 [w76 712])
Umlando weBhayibheli ngoZamcolo uchaza zonke lezizimo—kanjani?
Uchaza ukuthi amanzi kazamcolo avelaphi (Funda uGenesise 7:11) (gmZU 111-13)
Umhwamuko omkhulu wamanzi kungenzeka wawusebenza njengengubo yomswakama ofudumezayo
Lokho kungaba yimbangela yesimo sezulu esifudumele emhlabeni wonke leso ubufakazi obubonisa ukuthi sake saba kho-
na (it-1 610  ̊4)
Ukudabuka kwengubo kwasho ukuthi izindawo ezibanda ngokusesilinganisweni ngokungazelele zashintsha zaba izinda-
wo ezibanda njengeqhwa, zizuma izilwane zingazelele
Amazinga okushisa aphakeme kakhulu aze aba khona ngemva kukaZamcolo (Gen 8:22)
Izintaba zangaphambi kukaZamcolo kungenzeka ukuthi zazimfushane kakhulu kunalokho eziyikho manje (it-1 610  ̊1)
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi izindawo eziphansi zolwandle zacwila futhi indawo engaphezulu yezwe yaphakama ukuze
imumathe amanzi kazamcolo asemhlabeni
Ukwamukela lokhu kulandisa kwenza futhi ziqondakale izinganekwane eziningi eziphathelene noZamcolo (gmZU 116;
gZU89 1/8 7; wZU86 9/15 4)
Khona-ke singaphetha ngokuthini? Asikho isizathu sokungabaza ukuba ngokomlando kukaZamcolo (LmnZU 7  ̊11)
Kodwa lokho kunakuphi ukubaluleka kwangempela kithi? Kungani singavele sikuchilize njengomlando wakudala ongabalule-
kile?
UKUBHUJISWA KWEZWE ELINGAMESABI UNKULUNKULU KUBEKA ISIBONELO SOKUZOKWENZEKA ESI-
KHATHINI SETHU (18 imiz.)
IBhayibheli kuphela elichaza ukuthi kungani uZamcolo aba khona nokuthi kumelwe usho ukuthini kithi
Lisitshela ukuthi izwe lasendulo labhujiswa ngenxa yokungamesabi kwalo uNkulunkulu okwedlulele
Ububi babubonakaliswe kusukela esikhathini sokuxoshwa komuntu ePharadesi
Ububi banda njalo njengoba isikhathi sasiqhubeka (Funda uGenesise 6:1-4)
Kungani ububi babuye banda kangako? IBhayibheli kuphela elinikeza impendulo
‘Lamadodana kaNkulunkulu’ ayeyizidalwa zomoya, hhayi nje amadoda avamile ashada nabesifazane (it-2 996-7)
Izingelosi ezaziziphendule abantu zazala amadodana ayebizwa ngokuthi “amaNefili” (Gen 6:4, qhathanisa neNW)
Igama lawo ngokwezwi nezwi lisho “izilwi,” okungukuthi, izixhwanguxhwangu, izidlova (it-2 491-2)
Oyise bashiya izindawo ababezabelwe uNkulunkulu; kungani bona noma inzalo yabo babengalalela eminye imithetho yo-
muntu noma kaNkulunkulu? Ngokuqinisekile babengeke
Ngokokulandisa, siphawula ukugcizelelwa ngokuphindiwe kokungamesabi uNkulunkulu okwedlulele (Gen 6:5, 11-13)
UJesu uyenezela kulencazelo (Funda uMathewu 24:38, 39)
Akubona bonke abantu emuva lapho ababebabi kanjalo, kodwa babehileleke eminakweni yabo siqu yansuku zonke
Isixwayiso uNowa ayebanika sona basishaya indiva njengesingabalulekile
Ingabe usuyaqala ukuqaphela indlela lokhu okubaluleke ngayo kithi?
No. 6-ZU
3/91UNkulunkulu unesizathu esifanayo sokuthatha isinyathelo ngezwe lanamuhla elingamesabi
UJehova akashintshi, izimo ezifanayo zimenza asabele ngendlela efanayo (Mal 3:6)
Namuhla, njengakulesosikhathi, kugcwele ubudlova; izimpi, ubugebengu, ukungabi namthetho
Izwe elisizungezile, njengezwe lasendulo, ligcwele izenzo zokuphendukezela ubulili
UNkulunkulu usazilahla lezozenzo eziphendukezelwe (Rom 1:26, 27, 32)
Ithonya lamademoni linamandla namuhla, ngisho nanjengoba lalinjalo emuva ngalesosikhathi (gZU86 8/22 5)
Ukuchuma okukhona kokufundwa kwezinkanyezi, ukufundwa kokulumba, ukusetshenziswa kwamabhodi eOuija
Ithonya lamademoni lobuqili obukhulu libonakala ezimfundisweni zenkolo ezingamanga
Ukugxambukela ezindabeni zezwe zezombangazwe kubeka umuntu ohlwini lwabayobuthelwa ‘omoya bamademoni’
eHar–Magedoni (IsAm 16:14, 16)
Abantu abaningi, njengoba uJesu abikezela, abasinaki isixwayiso saphezulu
Isixwayiso ngokuyinhloko sibhekiswe kwabakholwayo (Funda uMathewu 24:37-39, 42)
Ukubhujiswa kwezwe elingamesabi uNkulunkulu ‘kubeka isibonelo sezinto ezizayo’ (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 2:5, 6)
Ukugcwaliseka kwalesosibonelo nakho kuyoba kukhulu, kube okwembulunga yonke (2Pet 3:5-7, 10; sl 290, 292, 294, 306;
rsZU 365-7)
Akuwona umhlaba ongokoqobo ozobhujiswa; uZamcolo awuzange ubhubhise imbulunga engokoqobo
Izwe elingamesabi uNkulunkulu, elakhiwa “umhlaba” ongabantu abangaphansi ‘kwamazulu’ angohulumeni, kumelwe li-
hambe
“Umlilo” ubonisa ukubhujiswa kwaphakade okulindele labohulumeni (Isa 66:15, 16)
“Umhlaba nemisebenzi ekuwo” kudalulwa njengokufanele ukubhujiswa
Umoya ogqugquzela abantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu, uyokwenziwa ize
Lokhu kumelwe kube nokubaluleka okukhethekile kithi, ngoba oFakazi ngaso sonke isikhathi baye babonisa ngokuvela
eBhayibhelini nangokugcwaliseka kwesiprofetho ukuthi siphila ezinsukwini zokugcina
UPetru ugcizelela ukuthi lokhu kufanele kuthonye imicabango yethu nezenzo (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:11)
Iqiniso lokuthi ukubhubhisa kukaZamcolo izwe elingamesabi uNkulunkulu kwakuyisibonelo sembubhiso uNkulunkulu azo-
yiletha esikhathini sethu kukwenza kubaluleke ngempela kithi, kuhilele ukuphila kwethu
UNowa nomkhaya wakhe kuphela abasinda ekubhujisweni kwezwe lasendulo elingamesabi uNkulunkulu; isibonelo sakhe
singasibonisa kanjani indlela esingasindiswa ngayo ekupheleni kwalesimiso?
INGABE UYALILAHLA IZWE NGOKHOLO LWAKHO? (10 imiz.)
UNowa wabonisa ngesenzo ukuthi kungenzeka futhi kuyasiza ngomuntu ukulalela iZwi likaJehova futhi avumelanise indlela
yakhe yokuphila nentando kaNkulunkulu (wZU89 10/1 10-15)
Ngezenzo zakhe zokulalela, uNowa wabonisa ukuthi abantu ababephila esikhathini sakhe babesephutheni
Walilahla izwe langalesosikhathi ngokholo lwakhe (Heb 11:7)
Walalela ‘izwi likaNkulunkulu’ futhi waligcina
‘Izwe labantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu’ alenzanga kanjalo futhi labonakala lifanelwe ukulahlelwa ekubhujisweni
Izwe esiphila kulo liye lahlulelelwa njengelifanele ukubhujiswa (2Pet 3:7)
Njengasezinsukwini zikaNowa, kuyoba khona abasindayo
Yini eyonquma ukuthi umuntu uyasinda noma uyabhujiswa?
Ezinsukwini zikaNowa, labo ababegxilise ukuphila kwabo eminakweni yabo siqu babhujiswa (Mat 24:37-39)
UNowa nomkhaya wakhe bagxilisa ukuphila kwabo ekwenzeni intando kaJehova: ukwakha umkhumbi nokushumayela
Basinda (1Pet 3:20)
Kwakudinga ukholo olungangabazi ngoNowa nomkhaya wakhe ukuba babe abahlukile
Kodwa ukholo lwabo lwalilahla izwe; lwabonisa ukuthi bonke abanye babengakwenza okufanayo (Heb 11:7)
UJehova wanquma ukuthi obani ababezophila nokuthi obani ababezobhubha
Kwakumelwe kube nomehluko ophawulekayo phakathi kwalamaqembu amabili
Ngosizi olukhulu, kuyophinda kube khona labo ababhubhayo nalabo abasindayo (Mat 24:21, 22, 40, 41)
Uyoba kuliphi iqembu wena?
Ingabe abantu abakuzungezile bakubona njengohlukile ezweni elilahliwe?
Ingabe uJehova ukubheka njengohlukile, noma ingabe ukubona njengengxenye yalelizwe elilahliwe?
Ingabe ‘uhamba noNkulunkulu’? (Mik 4:2)
Ingabe ubambelela ezindinganisweni zikaNkulunkulu zokulunga?
Ingabe uyazikhandla ‘njengomshumayeli wokulunga’?
Ingabe kusobala kubo bonke ababukele, ezulwini nasemhlabeni, ukuthi unokholo oluqinile?
Ingabe uyakubonisa lokhu ngesenzo?
Ingabe ukuziphatha kwakho kuyakulahla buthule ukuziphatha okonakele kwalelizwe? (1Pet 4:3, 4)
UNGALAHLEKELWA YILOKHO OKUSHIWO UKULANDISA KUKAZAMCOLO KUWE (2 imiz.)
Siye sahlanganisa amaphuzu amaningi abalulekile ngoZamcolo okumelwe asho okuthile kithi sonke
UZamcolo wawuyisenzakalo esingokoqobo esingase sibonwe emlandweni; uNowa wayengumuntu ongokoqobo, inceku kaNku-
lunkulu
Kumelwe sicabangele ukuthi umlando weBhayibheli ngoZamcolo walondolozwa uJehova ngoba ecabangela thina
Usitshela ukuthi kungani abhubhisa izwe lasendulo elalingamesabi nokuthi kungani alondoloza uNowa
Uwusebenzisa njengesibonelo kithi, esisiza ukuba sibe nokholo njengoNowa owasinda futhi silondolozwe
Singambonga uNkulunkulu ngomlando onjalo ngokufunda kahle kuwo futhi senze ngokufanele
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 6-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ISIHE, IMFANELO EVELELE YAMAKRISTU EQINISO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Chaza igama leBhayibheli elithi “isihe.” Bonisa izindlela ezisebenzisekayo esingaba nesihe ngazo nsuku zonke. Gxilisa isifi-
so esiqotho sokuba sibe abantu abanesihe
KUJEHOVA NAKUJESU, SIFUNDA LOKHO ISIHE SEQINISO ESIYIKHO (14 imiz.)
Isihe siyatuswa, kodwa kunokungaqiniseki ngokuthi sisho ukuthini ngempela nokuthi sisebenza kuphi
Ngokwesibonelo, uthembise umntwana ukuthi uyomjezisa uma engalaleli; umntwana akakulaleli. Ingabe kuyinkambo ye-
sihe ukugodla isijeziso?
Abanye bangase bathi yebo, abanye bathi cha; abanye futhi bangaba nomuzwa wokuthi kuxhomeke esimweni
Ngokuvamile, abantu bacabanga ukuthi isihe sigcina ezimweni okugodlwa kuzo isijeziso
Singazi kanjani ukuthi isihe seqiniso siyini? Kunini lapho singasibonakalisa khona nokufanele sisibonakalise khona? Kufa-
nele sikuthinte kanjani ukusebenzelana kwethu namalungu emikhaya yethu, omakhelwane, abafowethu abangamaKristu?
UJehova noJesu bayizibonelo zethu ezivelele zesihe
IBhayibheli lichaza uJehova ngokuthi “ucebile ngesihawu” (Efe 2:4) (Funda iHubo 145:8, 9) (wZU90 9/15 14)
UJesu ngokuphindaphindiwe wanxusa ukuba kuboniswe isihe; umbhalo ogciniwe wokuphila kwakhe ufakazela ukuthi wa-
beka isibonelo esihle (Mat 5:7; 9:13)
Ngezindlela abasebenzelana ngazo nabantu nangeziyalo zabo, singabona lokho isihe seqiniso esiyikho
Isihe sikaNkulunkulu sizibonakalisa ngezindlela eziningi kunokuba amane agodle isijeziso
Ngokuvamile, wayebonisa isihe ngokuthethelela nangokungazijezisi izoni eziphendukayo (Hu 51:1, 2)
Nokho, kuhileleke okwengeziwe, ngoba igama lesiHeberu elihunyushwe ngokuthi “isihe” liqondakala ngokuyisisekelo nje-
ngelisho “ukuba nesihawu” (Hu 145:8, 9; wZU72 1/1 3-5 [w71 411-13]; it-2 375-6)
Lokhu kuwukubonakaliswa kozwela noma isihawu esingase sifaniswe nomuzwa wozwela noma wesihe umama onceli-
sayo aba nawo lapho ingane yakhe ilambile (Isa 49:15)
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi isihe sethu kufanele sibe ukubonakaliswa ngezenzo kwemizwa yesihawu
Lapho izimpumputhe ezimbili zicela, “Sihawukele,” uJesu “waba-nesihe” (Mat 20:30-34)
Akazange agcine ngokusizwa isihawu kodwa wasibonakalisa ngesenzo ngokuziphulukisa
Wabonisa isihe futhi ngokupha abanye ngokomoya nangezinto ezibonakalayo ngoba wabona ukuthi babeswele (Mat 15:32-
38; Mar 6:34)
Khona-ke, isihe ngokuvamile, asibhekiseli ekugodlweni kwesijeziso okungafanele, kodwa sibhekisela esenzweni esiqondile,
ekubonakalisweni kokucabangela komusa noma uzwela
Akwenele ukuzwa isihawu; kumelwe sisibonakalise ukuze sibe nesihe
Sinxuswa ngamandla ukuba sibonise isihe njengemfanelo evelele ekuphileni kwethu
UJesu wakubonisa lokhu, ethi, “Bayajabula abanesihe, ngoba bayohawukelwa” (Mat 5:7, qhathanisa neNW)
Wayesho uhlobo lomuntu onesihe, okwazi ukusibonisa kalula nje
Abantu abanjalo yibona abayohawukelwa uNkulunkulu (w78 2/15 9-10; it-2 378)
Kodwa uJesu walahla abantu abathile ababenikela ‘ngezipho zesihe.’ Ngani? (Mat 6:2, qhathanisa neNW)
IBHAYIBHELI LITUSA ISIHE ESINESISUSA ESIQONDILE (7 imiz.)
Ngokuvamile, “isihe” abantu abasibonisayo asinaso isisusa esihle
Phakathi nenkonzo kaJesu, abaholi benkolo babenalesisimo (Funda uMathewu 6:1-4)
Abaholi benkolo babebukisa lapho bepha, bebonisa isisusa esibi (w78 7/15 30-1)
Cishe sibonile ukuthi isimo esifanayo sivame ukuba khona nanamuhla
Abanye abantu benza iminikelo yomusa lapho beqiniseka ukuthi amagama abo azomenyezelwa noma achonywe oqwembe-
ni njengabanikele kakhulu noma kuzoncishiswa intela kulowomnikelo
Ngezinye izikhathi ukunikela ngezinto ezibonakalayo kumane kuyizaba zokungakunikezi ngesihe lokho okudingekayo nge-
mpela
Mangaki amadoda anikeza omkawo noma abantwana izipho ezibizayo esikhundleni sokubanikeza isikhathi sawo, uthando,
nesiqondiso esingokomoya esinothando? Ingabe isihe seqiniso siyabonakala? (wZU88 3/1 24-5; wZU88 8/1 11  ̊5)
Lapho sinesisusa esifanele, isihe seqiniso siyaqabula futhi siyazuzisa
Isihe esinjalo siwusizo kakhulu kumuntu osiboniswayo; singalungiselela ukudla nezambatho
Isihe seqiniso sibangela izimfanelo ezifiselekayo kumuntu osiboniswayo
Naye ushukunyiselwa ukuba abe nesihe ngokwengeziwe; isihe sizala isihe (Luk 6:36, 38; wZU86 12/1 28-9)
Isihe esinesisusa esiqondile sikhuthaza uzwela nomusa
Isihe esinjalo sibangela ukwaneliseka okuhlala njalo nokufanele kulowo osibonisayo
Kungase kungabibikho ukunconywa okuvela kwabanye abantu, kodwa wena ngokwakho uba nokwaneliseka kokwazi uku-
thi wenze into enhle, okuthile okulingisa isihe sikaJehova
Futhi kubeka umuntu ethubeni lokuthola isibusiso sikaNkulunkulu (IzA 11:25; 22:9; wZU80 9/15 29 [w80 3/15 25])
Kodwa yiziphi izindlela ezingokoqobo esingabonisa ngazo isihe? Ingabe ngaso sonke isikhathi kuhilela izinto ezibonakalayo?
FUNA UKUBONISA ISIHE EKUPHILENI KWAKHO KWANSUKU ZONKE (20 imiz.)
Izipho zakho zesihe zezinto ezibonakalayo mazibonise ukuba kwakho ngumKristu (wZU87 11/15 6)
UbuKristu bethu buboniswa kuzo zonke izici zokuphila nakubo bonke abantu
Asibonisi umusa nokubekezela kubafowethu kuphela
No. 7-ZU
3/91UJesu wenza umfanekiso ophathelene nokubonisa isihe kubo bonke (Luk 10:29-37; wZU72 1/1 4-6 [w71 413])
Phawula ukuthi umSamariya akazange nje ‘amhawukele’ kodwa “wamenzela isihawu”
Wawuyokwenzenjani lapho usesimweni esinjalo? Phawula isikhuthazo sikaJesu (Ivesi 37)
Ukungabi kwethu ingxenye yezwe akusho ukuthi ngeke sibe nozwela ngalabo abasezweni
Asizithandi izindlela zalo, imikhuba yokuziphatha, izinkolo zamanga
Kodwa amaKristu ayabathanda abantu futhi abonisa isihe kubo
Umakhelwane wakho kungenzeka uyilungu lenhlangano yenkolo yamanga, nokho lapho indlu yakhe isha, ubungeke
yini umxwayise?
Yiqiniso, indlela umuntu angasiza ngayo kangcono kakhulu ixhomeke ezimweni (IzA 3:27)
Uma ungakwazi ukubhukuda, ukuziphonsa emanzini ukuze usindise othile bekungeke kube ukubonakaliswa kwesihe
okuwusizo; bekungaba ukuhlakanipha ukumphonsela into engamenza antante noma ukufuna usizo ngokushesha
Umuntu ngamunye kumelwe anqume ukuthi uzosibonisa kanjani futhi nini isihe kubantu esiphila nabo
Ubungasabela kanjani kumuntu ompofu, umntwana ocelayo, noma umuntu okhubazekile?
Akukhona ukuba nesihe ukukhuthaza ubuvila, ubudakwa, njalonjalo (IzA 20:1, 4; 2Thes 3:10, 12)
Ezimweni ezithile, ukumupha umuntu imali lapho eyicela kungamkhuthazela enkambweni engalungile; lokho bekunge-
ke kube isihe seqiniso (g80 5/8 21-2)
Kumelwe silinganisele ukucabanga kwethu nezisusa zesihe zenhliziyo
Ukuphekela umakhelwane ogulayo noma ukumsiza ukuba anakekele abantwana bakhe kungaba ngenye indlela onga-
bonisa ngayo isihe uJesu akhuthaza ukuba siboniswe emfanekisweni womSamariya onobungane
Ingabe ukuphana ngemali noma ngezinto ezibonakalayo kuyindlela ebaluleke kakhulu ongabonisa ngayo isihe? Cha!
Ukupha okungokomoya kungaba nengxenye enhlala-kahleni yabantu ehlala njalo
Umlando wobuKristu ubonisa ukuthi ukupha ngokomoya kufanele kugcizelelwe kakhulu (wZU86 10/1 22-4)
Inkonzo kaJesu yayigxile ngokuyinhloko ekufundiseni ngokomoya (Mat 4:23; gZU82 6/8 10-12 [w82 12/8 10])
Ngokufundisa kwakhe, wanikeza abantu isizathu sokuba bashintshe ukuphila kwabo kube ngcono
Nabaphostoli bagxila ekupheni ngokomoya, besiza abantu ukuba bathole ukuphila okuphakade
Ngisho nalapho abaphostoli bephulukisa abantu njengesipho sesihe, baqondisa ukunakekela kuJesu (Khulumela izEnzo
3:1-10)
Khona-ke, ukupha okungokomoya kugcizelelwa kakhulu ngokufanelekile phakathi kwamaKristu eqiniso
Njengoba izwe elisha selisemnyango, bekungeke kube ukubonisa isihe ngenhlangano yobuKristu ukuba izinikele ekunike-
zeni usizo lwezokwelapha noma ukwaba ukudla (wZU87 1/15 7-9; wZU90 8/15 18-19)
OFakazi bagxila ekusakazeni “ukudla okuhlala kuze kube-ngukuphila okuphakade” (Joh 6:27)
Sonke singazikhandla ekupheni ngokomoya
Izinga onganikela ngalo izipho zesihe ezingokomoya alixhomekile ezimweni ezingokwezimali
Kusekhona abantu abaningi abaqotho abanjengezimvu ezingenamalusi (it-2 377  ̊4-6)
UJesu wasabela ngesihe ngokufundisa abanjalo iqiniso, nathi singakwenza
Singazibuza: ‘Ingabe ngizizwa ngishukunyiselwa ukuba ngenze konke engingakwenza, ngingakubheki njengomsebenzi
ongabalulekile?’
Singasibonisa futhi isihe nsuku zonke ngokungagxeki ngokweqile nangokududuza abanye
Masibekezelele ubuthakathaka babanye ngesihe, singahluleli noma sibe ngabagxeka ngokweqile (Funda uMathewu 7:1-4)
Ngisho nalapho umuntu onile ngempela, kungase kube inkambo yesihe ukumane singanaki (wZU90 10/1 22-3)
Labo abasethubeni lokwenza kanjalo bangase babe nomuzwa wokuthi kungcono ukulungisa iphutha (Gal 6:1)
Thina ngabanye, uma umuntu eqaphela ukuthi wenze iphutha, kungani kufanele simbelesele ngalo? (IzA 15:4; 18:21)
Bonisa ukuthi isihe siyimfanelo evelele ekuphileni kwakho ngokududuza abanye (1Thes 5:14)
UPawulu wanxusa ukuba ‘kududuzwe abadanileyo,’ obekuyobonisa isihe nesihawu sethu; singakwenzi ngoba siphoqeleki-
le kodwa ngoba sishukunyiswa isihe (wZU84 1/15 10-13 [w83 8/1 9-11])
Asikhulumanga ngazo zonke izindlela ezingase zisetshenziswe zokubonisa isihe noma izimo ezidinga isihe
Singaboniswa ngokupha ngezinto ezibonakalayo nangezindlela ezingokomoya lapho sishukunyiselwa yisisusa esiqondile
ukuba senze kanjalo; futhi singaba nesihe ngokungagxeki ngokweqile, ngokuthethelela nokududuza
Ukubonisa kwethu isihe akufanele kugcine emkhayeni nakubafowethu abangamaKristu kuphela kodwa kufanele kudlule-
le nakwabanye, njengasemfanekisweni womSamariya
MASISEBENZELE UKWANDISA ITHONYA LESIHE EKUPHILENI KWETHU (4 imiz.)
Uma sikuqaphela ukubaluleka okungokomBhalo kwesihe, singasebenzela ekwandiseni ithonya laso ekuphileni kwethu
Akusho ukuba nesihe sokuphoqelelwa nesokuzenzisa, kodwa kusho ukusihlakulela, siqaphela lapho esingasibonisa khona
futhi sisabele emizweni esiyizwayo esenza sibe nesihe (Kol 3:10, 12)
Lendaba idinga ukunakekela kwethu ngoba ukungapheleli kulwisana nesihe
Sihlala sibhekene nomoya wezwe wokungabi nasihe
Lapho sivumela isihe sibe yimfanelo evelele ekuphileni kwethu, yilapho siyoba khona njengoNkulunkulu
Singalindela ukuthola umvuzo kuNkulunkulu ngokubonisa isihe (Funda uMathewu 5:7) (gZU72 2/8 22-3 [g71 8/8 27])
Isihe sikaNkulunkulu kithi singase sihilele ukuvuswa noma ukulondolozwa size singene ezweni elisha ngaphandle kokuba sife
Sinesizathu sokumbonga ngesihe sokusinikeza lelothemba
Isihe sokuba empeleni asinikeze ukuphila okuphakade siyisizathu esikhulu ngisho nangaphezulu sokubonga nesokuba thi-
na senze isihe sibe ithonya elinamandla ekuphileni kwethu
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudi-
ngeka ifundwe)
No. 7-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUNGAZIPHILELI THINA, KODWA
UKUPHILELA UKWENZA INTANDO KANKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Ukubonisa ukholo esihlengweni kusho ukuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu. Ngakho-ke, amaKristu kumelwe enze intando ka-
Jehova ize kuqala kuzo zonke izici zokuphila
SIZUNGEZWE UMOYA WOKUZIBUSA (5 imiz.)
Ezweni ukuzibusa kugcizelelwa ngezinga elandayo; kukhuthazwa “ukwenza okuthandayo”
Ngenxa yokungabibikho kobulungisa, abaningi babheka ukuzibusa njengokufiseleka kakhulu
Sonke siyaqaphela ukuthi isilinganiso esifanelekile sokuzibusa siyafiseleka
Ubungathanda yini ukuphila ukuphila kwakho konke, uthembele kwabanye ngokuphelele?
Yonke indawo sibona umoya wokuhlubuka nombono ongalinganiselwe wokuzibusa
Ngokuvamile abantu baqhakambisa ukuzibusa ngaphandle kokucabangela zonke izimo ezingaba umphumela nalokho okuha-
mbisana nakho
Ukugcizelelwa kwanamuhla kokuzibusa kuyingozi (Efe 2:2)
Lomoya wobudeveli wenza abantu abangaphelele bathambekele ekuhlubukeni kwenkani
IBhayibheli linxusa abantu abafuna ukwamukelwa uNkulunkulu ukuba babe nombono ohlukile kowobugovu
Lisikhuthaza ukuba sizidele futhi singaziphileli thina (Mat 16:24; 2Kor 5:15)
Ngomqondo owodwa, sonke kakade sesithengiselwe ebugqilini
SONKE SIYE SATHENGISELWA EBUGQILINI (7 imiz.)
Ukuthengiselwa kwakho ebugqilini akusihileli isimo sakho esingokomnotho ekuphileni, futhi akuhlobene nohlanga oyilo noma
ubuzwe; wubugqila besono (Funda eyabaseRoma 7:14)
Umuntu wokuqala owathengiselwa ebugqilini besono ukhokho wethu uAdamu (it-2 979  ̊6; w66-ZU 7/15 317-26 [w65 712-21])
UAdamu wavumela ukunqotshwa isifiso sobugovu (ezijabulisa yena, hhayi uNkulunkulu), eba yisigqila sesono
Kwakungebona ubugqila besikhashana kodwa baba khona kwaze kwaba sekufeni (Rom 5:12a)
Lokho kuthengiselwa ebugqilini kwasithinta sonke, ngoba ngaleyondlela nathi sathengiselwa ebugqilini. Ngani?
Njengoba sonke sasisemanyongeni ka-Adamu, wasithengisela ebugqilini besono kanye naye (Rom 5:12, 18a)
Ukuphila kwethu siqu kubonisa ukuthi nathi ngabanye siyathinteka (Funda eyabaseRoma 6:16)
Ubani phakathi kwethu ongakaze enze izinto uNkulunkulu azibheka njengesono—ukuqamba amanga, ukweba, noma okubi
nakakhulu?
Ngisho noma silwela ukugcina imithetho kaNkulunkulu, siyashiyeka (Rom 7:21-23; w74-ZU 3/1 119 [w73 511]; it-2 964-5)
Ukuqaphela lobubugqila kufanele kusishukumisele ukuba sifune noma iyiphi impumuzo etholakalayo nosizo
Asinasizathu sokuba abaqhoshayo; umoya wokuzibusa kwenkani awufaneleki
Ingabe siyoke siyithole inkululeko? Uma kunjalo, kanjani?
INKULULEKO YEQINISO IHILELA UKUTHEMBELA KUNKULUNKULU NAKUJESU (15 imiz.)
Ukuze sithole ukwahlulelwa okuhle, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi sithembele kuNkulunkulu
Sonke kufanele sivume ukuthi sikweleta uJehova ngokuphila kwethu (IzE 17:26-28)
Zibuze: ‘Ingabe ukuphila kwami kuyabonisa ukuthi ngiyaliqaphela iqiniso lokuthi ngikweleta uNkulunkulu ngakho?’
Sithembele kuNkulunkulu ukuze sithole izindlela zokusekela ukuphila kwethu (Hu 104:14, 15; IzE 14:17)
Abanye abantu bayavuma ukuthi bathembele kuNkulunkulu ukuze bathole ukuphila nezindlela zokukusekela, kodwa abayinaki
intando yakhe
Zibuze: ‘Iyiphi leyontando? Ibeka yiphi imfuneko kimi?’
Ngokuphila kwakhe okwanikelwa njengomhlatshelo kuNkulunkulu, uJesu wahlenga sonke isintu; wasithenga; sonke singesakhe
(Funda uMathewu 20:28) (w73-ZU 6/15 274-5 [w72 687-8]; it-2 733-6)
“Isihlengo” sisho inani elikhokhelwa ukubuyisa into ngokuyithenga noma ukuyikhulula
UKristu wahlenga sonke isintu; singesakhe kungakhathaliseki ukuthi sibonisa ukholo noma cha
Yingakho ngisho novuko lwabangalungile luyinto engenzeka (IzE 24:15)
Kodwa akekho umuntu ongazuza ukwamukelwa uNkulunkulu, ukukhululwa ebugqilini besono, ukuphila okuphakade, nga-
phandle kokuba abe nokholo enanini lomhlatshelo kaKristu futhi amvume obala ukuthi uyiNkosi (Joh 3:36; Rom 10:9)
Uma unokholo enanini lomhlatshelo kaJesu elihlangula izono, ungakhululeka ebugqilini besono kodwa ngeke ukhululeke ekubu-
sweni uNkulunkulu nasezimfunekweni zakhe (Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14, 15)
Ngenxa ka-Adamu, ‘sonke safa,’ kodwa ‘umuntu oyedwa’ (uKristu) wasifela; wasithenga
IBhayibheli liyakugcizelela lokhu (1Kor 6:19, 20; 7:23; 1Pet 1:18, 19)
UKristu uyena muntu uNkulunkulu athi kumelwe simbheke njengeNkosi
Njengoba siye sathengwa ngenani, kuyafaneleka ukuba singaziphileli thina, kodwa siphilele ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu
Umuntu othi wamukela inani lomhlatshelo kaJesu elihlangula izono kodwa abe ezenza zize kuqala izithakazelo zakhe, izi-
njabulo, imigomo (konke okubonisa UBUMINA), uyakuphikisa akushoyo
Ingabe bakhona kithi abanjalo? Ukuphila kwethu kubonisani? (Funda uMathewu 6:24; Roma 6:16)
No. 8-ZU
9/07Ukuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu noKristu kuyinkambo yenkululeko; kuletha izinzuzo manje nasesikhathini esizayo
Ukuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu noKristu akubangeli noma yikuphi ukulahlekelwa okungokoqobo; uyazuza (Rom 6:22, 23,
qhathanisa neNW)
Kakade ‘sinezithelo ngendlela yobungcwele’: sinonembeza abahlanzekile; sivikelekile emiphumeleni yokuba imilutha yo-
tshwala, izidakamizwa, nokuziphatha okubi; ukuphila kwemikhaya kuba okwanelisayo; siba nabangane beqiniso
Inkokhelo yokugcina nayo ingcono kakhulu: Isigqila sikaNkulunkulu sithola ukuphila okuphakade sinempilo nenjabulo
Indlela uNkulunkulu asebenzelana ngayo nezigqila ezingokoqobo esikhathini esidlule kufanele iqinise ukuthembela kwethu
esibusisweni sokuba kwethu yizigqila zakhe manje kuze kube phakade (it-2 978  ̊7, 8; Eks 21:20, 26, 27)
Abantu ababekhonza uNkulunkulu esikhathini esidlule bakujabulela ukuba yizinceku zakhe; nathi singaba naleyonjabulo
UAbrahama wakubonisa ngokusabela kwakhe ngokushesha ukuthi wayeyinceku kaNkulunkulu; wabusiswa (Gen 18:6-8)
UMose noJoshuwa babengenamahloni ngokuba izinceku, noma izigqila, zikaNkulunkulu (Jos 1:1; 5:14)
Umbono izigqila zikaNkulunkulu ezijabulayo ezazinawo uvezwe kumaHubo 84:10-12 (w80-ZU 5/1 24 [w79 9/15 15])
Umbuzo uyasala: ‘Lokhu kusho ukuthini kimi?’ Kubalulekile, ngoba ukuphila kwakho kuhilelekile
NSUKU ZONKE UNGAZIPHILELI WENA, KODWA PHILELA UKWENZA INTANDO KAJEHOVA (15 imiz.)
Ukuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu ngempela kusho ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu ize kuqala ekuphileni (Mat 16:24; tp-ZU 179-80)
Asikho esimweni sokuqophisana noNkulunkulu; siya kuye singabanxusayo
Ngabanye abalapha, ukusebenzisa lesiseluleko kuhilela ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuzinikezela nokubhapathizwa
Abanye bayakujabulela ukungenisa ulwazi lweBhayibheli nokuba kanye namaKristu kodwa abaqhubekeli phambili
Ulwazi lulodwa nokuhlanganyela nenhlangano kaNkulunkulu akumenzi umuntu abe yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu (Funda IzE-
nzo 2:38) (w79-ZU 6/1 15-16 [w78 11/1 15-16]; w89-ZU 1/15 14-15, 20)
Ukuba kwakho umKristu ozinikezele nobhapathiziwe kuyobonisa ukumqaphela kwakho uNkulunkulu kanye nokuthembela
kwakho kuye, uthando lwakho ngaye, isifiso sakho sokuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu
Ukuphenduka kufuna ukuguquka kunoma yiziphi izenzo ezingalungile nokushintsha yonke indlela yakho yokucabanga uku-
ze uyivumelanise nokucabanga kukaNkulunkulu okwambulwe eBhayibhelini (Rom 12:2; w92-ZU 3/15 16  ̊16)
Uyazi manje ukuthi kungenzeka ukuyeka ukuba yisigqila sesono; ingabe uyafuna ngempela?
Lapho uzinikezela kuNkulunkulu, kuboniswa ngokufanelekile obala ngokucwiliswa emanzini
Ukuba yisigqila sikaNkulunkulu kukubeka ohlwini lwabafanelekela “izikhathi zokuhlunyelelwa” (IzE 3:19, 20; tp-ZU 178)
Uma uyisigqila sikaNkulunkulu, qaphela isikhundla sakho ngokusabela ngokuzithoba eZwini nasentandweni kaNkulunkulu
Inceku kaNkulunkulu yangempela yamukela iseluleko sakhe njengoba sinjalo futhi izame ngenkuthalo ukusisebenzisa
Kulula ukuziphilela futhi kanjalo wenqabe iseluleko esiphathelene nokuziphatha; kusho ukwenqaba uNkulunkulu njengeNkosi
Umuntu osemusha angase athole injabulo ekuqabulaneni nasekuthintaneni nowobulili obuhlukile; eqala ukuthalalisa iselu-
leko seZwi likaNkulunkulu (2Ti 2:22; Juda 4; yp-ZU 254)
Umuntu ophuzayo ngezikhathi zemibuthano yokuzijabulisa angase acabange ukuthi kuwukuhlakanipha ukudiyazela, noku-
ba nesiyezi; unqaba isixwayiso esimelene nokudakwa (1Kor 5:11; 1Pet 4:3)
Kuhle ukuzibuza: ‘Ubani engimphilelayo, yimina noma uNkulunkulu? Ingabe ngiyafuna ukuba yisigqila sakhe?’
Isigqila sangempela sikaNkulunkulu ngeke singawunaki umyalo ‘wokushada kuphela eNkosini’ (1Kor 7:39)
Njengenceku ehloniphayo, siyaqaphela ukuthi lesiseluleko sizuzisa sona (w89-ZU 11/1 21-2)
Kunokuba uziphilele, sabela entandweni kaNkulunkulu ngokusiza abanye ngomsebenzi wokushumayela
Kungase kungavumelani nokuthambekela kwakho kwemvelo, kodwa ukwenza kanjalo kubonisa ukuthi ufuna abanye bazuze
Kanjalo ubonisa uthando ngoNkulunkulu nangomakhelwane, ukungavumeli ubumina bukuvimbele
Ukukukhumbula njalo ukuthi awuziphileli kuyenezela enjabulweni yakho enkonzweni yasensimini
Ukuphilela ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu kuhilela nokukhonza izithakazelo zabanye ngokuzithoba ebandleni
UJesu, iNhloko yebandla, wabeka isibonelo ngokugeza izinyawo zabafundi (Joh 13:2-5, 12-17)
Isibonelo okumelwe silandelwe, hhayi isenzo esithile, kodwa umoya awubonisa (Ivesi 17)
Ababonisi kudingeka bakhonze abafowabo ngokuthobeka, bangawubusi umhlambi (1Pet 5:1-3)
Intsha inesibonelo esinguThimothewu, ongazange aziphilele (Film 2:19-23)
Ingabe unesimo sengqondo esifanayo, uzimisele ukusiza ngisho nasemisebenzini ephansi?
Sonke singakwandisa ukuphilela ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu, singaziphileli thina
LWELA UKUJULISA ISIFISO SAKHO SOKUPHILELA INTANDO KANKULUNKULU (3 imiz.)
Sidinga ukuzikhumbuza njalo ngokuthi sithembele kuNkulunkulu nakuJesu
Masikuvume emithandazweni yethu ukuthi ukuphila kwethu kuvela kuNkulunkulu nokuthi ithemba lethu lesikhathi esiza-
yo lixhomeke esihlengweni
Masigxilise ukuphila kwethu ebuhlotsheni bethu noJehova, sibuvumele ukuba bube ithonya elinamandla
Njengoba sibhekana nezinkinga nezinqumo, masicabange ngokuthi yini okufanele siyenze, hhayi njengabantu abazibusayo, kodwa
njengezigqila zikaNkulunkulu ezijabulela ukwenza intando yakhe
Esikhundleni sokuvumela ukusabela KOBUMINA kokungapheleli, sabela njengomuntu oye wathengwa ngenani
Lena yinkambo yokuhlakanipha, ngoba labo abayosinda ekubhujisweni kweBabiloni Elikhulu futhi baphile baze bangene ezweni
elisha bachazwe ngokuthi ‘bayizinceku [izigqila, NW]’ zikaNkulunkulu encwadini yesAmbulo 19:5
Ukukhonza uJehova ngokuphumelelayo, ukuphilela ukwenza intando yakhe, kuyinkambo eletha isibusiso (Rom 6:22)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 8-ZU—ikhasi 2

Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone lezi zidingo ezibalulekile: Lapho utadisha noma usemihlanganweni, qaphela indlela ola-
lela ngayo. Lalelisisa; thola umqondo wesiyalo sikaJehova. Izenzo zakho ziyobonisa ukuthi uyalalela yini lapho uJe-
hova ekhuluma
ONEZINDLEBE, MAKALALELE (5 imiz.)
Yonke indlela yokuphila komKristu, inkonzo, ukukhulekela nokusindiswa kuxhomeke ekuzimiseleni kwakhe
ukulalela iZwi likaNkulunkulu; “ukholo lulandela into ezwiweyo” (Ro 10:17)
Inhliziyo elungile iba nokholo ezintweni ezizwayo futhi ibangele umlomo ukuba ‘uvume obala kube yinsindi-
so’ (Ro 10:10)
Izigidi zabantu zizwa izwi elilotshiwe nelikhulunywayo, kodwa bambalwa abalalela ngempela, noma abawutho-
layo umqondo walo
UPawulu uxwayisa ngokuba buthuntu ekuzweni (Heb 5:11)
Sheshani ukuzwa iZwi likaNkulunkulu; ‘namukele ukugxiliswa kwezwi elikwaziyo ukusindisa imiphefumulo
yenu’ (Jak 1:19, 21)
ABEZWAYO KUMELWE BABE ABENZI BEZWI (12 imiz.)
Yilabo kuphela ‘abenza intando kaNkulunkulu abayongena embusweni’ (Mat 7:21-23)
Baningi abenza imisebenzi yamandla ngegama likaJesu, kodwa ngenxa yokuthi abayenzi ngoba belalela iZwi
likaNkulunkulu, ibenza babe ‘abenzi bokungemthetho (w88-ZU 10/1 27; w90-ZU 10/1 24)
Kudingeka uqhubeke uzondla ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu ukuze wazi intando kaNkulunkulu (Mat 4:4)
Inhlangano kaJehova ilungiselela imihlangano yamasonto onke, isifundo seqembu nesomuntu siqu seZwi la-
khe kanye nabelusi, abafundisi nabeluleki ukuze bonke abantu bakaNkulunkulu bafundiswe futhi bayihlo-
nyiselwe ngokuphelele “yonke imisebenzi emihle” (2Ti 3:14-17; Mat 24:45-47)
[Yisho izibonelo ezingokoqobo zalabo abaye bezwa iZwi futhi babonisa ukholo kulo ngokuhlanganyela ngoku-
gcwele enkonzweni]
Kulula ukuba siwele ogibeni lokumane sibe ‘abalizwayo izwi’ (Jak 1:22)
Ngisho nezinceku zikaJehova ezizinikezele zibanjwa yilolu gibe ngokulandela indlela yezwe elibi nangokuhlu-
leka ukuzwa noma ukusebenzisa iseluleko esihle seZwi (Efe 5:28-33; 1Pet 3:1-3, 7)
Kuyaphuthuma manje ukuba siphikise futhi simelane nethonya eliphumputhekisayo likaSathane nezwe elibi
(Jak 4:7)
[Yisho isibonelo esingokoqobo somuntu owanqoba ushushiso ukuze abe umuzwi weZwi olalelayo]
Abezwa iZwi bayoba abathandi bokuthula futhi bayokhanda izinkemba zabo zibe amakhuba (Isa 2:2-5)
[Yisho isibonelo esingokoqobo esibonisa indlela abantu ababethanda impi abashintshwa ngayo amandla eqiniso
baba abathanda ukuthula]
ABEZWAYO BANELUNGELO LOKUYISA ISIGIJIMI SOKUPHILA KWABANYE (10 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu umfundisi omkhulu kunabo bonke; wathi wayeze ezweni ukuzofakazela iqiniso (Joh 18:37)
Watshela abantu ukuthi wayethunywe ukuzomemezela iZwi nokuzolifundisa abanye (Luk 4:18-21)
Wadabula lonke iJudiya ephulukisa futhi efundisa; wenza abezwayo abanokwazisa baba abafundi (Mat 9:35-38)
UJesu wagcizelela isidingo sokuba bonke laba bafundi balingise isibonelo sakhe futhi wabathuma ukuba ‘baha-
mbe bayoshumayela ivangeli lombuso’ (Mat 10:1-10)
Wabayala ngokuqondile ukuba bayokwenza abanye abafundi abengeziwe kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba fu-
thi bababhapathize (Mat 28:19, 20)
Waprofetha ukuthi lesi sigijimi sasiyofinyelela emhlabeni wonke (IzE 1:8; it-2 744)
AmaKristu okuqala ayisa isigijimi sezindaba ezinhle emhlabeni wonke owakhiwe (IzE 24:5; 28:22)
Ikakhulukazi kusukela ngo-1919, oFakazi BakaJehova baye benza umsebenzi omkhulu wokushumayela emhla-
beni wonke
[Bukeza amaphuzu athile avelele emashadini asencwadini ethi Umvuthwandaba WesAmbulo, amakhasi 64-5.
Hlanganisa namanani avela embikweni we-Ncwadi Yonyaka yamuva]
OFakazi BakaJehova baye basakaza izigidigidi zezincwadi zeBhayibheli (re-ZU 154  ̊18)
Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi abantu abangazange babe ‘abezwayo kuphela kodwa ababa abenzi bezwi’ baye basa-
bela kahle kakhulu (Jak 1:22)
[Yisho isibonelo esingokoqobo somuntu ozimisele ukuqhubeka ehlanganyela ngokugcwele emsebenzini woku-
vuna]

5/08ABEZWAYO ABANOKWAZISA BAYOBUSISWA (3 imiz.)
Sonke isintu siya ekuphileni noma ekubhujisweni (Mat 7:13, 14)
Abaningi bake baba yingxenye yezwe likaSathane futhi baba izitha zikaNkulunkulu, kodwa iqiniso likushintshi-
le ukuphila kwalabo abawalalelayo amazwi kaNkulunkulu (Efe 4:17-19)
Ukulalela iZwi likaNkulunkulu kuyokwenza olizwayo ukuba amukelwe uJehova futhi athole ukuphila okupha-
kade

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All rights reserved.UKUZIPHATHA NGOKWETHEMBEKA NGAZO ZONKE IZIKHATHI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza abazalwane ukuba bazihlole ukuze babone ukuthi bathembekile yini kuzo zonke izinto
AMAKRISTU KUMELWE AKULWELE KANZIMA UKWETHEMBEKA, IKAKHULUKAZI NAMUHLA (7 imiz.)
Niyazi ukuthi siphila esikhathini sokungathembeki okungakaze kube khona ngaphambili (wZU86 11/15 10-11; gZU89 8/8 3 [g89 3/22 3])
Akusenzeki kuphela ngezikhathi ezithile; kukhona ukwenqatshwa ngokuphelele kwezindinganiso zokwethembeka
Ukungathembeki kwezisebenzi kungesinye nje isibonelo sendlela ukungathembeki okusakazeke ngayo (Fanekisa ngesibonelo se-
ndawo yakini noma bheka iwZU88 2/15 3-5; tpZU 17-18)
Siyazi ukuthi ukungathembeki kungezindlela eziningi nasezindaweni eziningi, hhayi nje ezweni elilodwa
Ngokunokwenzeka nsuku zonke uyazibona izibonelo—ukuqamba amanga, ukukhohlisa, ukweba—esikoleni, kuhulumeni, na-
komakhelwane
Lokhu akuwamangalisi amaKristu, njengoba iBhayibheli lakubikezela (Funda eyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-4)
Ingabe ukuntuleka kokwethembeka akuhlangene yini nokuba umthandi wemali, umnyundeli, umkhapheli, ongathembekile?
Njengoba sibhekene nalomoya owandayo wokungathembeki, kufanele silwe kanzima ukuze sithembeke
Kunengozi yokuthi umKristu angase aqale ukuba nomuzwa wokuthi ukuhlehla okuthile ekwethembekeni kungenziwa ukuze si-
kwazi ukuphila kulesimiso
Isimo sengqondo esiqondile okufanele sonke sibe naso sitholakala kumaHeberu 13:18, 19 (Funda)
Akungabazeki ukuthi kuyisifiso sethu ukwethembeka, kodwa ukuzihlolisisa kuyafaneleka ukuze sibone ukuthi sinjalo yini
Ingabe ukwethembeka kuzo zonke izinto kuhlanganisa okungaphezu nje kokungebi, ukungaqambi amanga?
Ingabe siyazibona izibusiso ezihlangene nokwethembeka kumaHeberu 13:18, 19?
Engxoxweni namuhla, sizoxoxa ngezici ezingase zithinte ukuphila kwakho nokuziphatha
Indawo efanelekile yokuqala kuyo yithi ngokwethu nasekhaya nomkhaya wethu
MASITHEMBEKE KITHINA NGOKWETHU NASEMALUNGWINI EMIKHAYA YETHU (12 imiz.)
Kubalulekile ukuba umKristu athembeke kuyena ngokwakhe kuqala, azimisele ukubhekana neqiniso
Ukusabela kokuqala kungase kube ukuthi, ‘Ingani njalo ngilwela ukwethembeka, ukuba neqiniso!’
Ukwethembeka kithina ngokwethu kuhlanganisa ukuqaphela ukuthi asiphelele (1Kh 8:46; tpZU 109)
Njengoba singaphelele, siyowenza amaphutha, senze izinqumo ezingaqondile, sone; ingabe siyokuvuma ngokwethembeka?
(wZU83 2/15 8-11 [w82 9/1 28-30])
Kungenzeka wazi othile okuvuma ngokushesha ukuthi bonke abantu abaphelele, kuhlanganise naye, kodwa ongase anga-
kuvumi lokho uma kufikwa esenzakalweni esiqondile esihilela yena
Ingabe siyangabaza ukuvuma komkethu, amadoda, izingane, noma abazali ukuthi senze iphutha?
Ukuvuma ngokusuka enhliziyweni ukuthi wenze iphutha kwenza ukuba kube nobuhlobo obunokuthula nabanye
Ingabe uyasibona isidingo sokuthuthuka kulesisici ‘sokuziphatha ngokwethembeka’?
Ukubonisa ukwethembeka emkhayeni kubonisa uthando ngoNkulunkulu nangomkhaya (wZU88 2/15 7)
Amalungu omkhaya angomakhelwane bethu abaseduze kakhulu, ngakho kufanele sithembeke kuwo (Efe 4:25)
Yebo, isidingo sokuba ngothembekile asivuni ukuba luhlaza noma ukuba nonya; ungaba nomusa kanye namasu okungacunuli,
kodwa ukwethembeka kusho ukuthi asilisonti noma siligweme iqiniso
Kuba nezinkinga eziningi uma indoda noma umfazi bengasebenzelani ngokwethembeka
Uma indoda iqamba amanga ngokuthi ibikuphi noma umfazi ethenga izinto aziyo ukuthi indoda ngeke ivumelane nazo, kwe-
nza isimo esingesihle ekhaya
Uma indaba seyazeka, kunzima ukuxola nokukhohlwa; kuba khona ukungabaza nangezinye izinto
Uma umuntu enza iphutha, ukulivuma ngokwethembeka iphutha kuyosiza omunye ukuba alikhohlwe; kwenza kube khona
ukuhloniphana
Ukwethemba kwezingane kuqedwa yizibonelo zokungathembeki kwabazali, ngisho nasezintweni “ezincane”
Zingase zizwe abazali bekhuluma ngokuthi kungani bengafuni ukwamukela isimemo esithile bese kamuva zizwa isizathu esi-
hlukile futhi ngokusobala esiqanjiwe nje esinikwa lowomuntu
Abazali bangase balindele ukuba ingane ihlanganyele ekukhohliseni ngokuqondene nokuthi kungani ingayanga esikoleni, ini-
keze uthisha isizathu esingamanga
Ingabe lokhu kuyazisiza izingane ukuba zihloniphe iqiniso nokwethembeka? Noma ingabe kuyowubulala unembeza?
Kuwukuhlakanipha ukukhuluma iqiniso ngisho noma lokho ngokunokwenzeka kuyoletha ubunzima
Kungase kuphumele ekujezisweni, kodwa ukuphila kuhlangene nesiyalo esifanele (IzA 4:13)
Ekwethembekeni kithina ngokwethu nasemikhayeni yethu, sinosizo oluqondile
Konke esikufundayo njengamaKristu kufanele kusisize, ngoba uNkulunkulu, iZwi lakhe, nenhlangano yakhe konke kuyisibonelo
nesikhuthazo sokwethembeka; singafunda kukho
Izibopho zothando nenhlonipho kusisiza ukuba sibe neqiniso, sithembeke, emikhayeni yethu
UKUZIPHATHA NGOKWETHEMBEKA EMISEBENZINI YETHU YOKUZIPHILISA (14 imiz.)
Ngokungafani nezwe, amaKristu kufanele athembeke ezindabeni zomsebenzi (Funda uThithu 2:9, 10, qhathanisa neNW)
Iseluleko sikaPawulu kumaKristu ayeyizigqila kwakungesokuba athembeke; singasebenza nanamuhla
Uma isigqila kwakungafanele sebe, ingabe okufanayo akunakusebenza esisebenzini esiholelwayo?
Kulula ngesisebenzi esithenjwayo ukuba ‘sebe’ ngokuthatha amathuluzi noma ezinye izinto siye nazo ekhaya noma ngokuse-
benzisa ucingo, imoto, noma izimali zenkampani, ezintweni zaso siqu ngaphandle kwemvume (Efe 4:28; wZU88 2/15 4-5)
Ungazibuza: ‘Ingabe ngithembekile ekubikeni isikhathi engisisebenzile noma izindleko okufanele ngikhokhelwe zona, ekutha-
theni isikhathi sokugula?’ (Sikhulumi: Ungaphakamisa neminye imibuzo, kodwa ungagxeki; zama nje ukuthinta unembeza)
No. 10-ZU
5/91Asikho isizathu sangempela sokwesaba uma uthembekile, ngoba uNkulunkulu uyabanakekela abanjalo (Hu 37:25; tpZU 114-16)
Umuntu olungile (okuhlanganisa ukwethembeka) uyaqinisekiswa ngokuthola akudingayo (Mat 6:33)
Ukwethembeka kubalulekile futhi ekusebenzelaneni neziphathimandla zezwe (Funda abaseRoma 13:1, 2, 5-7)
Abantu abaningi bayazithethelela izenzo zokuphamba ezinteleni, ekukhokheleni izimpahla ezingena kwamanye amazwe, ekuce-
leni izimpesheni, noma usizo lwezenhlala-kahle
