Kuyinto engathi s ına kumaKristu afuna ukugwema isahlulelo esibi futhi abe nonembeza omuhle
Gwema imikhuba evamile yokungathembeki ehilela inkokhelo yezenhlalakahle neyokusiza ngezikhathi zenhlekelele
Akuyona into engalungile ukwamukela usizo lukaHulumeni uma umuntu elufanelekela ngempela futhi eludinga (wZU83 10/1
8-12 [w83 4/1 8-11])
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sisebenze ukuze sizondle uma sikwazi ukukwenza, alibukhuthazi ubuvila (2Thes 3:10)
Ukwethembeka kobuKristu akukuvumeli ukunikeza ukwaziswa okungamanga ukuze uthole usizo
Ngeke uphendukezele amaqiniso ukuze ufaneleke noma ungabiki izimo ezingabangela ukuba imali yezenhlala-kahle inqa-
muke
Kungasebenza futhi nasekutholeni umshuwalense wokungasebenzi noma izindlu ezixhaswa uhulumeni ngokwezimali
UmKristu angase abhekane nokuvivinywa kokwethembeka ngokuqondene nezintela (wZU80 5/1 30-1 [w79 1/15 30-1]; gZU86 11/8
12-13 [g86 11/8 26-7])
UPawulu wathi sinike okufaneleyo; uhulumeni onqumayo ukuthi yini efaneleyo
Lokho akukuvumeli ukucela ukukhululeka ekukhokheni noma izaphulelo umuntu ezingamfanele
Ukunika okufaneleyo futhi kuhilela ukubika yonke imali oyitholayo umthetho othi kufanele uyibike
Uma umholo wakho uhlanganisa imali eyisipho oyinikwayo (amathiphu) okufanele uyibike; ingabe uyayibika?
Okuhlangene nokukhokha intela kuwukwethembeka ekukhokheni intela yezimpahla ezingeniswa zivela kwelinye izwe, uku-
gwema ukuzingenisa ngomshoshaphansi
Kulula ukuzithethelela ngokuthi imali efunekayo iningi kakhulu noma izilinganiso ezibekwayo azinangqondo, kodwa iku-
phi okufaneleyo?
Ngaphezu kokugcina unembeza omuhle, ukwethembeka kulezizinto kuvikela esijezisweni
Ukwethembeka kusebenza ngisho nalapho umthetho unzima
Ngokuvamile, abantu abathi bathembekile bayeba uma lilincane ithuba lesijeziso
Bathatha “izintwana zokubakhumbuza” zasemahotela noma ezakhiweni zomphakathi (gZU73 9/22 11-12 [g73 3/22 6-7])
Abaningi bayakhohlisa ekusebenziseni ucingo, badlulise imibiko ngaphandle kokukhokha
Ngezikhathi zenhlekelele, abantu abacatshangelwa njengabathembekile bayaphanga (gZU80 6/8 15 [g79 12/22 19])
AmaKristu ayakugwema lokhu ngoba athembekile ngokusuka enhliziyweni, akukhona nje ukuthi asaba ukujeziswa
MASITHEMBEKE NGAZO ZONKE IZINDLELA NGOKUSUKA ENHLIZIYWENI (6 imiz.)
Akunakwenzeka ukuba lapha sicabangele zonke izimo lapho ukwethembeka kwakho kungase kuvivinywe khona
Okudingeka ngokuyisisekelo kumaKristu ukuthanda ukwethembeka kanye nesifiso sokwethembeka ngazo zonke izikhathi (ypZU
214-15)
AmaHeberu 13:18 ayakubonisa lokhu, athi: “Sithanda ukuhamba kahle [“ngokwethembeka,” NW]”
Inhliziyo iyashukunyiswa, okusiza unembeza nengqondo ukuba kukhethe inkambo yokwethembeka
Uma umKristu entula isifiso esisuka enhliziyweni sokuthembeka, angahluleka ngaphansi kovivinyo
UAnaniya noSafira benza ngokungathembeki; bantula inhliziyo enhle (Funda IzEnzo 5:1-5)
Kukhona ingozi nangathi futhi, njengoba isixwayiso ngokukhohlisa kwenhliziyo sisebenza namanje (Jer 17:9)
Siqokomisa isidingo sokuhlakulela uthando nokwazisa ngokwethembeka, okulolonga inhliziyo yomuntu
Zindla ngokwazisa ngokwethembeka okwaboniswa amaKristu okanye nawo, ikakhulukazi uma ukwethembeka kothile ku-
ngeyona indlela ebesingenza ngayo “ngokwemvelo”; lokhu kuyasisiza ukuze siqeqeshe inhliziyo nonembeza
Ukuhlakulela ukwethembeka okusuka enhliziyweni kubalulekile, njengoba ukuvivinywa kungenzeka kube okwangasese noma
okungavamile
Ngenxa yokuthi siye sakha ukwethembeka enhliziyweni, ngokunokwenzeka siyothatha inkambo yokwethembeka
ZIMISELE UKULANDELA UNKULUNKULU WEQINISO NOKWETHEMBEKA (6 imiz.)
Sisizwa ukuba sakhe ukwethembeka okusuka enhliziyweni ngokwazi ukuthi ngalendlela silingisa uNkulunkulu, hhayi uSathane
Ukungabi neqiniso nokungathembeki kuvela kuSathane (Joh 8:44)
Ukwenza ngokungathembeki—emsebenzini, esikoleni, emkhayeni—kusho ukulingisa uSathane
UNkunkulu wethu uJehova ngokungangabazeki unguNkulunkulu weqiniso nokwethembeka (Funda iHubo 31:5)
Uyakuzonda ukuqamba amanga, ukwephula isifungo, nezilinganiso ezingamanga (IzA 6:16-19; 20:23; it-2 874  ̊6, 7)
Ukulandela isibonelo sikaNkulunkulu seqiniso nokwethembeka kuyosenza sijabule manje naphakade
Ngaleyondlela siyogwema ukungethembi, unembeza okhathazekile, nobuhlobo obonakalisiwe
Kunalokho, siyoba nonembeza omuhle phambi kukaNkulunkulu nabantu, sizizwe sikhululekile ukuba sithandaze (wZU88 2/15 7)
Imithandazo iyozwiwa futhi iphendulwe uNkulunkulu (Heb 13:18, 19)
Iqiniso nokwethembeka kuyoba izici ezibalulekile zokuphumelela ekuphileni
Umhlaba uyogcwala abantu abathembekile kuJehova
Siyokwazi ukuhlala ngokuthula nabanjalo ngoba bayokwethembeka futhi babe neqiniso kithi futhi nathi sibe njalo kubo
Singaqiniseka ukuthi ukwethembeka neqiniso kuyochuma futhi kuhlale njalo; ingabe nathi siyoba njalo?
Impendulo iyokuba nguyebo uma sicabanga futhi senza ngokuvumelana noNkulunkulu othembekile noneqiniso, uJehova
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 10-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45‘ASIYONA INGXENYE YEZWE’—SILINGISA UKRISTU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zihlole isibonelo sikaKristu futhi ngaleyondlela zithole ukuqonda okukhanya ngokwengeziwe ngokuthi
kusho ukuthini ngazo ‘ukungabi ingxenye yezwe.’ Ngezindlela ezingokoqobo zisize ukuba zibone ukuthi kungenzeka uku-
lingisa uKristu kulokhu namuhla
UNKULUNKULU UYALITHANDA IZWE, KODWA THINA AKUMELWE SIBE “YINGXENYE YEZWE”—KUNGANI?
(10 imiz.)
AmaKristu ajwayelene nokuthi uNkulunkulu uyalithanda izwe (Joh 3:16) nokuthi thina akumelwe sibe ingxenye yezwe (Joh 15:19,
NW; 17:14, 16, NW); ingabe lokho akuziphikisi?
Siyazi ukuthi kufanele silingise isibonelo sikaNkulunkulu sothando nokuthi futhi kufanele sisebenzise iseluleko sikaJesu
Singakuqonda futhi sikuxazulule kanjani lokhu okubonakala sengathi kuyangqubuzana?
UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe lesintu, isintu sisonke, kangangokuba wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ukuze labobantu ababeyoba no-
kholo kuyo basindiswe (Joh 3:16; tpZU 118-20)
Enye yezincazelo zelithi kosmos (izwe) isho “sonke isintu” (it-2 1205  ̊5, 1206  ̊4-7; rsZU 203)
Ngenxa yothando ngabo bonke abantu abasesimweni sokungapheleli, ngesintu sisonke, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana ya-
khe emhlabeni
Ngaleyondlela wenza insindiso nokuphila okuphakade kwatholakala kunoma ubani owayeyokwamukela isihlengo
UNkulunkulu akakaze azithande izimfanelo zezwe zokungamesabi uNkulunkulu nezenzo zokungamesabi uNkulunkulu (Fu-
nda eyoku-1 Johane 2:15-17)
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi akumelwe sibe ingxenye yezwe elihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu (Funda uJohane 15:18, 19)
IBhayibheli lisebenzisa futhi elithi kosmos ngokuphathelene nesintu esingezona izinceku zikaNkulunkulu (it-2 1209  ̊2-5)
Akunakwenzeka ukuthi uJesu lapho wayebhekisele kuso sonke isintu, ngoba yena nabaphostoli bakhe ngalesosikhathi babeyi-
ngxenye yesintu
Kodwa amaKristu angangaba kanjani ingxenye yesintu esihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu?
Kufanele alingise uKristu, angabi ingxenye yezwe ‘njengoba naye ayengeyona ingxenye yezwe’ (Joh 17:14, qhathanisa neNW)
Kunengqondo futhi kufanelekile ukukholelwa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuba singabi ingxenye yezwe, njengoba uKristu ayenjalo
UNkulunkulu noKristu bebengenakusibangela ukuba sibe nokukhungatheka ngokusicela ukuba senze into engenakwenze-
ka; amaKristu okuqala akwazi ukulingisa uKristu, ngokufanayo nathi singakwazi
Phakathi nalengxoxo, sizohlola ngokunakekela isibonelo sikaKristu bese sibona ukuthi lokhu kusho ukuthini ngathi, ukuthi
sihileleke kanjani, nokuthi yiziphi izinguquko noma ukuthuthukisa esingase sidinge ukukwenza
PHUMELELA EKUNGABINI YINGXENYE YEZWE, NJENGOBA KWENZA UJESU (25 imiz.)
UJesu wayazi ukuthi kwakumelwe azabalaze ukuze angabi ingxenye yezwe elihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu
Waphawula ukuthi lokho ayekufezile kwakuwukunqoba (Funda uJohane 16:33)
Amazwi akhe abonisa ukuthi kuyodingeka ukuba sizabalaze, kodwa nathi singanqoba
Isizathu esiyinhloko sokuthi kungani uJesu kwadingeka ukuba azikhandle, ngokunjalo nathi futhi, siwukuthi uSathane ungumbu-
si wezwe (Funda uJohane 14:30)
Kuyakhanya ukuthi uJesu wayekhuluma ngesintu esihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu, ngoba uSathane akazange ambuse uKristu
Ezulwini uSathane wayebonisile ukuthi ithonya lakhe lingaba ngelinamandla nelikhohlisa kangakanani; wakwazi ukubangela
izingelosi eziningi ukuba ngobugovu zimelane nobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu (IsAm 12:4; reZU 179)
USathane waphumelela futhi ekuthonyeni iningi labantu ukuba liphishekele izinjongo zobugovu (Mat 7:13)
Lombusi wezwe wayefuna ukwephula ubuqotho bukaJesu futhi ufuna ukwephula nobethu
UDeveli wazama ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene ukunqoba uJesu, kodwa wehluleka
Kwakuhileleke okungaphezu kwesidingo sokuba uJesu agweme izenzo ezithile; kwakumelwe agweme “umoya” wezwe,
amandla acindezelayo athonya umphakathi wabantu (Efe 2:2; rsZU 373)
UJesu wamelana nesifiso sezwe sokugqama, nathi kumelwe senze okufanayo
USathane wazama ukulinga uJesu ngethuba lokubaluleka ezweni (Funda uMathewu 4:8, 9)
Ingabe uSathane wayemema uJesu ukuba athande izwe ngomqondo okuJohane 3:16 noma ngokweyoku-1 Johane 2:16?
Lokhu kwakuwukukhanga isifiso sobugovu sodumo nokuvelela phakathi kwabantu
Ngokwethembeka, uJesu walwenqaba uhlangothi lukaSathane nezwe lakhe (Mat 4:10)
UJesu wayengenawo umoya wezwe obonakala ngokulangazelela ukugqama
Nathi futhi sidinga ukulingisa uKristu ngokumelana nesifiso sezwe sokuvelela komuntu siqu
Umoya wezwe ngokuvamile uvusa kwabaningi isifiso sokuvelela (wZU83 12/1 19 [w83 6/15 19])
Esikoleni, udumo lunqwatshelaniswa kulabo abaphumelelayo kwezemidlalo; lokhu kungase kumlinge umKristu
Emsebenzini wokuziphilisa, isithakazelo sokuba yinduna, umthengisi ophethe abanye, noma imenenja singase sihilele isi-
fiso sokuvelela komuntu siqu; kudingekile ukuhlola isisusa sethu
Amanye amakhosikazi abonisa isifiso sokuvelela ngokukhulumela phezulu lapho eveza imibono yawo; amanye afuna uku-
velela ngohlobo lwezingubo azigqokayo noma ukuzilungisa kwawo (wZU91 6/1 30-1)
Hlaziya ukuphila kwakho siqu; zikhona yini izindawo ozibonayo lapho oye wavumela khona isifiso sokuvelela?
UJesu futhi wabeka isibonelo okufanele sisilingise ekubeni abangathathi-hlangothi ezindabeni zezwe
Ukwenqaba isipho sikaDeveli kwasho futhi ukuthi uJesu wenqaba noma yikuphi ukuhlanganyela ezindabeni zezombangazwe
nezempi zamaJuda
No. 11-ZU
9/98Lapho abashisekeli bezombangazwe abangamaJuda bezama ukumhilela emizamweni yokuthola ukukhululeka ekubusweni
iRoma, uJesu akazange avume ukuhlanganyela nabo (Funda uJohane 6:14, 15)
Wayengenakuzanyazanyiswa eMbusweni kaNkulunkulu; wayezimisele ukuwusekela (Joh 18:36)
AmaKristu okuqala asilingisa lesimo sokungathathi-hlangothi (rsZU 311-12)
Ingabe uyamlingisa uKristu ngokulwela ukulondoloza ukungathathi-hlangothi okunjalo namuhla?
Abaningi bethu bangavuma ngokushesha ukuthi abathathi-hlangothi ngokuqondene nokuhlanganyela ngokuqondile emise-
benzini yezombangazwe neyezempi
Sibheka izinto ngendlela efanayo nabafowethu baseMalawi nakwamanye amazwe
Ingabe uyoqhubeka njalo ungathathi-hlangothi, ungahlanganyeli kunoma iluphi uhlobo lomsebenzi wezombangazwe?
Ukungabi ingxenye yezwe kuhlanganisa ukungahlakuleli uzwela nganoma yiliphi iqembu lezwe lezombangazwe (reZU 197-8)
Uzwela olungokwengqondo luholela kalula ekwenzeni okuthile, amazwi noma izenzo zokusekela
Kudinga ukuzithiba kwangempela ukuba ngasohlangothini loMbuso kuphela, ukungabi ingxenye yezwe
Kufanele silandele isibonelo sikaJesu sokungabi nesithakazelo ekuziphatheni okubi kobulili
UJesu waqaphela ukuthi ubulili bunendawo efanelekile emshadweni (Mat 19:5, 6)
UKristu, njengoba ayengeyona ingxenye yezwe, akazange ajatshuliswe ukuziphatha okubi kobulili
Wenza isimo sakhe ngokuziphatha sakhanya eNtshumayelweni yakhe yaseNtabeni (Mat 5:27, 28, 32; rsZU 231)
“Izoni” eziningi ezaziza kuye zaziyizifebe, kodwa wazisiza lezo ezazizimisele ukuphenduka (Luk 5:30-32)
AmaKristu okuqala agwema ubulili obungemthetho, elingisa uKristu (wZU82 4/1 6-7 [w82 2/1 6])
AmaKristu afuna ukungabi ingxenye yezwe alingisa isibonelo sikaJesu kulokhu (wZU87 9/15 13-14; wZU87 10/15 6)
Siyazi ukuthi akumelwe senze ubufebe, ukuphinga, ubungqingili
Kungenzeka yini ukuthi singathambekela ekujabuleleni izindaba noma izithombe ezihilela ukuziphatha okubi kobulili?
Ingabe ukugxila ezithombeni nasezindabeni ezinjalo ngeke yini kudambise intshiseko yethu ngokulunga? (Efe 5:3, 4)
Uma esikhathini esizayo ulingwa ngezinto ezihlangene nokuziphatha okubi kobulili, zibuze: ‘Yini okufanele ngiyenze ukuze
ngingabi ingxenye yezwe, ngilingisa uKristu?’
Njengoba kwenza uJesu, kufanele simelane nokugxila kwezwe ezintweni ezibonakalayo
Nakuba uJesu ayedla, elala, futhi egqoka izingubo, wayengagxilile kulezozinto futhi akazange onakaliswe umoya wezwe (Funda
uLuka 12:23-31)
AmaKristu okuqala, nakuba amaningi ayempofu ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo, ayengahlali ehahela izinto ezibonakalayo (wZU70
5/1 200 [w69 564])
Kumelwe simelane nokucindezela okwandayo kokuhlala sikhathazeka ngezinto ezibonakalayo
Nakuba sikudinga ukudla, izingubo, nendawo yokuhlala, njengoba kwakunjalo ngoJesu, gwema ukuvumela lezinto zibe yinto
eyinhloko ocabanga futhi ukhulume ngayo (Mat 8:20; 24:38, 39)
ZIMISELE UKUMELANA NOMOYA WEZWE NGAZO ZONKE IZINDLELA (4 imiz.)
Simane sacabangela ezinye zezindlela thina, silingisa uKristu, okumelwe singabi yingxenye yezwe ngazo
Wena ngokwakho ungase uqaphele ezinye zezindlela ocindezelwa ngazo ukuba ube ingxenye yezwe
Kungase kube ukubonisa ubandlululo eqenjini elithile elincane elinebala elihlukile noma ulimi (wZU87 9/15 19)
Mhlawumbe kuyoba ukulingisa izindlela zezwe zokugqoka noma zokufuna injabulo (wZU87 9/15 14-15; ypZU 91)
Noma kungase kube ukuhlanganyela umoya wezwe ngokudumisa amaqhawe ezemidlalo (gZU80 5/8 23-5 [g79 11/8 18-20])
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ucindezelwa ngayiphi indlela ukuba ube ingxenye yezwe elihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu, melana nayo
(Jak 4:4)
Ngemizamo yakho yokuba ungabonisi umoya wezwe, awusoze wabufaka engozini ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu
Uyobonisa ukuthi ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu ubazisa ngaphezu kwanoma yini izwe elingayinikeza
THOLA ISIBINDI EKUNQOBENI KUKAJESU—NATHI SINGANQOBA (6 imiz.)
UJesu walinqoba ngempela izwe ngokugwema umoya wezwe (Funda uJohane 16:33) (it-1 516)
Akazange ahileleke kwezombangazwe; wenqaba ukwamukela izindinganiso zezwe, isimo salo sengqondo, nezifiso zokuvelela
Wasiqinisekisa ukuthi nathi singakwenza; singaphumelela ekungabini ingxenye yezwe
Lokhu kunqoba kungase kubangele ukungathandwa noma ukushushiswa, njengoba kwaba njalo ngoJesu (Joh 15:18, 19)
Esinye isizathu salokhu siwukuthi inkambo yethu iyalilahla izwe (Heb 11:7; wZU89 10/1 11, 13)
Ungavumi ukuba ukungathandwa kukwethuse bese uvumelana nezwe
Ungadikibali ekuzimiseleni kwakho ukunqoba izwe (Mat 24:13)
Nakuba ungeyona ingxenye yezwe, qhubeka ubonisa uthando ngabantu ngokubasiza bazuze insindiso
Lithande ngomqondo uNkulunkulu alithanda ngawo, ngokuthanda nokusiza abantu (Joh 3:16; tpZU 128)
Hlanganyela emsebenzini wokushumayela ukuze usize abanye basinde ekudluleni kwezwe elihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu
Basize babheke phambili esikhathini lapho lonke izwe lesintu liyobe likhulekela uJehova
Khona-ke thina, njengabanqobi balelizwe labantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu, siyoba ingxenye yalelozwe ngokugcwele
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 11-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INHLONIPHO NGEGUNYA IYISIVIKELO KUWE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zihlakulele umbono ofanele ngegunya elimisiwe. Bonisa ukuthi igunya elinjalo liyisivikelo futhi li-baluleki-
le ekuthuleni nasenjabulweni. Bonisa ukuthi ngokuhlonipha igunya, siphakamisa ukubusa kukaJehova kobukhosi
SIDINGA UKUVIKELWA, NGAKHO KUFANELE SILIHLONIPHE IGUNYA (4 imiz.)
Siphila esikhathini sesiyaluyalu esikhulu; izinto ezimisiwe nazo zonke izinhlobo zobuhlobo kuyahlaselwa (gZU90 8/8 9)
Ngisho nezinto ezimisiwe njengohulumeni, umkhaya, nenkolo kuyizisulu zokugxekwa
Nakuba amaKristu engahlanganyeli ekuvukeleni noma ekubhikisheni, singaqonda ukuthi kungani abantu abathile bethukuthe-
le, bekhungathekile (Shu 8:2-4; wZU72 11/1 485-6 [w72 263-4]; wZU86 8/15 4, 6)
Ngamunye wethu usengozini yangempela yokuthinteka; kanjani?
Umuntu kungenzeka kalula ukuba alinyazwe ubugebengu obandile, ubudlova, noma ukungahloniphi umthetho
Ubuhlobo bomkhaya bungalimala kakhulu ngenxa yesimo sengqondo esibusayo, futhi ngandlela-thile lomoya ungaze usiphange
injabulo ebandleni lobuKristu (ypZU 15-16)
Imbangela eyisisekelo yeziningi zalezinkinga iwukungalinaki igunya (wZU72 11/1 483 [w72 261]; g87 11/22 30)
Ngenxa yalokhu kuthambekela, yiliphi ngempela igunya okufanele uliqaphele? Ngani?
BHEKA KUJEHOVA UKUZE UTHOLE ISIQONDISO NGEGUNYA (4 imiz.)
Ngokuphambene nokubhikisha kokungacabangi kokufuna ukukhululeka ngokuphelele egunyeni, sonke siyaliqaphela futhi siyazu-
za egunyeni (wZU72 11/1 487-8 [w72 264-5])
Siyalihlonipha futhi siyalilalela igunya lomzimba wethu—ukudla ukudla, ukulala, ukuzikhulula
UMdali wethu unguMthombo waleligunya, ngakho inhlonipho ngalo isho ukubambisana naye
Kunengqondo ukubheka kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kubantu abangaphelele, ukuze sithole isiqondiso ezindabeni zegunya
Abantu abangaphelele ngokuvamile banikeza isiqondiso esidukisayo esilimazayo (2Pet 2:18, 19; g75 10/8 6-7)
UJehova uyayazi inkambo engcono kakhulu ngathi kuzo zonke izimo (gZU76 4/8 10-13 [g75 10/8 15-22])
Sizocabangela izindawo ezintathu zegunya elimisiwe—kuhulumeni womphakathi, ekhaya, nasebandleni
Ungazihlola wena ngokwakho ukuthi ulihlonipha kanjani igunya elinjalo
UMBONO OFANELE NGEGUNYA LIKAHULUMENI USIZA AMAKRISTU (12 imiz.)
Ngokuqondene negunya lomphakathi noma likahulumeni, kunzima kodwa kubalulekile ukuba sibe nenhlonipho
Alinakuphikwa iqiniso lokuthi izikhulu eziningi zikahulumeni, kuwo wonke amazinga, zonakele
Nakuba kunjalo, uNkulunkulu uyala amaKristu ukuba azithobe futhi awahloniphe lamagunya (Funda amaRoma 13:1, 2, qhatha-
nisa neNW)
Sinesizathu esihle sokuzithoba kulamagunya (tpZU 131-2)
UNkulunkulu uvumela ohulumeni babantu ukuba babe khona futhi balondoloze ukuhleleka okuthile emphakathini
Amaphoyisa, izinkantolo, nezishaya-mthetho zikhonza ‘njengesikhonzi sikaNkulunkulu’ (Funda amaRoma 13:3, 4) (wZU90 11/1
15, 20)
Nakuba singabajabuleli abantu abonakele, singabonisa inhlonipho ngenxa yesikhundla nomsebenzi wabo
Nakuba kuvunywa ukuthi awaphelele, lamagunya avimbela isiyaluyalu nobugebengu
Ukwanda okukhulu kokwephulwa komthetho ezindaweni lapho amaphoyisa eteleka kubonisa ukuthi anikeza isilinganiso
esithile sesivikelo kuwe nasempahleni yakho; ayakukhonza
Nsuku zonke sithola ezinye izinzuzo kulezikhonzi zomphakathi (Funda amaRoma 13:6, 7)
(Sikhulumi: Nikeza izibonelo zezinkonzo esizithola ngentela ekhokhelwa ohulumeni [wZU72 11/1 489-90 (w72 266-7); wZU90 11/1
20-2])
Yiqiniso, izimali zentela ngokuvamile zisetshenziswa kabi, kodwa siyazuza kulezo ezisetshenziswa ngokufanele (wZU90 11/1 24)
Iziphathimandla ezisebenzisa kabi noma zebe izimali zentela ziyojeziswa umthetho futhi ziyolandisa kuNkulunkulu; akulu-
ngile ngathi ukuba siziphathele umthetho ezandleni zethu ngenjongo yokuziphindiselela
AmaKristu kumelwe aqaphele isimo sawo sengqondo ukuze akwazi ukubonisa inhlonipho ngamagunya aphakeme
Ingabe uyaziqaphela izindawo ezidinga ukulungiswa: ukubika intela; imithetho ngebhizinisi lakho, ukunakekela ikhaya lakho,
ukuhlala kwakho ngokomthetho ezweni, imithetho ngokuqondene nokushayela kwakho, ukupaka, noma umshwalense?
Ngisho nalabo osekuyisikhathi eside bengamaKristu kumelwe banakekele ukuba balondoloze inhlonipho (tpZU 135)
Ukungawunaki umthetho ezindabeni ezibonakala zizincane kunikeza umuntu isibindi sokuba enze ukungabi namthetho okwe-
ngeziwe (Shu 8:11)
Ukulalela imithetho yegunya eliphakeme kuyavikela futhi kuvumela unembeza ohlanzekile (Rom 13:5)
Ukuzithoba okulinganiselwe emagunyeni aphakeme kuyinkambo yamaKristu (tpZU 133-4)
Ukuzithoba kwethu kucabangela ukuthi igunya eliphakeme kunawo wonke nguNkulunkulu; kuyofanele silalele yena kuqala
uma imfuneko kahulumeni ishayisana neyaKhe
Abaphostoli babeka isibonelo ngokwenqaba ukulalela umyalo wokuyeka ukushumayela (IzE 4:19, 20; 5:29)
Ezicini eziningi zokuphila, ukushayisana okunjalo akwenzeki, ngakho singalandela amaRoma 13:1
Kumelwe siqaphele ukuthi lapho singenzi ngokuvumelana nomthetho wezwe, kungenxa yokuthi ushayisana nomthetho ka-
Nkulunkulu, hhayi ngenxa yokuthi uyasiphazamisa, ubonakala ungabalulekile, noma asivumelani nawo
No. 12-ZU
5/91YANDISA UKUTHULA KWAKHO NGOKUQAPHELA IGUNYA EKHAYA (12 imiz.)
Umuntu uye wangaphumelela kakhulu ekwakheni imikhaya ejabulayo, enobunye kangangokuthi abanye bathi umkhaya wamanje
unqunyelwe ukwehluleka (g83 5/22 14; gZU83 2/8 3 [g82 8/8 3])
Imbangela eyisisekelo iwukwehluleka ukuqaphela amazinga egunya uNkulunkulu alinikeza umkhaya
Isimiso esibalulekile egunyeni lomkhaya siwubunhloko (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 11:3) (wZU72 11/1 488-9, 492-3 [w72 266, 270])
Njengoba kunjalo ngokuzithoba emagunyeni kahulumeni, izulu liyigunya eliphakeme kunawo wonke (Kol 3:18, 20; tpZU 138)
Isibonelo sikaKristu ekunakekeleni ngothando ibandla lakhe siyinto yokulandelwa (tpZU 136-7; peZU 240)
Lapho indoda isebenzisa igunya lobunhloko ngothando olufanayo, kulula ngokwengeziwe ngomkhaya ukuba uyihloniphe
Madoda, hlolani ukuthi isibonelo senu emkhayeni ngempela siyamlingisa uKristu; niyolandisa kuye ngendlela enisebenzi-
sa ngayo ubunhloko benu
Ukuba inhloko yomkhaya akudingi ukuba nenze zonke izinqumo noma nibuse yonke imininingwane yokuphila
Uma indoda engakholwa ingasilandeli iseluleko sikaNkulunkulu, umkhaya kusafanele uhloniphe isikhundla sayo (Efe 5:23; 6:1-4)
Inkosikazi iyolandisa kuJehova ngesimo sayo sengqondo ngasendodeni yayo nesimo sengqondo esihlakulelayo ebantwaneni
Ngokunakekela kwenkosikazi imisebenzi yasekhaya, ihlonipha izinqumo zendoda yayo ezingashayisani neBhayibheli, nangoku-
qhubeka isebenzela ubunye nokuthula, ibonisa inhlonipho ngoMsunguli womshado
Abantwana abakholwayo akumelwe bamdelele umzali ongakholwa
Ukusetshenziswa ngokufanele kwegunya lomkhaya ngokuqondene nabantwana kuhilela izibopho nhlangothi zombili
Abazali banesibopho sokuyala nokuqondisa abantwana (IzA 13:1, 24; w61 176)
Kusho ukuthatha isinyathelo kuqala kulokhu, bengazami ukukugwema ngoba kungase kubonakale kungathokozisi (gZU90
1/22 28)
Inhlonipho ngaleligunya elinikezwe nguNkulunkulu iyosiza abazali ukuba bamelane nokuvumela abantwana ukuba balawule
Intsha ehlonipha igunya emkhayeni ibonisa lokhu ngokuba nokubambisana nangokulalela (ypZU 12)
Ngezinye izikhathi umntwana uyalalela, kodwa ngokuthukuthela nangokucasuka okusobala noma ngokungafuni
Lokhu akukhona ukubonisa inhlonipho yeqiniso ngegunya; kudingeka sisixwaye lesimo sengqondo (ypZU 15-17)
IBhayibheli alisho ukuthi ukulalela kugcina eminyakeni engaphambi kokweva eshumini elinambili noma ezindabeni ezithile
(IzA 4:1)
Iqiniso lokuthi kungenzeka usondela eminyakeni yobudala engokomthetho alisiqedi isibopho sakho sokuhlonipha igunya
labazali bakho (IzA 23:22; wZU83 3/15 17 [w82 11/1 14])
Abazali bangase bamise iziqondiso ezikhethekile ngokujwayelana nabantu bobulili obuhlukile; inhlonipho ngegunya labo
iyosiza osemusha ukuba azamukele
Umkhaya wakho uyosizakala futhi uvikelwe ngokubonisa inhlonipho ngegunya ekhaya lakho
Niyojabulela ukuthula okwengeziwe ekhaya, nigweme usizi oluningi lwalabo abantula inhlonipho
Inhlonipho ehlakulelwe kanjalo ngegunya iyosiza futhi umuntu ukuba ahloniphe igunya nakweminye imikhakha
IGUNYA EBANDLENI LISEKELWE EZWINI LIKANKULUNKULU (9 imiz.)
Njengoba ukuthula nempumelelo emkhayeni (olungiselelwe uNkulunkulu) kuhilela inhlonipho efanele ngegunya, singalindela uku-
thola igunya ebandleni lobuKristu (nalo elilungiselelwe uNkulunkulu) nokuthula okuvela kulo
Okubonisa leligunya nendlela esifaneleka ngayo kulo kunikezwa kweyoku-1 Petru 5:1-3 (Funda)
Abadala, noma ababonisi, bafaniswa nabelusi; singalindela ukuba basebenzise igunya lothando
Lamavesi asikisela futhi ukuthi “umhlambi” ungabi ohlubukayo, kodwa uzimisele ukuholwa
Lababonisi abanothando bafanelwe inhlonipho yethu (1Ti 5:17; tpZU 139-40)
Baphatha iZwi likaNkulunkulu ekuyaleni abangahambi ngomthetho, ngaleyondlela besisiza sonke
Futhi ababonisi bayazikhandla ukuze balungiselele izingxenye zomhlangano nokuhola emalungiselelweni ebandla
Inhlonipho yethu efanele ngaleligunya iboniswa ngokuba kwethu abalalelayo (Funda eyamaHeberu 13:17) (wZU89 9/15 22)
Abadala bangase banikeze iseluleko esisekelwe eBhayibhelini, njengesiphathelene nokuhleba noma ukuphuza ngokweqile
(wZU89 9/15 24-5)
Ingabe siyasenqaba iseluleko ngenxa yokujwayelana nomdala osinikezayo, singakunaki ukuthi sisekelwe eBhayibhelini?
Kungcono ukwamukela iseluleko esinjalo ngokuzithoba, ngokuzihlola ukuthi kungenzeka ukuba siyasidinga
Inhlonipho ngaleligunya iyosiza lonke ibandla
Siyazi ukuthi liyophumelela, ngoba lisekelwe eZwini likaNkulunkulu
Ibandla liyobonisa ukuvumelana nobunye, lingabi nokungavumelani noma ukuhlubuka komshoshaphansi
INHLONIPHO NGEGUNYA IYONIVIKELA PHAKADE (4 imiz.)
Uma sihlakulela inhlonipho ngegunya likaJehova, ukulalela igunya eliphansi kuyoba lula ngokwengeziwe
Asikho isizathu sokukholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyoshintsha indlela yakhe eyisisekelo yokuphatha lapho izwe elisha selifikile
Ngokusobala, uJehova uyoqhubeka eqondisa izindaba ngegunya elimisiwe (wZU72 11/1 496 [w72 273])
Singalindela ukuthi elungiselelweni lomkhaya obaba bayoqhubeka behola futhi benomthwalo wemfanelo kuNkulunkulu
Ngokusobala, kuyoba nabameleli basemhlabeni abanegunya kwezinye izindaba (wZU89 9/1 22)
Inhlonipho esiyihlakulela manje ngegunya elimisiwe iyosisiza ukuba sifaneleke ezweni elisha
Siyobonisa, manje nasezweni elisha, ukuthi siphakamisa ubukhosi bukaJehova nendlela yaKhe yokwenza izinto
Ngakho-ke, inhlonipho yethu ngegunya iyoba isivikelo saphakade nesibusiso kithi
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 12-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGOBULILI NOMSHADO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Izwe linombono ophendukezelwe ngobulili nomshado; umbono kaJehova uyalinganisela. Ukuze sithole injabulo yeqiniso, ku-
dingeka sibe nombono kaJehova
UBULILI NOMSHADO KWABA NESIQALO ESIPHELELE EPHARADESI (6 imiz.)
Namuhla, ubulili nomshado kugcizelelwa kakhulu; ngokuvamile kunikezwa umbono ophendukezelwe (gZU87 1/8 27 [g86 12/22 8])
Okabani umbono thina esinawo? Kungenzeka yini ukuthi yilowo walabo esifunda nabo, esisebenza nabo, noma izincwadi zobu-
lili?
Kunengqondo ukuhlola umbono waLowo owaqalisa ubulili nomshado
UJehova wabukhanyisa ngokufanelekile ubulili nomshado lapho kuqaliswa umkhaya wesintu
Umbhangqwana wokuqala wangeniswa emshadweni ohloniphekile, ovunyelwe uNkulunkulu (Gen 2:24)
Ubuhlobo bobulili obungokwemvelo phakathi kwendoda nomfazi bamiswa ngokomthetho (Funda uGenesise 1:27, 28) (rsZU 232)
Kufanelekile ukucabangela lendaba ngendlela enesizotha; iBhayibheli liwunikeza ngokusobala umbono kaNkulunkulu ngo-
bulili nomshado
Ukulandisa kweBhayibheli kukwenza kucace ukuthi emshadweni ubuhlobo bobulili obungokwemvelo babubhekwa uJehova
njengobufanele
Umshado osekelwe embonweni kaNkulunkulu, ngokwezindinganiso zakhe, wawuyoletha izibusiso nezinzuzo eziningi
Ubulili babungeyona into okuwukuphela kwayo, ebaluleke kunazo zonke, nakuba abalingane bomshado babengazala futhi ba-
thole injabulo ngabo
Kwakumelwe bajabulele ubungane, ingxoxo, nezimfanelo zokuphelelisana komunye nomunye (Gen 2:18; flZU 55)
Babengazuza injabulo enkulu ekuphaneni nasekusizaneni
Babeyodala isimo esifanelekile—ngokomthetho, ngokwenhlalo, nangokokuziphatha—sokukhulisa abantwana (flZU 85)
Ngokunengqondo ungase ubuze: ‘Ingabe ikhona imingcele, noma imigoqo, uNkulunkulu ayinikeza eZwini lakhe ukuze asiqondise?’
Ake sihlole izici ezihlukahlukene ezihilela kokubili abantu abashadile nabantu abangashadile
ISELULEKO SIKANKULUNKULU SIYASIZA EKWENZENI UMSHADO UPHUMELELE (16 imiz.)
UJehova, owanikeza abantu amandla okuzala nowamisa umshado, wanikeza iseluleko ngokuqondene nalaba (gZU86 7/8 9-10)
Njengoba uNkulunkulu eluthando, imithetho yakhe neseluleko ngobulili nomshado kubonakalisa uthando lwakhe
NjengoMdali womshado nobulili, uyakwazi okusilungele
Sibonisa ukusekela ukubusa kwaphezulu ngokwamukela isiqondiso sakhe sothando
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi ubuhlobo bobulili phakathi kwabalingane bomshado bufanele bubonakalise uthando olungenabugovu
Indoda nomfazi akufanele bacabange nje kuphela ngemizwa yabo siqu noma izidingo (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 7:3, 4)
Lapho indoda nomfazi bekhathalelana ngempela, ukungavumelani ezidingweni ezingokwenyama nasezifisweni kungabeke-
zelelwa, kuphumele ekwanelisekeni okuphawulekayo kubo bobabili
Ukucabangela kwabonakaliswa futhi ekwenqabeleni koMthetho kaMose ubuhlobo bobulili ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini (Lev
20:18; wZU73 1/15 46-7 [w72 575-6]; it-2 372)
Lokhu kwasiza amadoda ukuba aqonde imijikelezo nemizwa yomkawo; futhi kwabangela inhlonipho ngegazi
EyabaseKolose 3:5, 6 ibhekiswe kokubili kubantu abashadile nabangashadile (wZU85 4/15 16  ̊5)
AmaKristu kufanele agweme ukwenza isifiso sobulili sibe isithixo (gZU87 1/8 8 [g86 12/22 8])
Ngokuqondakalayo, uJehova uvumela ubuhlobo bobulili bomuntu oshadile nomlingane womshado wendoda noma nomfazi kuphela
Ngisho nangaphambi kokuba uMthetho unikezwe, uJosefa waqaphela ukuthi ukuphinga ‘kwakuwukona kuNkulunkulu’ (Gen
39:9)
Ngaphansi koMthetho, ukuphinga kwakwenqatshelwe, kuhambisana nesijeziso sokufa uma lowomthetho uphulwa (Eks 20:14;
Dut 22:22)
ImiBhalo inxusa amaKristu ukuba nawo agcine ubulili nomshado kuhloniphekile
Ukuphinga kuyamcasula uNkulunkulu futhi kuyalimaza kulabo abakwenzayo (Funda amaHeberu 13:4) (gZU83 8/8 20 [g83 2/22 8])
Womabili amagama elesiGreki nelesiNgisi ahunyushwe ngokuthi “ukuphinga” anomqondo wokonakalisa noma ukungcolisa
(wZU73 3/15 142 [w72 767])
Ukulahla kukaNkulunkulu ukuphinga kuyisizathu esinamandla sokukugwema (Mal 3:5)
Esinye isizathu sokugwema ukuphinga siwukuthi ngokwenza kanjalo umuntu ugwema ukuzilethela yena ngokwakhe nabanye
usizi (Funda izAga 6:27-29, 32) (gZU86 7/8 8-9; hpZU 71; wZU88 3/15 17  ̊8)
Kunqamula ukwethembana, kulimaza ukuthula komshado, kuholela esehlukanisweni
Ukuphinga ngokuvamile kubalimaza kakhulu abantwana bomuntu ngokubhubhisa umkhaya onobunye
Ezikhathini eziningi kuphawuleka ngabantwana abangamavezandlebe, izifo ezithathelwana ngobulili, nonembeza abakha-
thazekile
Ngempela, umuntu ohlanganyela kukho uyisiwula, “uchitha umphefumulo” wakhe (rsZU 337; gZU83 8/8 20 [g83 2/22 8])
Okunezela othandweni olungenabugovu oluhlangene nobuhlobo bobulili emshadweni kuwukuqaphela ukuthi umntwana one-
lungelo lokuphila angase avele
Ayikho inkomba engokomBhalo ebonisa ukuthi sibophekile ukuba sishade futhi sibe nabantwana abaningi, ngakho kuseku-
nqumeni kombhangqwana ukuthi uyozama yini ukulawula ubungako bomkhaya noma cha (wZU89 6/15 29)
No. 13-ZU
5/91Umntwana ongakazalwa okhula esibelethweni uwukuphila futhi uyigugu kuNkulunkulu (Eks 21:22, 23; tpZU 153-4)
Ukukhipha isisu ngamabomu kuwukubulala; ngokuqinisekile lokho akumthokozisi uNkulunkulu
Ngisho nakuba odokotela noma izihlobo bekhuthaza ukukhipha isisu, umKristu uyolandela umbono kaNkulunkulu
(wZU75 10/15 478-9 [w75 191-2])
Emishadweni lapho kuba khona ukukhulelwa, ngisho noma kwakungahlosiwe, abazali banethuba lokuqeqesha umntwana
ngenhlonipho ngoMniki-Kuphila wethu nangethemba lokuphila okuphakade
Siyibonile indlela umbono kaNkulunkulu ngomshado nobulili ongaba nengxenye ngayo ekuphumeleleni komshado, kodwa kuthi-
wani ngemishado ehlukanayo? Uyini umbono kaNkulunkulu ngesehlukaniso?
INGABE UNOMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGESEHLUKANISO? (8 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu wayehlose ukuba abalingane bomshado bahlale benyamanye (Mat 19:4-6; wZU88 5/15 4-7)
UJehova wathi uyasizonda isehlukaniso (Mal 2:14-16; wZU81 12/15 17-23 [w81 7/1 17-22])
UJesu ngokwakhe wanikeza amaKristu okuwukuphela kwesizathu esivumelekile sokwenza kanjalo (Funda uMathewu 19:9)
Igama lesiGreki elihunyushwe ngokuthi “ukuphinga” elithi por·neia (uziphatha okubi kakhulu kobulili) (wZU83 9/1 29-31
[w83 3/15 30-1])
Uma umlingane womshado enecala lokuziphatha okubi kakhulu, ongenacala angathola isehlukaniso esingokomBhalo
Umlingane womshado ongenacala akabophekile ukuba afake isehlukaniso; angabonisa isihe nokuthethelela (it-1 1147)
Isehlukaniso esisekelwe kuyipor·neia kuphela esiyokhulula ongenacala ukuba aphinde ashade
Kubalulekile ukukhumbula umbono kaNkulunkulu ngesehlukaniso, ngoba uyisivikelo
 ́
Ukuqonda ukungathi s ına komshado nesehlukaniso kufanele kusize ekwenzeni umshado uphumelele
UMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGOBULILI UYABASIZA NABANTU ABANGASHADILE (13 imiz.)
UJehova wanikeza isifiso sobulili ukuze sisebenze ngokufanelekile endaweni yaso
Ngenxa yokuthi abantu abasebasha nabangashadile banaso lesifiso, kufanelekile ngathi ukuba sicabangele umbono kaNkulu-
nkulu ngokuhlobonga, ubungqingili, nokushaya indlwabu, okuyizinto ezivamile phakathi kwentsha eningi
UNkulunkulu ukwenqabela ngokuqondile ukuhlobonga (Funda eyoku-1 Thesalonika 4:3-5)
Umuntu ongashadile ohlobongayo uzilimaza kakhulu yena ngokwakhe nabanye (ypZU 181-8)
Abaningi banombono wokuthi uma bobabili abahilelekile bethanda, akukho ukulimala—akunjalo!
(Sikhulumi: Ungakhuluma ngezingcaphuno zamuva ezikhuluma ngengculaza, ezinye izifo ezithathelwana ngobulili, ubuve-
zandlebe)
Isihlobongi silimaza ilungelo lomunye umuntu lokungena emshadweni ngesiqalo esihlanzekile
Indlela yothando lweqiniso ngomakhelwane nangoNkulunkulu ayiyihlanganisi inkambo elimazayo yokuhlobonga
Umuntu angaba nonembeza ohlanzekile “nodumo” phambi koMdali (1Thes 4:4, NW)
“Ukuhlobonga” eBhayibhelini kungahlanganisa ubungqingili; uNkulunkulu uxwayisa ngakho futhi (tpZU 144-6)
Umkhuba wobungqingili owawonakele eSodoma naseGomora wabangela “isikhalo” (Gen 18:20; 19:23, 24)
Ngenxa ‘yesono esinzima impela,’ uNkulunkulu wayibhubhisa lemizi
IBhayibheli lisho ngokucacile ukuthi “abesilisa abalalanayo” abanakungena eMbusweni wakhe (1Ko 6:9, 10)
Kufanele sibonge ngokuthi uNkulunkulu usinikeza umbono wakhe ukuze sikwazi ukwenza ngokuhlakanipha
Uma umuntu eye wahlanganyela ekuhlobongeni, angalungisa ukucabanga futhi ayeke, njengoba kwenza abanye ababa ama-
Kristu (1Kor 6:11; gZU78 11/8 21-3 [g78 5/8 27-8]; gZU75 12/22 6-9 [w74 486-9])
Ukukwazi ukubonakalisa ukuzithiba kobuKristu nakho kuyasiza ekugwemeni ukushaya indlwabu (ypZU 198-211; wZU85 4/15
16-18)
Abanye ngephutha baye babheka ukushaya indlwabu njengokuzikhulula okungalimazi esifisweni sobulili
Ngokulahla ‘ukushisa kwenkanuko,’ iBhayibheli lisiza amaKristu ukuba agweme noma agqashule emkhubeni wokushaya
indlwabu (1Thes 4:5)
Inkinga ayiyona kakhulu engokomzimba kodwa ingokwengqondo
Njengoba umuntu efunda ukulawula ukucabanga, engagxili emicabangweni yobulili, angayinqoba inkinga
Ukuthandaza kuNkulunkulu nokufunda iBhayibheli kuye kwasiza (Fil 4:8)
Umuntu olwisana noma ogwema ukushaya indlwabu ubonisa ukuthi wamukela futhi ulandela umbono kaNkulunkulu
Abazali benza kahle ngokuxoxa ngalezindaba nabantwana abakhulayo, bedlulisela kubo umbono kaNkulunkulu
Izihloko ezikuNqabayokulinda nePhaphama! kanye nezinye izincwadi zingasetshenziswa; ziye zasiza abaningi (gZU66 1/8 7-11
[g65 6/8 16-19]; gZU66 2/8 9-12 [g65 7/8 16-19]; ypZU 198-211, 225-35, 252-60; gZU90 1/22 22-4; gZU90 2/8 13-15)
Ungalibali kuze kube yilapho abantwana bethola umbono wezwe kwabafunda nabo
Ukuba nombono kaNkulunkulu kuyothinta ukuthula nokujabula kwabantwana, njengoba kuyothinta nokwakho
UKUTHULA NENJABULO KUNGATHOLAKALA NGOKUBA NOMBONO KANKULUNKULU (2 imiz.)
Singalindela umvuzo wokuthula nenjabulo ngokuba nombono kaNkulunkulu (Funda iHubo 19:9-11)
UJehova uyakwazi okungcono kakhulu kithi, futhi ngothando uye wanikeza umbono ofanele ngobulili nomshado
Ukwamukela nokulandela lokhu kusisiza ukuba sibalekele iminjunju, izinsizi, nezinkinga
Sinokwaneliseka kokuzithiba, umlingane womshado omsulwa nonothando, unembeza ohlanzekile, ukuthula kwengqondo oku-
hlala njalo, nethemba lokuphila ngokombono kaNkulunkulu phakade
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 13-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ABANTU ABAHLANZEKILE BADUMISA UJEHOVA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Sidumisa uJehova ngokuhlanzeka okungokomzimba, ngokugqoka nokuzilungisa okuyisibonelo. Ngeke sibe abahlanzekile
emehlweni kaJehova uma sizihlanganisa nabantu abangahlanzekile ngokokuziphatha nangokomoya
UKUHLANZEKA OKUNGOKOMZIMBA KUHLANGENE NOKWAMUKELEKA OKUNGOKOMOYA (7 imiz.)
UJehova unguNkulunkulu ongcwele (it-1 1127  ̊17)
Kuyamhlazisa ukungcola, okungokomzimba noma okungokomoya (Isa 1:16)
AmaIsrayeli kwadingeka ukuba azihlanze wona kanye nezingubo zawo ngenxa yomhlangano owesabekayo waseNtabeni
yaseSinayi (Eks 19:10, 11)
UAroni namadodana akhe kwakumelwe bageze ngamanzi asesitsheni esikhulu sethusi ngaphambi kokukhonza etendeni
lokuhlangana (Eks 29:4; 30:18, 19)
UNkulunkulu ongcwele wayefuna ukuhlanzeka ekamu lamaIsrayeli (Dut 23:10-14; g81-ZU 11/8 14 [g81 5/8 14]; g71-ZU 10/8 24
[g71 4/22 28])
Ukungalucabangeli udumo olufanele uJehova kwakungabekezelelwa
Ukuhlanzeka okwakufuneka ngaphansi koMthetho kwakuyisisekelo senjabulo
Abantu bakaNkulunkulu kwakungadingekile ukuba babheke izimfuneko zakhe ngokuhlanzeka njengezinzima, eziwumthwa-
lo, noma ezicindezelayo
Ngokwenza kwabo bonke umzamo onengqondo, abantu babeyokwazi ukuphila endaweni enhle ngokwengeziwe
Babenganeliseka ngokuba abantu abanempilo ngokwengeziwe, abangekho engozini yokungenwa yimishayabhuqe yezifo noma
ukugula njalo
Ukulungiselela kukaNkulunkulu isiqondiso esinjalo kwakungabasiza ukuba babone ukuthi wayebakhathalela futhi babe-
khethekile kuye (Dut 33:29; Hu 33:12-14; Isa 48:17)
YONKE INDLELA YOKUPHILA KWETHU KUFANELE IDUMISE UJEHOVA (8 imiz.)
Njengoba nje ikamu lamaIsrayeli lalimelele yonke indlela yawo yokuphila, kanjalo inkambo yethu yokuphila kumelwe igcinwe
ihlanzekile, ukuze uJehova ‘angaboni lutho olungcolileyo kithina’ (it-1 398  ̊2)
Ukucoceka nokuhleleka kwamakhaya ethu, ngaphakathi nangaphandle, kumelwe kube ubufakazi komakhelwane bokuthi si-
khulekela uNkulunkulu ohlanzekile (w89-ZU 6/1 16-18)
Bufakazi buni bokuthi sikhulekela uNkulunkulu wobungcwele obunganikezwa igceke elingcolile, izibi ezinqwabelene, ikha-
ya elingahlelekile, noma imoto engcolile?
Kubalulekile futhi ukuba abantu okudingeka ukuba sidlelane nabo emsebenzini noma esikoleni basazi njengabantu abakhuluma
ngendlela ehlanzekile, abaphila ngendlela ehlanzekile, ababonisa inhlonipho ngoNkulunkulu nangomakhelwane ngesimo sethu
sengqondo nangendlela esigqoka ngayo (g86 12/22 23-4; w89-ZU 6/15 15; w87-ZU 8/15 13  ̊15)
Bangabona ukuthi ukukhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela yakhe kusisiza ukuba sibe ngabantu abajabula ngokwengeziwe, abane-
mpilo ngokwengeziwe, futhi abeneliseke ngokwengeziwe
UNKULUNKULU OHLANZEKILE KUMELWE KUSONDELWE KUYE NGOKWESABA NANGOKUTHUTHUMELA
(7 imiz.)
Kufanele sibe nokukhathalela lapho sikhonza uJehova, simmelela enkonzweni yasensimini noma epulatifomu (w89-ZU 6/1 19-20)
Lapho kudingeka ukuba sibonakale phambi kwesikhulu esiqhamile, umbusi, noma umqashi, siye sibonakale kanjani? Sibona-
kala singamadlabha, singenandaba ngendlela esenza ngayo noma esizilungise ngayo, noma sibonakala ngendlela yokuba si-
catshangelwe kangcono kakhulu? (Mal 1:8b)
Konke ukubonakala kwethu nesimo sengqondo kumelwe kubonise ukuthuthumela nenhlonipho yangempela. (km-ZU 11/80 1)
Noma yini engakubonisi lokhu iyoba ukumedelela uJehova (w87-ZU 11/1 17  ̊6; w88-ZU 8/15 17)
INkosi uDavide yenqaba ukudla, ukugeza, noma ukunakekela ukubonakala kwayo ngenxa yobuhlungu nokudabuka ngokufa
kwendodana yayo okwakusondela, kodwa lapho kufika isikhathi sokuyokhulekela uJehova, yageza futhi yabonakala isesimwe-
ni esihle (2Sa 12:20)
Lapho sihlangana ngenjongo yokukhulekela, nathi thina bakhulekeli abangamaKristu kufanele sinakekele ukuba sizilungise fu-
thi sigqoke, hhayi ngokwalokho okuzolungela thina noma esikuthandayo, kodwa ngokwalokho okuthokozisa uNkulunkulu osi-
memile ukuba sihlangane nangokwalokho okuthokozisa abakhulekeli esikanye nabo
Umhlangano wokukhulekela awusona nje isenzakalo sokuzijabulisa noma ukuzipholela okuvamile
Uma sinenhlonipho efanele ngebandla elijabulayo, elibusisekile, ngeke sidinge imithetho emisiwe ngalokho esingakugqoka
noma esingenakukugqoka
Siyothokoza ukubonisa ngokubonakala kwethu ukwazisa esinakho ngokukhulekela okuhlanzekile
UKUTHOKOZISA UNKULUNKULU KUMELWE KUZE KUQALA KUNOKUTHOKOZISA ABANTU BEZWE ABA-
NGAMESABI UNKULUNKULU (8 imiz.)
Izixuku zabantu zenza lokhu nalokhuya ukuze zizivumelanise nazo zonke izitayela noma izimfashini (yp-ZU 91-4; g89-ZU 10/8 17
[g89 10/8 11])
Abantu bakhulekela futhi balingise abantu bezwe abadumile, kwezemidlalo, ezokuzijabulisa, emabhizinisini, nasemphakathini
Isikhathi esiningi kakhulu nomcabango sichithelwa ekuzivumelaniseni nezindlela zalesimiso sezinto kunasekuguquleni izi-
ngqondo zabo nezindlela, okuyinto ebalulekile ekuzuzeni ukuphila (Rom 12:1, 2)
Kubalulekile ukuba senqabe ukuvumelana nesimiso sezinto esingamesabi uNkulunkulu noma nganoma iyiphi indlela sizihlanga-
nise naso, nezindlela zaso, noma nezitayela zaso zesimanjemanje
Asifuni ukuzenza onodoli bemakethe yaso yemfashini (yp-ZU 73-80)

ZIHLANGANISE NALABO ABAHLANZEKILE (10 imiz.)
Ukuze silondoloze ukuhlanzeka okufunwa uJehova, kumelwe siqaphele abangane bethu, sikhethe kuphela labo abayosekela isi-
nqumo sethu sokuthokozisa uNkulunkulu (1Kor 15:33)
Ungalokothi uzihlanganise nabaqambimanga, abazenzisi, abenzi bokubi, abantu ababi, labo abazinikele ekuziphatheni okuxeke-
thile noma olimini olubolile (Hu 26:4, 5, 10; w85-ZU 11/15 20-1; w72-ZU 3/15 129 [w71 528])
Labo abamane benqabe ukuzwa noma ukwamukela isigijimi sezindaba ezinhle ababona abangane abamukelekayo (uw-ZU 44-5)
Thina, njengoDavide, kufanele sikujabulele ukuhlangana nezixuku ezibuthene zezinceku zikaJehova ezithembekile (Hu 26:12;

ni (Hu 26:9; w72-ZU 3/15 129 [w71 528])
Nakuba abafowethu nodadewethu bengaphelele, bangabangane abahle kakhulu ngokwengeziwe kunabantu abasesimisweni
sikaSathane
KUBA NEZIBUSISO ENDLELENI EHLANZEKILE YOKUPHILA (5 imiz.)
Izibusiso manje—
Impilo yethu engokomzimba ingathuthukiswa ukuziphatha kanye nemikhuba ehlanzekile (g88-ZU 10/8 26-9 [g88 9/22 8-11])
Ukuzihlonipha kuthuthukiswa ukwazi ukuthi akukho-phutha elingatholakala ngokuphathelene nokukhulekela kwethu
uNkulunkulu (Dan 6:5)
Singaba nokwaneliseka ngokuhlobanisa inkonzo yethu kaNkulunkulu ohlanzekile nokuhlanzeka kwethu komuntu siqu (Isa
52:11; w87-ZU 11/1 15-16, 20)
Izibusiso esikhathini esizayo—
Sinesithembiso sokuqashelwa uNkulunkulu njengamadodana namadodakazi akhe (2Kor 6:18; 7:1)
Abagcotshiwe bayoba amadodana asezulwini
Ngemva kokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, izinceku zikaNkulunkulu izinceku zakhe zasemhlabeni ziyoba abantu
abaphelele
Khona-ke siyoba nobuhlobo baphakade naLowo ohlanzekile noqotho kuyo yonke imisebenzi yakhe, kuhlanganise naleyo ye-
simiso sakhe esisha sezinto (2Kor 6:17; 1Jo 3:3)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
