Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Ukukhathalela kwethu abanye abantu kubonisa ukuthi singamaKristu eqiniso. UJehova usibekela isibonelo. Bonisa indle-
la lokhu okungenziwa ngayo ngezindlela ezingokoqobo
UJEHOVA—ISIBONELO ESINGENAKUFANISWA EKUKHATHALELENI ABANYE (5 imiz.)
Uma sibuzwa ukuthi ubani oyisibonelo esikhulu kunazo zonke sokukhathalela abanye, impendulo yethu kufanele ithi, nguJehova
Nakuba enguMbusi Wendawo Yonke, unozwela ngezidingo zezidalwa zakhe (Luk 12:6, 7; gZU87 11/8 28 [g87 10/22 14])
Ukujula kokukhathalela kwakhe kusobala kokubili endalweni yakhe naseZwini lakhe elilotshiwe
Umhlaba ugcwele amalungiselelo akhe ngenjongo yokunethezeka kwethu nenjabulo (wZU89 12/1 4)
Imisebenzi yakhe yendalo ibonisa ukuhlakanipha kwakhe nobuhle (Job 5:9, 10; Hu 104:24; 145:7, 15, 16)
IBhayibheli liqondisa ukunakekela ebuhleni bukaNkulunkulu nokukhathalela abantu
Ukukhathalela uNkulunkulu akubonisa ekulungiseleleni uJesu njengesihlengo kutusa uthando lwaKhe (Funda eyoku-1 Johane 4:
9, 10)
Abantu ngokuvamile bayayeka ukukhathalela abanye uma kubonakala kungekho ukusabela, kodwa uNkulunkulu akakwenzanga
lokho
Ukubonakalisa kukaNkulunkulu ukukhathalela nothando ngabanye kufanele kube izibonelo kithina (Funda eyoku-1 Johane 4:11)
Ukukhathalela omakhelwane ngokungenabugovu kuwumyalo wesibili omkhulu kunayo yonke eMthethweni (Mat 22:39)
Ngokubonisa lokhu kukhathalela kothando, sisekela indlela kaNkulunkulu yokwenza izinto nobukhosi bakhe
Ake sicabangele izici ezingokoqobo zokuthi, ekuphileni kwansuku zonke, singabonisa kanjani ukuthi siyabakhathalela abanye
UKUKHATHALELA ABANYE KUHLANGANISA NGISHO NABANTU ESINGABAZI (7 imiz.)
Namuhla sibona ubufakazi bokwanda kokuntuleka kokukhathalela abanye (tpZU 165-6)
Abantu bezwe banombono wobugovu wokuzikhathalela bona kuphela noma, ngokuvamile, abangane babo nemikhaya
Ukungabi nandaba nomuntu nempahla yabanye kusobala (Fanelanisa nezimo zendawo)
Kungokuvamile ukubona abantu bengenela abanye ngokuhaha emigqeni
Abacekela phansi bonakalisa izindawo zabantu ngabanye nezikawonk’ uwonke; ukungabi nandaba ngabanye kubonakaliswa
ekungcolisweni kwamapaki, imigwaqo, nezinto zokuhamba zomphakathi
Lokhu kuwukungabahloniphi okusobala abanye, ukuntula ukukhathalela abanye (gZU71 1/8 3-4 [g70 7/8 3-4])
Ngaleyondlela umuntu wonakalisa lokho abanye abanelungelo lokukujabulela: izindawo ezihlanzekile
UmKristu okhathalela abanye uyomelana noma anqobe ukuthambekela kokuzithela ngabandayo
Lapho efinyelela ekuqondeni iseluleko sikaJesu esikuMathewu 7:12 (funda), ubona isidingo sokushintsha
Ngokuphathelene nalokhu, umuntu oba umKristu kumelwe aguqule ingqondo yakhe (Rom 12:1, 2)
Ukucabangela abanye, lokho okulungele bona, kusisiza ukuba senze ngokufanelekile
Uma indawo yakho noma isakhiwo kungcoliswa ngabanye, yenza okusemandleni akho ukuba uhlanzeke (Rom 12:21)
Abantwana bakho nabanye bayobona ukuthi isibonelo sakho esihle siyavumelana nalokho okufundisayo ngeBhayibheli
Ukukhathalela impahla yabanye kuyokusiza ukuba ubonise ukukhathalela ezicini ezahlukahlukene zokuphila
Ngokwesibonelo, uma umkhathalela ngokwanele othile kangangokuthi ubungeke ungcolise ngisho nendawo yakhe, ubunga-
yeba yini impahla yakhe, igama lakhe elihle, noma umkakhe?
EKUKHATHALELENI KWAKHO ABANYE, LINGISA UKUNGAKHETHI KUKANKULUNKULU (7 imiz.)
Izwe liyakhetha ngokuphathelene nokwahlukana ngokobuhlanga, ubuzwe, nezenhlalo; ingabe liyasithonya? (gZU89 4/8 9-11)
Ukubandlululana ngokobuhlanga kuye kwaholela kokuningi ukuphathwa ngonya nobudlova (gZU89 2/8 15-17 [g89 2/8 12-14])
Abanye babonisa ukuntula ukukhathalela kothando ngabanye ngenxa yokwahlukana ngokwezenhlalo, ngokwezimali, noma ngo-
kwemfundo
Ngaphambi kokuba sibe amaKristu, kungenzeka ukuthi sasithonywe kakhulu imizwa enjalo
Nalapha futhi, kunesidingo sokuguqula ingqondo yethu, siguqule ukucabanga kwethu nezisusa
IBhayibheli litusa ukukhathalela abanye, kungakhathaliseki uhlanga, ubuzwe, noma izinga lezenhlalo (tpZU 168-9)
ImiBhalo ibonisa ukuthi sonke sihlobene, siphuma kuAdamu
Kungayiphi indlela abaseRoma 3:23 (funda) bevumela ukubheka abanye njengabaphakeme noma abaphansi?
UNkulunkulu ufisa ukuba bonke, kungakhathaliseki ubuzwe, uhlanga, noma izinga lezenhlalo, bafinyelele ekuphendukeni (2Pet
3:9)
Ingabe amaKristu aphethe isigijimi sikaNkulunkulu sensindiso kufanele abonise ukukhetha? (wZU88 5/15 10-15)
Kufanele ayise isigijimi sokuphila kubo bonke, kungakhathaliseki isizinda sawo noma izinga kwezenhlalo
Emfanekisweni womSamariya onomusa, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu yakhuthaza ukukhathalela okungakhethi (Luk 10:29-37)
Nakuba kwakunobutha obuvamile phakathi kwamaJuda namaSamariya, lendoda yashukunyiswa isihe sayo nokukhathalela
abanye (Ngemva kokulandisa, gcizelela amazwi okugcina evesi 34)
Ngamazwi, ngemicabango, nangezenzo, kufanele siqaphele isithunzi sabo bonke abantu, sibonise ukukhathalela kwethu
UKUKHATHALELA IMIZWA YABANYE KUBONISA UKUTHI SIYAKHATHALELA NGEMPELA (7 imiz.)
Ukulingisa ukukhathalela kukaNkulunkulu abanye kuhlanganisa ukucabangela imizwa yabo (tpZU 167-8)
IBhayibheli likutusa ngokuqondile ukucabangela okunjalo imizwa yabanye (Funda abase-Efesu 4:32–5:1)
Lena akuyona into esizisungulela yona kodwa silingisa uNkulunkulu
Singabonisa ukucabangela imizwa yabanye ngokulawula ulimi (IzA 15:4; wZU86 8/15 22-3)
Kudingeka siqaphele ngokukhethekile ukuze singembuli amaphutha ahlukahlukene amalungu emikhaya yethu
Kungase kulethe ubuhlungu noma ukudumala kumfazi noma endodeni ekushiyeka kwayo kwangasese kukhulunywa obala
Bazali, cabangelani imizwa yabantwana benu, ngokuvumelana nabaseKolose 3:21 (Funda)
No. 15-ZU
5/91Ukucabangela imizwa yabanye kuyosisiza ukuba sigweme amahlaya angokoqobo (gZU86 10/8 17-18 [g86 9/22 12-13])
Ingabe amahlaya anjalo adumazayo, ethusayo ayavumelana noMthetho Wegolide? (Mat 7:12)
Senza kahle ngokulingisa umprofethi uJeremiya ngokugwema amahlaya anjalo (Funda uJeremiya 15:17) (wZU78 5/15 17 [w78
1/1 19])
Imizwa yabanye abantu idinga ukukhathalela okwengeziwe, njengeyalabo abacindezelekile (wZU90 3/15 26-30)
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba ‘sithokozise abadanileyo’ (1Thes 5:14)
Ikakhulukazi uma ukucindezeleka kungokuphindaphindayo noma kungokwesikhathi eside, ukubekezela nothando kuyavivinywa
Ingabe uyoqhubeka ukhuluma ngokukhuthazayo, noma uyodikila, uvele ungamnaki lowomuntu?
Ukusebenzisa isikhathi nomzamo usiza imiphefumulo ecindezelekile kungenye indlela yokubonisa ukuthi uyakhathalela nge-
mpela
UKUKHATHALELA KWAKHO IZIHLOBO ZAKHO UNKULUNKULU UYAKUTHAKAZELELA (12 imiz.)
Esinye isici lapho ukukhathalela okukhethekile kudingeka khona sihilela labo abaseduze kakhulu nawe—umkhaya, izihlobo
IZwi likaNkulunkulu libonisa ukuthi siphila esikhathini lapho uthando lwemvelo ngomkhaya luwohloka khona (2Ti 3:3)
Ukubaluleka kokuba umuntu akhathalele umkhaya wakhe kuqokonyiswe eBhayibhelini (Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 5:4, 8)
Lombhalo usebenza ngokuyinhloko ekukhathaleleni ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo abazali noma ogogo abangasenamandla okuzisi-
za (wZU87 6/1 13-18)
Ilungiselelo lomusa, lapho kunokwenzeka khona, liwukuba banakekelwe ekhaya labantwana babo noma basizwe ngokwezinto
ezibonakalayo ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka beziphilela ngokwabo
Abanye abanempilo ebuthakathaka bangase badinge ukunakekelwa okutholakala esibhedlela kuphela noma kwenye indawo
Isimiso esikweyoku-1 Thimothewu 5:8 sibonisa isidingo sokunakekela komuntu ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo abomkhaya wakhe
siqu
Umthwalo wemfanelo oyinhloko ungowendoda
Indoda kudingeka iqaphele ukuthi ukukhathalela umkhaya wayo kungase kuhilele ukuzilinganisela ngezindlela ezithile
Umfazi nabantwana kufanele bazithibe ukuze izinto abazifunayo (izingubo, amathoyizi) zingabangeli ukunakekela kwendoda
umkhaya kube umthwalo onzima
Imizamo yokunikeza ukukhathalela okungokomoya ibaluleke kakhulu—inhlala-kahle yethu yaphakade ihilelekile (tpZU 172-4)
UJesu wabeka isibonelo esihle sokunakekela komuntu umkhaya wakhe ngendlela ejulile (Funda abase-Efesu 5:25-27)
Isithakazelo sakhe esiyinhloko ‘ngomlobokazi’ wakhe sasisesimweni sakhe esingokomoya ‘sokungabi nabala’
NjengoKristu, abazali (ikakhulukazi obaba abakholwayo) kufanele baxoxe “ngezwi” nomkhaya
Imizamo ephikelelayo yokuba nengxoxo yetekisi losuku nesifundo somkhaya samasonto onke ibonisa ukukhathalela kwakho
Bazali, ingabe uNkulunkulu ubengakwamukela ukukhathalela kwethu abanye uma singazange sikhathalele abantwana be-
thu ngokwanele ukuba sihlele isikhathi sokufunda nabo? (Qhathanisa neyoku-1 Thimothewu 3:4, 5)
Labo abakhathalelayo bacabangela ngokujulile izidingo zomkhaya ezingokomoya zangalesosikhathi (wZU88 8/1 13-15)
Isifundo somkhaya singashintshashintshwa ukuze sivumelane nezidingo zangalesosikhathi—umbono womKristu ngamaho-
lide, izinkinga esikoleni, ukuhlalisana ngothando, ukuhileleka kwezemidlalo, abangane
Thatha isinyathelo kuqala sokuyisa iqiniso leBhayibheli ezihlotsheni zakho ezingakholwa (wZU90 2/15 25-7)
Uma senza kanjalo siyobe silandela izibonelo zikaRahabi noKorneliyu, abasiza izihlobo zabo (suZU 150-1)
Kungenzeka ukuthi izihlobo zakho ziye zakuphikisa noma zakugcona esikhathini esidlule, kodwa ingabe uzikhathalela ngo-
kwanele ukuba uphinde uzame futhi?
(Sikhulumi: Qokomisa okunye kokusikisela okukukmZU 7/85 4 nakukmZU 2/84 4)
Njengoba abaningi kangaka abangoFakazi manje basizwa yizihlobo, ingabe akufanele yini ubonise ukukhathalela kwakho ngo-
kwenza imizamo eyandisiwe yokuhlanganyela iqiniso nezihlobo zakho?
UKUKHATHALELA OKUJULILE KUBONAKALISA UKUSHUMAYELA IZINDABA EZINHLE OKUNJENGOKUKA-
KRISTU (3 imiz.)
NjengoKristu, ukukhathalela kwethu abantu kufanele kuhlanganise nokubasiza ngokomoya
Umuzwa wakhe ojulile ngabantu wamshukumisela ukuba abasize ngokuyinhloko ngokuhlanganyela nabo izinto ezingokomoya
(Funda uMarku 6:34)
Ukushumayela kwethu kufanele kube ukubonakaliswa kwesithakazelo esijulile ngabantu, kungabi nje ukugcina icala
Singacabanga ngesimo sabantu abaningi sokungabi nathemba, sokukhungatheka
Ingabe sikhathalela ngokwanele ukuba silungiselele kahle, sizame ukuthuthuka ezindleleni zethu zokufundisa? (wZU89 11/15
13-14)
Lokhu kukhathalela kothando kungase kuphumele ekubeni abanye bathole “uphawu” lokusinda (Hez 9:6)
ZIBONAKALISE UNJENGOYIHLO WASEZULWINI (4 imiz.)
Ukukhathalela abanye ngezindlela ezingokwenyama nezingokomoya kuyisici esibalulekile sokuba abantwana bakaBaba wethu wa-
sezulwini
UJesu wakukhuthaza lokhu, ethi kwakuwukulingisa uNkulunkulu (Funda uMathewu 5:43-48)
UNkulunkulu ubonisa ukukhathalela kwakhe ngokulungiselela ngokungakhethi izinto ezibonakalayo ezidingwa yibo bonke,
ngokuzimisela ukuthethelela, nangokwenza amalungiselelo angokomoya angaholela abantu ekuphileni okuphakade; amaKri-
stu nawo kufanele abonise ngalezindlela ukuthi ayakhathalela
(Sikhulumi: Bukeza kafushane izindlela ezihlukahlukene esingabonisa ngazo ukukhathalela abanye)
Ngokubonisa ukukhathalela abanye ngalezindlela, ‘nizibonakalisa ningabantwana bakaYihlo’ osezulwini
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 15-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45QHUBEKA UKHULA EBUHLOTSHENI BAKHO NONKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Kungenzeka sikhule ebuhlotsheni bethu noNkulunkulu phakade. Ukuze senze lokho kumelwe (1) siqonde futhi sisabele ku-
nembeza wethu futhi (2) sikhulele ekuvuthweni kobuKristu
KUNENGQONDO UKUFISA UKUBA NOBUHLOBO OBUHLE NONKULUNKULU (6 imiz.)
Yeka indlela okulula ngayo ukuba nobuhlobo bothando nothile onomusa, ophanayo nonesithakazelo kithina!
Singabona kulokho esikufundile ukuthi ubuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu buyafiseleka
Ngokutadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, siye safinyelela ekwazini eziningi zezimfanelo zakhe eziphakeme
Izipho zakhe zezinto ezibonakalayo nezingokomoya kubantu bokuqala zabeka isisekelo salobuhlobo obuhle
UJehova wabeka umuntu endaweni ephelele, enethemba lokuphila okungenakuphela (Gen 2:9, 15-18)
Wenza abazali bethu bokuqala ngomfanekiso wakhe (Funda uGenesise 1:27; wZU83 1/15 16 [w82 8/1 12])
Wafaka kubona izimfanelo ezinjengothando nobulungisa, ezibonakalisa ubuyena
Njengoba bekhulisa futhi bandisa izimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu ekuphileni kwabo, babezokhula ebuhlotsheni naye
Isihluthulelo ebuhlotsheni babo—nobethu—noJehova siwunembeza onikezwe uNkulunkulu (wZU73 3/15 127 [w72 557])
Nakuba singazange siphile ePharadesi uAdamu ayehlala kulo, singakubona ukufiseleka kwalo nendlela okwakuyoba kuhle
ngayo ukuba nobuhlobo obufudumele, nobuseduze noMdali wethu
Siye safunda ukuthi iPharadesi lizobuyiselwa masinyane; sinethemba lokuba amadodana kaNkulunkulu
Ngisho namanje kunokuningi esingakwenza ukuze sibe nokwazisa futhi sithuthukise ubuhlobo bethu noNkulunkulu
Sizocabangela izici ezimbili ezibalulekile: ukusebenza kukanembeza wethu nokukhulela kwethu ekuvuthweni kobu-
Kristu
UNEMBEZA KUFANELE USISIZE EKUBENI NOBUHLOBO NONKULUNKULU (12 imiz.)
Amandla kanembeza siye sawazuza njengefa kuAdamu (Funda abaseRoma 2:14, 15) (it-1 501  ̊1)
Singabubona ubufakazi balokhu namuhla; abaningi “ngokwemvelo” bayakugwema ukubulala, ukuphinga, ukudlwengula, no-
bunye ububi
Kukhona kokubili ubufakazi obungokweBhayibheli nobungebona obungokweBhayibheli (wZU75 10/1 440-2 [w75 209-10]; it-2
966  ̊1, 2)
UNkulunkulu usebenzelana namaKristu ngendlela ekhanga nekhuthaza ukusebenzisa kwethu unembeza (1Pet 3:16)
IBhayibheli lizichaza ngokuqondile ezinye izinto njengezingalungile, lisinikeza imithetho ngokumelene nazo
Ukuphinga, ukubulala, nokudla igazi kwenqatshelwe (IzE 15:29; 1Kor 6:9, 10)
Ngisho noma sinemithetho enjalo eqondile, unembeza kumelwe usebenze
Yini umuntu ayoyenza lapho engabonwa abanye abantu?
Kumelwe siyilalele lemithetho ukuze sibe nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu, kodwa kudingeka okwengeziwe
Ngokuyekelela izinto eziningi ukuba zinqunywe amaKristu ngokwezimiso, uNkulunkulu ufuna ukusetshenziswa okukhu-
dlwana kukanembeza futhi uvumela umuntu embule okusenhliziyweni yakhe (wZU77 3/1 107-9 [w76 528-9])
Izibonelo zezimiso ezingase zisebenze endabeni: ukungathandi izwe, ukungakhubekisi abanye, ukuhlonipha ubunhloko,
ukuphishekela ukuthula, ukugwema ukuncintisana, ukubonisa inhlonipho ngobungcwele bokuphila
Ukusebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli kuhilela okungaphezu kokulandela umthetho owaziwa ngekhanda
Kumelwe sisebenzise ulwazi, ukuqonda, nokuhlakanipha
Kunezici eziningana okumelwe sizicabangele lapho sibhekene nendaba kanembeza (wZU83 1/1 21-7 [w82 7/15 22-7])
ImiBhalo ithini? (Kungase kudingeke wenze ukucwaninga)
Isinqumo sami siyobathinta kanjani abanye? (1Kor 10:32)
Siyongithinta kanjani mina? (Rom 14:22, 23)
Zindla ngokukhuza kukanembeza, ufune lokho okuyokushiya unonembeza ohlanzekile
Singasizwa yikho konke esikwaziyo ngoNkulunkulu—ubuntu bakhe, izindlela, izindinganiso, nokusebenzelana kwakhe
nabanye esikhathini esidlule
Ngaleyondlela sifinyelela ekuwubonakaliseni ngokujule ngokwengeziwe “umfanekiso” kaNkulunkulu (Kol 3:10)
Ukuphila ngezimiso nangonembeza kubonisa futhi izisusa zenhliziyo yakho
Ingabe uyafuna ukusabela kunembeza nasezimisweni zeBhayibheli? Enhliziyweni yakho, ingabe uyafisa ukubonakalisa
umfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekusebenzelaneni nabanye?
Ngokusobala, ubuhlobo bomuntu noNkulunkulu buyakhula njengoba ethuthukisa izisusa ezinhle zenhliziyo, esabela ku-
nembeza oqeqeshiwe nasolwazini lwezimiso zeBhayibheli
Olunye usizo ebuhlotsheni obukhulayo noNkulunkulu luwukuvuthwa kobuKristu; kanjani?
UKUVUTHWA KOBUKRISTU KUBALULEKILE EBUHLOTSHENI NONKULUNKULU (17 imiz.)
Ngomqondo ovamile, umuntu “ovuthiwe” umuntu omdala, okhulile ngokomzimba
Umuntu usengayenza intuthuko futhi azuze ulwazi, okuhlangenwe nakho, nokwazisa
Ukukhula kobuKristu okusuka ebunganeni obungokomoya kuye ebudaleni kuthinta ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu
Singakubona kanjani ukungavuthwa ngokomoya? (1Kor 3:1-4; Efe 4:11-16; wZU74 8/15 367-8 [w74 109-10])
‘Izingane’ ezingokomoya aziqinile, zicabanga ngendlela ‘engokwenyama’ (wZU85 5/1 9-10)
No. 16-ZU
5/91UmKristu ovuthiwe yilowo owamukela wonke amaqiniso obuKristu, azame ukuphila ngokuvumelana nawo (wZU74 8/15 368-70
[w74 110-12]; wZU85 5/1 10-12)
Isidingo salokhu sibonakala kulokho okushiwo kumaHeberu 5:11-6:2 (Funda) (gZU82 3/8 20-1 [w81 10/1 9])
Amanye amaKristu angamaHeberu ayesalokhu eyizingane ngokomoya
Ayedinga ukubona indlela amaqiniso eBhayibheli akuhilela ngayo konke ukuphila kwawo—ethonya ukucabanga, izifi-
so, nezinqumo
Ayedinga ukuqeqesha amandla awo okucabanga ‘ngokuwasebenzisa’ ukuze akwazi ukwehlukanisa okuhle nokubi, azu-
ze okuhlangenwe nakho
Ukuthuthukela ekuvuthweni kobuKristu kusalokhu kuhilela ukwamukela nokusebenzisa wonke amaqiniso
UmKristu ovuthiwe usebenzisa iqiniso leBhayibheli ekuphileni kwakhe kwansuku zonke, elwela ukubonakalisa umfane-
kiso kaNkulunkulu ngokugcwele
Uyazi ukuthi izimiso kufanele zibuse ngisho nalapho kunzima, wenza ngokuvumelana nazo
UmKristu ovuthiwe uyasabela ekukhuzeni kukanembeza wakhe; ulwela ukuvumelanisa ukucabanga kwakhe ne-
zenzo nezimiso zeBhayibheli nakho konke akwaziyo ngoNkulunkulu
Uthola ukwaneliseka kulokhu, azi ukuthi ubuhlobo bakhe noNkulunkulu buyathuthuka
Abaningi abalapha namuhla bayakwenza lokhu, benikeza ubufakazi bokuthi bangamaKristu avuthiwe; ngokwesibonelo:
Umfazi ubonisa ukuvumelana nesimiso sobunhloko ngokufuna isiqondiso somyeni wakhe
Ukuthi ufuna isiqondiso somyeni wakhe akubonisi ukungavuthwa kodwa kuwubufakazi obuqhubekayo bokuthi ngoku-
vuthwa wamukela wonke amaqiniso eBhayibheli
Ukufuna komzalwane noma udade ukusikisela kumdala ongumKristu nakho kungase kubonise ukuvuthwa
Kulula ukwahlukanisa lokhu ‘enganeni’ engafuni ukubonakalisa umfanekiso kaNkulunkulu, ethambekele ekungawu-
nakini noma ekuwubulaleni unembeza, noma efuna ukuba abanye bayenzele izinqumo (wZU78 10/15 14  ̊20 [w78 4/1
19  ̊20])
Ngisho naphakathi kwamaKristu avuthiwe sithola ukungefani (wZU72 6/15 283-5 [w71 664-5]; it-2 355)
Abantu abavuthiwe ngokomzimba abafani bonke; bayehlukahlukana ngobukhulu, ubuntu, nezici
Iqiniso lokuthi omunye mfushane kunomunye alibona ubufakazi bokungavuthwa; bobabili bangase babe badala, babe aba-
vuthiwe
AmaKristu avuthiwe awabonisi wonke izimfanelo ngezindlela ezifanayo noma ngezinga elifanayo (Efe 4:15, 16)
Omunye angase abonise ukuphana kakhulu noma umoya wokungenisa izihambi kunomunye, ongase abekezele kakhulu fu-
thi abe mnene
Gwema ukuphawula umuntu njengongavuthiwe ngenxa nje yokuthi indlela asiza ngayo njengomKristu ovuthiwe ekwa-
khiweni kwebandla lobuKristu yehlukile kweyabanye
UmKristu ovuthiwe ngezinye izikhathi angase ahlulele kabi; lokho akusho ukuthi manje akasavuthiwe
Iqiniso, umuntu osemusha eqinisweni ongakavuthwa—akakabunikezi ubufakazi bokwamukela ngokugcwele iqiniso leBhayi-
bheli—angase akubonise lokho ngokuba ngokuvamile ahlulele kabi
Ngezinye izikhathi ngisho nomKristu ovuthiwe angase abonise ukwahlulela kabi noma ukuzinikela okubuthakathaka
Ngenxa yokubonisa ukwahlulela kabi, uPetru wayedinga ukusolwa (Gal 2:11-14; gZU83 3/8 27 [g82 9/8 27])
Khona-ke, uPetru wanikeza ubufakazi benhliziyo enhle, unembeza ololekile, nokwamukela wonke amaqiniso ngokuse-
benzisa iseluleko futhi aqhubeke njengomKristu ovuthiwe, umphostoli (wZU77 7/1 299-300 [w76 725])
Ukuvuthwa kusiza ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu, ngoba uzama ukubonakalisa “umfanekiso” wakhe ngokugcwele
Awufulatheli noma iyiphi ingxenye yamaqiniso obuKristu nokusetshenziswa kwawo
QHUBEKA UKHULA EBUHLOTSHENI BAKHO NONKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Ukufinyelela ukuvuthwa kobuKristu nokuba nonembeza obukhali akuqedi ukukhula komuntu
UThimothewu wakhuthazwa ukuba aqhubeke ethuthuka (Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 4:15)
Ngokungangabazeki, uThimothewu wayesengumKristu ovuthiwe kakade; wamelela indikimba ebusayo yobuKristu ekwe-
nzeni ukumiswa (Fil 2:19, 20; 1Ti 3:1-13; 5:22)
Wayengaqhubeka ekhula ebuhlotsheni bakhe noNkulunkulu ngokuwubonakalisa ngokugcwele ngokwengeziwe umfaneki-
so kaNkulunkulu ekuziphatheni kwakhe, enkulumweni, nasesimweni sengqondo (1Ti 4:12)
Singakhula ebuhlotsheni bethu noNkulunkulu, senze ukuthuthuka kwethu kuqhame (wZU74 8/15 372-8 [w74 114-19])
Lwela ukukhula ngolwazi, ukuqonda, nokuhlakanipha (wZU85 5/1 13-17)
Qhubeka uthuthuka ekuvezeni izithelo zomoya kaNkulunkulu
Thuthuka ekufezeni imithwalo yemfanelo njengelungu lomkhaya
Lwela ukuthuthuka ekuboniseni unembeza wobuKristu nokuvuthwa
Hlala njalo wenezela ulwazi lwakho ngoNkulunkulu nasekwaziseni kwakho izindlela zakhe (Hu 25:4, 5)
Lapho uthuthuka kakhulu kulezici, yilapho ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu buyoba obuqinile nobuseduze kakhulu
Ukukhula kobuhlobo bomuntu kungaqhubeka ngokungenasiphelo
Ukukhula okungenasiphelo kungenzeka ngoba ukuphila okuphakade kunikezwa labo abanobuhlobo noNkulunkulu
Kungenzeka futhi ngoba esikufunda ngoNkulunkulu akupheli (Rom 11:33)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 16-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUKHAZIMULISA UNKULUNKULU NGAKHO KONKE ESINAKHO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Yakha ukwaziswa okusuka enhliziyweni ngelungelo eliyigugu esinalo lokusebenzisa ukuphila kwethu ekukhazimuliseni uJe-
hova. Bonisa ukuthi lokhu kungenzeka ngisho nakuba singase sibe nokuncane esingakunikeza ngokombono wezwe. Shu-
kumisa izilaleli ukuba zizinikele ngokugcwele futhi ngaleyondlela zinikeze uJehova udumo nenkazimulo emfanele
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UJEHOVA AFANELE UKUKHAZINYULISWA (5 imiz.)
Igama lesiHeberu ngokuvame kakhulu elihunyushwa ngokuthi “inkazimulo” elithi ka·vohdh, elinomqondo ‘wokusinda’ (wZU91
2/1 10  ̊3; it-1 963)
Kanjalo umuntu okhazinyuliswayo wenziwa abe nesisindo noma abe mkhulu; isithunzi sakhe, udumo, nokubaluleka kuyapha-
kanyiswa
Igama lesiGreki elinomqondo ofanayo nelithi ka·vohdh elithi doxa
Linomqondo wedumela, udumo, noma ubuhle
NjengoMdali Omuhle neNkosi Ebusayo, uJehova ufanele ukukhazinyuliswa (IsAm 4:11)
Izingelosi ezinamandla zasezulwini zimnika inkazimulo (IsAm 7:11, 12; reZU 124  ̊15-16)
Lapho zimemezela ukuzalwa kukaJesu, izingelosi zasezulwini zakhazimulisa uNkulunkulu (Luk 2:14; wZU87 4/1 13-14)
Kufanele simkhazimulise kangakanani-ke uNkulunkulu thina bantu abaphansi!
Siyazuza kuwo wonke amalungiselelo kaJehova amahle naphelele (Jak 1:17)
Isipho sikaNkulunkulu esikhulu kunazo zonke siyilungiselelo leNdodana yakhe ngenjongo yokuhlengwa kwethu (Joh 3:16;
1Jo 4:9)
Bonke abantu banxuswa ukuba banike uJehova inkazimulo ngenxa yegama lakhe nobukhosi (Hu 96:7, 8, 10; 145:11-13; wZU90
9/15 16-18)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA KUBE NABAMBALWA KANGAKA ABAMKHAZIMULISAYO NAMUHLA (5 imiz.)
Iningi labantu liphuphuthekiswe uSathane nesibonelo sakhe sobugovu (2Kor 4:4)
Abantu bazifunela inkazimulo yabo ngokulwela ukuzenzela igama nokwamukela inkazimulo komunye nomunye (Joh 5:40-44;
7:18; w76 327  ̊2)
Bafana nenkosi yaseTire, eyalingisa uSathane uDeveli (Hez 28:14, 15)
Abaningi bayenqaba ukuvuma ukubonakaliswa okusobala kwamandla kaJehova nobukhosi (Rom 1:20, 21)
Behlazisa ngamabomu iZwi likaNkulunkulu, abaningi baziphatha kabi futhi baba inkazimulo ekungcoleni kwabo siqu (Rom
1:24-27; gZU89 7/8 30-1 [g89 7/8 26-7])
SINGAMKHAZIMULISA NGAZIPHI IZINDLELA UNKULUNKULU? (10 imiz.)
UJesu wabeka isibonelo ekukhazimuliseni uYise ngokuzithoba ngokuphelele entandweni kaNkulunkulu (Fil 2:5, 6; Heb 10:7, 9)
Wakhazimulisa uNkulunkulu ngokumemezela “izindaba ezinhle” kwabamnene (Luk 4:18, 19, qhathanisa neNW)
UKristu wahlanganyela lelilungelo nabalandeli bakhe (Mat 10:5-10)
Wafundisa abafundi ngendlela ababengamkhazimulisa ngayo uBaba (Joh 15:8)
Njengabafundi bakhe, kumelwe silandele uJesu (1Pet 2:21)
Kumelwe senqabe ukuhamba endleleni yezwe elibi (Efe 4:17)
Kufanele siguqule izingqondo zethu, sizinikezele, sibhapathizwe, senze intando kaNkulunkulu (Mat 16:24; Rom 12:1, 2)
Kubalulekile ukulingisa uKristu Jesu ngokusebenzisa isikhathi esiningi ngangokunokwenzeka ngokunengqondo ekufakaze-
ni endlini ngendlu nangokwethukela (Mar 1:38; Joh 4:6-30)
Manje siyazazi izindlela esingakhazimulisa ngazo uNkulunkulu, kodwa singamkhazimulisa kanjani ngakho konke esinakho?
INDLELA ESINGAKHAZIMULISA NGAYO UNKULUNKULU NGAKHO KONKE ESINAKHO (10 imiz.)
Akusona isibalo salokho esinakho elikhazimulisa uJehova (Luk 21:1-4)
Nansi into ebalulekile: Ingabe sikusebenzisa konke esinakho ekumkhazimuliseni?
Sonke sinezimo ezihlukahlukene, kodwa ngamunye unezinto angazisebenzisa ekukhazimuliseni uJehova: ithalenta, imfundo,
ubusha, okuhlangenwe nakho, ukuba ongenamngane womshado, izinto ezibonakalayo (wZU90 7/1 29-31)
Ngisho nezimo ezinzima ekuphileni zingasetshenziswa ekukhazimuliseni uJehova
(Sikhulumi: Xoxa ngephuzu elilodwa noma engeziwe kwangenhla uma isikhathi sivuma. Bheka i-Index ngaphansi kwesihlo-
ko esithi “Life Stories of Jehovah’s Witnesses”)
Ngokwesibonelo, cabangela ithalenta:
Abaningi abafinyelela olwazini lweqiniso banamathalenta
Abanye babengabadlali-mabhayisikobho abaphumelela kakhulu, abaculi, izilomo kwezemidlalo, onjiniyela, njalonjalo
Laba bakhazimulisa uJehova ngakho konke abanakho ngokubeka uMbuso kuqala, ngaleyondlela bebonisa ukuthi izinjongo
zikaNkulunkulu zibaluleke kakhulu kubo kunokuphumelela okungokwezwe (g84 12/8 19-20; g86 7/22 17-20)
Ezimweni eziningi laba baye bakwazi ukusebenzisa kahle amathalenta abo ekuzisekeleni emsebenzini wobuphayona,
ekukhonzeni eBethel, noma kwesinye isici senkonzo engcwele (g89 2/22 16)
Kuthiwani ngawe? Ingabe usebenzisa amathalenta akho noma ezinye izinto ekukhazimuliseni uNkulunkulu?
Lena akuyona inkonzo yokugcina icala, into nje yokuqhuba isikhathi, kodwa inkonzo yenhliziyo yonke, umphefumulo,
namandla (Mar 12:29, 30)
Kumelwe sigcwalise ukuphila kwethu ngemisebenzi ephathelene nomsebenzi kaJehova (1Kor 15:58)
Ngaleyondlela siletha inkazimulo egameni lakhe (IsAm 14:7)
No. 17-ZU
6/91USIZO EKUKHAZIMULISENI UNKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Sidinga ukulalela izwi likaJehova neziyalezo zeNdodana yakhe (Mat 17:5; Heb 4:7, 10)
Kungalendlela kuphela singathola ulwazi oluqondile, esingenakumkhazimulisa ngokuhlakanipha uNkulunkulu ngaphandle
kwalo (Joh 17:3)
Kufanele sihlangane nalabo abamnikezayo uNkulunkulu inkazimulo, kunokuba sizehlukanise
Kanjalo isenzo esinobunye, esihleliwe singenzeka ukuze sikhulise inkazimulo kuNkulunkulu (Heb 10:23-25)
Singafunda futhi silingise izibonelo zamadoda nabesifazane abamukelekayo labo esikhathini esidlule abakhonza uNkulunkulu
kwaba inkazimulo kuye (Heb, isahl 11)
UJesu Kristu uyisibonelo esiyinhloko (Heb 12:1-3)
Abaphostoli nabo bayizibonelo ezinhle kakhulu (wZU90 6/1 10-20; wZU90 6/15 10-25)
Kumelwe siphikelele ekuthandazeleni amandla kuNkulunkulu okuhlangabezana nokuhlasela kukaSathane nezwe lakhe futhi
kanjalo singalokothi ‘sihlehlele emuva’ (Heb 10:39; Luk 21:34, 36; Jak 4:8; wZU82 8/15 19  ̊6 [w82 3/1 22  ̊6])
SIYOTHOLA IMIVUZO NGOKUKHAZIMULISA UNKULUNKULU NGAKHO KONKE ESINAKHO (5 imiz.)
Siyozuza ukwaneliseka kokwazi ukuthi sifuna ukulandela isibonelo sikaJesu Kristu, owakhazimulisa uBaba ngaso sonke isikha-
thi (Joh 17:4, 5)
Siyoba nokuthula kwengqondo ngokwazi ukuthi asikhazimulisi izidalwa nje kodwa kunalokho ukuphela kwaLowo ofanele uku-
ba simdumise njengoMbusi Ophakeme (Hu 145:3; IsAm 4:11; wZU90 9/15 11-12)
Ngisho namanje singajabulela ukulangazelela umvuzo othenjisiwe—ukuphila okuphakade emseni kaJehova (1Sa 2:30; wZU87
12/15 20  ̊21)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 17-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UYAMENZA NGEMPELA UJEHOVA INQABA YAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
UJehova uyoba inqaba yethu uma simenza abe yiyo manje. Lokhu kusho ukulalela imithetho yakhe, ukumbeka kuqala kuzo
zonke izici zokuphila, nokuthembela kuye lapho sibhekene nezinkinga. Lungiselela manje ngalendlela ukuze ukhuthazele
osizini olukhulu
INGABE UJEHOVA UYOBA INQABA YAKHO PHAKATHI NOSIZI OLUSONDELAYO? (10 imiz.)
Abantu bakaJehova sebenesikhathi eside bevumelana nemizwa ekweyesi-2 Samuweli 22:2, 3 (Funda)
Abantu bakaNkulunkulu njengeqembu bambheka njengenqaba yabo, kodwa ingabe thina njengabantu ngabanye siyakwenza
lokho?
IBhayibheli lisenza sibone kusengaphambili isikhathi sosizi olukhulu
Ngaphambi kokuba leyombubhiso ifike, silindele isimemezelo sokuthula nokulondeka (1Thes 5:1-5; gZU89 12/8 28-31 [g89 12/8
24-7])
Ngokusobala usizi olukhulu luyoqala ngokuchithwa kwenkolo yamanga (IsAm 17:15-18; reZU 256)
Abakhulekeli beqiniso bayosinda kodwa bayohlaselwa amabutho kaSathane asemhlabeni, uGogi wakwaMagogi (Hez 38:10-16)
Ekugcineni, uJehova uyobhubhisa ingxenye esele yesimiso esibi empini yeHarmagedoni (IsAm 16:16; 19:11-21)
Leyompi iyocaba indlela yokumiswa kabusha kwePharadesi emhlabeni (wZU86 10/1 20)
Ngamunye wethu kufanele azibuze: ‘Ikusasa liyongithinta kanjani mina?’
Akekho ongathatha ngokuthi uyodlula kalula kulenkathi ngaphandle kwezinkinga noma izilingo
Abaningi bayofuna isivikelo sezinhlangano zabantu (Funda isAmbulo 6:15-17) (reZU 112)
Ingabe siyokwazi ‘ukuma’ ngalolosuku? Iyiphi inqaba esiyobe sinayo futhi esiyoyidinga?
UJehova angaba inqaba yethu, kodwa ingabe manje simenza abe yiyo? (Funda uNahume 1:6, 7)
Uyinqaba kulabo “abaphephela kuye”; okubonisa ukuthi kudinga umzamo nokunaka
 ́
Ngisho nakuba senz e uJehova waba inqaba yethu, kuhle ukuzibuza: ‘Ingabe manje ngingakwandisa ukuthembela kwami
kuye njengenqaba yami ukuze aqhubeke ngokungenakungatshazwa eyinqaba yami ngalesosikhathi?’
Ake sicabangele izici ezimbalwa zokuphila kwansuku zonke nokucabanga ezizosisiza sibone ukuthi siyamenza yini inqaba yethu
Lokhu kuyoqokomisa futhi izindlela esingakwazi ukuthuthukisa kuzo
YENZA UJEHOVA ISIPHEPHELO NENQABA YAKHO KHONA MANJE (20 imiz.)
Ukuqaphela uJehova njengenqaba, noma umbhoshongo, akwenziwa ezikhathini zosizi kuphela (Funda izAga 18:10)
Igama likaJehova kufanele libe inqaba lapho umuntu ebhekene nengozi, kodwa lokhu kuyasebenza futhi nasekuphileni kwa-
nsuku zonke
Njengoba “igama” lihilela izinjongo zakhe, ingabe uyazivumela izinjongo zakhe ukuba zithonye lokho okuza kuqala ekuphi-
leni kwakho?
Ukwenza komuntu uJehova abe inqaba yakhe kuhilela ukuzithoba ezahlulelweni zakhe nasesiqondisweni
Igama likaNkulunkulu lidonsela ukunakekela ekufezeni kwakhe izinjongo zakhe (naZU 6)
Siyophumelela ngokuletha ukuphila kwethu ekuvumelaneni okugcwele nentando yakhe nezinjongo
Ngeke abe inqaba yethu uma singazinaki izimiso zakhe zokuziphatha nemithetho
Umuntu kumelwe abe qotho ngokokuziphatha ukuze uNkulunkulu abe inqaba yakhe (Funda izAga 10:29)
“Indlela kaJehova” ibekwe njengephambene ‘nokwenza okubi’
Ukuziphatha okubi, njengokuphinga, ubufebe, nobungqingili, ngokusobala akulungile
Labo abenza uJehova inqaba yabo kumelwe bagweme konke ukuziphatha okubi (Kol 3:5)
UmKristu ongashadile akufanele abheke ukuphola njengokuzilibazisa nje noma njengendlela yokuzijabulisa (ypZU isahl 29)
Ubungane obuseduze nabantu bobulili obuhlukile kalula nje bungaholela ekuqabulaneni nasekugonaneni
IBhayibheli lixwayisa ‘ngokungcola’ (1Thes 4:7; yyZU 152-4; ypZU 254)
Ingabe ukungcola okunjalo “indlela kaJehova”? Ingabe umuntu angahlanganyela kukho futhi aqhubeke ebhekwa nje-
ngonoNkulunkulu njengenqaba yakhe?
UmKristu oshadile owenza uJehova inqaba yakhe uyolwisana nanoma yikuphi ukuthambekela kokudlala ngothando, ekhu-
luma ngamabomu amazwi othando kothile ongeyena umngane wakhe womshado (gZU69 6/22 5-6 [w68 476-7])
Ezweni, ukudlala kwendoda noma kowesifazane ngothando kungase kubhekwe njengokungenangozi
Ukuziphatha okunjalo ngokuvamile kuholela ekulimazeni umuntu okudlalwa naye ngothando noma ekulimazeni umnga-
ne wakho womshado
Ukwenza ngempela uJehova inqaba yakho kuhlanganisa ukugwema ukujatshuliswa ubulili obungemthetho
Abanye abaya emasontweni futhi abazisholo ukuthi baziphethe kahle bathola izithombe nezincwadi ezingcolile kujabuli-
sa (gZU87 1/8 22-3, 26 [g86 12/22 3-4, 7])
Ingabe kungashiwo yini ukuthi ukuzijabulisa okunjalo ‘kuwukubulala amalungu omzimba womuntu’ esifisweni sobulili
esingcolile?
Ngamunye wethu angazibuza: ‘Kulezici, ingabe ngempela ngiyamenza uJehova inqaba yami? Ingabe ngifanelanisa ukucabanga
kwami, izifiso, nezenzo “nendlela kaJehova,” inqaba yami?’
Siyazuza uma singavumeli ukuphila kubambelele ekubeni nezinto zokunethezeka (wZU87 2/1 4-5)
Njengoba izinkinga zezomnotho zanda, isici somsebenzi wokuziphilisa singase sibe isikhombo sokuthi inqaba yakho uNku-
lunkulu yini noma ingcebo (IzA 18:11)
No. 18-ZU
6/93Labo abaqashiwe manje abenza igama likaNkulunkulu (nezinjongo) inqaba yabo bayazuza
Abasebenzisi amasu okuncintisana okulimazayo ukuze bathole noma balondoloze imisebenzi enesithunzi; njengoba
bezimisele ukusebenza kanzima ngezandla zabo (Funda eyoku-1 Thesalonika 4:11) (wZU88 8/15 18)
Labo abenza uJehova inqaba yabo futhi bamukele leseluleko ngokunokwenzeka ngeke basheshe baxoshwe kodwa ba-
yaziswa (hp 51-4; gZU85 2/8 29 [w84 4/1 27]; yb89 51  ̊3)
Ukwenza uJehova inqaba yakho nokulandela iseluleko sakhe kufanele kuthinte lokho okuza kuqala ngisho nangokuphathelene
nomkhaya wakho nemisebenzi yansuku zonke (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 7:29-31)
Iseluleko sikaPawulu asisho ukungabi nobuhlobo bobulili emshadweni noma ukushiya umngane wakho womshado ukuze uphi-
shekele ukushumayela
UmKristu akufanele azinikele kakhulu emshadweni kangangokuba zize zinganakwa izithakazelo zoMbuso (wZU75 12/1 551
[w75 351]; it-2 343  ̊9)
Ngokunokwenzeka kunabantu obaziyo abakushaya indiva cishe konke okunye ukuze babe nomshado kanye nokuphila kwa-
sekhaya okujabulisayo
Ingabe lombono owomuntu owenza uJehova inqaba yakhe?
Amazwi kaPawulu ahlanganisa futhi ezinye izici zokuphila kwansuku zonke, esingazihlola ngazo
Selulekwa ukuba singagxili ngokuphelele ekudabukeni, ezinjabulweni, noma ekuzilibaziseni
Ingabe siqondisa izici zokuphila ngokwaleseluleko, senze uJehova inqaba yethu?
Kanjalo ukwenza uJehova inqaba yakho kufanele kube ukukhathalela komuntu siqu; kufanele kwenziwe manje
Zibuze: ‘Ingabe ngingasho ngokwethembeka ukuthi kulezozici ngiyamenza uJehova inqaba yami?’
Kuthiwani ngezinye izici—iseluleko sakhe ekulawuleni komuntu umoya wakhe, ukuphuza, noma imikhuba yokudla? ukuba no-
musa kwabanye nokubathethelela? ukusekela abadala ebandleni?
Uma sibona isidingo sokuthuthukisa, masifune futhi silandele isiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu manje ngokugcwele ngokwengeziwe
Lapho sizithoba ngokwengeziwe ezahlulelweni nasesiqondisweni sakhe, kulapho silenza ngokwengeziwe igama lakhe libe
umbhoshongo wethu
LAPHO UBHEKENE NEZINKINGA, THEMBELA KUJEHOVA (10 imiz.)
Senza uNkulunkulu inqaba yethu ngokulandela isiqondiso sakhe ekuphileni kwethu okuvamile, kwansuku zonke, kodwa uyinqa-
ba ekhethekile phakathi nokuhlupheka (Funda iHubo 18:2, 24-27)
Uma uhlupheka ngenxa yempilo ewohlokayo noma amandla, ungaphendukela eNqabeni yakho
UPawulu noThimothewu bakhonza uNkulunkulu ngokwethembeka kodwa nokho babebuye bagule futhi babe nezinkinga ezi-
ngokomzimba (2Kor 12:7; 1Ti 5:23; it-2 589  ̊3)
Nakuba wayengabelaphi ngokuyisimangaliso, uNkulunkulu wasiza uThimothewu noPawulu ukuba baqhubeke futhi baphu-
melele (Fil 4:13)
Lapho sibhekene nokuhlupheka ngokomzimba, singathola usizo eNqabeni yethu
Ngomoya wakhe uNkulunkulu uzimisele futhi uyakwazi ukusekela labo abancika kuye
Zibuze: ‘Uma ngihlupheka ngenxa yokugula noma ukulinganiselwa okungokomzimba, ingabe lokhu kungishukumisela uku-
ba ngenze uJehova inqaba yami, amehlo ami esemvuzweni wakhe waphakade?’ (2Kor 4:16-18)
Phakathi nezinkinga ezibangelwa ukungapheleli kwabanye, ingabe uyokwenza uNkulunkulu inqaba yakho?
UPawulu wahlushwa ‘abaphostoli abaqhamileyo kakhulu,’ amadoda ambalwa ebandleni ayevimbela imizamo yakhe (2Kor 10:10;
11:5; 12:11, 12)
Othile ebandleni lenu angase ahlubuke noma abange izinkinga; ingabe uyokwenza uNkulunkulu inqaba yakho, uthemba uku-
thi Yena uyosingatha izindaba ngendlela yaKhe nangesikhathi saKhe?
Phakathi nokushushiswa okunzima, manje noma esikhathini esizayo, qhubeka wenza uNkulunkulu inqaba yakho
UDavide wazi ngaloluhlobo lokuhlupheka ukuthi uJehova uyinqaba yakhe (Hu 18, umbhalo ongenhla)
Akazange azame ukuzizwa amandla nabashushisi bakhe kodwa wathembela kuNkulunkulu (Hu 18:2; wZU81 7/1 6 [w80 12/1
16])
Kunokuba siphephele emandleni ethu siqu, kudingeka sithembele kuJehova
Ukuthembela kuNkulunkulu njengenqaba yethu kuhilela ukwazi ukuthi uyophindisela ngokufanele kubashushisi futhi avuze
abashushiswayo
UNkulunkulu uqinisekisa ukusikhulula ekwambulweni kukaJesu (2Thes 1:4-8)
Kuze kube yilapho lokhu kwenzeka khona, uNkulunkulu uyakwazi ukuqinisa bonke abamenza inqaba yabo
UJEHOVA NGEKE ABASHIYE LABO ABAMENZA INQABA YABO (5 imiz.)
Labo abenza uJehova inqaba yabo ngeke balahlekelwe phakade (Hu 116:15; kaZU 407-8)
Lowo owenza imali, umsebenzi, umshado, izinjabulo, noma amacebo abantu inqaba yakhe akanakukuvimbela noma akuhlehli-
se ukufa (Hu 49:6, 7)
Umhubi ukhuthaza ukuthembela kuJehova (Funda iHubo 62:7, 8) (wZU72 12/1 546 [w72 331  ̊20])
Uyakwazi ukwanelisa izidingo zethu zansuku zonke manje futhi usiqinisekisa ngethemba lokuphila okuphakade ePharadesi
Nguye kuphela okwazi ukuqinisekisa insindiso yaphakade ngalowo othembekile kuze kube sekufeni
Uma ngempela wenza uJehova inqaba yakho manje, uyoba sesimweni sokujabula kuze kube phakade (Hu 5:11, 12)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 18-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45IKUSASA LAKHO—LINGAZIWA KANJANI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Ungalazi ikusasa! Iziprofetho zeBhayibheli zisinikeza lokho kwaziswa. Ikusasa lezinceku zikaJehova liyamangalisa. Manje
yisikhathi sokulungiselela ukuba yingxenye yalelokusasa
LIYOBA YINI IKUSASA LAKHO? (3 imiz.)
Abantu banesithakazelo esijulile kulokho ikusasa elikuphethe
Ngokuvamile singaphawula ubufakazi obunengqondo obuthakazelisayo ngalokho ikusasa elikuphethe nendlela eliyosithi-
nta ngayo
(Nikeza kafushane izibonelo ezimbalwa zasendaweni yakini: ukunaka izibikezelo zesimo sezulu zesikhathi eside; imibiko
yamaphephandaba ebikezela izimo zezomnotho, ukutholakala komsebenzi, isimo ezizweni zonke; izihloko ngokuthi uku-
phila kuyoba njani esikhathini esizayo, njalonjalo)
Uma singase sazi ukuthi ikusasa liphetheni, ngokunokwenzeka beliyoyithinta indlela esiphila ngayo manje
Ingabe ubuyoshiya ikhaya lakho lingenamuntu uma bewazi ukuthi kungase kugqekezwe ngalolosuku?
Ukuze azuze olwazini ngekusasa, umuntu kumelwe azimisele ukulungisa ukuphila kwakhe ngokufanelekile
Kudingeka wazi: (1) ukuthi liyoba yini ikusasa nokuthi (2) yini ongayenza nokumelwe uyenze ngalo
Kodwa umuntu angaqiniseka kanjani ngalokho ikusasa eliyoba yikho?
IZINTO EZIFIHLIWE, NGISHO NEKUSASA, ZINGEMBULWA (20 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu uyalazi iqiniso ngekusasa (Isa 14:24)
Ukhanyisela labo abamlalelayo ngokubanikeza ukwaziswa ngekusasa (Isa 42:9)
Isibonelo esithakazelisayo esikuDaniyeli isahluko 2 siphathelene ngokuqondile nosuku lwethu; sihilela ukuphila kwethu neku-
sasa
Isimo sezwe kusukela ekuqaleni kweMpi Yezwe I safanekiswa ngokwesiprofetho cishe eminyakeni engu-2 600 edlule

Ngisho namaKaledi ehluleka ukuthola okwakuphethwe iphupho (it-1 425  ̊14)
UNkulunkulu wayengadalula ukwaziswa okufihliwe, kuhlanganise nencazelo yephupho (Dan 2:14-23; dpZU 46-9)
UDaniyeli wagcizelela ukuthi uNkulunkulu okwakumelwe kubhekwe kuye ngenjongo yokuthola ulwazi ngekusasa
(Dan 2:24-28)
Uma sinesithakazelo ngekusasa, nathi futhi kumelwe sazi ukuthi iyini intando kaNkulunkulu
UDaniyeli wanikeza imininingwane yephupho elalihilela ukushintsha kwemibuso yezwe (dpZU 50-7)
Iphupho laliphathelene ‘nesithombe’ esikhulu esasizofinyelela ekupheleni okuyinhlekelele (Dan 2:29-35)
Lapho echaza iphupho, uDaniyeli wachaza uNebukadinesari ngokuthi “ikhanda legolide” (Dan 2:36-38)
UMbuso Wezwe wamaMede namaPheresiya wawuyingxenye elandelayo esithombeni sephupho (Dan 2:39)
Ngo-539 B.C.E. incazelo kaDaniyeli yabonakala iyiqiniso; yathinta ukuphila kwabantu
Incazelo kaDaniyeli ngokuphathelene neGrisi nayo yayinembile (Dan 2:39b)
“Inkosi yokuqala” (uAlexander Omkhulu) yalandelwa ojenene abane (Dan 8:20-22)
Umbuso wesine, onjengensimbi, kwakuyiRoma; wawunethonya elikhulu emlandweni, kuze kufinyelele ngisho nasesikha-
thini sethu (Dan 2:40)
Ekugcwalisekeni kwesiprofetho, uMbuso waseRoma walandela iGrisi; yilombuso owahlakaza ukuvukela kwamaJuda fu-
thi wabhubhisa iJerusalema ngo-70 C.E.

Ukugcwaliseka okuphathelene ‘nalombuso wesine’ kudlulela ngal e koMbuso waseRoma ngokwawo; imilenze yensimbi
yesithombe yayihlanganisa omunye umbuso wezwe okhona namuhla
IBrithani namakoloni ayo angaphambili eNyakatho Melika kwahlangana kwaba umbuso wezwe wesikhombisa
Ibilokhu ingumbuso omkhulu kakhulu kuze kube manje, kodwa kuyokwenzekani kuyo?
Kufanele kusikhathaze, ngoba ikusasa lethu lihlanganiswe kulokho okwenzekayo
Isici sokugcina sephupho sithakazelisa ngokukhethekile, ngoba sibonisa umphumela wezenzakalo zezwe zamanje (Dan 2:41-43;
dpZU 57-60; wZU86 11/15 6; wZU85 7/1 31)
Lezizinto ezimbili ezifanekisiwe zisikisela izinhlobo ezihlukene zobubusi

Ubumba lumelela ukubusa okuguquguqukayo kwabantu abenziwe ngothuli; umuntu ovamile uye waba nethonya elandi-
siwe kohulumeni abathile bentando yeningi nabesimiso sokusebenzela uhulumeni
Yini iphupho elingokwesiprofetho eliyibikezelayo ngekusasa, kuhlanganise nekusasa lethu?
Yiliphi ithonya leliphupho eselinamakhulu eminyaka likhona elinalo ekuphileni kwakho?

35, 44; dpZU 60-2)

No. 19-ZU
5/01“Lawomakhosi” kuyoba amakhosi, noma ababusi bezombangazwe, ngesikhathi sokumiswa koMbuso noma lawo athathe
umbuso esikhathini sokuphela kwalesimiso sezinto
Ekupheleni kwalenkathi, uNkulunkulu wasezulwini—hhayi noma yisiphi isizwe sabantu—uyophelisa imibuso yezwe
“Itshe” elifeza lokhu liwuMbuso wobuMesiya ezandleni zikaJesu Kristu
“Intaba” imelela ubukhosi boMdali bendawo yonke (Hu 121:1, 2)
UMbuso wobuMesiya, owamiswa ngo-1914, waphuma ebukhosini bukaJehova bendawo yonke
Njengoba usekelwa nguye, unamandla negunya lokuchoboza “isithombe” sobubusi babantu kuze kube phakade
Sihilelekile ngoba iphupho elingokwesiprofetho lithi lesenzakalo siyokuba sesikhathini sethu, lapho “izinyawo” zobumba ne-
nsimbi zikhona
Njengoba nje lesiprofetho sabonakala sithembeke ngokuphelele esikhathini esidlule ngokuphathelene nokuthi yiziphi ize-
nzakalo ngalesosikhathi ezazingezekusasa ezaziyokwenzeka, siyobonakala sithembeke ngokufanayo esikhathini sethu
Isiprofetho sibonisa ukuthi ikusasa liyosho ukuba wonke umhlaba ugcwaliswe ububusi boMbuso wobuMesiya (Dan 2:35)
Izibusiso ziyokwenabela kuwo wonke umhlaba, ngakho ngempela kuyoba uhulumeni wezwe
Kodwa yiziphi izimo zezikhonzi zawo eziyoba khona? Yini ongabheka phambili kuyo ngekusasa lakho? Ingabe ungazi manje?
IKUSASA ONGALILANGAZELELA FUTHI ONGATHOKOZA NGALO (12 imiz.)
Sonke besiyokhuthazeka uma besingaqinisekiswa ngokuthi ikusasa liyothokozisa
Ake sicabangele kafushane izimo ezishintshile esinesizathu sokuzilangazelela ngaphansi koMbuso kaNkulunkulu nokuthi
kungani singaba nethemba lokuthi izinto ezinjalo ezithokozisayo ziyokwenzeka

176)
Imithetho enobunye, ephelele iyokwenza ukuphila kube ngcono (Isa 2:3, 4)

Inala yokudla iyoqeda indlala nokungondleki kahle (Hu 72:7, 16; wsZU 175; tpZU 105-6)

Uvuko luyobuyisela ekuphileni abantu abayoba nethuba lokuba sohlelweni olunobunye

Singaqiniseka ngezibusiso ezinjalo zekusasa ngoba isikhungo salohulumeni wezwe siyoba sezulwini
Uyoba namandla angaphezu kwawabantu futhi ngaleyondlela ube nekhono elingaphezu kwelemvelo
UPawulu wafakaza ngamandla nekhono likaNkulunkulu kwabase-Efesu 3:20, 21 (Funda)
Sisebenzisa lokho akusho, singathembela kulokho uNkulunkulu ayokufeza

14:15-17)
Ngisho nakuba umuntu azi ukuthi ikusasa liphetheni, into elandelayo ukuthi uyokwenzani ukuze alithole futhi alijabulele
Manje yisikhathi sokuba nokholo kuNkulunkulu nasemalungiselelweni ekusasa; kuhilela ukumelela ngenkuthalo lowohulu-
meni wezwe

nke futhi ngaleyondlela uyingxenye yengxoxo yakho yansuku zonke? Ingabe ukuphila kwakho kubonakalisa ukusekela
kwakho?

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE SEKUYISIKHATHI SOKUBA UNKULUNKULU ABUSE IZWE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
UNkulunkulu wathatha izinyathelo zokubusa izwe ngo-1914. Namuhla ubusa ngoMbuso omisiwe wobuMesiya. Lokhu kuyo-
sho izibusiso kubo bonke abaqaphela nabasekela ukubusa kwakhe
ABANINGI BAFISA SENGATHI UNKULUNKULU UBENGATHATHA UKUBUSA KHONA MANJE (3 imiz.)
Sonke sinawo umuzwa wokuthi izwe ngokuqinisekile lidinga ububusi obungcono
Nakuba bengebona abavukeli bezombangazwe noma abasekela ukungabibikho kukahulumeni, abantu abaningi bayabona uku-
thi ohulumeni abaningi bahluleka kakhulu (Funda izAga 29:2) (gZU80 9/8 3 [g80 3/22 3])
Lokho okubonakala kuwukungabi nathemba kuholela abanye ekuzitheleni ngabandayo nasekukhungathekeni noma emizamweni
eyize yokuthuthuka
Abanye sebeye baba nesimo esibi noma bangakholelwa ebukhoneni bukaNkulunkulu, benomuzwa wokuthi ukuba bekukhona
uNkulunkulu onothando onamandla amakhulu, wayeyonikeza ububusi obungcono (gZU89 4/8 17)
Abanye bakholelwa ngokuqinile ekutheni uNkulunkulu ukhona futhi unamandla okubusa umhlaba ngokuphelele kodwa uya-
sivumela isimo samanje
Ingabe uzizwa ngaleyondlela? Ingabe ungachaza ngokucacile ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyolibusa nini futhi kanjani izwe?
IKHONO LIKANKULUNKULU KUFANELE LAKHE ITHEMBA LETHU NOKUQINISEKA (10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lembula okuningi ngezindlela zikaJehova namakhono akhe
Unelungelo lokuba uMbusi wendawo yonke ngoba unguMdali noMthombo wokuphila (Hu 36:9; IsAm 1:8)
Ubelokhu enguMlungiseleli Omkhulu wesintu futhi namanje unguye (Hu 145:15, 16; wZU90 9/15 18)
UJehova wathumela iNdodana yakhe njengendlela yokukhulula isintu esonweni; ngaleyondlela uNkulunkulu wabonisa utha-
ndo ngabantu
UNkulunkulu ulunge ngokuphelele futhi akanakho ukonakala, ngakho ububusi bakhe ngeke buwohloke (Hu 89:14)
Ikhono lakhe lokwazi ikusasa kusengaphambili nokuqikelela ukuthi injongo yakhe iyafezeka kusinikeza isizathu sokuqiniseka
(go 17-36)
UNkulunkulu ubekela izizwe nonkulunkulu bazo inselele ngokuqondene nekhono lokuprofetha (Funda uIsaya 43:9, 10) (go 19-22)
Izizwe azinabo ubufakazi bamakhono onkulunkulu bazo abahlukahlukene bokubikezela ikusasa ngokunembile
Lokho uJehova ayekwenzile nalokho ayesayokwenza ngamaIsrayeli kwawenza ofakazi bekhono lakhe lokwazi ikusasa kuse-
ngaphambili (Funda uIsaya 43:12, 13)
Njengoba abikezela ngoMose, uJehova wasindisa amaIsrayeli ebugqilini baseGibithe (Eks 6:1, 6-8; 12:37-42; wZU88 2/1 11)
Kamuva, uNkulunkulu wabikezela ukuthi wayeyosindisa abantu bakhe abasongelwa iAsiriya, futhi wenza kanjalo (Isa 14:
24-27; go 31-2; wZU88 2/1 12)
UNkulunkulu wabikezela futhi ukuthi wayeyohlenga amaIsrayeli ekudingisweni eBabiloni (Funda uIsaya 43:14, 15) (go 24-6;
wZU88 2/1 12-13)
AmaIsrayeli akhululiwe ayeyoba ofakazi bokubikezela nokufeza kukaJehova intando yakhe
Zonke lezozehlakalo zibonisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyakwazi ukuqala nokuphela kwendaba (Funda uIsaya 46:9, 10)
Khona-ke, kunengqondo ukubheka kuye ukuze sifunde ukuthi sinini isikhathi sokuba abuse izwe
IBhayibheli liqukethe incazelo yokuthatha kwakhe ububusi ngoKristu wakhe (Funda isAmbulo 11:15, 17) (go 34-6)
Ingabe emiBhalweni kukhona ukwaziswa okungokwesiprofetho kokuthi lesosehlakalo senzeka nini?
Lokhu kuhlobene nombuzo obalulekile: Ingabe manje yisikhathi sokuba uNkulunkulu abuse izwe?
UDANIYELI ISAHLUKO 4—UMFANEKISO ONGOKWESIPROFETHO (14 imiz.)
Eminyakeni engaphezu kweyikhulu, oFakazi BakaJehova bosuku lwanamuhla baye bakhomba uDaniyeli 4 njengobonisa isikha-
thi sikaNkulunkulu sokuqalisa ukubusa okukhethekile
Ingabe uyazi ukuthi uDaniyeli 4 ukhuluma ngani futhi kungasiphi isizathu ehlanganiswa nobubusi bukaNkulunkulu?
UJehova wathumela iphupho elingokwesiprofetho kuNebukadinesari, inkosi yoMbuso Wezwe waseBabiloni (go 71-6)
Waphupha ngomuthi omkhulu owanqunywa (Funda uDaniyeli 4:9-17) (go 73)
Incazelo kaDaniyeli ephefumlelwe yabonisa ukuthi ububusi babuhilelekile kuleliphupho elingokwesiprofetho (go 76-9)
Ngokuqondene nokusebenza kwalo okuqondile, uDaniyeli wathi umuthi ngalesosikhathi wawumelela ububusi obabuphathiswe
inkosi enamandla yaseBabiloni (Funda uDaniyeli 4:20-27)
Lokho uJehova akubikezela ngoDaniyeli kwenzeka kuNebukadinesari (go 79-83)
Ngezwi elivela ezulwini, uNebukadinesari onamandla wanqunywa (Funda uDaniyeli 4:31-33)
“Izikhathi eziyisikhombisa,” noma iminyaka, wadla utshani njengenkabi; wayenjengomuthi onqunyiwe, oboshiwe
Lapho ingqondo yenkosi ibuya, yasivuma isifundo eyayisifundile ngamandla kaNkulunkulu (Funda uDaniyeli 4:34, 35, 37)
Njengokungathi wayesusa izibopho esiqwini somuthi, uNkulunkulu wabuyisela ububusi baleyonkosi
Imibuzo ebalulekile kithi: Kunasiphi isizathu sokuthatha iphupho lomuthi njengenkomba engokwesiprofetho yokuthi uNkulunku-
lu uyobuthatha nini ububusi bezwe? Uma sikhona isizathu esinjalo, sikhomba kusiphi isikhathi, futhi sihileleke kanjani?

Iminyaka engu-2 520 iyosiletha ku-1914, lapho uNkulunkulu ayengalindelwa ukuba abuqinise kabusha ubukhosi ngombuso
Umlando ngesikhathi sika-1914 kuqhubeke uye waqinisekisa umbono wokuthi uMbuso wamiswa ngalesosikhathi ezulwi-
ni (wZU86 11/1 4-7; rsZU 186-7)

15, 18)

Izizwe zazingasenalo ilungelo lokubusa umhlaba ngokungenakuphazanyiswa
Kunencazelo ekhethekile kithi ngenxa yesikhathi esiphila kuso
Ivesi 18 libonisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyophoqelela ububusi bakhe bendawo yonke ngokubhubhisa ababhubhisi bomhlaba
Yiziphi izimo eziyolandela? Kungasho ukuthini ngathi?
UKUBUSA KUKANKULUNKULU IZWE—KUYOSHO UKUTHINI? (5 imiz.)
Ububusi obuvela kuJehova ngoKristu ngokunengqondo buyoletha izibusiso (IzA 29:2, 14; go 183-91)

Ngisho noDeveli namademoni ngeke babe khona ukuze badale izinkinga
Abangu-144 000 abakha iJerusalema Elisha bayohlanganyela noKristu ekubuseni
Izibusiso ziyogelezela esintwini zivela esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu (Funda isAmbulo 21:3, 4; 22:1, 2) (reZU 303, 310-12)
UKristu uhlezi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi ezulwini
Kuyoba namalungiselelo ayinsada okuphila okuphakade atholakalela bonke abahlonipha nabalalela uNkulunkulu
Singabheka phambili ekwelapheni kwaphezulu yonke imiphumela engokomzimba nengokwengqondo yokungapheleli
Yeka indlela esingabonga ngayo ngokuthi kulesizukulwane, uJehova uNkulunkulu kakade usethathe izinyathelo zokubusa izwe
nokuthi ngokushesha bonke labo manje abazithoba ebubusini bakhe nababusekelayo bangajabulela izibusiso ezinjalo!
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-

OFAKAZI BAKAJEHOVA NOMBUSO—IMFUNDISO EHLUKILE (4 imiz.)
UMbuso uyimfundiso yeBhayibheli emenyezelwa ngokuhlukile oFakazi BakaJehova (wZU79 9/1 8 [w79 7/1 18]; wZU80 7/15 10
[w80 1/15 9])
Uma ubungaqhathanisa izinkolelo zakho nalezo zamasonto, cishe umehluko oyinhloko bekuyoba nguMbuso (gZU89 1/8 23, 31
[g88 12/22 18, 24])
UJesu wathi uMbuso wawuyoba isici esiyisihluthulelo sokushumayela kwethu ezinsukwini zokugcina (Mat 24:14)
Ungambonisa yini umuntu ngokunembile lokho iBhayibheli elikushoyo ngoMbuso? (rsZU 356-63)
Sonke singazisho izinkolelo eziyisisekelo: UMbuso uwuhulumeni ezulwini onoJesu njengeNkosi kusukela ngo-1914; abangu-
144 000 bathathwa emhlabeni ukuba babe ababusi abangabapristi ukuze babuse phezu kwepharadesi elibuyiselwe emhlabeni
Kodwa manje ingabe ungalisekela ngeBhayibheli ngalinye lalamaphuzu?
Njengoba sixoxa ngephuzu ngalinye, cabangela ukuthi ubungalifakazela yini ngokweBhayibheli
UBANI OFANELEKA NJENGENKOSI YOMBUSO, FUTHI NINI? (20 imiz.)
Ubungabonisa yini ngokuvela eBhayibhelini ukuthi akukho-muntu emhlabeni, ngaphandle kothile kuphela osezulwini, ongafa-
neleka njengeNkosi yoMbuso? (go 91-2)
Inkosi yoMbuso ongokwasezulwini kwakuyomelwe ibe eyohlu lozalo lukaDavide (Hu 89:35, 36)
Akekho umuntu ophilayo kulesizukulwane ongabonisa ukuthi unelungelo elingokomthetho esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDa-
vide (it-1 909  ̊4)
UJesu wayengowalolohlu, kodwa akaphili emhlabeni, ngakho angaba kanjani iNkosi yoMbuso?
Isiprofetho esikuDaniyeli isahluko 7 sibonisa ukuthi ukubusa koMbuso kunikezwa othile osezulwini
Isiprofetho sikaDaniyeli sabonisa ukuthi ukubusa koMbuso kwakuyokuza esikhathini eside emlandweni (Dan 7:1-8; go 93-8;
gmZU 127-8; wZU86 10/1 7)
Izilo ezine eziphuma olwandle zazimelela ububusi babantu (Funda uDaniyeli 7:15-17)
UMbuso waseBabiloni, njengengonyama enesivinini, enamandla, washwabadela izizwe nabantu kodwa wawusunqotshwa
kamuva
Njengebhere, uMbuso Wezwe wamaMede namaPheresiya wawulambele ukunqoba futhi wawusuqhubukushe izinhlangothi
ezintathu ngaphambi kokuba unqotshwe iGrisi
UMbuso Wezwe waseGrisi waqala ngoAlexander Omkhulu futhi wanda ngokushesha, njengengwe egxumayo
Ngemva kokufa kuka-Alexander, ojenene abane babusa izingxenye zombuso wakhe
Isilo sesine ekuqaleni sasimelela uMbuso waseRoma kodwa futhi safanekisela ukuphakama koMbuso Wezwe wamaNgisi
namaMelika (Funda uDaniyeli 7:23-25) (wZU88 5/15 24-6)
UMbuso waseRoma, njengesilo esichobozayo, esishwabadelayo nesesabekayo, wabusa uMbuso waseGrisi
“Izimpondo eziyishumi” zazifanekisela ingqikithi yezizwe ezihlukahlukene nohulumeni abavela lapho uMbuso waseRo-
ma uwohloka kancane kancane
Omunye umxhantela ovelele walokhu kuwohloka kwakuyiGreat Britain
‘Njengophondo oluncane,’ ngo-1763 iBrithani yiyisinqobe imikhumbi yezempi yeSpain, iNetherlands, neFrance
‘Uphondo oluncane’ lukaDaniyeli 7:8 luye lwamelela uMbuso Wezwe wamaNgisi namaMelika
Sicabangela lomlando kafushane nje ukuze sithole isizinda sokwaziswa okubalulekile ngeNkosi yoMbuso
UDaniyeli usinikeza umbono wesinyathelo senkantolo ezulwini ngokuqondene nobukhosi boMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Funda uDa-
niyeli 7:9-14) (go 98-107)
UJehova uNkulunkulu ungoMdala Wezinsuku; lombono ugcizelela kithi isikhundla sakhe esiphakeme
Siphila esikhathini lapho ‘uphondo oluncane’ lunethonya khona
“Izilo” zokuqala ziye zavunyelwa ukuba zibe khona esimweni sezinsalela zezindawo zazo
Kwethulwa “iNdodana yomuntu”; ingubani, futhi yini echazwa njengeyenzeka kuyo?
Ungase uphendule, ‘ “INdodana yomuntu” nguJesu,’ kodwa ungawusekela yini lowombono ngeBhayibheli?
Ukulandisa okuphefumlelwe kuMathewu 26:63-65 (funda) kuchaza iNdodana yomuntu ngokuthi uJesu (wZU88 1/1 10)
Incazelo kaDaniyeli ivumelana nesAmbulo 1:7, lapho uJesu eyilowo oza namafu
Ufika nini futhi amukele ubukhosi nombuso? Umbono kaDaniyeli usisiza kanjani ukuba sazi?
Lesenzakalo kumelwe ukuba senzeka ngemva kokuphakama koMbuso Wezwe wamaNgisi namaMelika (‘uphondo olu-
ncane’) ezikhathini zanamuhla
Ukugcwaliseka kwezinye iziprofetho zeBhayibheli kubonisa ukuthi cishe lapho kugqashuka iMpi Yezwe I, uJehova wa-
nikeza iNdodana yakhe ubukhosi ukuba ibuse eMbusweni wobuMesiya wasezulwini
Isici esikhuthazayo sesiprofetho sikaDaniyeli siwukuthi sibonisa ukuthi uMbuso wobuMesiya uyobhubhisa imibuso yaba-
ntu (Dan 7:14, 26)
Kodwa kuthiwani ngokuyiswa kwabanye abantu ezulwini ukuze bayobusa? Ubungakusekela yini lokho ngeBhayibheli?
No. 21-ZU
5/97ABANTU BANGAHLANGANYELA KANJANI EKUBUSENI KOMBUSO? (9 imiz.)
Umbono kaDaniyeli awubonisi nje kuphela ukuthi uJesu (iNdodana yomuntu) uyokwamukela ububusi boMbuso kodwa ukuthi
futhi abanye bayohlanganyela kulokhu (Funda uDaniyeli 7:18, 27) (kc 143)
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi abanye babalandeli bakaJesu babizelwa ukuba bahlanganyele ekubuseni koMbuso (Funda isAmbu-
lo 1:9)
Umphostoli uJohane waphefumlelwa ukuba anikeze ukwaziswa okuningi ngokuhlanganyela kwabantu ekubuseni koMbuso
(go 108-14)
Wabhala ukuthi abantu abangu-144 000 babeyoyiswa ezulwini ukuze bahlanganyele ububusi noJesu (Funda isAmbulo 14:1;
umongo wamavesi 3-5)
Kuthiwani uma umuntu ethi akufanele sibheke u-144 000 njengenani elingokoqobo? (go 111; rsZU 201)
IWundlu okwakubhekiselwe kulo nguJesu, “iWundlu likaNkulunkulu”; IsAmbulo 14 sibonisa iWundlu elilodwa kuphela,
okuyinani elingokoqobo, ngakho kunengqondo ukuthi u-144 000 naye ungokoqobo (Joh 1:29; g62 9/8 27-8)
‘Bawulibo’ lwesintu; ulibo yilokho okukhethiwe okuncane okumelelayo
UJesu wayengababiza ngokuthi ‘umhlambi omncane,’ ngoba abantu abangu-144 000 abathathwayo ukuze babuse noJesu ba-
yobe bembalwa uma beqhathaniswa nezakhamuzi zomhlaba (Luk 12:32)
IsAmbulo 7:4-8 naso sikhuluma ngalabahlanganyeli ekubuseni koMbuso (go 112-14)
Nakuba kuthiwa bavela ‘ezizweni zakwaIsrayeli,’ akubona bonke abangamaJuda angokwenyama (reZU 116-19)
Amagama ‘ezizwe’ ahlukile kwawezizwe zakuqala ezingu-12 zakwaIsrayeli ongokwemvelo, okubonisa ukuthi isAmbu-
lo 7 asibhekiseli kumaIsrayeli ngokwenyama (wZU63 1/1 13, 14 [w62 400-401]; it-2 1125)
IsAmbulo 5:9, 10 (funda) sibonisa ukuthi eqinisweni bavela ezizweni eziningi
Kunengqondo ukuthi isAmbulo sibhekisela kulabo abangamaIsrayeli ngaphakathi (Caphuna abaseRoma 2:29)
Kwenzeka kanjani ukuba abantu babe abahlanganyeli ekubuseni koMbuso?
UNkulunkulu ubizela abantu ezulwini ukuba bahlanganyele ububusi boMbuso noJesu (go 115-20)
Kumelwe babhapathizwe emanzini futhi bagcotshwe ngomoya ongcwele (Funda uJohane 3:3, 5) (go 113-14)
Ngaleyondlela ‘bazalwa ngokusha,’ bengazalwa njengabantu kodwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu angokomoya
(gZU88 2/8 16-17 [g88 2/8 26-7])
Ngemva kokubizelwa ekubeni izindlalifa kanye noKristu, laba kumelwe bathembeke kuze kube sekufeni (IsAm 2:10)
UNkulunkulu, ngoJesu, ube esebavusela ekuphileni ezulwini ukuba babuse noKristu (IsAm 20:4-6)
Abaningi bethu abanakho ukubizwa kokubusa noKristu, ngakho sifaneleka kanjani elungiselelweni loMbuso?
Sinesizathu esihle sokubheka phambili esikhathini lapho wonke umhlaba uyozuza khona ebubusini basezulwini (Dan 7:27)

No. 21-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UYANELISEKA NGAMALUNGISELELO KAJEHOVA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Nakuba eLobukholwa likhungethwe indlala engokomoya, oFakazi BakaJehova banenala engokomoya. Ingabe uyawazisa
ngempela amalungiselelo amaningi uJehova akwenzela wona? Uma uwazisa, kufanele ube umuntu ojabule kakhulu nowa-
nelisekile
INDLALA ENGOKOMOYA YELOBUKHOLWA IPHAMBENE NESIMO SABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU (7 imiz.)
Njengoba kwabikezelwa, eLobukholwa lisesimweni esibi (Amo 8:11)
Amalungu alo siqu nabefundisi bayavuma ukuthi amasonto ayafa (wZU90 7/15 30; gZU89 12/8 23-6 [g89 11/22 19-22]; gZU88
2/8 12-15; reZU 229)
Kungani eLobukholwa linendlala engokomoya ngisho nakuba lineBhayibheli?
Liye lamshiya uJehova, lanhlanhlatha eZwini lakhe (Jer 2:13; wZU84 6/1 18 [w83 11/15 22])
Esikhundleni seZwi elinikeza ukuphila, eLobukholwa linikeza izimfundiso zobuqaba, ifilosofi, nemiqondo yabantu besima-
njemanje (Kol 2:8; g88 3/8 27)
Amasonto akhetha isiko esikhundleni seZwi likaNkulunkulu, njengoba kwenza abaFarisi (Mat 15:3-9; wZU88 12/1 4-7)
Abantu bakaNkulunkulu banakekelwa ngothando ngenala yokudla okungokomoya (Isa 65:13, 14)
Okuhlangenwe nakho kwabo kufana nokukaDavide, owayengasweli lutho (Hu 23:1; wZU88 7/1 23)
Labo abeza endaweni kaJehova yokukhulekela bakuvuma obala ukuthi bayofundiswa ngokufanelekile; bafisa ukuhamba emi-
khondweni yakhe (Isa 2:2, 3)
Bajabulela idili elingokomoya eliqhubekayo (IzA 15:15)
Bayakwazi ukuzondla “ngamazwi okukholwa nesifundiso esihle,” okubenza baneliseke (1Ti 4:6)
SINEZIZATHU EZIZWAKALAYO ZOKWANELISEKA LAPHO SICABANGELA AMALUNGISELELO KAJEHOVA
(20 imiz.)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyisisekelo sokudla okungokomoya okunikezwa indlu yokukholwa (wZU87 10/1 10-14)
Lenza umuntu azi iqiniso eliholela ekuphileni okuphakade (Hu 119:160; Joh 14:6)
Lisikhanyisela ngokuqhubekayo ngentando nenjongo kaJehova (Hu 97:11; IzA 4:18)
Ngokukhanya okuvela eBhayibhelini, siyakuqonda okushiwo izikhathi, sinombono wezenzakalo zesikhathi esizayo (2Pet
1:16-19; IsAm 1:1, 3; reZU 15-17)
Lisebenza njengesiqondiso futhi linenzuzo nangezinye izindlela (Hu 119:105; 2Ti 3:16, 17; wZU85 1/15 27 [w84 6/15 15])
Linethonya elinamandla ekuphileni kwethu, liguqula izingqondo; lisiza ekwembatheni ubuntu obusha (Rom 12:1, 2; Efe
4:23, 24)
Nakuba ulwazi oluyisisekelo ludingeka, ngeke sikhule ngokugcwele ngokuhlala nezinto eziyisisekelo (Heb 5:14; 6:1-3; wZU85
5/1 8-12)
Sidinga ukudla okuqinile ukuze sihlukanise phakathi kokulungile nokungalungile
Ukuthuthuka ngokomoya kuletha ukwaneliseka (1Ti 4:15)
Ilungiselelo lomoya kaNkulunkulu lenza amaKristu aneliseke
Ngokuphila ngokuvumelana nomoya, singakhiqiza izithelo ezinhle (Gal 5:22-25)
Sishukunyiselwa ukuba sifeze umsebenzi wokushumayela nowokwenza abafundi, kanye nokumemezela izahlulelo zikaNku-
lunkulu naphezu kokuphikiswa (Zak 4:6)
Imihlangano yebandla nemihlangano emikhulu inikeza isimiso sokufunda okuqhubekayo nesikhuthazo, kanye nobudlelwane
obunempilo nobuqabulayo (Hu 26:8; 122:1; 1Kor 14:26, 31; Heb 10:24, 25)
Yiba nezinhlobonhlobo zezincwadi zokusetshenziswa emihlanganweni, esifundweni somuntu siqu nesomkhaya, nezokusaka-
zwa ensimini (kmZU 4/91 1; wZU87 10/1 13-14)
Abadala bebandla bayatholakala ukuze bafundise, babuyise, futhi basize abazalwane (Efe 4:11, 12; 1Ti 5:17)
Ababonisi abajikelezayo ngezikhathi ezithile bayahambela ukuze bakhuthaze imizamo futhi bakhe isimo esingokomoya (IzE
14:22; Rom 1:11, 12; wZU79 9/1 19-22 [w79 2/15 23-6])
Kulungiselelwe izikole ezihlukahlukene ukuze kuqeqeshwe amaphayona, abadala, izithunywa zevangeli, nabanye
Wonke lamalungiselelo abonisa indlela uJehova abanakekela kahle ngayo abantu bakhe
Ingabe likhona iqembu elingokwenkolo kweLobukholwa eliwanakekela kanjalo amalungu alo?
Ukucabanga ngobuhle nothando lukaJehova kwenza umuntu azizwe ebonga ngempela (Hu 40:5)
HLALA WANELISEKILE NGOKWAZISA AMALUNGISELELO KANKULUNKULU NANGOKUSIZA ABANYE (15 imiz.)
Akuhlakaniphile ukudebeselela noma ukuthatha noma iliphi ilungiselelo kalula (wZU88 2/15 17  ̊9-11; wZU88 7/1 24  ̊7; w74 250)
Uma sidebesela, ngeke sikwazi ukuhlangabezana nokuvivinywa nobunzima bamanje noma obuzayo

1Ti 4:3, 4)
