umehluko futhi zibe nenjongo?
KUNOMDALI OYINGCWETI ONENJONGO (8 imiz.)
Cabangela ubufakazi obubonakala endaweni yonke bokuthi kunoMdali Oyingcweti onenjongo
Noma ubani uyovuma ukuthi iwashi laba nomenzi; ukuqhathaniswa kwewashi nemithala yasezulwini kukhomba ekubeni
khona komdali (Isa 40:26; Heb 3:4; ce 122)
Ukuhlobana okuningi kwelanga nomhlaba kubalulekile ekusekeleni ukuphila
Ilanga liwumthombo wamandla nokukhanya
Uyini umsuka welanga uma ungeyena uMdali Oyingcweti? (Hu 74:16)
Ukulandelana kwezinsuku, ubusuku, nezinkathi kunikeza ukukhula kwezitshalo ngokuvumela isilinganiso esifanele so-
kukhanya nokushisa nezinkathi ezifanele zokukhula (ce 131-3)
Cabangela ukulinganiselwa nezinzuzo zomoya wethu (ce 134-7)
Uqukethe isilinganiso esifanele somoya-mpilo namanye amagesi; usebenza njengesivikelo emisebeni ebulalayo
Amanzi anezintwana eziphawulekayo; ukuphila emhlabeni obekungeke kube khona ngaphandle kwazo (ce 137-8)
Athwala amaminerali awayise ezitshalweni, asekela ukulinganiselwa komoya-mpilo nesikhutha; imizimba yethu yakhi-
wa cishe amaphesenti angu-70 amanzi
Amanzi anamazinga afaneleke ngempela okubila nokuba yiqhwa, futhi ayanda lapho eba yiqhwa
Umhlabathi unezimfanelo ezibalulekile zokukhula kwezitshalo (ce 138-40)
Ama-bacterium, izimpethu, nezinambuzane kunengxenye ekucebiseni umhlabathi ukuze ukwazi ukukhiqiza uhlaza no-
kudla
Akukho nje kuphela eyodwa yalezizinto kodwa zonke zikhona futhi ziyaqhubeka, zonke zibalulekile ekuphileni; kwakunge-
nzeka yini ukuthi konke lokhu kuzihlanganele ngengozi hhayi kanye kuphela kodwa ngokuqhubekayo? (Rom 1:20;
ce 140-1)
Njengoba ubufakazi bukhomba kuMdali, ingabe zikhona izinkomba zokuthi unekusasa ngendalo yakhe?
INJONGO YOMDALI IBONAKALISWA EMALUNGISELELWENI AKHE AYINALA (8 imiz.)
Injongo yoMdali wethu ibonakaliswa ngokuthi akukhona nje kuphela ukuthi wadala lezizinto kodwa futhi uzigcina zisemazi-
ngeni adingekile futhi zilinganiselwe ukuze zisekele ukuphila
UNkulunkulu unjengomnikazi ophanayo “wekhaya” lethu, umhlaba (ce 129-31)
Ikhaya lethu eliwumhlaba “linezibani zasophahleni” nomthombo wamandla, njengoba izindlu eziningi ezinhle zinakho
“Ikamelo elingaphansi” lomhlaba liqukethe uwoyela, okusansimbi, amatshe ayigugu, namakhemikhali
Sithola ukuthi umhlaba “unesimiso samapayipi” semifula, iziziba, nemvula—ingabe umuntu wayengakwazi ukwakha isimi-
so esinjalo esimangalisayo? (Hu 104:10, 11)
“Iphansi” lomhlaba linokhaphethi owuhlaza—ngokuvamile umonokalo owenziwe abantu ulungiswa ngokushesha (gZU80
3/8 27-9 [g79 9/22 9-10])
Kunenala yokudla “ekhabetheni” lomhlaba (Hu 104:14, 15, 24; it-1 545)
Injongo yoMdali ngendalo yakhe ephilayo isobala lapho sicabangela ukubona kwakhe kusengaphambili ngokuthi ekuqaleni
enze umhlaba okwazi ukusekela abantu abaningi ababeyokuba khona esikhathini esizayo
Ikhaya lethu lasemhlabeni alilona elokuhlala isikhashana kodwa elokuhlala njalo (Isa 45:18; wZU84 8/1 4 [w84 2/15 4])
Njengoba umhlaba ubhujiswa kakhulu, yini eyokwenziwa ngokungahleleki okukhona emhlabeni?
Ngokombono wabantu, akunakwenzeka ukuletha ukuhleleka emhlabeni, ngakho ingabe kuyoke kufike? (Shu 1:15)
UNKULUNKULU AKATHEMBISI IPLANETHI EYONAKALISWA NGOKUQHUBEKAYO, KODWA UMHLABA OYI-
PHARADESI (12 imiz.)
UJesu wathembisa iselelesi esasisesigxotsheni eduze naye ukuthi sasiyoba sePharadesi (Luk 23:42, 43; rsZU 117-18)
UJesu wayesho ukuthini? Ingabe wayecabanga ngepharadesi lasezulwini?
Igama elithi “ipharadesi” ngokuyisisekelo lisho ingadi noma ipaki
Akukho lapho imiBhalo YesiHeberu eyanikeza khona noma ubani ithuba lokuya ezulwini
No. 23-ZU
7/91Umhlaba oyipharadesi wawungewona umqondo omusha; izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezithembekile kusukela ekuqaleni zazibhe-
ke phambili emhlabeni oyipharadesi omuhle,onokuthula (wZU81 10/1 6 [w81 4/15 6])
Lapho amaIsrayeli engena eZweni Lesithembiso, laliwumfuziselo wePharadesi (Dut 11:10-12)
UNkulunkulu wathembisa uIsrayeli “izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha” lapho ethi wayeyowabuyisa ekuthunjweni eBabiloni
(Isa 65:17, 18; suZU 106)
“Izulu elisha” laba khona ekubuseni kukaKoresi Omkhulu, uZerubabele, noJeshuwa
‘Umhlaba omusha’ wawungabantu abathobekile, abaphendukile ababuyiselwa ezweni lakubo
UJehova wanikeza amaIsrayeli usizo ekwenzeni izwe libe lihle (Isa 35:1, 2)
Isithembiso ‘sezulu elisha nomhlaba omusha’ sasiyoba nokugcwaliseka kwakamuva (suZU 107-12)
Umphostoli uPetru wabonisa ukuthi kwakuyoba nokugcwaliseka kwesikhathi esizayo, okukhulu (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:13)
‘Lomhlaba omusha’ uyogcwala yonke imbulunga—sonke isintu (IsAm 21:1-3; Hu 115:16)
“Izulu elisha” elizayo liwuhulumeni ohlala ezulwini (reZU 301-3)
Ukusebenzelana kukaNkulunkulu nohlanga lwesintu kusukela ekuqaleni kwaqinisekisa amadoda athembekile ngomhlaba
ozayo oyiPharadesi
(Thinta kafushane isithembiso sikaNkulunkulu ‘sembewu’ kuGenesise 3:15, qhathanisa neNW; 22:18, qhathanisa neNW;
2 Samuweli 7:12, 13, 16, qhathanisa neNW)
Ngaphambi kokuba iPharadesi libe khona, umhlaba kumelwe uhlanzwe (Jer 23:19, 20; IsAm 11:18)
UNkulunkulu uyokuqinisekisa kanjani ukuthula okuhlala njalo nokuphila okujabulisayo emhlabeni?
Izici ezimbi emhlabeni, kuhlanganise nabantu abanobugovu, ababhubhisayo, kumelwe zisuswe (IzA 21:18)
UNkulunkulu wakwenza lokhu eZweni Lesithembiso lasendulo (g89 1/22 4  ̊4, 5)
Isimiso esonakele esiye senza abantu bangalibona iqiniso kumelwe sidlule
Ngokungafani nezimpi zezizwe, ‘ukulwa kosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke’ kuyokhetha ukuthi ku-
bhubhisa bani (IsAm 16:14)
UNkulunkulu ulungile futhi uqotho ngokuthatha isinyathelo sokususa ababi emhlabeni, ngoba kuwukuphela kwendlela uku-
thula okungafika ngayo kulabo abafuna ukuthula (IzA 11:8)
ISIMO ESISHA ENDAWENI EZUNGEZILE NGAPHANSI KOKUBUSA KOMBUSO SIYOSUSA ISONO (11 imiz.)
Isimo esihle endaweni ezungezile sibalulekile ukuze sijabule ukuze siphile ngokufanelekile (wZU84 11/1 3-4 [w83 10/1 3-4])
Isimo endaweni ezungezile kwaIsrayeli wasendulo sasingcono kunakwezinye izizwe ngenxa yokuthi uIsrayeli wayenoMthe-
tho kaNkulunkulu, kodwa ithonya elibi lezizwe ezizungezile lawathinta amaIsrayeli (Lev 18:24-29; Dut 8:19, 20; 18:9)
UDeveli uye wasebenzisa isimo esibi endaweni ezungezile ukuze enze abantu bone
Isimo esihle endaweni ezungezile siyochuma ngemva kokubhujiswa kwesimiso samanje, futhi abantu bayozuza (Isa 9:6, 7; 26:7-9)
Kulesimiso labo abazama ukwenza okulungile bakuthola kunzima kakhulu, kodwa uNkulunkulu uzoyenza ibe lula indlela
yabanhliziyo-ziqotho
Abantu abavusiwe bayoba nethuba elihle lokufunda iqiniso
Ubuthakathaka bobuntu sonke esidinga ukulwa nabo ngeke bube nzima kangaka ukubunqoba esimweni esihle endaweni
ezungezile ngaphansi kokubusa koMbuso kaKristu
Abanye bayohluleka ukuthola ukuphila okuphakade (reZU 291-2; wZU89 2/15 14  ̊23)
UJesu ngokwakhe wakuveza lokhu (Funda uMathewu 12:31, 32)
Abanye babaFarisi babeyisibonelo sabantu ababengeke baphenduke (Mat 12:22-30)
AmaKristu kumelwe aqaphele ukuthi angaweli ekoneni umoya ongcwele (Heb 10:26, 27)
UmKristu uyokugwema ukuba nobudlelwane nalabo abathi bangabazalwane abangamaKristu kodwa ababonakala bona
ngamabomu futhi bengabonisi izimpawu zokuphenduka
UNkulunkulu, ngoKristu, unguMahluleli wabantu abanjalo; ngakho-ke, uyena kuphela, hhayi thina, onganquma uku-
thi umuntu uye wahlambalaza umoya ongcwele yini (wZU81 7/1 23  ̊8 [w80 12/1 23  ̊8])
Abahlambalazi abanjalo bayobhekana ‘nokufa kwesibili,’ ukuqothulwa phakade, ukuze bangabe besakwazi ukuhlamba-
laza uNkulunkulu noma bakhathaze omakhelwane babo (IsAm 20:14, 15)
UKUPHILA KUNAYO INJONGO NGALABO ABAKHONZA UNKULUNKULU (4 imiz.)
Siwumphumela wendalo kaNkulunkulu, asiwona umkhiqizo wengozi engenangqondo yokuziphendukela kwemvelo
Ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu, siyacabanga futhi sibonisane, sifinyelele ekuqondeni injongo kaNkulunkulu
Sinenjongo ngoba senza injongo kaNkulunkulu ibe injongo yethu ekuphileni
Ingxenye yenjongo yakhe iwukwenza lomhlaba ube ipharadesi
Kungenzeka kakhulu ukuba sibe ingxenye yalokho (Zef 2:2, 3; gZU89 2/8 21 [g89 2/8 27])
Enye ingxenye ephawulekayo yenjongo kaJehova iwukulwela ubukhosi bakhe
Sihileleke kakhulu kulokho (IzA 27:11)
Ngakho-ke, siyawenza umehluko, kungaba owokumelela noma owokumelana nobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu
Siyazi ukuthi siyaphi uma sithembekile
Akudingekile ukuba sibe izibalo nje emarekhodini omlando wokuqhubeka kwesikhathi
Singaphila phakade ngoba lokho kuyinjongo kaNkulunkulu
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 23-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45LOKHO UKUBUSA KUKANKULUNKULU OKUNGASENZELA KHONA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Sekuye kwaba sobala ukuthi ushintsho luyadingeka. Ukubusa kukaNkulunkulu kuyophakamisa umuntu esimweni sakhe
samanje esidabukisayo. Labo abasekela ukubusa kukaNkulunkulu bayoba nomvuzo omuhle
ABANTU BAFISA USHINTSHO, KODWA INGABE BAYOSHINTSHELA ENDLELENI KANKULUNKULU? (4 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi abajabule ngenxa yokungalungi, ubugebengu, izimpi, inzondo, nokugula
Bayabuza, “Kungani uNkulunkulu engaziqedi manje lezizinto?” (wZU89 10/15 21-2)
Ukuqeda lezizinto bekuyosho ukushintsha izimiso, izinhlangano, nemikhuba; ingabe lokhu bekuyokwamukelwa?
Sibona labo abafuna ushintsho lokuba kube ngcono ngabantu bephikiswa kakhulu (gZU88 5/8 5-8)
Kuhlala kunokulwisana phakathi kwabavikeli bendawo nabaphathi bezimboni, phakathi kwalabo abafuna ukusindi-
sa indawo ezungezile nalabo abafuna “intuthuko”
Ukuze bathole injabulo yangempela nokubambisana, abantu kumelwe bazimisele ukushintshela ekwenzeni okulungile
Indlela kaNkulunkulu inikeza isiqondiso ukuze abantu bakwazi ukusebenzisa inkululeko yokuzikhethela ngokuhlakanipha
(Rom 2:4)
UJehova akalindele ukuba abantu bamcele ukuba abe uMbusi wabo (Hu 2:1-6; gZU79 8/22 4 [w79 1/15 6])
Uqhuba isimiso esiyophumela ekubeni ukubusa kwakhe kungaphikiswa kuwo wonke umhlaba
UKUBUSA KUKANKULUNKULU, HHAYI OKOMUNTU, KUNGCONO KAKHULU NGATHI (4 imiz.)
Umuntu wayengadalelwanga ukubusa abanye abantu (Funda UmShumayeli 8:9; Jeremiya 10:23)
Ukubusa komuntu ngaso sonke isikhathi kuholela ekucindezelweni; ingabe awukaze ukubone lokho kwenzeka? (gmZU
187-8)
Ukuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu nolwazi lwakhe ngendalo yakhe kumenza afanelekele ukwazi lokho kanye okudingwa yisi-
ntu (Isa 40:12-14)
Wazi yonke imininingwane yemizimba yethu nobuntu bethu (Funda iHubo 139:3, 4, 16)
Uma enguMbusi ongcono kakhulu wesintu, kungani uNkulunkulu evumela umuntu ukuba abuse?
UNkulunkulu akayena ongenandaba, kodwa uhlose ukuba ngesikhathi esifanele athathe isinyathelo esiyozuzisa inani eli-
khulu kakhulu labantu abaphilayo manje nalabo ababephila esikhathini esidlule (2Pet 3:9; wZU80 9/1 3 [w80 3/1 4])
 ́
KUNGANI UNKULUNKULU EVUMEL E UKUHLUPHEKA EMHLABENI? (8 imiz.)
Umuntu wokuqala, lowo uhlanga lwesintu olwavela kuye, wayeyindodana kaNkulunkulu, ephelele, ebuvuma ngokuzithande-
la ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu (rsZU 156-7; it-2 160  ̊1)
UAdamu wayenezimfanelo zokuziphatha eziphelele futhi enekhono lokwandisa ulwazi olukhudlwana ngoJehova nothando
lwakhe nobuhlobo obuseduze ngokwengeziwe naye (it-2 604  ̊2, 3)
Akungabazeki ukuthi ngaso sonke isikhathi uNkulunkulu wayenikeza uAdamu iziyalezo (wZU89 8/1 11-16)
Njengoba uAdamu nenzalo yakhe babeyosebenzela ukunqoba umhlaba, kwakuyodingeka aqhubeke ethanda uMdali wakhe
futhi ethola iziyalezo ezivela kuNkulunkulu
UAdamu noEva babenazo zonke izinto ezidingekayo zokujabulela ukuphila (wZU89 8/1 19-20)
Njengendlela nje yokubonga, ngokufanelekile babekweleta uNkulunkulu ukwethembeka nokumlalela
Kubantu abaphelele, njengoba uAdamu noEva babenjalo, noma yisiphi isono sasiyobe singesamabomu—isenzo sokuhlubuka
kuNkulunkulu (it-1 45  ̊7)
Umuntu ophelele owayona wayeyobe engathembekile, engenakho ukwethenjelwa (Luk 16:10)
‘Umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi’ wawumelela, noma wawufanekisela, ukubusa kukaJehova kobukhosi, futhi wawuphawula
ukulinganiselwa kokubusa komuntu noma igunya (Gen 2:17; it-2 1011  ̊1, 2; 1124  ̊1, 2)
Ukudla emthini kwakuyosho ukuthi umuntu wayehoxa ekuzithobeni kuNkulunkulu
Inkambo eyathathwa uAdamu yaphakamisa lombuzo: Ingabe ukhona emkhayeni kaNkulunkulu owayengahlala ethembe-
kile ngaphansi kwakho konke ukucindezela nezilingo?
Ukudla emthini kwakungokungaphezu kokungalaleli nje; kwakuyinselele phambi kwendawo yonke ngokufaneleka ko-
bukhosi bukaNkulunkulu, noma ukubusa (it-2 1010  ̊6)
Incwadi kaJobe ichaza inselele, noma impikiswano, eyaphakanyiswa uSathane (Job 1:9-11; 2:4; it-2 1011  ̊3)
UJobe wakhonza ohlangothini lukaNkulunkulu lwalempikiswano futhi akazange alahlekelwe ngokuhlala ethembekile
kuNkulunkulu
UADAMU, NGOKONA, WALIMAZA LONKE UHLANGA LWESINTU (7 imiz.)
USathane waya kuEva kuqala ukuze aqale ukuhlubuka kuNkulunkulu (Funda uGenesise 3:1-6; 1 Thimothewu 2:13, 14) wZU86
8/1 11-12)
UEva wakhohliswa, ekholelwa ukuthi lokho inyoka eyakusho kwakuyokwenzeka
UAdamu wabonisa ukuthi wayengasamthandi uNkulunkulu ngokwanele noma wayengasakwazisi lokho uNkulunkulu aye-
mnike khona (Gen 3:12)
Walahlekelwa ukholo futhi wahlubuka ngamabomu
‘Ngalona lolosuku’ ona ngalo, uAdamu wafa ngokomoya; umzimba wakhe ongokwenyama nawo waqala ukuwohloka (Rom
3:23; 5:12, 14)
Sonke isintu sivela kuAdamu, ngakho sonke siyizoni ezingaphelele, ezifayo; futhi, eqinisweni sonke siye sazenza izono
thina ngokwethu
No. 24-ZU
6/91UNkulunkulu wakhipha uAdamu noEva ensimini, kodwa wabavumela ukuba babe nabantwana
Abanye balabantwana baye bazibonakalisa bethembekile kuNkulunkulu ngaphansi kovivinyo
Lapho impikiswano enkulu yobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu ixazululwa ekugcineni, ububi nokuhlupheka ngeke kusavunyelwa uku-
ba kuphazamise indawo yonke (ce 193-6)
Nokho, uNkulunkulu wayengasisiza kanjani isintu esimweni saso esidabukisayo, sokufa?
UNKULUNKULU USINDISA ISINTU (8 imiz.)
Isintu sasidinga usizo, kodwa uNkulunkulu wayengeke amane athi, ‘Ngiyanithethelela izono zenu’
Wayengeke amane angasinaki isono, ngoba lokho kwakuyoba ukungabi nabulungisa
Ukuze uNkulunkulu asize isintu, kwaphakama inkinga engokomthetho—indlela yokuthethelela izoni (wZU89 3/1 21-2)
Umuntu wayengenakuzisiza, ethengiswe ngaphansi kwesono (Hu 49:7; Rom 7:14)
UNkulunkulu wayengenakukhulumisana ngokuqondile nabantu abalahliwe, abanesono
Kwadingeka athathe isinyathelo ngobulungisa kuyilapho esiza uhlanga lwesintu ngokubonisa isihe (Rom 3:23-26)
Ngelungiselelo likaNkulunkulu lomusa nelingokomthetho, iNdodana yakhe yanikeza isintu ithuba lokuzuza ukuphila, ngesi-
khathi esifanayo ixazulula impikiswano yokufaneleka kokubusa kukaNkulunkulu (LmnZU 18-20)
UJesu wazalwa futhi waphila njengomuntu ophelele (Funda amaHeberu 7:26)
USathane akakwazanga ukwenza uJesu one ngokucabanga, ngezwi, noma ngesenzo
Ukunikela kukaKristu ngokuphila kwakhe njengomhlatshelo kwabeka isisekelo sokuba abantu abathembekile kuthiwe ba-
lungile (it-1 604-5)
UJesu ubekhonza njengoMmeli wezinceku zikaNkulunkulu kusukela ekuvukeni kwakhe (Funda eyoku-1 Johane 2:1, 2)
UJesu uba “uNkulunkulu onamandla” ngomnikelo wakhe wesihlengo (Isa 9:6; ws 163-6)
‘Uzala abantwana’ ngenxa yokuthi uNkulunkulu wamukela umhlatshelo wakhe wesihlengo njengomhlatshelo wezono
Bonke abaqaphela isihlengo sikaJesu ngokholo bangaba abantwana bakhe
ISIHLENGO SIKAKRISTU SINQOBA ISONO NAYO YONKE IMIPHUMELA YASO (4 imiz.)
Ngokusebenza kwenani lomhlatshelo wesihlengo, bonke abafisayo bayokwazi ukuzuza ukuphelela nokuphila okuphakade (Joh
3:17-21, 36)
Labo abahlulekayo ukuthola ukuphila kuyobe kuyilabo abenqaba ukubusa kukaJehova nokulunga kwakho (IsAm 20:7-9)
Igama likaNkulunkulu nokubusa kwakhe kuyolwelwa, kugcwaliswe incazelo ekumaHubo 150 (Nikeza umongo)
Ekupheleni kweminyaka eyinkulungwane yokubusa koMbuso kaKristu, ubuyisela uMbuso kuYise, kanye nohlanga lwesintu
olubuyiselwe
Khona-ke isintu siyoba amadodana kaNkulunkulu, ngemva kokuphumelela ovivinyweni lokugcina (1Kor 15:24; it-2 170)
UNGAQINISEKA NGOMVUZO (10 imiz.)
Ukuphila—ukuphila okuphakade—kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu samahhala
Asikwazi ukuzuza ukuphila ngemisebenzi yethu siqu, ngoba imisebenzi yethu ayilungile (suZU 98-9)
Ukuphila kuwumvuzo kulabo ababonakalisa ukholo nabalalela uKristu njengeNkosi kaNkulunkulu
Umgomo wethu kufanele ube ukuzuza ubuhlobo noNkulunkulu
Kungani uye wathola umusa wokuba uzwe futhi uqonde lezizinto kuyilapho kungenzeki ngezigidi zabanye?
UNkulunkulu uhlola inhliziyo futhi uqaphela noma ubani omfuna ngobuqotho
Udonsela umuntu kuyena lapho ebona ukuthi izimo zifanelekile (Landisa ngezEnzo 8:25-36)
Bonke labo uNkulunkulu aye wababonisa umusa banenjongo ekuphileni futhi akumelwe babe abanganaki (Funda eyesi-2 Ko-
rinte 6:1, 2)
Ukudebeselela injongo yokufunda kwethu iqiniso kuyophumela ekulahlekelweni umvuzo
Ngemva kokuba umuntu efunde iqiniso futhi eqiniseka ngokugcwele ngokubusa nangenjongo kaNkulunkulu nendawo yakhe
siqu kukho, ugcwalisa enye yezimfuneko zikaNkulunkulu ngokubhapathizwa emanzini (wZU82 4/15 21-3 [w82 2/15 28-30])
Kufanele azenzele lesinqumo ngokwakhe ngokuphelele
Umuntu kufanele aqaphele ukuthi lapho ebhapathizwa umane nje ungumntwana ongokomoya futhi kufanele aqhubeke eta-
disha futhi enza imizamo enganqamuki yokufinyelela ukuvuthwa (1Kor 14:20)
Akubona ubugovu ukubheka phambili emvuzweni ngoba uJehova unomoya wokwazisa futhi unguMvuzi walabo abamfuna nge-
ntshiseko (Kol 3:24; Heb 11:6)
Kufanele silazise ithuba elimangalisayo lokukhonza uNkulunkulu manje (Mat 24:14)
Sisesimweni sokuma ngasohlangothini lobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu futhi simemezele uMbuso naphezu kokuphikiswa
Futhi singase sibe nethuba lokukhonza njengengxenye ‘yesisekelo’ ‘somhlaba omusha’ (Isa 51:16; 65:17)
Umuntu akufanele abe ‘olunge ngokweqile’ ngenxa nje yokuthi uye wamukela ukubusa kukaNkulunkulu futhi uNkulunkulu
uye wambusisa ngomusa ukuba abone izinjongo zaKhe (Shu 7:16; Mat 7:1, 2)
Abagcini bobuqotho abajabulayo kufanele ngaso sonke isikhathi bazame ukuba usizo kwabanye, bebheke phambili enjabulwe-
ni yokuphila ngaphansi kokubusa kukaNkulunkulu, okuyohlangabezana nazo zonke izinto esizidingayo (Fil 4:19)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudinge-
ka ifundwe)
No. 24-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUMELANA NOMOYA WEZWE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Engxenyeni yesithathu engezansi, bonisa izici zomoya wezwe ngokuvula futhi usebenzise incwadi Ukubonisana,
amakhasi 374-7. Hlanganisa iphuzu ngalinye ngokucophelela, ukhulumele imibhalo ekhonjiwe futhi usebenzise
izikhombo ezengeziwe ukuze ugcizelele amaphuzu akho
UMOYA WEZWE LIKASATHANE UMELENE NOMOYA KANKULUNKULU, NOMA AMANDLA ASEBE-
NZAYO (7 imiz.)
Akunakwenzeka ukuba nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu ube ‘unomoya wezwe’ (1Ko 2:12)
Umoya wezwe ungamandla ashukumisayo obugovu nawobubi ashukumisa izwe lomphakathi wesintu esingalu-
ngile
Labo abanomoya wezwe banezimo zengqondo ezithile eziyisisekelo ezivamile kulesimiso sezinto uSathane
angunkulunkulu waso (rs-ZU 373)
Umoya wezwe likaSathane uhlanganisa ukuzonda iqiniso, imisebenzi yenyama, nokuphikisana nazo zonke izi-
ndlela zikaJehova ezilungile (Gal 5:19-21; 2Ti 3:1-5)
Bonke abakhulekeli bakaJehova kumelwe bamelane nomoya wezwe nenkambo yokuziphatha oyibangelayo (1Jo
2:15)
Bahlakulela izithelo zomoya ongcwele kaNkulunkulu (Gal 5:22, 23)
AmaKristu ‘awakhulumi okwezwe’ (1Jo 4:1-6; w84-ZU 4/15 19  ̊11-13 [w83 10/15 19  ̊11-13])
USATHANE USEBENZISA IZWE ELIBI UKUZE APHIKISANE NOKUKHULEKELA KWEQINISO KUKAJE-
HOVA (12 imiz.)
Ingxenye engokwenkolo yezwe elibi yiBabiloni Elikhulu, elisetshenziswa uMkhohlisi Omkhulu ukuze aphuphu-
thekise futhi adide isintu
Zonke izizwe ziye zadakwa yiwayini lalo lezimfundiso zamanga nobufebe obungokomoya (IsAm 18:2-4; re-ZU
261-4)
Isimiso sezentengiselwano esihahayo, noma amabhizinisi amakhulu, singenye ingxenye yezwe likaSathane elibi
Usebenzisa lengxenye ukuze athuthukise umoya wokuhaha nokuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo ezinhliziyweni
zabantu (Luk 12:15; pe-ZU 210  ̊9)
Ingxenye yezombangazwe yezwe likaSathane empeleni iyolwa neWundlu likaNkulunkulu ngesikhathi esifanele
(IsAm 17:12-14)
Amandla okugadla esimiso sezombangazwe ayisimiso sezempi esinobudlova, esiye sabangela ukubulawa oku-
ngenangqondo kwezigidi
Lonke izwe likaSathane lonakele ngokuziphatha (Rom 1:24-27)
Izinceku zikaJehova ngokusobala azinakuba nangxenye kulo
USathane uye waphuphuthekisa izizwe eqinisweni leZwi likaNkulunkulu, futhi zihamba ebumnyameni obu-
ngokwengqondo (Efe 4:17-19, qhathanisa neNW; pe-ZU 210  ̊10)
Imidlalo, ukuzilibazisa, nokuzijabulisa kuye kwavunyelwa ukuba kuwohloke kube imisebenzini eyonakalisayo,
yokuncintisana, futhi ngokuvamile elimazayo
Okwenezela kulokhu kweqisa ukuminza nokuphuza ngokweqile, amadili anomsindo, nokuziphatha okuxeke-
thile (1Pet 4:3, 4; g89-ZU 11/8 3-11; g84-ZU 4/8 16-19 [g83 10/8 6-8]; w79-ZU 12/15 3-4 [w79 6/1 3-4])
USathane usebenzisa zonke izimo ezinjalo zomoya wezwe ekulweni kwakhe nabantu bakaNkulunkulu nokukhu-
lekela kwabo uJehova (1Jo 5:19; IsAm 12:9, 12, 17; rs-ZU 374)
IZIPHI EZINYE ZEZICI ZOMOYA WEZWE ESIDINGA UKUZIQAPHELA? (rs-ZU 374-7) (22 imiz.)
Ukugqashula emoyeni wezwe kudinga ukufinyelela emnyombweni walendaba
Umuntu kumelwe abonakalise umoya kaNkulunkulu nothando lwangempela ngezindlela zakhe (1Ko 2:12)
Kubalulekile ukuqaphela izimo zengqondo ezibonisa umoya wezwe:
(1) Ukwenza lokho umuntu afuna ukukwenza, ngaphandle kokucabangela intando kaNkulunkulu (rs-ZU
337-40; w85-ZU 11/1 5-7)
(2) Ukusabela ezimweni ngesisekelo sokuqhosha
(3) Ukubonakalisa isimo sengqondo sokuphikisana negunya (g74-ZU 8/8 4-5 [g74 2/8 4-5]; w72-ZU 11/1 483-7,
490-1 [w72 261-4, 268-9])
(4) Ukuvumelana ngokukhululekile nezinkanuko zenyama enesono (w85-ZU 8/15 13-14; w79-ZU 12/15 6-8 [w79
6/1 6-8])
(5) Ukuvumela ukuphila komuntu ukuba kubuswe inkanuko yokuba nalokho umuntu akubonayo (w88-ZU
8/15 4-7)
(6) Ukugabisa ngezinto umuntu anazo nalokho athi ukufezile (w86-ZU 7/15 13  ̊18)
(7) Ukuveza imizwelo yomuntu ngenkulumo embi nezenzo zobudlova (w83-ZU 7/15 7 [w83 2/1 7])
(8) Ukusekela amathemba omuntu nalokho akwesabayo kulokho abantu abangakwenza
(9) Ukunikeza abantu nezinto inhlonipho yokukhulekela engekaNkulunkulu
No. 25-ZU
9/07THOLA INJABULO YEQINISO EKULALELENI UJEHOVA (4 imiz.)
UJehova wenza izinhliziyo zethu zijabule ngokusifundisa iZwi lakhe nangokusisiza ukuba silandele izimiso za-
khe ezilungile zokuphila
Unikeza abantu bakhe izibusiso ezinkulu ngokubasebenzisa ukuba basindise ukuphila kwabanye ngokushu-
mayela nangokufundisa ngeZwi lakhe
Abalalelayo ngokuvamile bavikelekile emiphumeleni elimazayo yabangane ababi, ukuphila okuxekethile, uku-
sebenzisa ugwayi, ukusebenzisa kabi imilaliso, nobudakwa (IzA 10:22)
Bazigcina bematasa futhi bejabula ngokushumayela izindaba ezinhle
Izwe elibi lizobhujiswa, liyohamba nabo bonke abalisekelayo nabanomoya walo (2Pet 3:7, 12; 1Jo 2:17)
Bonke abangabezwe likaSathane bayaqhubeka nesono futhi abakufanelekeli ukuphila okungenasiphelo (1Jo
3:8)
Abantwana bakaNkulunkulu bayamzonda ngempela uSathane, imisebenzi yakhe emibi, nalo lonke izwe elibi, ko-
dwa bayakuthanda ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu
Ngosizo lukaJehova bazimisele ukulwa nomoya walelizwe futhi bawunqobe (1Jo 4:4, 6)
Labo abalindele amazulu amasha nomhlaba omusha bayovumelanisa ukuphila kwabo nemiyalo yomoya omu-
hle kaNkulunkulu neZwi lakhe (2Pet 3:13, 14, 17, 18; 1Jo 3:9, 10)
Labo abathanda uJehova bayophila ukuphila okuhlanzekile, okuqondile ukuze bathole ukuvunyelwa nguye fu-
thi bathole ukuphila okuphakade ezweni lakhe elisha lokulunga (IzA 2:21)
Njengeqembu labantu, bahamba wonke umhlaba beshumayela futhi befundisa ngezindaba ezinhle ukuze na-
banye bathole indlela eya ekuphileni (Mat 28:19, 20)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedINGABE UNKULUNKULU UKUBHEKA NJENGOBALULEKILE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Zama ukujulisa ukwazisa ngokuthi uJehova unesithakazelo kumuntu ngamunye kithi. Sibonisa isithakazelo kuye
ngokutadisha iZwi lakhe nangokukhuleka njalo.—Jak 4:8
IMITHETHO YENDAWO YONKE IFAKAZELA UKUTHI UNKULUNKULU UNESITHAKAZELO ESINTWINI
(8 imiz.)
Abanye abantu baye bathi uNkulunkulu ufile—okungukuthi, ukude kakhulu, akanasithakazelo ezindabeni zabantu
Abanye baye bathi uNkulunkulu angase abe naso isithakazelo esithile endaweni yonke kodwa akazehlisi ukuze ezwe
umuntu ngamunye noma abe nesithakazelo somuntu siqu kuye
Kunezinto eziningi esizibonayo nsuku zonke ezifakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu unesithakazelo somuntu siqu futhi
ezibonisa injongo ecacile (ce 129-41; lp 98-107)
Lezinto zikhomba eqinisweni lokuthi injongo kaNkulunkulu iyafezeka ngokuqhubekayo ukuze kuzuze isintu
Imithetho yemvelo ibalulekile ekuqhubekeni kokuphila emhlabeni
Ukusebenza kwemithetho yemvelo okungaguquki, okuvumelanayo kufakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu akakude
Izazi zesayensi, ezinye zazo ezingase ziwuhleke usulu umqondo wokholo, kwazona zinokholo ekuthembekeni
nasekungaguqukini kwemithetho yemvelo ebusa indawo yonke
Imithetho ebusa ukuzalana yembula injongo kaNkulunkulu enhle ngesintu
Imithetho yokuziphatha nayo ayinakugwenywa futhi ibalulekile ekuphileni okunenjongo
Imiphumela emibi kakhulu iye yavela ngenxa yokwephula imithetho yokuziphatha (Funda eyabaseRoma 1:
26-31)
Ubuzenzisi obungokwenkolo buwuhlobo olwenyanyeka kakhulu lokwephulwa kwemithetho kaNkulunkulu yo-
kuziphatha (2Ti 3:5)
UNkulunkulu uhlose ukuletha yonke indalo ehlakaniphile ekuvumelaneni okuphelele nemithetho yakhe yokuzipha-
tha ukuze ingaphinde yephulwe
Ngokucabangela imithetho kaNkulunkulu yendawo yonke kuba sobala ukuthi unesithakazelo esintwini, kodwa si-
ngasho ukuthi ucabangela umuntu ngamunye?
INGABE UNKULUNKULU ANGANIKEZA UMUNTU NGAMUNYE UKUNAKEKELA? (12 imiz.)
KuNkulunkulu, “lowo nalowo kithi” ubalulekile (IzE 17:26, 27)
UKristu ‘wezwa ukufa ngenxa yabo bonke’ (Heb 2:9)
Ngomhlatshelo wakhe, uKristu wathenga isintu, esasikade ‘sithengisiwe phansi kwesono’ (Rom 7:14)
Abantu ngabanye badinga ukubuyiselwa ebuhlotsheni obuhle noNkulunkulu
UJesu unegunya lokwahlulela abantu (Funda uJohane 5:27-30)
 ́
Ingabe umuntu kufanele azizwe emubi kakhulu, esedlulele ngal e, ukuba angaba nethemba lokuthola usizo kuNku-
lunkulu? (wZU90 2/15 23  ̊4, 5)
Cabangela uIsaya 1:18 nokuhlangenwe nakho kukamphostoli uPawulu (1Ti 1:15, 16)
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, kuyiphutha elibi ukuba umuntu acabange ukuthi angazuza umusa kaNkulunkulu nge-
nxa nje yokuthi “muhle” noma ‘wenza imisebenzi yamandla’ (Mat 7:22, 23; Mar 10:18; Rom 3:10; 4:2, 3; 10:1-3)
Kubantu abaphelelwe yithemba singathi uthando lukaJehova kulabo abamfuna ngenkuthalo lukhulu kakhulu ku-
nanoma iluphi uthando esingalubonisa (Funda eyabaseRoma 8:38, 39)
UJesu, ngesikhathi esemhlabeni, wabonisa ukuthi wayenesimo sengqondo esifanayo sothando ngesintu (Mar 1:
40, 41)
Ukuze sithole ukuqonda ngoNkulunkulu nezindlela zakhe, kumelwe sibe nosizo oluvela kuye
Uvula ingqondo yomuntu ukuba aqonde (Joh 6:44)
Akekho ongaqonda uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kosizo lomoya wakhe (1Ko 2:11, 12)
Isithakazelo sikaNkulunkulu kumuntu ngamunye sibonakala elungiselelweni laKhe lovuko (LmnZU 20-1; lp 116-19)
Ukuze amvuse umuntu, uNkulunkulu
kumelwe abe nemininingwane yalowomuntu ephelele ukuze lowomuntu
 ́
abe nobuntu obufana ns e nalobo ayenabo ngaphambi kokuba afe
UNkulunkulu uyolwenza ngoKristu uvuko, naye ngokwakhe owavuswa
Njengoba uNkulunkulu enesithakazelo kithi sonke, singalindela ukuba ahlele izinto ukuze sazi ukuthi izinjongo za-
khe ziyini. Kodwa ingabe ukwenzile lokho?
SINGALAZI IQINISO ELIPHATHELENE NONKULUNKULU (12 imiz.)
UJesu watshela abafundi bakhe ukuthi babengase balazi iqiniso (Funda uJohane 8:31, 32)
Wayazi ukuthi wayenalo iqiniso ngoba wayekade enoNkulunkulu izinkulungwane zeminyaka ngaphambi koku-
ba eze emhlabeni
Abaphostoli babelazi iqiniso ngoba balifunda emiBhalweni YesiHeberu nakuKristu
Singalazi iqiniso ngoba sinemibhalo yabaphostoli nabangane babo
Umlando weBhayibheli ubalulekile ukuze sithole umbono kaNkulunkulu futhi siqonde izimiso zakhe
IBhayibheli, njengoba labhalwa abantu ngaphansi kokuphefumlelwa uNkulunkulu futhi liphathelene nokuphila
No. 26-ZU
7/92kwamadoda nabesifazane, lijabulisa ngokwengeziwe, liyakhanga, futhi liyasebenziseka ezimweni ezingokoqobo
kunanjengoba belingaba njalo ukuba lalibhalwe izingelosi
UNkulunkulu wengamela ukukhiqizwa kwalo kuzo zonke izici futhi waqaphela noma ikuphi ukunganembi
noma imibono nje yabantu (siZU 10  ̊19, 20)
EBhayibhelini sinamazwi kaJesu, owayengufakazi weqiniso leZwi likaNkulunkulu
IBhayibheli liye lalondolozwa njengeqiniso likaNkulunkulu (gmZU 12-24)
IBhayibheli liphelele ngokuthi linika umuntu onokholo konke akudingayo ukuze ahlome ngokuphelele (2Ti 3:15-17)
Liphelele futhi ngomqondo wokuthi lanele ukunikeza ukholo oluholela ensindisweni
Nakuba iBhayibheli liyindlela uNkulunkulu akhulumisana ngayo nathi, singakhuluma noNkulunkulu ngomkhuleko
Umuntu namuhla kufanele amqaphele uNkulunkulu futhi aye kuye ngoKristu, evuma ukuthi uyisoni esidinga
usizo (wZU90 1/15 4, 6)
Yiziphi izinto ezingakhulekelwa ngokufanelekile? (Funda eyoku-1 Johane 5:14)
Noma yini ephathelene nobuhlobo bethu noNkulunkulu noma engasithinta ngokomoya
Izimpendulo zingeza ziyisiqondiso esivela eBhayibhelini, kubafowethu, nasezenzweni zikaNkulunkulu
Kumelwe siqinisele ekukhulekeni
Njengokulindelekile kuphakama imibuzo emibili: Ingabe thina ngabanye sinalo ukholo lokuthi uNkulunkulu unesi-
thakazelo kithi? Ingabe uyoyifeza injongo yakhe?
KUSUKELA EKUQALENI UNKULUNKULU UBESEBENZA NGOKUQHUBEKAYO EKUGCWALISENI INJO-
NGO YAKHE ENHLE (13 imiz.)
Umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu oqhubekayo ngeke ubonakale ngaphandle kokholo
Labo ababheka izinto ngaphandle kokholo abakuboni ukufezeka kwenjongo kaNkulunkulu—kubo izinto zibona-
kala zingokuphambene ngempela
Ngo-66 C.E. amaRoma ngaphansi kukaCestius Gallus azungeza iJerusalema ase eyahoxa. Labo ababeseJerusa-
lema ababenokholo emazwini kaJesu babaleka; labo abangenalo ukholo bahlala. Kamuva, amabutho amaRo-
ma abuya futhi ababhubhisa labo abahlala (Luk 21:20, 21)
 ́
Abantu abanokholo babona ngal e kokubukeka kwangaphandle okukhohlisayo; ‘banokuqiniseka ngezinto ezithe-
njwayo, baneqiniso ngezinto ezingenakubonwa’ umuntu ovamile ongenakholo (Heb 11:1)
UJehova uye wazinika isikhathi efundisa abantu ngohulumeni wakhe futhi ebeka isisekelo sokholo
UMninimandla onke uye walungiselela lezinto ezidingekile:
(1) Ulwazi ngezimiso zikahulumeni wakhe
(2) Ukubonakaliswa kwezimfanelo zakhe
(3) Ukubonakaliswa okungenaphutha kukaMesiya, iNkosi
UNkulunkulu wakhetha isizwe sakwaIsrayeli ukuze sibe isibonelo sezimiso zakhe nezimfanelo
Umlando wakwaIsrayeli ubonisa ukuthi yini eyenzekayo lapho imithetho kaNkulunkulu ilalelwa noma inga-
lalelwa; umlando wezwe wembula umphumela otholwa yilabo abangenawo umthetho waphezulu (Efe 4:17-19)
UIsrayeli wakhethwa ngenxa yothando lukaNkulunkulu ngoAbrahama (Dut 7:7, 8)
UNkulunkulu wayezinikeza nezinye izizwe izidingo kodwa wayengasebenzelani nazo
UJehova futhi wasebenzisa amadoda athembekile angamaJuda ukuze abhale imiBhalo YesiHeberu (Funda eya-
baseRoma 3:1, 2)
UNkulunkulu wayeqondisa izindaba ukuze alungiselele “imbewu,” elungiselela ukubonakaliswa kwayo okusoba-
la futhi enza imifuziselo yezinto ezaziseza (Gen 3:15)
Phakathi nenkonzo yakhe emhlabeni, uJesu wakhetha ngokucophelela labo ababezoba seduze kakhulu naye eMbu-
sweni wakhe
Ukuqeqeshwa nokuvivinywa kwalaba abangu-144 000 phakathi neminyaka engu-1 900 edlule kuye kwafakaze-
la ukuthi labo abakhethwayo bangabantu abayothembeka kuze kube phakade (IsAm 14:1-4)
Kuqinisekisiwe ukuthi kuyoba nababusi abanesihe ‘bomhlaba omusha’ (2Pet 3:13)
UKristu ngokwakhe wavivinywa kuzo zonke izici, futhi uyakuqonda ukwakheka kwabantu nezinkinga (Heb
4:15)
Njengoba kunombuso wasezulwini, kumelwe kube khona ababuswayo abasemhlabeni (wsZU 164-8; lp 140-3)
Kumelwe kube nabayosinda ekubhujisweni kwalesimiso sezinto esonakele (IsAm 7:9, 14)
Abasindile bayohlanganiswa futhi bakwazi ukufundisa nezigidi eziye zavuswa
UNkulunkulu unesithakazelo ezigidini eziyizinkulungwane eziye zaphila ngaphambili (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:9)
Singalitadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu futhi kufanele silitadishe futhi sikhonze uJehova ngenkuthalo, sibonise ukwa-
zisa ngesithakazelo sakhe kithi futhi sibheke phambili ekuphileni ngaphansi kukahulumeni woMbuso wakhe
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona
yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUQALISA UMSHADO NGESIQALO ESIHLE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ukwaziswa okulolu hlaka kutholakala ezahlukweni 1-3 zencwadi ethi Imfihlo Yenjabulo Yomkhaya. Nokho,
ungazifundeli ngokuqondile izilaleli encwadini. Ukwaziswa kufanele kube kusha futhi kuhambisane nesikhathi
ngokuba usebenzise okunye ukwaziswa kwamuva. Vula njalo eBhayibhelini, futhi ulifunde ngokuqondile njenge-
liyigunya lakho
QAPHELA UKUBALULEKA KWELUNGISELELO LOMKHAYA (4 imiz.)
Izidingo eziningi zabantu zeneliswa eqenjini lomkhaya (Shu 4:9-12; qokomisa ubuhlobo obuseduze babazali naba-
ntwana)
UNkulunkulu wayenenjongo enhle ngokusungula ilungiselelo lomkhaya (Gen 1:27, 28; 2:15)
Umlando ubonisa ukubaluleka komkhaya, ngisho nokusinda kwesizwe sisonke
Kunomoya owandayo manje osongela umkhaya (g83 5/22 14
UKUKHETHA UMNGANE OZOKWENZA UMSHADO UJABULISE (9 imiz.)
Iseluleko sikaJehova siyisisekelo somshado ojabulisayo (Mat 7:24-27)
Ngisho nalabo asebeshadile kakade bangazuza ekubukezweni kwamaphuzu; kungasiza emshadweni wabo siqu
futhi kubahlomisele kangcono ukuba basize abanye
Ukuze umshado wakho ube ngojabulisayo, zazi wena nezidingo zakho lapho ukhetha umngane womshado (gZU84
3/8 28-32 [g83 9/22 16-19]; gZU84 4/8 25-8 [g83 10/8 20-2]; ypZU 236-41)
Kunemibuzo okufanele uzibuze yona ukuze uthole izizathu zakho zokushada: ‘Yini engiyifunayo emshadwe-
ni? Ziyini izidingo zami—ezingokwenyama, ezingokomzwelo, ezingokomoya? Ziyini izindinganiso zami, imi-
gomo yami nezindlela zami zokuyifinyelela?’
Ukungafanelani kuyisizathu sokungajabuli emishadweni eminingi (g85 7/22 29)
Imibuzo okumelwe icatshangelwe mayelana nokufanelana ihlanganisa lokhu: Hlobo luni lomsebenzi oyokwe-
nziwa indoda? Niyohlalaphi? Ingakanani imali edingekayo ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo ezingokoqo-
bo? Ubani oyosingatha ukuhlelwa kwendlela yokusebenzisa imali? Ingabe umfazi kuyodingeka asebenze? Iyi-
ni imizwa yomuntu ngamunye ngokuqondene nobulili, abantwana, ubuhlobo nabasemzini, njalonjalo? (IzA
15:22)
Izizinda ezifanayo ziwusizo ekufanelaneni
Uthando loqobo alufani nokuthatheka (ypZU 242-51)
‘Ngingamshintsha’—isimo sengqondo okumelwe sigwenywe
IZIBOPHO OKUFANELE ZENZIWE EMSHADWENI (10 imiz.)
Kudingeka uziqonde izibopho ezihilelekile emshadweni (Gen 2:23, 24)
Lokho owesifazane okumelwe akucabangele lapho ekhetha indoda ayoyigana: ‘Ingabe ngizimisele ukuba ibe
yinhloko yami?’
Lokho indoda okumelwe ikucabangele lapho ikhetha umfazi: ‘Ingabe ngimthanda njengoba ngizithanda mina?’
Isibopho esisekelwe othandweni nasenhloniphweni siyohlala ukwedlula ukuthatheka
Ezinye izici ezibalulekile okumelwe zicatshangelwe ngaphambi kokushada
Akukhona ukubukeka kwangaphandle okubalulekile kodwa yilokho umuntu ayikho ‘kumuntu osithekileyo
wenhliziyo’ (1Pet 3:4; 1Sam 16:7; ypZU 255, 258-60)
Ukushada nothile ‘oseNkosini’ kubalulekile (1Kor 7:39; Dut 7:3, 4; wZU89 11/1 18-22)
 ́
Bala izindleko ngaphambi kokwenza isibopho esingathi s ına njengomshado (Luk 14:28, 29)
 ́
Uma ukungafani okungathi s ına kuqhubeka, kungaba ngcono ukukunqamula ukuqomisana (ypZU 256-7)
Kubalulekile ukulalela iseluleko sabantu abadala (Job 12:12; IzA 3:5, 6)
USHINTSHO NGOKUVAMILE LUYADINGEKA NGEMVA KOMSHADO (4 imiz.)
Kuhle ukuqaphela ukuthi ushintsho lungase ludingeke ukuze umShumayeli 4:9, 10 agcwaliseke ngokuphelele
Ekwenzeni kanjalo, kudingeka ukuzivumelanisa nezimo, ukuzimisela ukuthobeka
Qaphela ukuthi awuwedwa ekwenzeni ushintsho; nobabili niyobe nilwenza ngenxa yothando
Ukucabangela izidingo zomngane womshado ezingokobulili nemibono yakhe kuyokusiza ukuba wenze ushi-
ntsho kulowomkhakha futhi ugweme ubugovu (gZU83 2/8 5-6 [g82 8/8 5-6])
UKUBHEKANA NOKUNGEZWANI EBUHLOTSHENI BOMSHADO (12 imiz.)
Abekho abantu ababili abayovumelana kukho konke
Ukungapheleli kuyobangela ukungezwani, futhi kumelwe sibamukele futhi sibhekane nobuthakathaka bom-
ngane wethu womshado (IzA 19:11)
Kuwukungabi namusa nokungahlakaniphi ukuqhathanisa kabi umngane wethu womshado nabanye
Ezinye izazi zokusebenza kwengqondo zanamuhla zitusa ukuba imibhangqwana ixabane ukuze iveze ukunga-
fani kwayo, kodwa iBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi iseluleko sazo asihlakaniphile (IzA 17:14)
No. 27-ZU
9/98Ukugcina ukukhulumisana kuvulekile phakathi kwabangane bomshado kuyisihluthulelo sokuxazulula izinkinga
(gZU86 1/8 3-5)
Kunendlela elungile nengalungile yokuveza izinkinga (IzA 18:13)
Ngezinye izikhathi umngane womshado angase abe nokucindezeleka okumelwe kuqondwe futhi kucatshange-
lwe (IzA 17:17)
Isikhwele sinezingozi ekukhulumisaneni okunokuthula (IzA 14:30)
Ngezinye izikhathi abangaphandle bangase babe usizo ekuxazululeni ukungezwani
Ukuzazisa kuphazamisa ukukhulumisana nokuxazululwa kwezinkinga, kodwa ukuzazisa kuyaphela uma si-
khumbula ubuncane bethu futhi sibe nesimo sokuba namahlaya
Isimiso esiqondisayo ekubhekaneni nezinkinga kumelwe sibe ukuthi, “Ningaphindiseli okubi ngokubi” (Rom 12:
17; 1Pet 2:23)
Thembeka kuwe ngokwakho nasezimisweni zokwenza okulungile
Ukuphindisela ngokuhle ngokuvamile kunqanda “okubi” (Rom 12:21)
BUKEZA IMIBHALO ESEBHOKISINI LOKUBUKEZA ELISEKHASINI 38 ENCWADINI ETHI INJABULO
YOMKHAYA (6 imiz.)
Ngokusebenzisa lezimiso, kufanele ukwazi ukuqalisa umshado ngesiqalo esihle
Yiba nombono oqondile ngaso sonke isikhathi. Gwema ukulindela okungekhona okungokoqobo. Gcina isimo
sakho sokuba namahlaya. Vumelana nezimo. Mazi ngempela umngane wakho
Ngesibusiso sikaJehova, ungaba nomshado ovuthiwe, oyohlala njalo, futhi ojabulisayo

No. 27-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45BONISA INHLONIPHO NOTHANDO EMSHADWENI WAKHO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ukwaziswa okulolu hlaka kutholakala ezahlukweni 3 no-11 zencwadi ethi Imfihlo Yenjabulo Yomkhaya. No-
kho, ungazifundeli ngokuqondile izilaleli encwadini. Ukwaziswa kufanele kube kusha futhi kuhambisane nesi-
khathi ngokuba usebenzise okunye ukwaziswa kwamuva. Vula njalo eBhayibhelini, futhi ulifunde ngokuqondile
njengeliyigunya lakho
INHLONIPHO NOTHANDO YIZICI EZIBALULEKILE EMSHADWENI OPHUMELELAYO (4 imiz.)
Cishe sonke siyawukhathalela umshado (owethu siqu noma owalabo esibathandayo); senza kahle ngokucabange-
la indlela ebaluleke ngayo inhlonipho nothando emshadweni ophumelelayo
Inhlonipho ingase ifunwe ngenkani, kodwa ukuze isuke enhliziyweni yomunye, kufanele ifanelekelwe
UJesu wazuza inhlonipho njengomfundisi ngendlela yakhe yokufundisa (Mat 7:28, 29)
Make sihlole indima yendoda ngokuqondene nenhlonipho emshadweni
Umfazi utshelwa ukuba ahloniphe umyeni wakhe; indoda ingayizuza kanjani inhlonipho? (Efe 5:33)
IZINDLELA INDODA EZUZA NGAZO INHLONIPHO EJULILE YOMKAYO (14 imiz.)
Ngokusebenzisa ubunhloko ngokufanelekile
Izibonelo zobunhloko bothando zitholakala ebunhlokweni bukaJehova kuKristu nasebunhlokweni bukaKristu
ebandleni (Mat 11:29; Heb 10:7; wZU89 5/15 11-13)
Indoda kufanele ilandele lezibonelo (Efe 5:25-29, 33)
Lapho indoda ingumashiqela, ukuzithoba komfazi kuyo kungaba nzima
Uma indoda yenqaba ukuhola futhi yenze izinqumo ezidingekayo, ukuzithoba komfazi kuba nzima futhi anga-
ze azizwe ephoqelekile ukuba azibambele mathupha ukuze izinto zilunge
Indoda kufanele ingaguquguquki futhi iqine ekwenzeni izinqumo kodwa kufanele icabangele imibono yo-
mkayo
Ngokuba umondli omuhle
Indoda kufanele imnakekele ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo umkayo (1Ti 5:8)
Ngokulungiselela izinto ezibonakalayo, indoda akumelwe yeqise bese iba ngethanda izinto ezibonakalayo, ihi-
lela wonke umkhaya wayo kulologibe (1Ti 6:7-10)
Kumelwe ilinganisele ukunakekela kwayo ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo nesidingo esibaluleke kakhulu selungi-
selelo elingokomoya lomkhaya wayo (1Ti 6:17-19; wZU83 11/15 21 [w83 6/1 18])
Ngokubonisa umkayo udumo njengalokhu owesifazane eyisitsha esibuthakathaka, (1Pet 3:7)
Ebuhlotsheni bobulili (wZU83 11/15 25 [w83 6/1 21])
Ngokulondoloza inhlanzeko yomuntu siqu
Ngokungalokothi imphathe njengophansi ngoba nje ebuthakathaka ngokomzimba (Efe 5:28; wZU89 5/15 13-
14; wZU86 8/15 16 isig. 12)
Ibonise ukukuqaphela ukwakheka kwakhe ngokomzwelo nesifiso sakhe sokuzizwa edingekile, ukukhulunyi-
swa, ukukhunjulwa, ukutshelwa ukuthi uyathandwa (wZU89 7/15 31; wZU83 11/15 23 [w83 6/1 20])
Kodwa kuthiwani ngomfazi? Futhi uthando—esikhulume ngalo njengolubalulekile—lungenaphi?
INDODA ITSHELWA UKUBA ITHANDE UMKAYO, KODWA UMFAZI KUMELWE ENZE NGENDLELA YO-
THANDO UMA LOKHU INDODA IZOKWENZA NGOKUSUKA ENHLIZIYWENI YAYO (8 imiz.)
Kufanele abe umsizi, asekele umyeni wakhe ezinqumweni zakhe
Umfazi kufanele azifundise ukukwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yakhe yobufazi (IzA 31:27)
Kufanele anakekele ukubukeka kwakhe siqu, nokho akhumbule ukuthi ukuhloba okubaluleke kakhulu yisimo
esihle sangaphakathi (IzA 31:20, 26, 30)
Umfazi, njengendoda, kumelwe abonise ukulunga nokucabangela ezindabeni zobulili (Heb 13:4; wZU86 8/15 16
isig. 13; wZU82 2/1 27-30 [w81 8/15 13-15])
IZIHIBE UMFAZI OKUFANELE AZIGWEME UKUZE ATHANDEKE (6 imiz.)
Umfazi ophendukela ekukhaleni ukuze athole lokho akufunayo ulahlekelwa inhlonipho yomyeni wakhe (Hl 14:
16, 17)
Umfazi obeleselayo ulimaza umshado wakhe futhi ubulala uthando (Hl 16:16)
Umfazi ofuna ukuba umyeni wakhe axoxe naye akufanele amvimbele ngendlela axoxa ngayo (Shu 3:7)
Umfazi onendoda engakholwayo akumelwe ayishumayeze ngokweqile kodwa kumelwe avumele ukuziphatha
kwakhe kubonise indlela yobuKristu (IzA 16:24; 25:11; wZU90 8/15 23; wZU90 2/15 26-7)
No. 28-ZU
9/98UTHANDO LUYISIBOPHO SOBUNYE EMSHADWENI (11 imiz.)
IBhayibheli linikeza incazelo ephefumlelwe yothando (1Kor 13:4-8)
Khulisani uthando
Uthando, njengesicubu, luqina ngokusetshenziswa
Yandisani uthando ngokuluhlanganyela
Ukwenelisa umngane wakho womshado kukhulisa uthando
Ngokuziphatha okuhlelwe ngenhla, uthando lungakhula kungakhathaliseki ukuthi umngane wakho womshado
uyikholwa elingumKristu noma cha
QHUBEKA UKHULISA INHLONIPHO NOTHANDO EMSHADWENI WAKHO (2 imiz.)
Madoda, bonisani uthando nenhlonipho emshadweni wenu (1Pet 3:8, 9)
Ungabi nomuzwa wokuthi kwanele nje ukubuya nomholo ekhaya
Qhubeka ujulisa ukumazisa kwakho umkakho
Zama ukungawanaki amaphutha akhe futhi uthethelele ubuthaka bakhe (Kol 3:12-14)
Bafazi, hlakulelani inhlonipho ejulile ngabayeni benu
Yiba umphelelisi wangempela wakhe, umsekele futhi umsize emthwalweni wakhe
Hlakulela ukwazisa ngaye, futhi usebenzele ukumenza ajabule
Ngalendlela, wena nawo wonke umkhaya niyojabula (IzE 20:35)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-

No. 28-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45IMITHWALO YEMFANELO NEMIVUZO YOBUZALI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ukwaziswa okulolu hlaka kutholakala ezahlukweni 5-8 zencwadi ethi Imfihlo Yenjabulo Yomkhaya. Nokho,
ungazifundeli ngokuqondile izilaleli encwadini. Ukwaziswa kufanele kube kusha futhi kuhambisane nesikhathi
ngokuba usebenzise okunye ukwaziswa kwamuva. Vula njalo eBhayibhelini, futhi ulifunde ngokuqondile njenge-
liyigunya lakho
UMNTWANA ONGUMUNTU—KUSUKELA EKUKHULELWENI KUYA ESIKHATHINI SOKUZALWA (12 imiz.)
Sonke siye saba abantwana futhi kungenzeka manje sesinabethu; yini esiyaziyo ngalesimangaliso esivela ku-
Nkulunkulu?
Kunamaqiniso amangalisayo nezinto ezisalokhu ziyizimfihlakalo ngokuzala (Hu 139:16; gZU92 4/8 13-16)
Ukwakheka okuqhubekayo kwehlule nombungu kuyisimangaliso (Hu 139:13, 15; wZU92 8/1 3; gZU92 1/22
14-17)
Kumelwe kwenzeke izinguquko ezimangalisayo ngokushesha ngesikhathi sokuzala (Hu 139:14)
Iziphi izinto ezibalulekile okumelwe zicatshangelwe ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa?
Indlela imikhuba kamama yokudla, ukuphuza, neminye ethinta ngayo umntwana (g89 2/22 9-10)
Izinqumo okumelwe zenziwe ngaphambi kokuba umntwana azalwe
Ukubaluleka kwesimo sasekhaya umntwana ayofikela kuso (gZU88 9/8 6)
Indlela abantwana abangumvuzo ngayo ovela kuJehova nendlela okumelwe banakekelwe ngayo (Hu 127:3)
IZINDIMA EZIFEZWA NGABAZALI (12 imiz.)
Kubalulekile ukuba indima kababa nekamama ivumelane ukuze zilinganiselane kahle (Fil 4:5)
Indima kamama ebucayi
Unakekela izidingo zomntwana ezingokwenyama
Kumelwe anakekele izidingo zomntwana ezingokomzwelo, ikakhulukazi isidingo sothando (1Thes 2:7; gZU87
6/8 27, 30-1 [g87 5/22 7, 10-11])
Indima ebalulekile kababa (gZU87 6/8 28-9 [g87 5/22 8-9])
Ubaba kufanele ahileleke emntwaneni nasekumnakekeleni zisuka nje; indima yakhe iba ebaluleke kakhudlwa-
na njengoba isikhathi sidlula
Unikeza izidingo ezingokwezinto ezibonakalayo nezimfanelo zobudoda eziphelelisa ubuntu bomntwana, ika-
khulukazi uma umntwana engumfana
Unomthwalo wemfanelo wokunikeza ukuqeqesha okungokomoya njengoba umntwana ekhula (Dut 6:6, 7; Efe
6:4)
Kuwumthwalo wemfanelo kababa, ngokubambisana nomama, ukuyala lapho kudingeka, enza kanjalo ngotha-
ndo nangokuhlakanipha (Kol 3:21; Heb 12:7; gZU87 6/8 31 [g87 5/22 11])
Ubaba nomama bangabangane ezindabeni zomkhaya (Shu 4:9)
Banesimo sobunye ekuqeqesheni nasekuyaleni abantwana (IzA 13:10)
Ukuvumelana kudingekile nasemikhayeni yokutholwa (gZU86 1/8 8-9; wZU85 8/1 22-6 [w84 10/15 21-5])
Abazali abahlakaniphile basebenza ndawonye ukuze bakwenze kube lula ngabantwana babo ukubazisa (Efe 6:2)
Abazali basebenza ndawonye ukuze bakhele izingane zabo isimo sasekhaya esinokuthula
Abazali abangabodwa, abanomsebenzi onzima wokuba kokubili “umama” “nobaba,” bangaphumelela ngosizo lu-
kaJehova (wZU81 3/15 23-5, 30-1 [w80 9/15 19-20, 25])
QEQESHANI IZINGANE ZENU KUSUKELA ZISEYIZINSANA (10 imiz.)
Kumelwe kuqalwe zisuka nje! (2Ti 3:15; wZU88 8/1 12-13; wZU88 5/1 6; gZU90 8/22 28)
Ingane ngayinye ihlukile, futhi ukuqeqesha kufanele kuvunyelaniswe nobuntu namakhono ayo ngayinye (wZU88
5/1 5)
Sizani izingane zenu ukuba zikhule, nizinike isikhuthazo njengoba zithuthuka futhi zizama izinto ezintsha
(gZU88 9/8 7-8)
Abazali kudingeka bachazele izingane zabo ngobulili, ikakhulukazi lapho zibuza imibuzo ngabo (Fushanisa;
gZU92 2/22 3-8)
Kusukela ebuntwaneni kuqhubeke, izingane zifunda esibonelweni sabanye futhi zibalingise
Kubalulekile ukuba abazali bangafundisi kahle ngomlomo nje kuphela kodwa futhi babeke izibonelo ezinhle
zokuziphatha (gZU87 6/8 31 [g87 5/22 11])
Nikezani izingane zenu isimiso sezindinganiso eziyonamathela kuso njengoba ziphila ukuphila kwazo ezweni elo-
nakele (Efe 4:13-15)
No. 29-ZU
9/98UKUBALULEKA KOKUYALA NGOTHANDO (10 imiz.)

Kubalulekile ukuba izingane ziqonde ngokucacile ukuthi ziyini iziqondiso zenu
Lapho niyala, kubalulekile ukuba nizitshele izizathu zalesosiyalo
Lapho niyala izingane zenu, lingisani uJehova, oyala ngothando (IzA 3:12)

Izingane nazo zidinga ukufundiswa, ukulungiswa, nesiqondiso sokuziphatha esivela kubazali

Kumelwe kuqale ziseyizinsana (Mar 10:13-16; 2Ti 3:15)

ngane zabo

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUKHULUMISANA—PHAKATHI KOMKHAYA KANYE NONKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ukwaziswa okulolu hlaka kutholakala ezahlukweni 6, 9, 14-16 zencwadi ethi Imfihlo Yenjabulo Yomkhaya. No-
kho, ungazifundeli ngokuqondile izilaleli encwadini. Ukwaziswa kufanele kube kusha futhi kuhambisane nesi-
khathi ngokuba usebenzise okunye ukwaziswa kwamuva. Vula njalo eBhayibhelini, futhi ulifunde ngokuqondile
njengeliyigunya lakho
BAZALI, GCINANI IMIZILA YOKUKHULUMISANA NEZINGANE ZENU IVULEKILE (12 imiz.)
Kuyini ukukhulumisana? (1Kor 14:9)
Iminyaka yobusha ingaba isikhathi senhlekelele ekukhulumisaneni
Isisekelo sokukhulumisana okuhle noma okubi sibekwa kusukela ziseyizinsana kuqhubeke lapho ukuxoxa ku-
khuthazwa noma kuvinjelwa khona (wZU88 8/1 11-12; wZU85 8/15 22-3
Zazini izidingo zentsha ukuze nihlakulele ukukhulumisana
Ikakhulukazi kuleminyaka yobudala, idinga ukuqondwa nokuhlonishwa njengabantu ngabanye
Kubalulekile kuyo ukuzizwa idingeka futhi yaziswa (gZU88 9/8 9-10)
Idinga inkululeko eyengeziwe, ehilela ukuncishiswa kwemingcele ethile
Izizwa inesidingo esinamandla sabangane abangontanga yayo ngaphandle komkhaya
Ukuze ninikeze iseluleko, qinisekani ukuthi niyasiqonda isimo (wZU86 11/1 23)
Ukuze intsha izizwe ibalulekile futhi iyingxenye yomkhaya, umsebenzi uwusizo (Gal 6:4; Thi 3:14; gZU88 9/8
9-10; gZU83 8/8 9-11 [g83 2/8 9-10])
Dluliselani entsheni isimiso sokuziphatha seBhayibheli njengesiqondiso (Hu 119:9, 63; wZU88 5/1 6; gZU83
8/8 11 [g83 2/8 10])
ZINGANE, KHULUMISANANI NABAZALI BENU FUTHI NIBAZISE (10 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uyala ukuba abazali baziswe (Efe 6:2, 3)
Kungani izingane kufanele zifune ukwenzenjalo? (ypZU 11-17, 42-9)
Izingane kufanele zifune ukukhulumisana nabazali bazo ukuze zizuze inhlakanipho
Ngokuhlangenwe nakho kwazo siqu, izingane ziyazi ukuthi ukuhlakanipha kuzuzwa ngokuhamba kwesi-
khathi
Zikwazi lokhu, futhi zazi ukuthi abazali bazo badala kakhulu, izingane kufanele zikwazise ngokwengeziwe
ukuhlakanipha okukhulu abazali bazo abanakho (IzA 23:22)
Funda ukwamukela igunya lomzali wokutholwa (ypZU 45-9)
Izingane zingafunda nasemkhayeni onomzali ongayedwa (gZU90 7/8 20-2)
Abazali bayaziswa futhi bayajabula lapho izingane zisiza ngemisebenzi yasekhaya, futhi ukukhulumisana kuya-
khuthazwa
Kunomthwalo wemfanelo wokunakekela abazali njengoba beguga (wZU87 6/1 13-18)
Ukwazisa abazali kuhlanganisa ukubanakekela ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo uma lokho kudingekile (Mat 15:
1-6)
Izidingo ezingokomzwelo nezingokomoya nazo kumelwe zilungiselelwe
UKULONDOLOZA UKUKHULUMISANA PHAKATHI KWENDODA NOMFAZI LAPHO SEBEKHULILE FU-
THI IZINGANE ZABO ZINGASAHLALI NABO (10 imiz.)
Ngemva kokuba izingane sezikhulile futhi sezihambile ekhaya, kungase kuphakame izimo ezonakalisa ukuso-
ndelana kukababa nomama
Kunengozi yokungahlaliseki neyokuba nesizungu ngoba izingane sezihambile futhi mncane umsebenzi wokwe-
nziwa
Ukuguga kuletha izinguquko ezingokomzimba; abanye asebegugile bazama ukuba abanobungane kakhulu uku-
ze babonise ukuthi basebasha kunanini
Abanye bazama ukubonisa ukuthi basenamandla ngokobulili, bahileleka ekuthandaneni nabanye abangapha-
ndle komshado, futhi ngezinye izikhathi baze ngisho bafake izehlukaniso futhi bashade kabusha (Mal 2:13-
16; gZU86 7/8 7-10; gZU83 8/8 20-3 [g83 2/22 8-10])
Kunezibusiso eziningi ezilethwa ukuhlala ndawonye ngokwethembeka (gZU83 8/8 11-13 [g83 2/8 11-12])
Hilelekani emisebenzini ejabulisayo engenza ukuphila kwenu kube usizo eminyakeni yamuva—ukusiza aba-
nye, ukukhonza uNkulunkulu, ukuba nezingane ezingokomoya (2Kor 6:11, 12; 1Thes 2:19, 20; Heb 13:16; Jak
1:27; gZU83 8/8 23-4 [g83 2/22 10-12])
ZIGCINENI NIKHULUMISANA NONKULUNKULU UKUZE UMKHAYA WENU UBE NENHLALA-KAHLE
YAPHAKADE (8 imiz.)
Njengoba isikhathi sidlula, ningagxili emicabangweni yesikhathi esidlule kodwa bhekani esikhathini esizayo
Ayini amathemba?
Kwabaningi, ikusasa libonakala liphethe iminyaka embalwa emifushane, bese kuba ukufa
No. 30-ZU
9/98Kulabo abanokholo kuNkulunkulu nabamkhonzayo, ikusasa lisho ukuphila okuphakade
Ngesihlengo, injongo kaNkulunkulu yasekuqaleni yokubeka isintu emhlabeni iyogcwaliseka
Ukuphila emhlabeni oyipharadesi, oyoba nokuthula, ungabi nakugula, nakufa (Mik 4:3, 4; IsAm 21:1-5)
Yini imikhaya okudingeka iyenze manje ukuze ithole lezibusiso?
Tadishani iZwi likaNkulunkulu, iBhayibheli, ngokomuntu ngamunye nanjengomkhaya (wZU86 11/1 25-6)
Philani ngokuvumelana nentando kaJehova, futhi nitshele abanye ngezibusiso zoMbuso kaKristu
Cabangani ukuthi kuyoba nezibusiso ezinjani emhlabeni oyipharadesi ngaleyomikhaya ekhulumisana noNku-
lunkulu neyenza intando yakhe phakade
UKUKHULUMISANA EMKHAYENI KUHOLELA ENJABULWENI NASEKUVUNYELWENI UNKULUNKULU
(5 imiz.)
Imikhaya ayinakukwazi ukukhulumisana uma ingasebenzisi isikhathi ndawonye
Inhloko yomkhaya kumelwe ihlele lesikhathi ngenjongo yokukhulumisana
Kufanele kucatshangelwe ingxoxo eyakhayo (sgZU 78-80)
Kufanele kwenziwe umgomo ukuba umkhaya udle ndawonye
Kufanele kube nesifundo seBhayibheli sasekhaya sasikhathi sonke (wZU86 11/1 25)
Imikhaya kufanele ibe khona emihlanganweni futhi ihlale ndawonye; futhi ijabulele inkonzo ndawonye
Kufanele kube nokuzilibazisa komkhaya kwasikhathi sonke nokushaywa umoya (Shu 3:1, 4)
Asinakukwazi ukuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu uma singakhulumisani naye
UJehova usimema ukuba sikhulumisane naye, sithandaze njalo (Hu 65:2; Jak 4:8)
Ukukhulumisana kuyindlela yokuba nobuhlobo obuhle nabanye: abazali, izingane, amadoda, abafazi, abantu be-
bonke, noNkulunkulu
Kudingekile ukuba sonke sibe abanekhono ekukhulumisaneni futhi siqhubeke sikhulumisana
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 30-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUJABULA NAKUBA SILAMBILE—KUNGENZEKA KANJANI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqaphele ukuthi isimo esilusizi sendlala kulesimiso samanje sibonisa isidingo esiphuthumayo
soMbuso ngendlela engokoqobo. Okubaluleke ngokwengeziwe, isintu siyalamba ngokomoya, kodwa amaKristu
anenala yokudla okungokomoya okutholakalayo
SILAMBILE NOMA CHA, KUFANELE SIKHATHAZEKE NGENDLALA (5 imiz.)
Kuwena, ingabe indlala imane nje iwumuzwa odlulayo, noma ingabe ihlala njalo futhi ibuhlungu ngoba untula
ukudla okungokwenyama okwanele?
Abantu abaningi badla njalo; bakhathazeka kakhulu ngokukhuluphala kunokulamba
Kodwa izigidi namuhla zilamba njalo, ziyagula ngenxa yokungondleki kahle (tpZU 14-15; gmZU 140)
Nakuba engenakukwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga zezwe zendlala, amaKristu kufanele akhathazeke ngendlala
Isiyonke inkinga yendlala ayinakuxazululwa abantu esimisweni samanje (gZU85 6/8 25-6 [g85 5/22 9-10])
Amathemba enguquko yezezitshalo (izinhlobo ezithuthukile zezitshalo zokusanhlamvu) ayabhuntsha nge-
nxa yezifo zezitshalo nezinye izinkinga (g86 11/22 30; gZU81 2/8 7-8 [g80 8/22 7-8])
Izinkinga zezombangazwe nezomnotho ziphazamisa ukuthengwa kokudla kwamanye amazwe nokwabiwa
kwakho (g87 10/22 29)
AmaKristu kumelwe alingise uJesu, sikhathazeke futhi senze okusemandleni ethu (Mat 15:32)
AmaKristu akuqala ahlanganyela ukudla, ikakhulukazi namanye amakholwa ayeswele kodwa hhayi ngenxa
yobuvila noma ukusaphaza imali emikhubeni eyonakele (IzE 2:46)
UJesu wakhuluma ngokulamba okusihilela sonke (Luk 6:21, 25)
KUNGENZEKA KANJANI UKUBA ABALAMBILEYO BAJABULE? (15 imiz.)
Ukuze siwaqonde ngokugcwele amazwi kaJesu, kumelwe siqaphele olunye uhlobo lokulamba—ukulamba oku-
ngokomoya nokufisela ukulunga (wZU86 10/1 8-9; gZU78 8/8 15 [w78 2/15 8])
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi unokuningi angakudla noma cha, umuntu kungenzeka akondlekile kahle ngoko-
moya (Amo 8:11, 12)
Ukulamba okungokoqobo nokungokomoya ngokuvamile kuhlobene, njengoba uJesu abonisa
Ukulamba okukhulu kuwumuzwa obuhlungu kakhulu, oqeda amandla; kuhilela okungaphezu nje kwesisu so-
muntu
Izinga leglucose egazini noketshezi oluzungeze ubuchopho kokubili kuhilelekile ekuzweni ukulamba
Uma umuntu entula ukudla, angase akubone ngokwengeziwe ukungabi nabulungisa nokukhetha kwesimiso
sezinto samanje
KuMathewu 5:6, uJesu ukhuluma ngokulambela nokomela ukulunga
UJesu lapha wayekhuluma ngokulunga kokuma okwamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu
Umuntu olambele ukuma okulungile phambi kukaNkulunkulu uzizwa enelisekile, noma ‘esuthisiwe,’ lapho
ekugcineni ekuzuza lokhu
Ingabe ulambele ukulunga, ukuma kokuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu?
‘Ukusutha kalokhu’ ngokuzibheka njengolungile, okungokuphambene nokulamba okungokomoya, kulimaza
isimo sengqondo kanye nobuhlobo noNkulunkulu (Luk 6:25)
Abantu abanokwaneliseka ngalokho izwe elikunikezayo bangase bangakulangazeleli ukulunga okuvela ku-
Nkulunkulu
Abaningi emazweni acebile banelisekile manje ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo
Ingabe unomuzwa wokuthi lokhu kuyingozi yangempela engokomoya? Ingabe wena nomkhaya wakho
‘nilambele ukulunga’ noma nifana kakhulu nalabo ‘abasuthi kalokhu’?
Abanokwaneliseka bangase basanguluke ngesikhathi senhlekelele yokugcina, kodwa ngalesosikhathi kuyo-
be sekwephuze kakhulu (IzA 1:28-32; Luk 12:16-21)
Kodwa injabulo ingatholakala kanjani manje ngokulambela ukulunga okuvela kuNkulunkulu?
Ukulambela nokuphila ngokuvumelana nokulunga kukaNkulunkulu kungasiza umuntu ngokwezimali (wZU86
5/1 5-6; gZU79 4/8 4-24 [g78 10/8 4-23])
Labo abalambele ukulunga bangajabula futhi kwamanje ngenxa yokuphila okwanelisayo abakuphilayo (gmZU
162-80)
Bazuza impilo ethuthukile engokwengqondo nengokomzimba (Fanekisa ngokuhlangenwe nakho)
Imishado nokuphila kwasekhaya kujabulisa ngokwengeziwe (Fanekisa ngokuhlangenwe nakho)
Bajabulela ubuhlobo obunokuthula ngokwengeziwe kanye nokulondeka (Fanekisa ngokuhlangenwe nakho)
Injabulo enkulu kakhulu iwukuthi ukulambela ukulunga kusondeza umuntu eduze kakhulu noNkulunkulu
Umuntu uyaqaphela ukuthi uthando lukaNkulunkulu ngoKristu ludluliselwa kuye (Rom 8:35, 38, 39)
Injabulo yalowomuntu inkulu futhi ngenxa yokuba nethemba lokuphila okuphakade ezweni elisha
Kodwa yini thina esingayenza manje ukuze sandise injabulo yethu?
No. 31-ZU
7/92YANDISA INJABULO YAKHO—QAPHELA FUTHI UGCWALISE ISIDINGO SAKHO ESINGOKOMOYA
(20 imiz.)
Qaphela isidingo sakho esingokomoya (Mat 5:3, qhathanisa neNW)
UJesu usiqinisekisa ngokuthi labo abalambele ukulunga “bayakusuthiswa.” Singakwenza kanjani lokho? (Mat 5:6)
Kumelwe sibonise ukholo emhlatshelweni kaKristu, sizuze intethelelo nesilinganiso esithile sokulunga eme-
hlweni kaNkulunkulu (IsAm 7:14)
Samukele umoya ongcwele futhi sembathe ubuntu obusha, obuhilela ‘ukulunga kweqiniso’ (Efe 4:24)
Singazikhandla—futhi kumelwe sizikhandle—ekufundeni okwengeziwe emiBhalweni, ebalulekile ngenjongo
‘yokuyala ekulungeni’ (2Ti 3:16)
Ingabe uyasiqaphela futhi usigcwalise njalo isidingo sakho esingokomoya?
Yeka ukuthi kulula kanjani ukuba umuntu ahileleke ngokuphelele ekunakekeleni kuphela izidingo zakhe ezi-
ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo, okuyilokho okwenziwa abantu abaningi abalambile ngokoqobo (w89ZU 12/15 19)
Ingabe akunjalo ngawe? Usebenzisa isikhathi esingakanani ngosuku noma ngesonto ucabanga noma ukha-
thazeka ngeholo, izikweletu, izembatho, ukuzilibazisa?
Nakuba kudingeka sikunakekele ukuphila, bekungaba ukuhlakanipha yini ukugxila ezindabeni ezinjalo ka-
ngangokuthi sibe ngabangacebile ngakuNkulunkulu noma singaqapheli izidingo ezingokomoya? (Luk 12:
19-31)
Kuhle ukuhlaziya isimiso sakho sansuku zonke nesamasonto onke ukuze ubone ukuthi yini oyenzayo ukuze
wondleke ngokomoya (Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 4:6)
Ingokomoya likaThimothewu walakha ngokuqaphela isidingo sakhe esingokomoya nokusigcwalisa njalo
Wazindla, noma wondliwa yiZwi likaNkulunkulu; wakwenza umkhuba ukulicabangela njalo
Cabangela itekisi losuku nsuku zonke; kungenziwa ngesikhathi sokudla lapho sanelisa ukulamba okungo-
komzimba
Ingabe ukucabangela itekisi losuku kuyingxenye yesimiso sakho (noma somkhaya wakho) sansuku zo-
nke?
Funda iBhayibheli njalo; hambisana nesimiso sokufunda eSikoleni SeNkonzo EsingokwaseZulwini
Khulisa ukondliwa ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu ngokujula ngokwengeziwe ezintweni, hhayi ukucabangela ko-
kukha phezulu noma okuncane
Ngokufundwa kweBhayibheli kwamasonto onke kwesikole, ungenza ukucwaninga okwengeziwe
(wZU91 5/1 15-16)
Siyawazi umehluko iBhayibheli eliwenzayo phakathi ‘kobisi lweZwi’ ‘nokudla okuqinileyo,’ kodwa thi-
na yini esiyidlayo? (Heb 5:12, 14)
Uma etholakala, amaIndex angamathuluzi ayinzuzo, kodwa ingabe siyawasebenzisa? (Fanekisa)
Kuhle ukuhlola imikhuba yakho yokudla okungokomoya futhi uthole indlela engathuthukiswa ngayo
Akukhona nje ukusebenzisa ingqondo, ngoba ngokukaMathewu 5:6, kuhlobene nenjabulo yethu
BHEKA KUNKULUNKULU UKUZE UTHOLE INJABULO NOKUQEDWA KWENDLALA (5 imiz.)
Njengoba uJehova elungiselela lokho esikudingayo ukuze sanelise ukulamba kwethu okungokomoya futhi ebe-
ka indinganiso ekulungeni, angasibusisa futhi ngokudla okwanele okungokwenyama
Abanye bangase basabele ekulambeni noma endlaleni engokoqobo ngokufulathela uNkulunkulu, kodwa ungu-
Mlungiseleli wako konke ukudla komuntu (IzE 14:17)
Kakade amalungiselelo akhe ngomhlaba anele ukuba aphelise indlala, ukuba ebengaphazanyiswa izindlela
zabantu (tpZU 106; g89 11/8 28)
Ukusebenzelana kukaNkulunkulu nabantu esikhathini esidlule kunikeza isiqinisekiso sokuthi angayiqeda fu-
thi uyoyiqeda indlala ezweni elisha
Lapho uIsrayeli eqaphela isidingo esingokomoya futhi ehlala eseduze noJehova, wambusisa ngokucebile
ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo (Dut 28:11, 12, 14)
Injabulo yakhe yayingaveli nje kuphela ekubeni owondlekile ngokomoya kodwa futhi nasekudleni uku-
dla okungokwenyama okwanelisayo
Ukwazi kwethu ngalokho uJehova akwenzayo manje nasayokwenza kufanele kwenezele enjabulweni yethu ya-
manje
Sonke kufanele sithathe izinyathelo eziwujuqu zokugcwalisa isidingo sethu esingokomoya, eziwujuqu njenga-
lezo esizithathayo ukuze sizame ukudla nsuku zonke
Ukwenza kanjalo kuyosisiza ngezindlela ezingokoqobo okuxoxwe ngazo, kuyokwandisa injabulo yethu manje,
futhi kuyosinikeza ithemba lokuthi injabulo yethu engokomoya nengokwenyama ingase ingapheli
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 31-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUBHEKANA NGOKUPHUMELELAYO NEZINKATHAZO ZOKUPHILA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Engxenyeni ethi “Indlela UNkulunkulu Asisiza Ngayo Ukuba Sibhekane Ngokuphumelelayo Nezinkathazo,” se-
benzisa okuhlangenwe nakho okuvela ezihlokweni ezikhonjiwe zeNqabayokulinda futhi unikeze lengxenye nge-
ndlela yemfudumalo nephimbo lomusa
IZWE LANAMUHLA LIGCWELE IZINKATHAZO (10 imiz.)
Emhlabeni wonke namuhla abantu abahlaliseki, bayesaba, bakhathazekile ngekusasa (gZU86 12/8 3-4; gZU90
8/8 31)
Kunokungethembi okukhulayo, ukungethenjwa kohulumeni nezinhlangano (gZU90 8/8 3-9)
Isintu sibhekene nezinkinga ezinkulu
Kolunye uhlangothi, abaningi bayahlupheka futhi bayakhathazeka ngenxa yokuntuleka kokudla, impahla, na-
mandla (Mat 24:7)
Izindleko zokuphila ziye zaphakama, zikwenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe ukunakekela ikhaya nomkha-
ya (IsAm 6:6)
Abantu emadolobheni amakhulu, emadolobhaneni amancane, nasemaphandleni bayakuzwa lokhu kucinde-
zela (Yisho kafushane ubufakazi basendaweni nemiphumela yalezinkinga)
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ohulumeni nabantu basaphaza imali nemicebo
Abaningi bayakwenqaba ukusebenza ukuze baziphilise
Imikhuba emibi yokuphila nokwehluleka kwemali ukuletha injabulo kwakha ukucindezeleka nokukhunga-
theka (1Ti 6:9, 10)
Konke lokhu kwenezela ezinkingeni ezingokomnotho nezingokwenhlalo
Kukhona futhi ukuntuleka komsebenzi okwandayo nokuntuleka kwezidingo zansuku zonke
Isikweletu sesizwe nesezizwe zonke sisheshisa ukwehla kwamandla emali futhi sisongela ngisho nokuzinza
kwabanye ohulumeni (gZU89 5/8 8)
Ngokwesibonelo, ePeru uhulumeni wamemezela “isimiso soshintsho olukhulu” sokulawula umnotho oye
waba nokwanda kwamanani okungaphezu kwamaphesenti angu-2 000 000 eminyakeni emihlanu (The New
York Times, 8/17/90)
Izazi eziningi zezomnotho zesaba ukuwa kwesimiso samabhange somhlaba wonke (g86 10/22 7-11)
Ukuphila komkhaya kuyaqhubeka kuwohloka, kunamakhaya ahlukene, imishado ehlulekayo, izehlukaniso,
izingane ezingalaleli, nokuphelelwa igunya kwabazali
EUnited States phakathi no-1985, kwakunezehlukaniso eziyisihlanu—uma kuqhathaniswa nemishado engu-
10,2—kulabo nalabobantu abangu-1 000; ngo-1986 umbiko ovela eMoscow wabonisa ukuthi amaphesenti
angu-37 kuphela emishado ahlala iminyaka emithathu nokuthi amaphesenti angu-70 aphela phakathi ne-
shumi leminyaka (wZU88 11/1 20; gZU86 7/8 10)
Abantu abanobugovu abawukhathaleli umhlaba nemicebo yawo (gZU90 3/22 6-8)
Ukubhujiswa ngokungakhethi kwamahlathi emvula kuyinkinga yembulunga yonke
Izinto eziningi ezingaba ukudla, imithi, nemikhiqizo yokusetshenziswa endlini kuyolahleka ngisho na-
ngaphambi kokuba kutholakale noma kuthuthukiswe
Esinye isazi sezitshalo sakhala: “Sibhubhisa izinto esingazi ngisho nokuthi zikhona” (gZU90 3/22 11)
Abaxhaphazi abanjalo baletha izimo ezibangela impi, ubuphekula, ubugebengu, nendlala
IMIZAMO EYIPHUTHA YOKUNQOBA IZINKATHAZO (7 imiz.)
Isintu sibheka ohlangothini okungeyilo nasemithonjeni engeyiyo ukuze sinqobe izinkathazo (wZU81 1/15 4-5
[w80 7/15 4])
Abaningi baphendukela ezidakamizweni njengezidunga-mizwa
Kodwa ingabe lezidakamizwa ziyakhulula enkathazweni? IWolfson Unit of Clinical Pharmacology ilinganise-
la ukuthi cishe ingxenye yesine yalabo abasebenzisa ama-benzodiazepine izinyanga ezine baba imilutha
yawo
Imiphumela eyivezayo: ukuqwasha, ukukhathazeka, ukucindezeleka, ukuhlaselwa ukwesaba, ukucanuzela
kwenhliziyo, ukungaboni kahle, nobuhlungu bemisipha (g84 10/8 30)
Abanye baphendukela ekuqongeleleni imali njengekhambi
Owesifazane othile waseCanada wathi: “Ngangikholelwa ukuthi imali yayikhulula ekukhathazekeni.” Nge-
mva kokushada nendoda elondekile ngokwezimali, uyalandisa: “Isimo sethu ngokwezimali sasisinikeza inku-
luleko yokujabulela noma yini eyayivezwa izwe . . . , [kodwa] ngangisakhathazeka ngemali.” Kungani? “Sa-
silahlekelwa eningi. Kubonakala sengathi uma uneyengeziwe, uzizwa ungalondekile. Imali ayizange ilethe
ukukhululeka ekukhathazekeni” (gZU88 5/8 17-18 [g88 4/22 3-4])
Kunezingxenye zomhlaba lapho kucatshangwa khona ukuthi ukulondeka kuvela ekubeni nemikhaya emikhulu
ukuze eminyakeni yamuva izingane zinakekele abazali abagugile (gZU91 11/8 6, 9)
Naleli futhi yithemba elingamanga njengoba izingane eziningi ngokwengeziwe zishiya amakhaya nabathande-
kayo bazo, zikhohlwa ukudumisa obaba bazo nomama (IzA 30:11; w85 1/15 12)
No. 32-ZU
7/92Kuye kwahlongozwa amakhambi ahlukahlukene futhi abanye bazama ukunqoba izinkinga zendawo ezungezile,
kodwa amaqiniso awukuthi izinkinga ziyaqhubeka ziba zimbi ngokwengeziwe (g73 3/8 31)
INDLELA UNKULUNKULU ASISIZA NGAYO UKUBA SIBHEKANE NGOKUPHUMELELAYO NEZINKA-
THAZO (20 imiz.)
Imfuneko eyinhloko ekunqobeni izinkathazo iwukubheka ohlangothini olufanele ukuze kutholakale inkulule-
ko (wZU81 1/15 6 [w80 7/15 6])
Ikhambi liyovela kuJehova, hhayi kumuntu noma ezinhlanganweni zakhe (Hu 3:8; Jer 10:23)
Izibonelo zesikhathi esidlule zalabo abathembela kuJehova
UNowa nomkhaya wakhe bathembela kuJehova, basinda kuZamcolo; ULoti namadodakazi akhe bencika
kuJehova ukuze bakhululwe eSodoma (Mat 24:37-39; Luk 17:28, 29; Heb 11:7)
UDaniyeli emphandwini wezingonyama (Dan 6:20-22)
Namuhla, nasesikhathini esiseduze esizayo, uNkulunkulu unikeza isivikelo nosizo (Hu 46:1; IzA 18:10)
Ukubheka kuJehova kuyosenza sikwazi ukukhululeka ekukhathazekeni (Heb 13:5, 6)
Zenzele izinto eziza kuqala ezifanelekile manje; qiniseka ngezinto ezibaluleke ngokwengeziwe (Fil 1:9-11)
Lokho kusho ukubekelela “ingcebo ezulwini” (Mat 6:19-21)
Bambelela ngokuqinile ekuphileni okuyikho; yeka ukukhathazeka ngezinto ezingabalulekile
Ukwenza kanjalo kuyosenza sikwazi ukunqoba ukukhathazeka, nokwesaba (Mat 6:25-31; 1Ti 6:17-19; wZU77
10/1 437-46 [w77 197-206]; wZU89 7/15 10-15)
Gcina indlela yokuphila ilula futhi inempilo (1Ti 6:6-8)
Ekubhekaneni ngokuphumelelayo nezinkinga zomuntu siqu, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuphonsa izinkathazo zakho
kuJehova
Ukugula, ukucindezeleka, isazela, ukuzizwa ungelutho, ukuntula ukuzithiba, ushushiso, ubandlululo, izinki-
nga zansuku zonke, ukukhathazeka ngesikhathi esizayo, nokushayisana kobuntu kuyimithwalo okunzima
ukuyithwala
Kungani uzama ukuyisingatha wedwa? Yamukela usizo lukaJehova (Hu 55:22; wZU83 3/1 23-6 [w82 9/15
23-5])
Yamukela usizo oluvela kubazalwane nodade abavuthiwe; xoxa ngokukhululekile nomuntu omethembayo
Nxusa uJehova, futhi wamukele izimpendulo azinikezayo (wZU88 2/15 12, 17-18)
UKUBHEKANA NGOKUPHUMELELAYO NEZINKATHAZO KULETHA IZIBUSISO (8 imiz.)
“Ukubhekana ngokuphumelelayo” kusho ukulwa noma ukuzabalaza ngokuphumelelayo
Lokhu kulwa kuyoletha ukukhululeka nokusinda ekwesabeni okuqhubekayo nasekuphazamisekeni okungo-
komzwelo okubangelwa ukulahlekelwa izinto ezibonakalayo
UPawulu wabheka izinto ezibonakalayo nesikhundla ‘njengezibi’ futhi wathola injabulo ekukhonzeni uJeho-
va (Fil 3:8, 10, 11)
Umuntu othembela kuJehova ugwema ukukhungatheka okubangelwa ukwehluleka kwezinto ezibonakalayo
ukunikeza ukulondeka; uyophila ekulondekeni okungokomoya futhi angakhathazwa inhlekelele; uyolala ngo-
kuthula (Hu 4:8; IzA 1:33)
Asinakukwazi ukubhekana ngokuphumelelayo nezinkinga zezwe ngokuhlakanipha komuntu (Jer 10:23)
Nqoba lempi ngokuzuza ukuphila okunokuthula nokunempilo ngokwengeziwe manje (gZU81 7/8 17-20 [g81 1/8
6-8])
Bhekana ngokuphumelelayo nezinkathazo zokuphila ngokwenza intando kaNkulunkulu manje, unombono we-
zibusiso zaphakade (1Kor 15:58; 1Jo 2:15-17)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 32-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45YINI EBANGELA UMOYA WOKUVUKELA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza ukuqonda kokuthi kungani amaKristu kungamelwe ahileleke ezinhlanganweni zokuvukela ezihlukahlu-
kene kanye nezimo zengqondo ezivela kuSathane. Kudingeka sibone ukuthi ukuvukela okunjalo kufeza okunca-
ne kakhulu ngokuphathelene nokumisa umphakathi olungile nokuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uwukuphela kwe-
khambi elinengqondo lezinkinga eziningi ezihlupha umphakathi wesintu
SIPHILA ENKATHINI YOKUVUKELA (5 imiz.)
Kulula ukubona izibonelo zokuvukela ngokwezinga lomuntu siqu: Intsha eningi ivukela igunya labazali; abafa-
zi bavukela abayeni babo (wZU84 10/1 5; wZU83 12/1 6-7 [w83 6/15 6-7])
Ngokwezinga elikhulu, kunokuvukela iziphathimandla zesikole, amaphoyisa, nohulumeni (g87 11/22 30; g82 5/8
17-18; tpZU 129; gZU71 8/22 11-13 [g71 2/22 16-18])
Kunokugqashuka kokuvukelwa ngokuqondile kohlelo olumisiwe lomphakathi ezindaweni eziqhelelene
(wZU72 11/1 483-4 [w72 261-2]; gZU90 8/8 9)
Umoya wokuvukela wande kakhulu kangangokuba uthinta wonke umuntu ngezinga elithile
INGABE UKUVUKELA KUYINKAMBO ETUSEKAYO NEZUZISA KAKHULU? (5 imiz.)
Umlando uyasiza ekuphenduleni ukuthi ukuvukela kuyatuseka yini noma kuzuzise
IBhayibheli lisenza sikwazi ukuthola isizinda sokuvukela igunya
Ukuvukela kwaqala ngesidalwa somoya, kwase kulandela abantu ababili, kwaba nemiphumela eyinhleke-
lele (Gen 3; lp 53-61; it-2 757)
Kamuva, kwavela imiphumela emibi ekuvukeleni kwaseBabele (Gen 11)
Umuntu womoya wokuqala owavukela usathonya isintu futhi ugqugquzela umoya omubi okuyo yonke indawo
(Efe 2:2, 3; IsAm 12:12; hs 52-3; rsZU 373-7; wZU72 11/1 484-5 [w72 262])
Uyena ngokuyinhloko onecala ngomoya wokuvukela owandile kanye nezimo ezingaphelele ezishukumisa uku-
vukela phakathi kwabantu (rsZU 404)
ZIYINI IZISUSA ZOKUVUKELA? (15 imiz.)
Ngezinye izikhathi labo abavukelayo baqotho, bashukunyiswa ukungalungi nezinkinga
Enye intsha icasulwa ubuzenzisi nokuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo kwabazali
Abafazi bangase bavukele abayeni babo ababusa ngokucindezela
Abantu bavukela izimiso zezomnotho nezenhlalo eziveza ukwahlukaniswa kwabantu ngokwezigaba nokuntu-
la inhlonipho ngokuphila (wZU89 11/15 30; wZU72 11/1 485-7 [w72 263-4]; gZU87 11/8 4-6)
Ubugovu noma ukuqhosha nakho kubangela ukuvukela
Sithola isibonelo kuKora (Num 16; w78 11/15 13-15; it-2 184)
Intsha eningi ivukela abazali neziphathimandla ngoba lentsha ifuna ukwenza umathanda noma ngoba itho-
nywe ukuthambekela kwesono (gZU88 1/8 16-17 [g88 1/8 20-1])
Umfazi angase abonise ukuzibusa kokuqhosha ngokuphikisana nomyeni wakhe obala, kanjalo evukela igunya
lakhe
Izigidi namuhla zenqaba imigoqo yokuziphatha eyisisekelo ngenxa nje yokuthi zifuna izaba zokuphila uku-
phila okuxekethile; ziba abavukela uNkulunkulu, onezindinganiso eziphakeme zokuziphatha (Hu 119:150; Efe
4:17-19)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi okuqotho noma okobugovu, ukuvukela kuhlulekile ukuxazulula izinkinga zabantu
eziyisisekelo (Hu 146:3; gZU87 9/8 13 [g87 9/8 23])
Ukuvukela kumelwe kugwenywe ngoba kuyalahlwa eZwini likaNkulunkulu (1Sa 15:22, 23; IzA 24:21, 22; Shu 8:
2, 3)
Ikhambi langempela litholakala kuphi?
IKHAMBI LANGEMPELA LENKINGA YOKUVUKELA LISEKUZITHOBENI EMBUSWENI KANKULUNKU-
LU (15 imiz.)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu uwukuphela kwethemba lokupheliswa ngokuphelele komoya wokuvukela kanye noku-
ngalungi okuwubangelayo
Ngaphansi kokubusa kwalowoMbuso, ‘omubi uyobe engasekho’ (Hu 37:10)

boniswa ukulandela kwethu izindlela zikaNkulunkulu ezichazwe eBhayibhelini (wZU78 8/1 16-22 [w78 1/15 18-
22]; gZU77 4/8 6-8 [g76 10/8 6-7])
Ukwenza kanjalo kuletha izinzuzo eziningi zamanje
Ngisho noma intsha ingenakukwamukela ukuzenzisa nemigomo yezinto ezibonakalayo kwabazali abange-
wona amaKristu eqiniso, kufanele ihloniphe isikhundla sabazali futhi ibalalele (Kol 3:20; flZU 161-3; tpZU
138-9; ypZU 13-17)

Ukulalela kuthokozisa uJehova futhi kungase kukhange abazali bangene eqinisweni

nye lelizwe elibi nenkolo yalo eyisihlubuki. Kumelwe futhi sibe nobuntu bobuKristu futhi sibe abenza intando ka-
Nkulunkulu ngokwethembeka ngesikhathi kugqashuka usizi olukhulu
UKUSINDA KUYINDABA YOKUKHATHALELWA KAKHULU (6 imiz.)
Lapho besongelwa inhlekelele, abantu benza umzamo wangempela wokusinda (w81 4/15 30; g75 10/22 31)
OFakazi baye babonisa ukuthi izizwe zibhekene nenhlekelele (gZU88 4/8 3-16)
Isiphelo sizofika nakanjani (Hab 2:3; Mat 24:21, 22, 37-39)
Ukuziphatha komuntu nesimo sengqondo kuyonquma ukuthi uyobhujiswa yini noma uyosinda (IzA 1:31; 2Pet
3:9-14)
Abayosinda kumelwe babheke izindaba njengoba uNkulunkulu enza; uyini umbono kaNkulunkulu?
ISIBONELO ESIFUNDISAYO SOKUBHUJISWA KWEJERUSALEMA, NGO-607 B.C.E. (18 imiz.)
Iziprofetho zikaHezekeli zigcizelela ukubaluleka kokuthola umbono kaNkulunkulu
Lezo ziprofetho zasiza abanye ukuba basinde kulokho kubhujiswa kweJerusalema
Njengoba kunjalo namuhla, abantu ngalesosikhathi kwadingeka balandise ngokomuntu siqu (Hez 7:3)
AmaJuda amaningi enqaba umbono kaNkulunkulu, nezinqumo (Hez 18:25)
AmaJuda ambalwa azibonakalisa ethembekile futhi ephapheme; athatha izinyathelo zokusinda
Ahlolisisa izimo nezenzo ngombono kaNkulunkulu
Kudingeka okufanayo nganoma yibaphi abalindele ukusinda osukwini lwethu
Ngokuhlola lokho uNkulunkulu akuthola kunengeka eJerusalema, sisizwa ukuba sithole umbono wakhe na-
muhla
Izimo zengqondo eziningi, imikhuba, okuvamile namuhla akuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu
Lapho sihlolisisa, ingabe sisuke sinombono wakhe ngempela?
UHezekeli wathola umbono wezinto ezinengekayo ezaziqhutshwa eJerusalema, futhi kufanele sifunde kulombo-
no (wZU88 9/15 13-14)
Abantu ababenecala kwakungamaJuda okwakucatshangwa ukuthi akhonza uJehova (kj 142-6)
Labo bantu ‘babenesithombe somhawu,’ mhlawumbe esasimelela uAshera, unkulunkulukazi wenzalo waba-
seKhanani (Hez 8:5, 6)
Benza uNkulunkulu weqiniso abe nomhawu; wayekwenqabele ukukhonza izithombe
Namuhla kweLobukholwa abantu bazisholo ukuthi bakhulekela uNkulunkulu weBhayibheli
Bahlanganisa izithombe, izimpawu ezingokwenkolo ekukhulekeleni; uNkulunkulu uyabalahla njengoba
kwakunjalo nasosukwini lukaHezekeli
Ingabe sinombono ofana nokaNkulunkulu wokuthi lemikhuba iyanengeka?
Ukusinda kwethu noma ukubhujiswa kwethu kungaxhomeka embonweni wethu
UNkulunkulu wakuthukuthelela futhi usakuthukuthelela ukukhulekela okunikezwa izidalwa (Hez 8:10-12)
AmaJuda abheka uNkulunkulu njengofile nje
Namuhla abaningi abanandaba kangako noNkulunkulu, nokho bayashiseka ekukhulekeleni kwabo ezinye
izinto
Bashisekela izifanekiselo zobuzwe, amaqembu ezemidlalo (kj 147-9; reZU 194, umbhalo waphansi)
Benqaba uNkulunkulu njengoMdali womuntu, abaningi bakhetha izimfundiso zokuziphendukela kwemve-
lo, nekaMama Oyimvelo (g61 11/22 5-7)
Kuthiwani ngathi? Ingabe siyayemukela imibono enjalo ekhohlisayo?
Ingabe sinombono kaJehova wokuthi ukuphakamisa izidalwa kuyinto enengekayo kuye?
Kufanelekile ukuzihlola
AmaJuda ayizihlubuki akhulekela unkulunkulu wamanga uTamuzi (Hez 8:14; kj 150-3; gZU89 2/8 25 [g89 1/22 22])
UTamuzi wayeyisithixo sabaseBabiloni nesithandwa sikankulunkulukazi wenzalo uIshitari
Lombono ubonisa indlela ukuhlubuka okubulala ngayo ngokomoya namuhla (wZU88 9/15 13-14)
Amasonto ngokuvamile anikeza udumo nokubaluleka konkulunkulu nonkulunkulukazi bamanga
Ukukhulekelwa kukaMariya (wZU89 5/1 20-2; g88 11/8 11-12)
Ukukhulekelwa kukaZiqu-zintathu (rsZU 416-17; tiZU 31)
Ukukhulekelwa kosanta nezinto ezingcwele (rsZU 192, 218; wZU91 11/15 3-4; gZU74 2/8 21-2 [g73 8/8 26-7])
AmaKristu ayaqikelela ukuba akhulekele uNkulunkulu weqiniso kuphela (Eks 20:2, 3; 2Kor 6:14-18)
AmaJuda ayekhulekela ngisho nelanga (Dut 4:19; Hez 8:16; kj 154-8)
Amasonto nabefundisi bawela ephutheni elifanayo ngisho nakuba bengakhulekeli ilanga elingokoqobo

UKUZE ASINDE, UMUNTU KUMELWE ABE OMUNYE WABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU ABABEKWE
UPHAWU (Landisa kafushane ngoHezekeli 9:1-11) (kj 162-76; wZU88 9/15 14; suZU 94-7) (15 imiz.)
Amadoda angokoqobo ayisithupha awazange enze umsebenzi wokubhubhisa abantu ababengenalo uphawu
Laba abayisithupha bamelela amabutho asezulwini
Ukubhujiswa ngabaseBabiloni ngo-607 B.C.E. kwakuvunyelwe ngokwaphezulu
Labo abaphawulelwe ukusinda namuhla yilabo abazibonakalisa bengabakhulekeli bakaNkulunkulu
Umkhuba wasendulo wawuwukubeka uphawu olungokoqobo noma igama lesithixo esithile ebunzini lomuntu

wZU87 10/1 4-7)
Ingabe iqiniso leBhayibheli liye lenza umahluko ophawulekayo enhliziyweni yakho?

Banombono kaNkulunkulu; empeleni bayakuzonda okubi
