No. 34-ZU—Ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UNGAPHILA PHAKADE? INGABE WENA UYOPHILA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibe nokuqiniseka okujulile kokuthi ukuphila ezweni elisha kuyoba okumangalisayo, okune-
njabulo yangempela nobumnandi kumuntu ngamunye. Ukuze sifanelekele izibusiso ezinjalo ezimangalisayo, ku-
melwe manje sibonise ukholo elungiselelweni lesihlengo elenziwe ngoJesu Kristu futhi sivumelanise konke uku-
phila kwethu nenjongo kaNkulunkulu
UKUPHILA—IMPAHLA YETHU EKHETHEKE KUNAZO ZONKE (4 imiz.)
Wonke amathemba ethu, amacebo, nezinjabulo kuxhomeke ekuphileni
Kunezinto eziningi esingathanda ukuzenza, sizenzela kokubili labo esibathandayo nokuzijabulisa thina siqu
Isikhathi sihamba ngokushesha okukhulu, ukuphila kubonakala kukufushane kakhulu (gZU71 4/22 4-6 [g70
10/8 4-6])
Uma ukuphila kwethu kungase kunwetshwe—sibe nesikhathi esengeziwe—singakwazi ukuzandisa kakhulu izi-
nto esiphumelela ukuzenza nenjabulo yethu
Kuyamangalisa ukuthi umuntu, owuhlobo lokuphila oluphakeme kakhulu emhlabeni, unesikhathi esifushane so-
kuphila kunezitshalo ezithile nezilwane (Mat 6:26; g88 10/8 24-5; tsZU 24-6)
Kungani umzimba womuntu uguga futhi ufa? Ingabe lokhu akunakugwenywa?
UMUNTU WAYEDALELWE UKUBA APHILE PHAKADE (9 imiz.)
Ososayensi abaqiniseki ukuthi kungani umuntu efa (g88 10/8 24; gZU90 4/22 4)
Abanye abantu baphila isikhathi eside ngokungavamile (g86 8/8 31)
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi isikhathi sokuphila komuntu ekuqaleni sasingalinganiselwe (Gen 2:16, 17; gZU77 8/22
23-4 [g77 2/22 27-8]; gZU90 4/22 7-8)
Ubufakazi bamandla nemisebenzi yobuchopho kanye nenqubo emangalisayo yokuzivuselela yamangqamuza-
na awo wonke umzimba bubonisa ukuthi umuntu wayeklanyelwe ukuba aphile phakade (tpZU 101-2; g88 8/8
16-20)
Ukuphila okuphakade kuyosho ukubuyiselwa esimweni somuntu sakuqala sokuphelela
Khona-ke, siphetha ngokuthi ngokusobala siklanyelwe ukuba siphile phakade, kodwa ingabe lokhu kuzwakala
kufiseleka kuwe?
UKUPHILA PHAKADE SIPHELELE NGEKE KUBE NESIDINA (12 imiz.)
Kusho ukuthini “ukuphelela”?
Ukuphelela kwesintu kuyoba okulinganiselwe, ngeke kube okuphelele (it-2 606-7)
Ingabe kudingeka ukuba ubhekane nokubi ukuze wazise okuhle?
Ukugula nokuhlupheka kunciphisa ukujabulela kwethu ukuphila, akukwandisi (tsZU 145; gZU71 4/22 13-16
[g70 10/8 14])
Ingabe siyophelelwa izinto zokuzenza nokuzifunda? (wZU84 6/1 3-8 [w83 11/15 3-7]; tsZU 146-51; gZU89 2/8 21
[g89 2/8 27]; gZU71 4/22 13-16 [g70 10/8 15-18])
Izinto esizozenza ziyoba ezingapheli, ezingafinyezwa ukufa
Okubaluleke kakhulu, siyojwayelana kangcono noNkulunkulu (Rom 11:33)
Ukumkhulekela kuyonezela njalo injongo nenjabulo ekuphileni
Siyojabulela amathuba angenamkhawulo enjabulo ngokuhamba nangokufunda ngezidalwa zasemhlabeni
Ingabe umhlaba uyokwazi ukuhlalisa bonke abantu?
Umhlaba ungahlalisa inani labantu elikhulu kakhulu (tpZU 105; it-2 792  ̊7; rsZU 415)
Ungakhiqiza ukudla okwanele, futhi uhulumeni kaNkulunkulu uyoqinisekisa ukuthi kwabiwa ngokufane-
le (Hu 67:6; tpZU 105-6; it-2 792  ̊8)
Akuyona indaba yokuqagela; uNkulunkulu usitshela injongo yakhe ngomhlaba (Gen 1:27, 28)
UKUPHILA OKUPHAKADE KUNGATHOLAKALA KANJANI? (12 imiz.)
Nakuba isayensi yezokwelapha iye yasiza ekwandiseni isilinganiso sobude bokuphila, ayinakukwazi ukuqinise-
kisa noma ikuphi ukwandiswa kakhulu kobude bokuphila (Luk 12:25; gZU90 4/22 4; g88 10/8 23-4)
UNkulunkulu, uMthombo wokuphila, usitshela ukuthi kungani umuntu efa futhi kakade useye walungiselela
indlela esingathola ngayo ukuphila okuphakade, umhlatshelo wesihlengo kaJesu Kristu (Siza izilaleli ukuba zi-
bone ukuthi lokhu kunengqondo, kungokoqobo) (Mat 20:28; Rom 5:12; wZU90 3/15 3-6; gZU71 4/22 20-1 [g70
10/8 22-3])
UKristu uyoba “uYise Ongunaphakade” wabo bonke labo ababonisa ukholo kuye nasesihlengweni sakhe (Isa 9:
6, 7; gZU71 4/22 21-2 [g70 10/8 23-4]; wsZU 162-7)
Singaqiniseka ukuthi njengeNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu, uJesu uyophelisa izimo ezenza ukuphila kube lusi-
zi futhi uyobuyisela abantu bokholo abalalelayo ekupheleleni kobuntu (wZU89 8/15 19-20; wsZU 170-9)
No. 35-ZU
6/92INGABE WENA UYOPHILA PHAKADE? (8 imiz.)
Ukuthi umuntu angaphila phakade ngokuthula nangenjabulo emhlabeni akusho ukuthi uyophila phakade
Kubalulekile ukuba umuntu ngamunye ngokomuntu siqu asebenzise ngokuhlakanipha ithuba lesikhathi elilinga-
niselwe lamanje
Ukulandelana kwezenzakalo zeBhayibheli ngokwezikhathi nokugcwaliseka kwesiprofetho seBhayibheli kubo-
nisa ukuthi isikhathi esisele salesimiso esingalungile siphela ngokushesha (Mat 24; 2Ti 3:1-5; IsAm 6:1-8)
Kumelwe sivumelanise ukuphila neZwi likaNkulunkulu futhi sikugcine kungaleyondlela (1Jo 2:15-17; gZU75
7/8 21 [g75 1/8 28])
Kungenzeka ukuthi sesiyiqalile lenkambo, kodwa kudingeka ukuphaphama okukhulu ukuze siqhubeke
(Luk 21:34-36)
Lisebenzise ngokunenzuzo ilungiselelo lemfundo yeBhayibheli eliqhutshwa oFakazi BakaJehova lelo manje
elisiza abantu abaningi ukuba balungiselele isikhathi esizayo esingenasiphelo (Joh 17:3; wZU88 6/15 28-9)
Ukuze uziqinisele ukulondoloza inkambo efanele, zihlanganise nalabo njengeqembu abalindele ukuphila pha-
kade emhlabeni (Heb 10:24, 25; wZU90 5/1 28; gZU77 10/8 15 [g77 4/22 15])
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 35-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE LOKHU KUPHILA KUWUKUPHELA KWAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Abantu abaningi abayiboni injongo ekuphileni kwabo. Kudingeka izilaleli zibone ukuthi ithemba lethu ngesikha-
thi esizayo, kuhlanganise novuko, lisekela injongo yokuphila kwethu. Lelithemba liqinisekile. Singaphishekela
injongo yangempela ekuphileni kwethu manje, sihlakulela lelithemba futhi sigwema isimo sengqondo sezwe so-
kuphilela usuku lwanamuhla. Ingxenye yokugcina yenkulumo kufanele iqondiswe ngokukhethekile kubantu aba-
sanda kuhlanganyela naseningini
IZIMO EZIKHUNGATHEKISAYO ZALOKHU KUPHILA ZIHOLELA ABANINGI EKUFUNENI INJONGO
NGOKUXHAMAZELA (6 imiz.)
Abantu abasha nabadala ngokuvamile bangabaza futhi benqabe imigomo emidala yesintu
Ingcebo iye yanezela ekukhathazekeni, ayanelisi ngaso sonke isikhathi (Shu 2:4-11; w77 59; wZU88 8/15 18;
wZU86 6/15 3, 10)
Udumo lumane nje luyinto edlulayo; abantu abadumile bayashesha ukulibaleka (Shu 2:15, 16; w77 78-9; wZU87
8/15 10-11)
Amandla angawesikhashana; umuntu angase athathelwe isikhundla imbangi yakhe; ngokuqinisekile aphethe
ngokufa (w76 626)
Ubuhle nabo budlula ngokushesha (gZU86 1/8 14-15)
Izinto umuntu aphumelela ukuzenza ekuphileni azilingani neziningi azozenza esikhathini esiphakade
Umuntu uyadlula ngokushesha futhi alibaleke (Hu 103:15, 16)
Lokhu akuwona umbono wokungasathembi lutho kodwa ungokoqobo
Uma lokhu kuphila kuwukuphela kwakho, khona-ke asilona ngisho neconsi ohlelweni lwezikhathi noma ngi-
sho nothuli ezilinganisweni zaphakade (wZU73 12/1 531-6 [w73 325-30]; gZU87 2/8 12 [g87 1/22 12])

mangqamuzana (ce 48)
UMdali weDNA unamandla okukhumbula isimiso sokuphila komuntu uma ekhetha ukwenza kanjalo

No. 36-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45NQUMA MANJE UKUSEKELA UBUKHOSI BAPHEZULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza umuntu ngamunye ukuba abone ukuthi kungani kumelwe anqume ukuthi uyobusekela yini ubukhosi baphe-
zulu nokuthi lokhu akuyona nje indaba yokukusho ngamazwi kodwa ihilela izenzo. Indlela umuntu enza ngayo
manje ngokuphathelene neziyalezo ezivela kuNkulunkulu ibonisa ukuthi uye wanquma yini ukusekela ubukho-
si baphezulu
NGOKUNGANGABAZEKI UJEHOVA KUFANELE AQASHELWE NJENGOMBUSI (5 imiz.)
Ubukhosi buyinto ekhathalelwa emhlabeni wonke
Lokhu kubonakala ekunakekeleni okugxiliswa kwezombangazwe emaphephandabeni nasemazingeni abanye
abantu abazama ngawo ukuthonya noma ukushintsha ababusi
Ukukhathalela ngokweqile ubukhosi babantu ngokuvamile kuphazamisa abantu ukuba baqaphele ubukhosi bu-
kaJehova kuyo yonke indawo
Ngokungangabazeki, indawo yonke ibonisa ukuthi kunoMdali ohlakaniphile onamakhono awedlula kude awe-
thu (Isa 40:12-15, 26; wZU87 7/15 24; gZU90 10/8 14 [g88 3/8 13]; wZU89 10/15 29)
Njengoba ephethe indawo yonke, uNkulunkulu kumelwe futhi abe uMbusi wayo (Hu 103:19)
Ngisho nababusi abangabantu abanamandla baye baphoqeleka ukuba bavume ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungumni-
nimandla onke (Dan 4:34, 35, 37; wZU88 12/1 12-13)
THINA NGABANYE KUMELWE SINQUME UKUTHI SIYOBUSEKELA YINI UBUKHOSI BAPHEZULU
(5 imiz.)
Kulula ukumane sithi siyabemukela ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu, kodwa ingabe siyakubonisa ukubaluleka kwa-
lobobukhosi ekuphileni kwethu?
UNebukadinesari waphoqeleka ukuba abuqaphele ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu, kodwa abukho ubufakazi bokuthi
waba umkhulekeli weqiniso futhi waqondisa ukuphila kwakhe siqu nokuthi wayecabanga ngemithetho nange-
zimiso zikaNkulunkulu
Ingabe sisesimweni esifanayo?
Abantu abaningi bakhangwa isigijimi seBhayibheli esiphathelene nomhlaba oyipharadesi ngaphansi kobukhosi
bukaNkulunkulu; bangase bahlanganyele nokuhlanganyela noFakazi BakaJehova, kodwa kuhileleke okwenge-
ziwe
Ukuze sibonise ukuthi sikunqume ngempela ukusekela ubukhosi baphezulu, kumelwe sitadishe iZwi likaNku-
lunkulu futhi sigcwalise izingqondo nezinhliziyo zethu ngalo, sizinikezele kuNkulunkulu, sibhapathizwe, bese
siphila ngokuvumelana nalokho okushiwo yilezizinto
Ukubusekela ngempela ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu kuhilela zonke izici zokuphila kwethu, indlela esihamba
ngayo usuku ngalunye (Mik 4:2)
Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi siye sanquma ukusekela ubukhosi baphezulu
Ngakho sisekela ubukhosi obunjalo ngokubonisa ukuthi sibufuna manje, nokuthi sifuna ukwenza izinto nge-
ndlela kaNkulunkulu
EKUPHILENI KWAKHO KWANSUKU ZONKE NASEKUSHUMAYELENI, SEKELA UBUKHOSI BAPHEZU-
LU (20 imiz.)
Asisekeli ubukhosi baphezulu ngokubhubhisa labo abangabunaki noma ababuphikisayo; uNkulunkulu uyobatha-
thela izinyathelo abaphikisi (2Kr 20:15)
Kunezinto eziqondile esingazenza manje ukuze sisekele ubukhosi baphezulu
Hlakulela futhi ubambelele ekuziphatheni okuhle komuntu siqu okusekelwe ezindinganisweni zikaNkulu-
nkulu
Izindinganiso zaphezulu aziyona imfihlo; siyazazi
Zibuze: ‘Ingabe ziyangicasula noma ngiyakuthokozela ukuphila ngokuvumelana nazo?’ (Hu 1:1, 2)
UJehova unguNkulunkulu weqiniso; uyawazonda amanga (Eks 34:6; IzA 6:16-19)
Ingabe silithanda ngempela iqiniso futhi sikhuluma iqiniso ngazo zonke izikhathi? (Efe 4:25)
UNkulunkulu uyakwenqabela ukweba (Eks 20:15)
Ingabe siyakubonisa ukuthi siyawusekela umbono wakhe? (Efe 4:28)
Ukuvuma ukuthi kumelwe silandise kuye njengoMbusi kusho ukubika ngokwethembeka iholo nezindle-
ko, ukubuyisela impahla kubaniniyo, nokungathathi izinto zomqashi noma zomngane ngaphandle kwe-
mvume
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi abantu (abazali noma amaphoyisa) bayasibona noma cha (Heb 13:18)
Ingabe siyayisekela ngempela indinganiso kaNkulunkulu yokuziphatha phakathi kwabobulili obuhlukile?
Iyakwenqabela ukuziphatha okungahlanzekile okufana nobufebe, ukudlala ngothando lomngane wom-
shado womunye, nokunye (Gal 5:19, 21; yyZU 152-6)
Ukwenza lokho bekuyoba ukuthi, ‘Nkulunkulu, angibufuni ubukhosi bakho!’ (Mat 5:28; Heb 13:4)
Phila ukuphila komkhaya okuvumelana nezindlela zaphezulu
Indlela kaNkulunkulu yokubusa isekelwe othandweni
No. 37-ZU
6/92Zinhloko zemikhaya, ingabe ukusebenzelana kwenu nomkenu nabantwana kubonakalisa ubukhosi buka-
Nkulunkulu? (flZU 40-53, 102-6)
Bafazi, ingabe ninenhlonipho ejulile ngabayeni benu njengoba imiBhalo ikhuthaza? (Efe 5:33; flZU 54-69)
Ukwenza okuphambene kuyoba ukwehluleka ukusekela indlela kaNkulunkulu yobukhosi
Bantwana, ingabe niyabufuna ngempela ubukhosi baphezulu?
UNkulunkulu wanikeza abazali umthwalo wemfanelo wokuninakekela; ukuhlubuka kubo kuyosho uku-
thi nimelene nobukhosi bakhe (Efe 6:2, 3; Kol 3:20; flZU 161-70)
Ekusebenzelaneni kwakho nabazalwane abangamaKristu nabanye, kubonakalise ukuthi unqume ukusekela
ubukhosi baphezulu
UNkulunkulu ubeka isibonelo; uthando lwethu kufanele lusishukumisele ukuba senze okuhle hhayi kuba-
fowethu kuphela kodwa nakwabanye; ingabe siyayilingisa indlela yakhe? (Mat 5:44-48; Luk 6:35, 36)
Ingabe akufanele sibonise ukubakhathalela abafowethu ngezindlela ezincane uma sithi sizimisele ukuba-
fela? (Joh 15:12, 13)
Ingabe siyakubonisa ukwamukela indlela kaNkulunkulu yokubusa ngokuba abaphayo nabanomusa ko-
makhelwane, abagugile, nakulabo abanesizungu? (wZU87 6/1 3-13; wZU88 7/15 21-3; wZU82 9/1 3-8 [w82
3/15 3-7])
Ingabe wena siqu usuye walunqoba noma yiluphi ubandlululo lohlanga noma lobuzwe, wazi ukuthi inzo-
ndo ekhulayo ezweni idinga ukuba silwisane nalo ngaso sonke isikhathi? (wZU88 5/15 10-20; gZU88 11/8
18-20 [g88 11/8 20-2])
Lapho singakhethi futhi sibaqonda ngokulinganayo bonke abantu, sibonisa ukuthi siyavumelana no-
Nkulunkulu; sifuna bonke bazuze ukusindiswa (IzE 10:34, 35)
Umsebenzi wokushumayela uyisici esiyinhloko esingabonisa ngaso ukuthi sisekela ukubusa kukaNkulunkulu
Ubukhosi babantu ngokuvamile bushukunyiswa ubugovu; bugcizelela ukuba umuntu azenzele okungcono
Ukubusekela ngempela ubukhosi baphezulu kusho ukusabela othandweni lukaNkulunkulu, ngenjabulo si-
beka umsebenzi wakhe ngaphambili kunokunethezeka kwethu siqu
Kuhilela ukubonisa uthando lwethu ngabantu esikanye nabo, sizikhandle ekubasizeni ukuze bazuze uku-
sindiswa (IzE 20:20, 24)
Manje yisikhathi sokushumayela nokwenza abafundi
Siyasondela ekupheleni kwesimiso esidala; asikho isikhathi sokunciphisa izinga lentshiseko (Luk 21:
34-36)
Uma sikukholelwa ngokujulile ukuthi ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu bungcono kubantu bonke, siyofuna
ukuba bonke abantu bezwe ngabo; siyozikhandla ngokushumayela ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu ngo-
Kristu manje usumisiwe emazulwini (IsAm 11:15)
LABO ABANQUMA UKUSEKELA UBUKHOSI BAPHEZULU BANGASE BABHEKANE NOKUVIVINYWA
OKUNZIMA KOBUQOTHO (10 imiz.)
Ukukhetha ukusekela ubukhosi baphezulu kwenza ukuba umuntu aphikisane nobukhosi bukaSathane
USathane unika ohulumeni bezombangazwe amandla negunya (Joh 12:31; 1Jo 5:19)
UMbuso Wentando Yeningi, ubuKhomanisi, isimiso sokusebenzela uhulumeni, ubushiqela—konke kuyizinhlo-
bo zobukhosi babantu ezisekelwa umthombo ofanayo ongengcwele
Ohulumeni abaningi bazama ukuphoqelela bonke abantu ukuba benze ngokuvumelana nemithetho yabo
Okuhlangenwe nakho kwabafowethu eMalawi nakwamanye amazwe kubonisa ukuthi lokho kungenzeka
(reZU 197)
Izenzo ezinjalo zingase zande njengoba ukushisekela ubuzwe kukhula ngamandla (IsAm 14:9, 10, 12)
Njengoba izizwe zilwela ukuthula kwezwe, zingase zikuphoqelele ukuba udumise futhi usekele ababusi noma
izinhlangano okunengxenye ekuthuleni kwezizwe zonke
Ungazivumeli ukuba ucindezelwe noma ukhohliselwe ukuba uthembele ebukhosini babantu ukuba bulethe uku-
thula nokulondeka kwangempela (1Thes 5:3, 4; wZU87 5/15 18-19; gZU88 4/8 14)
Nakuba siqhubeka silalela umthetho futhi sibahlonipha ababusi, nokho kumelwe silondoloze ubuqotho bethu
kuMbusi wendawo yonke (IzE 5:29)
UKUNQUMA UKUSEKELA UBUKHOSI BAPHEZULU KUYOLETHA IZINZUZO ZAPHAKADE (5 imiz.)
Ukuthula nanoma yiziphi ezinye izinzuzo izizwe ezingase zikulungiselele kuyoba okwesikhashana kuphela ngo-
ba izizwe zidelela uNkulunkulu nelungiselelo lakhe eliphelele lokuletha ukuthula okuhlala njalo
UJehova unguMbusi womhlaba wonke nowendawo yonke (Hu 47:1, 2, 6-8)
Izinzuzo azilungiselela abakhulekeli bakhe beqiniso ziyoba ngezaphakade
Ubukhosi bakhe bufanelwe ukusekela kwethu kwaphakade
Kubalulekile ukuba manje sibuqaphele ubukhosi baphezulu, sibonise ukuthi sinqume ukubamukela ubukhosi ba-
phezulu ngokuzinikezela nangokubhapathizwa, futhi siphile ukuphila kwethu ngokuvumelana nalokho (Hu 46:
8-11)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 37-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45YENZA NGOKUHLAKANIPHA NJENGOBA UKUPHELA KUSONDELA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siyazi ukuthi ukuphela kwalelizwe sekuseduze. Bonisana nezilaleli ngendlela ukubaluleka kwaleloqiniso okufa-
nele kuthinte ngayo ukuphila kwethu. Ingabe esikukhethayo nezinqumo zethu kubonisa ukuthi siyaqaphela uku-
thi lokho esikwenzayo manje kuthinta ikusasa lethu, ukuphila noma ukufa kwethu?
ISIZATHU ESENZA UKUBA SAZI UKUTHI UKUPHELA SEKUSEDUZE (6 imiz.)
OFakazi BakaJehova bayakholiseka ngokuthi ukuphela kwalesimiso esibi sekuseduze
Lokhu kufanele ukucatshangelwa, njengoba kuyindaba yokufa nokuphila
Isintu asinakukwazi ukuqhubeka enkambweni yaso yamanje
“Njengoba umuntu ephokophelele eshumini lokugcina leminyaka lekhulu lama-20, uzithola esesikhathini
senguquko esibucayi: izenzo zalabo abaphilayo manje ziyonquma isikhathi esizayo, futhi ngokunokwenze-
ka, khona kanye ukusinda kwezinto eziphilayo. ‘Asinazo izizukulwane, sineminyaka kuphela, esingazama
kuyo ukwenza izinguquko ezinkulu,’ kuxwayisa uLester Brown, umongameli weWorldwatch Institute ezi-
nze eWashington” (Time 1/2/89 30)
Izinkinga zihlanganisa ukuntuleka kokudla okwandayo, ukwanda kwenani labantu okungaqashelwe, uku-
ntuleka kwamanzi, imiphumela yokungcola, imithombo yosizo enganele, ngisho nokusongelwa kokutho-
lakala komoya-mpilo (gZU80 3/8 21-9 [g79 9/22 4-10]; gZU90 2/8 31)
Ubufakazi bubonisa ukuthi sisezinsukwini zokugcina ezabikezelwa eBhayibhelini (gmZU 134-48)
 ́
THINA NGABANYE SIBHEKENE NEMIBUZO ENGATHI S INA (5 imiz.)
Iyiphi inkambo okuwukuhlakanipha ukuyilandela? Singayithola kuphi impendulo?
Ingabe kufanele uphendukele kubantu noma kuNkulunkulu?
Ingabe ososayensi baye bazixazulula izinkinga zomuntu, noma ingabe baye basiza ekuletheni usizi lwamanje?
(reZU 94; g82 11/8 4-5)
Ubani ozazi kangcono izidingo zomuntu?

Ingabe uNkulunkulu akayazi kangcono imijikelezo nemithombo yengcebo engokwemvelo? (Job 38:4, 24, 28,
34-36)
Ingabe uNkulunkulu uyoletha ukuphela kulesimiso futhi amise isimiso esisha?
Ingabe akufanele ubheke kuNkulunkulu? (Hu 24:1, 2; 25:4; 32:7, 8)
Bangobani abantu okufanele uzihlanganise nabo manje?
Abashisekeli benguquko yezenhlala-kahle? Ososayensi abazama ukuxazulula izinkinga?
UNkulunkulu uhlela inkambo yokuhlakanipha ngalabo abalindele ukusinda
Kuwukuhlakanipha ukuzihlanganisa nalabo abalandela lenkambo (Hu 14:1; IzA 13:20)
ISIDINGO SOKUHLUZEKA KWENGQONDO, UKWENZA NGOKUHLAKANIPHA NJENGOBA UKUPHELA
KUSONDELA (5 imiz.)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli esikweyoku-1 Petru 4:7 sifaneleka ngokukhethekile manje
Kungenzeka siye sasebenza ngendlela elinganiselwe ekuqaleni uma kuqhathaniswa nesimo samanje (wZU75
12/1 542 [w75 340])
Sabhalwa cishe ngo-62-64 C.E., ngokushesha nje ngaphambi kokuphela kwesimiso sobuJuda ngo-70 C.E.
Ngokwenza ngokuhlakanipha, amaKristu eJerusalema akwazi ukusinda (wZU86 8/15 19)
AmaKristu akwamanye amazwe ayezobe ekulungele lokho kuphela ngokwengqondo futhi akwazi ukwenza
ukulungisa okudingekile (1Pet 1:1)
Eyoku-1 Petru 4:7 isebenza ngokuyinhloko osukwini lwethu
UPetru wagcizelela isikhathi ‘sokwambulwa’ kukaJesu (1Pet 1:7; 4:13)
Ingabe sizilungiselela ukuba sisinde? Ingabe senza ukulungisa ukuze silungele ukuphila ezweni elisha?
(bwZU 181-2)
YENZA NGOKUHLAKANIPHA UKUZE UZUZE UKUVUNYELWA UNKULUNKULU (20 imiz.)
Hlakulela ukuthobela ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu ngokusuka enhliziyweni
Ukuphila kuxhomeke kuNkulunkulu; unguMthombo welanga, umoya, ukudla, wona kanye amandla ethu oku-
phila
Nsuku zonke kufanele silwele ukumlalela

134-7)

No. 38-ZU
6/92Kulungele manje ukuphila ezweni elisha
Singakulindela ukuba nezambulo ezintsha zentando yakhe ngalesosikhathi (IsAm 20:11, 12; reZU 298-300;
wZU73 12/15 559 [w73 364])
Uma ezinhliziyweni zethu sifuna ukulalela uNkulunkulu manje, cishe siyoba nombono ofanayo ezweni elisha
Uma manje silalela ngokukhononda, ekuhambeni kwesikhathi singase sihlubuke ngisho nasezweni elisha
AmaIsrayeli awela uLwandle Olubomvu kodwa ngokushesha akhononda (Eks 16:1, 2)
Bonisa ubuntu bobuKristu beqiniso, ulwisane nokuthambekela okubi
Gwema izifiso zobugovu (1Pet 5:6; wZU88 8/15 3-7); ubuvila (Heb 6:11)
Hlakulela izithelo zomoya (Gal 5:22, 23)
Uvuko alubushintshi ubuntu bomuntu (lp 175-6)
Zibuze: ‘Ngingumuntu onjani? Ingabe ngibonisa isithakazelo esingafanele kumngane womshado womunye?
Ingabe ngilusebenzisa ngokweqile uphuzo oludakayo? Ingabe nginobuntu obuthanda ukubusa obabanye?’
Manje yisikhathi sokwenza ngokuhlakanipha ngokulungisa ukuthambekela okungalungile
Kuphaphamele ukuthandaza (1Pet 4:7)
Ingabe unobuhlobo obuseduze noJehova, obufakazelwa imithandazo yansuku zonke? (Hu 86:3)
Kufanele sisondele kuNkulunkulu ngisho nangezindaba zokuphila zomuntu siqu kakhulu
Ukusondelana noNkulunkulu kuyokushukumisela ukuba wenze lokho afuna ukuba ukwenze
Ungayeki ukwenza okufanele ukwenze, ugxile kulokhu kuphila kwamanje
Ungagxili emfundweni, umhlala-phansi, ukunethezeka
Ingabe unenkinga kulokhu? Thululela isifuba sakho kuNkulunkulu (Kol 4:2)
Gxila ezibusisweni nasezithembisweni zikaNkulunkulu ezingokomoya
IBhayibheli alizichazi ngokuningiliziwe izici eziningi ezibonakalayo zezwe elisha—izindlu zokuhlala, ezokuha-
mba, ukuxhumana, izembatho
Gxilisa ukunakekela ezibusisweni ezingokomoya (Hu 85:10-13)
Amalungiselelo angokwenyama ayoba ngajabulisayo
Izinto ezingokomoya ziyoletha injabulo enkulu kunazo zonke
Labo abahlakulela lomoya manje ngempela bayofaneleka emalungiselelweni ezweni elisha (lp 158-64; tpZU
106-7)
MANJE ISIKHATHI SOKUBA SONKE SITHATHE ISINYATHELO (9 imiz.)
UPetru wayesiqaphela lesidingo (2Pet 3:11-13)
Wayehlala ekhumbula umsebenzi wakhe wobuKristu futhi wenza ngokuvumelana nawo
Njengoba ukuphela kusondela, akufanele yini senze ngokuhlakanipha? (wZU86 5/1 18-20; sl 307-9)

Hhayi ukuba khona nje emihlanganweni

Kungaba lula ukubuyela emuva esimisweni esibi esilindele ukuba sibhujiswe

No. 38-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45QINISEKA NGOKUNQOBA KWAPHEZULU!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zakho ukuba zibone ukuthi kubalulekile ukuba zingagcini nje ngokwazi iqiniso kodwa ziqiniseke ngo-
kuphelele ngesigijimi esisithwele. Esikwenzayo ngokuphila kwethu kubonisa ukuthi siyaqiniseka yini ngempela
ngokunqoba kukaJehova kwaphezulu okuzayo noma cha
“UKUNQOBA KWAPHEZULU” KUSHO UKUTHINI? (4 imiz.)
Sizwa ngezimpi nangemibiko yezimpi, njengoba uJesu abikezela (Mat 24:6, 7; gmZU 136-8; reZU 93-5)
Umphumela wempi ethile ngokuvamile awuqinisekile
Abantu nabaholi bangase baqiniseke ngokunqoba kodwa bahlangabezane nokunqotshwa okumangalisayo
Yisiphi isisekelo sokuqiniseka abantu abanaso ngempela?
OFakazi BakaJehova bashumayela kabanzi ngempi ezayo phakathi kwamabutho kaNkulunkulu nalabo abame-
lene nobukhosi baphezulu
Iyoba yingxenye ‘yosizi olukhulu’ (Mat 24:21)
ImiBhalo ibonisa ukunqoba kukaNkulunkulu okuphelele (IsAm 6:2; 17:14; 19:11-21)
Lokhu kuyokwenzeka, njengoba nje kuqinisekile ukuthi kunoMbusi Waphezulu
Futhi iBhayibheli lithi umphumela uyoba ukuqedwa kwababusi abonakele, nabezentengiselwano abaxhapha-
za abantu (Hu 37:10; gZU84 7/8 30 [g84 1/22 9])
Ukunqoba kwaphezulu kusho ukubhujiswa kwabaningi, kodwa kuthiwani ngathi?
INGABE UYOZUZA EKUNQOBENI KWAPHEZULU? (6 imiz.)
Lapho kungumuntu onqobile empini, ubukhosi obusha ngokuvamile buba bubi ngendlela efanayo noma ngokwe-
dlulele kunalobo obunqotshiwe
Lapho uNkulunkulu enguMnqobi, izinzuzo ziba eziphelele
Akashukunyiswa ubugovu bokuthola indawo noma abantu azobaxhaphaza
UJehova unguMbusi Wendawo Yonke onothando ofanelwe ukukhulekela kwethu (IsAm 4:11)
Ukunqoba kukaNkulunkulu kuyozuzisa abasinde osizini olukhulu, labo abasekela ubukhosi baphezulu (IsAm
7:14-17)
Ngeke bayizwe intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu evuthayo (reZU 126-7)
Bayothola ukuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu, ukuqabuleka okukhulu; bayokwazi ukuhlanganyela emalungisele-
lweni okuphila okuphakade
IBhayibheli libonisa ezinye izibusiso eziningi zalabo abazuzayo ekunqobeni kwaphezulu (IsAm 21:3, 4; reZU
303)
Ngisho namanje singazuza (1Ti 4:8; w78 10/1 29-30; wZU81 10/15 4-8 [w81 5/1 4-8])
Singajabulela ukuphila komkhaya okuthuthukisiwe ngenxa yokusebenzisa izimiso zaphezulu
Sibe nobudlelwano obakhayo nabantu esingabethemba nabayosisiza ngenjabulo
Singathola ukuthula kwengqondo nenjongo ekuphileni ngokuhlanganyela manje ekwenzeni intando kaNku-
lunkulu (Fil 4:6, 7)
Ukuze sithole lezinzuzo, kumelwe sivumelanise ukuphila kwethu nezindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu futhi simele
ukukhulekela kweqiniso
Ukwazi ngokunqoba kwaphezulu okuzayo nangethuba lokuthola izinzuzo zako kufanele kusishukumisele
enkambweni ebonisa ukuqiniseka
INGABE UKUQINISEKA KWAKHO KUKUTHINTA NGEMPELA UKUPHILA KWAKHO? (9 imiz.)
Kulula ukuba nomuzwa wokuthi, ‘ngiyaqiniseka ngokunqoba kwaphezulu!’ Kodwa, ingabe lokho kuqiniseka ku-
yabonakala ngempela kukho konke ukuphila kwakho?
Umuntu angase asho ngomlomo nje ukuthi usekela okuthile kodwa angakuvumeli ukuba kuthinte ukuphila
kwakhe
Sizoxoxa ngezici ezithile zokuzihlola komuntu siqu; futhi sizocabangela ukuqapha okudingekile ukuze ukuqini-
seka komuntu kungancishiswa kancane kancane
Indaba yenkosi yakwaJuda uAsa ibonisa ukuthi ukuqiniseka komuntu kumelwe kulondolozwe (it-1 183-5; wZU81
7/1 28-31 [w80 12/1 28-30])
UAsa wayekushisekela ukukhulekela okumsulwa (2Kr 14:1-8)
Lapho ehlaselwa isitha esasinamabutho amaningi ukwedlula awakhe, uAsa wayeqiniseka ngosizo lwaphezu-
lu nangokuphumelela (2Kr 14:9-11)
Akazange adunyazwe (2Kr 14:12, 13)
Kamuva lapho esongelwa uBahasha wakwaIsrayeli, ngobuwula uAsa wathembela ekucabangeni kwabantu
noma eselulekweni esibi, waphendukela ekuhilelekeni kwezombangazwe nasemacebweni ozungu (2Kr 16:1-3)
Umprofethi uHanani wadonsela ukunakekela ekuncipheni kokuqiniseka kuka-Asa futhi wabikezela imiphu-
mela emibi (2Kr 16:7-9)
No. 39-ZU
1/96Ngaphezu kokuqiniseka ngokuthi ukuqiniseka kwethu kukuthinta ngempela ukuphila kwethu, kumelwe siqa-
phele ukuba kunganciphi
BONAKALISA UKUQINISEKA NGOKUNQOBA KWAPHEZULU (20 imiz.)
Kubonakalise ekuphileni kwakho ukuthi uyaqiniseka
ngokuthi ukunqoba kwaphezulu kuzokwenzeka ngoku-
 ́
shesha, nakuba singasazi isikhathi ngokuthe ngq o
Kuyinto engokwemvelo ukuba nesithakazelo esicini sesikhathi (Mat 24:3; IzE 1:6)
UJesu akazange anikeze isikhathi esimisiwe; wanxusa abalandeli ukuba babe matasa futhi baqaphe (Mat 24:
36-42)
Uma umuntu ekhonza enomgomo wesikhathi, angase akhathazeke, ‘Kuthiwani uma kungenzeki ngalesosi-
khathi?’
Kungakunciphisa kancane kancane ukuqiniseka ngokuthi ukunqoba kwaphezulu kuyoke kwenzeke
Sinesizathu esihle sokuqiniseka ukuthi isiphelo siseduze (Mat. 24:3; gZU88 4/8 13-14)
Ngokuqonda lokhu, ukuqiniseka komuntu ngeke kunciphe lapho izizwe zikhuluma ngokuthula nokulonde-
ka (1The 5:3, 4; wZU87 5/15 18-20)
Singaqiniseka ngokuthi uNkulunkulu ngeke alibale (Hab 2:3)
Ingabe uyakubonakalisa ukuqiniseka ngokuhlela ukuphila kwakho ngokuvumelana nako?
Ekuphileni kwansuku zonke, ingabe imisebenzi yakho ibonisa ukuthi uyaqiniseka ngokuthi ukunqoba kwa-
phezulu lesimiso esibi samanje kuyokwenzeka ngokushesha? (Jak 2:17)
Ingabe uvumela iminako yokuphila noma isifiso sezinto ezibonakalayo kukubangele ukuba ulahlekelwe umbono
wokunqoba okuzayo nowezwe elisha? (Mat 13:7, 22)
Ukuntuleka kokudla, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi, izindleko zokuphila ezikhulayo, kuyizinkinga ezikhathaza
abantu kakhulu
Asigonyiwe kodwa kufanele sibonise ukwethembela kwethu esiqinisekisweni sikaNkulunkulu sokulungise-
lela abantu bakhe (Mat 6:25-34; Heb 13:5, 6; wZU79 6/15 14-17 [w78 11/15 18-20]; wZU89 12/15 19-20; wZU88
2/15 11-12)
Futhi kumelwe siqaphele ukuba umbono wezwe wokuthi izinto ezithile zokunethezeka zidingeka ngempela
 ́
ungasibangeli ukuba siphile ngal e kwalokho esingakufinyelela (reZU 73; gZU85 3/8 28-31 [w84 5/15 8-11];
gZU88 5/8 18-20 [g88 4/22 4-6])
Ukukhathalela ngokweqile izinto ezibonakalayo kungabangela ukuba umbono wethu ufiphale ngokupha-
thelene nento ebaluleke ngempela—ukuphila njengezinceku zikaJehova ezamukelekayo (1Ti 6:17-19)
Lapho ubuhlobo bethu noNkulunkulu buyinto ebaluleke kunazo zonke, siyokwenza wonke umzamo ukuze sibu-
qinise
UJehova ukhuluma nathi ngeZwi lakhe, embula kulo ubuntu bakhe, izindlela zakhe, nokusebenzelana kwa-
khe nathi
Ingabe siyakulangazelela ukwazi lokho akushoyo, nokulalelisisa amazwi akhe?
Ingabe siyazikhandla ngempela esifundweni somuntu siqu seBhayibheli nezincwadi ezingasisiza ukuba sili-
qonde? (IzA 2:3-5)
Ingabe ‘siyasithengisisa isikhathi’ ukuze senze njalo? (Efe 5:16)
EBhayibhelini, uNkulunkulu ukwenza kucace ukuthi ziyini izimfuneko zakhe kulabo abayothola ukuvunye-
lwa nguye
Ingabe simane sicabange ukuthi konke okungenzeka siyakwenza kuyilokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo?
Sinesifiso esiqotho sokuvumelanisa ukuphila kwethu ngokugcwele nentando kaNkulunkulu, ingabe siya-
qhubeka ngokuzikhandla sihlola iZwi lakhe futhi silisebenzisa kithi uqobo? (Efe 5:10, 17; Jak 1:22-25)
Ingabe ngokunganaki siyakuhlehlisa, noma ngenxa yokukuqaphela ngokujulile ukusondela kwesikhathi so-
kukhishwa kwesahlulelo saphezulu, ingabe manje senza intando kaNkulunkulu ibe ebalulekile ekuphileni
kwethu? (2Pet 3:11, 12)
QHUBEKA WAKHA FUTHI UBONAKALISA UKUQINISEKA ONAKHO NGOKUNQOBA KWAPHEZULU
(6 imiz.)
Yenza izinqumo futhi uqondise ukuphila kwakho ucabanga ngokunqoba kwaphezulu
Loluhlobo lokuhluzeka kwengqondo luyadingeka kithi sonke (Thi 1:7, 8; 2:2-6, qhathanisa neNW)
Sinokuhluzeka kwengqondo futhi siqiniseka ngokunqoba kukaNkulunkulu, singase sisinde ngokunqoba ekuphe-
leni okusondelayo
Okwamanje, sifuna ukuzigcina simatasa sisiza abanye ukuba bazuze ulwazi oluqondile lweqiniso likaNkulu-
nkulu ukuze babe phakathi kwalabo abayohlanganyela ezibusisweni zokunqoba kwaphezulu
Ngisho noma kungafika iziyaluyalu, ukucindezeleka, nezinkinga, ngeke sikhubeke
Siyofana noHabakuki; nakuba athintwa umbiko ocacile kaNkulunkulu ngosuku lwempi kodwa wayezimisele
ukuthokoza ngoJehova (Hab 3:16-18)
Nathi masizimisele ukwenza lokho
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 39-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45LOKHO ISIKHATHI ESIZAYO ESISEDUZE ESIKUPHETHE!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
OFakazi BakaJehova bayakwazi lokho okuphethwe isikhathi esizayo esiseduze, kodwa ungazisiza izilaleli ukuba
zikuqaphele ngokwengeziwe lokhu. Labo abayosinda kumelwe bazilungiselele manje ukwamukela isimo esenze-
kayo futhi basheshe ukuzivumelanisa nesiqondiso esingokwasezulwini
SONKE SINESITHAKAZELO ESIKHATHINI ESIZAYO (6 imiz.)
Ingabe awukhathazekile ngesikhathi sakho esizayo? ngesomkhaya wakho?
Yini okufanele uyifundele esikoleni? Ingabe uyoshada? Ingabe kufanele uthenge indlu? Ingabe kufanele uqa-
lise ibhizinisi lakho? Ingabe kufanele uthuthele kwenye indawo?
Ezinye izinto ezikhathalelwayo ngesikhathi esizayo zingase zibonakale zibaluleke ngokukhethekile
Ingabe ukwehla kwamandla emali kuyobhubhisa ukulondeka kwakho? Uyoyikhokha kanjani intela yendlu
noma ukuthenge kanjani ukudla? Ingabe ukudla kuyophela? (gZU80 7/8 5-18 [g80 1/22 5-15]) Ingabe izi-
ngozi empilweni nasekulondekeni kwakho ziyokwanda? Ingabe izizwe zingakuvimbela ukugqashuka kwe-
zimpi? (gZU90 5/22 28; gZU90 9/8 7)
Abaningi bafuna izimpendulo ezindabeni noma kubahlaziyi bezimali, abezombangazwe, ososayensi; abanye ba-
phendukela esayensini yezinkanyezi, ne-ESP
IBhayibheli linokuningi elikushoyo ngesikhathi esizayo—hhayi ukuqagela, kodwa ulwazi oluyiqiniso oluvela ku-
Lowo owazi ngokuqondile (Isa 42:9; 46:9, 10)
Labikezela izimpi, ubugebengu, ukuntuleka kokudla esizukulwaneni sethu
Yini esazokuza? Iyokuthinta kanjani wena? Ingabe isikhathi sakho esizayo siyojabulisa?
IZWI LIKANKULUNKULU LEMBULA ISIKHATHI ESIZAYO ESISEDUZE (10 imiz.)
Ukugcwaliseka ‘kwesibonakaliso’ esihlanganisa izici eziningi kubonisa ukuthi sisesiphelweni sesimiso sezinto
(Mat 24:3, 7-14)
IBhayibheli lenza amaKristu akwazi ukunemba ngokuphathelene nonyaka wokuzalwa koMbuso ezulwini ngo-
1914, nezenzakalo eziyolandela (tpZU 70; gZU90 6/8 20 [g89 7/8 20])
Izizwe manje zibuthelwa ekubhujisweni eHarmagedoni (wZU90 5/15 3-7)
Abalungile bayolondolozwa; kulandele umhlaba omusha
Yini ezokwenzeka phakathi kwesikhathi samanje nesokuphela? Izenzakalo ezine eziyisisekelo:
(1) Isimo sezizwe zonke esibonakala senza isimemezelo sokuthula nokulondeka sifaneleke; lokhu kuyoba isi-
bonakaliso sokugcina sokuthi imbubhiso yezwe isizoqala (1Thes 5:3; tpZU 84; gZU88 4/8 14; wZU91 9/1 5-6)
(2) Beshukunyiswa izenzakalo ezithile, abezombangazwe ngokushesha bayoliphendukela futhi balibhubhise
iBabiloni Elikhulu, umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga, kuqale “usizi olukhulu” (IsAm 7:14; 17:16; 18:8, 21;
wZU89 4/15 14-15; reZU 256-7, 269)
(3) Ebona izikhonzi zikaJehova ezingamaKristu zihleli ngokuthula, uSathane (uGogi) uyoqondisa ukuhlasela
okunonya ngokumelene nazo esebenzisa izizwe (Hez 38:11, 16; kj 361; sl 258-9; wZU88 9/15 25-6)
(4) Ngenxa yalokho, uJehova uyoletha ingxenye yokugcina yosizi, ukubhujiswa kwabo bonke abaphikisi aba-
sasele emhlabeni empini yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke, kulandelwa ukuphonswa ku-
kaSathane namademoni kwalasha (Hez 38:18-22; kj 366-7; sl 262, 265; wZU90 5/15 6; wZU88 9/15 26)
Khona-ke uNkulunkulu uyoletha umhlaba omusha ngaphansi koMbuso kaKristu weminyaka eyinkulungwane;
nalokho futhi kuphethwe yisikhathi esizayo
ISIKHATHI ESIZAYO ESICHAZWA YIBHAYIBHELI SIQINISEKILE (8 imiz.)
Ubufakazi obuningi bufakazela ukuthi uMbuso wazalwa ngo-1914 (IsAm 12:5, 10)
UKristu manje ubusa njengeNkosi ezulwini, njengoba kuboniswa ukubalwa kwezikhathi zeBhayibheli (Hu 110:
1, 2; w84 4/15 3-4)
Ukugcwaliseka ‘kwesibonakaliso’ sokuba khona kukaKristu kufakazela ukuthi isikhathi esizayo esiseduze sihla-
nganisa ukupheliswa ngokuphelele kwalesimiso esibi (Mat 24:3; wZU78 8/1 8-10 [w78 1/15 8-10]; gZU74 4/22 11-
15 [g73 10/8 16-22])
Isikhathi esizayo esiseduze sihlanganisa izenzakalo ezine esixoxe ngazo
NgamaKristu eqiniso, isikhathi esizayo esiseduze sihlanganisa ukusindela emhlabeni omusha
Sihlanganisa nethemba lokuphila okuphakade ePharadesi (Zef 2:2, 3; wZU76 6/15 282-4 [w75 681-3])
LUNGELA LOKHO ISIKHATHI ESIZAYO ESISEDUZE ESIKUPHETHE (9 imiz.)
Ngokwanda kwezinkinga, kulula ukuba sizivumele zifune ukunaka kwethu okugcwele
Izimali, izinkinga esikoleni, ukuthola ukudla, ukungabikho kobulungisa kwezenhlalo, ukonakala kwezomba-
ngazwe, njalonjalo, kungase kuphambukise umuntu, kufiphaze umbono wakhe ngesikhathi esizayo
Kungase kwenzeke ngisho nakumKristu onesikhathi eside eseqinisweni
No. 40-ZU
1/96Kunalokho, izinkinga ezandayo kufanele ziqinise ukholo nethemba lethu (Jak 1:2, 3)
Ithemba liyosenza sikwazi ukumelana nokucindezeleka neziphazamiso
Sikholelwa ngokuqinile ukuthi manje sisesikhathini ‘sokuba-khona’ kukaJesu okungabonakali (Jak 5:8; wZU75
6/15 285-8 [w75 9-11])
Kumelwe sihlale siphapheme, silindele isikhathi ‘esizayo’ esiyosusa bonke ububi emhlabeni (Mat 24:36-42; ka
332-5; suZU 50, 53)
Njengoba sisazi isikhathi esizayo esiseduze, akufanele sithuswe izinto ezenzekayo
Isimemezelo sesikhashana sokuthula nokulondeka ngeke sisikhohlise (wZU77 1/15 41-2 [w76 441-2]; tpZU 84-5;
wZU87 5/15 17-19)
Izwe liyokhohliswa kodwa hhayi abakhulekeli bakaJehova abazinikezele
Njengoba kuphela inkolo yamanga, kungase kube khona umonakalo omkhulu, nokuchitheka kwegazi oku-
khulu
Ngokunokwenzeka kungaba khona ukuphazamiseka kokutholakala kokudla, nobudlova phakathi kwaba-
ntu abanobugovu
Kungase kube khona ubunzima obukhulu obungokomnotho ezincekwini zikaNkulunkulu
Njengoba sesixwayisiwe, siyolindela uJehova (Hab 3:17, 18; wZU74 5/1 211-13 [w73 758-9]; gZU81 2/8 5-8
[g80 8/22 5-8])
UNGASIJABULELA ISIKHATHI ESIZAYO SAPHAKADE (12 imiz.)
Usizi olukhulu luyophelisa emhlabeni labo abangeke bamkhulekele uNkulunkulu (2Thes 1:6-9)
Labo abavunyelwa uNkulunkulu, esikhathini esizayo esiseduze, bayongena emhlabeni ohlanziwe, oyoqhubeka
uba ngcono
Kuyoba nomsebenzi omningi wokukhuculula okuye kwasala ekubhujisweni, ukulungisa izindawo zokuhlala,
ukulima ukudla (Hez 39:9-13; wZU89 8/15 14)
Impilo iyothuthuka
Abantu ngeke bapheleliswe ngokushesha; nakuba kunjalo, kuyoba yisikhathi senjabulo eyandayo (IsAm
20:5; wZU91 12/15 12; reZU 290; rsZU 413-14)
Sibonakalisa ubuKristu manje; lokhu kusisiza ukuba sibhekane nezinkinga ngokuphumelelayo; kuyoba njalo
nasesimisweni sezinto esisha
Ukuhlakulela izimfanelo ezinhle manje kuyosheshisa izinguquko zangemuva kweArmagedoni (lp 171-4)
Izibusiso zesikhathi esidlule zinikeza isibonakaliso sezinto ezizayo (lp 143-56)
Ziyohlanganisa impilo, ukudla, inkululeko, kanye nomsebenzi owanelisayo (tpZU 96-104)
Akukho kungabaza ngalokho isikhathi esizayo esiseduze esikuphethe; izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu ziqinisekile
(IsAm 21:5; reZU 303-4)
Lokho esikuphathele khona wena kuxhomeke kulokho okwenzayo manje (tpZU 91-3)
Qhubeka uzuza ulwazi oluqondile
Thuthukela ekuzinikezeleni kuJehova, ubhapathizwe
Uma usubhapathiziwe kakade, thuthukisa ukukhulekela kweqiniso ngomphefumulo wonke
Yenza ulwazi lwakho ngesikhathi esizayo lulolonge ukuphila kwakho manje (wZU80 12/1 5-7 [w80 6/1 8-10])
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 40-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45“YIMANI NIBONE UKUSINDISA KUKAJEHOVA”
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Njengoba iArmagedoni iseduze, siza izilaleli zibone isidingo sokholo nokulalela. Ukusinda kwethu kuyoxhomeka
ekushesheni kwethu ukulalela imiyalo ethile
ISINTU SIKUKHATHALELA NGOKUFANELEKILE LOKHO OKUSAZOKWENZEKA (5 imiz.)
Izinkinga zembulunga yonke ziholela izazi ezithile ukuba zixwayise ngokuthi uhlanga lwesintu lusengozini enku-
lu (gZU90 2/8 31)
Ukuwohloka kwalesimiso ngeke kubangelwe izinkinga zaso—ukuminyana kwabantu, indlala, ukungcoliswa
komhlaba, izimpi, njalonjalo—kodwa kuyobangelwa uNkulunkulu, ‘osizini olukhulu’ (Mat 24:3, 21)
Ingxenye yokugcina iyoba “impi yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke” (IsAm 16:14; Jow 3:
12, 13)
Kuyoba yini ukuma kwakho kuleyompi yaphezulu ezayo? Ingabe kuyolindeleka ukuba ulwe?
Ubafundisani abantwana bakho nabanye ngalokhu?
Ukwazi umbono ofanelekile kubalulekile, ngoba sifuna ukuzilungiselela futhi sisinde (wZU86 12/15 24  ̊14)
Impi ekaNkulunkulu, ngakho-ke kunengqondo ukuba sibheke kuyena ukuze sithole impendulo
UYOKWENZANI KULEYOMPI YOKUGCINA? (16 imiz.)
Ngokuvamile empini abantu bathatha uhlangothi oluthile futhi balwe ngokoqobo
Abanye bazama ukubaleka enkundleni yempi ukuze baphephe
Impi yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu iyoba eyomhlaba wonke, ngakho-ke ngeke sikwazi ukubalekela enda-
weni yokungathathi-hlangothi noma esizweni esingathathi-hlangothi
Ingabe abantu abakhetha uhlangothi lukaNkulunkulu kuyolindeleka ukuba balwe baphelise ababi?
Lapho amaJuda esengabantu bakaNkulunkulu, ayenebutho futhi alwa izimpi ezingokwasezulwini lapho eyalwa
ukuba enze kanjalo
UJehova wawanikeza igunya lokulwa nezakhamuzi ezingamaqaba zeZwe Lesithembiso
Enza kanjalo ngaphansi kokuholwa uJoshuwa nangosizo lukaNkulunkulu (Dut 7:1, 2; Jos 10:40-42)
UDavide futhi wafuna ukuqondisa kukaNkulunkulu lapho ehola amabutho kaIsrayeli empini (1Kr 14:10, 16)
Ingabe lokhu kungumfuziselo wamaKristu, obonisa ukuthi siyohlanganyela ekulweni eArmagedoni?
Isibonelo esifundisayo senzeka kuIsrayeli ngaphansi kukaJehoshafati (wZU85 2/15 25-31 [w84 7/1 13-19])
Lapho izizwe eziyizitha zisondela, naye futhi wafuna ukuqondisa kukaNkulunkulu (2Kr 20:1, 5, 6, 10-12)
UNkulunkulu waphendula ngomLevi ogama lakhe uJahaziyeli (2Kr 20:14-17)
Ebonga ukuqondisa kukaNkulunkulu, uJehoshafati walalela futhi wanqoba (2Kr 20:18, 20)
Ngokungenela kukaJehova, amabutho esitha ahlaselana wodwa
Lokhu kwaholela ekutheni abulalane wodwa ngaphandle kwesidingo sokuba amaIsrayeli alwe (2Kr 20:22-24)
UIsrayeli wadumisa, noma wabonga uNkulunkulu (iBerakha isho “ukubonga”) (2Kr 20:26)
Kufakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyakwazi ukunqoba izitha ngaphandle kokuba izinceku zakhe zilwe
Ingabe lokhu kungumfuziselo ‘wokulwa kosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke’? (IsAm
16:14)
ImiBhalo YamaKristu YesiGreki ibonisa ukuthi eyesi-2 IziKronike 20:17 iwumfuziselo walokho okuzokwenziwa
abantu bakaNkulunkulu namuhla
IsAmbulo siveza ukuthi amabutho asezulwini kuphela ahlanganyela empini njengabasekeli bakaJesu Kristu
(IsAm 17:14; 19:11-16)
Ngaleyondlela, eyesi-2 IziKronike 20:17 iyiseluleko okudingeka sisikhumbule
KUMELWE SILANDELE IZIYALEZO ZIKANKULUNKULU (12 imiz.)
Sinemiyalo eqondile evela kuNkulunkulu esitshela lokho okumelwe sikwenze nalokho okungamelwe sikwenze
Emuva ngalesosikhathi amaJuda ayedinga ukulalela imiyalo yokuhlela kaJehoshafati
Ayengenakucabanga ukuthi, njengoba kwakungeke kudingeke alwe, ayengazihlalela emakhaya anakekele
umkhaya, amasimu, noma ibhizinisi
‘Ukuzihlela nokuma’ kwadinga ukulalela okunjengokungathi batshelwe ukuba balwe
Ingabe nathi siyozilandela iziyalezo?
Lapho sibona ababi bebhujiswa, singase silingeke ukuba sibonakalise imizwa yokuziphindiselela ngenxa yeze-
nzo zokungabi nabulungisa zangesikhathi esidlule
Ukuze sibone ukuthi sithambekele yini ekushiyeleni izindaba kuNkulunkulu, sisabela kanjani manje ezenzwe-
ni zokungabi nabulungisa?
Ukungabikho kobulungisa nokuphathwa kabi kuholela abapristi abaningi nabefundisi beLobukholwa uku-
ba babhikishe futhi balwele izinguquko (gZU87 5/8 22-3 [g87 4/22 3-4]; wZU86 7/15 27)
Ingabe sinokuthambekela okufanayo?
No. 41-ZU
7/92Asizange simiswe ukuba sibe abahluleli (2Thes 1:6-9; Heb. 10:30)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli siwukungathathi-hlangothi nokubheka kuNkulunkulu ukuze sithole ikhambi (Joh 17:
14, 16)
Esikhundleni sokuxoxa ngalokho izinhlangano zabantu namaqembu okumelwe akwenze, kumelwe siqondise
ukunakekela eMbusweni njengekhambi elidingekayo
Ngokwenza kanjalo, sithatha “ukuma” kwethu futhi silandela iziyalezo
Siyalwa ukuba ‘silukhumbule njalo usuku lukaJehova’ (2Pet 3:11-13, NW)
Ingabe indlela yakho yokuphila manje ibonakalisa ukukholelwa ukuthi lolosuku lukaJehova luseduze?
Ingabe ukukhonza uNkulunkulu sikubheka njengento engasho lutho, eyenziwa ngezikhathi ezithile, noma nje-
ngendaba ebalulekile efanelwe imizamo yethu engcono kakhulu, sikwenza kube yinto eza kuqala ekuphile-
ni, ngokuzilibazisa, umsebenzi wokuziphilisa, izinto esizijabulisa ngazo njalonjalo, kube yizinto eziza kamu-
va? (bwZU 185)
Ingabe sizimisele yini ukwamukela isikhathi esimiswe uNkulunkulu nendlela asingatha ngayo izindaba?
Yena uyasazi isikhathi esingcono kakhulu sokuletha isiphelo; asikho isidingo sokuzama ukuqagela lokho
ahlose ukukwenza (2Pet 3:8, 9; bwZU 173-6; wZU74 7/15 330 [w74 56-7])
Kumelwe siqhubeke nesabelo sokushumayela (Rom 10:10, 18)
Abanye baye bacabanga ukuthi kukhona isikhathi lapho siyoyeka khona ukushumayela sizihlalele nje, sili-
ndele isiphelo
IBhayibheli kalula nje lisitshela ukuba sishumayele kuze kufike isiphelo (wZU88 1/1 25-6, 28-9; wZU88 7/15
10-11)
Abanye bayazibuza ukuthi siyobe sithini isigijimi sethu njengoba sisondela ‘osukwini lwempindiselo’ (Isa 61:2)
Kakade sinikeza isigijimi esinamandla; kumelwe siphaphamele isiqondiso esingokwasezulwini njengoba isi-
phelo sisondela
Ngeke siyeke ukukhuluma ngoNkulunkulu nezinjongo zakhe
Siyolandisa ngezenzo zakhe futhi sikhulume ngezinjongo zakhe kuze kube phakade (2Kr 20:21)
Manje kufanele ‘sikhathalele izwi, sifakaze’ (IzE 18:5; wZU76 539-41 [w76 345-6])
QINISA ITHEMBA LAKHO MANJE (12 imiz.)
Ngezinye izikhathi emlandweni wawo, amaIsrayeli alahlekelwa ukwethembela kwawo kuNkulunkulu; kwanga-
thi kungebe njalo ngathi (Isa 30:15)
Sebenza manje ukuze wenze ithemba lakho liqine
 ́
Indlela izinto ezizokwenzeka ngayo phakathi nesikhathi samanje nomhlaba omusha ingase ingafani ns e nalo-
kho thina ebesikulindele
Uma ithemba lethu liqinile, ngeke sikhubeke
Ubunzima obuba khona bungase bube nethonya kithi (Hab 3:17; wZU74 5/1 211-13 [w73 758-9])
Kungase kube izinto ngokwemvelo eziyobangela ukucindezeleka nokukhathazeka
Kuyodingeka sithembeke futhi sibekezele, ‘sime’ sinethemba kuNkulunkulu (2Kr 20:17, 20; Hab 3:16, 18)
Ngokwethembela ekuphumeleleni kwezinjongo zikaNkulunkulu—kuhlanganise nenjongo yokusindisa isixuku
esikhulu—ngeke sikhubeke lapho kwenzeka izinto ebesingazilindele
Futhi ngeke sivumele ukucindezeleka kushintshe ubuhlobo bethu noJehova (Heb 10:37-39)
Namuhla nasesikhathini esizayo sidinga amandla esingawathola ngokuhlanganyela namaKristu akanye nathi
AmaJuda asendulo ngaphansi kukaJehoshafati aphuma ahamba njengabantu abahlangene (wZU85 2/15 30  ̊16
[w84 7/1 18  ̊16])
Ingabe uyingxenye yabakhulekeli abahlangene manje? (Heb 10:24, 25)
Qaphela ukuthi ngisho namanje uNkulunkulu usindisa abantu bakhe (Gal 1:4)
Uyasisiza ukuba singabi yingxenye yesimiso esibi
Ngisho noma isitha singambulala umKristu, uNkulunkulu angawalondoloza amathemba aphakade alowom-
Kristu (Mat 10:28)
Sidinga ukuba sohlangothini lukaJehova; singazindeli ekwenzeni isinqumo
Akuhlanganisi nje ukuzinikezela nobhapathizo kuphela kodwa ukulingisa izindlela zikaNkulunkulu noku-
lalela imiyalo yakhe (Jak 1:22)
Ngaleyondlela siyoba ngabakulungele ukuba phakathi kwabantu bakhe abalalelayo, abayosebenzisa eyesi-2 Izi-
Kronike 20:17 phakathi nosizi olukhulu
Abanjalo bayobona ukusindisa kukaJehova futhi bamdumise phakade

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INDLELA UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU OKUTHINTA NGAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Vusa ukwazisa ngeqiniso lokuthi labo abasekela uMbuso ngokwethembeka abashumayeli kuphela izindaba ezi-
nhle zokumiswa koMbuso kodwa baphila ukuphila okuvumelana nemithetho yalowoMbuso
UKUBUSA KUKANKULUNKULU AKUKHO NAKANCANE EZINGQONDWENI ZABANTU ABANINGI
(4 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi banombono wezinto ezibonakalayo; bacabanga kuphela ngalokho abantu abangakwenza (gZU71
9/8 9-11 [w71 99-100]; w71 132; wZU79 9/1 7-8 [w79 7/1 17-18])
Lapho betshelwa ngoMbuso kaNkulunkulu, ngokuvamile bacabanga ngokuthile okukwelinye izwe
Nokho, isimo sesintu sibonisa ukuthi lapha emhlabeni sidinga usizo oluvela eMthonjeni ophakeme; iBhayibheli
likhomba kulolosizo (gZU85 8/8 26-31 [g85 7/22 3-8])
IBHAYIBHELI LIQONDISA UKUNAKEKELA EMBUSWENI KANKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
UJesu wafundisa abalandeli bakhe ukuba bathandazele uMbuso kaNkulunkulu, bafune wona kuqala (Mat 6:10, 33)
Uyini lowoMbuso? Unguhulumeni ongokoqobo onababusi abasebenzisa igunya besezulwini
Injongo kaNkulunkulu iwukuba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi loMbuso ube yiwona kuphela owuhulumeni waso
sonke isintu (IsAm 5:10)
Ngaso sonke isikhathi, uJesu akazange ahileleke ezindabeni zohulumeni bosuku lwakhe (Luk 4:5-8; Joh 6:15)
Wakhuthaza ukuba kulalelwe umthetho wezwe kodwa wazinikela ngokwakhe ekushumayeleni ngoMbuso
(Mat 4:17; 22:21)
UJesu ngokwakhe wayenguMesiya, egcotshwe uNkulunkulu ukuba abe yiNkosi (wZU82 4/1 22  ̊8 [w82 2/1 21  ̊8])
UJohane uMbhapathizi washumayela ukuthi uMbuso ‘usondele’ (Mat 3:2)
Ngenxa yokuthi uJesu wayephakathi kwabo, uMbuso ‘wawuphakathi kwabo’ (Luk 17:21; it-2 167; gZU89 1/8
31 [g88 12/22 24]; rsZU 356)
Ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene uJesu wabonisa izinga legunya leNkosi kaJehova yobuMesiya
Ngomoya kaNkulunkulu, uJesu wayenamandla phezu komoya nolwandle, izitshalo, izinhlanzi nokudla (Mar
4:39; 8:1-9; 11:20, 21)
UJesu futhi wayenamandla phezu kwemizimba yabantu—ephulukisa izimpumputhe, izithulu, izishosha, na-
banezifo ezithile
Wavusa abafileyo futhi wakhipha amademoni kulabo ababephethwe yiwona (Mat 12:28)
Kokubili ngokufundisa kwakhe nangesibonelo, uJesu wayenza yacaca indlela efanelekile yokuphila nokukhu-
lekela (Jer 10:23; 1Pet 2:21)
Lokho akufundisa kwakungeyona imiqondo yabantu abangaphelele kodwa kwakuyizwi likaNkulunkulu
uMdali, oyaziyo injongo yokuba khona kwethu (Joh 8:28, 29)
Manje njengoba avuswa kwabafileyo wenyuselwa ezulwini, uyakwazi ukusingatha izindaba zaso sonke isintu
(Efe 1:19b-21)
Uhulumeni onjengaloMbuso ungazixazulula ngempela izinkinga zesintu, futhi uyozixazulula (rsZU 357-62)
ISIKHATHI UMBUSO OWAQALA NGASO UKUSEBENZISA AMANDLA AWO (10 imiz.)
Funda abaseKolose 1:13. Ingabe lokhu kubhekisela esenzweni sesikhathi esizayo noma kokuthile osekuye kwe-
nzeka kakade? (wZU78 9/15 9-12 [w78 3/1 17-20]; it-2 169)
Ngalesosikhathi, kuyiqiniso ukuthi iNdodana yayibusa embusweni wayo ezulwini; kusukela ngePentekoste
lika-33 C.E. kuqhubeke
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu wawungakaqali ukusebenzisa amandla awo phezu kwaso sonke isintu (rsZU 362)
UJesu wayebusa phezu kobani? NgokweyabaseKolose 1:1, 2, phezu kwabangcwele
UKristu wayeseqalile ngempela ukubusa kodwa phezu kwebandla lobuKristu kuphela, hhayi phezu kwe-
sintu
Ukunamathela kwamaKristu ekubuseni kwakhe kwawenza avelela njengahlukile ezweni
“Umhlambi omncane” wawuthathwa esintwini ukuze uyohlanganyela eMbusweni wasezulwini (Luk
12:32)
Ukumiswa koMbuso ozobusa phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba kwakuseyinto yesikhathi esizayo (1Kor 4:8;
IsAm 12:10, 12)
UDaniyeli 7 uchaza ukulandelana kwemibuso yomhlaba kwehle kuze kube sekhulwini lama-20 leminyaka, bese
uDaniyeli 7:13, 14 esitshela ngokunikezwa kwegunya ngesikhathi sokugcina kodwa ngaphambi kwembubhi-
so okukhulunywa ngayo evesini 26
Isenzakalo esichazwe kuDaniyeli 7:13, 14 senzeka ngo-1914 ezulwini; sihilela bonke abantu, izizwe, nezilimi
(wZU88 6/15 4-6)
Lesi isenzakalo esifanayo okubhekiselwe kuso esimemezelweni esikusAmbulo 11:15 (reZU 171)
Manje sonke, sonke isintu, sithintwa ngokuqondile imisebenzi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu
No. 42-ZU
1/96INDLELA UMSEBENZI WOMBUSO KANKULUNKULU OTHINTA NGAYO UKUPHILA KWAKHO (16 imiz.)
UJesu wabikezela ukuthi ngemva kokwamukela kwakhe igunya phezu kwazo zonke izizwe, ekugcineni waye-
yohlukanisa abantu njengomalusi ehlukanisa izimvu nezimbuzi (Mat 25:31-33)
Ngokwasiphi isisekelo? Ngendlela abaphatha ngayo “abafowabo,” abashumayela uMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Mat
25:40, 45)
UKristu wathenga isintu; akafuni ukusibhubhisa, kodwa usinikeza ithuba lokukhetha ukuphila
UJesu uvulela isintu ithuba elinjalo kuze kube sezingeni elingakanani?
Umsebenzi wokufundisa omkhulu kunayo yonke emhlabeni uyaqhutshwa
Izikole ezingaba ngu-70 000 emabandleni emhlabeni wonke ziqeqesha abantu ukuba bafundise abanye ngo-
Mbuso; emazweni angaphezu kuka-200 ngokuphindaphindiwe oFakazi baya emakhaya ukuze banikeze
imfundo yamahhala ephathelene noMbuso
Phakathi kwezincwadi eziye zasakazwa kabanzi emhlabeni yilezo (iBhayibheli, incwadi IQiniso, njalonja-
lo) ezimelela lowoMbuso (gZU88 2/8 11; gZU90 7/8 28)
Lesimiso sokufundisa manje sesiqhubeke iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-70; siye safinyelela kithina, futhi ku-
ngalesosizathu silapha namuhla
Amaqiniso abonisa ukuthi, nakuba izizwe zimelana nokushumayela, uKristu ubesebenzisa igunya lakhe lobukho-
si “embusweni wesintu” kusukela ngo-1914 (Dan 4:17)
Izwe elaliyiSoviet Union lazama ukuvimbela oFakazi, kodwa ngenxa yezinkambiso zamaRashiya ngokwawo
phakathi neMpi Yezwe II nangemva kwayo, ngokungazi langenisa izinkulungwane zoFakazi ezweni lalo fu-
thi labalungiselela izinto zokuhamba mahhala ezabayisa ezindaweni ezazingazange zibuthole ubufakazi nga-
phambili
Ngokomphumela, amashumi ezinkulungwane aye awumelela uMbuso kaNkulunkulu (gZU73 10/22 17-18
[g73 4/8 18]; wZU86 2/1 13-14; gZU92 2/22 31)
OFakazi bashushiswa kanzima eMalawi, kodwa lapho bebaleka, amakhulu abantu abanokuthambekela oku-
hle azidela ahamba nabo
Amakhulu amaningi afunda emakamu ababaleki aye abhapathizwa
Lokhu kubonisa indlela ukuphikisa okunobudlova, esikhundleni sokumisa umsebenzi, okwenza ngayo ukuba
abantu bazibonakalise ukuthi basohlangothini lukabani (wZU73 11/1 483-8 [w73 264-8])
Isenzo sesikhathi esizayo soMbuso kaNkulunkulu siyokuthinta kanjani ukuphila kwakho? (Dan 2:44)
Ngokushesha yonke inkolo yamanga nemibuso yezombangazwe yomhlaba nabasekeli bayo bazobhujiswa, ka-
nye nabo bonke abaphikelela ekubeni abaqambimanga, amasela, izihlobongi, iziphingi noma ongqingili
Abantu bangaguquka (1Kor 6:11)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyokwenza umhlaba ube yipharadesi, uphulukise isintu, uvuse abafileyo, ufundise ngo-
kuthula (rsZU 357-62)
Umbuzo awukhona ukuthi siyakufuna yini ukusinda noma ukuthi singathanda yini ukuphila ngaphansi kwe-
zimo ezinhle ezweni elisha
Kunalokho, ingabe singasohlangothini loMbuso kaNkulunkulu noma simelene nawo? Ingabe siyakubonakali-
sa ngokuphila kwethu kwansuku zonke ukuthi ngempela sifuna ukuba uNkulunkulu asibuse?
UKUBONAKALISA UKWAZISA KWETHU UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU MANJE (5 imiz.)
Uma sifuna ngempela ukuphila phakade njengezinceku zoMbuso kaJehova wobuMesiya, khona-ke kudingeka si-
kubonakalise manje
Ingabe sinesithakazelo sentshiseko kuNkulunkulu nemithetho yakhe, ekutadisheni iBhayibheli, nasekuhla-
nganyeleni nabantu bakaJehova?
Ingabe siyawusebenzisa umthetho kaNkulunkulu ekuphileni kwethu, senza izinguquko ezidingekayo ukuze
sivumelane nezindlela zakhe? (Mat 7:21)
Ingabe siyabasiza abanye ukuba bafunde ngoMbuso kaNkulunkulu? (IzE 20:25, 26; IsAm 22:17)
Injongo yaloMbuso iwukubuyisela isintu ebuhlotsheni obuhle noNkulunkulu (1Kor 15:24, 28)
Ukwazisa ngalowoMbuso kuyosishukumisela ukuba sakhe futhi silondoloze ubuhlobo obunjalo manje
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 42-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE WENZA LOKHO UNKULUNKULU AKUFUNAYO KUWE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Shukumisa izilaleli ukuba zibeke ukukhulekela uJehova endaweni yokuqala ekuphileni futhi ziqonde ukuthi uku-
khulekela uJehova akuwona umthwalo. Kuwumthwalo wemfanelo womkhulekeli ngamunye ukuqonda izimfune-
ko zikaNkulunkulu nokuhlangabezana nazo
ISIDINGO SOKUCABANGA NGOKUNGATHI SINA NGEZIMFUNEKO ZIKANKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Sinesithakazelo esiqotho ekuqondeni intando kaNkulunkulu; kungalesosizathu size kulomhlangano
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi sekuyisikhathi eside singabafundi beZwi likaNkulunkulu noma sisanda kuthakazela,
asivumelani nombono wabantu abazama ukungamnaki uNkulunkulu
Kusobala kithina ukuthi ukuncika kumafilosofi abantu akuzange kulethe injabulo esintwini
Isimo somphakathi wesintu esidabukisayo sigcizelela isidingo sokuphendukela eZwini likaNkulunkulu, silica-
 ́
bangele ngokungathi s ına
IZwi likaNkulunkulu alisikhuthazi ukuba sihlale singanakile, saneliswe nje ukuthi sikholelwa kuye (Jak 2:19;
w85-ZU 9/1 3)
Izenzo nokuphila kwabantu abaningi abazisholo ukuthi bayakholelwa kuNkulunkulu azibunikezi ubufakazi
 ́
bokuzikhathalela ngokungathi s ına izimfuneko zakhe (Thi 1:16; pe-ZU 28-33)
UJesu wagcizelela isidingo sokuba ngabenzi bentando kaNkulunkulu (Mat 7:21)
QONDA LOKHO UNKULUNKULU AKUFUNAYO KUWE (35 imiz.)
Singakwazi kanjani lokho okuyintando kaNkulunkulu?
Ingabe isimo sethu sihluke kakhulu kwesabanye abantu kangangokuthi uNkulunkulu kumelwe akhulume na-
thi mathupha?
Esikudingayo kuseBhayibhelini, nasezincwadini ezilungiselelwa ‘inceku ethembekileyo’ ukuze zisiqondise eku-
liqondeni (Mat 24:45-47; IzE 8:31, 35; 2Ti 3:16, 17)
Ukusebenzelana kukaNkulunkulu noIsrayeli wasendulo kunikeza izibonakaliso ezisobala zokuthi iyini intando
yakhe ngesintu (Rom 15:4)
Izimfuneko zakhe kuIsrayeli zazingacindezeli; zaphumela ekwanelisekeni ngokwenza intando kaNkulunkulu
(Hu 16:11; Isa 48:17)
Lezozimfuneko zazithinta zonke izici zokuphila: imicabango, izisusa, ubuhlobo nabantu abakanye nabo (Mar
12:28-33)
Ingabe siyayazisa indlela izimiso zeZwi likaNkulunkulu ezisiqondisa ngayo?
Lapho kuphakama izimo ezimbi kwaIsrayeli, kwakungenxa yokwehluleka ukwenza okwakufunwa uNkulunku-
lu; siyazuza ngokuqaphela lokho uNkulunkulu abatshela khona ngabaprofethi bakhe, abanjengoMika
UNkulunkulu wayemelene ngokuqinile nokukhulekela kwamanga
UJehova ubheka ukukhulekela izithombe kwabantu abazisholo ukuthi bangabakhe njengokwenyanyeka
njengobufebe (Mik 1:7; w77 288)
Abapristi ababezisholo ukuthi bakhuluma egameni likaNkulunkulu kepha besebenzisa lokho kuzisholo uku-
ze benze imali balahlwa (Mik 3:11, 12; kj 132-3)
 ́
Senza kahle ngokuthatha lezifundo ngokungathi s ına
Abantu bakhononda ngenkongozelo nokucelwa njalo kwemali esontweni, kodwa ingabe badumisa uNku-
lunkulu ngokuba amalungu enhlangano emelela kabi uNkulunkulu njengalowo oxhaphaza abantu?
Kuthiwani ngezithombe ezibaziweyo, izinto ezibonakalayo zokukhulekelwa? Ingabe ‘sesikubalekele uku-
khonza izithombe’? (1Kor 10:14)
Ingabe sikhonza izifiso zethu siqu? (Kol 3:5; g79 4/22 6)
NgoMika, uJehova wabonisa futhi ukuthi ufuna izenzo zokwethembeka ebhizinisini (Mik 2:1, 2; 6:11, 12)
Asikwazi ukuba nombono wokuthi izindaba zethu zebhizinisi nokuphila kwethu kwasekhaya akudingeki
ukuba kubonakalise izimiso eziphakeme zokukhulekela kwethu (w61-ZU 1/1 13 [w60 408])
Kunanzuzoni ukuya endaweni yokukhulekela futhi sizwe izimfundiso zeZwi likaNkulunkulu uma singazi-
sebenzisi? (1Sa 15:22)
Ukukhulekela kweqiniso kufanele kuthinte ukuphila kwethu; kufanele kuthonye lokho esikwenzayo ebhi-
zinisini, ekhaya kanye nemikhaya yethu, ekusebenzelaneni nomakhelwane
Ukukhulekela uJehova kufanele kube yinto evelele kakhulu ekuphileni kwethu; ingabe sikwenza ngokomuntu
siqu lokho?
UMika 4:1-4 wabikezela lokho okwakuyokwenzeka osukwini lwethu, ‘engxenyeni yokugcina yezinsuku’ (w82-
ZU 1/1 16-21, 24 [w81 7/15 18-22, 25])
Kwakuyoba nabantu ababeyophakamisa inhlonipho yabo ngokukhulekela uJehova ngaphezu kwanoma yini
enye
‘Izintaba’ ezikhathini zasendulo zaziyizindawo zokukhulekela
No. 43-ZU
9/07Osukwini lwethu, abantu baye baqhuba izinhlobo eziningi zokukhulekela kwamanga
Kuye kwakhulekelwa izinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zobuzwe; abanye bakhulekela indlela yokuphila yo-
kuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo
Landisa okuhlangenwe nakho okubonisa indlela abantu ezimweni ezihlukahlukene abaye baphakamisa
ngayo indawo yokukhulekelwa kukaJehova ekuphileni kwabo (yb92 42-64)
Ngenxa yokusabela eZwini likaNkulunkulu, abantu ababikezelwa uMika babeyoba nokuthula
Akukho zinga lokucindezela okuvela ezizweni okwakungababangela ukuba balahle ukuthula kwabo na-
bantu bezinye izizwe
Babengeke babonakalise ubutha obuvame kakhulu phakathi kwezinhlanga; bazuza umbono kaNkulunku-
lu, ongabandlululi (IzE 10:34, 35)
Ukuba nokuthula kwakuyofinyelela emabandleni, emakhaya; umphumela akuyona inzondo kodwa
ukulondeka
Ingabe sizithola sifanelana nalesimiso, senza lokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo kithi njengoba kuchazwe ku-
Mika 4:1-4?
Ikusasa elihle ngalabo ‘abahamba ngegama likaJehova’; abanethemba lokwenza kanjalo kuze kube pha-
kade (Mik 4:5)
Lokhu kusho ukuzinikezela kuJehova nokummelela njengomunye wabakhulekeli bakhe; kuhilela uku-
memezela igama lakhe nokuphila ngokuvumelana nentando yakhe
Akukho ngaphezu kwamandla ethu ukukhonza uNkulunkulu ngokwamukelekayo; akufunayo akuwona um-
hlatshelo othile omuhle kakhulu wokubukisa, kodwa inkonzo engcwele nokuziphatha okufanelekile okubo-
nisa isimo esihle senhliziyo (Mik 6:8; w88-ZU 3/15 19-20)
Ukwenza ubulungisa: Yenza okulungileyo, okuhle, nokuqotho; yenza lokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo; ni-
keza uJehova ukuzinikela okukhethekile (w88-ZU 3/15 16-17)
UJehova akakubekezeleli ukubangiswa; kumelwe sizinikele ngokuphelele kuye, hhayi ekuthambekeleni
kwenyama (Num 25:5-8)
Gcina inhliziyo yakho ngokuzithiba kulokho ovumela ingqondo yakho ukuba igxile kukho
Nikela ngenkonzo engcwele eyamukelekayo evela enhliziyweni ehlanzekile, epheleleyo (Hu 50:16-18, 23)
Ukuthanda umusa: Igama lesiHeberu lihunyushwe futhi ngokuthi “uthando oluqotho”
Ngokwabahlaziyi bamagama: “Elithi ubuqotho linezela kwelithi ukwethembeka umqondo wokufuna uku-
sekela nokulwela umuntu noma into, ngisho noma sekunzima kanjani” (w88-ZU 3/15 17-19)
Ngokulalela uJesu wabonisa ukuthi wayeqotho kuJehova (Rom 5:19; Fil 2:8)
NjengoJesu, ubuqotho bethu kuJehova nasenhlanganweni yakhe buyovivinywa
Ukungapheleli kwabazalwane bethu, kuhlanganise nababonisi abangamaKristu, kuvivinya ubuqotho
bethu enhlanganweni kaNkulunkulu
Akukho ukuzithethelela uma sishiya inhlangano kaNkulunkulu (Hu 119:165; Joh 6:68)
Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu ngesizotha: Njengezisebenzi ezikanye noNkulunkulu, siyamesaba uJehova fu-
thi sidonsela ukunakekela okuyinhloko kuye (w88-ZU 3/15 19-20)
Azise ngokusesilinganisweni amakhono akho siqu nokubaluleka kwakho (1Kor 3:6, 7; 4:7)
Kungokufanele ikakhulukazi ngani basha ukuba nizihlobise ngesizotha (Job 32:6, 7)
Labo abazikhandlayo ukuze benze lokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo banesizathu esizwakalayo sokuqiniseka ngo-
kuthi uNkulunkulu uyokwenza zonke izinto aye wazithembisa (Mik 7:7; w79-ZU 4/1 22 [w78 10/1 19])
Ngeke ahluleke enjongweni yakhe yokubhubhisa isimiso esibi
UJehova ngeke ahluleke ukuletha isimiso sakhe esisha sokulunga
QHUBEKA UTHUTHUKA EKWENZENI INTANDO KANKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Ingabe ufuna ukwazi okwengeziwe ngentando kaNkulunkulu ngawe?
Uma ungakabi naso isifundo seBhayibheli, cela omunye woFakazi BakaJehova
Yiba khona njalo emihlanganweni nalabo abashisekela ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu
Uma usuzinikezele kakade, ungabi nesimo sokunganaki; hlala uphaphamele amathuba okukhonza ngentshiseko
nokuvumelana ngokugcwele nentando kaNkulunkulu yokulunga (2Pet 3:17, 18; w66-ZU 12/15 573-4 [w66 370-1])
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUBALULEKILE UKWAZISA UKUBUSA KUKAJEHOVA (6 imiz.)
Abantu kuyo yonke indawo balangazelela ukubusa okulungileyo, uhulumeni ongazixazulula ngempela izinkinga
zabo
Izinkinga zokuthola umsebenzi, nokudla okwanele, ukulondoloza indawo yethu esizungezile, ukususwa kwe-
zifo nokunqoba imigoqo ehlukanisa isintu kudinga ikhambi elingaphezu kwalokho abantu abakunikezayo
(Shu 1:15)
Impendulo ikuMdali wethu, uJehova uNkulunkulu, nombuso wakhe (w85-ZU 11/15 3-5)
Sidinga ukuqonda izinga nohlobo lokubusa kukaJehova
Imithetho yakhe iqondisa ukujikeleza kwazo zonke izindikimba zasemkhathini, nemijikelezo engokwemvelo
ekwenza kube nokwenzeka ukuphila emhlabeni
Eminye yemithetho yakhe esebenza ukuze kuzuze thina yenza kanjalo ngaphandle kokuba sikucabange
nokukucabanga
NjengoMdali womuntu, uyazi ukuthi yini esiyidinga ngempela ukuze sijabulele impilo ephelele, ukuphila isi-
khathi eside, injabulo
Imiyalo yakhe ngokuphathelene nokukhulekela kwethu nobuhlobo bethu nabantu esikanye nabo idinga
ukuba sikhethe, sibonise ukuthi siyakufuna yini ukulalela (lp 98-105)
Imiyalo kaNkulunkulu ayicindezeli, kodwa izuzisa thina (Isa 48:17)
Icebisa ukuphila kwethu manje futhi isisiza ukuba sizuze ukuphila kwesikhathi esizayo (1Ti 4:8)
Abantu bazo zonke izizwe manje banikezwa ithuba lokubonakalisa ukuthi bayakufuna yini ngempela ukubusa
kukaNkulunkulu kuzo zonke izindaba zokuphila; ingabe bafuna ukuphila ngaphansi kukahulumeni kaNkulu-
nkulu?
UnguMdali noNkulunkulu umninimandla onke, futhi injongo yakhe yokubonakalisa ubukhosi bakhe ngoMbu-
so, uhulumeni ezandleni zeNdodana yakhe, uJesu Kristu, ayinakubhuntshiswa
Ukuqhubeka kwethu sijabulela ukuphila kusengozini ngoba kuyiqiniso elingenakuguqulwa ukuthi ukuphila
kuncike kuNkulunkulu (IsAm 4:11)
Ingabe thina njengabantu ngabanye siyowufuna uMbuso kaNkulunkulu, siwunikeze indawo ewufanele eku-
phileni kwethu?
ENTSHUMAYELWENI YASENTABENI, UJESU WABONISA INDLELA YOKUFUNA UMBUSO (30 imiz.)
(Mema bonke ukuba bavule iBhayibheli futhi balandele njengoba kufundwa imibhalo)
UJesu wafundisa abafundi ukuba bathandazele uMbuso, bacele ukuba “uze” ngamandla okubhubhisa isimiso esi-
bi (Mat 6:10; w79-ZU 2/15 5-6 [w78 8/15 5-6]; w89-ZU 8/15 12-13)
Waxwayisa ngokuthi akubona bonke abathi bangamakholwa abayozuza uMbuso (Mat 7:21-23; w90-ZU 10/1 23-
4; w79-ZU 5/1 3-5 [w78 12/1 14-15])
Sidinga ukuhlola isimo sethu ngokwethu, siqiniseke ukuthi siyenza ngempela intando kaBaba
Ukuze siphumelele ekutholeni ukuphila eMbusweni wasezulwini noKristu noma ukuphila njengezikhonzi zawo
emhlabeni, kumelwe sihlakulele izimfanelo ezivunyelwa uNkulunkulu
UNkulunkulu uyabamukela labo abasiqaphelayo isidingo esingokomoya, abamnene, abalambele ukulunga, aba-
nomusa, abahlanzekile enhliziyweni, abanokuthula (Mat 5:3-9, qhathanisa neNW; g78-ZU 7/22 4-6 [w78 2/1
27-9]; g78-ZU 8/8 15-17 [w78 2/15 8-10]; g78-ZU 8/22 10-12 [w78 3/1 4-5])
Ngokuhlakulela lezimfanelo umphumela uba injabulo
Ukuze umuntu angene eMbusweni, kumelwe abe nenhlonipho ejulile ngomthetho kaNkulunkulu—uwonke
(Mat 5:17-20; g78-ZU 9/22 9-11 [w78 4/1 29-31]; w86-ZU 10/15 8)
Uma nje uMthetho owanikezwa uNkulunkulu ngoMose wawusasebenza, abalandeli abangamaJuda kwaku-
melwe bawusebenzise futhi bawulandele
Akumelwe sifane noAdamu; sibe abangalaleli ngamabomu kunoma iyiphi indaba
Futhi akumelwe sifane nabaFarisi ababenezindinganiso zabo siqu zokulunga (w90-ZU 10/1 12, 19  ̊14, 15)
Akukhona nje ukulalela uMthetho; kumelwe siqonde indlela owawuhloselwe ukuba usetshenziswe ngayo
futhi senze ngokuvumelana nawo (Mat 5:21, 22; w90-ZU 10/1 13  ̊12, 13; w78-ZU 7/15 20-1 [w78 4/15 21-2];
w89-ZU 7/15 24-5)
Ngaphandle kokwenza okulungile, sidinga ukufunda ukuthanda okulungile (Mat 5:27, 28; w90-ZU 10/1 13  ̊14;
w78-ZU 11/15 22-3 [w78 5/15 28])
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sigcine inhliziyo
UJehova ufuna kuphela izikhonzi ezizinikelayo, labo abakhetha izindlela zakhe ngempela
No. 44-ZU
9/07Kubalulekile ukufunda ukulingisa uNkulunkulu ekuboniseni uthando (Mat 5:43-48; w90-ZU 10/1 13  ̊12, 14
 ̊18, 19; g78-ZU 12/22 8-10 [w78 7/1 5-6])
Loluhlobo lothando alucinaniswa ukuqhosha lapho abanye bengabonisi ukwazisa, kodwa lufuna inhlala-ka-
hle yaphakade yabanye, ngisho neyalabo abaziphatha njengezitha
Kumelwe silwele ukuba nokuthula nabafowethu, sibathande ngeqiniso, ukuze sikhonze uNkulunkulu ngo-
kwamukelekayo (Mat 5:23, 24; w78-ZU 9/1 18-19 [w78 5/1 29-30]; wt-ZU 147  ̊7)
(Ukubukezwa okufushane kukaMathewu isahluko 5 okusekelwe kuw90-ZU 10/1 15  ̊20)
Kumelwe siqaphele singalinganisi ukubaluleka komsebenzi wethu ngesisekelo salokho okubonakala ngapha-
ndle (Mat 6:1-6, 16-18; w90-ZU 10/1 15-17; w78 7/15 30-1; w78 9/1 14-15)
Isisusa siyisici esiyinhloko—singabi nokuzenzisa, singafuni ukudonsela ukunakekela kithina, kodwa silethe
udumo kuNkulunkulu
UJehova ubona okusezinhliziyweni zethu
Yiba nengqondo engokomoya, ubeke kuqala izithakazelo ezingokomoya, ungaphambukiswa izinto ezibonaka-
layo (Mat 6:19-21; w90-ZU 10/1 18; w79-ZU 3/15 21 [w78 9/15 9]; w89-ZU 7/15 13-14)
Kufanelekile ukunakekela izidingo zethu zezinto ezibonakalayo; kodwa akufanelekile ukuba sibe yizigqila
zazo, sizivumele zibuse ukuphila kwethu (Mat 6:24; w79-ZU 3/15 22 [w78 9/15 10])
Hlakulela ukwethembeka kuNkulunkulu nasesithembisweni sakhe sokubusisa umzamo wethu ukuze sizu-
ze izidingo zokuphila (Mat 6:25-34; w90-ZU 10/1 18-19; w79-ZU 4/1 20-2 [w78 10/1 24-6])
SIDINGA UKUZIKHANDLA UKUZE SIZUZE UMBUSO (9 imiz.)
Ukuze abangafaneleki bangakwazi ukungena, uNkulunkulu ufuna ukuba labo abangena eMbusweni bahambe
ngendlela eminyene, bathole isango elincane (Mat 7:13, 14; w90-ZU 10/1 23  ̊8, 9; w79-ZU 6/15 22-3 [w78 11/15
29-30])
Ungabi nombono wokuthi akunakwenzeka; ukuthethelelwa kwezono ezingahlosiwe kuyatholakala (Mat 6:
12-15)
Okudingekayo wukuba sikuthande ngempela okulungile
Lokhu kuyosishukumisela emzamweni wangaso sonke isikhathi, singaphelelwa kalula ithemba lapho ku-
phakama izinkinga (Mat 7:7, 8; w90-ZU 10/1 22  ̊6; w78 11/1 22)
Kumelwe sakhele indlu yethu engokomoya ekulaleleni izimfundiso zikaJesu Kristu (Mat 7:24-27; w90-ZU 10/1
24  ̊13-15; w78 12/15 12-13)
Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukulingisa uJesu ekuhlanganyeleni izindaba ezilungileyo zoMbuso nabanye (Mat 5:14-16;
w90-ZU 10/1 24  ̊12; g78-ZU 9/8 18-19 [w78 3/15 11])
Lona umsebenzi obalulekile; abanye kudingeka bezwe; labo abahlanganyela kulomsebenzi bavuna imivuzo ece-
bile
Kunekusasa elihle ngaphambili; izibusiso zezwe elisha likaNkulunkulu ziyimpendulo kuzo zonke izifiso ezilungi-
leyo zezinhliziyo zethu (Hu 145:13, 16)
UJehova uyolungiselela lezizinto ngoba ufuna ukuba sibe nazo (Mat 6:33)
Uyobusisa imizamo yethu yokuzizuza; umbuzo uwukuthi: Ingabe asifuni nje izibusiso zoMbuso kaNkulu-
nkulu, kodwa nokulunga kwakhe?
Sidinga ukuqhubeka sifuna uMbuso kaNkulunkulu (1) ngokuzikhandla ngenkuthalo ukuba simazi uJehova,
uMbusi weNdawo Yonke, (2) ngokuhlakulela uthando ngezindlela zakhe, (3) ngokuzisebenzisa ekuphileni kwe-
thu, (4) nangokumelela uMbuso kaNkulunkulu kwabanye
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 44-ZU—ikhasi 2

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedLANDELA INDLELA EYISA EKUPHILENI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yakha ukwazisa kwezilaleli ngezaga ezigcwele ukuhlakanipha eziphefumlelwe uJehova ezitholakala encwadini
yezAga. Thina ngokwethu singabonisa ukuhlakanipha ngokulalela nokusebenzisa lezizaga eziphefumlelwe
UKUPHILA KUYISIPHO ESIYIGUGU KAKHULU (4 imiz.)
Sonke siyakukhathalela ukuthola okungcono kakhulu ekuphileni (wZU85 8/15 11-16)
Sifisa ukuba nempilo enhle ukuze sijabulele ukuphila kwethu
Kuyakhungathekisa ukubona ukulinganiselwa okulethwa impilo ebuthakathaka
Singababonga abazali ngokuthi siyaphila futhi sinethuba lokwenza izinto
Kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba sibonge uJehova, Lowo owenza konke ukuphila kube nokwenzeka (Hu 36:9)
Uyazazi izinto esizidingayo, indlela yokuphila eletha injabulo enkulu kakhulu, izimiso zokuphila okuphume-
lelayo, kanye namathemba ethu esikhathi esizayo (IzA 9:10, 11)
Siyocabangela ezinye izibonelo encwadini yezAga ezingasisiza ukuba siphokophelele indlela eyisa ekuphileni
IZAGA ZINIKEZA ISIQONDISO ESIHLAKANIPHILE SOKUPHILA OKUJABULISAYO (20 imiz.)
Indlela ongazenza ngayo ukuba uthandeke
Bonisa isihe neqiniso (IzA 3:3, 4; 11:17); khuluma ngokwethembeka (IzA 3:29); khuluma ngendlela enesizotha
nangezinto ezinhle (IzA 15:1, 2); bonisa ukwethembeka (IzA 18:24)
Ukuziphilisa
Ukuphumelela kwangempela kulethwa ukuzikhandla nokuhlela kusengaphambili (IzA 6:6-11); inkuthalo (IzA
10:4, 5); ukwethembeka (IzA 11:1); ukwahlulela okuhle (IzA 11:15); ukwenza umsebenzi wobuchwepheshe (IzA
22:29); ukungabeki lonke ithemba lethu emalini esiyitholayo (IzA 11:28)
Ukufinyelela ukuphila komkhaya okujabulisayo
Zama ukuba oqondayo nonamasu (IzA 16:21, 23, 24; 17:1); yiba ngothethelelayo (IzA 17:9, 13); bonisa uthando
(IzA 10:12); thembeka kumngane womshado (IzA 5:15-20); indoda kufanele iwondle kahle umkhaya (IzA 12:
11); umfazi kufanele awunakekele kahle umkhaya (IzA 31:11, 12, 15, 26-28); qeqeshani abantwana kahle (IzA
13:24; 15:5, 20; 22:6, 15; 29:15, 17); bonisa inhlonipho ngabantu abadala (IzA 1:8, 9; 19:26; 23:22, 24, 25)
Ukugwema izinkinga
Ukuziphatha okuhle kukuvikela ezinkingeni zempilo (IzA 5:3-11; 6:24-33); umoya ozolile uthuthukisa impilo
(IzA 14:30); ubumnene busisiza ukuba sigweme ukuthukuthela (IzA 15:4, 18); ungaphindiseli (IzA 24:29); gwe-
ma ubudakwa (IzA 20:1; 23:20, 21, 29-35)
UKWESABA UJEHOVA IMFUNEKO EYISISEKELO YOKUPHILA OKUPHAKADE (10 imiz.)
Ingabe lezizAga zimane nje ziyindaba yokulandela ukwahlulela okuhle ukuze siphile ukuphila okuhle, noma inga-
be kunokuthile okwengeziwe ekuphileni? (IzA 6:23)
Kungani izAga 1:7 zithi ukwesaba uJehova kungukuqala kokuhlakanipha?
Ukulalela uJehova kuholela ekuphileni okuphakade (IzA 3:13-18)
Kusikhumbuza ithemba lokuphila okuphakade uJehova alibeka phambi komuntu ophelele e-Edene
Singawuzuza kanjani umklomelo wokuphila? Ngokumane nje siphile “ukuphila okuhle”?
Cabangela izAga 4:4, 10, 11; Johane 17:3
Ukwenza izinto ngendlela kaJehova kuyimfuneko yokuphila okuphakade
Ilungiselelo lebandla nesifundo seBhayibheli somuntu siqu kuyosisiza ukuba sifunde lokho uNkulunkulu akufu-
nayo kithi (IzA 24:3)
Imihlangano isishukumisela ekubeni sihlanganyele nabanye ulwazi lweZwi likaNkulunkulu ngokuba nengxe-
nye enkonzweni yasensimini (IzA 3:27; 15:7a)
Sisizwa ukuba sisondelane noJehova ngokuba nobuhlobo bomuntu siqu naye nangomthandazo (IzA 15:26)
Singathola usizo oluvela kubadala ebandleni (IzA 24:6b)
Kufanele sikhule ekuboniseni ukwazisa ngesidingo sethu sesiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu (IzA 16:9)
Kufanele sibe abafundisi beZwi likaNkulunkulu, siqhube izifundo zeBhayibheli nabanye (IzA 1:2-6)
Kufanele sondle abanjengezimvu ngaso sonke isikhathi, njengoba siye sondliwa emihlanganweni (Joh 21:
15-17)
UJESU—INDLELA, IQINISO, NOKUPHILA (6 imiz.)
Akukho muntu oza kuBaba futhi athole ukuphila ngaphandle kokuza ngoJesu (Joh 14:6)
Ukuya kwethu kuNkulunkulu kuxhomeke okholweni lwethu emhlatshelweni kaJesu
Ingabe sifuna ukulandela inkambo yakhe yokuphila, nakuba kungase kulethe ukuphikiswa, ukuze sikwazi uku-
ya kuBaba, uMuphi oMuhle wokuphila okuphakade? Ingabe lendlela inzima kakhulu?
No. 45-ZU
7/92UJesu wabonisa ukuthi abantu abaningi babengeke bayilandele lenkambo, nokho wayincoma (Mat 7:13, 14)
Ingabe lendlela encane, eyingcingo ingevimbela kakhulu kangangokuba isincisha injabulo yokuphila manje
ukuze sizuze umvuzo wesikhathi esizayo? Ingabe yilokho uJesu ayekusho ngendlela eyingcingo? (wZU78 6/1
7-11 [w77 621-5]; it-2 168  ̊2)
UJehova uye wasinikeza iziqondiso zokuphila okuphumelelayo eziyosigcina siphakathi kwemingcele yomusa wa-
khe futhi siqonde ohlangothini olufanele kuyilapho zisinikeza ukuphila okugcwele okungenakho ukuzisola (IzA
4:10-13)
Ngokwethembeka masilandele isibonelo sikaJesu ekushumayeleni nasekufundiseni ‘izindaba ezinhle’ (Mat 9:35-
38; 28:19, 20)
YIBA PHAKATHI KWABAHLAKANIPHILEYO ABALANDELA INDLELA KAJEHOVA EYISA EKUPHILE-
NI (5 imiz.)
Yeka indlela esingajabula ngayo ngokwazi ukuthi indlela kaJehova ingengcono kakhulu!
Iyindlela engayisi nje kuphela ekuphileni okujabulisayo manje kodwa eyisa ekuphileni okuphakade ngapha-
nsi kokubusa kukaKristu njengeNkosi Yokuthula
Nakuba lendlela ivulekele bonke, abantu abaningi ngobuwula balandela indlela ebanzi eyisa ekubhujisweni
Ngisho nasezinsukwini zabaphostoli, abaningi bakhuluma kabi ngalendlela (IzE 19:9)
Ingabe sifuna ukuhlala phakathi kwalabo abachazwe kuzAga 6:12-19?
Noma ingabe sifuna ukulandela indlela ehlakaniphile eholela ekuphileni? (IzA 8:32-35; 22:4)
Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukusiza abanye ukuba nabo bafunde ngalendlela efanele
Kwangathi singathatha inkambo ehlakaniphile, indlela kaJehova, eyisa ekuphileni okuphakade! (IzA 12:28)
(Ukwaziswa okwengeziwe kungatholakala kuwZU80 8/15 27-31 [w80 2/15 25-9]; wZU74 2/15 77-83 [w73 488-94];
wZU87 5/15 28-30; it-2 703-7. Futhi, hlola izikhombo zemiBhalo ukuze uthole ukwaziswa ngamavesi akhethekile)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
