KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45LONDOLOZA ITHEMBA LAKHO LIQINILE KUZE KUBE SEKUGCINENI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Lokhu kwaziswa kusekelwe kweyamaHeberu izahluko 3 no-4. Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone indlela lokhu okungasiza ngayo umu-
ntu athole ukuthi uye walivumela yini nganoma iyiphi indlela ithemba lakhe ezwini likaJehova ukuba lintengantenge
KULELIZWE KUNZIMA UKULONDOLOZA ITHEMBA (5 imiz.)
Ukucindezelwa, ukuphikiswa, ukungabi nandaba, nokudumala kusithinta sonke
Njengomphostoli uJohane, amaKristu athi: “Amen. Woza, Nkosi Jesu!” (IsAm 22:20)
Singathanda ukubona intando kaNkulunkulu yenziwa emhlabeni njengasezulwini
Kumelwe sibambelele ngokuqinile kuze kube sekupheleni kwalesimiso noma kokuphila kwethu siqu (Mat 24:13)
Ingabe sibambelele kulelothemba?
Iseluleko esinamandla sokusisiza ukuba sibambelele sinikezwe encwadini yeBhayibheli yamaHeberu (wZU83 8/1 14-15
[w83 2/15 17-18]; wZU73 10/1 447-50 [w73 213-16]; it-1 1077-80)
Sabhalelwa amaKristu angamaJuda, ayebhekene nobunzima, ukucindezelwa okuningi
Amanye amaKristu ayenesimo sokungabi nandaba, amanye ebuthakathaka noma engavuthiwe ngokomoya, amanye
ezethemba ngokweqile
Senza kahle ngokulalela lesoseluleko (1Kor 10:12)
ISELULEKO SIKAPAWULU KUMAKRISTU ANGAMAHEBERU (30 imiz.)
(Mema izilaleli ukuba zilandele ingxoxo yevesi nevesi kweyamaHeberu isahluko 3. Funda ivesi [amavesi], bese ulikhulu-
mela)
Ivesi 1:
Amandla ethu okulondoloza ithemba siwathola ngoKristu
“Qaphelani.” Zindla ngothando alubonisa emhlabeni, umhlatshelo wakhe, ukuvuswa kwakhe, nesithunzi sakhe nje-
ngomphostoli (noma, “othunyiweyo”) kaNkulunkulu, njengomPristi Ophakeme omkhulu wasezulwini, nanjengeNhlo-
ko yebandla (Heb 2:14, 15; wZU83 8/1 16-17 [w83 2/15 19-20])
Cabangela indlela ukuphila kwakho okuqhathaniseka ngayo, uzindle ngezinye zezilingo zikaJesu ezazingase zimdu-
maze (Mat 20:20, 21; Mar 3:5; 9:19; Luk 9:46-48; 22:24)
Amavesi 2-4:
UKristu wayephakeme kakhulu kunoMose, ngisho nakuba uMose enza izinto eziningi eziyizimangaliso ngenxa kaIsra-
yeli
Ngokuqondisa kukaNkulunkulu uKristu wakha zonke izinto, kuhlanganise nebandla lobuKristu, elakhiwa nguye nje-
ngeNgcweti kaNkulunkulu (IzA 8:30, 31; w84 9/15 31; wZU82 3/15 19 [w81 10/1 20])
Inkazimulo iya kuJehova uNkulunkulu njengoMklami noMdali
Amavesi 5, 6:
UMose, nakuba ayemkhulu, wayeyinceku nje emkhayeni, kodwa uKristu uyiNdodana yoMninindlu, umiswe nguNku-
lunkulu phezu kwabendlu (w84 9/15 31)
Ingabe sifuna ukusekela lomkhaya omkhulu, ibandla lamaIsrayeli angokomoya?
Akumelwe sidangale kodwa kumelwe sibambisise isibindi futhi silondoloze intokozo, noma “ukuziqhayisa”
Ivesi 7:
Umoya ongcwele (kumaHubo 95:7-11) wathi: “Namuhla”; manje yisikhathi esifanelekile
Asazi ukuthi ikusasa liyolethani
UPetru wanxusa: ‘Gcinani ukuba khona kosuku lukaJehova kuseduze ezingqondweni zenu’ (2Pet 3:12, qhathanisa
neNW)
Lokhu kusho ukuthi kufanele sifeze izibopho zethu zobuKristu nsuku zonke
‘Usuku lukaJehova’ luza njengesela; ukuphila kwethu siqu kungase kuphele kusasa
Amavesi 8-11:
UIsrayeli wenza izinto ukuze avivinye uNkulunkulu ngokuthi wayeyoligcina yini izwi lakhe (it-2 350-1)
Ngokukhononda, ngokungathokozi ngamalungiselelo akhe, bavivinya uNkulunkulu ngokuphathelene nokuthi waye-
yobekezela kangakanani, isineke sakhe sasiyohlala isikhathi eside kangakanani (Eks 32:1-4; wZU86 4/1 23-4)
Ivesi 12:
Kumelwe sizihlole ukuthi izinhliziyo zethu zinjani, singalahlekelwa ukholo, siqaphele ukuthi izithembiso zikaNkulu-
nkulu ziyogcwaliseka
Inhliziyo embi ayiveli ngokuphazima kweso kodwa ikhula kancane kancane (wZU81 7/1 22-3 [w80 12/1 22-3]; wZU89
7/15 22)
Ivesi 13:
Manje yisikhathi sokuba ngamunye wethu asondelane nabazalwane, singakhonondi noma sibonise ubuthakathaka,
kodwa siqine ukuze sikhuthazane (wZU86 4/1 24-6)
Mhlawumbe uzizwa ubuthakathaka, kodwa ngokukhuthaza omunye, uthola isikhuthazo esivela kuNkulunkulu
Isono sikhohlisa kakhulu
Sihlasela izici ezibuthakathaka, sisizume uma sidumala, singanaki, noma siyekethisa noma uma siba abalunge ngo-
kweqile, sigxeka abanye, futhi siba abangenaluzwela ngezinkinga zabafowethu
No. 46-ZU
7/92Ivesi 14:
Wawunjani ‘ekuqaleni,’ lapho uqala ukukhonza uJehova uNkulunkulu?
Ingabe wawushiseka, unesibindi, ujabula, uqiniseka? Ingabe usenjalo? (wZU81 2/1 13-14 [w80 8/1 16-17])
Manje, njengoba unolwazi olwengeziwe, ingabe usukhulele ekuvuthweni? Uma kungenjalo, kungani? Ingabe kuye kwa-
phakama izinkinga?
Ulwazi lwakho namuhla lukhulu ngokwengeziwe kunangesikhathi owaqala ngaso, ngakho uhlonyiselwe ukubhe-
kana ngokuphumelelayo nezinkinga ezinkulu ngokwengeziwe
Uma untula ithemba, cela usizo kuNkulunkulu
Ivesi 15:
Kushiwo uNkulunkulu namuhla, njengoba kwakunjalo ngalesosikhathi
Asilizwa izwi lakhe noma elengelosi ngokuzwakalayo, kodwa sinalo iZwi laKhe eliphefumlelwe ngomoya
UNkulunkulu akakude nathi (IzE 17:27)
Futhi sinabazalwane kuwo wonke umhlaba abalondoloza ithemba njengesibonelo kithi; bayabusiswa
Amavesi 16-19:
Abaningi ababona imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu emangalisayo, ababa nethemba lapho bewela uLwandle Olubomvu, bala-
hlekelwa iZwe Lesithembiso
Nakuba babengase bakwazi ukuzuza ithemba futhi, bakhononda njalo; ngenxa yokuntula kwabo ukholo uNkulu-
nkulu wathi kufanele bafele ehlane
UJoshuwa, uKalebi, namaLevi kuphela abasinda ukuze bangene eZweni Lesithembiso likaNkulunkulu (it-2 1016)
AmaLevi ayewukuphela kwesizwe esingazange sithumele muntu ukuyohlola izwe, khona-ke awazange abe ngapha-
nsi kokulahlwa kwezinhloli ezingathembekile nabalandeli bazo
Ukucabangela lokho okwenzeka kumaIsrayeli akusho ukuthi kufanele sikhathazeke noma sesabe
Kufanele sinake futhi siqaphe; yilabo abangalaleli kuphela abayokuwa, njengoba kwaba njalo ngalesosikhathi
Isahluko 4:1, 2:
Njengabantu ngabanye, asikwazi ukukhononda ngokufanele ngoNkulunkulu
Ingabe sonke asijabuleli ukudla okufanayo okungokomoya?
Sinezindaba ezinhle ezifanayo, isithembiso sokuphumula esimisweni esisha sezinto sikaNkulunkulu
Bonke, abadala nabanye, kumelwe baqaphe; uma abanye kubonakala sengathi bayashiyeka, babakhuthaze
Kungase kubonakale ukuthi laba balahlekelwa ukholo kuphela, ngakho indlela esixoxa nabo ngayo kufanele ibe
nobuzalwane, sibheke abanye njengabakhulu kunathi, futhi ngokuqaphela ukuthi nathi singase silingeke (Gal 6:1;
Fil 2:3)
Kudingeka okungaphezu kokulalela isithembiso; kudingeka ukholo lwangempela olusuka enhliziyweni
Ingabe sicabanga futhi senze ngalolokholo esithembisweni sikaNkulunkulu njengoba singokoqobo, kanye nalabo
abanokholo?
SINGABA NETHEMBA EZWINI LIKANKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Ivesi 11:
Kudingeka okungaphezu kokulalela okuvamile manje njengoba izikhathi ziba zimbi ngokwengeziwe (wZU83 8/1 24
[w83 2/15 26])
Sinesibonelo esixwayisayo ekuntuleni kwamaIsrayeli ukholo, ukulahlekelwa ithemba
Ivesi 12:
Izwi likaNkulunkulu lesithembiso liqinisekile (wZU77 1/15 38-9 [w76 439])
Akalilahlanga noma akabanga ongalinaki laba indaba engasebenzi
UJehova umatasa, egcwalisa isithembiso sakhe ngokuqhubekayo nangokuqiniseka
Siyini isimo sethu sengqondo ngezwi likaNkulunkulu lesithembiso?
UNkulunkulu uyazazi izinhliziyo zethu; sinesibopho sokulandisa kuye
Akumelwe sivumele ithemba lethu libe buthakathaka, njengoba kwenza uIsrayeli
Ukusabela kwethu esithembisweni sikaNkulunkulu kuyokwembula lokho esiyikho ngempela (gmZU 175-83; wZU88
5/1 7; wZU86 4/1 6-7)
Sonke sidinga ukunaka ngokucophelela isithembiso sikaNkulunkulu nazo zonke izinto iBhayibheli elizishoyo ngoku-
phathelene naso
Ukuzindla ngaso ngokwengeziwe kuyosinikeza amandla; kuyokwenza umoya wethu uqine, ube nethemba
Ivesi 13:
Njengoba zonke izinto zisobala phambi kukaNkulunkulu, kubalulekile ukuthembela kuye, sibe abangane bakhe aba-
seduze
Siyolandisa kuye yedwa (wZU80 10/1 29 [w80 4/1 27])
Amavesi 14-16:
Masime isibindi; sizuze futhi noma iyiphi injabulo esilahlekele; siqinise ithemba
Masiqhubeke sivuma obala umPristi Ophakeme neNkosi yethu
Masisondele kuJehova ngoJesu ukuze sithole usizo ebuthakathakeni bethu
Senze lokho ngaphandle kokwesaba nangokuqiniseka okugcwele, singathembeli emandleni ethu siqu
Uma senza kanjalo, singaqiniseka ukuthi siyobhekana nesiphelo ngokholo oluqinile nenjabulo, ngethemba eligcwe-
le othandweni lukaNkulunkulu nomvuzo awunikezayo (wZU89 2/15 13)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yo-
nke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 46-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45“YIBANI NOKHOLO EZINDABENI EZINHLE”
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yenza izilaleli ziqaphele ngokujulile iphuzu lokuthi umuntu ngamunye olindele ukuba abe yingxenye yelungise-
lelo loMbuso kumelwe abonise lokhu ngendlela akuphila ngayo ukuphila kwakhe
IZINDABA EZINHLE ZITHOLAKALA KALULA (8 imiz.)
Yiziphi izindaba obungacabanga ukuthi zingezingcono kakhulu? ezokuthula kwezwe? ukuqedwa kobugebengu?
ukupheliswa kwakho konke ukungcola? ukutholakala komthombo wamandla owongayo, nongenakuphela?
Lezizinto beziyoba yizindaba ezinhle, kodwa abantu bebeyolokhu beguga, begula, futhi befa
Izinkinga zomuntu siqu nezomkhaya ezikhungathekisayo beziyolokhu zisikhathaza
Izindaba ezinhle ngempela kubo bonke abantu kwakumelwe zilethe ukuthula kwengqondo nendlela yokubheka-
na nezinkinga manje, nethemba lokuphelisa ngisho nezinkinga zempilo esikhathini esizayo (gZU79 1/8 3-5 [g78
7/8 3-5])
Kubonakala kalula emlandweni ukuthi akukho muntu noma iqembu labantu, inhlangano noma uhulumeni
okungaba umthombo wanoma yisiphi isici sezindaba ezinhle esizidingayo (Jer 10:23)
Izindaba ezinhle uNkulunkulu onguMdali ayeyozithumela ngokuqinisekile zazingeke zintule noma yiziphi izi-
ci ezidingekile enhlala-kahleni nasentokozweni yethu ephelele (Rom 8:31, 32; w75 702)
Ingabe izindaba ezinhle ezinjalo ziyatholakala?
Yebo, futhi akunzima ukuba sizithole (IzE 17:27; 2Pet 3:9)
Umphostoli uPawulu ubonisa ukuthi, thina njengabezwayo, sinezindaba ezinhle, akudingeki ukuba sizifu-
ne ngokuzikhandla (Rom 10:6-10; wZU73 6/15 281 [w72 694]; g68 11/22 28)
OKUQUKETHWE IZINDABA EZINHLE (12 imiz.)
IBhayibheli likhuluma ‘ngezindaba ezinhle ngoNkulunkulu,’ “izindaba ezinhle ngoKristu,” ‘nezindaba ezinhle zo-
mbuso’ (Rom 15:16, 19, NW; Mat 9:35, NW; wZU80 5/1 27-8 [w79 12/15 5-6]; it-1 986-8)
Lezihloko ezintathu ziyafaneleka ngoba izindaba ezinhle, eziMthombo wazo unguJehova uNkulunkulu, zihla-
nganisa lonke iqiniso uJesu Kristu akhuluma ngalo nalelo abafundi ababhala ngalo
Izindaba ezinhle zigxilisa ukunakekela eNkosini, uJesu Kristu, naseMbusweni wakhe (Mat 6:10)
Ukwethembeka ekubambeleleni ezindabeni ezinhle uJesu wakubheka njengokubaluleke ngaphezu kokuphila
komuntu kwamanje (Mar 8:35)
UPawulu waqaphela ukuthi ukumemezela izindaba ezinhle ngokwethembeka kwakubalulekile (1Kor 9:16; 2Ti
1:8)
Ngenxa yokumelela izindaba ezinhle, umuntu ngezinye izikhathi angase alahlekelwe impahla noma akhutha-
zelele ukushushiswa (Mar 10:29, 30)
Ukwamukela izindaba ezinhle kuphumela ekusindisweni; ukuzenqaba kuletha imbubhiso (2Thes 1:6-8)
Kumuntu ngamunye obambelela ezindabeni ezinhle, kuletha izinzuzo eziningi zomuntu siqu manje (1Ti 4:8; bala
izinjabulo nezibusiso eziningi esiba nazo manje uma siba izinceku zikaNkulunkulu)
Izindaba ezinhle zithuthukisa ukuba neqiniso, okulethela umuntu izinzuzo eziningi (wZU78 6/1 6 [w77 620])
Zithuthukisa ukwethembeka, nezinzuzo zako (wZU88 2/15 6-7; wZU87 11/15 5-6)
Zibangela ubuqotho bokuziphatha (wZU86 7/15 6)
Lokhu kuletha izinzuzo eziningi, ngisho noma abanye bethi akusebenzi ngokoqobo (gZU85 11/8 14-16 [g89
11/8 17-19]; ypZU 188-9; wZU85 8/15 15)
ABANTU BASENDULO BABHEKA IZINDABA EZINHLE NJENGEZIYIGUGU KAKHULU (15 imiz.)
UAbrahama, nakuba ayengaziqondi zonke izinto ezaziphathelene nezindaba ezinhle, ‘wathokoza’ lapho etshelwa
izindaba ezinhle kusengaphambili (Joh 8:56)
Yiziphi lezindaba ezinhle osukwini luka-Abrahama ezambangela ukuba athokoze? (Gal 3:8)
Wayenokholo olungenakungatshazwa esithembisweni sikaJehova sokuthi izizwe zaziyobusiswa; uAbrahama
wakholwa ngempela futhi wenza ngokuvumelana nalolokholo (Gen 15:5, 6; Rom 4:3, 18-22)
UAbrahama wabheka izindaba ezinhle njengeziyigugu futhi wayezimisele ukukubonakalisa lokho, ngakho-ke
uNkulunkulu wamthanda (Dut 7:7, 8; 2Kh 13:23; Rom 4:11, 12; Heb 11:17-19; wZU89 7/1 18-23; wZU87 1/15 13)
Osukwini lukaMose izindaba ezinhle zaba nesici esengeziwe: ukukhululwa eGibithe nokungena eZweni Lesithe-
mbiso (wZU74 12/1 539 [w74 333])
UMose wayelwazisa ulwazi lwezindaba ezinhle futhi azisa nengxenye ayenayo ekukhonzeni (Heb 11:24-28;
wZU92 11/15 30; wZU87 1/15 13-15)
UAbrahama, uMose, kanye nabanye abantu basendulo bakhonza ngokwethembeka ngisho nakuba babazi uku-
thi isimo esingokoqobo sasizofika esikhathini esizayo esasisekude (Heb 11:10, 13-16, 32-39; wZU87 1/15 13, 16-19)
Ezinsukwini zabaphostoli, izindaba ezinhle zaba nezici ezintsha ezibalulekile (it-1 988  ̊4)
Abaphostoli bacacisa ukuthi ngemva kokuba uJesu esenikele ngokuphila kwakhe njengesihlengo, wenyukela
ezulwini futhi ngalesosikhathi wayesehleli ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu (Heb 10:12, 13)
No. 47-ZU
9/95Bashumayela izindaba ezinhle zokubuya kukaJesu nangoMbuso wakhe ozayo (2Ti 4:1)
Babenentshiseko engapheli ngalezindaba ezinhle (2Kor 11:23-28; wZU83 6/15 9-20 [w82 12/1 12-22])
UPawulu wasebenza ngokungayeki ukuze azimemezele kabanzi ngangokunokwenzeka izindaba ezinhle futhi
akhe ibandla elalizobhekana nalokho okwakuyomelana nalo, ikakhulukazi ukuhlubuka okukhulu
Wadlulisela izinto ayezazi emadodeni athembekile ayeyoqhubekisela phambili umsebenzi wezindaba ezilu-
ngileyo ngemva kokufa kwakhe; wazama ukuwafundisa konke ayekwazi (IzE 20:19, 20; 1Ti 3:14, 15; 2Ti 2:2)
UPawulu wenza lokhu nakuba ayazi ukuthi wayezokufa ngaphambi ‘kosuku lukaJehova’ (2Thes 2:2, 3, 7)
Umphostoli wayazi ukuthi, kithi ngabanye, ‘insindiso isisondele manje kunesikhathi esaqala ngaso ukukho-
lwa’ (Rom 13:11; 1Kor 7:29)
Osukwini lwethu izindaba ezinhle zingcono futhi ziphuthuma kakhulu kunanini ngaphambili (wZU74 12/1 537
 ̊13 [w74 331  ̊13])
Manje iNkosi isisesihlalweni sobukhosi! Manje uMbuso usumisiwe!
Ukuphela kwalesimiso sekusondele! Izwe elisha seliseduze!
Manje “izindaba ezinhle zombuso” zishunyayelwa ngentshiseko (Mat 24:14, NW)
“Usuku lukaJehova” kumelwe lugcinwe “lusengqondweni” (2Pet 3:12, NW)
INGABE IZINDABA EZINHLE ZIYIGUGU KUWE? (10 imiz.)
Thina ngabanye singazibuza:
‘Ingabe ngiyakulangazelela ukufunda okwengeziwe ngezindaba ezinhle, ukuthola lokho ezikushoyo ngempe-
la, ukuzisebenzisa ekuphileni kwami kwansuku zonke, nokusiza abanye ukuba bafunde ngazo?’ (wZU80
5/1 30 [w79 12/15 8])
Singakhulisa ukholo lwethu nokwazisa ngezindaba ezinhle ngokucabanga ngokunakisisa ngabantu abathembe-
kile basendulo nangesithakazelo izingelosi ezasibonisa kuzo (1Pet 1:10-12; bwZU 20-2)
Sizungezwe abazalwane abaningi namuhla abathembeke njengalabobantu basendulo futhi abamukela izibusiso
ngokulalela izindaba ezinhle (wZU90 1/1 4-6; wZU90 7/15 31)
Kuwudumo olukhulu kunalo lonke ukumelela uMbusi Wendawo Yonke manje ezweni elimelene naye nokusiza
labo abazidinga kakhulu izindaba ezinhle
Ngeke liphinde libe khona ithuba elinjalo
Siqondiswa, siqashelwe, futhi sisekelwe yizingelosi (1Ti 5:21; Heb 1:14; IsAm 14:6)
Njengoba usukubonile ukubaluleka kwezindaba ezinhle ekuphileni kwakho nokwabanye, yiba nokholo nasezi-
ndabeni ezinhle lapho uzitshela abanye
Qaphela amandla azo okuguqula nekhono ezinalo lokuthambisa izinhliziyo ezilukhuni kanye nokubalethela
injabulo nentokozo engenamingcele labo abazamukele ngenjabulo (Rom 1:16, 17)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 47-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUBHEKANA NOVIVINYO LOBUQOTHO BOBUKRISTU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yenza izilaleli ziqaphele ukuthi nsuku zonke ubuqotho bethu bobuKristu bubekelwa inselele uSathane nezwe la-
khe. Kumelwe siyisekele ngobuqotho inhlangano kaJehova ngaphandle kokukhononda noma ukukhubeka futhi
sibe ngabathobekile futhi sifunde nokuthobela ukuqondisa kukaJehova
ISIZATHU ESENZA UKUGCINA UBUQOTHO BOBUKRISTU KUBE UVIVINYO (8 imiz.)
Ubuqotho buhilela ukunamathela emthethweni kaNkulunkulu kuzo zonke izici zokuphila kwethu (Funda eya-
base-Efesu 4:20-24, qhathanisa neNW)
Umuntu ofunda indlela kaKristu uyakuqaphela ukuthi kumelwe ashintshe ubuntu bakhe bonke (wZU72 5/15
239 [w71 543-4]; it-2 404; wZU86 7/1 20  ̊14)
Lokhu kuhilela ukuhlakulela umbono ohluke ngokuphelele, obangelwa ‘amandla amasha ashukumisa ingqo-
ndo yethu’
Kuphumela ebuntwini obusha obuvumelana nentando kaNkulunkulu
USathane uhlose ukwephula ubuqotho bethu
Uye wasungula “amaqhinga” ahlukahlukene ukuze aphule ubuqotho bobuKristu (Funda eyabase-Efesu 6:11,
12) (wZU77 2/1 52-3 [w76 465-6]; wZU88 9/1 13, 15-17)
IKingdom Interlinear ihumusha igama lesiGreki elisho “amaqhinga” ngokuthi “izenzo zobuqili”
Ezinye izenzo zobuqili zikaDeveli ziwukuhlasela okuqondile: ukusongelwa, izenzo zobudlova, namanye ama-
su okwesabisa aklanyelwe ukusinqoba nokusethusa
Ezinye zezenzo zobuqili zicashile: izinto ezikhanga izifiso ezingokwemvelo nokuthambekela kobugovu
Nsuku zonke amaKristu abhekana novivinyo lobuqotho bawo
Loluvivinyo ngeke luhilele izinto ezinkulu ngaso sonke isikhathi; ubuqotho bobuKristu buhilela ukwenza “zo-
nke izinto ngokuphelele” (Efe 6:13, NW)
Uvivinyo luhilela ukusebenzisa umthetho kaNkulunkulu emikhayeni yethu, ukulondoloza umbono oqondile
ngenhlangano yakhe, nokubonisa intshiseko ekukhulumeni nabanye ngenjongo kaNkulunkulu
Singabubonisa kanjani ubuqotho esicini ngasinye kulezi ekuphileni kwethu njengamaKristu?
YIBA QOTHO EMKHAYENI (13 imiz.)
Umkhaya uyilungiselelo likaJehova emhlabeni (Efe 3:15; it-1 807  ̊3; w62 352)
Ukuze sibe qotho kudingeka silalele iseluleko sikaJehova esiphathelene nokuqondisa ubuhlobo bomkhaya
Ukonakala kwendawo ezungezile kubeka imikhaya yamaKristu ngaphansi kovivinyo
Imikhaya eminingi iyawohloka (gZU91 9/22 3-5; gZU80 10/8 13-17 [g80 4/22 3-7]; gZU83 2/8 3-4 [g82 8/8 3-4])
Kukhona ubuhlongandlebe kanye nokungeneliseki okubhebhethekayo phakathi kwentsha (wZU88 4/15 21;
wZU89 10/15 29)
USathane uthuthukisa umoya ovamile wokuzibusa nowobugovu emkhayeni
UJehova ufuna ukuba umfazi azithobe (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 3:3-6)
Kusebenza ngisho noma indoda ingakholwa (1Pet 3:1, 2; bwZU 77-9; wZU89 5/15 17)
Lokhu kuzithoba kuhamba ibanga elingakanani? (IzE 5:29; Efe 5:24)
Nikeza izibonelo ezibonisa indlela ubuqotho bobuKristu obungavivinywa ngayo emkhayeni ohlukene
Abesifazane abasebasha abacabangela ukushada kufanele basiqaphele isimo esingokoqobo salokho abakunge-
nelayo (Rom 7:2)
UJehova uyala indoda ukuba ‘inike umkayo udumo’ (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 3:7) (bwZU 90-2; wZU89 5/15 14)
Kumelwe yazi ukulinganiselwa kwakhe okungokomzimba, okungokomzwelo, nokunye (wZU89 5/15 13)
Ukumnika udumo kuhilela nokukhulumisana naye ngokungagunci nangokukhululekile
Cabangela izifiso zakhe ezindabeni ezithile; yenza izinqumo ngokuvumelana nezimiso ezingokomBhalo
Isibonelo esihle sabazali siyothonya abantwana
Ukuzithoba komfazi kukhuthaza abantwana ukuba balalele (Efe 6:1)
Intsha ithambekele kakhulu ‘ekwaziseni abazali bayo’ lapho ubaba ‘enika umkakhe udumo’ (Efe 6:2)
Abazali bayoba ‘nesibindi esikhulu’ sokuqondisa abantwana uma isibonelo sabo sisihle (1Ti 3:13)
UKUGCINA UBUQOTHO ENHLANGANWENI KAJEHOVA (13 imiz.)
UJehova unelungelo lokufuna ubuqotho ngenxa yokuba kwakhe uMdali, iNkosi ePhakeme (Jer 10:10)
Ukuze abeqotho kuNkulunkulu, umuntu kumelwe abeqotho enhlanganweni yaKhe (w65 412; wZU88 3/15 18-19)
ImiBhalo iqukethe izibonelo eziningi zabantu abaye babonisa ubuqotho elungiselelweni likaNkulunkulu
UDavide, lapho exoshwa uSawule, waba namathuba amabili okubulala uSawule kodwa wenqaba
Wayengakucabangi ukwelulela isandla sakhe ngokumelene nogcotshiweyo kaNkulunkulu (1Sa 24:1-7; 26:1-
12, 23)
No. 48-ZU
7/92Lapho abanye, bekhutshwe yilokho uJesu ayekufundisa, bemshiya, uPetru nabanye abaphostoli bahlala beqo-
tho (Joh 6:66-69)
Nakuba abanye baphambuka okholweni, abaphostoli namanye amaKristu amaningi ekhulu lokuqala leminya-
ka baba qotho ebandleni lobuKristu (1Ti 1:19, 20; 2Ti 2:16-19)
Kunezibonelo eziningi zosuku lwanamuhla zabantu abaye balondoloza ubuqotho babo kuJehova nasenhlanga-
nweni yakhe ngisho nangaphansi kwezimo ezinzima (wZU81 2/15 5-11 [w80 8/15 5-10]; wZU80 10/15 7-17 [w80

Yiba qotho kuJehova nasenhlanganweni yakhe
Yamukela “ukudla ngesikhathi sakho” okuvela ‘encekwini ethembekileyo neqondayo’ (Mat 24:45-47)
Ungakhutshekiswa incazelo ethile okungenzeka ukuthi kunzima ukuyiqonda (Hu 119:165)
Sekela izinqumo nomsebenzi wendikimba yabadala, uqaphela ukuthi imiswe umoya ongcwele, kuyilapho uqa-
phela nokuthi nabo abaphelele futhi bangawenza amaphutha (IzE 20:28; Heb 13:7, 17; 1Pet 4:8; wZU89 9/15

[w64 464-70])
LONDOLOZA UBUQOTHO EKUFEZENI UKUTHUNYWA KWETHU KOKUSHUMAYELA (8 imiz.)
Ukuphila komKristu kufanele kusetshenziselwe intando kaNkulunkulu (1Pet 4:1, 2)
UNkulunkulu “[ufisa] ukuba bonke beze ekuphendukeni” (2Pet 3:9)
Labo abangenalo iqiniso babhekwa ‘njengabafile eziphambekweni zabo’ (Efe 2:1; 1Pet 4:6)
Ukushumayela kuyindaba yokufa nokuphila
Okuhle kunakho konke esingakwenzela abantu ukubazisa ngezindaba ezinhle
USathane uzama ukusiphazamisa emsebenzini wokushumayela ‘ngezenzo zobuqili’
Usebenzisa izifiso ezingokwemvelo ezihlobene nobuntu obudala ukuze asinxenxe (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 4:3, 4)
(bwZU 109-11; wZU90 8/15 17)
Ukuze sishiseke ekushumayeleni, kumelwe sibe nombono okhanyayo wesimo esingokoqobo sezinto (Funda
eyoku-1 Petru 4:5, 6)
Isikhathi sokuqeda lomsebenzi siyaphela (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 4:7)
INDLELA YOKUBHEKANA NOVIVINYO LOBUQOTHO BOBUKRISTU (3 imiz.)
Manje kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba sitadishe iZwi likaNkulunkulu
Kumelwe sazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ufunani kithi
Ngaso sonke isikhathi kumelwe sizithobe ekuqondiseni kukaNkulunkulu (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 5:6, 7) (bwZU
136-7; wZU83 3/1 23-6 [w82 9/15 23-5])
Yiba nokholo lokuthi uJehova uyasazi isikhathi sokuletha ukukhululeka ekucindezeleni kukaSathane
Qiniseka ngokuthi uJehova uyakukhathalela
Phikelela emithandazweni ebonisa lesimo sengqondo
Ungesatshiswa amacebo kaSathane (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 5:8)
Akanakubanqoba labo abanesivikelo sikaJehova (Efe 6:10-13)
UJehova unikeza ‘bonke abazalwane’ ithuba lokuba umuntu ngamunye abonakalise ubuqotho bakhe (Funda
eyoku-1 Petru 5:9, 10)
Ungathembela kuJehova ukuba akuqinise ukuze uthole izinzuzo zamanje nezaphakade ngokubhekana naloluvi-
vinyo
Thembela kuye ukuba akuqinise ukuze ubhekane novivinyo
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Aku-
yona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 48-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UMHLABA OHLANZIWE—UYOPHILA UZE UWUBONE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ukuthi labo abafisa ukujabulela umhlaba ohlanziwe kumelwe balwele ukuba ngabahlanzekile ngokomzi-
mba, ngokwengqondo, nangokuziphatha. Basize bonke bahlole isimo sabo sengqondo nezenzo zabo. Siyazibonisa
yini izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu ezihlanzekile kuzo zonke izici zokuphila? Bakhuthaze bonke ukuba baphile
ngendlela ebonisa ukuthi bayakholelwa ukuthi umhlaba ohlanziwe ususeduze
UKUHLANZEKA KUYAKHANGA—KITHINA NAKUNKULUNKULU (4 imiz.)
Kuyajabulisa ukubona amakhaya anakekelwe kahle endaweni enhle
Kunjalo ikakhulukazi uma sivame ukubona udoti, ukungcoliswa kwendawo ezungezile
Ingabe uye wakuqaphela yini ukuthambekela ekungcoleni, nasekunukubezeni umhlaba? (g90-ZU 5/8 4-9)
Lapho abaningi emphakathini bengahlanzekile ngenxa yokungaqeqeshwa kahle, ukukhungatheka, noma
ukuphelelwa yithemba, lokhu kwenza imizamo yabanye yokuhlanzeka ibe yize
Ingabe isimo sendawo esihle, esihlanzekile asisishukumiseli ukuba nathi sihlanzeke?
Singaqiniseka ukuthi uMdali, uJehova uNkulunkulu, uyawazisa umhlaba ohlanzekile
Wenza umhlaba waba nobuhle bemvelo obuhlanzekile, obuqabulayo, obungonakalisiwe
Wamisa izinqubo zemvelo eziklanyelwe ukugcina umhlaba uhlanzekile (g90-ZU 5/8 10-11)
Isimiso esisha sezinto esithenjisiwe siyoba esinokulunga, esihlanzekile, nesihlelekile (2Pe 3:13)
Ukungahlanzeki nokungahleleki kuphambene nezindlela zikaJehova futhi kuyobangela ukucasuka (Lev 19:2)
UKUZE SILUNGELE UMHLABA OHLANZIWE, MASILWELE UKUHLANZEKA MANJE (14 imiz.)
Ngokufunda ezindleleni zikaNkulunkulu, amaKristu kudingeka alwele ukuhlanzeka manje
Imithetho eyanikezwa ama-Israyeli yawenza aba ngavelele ekuhlanzekeni okungokomzimba, yawasiza avike-
leka ezifweni (ce 204-5; it-1 478; w89-ZU 6/1 16)
UJesu wakhuluma ngesimiso sokuhlanzeka (Mat 23:25, 26)
Kungase kusho umsebenzi omkhulu ukuyeka imikhuba yakudala, ukuqeqeshwa, nesimo sendawo (g88-ZU 10/8
27-9 [g88 9/22 9-11])
Ukuhlanzeka okungokomzimba kumelwe kukhathalelwe umkhaya wonke
Wonke umkhaya, kuhlanganise nezingane, kumelwe ubambisane ekulweleni ukuhlanzeka
Kuhlanganisa nokugcina imizimba nezingubo kuhlanzekile (w89-ZU 6/1 16-17; g88-ZU 10/8 26-7 [g88 9/22 8-9];
g72-ZU 1/22 11-12 [g71 7/22 25-6])
Abazali kufanele basheshe baqale ukufundisa izingane ukubaluleka nokuba yinzuzo kokuhlanzeka emzi-
mbeni
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi ikakhulukazi abafazi abanomthwalo wemfanelo ngokuphathelene nekhaya (Thi 2:
4, 5)
Nokho, kungaba ukungabonisi uthando ngendoda nezingane ukuba amadlabha, benze umfazi ahlale ebaco-
cela njalo nje (w89-ZU 6/1 17)
IBhayibheli alifuni ukuba abafazi bakushisekele ngokweqile ukuhlanza; kudingeka babe nombono olingani-
selayo ngokubaluleka kwakho
Ukuphumelela kwabo noma ukwehluleka kulimelela ngandlela-thile iZwi likaNkulunkulu
Izimoto nazo kufanele zihlale zicocekile futhi zihlanzekile ngaphandle nangaphakathi (w89-ZU 6/1 18)
Ukunakekela lezizici kuyindlela yokubonisa isifiso sakho sokuhlala emhlabeni ohlanziwe
Abanye bayokuphawula (ikhaya nezingubo kungase kungabi okubizayo kodwa okuhlanzekile, nokucocekile)
futhi kuhlangene nethemba lethu nezinkolelo (g86 12/22 22-3)
Siyobe sihlakulela indlela yokuhlanzeka eyofaneleka emhlabeni omusha
UKUBONISA ISIFISO SETHU SOKUPHILA EMHLABENI OHLANZIWE (16 imiz.)
Izimo zendawo ezifanele zizodwa aziwenzi umhlaba omusha othenjisiwe
Abanye abantu bahlala endaweni enhle kodwa bakhathazwa ukungathembi, ukwesaba ubugebengu, isizungu,
nokucindezeleka
ULoti wayehlala endaweni enhle (Gen 13:10)
Kodwa ukonakala kokuziphatha komakhelwane eSodoma kwamkhathaza (Luk 17:28, 29; 2Pe 2:7, 8)
Nathi sicindezelwa ukonakala kokuziphatha okwandayo namuhla
“Umhlaba omusha” uyoba nokuhlanzeka kokuziphatha futhi ube nokuthula (2Pe 3:13; g85-ZU 4/8 9-11 [g84
10/22 9-11])
IBhayibheli lithembisa ukuthi ‘amazulu nomhlaba’ okukhona manje kuzosuswa (2Pe 3:7, 10; sl 297-306; rs-ZU
365-7)
“Amazulu” angohulumeni, noma izimiso zokubusa, kumelwe asuswe
“Izici” zawo ziwumoya wezwe—ongahlanzekile neze (wt-ZU 177-8)
Uyavuma yini ukuthi lomoya okhona manje awuvumelani noNkulunkulu?
No. 49-ZU
9/07“Umhlaba” ongokomfanekiso, ongumphakathi wabantu ababi, ‘usutholakele’
UJehova uyoqeda bonke ubuzenzisi njengokungathi ubushisa ngomlilo
Uyodalula ububi bomphakathi wesintu ongamesabi uNkulunkulu, abonise ukuthi ufanelwe ukubhujiswa
okuphelele (rs-ZU 366-7)
Njengoba ungavumelani noNkulunkulu ohlanzekile, kudingeka uqedwe
“Imisebenzi,” enjengezinhlangano, ngokuvamile yenza umonakalo endaweni ezungezile, ‘ibhubhisa um-
hlaba’ (IsAm 11:18; go 181)
Ingabe sibonisa ukuthi sifuna lesisimiso sezinto samanje sisuswe ngokuzigcina sehlukile ezweni? (Joh 17:16;
w80-ZU 12/15 5-10 [w80 6/15 5-10])
Ingabe sihlanzekile ngokokuziphatha nangokwengqondo, noma ingabe umoya ongcolile wezwe uyabonaka-
la ekuziphatheni kwethu nasendleleni esicabanga ngayo?
Kudingeka okwengeziwe kunokumane sigweme ukuziphatha okubi, njengoba kuboniswa eMthethweni (Bo-
nisa lokhu ngoLevitikusi 19:2, 3, 11-18, 29, 33-36; w89-ZU 6/1 12-13; w87-ZU 11/1 10-20; w79-ZU 2/1 22-4
[w78 8/1 30-1])
Okuyobonisa ukuthi sifuna amazulu nomhlaba okukhona manje kususwe ukuthi sisakujabulela yini (ngi-
sho nangezikhathi ezithile) ukungahlanzeki kwakho
Ingabe sinesimo sengqondo sokuthi ukungcola okuncane nje akunangozi? (w89-ZU 6/1 16)
Kuthiwani ngamahlaya angcolile, umculo nomdanso okuvusa inkanuko, nenhlamba?
Kungani sivumela izwe lisitshele ukuthi yini esingayijabulela, efiselekayo, nefanele udumo?
Ingabe abanye bangabona ngesimo sethu sengqondo nangokuziphatha ukuthi ngempela siyakholelwa uku-
thi amazulu nomhlaba okukhona manje sekulahliwe futhi ngokushesha kuzosuswa?
Uma sifuna izwe elisha elihlanzekile nelinokuthula, buhlobo buni esibuhlakulela nemikhaya nabafowethu?
Uma siqhubeka sigxeka futhi sinomhawu, silalela futhi sisakaze inhlebo, sifunana namaphutha, sigxambuke-
la ezindabeni zabanye siyobe sisanamathele emoyeni wezwe
Singasho ngempela yini ukuthi silwela ukuzihlukanisa nomoya wezwe?
Ukuthi siyafuna yini ukuphila emhlabeni ohlanziwe sikubonisa ngezinga esiguquka ngalo (Jak 4:1-4, 11)
LWELA UKUHLALA WAMUKELEKILE FUTHI ULUNGELE UMHLABA OHLANZIWE (11 imiz.)
Uma siwufuna ngempela umhlaba ohlanziwe, kufanele sikubonise lokho manje, hhayi ngesinye isikhathi (Fu-
nda eyesi-2 Petru 3:11)
Izenzo ezakhayo zokwesaba uNkulunkulu ziyosigcina siseduze noNkulunkulu wethu ohlanzekile
Ukuphila kwethu kwansuku zonke kufanele kubonise ukuthi sizinikele kuNkulunkulu futhi silandela izi-
ndlela zakhe (IzE 9:36; 1Ti 5:4)
Masikushisekele ukukhuthaza abanye ukuba bafunde ngomhlaba ohlanziwe
Masilulungele usuku lukaJehova; lungafika noma nini (2Pe 3:12, 17, 18; sl 309)
Kulula ukuchezukiswa izinto umuntu angase acabange ukuthi zizomphambukisa noma zimphazamise okwe-
sikhashana kuphela ekuzinikeleni ngomphefumulo wonke
Singazibuza: Uma usuku lukaJehova lungafika ngokushesha, ngiyokwaneliswa yini yilokho ebengikwenza?
Injongo yethu kufanele ibe ukukhulekela uJehova, sitholakale samukeleka kuye futhi sinokuthula naye (2Pe
3:14)
Kuyasiza ukuba sonke sihlale phansi sihlolisise isimo sethu
Ingabe kunezici okumelwe sithuthukise kuzo ukuhlanzeka okungokomzimba?
Ingabe ngandlela-thile sibonisa umoya wezwe ongahlanzekile?
Sizikhandla ngempela yini ezenzweni zokuzinikela kokwesaba uNkulunkulu?
Yiziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo?
Akungabazeki ukuthi umhlaba ohlanziwe uyeza
Kumelwe sikulwele ukuba lapho ngokulondoloza indinganiso kaNkulunkulu ephakeme yokuhlanzeka
Ngisho noma abanye bengabaza, siyazi ukuthi uyofika (2Pe 3:4, 13)
Yakha ukholo lwakho ngolwazi olwandisiwe, umthandazo, nemisebenzi yobuKristu
Kwenze kube isinqumo sakho ukuphila ngendlela ebonisa ukuthi uyaqiniseka ukuthi umhlaba ohlanziwe uzo-
fika ngokushesha

hlakaniphile kudinga ngaso sonke isikhathi sicabangele
iZwi likaNkulunkulu, unembeza womuntu, nokuzinike-
 ́
zela komuntu kuNkulunkulu. Uma umuntu esenze isinqumo esinengqondo, kufanele anamathele kuso angalokhu
eshintshashintsha. Qaphela ukuba ungazishayeli imithetho izilaleli ngezindaba zomuntu siqu
GWEMA UKUBA MANQIKANQIKA (9 imiz.)
Sonke sibhekana nezimo eziningi ezifuna senze izinqumo
Zingase zihlobane nokuthenga, ukuhlela ukuthi imali izosetshenziswa kanjani, umsebenzi, impilo, umshado,
ubudlelwane nabantu, ukusetshenziswa kwesikhathi, ukuzijabulisa, nokunye
Asinakukugwema ukwenza izinqumo
Abantu abaningi banomkhuba wokuba manqikanqika
Ngokuvamile bafuna othile abenzele izinqumo
IBhayibheli alikuvumeli ukuba manqikanqika (Jak 1:7, 8)
Igama lesiGreki elisho ukuba manqikanqika lisho ukuba “nhliziyo-mbili”
Kumelwe sizinikele ngomphefumulo wonke kuJehova, siphile ngokuvumelana nesinqumo sethu sokumkho-
nza (w79-ZU 12/1 17 [w79 5/15 22])
Ukuba manqikanqika kusichithela isikhathi kusilahlekisele namathuba (Efe 5:15, 16; g90-ZU 2/8 18)
Isizwe sakwa-Israyeli sazichithela isikhathi esasingasisebenzisela ukukhulekela uNkulunkulu ngoba sasi-
manqikanqika (1Kh 18:21)
Kumelwe sifunde ukwenza izinqumo ezinengqondo ngoba ngeke sikwazi ukuhlehlisa isikhathi siyolungisa ama-
phutha ethu (w83-ZU 4/1 3 [w82 10/1 3])
Kudingeka sazi ukuthi yiziphi izinqumo okuwumthwalo wethu wemfanelo ukuzenza (Gal 6:5; g74-ZU 3/8 20-1
[w73 542])
SEBENZISA UKUHLAKANIPHA LAPHO WENZA IZINQUMO ESIYOLANDISA NGAZO (14 imiz.)
Emsebenzini, kunezinqumo umuntu okumelwe azenze
Ezinye izindaba kufanele ziyiswe kumqashi (Efe 6:5, 6)
Ekhaya, umfazi wenza izinqumo eziningi nsuku zonke (IzA 31:11, 16, 18; it-2 342, 1197)
Ezinye izinto kumelwe zinqunywe umyeni wakhe (fl-ZU 55-6)
Ingane nayo yenza izinqumo eziningi (fl-ZU 151-5)
Lezi kumelwe zigunyazwe abazali bayo (Luk 2:40-42; Kol 3:20; g88-ZU 1/8 15-17 [g88 1/8 19-21]; yp-ZU 11-17;
yy-ZU 73-9)
Ezinye izinqumo zihilela unembeza wobuKristu
Ukukhetha umsebenzi (1Ko 10:31; w83-ZU 1/1 26 [w82 7/15 26]; w73-ZU 4/1 151-60 [w72 591-600])
Ukuzijabulisa, ukusetshenziswa kwesikhathi, kunqunywa unembeza (w79-ZU 12/15 3-20 [w79 6/1 3-20]; yp-ZU
289-303)
Ezimweni eziningi ngisho nakuba umuntu kunguyena onomthwalo wemfanelo wokwenza isinqumo esithile, ku-
bonisa ukucabangela ukuqale uxoxe indaba nabanye okungenzeka bahilelekile (w89-ZU 5/15 12-13)
YENZA IZINQUMO EZIHLAKANIPHILE NGOKUFUNA ISIQONDISO KUNKULUNKULU (11 imiz.)
Akuwona umthwalo wethu wemfanelo ukunquma ukuthi yini elungile nengalungile

10/1 11)

noma yisiphi isinqumo okumelwe sisenze (w90-ZU 4/1 13)
Kudingeka sizazi kahle izimiso zeBhayibheli uma sifuna ukwenza izinqumo ezinengqondo (w88-ZU 10/1 26)
Funda ukuthi zitholakalaphi lezizimiso ukuze uzisebenzise ezinqumweni zansuku zonke (2Ti 2:15)
Ngokuprakthiza nangokuziqeqesha, funda ukusebenzisa izincwadi zokutadisha iBhayibheli, futhi uzinike
isikhathi sokwenza lokho

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE IQINISO LIYAKUGUQULA UKUPHILA KWAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Yakha ukholo emandleni eqiniso okuguqula. Nikeza izibonelo ezinguquko ezinzima abantu abazenzile ukuze ba-
jabulise uJehova. Gcizelela ukuthi sonke kudingeka sihlale siguqula ukuphila kwethu ngenjongo yokubonakalisa
umfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ngokuseduze futhi ngaleyondlela simdumise
IQINISO LINAMANDLA OKUGUQULA (6 imiz.)
Iqiniso leBhayibheli linamandla okwenza izinguquko ezimangalisayo ekuphileni kwabantu
KweyabaseRoma 12:2, elithi “niguqulwe” livela egameni lesiGreki elithi me·ta·mor·phoo, elisho ushintsho
oluphelele, njengokuguquka kwesibungu siba uvemvane okubizwa ngokuthi i-metamorphosis (w90-ZU
4/1 16)
Izibonelo zabantu bekhulu lokuqala C.E. zifakazela ukuthi iqiniso lingakwenza lokhu (g78-ZU 11/8 21-2 [g78
5/8 27])
Inguquko yenzeka phakathi kwamaKristu aseKorinte nawaseKolose (1Ko 6:9-11; Kol 3:5-10)
Inguquko enjalo yenzeka nasekuphileni kukamphostoli uPawulu (Qhathanisa eyoku-1 Thimothewu 1:13-16
neyoku-1 Korinte 11:1)
Ingabe iqiniso linawo amandla okuguqula namuhla?
Umprofethi u-Isaya wabikezela ukuguqulwa kobuntu babantu osukwini lwethu (Isa 11:6-9; sl 183-94 [phawu-
la  ̊18, 20]; w84-ZU 4/1 4-6 [w83 10/1 4-6]; it-2 257)
Abantu abaningi baye bazenza izinguquko ezinjalo, benza ukuphila kwabo kwajabulisa ngokwengeziwe futhi
kwaba nenjongo (w90-ZU 4/1 17; w89-ZU 10/1 21; w88-ZU 1/1 5-6; w88-ZU 5/1 7, 18; w85-ZU 2/1 25; w84-ZU
4/1 6-8 [w83 10/1 6-7])
QAPHELA ISIDINGO SOKUGUQUKA (10 imiz.)
Sonke kudingeka siguquke (Rom 3:23; 13:11-14)
Sishukunyiswa isifiso sokujabulisa uMdali nokubonakalisa ubuntu bakhe (Kol 3:10)
IBhayibheli lisibonisa izici zobuntu okufanele sizilahle (IzA 6:16-19)
IBhayibheli lichaza izici ezifiselekayo okufanele sizihlakulele (Gal 5:22, 23; w90-ZU 4/1 17-18)
IBhayibheli lisibonisa indlela esingenza ngayo inguquko (w93-ZU 3/1 15-18)
Kumelwe siqale ‘siguqule izingqondo zethu’ ngokuzondla ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu (Rom 12:2; Efe 4:23)
Ngomthandazo, singanxusa ukuba uNkulunkulu asisize ngomoya ongcwele (Luk 11:13; 1Jo 5:14, 15)
Singacela usizo kubadala ebandleni lobuKristu (Jak 5:14-20; w89-ZU 9/15 17)
Asitholi uhlu olude lwemithetho, kodwa sithola izeluleko nezimiso ezisisiza ukuba sazi ukuthi yiziphi izinguqu-
ko ezidingekile
Abasanda kuhlanganyela banezici ezikhethekile okumelwe basebenzele kuzo, kodwa futhi kunezici ezidinga uku-
nakekelwa yilabo asebenesikhathi eside beseqinisweni
UKUSHIYA IMIKHUBA ELIMAZA UMZIMBA NENGQONDO (15 imiz.)
Ukusebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli kusiza abantu ukuba bashiye imikhuba elimaza umzimba nengqondo, ngale-
yondlela bathuthukise ukuphila kwabo
Ukusebenzisa kabi utshwala
Nakuba iBhayibheli lingakwenqabeli ukuphuza utshwala ngokulinganisela, liyakulahla ukudakwa (Gal 5:21;
1Ti 3:8; 5:23; yp-ZU 262-71)
Ukuthola umbono weBhayibheli ngokusebenzisa kabi utshwala kusize abaningi bayishiya inkambo enjalo
(w86-ZU 10/1 24; g82 7/22 15)
Lezizinguquko ziletha izinzuzo ezinjengempilo engcono, ukuphila komkhaya okujabulisa ngokwengeziwe
(g87-ZU 5/8 6-7; g87-ZU 11/8 10-11; g80-ZU 9/8 15-21 [g80 3/8 7-12])
Ukubhema nokusebenzisa kabi imilaliso
Ukubhema kunomphumela oyingozi emzimbeni nasengqondweni, futhi ngenxa yalokho, akuvumelani nezimi-
so ezingokomBhalo (Rom 12:1; g89-ZU 11/8 30-1 [g89 11/8 26-7]; rs-ZU 163-6)
Izimiso ezingokomBhalo zibonisa ukuthi amaKristu kumelwe akugweme ukusebenzisa kabi imilaliso (Luk
10:27; Gal 5:20, lapho igama lesiGreki elithi phar·ma·kia, lihunyushwe khona ngokuthi “ukusebenzisa imi-
moya,” ngokwezwi nezwi lisho “ukudakwa yimilaliso”; 2Ko 7:1; tp-ZU 158; rs-ZU 161; w73-ZU 545-6, 548-9
[w73 339, 342-3])
Isifiso sokuphila ngokuvumelana nezimiso ezinjalo sisize abaningi ukuba bashiye ukuba imilutha yemilali-
so; lolushintsho lubazuzisile (g89-ZU 7/8 14-15; w88-ZU 10/1 29; g87 11/22 21-3)
Ukuziphatha okubi kobulili
IBhayibheli likulahla ngokuqondile ukuhlobonga nokungcola (1Ko 6:9, 18; Gal 5:19-21)
Iqiniso leBhayibheli lisize abaningi ukuba bahlanze ukuphila kwabo futhi ngaleyondlela bagweme izinkinga
eziningi ezibuhlungu (yp-ZU 181-91; w94-ZU 5/15 20)
No. 51-ZU
6/95Ukuguquka kuyohlanganisa ukungagwemi ukuhlobonga nje kuphela kodwa nanoma yikuphi ukungcola na-
bobulili obuhlukile (yp-ZU 193-7)
UKUSHIYA UKUCABANGA KWEZWE NEZIMO ZALO ZENGQONDO (10 imiz.)
Esinye isidingo sokuguquka sihilela ukunqoba ithonya eliwumshoshaphansi lokucabanga kwezwe nezimo zalo
zengqondo
Izinguquko iqiniso leBhayibheli elingasisiza sizenze zihlanganisa:
Ukunqoba ubandlululo noma ukuqhosha ngenxa yobuzwe noma uhlanga (IzE 10:34, 35; w89-ZU 7/1 11-12;
g88-ZU 2/8 31 [g88 1/22 27]; g88-ZU 7/8 8-10 [g88 6/22 8-10])
Ukulwa nokucindezela kokugqoka nokuzilungisa ngendlela engenasizotha nengafanelekile (1Ti 2:9, 10;
w88-ZU 8/15 17; w77-ZU 9/1 396-7 [w77 149-50]; g78-ZU 3/22 22-3 [g77 9/22 27-8]; yp-ZU 90-6)
Ukungavumeli izinto ezibonakalayo nezithakazelo zomuntu siqu zikwenze ungamkhathaleli uNkulunkulu no-
makhelwane (Mat 6:33; 1Ti 6:6-8; w90-ZU 2/15 6; w87-ZU 10/1 5-6)
Ukwenza izinguquko ezinjalo kudinga umzamo wasikhathi sonke ngoba sihlale singaphansi kwamathonya ezwe
(2Ko 13:5)
Ingabe iqiniso likuguqulile ukuphila kwakho kulezizici?
Sonke kudingeka siqhubeke sisebenzela kuzona
IZINZUZO ZOKUGUQUKA (4 imiz.)
Ukuqhubeka siguqula ukuphila kwethu kuletha “inkazimulo” eyandisiwe kuJehova lapho sibonakalisa izimfa-
nelo zakhe ngokuseduze (2Ko 3:18; w90-ZU 4/1 20; w76 327)
Siyojabulela izinzuzo zangempela ezingokwenyama nezingokomoya, okufakazela ukuthi nakuba kudingeka
umzamo, imiphumela iwufanele
(Bukeza ezinye zezinzuzo ezishiwo ngenhla)
Izinzuzo esizithola manje ziyisandulela esincane nje salokho okuyotholwa yibo bonke abaqhubeka besebenzisa
iqiniso leBhayibheli ukuze liguqule ukuphila kwabo kuvumelane nentando kaNkulunkulu
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 51-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UNGUBANI UNKULUNKULU WAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Phawula ukuthi ngokuyisisekelo kubili ukukhetha okungenziwa mayelana nokuthi abantu bakhulekela bani, uJe-
hova noSathane. Abaningi abacabanga ukuthi bakhulekela uNkulunkulu eqinisweni bakhulekela uSathane. Siza
izilaleli zihlaziye ngokucacile ukuthi zimiphi. Bonisa ukuthi ukukhulekela kwamanga kuwukukhulekela uSatha-
ne. Siza abakhulekeli bakaJehova baqiniseke ngokwengeziwe ngezinkolelo zabo
LOMBUZO UHILELA OKUNGAPHEZU KOMBONO WOMUNTU SIQU (8 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi bacabanga ukuthi bayayazi impendulo yombuzo othi, “Ubani uNkulunkulu wakho?”
Kodwa uhilela okungaphezu kombono noma umuzwa womuntu siqu (Mat 7:22, 23)
Ingabe lokho okukhulekelayo kukhona ngempela futhi kuzibonakalisa kukufanelekela ukukhulekelwa? (Jer
16:20; w88-ZU 2/1 16)
Uhlobo lokukhulekela okwenzayo luyamukeleka yini? (Mat 7:21; IzE 7:42, 43)
Ziningi izinto namuhla ezikhulekelwa njengonkulunkulu (w90-ZU 12/1 4-5; w88-ZU 2/1 16)
Abanye abantu bayavuma ukuthi babheka imali, injabulo, noma isayensi njengonkulunkulu wabo (Isa 65:11;
Fil 3:19)
Ngokuvamile abantu abavelele, abanjengabaholi bezombangazwe noma izingcweti zemidlalo noma amabhayi-
sikobho, bayakhulekelwa (IzE 12:21, 22)
Noma yini umuntu ayihawukelayo iwunkulunkulu wakhe (Kol 3:5)
Amakhulu ezigidi zabantu akhulekela izithombe (Isa 44:16, 17, 20; w90-ZU 12/1 4)
Kodwa ukhona yini uMuntu ophilayo, noma uNkulunkulu, ofanelwe ukukhulekelwa?
Abanye bazisholo ukuthi bakhulekela uNkulunkulu oseBhayibhelini kodwa banombono ofiphele ngaye, abazi
kwagama lakhe nanokuthi unalo yini, abazi nokuthi ungumuntu onomzimba ohlala endaweni ethile noma
umane nje ungamandla akhona yonke indawo
IBHAYIBHELI LIBONISA UKUTHI NGOKUYISISEKELO KUNONKULUNKULU ABABILI ABAKHULEKE-
LWAYO (10 imiz.)
KunoNkulunkulu oyedwa weqiniso (Joh 17:3; pe-ZU 34-6)
Unegama (IHu 83:18)
Unomzimba womoya (Joh 4:24)
Uhlala ezulwini (1Kh 8:43)
UJehova unguNkulunkulu wangempela, umninimandla onke, uMdali nofanele ukukhulekelwa (IsA 4:11)
Nakuba kunabaningi abanye onkulunkulu abakhulekelwayo, iBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi ukukhulekela bonke
abanye onkulunkulu kungokwamademoni (Dut 32:16, 17; 1Ko 10:20)
AmaHindu anonkulunkulu abangu-330 000 000; imibhalo yobuShinto ikhuluma ngonkulunkulu abangu-8 000
000 (g89-ZU 1/8 28 [g88 12/22 21]; it-1 201, 237, 689)
Njengoba uSathane ‘engumbusi wamademoni’ futhi kuthiwa ayizingelosi zakhe, ukukhulekela amademoni ku-
yefana-ke nokukhulekela uSathane (Mat 12:24, 26; IsAm 12:7; w90-ZU 12/1 5-6)
Ngempela ungunkulunkulu wamanga omkhulu (2Ko 4:4)
Konke okunye okukhulekelwayo ngaphandle kukaJehova kungamanga futhi kufeza injongo kaSathane
Kudingeka sithole ukuthi ubani ngempela esimkhulekelayo
Kufanele siqiniseke ukuthi ukukhulekela kwethu kuyamukeleka kuNkulunkulu weqiniso (Thi 1:16; Jak 1:26)
IBHAYIBHELI LISENZA SIBONE IMIKHUBA EVAMILE YENKOLO NEZIMO ZAYO ZENGQONDO (9 imiz.)
IBhayibheli liyasisiza ukuba sibone ukuthi ubani ngempela esimkhulekelayo (g71-ZU 2/22 5-8 [g70 8/22 5-8]) (Bo-
nisana nezilaleli ngemiBhalo)
IBhayibheli liyayilahla imikhuba ethile ejabulisa uDeveli kodwa ithukuthelise uJehova
Ukukhulekela izithombe nokukhuleka ngazo (Eks 20:4, 5; 1Ko 10:14, 19, 21)
Ukukhulekela okuxubile (w90-ZU 12/1 3-4)
Ukuxubanisa izinkolo okusekelwe embonweni wokuthi zonke izinkolo zilungile (Dut 12:29-31; Mat 16:6, 12)
Ukuhlola izinkanyezi (g90-ZU 3/8 13-15; g89-ZU 11/22 3-8)
Ukukhulekela amadlozi (g89-ZU 3/8 18-19)
Izimo zengqondo ezivamile kubantu benkolo ziyangqubuzana neZwi likaNkulunkulu, zifeza izithakazelo zikaSa-
thane (Efe 2:1-5; w87-ZU 10/15 3-4)
Abaningi abantu abasontayo abazinaki izindinganiso zokuziphatha bese bethi uma nje “umthanda” omunye
umuntu noma uma bobabili bevumelana (g86-ZU 7/8 3; g85-ZU 12/8 16 [g85 12/5 10])
Bavumela ubungqingili nokunye ukuziphatha okuphendukezelwe (w89-ZU 4/15 8; g89 1/22 7-9; w87-ZU 11/1 14)
Ngokuyinhloko bakhathazeka ngezithakazelo zomuntu siqu (ibhizinisi noma abangane), bagwema ukuhilele-
ka ngokugcwele enkolweni (Jak 2:14, 26)

izinceku zakhe namuhla (1Ko 3:9)
Ngokungangabazeki lona uNkulunkulu okufanele sifune ukumkhulekela

‘Masenze ukulunga; sithande abazalwane bethu’ (1Jo 3:10)

Mat 6:24)

No. 52-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UKUCABANGA KWAKHO KUYAVUMELANA
NOKUKANKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi ngenxa yokungapheleli nokushiyeka kwethu nangenxa yokuphila ezweni elihlukanisiwe noNku-
lunkulu, kunesidingo sokuba silungise njalo ukucabanga kwethu ukuze siqiniseke ukuthi kuvumelana nokuca-
banga kukaNkulunkulu. Kufanele sizimisele ukwenza izinguquko zomuntu siqu futhi sivumele uNkulunkulu asi-
lolonge
KUNGANI KUFANELE SICABANGE NGOKUVUMELANA NONKULUNKULU? (5 imiz.)
Sonke sizizwa singaqiniseki ngezinye izikhathi ukuthi iyiphi inkambo engcono kakhulu okumelwe siyithathe
Ngokuvamile ukucabanga kobuntu kusekelwe emizwelweni, ukuqagela, noma okuhlangenwe nakho okulingani-
selwe (IzA 16:25)
Ukucindezela kokubhekana nezinkinga zokuphila kubangele ukwanda kwezinkinga ezingokomzwelo nokunga-
bi namthetho
Sidinga isiqondiso esinokwethenjelwa esivela emthonjeni ophakeme (IzA 3:5, 6)
Ukusebenza kwendawo ezungezile, ukuvumelana kwezinqubo zokuphila, umklamo wendalo, kubonisa ukuhla-
kanipha nokucabanga okuphakeme kukaNkulunkulu (Rom 1:20)
Uye wabona ukuphumelela nokwehluleka komuntu kuwo wonke umlando
NjengoMenzi womuntu, uyazazi izidingo zethu namakhono
IBhayibheli lisichazela ukucabanga kwakhe ukuze kusiqondise kuzo zonke izici zokuphila
Ingabe siyolalela?
ISIMO SENGQONDO ESINASO NGABANTU (14 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uyakulahla ukucabanga, inkulumo, nemikhuba yezwe lesintu esihlukanisiwe naye (IzA 2:11-15;
it-2 1094)
Uxwayisa izinceku zakhe ukuba zingahlakuleli ubungane nabantu abanjalo noma zilingise indlela yabo yoku-
phila (Jak 4:4; 1Jo 2:15-17; w80-ZU 9/8 32 [w80 4/1 31]; w80-ZU 12/15 5-7 [w80 6/15 5-7])
Ingabe siyavuma?
Ukungavumi kuboniswa yilabo abazitika emisebenzini yenyama, abafuna ubungane nezwe, abafuna injabulo,
abanombono wezinto ezibonakalayo (Isa 5:11, 12; Gal 5:19-21; tp-ZU 125-6; su-ZU 168)
Inkambo enjalo iphumela ekukhungathekeni
Ukuvumelana nendlela kaNkulunkulu yokucabanga kubonakaliswa ngokwethembeka ezintweni ezibonakala
zizincane (Luk 16:10; w80-ZU 12/15 9 [w80 6/15 9])
Ingabe sithonywa yizwe ezintweni ezinjengokugqoka nokuzilungisa? (it-1 655, 1021; w88-ZU 8/15 17; w87-ZU
9/15 14-15)
Ingabe izwe liyasithonya endabeni yokuziphatha phakathi kwabobulili obuhlukile? (yp-ZU 181)
Ingabe indlela yethu yokucabanga iyafana nekaNkulunkulu ezindabeni ezifana nobuzwe, ezombangazwe,
ezenhlalo, nokunye?
Ukuze abe ngomunye wabantu bakaNkulunkulu, umuntu kumelwe azihlukanise nezwe futhi ashintshe indlela
yakhe yokucabanga ukuze ivumelane nekaNkulunkulu (Efe 4:22-24; w86-ZU 7/1 20-1; it-2 305, 404)
Sinezibonelo ezinhle kakhulu zekhulu lokuqala zalabo abazenza izinguquko ezinjalo: UPetru, uSawulu, uSe-
rgiyu Pawulu, nabanye (om-ZU 154-5)
Iqiniso lingabashintsha abantu
Naphezu kwesimo sokuziphatha kwesintu, uNkulunkulu wenze ilungiselelo lensindiso ngalabo abazimisele
ukushintsha (Joh 3:16)
Izenzo zomusa kubantu bezwe zingabadonsela eqinisweni (1Pe 2:12; yb90 8; w90-ZU 5/1 31; w85-ZU 9/15 12)
Bonakalisa indlela kaNkulunkulu yokucabanga ngokubonisa uthando nesihe ngalokho okwenzela abanye nsu-
ku zonke (Gal 6:10)
Ingabe sibonakalisa indlela yakhe yokucabanga, ngokuthobeka sizimisele ukuhlanganyela izindaba ezinhle ngi-
sho nalabo abaphila ukuphila kokuziphatha okubi, noma abanye sibahlulela njengabangafanelekile bese si-
ngenzi mzamo wokubasiza? (Mat 5:44-48; Rom 5:8; w81-ZU 12/15 4-6 [w81 7/1 4-6]; w74-ZU 378-83 [w74 120-5])
ISIMO SENGQONDO ESINASO NGABAZALI (12 imiz.)
Isimo sengqondo sokuthi, ‘Angicelanga ukuba ngizalwe’ sivamile phakathi kwentsha yezwe
UNkulunkulu utshela abantwana ukuba bahloniphe futhi bazise abazali, ababazala babuye babanakekela lapho
besebancane (Efe 6:1-3; IzA 30:11, 17; fl-ZU 161-8; yp-ZU 11-17)
Kungenzeka abazali basabanakekela abantwana ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo futhi bayabaqondisa ngokokuzi-
phatha nangokomzwelo
Basha, niyavumelana yini nendlela kaNkulunkulu yokucabanga kulendaba?
Bonisani ukuvumelana noNkulunkulu ngokulalela abazali (IzA 23:24, 25)
No. 53-ZU
12/93Ngisho noma abazali bengekho eqinisweni, kufanele nihloniphe isikhundla sabo emkhayeni futhi nibalalele, uma
nje kungahileli okuthile okudumaza uNkulunkulu (Kol 3:20; yp-ZU 13-16; g87-ZU 7/8 21)
Lokhu kusebenza ngisho nalapho umntwana esekhulile (IzA 23:22)
