siphakama (it-2 782)
ISIMO SENGQONDO ESINASO NGOMSEBENZI (10 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi bawubukela phansi umsebenzi, ikakhulukazi umsebenzi wezandla
Abanye bayenqaba ukusebenza, bakhetha ukuphila ngemali kahulumeni
UNkulunkulu uyisisebenzi esikhiqizayo (Hu 104:24; Joh 5:17; w82-ZU 1/15 16-17 [w82 8/1 12-13])
Siyavumelana yini nesimo sengqondo sikaNkulunkulu ngomsebenzi?
Kumelwe siqaphele ukubaluleka kwawo; sigweme ubuvila (IzA 18:9; 1The 4:11)
Ungenzi okuncane kakhulu noma ube nesimo sokunganaki, kodwa zikhandle futhi uzuze ukwaneliseka ngo-
kwenza umsebenzi omuhle nonenzuzo (Shu 3:13, 22; g84-ZU 3/8 4-8 [g83 9/8 4-7]; w73-ZU 2/15 77 [w72 487])
Ukukhuthala nokuzikhandla kuletha izinzuzo (g90 6/8 24-5; g88 2/8 31; g84-ZU 4/8 28-31 [g83 10/22 21-3]; it-2 119)
Kumelwe sibe nombono olinganiselwe ngomsebenzi wokuziphilisa (Shu 4:4, 6; g93 6/22 9-11; w87-ZU 10/1 6)
Ukukhuthala kuletha ukwaneliseka okuhlala njalo nenjabulo lapho ukuphila kwethu kugxiliswe ekwenzeni
intando kaNkulunkulu (w89-ZU 7/15 4-7)
UNkulunkulu unikeze izinceku zakhe umsebenzi wokuba ziwenze manje, ukushumayela izindaba ezinhle (Mat
24:14; 28:19, 20)
Ingabe uhlanganyela kuwo ngenhliziyo yonke? (w87-ZU 2/1 15-20; g84-ZU 3/8 8-10 [g83 9/8 8-9]; w78-ZU 12/1
4-6 [w78 6/1 27-9])
Umsebenzi onjalo uletha ukuqabuleka kweqiniso (w89 7/15 19-20)
QHUBEKA WENZA NGOKUVUMELANA NENDLELA KANKULUNKULU YOKUCABANGA (4 imiz.)
Ukucabanga nokwenza ngokuvumelana neZwi likaNkulunkulu kuphumela ezibusisweni
Kusiletha ekuvumelaneni nendlela esenziwa ngayo (Gen 1:26, 27)
Kusenza sibe nokuthula kakhudlwana nabanye, imikhaya ebumbene, ukwaneliseka emsebenzini
Ukulungisa ukucabanga kuyinto ethuthukayo (Rom 12:1, 2; w90-ZU 11/1 29-31)
Izinguquko ziyadingeka ekuqaleni, kodwa qhubeka wenza umzamo! (Efe 4:23, 24)
Manje uNkulunkulu ulolongela abantu ukuphila ezweni elisha
Ingabe usabela ngokuzithandela futhi wenze izinguquko lapho kudingekile?
Imihlangano, isifundo somuntu siqu, ubungane obunempilo, kungasiza
Ziqaphele njalo izimpawu zendlela kaNkulunkulu yokucabanga, uqhubeke uvumelanisa indlela yakho yokuca-
banga nekaNkulunkulu
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ishiwo)
No. 53-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45YAKHA UKHOLO LWAKHO KUMENZI WOMUNTU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ziningi izinto ezingalwenza buthaka ukholo lwethu. Kumelwe sizibone ukuze sigcine ukholo lwethu luqinile fu-
thi singavumeli noma yini isenze siphelelwe ukholo. Kuyasizuzisa ukutadisha izibonelo zalabo ababonisa ukholo
oluqinile kuNkulunkulu futhi sibalingise. Futhi kubalulekile ukuba sisize abanye abasizungezile bakhe ukholo
lwabo
KUBALULEKILE UKWAKHA UKHOLO MANJE (9 imiz.)
Ungase uthi, ‘Nginalo ukholo,’ kodwa luqine kangakanani?
Uyakuqaphela yini lokho ukholo lwakho olubhekene nakho?
Isikhathi sethu ikakhulukazi sinokuphela kokholo (w89-ZU 7/15 22-3)
Amathonya amaningi alwenza buthaka: ukucabanga ngezinto ezibonakalayo, ukukhathazeka ngomsebenzi ne-
zindleko zokuphila, isithakazelo esingafanele ezenzakalweni zezombangazwe noma okufezwa isayensi, imi-
bono enjengokuziphendukela kwemvelo, ubungane nabantu abangaphili ngezindinganiso zeBhayibheli, uku-
balekela ukubhekana namaqiniso okuphila ngokuzilibazisa nemidlalo (w89-ZU 10/1 15-20)
Ingabe lokhu kuye kwaluthonya ukholo lwakho? Ingabe kusazoluthonya?
IBhayibheli ligcizelela ukubaluleka kokholo (Heb 11:6)
Asikwazi ukuluthatha kalula ukholo
Ngisho nangesikhathi sabaphostoli, amaKristu akhuthazwa ukuba alwele ukholo (Juda 3)
Luqine kangakanani ukholo lwakho? Olomkhaya wakho? (w86-ZU 7/15 21-6)
Ukholo alusho ukukholelwa yinoma yini; lusekelwe ebufakazini obuqinile (it-1 804)
Abaningi abahlambalaza ukholo lobuKristu babonakalisa ukholo ngezinye izindlela
Ososayensi babonisa ukholo ezintweni ezatholwa ngaphambili eziphathelene “nemithetho yemvelo”
Kusukela kumlimi kuya esazini sezemithi yokwelapha, bonke babonakalisa ukholo ekungaguqukini kwe-
mithetho yemvelo (Shu 1:5-7; w77-ZU 4/15 177-81; ce 118-25)
Kudinga isikhathi nomzamo ukuqoqa ubufakazi obuqinisekisayo njengesisekelo sokholo (Heb 11:1; w87-ZU
7/15 4)
Njengoba isakhiwo esikhulu sakhiwa ngezitini zokwakha, ngokufanayo ukholo lusekelwe “ezitinini” zobufa-
kazi ezibekwe ngokucophelela ngokuvumelana nezinye (w87-ZU 7/15 4)
“Isitini” ngasinye sinezela ubufakazi bokuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona, unguMdali, unenjongo ngendalo
UBUFAKAZI OBUNINGI, “BUYIZITINI,” EZAKHA UKHOLO KUNKULUNKULU (7 imiz.)
Ulwazi lokuthi sinoMenzi, uMdali, luyasisiza ekwakheni ukholo (Rom 1:20; Heb 3:4; w87-ZU 7/15 4)
Aluwona nje umcabango; siyazi ukuthi umhlaba ukhona nokuthi siyaphila
UPawulu wathi indalo ngokwayo iyisisekelo sokholo
Lolulwazi luvumelana nezwi likaNkulunkulu, noma isigijimi (Hu 19:1-4; Rom 10:17-18)
Isambulo esiseBhayibhelini esivela kuNkulunkulu sinezela okholweni lwethu
Kunobufakazi obuningi bokuthi iBhayibheli liyincwadi kaNkulunkulu ephefumlelwe (2Ti 3:16; w87-ZU 7/15
5-6)
Kunokuvumelana kubo bonke abalobi balo phakathi namakhulu angu-16 eminyaka
Isayensi eyiqiniso, kuhlanganise nesayensi yokuvubukula, kuye kwanikeza ubufakazi bokuba yiqiniso no-
kwethenjelwa kwalo
Kunobufakazi beziprofetho ezagcwaliseka (w87-ZU 7/15 6; ce 216-31; si-ZU 344-6)
Iziprofetho eziningi zagcwaliseka kuJesu kuphela (si-ZU 343-4)
Ukwethenjelwa kwezithembiso zikaNkulunkulu kuyisizathu sokuba sibe nokholo (Jos 21:43, 45; 23:14)
Ukukhulula kwakhe u-Israyeli eGibithe kubonisa ukuthi uyazifeza izithembiso
Lesosenzakalo amaJuda asasikhumbula nanamuhla
Lesisenzakalo sasigxiliswe kunembeza wawo njengesizwe
Ukuhlanganisa “izitini” kunikeza isisekelo sokholo oluqinile kuNkulunkulu
KUYADINGEKA UKWAKHA UKHOLO NGENKUTHALO (9 imiz.)
Ukuthi unokholo akusho ukuthi akumelwe ululondoloze
AmaKristu agcotshiwe atshelwa ukuthi ukuntula ukholo ‘kuyisono esithandelayo’ (Heb 12:1; it-1 805)
Noma ubani kithi angaba buthaka okholweni; ngisho nabaphostoli bacela ukholo olwengeziwe (Luk 17:5)
Sinezibonelo eziningi ezinhle zalabo esikhathini esidlule abalondoloza ukholo oluqinile kuNkulunkulu
UNowa wayengomunye owakha ukholo kuMenzi wethu
Wayibona indalo ebonakalayo njengathi
Wabona ukuthi izwi likaNkulunkulu lalibe iqiniso (Gen 3:16-19)
Wayengenalo iBhayibheli noma iziprofetho esezigcwalisekile
No. 54-ZU
12/93Nakuba kunjalo wayenokholo lokuthi kwakuzoba nozamcolo futhi wabonisa lolokholo ngokwakha um-
khumbi (Heb 11:7; it-2 507; w89-ZU 10/1 11; w87-ZU 1/15 11)
Kunezinganekwane emazweni amaningi eziphathelene noZamcolo (gm-ZU 116; it-1 328, 610-11; w86-ZU
9/15 4-5)
Nokho ukholo alwakhelwa ezinganekwaneni, kodwa ebufakazini obunokwethenjelwa beZwi lika-
Nkulunkulu (Luk 17:26, 27; 2Pe 2:5)
U-Abrahama wayengesinye isibonelo esivelele sokholo (Heb 11:8-10; it-1 804; w87-ZU 1/15 11)
Kungenzeka wathola ukuqonda kwakhe ngokuba nobungane bomuntu siqu noShemi (it-1 29)
Washiya umuzi wakhe e-Uri, “engazi lapho eya khona” (Gen 12:1-3)
Wamemezela ngesibindi igama likaNkulunkulu (Gen 12:8; 13:18; 21:33)
Akazange aphindele e-Uri ngesikhathi sendlala eKhanani (Gen 12:10; 13:1, 3; Heb 11:15)
Wasokwa (Gen 17:22-27; w89-ZU 7/1 19-21)
Wayekholelwa ovukweni (Heb 11:19; it-1 804)
Uyakusebenzela yini ukwakha ukholo lwakho? Uyakusebenzela ukwakha olwabanye?
SEBENZELA UKWAKHA UKHOLO LWAKHO NOLWABANYE (15 imiz.)
Sidinga ukholo olunempilo ukuze sithokozise uNkulunkulu (Thi 2:2; Heb 11:6; w89-ZU 10/1 15, 19-20)
Cishe ukholo lwakho luye lwakhula kusukela esikhathini owabhapathizwa ngaso; qhubeka ulwandisa
Asinakuba matasa ngokweqile sisiza abanye size singalunaki olwethu ukholo
Izinto esingazenza: isifundo somuntu siqu, thandaza ungaphezi, yiba khona njalo emihlanganweni yebandla, hla-
nganyela emisebenzini yokholo (w84-ZU 12/15 27-31 [w84 6/1 8-12])
Ingabe kudingeka ugxilise ukunakekela okukhethekile esifundweni sokwakha ukholo?
Akumelwe ube matasa ngokweqile usiza abanye uze ungakunaki ukufunda nokuzindla ngeZwi likaNkulu-
nkulu
Thandazela ukholo lwakho nolwabanye (Luk 22:31, 32)
Ukholo luyoqina njengoba silubonakalisa (Jak 2:22)
Siza amalungu omkhaya wakho akhe ukholo
Ingabe uyayicabangela indlela ozokwenza ngayo lokhu?
Lingisa isibonelo sika-Abrahama, uyise walabo abanokholo (Rom 4:11)
Wafundisa umkhaya wakhe “indlela kaJehova” (Gen 18:19; w89-ZU 7/1 20)
Abazali bangasiza abantwana babo ngokuxoxa nabo ngendalo (Bonisa ngesibonelo esisodwa noma ezimbili ezi-
vela ku-g68-ZU 9/22 3-8 [g68 3/8 3-8]; bheka ne-fl-ZU 105)
Abantwana abanakuba nokholo ngenxa nje yokuthi abazali babo banalo
Nabo kumelwe bakhele ukholo lwabo ebufakazini obuqinile (yp-ZU 308)
Kudingeka babe nesimiso sabo sesifundo somuntu siqu
Emkhayeni ohlukene phakathi, okholwayo angalwakha ukholo lwabantwana (2Ti 1:5)
Isibonelo sakho sokwethembeka naso siyobasiza ukuba bakhe ukholo
Abadala kufanele bakukhumbule njalo ukwakha ukholo lwebandla (Efe 4:11-13)
Akumelwe babe abahleli nabafundisi bamaqiniso nje kuphela
Kumelwe basize abanye babone ukuthi ngokuhlanganyela ekushumayeleni, babonakalisa futhi bakha ukholo
lwabo njengoba kwenza uNowa (2Pe 2:5)
Kumelwe bahole emisebenzini yokholo; babeke isibonelo esihle (Heb 13:7; w89-ZU 12/15 21)
BONAKALISA UKHOLO USUKU NGALUNYE NJENGOBA UBHEKE PHAMBILI ESIKHATHINI ESIZAYO
(5 imiz.)
Ukholo lungasisiza ukuba sigudluze izithiyo ezinjengezintaba (Mar 11:22-24; w87-ZU 7/15 3-4)
Lapho izithiyo ezinjalo okholweni zivela emsebenzini, esikoleni, ekusebenzelaneni nezihlobo, noma lapho usi-
ngatha izinkinga, ingabe uyalubonisa ukholo kuNkulunkulu ngokwenza lokho akuyala ngakho? Ingabe ukho-
lo lwakho lunamandla, luqine kangako?
Imisebenzi yokholo ihlanganisa okungaphezu kokubhekana nezinkinga ezinkulu
Ihlanganisa nalokho esikwenza nsuku zonke (Jak 2:14-17, 20)
UJesu wafanisa isikhathi sethu nezinsuku zikaNowa, indoda yokholo (Mat 24:37-42)
Yiba njengoNowa, futhi wakhe ukholo lwakho njalo
Yiba ngoqaphile, ukhathalele intando kaNkulunkulu, ukhuthale ekushumayeleni
Ukholo manje ludingeka ngaphezu kwanoma yinini ngaphambili
Isikhathi nomzamo okusetshenziswa okholweni kulufanele (Joh 3:16)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 54-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45HLOBO LUNI LWEGAMA OLWENZA NONKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gxilisa ukwazisa ukubaluleka kwegama elihle. Veza ukuthi ukuthola nokulondoloza igama elinjalo kudinga umza-
mo omkhulu futhi kuhilela yonke indlela yokuphila. Gcizelela ukuthi amagama uNkulunkulu awamukelayo ku-
phela ayoba sencwadini yakhe yokuphila
INGABE UKHATHAZEKILE NGOKUZENZELA IGAMA? (6 imiz.)
Zingase zibe mbalwa kuphela izinto ozinakekela ukudlula igama nedumela lakho
Ukuze bahlale bezihlonipha, abantu abaningi bafuna ukuhlonishwa
Mhlawumbe wathukuthela lapho othile ehlambalaza igama lakho (Qhathanisa noGen 34:25-30)
IBhayibheli liyavumelana nokubaluleka kwegama elihle (IzA 22:1)
Ungakanani umzamo ongawenza ukuze uzenzele igama?
Abanye banikela ngokuphila kwabo konke ukuze bazitholele amagama kwezombangazwe, emabhizinisini, ezi-
nkundleni zokuzijabulisa, ezemidlalo, ezesayensi
Abanye bangenza cishe noma yini ukuze bazenzele igama
Labo ababeseBabele babezimisele ukungamlaleli uNkulunkulu (Gen 11:3, 4)
Akukhona yini ukuthi iningi lamagama abo kade akhohlakala?
Lokhu kuzokwenzeka ngokushesha kulabo namuhla abazama ukuzenzela igama
Cabanga: Hlobo luni lwegama ozenzela lona? Igama lakho livezani ngomkhaya wakho nangebandla lobuKristu?
Ingabe liyowathonya amakhono akho okuba namalungelo ebandleni? Okubaluleke nangaphezulu, hlobo luni
lwegama olenza noJehova? Unencwadi yokuphila enamagama. Ingabe likhona elakho?
HLOBO LUNI LWEGAMA OLWENZAYO? (5 imiz.)
Lapho usengumntwana, wanikezwa igama
Ngokusobala liyabathakazelisa abazali bakho nezihlobo kodwa alibalulekile kangako kwabanye abaningi
Ngokuyisisekelo lwaluwuphawu, ngoba akekho owayazi okuningi ngawe, ukuthi wawuzoba nobuntu obuhle
neziphiwo ezikhethekile noma wawuzokhonza uNkulunkulu yini noma cha
Nakuba kungomunye umuntu owakwetha igama, nguwena olenza lisho okuthile
Igama lakho liya lisho okuthile ekuphileni kwakho konke, libonise uhlobo lomuntu oyilo (w81-ZU 8/15 20-31
[w81 2/15 20-30])
Abanye bazenzela igama elibi
UJuda—umkhapheli
UNimrode—isihlubuki
UKayini—onolaka nomona
Ingabe bakhona kithi abazenzela igama elinjalo?
Abanye bazenzela igama elihle
Umuntu olungile unegama elihle noNkulunkulu (Shu 7:1)
UMose wafumana umusa ngokwaziwa uNkulunkulu (Eks 33:12, 17)
Ingabe lokho kungase kushiwo nangawe manje?
IGAMA LAKHO ELIHLE LIYABATHINTA ABANYE (16 imiz.)
Ngokuzenzela igama elihle, uyowumelela kahle umkhaya wakho, uNkulunkulu neZwi lakhe, nebandla (w87-ZU
2/15 20)
Intsha engamaKristu ingaba neqhaza egameni elihle lawo wonke umkhaya ngokubonisa ukuziphatha okunezi-
miso
Ukuziphatha okunjalo kumelela idumela likayihlo, okuwuyena obizwa ngegama lakhe (1Sa 17:55; it-2 855)
Igama elihle onalo esikoleni lingakuvulela amathuba okufakaza kwabanye (Mat 5:16)
Lingakwenza utuselwe amalungelo anjengobuphayona obusizayo noma obuvamile, ukuba inceku ekhonzayo
Kungenzeka ukuthi uThimothewu wayesezokweva noma esanda kweva eminyakeni engu-20 lapho ekhe-
thwa uPawulu (IzE 16:1-3; it-2 1105)
Abesifazane abangamaKristu nabo bangalimelela kahle iBhayibheli (IzA 31:10-31; Thi 2:3-5)
Lapho ulingelwa ukuba uhlebe abanye, cabanga ngegama, noma idumela, okungenzeka uzakhela lona
Ukuhlanganyela ngokugcwele enkonzweni yasensimini kuyilapho ugcina ikhaya lihlanzekile futhi unakekela
abantwana kuyaphawuleka futhi kwaziswe abanye (Ungalandisa okuhlangenwe nakho kothile owaba nesi-
thakazelo eqinisweni ngenxa yalesisizathu; w90-ZU 2/15 27; yb93 62)
Igama elihle, noma idumela, liyadingeka kubazalwane abatuswa njengabadala noma izinceku ezikhonzayo (1Ti
3:2, 7, 10; w90-ZU 9/1 24; om-ZU 33)
Lapho kuphathwa igama lakho, ingabe abanye bacabanga ngawe njengomuntu ovilaphayo, ohlangene nemi-
khuba engabazisayo yebhizinisi noma ulimi olungcolile, noma othambekele ekubeni isififane?
No. 55-ZU
12/93Noma ingabe bacabanga ukuthi ungumuntu ophila ngezindinganiso zobuKristu zokuziphatha, ekusebenzela-
neni ngezebhizinisi, ezindabeni zomkhaya, nokuba umakhelwane omuhle?
Amadoda, abesifazane, nabantwana abanaloluhlobo lwedumela bazenzela igama elihle nakuNkulunkulu
UKUBALULEKA KOKUZENZELA IGAMA ELIHLE NONKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Ukuzenzela igama elihle noNkulunkulu kubaluleke ukudlula ukuzenzela igama elihle nofunda nabo, osebenza
nabo, emphakathini, noma ezweni
Ukuphila kukaJesu kubonisa ukubaluleka nenzuzo yokuba negama elihle noNkulunkulu
Wagxila ekukhazimuliseni nasekuzibonakaliseni ethembekile kuYise, engabeki kuqala igama lakhe siqu, inja-
bulo yomuntu siqu, noma umsebenzi wokuziphilisa (Luk 22:42; Joh 17:4)
Nakuba uNkulunkulu avumela ukuba uJesu avivinywe kuze kube seqophelweni lokufa, wamkhumbula futhi
wamvuza
Wamvusa futhi wamnika igama elingaphezu kwawo wonke amanye amagama abantu, eliphakeme ngisho
nangaphezu kwawezingelosi (Fil 2:9-11; Heb 1:3, 4)
Ukuze sizuze igama elihle noNkulunkulu, kumelwe siqaphele lokho okumelelwe igama likaJesu (it-2 467; w83
1/15 31)
Ingabe siyakwenza lokhu? Kudingekile ukuze sibe negama elihle noNkulunkulu
Lapho siphakathi kwalabo ababonakala bengamesabi uNkulunkulu nabagxekayo, ingabe siyalifihla iqiniso
lokuthi singoFakazi BakaJehova noJesu? (Mar 8:38)
Naphezu kwenkulumo engcolile nokuziphatha kokuyekelela okusizungezile, ingabe siziphatha ngendlela
ebonisa ukwethembeka kuJesu?
Ngokunamathela ngokuqinile egameni lakhe, sizenzela igama elihle noNkulunkulu, njengoba kwenza amaKri-
stu ePhergamu naseFiladelfiya lasendulo (IsAm 2:13; 3:8; re-ZU 42, 60)
INGABE IGAMA LAKHO ‘LIKHONA ENCWADINI YOKUPHILA’? (8 imiz.)
Ukuphila okuphakade kuwumvuzo omuhle uNkulunkulu awunika lowo ozenzela igama elihle naye
Kusho okungaphezu kwenkazimulo yesikhashana yegama elihle nabantu
Kusukela esikhathini sika-Abela, ekusekelweni kwezwe lesintu, uJehova ubebhala amagama “encwadini yoku-
phila” (IsAm 17:8; it-2 468)
Abafanelekayo amagama abo abhalwa ngoba ekuphileni kwabo babonakalise ukholo, baphishekela ukulunga,
benza intando kaNkulunkulu—bezenzela igama elihle noNkulunkulu
Ngokubeka intando kaNkulunkulu ngaphambi kwazo zonke ezinye izinto, singenza ukuba amagama ethu abha-
lwe kuleyoncwadi ngisho kwamanje. Ingabe sisebenzela ukwenza lokho?
Kodwa, khumbula, umuntu angenza ukuba igama lakhe lisulwe encwadini yokuphila
Amagama awabhalwa ngokungacimeki (Eks 32:32, 33; re-ZU 58)
Ngemva kokuzenzela igama elihle noNkulunkulu, kufanele siqhubeke sithembekile ukuze lelogama elihle li-
londolozwe
Ekugcineni, abantu abamagama abo alotshwe kanjalo bayokwazi ukuwagcina elapho phakade (w87-ZU 9/1 29)
Sonke singathuthukela ekubeni negama elihle noNkulunkulu futhi sililondoloze
Kuhilela yonke indlela yokuphila, ubuntu nemikhuba yethu siqu kanye nenkonzo yethu eqondile eya kuNku-
lunkulu
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi umusha noma umdala, lwela ukuba igama lakho libhalwe futhi lilondolozwe
“encwadini yokuphila” kaNkulunkulu
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 55-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUNGENA EZWENI ELISHA NGAPHANSI KOKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza bonke ukuba babheke uJesu njengeNhloko yebandla enamandla. Chaza indlela asihola ngayo. Ngendlela
engokoqobo, chaza lokho abadala nabanye okumelwe bakwenze ukuze babonise ukuthi baqaphela uJesu njengo-
Mholi. Khuthaza bonke ukuba balandele uKristu ngethemba eligcwele lokuthi uyobaholela ngokulondeka ezwe-
ni elisha
UKRISTU UNGUMHOLI WETHU (8 imiz.)
Kulesisikhathi senhlekelele yobuholi emhlabeni wonke, sinoMholi ophelele, uKristu
Abaholi abaningi bezizwe bayalahlwa, ngoba abantu abaneliswa ubuholi obungaphumeleli noma obonakele
Esinye isizathu esenza izizwe zibhekane nezinhlekelele noma usizi olungapheli ukuthi abantu abathembeli ku-
baholi futhi ababasekeli
Abantu babengadalelwanga ukubusa noma ukuhola abanye abantu (Jer 10:23; ce 189-93)
Abanalo ikhono noma ilungelo lokwenza kanjalo (yp-ZU 305)
NjengamaKristu, sinoMholi onguKristu hhayi omunye umuntu (Mat 23:10)
Kwakuprofethiwe ukuthi wayezoba uMholi ovelele (Dan 9:25)
Labo abalambile nabomile ngokomoya babheka kuye (Isa 55:1, 2, 4; sl 95-107)
UnguMholi WETHU
Isimo sethu sifana nesama-Israyeli emathafeni akwaMowabi
UJoshuwa wayengumholi wawo othembekile, onekhono owayemiswe uJehova (Dut 31:7, 8, 23)
Ngesibindi wawaholela eZweni Lesithembiso
Labo abamlandela babusiswa ngenxa yalokho (Jos 23:14; 24:31)
Uma sikwamukela ngokugcwele ukuhola kukaKristu, siyoholelwa ezweni elisha
UKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU KUNGOKOQOBO (10 imiz.)
Lapho esemhlabeni, uJesu wabonakalisa izimfanelo zakhe njengomholi (it-2 70)
Waqeqesha abalandeli bakhe ngendlela ewusizo (Mar 6:7-13; Luk 8:1)
Wanikeza abafundi bakhe imithwalo yemfanelo nemisebenzi ngaphezu kwenkonzo (Mat 14:19; Mar 3:9; Joh 4:2)
Walawula izixuku eziyizinkulungwane (Mar 6:39-46)
Wahola ngesibonelo sakhe siqu, ezikhandla ekushumayeleni, ebonisa ukuzithoba ekusebenzelaneni nabanye
(Mar 6:31-34; Joh 13:3-15)
Namuhla, uJesu usalihola ibandla (w87-ZU 8/1 15-20)
Wabikezela ukuthi wayezoba matasa ehola esikhathini sethu (Mat 18:20; 28:20)
Uqondisa ‘inceku ethembekile neqondayo’ (Mat 24:45-47)
Uqondisa umsebenzi wabadala abamisiwe kuwo wonke amabandla (IsAm 1:12-20; re-ZU 28-9)
Uyaqhubeka esebenzisa izingelosi
Ngempela, uKristu ‘uyinhloko yomzimba, ibandla’ (Kol 1:18; Efe 4:15)
UYABONISA YINI UKUTHI UKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU KUNGOKOQOBO KUWE? (12 imiz.)
Lona umbuzo ofanelekile ngoba abantu abaningi bayezwa ngoKristu kodwa abakwamukeli ngempela ukuhola
kwakhe futhi benze ushintsho oludingekayo ekuphileni kwabo
Ingabe sekuyisikhathi eside utadisha iBhayibheli kodwa ulokhu uhlehlisa isinyathelo esiwujuqu?
Mhlawumbe abazali bakho baseqinisweni, kodwa ingabe wena siqu usunqumile ukulandela ukuhola kukaKri-
stu?
Ababhapathiziwe bangazibuza: ‘Ingabe ekuphileni kwami kwansuku zonke nasezinqumweni engizenzayo ngibo-
nisa ukuthi ngiyakwamukela ukuhola kukaKristu? Ingabe ngempela ngiqhubekela ezweni elisha ngaphansi ko-
kuhola kwakhe?’
Bonisa ngesimo sakho sengqondo nangezenzo ukuthi uyakwamukela ukuhola kwakhe
Zimisele ukuqaphela ubunhloko, ungabi nomuzwa wokuthi wazi kangcono noma uhlukile (Luk 2:51; Kol 3:
18, 20)
Philela ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu, njengoba kwenza uJesu; bheka ngisho nezikhathi zokuphumula nje-
ngamathuba okukuqabula ukuze uqhubeke (w79-ZU 12/15 16-17 [w79 6/1 16-17]; w74-ZU 564-5 [w74 374])
Zimisele ukubambisana namalungiselelo ebandla, uqaphele ukuthi uKristu uhola ibandla ngomoya ongcwele
(Efe 4:11, 12; 5:23)
Hlakulela ukuthemba abadala, yiya kubo ukuze uthole usizo; bakhonza noKristu ukuze banikeze isivikelo (Isa
32:1, 2; w89-ZU 9/15 10, 17; tp-ZU 184)
Khumbula: Indlela esicabanga futhi siziphathe ngayo kufanele ibonise ukuthi sibheka uKristu njengoMho-
li wethu, iSibonelo sethu
No. 56-ZU
1/96ABADALA KUDINGEKA BALANDELE UKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU (10 imiz.)
AmaKristu anxuswa ukuba abazise abadala abaholayo ngokomoya, okuhilela ukulingisa ukholo lwabo (Heb 13:7)
Kumelwe balingiswe, hhayi ngoba bengabaholi, kodwa ngoba balingisa uMholi wangempela, uKristu (Mat 23:10;
1Ko 11:1)
Abadala ngesizotha kufanele bakuqaphele lokhu
Ukwamukela ukuhola kukaKristu kusho ukuthi abadala kumelwe bazimisele ukukhonza abanye (Mat 20:25-27;
Joh 13:15)
Badala, ingabe namukela indlela kaKristu njengendlela engcono kakhulu yokusebenzelana nabazalwane eba-
ndleni?
UKristu akazange nje anikeze imiyalo kodwa wabeka isibonelo; wayemnene (Mat 11:28-30; 1Pe 5:2, 3)
Gwemani noma yikuphi ukuthambekela kokuthuthukisa imibono yomuntu siqu noma ukuzenza iciko ngoku-
zikhukhumeza (1Ko 2:1-5; 2Ti 4:2)
Lapho ningaqiniseki ngendlela yokusingatha indaba ethile ebandleni, ingabe nifuna ‘umqondo kaKristu’? (1Ko
2:16; w86-ZU 12/1 10-15; w78-ZU 3/15 3-5 [w77 566-8]; w77-ZU 112-13 [w76 532-3])
Imizamo yenu yokuqaphela nokulandela ukuhola kukaKristu iyozuzisa nina nawo wonke umhlambi
QHUBEKA ULANDELA UKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU (5 imiz.)
Phokophela ezweni elisha futhi ungene kulo ngaphansi kokuhola kukaKristu
Ama-Israyeli awazange azingenele eZweni Lesithembiso, ngamunye ehamba ngendlela yakhe
Angena ngaphansi kokuqondisa nokuhola kukaJoshuwa (Jos, isahl. 3)
Njengoba izwe elisha lisondela, ukusinda kuyoqhubeka kuhilela ukulandela ukuhola kukaKristu
Ngaphambili kunovivinyo olukhulu lokholo
Kumelwe simelane nanoma yisiphi isifiso esingalindelekile sokuthatha inkambo ethile ngenxa nje yokuthi isi-
lungele noma ifeza izithakazelo zethu
Ingabe siyosikhumbula njalo isibonelo sikaKristu? (Luk 22:42)
Ukulandela ukuhola kukaKristu kuhlanganisa nokuzimisela ukufela abafowethu—ingabe sizimisele? (Joh 13:
34, 35; 15:12, 13)
Ngokwenza konke okudingekayo kithi njengoba silandela ukuhola kwakhe, singaqiniseka ukuthi siyozuza izi-
busiso ezithenjisiwe ezweni elisha (Jos 21:45; 23:14)
Ukuhola kwakhe kuyophumelela nakanjani, futhi ngamunye wethu uyophumelela uma ekulandela eduze, kuze
kuyongenwa ezweni elisha
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 56-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUKHUTHAZELELA USHUSHISO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza bonke babone ukuthi akufanele sesabe ushushiso kodwa kumelwe silulindele futhi sikulungele ukubhekana
nalo. Bonke kufanele baziqinise ukuze bakhuthazele. Gxilisa ithemba lokuthi uJehova uyosisiza ukuba sinqobe
ushushiso. Manje isikhathi sokusondela kuNkulunkulu ngokusebenzisa amalungiselelo akhe ngokugcwele
‘BONKE . . . ABAKUKRISTU JESU BAYOSHUSHISWA’ (5 imiz.)
Kungani manje sixoxa ngendaba engathokozisi yoshushiso?
Asikwenzi ngenxa yokwesaba ukuhlupheka noma ngoba sizama ukwethusa noma ubani ukuba athathe inka-
mbo ethile
Ukuba nombono olinganiselayo kuyosisiza ukuba sinqobe ukulwesaba
ImiBhalo ibonisa ukuthi wonke amaKristu ayoshushiswa (Funda eyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:12)
Nokho, ingabe wena wake wabhekana noshushiso olunjalo?
Sisengxenyeni yokugcina ‘yezinsuku zokugcina’ ezabikezelwa (2Ti 3:1-5)
Ingabe ucabanga ukuthi ‘izinsuku zokugcina’ ziyophela ungazange ubhekane nokugcwaliseka kwevesi 12?
NjengoPawulu, izinceku zikaNkulunkulu namuhla kufanele zilindele ushushiso (vs. 11)
Singase sizibuze: ‘Ngingase ngibhekane noshushiso olunjani, futhi ngani?’
Kufanele sicabangele isimo sethu ngokuqondene noshushiso
Njengoba sithola izibusiso njengamaKristu, kumelwe silindele noshushiso (Mar 10:29, 30)
Sonke kufanele sifune ukuqonda okungase kwenzeke nokuthi singaziqinisa kanjani ukuze sikhuthazelele
ushushiso
USHUSHISO LUNGEZA NGEZINDLELA EZIHLUKAHLUKENE (10 imiz.)
Ushushiso luza ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene, lungase lube ngokoqobo noma lungabi ngokoqobo (it-2 609; w82-ZU
10/1 20-1 [w82 4/15 22-3])
Ukuhlanjalazwa, ukugconwa, nokweyiswa
Lungavela ngisho nasemkhayeni womuntu (Mat 10:34-36)
Ngokuvamile kunzima ukulukhuthazelela, njengoba luvela kwesibathandayo
Singanqoba hhayi nje kuphela ngokuzimisela ukuhlala sithembekile futhi siqotho kuNkulunkulu kodwa
futhi nangokungaziphindiseleli (1Pe 2:21, 23)
Kunokuba sithukuthele, kumelwe silindele uJehova ngesineke, futhi siqhubeke sizame ‘ukunqoba oku-
bi ngokuhle’ (Rom 12:17-21)
Umphostoli uPawulu wayekujabulela ukukhuthazelela ukuphathwa kabi uma lokhu kwakudumisa iga-
ma likaNkulunkulu (2Ko 12:10; w85-ZU 11/15 12)
Ukucindezela kwezomnotho (IsAm 13:16, 17; re-ZU 197)
Ukuvinjelwa uhulumeni kungaholela ekulahlekelweni umsebenzi, amakhaya, nempahla
Asifuni ukufana nabanye ebandleni laseKorinte ababekhathalela kakhulu ingcebo nesikhundla (1Ko 4:8)
Ngokuphambene nalokho, uPawulu wabonisa ukuthi wayezimisele ukukhuthazelela ukuhlanjalazwa oku-
khulu nokuswela, kuye ngezimo ezaziphakama enkonzweni yakhe eya kuNkulunkulu (1Ko 4:9-13)
Uma ushushiso lusenza silahlekelwe umsebenzi omuhle futhi sithole ophansi, ukholo lungasenza sikhutha-
zele futhi sisabele ngendlela enhle (Heb 10:32-34)
Ukuhlupheka ngokoqobo—kuhlanganise nokulimala emzimbeni, ukuboshwa, ngisho nokufa (Mat 24:9; Luk
21:12; 2Ko 11:24, 25)
Akufanele sizikhathaze ngemibono yobuhlungu obunjunjuthayo (w74-ZU 10/1 447 [w74 219])
Kunalokho, iqiniso lokuthi ukuhlupheka kungase kufike kufanele lisishukumisele ukuba sibe nombono
ofanele ngoshushiso futhi silulungele, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi luza ngayiphi indlela
Ushushiso lungase lusixake okwesikhashana, kodwa ngaso sonke isikhathi uJehova uyozibonisa “indlela yoku-
phepha” izinceku zakhe ezithembekile
Hhayi ukuze zibalekele ukuvivinywa kodwa ukuze ‘zibe namandla okukuthwala’ (1Ko 10:13; 2Ko 4:8-10;
w90-ZU 7/15 19; w83-ZU 9/15 21 [w83 5/1 20]; w77-ZU 2/1 61-2 [w76 473-4])
Nakuba sibuthakathaka, ukholo luyosiqinisa ukuze sinqobe noma iluphi ushushiso noma ubunzima
Ukholo lwethu luyonqoba ngaso sonke isikhathi (1Jo 5:4)
IZIBONELO ZASENDULO NEZANAMUHLA ZOKUKHUTHAZELELA USHUSHISO (15 imiz.)
Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi singaphumelela uma sibhekene nanoma iluphi ushushiso
Sinesisekelo sesibindi nethemba—hhayi kithi kodwa othandweni lukaNkulunkulu (Rom 8:35-39)
Isibonelo sofakazi bangaphambi kwesikhathi sobuKristu sifakazela ukuthi kungenzeka ukukhuthazelela ushu-
shiso (Heb 11:35-38)
No. 57-ZU
12/93AmaKristu ekhulu lokuqala ngokwethembeka akhuthazelela ushushiso olukhulu (IzE 8:1-3; 9:1, 2)
Labo abanqoba esikhathini esidlule babengenawo amandla angaphezu kwawemvelo kodwa babengabantu aba-
buthaka, abavamile njengathi
Uma bakwazi ukukhuthazela, nathi singakwazi
Ezikhathini zanamuhla abaningi baye bakhuthazelela ushushiso (Nikeza izibonelo ezithile, mhlawumbe ezenda-
wo. Uma kungenzeka, sebenzisa: [1] ukulahlekelwa umsebenzi noma isikhundla ngenxa yokuba uFakazi;
[2] ushushiso oluqhubeka isikhathi eside ngokuhlekwa usulu, ngokuhlanjalazwa, njengoba kunjalo ngokuvami-
le emakhaya ahlukene ngokwenkolo; [3] ukuxhashazwa emzimbeni. Gwema ukudumisa lowomuntu. Shukumi-
sa ithemba lokuthi nathi singakhuthazela. Phawula nangesimo sengqondo esasiza abashushiswayo ukuba ba-
khuthazele, futhi uveze noma iziphi izinto eziwusizo abazenza ezingasiza abanye ukuba bakhuthazelele izimo
ezifanayo. Uma kudingekile, kungase kusetshenziswe okulandelayo: w89-ZU 3/1 18; w89-ZU 6/15 27; w88-ZU
2/15 17; w86-ZU 6/1 28-9; w82-ZU 10/1 14, 26 [w82 4/15 16, 27])
ZILUNGISELELE MANJE UKUKHUTHAZELELA USHUSHISO (15 imiz.)
Sigxilise engqondweni isizathu sokushushiswa kwakho
Ukuphathwa kwethu kabi akufanele kubangelwe ukuziphatha kwethu okusolekayo (1Pe 2:19, 20; 4:15, 16; it-2
610)
USathane uDeveli ungumshoshozeli wangempela woshushiso (w82-ZU 10/1 21 [w82 4/15 23])
Uye waphakamisa izimpikiswano zendawo yonke esihilelekile kuzo (w83-ZU 9/15 13 [w83 5/1 13])
Ingabe uJehova unguMbusi ngempela? Izizwe azifuni ukukwamukela lokho futhi zishushisa labo abase-
kela ubukhosi bakhe (IzE 4:18-30)
Ukukhumbula lokhu kuyosisiza ukuba sikhuthazele
Ushushiso lulethwa futhi ‘igama’ likaJesu, indima yakhe njengeNkosi yoMbuso omisiwe (Mat 24:9; it-2 61; w83
1/15 31; w84-ZU 4/15 30 [w83 10/1 22])
Futhi, kunempikiswano yokuthi thina ngabanye singabulondoloza yini ubuqotho ngaphansi kovivinyo
Uma sekuyiminyaka eminingi sibonisa ubuqotho, yeka indlela okuyobe kungenangqondo ngayo ukuyeke-
lela ngenxa yoshushiso lwesikhashana olunzima
Ukukhumbula ukuthi ukuvivinywa ‘kungokomzuzwana’ nje kuyosisiza ukuba sikhuthazele (2Ko 4:17, 18;
it-1 724-5; bw-ZU 121)
Phakathi noshushiso masikhumbule ukuthi singathembela kuNkulunkulu ukuze sithole usizo olungaphe-
zu koluvamile (1Ko 10:13; 2Ko 4:7)
Singathola ukuthula okungenakuqhathaniswa lapho sishushiswa (w83-ZU 9/15 19 [w83 5/1 19])
Khumbula ukuthandaza (IzE 4:23-31; Jak 1:5, 6)
Khumbula ukuthi uNkulunkulu uvumela ukuhlupheka okunjalo ukuze ekugcineni kuzuze thina (bw-ZU
115-39)
Kungase kube indlela yokusiqeqesha (it-1 629; w87-ZU 6/15 30-1)
Zilungiselele manje ukukhuthazelela noma iluphi ushushiso (w85-ZU 11/15 11-15; w83-ZU 9/15 18 [w83 5/1 18])
Kudingeka sisebenzise amalungiselelo okuziqinisa ngokomoya
Cabanga ngamalungiselelo anjalo njengasilungiselela ngokuqondile ukukhuthazelela ushushiso
Ukufunda iBhayibheli kusijwayelanisa nezibonelo zendlela abafowethu abakhuthazela ngayo esikhathini esi-
dlule
Ukuzindla ngokulandisa okunjalo kuyosisiza ukuba simelane nokucindezela manje futhi sikhuthazelele oku-
nye ukuvivinywa kamuva
Kufanele sizuze okuhlangenwe nakho kuzo zonke izici zenkonzo
Lokhu kuyosisiza ukuba siqhubeke sishumayela lapho sivinjelwe (w85-ZU 11/15 12-13)
Hlakulela ukukhulumisana njalo noNkulunkulu ngokuthandaza nsuku zonke (1Jo 5:14, 15)
Ungahlehli nyovane (Heb 10:39)
Yiba nombono ocacile wethemba elingaphambili (Heb 12:2, 3; it-2 610)
Kudingeka umzamo obumbene ukuze siqine manje futhi silungele noma yini engase ivele
Akudingekile ukuba siphile ngokwesaba (Mat 6:34)
UNkulunkulu uyosisekela uma sihlala siseduze naye
Angasisiza futhi uyosisiza ukuba sikhuthazele (2Ti 4:17; 1Pe 5:10)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 57-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KUFANELE UMKHONZE KANJANI UNKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukuthi kulula kangakanani ukuba umuntu acabange ukuthi ukhonza uNkulunkulu nge-
ndlela eyamukelekayo kodwa abe engamthokozisi nakancane. Cacisa ukuthi nakuba kudingekile ukuphila uku-
phila kokuziphatha okuhle nokugwema ukulimaza abanye, lezizinto zizodwa azikhona lokho okufunwa uNkulu-
nkulu. Khuthaza umuntu ngamunye ukuba ahlole inkonzo yakhe siqu eya kuNkulunkulu ngokuyiqhathanisa
nezimfundiso zikaJesu
KUNEMIBONO EMININGI NGOKUQONDENE NENDLELA YOKUKHONZA UNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Kunemibono ehlukahlukene ngendlela okufanele simkhonze ngayo uNkulunkulu (Khulumela lokho okwenziwa
abantu bezinkolo zendawo, njengokuya esontweni, ukukhipha iminikelo yemali, ukukhanyisa amakhandlela.
Ungagxeki, kodwa bonisa imibono ephikisanayo)
Abaningi bacabanga ukuthi bakhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eyamukelekayo ngokumane babe nomusa fu-
thi bangabalimazi abanye (rs-ZU 104)
Uma othile ebengakubuza ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhonza uNkulunkulu, ubungathini?
Ingabe indlela okhonza ngayo uNkulunkulu ingefanele?
Ukusho komuntu ukuthi uNkulunkulu ufuna indlela ethile akuyenzi leyondlela ibe ngefanele (IzA 14:12)
Umphostoli uJohane wabonisa isidingo sokuhlola umthombo wolwazi (1Jo 4:1; w88-ZU 4/1 30; w86-ZU 7/15 19)
Umuntu onikeza umbono kungenzeka udukile ngokwakhe
Kudingeka sihlale sihlola, sivivinya (2Jo 7-9; w83-ZU 10/1 20-2 [w83 4/1 22-4])
 ́
Kuyindaba engathi sına kakhulu ukuba inganqunywa umbono wanoma imuphi umuntu
Kuyosisiza ukuba sigweme ukukhohliswa
Kungasisiza sibone izici inkonzo yethu eya kuNkulunkulu okungadingeka ithuthukiswe kuzo
IBHAYIBHELI LISITSHELA INDLELA YOKUKHONZA UNKULUNKULU (7 imiz.)
IBhayibheli liyizwi likaNkulunkulu eliphefumlelwe, ngakho kufanelekile ukuhlola ukukhulekela kwethu ngoku-
qhathanisa neBhayibheli
Imibhalo kaJohane, eyaphetha iqoqo leBhayibheli, iwusizo
Umphostoli uJohane usiqaphelisa iqiniso lokuthi labo abacabanga ukuthi bakhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eya-
mukelekayo kungenzeka bayasilela kulokho okufunekayo (Joh 8:41-47; gt-ZU 69)
Ngisho nabantu abacabanga ukuthi baqotho bangase bavumele izithakazelo zabo zibabangele ukuba balahle-
kelwe iphuzu lesigijimi sikaNkulunkulu (Landisa ngoJoh 6:1-13, 22-26; gt-ZU 52-4)
Abanye basondela kuNkulunkulu noma kuJesu ngoba benesithakazelo ezidingweni zomuntu siqu, kodwa
lokho kwakungenelisi
Njengama-Israyeli adla imana kodwa angazange aphikelele okholweni, abanye abezwa uJesu abazange ba-
phikelele ekufuneni indlela yokukhonza efanele (Num 21:4-6; Joh 6:27-29, 48-51, 66)
Abanye abantu abaqotho kungenzeka baphikisana nezinjongo zikaNkulunkulu (Joh 16:2; pe-ZU 31-2)
Asifuni ukuba njengabantu abanjalo
Kufanele sibe nesifiso esiqotho sokukhonza uNkulunkulu ngokuvumelana nezimfuneko zakhe
Sizimisele ukufunda futhi samukele lokho akushoyo
Sizimisele ukwenza intando yakhe ngokugcwele
UJESU WABEKA ISIBONELO SENDLELA YOKUKHONZA UNKULUNKULU (30 imiz.)
Isibonelo esivelele sendlela okufanele simkhonze ngayo uNkulunkulu uJesu Kristu
Ngenxa yendima ebalulekile ayifezayo enjongweni kaNkulunkulu, uJesu ngokufanelekile wayengathi: “Ngi-
yindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila” (Joh 14:6; it-2 60; w92-ZU 3/1 18; g67-ZU 4/8 5-8 [g66 9/8 5-8])
‘Uyindlela’ yokuzuza ubuhlobo obufanele noNkulunkulu nendlela yokusondela kuYe ngomthandazo (it-2
1174)
‘Uyiqiniso,’ ukwenziwa samuntu kweqiniso, iqiniso elingokoqobo elalifuziselwa uMthetho kaMose (it-2 62,
1131)
‘Uwukuphila,’ ngoba ngomhlatshelo wakhe, singazuza ukuphila okuphakade (IzE 3:15; 4:12; it-2 61)
 ́
Izimfundiso nesibonelo sikaJesu kubonisa ukuthi inkonzo yethu kuNkulunkulu idlulela ngale kokuziphatha kwe-
thu okuhle nezenzo zomusa (w81-ZU 2/15 29 [w80 8/15 31])
(Ekukhanyiseni okulandelayo, vumelanisa nezidingo zebandla. Hlanganisa izibonelo nokuhlangenwe nakho
okungokoqobo ukuze ukhanyise amaphuzu futhi ubonise ukuthi amaKristu namuhla akhonza uNkulunku-
lu ngendlela eyamukelekayo)
UJesu wagcizelela izindinganiso zokuziphatha eziphakeme; bonke abazokhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eya-
mukelekayo namuhla kumelwe benze okufanayo
Siyabonisa yini ekuzijabuliseni nasengxoxweni yethu ukuthi sibambelela ezindinganisweni zokuziphatha
eziphakeme? (1Jo 1:6; 3:8; w86-ZU 7/15 11, 16)
No. 58-ZU
12/93Ngesikhathi esifanayo, uJesu wabonisa ukuthi inkonzo yethu eya kuNkulunkulu yamukeleka kuphela uma
ukuphila kwethu kubonisa ukulunga kwakhe (om-ZU 191-2)
Wadalula futhi walahla ukwenza imisebenzi emibi (Joh 3:19-21; 7:7)
Watusa ukungakhohlisi futhi wanxusa abafundi bakhe ukuba bangagqilazwa isono (Joh 1:47; 8:31-36;
w88-ZU 5/1 9; g79-ZU 8/8 22-3 [w79 2/8 27-8])
Njengoba singaphelele, singase sone ngokungenhloso, kodwa umuntu okhonza uNkulunkulu akasenzi
“umkhuba” isono noma aphikelele kuso, bese esithethelela noma asifihle (1Jo 3:9, NW; w86-ZU 7/15 16)
UKristu wakhuthaza uthando oluqotho ngabantu esiphila nabo (Mat 22:39; Joh 13:35)
Kubalulekile ukuba sithande abanye abantu uma sithi siyamthanda futhi siyamkhonza uNkulunkulu
Kumelwe sikubonise ngezenzo (1Jo 3:15-18; g86 10/8 23-4; w86-ZU 7/15 17-18) (Landisa ngokuhlangenwe
nakho kwabazalwane ababonisa umusa komakhelwane nakwabanye, okwaba nemiphumela emihle;
w92-ZU 2/15 18; w90-ZU 5/1 31; yb90 8)
UJesu wakulahla ukuqhosha, ukuncintisana, imikhuba yobugovu (Joh 13:12-17)
Labo abathi bakhonza uNkulunkulu kodwa abangamlingisi uJesu kulokhu kumelwe bashintshe (3Jo 9;
w83-ZU 10/1 27-8 [w83 4/1 28-9])
Labo abacebile, abanemfundo, noma ikhono elidlula elabanye, abadunyiswayo noma banconywe ngalokho,
kumelwe balwele ukulondoloza umbono kaJesu njengoba bekhonza uNkulunkulu
Ekukhonzeni uNkulunkulu, uJesu waqondisa ukunakekela egameni laphezulu (Joh 12:28; 17:6, 11; na-ZU
14-16)
Izinkolo eziningi ezithi zikhonza uNkulunkulu ziyanqikaza ukusebenzisa igama likaNkulunkulu
Abanye baphikisana ngendlela yesiHeberu yokuliphimisela ngokunembile, futhi basebenzisa lokho nje-
ngezaba zokugwema ukusebenzisa leligama (na-ZU 8-11)
Ingabe sihlanganisa ukusetshenziswa kwegama laphezulu ezingxoxweni zethu, kanjalo sikwenze kube so-
bala ukuthi singobani nokuthi sikhonza bani? (w80-ZU 8/1 15-18 [w80 2/1 13-16]; na-ZU 7, 11, 28-31)
Asifuni nakancane ukulifihla noma sibe namahloni ngaleligama
UKristu walondoloza ukungathathi hlangothi okuqinile ezindabeni zezwe (Joh 6:14, 15; 17:14)
Ingabe izinkolo zeLobukholwa ziyakwenza lokho? Kungashiwo yini ukuthi zikhonza uNkulunkulu njengo-
ba kwenza uJesu?
Nokho, amaKristu eqiniso amaningi namuhla ahlekwa usulu, ayahlukunyezwa, futhi ayashushiswa ngenxa
yokulondoloza ukungathathi hlangothi (Joh 16:1, 2; yb94 98-9, 207-8; yb89 111-25; w86-ZU 1/1 27; w80-ZU
10/15 7-17 [w80 4/15 6-15])
Nakuba singekho isidingo sokuba sigxile ezinkathazweni ezingase zisivelele esikhathini esizayo ngenxa yo-
kuma kokungathathi hlangothi, kuhle ukucabangisisa ngesinqumo sethu sokuba njengoJesu, singabi
ingxenye yezwe
UJesu wagcizelela ukuhlanganyela ekufuneni abantu abafanelekayo nokubatshela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso
(Joh 4:34-36)
Abantu abaningi abathi bakhonza uNkulunkulu bamadolonzima ukukhuluma ngaye nokukhulekelwa kwa-
khe (Joh 12:42, 43)
Ingabe sifuna amathuba okukhuluma nabanye ngoba sinesifiso sokuthola abanjengezimvu nangenxa yoku-
thi siyakujabulela ukudumisa uNkulunkulu? (w90-ZU 9/15 12-17; w77-ZU 8/15 379-81 [w77 117-19])
Kuhle ukuba ngabanye sihlaziye ukuhlanganyela kwethu emsebenzini wokushumayela
Ingabe kuye kwathuthuka ngezinga noma ngobukhulu?
Ingabe sinokuthambekela kokukubheka njengokungabalulekile kunendlela esasikubheka ngayo ngapha-
mbili?
Ukulalela imiyalo kaNkulunkulu ngentshiseko, kuhlanganise nowokushumayela izindaba ezinhle, kuyindle-
la ebalulekile yokubonisa ukuthi siyamthanda uNkulunkulu futhi sifuna ukumkhonza (1Jo 2:3, 4; 5:3;
w86-ZU 7/15 12)
UNGAMKHONZA UNKULUNKULU NGENDLELA EYAMUKELEKAYO, KODWA INGABE UYOKWENZA?
(3 imiz.)
Singamkhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eyamukelekayo
Abantu abanjengathi ekhulwini lokuqala C.E. babekhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eyamukelekayo ngokugci-
na imiyalo kaJesu nokulandela isibonelo sakhe (Joh 14:21; IzE 4:13, 19, 20)
Abaningi abaphakathi kwethu namuhla nabo baye bakhonza uNkulunkulu ngendlela eyamukelekayo (Bheka
okuhlangenwe nakho okusohlwini oluthi “Life Stories of Jehovah’s Witnesses” ku-Watch Tower Publica-
tions Index)
Ngamunye wethu ubhekene nombuzo owujuqu: Ingabe siyomkhonza uNkulunkulu?
Ukwenza kanjalo kuyodinga umzamo, ukholo, nokukhuthazela
UNkulunkulu ufuna simkhonze, ngakho uye walungiselela usizo ngeBhayibheli nangebandla lobuKristu
Ingabe siyolwamukela lolosizo futhi simkhonze?
UJohane uyasiqinisekisa ukuthi uma senza kanjalo, umphumela kuyoba isibusiso (1Jo 2:24, 25)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 58-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UYOKUVUNA OKUHLWANYELAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ngezindlela ezingokoqobo lokho okushiwo ‘ukuhlwanyelela inyama’ kuhlanganise nendlela ‘yokuhlwanye-
lela umoya.’ Yenza kucace ukuthi kuzo zombili izimo lomphumela awunakugwenywa: Siyokuvuna esikuhlwanye-
layo, ngisho noma kungase kungabonakali kunjalo ekuqaleni. Khuthaza bonke ukuba ‘bahlwanyelele umoya,’ be-
nombono wokuphila okuphakade (Gal 6:8)
INGABE UYOKUJABULELA UKUVUNA OKUHLWANYELAYO? (5 imiz.)
Izinto eziphilayo emhlabeni ziveza ezohlobo lwazo (Gen 1:11, 12, 24, 25)
Awukakuboni yini lokho ezilwaneni nasezitshalweni?
Abalimi bathembele kukho; lapho behlwanyela imbewu kakolweni, abalindeli isivuno serayisi
Lokhu kunjalo nasekuphileni kwabantu (Funda abaseGalathiya 6:7, 8; g76-ZU 10/22 3-4 [g76 4/8 3-4])
Ngokungangabazeki uyibonile imiphumela yemikhuba emihle nemibi ekuphileni kwabantu (Shu 11:9; w86-ZU
8/1 16-17)
Ingabe ukukholelwa ngokugcwele ukuthi uyokuvuna lokho okuhlwanyela manje? Uyayibonakalisa yini lenkole-
lo ekuphileni komkhaya, ukuzilibazisa, isimo sengqondo onaso ngokutadisha nenkonzo yasensimini, ukuzipha-
tha ebandleni?
Umphumela ungaba “ukuphila okuphakade” okuvela kuNkulunkulu noma “ukonakala” (w88-ZU 6/15 19-20)
IZIMO EZIHLOBENE NENCWADI KAPAWULU EYA KWABASEGALATHIYA (6 imiz.)
Lencwadi yayiya kubantu abangokoqobo njengathi
AbaseGalathiya babengabafowethu, benemikhaya, imisebenzi, izinkinga, izidingo, njengathi; iseluleko esasiya
kubo singasisiza
UPawulu wahambela khona wasiza nasekumisweni kwamabandla kulesosifundazwe, ngakho wayebathanda
ngempela (it-1 880-2; si-ZU 217-20; IzE, izahl. 13, 14, 16)
Yini eyashukumisa uPawulu ukuba alobe lencwadi yakhe? (it-1 882)
Wezwa ukuthi abaguqulela abanye ebuJudeni babedala izinkinga
AbaseGalathiya bokuzalwa babethambekele ekuguquguqukeni futhi bengemi entweni eyodwa, nomphakathi
wawunezindinganiso eziphansi zokuziphatha
Injongo yencwadi kaPawulu yayikabili: ukukhuthaza abaseGalathiya ukuba bagqashule ebugqilini boMthetho no-
kubakhumbuza ukuba bangeqisi bese begqashula kukho konke ukuzibamba (w83-ZU 6/1 29-32 [w82 11/15 28-30])
Iseluleko sakhe sabonisa ukuthi zombili lezizimo zokweqisa zaziyoba ‘ukuhlwanyelela inyama’ ziholele ‘nase-
konakaleni enyameni’
Kunalokho wabakhuthaza ukuba ‘bahlwanyelele umoya’ ngenxa yokuthi “lokho akuhlwanyelayo umuntu, lo-
kho wokuvuna”
Nakuba siphila esikhathini esihlukile, siyakubona yini ukubaluleka kweseluleko sikaPawulu kithi?
UKUYISEBENZISA, KODWA HHAYI KABI, INKULULEKO YOBUKRISTU (15 imiz.)

Bangase bacindezele abanye ukuba babalandele; benze sengathi noma ibaphi abanombono ohlukile abavu-
thiwe
Lokhu kuthambekela kudinga ukuqashelwa, ngoba ‘kuwukuhlwanyelela inyama’
Ukuyisebenzisa kabi inkululeko yethu kuKristu nakho ‘kuwukuhlwanyelela inyama’ (Gal 5:13; it-1 872; it-2 1014;

Izwe lithanda ukuzijabulisa okuthuthukisa ubudlova, ukungazithibi, ukudlala ngothando, ukuwuthatha ka-
lula umshado, ukuphuza ngokweqile, inkulumo nezenzo ezimbi, njalonjalo
Ingabe uyakuvumela ukucabanga kwezwe okungenamthetho, kokuzibusa, okunobugovu kukuthonye? (w84-ZU
11/15 30-2; w83-ZU 7/1 8-11 [w83 1/15 7-10]; w84-ZU 4/15 10-15 [w83 10/15 10-15])

No. 59-ZU
12/93Ingabe unamagqubu, uhlale ucabanga ngezinto ezicasulayo? (w69 351; w69-ZU 3/1 114 [w68 530])
Ingabe unomuzwa wokuthi ukhululekile emthethweni, noma ingabe ulawulwa umthetho wothando? (Jak 2:8)
Ukuze ugweme izingozi zokusebenzisa kabi inkululeko, hlwanyelela umoya
Ukholo, uthando, nomoya ongcwele kungakusiza ekuhlwanyeleleni umoya
Sidinga ukholo olufinyelela ezinhliziyweni zethu futhi oluthonya ukuphila kwethu kwansuku zonke (Gal 5:6)
Kudingeka siqhubeke sifuna umoya, sisabele ezindleleni zawo nasekuholeni kwawo
Uma ungabaza, zibuze: ‘Ingabe yilokhu umoya ongiholela ukuba ngikwenze?’
Kungase kwehluke kakhulu kulokho umuntu angazikhethela khona njengomuntu wenyama
Ukuhlwanyelela umoya nokuyisebenzisa ngokufanele inkululeko yobuKristu kuphumela ezibusisweni
“Imisebenzi yenyama” ayiyilethi injabulo ehlala njalo noma ukuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu (Funda eyabaseGa-
lathiya 5:19-21)
Lapho “izithelo zikamoya” zikukho konke ukuphila kwethu, yonke indlela yethu yokuphila iyohluka (Fu-
nda eyabaseGalathiya 5:22-25)
Uma kudingeka ukulungisa, kufanele silwele ukukwenza
Kuyindaba yakho noNkulunkulu, kodwa sonke kumelwe sithembeke kithi ngokwethu, siqaphele ukuthi eya-
baseGalathiya 6:7, 8 iyogcwaliseka
HLWANYELELA UMOYA NGOKUSEBENZISA UTHANDO ONALO NGABANYE (12 imiz.)
Uthando kufanele lube amandla angokoqobo ekuphileni kwethu, lungabi nje umbono ojabulisayo ongenamuzwa
Ubonisa uthando ngokusabela ezidingweni zamaKristu okanye nawo
Abavuthiwe ngokomoya banalomthwalo wemfanelo (Gal 6:1; it-2 400; w92-ZU 11/15 26-9)
Akusho ukuba ‘undabazabantu’; kodwa gwema isimo ‘sokungabi nandaba’
Ukuya komunye kungase kudinge isibindi esishukunyiswa uthando

Kwabafundiswayo lungasebenza ngokuba bazimisele ukuhlanganyela izinto ezibonakalayo nofundisayo uma
eswele
Amanye amabandla asiza ekunakekeleni izidingo zikaPawulu ezingokwenyama (Fil 4:15, 16)
Ingabe sinalo uthando olunjalo ngalabo abazinikezele ekunakekeleni izidingo zabanye ezingokomoya?
Nakuba sifuna ukwenzela abazalwane okuhle, nabanye kufanele sibenzele okuhle (Gal 6:9, 10)
Kungenzeka yini sithambekele ekubekeni injabulo yomuntu siqu ngaphambi kwenkonzo yasensimini?

QINISEKA UKUTHI SINGAKUVUNA UKUPHILA OKUPHAKADE (7 imiz.)

ukwamukelwa yizwe?’ (1Ko 9:19-22)

ukwamukela ukushushiswa ngenxa kaKristu (Gal 6:17; it-1 363; w90-ZU 11/15 23)
Ingabe singazimisela ukuba nezibazi futhi samukele ushushiso?

Sihlwanyela kanjani ngempela? Ingabe sikhathalela kuqala inyama noma umoya?
Ingabe uyaqiniseka ukuthi ukuphila kwakho kugxile ezintweni ezingokomoya?

No. 59-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KUNENJONGO KANGAKANANI UKUPHILA KWAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi ukuphila okunenjongo kuvela kuphela ngokuba nobuhlobo obuseduze noJehova no-
kuphila ngokuvumelana nenjongo yakhe yokuphinde abuthele ndawonye zonke izinto kuKristu. Yenza kukha-
nye ukuthi lobubuhlobo noJehova bungafinyelelwa kanjani, futhi ukhuthaze bonke ukuba bazikhandle emsebe-
nzini onenjongo ukuyedlula yonke emhlabeni, ukushumayela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu
KUNGANI SILAPHA? (8 imiz.)
Indlela yokuphila yabaningi ibonisa ukuthi abanayo injongo ekuphileni; bamatasa kakhulu ngemali, ukuzilibazi-
sa, imidlalo, ubulili, nokunye
 ́
Abavamile ukucabanga ngesikhathi esingale kwekusasa eliseduze
Abanye bamatasa ngokuziphilisa, balwela ukwandisa izidingo zokuphila zansuku zonke; ngokuvamile bano-
muzwa wokuthi basebenzela emuva
Ukwehluleka ukuqonda ukuthi kungani silapha kwenza abanye baphile ukuphila kokuyekelela, bangazithibi
Abantu abacabangayo bayazibuza ukuthi iyini injongo yokuphila. Ingabe imane nje iwumjikelezo ofana nowezi-
lwane, ukuzalwa, ukudla, ukusebenza, ukuzala, ukuguga, nokufa, noma ingabe sikhona isizathu ezinohlonze so-
kuba khona kwethu?
Zonke izinto zaba khona ngesizathu esithile. Abantu abahlakaniphile bayakha, bakhiqize izinto ukuze zise-
tshenziswe ngenjongo (Heb 3:4)
NgeZwi lakhe, uNkulunkulu usitshela injongo yokuphila
Uyazi ukuthi kungani asibeka emhlabeni, futhi wasiklama ngokuvumelana nenjongo yakhe (pe-ZU 73-4)
Ukwazi injongo yakhe yokusidala kubalulekile ukuze sivumelanise ukuphila kwethu nayo (lp 183-4)
Ukuqaphela isizathu sokuba lapha kusisusa ekuphileni kokuba khona nje kusiyise ekuphileni okungcono, oku-
nenjongo (g89-ZU 2/8 20-1; g87-ZU 2/8 10-12 [g87 1/22 10-12])
UNKULUNKULU USIZA LABO ABAMAZIYO UKUBA BAPHILE UKUPHILA OKUNENJONGO (17 imiz.)
Ulwazi oluqondile nokubambisana noNkulunkulu kusiza umuntu ukuba abe nokuphila okunenjongo kanye ne-
themba ngesikhathi esizayo (Joh 17:3)
Nakuba engabonakali, uNkulunkulu usimema ukuba sifune ukumazi (Rom 1:19, 20; IzE 17:26, 27)
UNkulunkulu usisiza ukuba simazi njengomuntu ngokwembula igama lakhe
Kwabathile, ukufunda igama lakhe kuye kwaba isinyathelo sokuqala esiholela ekuphileni ukuphila okunenjo-
ngo (g88 8/22 21-5; g86 7/22 17-20)
Igama lakhe lisho ukuthi “Ubangela ukuba kube khona”; libonakalisa uJehova njengoneNjongo (Gen 2:4, umbh.
waph. we-NW; it-2 12; kc 17-18)
Ukulisebenzisa njalo igama lakhe kwakha ukusondelana naye
Ukwazi izimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu ezivelele kusisiza ukuba siphile ukuphila okunenjongo
UNkulunkulu akayena okuyo yonke indawo ngasikhathi sinye kodwa uhlala endaweni ekhethekile (1Kh 8:49;
Heb 9:24)
Amehlo akhe ahlola amadodana abantu (Hu 11:4; IzA 15:3)
Izimfanelo zakhe eziyinhloko uthando, ukuhlakanipha, amandla, nobulungisa (Landisa kafushane indlela
ukwazi lezizimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu okuye kwasiza ngayo abaningi ukuba baphile ukuphila okunenjongo
ngokwengeziwe. Ngokwesibonelo, bheka i-w89-ZU 1/15 24; w88-ZU 7/1 18-22)
Ukumazi kuwukumthanda nokumazisa yena kanye nezimfanelo zakhe (Eks 34:6, 7)
UNkulunkulu usiza labo abamaziyo ukuba baphile ukuphila okunenjongo ngokuxhumana nabo nangokulalela
imikhuleko yabo
Unikeza isiqondiso ngeZwi lakhe elilotshiwe kanye nosizo lomoya ongcwele ukuze siliqonde
Umoya usiza ekufuneni “okujulile kukaNkulunkulu,” kuhlanganise nenjongo yakhe ngomuntu (1Ko 2:10)
Kwenziwe amalungiselelo eseluleko esidingekayo ngabadala, imihlangano yebandla, imihlangano emikhu-
lu, izincwadi
Uthembisa ukulondoloza izinhliziyo namandla abo engqondo uma benza izicelo zabo zaziwe nguye (Fil 4:6, 7)
(Isibonelo: w88 3/15 6-7)
Igama lesiGreki elihunyushwe ngokuthi “amandla engqondo” linomqondo “wenjongo” noma “icebo.” Nga-
kho, ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu kungayiqinisa injongo yethu yobuKristu (w88-ZU 2/15 18)
Kusobala ukuthi uJehova usiza abanhliziyo ziqotho ukuba babe nobuhlobo naye futhi baphile ukuphila okune-
njongo (Joh 6:44; w79-ZU 11/1 15 [w79 4/15 14])
Unesithakazelo somuntu siqu kumuntu ngamunye ikakhulukazi kulabo abayifuna ngobuqotho injongo yakhe
(1Ti 2:4; lp 108-11)
Usinikeza amandla ashukumisayo ukuze siphile ngendlela emthokozisayo
No. 60-ZU
2/97ISISEKELO SOKUZUZA UBUHLOBO OBUNENJONGO NONKULUNKULU (13 imiz.)
NjengoMdali, uNkulunkulu unobuhlobo obuthile nabo bonke abantu (IzE 17:25, 28)
Ukuze sifeze injongo yangempela yokuphila, sidinga ukuba nobuhlobo obunenjongo obuseduze noNkulunkulu
(w79-ZU 11/1 3-7 [w79 4/15 12-16])
Ukuba nesono kwesintu kwakuyokwenza ubuhlobo noNkulunkulu bungabi nakwenzeka ukube akasibekanga isi-
sekelo ngokufa nokuvuswa kukaKristu (Rom 5:8; 1Pe 2:24)
UNkulunkulu ngokwakhe wathatha isinyathelo kuqala ukuze enze ubuhlobo naye bube nokwenzeka, kodwa
lokho akuphumeli ekusondelaneni naye okumane kuzenzekele
Kudingeka izinyathelo eziqondile kithi ukuze sizuze isibopho esiqinile noJehova kanye nokuphila okunenjongo
(1) Kumelwe senze umzamo wokungenisa ulwazi oluqondile oluyokwakha ukholo. (Heb 11:6) Emizamweni ye-
thu njengabenzi babafundi, masilwele ukufinyelela izinhliziyo zabafundi ukuze bashukumiseleke ukuba ba-
phile ukuphila okunenjongo
(2) Bonisa ukuphenduka, hhayi nje ukuqaphela ngengqondo ukuthi inkambo edlule yayingalungile, kodwa
bonisa ukudabuka kweqiniso (IzE 3:19)
(3) Guquka, ushiye imikhuba engalungile uye enkambweni yokuphila enenjongo (Mar 13:10; IzE 26:20; Heb
10:25)
(4) Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, zinikezele kuNkulunkulu (Mat 16:24; 1Pe 2:21)
(5) Cela kuNkulunkulu unembeza omuhle ngokubhapathizwa ubonakalisa ukuzinikezela (1Pe 3:21; w89-ZU
1/15 13-16, 19-20; w79-ZU 6/1 15 [w78 11/1 15])
Kuleliqophelo, umfundi ungenela ubuhlobo obunenjongo noJehova
(Bukeza kafushane amaphuzu angenhla)
INGABE INJONGO YAKHO EKUPHILENI IYAVUMELANA NEKANKULUNKULU? (7 imiz.)
Injongo kaJehova mayelana nendalo yakhe ivezwe kwabase-Efesu 1:8-10 (w84-ZU 7/15 15-19 [w84 2/1 16-20])
Ukuqondisa kukaJehova kuyindlela aphatha ngayo, noma asingatha ngayo izindaba, eveza ubunye (it-1 48)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyithuluzi alisebenzisa ekufezeni lokhu
“Izinto ezisemhlabeni” manje ziyaqoqwa ziyisixuku esikhulu esizokwakha isisekelo ‘somhlaba omusha’ (IsAm
21:1)
Khona-ke ukushumayela “izindaba ezinhle” zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu nokwenza abafundi abayokwakha “isixuku
esikhulu,” kuwumsebenzi onenjongo kakhulu umuntu angahlanganyela kuwo (Mat 24:14, NW; 28:19, 20; IsAm
7:9)
Umuntu wadalelwa ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (IsAm 4:11)
Ingabe indlela yakho yokuphila iyakuvumela ukuba uhlanganyele ngokugcwele ngangokunokwenzeka ekushu-
mayeleni nasekwenzeni abafundi?
Izinga esihlanganyela ngalo kulowomsebenzi, ngokuvumelana nezimo zethu, liyosisiza sithole impendulo
embuzweni othi “Kunenjongo kangakanani ukuphila kwakho?”
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 60-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45EZIKABANI IZITHEMBISO OTHEMBELA KUZO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yakha ukwazisa ngoJehova njengoNkulunkulu ozifeza njalo izithembiso zakhe. Kwenze kukhanye ukuthi nathi
kudingeka sizifeze izithembiso zethu. Bonisa ukuhlakanipha kokuthembela kuJehova kunakubantu abangaphe-
lele, izithembiso zabo ngokuvamile ezingafezeki. Shukumisa bonke ukuba bathembele kuJehova futhi babheke
phambili esikhathini esizayo esimangalisayo asithembisile
IMIBONO YANAMUHLA NGEZITHEMBISO (7 imiz.)
Izithembiso zezombangazwe zibukelwa phansi ngenxa yokwehluleka kwezazi zezombagazwe ukuzigcina
Kungaba ukuthi zenziwa ngaphandle kokuzimisela ukuzigcina noma labo abazenzayo abanamandla okwenza
kanjalo
UMbusi uNapoleon I kwaziwa ukuthi wake wathi: “Uma ufuna ukuphumelela kulelizwe, yenza izithembi-
so eziningi, kodwa ungazigcini”
Phakathi nomkhankaso wokhetho luka-1940 umongameli wase-United States wathi: “Ngizokusho ngikugci-
zelele lokhu: amadodana enu ngeke athunyelwe kunoma iyiphi impi yangaphandle,” kodwa kakade wa-
yesebandakanye i-United States esimisweni esikhulu sokusiza eBrithani kwezempi futhi wahlela ukulwa
neJalimane neJapane ngesikhathi esisodwa (The New York Times 7/2/71 k. 33)
Ngo-1988 owayengenele ukhetho lukamongameli wase-United States wathi: “Isishayamthetho sizongipho-
qelela ukuba ngenyuse izintela, kodwa ngizokwenqaba, bazongiphoqelela futhi, ngenqabe, baphinde bangi-
phoqelele, bese ngithi kubo, ‘Lalelani lapha: Ngeke zibe khona izintela ezintsha.’ ” Kodwa-ke eminyakeni
emibili kamuva, ngemva kokukhethwa kwakhe, wathi: “Kuyangikhanyela ukuthi . . . inkinga yezikwele-
tu nesidingo sesimiso esisebenzayo kudinga . . . ukwenyuswa kwentela . . .” (The New York Times 6/27/90
k. 1)
Izithembiso zenkolo zilahlekelwa ukwethenjelwa kwazo uma kuthiwa inhlalakahle yekusasa iyotholakala nge-
minikelo yemali
Izithembiso zomuntu siqu ngokuvamile azibalulekile
Izithembiso zephulwa nsuku zonke, azigcinwa
“Isithembiso yisithembiso,” amazwi avame ukushiwo—akhuthaza othile ukuba agcine isithembiso
Imivuzo ethenjisiwe noma izinkonzo ziyakhohlakala
Izithembiso zomshado nezifungo zithathwa kalula futhi ziyaphulwa
Uprofesa othile wolwazi lwezokuhlalisana kwabantu uthi imishado yokuqala inamathuba alinganayo oku-
phumelela nawokwehluleka kulezizinsuku ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi kakhulu bathi “ngiyavuma,”
kuyilapho empeleni bengavumi
Kwabaningi, isithembiso senziwa ngomqondo wokuthi siyogcinwa uma sivumelana nabo
Akumangalisi ukuthi ukudumazeka, ukuphoxeka, ubuhlungu obujulile, ngisho nentukuthelo kuyanezelwa eku-
cindezelekeni kwesintu namuhla (w73-ZU 8/1 352 [w73 59])
UMBONO WEBHAYIBHELI NGEZITHEMBISO (10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi noma yini esiyishoyo kufanele ibe iqiniso (Hu 15:2; IzA 12:22; Efe 4:25)
Umuntu kufanele acabangisise kahle ngaphambi kokwenza izithembiso (Hu 34:13; IzA 20:25; Shu 5:2)
Lapho izithembiso sezenziwe, kufanele senze umzamo wokuzigcina (Dut 23:23)
Labo abehlulekayo ukugcina izifungo zabo (izithembiso eziqinisekisiwe) babhekwa njengeziwula noma abanezwi
elingenakwethenjelwa (Shu 5:4-6; w78-ZU 3/15 21 [w77 243])
UJefta waba yindoda aligcinayo izwi layo, ngisho noma kwamzwisa obukhulu ubuhlungu (Hlu 11:30-35; Hu 15:
1-4; it-2 28)
Isifungo siyithembiso esiqinisekisiwe, futhi umuntu owenza izifungo zamanga uyalahlwa uMlobi weBhayibheli
(Zak 8:17; it-2 516-18)
UJoshuwa akazange asephule isivumelwano sakhe nabaseGibeyoni ngisho nakuba kamuva athola ukuthi ba-
bemkhohlisile ukuze asenze (Jos 9:15-21)
Nathi kufanele siligcine izwi lethu
Akumelwe senze izithembiso bese siziphula uma amathuba angconywana esivulekela
UJesu wathi: “Izwi lenu malibe-ngelokuthi: Yebo‚ yebo; qhabo‚ qhabo” (Mat 5:37; w89-ZU 9/15 28-9)
Umuntu kufanele akusho ngobuqotho lokho akushoyo
Lapho umuntu eselikhiphile izwi, ukugcinwa kwalo kufanele kubhekwe njengesibopho esingcwele okume-
lwe sifezwe (Jak 5:12)
 ́
Elinye igama elihlobene nalo ngelithi “isivumelwano,” ukuvumelana okungathi sına ( it-1 520-1)
Eqinisweni, noma isiphi isithembiso esenziwa uJehova siyisivumelwano, ngenxa yokuthi sizofezeka nakanjani
Abantu abangathembeki ezivumelwaneni baphakathi kwalabo abangamukeleki kuNkulunkulu (Rom 1:
28, 31, 32)
Ukwephula kukaSedekiya isivumelwano ayesenze ngisho nesitha kwabangela ukungemukelwa uNkulunkulu
(2Kr 36:11-13; Hez 17:11-18; w77 454)
No. 61-ZU
12/93UJEHOVA UBEKA ISIBONELO ESIPHELELE NJENGOMGCINI WEZITHEMBISO (10 imiz.)
Asikho isithembiso sikaJehova esiyoke singafezeki (Heb 10:23)
Umlando wakhe njengoMgcini wezwi lakhe awunaphutha
UJoshuwa noSolomoni bobabili bayifakazela lemfanelo kaNkulunkulu wabo (Jos 21:45; 1Kh 8:56)
UJehova uthi: “Liyakuba-njalo izwi lami eliphuma emlonyeni wami: aliyikubuyela-ze kimi, lingakafezi lokhu
engikufunayo, liphumelele kulokhu engilithumele kukho” (Isa 55:11; w75 700)
Ufaneleka kahle kakhulu ukusho lenkulumo enamandla, ngoba unamandla angenakulinganiswa okufeza
zonke izithembiso zakhe (Isa 14:24, 27; go 30-1)
Ukungaguquguquki kwakhe, ukuba neqiniso kwakhe okungashintshi, kuyisiqinisekiso sokuthi akwethembi-
sayo uyokufeza (Heb 6:17, 18; w66-ZU 7/1 303-4 [w65 688-9])
Ukwethembeka kukaNkulunkulu eZwini lakhe kuyisisekelo sokholo olunamandla nethemba kulabo abafinyele-
la ekumazini (Rom 4:20, 21)
Zonke izinceku zakhe ezithembekile kufanele zimlingise
IZITHEMBISO ZAPHEZULU ESEZIGCWALISEKILE NALEZO EZISAZOGCWALISEKA (13 imiz.)
NjengoJoshuwa noSolomoni, nathi singakufakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu uye wazigcwalisa zonke izithembiso
zakhe ezinhle
Isithembiso sikaJehova ‘sembewu’ sagcwaliseka kuKristu (Gen 3:15; 22:15-18; Gal 3:16, qhathanisa ne-NW)
UNkulunkulu wathembisa uMesiya, futhi Lowo wavela eminyakeni engu-1 900 edlule (Dan 9:24-27)
UJesu wathembisa ukumisa uMbuso wakhe esikhathi sokugcina
Sesiyabubona kakade ubufakazi bokuthi iNkosi uJesu Kristu inabantu bakaNkulunkulu namuhla, iqondisa
umsebenzi wabo wokushumayela womhlaba wonke phakathi kwezitha ezingaphezu kwabantu nezingaba-
ntu (IsAm 11:15, 18; 12:10-12)
Sibheka phambili ngokulangazela ekugcwalisekeni kwazo zonke izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu (1Ko 15:24-28; IsAm
17:15-18; re-ZU 256-8; wZU-74 11/15 507 [w74 346])
Kuthenjiswe iPharadesi lomhlaba wonke ukuze kubusiswe zonke izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu zasemhlabeni ezi-
lalelayo (IsAm 21:1-4; Lmn-ZU 29-30)
Inkambo kaJesu yokugcina ubuqotho ngokuphelele yaqinisekisa futhi yenza kwaba nokwenzeka ukufezeka
kwazo zonke izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu (2Ko 1:20)
KHONA-KE, EZIKABANI IZITHEMBISO OYOTHEMBELA KUZO? (5 imiz.)
Izithembiso zabantu abangaphelele azinakwethenjelwa
Abantu abakwazi ukuqondisa izenzakalo ezithinta ukugcwaliseka kwazo (Hu 146:3, 4; w88-ZU 4/15 10-12)
Ngokuvamile izithembiso zenziwa ngesizathu sobugovu, esisithekile, ngakho kubalulekile ukulalela iseluleko
esikumaHubo 118:8, 9
Uma sithembela ezithembisweni zikaJehova, yeka ikusasa elimangalisayo elisilindele! (2Pe 3:13; su-ZU 107-12)
Singaba abahlanganyeli ekugcwalisekeni kwezibusiso zeMinyaka Eyinkulungwane uma sibonisa ukholo kuJe-
hova futhi silingise ukuhlonipha kwakhe izithembiso
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 61-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45OKUWUKUPHELA KWEKHAMBI LESINTU ESIGULAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ukuthi isono siwumthombo wakho konke ukugula kwesintu ngokomzimba, ngokwengqondo, ngokokuzi-
phatha, nangokwenhlalo nokuthi okuwukuphela kwekhambi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu ngoKristu Jesu. Bonisa uku-
thi uMbuso uyoyisusa kanjani imiphumela yesono, futhi uxwayise ukuthi ngokushesha uzothatha isinyathelo
sokubhubhisa bonke abayingxenye yezwe eligulayo likaSathane. Khuthaza bonke ukuba bafune ukwelashwa oku-
ngokomoya manje ngokuvumelanisa ukuphila kwabo nezimfuneko ezilungile zikaNkulunkulu
ISINTU SIGULA NGEZINDLELA EZININGI (9 imiz.)
Ukugula ngokomzimba: isifo senhliziyo, umdlavuza, izifo ezithathelwana ngobulili, izifo zasezindaweni ezishisa-
yo, nokunye (tp-ZU 19-20; g90 2/8 28; g89-ZU 12/8 3-4; g90-ZU 4/8 14 [g89 12/8 31]; g85-ZU 4/8 7 [g84 10/22 7])
Ingculaza: e-Afrika (g92-ZU 8/8 3-4); kubantwana (g91-ZU 7/22 3-8); kuwonk’ uwonke (g88-ZU 10/8 2-15)
Ukugula ngengqondo: ukucindezeleka (w90-ZU 3/1 3-4; g87-ZU 11/8 17-30 [g87 10/22 2-16]); ukukhubazeka kwe-
ngqondo (g86-ZU 9/8 3-10)
Ukugula ngokokuziphatha: ukulutheka (g90-ZU 7/22 3-9; g88-ZU 12/8 3-12); ukuziphatha okubi ngokobuli-
li (yp-ZU 181-2, 184; g89 1/22 7-11; w88-ZU 4/15 3-4, 6)
Ukugula kwezenhlalo: ubandlululo lobuhlanga, ubudlova, inzondo engokwenkolo, ukonakala kwezombangazwe
nezinye izinhlobo zakho, nobugebengu obunhlobonhlobo (w89-ZU 8/15 3-4; g89-ZU 5/8 24-7 [g89 4/22 3-6])
Izimo ziya ziba zimbi naphezu kwemizamo emihle yomuntu
UJesu wabikezela ukuthi ‘imihelo’ yayiyoqala ezinsukwini zokugcina zalesisimiso sezinto (Mat 24:8)
Isibonelo sezimo eziqhubeka ziba zimbi ezabikezelelwa izinsuku zokugcina: ubugebengu, ubudlova (Mat
24:12; 2Ti 3:3, 13)
 ́
Ingqikithi yenani lobugebengu obungathi sına elabikwa e-United States landa ngamaphesenti angaphezu kuka-
1 000 kusukela ngo-1935 kuya ku-1980, kuyilapho inani labantu lakhula ngamaphesenti angu-78 kuphela pha-
kathi nenkathi efanayo, futhi ubugebengu buyadlondlobala (w90-ZU 10/1 5; w83-ZU 11/15 6, 7 [w83 6/1 6])
Amakhambi omuntu okugula kwesintu awaphumeleli
Icabangela amandla nokubhubhisa kwempi yezwe yokuqala, i-Post-Dispatch yaseSt. Louis ngesizathu esihle
yayingathi: “Ngo-1914 impucuko yahlaselwa isifo esinonya futhi mhlawumbe esibulalayo”
Lapho sivakashele e-Australia, isikhulu esithile soMkhandlu Wezwe Wamasonto sathi: “Kubonakala sengathi
wonke umuntu ufuna ikhambi elinamandla, eliwuzifo-zonke, eliyosenza sigqashule kuzo zonke izinkathazo
zethu. . . . Eminyakeni engamashumi amathathu nantathu ngihambela izindawo eziningi emhlabeni, angiza-
nge ngilithole.”—Sydney Morning Herald
Ebhekisela ekujuleni kokugula kwesintu, omunye umlobi wephephandaba waphawula: “Uhlobo lobudlova esi-
bhekene nalo lusitshela ukuthi kugula ingqondo nenhliziyo, okuyiyona migogodla yesintu. Izinto ezihlanga-
nise impucuko ziyahluleka.”—New York Post
ISIZATHU SOKUGULA KWESINTU (8 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu unguMdali onobulungisa, ohlakaniphile, onamandla onke, onothando
Yonke imisebenzi yakhe, kuhlanganise nomuntu, yenziwa yaphelela (Dut 32:4)
Injongo yakhe ngesintu: ukuba sijabulele ukuphila ePharadesi, senza intando yaphezulu (Gen 1:26-28; 2:15)
USathane wahlubuka, wayenga u-Adamu no-Eva ukuba bamlandele (Gen 3:1-6)
Kusukela lapho isintu saba sosizini, sangakwazi ukubhekana nesono nokugula kwaso okuzuzwe njengefa (Rom
5:12; 8:20, 22)
Nakuba kufundiswa ukuthi umuntu wazivelela, imiBhalo ikuveza ngokusobala okuphambene nalokho—eku-
qaleni umuntu wayeyindodana kaNkulunkulu futhi usewohlokile
Isazi sesayensi yemivubukulo u-O. D. Miller saphawula: “Imfundiso endala yokuwohloka okuwumphumela,
yokuwohloka okudabukisayo kohlanga lwesintu, kusuka esimweni sasekuqaleni senjabulo nobumsulwa,
ngokungangabazeki iqukethe iqiniso elimqoka, kodwa elibanga umunyu. Amafilosofi ethu anamuhla omla-
ndo . . . ngokusobala adinga isethulo esisha.” (it-2 303)
Abaningi bayabuza ukuthi kungani uNkulunkulu eye wavumela usizi luqhubeke (Hab 1:2, 3; ce 188-96; rs-ZU
228-30)
Ukuhlubuka kwaphakamisa impikiswano yokufaneleka nokulunga kobukhosi bukaJehova bendawo yonke (Isa
33:22)
Kwahilela nempikiswano yokuthi isidalwa sasingabugcina yini ubuqotho, njengoba kubonakala ekuqhoshe-
ni kukaSathane (Job, izahl. 1, 2)
Ukubulawa kukaSathane, u-Adamu, no-Eva lapho behlubuka kwakungeke kuyixazulule impikiswano eya-
phakanyiswa uSathane
Kwakudingeka isikhathi ukuze kubonakale ukuthi kungamanga ukuqhosha kukaSathane (Eks 9:16)
Kwakudingeka futhi isikhathi ukuze umuntu abonise ukuthi uyehluleka ukuzibusa ngaphandle koMenzi
wakhe (Shu 8:9; Jer 10:23)
No. 62-ZU
12/93UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU UYIKHAMBI ELITHENJISIWE LESINTU ESIGULAYO (9 imiz.)
Isono sika-Adamu salahlekisela yena nenzalo yakhe amalungelo okuphila
Sonke asiphelele, akekho okwaziyo ukubuyisela lawomalungelo (Hu 49:7-9)
Isisekelo esingokomthetho sokuthethelela isono silungiselelwe ngomhlatshelo wesihlengo kaKristu (Mat 20:28;
Rom 3:25, 26; it-1 606)
UJesu, njengoba uNkulunkulu enguYise, wayephelele, engenasono (it-2 56)
Wadela ukuphila kwakhe ukuze kuzuze bonke ababonisa ukholo (1Jo 3:16)
UJesu wavuzwa ngenxa yokugcina ubuqotho ngokuba enziwe iNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu
Ikhambi lesintu liyolethwa uMbuso okwakhulunywa ngawo ngokushesha ngemva kwesono sika-Adamu (Gen
3:15)
IMbewu ethenjisiwe yayizovela ngo-Abrahama, uJuda, noDavide (Gen 22:17, 18; 49:10; 2Sa 7:12)
Ukubusa kukaSolomoni kwakufanekisela ukubusa kukaMesiya (1Kh 4:25; Hu 72)
Iziprofetho eziningi zabhekisela kuloMbuso: Hu 2; 45; 110
Ubufakazi bukaJesu Kristu: Mat 6:10; Luk 23:42, 43
Ubufakazi bukamphostoli uPawulu: Rom 8:20, 21; 1Ko 15:24, 25, 28
IZwi likaJehova alinakwehluleka (Isa 55:10, 11)
IZENZO ZIKAJEHOVA ZILUNGISELELA INDLELA YEKHAMBI LESINTU (15 imiz.)
Ngokuqinisekile uJehova uNkulunkulu uzothatha isinyathelo ngoba kuhileleke igama lakhe
Kusuka ku-Eksodusi kuya kuHezekeli, izikhathi ezingaphezu kuka-70 uNkulunkulu uthi, ‘Bayokwazi ukuthi
nginguJehova’
Ukuthula nenhlalakahle yesintu kuxhomeke ekungcwelisweni kwegama likaNkulunkulu (it-2 16-18)
Ukuze elaphe isintu, uJehova kumelwe aqede zonke izitha zikaNkulunkulu nezomuntu
UJehova uNkulunkulu wababhubhisa ababi ezikhathini zasendulo
Ngesikhathi sikaZamcolo (Gen 6:5-8; 7:23)
ISodoma neGomora elibi kwabhujiswa (Gen 19:25)
IJerusalema elingathembekile labhujiswa kabili: Ngo-607 B.C.E. nango-70 C.E. (2Kh 25:8-11; Luk 19:42-44)
Kwakufanekisela ukubhujiswa kwababi okuzayo phakathi ‘nosizi olukhulu’ (Luk 21:25-27; IsAm 7:14)
UJohane wabikezela ukuthi “iBabiloni Elikhulu,” umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga, liyobhujiswa kuqala
(IsAm 17:5, 16, 17)
Ezinye izingxenye zezwe likaSathane ziyolandela (IsAm 19:11-21)
Isikhathi siseduze
Izimo zezwe zamanje zisongela ukuba khona komuntu (w90-ZU 7/1 3-4; g90-ZU 2/8 31)
Ukugcwaliseka kweziprofetho zeBhayibheli kubhekisela osukwini lwethu (Mat 24; Mar 13; Luk 21; 2Ti 3:1-5)
UJesu Kristu nabakanye naye abangu-144 000 bayobusa iminyaka engu-1 000 (IsAm 14:1, 3; 20:4, 6)
Bayobuyisela isintu ekupheleleni kwengqondo, komzimba, nokomoya, nokokuziphatha (IsAm 21:3, 4; Isa 11:9;
ws-ZU 174-9)
Futhi bayovusa bonke abasemathuneni (abasenkumbulweni kaNkulunkulu) (Joh 5:28, 29; IzE 24:15)
Isitha sokugcina esiyochithwa ukufa (1Ko 15:25, 26; w86-ZU 10/1 13; ka 159-60)
UKUTHOLA IZINZUZO ZOKWELASHWA OKUNGOKOMOYA MANJE (4 imiz.)
Ngenisa ulwazi oluqondile lweBhayibheli (Hu 119:105; Joh 17:3; w77-ZU 3/15 137-8 [w76 562-3])
Vumelanisa ukuphila kwakho nezimfuneko ezilungile zikaNkulunkulu (1Pe 3:10-12; w75-ZU 11/15 508-9 [w75 292-
3]; w73-ZU 12/1 537-8 [w73 331])
Funa ukuthobeka, funa ukulunga (Zef 2:3; 1Ti 4:8; w82-ZU 9/15 26-7 [w82 4/1 30-1])
Khulekela uMdali, uJehova uNkulunkulu (IsAm 4:11; w90-ZU 12/1 6-7)

imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 62-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UNAWO YINI UMOYA WOBUVANGELI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Basize bonke ukuba baqaphele ukuthi umsebenzi wokushumayela ivangeli uwumsebenzi obaluleke kunayo yonke
namuhla. Bonisa ukuthi abaningi manje bayasabela obizweni lokungenela umsebenzi wesikhathi esigcwele woku-
shumayela ivangeli. Khuthaza bonke abangawenza umsebenzi wesikhathi esigcwele wokushumayela ivangeli, ba-
qiniseke ukuthi kuyintando kaJehova futhi uyobasekela
ALIKHO ELINYE IVANGELI NGAPHANDLE KWELIVELA EZWINI LIKANKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Kunevangeli leqiniso elilodwa kuphela, uJehova anguMsunguli walo (Gal 1:11, 12; w88-ZU 1/1 4)
Elithi “ivangeli” livela egameni lesiGreki elisho “izindaba ezinhle” noma “isigijimi esihle.” Umuntu oshumaye-
la izindaba ezinhle zeZwi likaNkulunkulu ubizwa ngokufanelekile ngokuthi umvangeli (w88-ZU 1/1 3; it-1
770-1)
Izindaba ezinhle zokukhululwa nokusindiswa zashunyayelwa uJehova ku-Abrahama eminyakeni engaphezu
kuka-4 000 edlule (Gal 3:8)
Ingabe wena, njengomuntu othanda uNkulunkulu, unaso isifiso esiqotho nokuzimisela ukuba umshumayeli
oshisekayo wezindaba ezinhle zeqiniso zikaNkulunkulu ezinikeza ukuphila? (1Ko 9:23)
Kunesikhuthazo esikhulu esivela encekwini ethembekile kaJehova sokungenela umsebenzi owengeziwe woku-
shumayela ivangeli, isikhathi esigcwele noma ngezikhathi ezithile (km-ZU 2/90 3; km-ZU 7/89 1-2; km-ZU 10/89
1-2; w88-ZU 12/15 25-7)
Manje abaningi abanhliziyo ziqotho bahlanganyela nabashumayeli bevangeli
UJesu wasiyala ukuba sibenze abafundi, ‘sibabhapathize’ (Mat 28:19, 20)
Manje isidingo esiphuthumayo ‘siwukwenza umsebenzi womvangeli’ futhi kusizwe abaningi ukuba bathole
indlela eya ekuphileni (2Ti 4:5; w87-ZU 2/1 10-11; w86-ZU 1/15 13; w86-ZU 4/15 28-30)
IZINDABA EZINHLE EZIVELA EZWINI LIKANKULUNKULU KUMELWE ZIMENYEZELWE MANJE
(11 imiz.)
 ́
Manje izizwe zingene shı ebumnyameni obukhulu ngaphansi kwamandla nethonya lomubi (IsAm 12:9)
Ngemva kokukhishwa kukaSathane ezulwini, izindaba ezinhle zaba ukuthi kwase kufike amandla nensindiso
yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu futhi omubi wayesesalelwe isikhathi esifushane (IsAm 12:10-12)
Iphuzu eliyinhloko liwukuthi: Ababi bayakwazi yini ukuvimbela noma ukuqeda izindaba ezinhle, noma ingabe
injongo kaJehova iyofezwa? (Mat 24:14)
Ukuxazululwa kwempikiswano yobukhosi bukaJehova kuthinta bonke abasemhlabeni. INkosi enqobayo uJe-
su iyolwela uhlangothi lukaJehova lwempikiswano ize inqobe ngokuphelele! (IsAm 6:2; re-ZU 90-2)
Ezulwini, izingelosi ezinamandla zisebenza noMvangeli Omkhulu ekuqondiseni ukusakazwa kwesigijimi seva-
ngeli kuze kube semaphethelweni omhlaba (IsAm 14:6; re-ZU 204-5)
Emhlabeni, uJehova unezigidi zabantu abasebenza ngokuzithandela; abancane nabadala, abesilisa, abesifaza-
ne, nabantwana bakhonza njengabashumayeli bevangeli
Njengamaqhawe asemasha ashisekayo, amaningi njengamazolo, lezizisebenzi ezishisekayo zizinikela ngoku-
zithandela ngosuku “lwempi” kaKristu futhi ziyoqhubekela ekunqobeni kwangempela (Hu 110:3; w87-ZU
3/15 24)
Ukumenyezelwa okukhulu kuyoqhubeka kuze kufike ukuphela okuphelele kwalesisimiso esibi sezinto (IsAm 20:
1-3; w88-ZU 1/1 5-7)
Yeka ithemba elikhazimulayo! Yeka izizathu ezinhle zokuchichima injabulo! (w74-ZU 12/1 535-40 [w74 329-34])
INGABE WENA SIQU UNAWO UMOYA WOBUVANGELI? (18 imiz.)
Abaningi bathola ulwazi lweqiniso kulenkathi yobugovu obukhulu emlandweni wesintu (2Ti 3:1-5; w90-ZU
6/15 30)
Ukuthanda uNkulunkulu kubashukumisela ukuba balahle umoya wobugovu bese behlakulela umoya ongena-
bugovu wokushumayela ivangeli (1Ti 4:15; w87-ZU 2/1 16-17)
Njengoba ulwazi nokwazisa kwabo iqiniso kukhula, bayaqaphela ukuthi umsebenzi wokushumayela ivangeli
uyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekuphileni. Usho ukuphila kulabo abamukela iqiniso nokufa kulabo abalenqaba-
yo. Futhi usho ukuphila nakulabo abenza iqiniso laziwe (1Ti 4:16; w88-ZU 7/15 15-20)
UJesu Kristu, isibonelo esiyinhloko sokushumayela ivangeli ngomphefumulo wonke, wahamba kulo lonke ela-
kwa-Israyeli, elethela abantu isigijimi sokuphila nokukhanya kubantu
Iningi lamzonda futhi lamshushisa, kodwa wabathola abamkholelwa futhi wabanikeza ilungelo lokuba aba-
shumayeli bevangeli noma abaphathi bokukhanya kanye naye (Mat 5:14, 16; Joh 8:12)
Inkambo kaJesu yokwethembeka iyisibonelo esimangalisayo kubo bonke abafisa ukulandela ezinyathelweni
zakhe (Mat 9:35-38; w73-ZU 11/1 491-5 [w73 269-73])
Esinye isibonelo esivelele nesiwumthombo wesikhuthazo umphostoli uPawulu, naye owaba umshumayeli weva-
ngeli oshisekayo, ehamba e-Asia Minor naseYurophu efaka ukuphila kwakhe engozini (2Ko 11:23-27; w87-ZU
2/1 11-14; w83-ZU 6/15 9-20 [w82 12/1 12-22])

MANJE KUNAMATHUBA AMANINGI OKUKHONZA NJENGABASHUMAYELI BEVANGELI (6 imiz.)
Ngenxa yesimo esiphuthumayo manje, inceku ethembekile neqondayo ayikhuthazi ukuzinikezela nokubhapathi-
zwa kuphela kodwa futhi igcizelela ilungelo lokuhlanganyela ngentshiseko emsebenzini wokushumayela iva-
ngeli
Eminyakeni engaphezu kwekhulu edlule, iNhlangano yakhipha isimemo esithi “Abashumayeli Abangu-1 000”
Abanye bazenza batholakala, futhi amanani abo anda kancane kancane
Ukuzidela kwamaNaziri kuyisibonelo esihle kulabo abazinikele ngokuphelele emsebenzini wokushumayela
ivangeli (Num 6:2-6; w82-ZU 8/15 15-17 [w82 3/1 19-20])

li besikhathi esigcwele, noma amaphayona (Luk 8:1; 10:1)
Manje kunobizo oluya kubo bonke abangangenela umsebenzi wesikhathi esigcwele njengabashumayeli bevange-
li. Kunikezwa isiqinisekiso sokuthi uJehova uyobasekela futhi abanakekele bonke abakhonza ngokuzithande-
la ebuthweni lakhe labashumayeli bevangeli (Hu 37:25; Luk 12:22-31)

No. 63-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ABATHANDI BENJABULO NOMA ABATHANDI BAKANKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Chaza ingozi efihlekile yokuvumela ukuthanda injabulo kubuse ukuphila komuntu. Bonisa imiphumela ebhubhi-
sayo inkambo enjalo engaba nayo enjabulweni yomuntu nengokomoya lakhe. Bakhuthaze bonke bahlakulele
umbono olinganiselwe ngenjabulo futhi bazame ngenkuthalo ukugcina uthando ngoJehova luza kuqala
UKUTHANDA INJABULO OKUSAKAZEKILE SEKUFINYELELE AMAZINGA APHAKEME KAKHULU
(5 imiz.)
ImiBhalo yabikezela ukuthi ezinsukwini zokugcina abantu babeyoba ‘abathanda injabulo kunokuthanda uNku-
lunkulu’ (2Ti 3:1, 4; w88-ZU 6/15 17)
Nakuba abaningi bethi bayamthanda uNkulunkulu, bachitha isikhathi esiningi bephishekela futhi bebonisa
ukuzinikela okukhulu ekuphishekeleni injabulo kunokuphishekela izinto ezingokomoya
Abaningi bayakuthethelela lokhu noma bazame ukuthola izaba ukuze bazame ukuthethelela ukuthambekela
kwenhliziyo okunobugovu (Jer 17:9, 10)
Ukuthambekela okunjalo kwazuzwa njengefa ku-Adamu, inhliziyo yakhe eyahungwa ubugovu. Kwabona-
kala ngezinga elikhulu ngosuku lukaNowa lapho ukuzitika kuholela kwezinye izinhlobo zobubi, okwaphu-
mela ekubhujisweni kwezwe elingamesabi uNkulunkulu (Gen 6:5; 2Pe 3:6)
AmaKristu kumelwe acophelele kakhulu ukuze angangenwa yilomoya
Ngokuvamile ukuphishekela injabulo kuholela ekudakweni, ekusebenziseni kabi izidakamizwa, ekuziphathe-
ni okubi, ngisho nasekufeni ngaphambi kwesikhathi (Gal 6:8)
Yilabo kuphela abafuna futhi bathande uNkulunkulu abanethemba lokusinda ekupheleni kwalesisimiso esibi
sezinto samanje (Zef 2:2, 3)
USATHANE NEZWE BAKHUTHAZA UKUTHANDA INJABULO (12 imiz.)
UJehova ‘unguNkulunkulu ojabulayo,’ uyayijabulela imisebenzi yakhe ephelele (1Ti 1:11, qhathanisa ne-NW.)
Ufisa ukuba nezidalwa zakhe ezihlakaniphile zijabule
Izinzwa zethu ziklanyelwe ukuqonda izinto eziningi ezihlukahlukene, esizibonayo, esizizwayo, esizihogela-
yo, esizinambithayo, nezinokwakheka okuhlukahlukene (1Ti 6:17)
Ufuna ukuba sijabulele ukudla nokuphuzwayo (Shu 5:18)
UJesu wakuvuma ukumenyelwa ezidlweni nasemadilini kodwa wazigcina engolinganiselayo ngokomoya;
akazange abe ‘umthandi wenjabulo kunokuba abe umthandi kaNkulunkulu’ (Luk 5:29; 19:5, 6; Joh 4:34)
USathane nezwe basebenzisa kabi isifiso sethu sokujabula esingokwemvelo
Izinceku zikaJehova kumelwe ziziqaphele izingibe ezizikhuthaza ukuba zibeke injabulo kuqala
USolomoni wanikeza umbono ongokoqobo ngenjabulo (Shu 2:1, 2)
Ukuphishekela injabulo akunakuletha injabulo ehlala njalo
Kufanele silinganisele inani lemibuthano esiya kuyo nobude besikhathi esisichitha kuyo
Kufanele siqikelele ukuthi imibuthano yobuKristu ayibi izenzakalo ezinomsindo, ezinokuxokozela kokuzi-
tika (2Pe 2:13)
Singavumeli imibuthano ibe izikhathi zokuzijabulisa okungenakuzithiba, ukudakwa, nokuvusa inkanu-
ko (Isa 5:11, 12; 1Pe 4:3)
Imicimbi yomshado, izinsuku zokugubha okuthile, nokunye okunjalo akufanele kuphenduke izikhathi
zokubonisa imikhuba yezwe (1Ko 10:31; w92-ZU 8/15 15-20; w84-ZU 10/15 26-32 [w84 4/15 16-22])
Into ebalulekile ekuphileni kwethu kumelwe kube ukukhulekela kweqiniso, hhayi ukuphishekela injabulo
(w84-ZU 3/15 22-5 [w83 11/1 24-7])
Masimelane nomcabango wobusathane: “Yenza okuthandayo”; “Zinqumele”; “UNkulunkulu uyabazi ubutha-
kathaka bethu futhi uyaqonda”; “UNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi ufuna sijabule”; “Kumane kuwukuzijabu-
lisa nje okuvamile,” nokunye (Juda 4)
USathane ufuna ukuba abantu baphile sengathi alikho ikusasa (Isa 22:13; 1Ko 15:32)
Abathandi bakaNkulunkulu, njengabantu abangcwele, akufanele nakancane bakhohlwe ukuthi ‘usuku lukaNku-
lunkulu’ luyasondela futhi izwe elisha elithenjisiwe liseduze (2Pe 3:11-13)
UJesu wasixwayisa ngezingozi ezinkulu zokuba abathandi benjabulo kunokuba abathandi bakaNkulunkulu
(Luk 21:34-36; w83-ZU 12/15 3-6 [w83 7/1 3-7]; w78-ZU 3/1 6-10 [w77 520-4])

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUTHOLA UDUMO NENJABULO ENKONZWENI KANKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gxilisa ukwazisa okusuka enhliziyweni ngelungelo lokuhlanganyela enkonzweni yobuKristu. Julisa ukuqiniseka
kokuthi oFakazi BakaJehova babhekwa ngokufanelekile njengezikhonzi. Khuthaza bonke ukuba bajabulele inja-
