UKUSHUMAYELA KUKAJESU NABAFUNDI BAKHE KWAKUYINKONZO (6 imiz.)
Edolobheni lakubo laseNazaretha, uJesu watshela abantu bedolobha ukuthi wayegcotshelwe ukumemezela “ivange-
li kwabampofu” (Luk 4:18)
UJesu wathi wayezele ‘ukuzofakazela iqiniso’ ezweni. Wayengazelanga ukuzokhonzwa kodwa ukukhonza (Joh
18:37; Mat 20:28)
Wathuma abafundi bakhe ukuba bashumayele isigijimi soMbuso kwa-Israyeli (Mat 10:6, 7)
Kamuva wabatshela ukuba baye nasemhlabeni wonke. Lokhu kwakuyinkonzo yabo (Mat 28:19, 20)
Igama elithi “isikhonzi” emiBhalweni YamaKristu YesiGreki lihumusha igama lesiGreki elithi di·ako·nos (w89-ZU
3/1 5)
Ebhala encwadini ethi Bibliotheca Sacra, uD. Edmond Hiebert waphawula lokhu ngelithi di·ako·nos: “Kuye
kwaba nombono wokuthi leligama liwukuhlanganiswa kwesihlanganiso esithi [di·a], esisho ukuthi ‘phakathi,’
nebizo elithi [konis], ‘uthuli,’ ukuze leligama lisho umuntu ohamba ngokushesha othulini ukuze afeze inkonzo
yakhe. Kodwa lomsuka osikiselwe ngokuvamile awamukelwa namuhla. Cishe umsuka wesenzo kwakuwu
[di·eko], ‘ukusuka endaweni ethile uya kwenye,’ ohlobene nesenzo esithi [di·oko], ‘ukuphuthuma, ukujaha.’
Khona-ke umqondo owumsuka ubhekisela kothile ozinikela ngenkuthalo futhi ephikelela ukukhonza abanye.”
—1983, Umq. 140, k. 153 (it-2 406-7)
Lisho inceku, umuntu ngokuthobeka ongayeki ukukhonza abanye ngokugcwele
Ingabe uJesu wabonisa ukuthi izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu zaziyohlonishwa futhi zenzelwe izinto ezikhethekile?
Kunalokho watshela abafundi ukuthi babeyozondwa, bashushiswe, futhi babulawe ngisho nokubulawa ngenxa
yokuhlanganyela enkonzweni yokwelapha okungokomoya (Mat 10:16-21)
Kwakungafanele benze inzuzo engokwezimali, babe neziqu zokudunyiswa, noma bathole izikhundla eziphakeme
kodwa babeyoncishwa izinto eziningi (Mat 10:8-10; 23:8-11)
Nakuba kunjalo, inkonzo yobuKristu iwudumo olukhulu kakhulu nesabelo esijabulisa ngaphezu kwazo zonke eza-
ke zanikezwa abantu. Idinga ubuqotho obuphelele
Ingabe lokhu kusho ukuthi abambalwa kuphela abanelungelo ebandleni abangaba naloludumo?
Ukuze sisizakale ekuphenduleni lombuzo, kudingeka sithole umbono ongokomBhalo wegama lesiZulu elithi
“isikhonzi”
UMBONO OQONDILE ONGOKOMBHALO WEGAMA ELITHI “ISIKHONZI” (12 imiz.)
Igama elihunyushwe ngesiZulu ngokuthi “isikhonzi” lisuselwa kwelesiLatini elithi minister, elinencazelo efanayo
neyegama lesiGreki elithi di·ako·nos—osesikhundleni esiphansi noma inceku
Njengoba lisetshenziswa kuyo yonke imiBhalo YamaKristu YesiGreki, leligama linezincazelo ezintathu eziyisiseke-
lo (w81 3/15 14)
Lingabhekisela kothile okhonza ngomqondo ongokoqobo, ekuphileni okuvamile (Rom 13:4)
Lapho lisetshenziswa ngalendlela, elithi di·ako·nos ngokuvamile lihunyushwa ngokuthi “inceku” kunokuba
lihunyushwe ngokuthi “isikhonzi” (Mat 22:13)
Lingase lihlobane nalabo abasesikhundleni esithile somsebenzi ebandleni, okuwumqondo okhethekile osebenza
ezimweni ezithile (Fil 1:1; 1Ti 3:8, 12)
Umsebenzi wabadala ebandleni lakuqala wawubizwa ngokuthi inkonzo (Efe 4:7-12)
Lisetshenziswa kunoma imuphi umuntu okhonza uNkulunkulu ezindabeni ezingcwele noma ezingokomoya (Efe
6:21; 1The 3:2; w81 3/15 26)
Lapho elithi di·ako·nos linalencazelo, ngokuvamile lihunyushwa ngokuthi “isikhonzi” kunokuba lihunyushwe
ngokuthi “inceku”
Elithi “isikhonzi” lifaneleka kangcono ngoba lidlulisela umqondo wothile owenza inkonzo ephakeme noma
yokwesaba uNkulunkulu, uma eqhathaniswa nalowo owenza imisebenzi evamile
Etusa ibandla eThiyathira, e-Asia Minor, uJesu wabonisa ukuthi bonke ebandleni babenenkonzo, futhi ngale-
yondlela bonke babeyizikhonzi (IsAm 2:18, 19)
ImiBhalo inikeza bonke ebandleni ilungelo lokuthola udumo nenjabulo enkonzweni kaNkulunkulu
Ezinye izilimi zisebenzisa igama elithi “isikhonzi” ngomqondo wezombangazwe kuphela, kodwa lokhu akusho uku-
thi abantu bakaJehova babophekile ukulisebenzisa ngalezizindlela (w81 3/15 22)
Izinkolo zobuBabiloni ziye zanikeza labo ezibabiza ngokuthi izikhonzi iziqu zokuthopha, izikhonzi ezifuna ukwazi-
wa ngokuthi ‘Mfundisi,’ ‘Mfundisi Ohloniphekile,’ njalonjalo (Mat 23:6-8)
Kuphambene nomqondo wakuqala wesikhundla esiphansi
Phakathi namakhulu amaningi eminyaka abefundisi baye bazikhuluphalisa futhi baphila ngokunethezeka ngo-
kungenamahloni namakhosi nabantu abacebile bomhlaba (IsAm 18:3; re-ZU 262)
Kunamanani ashaqisayo enzuzo yobugovu eyenziwa abantu namuhla ababhekwa njengompetha abasakaza izi-
nkonzo zenkolo kuma-TV (g88-ZU 4/8 28-30 [g88 3/22 5-7]; g88-ZU 7/8 28)
No. 65-ZU
12/93Okushaqisa ngisho nangaphezulu ukuziphatha okuyihlazo ngokobulili ‘kwalezizikhonzi’ zakuma-TV nabanye be-
sigaba sabefundisi
UMzalwane uC. T. Russell waveza umehluko phakathi kwesimo sengqondo sokuqhosha sezikhonzi zenkolo ya-
manga nesezinceku zeqiniso ezithobekile zikaNkulunkulu (w81 3/15 22)
Ingabe kuwukuqhosha ukubheka abafundi bakaJesu Kristu ababhapathiziwe njengezikhonzi ezimisiwe? Cha!
Ingabe labo abathembekile banalo ilungelo elingokomthetho lokugunyazwa ngokufanelekile nokwamukelwa ngo-
komBhalo njengezikhonzi zeqiniso zikaNkulunkulu? Yebo! (g88 4/22 30; w81 3/15 23)
OFakazi BakaJehova ababophekile ukuba bavumelane nemibono yezwe noma inkolo yamanga ngokuphathelene
nencazelo yegama elithi “isikhonzi”
UKUKHAZIMULISA UNKULUNKULU ENKONZWENI YETHU (10 imiz.)
UPawulu wasebenzisa inkonzo yakhe yasobala (ukushumayela) ukuze akhazimulise uNkulunkulu (1Ko 3:5, 6)
Futhi wabheka lesisabelo njengodumo olukhulu kuye (1Ti 1:12)
Wayengenamahloni ngenkonzo yakhe, uPawulu wayeyazisa kakhulu
Wasebenzisa igama lesiGreki elithi dox·azo, elisho ‘ukukhazimulisa,’ njengoba asho lapho ebonga: “Ngikha-
zimulisa inkonzo yami” (Rom 11:13, NW)
Wabheka inkonzo njengokuthile okubaluleke kakhulu, okwakufanelwe ukuzidela (w81 3/15 29)
Wazizwa enelungelo elikhulu kangangokuthi wabhekisela kuye nezikhonzi ayekanye nazo ‘njengamanxusa
kaKristu’ (2Ko 5:18-20)
Ngokwazisa inkonzo yakhe ngalendlela, uPawulu walethela uNkulunkulu inkazimulo
Manje insali egcotshiwe isebenzisa lesisabelo esifanayo sodumo ukuze ilethele uJehova inkazimulo
Izimisele ukwenza noma ikuphi ukuzidela ukuze iqhubeke ikhonza njengamanxusa oMbuso
Isixuku esikhulu ngokufanayo sijabulela ilungelo lenkonzo lokukhonza njengezithunywa zoMbuso (Isa 60:6, 7; IsAm
7:10; w85-ZU 4/15 23-4 [w84 8/15 12-13])
Inani lalaba manje abakhazimulisa uNkulunkulu landa ngokuqhubekayo. Phakathi kwabangu-11 800 000 ababakho-
na eSikhumbuzweni, abangu-4 700 000 bakhuthele ensimini. Kusenabaningi abazohlanganyela enkonzweni. Singa-
siza laba ukuba bathathe ukuma okuhle (2Ko 6:1; w88-ZU 8/1 27-9)
Izihloko ze-Nqabayokulinda ziye zabakhuthaza abantu bakaNkulunkulu ukuba bahlanganyele kakhudlwana eku-
khazimuliseni uNkulunkulu ngokuba amaphayona avamile, njengoba nje noPawulu akhuthaza uThimothewu:
“Wenze umsebenzi womvangeli, ufeze ukukhonza kwakho” (2Ti 4:5; w93-ZU 9/15 28-31; w88-ZU 12/15 25-7; w87-ZU
2/1 15-20; w86-ZU 4/15 28-30; w82-ZU 8/15 18-24 [w82 3/1 21-6])
Ingabe ngamunye wethu angayandisa inkazimulo ayiletha kuNkulunkulu ngokuhlanganyela ekumemezeleni uku-
nqoba okukhulu njengasekuweni kweJeriko? (Jos 6:10-20; w86-ZU 12/15 19)
Kusenenjabulo enkulu eyotholakala enkonzweni ejabulisayo. Khazimulisa uJehova ngokusisebenzisa ngokuhlaka-
nipha isikhathi esifushane esisele (Efe 5:15-17)
UKUKHONZA NGENJABULO NOKWAZISA (12 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu wayijabulela kakhulu inkonzo yasobala. Watshela abafundi ukuba balandele isibonelo sakhe futhi ba-
nxuse iNkosi ukuba ithume izisebenzi ezengeziwe (Mat 9:35-38; w80-ZU 1/15 8-10 [w79 7/15 8-10])
UPawulu, uPetru, uJohane, nabanye bawubonga futhi bawazisa umsebenzi wenkonzo, naphezu koshushiso (IzE 5:
41, 42; 20:20, 21; 2Ko 12:10; w80-ZU 1/15 10-13 [w79 7/15 10-13])
Injongo eqondile yenkonzo iwukwenzela uJehova inkonzo engcwele yomphefumulo wonke. Lokhu kusenza sibe izi-
sebenzi ezikanye noNkulunkulu ensimini yakhe elinywayo (1Ko 3:6-9)
Ukubona indlela uJehova asisebenzisa ngayo ukuze afeze umsebenzi wakhe kusilethela injabulo enkulu (w88-ZU
3/15 6, 7; g87-ZU 2/8 26)
Inkonzo yosuku lwanamuhla ihlanganisa ukushumayela endlini ngendlu, kanye nokondla abathakazelayo ngezifu-
ndo zeBhayibheli zasekhaya. Ihlanganisa nokusiza bonke abathakazelayo ukuba bahlanganyele emihlanganweni
yebandla yasikhathi sonke (Mat 10:5-10; Luk 10:5-7; Heb 10:23-25; w80-ZU 1/15 10 [w79 7/15 10])
Ukusabela kwabanhliziyo-ziqotho enkonzweni yethu kusilethela injabulo enkulu. Phawula injabulo enkulu ka-
khulu yokubuyisa imvu elahlekile ngisho ‘nokuthokoza ezulwini’ ngokubuya kothile ophendukayo (Luk 15:4-7;
w89-ZU 1/15 8, 9)
Ukwamukelwa uJehova ngenxa yokwethembeka nenkuthalo kuletha injabulo, naphezu kokusabela kwabantu
enkonzweni yethu
Emfanekisweni wamatalenta, izinceku ezisebenza ngokuzithandela zathola injabulo yoqobo ngokuwaphinda ka-
bili amatalenta. Zamenyelwa ekujabuleni kanye nenkosi. Inceku evilaphayo ayizange iyithole injabulo ngoku-
vilapha kwayo. Yaphonselwa ngaphandle ebumnyameni (Mat 25:19-30; w90-ZU 5/1 8, 9)
Ayikho injabulo enkulu engatholwa kunaleyo eza ngokwamukelwa uJehova ngenxa yokwethembeka enkonzwe-
ni yakhe yasobala (Mat 25:21, 23)
UJEHOVA UZIBUSISA NGOKUCEBILE IZIKHONZI ZAKHE EZISHISEKAYO (5 imiz.)
Okuhlangenwe nakho okungokoqobo okuvela ensimini kubonisa indlela uJehova abusisa ngayo imizamo yezikho-
nzi zakhe ezishisekayo (w90-ZU 1/1 7; w89-ZU 1/1 31)
Abantu abaningi baye bakhuluma ngemisebenzi yenkuthalo yezikhonzi zikaJehova (w88-ZU 7/15 11; g87 3/22
5, 6; w85-ZU 4/1 11)
Sebenzisa inkonzo ekhazimulayo ukuze ukhanyisele abanye, ucebise injabulo yakho siqu, futhi, ngaphezu kwakho
konke, udumise uJehova (2Ko 4:6, 7, 15; w90-ZU 7/15 18-19)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

Chaza ngokucacile ukuthi ukukhonza uJehova njengezigqila akucindezeli kodwa kuletha intokozo. Yiba nombo-
no oqondile, uqokomise izibusiso ezilethwa inkonzo yokwethembeka
UJESU WAFANISA ABAFUNDI BAKHE NEZIGQILA ZENKOSI YAZO, UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU (6 imiz.)
Igama elithi “isigqila” nelithi “ubugqili” abangela imicabango ephambene kwabaningi ngenxa yokuxhashazwa,
ukufukuza, nokungabi nankululeko okuye kwahlupha izigqila ezivamile nje (w92-ZU 4/1 3, 4)
AmaKristu abizwa ngokuthi izigqila zikaNkulunkulu ngoba ‘athengwe ngenani’ (1Ko 7:23)
Ngomhlatshelo wesihlengo, akhululiwe ebugqilini besono nokufa futhi azenze atholakalela inkonzo kaNkulu-
nkulu (Joh 3:16; 2Ko 5:14, 15)
Anesibopho sokugcina imiyalo yakhe
Njengesigqila esingumHeberu esithanda inkosi yaso, amaKristu kufanele akushisekele ukukhonza iNkosi, uJe-
hova, owanikeze ukuphila nazo zonke izibusiso zako (Eks 21:5, 6; 1Jo 5:3)
Njengoba uNkulunkulu eyiNkosi yawo, amaKristu awanakukhonza amanye amakhosi aqhubeke emthokozisa
(Mat 6:24)
UJesu wabeka isibonelo ngokwenza ukusebenzela uYise wasezulwini kuze kuqala (Joh 4:34)
Bonke abantu emhlabeni basesigabeni esisodwa kwezimbili—labo abakhonza uNkulunkulu njengabafundi ba-
kaJesu nalabo abangamkhonzi (Mat 12:30; 1Ko 10:21)
UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU UYINKOSI ENOTHANDO, UKUFANELE UKUBA SIMKHONZE (7 imiz.)
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi uJehova uyiNkosi ekhathalelayo nenothando
Ekomunye umkhankaso wokushumayela, uJesu wabona abantu ababentula kakhulu ngokomoya wayesebaha-
wukela (Mat 9:35, 36; gt-ZU 49)
Wabonisa abafundi ukuthi babenomsebenzi omkhulu okwakudingeka bawenze (Mat 9:37)
Nokho, wabaqinisekisa ukuthi “iNkosi yesivuno,” uJehova uNkulunkulu, yayizobasiza baqedele ukuvuna
(Mat 9:38)
Ngemva kokutshela abafundi ukuba bacele izisebenzi ezengeziwe, uJesu wabathuma ensimini ebanikeze izi-
yalezo ezithile (Mat 10:1, 5-15)
Kwakudingeka bashumayele ngoMbuso (Mat 10:7)
Kwakungafanele abafundi baphambukiswe uthando lwezinto ezibonakalayo ngesikhathi bevuna (Mat 10:
9-11)
Kwakudingeka baye kumninikhaya ngamunye nesigijimi sokuthula (Mat 10:12-15)
Labo ababa nengxenye kulomsebenzi njengoba wawuqondiswa uJesu bathola intokozo enkulu nezibusiso eNko-
sini yabo enothando (Luk 10:17-20)
Umsebenzi wokuvuna wekhulu lokuqala wabusiswa iNkosi
NgePentekoste lika-33 C.E., kwabhapathizwa abangaba u-3 000 (IzE 2:41)
UJehova waqhubeka eletha ukwanda (IzE 2:47b; 4:4; 5:14)
Noma kunjalo, kusadingeka izisebenzi ezengeziwe—Ngani?

ezweni’ (Mat 13:43; Fil 2:15)

INTOKOZO NEZIBUSISO KULINDELE LABO ABAHLANGANYELA NGOKWETHEMBEKA EMSEBENZINI
WOKUVUNA (5 imiz.)
Kuyilungelo elikhulu ukuhlanganyela emsebenzini omkhulu wokuvuna oqhubekayo ngaphansi kokuqondisa
kweNkosi yesivuno, uJehova
Intokozo nezibusiso kufanekiselwa uMkhosi Wokuvuna, noma uMkhosi Wamadokodo ka-Israyeli wasendulo (Dut
16:13-15; it-1 823)
Njengabantu ababegubha umkhosi wasendulo, isixuku esikhulu namuhla sivezwa njengesiphethe amahlamvu
esundu ngezandla zaso futhi ngentokozo sithi insindiso ingekaNkulunkulu neWundlu (re-ZU 122)
Isixuku esikhulu sinethemba elimangalisayo lokusinda ‘osizini olukhulu’ nokuphila emhlabeni omusha
(IsAm 7:14; 2Pe 3:13)
Sinalezizibusiso ngoba ‘sihlanze izingubo zaso sazenza zaba-mhlophe egazini leWundlu’ futhi ‘siphambi kwesi-
hlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu simkhonza imini nobusuku’ (IsAm 7:15; re-ZU 126)
Nawe futhi ungazijabulela lezizibusiso ezimangalisayo ngokuhlanganyela ngokwethembeka emsebenzini omkhu-
lu wokuvuna namuhla

Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone indima ebalulekile yokuzindla ekuphileni komKristu okungokomoya. Khuthaza bonke ukuba
njalo babekele eceleni isikhathi esihle sokuzindla ngezinto ezingokomoya. Gcizelela ukuthi ukuzindla okufanele
kudinga isikhathi nomzamo, futhi ubonise indlela efanele yokuzindla
IMIBHALO IKHUTHAZA UKUZINDLA (6 imiz.)
Ukuze umuntu azi uNkulunkulu, kumelwe angenise ulwazi oluqondile lwemiBhalo (Joh 17:3)
Ngaphezu kwalokho, umuntu kufanele aqaphele imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu yendalo (w90-ZU 9/15 15)
 ́
Ngemva kokutadisha nokuhlaziya, umuntu kumelwe azindle ngokungathi s ına ukuze azi uNkulunkulu (Hu
143:5)
Akwanele ukucabanga nje ngezinto; kudingeka sibone ukuhlobana kwazo noJehova (w93-ZU 9/15 16)
Kwakubalulekile ngoJoshuwa ukuba azindle ukuze aphumelele
UJoshuwa wayelandele uMose esikhundleni futhi wayelungiselela ukuhola abantu bakaJehova abangenise
eZweni Lesithembiso ngo-1473 B.C.E.
UJehova wanikeza uJoshuwa imiyalo (Jos 1:1-9)
Njengoba kuboniswe evesini 8, uJoshuwa kwakumelwe azindle njalo ngoMthetho kaNkulunkulu ukuze enze
izinto ngokuhlakanipha futhi athole isibusiso sikaJehova
Labo abazindla ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu kuthiwa bayajabula (Hu 1:1, 2)
Ukuzindla kuyimfanelo yalabo abalungile nabanokuqonda (Hu 49:3; IzA 15:28; g79-ZU 7/22 10 [w79 1/1 28];
g79-ZU 10/22 17 [w79 5/1 10])
AMAKRISTU AKUMELWE ADIDWE UMBONO WEZWE NGOKUZINDLA (8 imiz.)
AmaKristu kumelwe aqaphele ukuba angaphambanisi ukuzindla okufanele nemibono yezwe ngokuzindla
UbuHindu: Ukuzindla ngendlela engaphezu kweyemvelo (Transcendental meditation [TM]) (g77-ZU 5/8 21-3
[g76 11/8 26-8])
Nakuba abanye abakusekelayo bengavumi ukuthi kunenkolo ehilelekile, ngokuvamile kusetshenziswa
i-altare, kanye nehubo lesiSanskrit elidumisa uBrahma njengoMdali; amanye amahubo adumisa uziqu-zi-
ntathu wamaHindu
AmaKristu adumisa uJehova kuphela njengoMdali (IsAm 4:11)
IBhayibheli liyasazisa ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu kuphela ongaxazulula izinkinga ezinkulu zomphaka-
thi wesintu (Dan 2:44; 7:13, 14)
UbuBuddha: Ukuzindla okumisiwe kodwa hhayi lokho okukhuthazwa iBhayibheli (sh-ZU 146-7; g74 1/8 16-19)
AmaBuddha asekela ukuzindla ngokugxilisa ingqondo entweni eyodwa, isitho esithile somzimba, noma ama-
zwana athile noma imfumbe
Ekugcineni kukhishwa yonke imicabango nemizwa engqondweni
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ozindlayo angase angakufisi ukuphila noma injabulo ehlobene nokuphila
Ukuzindla okunjalo akuhambisani neBhayibheli, ngoba ngokukhipha engqondweni yonke imicabango
ephilile, umuntu uzifaka engozini yokuthonywa amademoni (Phawula isimiso esikuMathewu 12:43-45;
w87-ZU 3/1 8-9; w81-ZU 8/15 26 [w81 2/15 26])
LOKHO OKUHLANGANISWA UKUZINDLA OKUFANELE (10 imiz.)
Ukuzindla kuchazwa
 ́ ngokuthi: “Uhlobo lokucabanga okujulile, okugxilisa ingqondo lapho umuntu ecabanga kho-
na ngokungathi s ına ngokuhlangenwe nakho kwangesikhathi esidlule, azindle futhi acabange ngezinto ezenze-
kayo, noma acabange ngokujulile ngezenzakalo ezingase zenzeke esikhathini esizayo” (it-2 363)
Kudingeka sigxilise ingqondo futhi sifunde ukuzindla
Ukuzindla akukhona ukwakha amaphupho, ukuvumela ingqondo ukuba yakhe amaphupho angenanzuzo
(w84-ZU 7/15 28-31 [w84 2/1 27-30])
Kumelwe siqaphele ukuba inhliziyo ingenzi ukuzindla kube ukwakha amacebo noma ukuhlela ukwanelisa
izifiso ezingalungile
Ukuze ukuzindla kuzuzise futhi kuqinise ukholo, umuntu kumelwe agweme ukuqagela
Ukuqagela kuphumela eziphethweni ezingasekelwe ebufakazini obungokoqobo; kuyingozi ukuqagela oku-
njalo (Kol 2:8; w75 380, 389)
Ukuqagela kuye kwabangela abanye ukuba bawe eqinisweni (2Ti 2:18)
Ukuzindla ‘ngokuyize,’ izinto ezingenabo nakancane ubuhle, kungaholela umuntu ekuphikiseni uJehova ne-
zinceku zakhe (IzE 4:25, 26; it-2 363)
Ukuze azindle ngendlela efanele, umuntu kudingeka anethezeke, angabi okhathazekile
Umuntu kumelwe abe yedwa lapho ecabanga, engaphazanyiswa i-TV, umculo, nokunye
Kufanele afune izikhathi nezindawo ezithulile, mhlawumbe ebusuku (Hu 63:6)
U-Isaka wahamba yedwa sekuhlwile eyozindla (Gen 24:63)

9/07Ukuzindla kufanele kugxiliswe ezintweni ezizuzisayo (Hu 77:12; w77-ZU 9/15 414 [w77 166])
Akufanele sizikhathaze ngezenzo zababi (IzA 24:1, 2)
Kokubili inhliziyo nengqondo kufanele kuhileleke ekuzindleni (IzA 15:28)
UKUBALULEKA KOKUZINDLA NGEZINTO EZINGOKOMOYA (18 imiz.)
Ukuzindla kuyadingeka ukuze sizuze ukuhlakanipha, kubalulekile ukuze sithuthuke ngokomoya
UPawulu waluleka uThimothewu ukuba azindle ngokuziphatha kwakhe, inkonzo, nokufundisa kwakhe (1Ti
4:15)
Ngokuvamile umuntu onamawala akakwazi ukucabangela ulwazi noma ukucabangisisa (it-2 1140-1)
Umuntu onokuqonda uyazindla ukuze athole ukubaluleka kweseluleko (Job 23:5)
Lokhu bekungaba iseluleko asinikeziwe, inkulumo ethile emhlanganweni, noma isihloko esithile asifundile
Cabangela imiphumela yezinqumo nezenzo ukuze ugweme usizi (Hu 73:2, 3, 16-18; w79-ZU 4/15 14-16 [w78
10/15 14-15])
Ama-Israyeli ahluleka ukucabangela ‘ukugcina kwawo’ (Dut 32:28-30)
Zindla ngobuhlobo bakho noJehova (w77-ZU 9/15 413-14 [w77 165-6])
Ubuhlobo obubuthaka bungase bubonise ukuntuleka kokuzindla (Luk 8:11-13)
Zindla ukuze uqonde izimfanelo nokusebenzelana kukaJehova unomgomo wokukwenza ingxenye yobuntu ba-
kho (w90-ZU 3/1 13-14; w78-ZU 9/1 21-2 [w78 2/15 28-9]; wt-ZU 28-31 izig. 12-13)
Gxila ekutheni ufaneleka kanjani enjongweni kaJehova
Cabangela umsebenzi wesikhathi esidlule, wamanje, nowesikhathi esizayo
Ukuzindla ngesikhathi esidlule kungakusiza ukuba ubone amaphutha akho futhi uthuthukise ukuphila
Izono zama-Israyeli zesikhathi esidlule kwakufanele zibe isikhumbuzo kuwo (Dut 9:7)
Khumbula izenzo zakho zokwethembeka zesikhathi esidlule (Heb 10:32, 33; it-2 1089)
Zindla ngenkambo yesikhathi esidlule yabantu abathembekile (w73-ZU 1/1 11-13 [w72 404-5])
Zindla ngomsebenzi wamanje nowesikhathi esizayo unomgomo wokuthuthuka
Cabangisisa ngemigomo yakho, izinto eziza kuqala kuwe, unembeza wakho
Zindla ngendlela okusebenzisa ngayo ukuphila kwakho manje nalokho ohlela ukukwenza esikhathini esi-
zayo
Izinqumo zingase zithinte ukuphila kwakho phakade
Ukuzindla ngezinto ezingokomoya kuyokwenza umuntu ohlakaniphile
Ukuzindla okunjalo kuyobonakala ekukhulumeni kwakho (Hu 49:3; Efe 4:29, 31, 32)
QHUBEKA UZINIKEZA ISIKHATHI SOKUZINDLA NGEZINTO EZINGOKOMOYA (3 imiz.)
Ungavumeli ukushesha kokuphila kwansuku zonke kukuvimbele ekuzindleni
Njengoba uJesu ayezidinga izikhathi zokuba yedwa ukuze athandaze futhi aqabuleke ngokomoya, nawe uya-
zidinga (Mar 6:30, 31; Luk 6:12)
Zazise izikhathi ozibekela eceleni ukuze uzindle
Zindla njalo ngezinto ezingokomoya (Fil 4:8, 9)
Kuyokwenza ube isikhuthazo futhi wenze abanye baqabuleke futhi kuyokhulisa ubuhlobo bakho noJehova
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedINGABE UBAMBA AMAGQUBU NOMA UYATHETHELELA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza abazalwane bakhiphe ezinhliziyweni zabo noma ikuphi ukuthambekela kokucasuka nokubamba amagqubu.
Basize babone indlela yokugwema imizwa enjalo nendlela yokuyixosha uma iphakama. Faka isifiso sokulingisa
uJehova ekuboniseni uthando nesihe. Khuthaza bonke ukuba benze wonke umzamo wokuxazulula izinkinga fu-
thi bathethelelane ngokusuka enhliziyweni
SONKE SINAMAPHUTHA, SIYIZONI (6 imiz.)
Akekho ongenasono, ongenaphutha (Hu 51:5; Shu 7:20; Rom 3:23; it-2 18)
Ekugcineni sonke siyakhubeka, ikakhulukazi ngokuphathelene nolimi (Jak 3:2; w78-ZU 11/15 5 [w78 5/15 7])
Sithambekele ekukunciphiseni okwethu ukushiyeka
Ngokuvamile sicabanga ukuthi abanye bayizoni ezimbi kakhulu kunathi (Luk 6:42)
IBhayibheli lisiyala ukuba sithobeke, sibheke abanye njengabakhulu kunathi (Fil 2:3)
Kumelwe silandele isibonelo esibekwa uJehova ngokuthethelela (Efe 4:32)
UJEHOVA AKAWABAMBI AMAGQUBU (10 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu unesizathu sokusithukuthelela ngenxa yamaphutha ethu
Esimweni sethu esinesono, sihluleka njalo ukufinyelela izindinganiso zakhe
Nakuba eyibonisa intukuthelo efanelekile ngezinye izikhathi, uJehova “akagcini intukuthelo” (Hu 103:9)
UNkulunkulu uyabathethelela ababushiyayo ububi (Isa 55:7; sl 111-12)
Ukusinda kwethu kuxhomeke entethelelweni kaJehova
Izibonelo zokuthethelela kukaJehova abantu
INkosi uManase yamcasula uJehova ngezono ezimbi kakhulu, nokho yathethelelwa ngemva kokuphenduka
(2Kr 33:10-13)
Indodana esaphazayo yathethelelwa nguyise, yamukelwa ngisho nangezandla ezivulekile
Kubonisa uzwela lukaJehova (Luk 15:11-32; gt-ZU 86)
UPawulu wazibiza ‘ngesoni esikhulu,’ nokho wathethelelwa futhi wasetshenziswa kakhulu njengesikhonzi si-
kaNkulunkulu (1Ti 1:15; lp 111-12)
UNGASHESHI UKUCASUKA (6 imiz.)
Akumelwe sisheshe sicasulwe yilokho abanye abakushoyo ngathi
Masiqaphele ukuthi nathi ngezinye izikhathi siyabacasula abanye (Shu 7:21, 22; g89-ZU 8/8 23 [g89 7/22 19])
Ingabe siyashesha ukucasuka ngenxa yokuqhosha, sicabangela imizwa yethu ngokweqile? (Shu 7:9; w78-ZU 1/1
22-3 [w77 415-16])
Lapho kukhulunywa kabi ngathi, ngokuvamile asikho isidingo sokukwenza kube into enkulu
UJesu, wamangalelwa ngokuthi uyisiminzi, akakwenzanga kwaba indaba enkulu lokho
Wayazi ukuthi imisebenzi yakhe yayizokubonisa kungamanga lokho kumangalela (Mat 11:19; it-1 964)
UDavide wayengabalaleli abantu abathanda ukuphikisana (Hu 38:12-15)
Wakuthola kungcono kakhulu ukuthembela kuJehova futhi alinde
ABANYE BATHAMBEKELE EKUBAMBENI AMAGQUBU (8 imiz.)
Ake ucabangele lesisimo esiwumfanekiso esilandelayo
Unenkinga encane yakho siqu oyembulela umngane oseduze. Uthembisa ukungatsheli muntu. Kamuva utho-
la ukuthi abanye bayazi ngenkinga yakho
Uzizwa kanjani ngomngane wakho? Ingabe unquma ukuhlukana naye? Ingabe uzothi: “Ngizombingelela ko-
dwa angifuni lutho olunye oluzongihlanganisa naye. Ngizomgcina ekude nami”?
Ungasheshi ufinyelele eziphethweni, uthukuthele (IzA 29:20, 22)
Cabanga: Ingabe umzalwane ubemane nje engongacabangi? Ingabe wena wake wayenza into enjalo? Inga-
be mhlawumbe bekuwukungaqondi? Ingabe mhlawumbe ubekufunela iseluleko esengeziwe ebesingakusi-
za? Ingancishiswa yini indaba, ithalaliswe futhi ixolelwe? Ingabe ukuyigcina iyimfihlo bekubaluleke ka-
ngako? Uyaqiniseka yini ukuthi ngempela uyena odlulisele lokho kwaziswa komunye umuntu? (IzA 19:11;
g87-ZU 5/8 16-17; g74-ZU 9/8 3-4 [g74 3/8 3-4])
IBhayibheli lisiyala ukuba singabi namagqubu (Lev 19:18; w72 707)
Ukuba nobutha kungaholela ekumlimazeni ngokuqondile umakhelwane, ngisho nasezinyathelweni ezingaphe-
zu kwalokho
Uma silalela umuzwa wemvelo, singase sifinyelele ekungamthandini lowomuntu
Ukungamthandi ngokumenyanya umuntu kungaphenduka inzondo
Inzondo iwumzwelo onamandla, ingakulimaza (w87-ZU 7/1 3-4)
Ungase ube nesimo sengqondo sokuba umbulali ngalowomuntu (Mat 5:21, 22; w90-ZU 10/1 13)
Kungaholela ngisho nasekuziphindiseleleni

12/93Uziphatha kanjani ezimweni ezinjalo? Ingabe ubamba amagqubu, noma uyathethelela?
Ukuhlala uthukuthele ngenxa yesono somunye kunqamula ubuhlobo bobuntu, ‘kuvusa ukuxabana’ (IzA
29:22; w90-ZU 9/15 22; g80 5/8 24)
Kubangela ubunzima emshadweni nokuwohloka kwelungiselelo lomkhaya
Kuphazamisa ubunye phakathi kwabazalwane ebandleni
UNGABAMBI AMAGQUBU, KODWA SHESHA UKUTHETHELELA (10 imiz.)
Ukuzimisela ukuthethelela kuvivinya uthando oluqotho ngabanye
Kulula ukuphana ngezinto kunokubonisa ukuphana ngokuthethelela (w80-ZU 3/1 3, 4 [w79 9/1 3, 4])
Ingabe sinomuzwa wokuthi uthando luqotho nokuthi siyaphana ngokuthethelela? (Mat 18:21, 22; w88-ZU 3/1
8, 9)
Ukubonisa umoya wokuthethelela emkhayeni
Ukuphawula okuye kwenziwa: “Umshado ojabulisayo uwukuhlanganiswa kwabantu ababili abathethelelana-
yo” (w80-ZU 3/1 4 [w79 9/1 4])
Thethelela amaphutha ngokuphelele
Thethelelanani ngokukhululekile ebandleni
Kubalulekile ukuze kube nenjabulo nesikhuthazo kubo bonke, ikakhulukazi endabeni yomenzi wobubi ofuna
intethelelo
Ukona kuletha isihlamba ebandleni, kuthinta umoya webandla
Bonke ebandleni kufanele babonise intethelelo eqotho kulabo abaphenduka ngempela (2Ko 2:5-11; w78-ZU
7/1 18 [w77 693])
Yithetheleleni inkathazo, isihlamba, nosizi ukona kwabo okuye kwakuletha ebandleni (w73-ZU 1/15 27
[w72 437])
UJehova akabalahli labo abaphenduka ngempela, ebeka isibonelo okumelwe sisilandele (Hu 51:17; w93-ZU
3/15 16)
Funda ukusheshe uthethelele
Ungahlobanisi isisusa esibi nezenzo zabanye
Zama ukulungisa izindaba masinyane (Efe 4:26; w90-ZU 9/15 21)
Ungaphindiseli “okubi ngokubi” (1Pe 3:8, 9; g80 1/8 4)
Intethelelo yenza kube nokuthula; impindiselo yenza kube nengxabano
Ungathetheleli nje kuphela kodwa futhi khohlwa (w92-ZU 7/15 29)
QHUBEKA ENDLELENI YOKUTHETHELELA (5 imiz.)
Uthando lusenza sikwazi ukuthethelela abafowethu futhi siqhubeke sisendleleni kaJehova yokuthethelela (Mat
6:14, 15; 1Ko 13:5; w90-ZU 5/15 19; w72 708)
Thethelela, futhi ugweme imiphumela elimazayo impindiselo enayo kuwe nakwabanye (ce 206-7)
Gwema ukuzihlanganisa nabanamagqubu (IzA 22:24, 25; g87-ZU 5/8 17)
Lingisa uJehova, isibonelo esiphelele salowo othethelelayo (Hu 103:3; Hez 18:22)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUVUSELELA UMOYA WOKUZIDELA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Basize bonke babone ukuthi umoya wobuKristu beqiniso umoya wokupha nokuzidela. Bakhuthaze ukuba bazi-
hlole babone ukuthi inkonzo yabo eya kuJehova iwubonakalisa ngokugcwele yini lomoya. Bonisa izindlela eziwu-
sizo abangahlakulela ngazo lomoya kubo nakubantwana babo. Banxuse ngokufudumele ukuba balingise izinkulu-
ngwane zabanye eziwubonisa ngempela lomoya wokuzidela namuhla
IZWE LIKHUTHAZA UKUZITIKA, HHAYI UKUZIDELA (7 imiz.)
Yonke into namuhla iklanyelwe ukuba umuntu azijabulise
Injongo iwukuthola lokho ongakuthola lapho usengakuthola; thola okuningi nokungcono kakhulu; awunaku-
thola okuningi ngokweqile
Izwe lisebenzisa amazwi anjengokuthi: “Ngikwenze ngendlela yami,” “Kufanele uqikelele ukuphuma phambi-
li,” “Thola okufunayo manje,” “Umphumela awunandaba kuphela nje uma ukuthola okufunayo,” “Yenza oku-
thandayo”
Abazali abaningi, benomuzwa wokuthi “kufanele baziphilele ngokukhululekile,” abazinaki izingane zabo
(g89-ZU 8/8 5 [g89 3/22 5])
Iyini imiphumela yokuzitika?
Ukungajabuli, ukukhungatheka, ukunganeliseki, nosizi
Ama-Israyeli ayeyisibonelo salokho okwenzeka kwabazitikayo
Abubula, akhononda, aba ‘nokunxanela kobugovu’ (Num 11:34, qhathanisa ne-NW.)
Kwenza ukuba angajabuli futhi kwalethela amaningi ukufa
Izwe alizange lifunde kulokho noma kokunye okuhlangenwe nakho emlandweni
Abantu bayabuza: ‘Kungani kufanele uzidele kuyilapho kungekho muntu ngempela onendaba futhi izwe la-
namuhla linokuningi kangaka elingakunikeza? Kungani kufanele uzidele kuyilapho abantu yonke indawo
benza okuphambene nje nalokho—bezidla futhi bezifunela okwengeziwe? Kungani ungazami “ukuzuza izwe
lonke” noma okungenani ingxenye enkulu yalo?’ (Mar 8:36)
IZINCEKU ZIKANKULUNKULU ZIKHUTHAZWA UKUBA ZIZIDELE (12 imiz.)
Izibusiso kuma-Israyeli zazixhomeke ekunikeleni kwawo ngemihlatshelo emihle (Mal 1:14; 3:10)
UJesu wazidela ngokushiya izulu (Fil 2:5-8)
Ngenxa yalokhu waba nenjabulo enkulu (Hu 40:8; Heb 12:2)
Wayishisekela ngokukhethekile inkonzo kaJehova (Mar 1:32-39)
Ngaso sonke isikhathi uJesu wayedela izithakazelo zakhe ukuze ajabulise uNkulunkulu (Joh 5:30)
UJesu wakhuthaza abalandeli bakhe ukuba bazidele (Luk 9:23-25; w90-ZU 8/1 16)
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi babenjalo (Mat 4:20; 19:27)
Lokhu kusho ukuthi bayeka izinto ezithile ekuphileni ukuze bajabulise uNkulunkulu ngokugcwele futhi
babeke izithakazelo zoMbuso kuqala
Abafundi bakaJesu banamuhla lokhu bakwenza ngaziphi ezinye izindlela? (w86-ZU 6/15 12)
Ukudela komuntu isikhundla sakhe kwezamabhizinisi ngokwaziwa ngokuthi ungomunye woFakazi Baka-
Jehova
Ukudela isikhathi ebesingasetshenziselwa ukuphishekela ukuzijabulisa noma izinto ezibonakalayo ukuze
uye emihlanganweni nasenkonzweni
Ukungenela inkonzo yesikhathi esigcwele (Rom 12:1, 2; 2Ti 2:15)
Ukulahla ukuzijabulisa okuthile kwezwe, umculo, imisebenzi (g86 2/22 13-17)
Ukuvuma ukuboshwa (IzE 5:29; w89-ZU 3/1 18; w89-ZU 6/15 27)
Ukuzimisela ukulalela iZwi likaJehova kuze kube ngisho nasekufeni (Mat 10:28; yb89 119-23; yb88 151-4)
Ukuhlanganyela njalo enkonzweni (w92-ZU 2/1 27-8)

12/93Izinkulungwane zabanye ziye zakhonza njengamaphayona emazweni akubo

Abaningi baye bakhonza emakhaya aseBethel emhlabeni wonke, belungiselela izincwadi futhi besekela umse-
benzi wasensimini
Kukho konke lokhu, siye sabona ukugcwaliseka kweHubo 110:3, elanikeza incazelo ecacile yomoya wokuzidela

Ngokwalemibhalo kusobala ukuthi iZwi likaNkulunkulu liyala zonke izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezizinike-

Uhileleke ngokugcwele?

(Dut 6:6, 7)
Noma ingabe wena nomkhaya wakho nithambekele kakhulu ekuzakheleni ukuphila okungcono nokune-
thezekile manje?
UJesu waxwayisa ‘ngokukhohlisa kwengcebo’ (Mat 13:22)
Ingcebo yezinto ezibonakalayo ilinganiselwe; iyehluleka lapho kunezidingo ezinkulu kakhulu; ayinakunike-
za impilo enhle noma ivimbele ukufa

HLAKULELA UMOYA WOKUZIDELA (5 imiz.)
Ingabe ubonisa umoya wokuzidela ngokukhonza uJehova ngokugcwele ngokwezinga izimo zakho ezikuvumela
ngalo?
Ungasisebenzisa yini isikhathi esengeziwe ekufundeni nasekutadisheni iBhayibheli komuntu siqu?
Ingabe utadisha njalo?
Kungenzeka yini ukuba uchithe isikhathi esengeziwe emsebenzini woMbuso?
Mangaki amahora owachitha ekuzijabuliseni noma ekubukeni ithelevishini?
Ingabe asesilinganisweni esifanelekile nomsebenzi woMbuso? (Efe 5:15, 16)
Ingabe ungumzali? Isikhathi esingcono kakhulu sokuba abantwana bakho bafunde umoya wokuzidela yilapho
besebancane (2Ti 3:14, 15)
Banikeze umsebenzi abangawenza; bafundise ukuthi ukuphila akulula (g90-ZU 9/8 6)
Zinikeze isikhathi sokubaqeqesha, sokufunda nabo, sokubayala (Efe 6:4; Heb 12:11)
Ingabe ungumdala noma isikhonzi sesikhathi esigcwele? Kukhona okuthile nawe ongakwenza?
Ungalithuthukisa yini izinga lenkonzo yakho?
Ungazenza yini umKristu ongcono? (Gal 5:22, 23)
INKAMBO YOKUZIDELA ILETHA INJABULO ENKULU (2 imiz.)
Lwela ukuthola ingcebo engokomoya engasoze yahluleka (Mat 6:20; w89-ZU 7/15 13-14)
Umphostoli uPawulu wabonisa ukubaluleka kwengcebo engokomoya (1Ti 6:17-19; w88-ZU 10/15 21; w86-ZU 6/15
5-6)
Yaneliswa yilokho onakho, futhi ukhonze uJehova ngenjabulo (IzE 20:35)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 69-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45YENZA UJEHOVA ABE ITHEMBA LAKHO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gxilisa ezinhliziyweni zabazalwane umuzwa ojulile wokuqiniseka ukuthi izindlela zikaJehova zingezingcono ku-
nazo zonke kithi. Siza izilaleli zibone ngezindlela ezingokoqobo indlela ezingabonisa ngayo ukuthemba uJehova.
Xwayisa ngengozi yokuzethemba noma ukuthembela ekuhlakanipheni komuntu, futhi ubonise imiphumela eda-
bukisayo lokhu okungaholela kuyo. Khuthaza bonke ukuba bathembele ngokugcwele kuJehova kuzo zonke izici
zokuphila
THOLA UMUSA NOKUQONDA OKUHLE EMEHLWENI KANKULUNKULU NAWABANTU (IzA 3:1-4) (5 imiz.)
Ukucabangela izAga 3:1-26 kuzosibonisa indlela yokwenza uJehova abe ithemba lethu
Ulwazi lweBhayibheli kumelwe lugxiliswe enhliziyweni
Bonke kumelwe balalele uJehova, uBaba wethu; intsha kumelwe ilalele abazali
Hlala uyikhumbula imithetho kaNkulunkulu
‘Yilobe esibhebheni senhliziyo yakho’ ngokufunda nangokukhuluma ngemithetho kaJehova ukuze ibe ingxe-
nye yokuphila kwakho (Hu 40:8; it-2 483  ̊5; w86-ZU 11/1 17-18)
Umvuzo uyoba “ubude bezinsuku, neminyaka yokuphila, nokuthula”
UJehova unquma ukuthi umuntu uyophila phakade noma uyobhubha
Labo abasebenzisa iZwi likaJehova kufanele bangahileleki ezingxabanweni, ukunyundela, nokunye, futhi babe
“nokuthula” (Gal 5:20, 22)
THEMBA UJEHOVA FUTHI UNGENCIKI KOKWAKHO UKUQONDA (IzA 3:5-8) (12 imiz.)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi wenzani, hlala ukhumbula imithetho kaJehova, funa isiqondiso sakhe
Themba uJehova, futhi uzibonele ukuthi iBhayibheli liqondisa abantu endleleni eqondile
Themba uJehova ngokutadisha iZwi lakhe; zindla ngalokho elikushoyo; lalela imiyalo yalo; phila ngezimiso
zalo
“Themba kuJehova,” njengoba kwenza uJesu (Isa 8:17, 18) noPawulu (2Ko 1:9, 10); ungathembeli kubantu (Hu
146:3, 4)
Thembela esiqondisweni sikaJehova esiza ngenhlangano yakhe, ilungiselelo lokudla okungokomoya, ukumiswa
kwababonisi
Ungenzi “ukuqonda” kwakho izinto, izenzakalo, amalungiselelo, kube ngaphezu kwesiqondiso sikaJehova esi-
za kuwe ngeZwi lakhe nangenhlangano
“Mazise” ngokumqaphela uJehova, wenze lokho akushoyo, ulandele izindlela zakhe
Liqaphele igunya likaJehova, ubukhosi bakhe
Mlalele ngisho nasezindabeni zomuntu siqu nasemicabangweni yakho
Lalela uJehova ezindabeni ‘zokushada eNkosini kuphela’ (1Ko 7:39)
Wazi kangcono, futhi kumelwe ufunde ukumethemba
Labo abathemba uJehova bayophumelela, bazuze umusa waphezulu
Labo ‘abancika kokwabo ukuqonda’ bangase baphambuke futhi babhekane nenhlekelele engokomoya
Ukuhlakanipha kwabantu kufanele kugwenywe
Akufanele sizicabangele ngaphezu kokuba kufanele (Rom 12:3)
Akufanele siphambukiswe imibono, nemiqondo yomuntu siqu
Kufanele siqondiswe ilungiselelo likaNkulunkulu lebandla (Hu 22:22)
Isizathu sokuba kube nezinkolo eziningi kangaka namuhla ukuthi abantu baye baphikelela ekwencikeni eku-
qondeni kwabo (IzA 14:12)
Bambalwa abaye baya eZwini likaNkulunkulu; bakhetha imibono yabo siqu
‘Deda ebubini,’ futhi uyoba nonembeza ohlanzekile
Gwema ukugxeka ngokweqile, ukhetha abazalwane noma amabandla
Qhubeka uthuthuka olwazini oluqondile, kodwa ungavumeli ukushukunyiswa ukuqhosha, ukwesaba, noma
umona
Isifundo seZwi likaNkulunkulu kanye nokulisebenzisa enkulumweni, ekucabangeni, nasesenzweni kunetho-
nya elihle, ‘kuwukuhlunyelelwa kwamathambo akho’
DUMISA UJEHOVA NGOKUNGCONO KAKHULU KWAKHO, FUTHI WAMUKELE ISIYALO (IzA 3:9-12)
(10 imiz.)
Sekela inhlangano kaJehova (w85-ZU 12/1 20-2)
Njengoba ama-Israyeli aletha okungcono kakhulu kwawo kuJehova, amaKristu enza okufanayo namuhla
Nikelela iHholo LoMbuso lakini; siza indlunkulu namagatsha eNhlangano kanye nomsebenzi wezithunywa ze-
vangeli wembulunga yonke (g89-ZU 1/22 14-15; w87-ZU 12/15 19-20)
Sebenzisa impahla yakho ukuze usize ababuthaka nabazalwane abanesidingo (w84-ZU 12/1 28)
Yisebenzisele ukusiza abanye; ‘ayiyikukusiza ngosuku lolaka’ (IzA 11:4; w77-ZU 10/1 441 [w77 201])
No. 70-ZU
12/93Ukuthi “izinqolobane zakho zigcwale ngobuningi” ngokuyinhloko kubhekisela engcebweni engokomoya ka-
nye nenjabulo nokulondeka ekulethayo (it-2 1038  ̊4)
Yamukela ukuyala kukaJehova njengobufakazi bothando lwakhe lobuzali (tp-ZU 110)
UJehova ufuna simlalele, ngoba lokhu kungokwenzuzo yethu siqu
Isiyalo singase sibe buhlungu futhi sethuse kodwa sinesici esizuzisayo; sinikezwa ngomgomo wokukuzuzisa
Bonga ngokuthi uye waqasheliswa ngaleyondaba, ukuthi othile ube nesithakazelo esanele kuwena ukuba
akuqondise
Kungcono ukuqondiswa kusenesikhathi enkambweni embi kunokuqhubeka ungaqondisiwe (Heb 12:5-7)
Ungacasuki lapho isiyalo sifika (IzA 4:13; 19:20)
Singavela kumzalwane ovuthiwe, sivele kumzali
Singavela ngisho nangokufunda iBhayibheli noma INqabayokulinda
Ungabheki iziyalezo njengemithetho ecindezelayo kodwa njengobufakazi bokuthi uJehova unesithakazelo so-
thando
Liqaphele igunya lenhlangano kaJehova lokwenza izinguquko
Ungalishiyi iqiniso ngenxa yokulungiswa kokuqonda
UKUBALULEKA KOKUHLAKANIPHA KOKWESABA UNKULUNKULU KUNGAPHEZU KWENZUZO YEZI-
NTO EZIBONAKALAYO (IzA 3:13-18) (7 imiz.)
Ukuhlakanipha kuletha injabulo, ukuthula, nokwenama (w86-ZU 6/15 6)
Kunikeza umuntu ikhono lokwenza ngokuvumelana nezinjongo zikaNkulunkulu
Ulwazi oludingekayo lungatholakala ngokutadisha iBhayibheli ngobuqotho nangokuqonda
Ukuhlakanipha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu kunesethembiso sokuphila, ingcebo, nenkazimulo
“Izindlela zakho ziyizindlela zokumnandi,” njengoba uJehova ebabusisa ngokucebile labo abazuza ukuhla-
kanipha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu nokuqonda
“Kungumuthi wokuphila kwabakubambayo” ngomqondo wokuthi lokhu kuhlakanipha kunethonya elihle
ekuphileni kwamanje (it-2 250  ̊3)
Kungasisindisa ezinkingeni ezinkulu, kuhlanganise nokufa ngaphambi kwesikhathi
Ngokwesibonelo, sebenzisa izimiso ngokuphathelene notshwala, izidakamizwa, intukuthelo
Ukuze sithole ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda, kumelwe sisebenzise ulwazi
Lokhu kudinga ukuzimisela ukusebenzisa lokho okufundayo
UKWENZA UJEHOVA ITHEMBA LAKHO KUPHUMELA EZIBUSISWENI (IzA 3:19-26) (9 imiz.)
Ukulondeka okungokomoya kuyoqinisekiswa (Hu 91:1-3)
Ukwesaba izingozi kuyoncipha (Hu 91:5, 6)
Ubuthongo buyojabulisa
Ngandlela-thile ubuthongo obumnandi buwumvuzo wokuphila ngokuhlakanipha
Ngeke silwesabe usizi oluyofikela ababi
Njengoba oFakazi BakaJehova bebhekana nosizi olukhulu, bathola isikhuthazo kulamazwi: ‘Aniyikwesaba’
Asikulindele ukuvikelwa kukho konke ukulimala okungokomzimba
UJeremiya akazange avikelwe kukho konke ukuhlaselwa okungokomzimba (Jer 37:15, 21)
Umphostoli uJakobe wabulawelwa ukholo (IzE 12:1, 2)
UJehova uyosivikela njengesigaba noma njengenhlangano (Hu 145:20; Mat 10:28)
Abantu ngabanye bangase bahlupheke
Sonke sinethemba ovukweni (Joh 5:28, 29)
Sinethemba lokuthi uJehova akanakusikhohlwa ngisho nasekufeni
PHISHEKELA LENKAMBO YOKUBA NETHEMBA NGAMANDLA AVELA KUJEHOVA (2 imiz.)
Qhubeka wenza uJehova ithemba lakho
Thembela ezithembisweni zikaNkulunkulu
Khonza uJehova ngokuthobeka nenjabulo
Funda izAga 2:20-22
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INDLELA YOKUHLALA UPHAPHEME NGOKOMOYA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Xwayisa abazalwane ngengozi ehlala ikhona yokunqotshwa ukozela okungokomoya okugcwele esintwini. Nike-
za isiqondiso esicacile ngalokho okufanele sikwenze nokufanele sikugweme ukuze sihlale siphapheme ngokomo-
ya. Banxuse ukuba bakhuthale kunanini ngaphambili njengoba ukuphela kusondela
AMAKRISTU AYALWA UKUBA AHLALE EPHAPHEME NGOKOMOYA (5 imiz.)
Njengoba isenzakalo esikhulu emlandweni, iHarmagedoni, sisondela, isintu sisonke silele ngokomoya (w91-ZU
5/1 21; g79-ZU 9/8 15-16 [w79 3/15 28-9])
Ubuchwepheshe banamuhla obuphambili buyozela, abukuphaphamele okushiwo izenzakalo zezwe (Mat 16:2, 3)
Ngokuphambene, amaKristu ayalwa ukuba ‘avuke ebuthongweni’ nokuba ‘alinde’ (Rom 13:11-14; 1Ko 16:13; it-2
980)
Akufanele sizikhohlise; sivuna esikutshalayo (Gal 6:7, 8)
Kufanele silivume iqiniso lokuthi asinakulala njengoba kwenza izwe lonke (1The 5:6)
OKWENZA ABANYE BANGAHLALI BEPHAPHEME NGOKOMOYA (10 imiz.)
Abantu ngokuvamile bamatasa ngeminako yokuphila nezwe elibazungezile (Mat 24:37-39; w89-ZU 10/1 12-14;
w87-ZU 5/15 20; su-ZU 50)
Nakuba uJehova elungiselela inala yokudla okungokomoya, abantu abaningi namuhla abalaleli futhi abasise-
benzisi iseluleko esinikezwa ngokuphindaphindiwe (w87-ZU 5/1 16; re-ZU 21)
Njengabantu basosukwini lukaNowa, ‘abanaki’
Abaningi bazivumela ukuba babe izimpumputhe nezithulu ngokomoya nakuba bethi bangabantu bakaNkulunku-
lu (Isa 42:18-20)
Ngakho, njengoba belele ngokomoya, abanaki (Isa 42:25)
Abanye balolozelwa ukuba balale ngoba izwe libonakala liqhubeka ngendlela evamile (w87-ZU 5/15 17-19; w77-ZU
1/15 41-3 [w76 441-3])
Intuthuko yezomnotho, izingxabano zamazwe ezidambayo, nokunye, kubenza babe nomuzwa wokuthi akushi-
ntshanga lutho (2Pe 3:4)
Bazama ‘ukusebenzisa izwe ngokugcwele’ (1Ko 7:31, NW)
Abanye bavuma ukulalela izimfundiso zamanga (1Jo 4:4-6; w86-ZU 7/15 20)
Abaqapheli futhi balalele izwi likaMalusi Omuhle (Joh 10:4, 5, 16)
INDLELA YOKUHLALA UPHAPHEME NGOKOMOYA (15 imiz.)
Qaphela isidingo sokuhlala uphapheme ngokomoya
‘Zithibe ukuze ukhuleke’ (1Pe 4:7)
‘Linda futhi ukhuleke’ (Mat 26:41)
“Masiqwashe, siqonde” (1The 5:6)
“Qondani, nilinde” (1Pe 5:8)
“Osuka ethi umi, akaqaphele ukuba angawi” (1Ko 10:12)
Yidla ‘ukudla okufika ngesikhathi’ okuvela enhlanganweni kaJehova (Mat 24:45)
Zimisele ukuba ungaphuthelwa nokukodwa ukudla okungokomoya (Mat 5:3)
Kokubili ukutadisha komuntu siqu nokuba khona emihlanganweni kuyaphuthuma kithi sonke
Yidla ukudla okungokomoya ngentshiseko
Landela izindlela, izinqubo, nezimiso ezingokwasezulwini (rs-ZU 97-9)
Qaphela inhlangano esetshenziswa uJehova
Hlonipha futhi ulalele abaholayo (Heb 13:17; w89-ZU 9/15 20-5)
Gwema ukugxeka noma ukukhuluma ngokungacabangeli
Thola indawo yakho elungiselelweni likaNkulunkulu futhi uhlale kuyo
Ungakhonondi ngezabelo nangamalungiselelo (Rom 12:4, 6-8)
Zenze kahle noma iziphi izabelo ozitholayo (Shu 9:10)
Thembela ezingelosini zikaNkulunkulu ukuba zenze ushintsho lapho kudingeke khona (Mat 13:41; IsAm 1:16)
Phikelela ekuthandazeni (Rom 12:12)
UJesu wayevelele ngokuthandaza njalo (Mat 14:23; Mar 1:35; Luk 23:46)
Zinikele ngomphefumulo wonke enkonzweni yasensimini nasekunikeleni ngemali
UJehova usenzele okuningi ngenhlangano yakhe
Singabonisa ukuthi siyamthanda ngokusekela ngokugcwele ngesikhathi sethu nemali (w92-ZU 1/15 14-16)
Ukusekela okunjalo kwabikezelwa (Isa 60:5; 61:5, 6; w85-ZU 3/1 14)
Bonisa uthando kubo bonke, futhi uziphathe ngobuqotho (Efe 4:1-3)
No. 71-ZU
9/07MANJE ISIKHATHI ESIBUCAYI SOKUHLALA UPHAPHEME (12 imiz.)
NjengoJeremiya, inceku ethembekile neqondayo ikhipha isixwayiso (Jer 4:19-31)
UJeremiya yamdabukisa kakhulu inhlekelele ayeyibona isondela
Wakhipha isixwayiso, kodwa abantu abazange banake (Jer 4:22; sl 156)
Ukube banaka, babeyosinda ezenzakalweni zango-607 B.C.E.
Lesisizukulwane sibhekene nosizi olufanayo
Labo abasabela esimemezelweni sesigaba sikaJeremiya banomvuzo wepharadesi elingokomoya (Isa 29:17-
19; sl 150)
Manje isikhathi esibucayi ngoba uSathane uyazi ukuthi isikhathi sakhe sifushane (IsAm 12:12)
Njengoba sibhekene ‘nokwanda kokungabi namthetho,’ uthando lwethu lungase luphole (Mat 24:12; w85-ZU
4/15 30 [w84 10/1 31])
Kudingeka ukuqapha okukhulu ukuze simelane nobugovu, ukuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo, nezinkanuko ze-
nyama
Ukuchuma ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo nesikhathi esiningi sokungcebeleka ngokuvamile kuba inhlekelele
ngokomoya
Abanye abasinda ekushushisweni kamuva baba izisulu zezinye izingibe zikaSathane
Akufanele silokothe sizethembe ngokweqile (1Ko 10:12)
Njengoba iHarmagedoni isondela, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuhlala siphapheme
Kunesixwayiso esikhethekile kithi sonke manje esiphila kulesisikhathi esibucayi (IsAm 16:15)
Injabulo izolethwa ukuhlala kwethu siphapheme (re-ZU 231-2)
Ukuphaphama kuhilela ukuhlanganyela ngokugcwele, ngentshiseko enkonzweni yoMbuso
Labo abalele bayohlazeka, bahambe-ze ngokomoya, bafe phakade (IsAm 21:8)
SEBENZISA ISIKHATHI ESISELE EKUKHUTHAZENI ABANYE BAPHAPHAME NGOKOMOYA (3 imiz.)
Lesi isikhathi sokuvuna, esiletha imithwalo yemfanelo eyengeziwe
Kudingeka sisebenze amahora engeziwe; ukuvuna kuyaphuthuma (IzA 10:5; w78-ZU 12/1 15 [w78 6/1 18])
Fundisa abanye ukwazi uJehova, bathandaze njalo (Kol 4:2)
Emihlanganweni yebandla, ‘vuselela abanye’ ngokulungela ukunikela ngendlela eyakhayo emhlanganweni (Heb
10:24, 25)
Lokhu kudinga ukukhuthalela isifundo somuntu siqu, esibaluleke ngempela ukuze sihlale siphapheme ngoko-
moya
Hlala uphapheme ngokomoya ngokuziqaphela (Luk 21:34-36; w92-ZU 5/1 19-23)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

All Rights ReservedUTHANDO LUBONAKALISA IBANDLA LOBUKRISTU LEQINISO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza abazalwane baqonde ukuthi uthando, hhayi ukuphelela, lubonakalisa ibandla lobuKristu leqiniso. Bonisa uku-
thi njengoba sonke singaphelele, ngisho nabazalwane abanemithwalo yemfanelo bayawenza amaphutha futhi ba-
yadinga ukuthethelelwa nokuboniswa uthando. Khuthaza bonke ngemfudumalo ukuba babonise ‘ukuthandana
okunganqamukiyo’—uhlobo lothando ‘olusibekela inqwaba yezono.’—1Pe 4:8
UTHANDO LUWUPHAWU OLUBONAKALISA IBANDLA LOBUKRISTU LEQINISO (3 imiz.)
Ingabe kufanele silindele ukuba wonke amalungu ebandla abe aphelele?
Ingabe abaphostoli namaKristu okuqala babephelele?
Ingabe kungenzeka ngempela nganoma ubani kithi aphelele namuhla?
Uthando, hhayi ukuphelela, lubonakalisa ibandla lobuKristu leqiniso (Joh 13:34, 35)
Kodwa abanye uthando baludidanisa nokuphelela, balindela okukhulu kakhulu kwabanye
Basebenzisa ukungapheleli kwabanye njengezaba zokukhubeka (w88-ZU 8/15 29-30)
Ingabe ulindela ukuphelela kwabanye? Yini okufanele ulindele ukuyibona ebandleni lobuKristu? (Rom 14:4;
w78-ZU 7/15 9 [w77 714])
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UTHANDO LUBE UPHAWU OLUVELELE OLUBONAKALISA AMAKRISTU EQINISO
(5 imiz.)
Uthando, ‘indlela enhle kakhulu,’ lwalubaluleke ukwedlula izipho zomoya ezikhethekile amaKristu ekhulu lo-
kuqala ayenazo (1Ko 12:31; w79-ZU 3/15 14-15 [w78 9/15 17-18])
Uthando lwedlula ukholo nethemba (1Ko 13:13)
Uthando luhlanganisa wonke uMthetho (Rom 13:9, 10; w90-ZU 11/15 14-15)
UPawulu wakhumbuza amaKristu ukuthi ayekweletana uthando (Rom 13:8; 1Jo 4:11)
Njengoba uthando lubonakalisa ibandla leqiniso, kudingeka sifunde indlela yokusabela ezimweni nasezinkinge-
ni zansuku zonke ngokusebenzisa uthando
Ukuze sikwazi ukwenza lokho, ake sicabangele izibonelo zamaKristu ekhulu lokuqala
AMAKRISTU EKHULU LOKUQALA AYENGEBONA ABANTU ABAPHELELE, KODWA ABONISA UTHA-
NDO 17 imiz.)
Ukungapheleli kwakusobala; ngisho naphakathi kwabaphostoli (it-1 128)
Umona, ukuhaha, nokuntula ukuthobeka kwaziveza izikhathi eziningana (Mat 20:20-28; gt-ZU 62, 98, 113, 115)
Kodwa kungani babenza ngaleyondlela?
Ngenxa yokukuzuza ngefa, abantu bathambekele ekuzicabangeleni ngaphezu kokuba kufanele (Rom 12:3)
Izwe lizama ukuhlakulela umuzwa wokuba mkhulu, ukuba phambili
Abafundi babekhulele enkolweni yobuJuda, eyayigcizelela isikhundla kuzo zonke izimo (gt-ZU 62;
w76-ZU 7/1 298  ̊4 [w75 723  ̊4])
Akufanele simangale ukuthi ngezinye izikhathi abantu abangaphelele bathambekele ekufuneni isikhu-
ndla noma ukuvelela
UPetru, nakuba ayevelele, kwadingeka aqondiswe izikhathi eziningana
Wakhuzwa uJesu ngenxa yokucabanga okushukunyiswa ukungalungi (Mat 16:22, 23)
Waqhosha ngokuba nokholo ayecabanga ukuthi lwedlula olwabanye nangokuthi uphambili kunabanye aba-
phostoli, kodwa-ke waphika uJesu kathathu (Mat 26:33, 34, 69-75; it-2 619)
Wenqaba ukulalela iziyalezo ezazivela kuNkulunkulu futhi waqondiswa (IzE 10:14-16)
Wavumela ukwesaba abantu, wabonisa ubandlululo emaJudeni ayephendukile—nakuba ayesetshenzi-
siwe kwabeZizwe bokuqala abaphendukela ebuKristwini—futhi waqondiswa uPawulu (Gal 2:11-14; w90-ZU
11/1 31; w75-ZU 12/1 548 [w75 345])
UJesu waqhubeka emsebenzisa ngokuvelele uPetru (Joh 21:15-17)
Uthando olujulile lukaPetru nezinye izimfanelo ezinhle kwakukwedlula ukungapheleli kwakhe (1Pe 1:22;
g78-ZU 1/22 17-21 [w77 437-40])
Nakuba uPawulu ayeyisibonelo othandweni nasekuzinikeleni, wayengaphelele
UPawulu noBarnaba, abadala ababevelele, baba ‘nokuqhuma okukhulu kwentukuthelo’ ngendaba encane fu-
thi bahlukana (IzE 15:36-41; w90-ZU 6/15 13-14; w75-ZU 12/1 546 [w75 344])
Uthando lwaqhama naphezu kokungapheleli ebandleni (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 4:8)
Kuzo zonke lezizimo zokungapheleli, uthando lwasibekela “inqwaba yezono,” okwakubonisa ukuthi abafundi
‘babethandana’
AbaseFilipi babonisa uthando loqobo kuPawulu naphezu kokungapheleli kwakhe (Fil 4:15, 16; it-2 631)
Uphawu lweqiniso lothando lwasibekela amaphutha alabo ababevelele, labo ebesingase sibe nomuzwa woku-
thi kwakumelwe benze okungcono

UTHANDO LOBUKRISTU LUSIBEKELA UKUNGAPHELELI (17 imiz.)
AmaKristu eqiniso alingisa uMdali wawo othandweni lwakhe ngesintu
Awalindeli ukuba amaKristu akanye nawo aphelele kuqala ngaphambi kokuba abonise uthando kuwo (Rom
5:8; Efe 5:1, 2)
Kumelwe sibe nombono olinganiselwe ngobudlelwane bethu komunye nomunye
Ngenxa yokungapheleli esikuzuze njengefa, sonke sithambekele ekwenzeni okubi (Rom 5:12)
Ngaphakathi kithi sinokuthambekela kokuba nomhawu, ukucasuka, ukuqhosha, ukungathetheleli, noku-
nye (Jak 3:2)
Nakuba sonke kufanele sisebenze ukuze sinqobe lokho kuthambekela, ukuthambekela okunesono kusa-
zobonakala phakathi kwamaKristu (Shu 7:21, 22; Rom 7:15-20; g89-ZU 8/8 23 [g89 7/22 19])
Ukulindela ukuphelela kubafowethu, noma kithi ngokwethu, kuyinto engekho ngokoqobo futhi kuyoma-
ne kulethe ukudumazeka
Incazelo kaPawulu yothando isibonisa indlela esingasebenzelana ngayo lapho siqaphela ukungapheleli komunye
nomunye (1Ko 13:4, 5; it-2 277-8; w93-ZU 10/15 17-22; w92-ZU 7/15 27-31; w89-ZU 10/15 18-19)
“Uthando luyabekezela, uthando lumnene”
Lukubekezelela ngenjabulo ukungafani kobuntu kanye nemibono ehlukile yabanye, alunalo unya, kodwa
lunomusa, nenhlonipho
“Alucunuki”
Zingase zibonakale zikhona izizathu zokucasuka, kodwa ukungapheleli kwabanye kuyisizathu sokusebenzi-
sa uthando
“Alunagqubu”
Yebo, kungase kube khona “ukulinyazwa [qhathanisa ne-NW],” ngakho hlala ukulungele ukubonisa
uthando
Akulona uthando ukubamba amagqubu noma ukubukeza indlela abathile abaye basona ngayo (w79-ZU
3/15 17 [w78 9/15 20])
Uthando olujulile lusiza amalungu ebandla ukuba asibekele amaphutha enziwa ababonisi, nabo abangaphelele
AmaHeberu 13:17 akhuthaza ukulalela labo abasiqaphile, ngisho nakuba bengaphelele (w89-ZU 9/15 23)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUZUZA INHLIZIYO ENOKUHLAKANIPHA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zihlakulele umbono ongokoqobo ngezinkinga nokucindezela okungase kuphakame ekuphile-
ni. Bonisa indlela yokuzuza ukuhlakanipha kwaphezulu ukuze sibhekane nakho
KUDINGEKA INHLIZIYO ENOKUHLAKANIPHA UKUZE SIBHEKANE NEZINKINGA NOKUCINDEZELA
KOKUPHILA (3 imiz.)
Isintu siphila isikhathi esifushane; iminyaka engu-70 kuya kwengu-80 ‘evame ukuhlupheka’; kunezinkinga ezi-
ningi okumelwe sibhekane nazo (Hu 90:10)
Ngisho naphakathi kwezinceku zikaNkulunkulu, ukukhononda, izinkinga, nokucindezela kuyaphakama
Ukukhononda kwama-Israyeli kuMose kwaphumela enhlekeleleni eMeriba (Num 20:2-13)
AmaKristu ekhulu lokuqala abhekana nobunzima (IzE 11:27-29; Fil 4:2, 3)
Uma sicabangela isimiso esikumShumayeli 7:7, kudingeka sizuze ukuhlakanipha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu
Ukuhlakanipha kuhlanganisa ukuhluzeka kwengqondo nolwazi (w83-ZU 4/15 16 [w82 10/15 22])
Inhliziyo enokuhlakanipha yayingasiza uMose ukuba abhekane nokucasulwa futhi angathukutheli (Funda
iHubo 90:12) (Hu 106:32, 33)
SEKUYISIKHATHI ESIDE IZINCEKU ZIKANKULUNKULU ZIKHUTHAZELELA UKUCINDEZELA KWA-
NGAPHAKATHI (10 imiz.)
Ama-Israyeli akhuthazelela ukubusa kwamakhosi, abapristi, nabahluleli ababi
UDavide “waziphatha ngokuhlakanipha” ngaphansi kweNkosi embi uSawule (1Sa 18:10-15)
USamuweli wakhonza uJehova ngokwethembeka naphezu kwezibonelo ezimbi zika-Eli namadodana akhe (1Sa,
izahl. 2, 3)
AmaKristu ekhulu lokuqala abhekana nezinkinga, kuhlanganise nokuhlukana, “izimpi” “nokulwa” kwangapha-
kathi (Jak 4:1-3; 1Ko 1:10, 11)
IsAmbulo izahluko 2 no-3 ziyisiprofetho sezinkinga zangaphakathi zesikhathi esizayo (w89-ZU 4/1 12-13)
Izinkinga zihlanganisa ukuphelelwa uthando lokuqala ngoJehova (IsAm 2:4), ukubambelela emibonweni eyi-
phutha (IsAm 2:14), ukubekezelela ukwakhiwa kwamahlelo (IsAm 2:15) nethonya ‘likaJezabeli’ (IsAm 2:20),
ukunganaki (IsAm 3:2, 15, 16)
Lezizibonelo zibonisa ukuthi akufanele silindele ukuphelela ezincekwini zikaJehova esikanye nazo kodwa kufa-
nele sizuze inhliziyo enokuhlakanipha ukuze sibhekane nezinkinga nokucindezela okunjalo
INDLELA IZINKINGA EBANDLENI LAMAKRISTU OKUQALA EZASINGATHWA NGAYO NGENHLIZIYO
ENOKUHLAKANIPHA (12 imiz.)
Ukusoka kwakuyimpikiswano phakathi kwalabo ababesenomuzwa wokuthi kwakuyimfuneko (IzE 11:2, 3; 15:1;
w89-ZU 2/15 18-20)
Lendaba yayiswa endikimbeni ebusayo (IzE 15:2)
Kwenziwa isinqumo sazwilinye, esisekelwe eZwini likaNkulunkulu nasebufakazini bokuthululelwa komo-
ya ongcwele kwabangasokiwe (IzE 15:3, 15-18, 25; w90-ZU 6/15 12-13)
Naphezu kwesinqumo sango-49 C.E., kwaqhubeka kuseyimpikiswano kwabanye, ababengenayo inhliziyo eno-
kuhlakanipha (w89-ZU 2/15 18-20)
UPawulu wamelana nokusoka encwadini eyayiya kwabaseGalathiya, eyabhalwa cishe ngo-50-52 C.E. (Gal
5:1-3)
Wayisingatha futhi lendaba encwadini yokuqala eyayiya kwabaseKorinte, cishe ngo-55 C.E. (1Ko 7:18-20)
Ababesekela ukusoka bakhuzwa ngendlela enamandla encwadini eyayiya kwabaseFilipi, cishe ngo-60-
61 C.E. (Fil 3:1-3)
Kungenzeka abanye basuswa ekuhlanganyeleni ukuze kuvikelwe ibandla (Thi 1:10, 11; 3:10, 11)
Uvuko lwabafileyo lwalungenye impikiswano enkulu phakathi kwamaKristu ekhulu lokuqala
AbabengabaFarisi ngaphambili kungenzeka babethambekele embonweni womphefumulo ongafi (it-2 625)
Ngo-55 C.E., abanye babenombono wokuthi uvuko lwabafileyo alukho (1Ko 15:12)
Umphostoli uPawulu wakuphikisa lokhu, esekela izizathu zakhe emaqinisweni nasemiBhalweni (1Ko 15:
3-8; w82-ZU 5/1 16 [w81 12/15 18])
Ngo-65 C.E., abathile ababephambukile okholweni babenombono wokuthi uvuko lwabafileyo lwase ludlulile
(2Ti 2:16-18)
AmaKristu axwayiswa ngokujwayelana nalabo okungenzeka babengakasiguquli ngokugcwele isimo sengqo-
ndo (1Ko 15:33; w93-ZU 8/1 16)
Lapho esingatha lezizinkinga nezinye, uPawulu wabonisa isibindi nenhliziyo enokuhlakanipha

ABANTU ABANINGI BAZIPHATHA NJENGOKUNGATHI UNKULUNKULU UFILE (4 imiz.)

329-30)

9/94UJosefa wathi ukuphinga kuyisono “kuNkulunkulu” (Gen 39:9)

la (1Sa 2:12, 22; 3:11-14)
USedekiya no-Ahabi, abaprofethi bamanga, babephinga ngokuqhubekayo. Isahlulelo sikaJehova: Inkosi yase-
Babiloni ‘yabosa ngomlilo’ (Jer 29:21-23)

AMEHLO KAJEHOVA ABHEKA NABALUNGILE UKUZE ABAYALE, ABASIZE, FUTHI ABABUSISE
(7 imiz.)
Unobhala kaJeremiya, uBaruki, owayeyindoda elungile, waphazanyiswa ukuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo nge-
sikhathi esibucayi emlandweni ka-Israyeli. UNkulunkulu waxwayisa uBaruki: ‘Ungazifuneli izinto ezinkulu.’
(Jer 45:1-5) UJehova wayembhekile ukuze azuze (w80-ZU 9/1 21-3 [w80 3/1 19-21])
UKorneliyu wasizwa uNkulunkulu ngenxa yezinto eziningi ezinhle azenza (IzE 10:2, 4)
Wavuzwa ngelungelo lokuba oweZizwe wokuqala ongasokile ozelwe ngomoya (IzE 10:44-48)
Ngisho nezinto ezincane ezinhle esizenzayo abantu abangase bangaziqapheli uNkulunkulu uyaziqaphela
Naphezu kwesijeziso sakhe esinzima phezu kwendlu kaJerobowamu, uJehova wangcwaba enye yamadodana
kaJerobowanu ngoba ‘kwafunyanwa kuyo okuhle kuJehova uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli’ (1Kh 14:1-18)
Umnikelo omncane womfelokazi ompofu waqashelwa (Luk 21:1-4)
UJehova uyazikhumbula izenzo zomusa (Mat 26:6-13)
INGABE UYOZUZA NGOKWAZI UKUTHI AMEHLO KAJEHOVA AYAKUBONA? (5 imiz.)
Lapho uJehova ekuyala futhi ekusiza ngenhlangano noma abadala, uyakwazisa yini ukuqapha kwakhe kotha-
ndo?
Ukuqaphela ukuthi uJehova uphambi kwethu futhi usibhekile ngaso sonke isikhathi kuyosisiza ukuba sigweme
ukwenza okubi futhi siphile njengokungathi siphambi kwakhe (Hu 16:8; w85-ZU 9/1 5)
Kufanele sifundise nabantwana bethu ukuba baqaphele ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyayiqaphela yonke imisebenzi ye-
thu (Hu 11:4)
Uma senza okungalungile, uNkulunkulu uyakubona futhi uyokudalula (IzA 24:12)
Uma senza okulungile, sithola izibusiso zaphezulu futhi sihlanganyele ekusekeleni uhlangothi lukaNkulunkulu
lwempikiswano manje ephambi kwendawo yonke (Hu 18:20; Heb 6:10)
Ngaphezu kwakho konke, uthando lwethu ngoJehova kufanele lusenze sifune ukwenza okulungile ukuze ame-
hlo kaJehova abone okuhle kithi
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 74-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UYABUQAPHELA UBUKHOSI
BUKAJEHOVA EKUPHILENI KWAKHO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Chaza isizathu sokuba uJehova abe uMbusi ofanele, indlela abusa ngayo ngothando, nezinzuzo umuntu azithola-
yo ngokuzithoba ebukhosini baKhe
UJEHOVA UNGUMBUSI OFANELE WENDAWO YONKE (5 imiz.)
Ukubusa kwakhe kuphakeme futhi unguMthombo oyinhloko walo lonke igunya namandla (Hu 145:13; it-2 1008)
Yonke indalo incike kuye njengoMdali noNkulunkulu owukuphela kwakhe weqiniso (IzE 17:28; IsAm 4:11)
Nguye kuphela ongadalwanga, ongenaso isiqalo nesiphetho (Job 36:26; IsAm 10:6)
Isikhundla sikaJehova njengeNkosi enguMbusi noMninimandla-onke kufanele siqashelwe (1Kr 29:11; IsAm 15:3)
INDLELA UBUKHOSI BUKAJEHOVA OBABEKELWA NGAYO INSELELE (8 imiz.)
Ubukhosi bukaJehova babulokhu bungabekelwe nselele kwaze kwaba ngemva kokudalwa kwendoda nowesifa-
zane
Kwakungalesosikhathi lapho isidalwa sikaNkulunkulu somoya sabona ithuba lokuhlasela ubukhosi bukaNku-
lunkulu futhi sazama ukuncintisana naye ngobukhosi
Ensimini yase-Edene, uJehova wayebusa ngothando
Wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso waKhe, ukuze abonise izimfanelo nobuntu baKhe (1Ko 11:7)
Wanikeza umuntu isabelo esivumelana nekhono lakhe (Gen 1:26-28)
Umuntu wayeyokujabulela ukwenza izinto nokuphila ngokuvumelana nentando kaNkulunkulu (Hu 128:1;
144:15b)
Into eyodwa ayenqatshelwe yona yayivivinya ukuzithoba kwakhe ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu, u-Adamu aye-
yokubonisa ngokugwema ukudla “umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi” (Gen 2:16, 17; it-2 1011)
Loluvivinyo lwalucabangela; u-Adamu wayengabhekwa njengonezisusa ezimbi, ezingafanele; wayengacinde-
zelwa
UNkulunkulu kuphela onelungelo lokunquma okuhle nokubi nendima okufanele ifezwe indalo yakhe (Isa
29:16)
USathane wabekela ubukhosi bukaJehova obufanele inselele (Gen 3:1-5)
Iqiniso lokuthi uNkulunkulu uphakeme futhi unobukhosi alizange libekelwe inselele, ngoba akekho ongame-
phuca igunya lakhe eliphakeme namandla
Inselele yabekwa ngokuqondene nokufaneleka nokulunga kobukhosi bukaJehova, ukuthi babusetshenziswa
ngendlela efanele newusizo yini ezikhonzini
Wakuphikisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu unelungelo lokunquma okuhle nokubi
Wahlasela ukuba neqiniso nobuhle bukaNkulunkulu, ethi, “uNkulunkulu uyazi”
Eqamba amanga wagomela ngokuthi umphumela wokudla isithelo esenqatshelwe wawuyoba ukukhanyiselwa,
hhayi ukufa
Wanyundela nezinceku zikaNkulunkulu ngokuqondene nobuqotho bazo ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu (Job
2:3-5)
KUNGANI UNKULUNKULU EYE WATHATHA ISIKHATHI ESIDE UKUXAZULULA LEMPIKISWANO
(10 imiz.)
UJehova akakungabazi ukulunga kobukhosi bakhe, futhi akudingekile ukuba aziqinisekise
USathane akazange abekele amandla kaNkulunkulu inselele, okwakuyobonakala ngokuthi abhujiswe ngoku-
shesha
Wayethembe ubuqotho bukaNkulunkulu, ecabanga ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayeyophoqeleka ukuba amvu-
mele aphile uma ekufakazela ukusola kwakhe ngokuqondene nokungathembeki kwezidalwa zikaNkulu-
nkulu
Impikiswano yokuziphatha yayihilelekile
UNkulunkulu unikeza isintu ithuba nelungelo lokubonakalisa uDeveli engumqambimanga nelokususa ukunyu-
ndelwa kwegama likaNkulunkulu nelaso
Ngokuvumela uSathane ukuba asebenzise zonke izindlela ukuze afakazele ukuphikisa kwakhe, uNkulunkulu
waqinisekisa ukuthi lempikiswano yayiyoxazululwa phakade
Ngokumelana nobubi, labo abavuma ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu futhi bamkhonze ngokwethembeka bangabo-
nakalisa ukuthi ukumangalela kukaSathane kungamanga (IzA 27:11)
Ukubekezela kukaNkulunkulu kunikeza izoni ithuba lokushiya inkambo engalungile, zizithobe ngokuzitha-
ndela ekubuseni kukaNkulunkulu kokulunga, futhi zifakazele uthando nokuzinikela kwazo kuNkulunkulu
(Rom 9:22-26; 2Pe 3:9; rs-ZU 230)
Lempikiswano yahlanganisa nezidalwa zikaNkulunkulu zasezulwini, ngisho neNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa,
eyayimjabulisa njalo uYise
No. 75-ZU
9/07Lapho uJesu ethunyelwa esabelweni emhlabeni, wabonakalisa ngendlela ephelele ukuthi uDeveli ungumqa-
mbimanga (Joh 14:30; 16:33; it-2 1012)
Ekugcineni uyophelisa bonke ohulumeni, amagunya nemibuso emelene nobukhosi bukaJehova (1Ko 15:
24-28)
INDLELA NGABANYE ESINGABONISA NGAYO UKUTHI SIYABUQAPHELA UBUKHOSI BUKANKULU-
NKULU (17 imiz.)
Tadisha ngenkuthalo iZwi likaNkulunkulu, iBhayibheli, futhi ufune ukwenza intando yakhe kanye namanye
amaKristu eqiniso (Zef 2:2, 3)
Gwema ukugabadela nomoya wokuzibusa (it-2 681)
Makube uNkulunkulu onqumayo ukuthi yini enhle nembi ngathi; gwema ukuzibekela izindinganiso zakho
Basha, melanani nokufuna ukukhululeka egunyeni labazali noma abanye abasegunyeni (Efe 6:1-3)
Bafazi, melanani nokufuna ukukhululeka egunyeni lamadoda; bonisani inhlonipho, ukubambisana (Efe 5:
22, 23; fl-ZU 54-69)
Madoda, landelani iseluleko seBhayibheli esikweyabase-Efesu 5:25 nakweyoku-1 Petru 3:7 (fl-ZU 40-53)
Bonisa inhlonipho ngezinceku zikaJehova ezimisiwe, kuhlanganise ‘nesigqila esikholekileyo nesiqondayo’ na-
badala ebandleni (Mat 24:45)
[Qhathanisa amaHeberu 13:7, 17 nokulandisa okukuNumeri 12; gcizelela ukuthi uMose wayeyinceku ka-
Nkulunkulu]
Gwema ithonya lezwe elibuswa uSathane (Efe 2:2, 3)
Xwaya izici eziphawula umoya wezwe (rs-ZU 374-7)
Hlakulela izisusa eziqondile ukuze ulalele uJehova ngazo zonke izikhathi
Landela izibonelo zoNowa, uSara, uMose, uJosefa, uJobe (wt-ZU 54-7)
Ngisho noma siyizoni futhi singenakwenza ngendlela ephelele, kumelwe sifise ukuncika kuNkulunkulu futhi
senze izinqumo ezivumelana nentando yakhe
Siyowalalela yini amazwi kaNkulunkulu nesibonelo sikaJesu? (IzA 3:5; 1Pe 2:21)
IZIBUSISO ZESIKHATHI ESIZAYO ZALABO ABAQAPHELA UBUKHOSI BUKAJEHOVA (5 imiz.)
Manje isikhathi sokuma ngasohlangothini lobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu (w91-ZU 3/1 7)
Labo abenza kanjalo ngenxa yothando nokwazisa ngoJehova nesifiso sokumkhonza bayokhululwa ‘njengaba-
ntwana bakaNkulunkulu’ (Rom 8:21, 22; w87-ZU 1/1 24, 26, 28)
Inkonzo esimenzela yona ayiwona umthwalo (1Jo 5:3)
Labo abafakazela ukuthi bafuna ukuncika kuJehova bayokwakha ingxenye eyinhloko ‘yomhlaba omusha’ (2Pe
3:13; sl 324-5)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyosusa wonke umonakalo owenziwe uSathane (Dan 2:44)
Ngaphansi kokunakekela kukaNkulunkulu, ngisho nezinkumbulo ezibuhlungu ziyosuswa (Isa 14:7; 65:17, 18;
dg-ZU 27-8)
 ́
Ukuphila okuphakade kunqunywa ukuthi sihlala sincik e kuJehova yini noma cha (IsAm 20:12, 15)

All Rights ReservedINGABE IZIMISO ZEBHAYIBHELI ZINGASISIZA
EKUBHEKANENI NEZINKINGA ZANAMUHLA?
KUNGANI KUFANELE SISEBENZISE IZIMISO ZEBHAYIBHELI? (4 imiz.)
Namuhla, kunentilibathwa yezeluleko cishe nganoma yini ongayicabanga (Kol 2:8; w09 6/1 3-4)
Iseluleko sikabani esingasethemba ekubhekaneni nezinkinga zanamuhla?
IBhayibheli linezimiso ezingaphelelwa isikhathi ezizedlula kude zonke ezikhona ezweni (IzA 19:20)
Ake sicabangele indlela izimiso zeBhayibheli ezingasisiza ngayo ekubhekaneni nezinkinga ezine ezivamile
INDLELA YOKUXAZULULA IZINGXABANO (5 imiz.)
Abaningi namuhla bazwiswa ubuhlungu abantu abakhuluma ngokungacabangi nabanobugovu (2Thim 3:1-3)
Abanye bangase bathambekele ekuvukeleni noma ekuziphindiseleni
Abanye banamathela kulesi simiso: “Lokho ongafuni kwenziwe kuwe, ungakwenzi kwabanye” (w04 6/1 32)
Izimo zengqondo ezinjalo azibulethanga ubuhlobo obunokuthula nabanye
Kunokuba amane afundise abantu ukuba bangenzi okubi kwabanye, uJesu washo isimiso esisithola kuMathewu
7:12 [Funda]
Ukusebenzisa lesi simiso kusho ukuphatha abanye ngenhlonipho, ngokungenzeleli nangokwethembeka, uku-
yikhathalela ngobuqotho inhlalakahle yabanye
UJesu wanikeza iseluleko esihle kakhulu sendlela yokuphishekela ukuthula (Math 5:23-25)
Ukuphishekela ukuthula kusenza sibe nomoya ozolile futhi kusisiza ukuba sibe nobuhlobo obujabulisayo na-
banye (Ro 12:18; w09 10/15 9 izig. 7-9)
INDLELA YOKUTHOLA INJABULO (5 imiz.)
Umbono othandwayo uwukufuna injabulo ngokuphishekela izinto ezibonakalayo, udumo noma ezinye izindlela
zobugovu (Efe 2:2, 3; g 4/06 6)
Ukuphishekela izinto ezinjalo akuyiqinisekisi injabulo (Luka 12:15)
UJesu wafundisa abalandeli bakhe ukuthi injabulo yeqiniso itholakala ngokupha [Funda IzEnzo 20:35]
Labo abapha ngesandla esivulekile empeleni bayachuma (IzA 11:25)
Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukupha abanye isikhathi namandla ethu (IzA 19:17)
Ukupha ngesandla esivulekile kwakha imishado eqinile nemikhaya ejabulayo (Fil 2:3, 4)
Ngokuphana ngathi ngokwethu, siyakwazi ukududuza abashonelwe, abagulayo, asebekhullile nabacindezele-
kile (1Thes 5:14)
Singathola injabulo yangempela ngokubonisa umoya wokupha, sazi ukuthi “uNkulunkulu ujatshuliswa
yimihlatshelo enjalo” (Heb 13:16)
INDLELA YOKUBHEKANA NEZINKINGA ZEZOMNOTHO (5 imiz.)
Umoya wezwe ukhuthaza ‘isifiso samehlo,’ isifiso esinganeliseki neze (1Joh 2:16; IzA 27:20)
Impumelelo ivame ukulinganiswa ngezinto ezibonakalayo umuntu anazo, kodwa ukuzimisela ukuceba kuho-
lela encithakalweni (1Thim 6:9, 10)
IBhayibheli linikeza iseluleko esihlakaniphile ngezinto ezibonakalayo [Funda 1Thim 6:8]
Ukwaneliseka kuhilela ukuphila ngemali onayo nokugcina ‘iso lakho lilihle’ (Math 6:22; IzA 22:7)
Ukulalela lesi seluleko esiphefumulelwe kuyosisiza sigweme ukungena ezikweletini ezinkulu, ezibangela
ukukhathazeka nokungalondeki (w03 12/15 23 isig. 17)
Ukwaneliseka kusisiza ukuba sigxile ezintweni ezibaluleke kakhulu, ezinjengokuhlakulela ubuhlobo obuhle
noNkulunkulu nokuba nokuphila komkhaya okujabulisayo nokulondekile (Fil 1:10; 1Thim 6:17-19)
INDLELA YOKUNCIPHISA UKUKHATHAZEKA (5 imiz.)
Ukukhathazeka kungabangelwa ukuba nexhala ngomkhaya, impilo noma imali
Izincwadi ezibonisa izindlela zokuzenzela izinto zingaba namacebiso amahle, kodwa zinganikeza nezeluleko
 ́
eziyingozi ezingaholela ekudumazekeni nasezinkingeni ezingath ı sina
EyabaseFilipi 4:6, 7 iqukethe ukuhlakanipha okuwusizo [Funda]
Umthandazo usilethela “ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu okudlula konke ukucabanga”
Singaqiniseka ukuthi uJehova uyazazi izidingo zethu futhi uyozinakekela
Singagwema noma siqede ukukhathazeka okuningi lapho senza ngokuvumelana nemithandazo yethu (Jak
1:5)
Ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu elizayo, zonke izinkinga ezibangela ukukhathazeka ngeke ziphinde zibe khona
(2Pet 3:11-13)
SIYINI ISIHLUTHULELO SOKUBHEKANA NEZINKINGA ZANAMUHLA NGOKUPHUMELELAYO? (6 imiz.)
IBhayibheli linezeluleko eziwusizo zokubhekana nezinkinga zethu (Heb 5:14; w05 10/1 13; w02 2/15 6, ibhokisi)
Izimiso zeBhayibheli ziyasebenza njalo lapho zisetshenziswa
No. 76-ZU
8/10Ukusebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli kusilethela injabulo manje futhi kusisiza ukuba senze izinqumo ezihlaka-
niphile ezithinta ikusasa (IHu 128:1, 2; Isaya 48:17, 18)
Phawula ezinye zezimiso zeBhayibheli eziwusizo esingazisebenzisa kulezi zici:
Izinkinga zempilo (IzA 14:15, 30)
Izinkinga zemali (Math 6:31, 32)
Izinkinga zomshado (Kol 3:14)
Inzondo yobuzwe nobuhlanga (IzE 10:34, 35)
Abangane abayingozi (IzA 13:20)
Izinkinga zomsebenzi (IHu 37:25)
Siyajabula ukubona abantu abasha abathakazelayo phakathi kwethu
Sicela nikhulume nomunye woFakazi BakaJehova ukuze kwenziwe amalungiselelo okuba nifunde okwenge-
ziwe ngendlela yokuqonda lezi zimiso futhi nizisebenzise ekuphileni kwenu
Ngempela, ukusebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli eziwusizo kuyinkambo yokuhlakanipha manje futhi kuyonenza
nithole izibusiso zaphakade (IHu 19:7)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedLANDELA INKAMBO YOKUNGENISA IZIHAMBI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Qokomisa indlela okungaboniswa ngayo ukungenisa izihambi nemivuzo yokukwenza. Veza ukuthi umoya woku-
ngenisa izihambi ukubonakalisa kanjani ukupha kukaJehova
UKUNGENISA IZIHAMBI KUYADINGEKA NAMUHLA (8 imiz.)
Incazelo eyisisekelo yokungenisa izihambi: “Ukwamukela nokujabulisa izivakashi noma abafokazi ngomoya omu-
hle nowokupha”
Igama lesiGreki ngokwezwi nezwi lisho “ukuthanda (noma ukubonisa umusa) abafokazi” (it-1 1149)
Singase sizizwe singakhululekile lapho siphakathi kwabantu esingabazi. Kodwa “ukungenisa izihambi kunqo-
ba ukungakhululeki kwenze nomfokazi abe umngane” (Theological Dictionary of the New Testament)
Emasikweni amaningi abantu bafundiswa beseyizingane ukuba bangenise izihambi
IBhayibheli labikezela ukuthi lemfanelo iyophela osukwini lwethu (2Ti 3:1-5; Mat 24:12)
Ngokudabukisayo, ukungenisa izihambi kuyaphela namuhla emazweni amaningi (g78-ZU 11/22 3-6 [g78 5/22
9-12])
Nokho, amaKristu ayalwa ukuba ‘alandele inkambo yokungenisa izihambi’ (Rom 12:13)
Kuwumsebenzi obonisa ukholo, ikakhulukazi uma kwenzelwa esikholwa nabo (Gal 6:10; 3Jo 5)
Kuyimfuneko kubadala abangamaKristu (1Ti 3:2; Thi 1:8)
NgokweBhayibheli, isimo sengqondo sokungazingenisi izihambi sibonisa ukuba nenkinga engokomoya futhi si-
hlangene nokwamukeleka kokukhulekela komuntu (Isa 58:6, 7; it-1 1150)
Izenzo ezilula zokungenisa izihambi zithinta ukuphila
Owesifazane osekhulile uthi: “Anginazo nhlobo izihlobo zegazi. . . . Ngizinakekela mina futhi angisizwa mu-
ntu, futhi ngikholwe, ziningi izikhathi engiludinga ngazo usizo. . . . Ukukhathalelwa, kungakhathaliseki uku-
thi kuncane kangakanani, kungithinta kakhulu. Ngikwazisa ngokuthobeka” (g79-ZU 10/22 3 [w79 5/1 3]; bhe-
ka ne-w88-ZU 2/1 30)
Singawubonisa kanjani umoya wokungenisa izihambi?
INDLELA ABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU ABAKULINGISE NGAYO UKUPHA KUKAJEHOVA KUWO WO-
NKE UMLANDO (15 imiz.)
UJehova usibekela isibonelo ngokubusisa amadoda nabesifazane ngokucebile nangokubanikeza izinto ezinhle ezi-
yinsada (1Jo 5:14, 15)
UJesu wayilingisa ngokuphelele indlela kaJehova yothando, yokupha ngokuba nesithakazelo kwabampofu; wa-
bonisa ukuthi uyapha ngokusebenzisa amandla akhe ukuze kuzuze abanye (Mat 14:14-21; ungacaphuna nezi-
nye izibonelo)
Nakuba nabanye abantu bawubonisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi, izinceku zikaJehova ziyaphawuleka kulo-
khu (it-1 1149-50)
Ukunakekela izihambi kwakuyingxenye yokuphila ebalulekile kubantu bakwa-Israyeli wasendulo
Babezamukela ngemfudumalo izivakashi, bazikhuthaze ukuba zihlale (Gen 18:2, 5-7; Hlu 13:15)
Babegijima bayozihlangabeza ngentshiseko (Gen 29:13, 14)
Owesifazane waseShunemi wanakekela izidingo zika-Elisha ngesikhathi emvakashele (2Kh 4:8-11)
Nakuba izimo zokuphila nezimo zengqondo zase zishintshile kwezasendulo, ukungenisa izihambi kwakusava-
mile kumaKristu ekhulu lokuqala
Abafundi bakhuthazwa ukuba bakwamukele ukungeniswa yilabo ababesabele kahle emsebenzini wokushu-
mayela ngoMbuso (Luk 9:3-6)
Umoya wokungenisa izihambi waboniswa nakuJesu, owayengenakhaya (Mat 8:20; Luk 10:38)
UPawulu wayeqiniseka ngokuthi uFilemoni wayeyozingenisa izihambi, ngoba kwakuyindlela yakhe yoku-
phila (Flm 21, 22)
UGayu watuswa ngokubonisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi kubazalwane abajikelezayo (3Jo 5-8; w88-ZU
10/1 18-19)
AmaKristu akuqala ayizibonelo ezivelele zabantu ababonisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi (IzE 2:42-
46; 16:15; w86-ZU 12/1 29)
AMATHUBA OKUNGENISA IZIHAMBI NAMUHLA (17 imiz.)
Qaphela izidingo ezingokwenyama nezingokomoya zabantu okholwa nabo (w86-ZU 1/15 21-3)
Yenza noma yini esemandleni akho nonekhono lokuyenza (IzA 3:27)
Ungakhethi labo okungenzeka ukuthi badla izambane likapondo (Luk 14:13, 14)
Khumbula labo abadla imbuya ngothi—abampofu, asebekhulile, abanamahloni, abasha
Akudingeki wenze isiphihli sedili
UJesu weluleka uMarta ukuba akhathalele okungokomoya angaphazanyiswa kakhulu ukulungisa izibilibo-
co (Luk 10:38-42)
No. 77-ZU
9/94Lapho izimpi, izinhlekelele zemvelo, ukushushiswa, ukugula, noma ezinye izinkathazo ezicindezelayo zenza
amaKristu esikanye nawo antule, sizizwa sinesifiso sokusiza, sibaduduze ngempela—hhayi nje ngamazwi
enduduzo kuphela (Jak 2:15, 16; w86-ZU 10/15 15-21; w91-ZU 7/15 19; ungase ubhekisele nakokuhlangenwe
nakho kwamuva okuku-Yearbook)
Bonisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi kubabonisi abahambele noma abajikelezayo (w88-ZU 10/1 18-19)
UPawulu weluleka ukuba ‘sanuleke’ “othandweni olunesisa” kwesikholwa nabo (2Ko 6:12, 13)
Gwema ukudlelana nabantu abathile abambalwa
Yiba nesikhathi sokwazi abafowenu ukuze wazi izidingo zabo
Sebenza nabasanda kuhlanganyela ensimini; bafundise ubakhuthaze
Abanye bamemele isidlo, iziphuzo, nokuhlangana; ungabelana izinto nabanye, ubaphe noma ubathume-
lele izipho ngezinye izikhathi (IzE 16:15; Flm 4:15-17)
Wonke umuntu unomthwalo wemfanelo wokwakha umoya ofudumele ebandleni, abadala behola kulokhu
(1Ti 3:2; w86-ZU 10/15 16-18)
Ukubacabangela ngokukhethekile abafowethu kungokomBhalo (Gal 6:10)
Ngesikhathi usathuthukisa lemfanelo, funda futhi ukuwamukela ngokwazisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi
UPawulu wayezazisa izipho ayephiwa zona, kodwa akazange asizakale ngabazalwane (2Ko 11:7-9; w92-ZU 12/1
28-9)
Kudingeka uqaphele i-simony, ukwamukela izipho ukuze unikeze othile amalungelo (w86-ZU 8/15 15-16)
Ngokuvumelana nesimiso esikumaHubo 15:4b, akufanele sisichithe isimemo ngoba nje sekuvele okuthile oku-
ngcono
Kufanele siqaphele izidingo zalabo esingakholwa nabo
UJesu wabeka isibonelo sokumema abafundi ngothando ukuba ‘bamlandele’ enkonzweni yakhe (Joh 12:26) na-
noma yibaphi abanye ukuba beze kuye bathole ukuqabuleka okungokomoya (Mat 11:28-30; w89-ZU 7/15 17-19)
Ukuthanda “abafokazi” kuhlanganisa nomakhelwane bethu esibashumayezayo
Ukuzimisela ukuhlangana ‘nomfokazi’ emsebenzini wendlu ngendlu kuyindlela esibonisa ngayo ukuthi si-
yapha
NjengoJesu, sibamema ukuba bazohlanganyela nathi ukuphila okujabulisayo, sibalungiselele izidingo zabo
ezingokomoya, sibakhathalele futhi sibanakekele
Ukusiza abasanda kuhlanganyela abavakashela eHholo LoMbuso ukuba bazizwe bekhululekile ngokubabi-
ngelela, kubonisa ukuthi siyabakhathalela futhi siyabanakekela
Owesifazane othile wathi: “Angikaze ngiye kunoma yimuphi umbuthano ongokwenkolo engazizwa nga-
mukeleke kangaka kuwo.” Wachaza ukucabangela akuboniswa “abafokazi angabazi nhlobo” (km-ZU
3/78 4; noma ezinye izibonelo eziveza ukubaluleka kokubonisa umoya wokungenisa izihambi emihlanga-
nweni yethu, ezinjenge-w89-ZU 11/1 30; w88-ZU 6/1 6-7; bheka i-Index ngaphansi kwesithi “Kingdom
Halls,” isihlokwana esithi “experiences”)
‘SINGAKHOHLWA UKUNGENISA IZIHAMBI’ (5 imiz.)
Ukungenisa izihambi kuphumela ezibusisweni kubo bonke abahilelekile (IzA 11:25)
Umoya wokungenisa izihambi esiwubonisayo uxhomeke ekutheni sibathanda kangakanani abanye. UPawulu wa-
siyala sonke ukuba ‘lume njalo uthando lobuzalwane’ wayesesikhumbuza ukuba ‘singakhohlwa ukungenisa izi-
hambi’ (Heb 13:1, 2; w89-ZU 12/15 17)
Kwazibani, kungenzeka ukuthi ubungaza umuntu othandwa uJehova
Kufanele singenise izihambi ngenxa yothando olujulile esinalo ngoJehova nabantu esiphila nabo—siyibonise
kubo bonke lemfanelo, sishumayeze omakhelwane bethu, sinakekele ikakhulukazi labo esikholwa nabo
“Landela inkambo yokungenisa izihambi” (Rom 12:13)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 77-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KHONZA UJEHOVA NGENHLIZIYO EJABULAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Veza ukuthi injabulo ebangelwa ukwazi uNkulunkulu ingalusibekela kanjani uvivinyo futhi isisize ukuba sibe no-
mbono wokuhle. Khumbula ukuthi kungenzeka ukuba abanye ezilalelini basovivinyweni. Gwema izinkulumo zo-
kugxeka. Yiba ngonobubele nokhuthazayo
UJEHOVA UFUNA IZINCEKU ZAKHE ZIJABULE (5 imiz.)
UJehova “unguNkulunkulu ojabulayo” (1Ti 1:11)
Ufuna izinceku zakhe zijabule (Flm 4:4)
Akusho ukuthi abantu bakhe bayohlale bejabulile kodwa kusho ukuthi nasezimweni ezimbi kanjani, banga-
yithola injabulo ngokukhonza uJehova
Injabulo iyisithelo somoya kaNkulunkulu (Gal 5:22, 23; 1Th 1:6)
Umuntu onomoya kaNkulunkulu angajabula
Injabulo etholakala ngokuba nempilo enhle, ngokuba musha, nasezinjabulweni, nasemalini nakwezinye izinto
ezibonakalayo ingahlala isikhashana
USolomoni akayitholanga injabulo ehlala njalo kulezizinto (Shu 2:1, 2, 4-8, 11)
Ngokuphambene nalokho, ukuba umngane kaNkulunkulu kuwumthombo wenjabulo ehlala njalo (Hu 64:10)
UKUKHONZA UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU KUWUMTHOMBO WENJABULO (8 imiz.)
Fundani iHubo 100 bese nixoxa ngalo
IHubo 100:1, 2
Ukuhlokoma ngezwi lokuhalalisa kubonisa ukuthi ukudumisa kwethu akufanele kube lula kodwa kufane-
le kube nomfutho, siqiniseke njengabebutho elinqobayo
Izwe silinqoba ngokulalela imiyalo kaNkulunkulu (1Jo 5:3-5)
Ukwenza kanjalo kuletha injabulo
Inkonzo kaNkulunkulu kufanele siyibheke njengesinika amandla nesiqabulayo, hhayi ewumthwalo
Yenza ukuphila kube nenjongo, yenze umuntu akwazi ukubhekana nezinkinga, nokucindezela kokuphila
IHubo 100:3
Injabulo siyithola ngokumazi njengomuntu, njengoNkulunkulu noMdali
UJehova unjengomalusi onothando onakekela izimvu zakhe
IHubo 100:4, 5
Izimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu (ubuhle, umusa, ukwethembeka) zisenza sifune ukumbonga nokumdumisa
UJehova akanabo nobuncane ububi futhi singathembela kuye kuze kube phakade
Siyakujabulela ukuya emasangweni nasemagcekeni akhe (okuhlanganisa nokuya endaweni yakhe yoku-
khulekela)
Kuyilungelo kithi ukuba abe uNkulunkulu wethu; kuletha injabulo
OKUHLANGENWE NAKHO KUBONISA UKUTHI SINGAMKHONZA UNKULUNKULU NGENJABULO NA-

Abafowethu base-Ukraine (w91-ZU 1/1 13-14)

(Ukuze uthole okunye okuhlangenwe nakho bheka ama-Index amuva ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi “Field Min-
istry Experiences”)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA ABANYE BALAHLEKELWE INJABULO ABANAYO (15 imiz.)
Abanye balahlekelwa injabulo ngoba umphakathi awusinaki isigijimi esisishumayelayo
Kungokwemvelo ukufuna ukulalelwa kahle, kodwa kudingeka sibe nombono ofanele ngezinto
Njengoba isiphelo sisondela kufanele silindele ukuthi lizokwanda inani labangasilaleli (Isa 6:9-11)
Ukuzindla ngezizathu zokushumayela kwethu kungasisiza silondoloze injabulo
Simemezela izindaba ezinhle ukuze sinikeze ubufakazi (Mat 24:14)
Ukuze senze igama likaJehova laziwe (Rom 10:13-15)
Ukuze sinikeze isixwayiso (Hez 3:17, 19)
Kudingeka sikhumbule ukuthi ezinye izimbewu zeqiniso ziyothela ngemva kwesikhathi esithile (Shu 11:6;
w88-ZU 7/15 13)
Siyovuna uma singakhathali emsebenzini wokushumayela (Gal 6:9)

Uvivinyo lungolwesikhashana (1Ko 10:13)
Izinto ezibonakalayo aziyilethi injabulo (Luk 12:15)

Ukuba nesimo sengqondo esifanele ngezinto ezibonakalayo kuletha ukwaneliseka (1Ti 6:6-12)
YENZA INJABULO ISIBEKELE IZINKINGA (3 imiz.)

dala
