No. 78-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBUNGANE NONKULUNKULU, UBUNGANE NEZWE
—UYOKHETHANI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Njengoba ukhumbula ukuthi lena inkulumo yeningi, ngokuhlakanipha bonisa isizathu nendlela umKristu weqi-
niso okufanele agweme ngayo ukuthanda lelizwe noma ukuhlakulela ubungane nalo. Qokomisa izibusiso ezihla-
la njalo zokuba nobungane noNkulunkulu
UTHANDO NOBUNGANE IZIDINGO ZOMUNTU EZIYISISEKELO (4 imiz.)
UMdali wasibumba ngendlela yokuba sidinge futhi sijabulele uthando nobungane (g86-ZU 10/8 25-8 [g86 9/22 4-7])
Lapho lesisidingo singagcwaliswa, asijabuli (g83-ZU 10/8 30 [g83 4/22 31])
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sizakhele abangane abanothando (IzA 17:17; Shu 4:9)
Nokho, iBhayibheli libeka umngcele ngokuqondene nolunye uhlobo lothando nobungane
UJakobe 4:4 usixwayisa ngokuqinile ngokumelene ‘nokuthanda izwe’
Eyoku-1 Johane 2:15 isitshela ukuba ‘singathandi izwe’
Kusho ukuthini lokhu? Kungase kubonakale kudida, ikakhulukazi ngenxa yeqiniso lokuthi bobabili uJehova no-
Jesu bayasithanda isintu (IzA 8:31; Joh 3:16)
LIYINI “IZWE”? (10 imiz.)
Incazelo yegama lesiGreki elithi kosmos, elihunyushwe ngokuthi “izwe,” iyahlukahluka kuye ngomongo (it-2
1205-7, 1209-10)
Ngezinye izikhathi ibhekisela esintwini sisonke: izigidigidi zabantu uJehova afuna zisindiswe (2Pe 3:9)
Leli ‘yizwe’ okubhekiselwe kulo kuJohane 3:16 no-6:51
Kodwa elithi kosmos lingase futhi libhekisele emphakathini wesintu ongazihlanganisi izinceku zikaJehova
ezithembekile futhi owahlukanisiwe noJehova uNkulunkulu, noma lingase lisho isimiso, uhlelo, noma ingxe-
nye yokuphila komuntu
“Izwe” lomphakathi wesintu owahlukanisiwe libuswa uSathane (1Jo 5:19)
Lihlanganisa izingxenye ezihlukahlukene: inkolo yamanga (IsAm 17:5); ohulumeni bezombangazwe (IsAm 13:
1, 2); isimiso sezentengiselwano (IsAm 18:11)
USathane usebenzisa ingxenye ngayinye ukuze adukise abantu, abaphuphuthekise izingqondo bangasiboni isi-
dingo sabo esikhulu: ukuhlakulela uthando nobungane noJehova uNkulunkulu (Mar 12:29, 30; 2Ko 4:4; IsAm
12:9, 10)
Ngenxa yalokho, iseluleko nezindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu kuyenqatshwa emhlabeni kabanzi (2Ti 4:3-5)
Ukuziphatha okubi nokuphila okuxekethile kuyamukelwa futhi kuyakhuthazwa (Efe 2:1-3; 4:17-19)
Khona-ke, akumangalisi ukuthi uJehova usitshela ukuthi singalithandi lelizwe futhi singenzi ubungane nalo!
Kodwa singasilalela kanjani lesisixwayiso?
SINGABUGWEMA KANJANI UBUNGANE NEZWE? (16 imiz.)
Yiqiniso, lokhu asinakukwenza ngokuzehlukanisa, ukuziphakamisa
NjengoJehova noJesu, siyabathanda abantu futhi sibabheka njengabayoba yizimvu esizikweleta ubufakazi
obungcono kakhulu esingabunikeza (1Ko 9:19-23)
Lokhu ngokuvamile kuhilela ukwenza izenzo zomusa nokusiza omakhelwane (Luk 10:30-37; Jak 2:8; w92-ZU
2/15 18,  ̊20)
Ukuthobeka, hhayi ukuqhosha, kuwuphawu lobuKristu beqiniso (Jak 4:6)
Ukuthanda izwe noma ukufuna ubungane nalo ngendlela engamjabulisi uNkulunkulu kusho ukuhlanganyela ezi-
fisweni zezwe, ukwamukela isifiso salo sokuvelela, ukubonakalisa ubandlululo nenzondo yalo, ukuba nesimo se-
ngqondo sokulawula esigcwele emphakathini walo owonakele
Gwema ubungane nezwe ngokwenqaba “umoya wezwe” (1Ko 2:12)
UDeveli usebenzisa lomoya ukuze enze izwe likhange, athonye izingqondo nezinhliziyo zethu ngobuqili
Ingabe uyazithanda izinto zalelizwe? Ziyakujabulisa yini izinto ezibonisa ukuntula kwalo ngokuphelele “umu-
zwa wokuziphatha okuhle”? (Efe 4:19; g92-ZU 11/8 4-10)
Lokho kuzijabulisa kokuziphatha okubi kungakwenza uhileleke emikhubeni yezwe bese uvuna imiphume-
la (Gal 6:7)
Izwe lithambekele ekugqugquzeleni imigomo yezinto ezibonakalayo, hhayi engokomoya (Flm 2:21; 1Jo 2:16;
w84-ZU 10/1 12-13)
Izwe ligqugquzela umgomo wokuba isigwili
Lezozifiso zokuvelela zibangela ukukhathazeka, ubuhlungu (1Ti 6:10)
UJesu wasixwayisa ngokuthi singakhathazeki ngisho nangezidingo zokuphila (Mat 6:25-34)
‘Ukukhohlisa kwengcebo kuminyanisa izwi’ (Mat 13:22)
Lokhu kungenzeka namuhla njengoba kwenzeka ekhulwini lokuqala (Flm 3:18, 19)
No. 79-ZU
1/96Izwe likhonza abantu balo abadumile nabavelele
Indlela yabo yokuphila ebukisayo yenza izwe lithatheke (1Jo 2:16)
Liyakuthanda ukuziphatha kwabo kobundindwa, inhlamba, nokuzilungisa kwabo
Sinjani isimo sakho sengqondo ngakulababantu?
Umoya wezwe awunathando, awunabumnene, futhi awuthetheleli
Ukulingisa lowomoya kungaba ukuzibizela intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu efanele (IzA 16:27)
UNkulunkulu ubulahla ngokufanele ‘ubuhlobo nezwe’ (Jak 4:4)
Okhetha ukuba umngane wezwe ukhetha ukuba umngane wesitha sikaNkulunkulu esiyingozi kakhulu (1Pe
5:8; 1Jo 5:19)

ba kungalimaza umntwana ukuba abe umngane wakhe oseduze?

Ubungane nezwe nakanjani abusoze baphumelela, kodwa kunobungane obuyohlala phakade (1Jo 2:17)
HLAKULELA UBUNGANE OBUHLE KUNABO BONKE—NONKULUNKULU (11 imiz.)
Njengo-Abrahama, abantu abangaphelele bangaba abangane bakaNkulunkulu (2Kr 20:7; Jak 2:23)
UJehova wayemthanda u-Abrahama futhi waba umngane wakhe (Isa 41:8)
U-Abrahama wabonisa ukholo futhi walalela (Heb 11:8-10, 17-19)
UJehova wamphakamisa ngokumnikeza ilungelo lokuba ukhokho kaJesu
Izimfuneko zokuba umngane kaNkulunkulu zivezwe kumaHubo 15:1-5 (w89-ZU 9/15 26-9; cabangela kafushane
amanye alamaphuzu ayishumi)
Labo abafanelwa yileyoncazelo benza intando kaNkulunkulu
Ngeke bantengantenge, ngoba uJehova, njengomngane weqiniso, uyobavikela futhi abasekele
Kudingeka siqinise lobobungane manje; kudinga ukuzikhandla (Juda 3)
Yini esiyoyidinga kakhulu ngosizi olukhulu?
Akuyona imali, akuzona izinto zezwe, kodwa ukholo oluqinile
Yakha lolukholo ngokuthandaza ngokuphikelelayo, ngokutadisha iBhayibheli ngenkuthalo, ngokuba khona
emihlanganweni ngokwethembeka, ngokuhlanganyela ngentshiseko enkonzweni yasensimini
 ́
Uma senza iphutha elingathi sına, akumelwe sivumele ukuthambekela kokuba sishiye phansi noma siyeke; yi-
lokho uSathane akufunayo
Cela abadala ukuba bakusize; sebenzisa iseluleko sabo (IzA 12:15; Heb 13:17)
Ungalulama enkambweni yesono (Jak 5:13-16)
UJehova, njengoMngane weqiniso, uyokuthethelela (Isa 55:7)
Landela isibonelo sikaMose (Heb 11:24-26)
Wenqaba ukuthanda izwe kodwa wagcina uthando ngoJehova luvutha

UBUNGANE NOJEHOVA BUHOLELA EZIBUSISWENI EZINGAPHELI (4 imiz.)
 ́
UJehova uthathe isinyathelo kuqala wasithanda futhi wenza ukuba sikwazi ukuba nobungane naye (1Jo 4:19)
Izinhliziyo zethu zisishukumisela ukuba sisabele ngokumbonisa uthando nokwazisa
Uthando ngoNkulunkulu silubonisa ngokulalela imithetho yakhe (1Jo 5:3)
Bhekana noshushiso kunokuba uphule imithetho kaJehova (IzE 5:29)
Sithanda igama lakhe futhi siyalisekela ngamazwi ethu nangezenzo (Hu 119:132; Isa 43:10-13)
Sifuna ukutshela abanye ngoJehova (Rom 10:13-15)
Ubungane obunjalo buholela ezibusisweni manje nasesikhathini esizayo (Mar 10:28-30)
Abangane bakaNkulunkulu baqondiswa umoya wakhe (Gal 5:22, 23)
Banelungelo lokuba “abantu begama lakhe” (IzE 15:14)
Ubungane bethu noJehova bungahlala njalo, bukhule njalo, futhi bungaba nomvuzo ngokwengeziwe kuze kube
phakade

No. 79-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE ITHEMBA LAKHO LIKUYISAYENSI NOMA LISEBHAYIBHELINI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gxila ekuthembekeni kweBhayibheli. Amakhambi abantu asekelwe kuyisayensi awazona izimpendulo. Bonisa
ukuthi kunesisekelo esiqinile sokuthembela ethembeni leBhayibheli ngekusasa
ABANINGI BATHI ISAYENSI ENIKEZA ITHEMBA LEKUSASA, HHAYI IBHAYIBHELI (8 imiz.)
Abanye bacabanga ukuthi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ososayensi bayozixazulula zonke izinkinga
Umlando unikeza ubufakazi bokuthi ngokuvamile isayensi iyehluleka ukufeza izithembiso zayo
Incwadi ethi The Experts Speak ithi uJohn Langdon-Davies, intatheli yaseBrithani neLungu le-Royal Anthro-
pological Institute, 1936, wabikezela lokhu okulandelayo: “Ukuze siqale ukuzama ukuqonda ukuthi ukuphi-
la kuyobe kunjani ngo-1960, kumelwe siqale ngokuqaphela ukuthi ukudla, okokugqoka nendawo yokuhlala
kuyobe kungabizi ngisho nesenti” (w86-ZU 5/15 3)
Kunamathemba amaningi angafezwanga (Bheka i-g86-ZU 11/8 3)
Abanye ososayensi bazisholo ukuthi isayensi inesihluthulelo sokunqoba ukufa nokuthi ukuthola ukuphila oku-
phakade kusemandleni abo (g90-ZU 4/22 4)
Nokho, iBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sithembele kuJehova, hhayi kumuntu (Hu 118:8)
Amandla oMdali nobuNkulunkulu bakhe kubonakala ngokucacile endalweni (Rom 1:20)
Kodwa bayidlanzana abathembela ngobuqotho kuNkulunkulu (Hu 31:14)
Uzizwa kanjani? Sikhona yini isisekelo esiqinile sokuba ubeke ithemba lakho lekusasa kuyisayensi? Kuthiwani
ngeBhayibheli? Singathembela kulokho iBhayibheli elikushoyo ngekusasa?
INGABE ISAYENSI IYISISEKELO SETHEMBA ESINOKWETHENJELWA? (12 imiz.)
Izinto eziningi ezifezwe isayensi asinakuziphika futhi ziyancomeka
Eziningi izinto zesimanje ezisunguliwe zenze abanye bayeka imisebenzi enesicefe, edla isikhathi
Cabanga ngezinzuzo esizithola ngenxa yokusungulwa kocingo, izimoto, izindiza, i-computer
 ́

Unyaka ngamunye kufa amakhulu ezinkulungwane emhlabeni wonke ezingozini zezimoto; kulimale nezigidi
Ososayensi baye baphazamisa indawo ezungezile nokuphelelisana kwezinto eziphilayo nendawo ezihlala kuyo
Izinkulumo ezinjengokuthi “imvula ene-acid,” “ukushisa okubabazekayo,” “nokucekelwa phansi kwama-
hlathi” ziveza ukwehluleka kwesayensi
IBhayibheli lasibikezela ngokunembile lesisimo (IsAm 11:18)
Umphumela wokungcola empilweni yomuntu (g90-ZU 12/22 28)
Abaningi banomuzwa wokuthi izindaba zabo siqu ziyaphazanyiswa ngokusetshenziswa kwama-computer
(g88-ZU 3/8 25)
Ososayensi abaningi bacwaninga ngezempi (g89-ZU 6/8 6)
Izikhali zesimanje ziye zabulala amakhulu ezinkulungwane
Abanye ososayensi baye benza umkhonyovu ngokwaziswa okuthile bezama ukuzitholela udumo nenzuzo ka-
nye nokuthuthukisa izimfundiso zabo (g90-ZU 1/22 2-15)
Incwadi ethi Environmental Ethics ithi: “Ubuchwepheshe buyithuluzi elingase lisetshenziswe ngokulingani-
selwe nelingathembekile neze. Uma buxazulula inkinga eyodwa, ngokuvamile budala ezimbili ezintsha—fu-
thi imiphumela yabo emibi ngokuvamile kunzima ukuyibona kusengaphambili” (tp-ZU 16-17)
Umlando walokho okufezwe isayensi awunikezi makhambi angempela ezinkinga osekuyisikhathi eside zikho-
na, ezinjengokufa, izifo, ubugebengu, ukuziphatha okubi, nempi (w91-ZU 6/15 3-5; w90-ZU 10/1 4-5; w88-ZU
6/15 27)

(ce 199-207)

Umjikelezo wamanzi (Shu 1:7)
Ukuhlaliswa wedwa ngenxa yesifo esikuphethe (Lev 13:46; it-1 633)
Umphumela imizwelo eba nayo emzimbeni (IzA 14:30; 17:22)
Ukwaziswa okungokwesayensi okwambulwa ngaphambi kokuba abantu bakuthole kufakazela ukuthi iBhayibhe-
li liphefumulelwe ngokwaphezulu nokuthi linokwethenjelwa

okwalandela (1Ko 15:3-8; w86-ZU 8/15 19)

kunembile (w92-ZU 5/15 6-7)

Ukuthi esikhundleni sokubusa komuntu kuyoba nokubusa kukaNkulunkulu (Dan 2:44)

No. 80-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45OBANI ABAFANELEKA NJENGEZIKHONZI ZIKANKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Qhathanisa isibonelo sikaJesu nabafundi bakhe nesabefundisi beLobukholwa, abathi bayizikhonzi zikaNkulunku-
lu. Bonisa lokho okuyizimfanelo ezingokomBhalo zezikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu nendlela izikhonzi zikaNkulunku-
lu zeqiniso eziqeqeshelwa ngayo inkonzo yobuKristu namuhla
UJESU KRISTU UYAFANELEKA NJENGESIKHONZI SIKANKULUNKULU ESIYINHLOKO (6 imiz.)
UJesu waqala inkonzo yakhe ngemva kokubhapathizwa eJordani eneminyaka engu-30 ubudala (Luk 3:21-23)
Wamemezela ukuthunywa kwakhe esinagogeni laseNazaretha (Luk 4:17-21)
Waya kuwo wonke amadolobha nemizi yakwa-Israyeli, eshumayela, ephulukisa, futhi efeza inkonzo yakhe aye-
yabelwe (Mat 9:35, 36)
Emhlabeni akezelanga ‘ukuzokhonzwa, kodwa ukukhonza’ futhi waba njengenceku yendlu ephansi, diakonos
(Mat 20:28)
Kulokhu, wababekela isibonelo esimangalisayo bonke ababeyoba abalandeli bakhe
ABANYE BAYAMENYWA UKUBA BAHLANGANYELE ENKONZWENI ABAYINIKEZWE UNKULUNKULU
(10 imiz.)
Kusukela ekuqaleni kwenkonzo yakhe uJesu wamema abanye ukuba bahlanganyele naye babe “abadobi baba-
ntu” (Mat 4:18, 19)
Wayebadlula abaholi benkolo abangamaJuda, nakuba babefunde bagogoda eMthethweni (Mat 23:2, 3, 6, 7)
Kunokuba amukele lababaholi benkolo, uJesu empeleni wabasola (Mat 23:33)
UJesu akazange amise izikole zokufundela ubufundisi kodwa wahamba nabafundi bakhe ukuze abaqeqeshe ‘ensi-
mini’ (Mat 9:35-38)
Phakathi neminyaka emithathu amadoda anjengoJakobe, uJohane, noPetru ayeseqeqesheke kahle futhi athu-
nywa njengezikhonzi ezifanelekayo, ‘abashumayeli boMbuso kaNkulunkulu’ (Mat 10:5-7)
Ukufundisa nokukhuluma kwawo kwakufana nokweNkosi yawo (IzE 4:13)
Yeka indlela abaholi benkolo beLobukholwa abahluke ngayo namuhla!
Baqhosha ngokuthi baqeqeshwe ezikoleni zobufundisi, bathanda iziqu eziphakeme, futhi bathi bamiswe ngo-
kwaphezulu
Ukugxeka kwabo iZwi likaNkulunkulu kuye kwenza imihlambi yabo yangalazi iBhayibheli, njengoba ukuhlo-
la kubonisa (w91-ZU 1/15 7; w89-ZU 7/1 4-5)
Abaningi baye bahileleka kwezombangazwe, ekuziphatheni okubi ngokobulili, nasemikhonyovwini yezimali
Abavumelani ngisho nangalokho okushiwo ukulandela isibonelo sikaJesu
IZIMFANELO EZINGOKOMBHALO ZEZIKHONZI ZIKANKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Obani ngempela abafanelekayo ukuba babe izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu? UPawulu unikeza impendulo eqondile
kweyesi-2 Korinte 2:16b, 17
ImiBhalo izichaza ngokucacile izinyathelo ezidingekayo ukuze umuntu afaneleke ngokwanele njengesikhonzi si-
kaNkulunkulu
Okokuqala umuntu kufanele angenise ulwazi olunembile oluvela eZwini likaNkulunkulu, njengoba abapho-
stoli namaKristu ekhulu lokuqala benza (Joh 17:3)
Kanye nolwazi olunjalo, kudingeka ukholo (Joh 3:16; Heb 11:6)
Ukuze umuntu anikeze ubufakazi bokuthi unokholo, kumelwe enze imisebenzi yokuphenduka enkambweni
engalungile yangesikhathi esidlule (Rom 2:4)
Khona-ke umuntu kumelwe ashintshe noma athathe isinyathelo sokuguquka, ukuze athuthuke endleleni elu-
ngile eholela ekutholeni umusa kaNkulunkulu (IzE 3:19)
Kumelwe afinyelele eqophelweni lokuzinikezela, azinikele kuNkulunkulu ukuba enze intando yakhe njengo-
mlandeli wezinyathelo zikaJesu Kristu (Mat 16:24-26)
Ukuze abonise ukuzinikezela, isinyathelo esilandelayo ukubhapathizwa emanzini elalela umyalo kaJesu (Mat
28:19, 20)
Ngokombono kaNkulunkulu, bonke abathathe izinyathelo ezingenhla bayafaneleka ukuba izikhonzi zezindaba
ezinhle
Ubhapathizo olubangela ukumiswa uNkulunkulu njengomunye wezikhonzi zakhe, hhayi izitifiketi zasekolishi
noma izincwadi zokutusa ezivela kubantu
Labo abasabela esigijimini salezi zikhonzi futhi babe yizikhonzi bona ngokwabo bayincwadi yabo yokutusa
(2Ko 3:1-3)
Isidingo sokuba zenze umsebenzi wokuziphilisa ukuze zizinakekele zona nemikhaya yazo asikwenzi ize uku-
sho kwazo ukuthi ziyizikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu
Umphostoli uPawulu wayenza amatende; wayesebenza ngezandla zakhe ukuze anakekele izidingo ezingo-
kwenyama kodwa wazibonakalisa eyisikhonzi sikaJehova esishisekayo (IzE 18:1-4; 20:34)
Namuhla oFakazi BakaJehova balandela sona lesi sibonelo esiseBhayibhelini, ngisho nalabo abasenkonzwe-
ni yesikhathi esigcwele

1/95UKUQEQESHWA KOSUKU LWANAMUHLA UKUZE SIFANELEKE NJENGEZIKHONZI (9 imiz.)
Zonke izikhonzi zikaJehova zithola ukuqeqeshelwa inkonzo okunzulu
Isonto ngalinye kulungiselelwa imihlangano emihlanu ukuze siqeqeshelwe ukusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunku-
lu ngekhono (Heb 10:23-25)
ISikole Senkonzo Esingokwasezulwini ebandleni ngalinye sinikeza isiyalo esiningiliziwe ngokuqondene nezi-
ndlela zokutadisha eziphumelelayo, ukufunda nokukhuluma obala, ukufundisa, nenkonzo yasensimini. Esa-
bo bonke (2Ti 3:14-16; Incwadi Yokuchasisa Isikole SeNkonzo EsingokwaseZulwini ingasetshenziswa uku-
ze kuboniswe ukuthi ziningi kanjani izihloko ezikhulunyelwayo)
ISikole Senkonzo Samaphayona siye sanikeza ukuqeqesha okubalulekile ezinkulungwaneni zezikhonzi zesi-
khathi esigcwele emhlabeni wonke ukuze zikhanye njengezinkanyiso (Flp 2:15)
ISikole Senkonzo SoMbuso sinikeza abadala ukuqeqesha okusezingeni eliphezulu ngokuqondene nokwenga-
mela nokwalusa ibandla likaNkulunkulu (IzE 20:28)
Eminyakeni engu-50 edlule i-Bible School of Gilead iye yaqeqesha izigidi zezithunywa zevangeli ezishisekayo
ezikhonza emhlabeni wonke (Mat 28:19, 20)
ISikole Sokuqeqeshela Inkonzo sinikeza isiyalo esikhethekile ukuze kusizwe abazalwane abafanelekayo uku-
ba bandise inkonzo yabo
Wonke lamalungiselelo ayingxenye yokuqeqesha okungokweBhayibheli okwenza izinceku zikaJehova zifanele-
ke ukuze zibe yizikhonzi eziphumelelayo
UPawulu wavuma ukuthi ‘ukufaneleka kuvela kuNkulunkulu’ (2Ko 3:1-5)
IZIKHONZI EZIFANELEKAYO MANJE EZISETSHENZISWA UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Iqiniso lokuthi izindaba ezinhle zishunyayelwa kuzo zonke izizwe liwubufakazi bokwamukela kukaNkulunkulu
imizamo yabo (Mat 24:14)
Ngokuvumelana nesibonelo sikaHezekeli, owayekhonza ‘njengomlindi’ esizweni esihlubukayo ngokuxwayisa
ngesahlulelo sikaNkulunkulu, namuhla izikhonzi zikaJehova zimemezela isixwayiso saphezulu (Hez 3:17-21;
33:2-7; w91-ZU 3/15 15)
Izikhonzi zikaJehova ezamukelayo ziyizisebenzi ezikanye noNkulunkulu ezithobekile nezilalelayo. Esinye siya-
tshala, esinye sinisele, kodwa uNkulunkulu uyakhulisa (1Ko 3:5-9)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu lisikhuthaza sonke ukuba siqhubeke sithuthuka njengezikhonzi ezizikhandlayo (2Ti 2:15)
Khona-ke singasetshenziswa ukuba sikhazimulise uNkulunkulu, singasindisa ukuphila kwethu nokuphila
kwabo bonke abalalela iZwi lokuphila njengoba limenyezelwa izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu zeqiniso nazamuke-
layo
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 81-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UJEHOVA NOKRISTU—INGABE BAYINGXENYE KAZIQU-ZINTATHU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ngendlela egculisayo bonisa ukuthi kokubili amaqiniso omlando kanye neBhayibheli kufakazela ukuthi uJehova
noJesu abayona ingxenye kaNkulunkulu onguZiqu-zintathu
UMSUKA “WEMFIHLAKALO” KAZIQU-ZINTATHU (5 imiz.)
AmaKristu okuqala abambelela ngokuqinile eZwini eliphefumulelwe lokuthi uBaba uphakeme futhi ufanelwe yi-
kho konke ukukhulekela (IsA 15:3, 4)
Futhi ayemunye enkolelweni yokuthi uJesu Kristu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, umuntu ohlukile nonesikhundla
esiphansi kunesikaYise (Joh 14:28; Flp 2:5, 6)
Phakathi nekhulu lesibili C.E. abaholi abangakholekile baqala ukuphendukela kumafilosofi amaGreki athandwa-
yo ayehloselwe ukuguqula amaqaba afundile. Baphendukela ikakhulukazi emfundisweni kaPlato (ti-ZU 11-12)
Amafilosofi kaPlato nezimfundiso zikaPhilo, umJuda, kwahlanganiswa ukuze kwakhe isisekelo semfundiso ka-
Ziqu-zintathu. Ayisekelwe emiBhalweni (ti-ZU 11)
Yangeniswa esontweni ngochungechunge lwemikhandlu yamasonto futhi ekugcineni yamukelwa eSivumweni
Sokholo Sika-Athanasius (ti-ZU 8-9)
UJEHOVA—UNKULUNKULU OYEDWA NOMA INGXENYE KANKULUNKULU ONGUMTHATH’ EMUNYE?
(12 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke wenza igama elithi Jehova laziwa lapho etholana phezulu nabo bonke onku-
lunkulu abangamaqaba baseGibithe, ngekhulu le-16 B.C.E. (Eks 6:3)
Ngemva kokukhulula ama-Israyeli, wawenza isizwe esimmelelayo wabe esewayala: “Ungabi-nabanye onkulunku-
lu ngaphandle kwami” (Eks 20:3)
Wayefuna ukuzinikela okukhethekile kuqondiswe kuye, “uJehova oyedwa” (Dut 4:24; 6:4; qhathanisa ne-NW;
Nah 1:2)
Emakhulwini eminyaka kamuva waphinda walisho igama lakhe futhi wamemezela ukuthi AKEKHO omunye
ayeyomnika inkazimulo yakhe. Wazifunga yena uqobo ngokuthi ‘onke amadolo ayakuguqa’ kuye yedwa (Isa
42:8; 45:23)
Ama-Israyeli anikezwa ilungelo lokuba ofakazi bakhe bokuthi, “ngaphambi kwami akwenziwanga uNkulunku-
lu,” nangasemva kwami, “mina nginguJehova” (Isa 43:10, 11)
Igama lesiHeberu elihunyushwe ngokuthi Nkulunkulu lithi elohim (ubuningi) abanye abaye bathi liyinhlangani-
sela yabantu abathathu koyedwa. Nokho, lapho lisetshenziswa esiHeberwini elithi elohim “cishe ngokungagu-
quguquki lihunyushwa nesilandiso sesenzo esisebunyeni, futhi liba nesimo sesiphawulo esisebunyeni” (ti-ZU 13)
Alisho ubuningi babantu, kodwa lisho ‘ubuningi bokugcizelela’ obubonisa ubukhulu nokuphakama
UJehova wagcizelela ukuthi kwakungamelwe ahlukaniswe abe izingxenye njengoba kwakwenza amaqaba koBa-
li. Lokhu futhi kwakuyovimbela ukuba bamenze ingxenye yonkulunkulu abanguziqu-zintathu okusekelwe ku-
filosofi (Hlu 3:7; it-1 229)
UPawulu wavuma ukuthi kwakunonkulunkulu bamaqaba abaningi, kodwa munye kuphela uNkulunkulu (weQi-
niso), uBaba, futhi yinye iNkosi, uJesu. Laba abantu ababili abahlukene, ababona onkulunkulu ababili koyedwa
(1Ko 8:5, 6)
Ekugcineni uJehova uyoba ‘iNkosi emhlabeni wonke, inkosi eYodwa, negama lakhe libe linye.’ Bonke bayokhu-
lekela ‘uNkulunkulu oYedwa noBaba ophezu kwakho konke.’ Lokhu akuhlangene noziqu-zintathu (Zak 14:9;
Efe 4:6)
UJESU KRISTU—INDODANA EPHAKANYISIWE, KODWA ENGAPHANSI KUKAYISE (10 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa (Joh 1:14)
Ngaphambi kokuba abe umuntu waphila ezulwini njengoLogos, uLizwi (Joh 1:1)
Wasetshenziswa ekudaleni zonke ezinye izinto kodwa ‘wayeyizibulo layo yonke indalo’ (Joh 1:3; Kol 1:15)
Kanjalo, ngokungafani noYise owayelokhu ekhona, uJesu waba nesiqalo
Wamiswa uYise njengeNxusa Eliyinhloko noMphathi wokufeza izinjongo zikaJehova (Kol 1:16, 20; 1Jo 4:9)
Uyinxusa likaJehova lokuqeda zonke izinkinga ezabangelwa ukuhlubuka kukaSathane
Uyisisekelo uJehova ayokwakhela phezu kwaso ilungiselelo lokuphatha eliyobhubhisa uSathane futhi lenze
zonke izinto zibe nobunye (Heb 2:14; Efe 1:8-10)
Wamiswa uJehova njengeNkosi kahulumeni ongokwaseZulwini (Dan 7:13, 14)
Waba uMhlengi womuntu ngokuzinikela njengomhlatshelo wesihlengo; ngaye kuyoba novuko lwabafileyo (Joh
11:25; IzE 10:42; 1Ti 2:5, 6)
Kungokugunyazwa uYise kuphela uJesu ayengasho ngokuqiniseka athi, “Mina ngiyindlela neqiniso nokuphila.”
(Joh 14:6) Wayengeyena umsunguli noma umthombo walawo mazwi
Wadunyiswa futhi waphakanyiswa kakhulu kodwa hhayi ukuba alingane noYise (ti-ZU 19)
No. 82-ZU
5/95AKUKHO UKULINGANA KWABATHATHU KOYEDWA PHAKATHI KUKAYISE NENDODANA (7 imiz.)
UJesu akakaze athi uyalingana noYise kodwa wamemezela ukuthi igunya lakhe livela kuNkulunkulu (Joh 5:19,
21, 24; 8:28)
Wamemezela obala ukuthi ‘wayethunyiwe’ nokuthi isigijimi sakhe ‘sasingesalowo omthumile.’ Othumayo ngaso
sonke isikhathi mkhulu kunothunywayo (Luk 4:18; Joh 7:16, 18; 13:16, 17)
Futhi uJesu, iNdodana, wafunda ukulalela ngezinto ahlupheka ngazo. UJesu wayelalela bani? (Joh 7:28; 8:29, 42;
Heb 5:8)
NjengeNhloko yebandla, uJesu ngaso sonke isikhathi usekela uhlelo olungokwasezulwini, ezithoba kuJehova nje-
ngeNhloko yakhe (1Ko 11:3; 15:28)
UJesu ngaso sonke isikhathi wayethandaza kuYise. Sasingekho isidingo uma yena ngokwakhe ayenguNkulu-
nkulu. Akazange athandaze kuye ngokwakhe (Mat 4:10; 6:9; Heb 2:12)
ImiBhalo ayikusekeli ukuthi uYise neNdodana bayalingana
KUTHIWANI NGEMIBHALO YEBHAYIBHELI OKUTHIWA IFAKAZELA NOMA ISEKELA UKUKHOLE-
LWA KUZIQU-ZINTATHU? (6 imiz.)
Njengoba kungabonwa ekwazisweni okunikeziwe, ubufakazi beBhayibheli nobomlando abuyisekeli imfundiso ka-
Ziqu-zintathu
Imibhalo esetshenziswayo ekusekeleni imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu ngokuvamile ichazwa ngokungeyikho noma
ngokungavumelani nomongo (chaza kafushane)
Johane 10:30 (Bhekisela kuJohane 17:21, 22 ukuze ubonise lokho uJesu ayekuqondile)
Johane 1:1 (Bheka isithasiselo 3 ku-bi7)
Johane 8:58 (Bheka i-ti-ZU 26)
Khumbula ukuthi lemibhalo ibhekisela kubantu ababili kuphela, hhayi abathathu
Awukho nowodwa umbhalo weBhayibheli othi uNkulunkulu, uJesu, nomoya ongcwele bayafana ngesimo, ama-
ndla, nobuphakade
UJEHOVA UYOBUSA NGEGUNYA ELIPHAKEME PHAKADE (5 imiz.)
Izenzakalo zifakazela ukuthi uJehova wathatha ubukhosi bakhe obukhulu ekupheleni kweZikhathi Zabezizwe
ngo-1914 futhi waqala ukubusa ngoMbuso wobuMesiya (IsA 11:17)
Ngomusa wamema iNdodana yakhe ekholekile nethembekile ukuba ihlanganyele kulowo Mbuso uJehova
angoPhakeme kuwo. UYise wanikeza iNdodana udumo (Dan 4:25; IsA 11:15; 12:10)
Ngothando wakhetha abanye abangu-144 000 esintwini ukuba bahlanganyele isihlalo sobukhosi noJesu Kristu
(IsA 14:1; 20:4, 6)
Uhlelo nelungiselelo elingokwaseZulwini limi ngalendlela: (1) uJehova, uMbusi Ophakeme; (2) uJesu Kristu, iNko-
si ethembekile nephakanyisiwe; (3) amakhosi nabapristi abakanye naye abangu-144 000; (4) zonke ezinye izida-
lwa zingaphansi kwabo
Abekho oNkulunkulu abanguziqu-zintathu, akukho okulingana neNkosi enguMbusi uJehova, zonke izinto ezu-
lwini nasemhlabeni ngokuvumelana ziyazithoba ekubuseni okungokwaseZulwini (1Ko 15:24, 28)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ISIKHATHI SOKWAHLULELWA KWENKOLO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqaphele ukuthi inkolo iyolandisa kuNkulunkulu. Bonisa ngokucacile ukuthi kungani inko-
lo yamanga ifanelwe isahlulelo esinzima sikaNkulunkulu nokubhujiswa
KUYASANGULUKISA UKWAZI UKUTHI ZONKE IZINKOLO ZIYOTHOLA UKWAHLULELWA KOKUGCI-
NA (6 imiz.)
Kwabanye, lokhu kungase kuzwakale kuyinqaba. Inkolo iye yafeza indima ebalulekile kuyo yonke impucuko.
Ngokuhlangana kweSonto noMbuso, abameleli benkolo baye babeka amakhosi ezihlalweni noma bawehlisa, ba-
phehla izimpi zenkolo, futhi babusisa izimpi
Ngokuphawulekayo, igagasi lokungakholelwa kuNkulunkulu likhukhula umhlaba wonke, okuthinta isimo se-
nkolo
Amalungelo ayo aqhubeka engatshazwa njengoba abefundisi behileleka kwezombangazwe, ekuziphatheni oku-
xekethile ngokobulili, nasemkhonyovwini wezimali
Inkolo ihilelekile nasezingxabanweni zobuzwe nasezenzweni zobuphekula (w94-ZU 12/15 28; g94-ZU 12/22
18-20)
Ukuhlola kubonisa okwandayo ukungabi nandaba nenkolo (w91-ZU 12/1 6; g89-ZU 2/8 29; g89-ZU 1/8 3)
Ukuphangwa kwamasonto kubonisa ukuntuleka kokwesaba uNkulunkulu (g92-ZU 11/8 29; g92-ZU 1/8 28)
Lezi zimo zengqondo nezenzo ziyisibonakaliso salokho okulindele inkolo esikhathini esizayo esiseduze
Inkolo ibhekene nenkathi enzima kunazo zonke yomlando wayo omude
ELobukholwa, elizisholo ukuthi limelela uNkulunkulu, limi phambi kwesihlalo sikaNkulunkulu sokwahlulela
njengelizokwahlulelwa kuqala
Zonke ezinye izinkolo ziyokwahlulelwa kamuva
INKOLO YEQINISO NEYAMANGA ZIZOTHOLA IZAHLULELO EZINGAFANI (6 imiz.)
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi akuzona zonke izinkolo ezamukeleka ngokulinganayo kuJehova
Isiprofetho sokuqala siveza ukungqubuzana phakathi kwabakhulekeli beqiniso nabamanga (Gen 3:15)
UJesu ukhuluma ngalabo abakhulekela ngomoya nangeqiniso nangalabo abakhulekela ‘abangakwaziyo,’ futhi
uxwayisa ngoKristu, abaprofethi, nabaphostoli bamanga (Joh 4:22, 23; Mat 24:5)
UPawulu uxwayisa ngokuzama ukudla etafuleni likaJehova nakwelamademoni (1Ko 10:21)
Umfundi uJakobe uchaza uhlobo lokukhulekela okuyize nalolo oluhlanzekile futhi olungangcolile (Jak 1:26, 27)
Inkolo kuyodingeka ilandise kuJehova naseNdodaneni yakhe, okuyiyona emiselwe ukwahlulela (Joh 5:22; 2Ko
5:10)
Kuyocaca ukuthi ubani olalela imfundiso yakhe noqhuba ukukhulekela kweqiniso
Isahlulelo siyoxhomeka ezithelweni eziveziwe (Mat 7:17-20)
ABAKHULEKELI ABAQOTHO BAYOTHOLA ISAHLULELO ESIBAVUNAYO (10 imiz.)
Iziphi izithelo ezinhle inkolo yeqiniso okulindeleke ukuba iziveze?
Njengoba uNkulunkulu eluthando, abantu bakhe bayokwenza ngokuvumelana nalemfanelo emangalisayo futhi
bayibonakalise (Mar 12:29-31; 1Jo 4:8)
Abafundi bakaJesu Kristu beqiniso babonakala ngokubonisana uthando lokuzidela (Joh 13:34, 35)
Lesi sithelo, kanye nezinye izimfanelo zokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu, sifakazela ukuthi banomoya kaNkulunku-
lu (Gal 5:22, 23)
Abakhulekeli beqiniso bayalihlonipha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, basebenzisa izimiso zalo ekuphileni kwabo, futhi ba-
lisebenzisa njengesisekelo sokufundisa abanye (2Ti 3:15, 16)
UJesu weza ngegama likaYise, wamkhazimulisa (Joh 5:43, 44; 7:16-18; 17:4)
Abalandeli bakhe bayalikhazimulisa igama likaJehova, balingcwelise futhi bahambe ngalo (Mik 4:5; Mat 6:9;
Joh 15:8)
Njengabalandeli bakaJesu, abakhulekeli beqiniso bazishumayela ngentshiseko izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso njengo-
ba uKristu ayala (Mat 24:14; Luk 8:1)
Bazigcina behlukile ezweni (Joh 15:19; Jak 4:4)
Bayashushiswa, kodwa bafanelwe umusa kaNkulunkulu (2Ti 3:12; 1Pe 3:14)
Izithelo ezinjalo ezinhle zivezwa abantu bakaJehova emhlabeni wonke
Abalandeli bezinyathelo zikaKristu abagcotshiwe bazi ngokusuka eziprofethweni zeBhayibheli eziphathelene
nabo ukuthi ukwahlulela sekuqalile endlini kaNkulunkulu (1Pe 4:17, 18)
UKristu uzoqala masinyane ukwahlulela labo abafanelwe umusa wakhe noma abangawufanele (Mat 25:31-33)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA ZONKE IZINKOLO ZAMANGA ZITHOLE ISAHLULELO ESIBI (10 imiz.)
Zakha ingxenye yalesi simiso esibi sezinto esingaphansi kokulawulwa uSathane, zingabangane bezwe futhi nga-
leyo ndlela ziyizitha zikaNkulunkulu (Jak 4:4)
No. 83-ZU
11/95Zilifulathele iZwi likaNkulunkulu futhi zenze imiyalo yakhe yaba engabalulekile ngamasiko azo namafilosofi ayi-
ze (Mat 15:7-9)
Ziye zenqaba ukuqaphela uNkulunkulu okuwukuphela kwakhe ophakeme, uJehova, kodwa zaphakamisa onku-
lunkulu bazo, ngisho nonkulunkulu abangoziqu-zintathu
UJehova ngeke abubekezelela ubuzenzisi bazo nemithandazo engeqotho, enjengeyeSodoma neGomora okungo-
kwesiprofetho (Isa 1:10-15)
Ziye zasishaya indiva isigijimi sikaNkulunkulu sokwahlulela futhi ziye zahlupha izithunywa zakhe futhi zazi-
bulala (Qhathanisa noMathewu 23:29-36)
Ngaphansi kophawu lwesifebe esikhulu, umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga unecala lokuchitha igazi, lokuthatha
izinhlangothi ezimpini eziningi (IsA 17:3-6)
Kusobala-ke ukuthi zonke izinkolo zobuBabiloni zaseMpumalanga naseNtshonalanga ziye zabekwa esikalini si-
kaJehova sokwahlulela zatholakala zintula
Inkemba kaJehova yokubhubhisa inkolo yamanga iyobanjwa kuze kube sekupheleni kokumenyezelwa kwesigi-
jimi sesahlulelo (IsA 14:6-8)
UKUBIKEZELWA OKUNGOKWESIPROFETHO KOKUBHUJISWA KWENKOLO YAMANGA (10 imiz.)
IBabiloni lasendulo, lapho unya nenkolo yamanga kwakuhambisana khona, laphela ngokuzumayo lapho ngobu-
suku obubodwa liwela kuKoresi wasePheresiya
Ingxubevange yamabutho amaMede, amaPheresiya, nama-Elamithe ngaphansi kukaKoresi yacoboshisa iBa-
biloni okwakuqhoshwa ngokuthi alinakunqotshwa
IBhayibheli libikezela ukubhujiswa okuzumayo, okuphelele kweBabiloni Elikhulu libhujiswa “izimpondo eziyi-
shumi” (IsA 17:15-18; 18:8, 10, 17, 19; re-ZU 256-8)
Ngisho namanje, amaqembu angamhloniphi uNkulunkulu, amelene nenkolo avelele eZizweni Ezihlangene. Ku-
nokwandayo ukunganakwa kokwandisa inkululeko engokwenkolo, uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izinto ezikha-
thalelwayo (g86 1/8 29)
Ngokwesiprofetho, ngolunye usuku leyo mizwa nezimo zengqondo kuyoba namandla kuphumele ezinyathelwe-
ni ezimbi kakhulu ezimelene nayo yonke inkolo yamanga
Kuyothi kamuva amabutho angenaNkulunkulu agxilise inzondo yawo futhi alwe nabameleli benkolo yeqiniso
emhlabeni, kodwa izitha ziyophela “empini yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke” (IsA 16:14;
2Th 1:6-10)
Ngaleyo ndlela inkolo yeqiniso iyonqoba kuyilapho inkolo yamanga iyoshabalala unomphela, njengetshe loku-
gaya lijikijelwe olwandle (IsA 18:21)
ABATHANDI BOKULUNGA KUDINGEKA BAZIHLANGANISE NENKOLO YEQINISO (3 imiz.)
Ihora lokwahlulela nosizi lwenkolo yamanga okusondelayo kubizela ukuba kukhishwe isixwayiso emhlabeni wo-
nke (IsA 18:4, 5)
Ukwehlukana nombuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga kubalulekile uma sifuna ukusitshekelwa ngosuku lolaka lu-
kaJehova (Zef 2:1-3)
Ukulunga nokuthobeka kweqiniso ngeke kutholakale kunoma iyiphi ingxenye yenkolo yobuBabiloni
Funa ukulondeka kubantu bakaJehova, abakhipha isixwayiso sesiphelo senkolo yamanga esisondela ngesivinini

Ukuthi inhlekelele yenuzi ingaba khona akuyona inkolelo yesikhathi esidlule

le phansi” (w94-ZU 8/1 3)

LOKHO UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU AYE WAKUMEMEZELA NGALELIZWE (5 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu ngeke avumele ukuba isintu sishatshalaliswe (Isa 45:18)
Kodwa uNkulunkulu uye wamemezela ukubhujiswa kwezwe likaSathane okuzokwenzeka maduzane ‘ngosuku
lukaJehova olukhulu’ (Zef 1:14-18)
UJehova, uNkulunkulu wothando, ubakhanyisela kusengaphambili abantu bakhe, futhi abanye ubatshela ngabo
(Isa 42:9; 61:1, 2)
Ngakho imbubhiso ayiyona into engenakugwenywa (Funda iHubo 145:20)
UNGALIYEKI ITHUBA LOKUSINDA ONALO (12 imiz.)
Ukulondolozwa phakathi ‘nosuku lukaJehova’ kudinga ukuba silalele izixwayiso ezingokomBhalo
Kodwa lapho kusongela inhlekelele, ngokuvamile abantu abazinaki izixwayiso (w86-ZU 9/15 3-4; w80-ZU 12/1 3-4)
Encwadini yakhe ethi The Face of Disaster uDonald Robinson wabhala: “Abantu abaningi . . . abakwazi nhlo-
bo ukukwamukela ukuthi bazokwehlelwa inhlekelele. Bayazi ukuthi ukuqhuma kwezinto, imililo emikhulu,
izivunguvungu, iziphepho, izikhukhula, ukushayisana kwezindiza nezitimela kuyenzeka. Bayazi ukuthi nge-
sikhathi sempi kuyoqhunyiswa amabhomu. Kodwa abavumi ukuthi lezo zinhlekelele zizobathinta ngokuqo-
ndile. Ukuthi bona, noma labo ababathandayo, bangase balimale kabi, bafe. Ukuthi umsebenzi wabo abaze-
nzela wona ungaphazamiseka unomphela. Kubi kakhulu ukuba bacabange ngakho. Kungadingeka babe
nezindinganiso ezishintshile, umbono omusha ngokuphelele, futhi lokho abantu abaningi abanakukwazi uku-
kwenza” (Ikhasi 58)
Abaningi manje abacabangi ukuthi inhlekelele izobehlela futhi abafuni ukwenza izinguquko, njengoba nje aba-
ntu babengafuni ukushintsha indlela yabo yokuphila naphezu kokushumayela kukaNowa (Mat 24:37-39)
Abakhwenyana bakaLoti abasinakanga isixwayiso sokuphela kweSodoma (Gen 19:14)
Kuzo zombili izimo, ukuhluleka ukulalela izixwayiso nokwenza izinguquko kwenza bangakwazi ukusinda (2Pe
2:5-7)
UNowa, umkhaya wakhe, noLoti namadodakazi basinda ngokulalela izixwayiso nokulalela uNkulunkulu;
umkaLoti akalalelanga futhi wafa
UJesu Kristu wabonisa ukuthi phakathi nokuba khona kwakhe abantu babeyozishaya indiva izixwayiso (Funda
uLuka 17:26-30)
UNGABUSHALAZELI UBUFAKAZI OBUSOBALA (8 imiz.)
Ingabe uyobuqaphelisisa ubufakazi obubonisa ukuthi uJesu manje ukhona njengeNkosi nokuthi ‘usuku lukaJe-
hova’ lusondela ngokushesha?
Phawula ezinye zezici ‘zesibonakaliso’ esiyinhlanganisela sokuba khona kukaJesu (Mat 24:3; funda uLuka 21:
10, 11)
Esinye isici izimpi ezingenakulinganiswa
Abantu abangaba ngu-69 000 000 bafa eMpini Yezwe I neyesi-II; futhi ezinye izigidi ziye zafa ezimpini ku-
sukela ngo-1945
Esinye isici ‘sesibonakaliso’ “ukuzamazama okukhulu komhlaba”
Phakathi naleli khulu leminyaka, amakhulu ezinkulungwane aye afa ngokuzamazama komhlaba (g91-ZU
8/8 28)
“Izifo eziwumshayabhuqe” nazo ziseyingxenye ‘yesibonakaliso’
‘Umkhuhlane waseSpain’ wembulunga yonke wango-1918-1919 wabulala cishe abantu abangu-20 000 000; izi-
fo ziyanda namuhla (g94-ZU 4/8 31; w83-ZU 10/15 3-7 [w83 5/1 3-7])
No. 84-ZU
11/03Ukuswelakala kokudla kuyawuhlasela umhlaba njengengxenye ‘yesibonakaliso’
I-World Book Encyclopedia ithi: “Amazwe amaningi asathuthuka ase-Afrika, e-Asia, naseLatin America
awanakho ukudla okwanele kwabantu bawo. Izigidi ezikulamazwe ziyalamba. Lapho ukukhiqizwa koku-
dla noma ukudla okutholwa kwamanye amazwe kuncipha ngesizathu esithile, indlala ingagadla futhi izi-
nkulungwane noma izigidi zabantu zingafa.”
Ukushumayela emhlabeni wonke izindaba ezinhle kuyisici esiyinhloko ‘sesibonakaliso’ (Mat 24:14)

IZIMFUNEKO ZOMUNTU SIQU ZOKUSINDA (12 imiz.)
UJesu wanikeza iziyalezo okufanele manje sizilalele ukuze sisinde enhlekeleleni
Kumelwe sihlale siphapheme futhi sinxuse (Funda uLuka 21:34-36)
Ukubaleka ngaphandle kokulibala kubalulekile lapho kusongela inhlekelele
Ngakho njengoba abalandeli bakaJesu babaleka eJerusalema, ungavumeli lutho luphazamise ukubalekela
kwakho manje endaweni elondekile phakathi kwabantu bakaJehova (Mat 24:15-18)
Ukusinda komuntu siqu kuxhomeke ebuhlotsheni obuhle noJehova obusekelwe emhlatshelweni wesihlengo ka-
Jesu Kristu (Rom 3:23-25)
Kufanele afunde izindlela zikaNkulunkulu, ahambe emikhondweni yakhe (Isa 2:2-4)
Ukuzinikezela kuNkulunkulu nobhapathizo kubalulekile
Hlala uqaphile ngokuvumelana nezwi likaJehova (Hu 119:9)
Ukutadisha iBhayibheli nezincwadi zobuKristu ngenkuthalo kuyisibopho
Hlangana njalo nabantu bakaNkulunkulu; ungazihlukanisi
Ukuzihlukanisa ngamabomu nabantu bakaNkulunkulu kungaholela ekubeni nemiqondo engaqondile, ekunga-
kwazini ukusinda esiphelweni (IzA 18:1)
Ngakho-ke, ‘ungakuyeki ukuya emihlanganweni’ (Heb 10:25, The Jerusalem Bible)
Kufanele ubonise uthando ngoNkulunkulu nomakhelwane ngokushumayela izindaba ezinhle nokufundisa aba-
nye ‘ngomkhululi’ (Hu 18:1, 2)
UNGABA PHAKATHI KWALABO ABASINDA KULOKHO OKUMISELWE LELIZWE (3 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu ngeke akuvumele ukuba sonke isintu siqothulwe
Uhlose ukuba iPharadesi lasemhlabeni lihlalwe abantu abaphelele
Bonke abangekho ohlangothini lukaJehova bayoshatshalaliswa ‘ngosuku lukaJehova’ olusondela ngokushesha
Sonke manje sinikezwa ithuba lokuba sisinde
Lalela izixwayiso neseluleko okungokomBhalo futhi ulungiselele ukusinda ekupheleni kwalesi simiso
Uma uthatha isinyathelo manje unokholo kuJehova, ungaba nekusasa eliqhakazile nalabo abayosinda kulokho
okumiselwe lelizwe (Hu 37:37-40)

All Rights ReservedIZINDABA EZINHLE EZWENI ELINOBUDLOVA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Lapho ukhulumela ubudlova bosuku lwanamuhla, qokomisa lokho iZwi likaNkulunkulu elikushoyo ngomsuka wo-
budlova. Gcizelela ithemba lezwe elisha lokuthula elivezwa yiBhayibheli. Khuluma ngokuqiniseka ngethemba le-
sikhathi esizayo elisekelwe eBhayibhelini
ELITHI “ELINOBUDLOVA” LILICHAZA NGOKUFANELE IZWE ELISIZUNGEZILE NAMUHLA (7 imiz.)
Abaningi bethu bake baba (noma bazi abantu abake baba) izisulu zobudlova ngokuqondile
[Lapha nakamuva, ungase usebenzise izibonelo zendawo zamuva]
Ubudlova buvame kakhulu kangangokuba buthinta imisebenzi yethu yansuku zonke—indlela yokuhamba, isi-
khathi okungafanele uphumele ngaso ngaphandle, lokho okufanele ukugweme
Imikhaya eminingi iwohlozwa ubudlova basekhaya—ukuxhashazwa kwabantwana, ukuxhashazwa umngane
womshado, ubuhlobo bobulili phakathi kwezihlobo
I-United States iye yabizwa ngokuthi inhloko-dolobha yokubulala yamazwe ezezimboni (g90-ZU 10/22 28)
Abasha, abadala, abesilisa, abesifazane, bangase bazizwe ngendlela uJobe azizwa ngayo (Funda uJobe 19:7)
Kuwo wonke umhlaba, ukubulala, ubuphekula, nezingxabano zezinhlanga kwanda ngokuqhubekayo
Akubhebhethekiswa izigebengu nje kuphela kodwa futhi nabashisekeli bezombangazwe, benkolo, nabanye
Abantu abaningi namaqembu kubonakala befanelana nencazelo yababi ekuzAga 4:16, 17 (Funda)
Ngokuvamile, kulimala izakhamuzi ezinokuthula nezibukeli ezingenacala
Kushiya abantu bephelelwe ithemba, benovalo lokuthi kusazovela ubudlova obubi nakakhulu
Ukuze siqonde ukuthi iziphi izindaba ezinhle ezitholakalayo naphezu kwalobu budlova, kudingeka sicabangele
isizinda sabo
SIYINI ISIZINDA SALOBU BUDLOVA BEZWE? (10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli libika izikhathi zokungabi namthetho nobudlova zangesikhathi esidlule futhi linikeza ukuqonda nge-
mbangela yangempela
Ukuhlola izenzakalo zangalezo zikhathi kungasikhanyisela ngezenzakalo zanamuhla
Kwaqubuka ubudlova ngaphambi kweSikhukhula (Funda uGenesise 6:5, 11)
Kumelwe ukuba ubudlova obukhulu babangelwa izingelosi ezonakele nenzalo yazo enamandla (Gen 6:2, 4)
Ukuba wawuphila ngaphambi kweSikhukhula, wawuyothinteka kanjani?
Ingabe wawuyoba nomuzwa wokuthi kudingeka ube namandla ukuze usinde?
Noma, ingabe wawuyothembela kuNkulunkulu njengethemba lakho lokuqeda ubudlova?
Kuyakhuthaza ukuphawula ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayengathokozi nakancane ngobudlova
Wayenenjongo yokubuqeda, futhi wenza kanjalo (Gen 6:7, 8)
IJerusalema ngaphambi kuka-70 C.E. lalingenye indawo enobudlova
AmaJuda ayethi akhulekela uJehova, kodwa abaholi babethambekele ekuhlukaniseni abantu babe amaqembu,
okwaholela ngisho nasekuvukeleni (IzE 5:36, 37)
UNkulunkulu amshaya indiva, njengoba ubutha obungokwenkolo nezinhloso zobugovu zazithatha indawo
yokuqala
Njengoba kwabikezelwa, ‘ukwanda kokungabi namthetho’ kwakuhlanganisa ukushushiswa kwamaKristu ngo-
budlova (Mat 24:12; IzE 7:58; 8:1-3)
Ekugcineni kwaholela ekuvukeleni ngobudlova iRoma, okwaholela ekubhujisweni kwaso sonke isimiso sobu-
Juda (it-2 47-8)
Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi umlando wagcwala izikhathi ezinobudlova, ezifinyelela emvuthwandaba namuhla
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni kaSathane, ozama ukulawula ukucabanga nezenzo zabo
bonke abantu (1Jo 5:19)
Esebenzisa imithombo yezindaba uthuthukisa ‘ukuhlakanipha kwasemhlabeni,’ okobulwane, okobudemoni,
okunezingxabano, nokonakele (Jak 3:15, 16)
Ithelevishini namabhayisikobho kuveza abantu begwazwa, beshaywa, bedlwengulwa, bedutshulwa, beqothu-
lwa, bedutshulwa ngamabhomu; ubudlova buba umkhuba
Umphumela usobala—isizukulwane esinobudlova ngokwandayo esithambekele ebugebengwini (g87 4/8 30)
INGABE UNOMBONO KANKULUNKULU NOKAKRISTU NGOBUDLOVA? (8 imiz.)
Kulotshelwe isikhathi esizayo ukuthi uJehova uyomelana nanoma ubani othanda ubudlova (Funda iHubo 11:5)
Akakashintshi, ngisho nakuba abantu namuhla bemukela ubudlova njengento evamile
INdodana kaNkulunkulu ‘iyiNkosi yokuthula’ futhi lapho isemhlabeni ayizange yenze “indluzula” (Isa 9:6, 7; 53:9)
Lokhu kusinikeza isizathu sokulindela ukuthi lapho uJesu ekhipha isahlulelo sikaNkulunkulu kwababi, ize-
nzo zakhe ziyoba nokulunga
No. 85-ZU
9/01UNkulunkulu manje unikeza abantu ithuba lokuphenduka ebudloveni ukuze bamukeleke kuye
Lifana nethuba elanikezwa abantu baseNineve lokuba baphenduke ‘endleleni embi nasebudloveni obusezandle-
ni zabo’ (Jon 3:8)
Lapho esenze lolu shintsho, umuntu kufanele akhumbule iseluleko esikuzAga 3:31, 32 (Funda)
Ababi bangase bazuze ingcebo, ukuvelela, noma amandla, kodwa abanaso isibusiso sokusondelana noMdali
Njengoba sibona izwe liqhubeka liba nobudlova kakhulu, singase sibuze: Siphokophelephi? Ingabe zikhona izi-
ndaba ezinhle namuhla?
NAKUBA IZWE LINOBUDLOVA, ZIKHONA IZINDABA EZINHLE! (20 imiz.)
Lapho ebona ubudlova nobubi eJerusalema, uHabakuki waphazamiseka kakhulu (Funda uHabakuki 1:2, 3)
Ngokufanayo, singaphazamiseka futhi sidumale, sinomuzwa wokuthi alikho ithemba, azikho izindaba ezinhle
Kodwa zikhona izindaba ezinhle!
Okokuqala, uJehova noJesu bayabuqaphela ubudlova obukhona
Baphakeme kakhulu kunababi futhi bayabona (IzA 15:3)
Ukuqedwa kobudlova nobubi ngokuphelele kuzofika ngokushesha, futhi singaphawulelwa ukulondolozwa—ngo-
kuqinisekile lokho kuyizindaba ezinhle!
UJehova wakuphawula okwakwenzeka eJerusalema futhi wathatha isinyathelo ngokulunga, ebhubhisa lomu-
zi ngo-607 B.C.E. (Hez 8:17; kj 154-6, 165-71)
Ngaphambi kokuba uJehova angenele ngamandla, labo ababecindezelekile ngenxa yezimo baphawulelwa uku-
londolozwa (Hez 9:4)
Abakholekile njengoBaruki, u-Ebedi-Meleki, namaRekabi basinda
Namuhla abantu abesatshiswa ubudlova bezwe futhi abafuna ukukhonza uJehova ngeqiniso nabo bangalondo-
lozwa
Kunezinto esingazenza ukuze siqiniseke ukuthi siyasinda ekupheleni kwezwe elinobudlova—nalokho futhi ku-
yizindaba ezinhle!
Njengoba izwe elinobudlova langaphambi kweSikhukhula libhujiswa, uNowa nomkhaya wakhe babazi ukuthi
yini okwakumelwe bayenze ukuze basinde, futhi benze “njalo” (Gen 6:13-22)
Njengoba ubudlova babanda eJerusalema ngaphambi kuka-70 C.E., amaKristu, exwayiswe kusengaphambili,
ayazi ukuthi yini okwakumelwe ayenze (Luk 19:43, 44; 21:20, 21)
Kwakungamelwe nje kuphela agweme ukuba nobudlova kodwa futhi kwakumelwe alalele isixwayiso—lo-
kho kwakusho ukusinda nokulondolozwa kwawo
Ukukhululwa kwethu ebudloveni namuhla akusho ukubalekela endaweni ethile ekhethekile noma ukumane
sibe abantu abangabuthandi ubudlova
NjengoNowa namaKristu ekhulu lokuqala, isinyathelo esiqondile esivumelana nokholo esiluzuze ngokuta-
disha iBhayibheli siyosho ukulondolozwa kwethu siphila (Heb 10:23-25, 39)
Siyolondolozwa singene ezweni elisha, eliyobe lingenabo ububi nobudlova—lezo izindaba ezinhle ngempela! (Hu
72:7, 8, 14)
Ngaphansi kokubusa kukaKristu okunokuthula, ubudlova buyobe bungasekho
Ababi nabathanda ubudlova ngeke bavunyelwe ukuba babe ingxenye yezwe elisha, kodwa bayobhujiswa (IsA
21:8)
Kwangathi isimo sakho sengqondo ngobudlova nezenzo zakho ekukhonzeni uNkulunkulu zingakwenza ukwazi
ukuthola indawo lapho (Funda iHubo 72:18, 19)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 85-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45IMITHANDAZO EZWIWA UNKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Qinisekisa izilaleli ukuthi uNkulunkulu weqiniso uyayizwa futhi athathe isinyathelo ngemithandazo ehlangabe-
zana nezimfuneko zeBhayibheli. Sebenzisa izibonelo zeBhayibheli ukuze ubonise indlela uJehova ayiphendula
ngayo imithandazo. Ungase futhi ubheke ama-Index eNhlangano ngaphansi kwesithi “PRAYER” ukuze uthole
okuhlangenwe nakho kosuku lwanamuhla okubonisa indlela uNkulunkulu ayiphendula ngayo imithandazo
ABANTU BAZO ZONKE IZINKOLO BAYATHANDAZA (3 imiz.)
Kodwa imithandazo eminingi ayiphendulwa
Imithandazo yokucela ukuthula kwezwe ayiphendulwa (w92-ZU 3/1 6)
Ngezikhathi zempi, zombili izinhlangothi ziyathandaza; “kuphumelela” uhlangothi olulodwa
Kungokufanayo nangabancintisani bezemidlalo abathandazayo (g94-ZU 2/8 31)
“Abekho abangakholelwa ebukhoneni bukaNkulunkulu emigodini yokucasha yamasosha,” kodwa kubulawa
amasosha amaningi (g67-ZU 2/8 5 [g66 7/8 5])
Kodwa uNkulunkulu uyabezwa abafuna iqiniso ngobuqotho (1Kh 8:41-43; IzE 10:31)
KUDINGEKA IQONDISWE KUNKULUNKULU WEQINISO, NGOKRISTU, NGESISUSA ESIFANELE (10 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu weqiniso, uJehova; kumelwe sibize igama lakhe (IzE 2:21)
Bonke abanye onkulunkulu bayize, abanamandla (Hu 115:4-8)
Imithandazo eqondiswa kubo iyize (1Kh 18:26-29)
Kumelwe yenziwe ngoJesu Kristu (Joh 14:6; 16:23)
Kumelwe kube umuntu omfuna ngobuqotho uNkulunkulu (Heb 11:6)
Kudingeka ukuthanda ukulunga (IzA 15:29; qhathanisa no-Isa 1:15)
Kudingeka ukuthobeka (Hu 138:6)
Kumelwe siphikelele (Luk 18:1-8)
Akwamukeleki ukwazi ngekhanda futhi sisebenzise amazwi afanayo ngokuphindaphindiwe
KUMELWE IMITHANDAZO IBE NGEYEZINTO EZIFANELE FUTHI INGAGWEGWESI (15 imiz.)
Sithandazele ukunqoba kokulunga phezu kwezitha zikaNkulunkulu (Hu 83:1, 2, 16-18)
Sithandazele ukungcweliswa kwegama likaNkulunkulu (Mat 6:9)
Ukuba uMbuso uze, intando kaNkulunkulu yenziwe emhlabeni (Mat 6:10)
Ukuba umsebenzi woMbuso uchume (Mat 9:38; 2Th 3:1)
Sithandazele abazalwane: Abaholayo; abashushiswayo, abagulayo, abagugile (Hu 41:1-3; IzE 12:5)
Sithandazele izinto ezisithintayo
Intethelelo lapho siye sashiyeka khona (Mat 6:12)
Ukuhlakanipha kokubhekana nenkinga ethile (Jak 1:5-7)
Usizo lokunqoba isono noma ubuthakathaka obuthile (Jak 5:14, 15)
Ilungelo lokuqhuba isifundo seBhayibheli
Izidingo ezingokwenyama: Impilo, umsebenzi, njalonjalo
Kumelwe ivumelane nentando kaNkulunkulu (Mat 26:39; 1Jo 5:14)
UKUZE SIBONISE UBUQOTHO, UKUNGAGUQUGUQUKI, KUMELWE SISEBENZELE KULOKHO ESIKU-
THANDAZELAYO (10 imiz.)
Isibonelo sikaJakobe lapho ezohlangabezana no-Esawu (Gen 32:9-21)
Isibonelo sikaDavide lapho u-Abisalomu evukela (2Sa 15:31-34; 17:8-14)
Akwanele nje ukuthandazela ukuba nelungelo lokuqhuba isifundo seBhayibheli
Kumelwe sishiseke emsebenzini wendlu ngendlu nasekwenzeni izimpindelo
Umuntu kumelwe akhathalele ukuthuthukisa ukuphumelela kwakhe
Sitshale futhi sinisele ukuze uNkulunkulu akhulise (1Ko 3:5-7)
IZINDLELA UJEHOVA AZISEBENZISAYO UKUZE APHENDULE IMITHANDAZO (5 imiz.)
IZwi lakhe nomoya osebenzayo (Hu 119:105; Zak 4:6)
Isiqondiso nosizo lwezingelosi (Hu 34:7)
Amanxusa angabantu: iNhlangano, abadala, abafowethu
Ngezinye izikhathi angase enqabe lapho ephendula (2Ko 12:8, 9)
No. 86-ZU
1/95IMITHANDAZO YOKHOLO IYOTHOLA UKUNAKEKELA KWAPHEZULU NGOKUQINISEKILE (2 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lembula uJehova njengoMuzwi wemithandazo (Hu 65:2)
Ngakho uNkulunkulu ujabulela ukuvula umzila wokukhulumisana ngoKristu
Uqinisekisa abanxusayo ngokuthi imithandazo izocatshangelwa ngokufanele ngenxa yezinzuzo ezinhle (Jak
1:5)
(Phawula: Ama-Index eNhlangano anikeza izikhombo ezanele, njenge-w92-ZU 4/15 3-6; w91-ZU 9/15 3-8; w88-ZU
3/15 4-7, zokusekela okungenhla; sebenzisa imibhalo engenhla uma isikhathi sivuma)

No. 86-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45BUNJANI UBUHLOBO BAKHO NONKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Khuthaza umuntu ngamunye ukuba acabange ngobuhlobo bakhe siqu noNkulunkulu. Qokomisa lokho uNkulu-
nkulu akufunayo ukuze umuntu abe nokuvunyelwa kwaphezulu nendlela umuntu okumelwe enze ngayo ukuze
asekelwe uNkulunkulu
UBUHLOBO OBUHLE NONKULUNKULU BUBALULEKILE (5 imiz.)
Izazi-mlando nezazi zemvelaphi nenhlalo yabantu zithola ukuthi abantu banesifiso sokukhulekela (sh-ZU 19;
g89-ZU 8/8 6 [g89 3/22 6])
UJesu wathi: “Bayajabula abaqaphela isidingo sabo esingokomoya” (Mat 5:3)
Njengoba sidinga ukudla okunomsoco ukuze sibe nempilo enhle engokomzimba, siyabudinga nobuhlobo obu-
hle noNkulunkulu ukuze sibe nempilo enhle ngokomoya (sh-ZU 28)
Izinto azihambi kahle ngaso sonke isikhathi, ngakho sidinga usizo lwaphezulu
Ukubhekana nokugula, ubunzima, kungase kudinge amandla angaphezu kwawabantu
Isintu sisonke sidediselwe kude noNkulunkulu (Efe 2:1, 2)
Nokho, u-Enoke noNowa babehamba noNkulunkulu; u-Abrahama wayengumngane wakhe; uDavide wayenobu-
hlobo obuhle naye (Gen 5:22; 6:9; Isa 41:8; Hu 23:1)
Bunjani ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu? Ingabe bungathuthukiswa?
Ziyini izinzuzo zokuba nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu?
INDLELA ESIZUZA NGAYO NGOKUBA NOBUHLOBO OBUHLE NONKULUNKULU (8 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uyayiphendula imithandazo yalabo abamfuna ngobuqotho (Heb 11:6)
Isithunywa sevangeli esithile esinguFakazi e-Afrika sathi: “Ngithola injabulo enkulu njalo kusihlwa lapho
ingqondo yami isaphapheme, futhi lapho ngingedwa ngiye ngichithe isikhathi esithile ngingaphansi kwama-
zulu anezinkanyezi ngihambahamba futhi ngikhuluma noJehova. Lokhu kuye kwangisondeza eduze noJe-
hova.” (w73-ZU 11/15 511-12 [w73 174])
Ubuhlobo obuhle buthuthukisa izinga lokuphila kwethu (Caphuna okuhlangenwe nakho kokuphila okungoko-
qobo, njengalokho okuku-w90-ZU 5/15 21)
Ubuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu buyasivikela, ngoba siyesaba ukumdumaza (Hu 97:10)
Umuntu olingelwa ukuba enze ubufebe uyoqaphela ukuthi uma ekuvumela lokho uyoletha isihlamba nosizi
kuye ngokwakhe nakwabathandekayo futhi uyohlambalaza ibandla lobuKristu (IzA 7:1-27)
Ubuhlobo obuhle noJehova buyasisekela (Hu 121:1, 2)
Buvikela umuntu ekubeni akhubazwe ukwesaba abantu; bumenza athembele ekusekeleni kukaNkulunkulu
kungakhathaliseki ukuthi umphumela uba yini (w89-ZU 6/1 6)
Buzuzwa kanjani lobo buhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu?
UKUZUZA UBUHLOBO OBUHLE NONKULUNKULU (7 imiz.)
Kumelwe sakhe ukwesaba uJehova okufanele (IzA 9:10; it-1 818)
Khona-ke landela lezi zinyathelo ezibalulekile eziholela ebuhlotsheni obuhle noNkulunkulu:
(1) Ngenisa ulwazi olunembile futhi uvumelane nalo (Joh 17:3)
(2) Yiba nokholo kuNkulunkulu, kuKristu, nasesihlengweni (Joh 3:16)
(3) Ukuphenduka—ukudabuka okusuka enhliziyweni ngobubi besikhathi esidlule (Luk 5:32)
(4) Ukuguquka—ukushintsha, uphishekele inkambo yokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu (IzE 3:19)
(5) Ukunikezela ukuphila kwakho kuNkulunkulu, okwenziwa ngomthandazo (Mar 8:34)
(6) Ukubhapathizwa njengophawu lokuzinikezela kuJehova (Mat 28:19)
Uma ungakazithathi lezi zinyathelo, awukabi nobuhlobo obuphelele noNkulunkulu, obuholela ensindisweni
(w89-ZU 1/15 15-16)
UKUZIPHATHA OKUHLE KUDINGEKILE UKUZE ULONDOLOZE UBUHLOBO OBUHLE NONKULUNKU-
LU (12 imiz.)
Qhubeka utadisha iBhayibheli, uba khona emihlanganweni (Joh 6:63; Hu 26:12)
Thembela kuNkulunkulu ngemithandazo eqotho, engagunci (Fil 4:6, 7)
Yamukela isiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu ngeZwi lakhe, isiqondiso saphezulu, umoya, izingelosi, inhlangano ebona-
kalayo (IzA 3:5, 6; 16:9; IsA 14:6)
Themba uNkulunkulu, usabele othandweni lwakhe nakwezinye izimfanelo zakhe (Hu 107:8)
Ngokuthobeka yamukela isiyalo sikaNkulunkulu (Heb 12:4-11)
Kungenzeka ukuthi uJehova uyasihlunga ukuze asisebenzise esikhathini esizayo, njengoba kwaba njalo ngo-
Mose
Kumelwe sithethelele, uma kungenjalo uNkulunkulu ngeke asithethelele (Mat 6:14, 15)
Yilwa nokuthambekela kokufukamela inzondo (1Ko 13:4, 5)
Thanda abazalwane (1Jo 4:20, 21)
No. 87-ZU
1/95Funa ukuthokozisa uNkulunkulu ngisho nasezintweni ezincane (Luk 16:10)
Gcina ubuqotho kuJehova (Hu 26:1)
UBUHLOBO OBUHLE BUFUNA UKUBA SIBE YIZISEBENZI KANYE NONKULUNKULU (10 imiz.)
Yiba nesithakazelo kulokho uNkulunkulu akukhathalela ngokuyinhloko—ukuxazulula impikiswano yobukhosi
Ukuphila okuhlanzekile nokubonisa uthando lomakhelwane ezintweni ezivamile akwanele
Kumelwe ufakaze ngegama nezinjongo zikaJehova (Isa 43:10)
Bambisana nesigqila esikholekile nesiqondayo esiqondisa umsebenzi wokushumayela ngoMbuso (Mat 24:14, 45-47)
Yenza lomsebenzi ngentshiseko; ungazigodli (Luk 13:24)
Uma ungakabhapathizwa kodwa ufuna ukuhlanganyela kulomsebenzi ojabulisayo, khuluma nabadala beba-
ndla
Lapho sishiseka kakhulu enkonzweni engcwele, yilapho nobuhlobo bethu noNkulunkulu buba ngcono nenjabu-
lo yethu yanda (Thi 2:13, 14)
Kunokwaneliseka okukhulu ekusebenzeni noNkulunkulu (1Ko 3:6-9)
Yini enye edingekayo?
QHUBEKA USEBENZELA UKUTHUTHUKISA UBUHLOBO BAKHO NONKULUNKULU (3 imiz.)
Zikhandle ukuze ujulise ubuhlobo bakho noNkulunkulu
Mazi kangcono uNkulunkulu ngokutadisha ngenkuthalo, ukuya emihlanganweni
Ungalokothi uzithathe kalula izinzuzo zokuba nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu
Londoloza ukukhulumisana okuhle, ungalokothi ube matasa kakhulu ukuba uthandaze
Bambisana ‘nesigqila esikholekile’ ukuze ube nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu
Zigcine umatasa enkonzweni engcwele, ngentshiseko ushumayela isigijimi soMbuso
Hlwanyela kakhulu futhi uyovuna kakhulu (2Ko 9:6)
Ngalezo zindlela, yizwa futhi ubone indlela uJehova amuhle ngayo ngempela! (Hu 34:8)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 87-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KUNGANI KUMELWE SIPHILE NGEZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ngokucacile indlela ukuphila ngezindinganiso zeBhayibheli okuthuthukisa ngayo izinga lokuphila. Chaza
ukuthi izinkinga abaningi ababhekana nazo ngokuvamile zibangelwa ukuhluleka kwabo siqu ukusebenzisa izindi-
nganiso zeBhayibheli, behlosile noma bengahlosile. Lapho ucabangela isihlokwana esandulela esokugcina, veza
amakhophi ahlukahlukene e-Nqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama!, futhi udonsele ukunakekela ekwazisweni okuwu-
sizo okulapho
IZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI ZIVELA KUNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Sekuyisikhathi eside iBhayibheli lidunyiswa njengesiqondiso esivela kuNkulunkulu
U-Abraham Lincoln, umongameli we-16 wase-United States wathi: “Ngikholelwa ukuthi iBhayibheli liyisipho
esingcono kakhulu uNkulunkulu ake wasipha umuntu”
UWilliam E. Gladstone, isazi sokuphathwa kwezwe saseBrithani sekhulu le-19 wathi: “IBhayibheli liphawule-
ka ngokuba neMvelaphi Ekhethekile, futhi lihlukaniswa ngebanga elingenakulinganiswa nazo zonke ezinye
izincwadi eziphikisana nalo”
 ́
UNapoleon Bonaparte, umbusi waseFrance wathi: “IBhayibheli aliyona nje incwadi engasho lutho, kodwa li-
yisiDalwa Esiphilayo, esinamandla okunqoba konke okuphikisana naso” (w92-ZU 5/15 3)
Izindinganiso zeBhayibheli zihlala njalo, ngoba uMthombo wazo uMdali, uJehova (Isa 40:8)
Ziye zanikezwa uNkulunkulu ngenxa yothando ngendalo yakhe engabantu (Isa 48:17, 18)
Siyakhuthazwa, asiphoqelelwa, ukuba silalele izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu
Lapho zilalelwa, umphumela uba ukuthula nenjabulo (IzA 3:1, 2)
IZIMO ZEZWE ZIBONISA UBUWULA BOKUNGAZINAKI IZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI (10 imiz.)
Iningi lesintu likhetha ukungazinaki izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu (Hu 14:1-3)
Kunokuba kwande uthando nokuthula, kwanda ubudlova nobuphekula (w90-ZU 10/1 4-5)
Ubugovu buyanda, okuphumela ekonakalisweni komhlaba
Ukudla, umoya, amanzi, nenhlabathi kuye kwangcoliswa
Nakuba kunokwanele kwabo bonke, ubumpofu nokuntuleka kokudla kukhokhobela umhlaba (g91-ZU 5/8 28)
Ukuwohloka kokuziphatha kuye kwalethela kokubili abasha nabadala ukuhlupheka okwengeziwe (g92-ZU 1/22
3, 8-9)
Ukuqina komkhaya kuyaqhubeka kusongelwa njengoba izehlukaniso zanda
Ukuluthwa izidakamizwa kuye kwaholela abaningi ekuziphatheni okubi nasebugebengwini
Ingculaza nezinye izifo ezithathelwana ngobulili ziletha usizi futhi zibhubhise amanani andayo okuphila
Ukuhaha nokuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo ‘kuphonsa abantu embubhisweni nasencithakalweni’ (1Ti 6:9, 10)
Ukuzibulala okwandayo, ikakhulukazi phakathi kwentsha, kubonisa ukuhluleka ukubhekana nezinkinga lapho
izindinganiso zeBhayibheli zinganakwa
Ngempela, umuntu ‘akanakuziqondisa izinyathelo zakhe’ (Jer 10:23)
IBHAYIBHELI LISINIKA IZINDINGANISO EZISEBENZA KUZO ZONKE IZICI ZOKUPHILA (15 imiz.)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi singobani noma ukuthi siyini isikhundla sethu ekuphileni, kunezindinganiso zeBha-
yibheli ezisithintayo
Ubuhlobo bomkhaya (Efe 5:22-25, 28, 33; 6:1-4)
Amadoda, njengezinhloko zemikhaya, kumelwe athande omkawo njengemizimba yawo futhi akhulise izi-
ngane ukuba zilandele izindinganiso zeBhayibheli
Abafazi kumelwe bazithobe emadodeni
Abantwana kufanele bahloniphe futhi balalele abazali “ebunyeni neNkosi”
Ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu
Konke ukuziphatha okubi ngokobulili kumelwe kugwenywe (Heb 13:4)
Ukusebenzelana kumelwe kuqhutshwe ngokwethembeka neqiniso
Yenza okuhle ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi uzame ukuphila ngokuthula nabo bonke (Rom 12:17, 18, 21)
Ubuhlobo phakathi komqashi nomqashwa (Bheka isimiso esikweyabase-Efesu 6:5-7, 9)
Abaqashi kumelwe baphathe abaqashwa ngobulungisa
Abaqashwa kumelwe babe izisebenzi eziqotho
Ubuhlobo nawohulumeni
Kumelwe sizithobe futhi sinikeze amagunya aphakeme okuwafanele (Rom 13:1, 5-7)
Lezi zindinganiso uJesu uyazifingqa: Bonisa uthando ngoNkulunkulu nomakhelwane (Mat 22:37-40)
Uthando ngoNkulunkulu luyosishukumisela ukuba sivumelane nezindinganiso zakhe (1Jo 5:3)
Uthando ngomakhelwane luyosishukumisela ukuba senze izenzo ezinhle futhi sigweme izinto ezilimaza aba-
nye (Gal 6:10)
No. 88-ZU
1/95KUDINGEKA USIZO UKUZE SIPHILE NGEZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI (10 imiz.)
Kufanele simelane nethonya likaSathane nezwe elibi elisizungezile
Ngesikhathi esifanayo, kufanele sakhe ukwazisa ngoNkulunkulu nezindinganiso zakhe zokulunga (Hu 119:97)
Kudinga umzamo oqotho nesifundo senkuthalo seZwi likaNkulunkulu (2Ti 2:15)
Siqaphele isidingo esingokomoya
Zinike isikhathi sesifundo somuntu siqu
Qhubeka ufuna kuqala uMbuso kaNkulunkulu
Ukwesaba ukudumaza uNkulunkulu nakho kuyosivikela (IzA 8:13)
UJehova ulunge ngokuphelele; isono siyamdumaza
Ngeke ababekezelele abaphula izindinganiso zakhe zokulunga ngamabomu (2Th 1:8, 9)
Usizo luye lwalungiselelwa ngenhlangano kaJehova ebonakalayo
INqabayokulinda, i-Phaphama! nezinye izincwadi zigcizelela izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu
Imihlangano yebandla isishukumisela ukuba siphile ngalezi zindinganiso
Abadala bakulungele ukunikeza usizo lomuntu siqu
Thola usizo lomoya ongcwele ngomthandazo (Luk 11:13)
UKUPHILA NGEZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI KUNENGQONDO (5 imiz.)
Isimiso seBhayibheli esingaguquki siyiqiniso: Sivuna lokho esikuhlwanyelayo (Gal 6:7, 8)
Singazigwema izinkinga zalabo abangazinaki izindinganiso zeBhayibheli
UJehova usibheka futhi asebenzelane nathi ngokufanele (1Pe 3:10-12)
Ukuphila ngezindinganiso zeBhayibheli kuletha izibusiso
Kusho ukusindiswa kwethu nokwabanye (1Ti 4:8, 16)
Inkambo yethu ingabekela abanye isibonelo esikhuthazayo
Kuqinisekisa ubuhlobo obuhle noJehova
Kusilethela inzuzo yokuba nonembeza omuhle
Kufeza injongo esasiyidalelwe, ukuletha inkazimulo nodumo kuJehova
Kunikeza ithemba lezibusiso zesikhathi esizayo
Ngakho, kuyinkambo yokuhlakanipha ukuphila ngezindinganiso zeBhayibheli
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 88-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45WOZANI, NINA ENOMELE IQINISO!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukubaluleka kokusabela esimemweni sikaNkulunkulu sokuqeda ukoma kwazo okungokomo-
ya. Bonisa ngendlela engokoqobo ukuthi singakuthola kanjani ukuqabuleka okungokomoya emalungiselelweni
kaNkulunkulu
ISIMEMO ESIYINGQAYIZIVELE NAMUHLA SIYA EMHLABENI WONKE (3 imiz.)
Lesi simemo esikusAmbulo esokuthatha “amanzi okuphila” (IsA 22:17)
Lesi simemo siyaphawuleka ngoba sivela emthonjeni ophakeme ngabalandeli bakaJesu abagcotshiwe
Laba bakha isigaba sikaJohane esihlangene (IsA 1:1-3)
Lesi simemo esimangalisayo besingavela kuJehova uNkulunkulu kuphela, omoya wakhe waqondisa uJoha-
ne ukuba abhale lamazwi esimemo
Izigidi esezisamukele kakade lesi simemo futhi zenza ngokuvumelana naso manje zihlanganyela ekusidlulisele-
ni kwabanye
Iqiniso elingokwenkolo liyingxenye ‘yamanzi okuphila,’ elihlanganisa lonke ilungiselelo likaNkulunkulu lensi-
ndiso ngalabo abamthandayo
UKUTHOLA IQINISO ELINGOKWENKOLO KUBALULEKILE NAMUHLA (6 imiz.)
Ziningi izimfundiso ezingokwenkolo ezingamanga namuhla
Umphumela uba ukungcola okungokomoya, ukudebesela okungokomoya, kamuva kube ukufa kwabakhulekeli
Ngokwesibonelo, imfundiso yokungafi komphefumulo iphikisana neqiniso leBhayibheli
Iyona ebangela amaphutha angokwenkolo anjengesihogo somlilo, isihlanzo, ukuguqulwa komphefumulo ube
esinye isimo, kanye nokukhuluma nabantu abafile okucatshangelwayo
Iqiniso leBhayibheli liyakulungisa lokho (Gen 2:7; Hez 18:4; Dut 18:9-13)
Amanzi eqiniso ayaqabula, ahlanze ekungcoleni okungokwenkolo, anikeze ithemba lokuphila okuphakade (Efe
5:25-27; Joh 4:10-14)
Uma siliqonda kahle, iBhayibheli lisifundisa indlela yokukhulekela uNkulunkulu ngomoya nangeqiniso (Joh
4:24)
Labo abasabelayo bayahlanzwa bahlanzeke ekungcoleni okungokwenkolo, bayaqatshulwa, bakhululwe ebu-
gqilini obungokomoya (Joh 8:32)
Bayajabula ngokuba nethemba eliqinisekile lokuphila emhlabeni omusha
Isimemo sokuthatha “amanzi okuphila” sisadluliswa
KUBALULEKILE UKUHLAKULELA UKOMELA IQINISO ELINGOKWENKOLO (15 imiz.)
Bayajabula labo abaqaphela isidingo esingokomoya (Mat 5:3)
Kumelwe uwenqabe amanga angokwenkolo, womele iqiniso, ufune ulwazi kuNkulunkulu (IzA 2:3-5)
Ukoma okungokoqobo kufanele kuqedwe ukuze siphile
Ngokufanayo, ukoma okungokomoya kufanele kwaneliswe ukuze siphile phakade
Umphostoli uPetru weluleka ngokuthi ngamunye wethu kufanele ‘akhe ukulangazelela ubisi olungonakalisiwe
olungolwezwi,’ noma alomele (1Pe 2:2)
Abanye abanakho lokhu kulangazelela; badinga usizo ukuze bazizwe bomile
Enye indlela inhlangano kaJehova ekwakha ngayo ukomela iqiniso ingokunyathelisa izincwadi zeBhayibheli
Yakha ukomela iqiniso okukhudlwana ngokufunda izincwadi nangokutadisha njalo (w86-ZU 5/15 12-20)
Bekela eceleni isikhathi sokufunda izincwadi ezintsha, bese unamathela kuleso simiso
Ukutadisha kungathakazelisa uma ukulandisa kubonwa ngeso lengqondo (Hlu 7:19-22)
Ukuhlobanisa amaphuzu amasha namadala nakho kuwusizo; bukeza amaphuzu
Unganeliswa nje ‘ubisi lwezwi’ (Heb 5:12-14)
Kudingeka utadishe izincwadi ezinjengethi Umvuthwandaba WesAmbulo
Enye indlela inhlangano kaNkulunkulu esisiza ngayo ukuba sakhe lokhu koma ingokulungiselela imihlangano
eyakhayo yebandla, yesifunda, neyesigodi
Injabulo itholakala ngokuhlangana ndawonye (Neh 8:12)
Lalela isikhuthazo sokuba khona njalo emihlanganweni
 ́
Yenza umzamo ongathi sına, nowomthandazo wokwakha ukoma okungokomoya
Akwakheki kalula, ngoba ukuthambekela kwenyama nokwezwe kuwubutha kuNkulunkulu (Rom 8:6-8; 1Jo
2:16, 17)
Abantu abakhuthazeki ukuba baqaphele isidingo esingokomoya, ngoba uSathane uzama ukubaphuphutheki-
sa (2Ko 4:4)
Ngenxa yalokho, abantu abaningi bafana nenhlabathi embi (Mat 13:3-7)
Ungafana nenhlabathi enhle ethelayo (Mat 13:8)
No. 89-ZU
1/95Zibuze: Ingabe ngiyalomela iqiniso elingokwenkolo?
Uma uhlanganyela noFakazi BakaJehova, ulomela ngobuqotho kangakanani ulwazi olunembile lweqiniso li-
kaNkulunkulu?
Ungafani nabathile asebehlanganyele iminyaka eminingi kodwa abasanamathele ezimfundisweni zamanga,
emikhosini yokugubha izinsuku zokuzalwa namaholide, njalonjalo
Nqamula ubudlelwane nabantu noma izinhlangano eziyophambukisa ukunakekela kwakho imigomo engoko-
moya
Njengoba nje ungenakuphila ngaphandle kwamanzi, awunakukujabulela ukuphila okuphakade ngaphandle ko-
kuba wanelise isidingo ‘samanzi okuphila’
Ngokutadisha, ngokuba khona emihlanganweni, nangomthandazo, yakha futhi wanelise ukomela iqiniso
UKUQEDA UKOMELA IQINISO NGESIHLE (15 imiz.)
Izigidi zezigidi namuhla zisebugqilini beBabiloni Elikhulu, umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga
Bakhokha izimali ezinkulu kodwa basale bomile ngokomoya (w88-ZU 2/15 21; w87-ZU 5/1 10-11; w86-ZU
12/1 28)
Ubuhle bolwazi lweqiniso elingokwenkolo buwukuthi lutholakala ngesihle
Phawula lokhu njengoba sifunda u-Isaya 55:1-4
Lombhalo ngokuyinhloko ugcwaliseka kofakazi abagcotshiwe bakaJehova (Man’s Salvation kk. 95-9)
Phakathi neMpi Yezwe I (1914-18), iBabiloni Elikhulu labenza baba ngaphansi kwamandla alo ngokusebe-
nzisa amashende alo ezwe, njengoba nje iBabiloni lalithumbe abantu bakaNkulunkulu basendulo
AmaKristu agcotshiwe ayebheke ukubhujiswa kwezwe elibi; kodwa akuzange kwenzeke, futhi adumala
kakhulu
NgoJesu Kristu, uNkulunkulu walungiselela amanzi aqeda ukoma enza abantu bakhe abomile baba nokuphi-
la nethemba
Isigijimi esingokomBhalo sasingesokukhululwa eBabiloni Elikhulu ngoMbuso omisiwe wobuMesiya
Njengomfula, iqiniso elinjalo elingokwenkolo liyaqhubeka ligelezela ezigidini zabantu, ngaphandle kwentengo
Kuze kube namuhla lamanzi asanikezwa ngesihle emhlabeni wonke emazweni angaphezu kuka-200 nangezi-
limi ezingaphezu kuka-200
(Ngokususela kwethi INcwadi Yonyaka yamuva, yisho izibalo ezikhuphukile zabamemezeli, inani lababese-
Sikhumbuzweni, isikhathi esachithwa kunikezwa abantu amanzi eqiniso, njll.)
IZIBUSISO ZOKUQEDA UKOMELA IQINISO ELINGOKWENKOLO (6 imiz.)
Uma womele iqiniso elingokwenkolo, yenza okuthile ngakho manje
Ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu seluqalile ukugcwala emhlabeni (Isa 11:9)
Luyoqhubeka kuze kube sekufikeni kweMinyaka Eyinkulungwane (Dan 12:3, 4)
Izibusiso ezingenakuphela ziyoba khona nakanjani ngaphansi kokubusa koMbuso (IsA 22:17)
Manje isikhathi sokuqeda ukomela iqiniso elingokwenkolo
Balekela iBabiloni Elikhulu elikhungethwe indlala (Amo 8:11, 12)
Hlanganyela nabantu bakaNkulunkulu epharadesi elingokomoya (Isa 49:8-10; IsA 7:16, 17; Umvuthwandaba
WesAmbulo kk. 126-7)
Kushisekele ukuphuza ngokujulile “emthonjeni wamanzi okuphila” (IsA 21:6b; Umvuthwandaba WesAmbu-
lo k. 304)
Wozani, nina enomele iqiniso, niphuze ngesihle!
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe.)
No. 89-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45FINYELELA UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Qhathanisa umbono wezwe ‘wokuphila kwangempela’ nalokho uJehova uNkulunkulu akuthembisayo eZwini la-
khe elilotshiwe. Siza izilaleli ziqaphele indlela okunenjongo nokwanelisa ngayo ukuphila ukuphila kwethu ngo-
kuvumelana nenjongo kaNkulunkulu manje
UMBONO WEZWE WOKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA (6 imiz.)
Abanye bacabanga ukuthi baphila ngempela ngokuphishekela injabulo
Bangase bafune injabulo ngentshiseko kangangokuthi bangathi: “Masidleni siphuze, ngoba kusasa sizokufa”
(1Ko 15:32)
Ngokuvamile abayinaki impilo, umkhaya, ikakhulukazi inhlalakahle yabo engokomoya
Ngenxa yalokho abaningi bafanelana nencazelo yalabo bangezinsuku zokugcina ‘abangabathandi benjabu-
lo kunokuba abathandi bakaNkulunkulu’ (2Ti 3:1-4)
USolomoni akatholanga ukuphila kwangempela enjabulweni, empahleni, kodwa wabona ukuthi izinto ezinjalo
ziyize (Shu 2:17; it-2 250)
Abanye futhi bayazi ukuthi ukuphila kwangempela akutholakali empahleni eyizinto ezibonakalayo
Usozigidi waseMelika noyisazi sezombangazwe uH. Ross Perot watshela abafundi baseHarvard Business
School: “Uma nenza imali eningi, uma nihamba niyothenga izinto eziningi—kuzophela. . . . Izinto onazo azi-
sho ukuthi uzothola injabulo” (Fortune, September 11, 1989, k. 50)
Usosayensi u-Albert Einstein wathi: “Impahla, impumelelo yangaphandle, ukwaziwa, ukunethezeka—bengi-
lokhu ngizenyanya lezi zinto. Ngikholelwa ukuthi indlela yokuphila elula yesizotha ingengcono kakhulu
kuwo wonk’ umuntu” (The New Dictionary of Thoughts, k. 622)
Njengoba ukuphila kwangempela kungahlangene nokuphishekela injabulo nempahla, kuyini ngempela?
LOKHO UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA OKUYIKHO (5 imiz.)
Umphostoli uPawulu wakhuluma ngokuphila kwangempela kweyoku-1 Thimothewu isahluko 6
UPawulu waluleka uThimothewu ukuba aphishekele izimfanelo zokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu, abambisise uku-
phila okuphakade (Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 6:11, 12)
Kufanele sithembele kuNkulunkulu, sizibekelele isisekelo esihle sekusasa ukuze sibambisise ukuphila kwa-
ngempela (Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 6:17-19)
Ukuhlaziya amazwi kaPawulu kuyasisiza ekutholeni ukuthi “ukuphila kwangempela” kuyini
Eyoku-1 Thimothewu 6:12 ithi: ‘Bambisisa ukuphila okuphakade’
Ivesi 19 likhuluma ‘ngokubambisisa ukuphila kwangempela’
Ngakho-ke, ukuphila kwangempela kuwukuphila okuphakade okuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu
Kuwukuphila kwasezulwini okungenakufa kubalandeli bakaJesu abagcotshiwe
Ngabanye, kuwukuphila kwaphakade ePharadesi emhlabeni (Luk 23:43)
INDLELA YOKUBAMBISISA UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA NOKUKULONDOLOZA (17 imiz.)
Kumelwe samukele isihlengo, sizinikele ngokugcwele kuNkulunkulu ngemva kokuthatha izinyathelo eziholela
obhapathizweni (it-2 249; w93-ZU 4/1 5-6)
Kuyadingeka ukufakazela ukholo ngemisebenzi emihle (Jak 2:26; rs-ZU 113-14)
Kubalulekile ukuba nengxenye emsebenzini omuhle wokushumayela ngoMbuso (1Ti 6:12b)
Kumelwe sisebenze ukuze sihlale sikubambisisile ukuphila kwangempela
Sigxilise ingqondo ezintweni ezingokomoya, siqaphe inhliziyo (Kol 3:2; IzA 4:23; it-2 249)
Kudingeka sibulale izifiso zenyama futhi sihlakulele izithelo zomoya kaNkulunkulu (Kol 3:5; Gal 5:22, 23)
Kumelwe sigweme ukuthanda izwe (w86-ZU 7/15 13; funda eyoku-1 Johane 2:15-17)
Kubalulekile ‘ukuphikelela emthandazweni’ (Rom 12:12)
Esinye isici esibalulekile siwukucela uNkulunkulu: “Ungasifaki esilingweni, kodwa usikhulule komubi,” uSa-
thane (Mat 6:13; w90-ZU 1/15 5-6)
UNkulunkulu uyakuvumela ukuba sivivinywe kodwa akasilingi ngokubi noma asiyeke silingwe ngoku-
ngaphezu kwesingakuthwala (Jak 1:13; 1Ko 10:13)
UJehova akasiholeli “esilingweni” ngokusixwayisa ngobubi nangokuseluleka ngokuthi yini ezosehlela
uma sihlanganyela kubo
Ngokwesibonelo, kweyoku-1 Thimothewu 6:9, 10 iZwi likaNkulunkulu lixwayisa ngokuthi ukuthanda
imali kungaholela ezintweni ezilimazayo futhi libonisa ukuthi lokhu kungasenza sidukiswe okholweni
Ngemva kokuthandaza, gwema izimo eziletha izilingo
Umoya wokuzidela nokuthembela ngokugcwele kuNkulunkulu nakho kuyasisiza ekuhlaleni sibambisise uku-
phila kwangempela
Ngenxa yokuthi uRuthe owayezidela wakhetha ukukhulekela kweqiniso, uNkulunkulu wamupha “umvu-
zo opheleleyo” njengokhokhokazi kaJesu (Rut 2:12; Mat 1:1, 5)
No. 90-ZU
3/03SIZA ABANYE BAFINYELELE UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA (6 imiz.)
Ngomoya wokuzidela, singabasiza abanye ukuba “babambisise ukuphila kwangempela” (1Ti 6:19)
Ngesifundo somkhaya sasikhathi sonke, ukuya emihlanganweni, nokuhlanganyela enkonzweni, sisiza imikhaya
yethu siqu ukuba yazise izinto ezingokomoya futhi ibambe ukuphila kwangempela
Umsebenzi wethu wokushumayela usiza abanye ukuba babambe ukuphila kwangempela futhi usinikeza injabu-
lo enkulu (Sebenzisa okuhlangenwe nakho kwe-Ncwadi Yonyaka yamuva)
Phakathi kwalabo abasiza abanye ukuba babambe ukuphila kwangempela kunezithunywa zevangeli eziqeqe-
shwe e-Watchtower Bible School of Gilead
 ̈
UMargarita Koniger uthi: “Angikaze ngizisole ngesinqumo sokusebenzisa ukuphila kwami enkonzweni ka-
Jehova. . . . Ngangingaphishekela umsebenzi ovuzayo ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo, kodwa lokhu ngikubhe-
ka njengokungelutho uma kuqhathaniswa nelungelo lokusiza abantu . . . bafunde iqiniso ngezinjongo zi-
kaNkulunkulu ezinhle” (w78 11/1 29; caphuna noF. E. Skinner, w90-ZU 1/1 28, isig. 1)
Noma yini esiyenzayo ukuze sisize abanye babambe ukuphila kwangempela iyavuza
BHEKA PHAMBILI EKUPHILENI KWANGEMPELA (8 imiz.)
Kuyasiza ukucabanga ngezibusiso zokuphila kwangempela
Ngenjabulo abagcotshiwe balindele ukuphila kokungafi ezulwini
Bayoba nemisebenzi lapho isintu siyiswa ekupheleleni, kanye namalungelo angemva kokuBusa Kweminya-
ka Eyinkulungwane (IsA 22:5; re-ZU 313)
Iningi labantu bakaJehova ngenjabulo libheke phambili ekuphileni okuphakade emhlabeni oyipharadesi
Zibone usindile ‘osizini olukhulu’ unengxenye ekwenzeni umhlaba ube ipharadesi (IsA 7:9, 14, 17)
Zibone ngeso lengqondo uhlala ePharadesi, lapho ujabulela khona umsebenzi ozuzisayo, ukudla nomoya
okungangcolisiwe, nalapho abantu abanezici zobulwane kanye nezilwane uqobo kungeke kukulimaze kho-
na (Isa 11:6-9; 65:21-23)
Awuboni matilongo, awuboni bantu abangenamakhaya, futhi injabulo yovuko ithatha indawo yobuhlungu
bokungcwaba (IsA 21:4; Joh 5:28, 29)
Ngasekupheleni kokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, sonke isintu siphelele futhi sihlala epharadesi eli-
nabele emhlabeni wonke (it-2 249)
UNkulunkulu uthi bakufanelekele ukuphila okuphakade labo abathembekile phakathi nokuvivinywa koku-
gcina (IsA 20:5-10; re-ZU 290; it-2 251)
Ukukhulekela kweqiniso kuyochuma, inhlalakahle yethu engokwengqondo nengokwenyama iyolokhu ilu-
ngiselelwa ukudla okungokomoya (it-2 247-8)
HLALA UKUBAMBISISILE UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA (3 imiz.)
Kulezi zinsuku zokugcina kuyingozi ukuzigcina simatasa ngokufuna nje kuphela imfundo ephakeme, ingcebo,
udumo, noma ukuphumelela okungokwezwe
Lokhu kungasilahlekisela ukuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu nokuphila kwangempela
Njengoba uZamcolo washanela isintu ngaphandle kukaNowa nomkhaya wakhe, nembubhiso iyofikela labo
‘abanganaki’ namuhla (Mat 24:36-42)
Masiqaphele ukuphuthuma kwalezi zinsuku (2Ko 6:2)
Bambisisa ukuphila kwangempela, hlale ukubambile, siza nabanye babambe ukuphila okunjalo
Lelo themba ligcine lisenhliziyweni ngesifundo, umthandazo, nokuzindla
Cabanga ngezibusiso ezingaphambili, futhi ungavumeli lutho lukuvimbele ekufinyeleleni ukuphila kwange-
mpela
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)

All Rights ReservedUKUBA KHONA KUKAMESIYA NOKUBUSA KWAKHE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ukuthi uJesu ngokuqinisekile unguMesiya ngokokugcwaliseka kwesiprofetho seBhayibheli. Chaza ukuthi
ukubuya kwakhe ekuleyo ndima kusho ukuthini ngesintu, ugcizelele izibusiso eziyotholwa yilabo abamukela indi-
ma yakhe njengoMesiya
UMESIYA—ITHEMBA ELISEKELWE EBHAYIBHELINI (5 imiz.)
‘Izwe limdinga ngempela umesiya,’ kusho umongameli we-Club of Rome, iqembu elidumile longqondongqondo
(w92-ZU 10/1 3)
Wayesho umsindisi onogazi kwezombangazwe, kwezesayensi, noma kwezenkolo owayezosindisa isintu enxu-
shunxushwini yezenhlalo nezomnotho
Ngokusobala, ababusi bezwe banamuhla abalinikezi ikhambi lezinkinga zobumpofu, indlala, inhlekelele yenda-
wo ezungezile, ukwehla kwamandla emali, njalonjalo
Futhi alikho ithemba lomkhululi wangempela
IBhayibheli likhomba uMesiya, noma Ogcotshiwe, njengesisekelo sethemba langempela
Leli gama lalisetshenziswa emakhosini nakubapristi bakwa-Israyeli (it-1 113; w92-ZU 10/1 7)
Lagcina selisho umkhululi owayezoba inkosi nompristi ophakeme
Isiprofetho sokuqala esibhekisela kuMesiya sashiwo kuGenesise 3:15
Leli vesi lichaza ngokusankondlo ‘imbewu’ eyayiyoqeda ububi
Lokhu kusho izibusiso ezivelele kuso sonke isintu—ukukhululwa!
Njengoba amakhulu eminyaka ayedlula, uNkulunkulu wanikeza iziprofetho ezengeziwe ngokuphathelene
noMesiya
Ubufakazi bubonisa ngokusobala ukuthi uJesu waseNazaretha unguMesiya othenjisiwe
Bufakazi buni? Kungakuzuzisa kanjani phakade ukuqaphela uMesiya?
UKUBONA UMESIYA (10 imiz.)
(1) UJesu wagcwalisa iziprofetho eziningi ngokuphathelene noMesiya (w92-ZU 10/1 9-10)
Wayengowozalo lukaDavide (2Sa 7:12, 13)
UMathewu 1:1 umchaza ngokuthi “indodana kaDavide, indodana ka-Abrahama”
Izitha zikaJesu azizange zilubekele inselele nakancane uhlu lozalo lwakhe (it-1 915)
(2) UJesu wavezwa ngokuqondile njengoMesiya
Isimemezelo sengelosi ngesikhathi sokuzalwa kwakhe samveza ngokuthi ‘uyoba nguMesiya wenu’ (Luk 2:11,
Charles B. Williams)
Ngo-29 C.E., lapho uJesu ebhapathizwa, uJehova ngokwakhe wagcoba uJesu ngomoya ongcwele (Luk 3:21, 22)
Ngakho uJesu wayengazibiza ngoMesiya ngokuvumelana nesiprofetho (Isa 61:1, 2; Luk 4:16-21)
(3) Ukuvela kukaJesu njengoMesiya kwenzeka ngaso kanye isikhathi esasiprofethwe kuDaniyeli 9:24-27 (it-2 899-
904; w92-ZU 10/1 11-12)
(Uma isikhathi sivuma, sebenzisa izingxenye ezicashunwe ku-w92-ZU 10/1 11 isig. 11)
OKWENZA ABANINGI BENQABE UJESU NJENGOMESIYA (5 imiz.)
Isizwe samaJuda sasilindele iqhawe elinqobayo elalizosikhulula ekucindezelweni amaRoma (w92-ZU 10/1 13-14)
Sasicabanga ukuthi wayeyoletha iNkathi YobuMesiya zisuka nje
Ngisho nabafundi bakaJesu babenalombono oyiphutha (IzE 1:6)
Ukufa kukaJesu okuyihlazo emphakathini kwakuphambene namathemba amaJuda
Ukufa kukaMesiya njengomhlatshelo kwabikezelwa kuDaniyeli 9:24-27
‘Ukunqunywa’ kwakhe kwenza ukubuyisana futhi kwaqeda isono; ukuphila kwakhe okuphelele okwenziwa
umhlatshelo kusebenza njengesihlengo sesintu
U-Isaya 52:13–53:12 wakhuluma futhi ngokuhlupheka nokufa kukaMesiya
UMesiya ‘wayeyobona inzalo yakhe’ futhi ‘enze izinsuku zakhe zibe ziningi’ (Isa 53:10)
Lokhu kwakungenzeka kuphela uma uMesiya ayengavuswa kwabafileyo (Hu 16:10)
Ngakho, uJesu ovusiwe, okhazinyulisiwe uyakwazi ukubuya futhi agcwalise zonke iziprofetho ezisele ezipha-
thelene noMesiya (Heb 10:12, 13)
UKUBUYA NOKUBA KHONA KUKAMESIYA—OKUKUSHOYO KITHI (15 imiz.)
“Ukuba khona” kuhlanganisa inkathi yeminyaka eminingi, nokunakekela okukhethekile okugxiliswe emhlabeni
Kuyoba ‘njengezinsuku zikaNowa’ (Mat 24:37-39; it-2 676-9; w92-ZU 10/1 16)
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi lokhu kuba khona kwakuyoba okungabonakali (Joh 14:19)
Yiqiniso, isAmbulo 1:7 sithi, “Uyeza kanye namafu, futhi wonke amehlo ayombona,” kodwa ‘amafu’ asikisela
ukungabonakali (IzE 1:9; re-ZU 19-20)
Abalandeli ‘babona’ ngokuqonda “isibonakaliso” uJesu asinikeza kuMathewu 24, 25

Lokhu kwabonakala esimemezelweni esiqinisekile esenziwa uC. T. Russell (w90-ZU 10/15 19)
Sasibonisani? UMesiya usesihlalweni sobukhosi; uMbuso usuyabusa (IsA 12:10)
Nokho iNkathi YobuMesiya osekuyisikhathi eside ilindelwe iseza

Ngaleyo ndlela uMesiya uyoxazulula impikiswano enkulu eyaphakanyiswa uSathane (it-2 16)

JABULELA IZIBUSISO ZOKUBUSA KUKAMESIYA! (10 imiz.)
Ekugcineni isiprofetho sika-Isaya 11 siyogcwaliseka (w92-ZU 10/1 18-19)
Amavesi 1-5 achaza izimfanelo zikaJesu njengombusi olungile
Ukugcwaliseka okungokomoya kwamavesi 6-9 kuyobonakala lapho uKristu, ‘enamandla onke ezulwini nasem-
hlabeni,’ eqondisa ukuguqulwa komhlaba ube iPharadesi lembulunga yonke (Mat 28:18; ws-ZU 174)
Kubhekisela ekuguqukeni kobuntu bobulwane manje nasesikhathini esizayo
Futhi sibheke phambili ekugcwalisekeni okungokoqobo ezilwaneni
Usuqalile kakade umsebenzi omkhulu wokufundisa; wenziwa oFakazi BakaJehova emazweni angaphezu
kuka-200
Manje uJesu osemandleni obukhosi umi ‘njengesibonakaliso’; izigidi ‘ezizweni’ zabeZizwe ziye zasabela (Isa 11:
10, NW)
Akekho umesiya wamanga wobuJuda owake walandelwa kangaka abeZizwe
Ingabe uye wasabela esibonakalisweni sobuMesiya ngokwamukela ithemba loMbuso?
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ulamukele noma cha, qhubeka ungenisa ulwazi ngoJehova
Qhubeka uba khona emihlanganweni futhi uhlanganyele nebandla
OFakazi abazinikezele kumelwe baqhubeke begxilile ekusakazeni ulwazi ngoJehova kubo bonke abayolalela
(1Ko 15:58)
Kwangathi singaba nokuningi kokukwenza emsebenzini weNkosi kuze kube yilapho uMesiya enqoba—kube inka-
zimulo yaphakade kuNkulunkulu nenzuzo yethu emi phakade!
