KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INDIMA YENKOLO EZINDABENI ZEZWE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ngokusobala indima yenkolo yamanga ezindabeni zezwe nesahlulelo saphezulu ezosithola. Qhathanisa lo-
khu nendima yobuKristu beqiniso, esekelwe ezimfundisweni nasesibonelweni sikaJesu. Phetha ngokudonsela
ukunakekela eMbusweni njengowukuphela kukahulumeni ongaxazulula izinkinga zesintu
INDIMA YENKOLO EZINDABENI ZEZWE YABIKEZELWA ESIPROFETHWENI (5 imiz.)
Kokubili inkolo yeqiniso neyamanga kunezindima manje: inkolo eyamukelwa uNkulunkulu kulezi ‘zinsuku zo-
kugcina’ yabikezelwa ku-Isaya 2:2-4, NW; inkolo angayamukeli uNkulunkulu (ebizwa ngokuthi “iBabiloni Eli-
khulu”) yabikezelwa kusAmbulo 17:1, 5
Abantu bayahlukaniswa kulesi sikhathi
Abaphendukela enkolweni yeqiniso bayosinda ekupheleni kwalesi simiso
Bonke abaqhuba inkolo yamanga bayoba phakathi kwalabo ‘abayomuka baye ekunqunyweni okumi phakade’
(Mat 25:41, 46)
Singabahlukanisa abakhulekeli beqiniso kwabamanga ngezithelo zabo (Mat 7:17, 20)
INDIMA YENKOLO YEQINISO: KUMELWE ‘INGABI INGXENYE YEZWE’ (8 imiz.)
Ukuba umngane wezwe likaSathane kusho ukuba isitha sikaNkulunkulu (Jak 4:4)
Inkolo yeqiniso iqhutshwa abantu abalalela umyalo kaJesu wokungahlanganyeli ezindabeni zezwe zezombanga-
zwe (Joh 15:19)
Isazi-mlando u-Edward Gibbon sabhala ngokuphathelene namaKristu okuqala eMbusweni WaseRoma: “Kwa-
kungenakwenzeka ukuba amaKristu . . . athathe isikhundla samasosha . . . noma samakhosi” (History of
Christianity, kk. 162-3)
UJesu wasenqaba isikhundla sezombangazwe, wanamathela ngobuqotho ekushumayeleni ngoMbuso (Joh 6:15;
18:36, 37)
Umlobi uMalcolm Muggeridge wabhala: “ELobukholwa laqala ngoMbusi uConstantine. . . . [Kodwa] ungase usho
ngisho nokuthi uKristu ngokwakhe walichitha eLobukholwa ngaphambi kokuba liqale ngokusho ukuthi umbu-
so wakhe wawungewona owalelizwe—enye yezinkulumo zakhe ezifinyelela kude nezibaluleke kunazo zonke”
(The End of Christendom, k. 14)
UJesu waqeqesha abalandeli ukushumayela ngoMbuso (Luk 10:1, 2, 8, 9)
AmaKristu eqiniso anesibonelo esinguJesu ekushumayeleni ngoMbuso nasekuzigcineni engenalo ibala elivela
ezweni (1Pe 2:21)
Ukushumayela koFakazi ngoMbuso emhlabeni wonke ngaphambi kokuphela kwalesi simiso kungolunye upha-
wu lwenkolo yeqiniso (Mat 24:14)
INKOLO YEQINISO KUMELWE ILALELE UNKULUNKULU NGOKUBONISA UTHANDO (5 imiz.)
Kumelwe ilalele umyalo wokuthanda umakhelwane (Mar 12:30, 31)
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ziyalwa ukuba zingabi nokuhlukana kobuzwe noma kobuhlanga emhlabeni wonke
(IzE 10:34; 1Jo 4:20, 21)
OFakazi BakaJehova bayayilalela lemiyalo, okungokunye okubabonakalisa ukuthi bayinkolo yeqiniso (Joh 13:
34, 35)
IZINKOLO ZEZWE ZIYEHLULEKA ‘UKULALELA UNKULUNKULU KUNABANTU’ (8 imiz.)
Nakuba amaKristu kumelwe ‘azithobe emagunyeni aphakeme ohulumeni’ futhi ‘abuyisele izinto zikaKesari ku-
Kesari,’ kumelwe futhi ‘abuyisele izinto zikaNkulunkulu kuNkulunkulu’ (Rom 13:1; Luk 20:25)
Lapho lokhu kungqubuzana, kumelwe alalele uNkulunkulu kunabantu (IzE 5:29)
Izinkolo zalelizwe azimlaleli uNkulunkulu njengoMbusi
Azilubonisi uthando; kunalokho, zisekela izimpi zobuzwe nezobuhlanga
Ziyingxenye yezwe likaSathane ngenxa yokugxambukela kwezombangazwe
UMbusi WaseRoma uConstantine wavula indlela “yombuso ongokwasezulwini” emhlabeni ekhulwini lesine C.E.,
umagazini i-Christianity Today (Oct. 22, 1990) othi ngakho, ‘kokubili isonto nombuso kwakungamagatsha ka-
hulumeni owodwa waphezulu emhlabeni’ (Qhathanisa noJohane 18:36)
Umpristi ongumJesuit u-Ignacio Ellacuria wathi inkolo yamaKatolika izama “ukuguqula lomhlaba ufane [no-
Mbuso kaNkulunkulu] ngangokunokwenzeka” (Boston Globe, Nov. 17, 1989)
Yena nabanye abapristi baba abalandeli bakaMarx (Phinda uqhathanise noJohane 18:36)
Umlobi uRobert L. O’Connell wathi ngezimpi zaseYurophu zekhulu le-16 nele-17: “Lezi zimpi zazilwiwa . . . ika-
khulukazi ngezizathu ezingokwenkolo. . . . Kuzo zonke izisusa zodlame lweningi labantu ngaphandle kwezo-
hlanga, ukuhlukana ngokwenkolo kunethonya kakhulu ekululazeni ubuntu nasekwenzeni abantu baziphathe
njengezitha . . . zabanye” (Of Arms and Men, k. 124)
Umfundisi uHarry E. Fosdick wavuma: “Ngolunye uhlangothi lomlomo wethu siye sadumisa iNkosi Yokuthula
kanti ngolunye siye sadumisa impi” (The Modern Use of the Bible, k. 204)
No. 92-ZU
11/95Kuleli khulu leminyaka, abaholi benkolo bawo wonke amahlelo baye basekela izimpi, bebangela ukuba umKato-
lika abulale umKatolika, umOrthodox abulale umOrthodox, umProthestani abulale umProthestani
Ngokwesibonelo, i-New York Times (Dec. 29, 1966) yathi: “Abefundisi bamaKatolika ngezigaba zabo cishe nga-
so sonke isikhathi bebesekela izimpi zezizwe zabo, bebusisa amabutho futhi bethandazela ukunqoba, kuyila-
pho elinye iqembu lababhishobhi ngakolunye uhlangothi liwuthandazela obala umphumela ophambene”
Izinkolo ezingaphandle kweLobukholwa nazo zihileleke kwezombangazwe nasezimpini
Isikhulu sikahulumeni saseNdiya uNehru sathi: “Inkolo, eNdiya nakwamanye amazwe, iye yasigcwalisa ngo-
kwesaba” (The Great Quotations, k. 522)
Izinkolo zezwe zinecala legazi phambi kukaNkulunkulu (Isa 1:15)
Nokho, oFakazi BakaJehova ngempela baye ‘bakhanda izinkemba zabo zaba amakhuba’ (Isa 2:4)
Encwadini ethi More About Justifying Violence (k. 23), abalobi bathi: “OFakazi BakaJehova ngobunye baye
bagcina ukuma kwabo ‘kokungathathi-hlangothi kobuKristu’ okungenabudlova”
INKOLO YEZWE IBIZWA NGOKUTHI “IBABILONI ELIKHULU” EBHAYIBHELINI (8 imiz.)
Inkolo yalelizwe (iBabiloni Elikhulu) ibizwa ngokuthi ‘isifebe’ eBhayibhelini ngoba iye ‘yenza ubufebe,’ eqiniswe-
ni ifeba nazo zonke izinhlangano zezombangazwe (IsA 17:1, 2)
Iwumbuso wezwe ngoba ‘inombuso phezu kwamakhosi omhlaba’ ngenxa yethonya layo phezu kwawo (IsA
17:18)
Kungani ibizwa ngokuthi iBabiloni Elikhulu? (Bheka ethi Ukufuna Kwesintu UNkulunkulu, kk. 368-70)
IBabiloni Elikhulu liye laholela izizwe ezimpini ezibulalayo nasezimpini zenkolo, labusisa amabutho, lathanda-
zela ukunqoba kwesizwe noma kwenkolo yalo
Ngenxa yalo, ‘zonke izizwe ziye zadukiswa’ futhi ‘igazi labaprofethi nelabo bonke abaye babulawa emhlabeni’
liye latholakala kulo (IsA 18:23, 24)
Kungani linecala ngabo “bonke” ababulawa? Ngenxa yokufundisa abantu ukuba babe ingxenye yezwe no-
kuba basekele ubuzwe nezimpi
Inkolo yezwe izobhujiswa, ngoba imisebenzi yayo iyenyanyeka kuNkulunkulu (Thi 1:16)
Ngokushesha izoqothulwa, izwe limangale (IsA 17:16; 18:9, 10)
Lesi kuyoba isijeziso esivela kuNkulunkulu ngenxa yezono zayo (IsA 18:5)
OKUWUKUPHELA KWETHEMBA LESINTU UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU, HHAYI UKUBUSA KWABANTU

Okuwukuphela kwekhambi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu ngoKristu (Mat 6:9, 10, 33)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45“IZENZO ZIKANKULUNKULU”—UZIBHEKA KANJANI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukuthi (1) izenzo eziningi okuthiwa ezikaNkulunkulu ngokuvamile zibangelwa noma
zenziwe abantu ukuba zibe zimbi ngokweqile, (2) ngokuvamile abantu abazinaki izenzo zikaNkulunkulu zeqiniso
okuholela ekulimaleni kwabo, nokuthi (3) sibhekene nesenzo sikaNkulunkulu esikhulu kunazo zonke kuwo wo-
nke umlando wesintu
UKWANDA KWEZINHLEKELELE, ISIBONAKALISO SEZIKHATHI (8 imiz.)
Abaningi banomuzwa wokuthi kuye kwaba nezinhlekelele eziningi ezikhathini zamuva, futhi baqinisile
Umagazini i-New Scientist (ka-October 5, 1991) uthi: “Umhlaba ungalindela izinhlekelele ezengeziwe
kuleminyaka yawo-1990 kunasemashumini eminyaka adlule . . . Kwabikwa izinhlekelele ezingu-523
ngawo-1960 nezingu-767 ngawo-1970. Ngawo-1980, lelinani lase lifinyelele ku-1387”
I-Britannica Book of the Year ka-1992 ithi: “E[United States] . . . izinhlekelele ezingamashumi ama-
bili nesikhombisa phakathi nezinyanga zokuqala eziyisithupha zaziziningi ukwedlula zonke izinhle-
kelele ezake zalotshwa phansi ngaphambi kokugamanxa konyaka”
Umagazini i-Time (ka-September 14, 1992) ubika ukuthi ngenyanga eyodwa (phakathi no-August kuya
phakathi no-September) kwaqhuma intabamlilo e-Alaska; kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba edu-
ze neZiqhingi zase-Andreanof e-Alaska nokunye eKyrgyzstan ezweni elaliyiSoviet Union; iSiphepho
i-Andrew sagadla eBahamas, eFlorida, naseLouisiana; iSiphepho i-Iniki sagalela iKauai eHawaii; iSi-
vunguvungu i-Polly samboza impumalanga yeChina ngamanzi; iSishingishane i-Omar sashanela iGuam
nePhilippines; izikhukhula ezinamandla zashanela izigodi zaseHindu Kush; futhi amagagasi olwandle
aphakeme abhubhisa amakhilomitha angu-320 endawo ezungeze ugu eNicaragua
(Ungaphawula noma yiziphi izinhlekelele zamuva)
Abantu ngokuvamile babhekisela ezenzakalweni ezinjalo eziyinhlekelele ‘njengezenzo zikaNkulu-
nkulu’
Kusukela esikhathini eside kakhulu, abantu baye babheka izenzakalo ezinjalo njengezinokubaluleka
okukhethekile, bezibheka njengokubonakaliswa kwentukuthelo nolaka lukaNkulunkulu noma nje-
ngesijeziso esivela kuye
EChina zazibhekwa njengezimpawu zokungathokozi kwaphezulu ngombuso wozalo lwasebukhosini
obusayo nanjengezibikezelo zokuvukela kwezombangazwe
Ukuzamazama komhlaba okunesilinganiso esingu-7,8 kwaseTangshan kwango-1976, okwabulala aba-
ntu abangu-240 000, kwagadla emasontweni ayisithupha nje ngaphambi kokufa kowayengusihlalo
uMao Tse-tung futhi abanye bakuchaza njengesibikezelo esivela ezulwini esiphawula inkathi entsha
emlandweni wamaShayina
Ngakho, abanye abantu ngandlela-thile basola uNkulunkulu ngalezinhlekelele
Lapho izinhlekelele zigadla, abantu ngokuvamile basola uNkulunkulu
Ingabe uNkulunkulu ngempela onecala? Wena uyibheka kanjani lendaba?
NAKUBA IBHAYIBHELI LIZIBIKEZELA, IZINHLEKELELE AZIZONA IZENZO ZIKANKULUNKULU
(10 imiz.)
UJesu, esiprofethweni sakhe esikhulu ‘ngokuphela kwezwe,’ wabala ukuntuleka kokudla, ukuzamazama
komhlaba, nobici (Mat 24:3, 7; Luk 21:11)
Umphostoli uJohane wakubona kusengaphambili ukuntuleka kokudla nezifo ezibulalayo (IsAm 6:5-8)
Ingabe lokho kusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu obangela ukuba lezizenzakalo zenzeke? Cha!
Njengoba enokuhlakanipha okuphelele, uJehova angabona kusengaphambili imiphumela yemizamo yo-
muntu ongaphelele futhi ayibikezele leyomiphumela (Isa 42:9; 46:9, 10)
Izinhlekelele eziningi ezibhubhisayo zaziyimiphumela yezenzo zabantu
(Uma isikhathi sivuma, sebenzisa ukwaziswa okuku-Phaphama! ka-July 8, 1986, amakhasi 17-20 [g86
6/22 17-19], kodwa uqokomise izici ezintathu ezilandelayo)
Abantu basebenzisa kabi imikhiqizo yemvelo futhi baphathe kabi indawo ezungezile, beyenza ukuba
ibe sengcupheni yezinhlekelele ngokwengeziwe
Indlela abantu abaphila ngayo yenza babe sengozini ngokwengeziwe lapho izinhlekelele zigadla
Ngokuvamile abantu abazinaki izixwayiso, benza imiphumela ibhubhise ngokwengeziwe
Ngokusobala, abantu ngokuvamile baye babangela izinhlekelele, kwaphumela ekulahlekeni okukhulu ko-
kuphila nempahla
UNkulunkulu akayona imbangela yezinhlekelele ezinjalo
No. 93-ZU
11/92ZIYINI “IZENZO ZIKANKULUNKULU”? (12 imiz.)
Khona-ke, kungani iBhayibheli likhuluma ngoNkulunkulu njengothumela uzamcolo, umlilo nesibabule,
nokunye, ukuze abhubhise ababi?
Ingabe izinhlekelele ezinjalo zazingezona “izenzo zikaNkulunkulu”?
Amazwi athi “isenzo sikaNkulunkulu, uma echazwa ngokomthetho, ayingozi evela entweni esebenza nga-
phandle kokungenela noma usizo lomuntu,” kusho i-Encyclopedia Americana, uHlelo luka-1991, Umqu-
lu 1, ikhasi 122
Nokho, izenzakalo ezilotshwe eBhayibhelini zazingezona izingozi futhi zazingahloselwe ukwenza abantu
bahlupheke ngokungakhethi
Zonke izenzo zikaNkulunkulu zeqiniso zilungile futhi zinenjongo. (Dut 32:4; Isa 55:10, 11) Kumelwe zi-
hlangabezane nezici ezintathu:
(1) Zivumelane nenjongo kaNkulunkulu
(2) Zandulelwe isixwayiso sangaphambili esivela kuNkulunkulu
(3) Zihambisane neziqondiso zaphezulu zokusinda
Cabangela ezinye izibonelo zezenzo zikaNkulunkulu zeqiniso
Landisa ngoZamcolo kaNowa, futhi uchaze ukuthi uhlangabezana kanjani nezici ezintathu ezingenhla
(Gen 6:5–7:10; 2Pet 2:5)
Landisa ngokubhujiswa kweSodoma neGomora, futhi uchaze indlela okwakuyisenzo sikaNkulunkulu
ngayo (Gen 18:20–19:26; 2Pet 2:6-8)
(Sebenzisa ukwaziswa okuku-Phaphama! ka-August 8, 1986, amakhasi 6-7)
Ukwehluleka ukuqaphela isixwayiso kuholela esiphethweni esiyinhlekelele (Eks 9:15-17; Luk 17:26-30)
ISENZO SIKANKULUNKULU ESIKHULU KUNAZO ZONKE ESISAZOKWEHLELA ISINTU (10 imiz.)
Sibhekene nenhlekelele enkulu kunazo zonke ezake zaba khona (Mat 24:21)
‘Impi yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke,’ hhayi ukhukhulela-ngoqo wenuzi noma
enye inhlekelele eyenziwa abantu, iyofinyelela umvuthwandaba wayo e-Armagedoni (IsAm 16:14, 16,
qhathanisa ne-NW)
Iyoba ekhethayo (2The 1:8-10)
Iyoletha isimiso samanje sezinto esibi, esinobugovu ekupheleni kwaso (2Pet 3:9, 10)
“Usizi olukhulu” luyoba isenzo sikaNkulunkulu esingenakuqhathaniswa nanoma iyiphi enye inhlekelele
eyake yenzeka (Isa 28:21)
Luyoba isenzo sikaNkulunkulu esingenakungatshazwa ngoba luhlangabezana nazo zonke lezici
(1) Luvumelana nenjongo kaNkulunkulu emenyezelwe (Jer 25:31-33; Zef 3:8)
(2) Kunikezwa isixwayiso sangaphambili emhlabeni wonke (Mat 24:14; IzE 20:20)
(3) Kunikezwa iziqondiso zokusinda (Zef 2:3; Joh 17:3)
Imbubhiso engenakuqhathaniswa iyeza nakanjani, kodwa ukusinda kungenzeka (Zef 1:14–2:3)
Njengama-Israyeli emngceleni weZwe Lesithembiso, nguwena ozikhethelayo (Dut 30:15-20)
IZIBUSISO EZIVELA EZENZWENI ZIKANKULUNKULU EZIMANGALISAYO ZESIKHATHI ESIZAYO
(5 imiz.)
Ngemva kokususwa kwababi, kuyoba nokuthula okukhulu (Hu 37:10, 11; 72:7)
Wonke umonakalo oye wenziwa isintu endaweni ezungezile uyolungiswa (Isa 35:1-7; 55:12, 13)
Ubumpofu, ukungabi nabulungisa kwezomnotho nakwezenhlalo, kuyolungiswa (Hu 72:16; Isa 65:21-24)
Izimo ezinokuthula, ezinobulungisa, nezilungile ziyolethwa “ukushisekela kukaJehova-Sebawoti” (Isa 9:7)
Ziyoba imiphumela yezenzo zikaNkulunkulu ezimangalisa kakhulu azenzela isintu
Ungazijabulela lezibusiso uma ulalela isixwayiso sikaNkulunkulu manje futhi uthatha isinyathelo soku-
sinda (Mat 7:24, 25)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye.
Akuyona yonke imibhalo okudingeka ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba
ishiwo)
No. 93-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INKOLO YEQINISO IHLANGABEZANA NEZIDINGO ZOMPHAKATHI WESINTU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukuthi inkolo yeqiniso iyahlangabezana nezidingo zabantu. Bonisa ukuthi isekelwe eBhayi-
bhelini nokuthi iqhutshwa kuphela yilabo abakhonza uJehova. Gcina imithombo yokwaziswa yezwe ihambisana
nesikhathi ngokusebenzisa imibiko ekhishwe ku-Nqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama!
IZIDINGO EZIKHETHEKILE ZOMPHAKATHI WESINTU (5 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu wadala abantu benesidingo sokukhulekela
I-New Encyclopædia Britannica ithi: “Ngokwalokho izazi eziye zakuthola, akukaze kube nabantu,
nomaphi, nganoma isiphi isikhathi, ababengenankolo ngandlela-thile.” (gZU89 1/8 4; shZU 28)
Nanamuhla umphakathi wesintu usasidinga isiqondiso saphezulu (Funda uJeremiya 10:23)
Ngenxa yesifiso somuntu sokukhulekela nesidingo sosizo lwaphezulu, siyabuza:
Ingabe izinkolo zezwe ziyahlangabezana nezidingo ezingokomoya zesintu?
Ingabe izinkolo zalelizwe ziye zawuthuthukisa umphakathi wesintu ngokokuziphatha?
Ingabe lezizinkolo zikhuthaza ukuthula, ziqinisekise ngokuba khona kwenjabulo emkhayeni, futhi
zinikeze abantu injongo eyanelisayo ekuphileni?
YINI IZINKOLO ZEZWE EZIYENZELA UMPHAKATHI WESINTU? (10 imiz.)
Akuhlangatshezwana nezidingo ezingokomoya; inkolo iyawohloka (tpZU 22-6)
Ukuziphatha akuthuthukiswa
Ngezimfundiso zabo nangesibonelo, abaholi benkolo banecala ngokuwohloka kokuziphatha (gZU89 1/8
8-9; wZU87 10/15 3-4; wZU86 4/15 21; tpZU 26-31)
Ukuthula akukhuthazwa, kwazise izinkolo zezwe ngokuvamile zigqugquzela izimpi
Umlobi uTom Harpur wabhala: “Inkolo . . . ngandlela-thile iyakwazi ukuthola izindlela zokuthethele-
la noma zokubushaya indiva ubudlova ngisho nalapho iyimbangela yabo eyinhloko noma eyisiseke-
lo.”—The Toronto Star, January 17, 1993
Indima yenkolo empini ifakazelwe kahle (wZU88 2/1 17; gZU89 1/8 27 [g88 12/22 20])
Izigidi aziyitholi injabulo emkhayeni kungakhathaliseki ukuthi zikuyiphi inkolo
Izehlukaniso nokuhlukana kwemikhaya kudlangile (wZU84 10/1 4-7)
Ngisho nabefundisi abakuqondi ukuphila okunenjongo okusekelwe olwazini oluphathelene noNkulunkulu
Umfundisi othile odumile wathi: “Kungani kunesono? Kungani kunokuhlupheka? Kungani kukhona
udeveli? Lemibuzo ngifuna ukuyibuza iNkosi uma ngifika ezulwini.”—U.S.News & World Report,
May 3, 1993
Nokho lokhu akusho ukuthi zonke izinkolo zihlulekile ukwanelisa izidingo zomphakathi wesintu
LAPHO INKOLO EYODWA YEQINISO IHLANGABEZANA NEZIDINGO ZABANTU (12 imiz.)
Inkolo yeqiniso eyayivela kuNkulunkulu yayihlangabezana nezidingo ezingokomoya
U-Adamu no-Eva babekhulekela uJehova kuphela, uMbusi Wendawo Yonke
UJehova, uMdali wabo, wayeyazi indlela yokubanikeza isiqondiso esiphelele
Abapristi nethempeli kwakungadingeki ekhaya lika-Adamu eliyipharadesi, ngoba wayengakhuluma no-
Nkulunkulu ngokukhululekile
Inkolo yeqiniso engangcolisiwe yayifuna ubuqotho ezimisweni zokuziphatha
Ukulunga kwakuphishekelwa uma nje uNkulunkulu ayekhulekelwa ngokuzithoba
Imihlatshelo yayingadingeki ngoba ngalesosikhathi abantu babengenasono
Kwakunokuthula noxolo
Kwakungekho ukwesaba unkulunkulu othile ofuna ukuziphindisela okwakumelwe kushwelezwe kuye
Uthando lukaNkulunkulu lwalubangela umuzwa wokulondeka (1Jo 4:8)
Injabulo emkhayeni yayiyoba khona nakanjani uma nje u-Adamu no-Eva babeyokhulekela uJehova uNku-
lunkulu ngokuvumela nesambulo kanye nesiqondiso saphezulu
Ukuphila okunenjongo nokwanelisayo kwakugcinelwe u-Adamu no-Eva, ngoba babebusiswe ngomsebenzi
onomvuzo (Funda uGenesise 1:27, 28)
Inkolo yamanga yaqala lapho uSathane eholela abantu ababili bokuqala ekuhlubukeni kuNkulunkulu na-
sekulahleni ukukhulekela kweqiniso (Gen 2:17; 3:1-7)
USathane wakhuluma kabi ngoJehova ethi akazikhathaleli izithakazelo zabantu
Nanamuhla, inkolo yamanga ngokuyinhloko isasekelwe emangeni (Joh 8:44)
Nokho, ngokungefani nayo, inkolo yeqiniso iyahlangabezana nezidingo zabantu namuhla
No. 94-ZU
12/93INDLELA INKOLO YEQINISO EHLANGABEZANA NGAYO NEZIDINGO ZABANTU NAMUHLA
(13 imiz.)
Kuyahlangatshezwana nezidingo ezingokomoya zalabo abaqhuba inkolo yeqiniso
Ukukhulekela kunikezwa uJehova kuphela, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso (Mat 4:10)
Isifiso sokukhulekela saneliswa ngokuba nobuhlobo obuseduze noJehova, obuhambisana nokumethe-
mba, njengabantu bakhe abazinikezele (IzA 3:5, 6)
Isiqondiso saphezulu sitholakala ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu nangezincwadi ‘zenceku ethembekileyo’ (Mat
24:45; Hu 119:105)
Abakhulekeli beqiniso bathola nezinye izibusiso (Joh 4:23; wZU91 5/1 18-19)
Abadidwa imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu (Joh 14:28; 1Ko 8:5, 6)
Banokholo kuKristu futhi banethemba lensindiso (Joh 3:16; IzE 4:12)
Bayaqaphela ukuthi umuntu wadalwa uNkulunkulu nokuthi akabanga khona ngokuziphendukela
kwemvelo (Gen 2:7)
Bayazi ukuthi umphefumulo uyafa, kodwa uvuko lungenzeka (Hez 18:4; IzE 24:15)
Bangakwazi ukuchaza ukuthi kungani manje kunesono nokuhlupheka (Rom 5:12)
Bayaqaphela ukuthi ukuphela kwalesisimiso esibi kuseduze
Bajatshuliswa ithemba lokuphila okuphakade esimisweni esisha sikaNkulunkulu (Joh 17:3)
Izindinganiso zokuziphatha zezinceku zikaJehova ziphakeme ngoba zenza ngokuvumelana nezimfuneko
zakhe zokulunga (Hu 97:10; Mat 6:33)
OFakazi BakaJehova baphishekela ukuthula
Banobunye ekukhulekeleni kweqiniso njengobuzalwane bembulunga yonke (gZU90 12/8 8-10)
Baye ‘bakhanda izinkemba zabo zaba amakhuba’ (Funda u-Isaya 2:4)
Injabulo emkhayeni ibangelwa ukusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu (wZU93 5/1 4-6)
IBhayibheli linikeza isiqondiso esiwusizo ekusebenzelaneni kwabantu nasekuphileni komkhaya
ImiBhalo isiza amalungu emikhaya ukuba afeze izindima zawo (Efe 5:33; 6:1)
Kuvamile ukuba abantu abaqhuba inkolo yeqiniso babe nokuphila okunenjongo nokwanelisayo
Bangabashumayeli abakhuthele beZwi likaNkulunkulu (Funda eyabaseRoma 10:10)
Bajatshuliswa ukusiza abanye ngokomoya
Akukephuzi ukuba uphile ukuphila okunenjongo enkonzweni kaNkulunkulu (gZU91 3/22 9)
INKOLO YEQINISO IYOHLALE IHLANGABEZANA NEZIDINGO ZOMPHAKATHI WESINTU (5 imiz.)
Ngenxa yokuthi ukukhulekela kweqiniso kuvela kuNkulunkulu, akuwohloki njengenkolo yamanga, fu-
thi akusoze kwehluleka (gZU89 12/8 24 [g89 11/22 20])
Ukukhulekela kweqiniso kuyohlale kuhlangabezana nezidingo zesintu ezingokomoya futhi kuyosiza
abantu ukuba balondoloze izindinganiso eziphakeme zokuziphatha
Kuyoqhubeka kukhuthaza ukuthula, kwakha imikhaya ejabulayo, futhi kunikeza labo abakuqhubayo
ukuphila okwanelisayo nokunenjongo
Futhi inkolo yeqiniso iyohlangabezana nesidingo somuntu sezwe elisha (2Pe 3:13)
Lelozwe liyoba nokuthula okungapheli (Hu 37:10, 11; 46:8, 9)
Umchithi wokuthula uSathane ekugcineni uyobhujiswa (Rom 16:20)
Isintu esilalelayo esilethwe ekupheleleni emhlabeni oyipharadesi, ngeke sisakhala, sibe nobuhlungu,
nokufa (Funda IsAmbulo 21:4)
Yini ozoyenza ngenkolo yeqiniso namathemba ayo amahle?
Funda ngeqiniso, futhi ulenze libe ngelakho, uma ungakakwenzi lokho
Vumela ukukhulekela okuhlanzekile kusho okuthile ekuphileni kwakho
Zibekele umgomo wokuba phakathi kwalabo abayoqhuba inkolo yeqiniso kuze kube phakade kube udu-
mo nenkazimulo kuJehova
Yamukela futhi unamathele enkolweni eyodwa yeqiniso ehlangabezana nezidingo zomphakathi we-
sintu
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyo-
na yonke imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 94-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UMBONO WEBHAYIBHELI NGOKUSEBENZISA IMIMOYA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ukunaka kwezilaleli kugcine kugxile embonweni ongokomBhalo ngalendaba, ukhumbule ukuthi iqiniso leBhayibhe-
li elidonsela abantu abanhliziyo ziqotho kuJehova. Sicela ungenabi ngemikhuba ethile yokusebenzisa imimoya. Se-
benzisa okuhlangenwe nakho okusezincwadini zeNhlangano kuphela
UKUSEBENZISA IMIMOYA KUSAKAZEKE YONKE INDAWO (3 imiz.)
Ukusebenzisa imimoya kuhilela ukuxhumana nemimoya engabonakali
Ukusetshenziswa kwemimoya kungezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene
Kuhlanganisa ukubhula, ukufundwa kwezinkanyezi, ukuphonsa, ubuthakathi, ukulumba, amabhodi e-Ouija, uku-
funda intende yesandla, ukubikezela inhlanhla, ukukhulumisana nemimoya nezinye izinhlobo zalokho okuthi-
wa ukukhuluma nabafile (sp-ZU 21; sh-ZU 91; pe-ZU 95-6)
Abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi ingxenye engumoya yabantu iyasinda ekufeni futhi ingakhuluma nabaphilayo
(sp-ZU 2-3; rs-ZU 77)
Emhlabeni kabanzi ukusebenzisa imimoya kuya kuthandwa
Incwadi ethi Occult Shock and Psychic Forces iyaphawula: “Abantu abahlukahlukene babonakala benomuzwa
wokuthi sisesikhathini sokuvuselelwa kobuthakathi okungakaze kube khona ngaphambili” (w87-ZU 9/1 3)
Izazi zezombangazwe, abaholi benkolo, nabanye osaziwayo bavamile ukuyisebenzisa imimoya
Abaningi kweLobukholwa bayakuthalalisa futhi bayayisebenzisa (w87-ZU 9/1 3-4)
Uyini umsuka wokusebenzisa imimoya? Kuhle noma kuyalimaza? Uyini umbono weBhayibheli ngokusebenzisa imi-
moya?
OKUHILELEKILE EKUXHUMANENI NEZWE LEMIMOYA (12 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lembula ukuthi ukuxhumana nabasendaweni engabonakali akukusha
Indoda nowesifazane bokuqala baxhumana noMdali (Gen 3:8-13)
Babengakhulumi nabantu abafile kodwa noNkulunkulu owayebanikeze ithemba lokuphila okuphakade ePha-
radesi (Gen 2:15-17)
UNowa wanikezwa iziyalezo ezimayelana noZamcolo (Gen 6:13-22)
Kwakhulunywa no-Abrahama okwaphumela ekutheni athole izibusiso (Gen 12:1-4)
Nokho, akukhona konke ukuxhumana nabasezweni lemimoya obekuzuzisa
Umoya omubi wasebenzisa inyoka ukuba idukise u-Adamu no-Eva (Gen 3:1-5)
Izingelosi ezahlubuka zangosuku lukaNowa zadukisa abantu futhi zabhebhethekisa ubudlova nokuziphatha oku-
bi kobulili (Gen 6:1, 2, 11; Juda 6)
Ngosuku lukaJesu, indoda eyayibanjwe umoya ongahlanzekile yayilusizi futhi yazilimaza emzimbeni (Mar 5:2, 5)
Abaningi abahileleka emimoyeni emibi nasemikhubeni yayo namuhla bathola imiphumela emibi
Bavame ukuhlupheka ngokomzimba nangokwengqondo; ukuziphatha okubi kobulili ngisho nokubulala kuyi-
nsakavukela kubantu abasebenzisa imimoya (sp-ZU 12, 22)
Ukusebenzisa imimoya ezweni elisizungezile akuveli kuNkulunkulu
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi uSathane namademoni bangabagqugquzeli abangabonakali bokusebenzisa imimoya
USathane ‘uyinyoka endala’ edukisayo yase-Edene (IsAm 12:9)
IzEnzo 16:16-19 zembula ukuthi ‘[kunedemoni, NW] lobungoma,’ zibonisa ukuthi ‘ukubhula’ kusekelwa ama-
demoni
Inhloso yawo ihlale iwukudedisela abantu kude noJehova (Dut 13:1-5)
USathane waqamba amanga ngokuthi abasoze bafa; lapho u-Adamu no-Eva befa, wabhebhethekisa amanga oku-
thi umuntu unomphefumulo ongafi
Umqondo womphefumulo ongafi nokuxhumana nabafile usuka emuva eBabiloni lasendulo (sh-ZU 41, 52-3)
Kusukela emakhulwini eminyaka adlule kuze kube manje amanga kaSathane abelokhu ehlotshiswa
Umphumela ube ukuthi esikhundleni sokuba abantu bafune uMdali, baye bazama ukuxhumana nabafile fu-
thi benza ubuciko bemilingo (sh-ZU 77-8)
IBHAYIBHELI LIYAZILAHLA ZONKE IZINHLOBO ZOKUSEBENZISA IMIMOYA (6 imiz.)
Kusukela kumlobi weBhayibheli wokuqala kuya kowokugcina, babephefumlelwe uNkulunkulu ukuba bayilahle
ngokuqinile imikhuba yokusebenzisa imimoya (Dut 18:10-12; IsAm 21:8)
UPawulu ukusho kucace ukuthi abasebenzisa imimoya ngeke balidle ifa loMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Gal 5:19-21)
Kungani iBhayibheli liqine kangaka kulendaba?
Kungenxa yokuthi labo abasebenzisa imimoya baba ngaphansi kwethonya lamademoni, ayizitha zikaNkulu-
nkulu
Ukusebenzisa imimoya kubhebhethekisa amanga athi abantu abafi ngempela kodwa banengxenye engumoya
eqhubeka iphila
UJehova, uNkulunkulu weqiniso, akawafuni amanga (Hu 31:5; IzA 6:16-19)
Wakhuluma iqiniso lokuthi abafile abazi lutho futhi ngeke bakwazi ukuxhumana nabaphilayo (Shu 9:
5, 10)
No. 95-ZU
7/94Noma yikuphi ukuxhumana nabafile okuthiwa kuyenzeka kuyinkohliso noma empeleni kuwukuxhumana
nemimoya emibi
Kumelwe siqaphele singadukiswa; uSathane uyiqili futhi uhlakaniphile (2Ko 11:14)
INDLELA YOKUHLALA UKHULULEKILE ETHONYENI ELILIMAZAYO LOKUSEBENZISA IMIMOYA
(20 imiz.)
Ukuze uhlale ukhululekile, zithobe kuNkulunkulu weqiniso, uJehova (Jak 4:7a)
Funda ukwenza intando yakhe futhi uyenze ize kuqala
Yenqaba ngokuphelele ukuhlanganyela emasikweni noma emikhubeni yokusebenzisa imimoya
Hloma izikhali zikaNkulunkulu (Efe 6:11-13)
Thandaza kuJehova; libize uliphimisele igama lakhe uma uhlaselwe amademoni (IzA 18:10)
Igama likaNkulunkulu aliyona intelezi yomlingo
Siyavikeleka uma esamukela uJehova, ngemva kokugqashula ngokuphelele ekusebenziseni imimoya sabeka
nethemba lethu lonke kuye (1Pe 3:12)
Ubufakazi bosizo lwakhe bubonakala emananini andayo oFakazi abagqashulile ekusebenziseni imimoya
(Bheka i-Index 1986-90, ngaphansi kwesithi “Spiritism,” isihlokwana esithi “experiences”)
UJehova unamandla kakhulu kunoSathane
Mkhonze uJehova futhi uyokuvikela emademonini (sp-ZU 24)
Kumelwe futhi umelane noDeveli (Jak 4:7b)
Nqamula noma yibuphi ubudlelwane nabantu obaziyo ukuthi basebenzisa imimoya (1Ko 10:21)
Ungazilethi kwakho izinto zabo (Dut 7:25)
Landela isibonelo sabase-Efesu abazishisa izincwadi zabo ezikhuluma ngomlingo (IzE 19:19, 20)
Hlukana nazo zonke iziphandla, izigqabo, izintambo “zokuzivikela,” izintelezi, izincwadi zemilingo, nanoma
yini ehlangene nokusebenzisa imimoya
Ungalokothi ufunde ukwaziswa okugqugquzela ukusebenzisa imimoya, njengamashadi okuma kwezinkanyezi,
ukuze nje uthole ukuthi kuthiwani (Jer 10:2)
Ungayibukeli ithelevishini noma amafilimu akhuluma ngeziphonso, abantu abakhuluma nabafile, nezinye izi-
nhlobo zokusebenzisa imimoya
Ungalokothi uvumele ilukuluku lokufuna ukwazi likuholele ophathe
Yenqabe imikhuba yabanye abafuna izibonakaliso noma amabika okubi (Dut 18:10; Isaya 8:19)
Ungalindeli ukuthi uzoxhumana ngokomuntu siqu noNkulunkulu njengoba kwenza u-Adamu, uNowa, noma
u-Abrahama
UNkulunkulu akasaxhumani nabantu ngamaphupho, imibono, noma amazwi avela ezweni lemimoya
UJehova wembule intando yakhe ngoJesu, futhi sinombhalo wayo eBhayibhelini (Heb 1:1, 2)
Manje sesineBhayibheli eliphelele, futhi uNkulunkulu usiqondisa asiyale ngalo, asenze ‘sipheleliselwe yonke
imisebenzi emihle’ (2Ti 3:17)
Gwema imizamo yokukhulumisana nabasezweni lemimoya ngokugabadela; thembela eZwini likaNkulunku-
lu nasenhlanganweni yakhe (Mat 24:45-47)
Uma naphezu kwemizamo yakho yokukhululeka, amademoni ekuvivinya, njengoba enza kuJesu, akusho ngempe-
la ukuthi uNkulunkulu akakwamukeli
Kumelwe ubekezele ungadikibali
Ngeke anqobe amademoni uma simelana nawo ngokuqinile futhi sinamathele kuJehova (Mat 4:10, 11)
KHONZA UJEHOVA BESE UTHOLA IMIVUZO ECEBILE (4 imiz.)
Imiphumela elimazayo yokusebenzisa imimoya iveza uSathane namademoni akhe njengabangamandla angabona-
kali asekela ukusebenzisa imimoya
Bayakujabulela ukulimaza nokukhohlisa isintu
UJehova osithanda ngempela
Wenze amalungiselelo esibusiso sesikhathi esizayo, kuhlanganise nokuqedwa kokubusa kukaSathane (Gen 3:15;
sp-ZU 22-3)
Wathumela uJesu eMhlabeni ukuba asindise isintu (Joh 3:16)
UJesu waphulukisa abantu, wakhipha amademoni, wavusa abafile, esinikeza isisekelo sokukholelwa izibusiso
zomhlaba omusha (2Pe 3:13; IsAm 21:4)
UJehova akabadukisi nhlobo abantu (Num 23:19)
Ungumthombo wokuhle kodwa (Jak 1:17)
Ngakho-ke yigweme imikhuba ehlangene nokusebenzisa imimoya
Khonza uJehova ngokusebenzisa iqiniso leBhayibheli
Thembela emoyeni kaNkulunkulu nasemandleni eqiniso okukulondoloza nokukuvikela ekusebenziseni imimoya
(Joh 8:32)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe. Imithombo yendaba ekubakaki akudingekile ukuba ishiwo)
No. 95-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUPHELA KWENKOLO YAMANGA KUSEDUZE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza lenkulumo ngokuqiniseka, ngokucabangela, nangesizotha. Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqonde ukuthi iBhayibheli laku-
bikezela ukuphela kwenkolo yamanga. Gcizelela izithelo ezingafani ezikhiqizwa inkolo yeqiniso neyamanga. Ngobuqo-
tho khuthaza abathandi beqiniso ukuba baphume enkolweni yamanga manje futhi bamukele iqiniso
NAMUHLA YONKE INKOLO IYAHLULELWA PHAMBI KUKANKULUNKULU (4 imiz.)
Siphila engxenyeni yokugcina ‘yezinsuku zokugcina.’ Ngokushesha uNkulunkulu uzokhipha izahlulelo zakhe kulo
lonke izwe elibi (Khulumela kafushane eyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-5, 13; bese ufunda uJeremiya 25:31-33)
Manje uNkulunkulu uhlukanisa abafuna iqiniso ebakhipha enkolweni yamanga. Abafuna iqiniso kumelwe baqhu-
be inkolo yeqiniso; uNkulunkulu uyobhubhisa yonke inkolo yamanga (Funda uMalaki 3:18)
UKUBHUJISWA KWENKOLO YAMANGA—ISIKHATHI SOSIZI (5 imiz.)
“Usizi olukhulu” luletha ukubhujiswa kwenkolo yamanga, ebizwa ngokuthi ‘isifebe esikhulu’ ngoba sekungama-
khulu eminyaka yenza ubufebe obungokomoya nesimiso sikaSathane sezombangazwe (Funda uMathewu 24:21)
(IsA 17:1, 2)
Lesisifebe sibizwa nangokuthi “iBabiloni Elikhulu,” ngoba njengeBabiloni lasendulo, siwumbuso wenkolo yama-
nga (IsA 17:5, 15)
Ngokuzumayo izinhlangano zezombangazwe ziyasiphendukela futhi zisibhubhise, okumangalisa labo abangasi-
qapheli isiprofetho seBhayibheli (Funda isAmbulo 17:16 nezingxenye ezimbalwa kusAmbulo 18:9-19 ezibonisa
indlela esibhujiswa ngayo ngokushesha nendlela lokhu okushaqisa ngayo kwabaningi)
Kodwa izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ziyajabula ngokuphela kwaso (Funda isAmbulo 19:1, 2)
Ekugcineni, e-Armagedoni, uNkulunkulu ubhubhisa sonke isimiso sikaSathane. (IsA 16:14, 16) IsAmbulo 19 sive-
za uKristu njengoMkhiphi-sahlulelo kaNkulunkulu Oyinhloko, ehola uquqaba lwamabutho asezulwini (Funda
amavesi 11, 16-18)
Ngakho-ke, ukuhlukanisa inkolo yeqiniso neyamanga kuyindaba yokufa nokuphila. Kanjani? UJesu wathi: “Nge-
zithelo zabo” (Funda uMathewu 7:15-18)
IZITHELO EZINHLE LABO ABAQHUBA INKOLO YEQINISO OKUMELWE BAZIKHIQIZE (6 imiz.)
Kumelwe basekele (1) UBUKHOSI bukaJehova (Hu 83:18); (2) IGAMA (Joh 17:6; IzE 15:14; Rom 10:13); (3) UMBU-
SO (Dan 2:44; Mat 6:9, 10; 24:14); (4) IZWI (2Ti 3:16, 17)
Kumelwe babe nothando lweqiniso phakathi kwabo emhlabeni wonke; bangabi nobuhlanga, ubuzwe (Joh 13:35; 1Jo
4:8, 20, 21)
Kumelwe bangathathi-hlangothi ezindabeni zezombangazwe, njengoba kunguSathane olawula lelizwe. (Joh 18:36;
Jak 4:4; 1Jo 5:19) Abanakuhlanganyela ezimpini; bayobe bebulala abafowabo. (Funda u-Isaya 2:2-4 neyoku-1 Jo-
hane 3:10-12) Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zinokuthula, zibonisa izithelo zomoya (Gal 5:22; 1Pe 3:11)
Kumelwe babe nemfundiso eyodwa (1Ko 1:10)
Kumelwe basekele izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu zokuziphatha eziphakeme; abantu abanokuziphatha okubi aba-
ngaphenduki kumelwe basuswe ekuhlanganyeleni (1Ko 5:11-13; 6:9-11)
IZINKOLO ZALELIZWE ZIKHIQIZA IZITHELO EZIMBI (11 imiz.)
Azibusekeli ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu, igama, uMbuso, iZwi. Azinalo uthando noma ubunye kodwa zihlukene ngo-
kohlanga, ubuzwe, ezombangazwe, ezomnotho, ezenhlalo, nangokwemfundiso
Njengengxenye yesimiso sikaSathane somhlaba wonke, izinkolo zalelizwe zibonisa umoya wakhe wokuziphatha
okubi nokubulala—zikhiqiza inzondo, ingxabano; zizigaxa kwezombangazwe; zibulala amalungu enkolo yazo ezi-
mpini, njengaseMpini Yezwe I neyesi-II futhi muva nje eRwanda ngenxa yobutha phakathi kwezizwe (Gal 5:
19, 20; phinda ubhekisele kweyoku-1 Johane 3:10-12; funda isAmbulo 18:24)
Encwadini ethi Preachers Present Arms, umlobi wathi: “Emlandweni wempucuko . . . , amaqembu amabili ebe-
lokhu ehlangene ndawonye ngobumbano. Lawa yimpi nenkolo. Futhi, kuzo zonke izinkolo zezwe ezinkulu, . . .
ayikho ebizinikele [empini] ngaphezu [kweLobukholwa]”
I-Sun yaseVancouver, eCanada, yathi: “Ukuthi isonto lilandela ifulege cishe kuwubuthakathaka bayo yonke
inkolo ehleliwe . . . Iyiphi impi eyake yalwiwa lapho kungazange kushiwo khona ukuthi uNkulunkulu usohla-
ngothini ngalunye lwamaqembu alwayo?”
I-New York Times yathi: “Izinhlekelele zaseRwanda ziye zenza amaRoma Katolika amaningi alapho azizwa
ekhashelwe isigaba sabefundisi esiphethe isonto. . . . Ngokuvamile isonto lalihlukene ngokobuzwe, phakathi
kwamaHutu namaTutsi.” I-National Catholic Reporter yathi: “IRwanda neBurundi amazwe amabili anama-
Katolika amaningi kakhulu e-Afrika futhi achitha igazi kakhulu”
Ukuziphatha okubi okusobala kuyabekezelelwa phakathi kwabefundisi namalungu: ukuphinga, ubufebe, ubu-
ngqingili, ukunukubezwa kwabantwana, ukungathembeki; kodwa abekho abaxoshwayo esontweni ngenxa yo-
kwephula imithetho kaNkulunkulu
INgqungquthela yeSonto laseHabe e-United States yavuma: “Sibhekene nosizi olukhulu noluyinhlekelele ka-
khulu. . . . Amaphesenti aphakathi kwayishumi nangu-23 abefundisi ezweni lonke aye ahileleka ekuziphathe-
ni okungokobulili noma aba nobuhlobo bobulili namalungu ezifunda zawo, amakhasimende, izisebenzi, njalo-
njalo.”
No. 96-ZU
1/96Umongameli we-U.S. Business and Industrial Council wakuqinisekisa lokhu, ethi: “Izinhlangano zenkolo zihlu-
lekile ukudlulisela izindinganiso zazo ezingokomlando, futhi ezikhathini eziningi, ziye zaba ingxenye yenki-
nga [yokuziphatha]”
I-U.S.News & World Report iphawula ukuthi iSonto LamaKatolika liye lakhokhela imikhaya yamaKatolika
amakhulu ezigidi zamarandi ngenxa yokuthi abapristi baye baziphatha kabi nabantwana bayo
Kunjengoba isazi semfundiso yenkolo esingumDashi uSøren Kierkegaard sake sasho: “ELobukholwa liye labu-
lahla ubuKristu lingakuqapheli ngempela”
I-India Today yaphetha: “Inkolo iye yaba ibhanela okuye kwabhebhethekiswa ngaphansi kwalo izenzo zobuge-
bengu eziyisinyenyela kakhulu. . . . Idala ubudlova obukhulu futhi ingamandla abhubhisa ngempela”
IZwi likaNkulunkulu eliphefumulelwe liyabulahla ubuzenzisi benkolo yamanga (Funda uMathewu 15:7-9 noThithu
1:16)
UJesu wamemezela ukuthi abaholi benkolo yamanga “bangabaqondisi abayizimpumputhe” abahola abalandeli
abayizimpumputhe; kokubili kuwela emgodini (Mat 15:14) (Bheka i-w90-ZU 2/1, kk. 17-20, izig. 10-24, uma ufi-
sa ukuthola imininingwane eyengeziwe)
IYIPHI INKOLO EKHIQIZA IZITHELO ZOKUHLONIPHA UNKULUNKULU? (11 imiz.)
Obani abakhiqiza izithelo ezifunwa uNkulunkulu? Obani abasekela ubukhosi bukaJehova, igama, uMbuso, iZwi?
Obani ababonisa uthando ngezinga lomhlaba wonke? Obani abangathathi-hlangothi kwezombangazwe, abangahi-
leleki kunoma yiziphi izimpi zobuzwe? Obani abanemfundiso eyodwa? Obani abasekela izindinganiso zikaNkulu-
nkulu zokuziphatha eziphakeme? Amaqiniso alelikhulu leminyaka abonisa ukuthi inkolo eyodwa kuphela ekhi-
qiza izithelo ezinjalo—oFakazi BakaJehova
Ngokuqondene nokunamathela ngokuseduze eZwini likaNkulunkulu, othile ofundisa eyunivesithi yasePhilippi-
nes wathi: “OFakazi bakwenza ngentshiseko lokho abakufunda emiBhalweni”
Ngokuqondene nokwenqaba koFakazi ukuhlanganyela ezimpini zezizwe futhi babulale abantu abaphila nabo,
indelakazi engumKatolika yabhala kumagazini wesonto lase-Italy i-Andare alle genti: “Yeka indlela izwe ebe-
lizohluka ngayo uma sonke besiyovuka ekuseni ngolunye usuku [sesinqume] ngokuqinile ukuba singaphinde
sithathe izikhali, . . . njengoFakazi BakaJehova!”
Ngokuqondene nenhlangano yabo engenabo ubugebengu nenenhlonipho ngomthetho, ukuhleleka, nempahla yo-
 ́
makhelwane, umlobeli we-Journal de Montreal, eCanada, wathi: “Uma [oFakazi BakaJehova] bekuyibona ku-
phela abantu emhlabeni, besingenakuyikhiya iminyango yethu ebusuku futhi sicuphe izinhlabamkhosi”
Ngokuqondene nobunye babo, iphephandaba laseMexico i-Veredicto lathi “banobunye bokholo obutusekayo obu-
bonakala bubehlukanisa nomaphi lapho bekhona”
Ngokuqondene nokuziphatha kwabo, indoda ethile yaseNingizimu Afrika yabhala: “Ngizihlonipha kakhulu izi-
ndinganiso nokuziphatha koFakazi. Niwukuphela kohlobo lobuKristu engake ngalubona olunamalungu akwe-
nza ngokungaguquguquki lokho akushoyo”
Ebonisa ukuthi oFakazi bayaphawuleka njengabakhiqiza izithelo zokwesaba uNkulunkulu ezidingekayo, um-
pristi ongumKatolika wabhala kumagazini i-Time: “Angisakwazi ukwahlukanisa okholwayo koyiqaba [ezinko-
lweni zalelizwe]. Ngingabehlukanisa oFakazi BaJehova . . . kodwa hhayi abalandeli bezinkolo ezilandela ama-
siko”
Yebo, ngezithelo zabo oFakazi BakaJehova baphawulwa njengabanenkolo yeqiniso, esekelwa umoya kaNkulu-
nkulu (Isa 43:10-12)
NGOKUSHESHA UNKULUNKULU UZOBHUBHISA YONKE INKOLO YAMANGA (4 imiz.)
UJesu wabikezela ukuthi inkolo yamanga, ebonakala ngezithelo ezimbi ezibangelwa ukwephula imithetho kaNku-
lunkulu, ‘iyogawulwa iphonswe emlilweni’ (Mat 7:19-23)
Chaza lokho okwenzeka phakathi kwabakhulekeli bakaBali nalabo ababekhulekela uJehova (1Kh, isahl. 18; bese
ufunda amavesi 36-40)
Inkolo yamanga iwumgwaqo obanzi oholela ekubhujisweni. (Mat 7:13, 14) Ngokushesha izobhujiswa phakade (Fu-
nda isAmbulo 18:21, 22)
Bonke abafuna ukuvunyelwa uNkulunkulu nokuphila kwesikhathi esizayo kumelwe balalele isixwayiso sikaNku-
lunkulu ‘sokuphuma kulo’ (Funda isAmbulo 18:4)
Kumelwe benze lokho isithunywa sikaNkulunkulu esiyingelosi esikunxusayo (Funda isAmbulo 14:7)
INKOLO YEQINISO IYASINDA EKUPHELENI KWALELIZWE (4 imiz.)
UJehova ulondoloza abakhulekeli bakhe beqiniso (IzA 18:10)
Yiba ingxenye ‘yesixuku esikhulu,’ esikhulekela uJehova futhi sisinde ekupheleni kwalelizwe. (IsA 7:9, 10, 13-15)
Ngisho noma befa ngaphambi kwesikhathi sokuphela, ngenxa yokugula, ingozi, ukuguga, bayaqiniseka ngovuko
(IzE 24:15)
Abathembekile babheke phambili ngokuqiniseka ekuphileni okumi phakade ezweni elisha elinokulunga nasekuja-
buleleni impilo ephelele, ukuthula, nokulondeka emhlabeni oyiPharadesi, oyobe ungasenayo phakade inkolo ya-
manga nesimiso sikaSathane esingalungile (Hu 37:10, 11, 29; Joh 17:3; 2Pe 3:13; IsA 21:4, 5)
(ImiBhalo ekhonjiwe engandulelwa igama elithi “Funda” akudingekile ukuba ifundwe yonke, kodwa ingxenye eyi-
sihluthulelo esekela indaba ingafundwa noma kubhekiselwe kuyo uma isikhathi sivuma)
No. 96-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUHLALA SINGABANGASOLEKI ESIZUKULWANENI ESIGWEGWILE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ezilalelini isidingo sokuhlala singasoleki ngokombono kaNkulunkulu, sizifinyelele ngokugcwele izimfu-
neko zakhe. Zisize ziqonde ukuthi lokho kungenzeka kubantu abangaphelele. Ukuqaphela izilingo zalesi sizuku-
lwane esigwegwile kuyosisiza ukuba silondoloze ukuma kwethu kokungasoleki kuNkulunkulu
IZINCEKU ZIKANKULUNKULU KUMELWE ZINGASOLEKI (3 imiz.)
Njalo nje izinceku zikaJehova ziye zafuna ukuhlala zingasoleki, zingenacala
UNowa ‘wayengenacala esizukulwaneni sakhe’ (Gen 6:9)
UJakobe waphawuleka ngokuba kwakhe ongasoleki, ngokungafani nomfowabo, u-Esawu (Gen 25:27)
UJehova wabiza uJobe ngokuthi umuntu ongasoleki (Job 1:8, NW)
UZakariya no-Elisabethe, abazali bakaJohane uMbhapathizi, bahamba ngokungasoleki phambi kukaNkulu-
nkulu (Luk 1:6)
Ukuba kwethu abangasoleki kusenza sibe nonembeza ohlanzekile, nobuhlobo obuhle nomakhelwane bethu, fu-
thi ngaphezu kwakho konke, kusenza sibe nokuma okuhle noJehova
Egcizelela lokhu, uPawulu wanikeza iseluleko esicacile kweyabaseFilipi 2:14, 15 (Funda)
ABANGAPHELELE KODWA ABANGASOLEKI (6 imiz.)
Kungenzeka yini ukuba abantu abangaphelele babe abangasoleki? Yebo
Lapho lichaza abantu, igama elithi ‘ongasoleki’ kufanele libhekwe njengelinomqondo olinganiselwe, hhayi
ophelele (it-1 337)
Siba abangasoleki ngokwezinga esifinyelela ngalo lokho uNkulunkulu asilindele ukuba sikufinyelele
Njengoba sekuphawuliwe kakade, amadoda okholo ezikhathi zasendulo ayekufanelekela ukubizwa ngokuthi
‘awanasici’ noma ‘awasoleki’
Lokhu kwakungengenxa yokuthi babengenzi phutha noma bubi, kodwa kwakungenxa yokuthi ngokwesili-
nganiso ababengakwazi ukusifinyelela, ukuzinikela nokwethembeka kwabo kuNkulunkulu kwakuphelele,
kungenasici
Bakufinyelela lokho uJehova ayekulindele kubantu ababenesici sokungapheleli, kodwa baba abathembekile
Babonakalisa “inhliziyo ephelele” (noma “inhliziyo engenasici” AS, KJ) kuJehova (2Kh 20:3)
Noma nini lapho benza iphutha, babekwamukela ngokuzithoba ukuqondiswa neseluleko (Job 42:1-6; Hu 51:1-4,
7-11)
Naphezu kwamaphutha abo nobuthakathaka, benza lokho uNkulunkulu ayefuna bakwenze, futhi uNkulunku-
lu akazange afune okungaphezu kwalokho ababengakufinyelela (g72-ZU 10/22 11-12 [w71 9/15 565-6])
UJehova uNkulunkulu wayekujabulela ukukhulekela kwabo
Kuyaduduza ukwazi ukuthi uyosebenzelana nathi ngokuqonda okufanayo, asifune nje lokho esikwazi uku-
kwenza
Ngaphezu kwalokho, sinenzuzo yomhlatshelo wesihlengo (Heb 7:25)
IZWE NAMUHLA LIGWEGWILE FUTHI LONAKELE (10 imiz.)
Kusukela ekoneni kuka-Adamu, indlela yeningi lesintu iye yaba egwegwile, yokungamlaleli uNkulunkulu
Njengoba ububi babanda, uNkulunkulu wathatha isinyathelo
UJehova wabheka umhlaba njengowonakele ngenxa yokuziphatha okubi kwabantu bosuku lukaNowa fu-
thi wabakhukhula ngoZamcolo (Gen 6:11-13; 7:1)
Eminyakeni engu-2 400 kamuva, amaJuda aba isizukulwane esigwegwile esifanelwe imbubhiso (w95-ZU
11/1 14)
Enqaba uMesiya owayethunywe uNkulunkulu futhi ambethela (Luk 17:25)
Lelozwe lamaJuda labhujiswa ngo-70 C.E.
Izwe namuhla libi ngaphezu kolosuku lukaNowa nelangekhulu lokuqala leminyaka
Ububi, ukonakala, nokuziphatha okubi kwandile kubantu balesi sizukulwane
Ukuwohloka kwezimilo, kwezimiso zokuhle, nezimiso zokuziphatha kuya kuba sobala
Inkinga enkulu ibangelwa ukuwohloka kwengokomoya lenkolo yobuBabiloni
Umphumela uye waba inzondo enkulu phakathi kwamaqembu enkolo, ezinhlanga, nezizwe; nokuchitheka
okuningi kwegazi (w94-ZU 12/15 28-9)
Ukona kuyavunwa, kuze kusekelwe
Izikhali ezesabekayo, ukukhishwa kwezisu, imikhiqizo ebulalayo enjengogwayi nezidakamizwa kuyavunye-
lwa futhi kugunyazwe
AmaKristu kufanele agweme izindlela zezwe ezonakele futhi azigcine engasoleki (Efe 4:17-19; 1Th 5:23)
USathane ufuna ukuyenga abangaqaphile, abenze balahlekelwe ukuma kwabo kokungasoleki (1Pe 5:8)
Ibhizinisi lezentengiselwano lithuthukisa izitayela zokuphila zokuziphatha okubi, okuphendukezelwe kwalo
lonke uhlobo, nokungakuhloniphi ukuphila nesithunzi somuntu (g92 11/8 5-7)
No. 97-ZU
1/96Imidlalo yama-video iheha abangenalwazi ukuba benze izinto eziyinqaba neziwubudemoni (g95-ZU 5/8 25)
Ubugovu nokuhaha kuyizici ezishukumisayo eziqondisa izwe
Uma sijwayelana nezindlela zezwe, imizwa yethu ingaba buthuntu futhi siqale ukuzamukela njengezivamile
Singamelana kanjani ngokuphumelelayo nethonya likaSathane?
YILWANI KANZIMA UKUZE NIBE ABANGASOLEKI (22 imiz.)
Abathandi bakaNkulunkulu beqiniso kumelwe bazimisele ukulwa ngokomoya ukuze bazuze futhi balondoloze
ukuba abangasoleki kulesi sizukulwane esigwegwile (Jude 3)
UJehova ufuna ukuzinikela okukhethekile, ngakho kufanele sizehlukanise ngokuphelele nazo zonke izimfundi-
so nemikhuba engcolisayo (2Ko 6:14-18; IsA 18:4; kl-ZU 48-52)
Gwemani zonke izinhlobo zokusebenzisa imimoya (Dut 18:10-14; kl-ZU 111-17)
Hlakulela uthando lokungcwele nokuhlanzekile kanye nenzondo yokubi (Amo 5:15a)
Qaphela imibuthano yokuzijabulisa eba nezinto zezwe nokweqisa (1Ko 10:31; w92-ZU 8/15 16-20)
Qaphela ukuziphatha lapho unabobulili obuhlukile (Efe 5:3, 4)
Hlonipha igunya elimiswe ngokufanelekile njengeliyilungiselelo likaNkulunkulu (w94-ZU 7/1 19-23)
Kuhlanganisa ukuzithoba kubabusi bezwe nokukhokha izintela (Rom 13:1-7)
Amakhosikazi kufanele azithobe kubayeni bawo, izingane kubazali (Efe 5:22; 6:1, 2)
Ebandleni, kufanele kuhlonishwe abadala nabanye abaholayo (Heb 13:17)
Ngaphezu kwalokho, labo abasegunyeni kufanele bakugweme ukukhetha, ukutuselana izikhundla ngobuhlo-
bo, ukusebenzisa kabi igunya (Jak 2:9; w86-ZU 8/15 14-18)
Masibonise ukwethembeka nobuqotho kukho konke ukusebenzelana kwethu (Heb 13:18)
Kuxwaye ukusebenzisa imikhuba yezamabhizinisi yokuzizuzisa wena, usebenzisa kabi ubudlelwane bethu bo-
buKristu (w86-ZU 11/15 15-19)
Gwema ukuheha kwezinto ezibonakalayo ‘nothando lwemali’ (1Ti 6:9, 10)
Phishekela inkambo yokuthula nothando lobuKristu beqiniso (Rom 12:18-21; Kol 3:12-14; g72-ZU 10/22 14 [w71
9/15 567-8])
Qhubeka uthandazela usizo lukaNkulunkulu nomoya wakhe ongcwele (Luk 11:13; 18:1)
Ukuba ongasoleki akuhileli nje ukugwema inkambo embi kodwa nokwenza ngenkuthalo lokho okufanele si-
kwenze
Londoloza ingokomoya ngesifundo seBhayibheli sasikhathi sonke, nokuba khona emihlanganweni njalo (Hu
1:2; Heb 10:25)
Kunesidingo sokukhuthala ekumemezeleni izindaba ezinhle
Kufanele ‘sinakekele izintandane nabafelokazi’ nabanye abaswele (Jak 1:27)
Sebenzisa isikhathi, izimali, namathalenta ukuze usekele umsebenzi woMbuso; phakamisa igama likaJehova
nobukhosi bakhe (2Ko 8:12; 9:7)
Igebe phakathi kobuKristu beqiniso nezwe kufanele liqhubeke livuleka
Iphuzu alikhona ukubona ukuthi singasondela kangakanani onqenqemeni lokuziphatha okubi, kodwa liwuku-
thi singahlala siqhele kangakanani kukho
Uma silingisa izwe noma singahlukaniseki kulo, khona-ke asimdumisi uJehova futhi asibona abangasoleki
emehlweni akhe
Singaba isikhubekiso kwabaqotho abafuna iqiniso
Ngisho nalabo asebenesikhathi eside eqinisweni kufanele baqaphele ukuba bangakhukhuleki (Heb 2:1)
UJEHOVA UYABAMUKELA ABANTU BAKHE ABANGASOLEKI (4 imiz.)
Kulezi zikhathi ezibucayi zesiphelo, kubalulekile ukuba uJehova asithole singabangasoleki (2Pe 3:14)
Abangenasici kuphela abayoba nesivikelo sakhe nesibusiso (Hu 15; IzA 2:21, 22)
Ngokuhlala singabangasoleki kulesi sizukulwane esigwegwile, sinikeza impendulo enseleleni kaSathane futhi si-
lethela uJehova injabulo (IzA 11:20; 27:11)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 97-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ZIGCINE UHLANZEKILE EKUNGCOLENI KWEZWE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ngokucacile ukuthi kungani amaKristu azinikezele nalabo abazabalazela ukukhonza uNkulunkulu kufa-
nele bahlanzeke ekungcoleni kwezwe. Basize bonke ukuba baqaphele ukuthi naphezu kokungapheleli kwethu, si-
ngazenza izinguquko futhi sikhonze uJehova ngendlela eyamukelekayo. Yinikeze ngendlela ekhuthazayo na-
ngomdlandla.
UKWANDA OKUSHAQISAYO KWEMIKHUBA ENGCOLISAYO EZWENI NAMUHLA (4 imiz.)
Abaningi bazwakalisa ukukhathazeka okukhulu ngokwanda kwemikhuba engcolisayo
Ukuziphatha okubi kwalo lonke uhlobo, ukusetshenziswa kabi kwemilaliso, ubudlova, ukusebenzisa ugwayi,
ukuqamba amanga, ukweba nokudakwa
Abaningi bakubheka njengemikhuba engemibi
Njengoba uJesu asho, lezi zinto ziyamngcolisa umuntu (Mar 7:20-23)
Ukungcolisa into ethile kusho ukuyenza ingahlanzeki, ukonakalisa ukuhlanzeka kwayo, noma ukona
ubumsulwa bayo
Abantu abacabangayo bacabanga ngomphumela wemikhuba yanamuhla, bazibuze ukuthi yini engenziwa ukuze
siphephe emiphumeleni yokungcola okwandayo
Njengoba ‘abantu ababi beqhubeka besuka kokubi baye kokubi kakhulu’ nemikhuba ehlambalaza uNkulunku-
lu yanda, singonakaliswa kalula (2Ti 3:13)
Ngokuvamile nabaholi bezwe ngokwabo bonakele (g96-ZU 7/8 19)
Bethonywa izinto ezinjengezinhlelo ze-TV, amabhayisikobho nama-video, kwabaningi ukuziphatha okubi
nobudlova sekwaba indlela yokuphila futhi abasenayo inhlonipho ngokuphila (g96-ZU 7/22 10, 21)
Abaningi bakhathazeka ngokungcola okuthinta bona siqu, kodwa ngokuvamile ubuhle, ukwethembeka nokulu-
nga kubhekwa njengokuphelelwe isikhathi nokungazuzisi nhlobo
 ́
Isimo sengqondo sabantu namuhla sifana ncamash ı nesabantu okukhulunywa ngabo ku-Isaya 5:20, 21
Ukuzigcina sihlanzekile ekungcoleni kwezwe kudinga imisebenzi ehambisana nokuba nokholo kuNkulunkulu
(Thi 1:16)
NJENGOBA UJEHOVA ENGCWELE, ABANTU BAKHE KUFANELE BAHLANZEKE FUTHI BABE
NGCWELE (10 imiz.)
Ubungcwele buyadingeka kulabo abakhonza uJehova (Isa 52:11; 1Pe 1:14-16)
Igama lesiHeberu lobungcwele lidlulisela umqondo wokwehluka, ukungazihlanganisi, noma ukuzingcwelisela
uNkulunkulu; isimo sokubekela eceleni ngenjongo yenkonzo eyenzelwa uNkulunkulu
Ukuze siphishekele ubungcwele futhi sihlanzeke phambi kukaNkulunkulu, kufanele sithathe izinyathelo ezi-
thile
Sibe nokholo emhlatshelweni kaKristu, osihlanzayo ezonweni (1Jo 1:7, 9)
Senze umzamo oqotho wokwenza ukulunga (IzE 10:34, 35)
Sigqoke ubuntu obusha, futhi sisebenzise amandla ethu okucabanga ukuze sibone futhi siqaphele umehlu-
ko phakathi kwendlela yezwe nendlela kaNkulunkulu ehlanzekile (Rom 12:1, 2; Kol 3:5-10, 12-14; w93-ZU
3/1 17, 18)
Sinikeze uNkulunkulu ukukhulekela okukhethekile ngokuvumelana nezimo zethu ngabanye (Luk 4:8; Joh
4:24; w91-ZU 5/15 5)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu nenhlangano yakhe ebonakalayo kusisiza ukuba sikubone ukungcola bese sikugwema
IBhayibheli linemithetho yobuKristu exwayisa ngezenzo ezithile ezimbi (IzE 15:28, 29; 1Ko 6:9, 10)
Inhlangano isitshela ngezimiso ezingokomBhalo ezingasivikela ekungcoleni okunjengokusebenzisa ugwayi,
ukusebenzisa kabi imilaliso kanye nokugembula, ngisho noma eminye yalemikhuba kungakhulunywa nga-
yo ngokuqondile eBhayibhelini (Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 7:1; g91-ZU 8/8 17; g94-ZU 2/22 31; g94-ZU 8/8 14, 15)
IZIGIDI EZITHAMBEKELE EKULUNGENI ZIZIGCINA ZIHLANZEKILE (8 imiz.)
UMika 4:1-4 wabikezela ukuthi abantu abavela kuzo zonke izizwe babeyothuthukela endleleni ephakeme yoku-
phila
Ziningi izici ezibangela ukuba bahlanzwe futhi bahlale bekuleso simo
Ukufundiswa kwaphezulu ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu ukuze bahambe ezindleleni zakhe (Hu 119:105; Isa 48:17)
Ukuqaphela isidingo sokufinyelela nokulondoloza indinganiso ephakeme yeBhayibheli yokuziphatha, edi-
nga ukuhlanzeka ngokomzimba, ngokokuziphatha nangokomoya (Hu 24:3, 4; Jak 1:27)
Ukuhlanganyela nesizwe esingcwele uNkulunkulu aye wasihlanza futhi wasibiza ukuba siphume ebumnya-
meni obungokomoya (Thi 2:11-14; 1Pe 2:9)
No. 98-ZU
9/07Isimemo esingakhethi sokuba balandele indlela ehlanzekile yokuphila siya kubo bonke abantu, kodwa obani aba-
sabelayo kuso?
Abantu ababubulayo bekhala ngezinto ezenyanyekayo ezenzekayo (Hez 9:4)
Labo abalambele iqiniso nokulunga (Mat 5:6; w95-ZU 12/15 28)
Labo abathambekele ngokufanele ekuphileni okumi phakade ngaphansi koMbuso kaNkulunkulu (IzE 13:48)
Bonke asebekubalekele kakade ukungcola kwezwe kufanele bazigcine behlanzekile emehlweni kaNkulunkulu
Kufanele baziqaphele njalo izimfuneko zikaNkulunkulu futhi banamathele kuzo
ISIXUKU ESIKHULU ESIHLANZWAYO EKUNGCOLENI KWEZWE NAMUHLA (20 imiz.)
Emhlabeni wonke, abanjengezimvu bayamenywa ukuba bakhonze uJehova (Mat 11:28-30)
IBhayibheli labikezela ukuthi izixuku ezivela kuzo zonke izizwe zaziyohlanzwa ezonweni ezizuzwe njengefa
kanye nasezenzweni zazo zesono futhi zaziyokhulekela uJehova phambi kwesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi (IsA 7:
9, 10, 13-17)
Njengoba uJehova esimema ukuba simkhonze, akufanele sibe nomuzwa wokuthi asinakukwazi ukwenza izi-
nguquko ezidingekile
Kunalokho, kufanele siwasebenzise ngokunenzuzo amalungiselelo awenzile okusisiza ukuba sinqobe uku-
ngcola kwenyama nokomoya
Lamalungiselelo ahlanganisa imiBhalo Engcwele, umthandazo, umoya ongcwele kanye namaKristu avu-
thiwe asebandleni
Ubufakazi bokuthi amalungiselelo kaNkulunkulu angasisiza buqinisekiswa okuhlangenwe nakho okungokoqo-
bo kwabantu abaye bahlanzwa emikhubeni engcolisayo:
Ukusebenzisa ugwayi (w96-ZU 9/15 17; w94-ZU 10/1 9)
Uphuzo oludakayo nokusebenzisa kabi imilaliso (g96-ZU 9/8 14; w94-ZU 9/15 27)
Ukuziphatha okubi kobulili (w93-ZU 2/1 6; w88-ZU 4/15 7)
Ukugembula (g95-ZU 9/22 11; g92-ZU 6/8 9-10)
Imikhuba yenkolo yamanga nokusebenzisa imimoya (w92-ZU 9/1 23; yb92 48-9)
[Ungasebenzisa nokunye okuhlangenwe nakho okufanelekayo okusezincwadini ze-Watch Tower okuqokomi-
sa amaphuzu ayinhloko akulengxenye. Uma zikhona ezinye izibonelo eziphawulekayo zokungcola kwezwe
ezivamile endaweni yakini, ungazisho kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho okukhuthazayo kwalabo abaye baku-
nqoba]
ZIGCINE UHLANZEKILE EKUNGCOLENI KWEZWE FUTHI UHLALE UHLANZEKILE (3 imiz.)
Lapho usukhululekile ekungcoleni kwezwe, yilwa kanzima ukuba uhlale uhlanzekile (2Pe 2:20; Jude 3)
Ungadikibaliswa amaphutha obuntu noma ukungapheleli
Qhubeka ubonisa ukholo emandleni ahlanzayo omhlatshelo wesihlengo kaJesu Kristu (1Jo 2:1, 2)
Yiba khona njalo emihlanganweni yebandla (Heb 10:23-25)
Hlanganyela iqiniso nabanye
Ngeke nje kubasize ukuba babe sendleleni eyisa ekuphileni kodwa futhi kuyokusiza nawe ukuba ulondolo-
ze ingokomoya lakho kanye nethemba lakho lokusindiswa (1Ti 4:16)
Jabula ngelungelo lakho lokudumisa igama likaJehova elingcwele nelokuhlanganyela nenhlangano yakhe ehla-
nzekile nengcwele
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqaphele ukuthi iBhayibheli liphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu futhi liyisiqondiso esiwusizo nesi-
nokwethenjelwa esilungiselelwe isintu. Gcizelela indlela okubaluleke ngayo ukunamathela kulokho okushiwo
iBhayibheli ukuze udumise uNkulunkulu futhi uphile ukuphila okujabulisayo
ISINTU SIDINGA ISIQONDISO ESINOKWETHENJELWA (3 imiz.)
Kunezizathu eziningi ezenza abantu yonke indawo bafune isiqondiso
Bafuna ukuthuthukisa inhlalakahle yabo engokwenyama nengokwengqondo nokulwa nokugula nezifo
Isifiso sabo siwukwenza ngcono imishado yabo nokuphila kwemikhaya yabo
Bafuna usizo lokwenza izinqumo eziphathelene nemfundo, umsebenzi, ezezimali nezinye izinto eziningi
Abaningi baphendukela kubeluleki abangochwepheshe nasezincwadini zokuzisiza
Kwabaningi, imiphumela ayenelisi ngoba isiqondiso abasitholayo ngokuvamile sisuke sisekelwe olwazini
lomuntu olulinganiselwe kakhulu noma sisuke singenakwethenjelwa
Izigidi ezivela kuzo zonke izizinda zobuzwe, zemfundo nezenhlalo ziye zathola isiqondiso esinokwethenjelwa
esisebenza ngempela
 ́
Sibenze baba abantu abanokuthula, abajabulayo nabanobunye, enye ingosi yomhleli eyathi ngabo: “Ngiya-
qiniseka ngokuthi ukube izwe lonke beliphila ngezimiso [zeBhayibheli] zoFakazi BakaJehova bekuyophe-
la ukuchitheka kwegazi nenzondo, futhi uthando beluyobusa njengenkosi.” (g93-ZU 12/22 13)
OFakazi BakaJehova bayalethemba iBhayibheli futhi bakholelwa ngokuqinile ukuthi linikeza isiqondiso esi-
ngcono kunazo zonke emhlabeni
ISIZATHU SOKUBA ULETHEMBE IBHAYIBHELI (17 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi abangalethembi iBhayibheli abakaze balifunde
Ukube bebengalifunda iBhayibheli, bebeyothola ukuthi ngaso sonke isikhathi lishaya emhloleni
UJesu Kristu wathi izwi likaNkulunkulu, elilotshwe emiBhalweni, liyiqiniso (Joh 17:17)
Ake sibone ukuthi kungani iBhayibheli lingase libhekwe njengeliyiZwi likaNkulunkulu leqiniso
IBhayibheli lishaya emhloleni ngokomlando nangokwesayensi yokuma komhlaba
Umvubukuli uYohanan Aharoni wabhala: “IBhayibheli lisewumthombo oyinhloko wesayensi yasendulo yoku-
ma kwePalestine ngenkathi yama-Israyeli. Ukulandisa nezincazelo zalo zibonisa indawo ayekuyo kanye ne-
zenzakalo ezingokomlando ezenzeka. Libhekisela emagameni ezindawo ezingu-475 ezaziwayo, amaningi awo
anikeza imininingwane ngesimo, indawo nomlando waleyo ndawo.” (g83 7/8 6)
IBhayibheli linokwethenjelwa ngokwesayensi
Nakuba kwakunemibono ephikisanayo ngesikhathi kulotshwa incwadi kaJobe neka-Isaya, lokho ezikushoyo
kushaya emhloleni ngokwesayensi
U-Isaya wayenembile lapho ethi umhlaba ‘uyisiyingelezi,’ noma indilinga (Isaya 40:22)
ImiBhalo futhi yasho iqinisile ukuthi umhlaba ulenga phezu kweze (Jobe 26:7)
Iziprofetho ezingashayi eceleni ziphawula iBhayibheli njengencwadi eyingqayizivele
Ezinye iziprofetho zeBhayibheli zagcwaliseka esikhathini esidlule
Isiprofetho esiphawulekayo esagcwaliseka esikhathini esidlule sitholakala kuDaniyeli 8:3-8; 20-22 (w93-ZU
5/15 6)
Ezinye iziprofetho ezingokomBhalo ziyagcwaliseka kulesi sikhathi sokuphela
Esinye seziprofetho eziningi ezigcwaliseka osukwini lwethu sikusAmbulo 17:3, 8-11, esalotshwa eminyake-
ni engaba ngu-1 900 edlule (re-ZU 246-8; 251-4)
‘Isilo sasendle esinombala obomvu klebhu’ saqala siyiNhlangano Yezizwe, saya kwalasha phakathi neMpi
Yezwe II, sabuye savela ngo-1945 sesiyiZizwe Ezihlangene
Amakhanda angu-7 amelela imibuso emikhulu engu-7, leyo, ngamunye ngesikhathi sawo, eye yahola eku-
cindezeleni abantu bakaNkulunkulu
Yebo, lokhu kwaziswa okungokomBhalo akugunyazi noma yiluphi uhlobo lokwedelela ohulumeni
noma iziphathimandla zabo
NjengamaKristu eqiniso, oFakazi BakaJehova babonisa inhlonipho efanele ‘ngamagunya aphakeme’
kahulumeni (Rom 13:1)
Ukuhlolwa kweBhayibheli ngokwethembeka kunikeza ubufakazi obunamandla obusobala bokuthi liyiZwi li-
kaNkulunkulu nomthombo onokwethenjelwa wesiyalo nesiqondiso
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UQONDISWE IBHAYIBHELI (20 imiz.)
IBhayibheli ‘liyisibani ezinyaweni zethu nokukhanya endleleni yethu’ (Hu 119:105)
Owayengumfundi wezomthetho eyunivesithi eSpain wathi: “Iyunivesithi yangifundisa indlela yokutadisha;
iBhayibheli langifundisa indlela yokuphila” (w94-ZU 9/15 27)
No. 99-ZU
9/97IBhayibheli ligcizelela izindinganiso ezifanele, kanye nezimiso ongaphila ngazo, futhi lingahlakaniphisa nezi-
wula (Hu 19:7, 8)
Lisinxusa ukuba sizole, singabi nomhawu noma sisheshe sicasuke (IzA 14:30; w96-ZU 2/1 31; 12/15 32)
ImiBhalo iseluleka ukuba silinganisele emikhubeni (IzA 23:20; 1Ti 3:11; Thi 2:2)
Nakuba iBhayibheli lingasithembisi impilo ephelele manje, lisinikeza isibindi sokuqhubekela phambili sikhu-
thazela naphezu kwezinkinga zempilo
Owesifazane owaqhubeka ebekezela empini yesikhathi eside elwa nokukhubazeka kobuchopho, kanye ne-
zikhathi zokucindezeleka, wathi: “Impilo yami ingase iqhubeke iwohloka, kodwa ukuthembela kwami ku-
Nkulunkulu nobuhlobo bami naye kuwusizo. Yeka indlela engijabula ngayo ngokuba phakathi kwabantu
bakaJehova nokuthola usizo lwakhe oluqinisekile!” (w93-ZU 6/1 31)
IBhayibheli lisinika iseluleko esiwusizo nesisebenzisekayo sendlela yokuxazulula izinkinga zomshado nezinye
izinkinga zomkhaya
Uthisha waseZimbabwe, e-Afrika, wabhala: “Mina nomkami sifunde kokuhlangenwe nakho kwethu okubu-
hlungu ukuthi imizamo yomuntu yokuxazulula izinkinga zakhe ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu iyize.”
(g97-ZU 4/8 32; fy-ZU 11)
Uma silandela iBhayibheli, siyothembeka kwesishade nabo ngaleyo ndlela sigweme ubuhlungu bokuchithe-
ka komshado (IzA 6:32, 33; Efe 5:33)
Ngenxa yokulandela izindinganiso zeBhayibheli, amaKristu aphishekela ukuthula nabantu bonke (Rom 12:18;
Heb 12:14)
Ukuqaphela iqiniso leBhayibheli lokuthi uNkulunkulu akakhethi lisisiza ukuba sinqobe ubandlululo olu-
ngokohlanga nobuzwe (IzE 10:34, 35; g88-ZU 2/8 31 [g88 1/22 27])
EmiBhalweni sifunda ukuthi thina bantu asilona nje uhlobo oluphakeme lwezilwane kodwa ukuthi sine-
khono lokuba nomqondo ongokomoya (Mat 5:3; Kol 3:16, 17)
Ulwazi olunembile lweBhayibheli lungasiholela ekusaseni elijabulisayo
Lusinika injongo yangempela ekuphileni, leyo ewukukhonza uNkulunkulu
Ukulamukela ngokwazisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu kusenza sikwazi ukuba nobuhlobo obuseduze noJehova,
uMthombo wokuphila, iqiniso nokukhanya okungokomoya (Hu 36:9; 43:3)
Lusiletha ebuhlotsheni obujabulisayo nabantu bakaNkulunkulu (Hu 144:15b)
Iqiniso leBhayibheli lisinika ukuphila okunenjongo enkonzweni kaJehova
VUMELA IBHAYIBHELI LIKUHOLELE ENJABULWENI NASEKUPHILENI (5 imiz.)
Qaphela iBhayibheli ngokwalokho eliyikho ngempela, iZwi likaNkulunkulu (1Th 2:13)
Iseluleko salo siyasizuzisa ngazo zonke izindlela
Isiqondiso esingokomBhalo sisisiza ukuba siphile ukuphila okujabulisayo nokunenjongo
IBhayibheli lisinikeza isiqondiso esidingekayo ukuze sibhekane nezinkinga zempilo, izinkinga zomkhaya,
izinhlekelele nolunye uvivinyo
Lisinikeza ithemba eliqinisekile (IsA 21:3, 4)
Ngaphezu kwakho konke, iBhayibheli lisibonisa indlela yokukhonza uJehova uNkulunkulu ngendlela eyamu-
kelekayo (2Ti 3:16, 17)
Ngokulandela isiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu esiqinisekile, iBhayibheli, nangokunamathela kubantu bakhe, ungatho-
la injabulo engunaphakade (IzA 2:21)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 99-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBUNGANE BEQINISO NONKULUNKULU KANYE NOMAKHELWANE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Le nkulumo kufanele inikezwe ngemfudumalo enkulu nangendlela ekhuthazayo. Siza izilaleli ziqaphele ukuthi
kuyilungelo elikhulu nenjabulo ukuba umngane kaJehova nokuthi kungani kufanele senze konke okusemandle-
ni ukuba simazi futhi simjabulise
UBUNGANE BEQINISO BUSEKELWE OTHANDWENI (3 imiz.)
Umngane nomuntu enijwayelene naye akufani
Ubungane budinga ukuba bubonakaliswe ngokwethembana, uthando olungokomzwelo, inhlonipho nangokwe-
thembeka okujulile, futhi budinga izinga eliphezulu lobuqotho
Umngane umuntu esimthanda ngothando olungokomzwelo nesimazisayo futhi esijwayelene kakhulu naye ne-
sinobudlelwane naye
Isichazamazwi sichaza “umngane” ngokuthi “umuntu osondelene nomunye ngenxa yothando olungokom-
zwelo noma ukwazisana”
Abangane abaseduze bayakujabulela ukugcwalisa imithwalo yabo yemfanelo ebangelwa izibopho eziqinile
abanazo, beqaphela ukuthi ibanikeza ithuba lokubonisa ubungane babo
Umuntu ofuna ubungane obungenakwethembeka nomthwalo wemfanelo, empeleni umane nje ufuna umu-
ntu azojwayelana naye, akafuni umngane (w92-ZU 6/1 24)
Isisekelo sabo bonke ubungane beqiniso siwuthando oluqotho, oluyimfanelo ehlala njalo engahluleki nanini (1Ko
13:8)
Uma enothando, umngane weqiniso uyokusekela ngezikhathi zokucindezeleka futhi akunikeze iseluleko ngo-
kwethembeka (IzA 17:17; 27:9)
Uthando ngoNkulunkulu luyosishukumisela ukuba sizuze ubungane naye
IBhayibheli lembula lokho okumelwe sikwenze ukuze sijabulele ubungane beqiniso noNkulunkulu kanye
nomakhelwane
IZIBONELO ZEBHAYIBHELI ZOBUNGANE BEQINISO (10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli linezibonelo eziningi zobungane beqiniso, esingazilingisa
URuthe noNawomi babenobungane obungapheli
URuthe, owayengeyena umIsrayeli, wabonisa ukuzinikela okungavamile nothando olunokwethembeka ku-
ninazala, uNawomi
Nakuba ayengumfelokazi futhi engenangane, uRuthe wenqaba ukuhlukana noNawomi (Rut 1:16, 17)
Uthando lwakhe lwalujule kangangokuba abanye bathi wayengcono kuNawomi kunamadodana ayisikho-
mbisa (Rut 4:15; it-2 828)
UDavide noJonathani bajabulela ubungane obuseduze kakhulu
Ukholo lukaDavide kuNkulunkulu nesibindi asibonisa lapho ebhekana noGoliyati, ngokuqinisekile kwam-
hlaba umxhwele uJonathani (it-2 102)
Baba abangane beqiniso, bathembana (1Sa 18:1, 3; 20:17, 42; w96-ZU 3/15 4-5)
Nakuba ayeyindlalifa yesihlalo sobukhosi sika-Israyeli, uJonathani wabeka izithakazelo zikaDavide nga-
phambi kwezakhe (1Sa 20:31, 32; 23:16-18; w89-ZU 1/1 24-5)
Ubungane babo babungenakunqamuka ngoba kuwo womabili la madoda ubungane noJehova uNkulunku-
lu kanye nokwethembeka kuye kwakuza ngaphambi kwanoma yini enye
Lapho uJonathani efa, uDavide wadabuka kakhulu ngokufa kwakhe (2Sa 1:25, 26)
UJesu nabafundi bakhe abathembekile babenobungane obuseduze
Wabembulela ulwazi oluphathelene noJehova uNkulunkulu (Mar 4:34)
Ubungane babo banqoba izilingo eziningi futhi buyohlala phakade (Luk 22:28-30; Joh 13:1)
UJesu wayezimisele ukubafela (Joh 15:11-15)
INDLELA YOKUBA UMNGANE KANKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Asimane nje sibe abangane bakaNkulunkulu ngenxa nje yokuthi unguMdali wethu
Kudingeka ukholo; kumelwe sikholelwe ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungumngane, futhi sibuphishekele ubungane
naye (Heb 11:6)
Kuyadingeka ukuze sizuze ulwazi olunembile ngaye, ubuntu bakhe, imisebenzi kanye nezinjongo zakhe (Joh
17:3)
Kudingeka sihlakulele ukwesaba uJehova okunenhlonipho futhi sibonise ukuthi siyamthanda ngokumlale-
la (Hu 25:14; 1Jo 5:2, 3)
Ukuze sibe nobungane noNkulunkulu kudingeka simethembe
Abukho ubuhlobo obungaqhubeka phakathi kwabantu noma noNkulunkulu, uma kungekho ukwethembana
No. 100-ZU
11/98U-Abrahama wakuqonda lokhu futhi ngokuphindaphindiwe wabonisa ukumethemba ngokuphelele uNkulu-
nkulu (Heb 11:8, 9, 17-19)
Ngakho-ke, wabizwa ngokuthi ungumngane kaJehova (Funda uJakobe 2:21-23)
UNkulunkulu uyakuthanda ukulunga futhi ufuna ukuba abangane bakhe nabo bathande ukulunga (Hu 33:5)
Yiba ngumngane walabo abangabangane bakaNkulunkulu, futhi ubagweme labo abangenayo nhlobo inhloni-
pho ngezindinganiso zokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu (Jak 4:4)
Thembeka kuNkulunkulu futhi uzimisele ukumlwela (Isa 6:8)
Ungafihli ukuthi ungumngane kaNkulunkulu; yimemezele obala insindiso (Rom 10:10)
Kubalulekile ukuxhumana noNkulunkulu ukuze ube umngane wakhe
Khuluma noNkulunkulu ngomthandazo, futhi umazise imizwa yakho ejulile (Flp 4:6, 7)
Lalela uNkulunkulu ngokufunda iZwi lakhe futhi usebenzise iseluleko sakhe (w92-ZU 6/1 26)
Ukwakha ubungane noNkulunkulu kuhilela nokusebenzisa kahle ‘ingcebo engalungile’ (Luk 16:9, 11-13; it-1 873)
Ukwenza ukukhulekela uJehova kuze kuqala ekuphileni kwethu nokuyisebenzisa ngokuhlakanipha impahla
yethu kuyosisiza ukuba silondoloze ubungane noNkulunkulu (w94-ZU 12/1 18)
Ubungane noJehova buncike emizamweni esiyenzayo ukuze siphile ngokwezimfuneko ezingokomBhalo (w89-ZU
9/15 26-30; funda amaHubo 15:1-5)
UBUNGANE NOMAKHELWANE (12 imiz.)
Ukuba umngane kusho okungaphezu nje kokuba nobungane
Kumelwe sibe qotho futhi sibafunele okungcono kakhulu abanye
Landela iseluleko sikaPawulu sokwenza okuhle kubo bonke, kodwa ikakhulukazi kulabo esihlobene nabo okho-
lweni (Gal 6:9, 10)
Yenza okuhle kubo bonke ngokuhlanganyela nabo ithemba loMbuso (Mat 28:19, 20; Joh 15:14)
Nakuba njengoJesu, umKristu ebonisa uthando kuso sonke isintu, uthando lobungane ulubonisa labo abangaba-
ngane bakaNkulunkulu kuphela (2Kr 19:2)
Thatha isinyathelo kuqala ngokubonisa ubufakazi bobungane (1Jo 4:19)
Zimisele ukunikela ngawe ngokwakho, isikhathi, ukuqonda nempahla yakho yezinto ezibonakalayo (IzA 17:
17; w96-ZU 11/1 15)
Namathela ezimisweni zokulunga futhi uthembeke (Hu 97:10)
Ungasheshi ukulalela inhlebo (w96-ZU 9/15 22; 3/15 6)
Thembeka kumngane ofuna ukwazi iqiniso, futhi ungamcasukeli umngane okutshela iqiniso (IzA 27:6; Gal 4:16)
Bonisa umusa, ube nozwela futhi ukulungele ukuthethelela (Kol 3:12-14)
Ukuzithoba nokushesha ukuxolisa kuyoba nesandla kakhulu ekusisizeni ukuba silondoloze abangane bethu
(w96-ZU 9/15 22-4)
Uma kudingeka, kulungele ukudela ukuphila kwakho ngenxa yabafowenu, njengoba uJesu enza [Landisa ka-
fushane izibonelo ezimbili eziqinisekisiwe] (g98-ZU 10/22 22; w96-ZU 11/1 18)
IZIBUSISO ZOKUBA NABANGANE BEQINISO (5 imiz.)
Ukuba umngane kaNkulunkulu akuyona into engenakwenzeka noma engafinyeleleki
U-Abrahama waba umngane kaNkulunkulu
Njengaye, qaphela ukuthi izibopho onazo kuNkulunkulu zinkulu kunalezo zomngane ongumuntu
UJesu wayeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu nomngane wakhe oseduze kakhulu (Joh 1:18)
Njengoba kwenza uJesu, lwela ukujabulisa uNkulunkulu kuzo zonke izinto (Joh 8:29; w92-ZU 6/1 25)
Ukuphishekela ubungane noNkulunkulu kusiletha ebandleni elifudumele nelinothando labakhulekeli bakaJeho-
va (Hu 27:10; 133:1)
Kulo sithola abangane beqiniso, nabo abangabangane bakaJehova
Qaphela ukuthi bonke ubungane obuyohlala njalo busekelwe ebunganeni noJehova
Ubungane noNkulunkulu buletha injabulo manje futhi buholele ekuphileni okumi phakade esikhathini esizayo
Ngokushesha, uJehova noJesu bazongenisa abangane babo ezweni elisha, lapho bonke abantu beyoba abanga-
ne beqiniso (Isa 11:9)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 100-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UJEHOVA—UMDALI OMKHULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Usebenzisa amaqiniso nezibalo ezicashuniwe ngokuphathelene nobukhulu nezinhlobonhlobo zemisebenzi kaJeho-
va yokudala, qokomisa ukuthi kungani enguMdali Omkhulu ngempela. Bonisa indlela thina, njengengxenye ye-
ndalo yakhe, esingamdumisa ngayo ngenxa yemisebenzi yakhe yokudala nokuthi kungani kufanele senze kanjalo
UJEHOVA NGUYE YEDWA ONGUMDALI (6 imiz.)
Akekho omunye ongaqhathaniswa noJehova (Funda iHubo 97:9, qhathanisa ne-NW)
Uchazwa ngokuthi “ungoPhezukonke” izikhathi ezingu-50 eBhayibhelini
UMbangeli omkhulu, nguye yedwa ongazange adalwe, ongenasiqalo (IsA 10:6)
Unesikhundla esiphakeme nesokugcina ngobukhulu endaweni yonke (Hu 113:4, 5)
Akukho ngelosi engaqhathaniswa naye, ngisho neNdodana eyizibulo (Hu 89:6)
UJehova unesikhundla esiyingqayizivele njengowukuphela koMdali wazo zonke izinto ezidaliwe (Neh 9:6; Isa
40:28)
Igama elithi “dala” livela esenzweni sesiHeberu esithi ba·ra’—esisetshenziswa kuphela ngokuqondene noJe-
hova (Gen 1:1, 21, 27; 2:4; it-1 526)
Lapho uNkulunkulu ekhuluma ‘nengcweti yakhe yomsebenzi’ kuGenesise 1:26, kwasetshenziswa isenzo sesi-
Heberu esithi a·sah; lesi senzo sisho ukuthi “yenza” futhi singahilela nabanye
‘Ingcweti yomsebenzi’ yayiyisisebenzi esikanye noNkulunkulu, hhayi umdali obambisene naye (IzA 8:30;
Kol 1:15, 16)
UJesu ngokwakhe wadumisa uNkulunkulu ngendalo (Mat 19:4-6)
UJEHOVA UBIZWA NGOKUFANELEKILE NGOKUTHI “UMDALI OMKHULU” (8 imiz.)
KumShumayeli 12:1 uJehova uchazwe nangokuthi “uMdali wakho [Omkhulu, NW]”
Lapho ezinye izinguqulo zithi “uMdali” nje kuphela, zisuke zihluleka ukunikeza incazelo ephelele yombhalo
wokuqala wesiHeberu
Igama elisetshenzisiwe lisebuningini, libonisa ubuhle noma ubukhulu (Job 35:10, NW; Isa 54:5, NW)
Amazwi athi “uMdali Omkhulu” asiza ekuboniseni isikhundla sikaJehova esingenakuqhathaniswa
Abonisa ubukhulu obungenakulinganiswa, isithunzi; ukuphakama kwakhe nenkazimulo esabekayo nama-
ndla
Ubukhulu bukaJehova bubonakala emazwini okuvula eBhayibheli (Gen 1:1)
Yeka umsebenzi ovezwe lapha—ukudalwa kwendawo yonke esabekayo! (ce 115-27)
UJehova ubelokhu ekhona ngaso sonke isikhathi, kodwa akunjalo ngezinto namandla okwakha indawo yo-
nke (Hu 90:2)
Uma bekungenjalo, igama elithi “ekuqaleni” belingeke lifaneleke
“Izulu nomhlaba” kwaba khona kanjani ngentando kaNkulunkulu?
“Umoya” kaJehova, amandla akhe asebenzayo, yiwona owabangela indalo (Hu 33:6; Gen 1:2)
Yonke indalo kaNkulunkulu ihlelekile, ayikaze ibe isixakaxaka noma ibe khona ngengozi (1Ko 14:33; Job 38:1,
4-11, 31-33)
Yonke into edalwa uJehova iphelele—imane nje yinhle! (Dut 32:4)
Ingabe siyakuqaphela lokho futhi simbonisa ukwazisa? (Shu 3:14; Hu 139:14)
UBUHLE BEZINTO EZIDALWE UJEHOVA (15 imiz.)
Izinto ezidalwe uJehova azigcini ezintweni ezimbalwa nje
Ubizwa ngokufanelekile ngokuthi “umdali wezulu nomhlaba” (Gen 14:19, 22)
Indalo yokuqala nevelele ‘kwakuyingcweti yakhe yomsebenzi’—‘iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa’ (IzA 8:22, 23, 30;
Joh 3:16; IsA 3:14)
‘Njengezibulo layo yonke indalo,’ yasetshenziswa uJehova ekudaleni zonke ezinye izinto (Kol 1:15-17; Joh 1:3)
Uquqaba lwezingelosi zasezulwini zadalwa kamuva ngazinye ngazinye (Dan 7:10)
Khona-ke kwabe sekudalwa amazulu nomhlaba okungokoqobo nazo zonke izici zako (Gen 1:1; Job 38:4-7)
Iplanethi enguMhlaba iyindalo kaJehova eyingqayizivele
Iwukuphela kweplanethi okutholakala kuyo ukuphila—isekela izinhlobo ezihlukene eziyizigidi ezinhlanu
noma ngaphezulu zezitshalo nezilwane (ce 129; g87 7/8 30)
Umhlaba ugcwele indalo kaJehova yobungcweti
Genesise 1:11, 12—kunezinhlobo ezihlukene ezingu-20 000 zezihlahla; izinhlobo ezingu-300 000 zezitshalo
(w84-ZU 6/1 8 [w83 11/15 7]; g89 1/8 18; ce 147-9)
Genesise 1:20—kunezinhlobo ezingu-30 000 zezinhlanzi; izinhlobo ezingu-9 000 zezinyoni; izinhlobo ezingaphe-
zu kuka-800 000 zezinambuzane esezaziwa kakade (ts-ZU 145-6; w84-ZU 6/1 8 [w83 11/15 7]; it-1 1201)

“INDALO ENTSHA” KAJEHOVA (6 imiz.)
Ngosuku lwesikhombisa uNkulunkulu waphumula kuphela emisebenzini yokudala yasemhlabeni ayeyenzela isi-
ntu (Gen 2:1-3)
Umsebenzi okude nendawo yesintu uyaqhubeka (Joh 5:17)
UNkulunkulu uyaqhubeka enza izinto ezinkulu ngendlela engokomoya
Kwakhiwa “indalo entsha” (2Ko 5:17)
Njengoba nje uJesu lapho ebhapathizwa aba ‘isidalwa esisha,’ ngakho ngePentekoste lika-33 C.E., kwazalwa
“indalo entsha”
Umuntu ngamunye owayekhona wabhapathizwa ngomoya ongcwele kaNkulunkulu njengendodana yakhe
engokomoya, waba ingxenye ‘yendalo entsha’ (1Pe 1:23)
Kwanezelwa nabanye abalandeli bakaKristu, baba yingqikithi yabangu-144 000 (IsA 14:1-5)
“Indalo entsha” ithunywe ukuba imemezele ‘izinto ezinhle kakhulu zikaNkulunkulu,’ kuhlanganise nezindaba
ezinhle zoMbuso (IzE 2:11)
Injongo yesikhathi esizayo yabangu-144 000: ukuba ababusi abakanye noKristu Jesu, benikeza isintu izibusiso zo-
Mbuso (IsA 20:4-6)
Injongo enhle ‘yendalo entsha’ iyofezeka lapho kugcwaliseka u-Isaya 11:9
Yeka indlela esiyojabula ngayo ngaleso sikhathi ngokuzuza ekubuseni kwayo!
Manje sinelungelo lokuhlanganyela nayo ekusakazeni izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso
YONKE IMISEBENZI YOMDALI KUMELWE IMDUMISE (10 imiz.)
Injongo kaJehova iwukuba yonke “imisebenzi” yakhe ‘nabangcwele’ kumdumise (Hu 145:10)
Indalo engaphili imdumisa buthule uJehova njengoMdali noMklami (ce 115-28)
Indalo ehlakaniphile inelungelo lokudumisa uNkulunkulu ngokuzithandela (Funda amaHubo 145:1-3)
Namuhla, insali ‘yendalo entsha’ idumisa uJehova ngokuhlabelela ‘ingoma kaMose neyeWundlu’ (Funda isAmbu-
lo 15:2, 3)
Njengoba kuvezwe engomeni kaMose, badumisa uJehova ngokuthi ‘uyiNkosi kuze kube phakade’ futhi
unguMphindiseli wezitha zakhe (Eks 15:1-19; Dut 31:30–32:43)
Lengoma ijabulisa amakhulu ezinkulungwane zabanye manje abamqaphelayo Lowo insindiso engeyakhe (IsA
7:9, 10)
Beqaphela uMdali wabo Omkhulu, abantu bezizwe bahlanganyela ekukhulekeleni uNkulunkulu nasekukha-
zimuliseni igama lakhe (Funda isAmbulo 15:4)
NjengoMdali wazo zonke izinto, uJehova ufanelwe yikho konke ukukhulekelwa nodumo (IsA 4:9-11)
Ingabe uyoba phakathi kwalabo abahlanganyela ekuqapheleni uJehova njengoMdali Omkhulu?
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
No. 101-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUNAKA IZWI LESIPROFETHO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gxila esizathwini sokuba sibe nesithakazelo esiprofethweni seBhayibheli nasendleleni esingaqinisa ngayo ukho-
lo lwethu. Chaza ngokucacile iziprofetho zeBhayibheli ezikhethiwe ezikhuluma ngezenzakalo zesikhathi esizayo,
futhi ubonise indlela esingakubonisa ngayo ukuthi siyazinaka
IBHAYIBHELI INCWADI YESIPROFETHO (7 imiz.)
Abaningi abathi bangamaKristu abanasithakazelo esiprofethweni
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi ngisho nezingelosi zinesithakazelo sokwazi ngekusasa (1Pe 1:12)
Phakathi kwemibhalo engcwele iBhayibheli livelele ngenxa yezici zalo ezingokwesiprofetho
Liqukethe umlando wokugcwaliseka kweziprofetho zalo uqobo
Eziningi zeziprofetho zalo zigcwalisekile, ezinye zisazogcwaliseka
Siyini isiprofetho? Umlando olotshwe kusengaphambili, okungukuthi, isibikezelo
Kodwa eBhayibhelini igama elithi “isiprofetho” lisebenza nakunoma yimiphi imiyalo, izimfundiso zokuzipha-
tha, nezigijimi ezivela phezulu (Dut 18:18, 19; Hez 37:9, 10; Luk 7:16; Joh 4:19; Isa 1:1-23)
Izibikezelo zeBhayibheli ezingokwesiprofetho zadluliselwa ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene
Ngezwi eliphuma emlonyeni kaJehova (Gen 3:15)
Ngokuqondisa umcabango nenkumbulo ephapheme (Joh 14:26; 16:13; 2Pe 1:21)
Ngamaphupho (Gen 41:15; Dan 4:5)
Ngemibono (Dan 8:2)
Ngezingelosi (Luk 1:19, 30, 31)
Ngezinye izikhathi iziprofetho ziba nokugcwaliseka okungaphezu kokukodwa
UMalaki 4:5 wagcwaliseka kuJohane uMbhapathizi kodwa futhi unokugcwaliseka kwanamuhla ngenxa kaMa-
laki 4:6 (Mat 11:14)
Iziprofetho zokubuyiselwa zagcwaliseka ngemva kuka-537 B.C.E., ziyagcwaliseka epharadesi elingokomoya
lanamuhla, ziyogcwaliseka ngokoqobo ngaphansi koMbuso wobuMesiya (Hu 126; 2Ko 12:4; IsA 21:3, 4)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA SIBE NESITHAKAZELO ESIQOTHO EZIBIKEZELWENI ZEBHAYIBHELI (10 imiz.)
Iziprofetho zisisiza ukuba sibone ukuthi sikuphi ngokohlelo lukaNkulunkulu lwezikhathi
Izibonelo (Mat 24:1-51; 2Ti 3:1-5)
UDaniyeli 9:24-27 wasiza amaJuda ukuba azi ukuthi ukuvela kukaMesiya kwase kuseduze
Iziprofetho esezigcwalisekile ziqinisa ukholo eBhayibhelini lokuthi liyiZwi likaNkulunkulu eliphefumulelwe
Iziprofetho esezigcwalisekile zifakazela ukuba kukaJehova usomandla, ukuba kwakhe nokuqonda konke; aka-
boni kusengaphambili nje kuphela kodwa ukwazi nokulawula ikusasa (Isa 46:8-10)
Iziprofetho esezigcwalisekile ziqinisa ukholo lwethu kulezo ezisazogcwaliseka
Iziprofetho zalotshwa ukuze siduduzwe, sibe nethemba (Rom 15:4)
IZWI LESIPROFETHO LENZIWE LAQINISEKA NGOKWENGEZIWE (10 imiz.)
Ngesibonakaliso sokuguqulwa isimo (umbono) (Mat 17:1-9)
Ofakazi kwakungabaphostoli bakaJesu abathathu ababeseduze kakhulu naye (uPetru, uJakobe, noJohane, nje-
ngoba kuboniswe kuLuka 8:51; Marku 14:33)
Ngalombono ukholo lwabaphostoli lwaqinisekiswa kokubili ngombono nangezwi okungavamile (2Pe 1:17-19)
Ivesi 17: Izwi kwakungelikaJehova uqobo (esinye sezikhathi ezintathu lapho izwi likaNkulunkulu lazwiwa
khona abantu: Marku 1:11; Johane 12:28)
Ivesi 18: Kungenzeka ukuthi kwakusemithambekeni yeNtaba iHermoni (w91-ZU 9/15 20)
Ivesi 19: Yiliphi izwi lesiprofetho elenziwe laqiniseka? ImiBhalo YesiHeberu ebhekisela kaningi kuMesiya
(Luk 24:44; Dut 18:15; Dan 7:13, 14)
 ́
Ukunaka kusho ukuthatha iZwi lesiprofetho ngokungathi sına, ukubonisa ukholo kulo, nokulivumela litho-
nye ukuphila kwethu
Ubani “ikhwezi”? IsAmbulo 22:16 siliveza ngokuthi uJesu Kristu
Sonke isiprofetho sangempela asiveli ‘encazelweni yomuntu ngokwakhe’ (2Pe 1:20)
Okusho ukuthi asikho isiprofetho esivele ngenxa yencazelo yezenzakalo enikezwa umuntu
Futhi, asikho isiprofetho esivela kumuntu noma esikhishwa nguye (umbhalo waphansi we-NW)
Zonke ziyingxenye yezinto ezizuzisayo eziphefumulelwe; azizange zivele ngentando yomuntu kodwa zavela
ngokusebenza komoya kaNkulunkulu, njengoba nje kwafakazelwa uDavide (2Sa 23:2), uPawulu (2Ti 3:16)
Ziyingxenye yamazwi kaNkulunkulu esiphila ngawo (Mat 4:4)
No. 102-ZU
5/95IZIPROFETHO EZISAZOGCWALISEKA, OKUDINGEKA SIZINAKE (15 imiz.)
Nakuba ukutadisha iziprofetho esezigcwalisekile kakade kuqinisa ukholo lwethu, kubalulekile ukunaka lezo ezi-
phathelene nekusasa ukuze sisindiswe
Esinye isiprofetho esinjalo sitholakala kweyoku-1 Thesalonika 5:3 (Funda) (dg-ZU 21 isig. 12)
Abantu benza imizamo ngokuvumelana nalokhu (Bhekisela kunoma yimiphi imizamo yezombangazwe yamu-
va, imihlangano yabaholi bemibuso yezwe emikhulu)

ntu bakaNkulunkulu (Funda uHezekeli 38:14-16a)

8/15 27)

Entabeni yobukhosi bukaJehova bendawo yonke kuye kwavela uMbuso WobuMesiya, ngokushesha ozobhu-
bhisa inhlangano kaSathane ebonakalayo eyonakele

38:23)
Ngemva kwalokho, uSathane namademoni akhe bayofakwa kwalasha (Funda isAmbulo 20:1-3a)
Ingelosi ebabophayo uJesu Kristu (re-ZU 287)

Khona-ke isAmbulo 21:3, 4 siyogcwaliseka (Funda)
Kancane kancane wonke umhlaba uyoba ipharadesi
Isintu siyobuyiselwa ekupheleleni
Amazwi kaJesu kuJohane 5:28, 29 ayogcwaliseka (Funda)
Ukwenza okuhle noma okubi kubhekisela ekuziphatheni kwangemva kokuvuswa; igama elithi ‘ukwahlule-
lwa’ libhekisela ekwahlulelweni okubi
Amazwi kaPawulu kweyoku-1 Korinte 15:24-28 ayoba yiqiniso (Funda)
Ekugcineni, kuyoba nokuvivinywa ekugcwalisekeni kwesAmbulo 20:7, 8 (Funda)
Zonke izihlubuki ziyobhujiswa; bonke abaphumelelayo kulolo vivinyo bayonikezwa ilungelo lokuphila okumi
phakade
