No. 102-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UNGATHOLA INJABULO EKUKHONZENI UNKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza izilaleli isizathu esihle sokubonisa umoya wenjabulo naphezu kwezinkinga zokuphila. Bonisa indlela inja-
bulo, isithelo somoya kaNkulunkulu, ehlangene ngayo ngokungenakuhlukaniswa nokwazi uNkulunkulu nokum-
khonza
ISIFISO NEMIZAMO YOMUNTU YOKUTHOLA INJABULO (5 imiz.)
Wonke umuntu ophilile ufuna ukujabula. Izwe alinaso isizathu senjabulo: ubuphekula, izingxabano zobuhlanga,
ubugebengu, izifo, nokunye, kudlangile ezweni
Ngokwesibonelo: “Ubuphekula buye baba yimpi enonya engenayo imingcele,” kusho isikhulu esithile sikahu-
lumeni (g86-ZU 7/8 21 [g86 6/22 3])
Ngo-1971, kwafa abantu abangaphansi kwamashumi amabili nane ekuhlaseleni kwamaphekula; ngo-1983, kwa-
fa abangaphezu kuka-10 000; futhi manje izingxabano zobuhlanga nobuphekula kuyinsakavukela (g86-ZU 7/8
21 [g86 6/22 3]; g93-ZU 12/22 4-5)
Izwe lizama ukuthola injabulo ngezemidlalo, ngokubuka i-TV, ngohambo lokuzijabulisa, ngokuthanda izinto
ezibonakalayo, ngendlela yokuphila eyekethisayo
Amabhizinisi amakhulu asebenzisa ubuchwepheshe banamuhla ukuze abangele izidingo-mbumbulu abese eza-
nelisa
Lokhu kuphishekela injabulo umuntu ayifisela kangaka akulethi ukwaneliseka okuhlala njalo. Konke kuwu-
bugovu obuyize, obuphelela egodini (1Ti 6:9, 10; Gal 6:7, 8; Job 17:13, 16)
UNKULUNKULU UYALA IZINCEKU ZAKHE UKUBA ZIJABULE (8 imiz.)
(Kulesi sihlokwana nesilandelayo, bheka i-w95-ZU 1/15 10-15)
Nakuba abanye bekholelwa ukuthi ayinakufinyelelwa, injabulo ingatholakala kulelizwe elibi
Cabangela isibonelo sikaJesu (Heb 12:2)
Ukuze akhonze uNkulunkulu, uPawulu uthi amaKristu okuqala ‘akwamukela ngenjabulo ukuphangwa koku-
ngokwawo’ (Heb 10:32-34)
Kunomuzwa umuntu anawo onezidingo ezingaphezu kwezinto ezibonakalayo
Ngaphandle kokuba lezi zidingo zaneliswe, ukwaneliseka, injabulo, ngeke kube khona. Izidingo zomzimba
nezomoya kumelwe zaneliswe—kudinga ukulinganisela (Mat 4:4; 5:3)
Ngaso sonke isikhathi abantu bakaNkulunkulu banesizathu sokujabula (Flp 4:4; 1Th 5:16)
Injabulo ilethwa ukuba umuntu ongokomoya. Ingabe injabulo yezinto ezibonakalayo ingafana nenjabulo
etholakala ngobuzalwane bethu bomhlaba wonke? Ingafana yini nombono womusa ozwakaliswa umfowe-
thu ongokomoya? Ingafana yini nokuthinta kozwela, ukumomotheka okufudumele, noma isenzo sothando
somuntu omthandayo? Ingafana yini nomuzwa wokuthi ngempela uyilungu lomkhaya kaNkulunkulu no-
kuthi uyakukhathalela lapho uswele? Lobu buhlobo obuhle nabafowenu noJehova, uNkulunkulu ojabula-
yo, yibona obukulethela injabulo. UJehova uyayala: “Jabulani ethembeni” (Rom 12:12)
INJABULO YOKUHLONIPHA UNKULUNKULU AYIXHOMEKILE EZINTWENI EZINGAPHANDLE (12 imiz.)
Enye incazelo yenjabulo: “Isimo sentokozo” (Webster’s Ninth New Collegiate Dictionary)
Injabulo ayiwona nje umuzwa kodwa iyimfanelo yenhliziyo (IzA 17:22; Shu 2:10)
Iwumuzwa wangaphakathi wenjabulo ojulile osekelwe ezimisweni futhi ngaleyo ndlela uhlala njalo
Ukuphila nenjabulo akuxhomekile ezintweni ezibonakalayo (Luk 12:15; Mat 13:44) (Qhathanisa nezwe elinge-
nanjabulo, elithanda izinto ezibonakalayo)
Injabulo iyisithelo somoya (Gal 5:22)
Ukwazi iqiniso kuyisisekelo senjabulo
Ukuqonda injongo kaNkulunkulu kunikeza injongo ekuphileni, leyo ngaphandle kwayo ‘esinjengezinkanyezi
ezingenawo umzila omisiwe’ (Jude 13)
Iqiniso likhulula umuntu ‘eBabiloni Elikhulu,’ okuyisibusiso esiletha injabulo (IsA 18:2, 4; Joh 8:32)
Abakhulekeli abasathandazi phambi kwezithombe ezingaphili ezingenakuphendula (Hu 115:4-8)
Ulwazi lweBhayibheli lukhulula umuntu ekusabeni ukuhlushwa phakade; lukhulula umuntu ebugqilini beso-
no (Rom 8:2); lukhulula umuntu ekusabeni abantu (Hu 118:6)
UNkulunkulu uvuza abakholekile ngokugcwalisa isithembiso sokuphila okumi phakade (Joh 17:3)
OKUNGENZA IZINCEKU ZIKANKULUNKULU ZITHOLE INJABULO EKUMKHONZENI (15 imiz.)
(Bheka i-w95-ZU 1/15 15-20)
Ukusiza abanye kuletha injabulo (1Th 2:19, 20)
AmaKristu okuqala ajabula lapho eshushiswa ngenxa yokushumayela. Ngani? Ngoba ayehlupheka ngenxa yo-
kulunga (Mat 5:10; 1Pe 4:13, 14)
Nathi sinomthwalo wemfanelo omkhulu wokushumayela izindaba ezinhle, futhi ngokufanayo singathola inja-
bulo ekukhonzeni uJehova

13:5, 6)
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zithola injabulo ngobudlelwane obuhle nabafowabo abakholekile emihlanganweni,
enkonzweni yasensimini, nasekuzilibaziseni okunempilo (Hu 133:1; Heb 10:23-25)

yeka indlela okuqabula ngayo ukuba nobudlelwane nabafowethu abaye bembatha ubuntu obusha! (Kol 3:8-11)

5/1 27)
Cabanga ngesikhathi lapho lonke izwe liyobe lithembeka kanjalo!

khe (IzA 27:11; Heb 6:10)

No. 103-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45BAZALI—INGABE NAKHA NGEZINTO EZINGASHI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Vuma ukuthi ukukhulisa izingane akuwona umsebenzi olula kulezi zinsuku zokugcina. Khuthaza abazali ukuba
balandele iseluleko seBhayibheli esiphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu bese beshiyela imiphumela ezandleni zikaJeho-
va. Nikeza ukusikisela okuwusizo ngendlela yokusebenzisa iseluleko seBhayibheli
OKWENZA KUDINGEKE IZINTO EZINGASHI EKUQEQESHENI IZINGANE (5 imiz.)
Ukuqeqesha izingane kuyinselele yangempela namuhla
Ukucindezela kwezwe elinokuziphatha okubi kuyanda ngenxa yokuzimisela okukhulu kukaSathane ukuba
afinyelele umgomo wakhe wokonakalisa uhlanga lwesintu (1Pet 5:8)
Ukuthambekela okubi okubonakala kusukela “ebusheni” kumelwe kunqandwe (Gen 8:21)
Abanye abazali bakhulisa izingane eziningi, zonke ezikhula zibe abantu abanesimo esihle
Lokhu kufakazela ukuthi abazali benza imizamo ukuze bafeze imithwalo yabo yemfanelo
Kodwa enye intsha, nakuba ikhuliswe ngeqiniso, iyalishiya lapho isikhulile
Yini ebangela le miphumela engafani?
Okuningi kuxhomeke ezingeni abazali abasebenzisa ngalo izinto ezingashi ekwakheni ukholo ezinganeni
(Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 3:10-13)
Le ngxoxo izoveza indlela iseluleko sikaPawulu esingasetshenziswa ngayo ekuqeqesheni izingane
Yiqiniso, lona umsebenzi wokubambisana; izingane nazo zinomthwalo wokusebenzisa lokho ezikufunda-
yo ekuphileni kwazo (w98-ZU 11/1 13; w91-ZU 7/1 26-7)
ZIYINI IZINTO EZINGASHI? (13 imiz.)
Kweyoku-1 Korinte 3:12, 13, uPawulu wayeqhathanisa izinhlobo ezimbili zezinto zokwakha—ezingashi (“igolide,
isiliva, amatshe ayigugu”) nezishayo (‘ukhuni, utshani obomisiwe, izinhlanga’) (w85-ZU 3/15 24-6 [w84 8/1 10-12])
Ekuqeqesheni izingane, kumelwe sakhe ngezinto ezingashi; zimelelani lezi zinto?
EBhayibhelini, igolide, isiliva namatshe ayigugu ngezinye izikhathi kusetshenziswa ngokomfanekiso njengoku-
melela izimfanelo ezinjengokuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu, ukuqonda okungokomoya, ukholo oluqinile, ukwe-
thembeka, ukwazisa kothando ngoJehova nangemithetho yakhe (IHu 19:7-11; IzA 2:1-6; 1Pet 1:6, 7; fy-ZU 55)
Lezi zimfanelo zakha ubuntu okumelwe sizame ukubakha ezinganeni zethu
Abantu abanalezi zimfanelo eziqinile bayokwazi ukumelana ‘nomlilo’
“Umlilo” lapha umelelani? (w85-ZU 3/15 26 [w84 8/1 12])
UmBhalo uthi umsebenzi womuntu ngamunye uyofakwa ‘emlilweni’
Futhi awulona ngempela ushushiso
Kungaba yinoma ikuphi ukucindezela noma izilingo ezingabhubhisa ingokomoya lomuntu—isilingo sokuba
ahileleke ekuziphatheni okubi ngokobulili, ukunxenxelwa ukuba asebenzise izidakamizwa noma utshwala,
ukucindezelwa ukuba ahlanganyele ekuzijabuliseni kwezwe okonakele, ihuha lokuthanda izinto ezibonaka-
layo
Abazali kudingeka bazibuze: Ingabe izingane zethu ziyophumelela lapho zibhekana ‘nomlilo’? Ingabe ziyokuma
ziqine njengesakhiwo esakhiwe ngezinto ezingashi? Noma ziyokusha njengaleso esakhiwe ngezinto ezishayo?
Okuningi kuxhomeke ekutheni niye nazama yini ukwakha izimfanelo zobuKristu eziqinile ezinganeni zenu
INDLELA YOKWAKHA NGEZINTO EZINGASHI (22 imiz.)
Into yokuqala ebalulekile: Abazali kumelwe babeke isibonelo esifanele (w85-ZU 3/15 27-8 [w84 8/1 13-14];
fy-ZU 56)
Kumelwe thina ngokwethu sibe nezimfanelo esifuna ukuzakha ezinganeni zethu
Abazali kumelwe bagxilise uthando ngoJehova ezinhliziyweni zabo ngaphambi kokuba balugxilise ezinhlizi-
yweni zezingane zabo (Dut 6:4-6)
Lokho abazali abakufundisayo nalokho abakwenzayo kumelwe kuvumelane (Ro 2:21-24)
Uma sifisa ukwakha izingane zethu ukuba zithande uJehova futhi zibe nesifiso sokumjabulisa, kufanele zi-
bone lolo thando naleso sifiso emithandazweni yethu, enkulumweni nasezenzweni zethu
Izingane zinaka kakhulu esikwenzayo kunalokho esikushoyo
Izingane kudingeka zifundiswe ngendlela efanele kusukela ebuntwaneni (IzA 22:6; 2Thim 3:15; fy-ZU 67-71)
Zifundise ukuthandaza; isibonelo semithandazo yakho sibalulekile
Zisize ukuba zazi uJehova ngokuseduze, zifunde izimfanelo nezindlela zakhe
Lokho kuyozisiza ukuba zakhe kuzona ngokwazo umuzwa onamandla wokuzinikela kuJehova
Ngesibonelo sakho, zisize zibone ukuhlakanipha kokulalela imithetho kaJehova (w85-ZU 3/15 29-30 [w84 8/1
15-16])
Zisize zibone ukuthi ukugcina imithetho yakhe kuyozuzisa zona; kuyozishukumisela ukuba zifune ukum-
jabulisa
No. 104-ZU
1/05Yenza uKristu isisekelo ngokufundisa izingane ngaye
Izingane kufanele zibone ukuthi isibonelo nezimfundiso zikaJesu kufanele kuthinte imizwa nezenzo zazo
(1Pet 2:21)
Zisize ukuba zazi ingqondo kaKristu nezimfanelo zakhe
Sebenzisa izindlela zokufundisa ezinhle (w01-ZU 10/1 8-13; w85-ZU 3/15 28-9 [w84 8/1 14-15])
Buza imibuzo ukuze uzenze zicabange futhi zizindle ngalokho ezikufundayo
Sebenzisa imibuzo eyozenza ziveze imibono yazo, njengothi “Uzizwa kanjani ngalokhu?” noma “Ungasisebe-
nzisa kanjani lesi seluleko ekuphileni kwakho?”
Imibuzo enjalo ingakusiza ukuba uthole okusenhliziyweni yengane
Yenza isifundo somkhaya sivumelane nezidingo zawo—izinkinga esikoleni noma ekhaya—kungabi ukuhla-
nganisa indaba nje
IBhayibheli lithi: “Lalelani isiyalo” (IzA 8:33)
Isiyalo sihilela ukufundisa nokuqeqesha
Isiyalo sibonisa ukuthi abazali bayayikhathalela ingane (Heb 12:6, 11)
Akufanele abazali bathukuthele ngokweqile; lokho kubonisa ukuntula ukuzithiba
Ungaguquguquki (Math 5:37; Efe 6:4; fy-ZU 84)
Nakuba abanye ebandleni bengase basize, khumbula ukuthi izingane zakho ziwumthwalo wakho lapho kuzi-
wa endabeni yokuziqeqesha
Cela uJehova ngomthandazo ukuba akusize ukuze ukwazi ukusondelana nezingane zakho futhi uziqeqeshe
ngendlela efanele (AbA 13:8)
Siza izingane ukuba zizuze emihlanganweni yebandla
Qikelela ukuthi zinamaBhayibheli azo siqu nezincwadi ezidingekayo; hlala nazo; zisize ukuba ziyilungisele-
le imihlangano
Hlanganyelani enkonzweni yasensimini njengomkhaya
UMVUZO WOKWAKHA NGEZINTO EZINGASHI (5 imiz.)
Ukwakha izimfanelo ezingashi ezinganeni zethu kuletha umvuzo (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 3:14, 15) (w85-ZU
3/15 31 [w84 8/1 17])
UPawulu wavuzwa ngokubona labo abasiza ukuba bamukele iqiniso bekhuthazelela ukuphikiswa; kwaba ubu-
fakazi bokuthi wayakhe kahle (1Thes 2:19, 20)
Ngokufanayo, yeka ukuthi kuyokujabulisa kanjani ukubona izingane zakho zima ziqine lapho zibhekene
nezilingo nokucindezela, ukuzibona zikhuthazela endleleni yobuKristu!
Yiqiniso, isimo senhliziyo yomuntu ngamunye siyisici esihilelekile ekunamatheleni kwakhe eqinisweni, ko-
dwa ungalokothi ukhohlwe indima ebalulekile efezwa isibonelo sabazali nendlela yabo yokuqeqesha
Lapho izingane zibambelela ngokuqinile eqinisweni, zidumisa uJehova futhi zijabulisa abazali bazo
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ichazwe)
No. 104-ZU—ikhasi 2

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUKUTHOLA INDUDUZO KULO LONKE USIZI LWETHU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza lenkulumo ngendlela eduduzayo enokufudumala nozwela. Siza abacindezelekile babone ukuthi uJehova
uyabakhathalela, udonsele ukunakekela ezindleleni zakhe zokunikeza induduzo kulezi ‘zikhathi ezibucayi oku-
nzima ukubhekana nazo’
INDALO YONKE IYIDINGA KAKHULU INDUDUZO (4 imiz.)
Sonke isintu siyidinga kakhulu induduzo (Rom 8:22)
Abantu bakaJehova nabo bayayidinga induduzo
Siphila ‘ezikhathini ezibucayi okunzima ukubhekana nazo’ (2Ti 3:1)
Kumelwe futhi silwe nenyama yethu engaphelele (Rom 7:21-24)
Singayitholaphi induduzo esiyidingayo?
LAPHO SIBHEKENE NEZILINGO, MASIPHENDUKELE ‘KUNKULUNKULU WENDUDUZO YONKE’ (12 imiz.)
UJehova, ‘uNkulunkulu wenduduzo,’ angasisiza ukuba sikhuthazele ngaphansi kwazo zonke izimo (2Ko 1:3, 4)
IZwi lakhe libhalelwe ukusinikeza induduzo nethemba (Rom 15:4)
INdodana yathunyelwa njengomduduzi onesigijimi sokuphila
Yaqinisekisa abalilayo ukuthi babeyoduduzwa (Mat 5:4)
Yayizoqabula labo ‘abasindwayo’ (Mat 11:28-30)
UPawulu wathola induduzo kuJehova naphezu kobunzima obukhulu phakathi nayo yonke inkonzo yakhe (2Ko
4:7, 16-18)
Wanikeza izinhlobo zezilingo noma zoshushiso ezingu-23 kweyesi-2 Korinte 11:23-27 (w83-ZU 6/15 9-20 [w82
12/1 12-22])
UPawulu noSila babengahuba izindumiso zikaJehova naphezu kokushushiswa ngonya ngenxa yokushumaye-
la (IzE 16:19-25)
Izingubo zabo zadatshulwa, futhi bashaywa base befakwa ezitokisini (amave. 22-24)
Bathandaza, bahuba izindumiso zikaNkulunkulu ukuze bezwe bonke (ive. 25)
UJehova wabakhulula ngokuyisimangaliso (ive. 26)
Kamuva, baduduza umgcini wejele nomkhaya wakhe ngezindaba ezinhle (amave. 27-34)
Nathi singabheka kuJehova ukuze sithole induduzo nosizo ngazo zonke izikhathi esikudinga ngazo (Hu 55:22;
w92-ZU 4/15 26-30; w92-ZU 5/1 26-9; w92-ZU 5/15 28-31 noma omunye umthombo wamuva)
“Ngingase ngihlukaniswe nabantu engikanye nabo, kodwa akukho muntu ongangihlukanisa noNkulunkulu.
Yeka amandla nenduduzo engokomoya umthandazo owanginikeza khona! . . . Akukho zibhamu, zindonga,
namigoqo yejele okungavimbela ukuba umoya kaNkulunkulu ufinyelele abantu bakhe! . . . UNkulunkulu nga-
mandla akhe wonke uyakwazi ukwenza ngisho nababuthakathaka kakhulu kithi banqobe lapho bebhekene
nokushushiswa!” (Isithunywa sevangeli esasivalelwe sodwa eChina) (w73-ZU 3/1 106-7 [w72 9/1 524-5])
INDLELA ESINGATHOLA NGAYO INDUDUZO KUJEHOVA (10 imiz.)
Kumelwe samukele futhi sisebenzise usizo uJehova asinikeza lona ngomoya wakhe, iZwi, nenhlangano yakhe
(Heb 13:5b, 6)
Ukutadisha njalo nokuhlanganyela emihlanganweni kuqinisa umuntu ekumelaneni nokuhlasela kukaSatha-
ne (Hu 1:1-3; Heb 10:24, 25)
Kufanele sizijwayelanise nendlela uJehova asebenzelana ngayo nabantu (1Ko 10:6, 11)
Ukuzindla kugxilisa amaqiniso engqondweni nasenhliziyweni (Flp 4:8)
Lapho uwedwa noma uhlaselwa isilingo ngokungazelele, sebenzisa izimiso osuzifundile kakade (Hu 105:5)
Imithandazo yezinceku zikaJehova izwiwa ngokuphazima kweso (2Kr 7:1; Neh 2:4-6; Luk 3:21, 22; IzE 9:11, 12;
10:30, 31)
Kubalulekile ukuthandaza njalo (Mat 26:41)
Kubalulekile ikakhulukazi ngezikhathi zosizi (Hu 77:2)
Hlala unombono kaJehova phambi kwakho (IzE 2:25, 26)
Njengoba silwela ukukhuthazela ngokukholeka, uyasisiza futhi asiduduze, njengoba eye wenza kubantu ba-
khe endulo nasezikhathini zanamuhla
LINGISA UJEHOVA NGOKUDUDUZA ABANYE NGAZO ZONKE IZIKHATHI (12 imiz.)
UJehova uyasiduduza futhi asiqinise ukuze sikwazi ukukhuthaza nokududuza abanye (2Ko 1:4)
Khuluma ngokududuzayo nalabo abacindezelekile, abanesizungu, abaphelelwe ithemba (1Th 5:14; w90-ZU 3/15
26-8)
UJehova ngeke ayikhohlwe inkonzo yabo yokukholeka (Heb 6:9-11)
Ngothando bakhuthaze ukuba babe nombono oqondile ngezimo nezinto abangenakuzishintsha (1Ko 10:13; Heb
12:1-3)
No. 105-ZU
5/95Basize baqaphele ukuthi ‘uNkulunkulu wenduduzo’ uyakhathalela (Hu 41:3; 1Pe 5:7)
Ngisho nalabo abasokhukhweni lokufa banethemba lovuko (Job 14:13-15; w86-ZU 10/1 12-13)
Banikeze ithemba lovuko labo abalahlekelwe abathandekayo ngokufa (Jak 1:27, umbhalo waphansi we-NW; Joh
11:23-25)
Ukwazi isimo sabafileyo kunikeza induduzo (Joh 11:11, 14; Shu 9:5)
Duduza labo abanamakhaya ahlukene, abanezingane ezihlubukayo (Hu 27:10; Isa 49:15)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu lihlanganisa zonke izimo (2Ti 3:16, 17)
INGABE UYAWAZISA AMALUNGISELELO KAJEHOVA OKUSIDUDUZA? (7 imiz.)
Labo abahlonipha amalungiselelo kaJehova bajabulela ukholo oluqinile nethemba elingantengi (1Pe 5:7-10)
Bathola induduzo ngisho noma ‘bedangele’ (2Ko 7:6; 2Th 2:16, 17)
Nokho, abanye baphelelwa ukwazisa izindlela zikaJehova, babuyele ezweni
Mhlawumbe bayakhubeka, bazizwe belimele, noma baye bakhathala futhi ‘bakhukhuleka’ (Heb 2:1; Rom 14:13)
Bangase bazizwe bengabufanelekeli ubuhle bukaNkulunkulu ngenxa kanembeza omubi
Abanye bangase bazizwe bengafaneleki ngenxa yendlela yokuphila embi yangesikhathi esidlule
Bangathola induduzo emfanekisweni wendodana esaphazayo (Luk 15:11-24)
Bangase bazisole futhi baphendukele ekwenzeni intando kaNkulunkulu (Mat 21:28-32)
Isifiso sethu kufanele sibe ukusiza abathandayo babuyele kuNkulunkulu kusenesikhathi (Gal 6:1)
Kuyobe sekwephuze kakhulu lapho kuqala “usizi olukhulu” (2Ko 6:1, 2)
Kujabulele ukutadisha nalabo abathandayo
Baduduze ngokuqonda iqiniso ngokujulile (Heb 5:12-14)
Bafundise ukusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu ekuphileni kwabo
Masibasize bonke basondele kuJehova hhayi ukuze bathole induduzo manje kuphela kodwa futhi ukuze basindi-
swe (1Kr 28:9)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKONAKALISA UMHLABA KULETHA ISIJEZISO SAPHEZULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza ithemba elisekelwe eBhayibhelini lepharadesi elibuyiselwe ngendlela enokucabangela. Chaza ukuthi
uMdali onothando unenjongo yokuba umuntu ajabulele ukuphila ePharadesi nokuthi kungani lokhu kungakenze-
ki. Khuthaza izilaleli ukuba zifunde okwengeziwe ngenjongo kaNkulunkulu
INSIMU YASE-EDENE, ISIPHO SIKANKULUNKULU SOMUSA KUMUNTU WOKUQALA (6 imiz.)
Umhlaba omuhle walungiselelwa ngezinsuku eziyisithupha zokudala, waklanywa kucatshangelwa umuntu (Hu
115:16; Isa 45:18)
Kwafinyelela umvuthwandaba ngokudalwa kwendodana engumuntu ophelele (Gen 2:7)
Umuntu, owenziwa “ngomfanekiso” kaNkulunkulu, unekhono lokuqonda izinto ezingokomoya, ngokungafani ne-
ndalo eyizilwane (Gen 1:26)
Lesi ‘sidingo esingokomoya’ kumelwe sigcwaliswe ukuze ajabule (Mat 5:3)
Ngemva kokwenza umuntu, uNkulunkulu wambeka ensimini yase-Edene
Insimu yase-Edene futhi yaziwa ngokuthi “ipharadesi lenjabulo,” “insimu kaJehova” (Gen 2:8, umbhalo wa-
phansi we-NW; Isa 51:3)
[Chaza: Yayinamanzi amaningi; umfula wawugeleza phakathi, uhlukana ube imifula emine emikhulu. Ama-
nzi ahlanzekile, amsulwa, angangcolile. Yonke imithi “ebukekayo, emihle, edliwayo.” Izinhlobonhlobo ze-
zimbali, izihlahlana, uhlaza. Izinyoni ezinhle, izilwane ezikhangayo (hhayi ezibulalayo), zihlala ndawonye
ngokuthula ekhaya ezilinikezwe uNkulunkulu (Gen 2:9, 10; it-1 676-7)]
Umhlaba wawuyoba ikhaya lakhe laphakade (Shu 1:4)
Ngothando uMdali wanikeza umuntu umfazi ophelele ‘njengomsizi’ (Gen 2:18, 22)
Umbhangqwana wokuqala ongabantu wenziwa abanakekeli bekhaya eliyiPharadesi, unezibusiso ezicebile ze-
njabulo echichimayo (Gen 2:15)
Njengoba umkhaya wesintu wanda, izibusiso zaziyokwanda emhlabeni wonke (Gen 1:26-28)
IKHAYA ELIYIPHARADESI LIYALAHLEKA, UKONAKALISWA KOMHLABA KUYAQALA (12 imiz.)
Indawo eyisivikelo eyipharadesi yalahleka ngokuhlubuka
Ukudla isithelo esinqatshelwe kwakuwukuhlubuka ngamabomu (Gen 2:16, 17)
Umbhangqwana ongabantu waxoshwa ekhaya eliyiPharadesi, wawungeke uphinde ubuyele kulo; indlela ephi-
ndela kulo yayigadwe amakherubi (Gen 3:22-24)
Wavinjelwa ekutheni ubuye udle ‘emthini wokuphila’
“Umuthi wokuphila” uwuphawu lwesiqinisekiso soMdali sokuphila esingashintshi (it-2 247)
Nokho, uNkulunkulu akazange awushintshe umqondo wakhe ngokuqondene nenjongo yakhe ngomhlaba, owa-
wuyonakekelwa umuntu (Isa 55:11)
Ukukhetha ukuzibusa ngaphandle koMdali kwaletha ukungapheleli, ubudlova, ukufa (Rom 5:12; dg-ZU 14-15)
Ubudlova baqala ngokufa kuka-Abela owesaba uNkulunkulu (Gen 4:8-11)
Ngesikhathi sikaNowa (cishe ngo-2490 B.C.E.), umhlaba wawugcwele ubudlova babantu ababi nenzalo ‘enama-
ndla’ yezingelosi ezonakele (Gen 6:4, 5)
AmaNefili asebenzisa ubukhulu bawo ekubeni iziqhwaga, okwabangela ubudlova
UMdali, uJehova, wazisola ngokuthi wayemenzile umuntu futhi wezwa ubuhlungu benhliziyo ngenxa yezimo
ezingcolile emhlabeni (Gen 6:6)
Isikhukhula—isijeziso saphezulu—sabhubhisa ababebhubhisa umhlaba (Gen 6:11-13; it-1 609; w92-ZU 1/15 3)
Ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, ukonakaliswa nokungcoliswa kwaqala kabusha ngoNimrode, ‘iphisi elina-
mandla ebusweni bukaJehova’ (Gen 10:8, 9)
Wangcolisa umhlaba ngokuchitha igazi, elezilwane nelabantu (it-2 503)
Njengoba ayaziwa njengendoda enonya, wakha uMbhoshongo WaseBabele futhi wandisela umbuso wa-
khe omubi endaweni yase-Asiriya
Isigodi saseJordani, nakuba ‘sasinjengensimu kaJehova,’ sangcoliswa izakhamuzi (Gen 13:10; 18:20)
Nalapha futhi, kwakhishwa isijeziso saphezulu, kwabhujiswa iSodoma neGomora (Gen 19:13; Jude 7)
Kamuva amaKhanani athola isijeziso saphezulu ngenxa yesizathu esifanayo (Lev 18:24, 25)
U-Israyeli ongakholekile wephula imithetho kaNkulunkulu yeSabatha futhi wonakalisa izwe
Izwe langcoliswa ukuziphatha okubi, ukukhulekela izithombe, ukuchitha igazi, njalonjalo
Isijeziso saphezulu safika ngo-607 B.C.E. ngembubhiso nokuthunjwa iminyaka engu-70 (2Kr 36:14-21)
NAMUHLA IZAKHAMUZI EZINGABONGI ZIYE ZONAKALISA ISIPHO SIKAJEHOVA (10 imiz.)
Umuntu uye wawonakalisa umhlaba, kunokuba awunqobe
Ngemva kweminyaka engu-6 000 yokuyishaya indiva imithetho kaNkulunkulu, umuntu usongela ukwenza
umhlaba ube indawo engahlaleki esikhundleni sokuwenza ube iPharadesi elijabulisayo uNkulunkulu ayeli-
hlosile
Manje umhlaba udinga ukuvikelwa kumuntu!
No. 106-ZU
5/95Ngokungacabangeli nobugovu, umuntu uye waphazamisa isimiso semvelo esibucayi futhi wabangela izikhu-
khula eziyinhlekelele, isomiso, ukungcola, usizi olukhulu nokufa
Ezinye izibonelo ukulahlwa kukadoti onoshevu, imvula ene-asidi, ukuklaba kwemfuyo ngokweqile, ukugawula
amahlathi, ukusebenzisa izibulala-zinambuzane ngokweqile, udoti okhipha imisebe, izimpi (g93-ZU 1/22 3-7;
g90-ZU 5/8 3-7)
Umoya, amanzi, inhlabathi, konke kungcolisiwe (g92-ZU 7/22 24; g93-ZU 1/8 9-10)
Izinyoni, izilwane, izinambuzane, umuntu, kusengozini (g92-ZU 11/22 28)
“Siye sawuhlolisisa umhlaba, sawugubha, sawushisa, sakhipha izinto kuwo, sagqiba izinto kuwo, sagawula
amahlathi awo, sahlelemba amagquma awo, sadunga amanzi awo, futhi sangcolisa umoya wawo. Lokho aku-
yifaneli incazelo yami yesakhamuzi esihle. Ukuba besiyiqashile lendawo, ngabe kade saxoshwa” (URose Bird,
owayengumahluleli omkhulu weNkantolo Ephakeme yaseCalifornia)
Ubugebengu obunobudlova, ukuziphatha okubi, izidakamizwa, kubeka umhlaba onqenqemeni lwenhlekelele
Njengo-Israyeli wasendulo, umuntu nezizwe zinecala phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngenxa yokungcola ngokokuzi-
phatha nangokomoya kanye nangokungcolisa umhlaba ngokoqobo (Isa 24:5, 6)
INDLELA ISIJEZISO SAPHEZULU ESIYOSINDISA NGAYO UMHLABA EKONAKALISWENI (7 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uye wathembisa ukuqeda bonke abantu ababi (Hu 37:10; 2Th 1:6-9)
Asiyibhidlizi indlu ukuze siqede izilokazane, izilwane eziququdayo, umuhlwa; ngakho asikho isidingo soku-
bhubhisa leplanethi ukuze kuqedwe izakhamuzi ezimbi kulomhlaba
Izibonelo zangesikhathi esidlule zibonisa ukuthi yini okumelwe siyilindele esikhathini esizayo esiseduze (2Pe
2:4-9)
Ngokushesha uJehova uzobhubhisa labo abonakalisa umhlaba (IsA 11:18; g93-ZU 1/22 9-11)
Abanye bangase bahleke usulu, kodwa ukugcwaliseka kuqinisekile (2Pe 3:3-7)
Abantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu ngeke basinde “empini yosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu” (IsA 16:13,
14, 16)
Ukufakwa kukaSathane namademoni kwalasha kuyoqeda imbangela eyinhloko yokungcola nokonakala, ngoko-
moya nangokoqobo (IsA 20:1-3)
IKHAYA LOMUNTU LAPHAKADE LIBUYISELWA EPHARADESI (10 imiz.)
Njengoba abantu abangcolisayo (ababonakalayo nabangabonakali) beyobe bengasekho, abasindile bayokwenza
ngokuvumelana nemithetho yoMdali yokuziphatha yendawo yonke
Bayobuyisela umhlaba esimweni sePharadesi (Hu 37:34; Luk 23:43; w89-ZU 8/15 15-20; w94-ZU 4/1 6-7)
Ukubusa koMbuso kuyomisa isimiso sokwakha, ukutshala, ukufundisa (Hu 22:26, 27; IsA 20:12; re-ZU 298-9;
w93-ZU 2/15 7)
Njengoba imiphumela yokuhlubuka nokuzibusa ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu iyobe isisusiwe, kuyoba khona
ukuthula phakathi kukaNkulunkulu, abantu, nezilwane (Isa 11:6-9; Hu 37:11; 46:9)
Isimiso sezinto eziphilayo esiphelele sikaNkulunkulu siyobuyiselwa
Khona-ke umhlaba uyokhiqiza inala
Yonke indalo iyodumisa uJehova kuze kube phakade (Hu 37:29; 150:6)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45YIBA NONEMBEZA OMUHLE EZWENI ELINESONO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza abazalwane bakwazi ukuhlangabezana nenselele yokwakha unembeza onokwesaba kokuhlonipha uNkulu-
nkulu ngokuqale ubhekise ukunaka kwabo emathonyeni ezwe athonya ukwakheka kukanembeza omuhle. Cha-
za indlela yokuhlakulela unembeza omuhle nezinzuzo zokulandela ufakazi wangaphakathi
KUYINSELELE UKUBA NONEMBEZA OMUHLE EZWENI ELINESONO (8 imiz.)
Bonke abantu banonembeza
Uwufakazi wethu wangaphakathi, uyikhono lokuzahlulela (it-1 500)
Ngokwezwi nezwi usho ukubambisana nolwazi, ukuba nolwazi lwento ethile ngaphakathi kuwe, izwi ‘lomu-
ntu osekusithekeni’ (Hu 51:6, qhathanisa ne-NW; Rom 9:1)
Ulolongwe ukuqeqeshwa nokuhlangenwe nakho, unembeza uyahlulela futhi ungamvuna noma umbeke icala
umuntu
Lomuzwa wokuziphatha wangaphakathi wafakwa kubantu lapho bedalwa futhi abantu bazo zonke izizwe ba-
zalwa nawo (Funda eyabaseRoma 2:14, 15)
Unembeza ungasetshenziswa kabi futhi ube isiqondiso esingaphephile (Thi 1:15, 16)
Iningi namuhla linombono osontekile walokho isono esiyikho
Ukuthambekela okwandayo ‘kokwenza lokho okuthandayo’ kuye kwaholela ekuphendukezelweni kwazo zo-
nke izinhlobo
Ukuguguleka kwezindinganiso zokuziphatha kuye kwaphumela konembeza ababuthuntu nabashile, naba-
ntu ababi beqhubeka besuka kokubi beya kokubi kakhulu (2Ti 3:1-3, 13)
Kuyinselele ukulondoloza unembeza omuhle endaweni egcwele ‘umoya walelizwe’ (Efe 2:1-3)
KUNENGOZI EYANDAYO YOKUTHONYWA YILELIZWE (12 imiz.)
Ukuqapha kuyadingeka hleze uthando lokulunga nenzondo yokubi kuphele (Hu 37:27; Amo 5:14, 15)
Amathonya ezwe andisa ukucindezeleka kokulandela iningi nokwenza lokho okujabulisa thina siqu (IzA 1:
10, 11, 13)
Ungalokothi ukuthathe kancane lokho okungenziwa ithonya lezwe
Kungaba ukuguguleka kancane kancane kwezindinganiso, kangangokuba into eyake yaba enyanyekayo
manje iyamukelwa noma ivunyelwe
Ngokwesibonelo, okuhlangenwe nakho kubonisa ukuthi umculo owonakalisayo ungathonya umcabango
nokuziphatha (Eks 32:1-6, 17, 18; g93-ZU 2/22 25-7; g93-ZU 6/8 4-7)
Ukuwohloka kokuziphatha sekusakazeke kangangokuthi abantu abangenazimilo baba izilomo futhi ba-
dunyiswe (g92-ZU 1/22 3-5)
Kunengozi ngoba nakuba iningi labantu livuma ukuthi izimo zonakele, lisazemukela futhi linengxenye kuzo
Kuyingozi nakakhulu entsheni engazange ikubone okunye okuhlukile futhi ebheka izimo ezinjalo njenge-
zivamile
Izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu azishintshile (Mal 3:6)
Uma samukela imibono yezwe, ngeke siphumelele (Rom 1:28, 32; 1Ko 6:9, 10)
Ngeke simjabulise uJehova, owazi konke (Heb 4:12, 13)
Singakhubekisa nabanye (Rom 14:13)
Masikhumbule isimiso esikweyoku-1 Korinte 8:8-13
Okuhlangenwe nakho: Udade owayesanda kuhlanganyela waphuma ehholo lebhayisikobho ngenxa yoku-
thi ifilimu eyayibukiswa yayinengeka. Wabona umdala, nomkhaya wakhe, ngokusobala beyijabulela le-
filimu. Akabange esahamba futhi isikhathi eside wahlushwa unembeza okhathazekile
Unembeza ofundisiwe uyosivimbela ekubeni silandele inkambo yezwe elinesono (1Jo 2:15-17)
UKUZE UBE NONEMBEZA OMUHLE, SEKELA IZINQUMO ZOMUNTU SIQU OLWAZINI OLUNEMBILE
(15 imiz.)
AmaKristu kumelwe ‘abe nonembeza omuhle’ naphezu kokucindezeleka noma ukuphikiswa (Funda eyoku-1 Pe-
tru 3:16, 17)
Unembeza kumelwe ukhanyiselwe, uqeqeshwe ngezindinganiso ezilungile
Unembeza ofundiswe ngolwazi olunembile lweZwi likaNkulunkulu ungazahlulela ngokufanele izinto futhi uzi-
qondise (2Ti 3:16)
Cabangela isibonelo sikaZakewu (Luk 19:1-8)
Izinga lolwazi olunembile liboniswa izinga osebenza ngalo unembeza
Cishe kubo bonke abantu, unembeza wahlulela ububi ngemva kokuba sebenziwe (2Sa 24:10; w83-ZU 1/1 16
[w82 7/15 17])
Ngabantu abayazisayo intando kaNkulunkulu, unembeza umelana nokuthatha inkambo elahlwa uNkulu-
nkulu (Gen 39:9)
No. 107-ZU
5/95‘Unembeza omuhle’ uhlanganisa yonke imikhakha yokuphila (IzE 24:14, 16; Heb 13:18)
Uqondisa umuntu ofuna umsebenzi angeke athathe hlangothi kuwo (Isa 2:4; w83-ZU 1/1 26 [w82 7/15 26])
Uqondisa ukuziphatha komuntu siqu nenkulumo yakhe (Rom 12:18; 1Pe 2:12)
Uholela ekuboniseni “ubuntu obusha” (Efe 4:22-24)
Wamukela isiqondiso esivela kubadala nasesigabeni sesigqila esikholekile (Heb 13:17)
UBUHLE OBUWUMPHUMELA KANEMBEZA OQEQESHWE KAHLE (10 imiz.)
Hlakulela isifiso sikanembeza omuhle, hhayi obuthaka
Unembeza obuthaka uyobonisa ukuthi awuqeqeshiwe kahle nangokwanele
Unembeza omuhle, oqeqeshwe kahle, uyoshesha ukusiqaphelisa izingozi
Uyosivimbela ekubeni sizilimaze, ekubeni nethonya elibi kwabanye, nasekudumazeni uJehova
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi onembeza bethu kufanele basishukumisele ekubeni siwasebenzise amathuba okwenza
izinto ezingenabugovu, ezinhle, zomusa, nezothando (Luk 10:29-37)
Unembeza oqeqeshwe kahle uyosishukumisela ekubeni sibeke isibonelo esihle, silingise uKristu (1Ko 11:1)
Siyokhathalela indlela okubathinta ngayo abanye lokho esikwenzayo, ngisho nasezintweni ezingezimbi (Rom
15:1, 2)
Siyophishekela ukuthula kwebandla njalo (Rom 14:15, 19-21; w91-ZU 3/1 21-5; w89-ZU 2/15 18-20)
Abadala bayolondoloza ikhono lokusiza abanye (Isa 32:1, 2)
Unembeza oqinile, osebenzayo, kodwa omuhle wenza umuntu owesaba uNkulunkulu abe nokuthula kwengqo-
ndo nomusa kaJehova
 ́
Uyodlulela ngale kwezimfuneko eziyisisekelo zemithetho, uyosilonda ngokugcwele ezintweni ezenza uNkulu-
nkulu angasamukeli (w83-ZU 1/1 27 [w82 7/15 27])
Nakuba siphila ezweni elinesono, siyojabulela ubuhlobo u-Abrahama ayenabo noNkulunkulu ‘njengomngane
kaJehova’ (Jak 2:23)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
No. 107-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUNQOBA UKWESABA IKUSASA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Injongo yalenkulumo iwukubonisa ukuthi uma senza intando kaNkulunkulu, akudingeki sesabe ikusasa. Qhatha-
nisa ikusasa elifiphele lalabo ababi nezibusiso uNkulunkulu azithembisa abantu bakhe abathembekile. Benze ba-
qiniseke
ISINTU SINESIZATHU ESIZWAKALAYO SOKWESABA IZINHLEKELELE EZIZAYO (6 imiz.)
Cishe eminyakeni engu-2 000 edlule, uJesu wabikezela ukuza kwezenzakalo ezishaqisayo (Funda uLuka 21:25, 26)
Zaziyokwenzeka ngemva kokuba usizi olukhulu luqalile futhi zaziyobangela usizi lwezizwe ubuhlungu, izinhli-
ziyo zabantu ziphele amandla ngokwesaba okuzayo (Mat 24:29; w94-ZU 2/15 20)
Abantu bazo zonke izizinda bayokwesaba, kusukela kulabo abathola imiklomelo kaNobel kuya kubantuka-
zana nje
Ngisho namanje, njengoba sisondela esiphelweni salesi simiso sezinto, abantu banexhala elikhulu ngezimo
nangezenzakalo zamuva (g93-ZU 1/8 4-10, 12)
“Iningi labantu liye lalahlekelwa ithemba ngekusasa, ngenxa yokuthi cishe kuyo yonke imikhakha ye-
mpucuko yethu sesiqala ukwenza njengokungathi ikusasa lethu manje selingabazisa kangangokuba ku-
ngcono ukugxila ezidingweni zethu zamanje nasezinkingeni zamanje” (U-Al Gore, encwadini yakhe ethi
Earth in the Balance—Ecology and the Human Spirit)
Ngokuphathelene nokubhujiswa kwendawo ezungezile, isazi sendawo ezungezile uNorman Myers sathi:
“Esikhathini esingaphambili asikho isizukulwane esike sabhekana nethuba lokuqothulwa okukhulu pha-
kathi nesikhathi sokuphila kwaso. Asikho isizukulwane esiyoke sibhekane nenselele efanayo esikhathi-
ni esizayo: uma lesi sizukulwane samanje sihluleka ukubhekana nalomsebenzi, umonakalo uyobe sewe-
nzekile futhi ngeke libe khona ‘ithuba lokuzama okwesibili’ ” (State of the World 1988)
Ubuphekula, ubudlova, ubugebengu, izidakamizwa, ukuziphatha okuxekethile, izinhlekelele, nezifo ziwupha-
wu lwesikhathi sokuphela; njengemihelo yokucindezeleka phezu kowesifazane okhulelweyo (w93-ZU 3/1 4-6;
w94-ZU 7/15 3-4)
Sesifikile isikhathi sokuba uNkulunkulu ‘achithe labo abachitha umhlaba’ (IsA 11:18)
ABABI KUDINGEKA BESABE USUKU LOLAKA LUKAJEHOVA OLUZAYO (15 imiz.)
Lonke izwe elibi likaSathane liphawulelwe ukubhujiswa (w94-ZU 3/1 15-23)
Zonke izizwe ziyophuza ulaka lukaJehova futhi zenze njengabantu abahlanyayo (Funda uJeremiya 25:15, 16)
Izahlulelo zakhe zifaniswa ‘nesitsha esikhephuzelayo,’ isiphuzo esibulalayo (Hu 75:7, 8)
Kusukela ngo-1919, isigaba sikaJeremiya (insali egcotshiwe) besilokhu siqondisa ukunaka kwezizwe ‘ku-
lesisitsha’
‘Ngezinkulumo eziphefumulelwe amademoni,’ zonke izizwe manje zibuthelwa “empini yosuku olukhulu
lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke” (IsA 16:13, 14, 16)
UJehova uzothumela uJesu Kristu phakathi kwazo ‘enenkemba’ yokukhipha isahlulelo e-Armagedoni (IsA
19:11, 15)
‘Isivunguvungu’ sikaJehova siyoshanela wonke umhlaba futhi sibulale bonke abaphikisi (Funda uJeremiya 25:
31-33)
ELobukholwa nayo yonke inkolo yamanga kuyobhujiswa kuqala ‘osizini olukhulu’ (Mat 24:21; IsA 18:21)
Ababusi bakahulumeni, noma “abelusi,” bayohewula phakathi ‘nosizi olukhulu’ (Funda uJeremiya 25:34-38)
Njengezenzakalo ezisaketanga, ‘isivunguvungu’ sisibekela abaholi benkolo bese kuba amaqembu ezomba-
ngazwe
“Idlelo” lababusi, isimiso sezinto, liyachithwa
Amakhosi omhlaba namabutho awo ayolwa neNkosi kaJehova eyiQhawe kodwa ayobhujiswa ngokupho-
nswa “echibini lomlilo ovutha isibabule” (IsA 17:12-14; 19:19-21)
Usuku lukaJehova oluzayo lwafanekiselwa ukubhujiswa ‘kwezwe langalesosikhathi’ ngoZamcolo, ngaphandle
kukaNowa nomkhaya wakhe (2Pe 3:6, 7)
Abaphikisi banxuswa ukuba ‘bange indodana,’ uJesu Kristu, ukuze benze ukuthula (Hu 2:9-12; g79-ZU 8/22 3-4
[w79 1/15 6-7])
Iningi liyokwenqaba ngenkani bese liphihlizwa ngentonga yensimbi yeNkosi esesihlalweni sobukhosi uJesu
UKUBHEKA IKUSASA NGOKUNGESABI (18 imiz.)
Labo abalalela isixwayiso sikaJehova akudingeki besabe ikusasa
Ulaka lukaNkulunkulu ngeke luqondiswe kubo (Zef 2:3)
Njengasezikhathini ezidlule, uNkulunkulu ukwazi kahle kakhulu ukusindisa abantu bakhe (Eks 6:6-8; 15:1-
13, 19; 2Pe 2:9)
Labo abenza intando kaNkulunkulu bayoba nethemba elijabulisayo lokusindela ezibusisweni zoMbuso kaNku-
lunkulu
Abaphikisi bokubusa okulungile kukaNkulunkulu bayoshona ekunqunyweni kwaphakade (IzA 2:21, 22)
No. 108-ZU
5/95Uhulumeni kaJehova wokuthula uyothatha indawo yezwe elibi likaSathane (Isa 9:6, 7)
UMbuso uyofeza lokho okungekho hulumeni owenziwe abantu ongathemba ukukufeza
Izinzuzo zawo ziyohlala phakade futhi zibe eziphelele ngoba uyofundisa bonke abafundisekayo ngezindlela
zikaNkulunkulu (Isa 2:2-4)
Esikhundleni sokuthembela ezikhalini zenuzi noma zobuchwepheshe obuphambili ukuba zilethe ukuthula, aba-
ntu bakaJehova bathembela eNkosini Yokuthula enamandla
Kunokuba ichithe umhlaba, iyoletha ipharadesi
Abantu ‘bayokwakha izindlu bahlale kuzo; batshale izivini, badle izithelo zazo’ kunokuba umsebenzi wabo
uqhwagwe izitha (Isa 65:21, 22; 62:8, 9)
Ngeke kube khona ukwesaba ukuhlaselwa izizwe eziyizitha ngoba uJehova ‘uyophelisa ukulwa kuze kube-semi-
khawulweni yomhlaba’ (Hu 46:9)
Uyoshabalalisa nazo zonke izikhali zabo zempi
Namuhla, ukwesaba kuthathelwa indawo uthando nenjabulo njengoba uJehova eqoqela ndawonye abamnene
abaphuma kuzo zonke izizwe (IsA 7:9, 10)
Ngisho kwamanje laba bakha ubuzalwane bomhlaba wonke obungenanzondo yobuzwe noma yobuhlanga (Joh
13:34, 35; 1Pe 1:22)
(Sebenzisa izinkulumo ezivela emithonjeni yezindaba, njengalezo ezikuyi-Index ngaphansi kwesithi “Jeho-
vah’s Witnesses, Statements by Others”)
NQOBA UKWESABA—GCWALA INJABULO NETHEMBA ELIHLE (6 imiz.)
Masinyane wonke umhlaba uzobuswa iNkosi Yokuthula ekhazimulayo
Iyakufanelekela ukuba siyethembe; iletha amakhambi aphakade azo zonke izinsizi (Funda uMathewu 12:18-
21) (gt-ZU 33)
Wonke amanxusa kaSathane ayizidlova ayosuswa; akekho okuyodingeka aphinde esabe ababi (IzA 2:22)

Ithemba lokubona abathandekayo bephuma eSheoli lapho ukufa kunqotshwa ngokuthi kugwinywe, zonke izi-
nyembezi ziyesulwa (Isa 25:6-8; w93-ZU 11/15 6-7)
Uyothola ukuphila okungapheli nenjabulo, lapho ukwesaba kuyobe kungasekho unomphelo (Hu 37:39, 40)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU USEDUZE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Chaza umehluko phakathi kombuso okukhulunywa ngawo kweyabaseKolose 1:13 nalowo okubhekiselwe kuwo
kusAmbulo 11:15. Bonisa indlela isiprofetho seBhayibheli esigcwaliseka ngayo osukwini lwethu, okufakazela uku-
thi ukubusa ngokugcwele koMbuso phezu komhlaba kuseduze
‘PHENDUKANI, NGOBA UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU USEDUZE’ (7 imiz.)
Ukuphila kwakho kuxhomeke ekuqapheleni ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu useduze
UMbuso wobuMesiya, uhulumeni wasezulwini oholwa uJesu Kristu, uwukubonakaliswa kobukhosi bukaNku-
lunkulu
Labo abafisa ukuthola ukuphila okuphakade kumelwe babe abameleli balowo Mbuso
UMbuso wawuyisihloko senkonzo kaMesiya (Funda uMathewu 4:17)
Ngaleso sikhathi, ‘umbuso wawususondele’ ngayiphi indlela?
Lapho ebhapathizwa, uJesu, indlalifa yesihlalo sobukhosi sikaDavide, wagcotshwa njengeNkosi (Luk 1:
32, 33; 3:21, 22)
Yingakho ayengatshela abaFarisi ukuthi uMbuso (njengoba wawumelelwa uKristu) wawuphakathi kwabo
(Luk 17:20, 21; rs-ZU 356)
Kungani uJesu anxusa amaJuda ukuba aphenduke? (Mar 1:14, 15)
Kwakudingeka aphenduke ezenzweni zawo ngokuqondene noMbuso (2Pe 3:9; w76-ZU 5/1 204-6 [w75 12/15
750-1])
Kwakudingeka aqaphele uNkulunkulu njengoMbusi wawo ofanele neNdodana yakhe njengeNkosi emisiwe
Namuhla, abantu kudingeka baphenduke ezenzweni abazenza ngaphansi kobukhosi bukaSathane futhi ba-
zinikele ngokugcwele eMbusweni kaNkulunkulu
Kodwa sinazo yini manje izizathu zokukholelwa ukuthi ‘umbuso useduze’?
Yebo, ngoba uJesu washo iziprofetho ezivusa amadlingozi ezazibonisa ukubuya kwakhe njengeNkosi ebusayo
Yiziphi izenzakalo eziholela ekubuseni okuphelele koMbuso wobuMesiya phezu komhlaba?
LAPHO EVUSWA UJESU WAMUKELA UMBUSO ONGOKOMOYA (8 imiz.)
UKristu wamukela umbuso ongokomoya kuqala—‘umbuso weNdodana yothando lwakhe [uNkulunkulu]’ (Fu-
nda eyabaseKolose 1:13, 14)
Njengoba ayebulawe izitha, wavuswa engumoya ukuze abe iNkosi yesizwe esisha sama-Israyeli angokomoya
(Efe 1:20-23; w91-ZU 8/1 11 izig. 11-13)
‘Lo-Israyeli kaNkulunkulu’ waba khona lapho kuthululwa umoya ongcwele ngePentekoste lika-33 C.E. (Gal
6:16; IzE 2:1-4)
Labo abakha lo-Israyeli “badluliselwa” embusweni kaJesu ongokomoya (it-2 169; rs-ZU 362; w81-ZU 12/1
22-4 [w81 6/15 26-7])
NgePentekoste, uJesu waqala ukubusa phezu kuka-Israyeli ongokomoya, ibandla lamaKristu agcotshwe ngomo-
ya, hhayi phezu kwezwe lesintu
Inani eliphelele labanjalo abagcotshwe ngomoya kumelwe libe ngu-144 000 (IsA 14:3)
Lapho besesenyameni, bahlanganyela “enkonzweni yezwi” ‘njengamanxusa abambele uKristu’ (IzE 6:4; 2Ko
5:20)
Ukubusa kukaJesu ‘embusweni weNdodana yothando lukaNkulunkulu’ kuyophela lapho owokugcina waba-
ngu-144 000 efa futhi ehlanganyela noKristu ezulwini (pe-ZU 136)
Kumelwe bakhonze ngokukholeka ngaphansi kwalombuso ongokomoya kuze kube sekufeni ukuze babuse no-
Kristu eMbusweni wobuMesiya wasezulwini (IsA 2:10; 5:9, 10)
UKUBUSWA KWEZWE “KWENKOSI YETHU NOKUKAKRISTU WAYO” KUYAQALA (8 imiz.)
Siyofika isikhathi lapho uJesu eyokwamukela amandla njengeNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu
Uyoba umbusi ‘embusweni wezwe,’ abuse phezu kwaso sonke isintu emhlabeni (re-ZU 171-2; funda isAmbulo
11:15-18)
Khona-ke uJehova, ‘iNkosi yethu,’ uyoqala ukusebenzisa amandla akhe amakhulu ukuze abuse phezu kwe-
zwe lesintu ngomqondo okhethekile
UJesu, ‘uKristu wakhe,’ uyohlanganyela kulokhu kubuswa kwezwe
UJesu ovusiwe wayeyohlala ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu kuze kube yisikhathi sokuba aqale ukubusa ko-
Mbuso phakathi kwezitha zakhe (ws-ZU 22-3; funda iHubo 2:1-6)
Ukugcwaliseka okukhulu kweHubo 2 bekulokhu kwenzeka kusukela ekupheleni kweZikhathi Zabezizwe ngo-
1914 (ws-ZU 24-8)
Ngaleso sikhathi kwazalwa umntwana wesilisa, noma uMbuso (IsA 12:1, 2, 5)

1/96LOKHO UKUBUSA KOMBUSO OKUKUSHOYO KWABAWUPHIKISAYO NAKWABAWUSEKELAYO (10 imiz.)

kushesha uzochoboza isimiso sezwe sikaSathane (Dan 2:34, 35, 44, 45; go 66-70)
Ngaphambi kokuba lokho kwenzeke, ababusi bezwe ngaphansi kwethonya likaSathane bayozama ukuqothu-
la abasekeli boMbuso (IsA 12:17)

38:18-22; ws-ZU 152-9)
Izitha zoMbuso nezofakazi boMbuso ziyonqotshwa ngendlela eyihlazo (Zak 14:12)

sinethemba lokuphila okungunaphakade (IsA 7:9, 14, 17)
“ISIBONAKALISO” SIFAKAZELA UKUTHI UKUBUSA KOMBUSO KUSEDUZE (8 imiz.)
Izenzakalo zibonisa ukuthi uKristu ukhona emandleni oMbuso; ngakho ukuphela kokubusa kukaSathane kuse-
duze
“Isibonakaliso” sokuba khona kukaJesu sihlanganisa izenzakalo ezaqala ngo-1914 (Funda uMathewu 24:3, 7, 34)
Ukugabavula kwabagibeli bamahhashi besAmbulo kuyaqhubeka (IsA 6:1-8; re-ZU 89-99)
Ubufakazi obukhulu bokuthi ukubusa koMbuso kuseduze umsebenzi wokushumayela womhlaba wonke owe-
nziwa oFakazi BakaJehova (Mat 24:14)
Lezi “izindaba ezinhle” zoMbuso osumisiwe kakade
Akukaze emlandweni kushunyayelwe ngoMbuso ngalendlela
KHUMBULA UKUTHI UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU USEDUZE (4 imiz.)
UJesu wanxusa: “Hlalani nilindile” (Mat 24:42)
Ingabe ulindile? Ingabe ungasichaza kahle “isibonakaliso”?
Ukugcwaliseka ‘kwesibonakaliso’ kubonisa ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu useduze ngempela—usuqalile ka-
kade ukubusa!
Lokhu kusho ukuthi ukubhujiswa kwesimiso esidala kuseduze
Philela izwe elisha, hhayi izwe elidala
Zikhandle ukuze wenze ukusindiswa kwakho kuqiniseke (Luk 13:24; 2Pe 3:13-15)
Hlanganyela nabanye ngentshiseko ekumemezeleni: UMbuso kaNkulunkulu useduze!

No. 109-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UNKULUNKULU UZA KUQALA
EKUPHILENI KOMKHAYA OKUPHUMELELAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi uJehova, uMdali welungiselelo lomshado, ngokunengqondo nguye okufanele imikhaya ifune
kuye isiqondiso. Bonisa ukuthi ukuphila komkhaya okuphumelelayo kungafinyelelwa kanjani ngokulandela izi-
miso zeBhayibheli
UMKHAYA UYILUNGISELELO ELIMISWE UJEHOVA (8 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu wasungula umshado, wahlanganisa umshado wokuqala wabantu (Gen 2:22-24; it-2 340)
Injongo eyisisekelo: ukuzala amalungu omkhaya wesintu (Gen 1:27, 28)
Ukuzala abantwana kwakudinga ukuhleleka komkhaya
Kwakwakha nesibopho sobunye esihlala njalo phakathi kwendoda nomfazi
Kuwubuhlobo babantu obuseduze kakhulu; kwakuyosiza umngane womshado ngamunye, umthombo we-
njabulo enkulu (Mat 19:4-6)
Umshado wawuyindlela yokuphila evamile kumaHeberu; alikho igama elithi “impohlo” emiBhalweni yesiHeberu
Abantwana babebhekwa njengesibusiso; ngokuzala abantwana, u-Israyeli waba isizwe esikhulu
Umshado ‘wawudunyiswa’ phakathi kwamaKristu okuqala (Heb 13:4)
Ukushumayela—hhayi ukuzala abantwana—ukuthunywa kwamaKristu okuyinhloko
Nokho, uJehova wabonisa isithakazelo esiqhubekayo emkhayeni ngokulungiselela iseluleko samadoda anga-
maKristu, abafazi, nabantwana
KUMELWE NIBEKE UNKULUNKULU KUQALA EKUPHILENI KOMKHAYA (12 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu unesithakazelo ekuphileni komkhaya wabakhulekeli namuhla
Unxusa indoda nomfazi abangamaKristu ukuba baqinise ‘intambo emicu-mithathu’ ngokumfaka emshadweni
wabo (Shu 4:12)
Unesithakazelo esifanayo enhlalakahleni yemikhaya enomzali ongayedwa (1Ti 5:5)
Ukuze ithole isibusiso sikaNkulunkulu, kumelwe ibeke yena kuqala (Hu 127:1)
Lokho okushiwo ukubeka uNkulunkulu kuqala emkhayeni (w81-ZU 12/15 12-17 [w81 7/1 12-17])
Kusho ukuthi amalungu omkhaya akhathalele ukufinyelela izimfuneko zikaNkulunkulu
Ukuba nomusa nothando olungenabugovu kuphakathi kwalezi zimfuneko (Efe 4:32)
Indoda: inomthwalo wemfanelo omkhulu; kufanele ibeke isibonelo futhi ilwele ukukhuthaza umkayo (Efe
5:28-32)
Kunezindlela eziningi zokubonisa uthando ngaphandle kokuthi “Ngiyakuthanda”
Zwakalisa ukwazisa ngomsebenzi womkakho (IzA 31:28)
Beka izithakazelo zomkakho ngaphambi kwezakho (Flp 2:4)
Funa ukupha, hhayi ukwamukela (IzE 20:35)
Umfazi: hlakulela ukuzithoba okusuka enhliziyweni (1Pe 3:1-6)
Khuthala, uthembeke (IzA 31:10-27)
Abantwana: ukuhlonipha nokulalela abazali kuyimfuneko yaphezulu (Kol 3:20)
Ukubeka uNkulunkulu kuqala kusho nokuba nobuhlobo obufudumele, bomuntu siqu naye, okumnikeza inja-
bulo, kuthokozise inhliziyo yakhe (IzA 27:11)
Kuhlanganisa nokuzuza ulwazi eZwini likaNkulunkulu, ukubeka izinto ezingokomoya kuqala (Hu 19:7)
UKUGCINA IMIZILA YOKUKHULUMISANA IVULEKILE (10 imiz.)
Ukukhulumisana kwangempela kusiza imikhaya ukuba ibeke uNkulunkulu kuqala ngobunye
Kusho okungaphezu nje kokukhuluma (1Ko 14:9; fl-ZU isahl. 11)
Indoda enhle ‘ihlala nomkayo ngokolwazi,’ isebenzisa ukuhlakanipha kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu ekusebe-
nziseni ubunhloko (1Pe 3:7)
Awukho umkhaya ovumelana ngazo zonke izinto; kumelwe ifunde ukwamukela ukuhluka kwemibono, ibeke-
zelele ubuthakathaka obuncane (Kol 3:13)
Ikhuthaza abantwana ukuba baveze imizwa yabo; ifuna ukuqonda izidingo zabo
Uma abazali beqaphela ukungathiyi ukukhuluma ngokukhululekile, bangafunda okuningi ngezidingo zaba-
ntwana (fl-ZU 149)
Lapho ninikeza abantwana iseluleko nesiqondiso, cacisani ukuthi izindinganiso zisekelwe eZwini likaNkulunku-
lu (Hu 119:105)
Sizani umntwana afunde ukuthi umthwalo wemfanelo omkhulu uhambisana nenkululeko eyengeziwe; lapho
eqhubeka ebonisa ikhono lokusingatha umthwalo wemfanelo, kulapho ethenjelwa kakhulu (Luk 12:48)
Ngisho noma umntwana evukela, gcinani indlela yokubuya ivulekile; uthando lulindela okuhle (1Ko 13:7)
No. 110-ZU
1/95UKUKHULUMISANA NOJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU NJALO (10 imiz.)
Ukuthandaza komkhaya ndawonye njalo kusiza ekugcineni uNkulunkulu eza kuqala emkhayeni; indoda engum-
Kristu iyahola kulokhu
Umfazi nabantwana nabo kudingeka bathandazele usizo nesiqondiso
Nilandela isibonelo sikaJesu, gwemani ukuphindaphinda; imithandazo kufanele ivumelane nesimo (Mat 6:
9-13)
Kunini lapho ukuthandaza kufaneleke khona?
Thandaza lapho usesimweni sokucasuka (Efe 4:26, 27)
Umthandazo unethonya elelaphayo njengoba sifuna ukuthethelela abanye (Jak 5:16)
Thandazani ngesikhathi sokudla nasebusuku ngaphambi kokulala
Umthandazo osuka enhliziyweni ubonisa ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu noJehova
Ngezikhathi zokudla: ungagwegwesi, ube mfushane; ungathemelezi, ungabi ongahlangani
Ekupheleni kosuku: indoda kufanele iqaphele izinto ezenzeke phakathi nosuku, ihlanganise amaphuzu adi-
nga ukunakekelwa
Izinto ezifanele ezingase zithandazelwe (it-2 668-70)
Noma yini ethinta ubuhlobo noNkulunkulu (1Jo 5:14)
Singase sicele isiqondiso sokulondoloza ukuphila kokungashadi okunokulinganisela noma ukuthola umnga-
ne womshado
Uma sishadile, ngomthandazo singacabangela indaba yokuba nabantwana noma sifune ukuhlakanipha ko-
kubakhulisa
UNkulunkulu uthembisa ukunikeza ukuqonda okudingekayo (Hu 32:8)
Lapho singaqiniseki ukuthi yini okufanele siyithandazele, umoya kaNkulunkulu uzosiza (Rom 8:26, 27; it-2
405, 670)
BEKANI UNKULUNKULU KUQALA NJENGOBA WONKE UMKHAYA UHLANGANYELA NJALO ENKO-
NZWENI ENGCWELE (5 imiz.)
Ukunikela inkonzo engcwele kusiza ekufezeni injongo yomkhaya yamanje: ukukhonza uNkulunkulu ngokukho-
leka
Kusho ukuzigcina simatasa enkonzweni kaNkulunkulu, ekutadisheni, ekulungiseleleni imihlangano naseku-
hlanganyeleni kuyo
Indoda kufanele ihole; kulula ngomkhaya ukwamukela igunya layo
Abesifazane abangabazali abangabodwa kumelwe nabo bahole
Labo abasemikhayeni ehlukene kufanele nabo balwele ukubeka uNkulunkulu kuqala
Kungase kuphumele ekuhlanganiseni umkhaya (yb93 9; w93-ZU 8/15 6-7)
Udumo luya kuJehova, futhi sonke sithola izibusiso lapho sibeka uNkulunkulu kuqala ekuphileni komkhaya
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
No. 110-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KUFEZANI UKUPHULUKISWA KWEZIZWE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Qokomisa isidingo sethu samalungiselelo othando oMdali okuphulukisa okungokomoya nokungokwenyama. Bo-
nisa isizathu sokuba ukuphulukisa okungokomoya kube okubaluleke kakhulu. Khuluma ngentshiseko nangendle-
la enikeza ithemba ngemiphumela ehlala njalo yesikhathi esizayo yesimiso sikaNkulunkulu sokuphulukisa oku-
khulu
ISINTU SINESIDINGO ESIKHULU SOKUPHULUKISWA (5 imiz.)
Ukuphulukisa kusho ukubuyisela impilo, ukuphilisa (it-1 1055)
Ngenxa yesono nokungapheleli okuzuzwe njengefa, isintu sikudinga kakhulu kokubili ukuphulukiswa okungo-
kwenyama nokungokomoya (Rom 5:12)
Izifo ziyaqhubeka zibulala abantu
Umphakathi wesintu onesono nawo usebumnyameni obungokomoya, uhlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu (Efe 4:
17-19)
UNkulunkulu uyokulungiselela kanjani ukuphulukisa okungokwenyama nokungokomoya?
UDOKOTELA OMKHULU KUNABO BONKE ULUNGISELELA UKUPHULUKISA OKUKABILI (7 imiz.)
UJehova, uDokotela omkhulu kunabo bonke, wafaka amandla okuzivuselela emzimbeni womuntu (it-1 1055)
Nakuba izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezingabantu zizuze isono nokungapheleli njengefa, uyazisekela lapho zine-
mpilo ebuthaka (Hu 41:1-3)
Iqiniso lokuthi uNkulunkulu uye waphulukisa abanye ngokwenyama esikhathini esidlule libonisa ukuthi anga-
kwazi ukukwenza lokho esikhathini esizayo
Wabuyisela impilo kaJobe ngemva kokuhlushwa uSathane (Job 42:10)
INkosi uHezekiya yaphulukiswa futhi ukuphila kwayo kwelulwa (Isa 38:4, 5)
Manje uJehova unikeza labo abaphendukayo ukuphulukiswa okungokomoya okubaluleke kakhulu
Kubuyisela amandla, ukuzwa, nenkulumo ngendlela engokomoya (Isa 35:3-6)
Singazenza sitholakalele izinzuzo zazo zombili izinhlobo zokuphulukiswa
Ukucabangela lokho iBhayibheli elikushoyo ngokuphulukiswa okungokwenyama nokungokomoya kuyoqini-
sa ukholo lwethu esimisweni sikaNkulunkulu sokuphulukisa okukhulu
UJESU NABAPHOSTOLI BAPHULUKISA NGOKWENYAMA NANGOKOMOYA (10 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu uye welapha zonke izinhlobo zezifo (Mat 9:35)
Kwakungekhona ukusebenzisa kukaJesu amandla noma ukuhlakanipha kwakhe siqu okwaphulukisa abagu-
layo (it-1 1056)
UJesu akazange asebenzise ukwelapha ngokulutha ingqondo, ukwelapha ngokusebenzisa ingqondo, noma izi-
ndlela ezifana nalezo
Wayephulukisa ngamandla omoya kaNkulunkulu (Luk 5:17)
Cabanga ngenjabulo yalabo ababelashwa neyemikhaya yabo (Luk 7:1-10)
Ukwelapha uJesu akwenza ngaleso sikhathi kusinikeza isiqinisekiso salokho angakwenza esikhathini esi-
zayo
Abaphostoli banikwa igunya lokwelapha izifo (Mat 10:1)
Ukuphulukisa kwakunikeza isiqinisekiso sokusekela kwaphezulu, kwaletha injabulo enkulu (IzE 3:1-9)
Ngemva kokuba ubuKristu sebumiswe ngokuqinile, “izipho zokuphulukisa” ezinjalo zaphela (1Ko 12:8, 9; 13:8)
Lapho sibona umuntu ogulayo noma obuthaka, singase sicabange ukuthi ukuphulukiswa okungokwenyama ku-
baluleke kakhulu
Nokho, okwakubaluleke kakhulu kwakuwukuphulukisa kukaJesu okungokomoya izingqondo nezinhliziyo
Wahawukela izixuku ngokuyinhloko “ngoba zaziphundleke futhi zihlakazeke njengezimvu ezingenamalu-
si” (Mat 9:35, 36)
AmaJuda njengesizwe amenqaba uJesu nokuphulukiswa okungokomoya
Abantu abaningi manje abasiqapheli isidingo esingokomoya futhi ababoni ukuthi isihlengo sikaJesu sinenzu-
zo engunaphakade
Kwangathi singasazisa kakhulu isihlengo nokuphulukisa okungokomoya
Kodwa yini efezwayo ukuze kuphulukiswe namuhla?
LOKHO OKUFEZWA UKUPHULUKISWA KWEZIZWE KWANAMUHLA (6 imiz.)
U-Israyeli ongokomoya ukhanyiselwe ngokomoya (1Pe 2:9)
Insali egcotshiwe inempilo ngokomoya (Heb 12:12, 13)
“Isixuku esikhulu” esibonisa ukholo esihlengweni sikaJesu sihlukaniselwa ukusindela ezweni elisha lokulunga
UJesu Kristu usiholela emanzini okuphila (IsA 7:9-17)
No. 111-ZU
1/95Izinkulungwane ziyazinikezela kuNkulunkulu, zibhapathizwe (Yisho izibalo ezikuyi-Ncwadi Yonyaka yamuva)
Ungaba phakathi kwalabo abahlukaniselwa ukusinda ekupheleni kwalesi simiso
Wasebenzise ngokugcwele amalungiselelo aphezulu okuphulukisa okungokomoya
Uma wenza kanjalo, ungajabulela izinto ezifezwa isimiso sikaJehova sokuphulukisa okukhulu manje nase-
sikhathini esizayo
IZINTO EZILINDELWE EZIFEZWA ISIMISO SOKUPHULUKISA OKUNGOKOMOYA
NYAMA (12 imiz.)
NOKUNGOKWE-
Isimiso sikaNkulunkulu sokuphulukisa okukhulu safanekiselwa
UHezekeli wabikezela ngomfula wokuphila ophulukisayo ogeleza usuka endlini kaJehova (Hez 47:1, 12; kj
395-8)
Labo abenqaba ukuphuza bayofa, kodwa labo abaphuza kuwo abanika ukuphila
Ngasezingwini zomfula kunemithi enezithelo namaqabunga okuphulukisa izizwe
Phawula umbono ofanayo njengoba sifunda isAmbulo 22:1, 2 (re-ZU 310-12)
“Umfula wamanzi okuphila” umelela zonke izibusiso zesintu ngoKristu, osusa isono sezwe (Joh 1:29)
“Imithi yokuphila” iveza amaqabunga nezithelo eziphulukisayo ukuze zinikeze ukwelapha okudingekayo
okungokomoya nokungokomzimba
Njengengxenye yembewu ka-Abrahama, abangu-144 000 bayohlanganyela ekudluliseleni izinzuzo esintwini
phakathi neMinyaka Eyinkulungwane (Gal 3:8, 29; IsA 14:1)
Ngisho kwamanje, ‘njengemithi yokulunga,’ insali yabagcotshiwe iyashumayela futhi ngaleyo ndlela inike-
za isintu izithelo zoMbuso omisiwe (Isa 61:1-3)
Yiziphi ezinye izibusiso zesikhathi esizayo zesimiso sikaNkulunkulu sokuphulukisa?
Ukwelapha kukaJesu okungokwenyama kwafanekisela ukusebenzisa kwakhe amandla obuMesiya ukuze
aphulukise phakathi nokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane (it-1 1056)
Ngeke besadingeka odokotela, njengoba impilo engokwenyama iyobe isibuyiselwe
Abafile bayovuswa, bahlulelwe ngezenzo zangaleso sikhathi (Joh 5:28, 29)
Bonke abalalelayo bayolethwa ekupheleleni kobuntu ePharadesi (w91-ZU 12/15 12)
Kunesiqinisekiso senala yokudla okunempilo ngaleso sikhathi (Hu 72:16; 85:12)
Abahlubukayo ngeke bazijabulele lezi zibusiso, kodwa ungaba phakathi kwabalungile abayozijabulela kuze kube
phakade (Hez 18:20, 30-32)
HLANGANYELA EMSEBENZINI WAMANJE WOKUPHULUKISA OKUNGOKOMOYA (5 imiz.)
Njengenceku kaJehova, unelungelo elikhulu lokutshela abanye ngesimiso sikaNkulunkulu sokuphulukisa oku-
khulu
Ngokushumayela uMbuso ngenkuthalo, basize ukuba bathole ukuphulukiswa okungokomoya manje
Tshela abanhliziyo ziqotho ngesikhathi esiseduze kakhulu lapho izinyembezi zosizi ziyosulwa khona (IsA 21:
3, 4)
Bameme ukuba basabele esimemweni sokuhlanganyela emanzini okuphila (IsA 22:17)
Wena nalabo abalalelayo ningaba nethemba lokuthula, injabulo, nokuphila okungunaphakade isimiso sikaJeho-
va sokuphulukisa okukhulu esikwenza kube nokwenzeka
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
No. 111-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INDLELA ESINGABONISA NGAYO
UTHANDO EZWENI ELINGENAMTHETHO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ngemfudumalo nangomuzwa, siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi uthando luyisisusa esiyinhloko sezenzo zikaJehova no-
Jesu. Usebenzisa izibonelo ezingokoqobo, bonisa indlela eyoku-1 Korinte 13:4-8 engasetshenziswa ngayo, okule-
tha izibusiso ezicebile kulabo ababonisa uthando
UKUNGABI NAMTHETHO KWEZWE KUBANGELWA UBUGOVU (6 imiz.)
Ukungabi namthetho, ikakhulukazi okubangelwa ubugovu, kwabikezelelwa usuku lwethu (Mat 24:12; 2Ti 3:1-5)
Ubugebengu bunjengegagasi elikhulayo (rs-ZU 184-5; unganezela nezibonelo zamuva nje)
Ukuhaha, ukuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo, ukuziphatha okubi, ubandlululo lobuhlanga, ukushisekela ubuzwe
ngokungenangqondo kunethonya elinamandla
Ubugovu “buwukuba umuntu afune noma agxile enzuzweni yakhe siqu, injabulo, noma inhlalakahle ngaphandle
kokucabangela abanye”—Webster’s New Collegiate Dictionary
Ngokusobala, ubugovu abubonisi uthando; futhi buwukuzilimaza
Abantu abathanda izinto ezibonakalayo abaneliseki, abajabuli
Abantu abangathembekile bayakhokha ngobugebengu ngokuba nonembeza omubi, mhlawumbe baboshwe
Abantu abaziphethe kabi ngokobulili ngokuvamile bakhokha ngokuba namakhaya ahlukene phakathi, izifo
Naphezu kwalokho okubonakala kuyizinzuzo, abangenamthetho abanobugovu abanalutho ngoba abanalo utha-
ndo (1Ko 13:1-3)
Abantu bakaNkulunkulu kufanele babonise uthando, kodwa lokhu kudingani?
LOKHO ESIKUFUNDA OTHANDWENI OLUBONISWA UNKULUNKULU NOKRISTU (14 imiz.)
Uthando luyikho kanye okuphambene nobugovu (it-2 273-9)
Ngokwengxenye, “luwukukhathalela okuthembeke ngokungenabugovu nokunomusa ngenhlalakahle yomu-
nye”—Webster’s New Collegiate Dictionary
IBhayibheli liqokomisa uthando olunezimiso; luhlanganisa ukuzinikela okungenabugovu ekulungeni, ukukha-
thalela kwentshiseko inhlalakahle yabanye ehlala njalo
Indlela uJehova azibonakalisa ngayo ewuthando olwenziwe samuntu (1Jo 4:8)
Uthando lukaNkulunkulu lubonakala ezintweni azidalile ukuze sizijabulele
Ukudla kuyanambitheka futhi kumnandi; izimbali zimibalabala, aziphuphile
Abantu badalwa benekhono lokunambitha, ukubona ukushona kwelanga okujabulisayo, ukwazisa ubuhle
bendalo
Ukubonakalisa kukaJehova uthando okukhulu kunakho konke kwakuwukunikela ngeNdodana yakhe nge-
nxa yezono zethu (1Jo 4:10)
UNkulunkulu uyasikhathalela ngempela (1Pe 5:6, 7)
Lokhu kubonakala ngokuthi uJehova unesihe, uthando lwakhe alupheli (Hu 130:3; Rom 8:38, 39)
UJesu Kristu naye unothando oluphelele
Wathanda abalandeli bakhe “kwaze kwaba sekupheleni” (Joh 13:1)
Ngisho nalapho ekhathele, wayezikhathalela izidingo zabanye ezingokomoya (Joh 4:6-10)
Wayenesihawu, welapha abagulayo, wavusa abafileyo (Mat 14:14; Joh 11:30-44)
Wanikela ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yabalandeli bakhe (Joh 10:15)
Kufanele sifune ukulingisa uNkulunkulu noKristu ekuboniseni uthando (w94-ZU 10/1 13)
Kufanele sibonise uthando ngoNkulunkulu nangabanye (Mat 22:36-39)
Uthando phakathi kwabazalwane luwuphawu oluhlukanisayo lwamaKristu (Joh 13:34, 35)
Ngakho yiziphi izindlela eziqondile esingabonisa ngazo uthando?
INDLELA ESINGABONISA NGAYO UTHANDO KULELIZWE ELINGENAMTHETHO (20 imiz.)
(Ukuze uthole ukwaziswa okwengeziwe, siza ubheke i-w93-ZU 10/15 17-22; w92-ZU 7/15 28-31; w86-ZU 1/1 28-30
[w85 3/15 21-3]; fl-ZU 70-80)
UPawulu usibonisa indlela esingabonisa ngayo uthando (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 13:4-8)
Uthando lubhekakade futhi lunomusa
Lubangela ukubekezela ngesineke ezimweni ezingathandeki
Luboniswa ngokwenza izenzo eziwusizo ekhaya, kubafowethu, enkonzweni
Uthando alunamhawu
Ingabe siyacasuka lapho omunye ngaphandle kwethu ethola ilungelo lenkonzo?
Ingabe siba nomona ngalabo abanezinto eziningi zalelizwe?
Uthando luyosivimbela ukuba sinqotshwe ukucasuka nomona
No. 112-ZU
1/95Aluzigabisi, alukhukhumali
Ingabe siyaqhosha ngalokho esikufezile, silulaze abanye?
Uthando luyosisiza ukuba sigweme ukuqhosha okuyisono (IzA 21:4)
Aluziphathi ngokuhlazisayo
Izono ezingokobulili ziyahlazisa, ngokufanayo nenkulumo engcolile
Uma simthanda uNkulunkulu nomakhelwane wethu, ngeke ‘siphendule umusa ongafanelwe kaJehova
siwenze izaba zokuziphatha okuxekethile’ (Jude 4)
Uthando ngoNkulunkulu nangabanye lusenza sikhulume okuhle (Efe 4:29)
Ukuhlanzeka komzimba nokwekhaya ngeke kudebeselelwe uma sihloniphekile futhi sinothando
Aluzifuneli izinzuzo zalo siqu
Ukukhathalela abancane, abadala, ababuthakathaka, nabanye kungesinye sezici ezishukumisa kakhulu
othandweni (1Ko 10:24)
Uthando luyasivimbela ekubeni abanobugovu, abazibeka ngaphambi kwabanye, abasebenza “ensimini
ekhiqiza kangcono” kuphela
Alucasuki
Abadala, basabela ngothando uma abanye bengasheshi ukwamukela iseluleko, ukuletha imibiko, bekhohlwa
(Jak 1:19)
Abekho kithi okufanele bakhutshekiswe yilokho abanye abakushoyo noma abakwenzayo
Alugcini umbhalo wokulinyazwa
Njengoba sidinga ukuthethelelwa, kumelwe sithethelele abanye (Mat 6:12)
Uthando luyosivimbela ukuba sibambe amagqubu (Lev 19:18)
Alujabuli ngokungalungi, kodwa lujabula kanye neqiniso
Akufanele sijabulele ukuzilibazisa okungcolile, izincwadi, i-TV, amabhayisikobho
Kunalokho, jabulela ithonya leqiniso leBhayibheli futhi ulamukele
Lubekezelela [lumboza] zonke izinto (“Kingdom Interlinear”)
Njengophahla olungavuzi, uthando lumboza ukungapheleli (IzA 17:9)
Lusisiza ukuba sigweme ukukhuluma ngobuthakathaka babanye
Lukholelwa yizo zonke izinto
Uthando alukhohliseki kalula kodwa luyethemba, alusoli ukuthi kunezisusa ezimbi
Luthembela kuJehova uNkulunkulu, eZwini lakhe, nasenhlanganweni yakhe
Luthemba zonke izinto
Uthando lunombono oqondile, luyenama, lubheka phambili
Lusishukumisela ukuba sithandaze futhi sisebenzele umphumela omuhle kunoma yisiphi isimo
Uthando lunethemba kuzo zonke izithembiso zikaJehova
Lukhuthazelela zonke izinto
Uthando lungakhuthazelela noma yini uSathane ayenzayo ukuze avivinye ukuzinikela kwethu kuNkulu-
nkulu
Uthando alupheli nanini
Indlela yothando ngeke nanini iphele noma intule (w93-ZU 10/15 20)
Ulwazi olusha lungase luguqule okudala, ithemba liyagcwaliseka, kodwa uthando luhlala lugcwele; luya-
qhubeka luqiniswa
Ngaso sonke isikhathi bonisa uthando ngentshiseko (Kol 3:13, 14)
Luyisibopho esiqinile esingafaniswa nenhlaka eqinile yembambelela (barnacle) (w86-ZU 1/1 28 [w85 3/15 21])
Njengoba ingubo ihlanganiswa imithungo emincane eminingi, kwangathi amazwi nezenzo zethu zansuku zo-
nke kungabonisa ukuthi sembethe uthando (fl-ZU 80)
UTHANDO LULETHA IMIVUZO MANJE NASESIKHATHINI ESIZAYO (5 imiz.)
Labo ababonisa uthando bathola izibusiso manje
Ukupha kothando kuletha injabulo (Luk 6:38)
Ngothando sikhanga abanye ukuba bakhulekele uJehova (w92-ZU 2/15 18)
Uma sinothando, singaba nokuthula kwengqondo manje, ukuzihlonipha, ukuphila komkhaya okungcono
Izibusiso zesikhathi esizayo zilindele labo ababonisa uthando manje
UNkulunkulu uyosivuza ngokubonisa uthando kwabanye (IzA 19:17)
UJehova ngeke alukhohlwe uthando esilubonisa ngenxa yegama lakhe (Heb 6:10)
Labo abaqhubeka bebonisa uthando kulelizwe elingenamthetho uJehova ubanikeza ukuphila okumi phakade
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
No. 112-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INTSHA INGABHEKANA KANJANI NOSIZI LWANAMUHLA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Njengoba uziqaphela izinselele intsha ebhekene nazo, nxusa abazali abasezilalelini ukuba bafeze umthwalo wabo
wemfanelo wokufundisa izingane zabo ngendlela yokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu. Bonisa intsha ekhona ukuthi inga-
bhekana kanjani nokuphila kulesi simiso sezinto, bese ugcizelela izinzuzo zokuphila ngokuvumelana nezindinga-
niso zikaNkulunkulu
INTSHA YANAMUHLA IBHEKENE NESIKHATHI SOSIZI—IKUSASA LISENGOZINI (4 imiz.)
Siphila esikhathini esibucayi, esingafaniswa nesikhathi sokuguquka kwezinto zibe ngcono noma zibe zimbi ka-
khulu esigulini esibangwa nezibi (2Kh 20:1, 2)
Usizi lubonakala ekusebenziseni kwentsha izidakamizwa, ekuzibulaleni, ekuziphatheni okuxekethile ngokobuli-
li, ezifweni ezithathelwana ngobulili, ebudloveni (Caphuna izibalo zamuva noma izibonelo ezimfushane; bheka
i-Index ngaphansi kwesithi “Youths”)
Yini eniyoyenza—niyokwenza ushintsho olwenza kube ngcono noma kube kubi kakhulu?
Ngisho noma ungemncane, ucabanga ukuthi intsha ingaqikelela kanjani ukuthi ithola ikusasa elijabulisayo?
ISIZATHU SOKUBA KUBE NALOLUSIZI NAMUHLA (10 imiz.)
Ukuwohloka kokuphila komkhaya kuyisici esiyinhloko salolu sizi
Iningi labazali liyehluleka ukuchitha isikhathi esiningi linezingane zalo (g93-ZU 5/22 16-17)
“Ukuhlola kwamuva okwenziwa i-University of Michigan Institute for Social Research kwathola ukuthi
omama abasebenzayo nsuku zonke bachitha isilinganiso semizuzu engu-11 yesikhathi esizuzisayo (esicha-
zwa ngokuthi esokudlala noma ukufunda kuphela) nezingane zabo phakathi nezinsuku futhi bachithe imi-
zuzu engu-30 usuku ngalunye ngezimpelasonto. Obaba bachitha cishe imizuzu engu-8 yesikhathi esizu-
zisayo benezingane zabo phakathi nezinsuku futhi kube imizuzu engu-14 ngezimpelasonto. Omama
abangasebenzi bachitha imizuzu engu-13 yesikhathi sabo esizuzisayo usuku ngalunye benezingane zabo”
(U.S.News & World Report, October 27, 1986)
Abazali bangase bangabi nezinkolelo eziqinile zokuziphatha, banikeze izeluleko noma iziqondiso ezinengqondo
ezimbalwa (1Ko 14:8)
Ngenxa yokutotoswa kwezingane abazali, ziye zalahlekelwa isikhathi sokuba izingane ezingokwemvelo (g85
7/22 28)
Ukutotosa intsha kuveza imiphumela emibi (IzA 29:21; g87 2/8 20)
Imfundo eningi yanamuhla nendawo ezungezile ayinakho ukuziphatha, nemfundiso yokuhle nokubi
Abaningi balinganisa impumelelo nezinto ezibonakalayo noma isikhundla emphakathini
Ukuziphatha okubi kobulili, ubungqingili, njalonjalo, kuvezwa njengokwamukelekayo
Osaziwayo bomhlaba bagabisa noma bagqugquzele ukuziphatha okubi, abalihloniphi igunya nezindinganiso
zokuziphatha eziyisiko
Ithonya lethelevishini nomculo entsheni liyisici esikhulu osizini lwanamuhla
Okuningi kwakho kudumisa ubudlova, ubulili nokungabi nandaba nokuhlupheka
Emazweni amaningi, lapho osemusha eba neminyaka engu-18, usuke esebuke izinkulungwane zabantu ababu-
lawayo, abadlwengulwayo, nobunye ubugebengu
Lokhu kuthuntubeza intsha yanamuhla futhi kuyenze ingabi nazwela
Ubumpofu, ukungabi nathemba, ukuphelelwa yithemba, nakho kuyizici ezinengxenye kulokhu
Izizathu eziyinhloko zalolu sizi zinikeziwe eBhayibhelini
Isizathu esiyinhloko siwukuthi sisezinsukwini zokugcina, esikhathini sokuphela (Mat 24:3-8)
UPawulu wabikezela indlela izinsuku zokugcina ezaziyothonya ngayo abantu, kuhlanganise nentsha (2Ti 3:1-5)
Yisho izizathu eziyinhloko zosizi: abantu abadala, nentsha ezibonakalisa ingathembekile emandleni okuzi-
nikela kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu ngoba bengamesabi uJehova
Ukuzinikela kweqiniso kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu kuholela ekulaleleni uNkulunkulu; ukuzibonakalisa
ungathembekile emandleni akho kuholela ekungalalelini (Thi 1:16)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi umusha noma umdala, uyavuma yini ukuthi lezi zici zibanga usizi lwanamuhla?
Uma ulamukela iqiniso lokuthi usizi lukhona, yini ongayenza ngakho?
ISIBONELO SABAZALI NOKUQEQESHWA KUYOSIZA INTSHA IKWAZI UKUBHEKANA NALO (12 imiz.)
Ukuze siphumelele, isibonelo sabazali kumelwe sihambisane nezimfundiso zobuKristu
Abazali kufanele babonise izingane ngezenzo ukuthi uNkulunkulu uza kuqala ekuphileni kwabo (Dut 6:5, 6;
Mat 22:37, 38)
Ukuze bakwenze lokhu, abazali kufanele bazimisele ukuthobela igunya likaNkulunkulu nezindinganiso ze-
Bhayibheli
Njengesibonelo, funani kuqala uMbuso kaNkulunkulu nokulunga kwawo (Mat 6:33)
Kudingeka abazali benze izingane zizibone kubo izimfanelo uThimothewu azibona kunina nakuninakhulu
(2Ti 1:5; 3:14)
No. 113-ZU
1/96Kudinga umzamo ngabazali ukuba bathengisise isikhathi abazosichitha nezingane
Kudingeka okwengeziwe kunokumane ube nazo; kumelwe bakhulumisane noma benzelane izinto nazo nge-
ndlela ephumelelayo
Isikhathi esenziwa njalo sokulalelana, sokuxoxa, nesokudlala, sivula amathuba okukhulumisana (Dut 6:7)
Zamani ukwakha isimiso sokufunda esithakazelisayo, nesijabulisayo (w92-ZU 10/15 16-18)
Kubalulekile ukuba isikhathi sichithwe ekuzilibaziseni okwakhayo okujatshulelwa izingane
Umgomo kufanele ube ukuqondisa umqondo wezingane, nifake umqondo kaJehova kuzo (Efe 6:4)
Kusho okungaphezu kokudlulisa ukwaziswa nje; kudingeka niqeqeshe izifiso nokuthambekela kwengane
ngezindlela ezifanele (w93-ZU 5/15 18-19)
Abazali abanothando ngempela bayokhathazeka ngokwengeziwe ngokugxilisa ukuzinikela kokuhlonipha
uNkulunkulu kunemfundo yezwe nokuchuma kwezingane zabo ngokwezinto ezibonakalayo (Joh 17:3)
BASHA, BHEKANANI NOSIZI NGOKUPHILA NGOKUZINIKELA KOKUHLONIPHA UNKULUNKULU
(15 imiz.)
Ukuze niphumelele, kubalulekile ukuba niqaphele isitha senu futhi nimelane nemizamo yaso
USathane uyisitha esikhulu, lonke izwe lisemandleni akhe (1Jo 5:19)
Inhloso kaDeveli iwukunisusa kuJehova noma anenze nenze izinto ezizonenza anganamukeli
Ningabasoli abazali benu ngezwe elibi nobabili enazalelwa kulo
Iningi lesintu lisesimweni sokungamukeleki (Mat 7:13, 14)
Manje kuvunwa isivuno esibi (Gal 6:7; bhekisela ezibalweni ozinikeze ngaphambili)
Kudingeka nimelane noSathane ngokuphila ngokuzinikela kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu
Yibani namandla okuziphatha okubalekela ukuziphatha okubi kobulili (1Ko 6:18)
KWENQABENI ukusetshenziswa okungafanele kwezidakamizwa njengoba uJesu enza (Mar 15:23; g85 3/8
16-18)
Vunani isivuno esihlukile—imivuzo ecebile—ngokuthatha isinyathelo kuqala ekwenzeni intando kaNkulunku-
lu (1Jo 2:17)
UJehova unikeza ukuphila okunenkululeko, okunenjongo nokujabulisayo manje kulabo abamkhonza ngapha-
ndle kobugovu (Joh 8:32)
Ukukhululeka ebugqilini obungokwenkolo, amafilosofi ezwe, nokugqilazwa izifiso zenyama zomuntu ngo-
kwakhe (Rom 6:16; 8:5, 6)
Jabulela ukuphila okunenjongo enkonzweni kaJehova (Rom 12:1, 2)
Abanye bamkhonza ngokwethembeka; nawe ungakwenza (1Pe 5:9, 10; caphuna izibonelo zasebandleni noma
usebenzise okuhlangenwe nakho okuku-w91-ZU 7/15 23-6)
Ibandla likaJehova lomhlaba wonke lakhiwe amakhulu ezinkulungwane zentsha eshisekayo, ‘enjengama-
zolo’ (Hu 110:3)
IKUSASA ELIMANGALISAYO LILINDELE INTSHA EBONISA UKUZINIKELA KOKUHLONIPHA UNKULU-

No. 113-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKWAZISA IZIMANGALISO ZENDALO KANKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisana nezilaleli ngendlela izimangaliso zendalo ezembula ngayo uMdali ohlakaniphile nezimfanelo zakhe. Siza
izilaleli ziqaphele ubuncane bomuntu nokuthi angayazi kanjani injongo yoMdali yothando
IZIMANGALISO ZENDALO—ISIHLOKO ESIFANELEKAYO SENKULUMO YEBHAYIBHELI (4 imiz.)
Impikiswano yokuziphendukela kwemvelo neyokudala iseyimpikiswano esabalulekile
Abaningi bayenqaba ukukholelwa kuNkulunkulu futhi benza ngokuvumelana nalokho (Hu 10:4; 14:1)
Izincwadi zesikole nomagazini abathandwayo baveza ukuziphendukela kwemvelo njengokuyiqiniso
Abalobi beBhayibheli nabantu abaseBhayibhelini bakhuluma ngendaba yokudala, ngakho lesi sihloko siyafane-
leka ukuba sibe esenkulumo yeBhayibheli namuhla
Izimangaliso zendalo zibonakalisa izimfanelo zikaNkulunkulu (Hu 19:1)
Lapho sazi okwengeziwe ngomhlaba, sihlabeka umxhwele ngokwengeziwe
IZIMANGALISO ZENDALO ZIBONAKALISA UMDALI OHLAKANIPHILE (15 imiz.)
Indawo yonke igcwele imithala emikhulu ngendlela esabekayo, namandla (ce 116-20)
Ngisho noma kungenzeka ukuthi asizona izazi zezinkanyezi, sinolwazi lwemithala
Ukuhleleka kwendawo yonke kudinga uMhleli; imithetho idinga uMenzi wemithetho (ce 122-4; sh-ZU 336-9;
Isa 40:26; 1Ko 15:41)
Esimisweni sonozungezilanga, ilanga liyisimangaliso esidaliwe esisizuzisa sonke
Nakuba liqhele ngamamayela ayizigidi ezingu-93, linikeza ukukhanya, ukushisa, namandla
Kodwa ilanga limane liyikhandlela uma liqhathaniswa nezinye izinkanyezi, kodwa lisilungele
Abantu abahlakaniphe ngempela bafuna ukuthola ukuthi ubani uMdali noMhleli wendawo yonke (Heb 3:4; Gen
1:1; Isa 42:5; ce 125-7)
Umhlaba owadalwa uNkulunkulu awulona nje “itshe elingavamile, elihle elisemkhathini” kodwa uwukuphe-
la kweplanethi okutholakala kuyo ukuphila, ngobuningi bakho (Hu 104:24-27; ce 129-30)
Umhlaba uyisici sendawo yonke esibaluleke kakhulu, futhi ngokusobala uMdali wayewudalele ukuphila (sh-ZU
337)
Uqhele ngebanga elifanele elangeni, unezinkathi zonyaka ezithakazelisayo nezizuzisayo, unamanzi nomo-
ya okubalulekile, unenhlabathi engaveza ukudla okunambithekayo (Hez 34:26, 27; ce 131-41)
“Lapho sizihlola ngokwengeziwe izindawo ezinkulu ezimnyama zomkhathi, yilapho siqaphela khona ngo-
kwengeziwe ukuthi umhlaba wethu uyiplanethi engavamile—iNsimu yase-Edene yesimiso sonozungezila-
nga. Ayikho enye into endaweni engamamayela ayizigidi eziyinkulungwane eziyikhulu [amakhilomitha
ayizigidi zezigidi ezingu-160] enezinto ezinhle nezinhlobonhlobo kangaka . . . Emakhulwini ambalwa adlu-
le umuntu wayecabanga ukuthi iplanethi iMars igcwele abantu abahlakaniphile . . . Manje iqiniso seliya-
ziwa. Uma zikhona izinto eziphilayo lapho, zincane kakhulu . . . ngokungazelele sesiyaqaphela ukuthi um-
hlaba uyindawo ekhetheke kakhulu. Ngezindlela ezithile kungenzeka ngisho nokuthi uyingqayizivele
endaweni yonke”—The Blue Planet, kaLouise B. Young, (1983) kk. 3-4
Ingabe izici ezinjalo sizibheka njengobufakazi bokuba khona koMdali? (ce 151)
Ingabe sishukunyiselwa ekucabangeni ukuthi ziyini izimfanelo zoMdali nokuthi iyini intando yakhe ngathi?
INDALO ESIZUNGEZILE IBONAKALISA IZIMFANELO ZIKANKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Kudingeka sifunde okwengeziwe endalweni kunasemaqinisweni angase asesabise; kufanele sifunde ukuthi inda-
lo yembulani ngoMdali
Izimfanelo zakhe eziyinhloko zibonakala emisebenzini yakhe
Indalo ibonisa amandla akhe—Jeremiya 10:12
Lokhu kubonakala ekuhlanganeni kwamandla ezinkanyezi nawelanga lethu, okukhipha ukushisa nokukha-
nya ngenxa yobukhulu bamandla oMdali (Isa 40:26)
Lapha emhlabeni kunamandla amangalisayo abonakala eziphephweni, ekuzamazameni komhlaba, ezimpande-
ni zezitshalo ezikwazi ukuqhephula amadwala
Ngisho nezidalwa ezinjengezindlovu nemikhoma zingawabonisa amandla
Indalo inikeza ubufakazi bobulungisa—Duteronomi 32:4, qhathanisa ne-NW
Abantu abaningi babonisa umuzwa wobulungisa; ngisho nezingane eziningi ziyakwenza
Ngisho nezinhlobo zezinto eziphilayo ezingenawo umuzwa wangempela wobulungisa zingenzelana izinkonzo
eziwusizo
Isibonelo: inyosi ithola uju embalini kodwa ibuye ithuthe impova yembali (ce 145-6)
Sibona ukubonakaliswa kokuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu kuyo yonke indawo—IzAga 2:6
Kubonakaliswa ngendlela emangalisayo ezidalweni ezenziwa “ngokomzwelo ukuba zihlakaniphe” (IzA 30:24,
qhathanisa ne-NW; ce 160-7; yenza isibonelo ngezindlela zokufuduka noma zokwakha izidleke eziqondiswa
imizwelo)

1/95Ukuhlakanipha kubonakala nasemizimbeni yethu, njengobuchopho bomuntu (ce 168-78; bonisa ikhono elikhu-

Sinesizathu sokudumisa uMdali wethu ohlakaniphile

INDALO INGASIFUNDISA IZIFUNDO EZIBALULEKILE (6 imiz.)
UJobe wabhekisela endalweni njengewumthombo wokwaziswa (Job 12:7-10)
UJehova wasebenzisa indalo yakhe ukuba afundise uJobe ukuqaphela ukulinganiselwa kwakhe nesidingo so-
kuthobeka (Job 38:1–42:6)
Endalweni uDavide wabona ubuncane bomuntu nokuklanywa kwakhe ngendlela esabekayo (Hu 8:3, 4; 139:13-16)
IBhayibheli linikeza ezinye izifundo esingazifunda endalweni
USolomoni wathola isifundo sokukhuthala entuthwaneni (IzA 6:6-11)
Ekunakekeleni kukaJehova izinyoni nezimbali singafunda ukususa izinkathazo zezinto ezibonakalayo futhi
sibe nokholo kuNkulunkulu njengomlungiseleli (Mat 6:26-30)
Umzimba womuntu unikeza isifundo sobunye obukhona phakathi kwamalungu ebandla lobuKristu (1Ko 12:
12-18)
Isifundo esikhulu kunazo zonke esisifundiswa indalo yilesi: uNkulunkulu unawo wonke amandla, uhlakaniphi-
le, uhlale enobulungisa, enothando, uyena owasinikeza ukuphila (Hu 36:9)
Labo abenqabayo ukubona lokhu endalweni futhi bamkhulekele ngokwazisa abanazaba emehlweni akhe (Rom
1:20, 21, 28)
INGABE UYAKUBONISA UKWAZISA NGENDALO KAJEHOVA? (5 imiz.)
Uma uyazisa indalo kaNkulunkulu, uyokubonisa kanjani? Uyokubonisa kubani?
Kufanele ukubonise kuMdali wendawo yonke (Gen 1:1; IsA 4:11; 10:6)
Uma izazi zokuziphendukela kwemvelo zinomuzwa wokwazisa ngalezi zimangaliso, ingabe ziyobonga “inhla-
nhla” noma “unkulunkulu weNhlanhla”? (Isa 65:11, qhathanisa ne-NW)
Injongo kaJehova yokudala umhlaba nezimangaliso zawo yayiwukuba umuntu ahlale kuwo, awunakekele, awu-
jabulele, futhi ngokwazisa amdumise (Gen 1:28; 2:15; Isa 45:18; Hu 100)
Uma amazulu angakhulumi, angenaphimbo, noma amazwi, emdumisa, labo abanezindimi namandla okukhu-
luma kufanele bamdumise kangakanani-ke bona!
UNkulunkulu wanikeza izidalwa eziphansi ukuhlakanipha okungokomzwelo wemvelo ukuba kuziqondise, ko-
dwa wanikeza abantu iBhayibheli njengesiqondiso esiyinhloko
Njengabantu abanenkululeko yokuzikhethela, singazifinyelela izimfuneko zikaNkulunkulu zokuphila okupha-
kade noma singazivumela ukuba siqondiswe ukukhohlisa kukaSathane, sidukiselwe enkambweni eholela
ekufeni okungenavuko
Uyoba nalo isikhathi esingakanani ilungelo lokuphila ukuze ujabulele izimangaliso zikaJehova zendalo? Uwe-
na ozozikhethela (Dut 30:19, 20; Jos 24:15; Joh 17:3)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe)
