KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INDLELA YOKUZIVIKELA EZINGIBENI ZIKASATHANE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukuthi uSathane uDeveli namacebo akhe kungokoqobo, okuyizinto okungafanele zi-
thathwe kalula. Qokomisa izindlela ezingokoqobo esingazivikela ngazo kanye nemivuzo yokwenza kanjalo
USATHANE UNGUMUNTU ONGOKOQOBO, AKASONA NJE ISIMO SENGQONDO ESIBI (4 imiz.)
Inkolelo ethandwayo: uSathane akayena umuntu ongokoqobo (w92-ZU 12/1 32)
Iwugibe lukaSathane lokuqhubeka elawula isintu
Empeleni, lonke izwe lingaphansi kokulawula kwakhe (1Jo 5:19)
IBhayibheli liwumthombo wokwaziswa okunokwethenjelwa ngokuphathelene noSathane
Ukulandisa kukaJobe 1, 2 kubonisa ukuthi uSathane ungumuntu ongokoqobo
Ukulingwa kukaJesu nakho kubonisa ukuthi uDeveli ungokoqobo (Mat 4:1-11; w88-ZU 9/1 13-14)
ISISUSA NEZINJONGO ZIKASATHANE (6 imiz.)
Wadalwa ephelele, kodwa wavumela ukuhaha kwamnqoba (Jak 1:14, 15)
Wayezimisele ukuzibonakalisa ephakeme kunoJehova ngokuzidedisela kude noNkulunkulu izidalwa zaKhe
(dg-ZU 13-14)
Wabekela ukufaneleka kobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu inselele (Gen 3:1-5)
Washukunyiswa ukuqhosha (1Ti 3:6)
Inselele yakhe iwuvivinyo kuzo zonke izidalwa ezihlakaniphile ngokuphathelene nokuthembeka kuJehova
(Job 1:9-11; 2:4, 5)
Isizathu sokuba simqaphele uSathane
Ukuze angasibhubhisi (1Pe 5:8)
Ukuze sisekele ubukhosi bukaJehova, senze inhliziyo yakhe ijabule (IzA 27:11)
Ukuphaphama kwethu kuletha umvuzo wokuphila okuphakade
IZINGIBE EZISETSHENZISWA USATHANE (10 imiz.)
Kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ezibucayi, uSathane udukisa abaningi ngokuthanda injabulo (2Ti 3:1, 4)
Isifiso samehlo, isifiso senyama (1Jo 2:16; w86-ZU 5/1 11-12)
Umculo othandwayo owonakele, i-TV kanye nezithombe zamabhayisikobho ezonakalisayo
Uvusa ubuzwe, ngisho nokushisekela inkolo emidlalweni enezibukeli
Ubangela ukuqhosha; wabangela ukuwa kuka-Eva (Gen 3:5, 6)
UKayini, noNimrodi bayizisulu zokuqhosha (Gen 4:3-8; 10:8, 9)
Ukuqhosha ngohlanga kungolunye lwezingibe zikaSathane (g84 11/8 4-5)
“Umuntu ongenamthetho” wanqotshwa ukuqhosha (2Th 2:3, 4)
Usebenzisa amandla okuyenga okungokobulili
Wayenga izingelosi (Gen 6:2; Jude 6)
Nama-Israyeli ayengwa abesifazane bakwaMowabi (Num 25:1)
Imithombo yezindaba yezwe, imidlalo ye-TV ewuchungechunge kufeza injongo kaSathane
Kulabo abasuswa ekuhlanganyeleni unyaka ngamunye, iningi labo kungenxa yokuziphatha okubi ngoko-
bulili
Ugwayi, ukuba umlutha wemilaliso kuyizingibe ezingahlanzekile (2Ko 7:1)
Inkolo yamanga nayo iwugibe lukaSathane (1Ko 10:20)
Ukulumba nokufuna ukwazi ngakho kungolunye ugibe (Isa 8:19, 20)
Izihlubuki nazo zisetshenziswa uSathane
Zisizakala ngezinto ezincane nokukhononda komuntu siqu (Mat 24:48-51)
Ukwesaba abantu kungolunye ugibe lukaSathane (IzA 29:25)
INDLELA YOKUZIVIKELA EZINGIBENI ZIKASATHANE (20 imiz.)
Qaphela isidingo sokuzivikela kuMkhohlisi (2Ko 11:3)
Ukuvikela kusho ukwemboza, ukulwela, ukuvimbela ekulimaleni
Melana noSathane ngazo zonke izikhathi (Jak 4:7)
Izimpikiswano ezaphakanyiswa uDeveli kufanele sizikhumbule njalo (rs-ZU 402-4)
Izinto ezimbi kufanele sizenyanye, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi zingabonakala zijabulisa kangakanani (Hu 97:10;
1Ko 14:20)
UJesu wabeka isibonelo (Heb 1:9)
No. 115-ZU
4/95Kufanele sihlome njalo izikhali ezingokomoya (Efe 6:11-18; w92-ZU 5/15 21-3)
Izinkalo zenu zibhinciswe iqiniso
Ukugcina izingqondo zethu zimatasa ngeqiniso likaNkulunkulu kuyosisiza ukuba sixazulule imibuzo, kusi-
vikele
Isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga
Kufanele silondoloze inhliziyo, sibe nezisusa ezinhle (IzA 4:23)
UJesu waxwayisa ngokuthi izinhliziyo zethu zingasindwa kangangokuba singabe sisakwazi ukubeka izi-
thakazelo zoMbuso kuqala (Luk 21:34, 35)
Izinyawo zigqokiswe izindaba ezinhle zokuthula
Yiba nesineke, nesu enkonzweni yasensimini ukuze unqobe ukuphikiswa okubangelwa uSathane (Luk 10:
5, 6)
Isihlangu esikhulu sokholo
Yakha lesi sikhali esiyisivikelo ngesifundo seBhayibheli nangokuzindla, ukuhlanganyela nabakhulekeli oka-
nye nabo
Ukuhlekwa usulu, ukunyundelwa, amazwi ayiziswana, ukubhuqwa, amanga konke kunganqotshwa nga-
lesi sihlangu esikhulu
Yenza ukholo lwakho luphile ngokusiza abanye (Jak 2:26)
Isigqoko sokuzivikela sensindiso
Ithemba lensindiso linjengesigqoko esivikela ikhanda (1Th 5:8)
Qinisa leli themba ngokutshela abanye ngalo
Inkemba yomoya
Kudingeka ujwayelane kangcono neBhayibheli ukuze udalule izenzo zobuqili zikaSathane, izimfundiso za-
manga; ulisebenzise ngobunyoninco
Nomthandazo uwusizo ekuzivikeleni ezingibeni zikaSathane
Kufanele uhlanganise ukucela, ukunxusa, ukubonga, nokudumisa (Flp 4:6, 7)
Izithelo zikamoya ziyisivikelo esinamandla sokumelana noSathane nemisebenzi yenyama (Funda eyabaseGala-
thiya 5:19-23)
Uthando ngoJehova nesikholwa nabo aluyivumeli imisebenzi yenyama (1Ko 13:4-8)
Ubumnene buyayehlisa intukuthelo, buvimbele ukulwa (IzA 15:1)
Ukuzithiba kuyasiza ekuvimbeleni ukwehlulwa imisebenzi yenyama
Kufanele siwutube umzimba wethu ukuze siwugcine uhlanzekile ngokokuziphatha (1Ko 9:27)
Ukondla ingqondo ngezinto ezinhle kwenza imicabango emibi ingabi nandawo (Flp 4:8)
IMIVUZO YOKUZIVIKELA EZINGIBENI ZIKASATHANE (5 imiz.)
Ukuba nonembeza omuhle ngenxa yokuziphatha okuhle (1Pe 3:16)
Injabulo yokuba nengxenye ekulwelweni kobukhosi bukaJehova
Senza uNkulunkulu abe nempendulo kulowo oMsolayo (IzA 27:11)
Ukugcina ubuqotho bethu nakho kuyabakhuthaza abanye ukuba bathembeke (Flp 1:12-14)
Ukuphila phakade esimisweni esisha sezinto kungomunye umvuzo omkhulu
AmaKristu agcotshiwe ayobusa njengamakhosi asezulwini (IsA 5:10)
“Isixuku esikhulu” siyosinda e-Armagedoni futhi sihlanganyele ekwenzeni umhlaba ube ipharadesi (IsA 7:9-14)
Singayithola lemivuzo uma nje sihlala siphapheme futhi sizivikele ezingibeni zikaSathane (Mat 24:13)
(Bheka ne-w88-ZU 9/1 13-18; w84-ZU 10/15 9-18 [w84 10/15 11-20]; rs-ZU 400-408)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KHETHA ABANGANE BAKHO NGOKUHLAKANIPHA!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Chaza ukuthi kungani kuhlakaniphile ukukhetha ukuthi siba nobudlelwane nobani. Qhathanisa imiphumela ya-
bangane abahle nababi, bese ubakhuthaza bonke ukuba babe abangane nalabo abavunyelwa uNkulunkulu
ABANGANE BAYITHONYA ELINAMANDLA (8 imiz.)
Abangane bangasithonya ngokuhle noma ngokubi (Funda izAga 13:20)
Igama lesiHeberu elithi ‘isiwula’ lisho ukungabi nandaba neqiniso elingokokuziphatha
‘Abantu abahlakaniphile’ benza ngendlela enengqondo nangokuhlakanipha, basebenzisa ukwahlulela okuhle
futhi bagweme izingozi
UDavide wakuqaphela ukubaluleka kwabangane abahle (Hu 64:2; 142:7)
Wayelangazelela ukuba nobungane noJehova, eqaphela ukuthi kwakungenakwenzeka uma eba nobudlelwa-
ne nabantu ababi (Cabangela amavesi afanelekayo akumaHubo 26 bese ugcizelela inzuzo yawo)
UDavide wazuza ebunganini bakhe noJonathani, owayemncane kunaye ngeminyaka engu-30 (1Sa 18:1-4; 23:
16-18; w89-ZU 1/1 24-5)
Ukuba abangane nabenzi bobubi kuye kwaholela abanye enhlekeleleni engokomoya (1Ko 15:33)
Kuye kwaholela ekuziphatheni okubi nasekubeni umlutha wotshwala nezidakamizwa (w93-ZU 8/1 19; yp-ZU
65-6; g90-ZU 2/8 28-30 [g89 4/22 12-14])
Ukulalela iseluleko seBhayibheli esingagwegwesi nesiqondiso esicacile ezindabeni zabangane kuyosilondoloza
ukuba singadukiswa
QAPHELA ISIDINGO SOKUBA NABANGANE ABANGOKOMOYA (15 imiz.)
UPawulu ukhuluma ngemivuzo ecebile evela ekuhlanganeni ndawonye (Heb 10:23-25)
Ngisho noJehova, nakuba engadingi lutho, wakubona ukubaluleka kokuba nabangane
Wenza ukuba azungezwe amashumi ezinkulungwane amadodana angokomoya, athola izibusiso ekubeni nobu-
ngane naye (Job 38:4-7; Dan 7:10)
Izingelosi ezingathembekile ezadela ubungane bazo noJehova zalahlekelwa izinzuzo eziyigugu namathemba
esikhathi esizayo (2Pe 2:4)
Abangane beqiniso abangokomoya bayisivikelo ekucindezelekeni, ekungabazeni, nasekubeni isisulu sikaSathane
USathane ufuna ukushwabadela bonke abanjengezimvu (1Pe 5:8, 9)
Uzama ukubahlukanisa nebandla abese ebenza bahileleke ekuphishekeleni imigomo yezwe (wt-ZU 72-5)
Ukuzihlukanisa kungabangela ukugula okungokomoya, ukuhlubuka, nokufa (IzA 18:1; w54 9/15 568)
Ngakho, “ningaphuthi emihlanganweni” (Heb 10:25, The Jerusalem Bible)
Khetha abangane abayisibonelo phakathi kwabantu bakaNkulunkulu (2Ti 2:20, 21; w93-ZU 4/15 15)
Kufanele sikhethe labo abazoba nethonya elihle, nelakhayo kithi nasezinqumweni zethu
Masilwele ukwakha izimfanelo ezinhle kithi ukuze sibe abangane abayigugu kwabanye
Qondiswa ngokukhethekile izimiso zeBhayibheli ekukhetheni umngane womshado (w88-ZU 11/1 15-16)
Gwema ukwakha noma isiphi isithakazelo sothando kunoma ubani ‘ongekho eNkosini’ (1Ko 7:39)
Makube umuntu oye wabonisa ukwethembeka nezimfanelo ezingokomoya kuphela ongase umcabangele nje-
ngomuntu ongase abe umngane wokuphila kwakho konke
 ́
Lesi isinqumo esingathi s ına, ngoba abangane bomshado bayothonyana ukuphila kwabo konke
GWEMA UKUZIHLANGANISA NABENZI BOBUBI (14 imiz.)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli sixwayisa ngokucacile ngethonya elibi labenzi bobubi (Eks 23:2; 1Ko 5:6; 2Pe 2:2)
Intsha nabantu abadala ngokufanayo kudingeka babakhethe abangane
Gwema ubudlelwane obungadingekile nabantu bezwe (Joh 15:19; 17:14; 1Ko 5:9-11)
Bangase bacatshangelwe njengabantu “abakahle,” kodwa abazange bazibonakalise ‘bengabantu abahlakani-
phile’ abesaba uJehova
Ngokuhlakanipha intsha iyakugwema ukuba nobudlelwane nabantu abangakholwa emicimbini yokuphothula
esikoleni, emisebenzini eseceleni, nangezinye izikhathi (sj-ZU 22-5)
Abantu abadala ngokufanayo balandela izimiso zobuKristu lapho bemenyelwe emicimbini yokuhlangana kwa-
bantu abaphothule izifundo ezithile, emicimbini yezisebenzi zasehhovisi, noma eminye imibuthano yokuzija-
bulisa
Kufanele sizikhethe ngokucophelela nezincwadi esizifundayo, amabhayisikobho, izinhlelo zethelevishini, noku-
nye (Efe 5:3, 4; Kol 3:5-10; yp-ZU 283-8)
Ukulingisa abadlali bemidlalo ye-TV ewuchungechunge ababonisa ukuziphatha okungahlanzekile konakalisa
umqondo omuhle (w83-ZU 6/15 3-8 [w82 12/1 3-7])
No. 116-ZU
9/07Izincwadi zezihlubuki zihloselwe ‘ukonakalisa’ izingqondo zethu futhi sidinga ukuqapha okukhethekile (2Ko 11:
3, 4)
Kuwubuwula ukuzifaka engozini yokuba nobudlelwane nabantu abanjalo ngokufunda izincwadi zabo (2Ko 11:
13-15; Thi 3:9, 10)
Lezo zincwadi ziwushevu futhi ziklanyelwe ukusikhohlisa (1Jo 2:19; 2Jo 8-11; w94-ZU 7/1 11-13; w86-ZU 3/15
12-14)
Gcwalisani ukuphila ngezinto ezinethonya lokuzinikela kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu (IzA 4:23; Flp 4:8, 9)
HAMBA NOJEHOVA FUTHI UHLANGANYELE NABANTU BAKHE (8 imiz.)
Izikhonzi ezithembekile zikaJehova ziye zakufuna ngokuqhubekayo ukuba abangane naye (IzA 3:32; Mik 4:5)
UJosefa wagcina uJehova ephambi kwakhe njalo, okwamvikela ngokokuziphatha (Gen 39:9)
UMose wayeqondiswa ‘yiLowo ongabonakali’ (Heb 11:27)
Ukubeka uJehova ngasesandleni sakhe sokudla kwenza ukuba uDavide angazanyazanyiswa (Hu 16:8)
Ukuhamba noJehova kuletha izinzuzo eziningi (Flp 4:6, 7; w85-ZU 9/1 5-7)
Kufanele uzimisele ‘ukuhamba noNkulunkulu’ (Amo 3:3)
Yakha ubuhlobo obuseduze naye (Jak 4:7, 8)
Enhlanganweni kaJehova ehlanzekile kunabantu abakahle ongakha nabo ubungane
Lapha sithola abanye abazinikele ngokuphelele kuNkulunkulu futhi abaveza izithelo zomoya wakhe (Hu 122:1;
1Ko 16:17, 18; w92-ZU 9/15 26; w89-ZU 6/15 20)
Ingabe siba khona njalo kuyo yonke imihlangano yebandla, yesifunda, neyesigodi kanye nabantu bakaNku-
lunkulu abathembekile? (Hu 119:63)
‘Singanuleka’ ebudlelwaneni bethu ngaphambi nangemuva kwemihlangano yebandla (2Ko 6:11-13; wt-ZU 149-
150)
Abafowethu abathembekile nabo badinga ukwakhiwa (1Th 5:11)
Ngothando basize ukuba baqhubeke behlanganyela ngenkuthalo emihlanganweni yebandla nasenkonzwe-
ni yasensimini
Njengobungane bukaDavide noJonathani, singakha ubungane obufanayo ebandleni lobuKristu (2Sa 1:26)
Amazwi ‘asivuselela othandweni nasemisebenzini emihle’ ngempela awabangane abathembekile (Heb 10:24;
Luk 6:45)
Unombono wokuphila okuphakade, khetha abangane bakho ngokuhlakanipha!

All Rights ReservedINDLELA YOKUNQOBA OKUBI NGOKUHLE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuhlakanipha nenzuzo yokunqoba okubi ngokuhle. Bonisa ukuthi ngokusebenzisa ukwahlulela oku-
hle, ngokuvamile singakugwema okubi, noma-ke sikwazi ukubhekana nezimo ezimbi
OKUBI KUSITHINTA SONKE (4 imiz.)
Ububi yinoma yini ebangela ubuhlungu, ukudabuka noma ukucindezeleka (it-1 772)
Abaningi babhekana nokubi ngokuba nempilo ebuthaka, izingozi, izinhlekelele zemvelo, ukudumazeka, uku-
ngabi nabulungisa, ukulahlekelwa okuhlukahlukene, inkulumo elimazayo nezenzo zabanye zokungacabangi
Umphumela ungaba ukuhlupheka okukhulu, ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo
Lapho sibhekene nokubi, ukuthambekela kobuntu ukuba nenzondo noma ukusola abanye, ngisho noNkulunkulu
Abanye bayaphindisela, bafune impindiselo, ngokuvamile benze izinto zibe zimbi nakakhulu
Nokho, iBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi okubi kunganqotshwa ngokuhle (Funda eyabaseRoma 12:21)
Ngaphambi kokuthola ukuthi singakwenza kanjani, sizoxoxa ngokuthi ububi bavela kanjani
UMSUKA WOBUBI (10 imiz.)
Ngemva kokudala umbhangqwana wokuqala ongabantu, “uNkulunkulu wabona konke akwenzileyo; bheka, kwa-
kukuhle kakhulu” (Gen 1:31)
Konke kwakuklanyelwe ukuba kunikeze isintu okuhle kuze kube phakade
Umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi wawukhumbuza u-Adamu no-Eva ngegunya likaNkulunkulu lokubeka izindi-
nganiso zokuziphatha (Gen 2:16, 17)
Ukube babelalelile, babengeke behlelwe yingozi noma okubi, bona noma inzalo yabo
UDeveli wakhohlisa u-Eva, kwase kuthi kamuva u-Adamu nomkakhe bangamlalela uJehova
Ngaleyo ndlela bazivumela ukuba banqotshwe okubi
Ngenxa yalokho, inzalo yabo yasala nefa lesono nokufa (Rom 5:12)
Yebo, akuzona zonke izehlakalo zokubi ezehlela isintu ezibangelwa uSathane ngokuqondile
Isikhathi nethuba, ukungapheleli nokwahlulela okubi kungaba nemiphumela emibi (Hu 51:5; IzA 11:27; Shu
9:11)
Nakuba kunjalo, ngokusobala ithonya likaSathane lingesinye sezizathu zokudlanga kobubi namuhla kunani-
ni ngaphambili
Abaningi ‘abanalo uthando ngobuhle’—ubufakazi bokuthi siphila “ezinsukwini zokugcina” (2Ti 3:1, 3)
Ngakho usizi olukhulu luseduze; uNkulunkulu uzongenela ukuze asuse ububi emhlabeni ngokubhubhisa
ababi!
Kunokuba lube into embi, usizi olukhulu luyovula indlela ‘yamazulu amasha nomhlaba omusha oku-
yohlala kukho ukulunga’ (2Pe 3:7, 13)
UKUNQOBA OKUBI NGOKUHLE (28 imiz.)
Okwamanje kumelwe sibhekane nokuningi okubi
Izinto ezimbi, njengobugebengu noma izingozi, ngokuvamile zingaziwa kusengaphambili futhi zigwenywe,
noma okungenani zenziwe zingabi zimbi kakhulu, ngokucabangisisa kusengaphambili (IzA 22:3; w95-ZU 8/15
3-4)
Nokho, ngokuvamile, asikwazi ukugwema okubi; kumelwe sizame ukukunqoba ngokuhle
Akusho ngempela ukuthi kufanele sibekezelele ukuphathwa kabi, sisonge izandla
Ubuhle buyimfanelo eyakhayo ebonakala ezenzweni ezizuzisayo (it-1 986)
Manje asihlole izimo ezithile esinganqoba kuzo okubi ngokuhle [Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi: Yivumela-
nise nezidingo zebandla]
Ushushiso (2Ti 3:12)
Nqoba ngokungavumi ukuhlehla nangokukhuthazela ngenjabulo ngenxa yezindaba ezinhle (IzE 5:27-29, 40-
42; 1Pe 4:12-14)
Ngokwenza okuhle noma ukubonisa umusa, ungabathambisa abashushisi (Mat 5:44; Rom 12:17-21; it-1 1051)
[Landisa okuhlangenwe nakho; yb90 64 noma esinye isibonelo esifanelekayo esinyathelisiwe]
Ukufa kothandekayo
Ngemva kokufa kothandekayo kungavela imizwelo enamandla, edidayo
Ukulila kungokwemvelo futhi kuyazuzisa (Joh 11:33-35)
 ́
Nokho, usizi oludonsa isikhathi lungalimaza, luholele ekucindezelekeni okungathi sına ( we-ZU 7)
Kancane kancane imizwelo ephambene enamandla “inganqotshwa” ngokusebenzisa iseluleko esingokom-
Bhalo (we-ZU 14-19)
No. 117-ZU
11/06Ukuthembela ngokuphelele kuNkulunkulu nasezithembisweni zakhe eziqinisekile nakho kungabasiza aba-
ntu balulame (we-ZU 26-31)
Ngokwenzela abanye okuhle, sigwema ‘ukuzihlukanisa’ futhi sinambitha injabulo etholakala ngokupha (IzA
18:1; IzE 20:35)
Lapho abanye besicasula
Amazwi nezenzo zabanye zokungacabangi zizwisa ubuhlungu (IzA 12:18)
Singayinqoba imizwa emibi ngabanye ngokubathethelela ngokuqondile noma ngokulungisa ukungezwani
ngokushesha nangomoya wothando (Efe 4:26, 32; Kol 3:12-14)
Ukunqoba okubi ngokuhle kungahlanganisa nokwenza izinguquko ebuntwini bethu ukuze singazilimazi thina
noma abanye
Inkulumo nesimo sengqondo esilimazayo
Ulaka, inzondo, ukuhleba nokuqamba amanga kuphazamisa ukuthula nobunye bebandla (Gal 5:15; Efe 4:31)
Ngokuqhubeka ethuthuka ekugqokeni ubuntu obusha, umuntu anganqoba inkulumo nesimo sengqondo
esilimazayo ngokucabanga nenkulumo ehlanzekile (Kol 3:8-10)
Ukusebenzisa kabi utshwala
Ukuphuza utshwala ngokweqile kungaletha izingozi ezingokwenyama nezokuziphatha (IzA 23:20, 21, 29-35;
it-1 656)
Sizilethela okubi ngokuzitika
Kunqobe ngokulinganisela noma ngokungabuthinti nhlobo
Abaningi abathembela kuJehova nababonisa ukuzithiba bangakwazi ukuphuza ngokulinganisela
Labo asebephila ngotshwala kudingeka benze imizamo emikhulu ukuze bagqashule ekuluthekeni (g92-ZU
5/22 6-7)
Abangane ababi
Ukuziphatha kwethu nemizwelo kuthonywa kakhulu yilabo esibakhetha njengabangane (IzA 22:24, 25; 1Ko
15:33)
Ukukhetha ukuzihlanganisa nalabo abangezona izinceku zikaNkulunkulu kungaletha inhlekelele (Gen
34:1-3; w85-ZU 6/15 31; rs-ZU 338)
Kunqobe ngokukhetha abangane abakhayo ebandleni
Uthando lwemali
Ukuthanda imali kungenza umuntu akhohlwe izimiso zeBhayibheli (IzA 28:20; 1Ti 6:9, 10)
Kungenza umuntu enze imikhuba yezebhizinisi yokungathembeki noma aze axhaphaze ngisho nobuhlo-
bo nabafowethu ngenxa yenzuzo engokwezimali
UmKristu unqoba ‘ububi’ obunjalo ngokufeza izibopho zakhe nangokugwema imikhuba yobugovu (IzA 21:6;
Mat 5:37)
Unqoba nangokwaneliswa anakho (Mat 6:33, 34; Heb 13:5)
IMIVUZO YOKUNQOBA OKUBI NGOKUHLE (3 imiz.)
Kuletha injabulo enkulu nokwaneliseka ekuphileni manje
Singathola ukwaneliseka ngokwazi ukuthi senze into efanelekile futhi sijabulisa uNkulunkulu (1Pe 3:10-17)
Ngokunqoba okubi ngokuhle, sikhazimulisa uNkulunkulu
Abenzi bobubi bangashukunyiswa isibonelo sethu sobuqotho (1Pe 2:12)
Ekugcineni, labo abanqoba okubi ngokuhle bayovuzwa ngokuphila nenjabulo yaphakade (Hu 37:27)
(Namathela ngokuseduze ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye.

Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ngomusa, siza abantu abadala babheke intsha ngendlela uJehova ayibheka ngayo futhi basebenzelane nayo ngo-
kufanelekile. Khuthaza intsha ngemfudumalo ukuba ilwazise uthando lukaJehova ngayo futhi isabele kulo ngo-
kuphishekela imigomo engokwasezulwini
UJEHOVA UBONISA UKUKHATHALELA KOTHANDO NGENTSHA (8 imiz.)
AmaKristu aqotho ayayazi indlela uJehova abheka ngayo intsha
Uyikhathalela ngokujulile inhlalakahle yabantu abasha (Hu 94:6; Isa 1:23)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu linikeza iseluleko sothando nesidingekayo kokubili entsheni nakubazali bese lisho nemi-
thwalo yabo yemfanelo; lingahlakaniphisa ongenalwazi (Hu 19:7)
Kunamavesi amaningi eBhayibhelini akhuluma ngezinsana, izingane, abafana, amantombazane kanye nentsha
Kulamavesi siyabona ukuthi uJehova uyazithanda izingane (Hu 127:3-5)
Uye wenza amalungiselelo okuzinakekela, ukuzifundisa kanye nokuzivikela; unendawo yazo elungiselelweni
lakhe laphezulu
UJehova wasungula umkhaya, wenza amalungiselelo okuvikelwa, okondliwa kanye nawokunakekelwa
kwabantu kusukela ekukhulelweni kuqhubeke (Efe 3:14, 15)
Ukuqeqeshwa nokunakekelwa abazali abanothando nabahlonipha uNkulunkulu (Efe 6:4)
Ukufundiswa ngelungiselelo lomkhaya nelebandla (Dut 6:6-9; 31:12; it-1 435)
Imithetho yokuvikela izingane ekuxhashazweni (Eks 22:22-24)
AMAKRISTU ANOMBONO KAJEHOVA NGENTSHA (10 imiz.)
UJesu wabonisa isithakazelo esiqotho kubantwana (Mat 19:14)
Abazali abahlonipha uNkulunkulu, ikakhulukazi obaba, kufanele baqeqeshe izingane zabo ngezindlela zikaJe-
hova
Kufanele bakugweme ukuthukuthelisa noma ukucasula izingane zabo (Efe 6:4; Kol 3:21)
Izimiso zeBhayibheli kufanele ziqondise abazali lapho beyala izingane zabo (Cabangela amaphuzu ayinhlo-
ko akuyi-g92-ZU 9/8 26-7)
AmaKristu avuthiwe awayibhekeli phansi intsha; kunalokho ibandla libheka intsha ethembekile njengezibone-
lo okufanele zilingiswe (1Ti 4:12)
Wonke amaKristu, kuhlanganise nentsha, kufanele aphathwe ngenhlonipho nangesizotha
UJehova uyakwazisa ukukhulekela kwayo (Hu 110:3)
INTSHA EYAJABULELA UKUVUNYELWA UNKULUNKULU (9 imiz.)
Intsha inamakhono amangalisayo kodwa kufanele ikhule, ifunde futhi iqeqeshwe ukuze iwasebenzise (Hu 71:17)
Kunezibonelo ezikhuthazayo zentsha yangezikhathi zeBhayibheli [Qokomisa indlela lentsha elandelayo eyam-
khonza ngayo uJehova kusukela ebuntwaneni, bese usho ngokuqondile izimfanelo ezayenza yathandeka ku-
Nkulunkulu]
UJosefa: Lapho esanda kweva eminyakeni eyishumi nambili uNkulunkulu wamenza waphupha amaphupho
ayiziprofetho (Gen 37:2, 5)
Wathanda ukulunga futhi wakwenqaba ukuziphatha okubi (Gen 39:7-9)
Indodakazi kaJafta: Yayizinikele futhi ilalela, izimisele ukudela ukuphila okuvamile kowesifazane ongum-
Israyeli (it-2 27-8)
UDavide: Umoya kaJehova ‘wehlela phezu kwakhe’ lapho ‘esengumfana’ (1Sa 16:11-13; 17:33)
UJosiya: Waba iNkosi yakwaJuda eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ubudala; walihlonipha iZwi likaNkulunku-
lu futhi wakuthuthukisa ngenhliziyo yonke ukukhulekela kweqiniso (it-2 117-18)
UDaniyeli: Lapho eyiswa eBabiloni cishe esanda kweva eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, wahlala egxilile, ethe-
mbekile futhi engayekethisi (Dan 1:8; it-1 576)
ISELULEKO ESIVELA KUBABA WETHU WASEZULWINI, OYIKHATHALELAYO INTSHA (14 imiz.)
NjengoBaba onothando, uJehova uyakhanga kithi futhi uyikhathalela ngokujulile inhlalakahle yethu (IzA 4:
20-27)
Ukuqaphela ngokuphelele ukuthambekela ebubini kwezinhliziyo zethu okumelwe sonke silwe nakho kusuke-
la ebusheni (Gen 8:21)
UNkulunkulu uyabaqonda abantu abasha futhi ukwazi kahle ukucindezela ababhekana nakho okuvela kuba-
ntu abadala, intsha endadlana nakontanga
Ulungiselela iseluleko sothando nezibonelo eziwusizo zokulandelwa
USamuweli, nakuba ayesengumfana nje, wakha ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu noNkulunkulu futhi akazange avu-
me ukuthonywa ukuziphatha okubi nokweyisa kwamadodana ka-Eli (1Sa 2:11-26)
No. 118-ZU
8/98Shesha ‘ukubalekela izifiso ezihambisana nobusha’ (2Ti 2:22)
Zihlanganisa ukuthambekela ekuziphatheni okubi kobulili nokuphishekela injabulo ngokungenakuzithiba na-
ngokweqile okuvame kakhulu namuhla
Nquma enhliziyweni yakho ukungazingcolisi nganoma iluphi uhlobo lokungcola (Dan 1:8)
Kubalulekile ukuba sonke, kuhlanganise nentsha, siqaphele ukuthi siyolandisa kuNkulunkulu (Shu 11:9; Rom
14:12)
Kuhlanganisa ukulalela nokunikeza abazali inhlonipho ebafanele (Efe 6:1-3)
Intsha eyakhulela ezweni kodwa manje esiseqinisweni kumelwe iqhubeke ilwisana nokubuyela ekuziphatheni
kokungamhloniphi uNkulunkulu, emilalisweni nasekuziphatheni okubi
Ungakhohliswa ukuheha kwaleli lizwe noma ukucabanga kwalo; kungokwesikhashana futhi kuyingozi (1Jo
2:15-17)
Lwela ukulinganisela kukho konke okwenzayo, kuhlanganise nasekuzijabuliseni (w92-ZU 8/15 16)
Hlakulela isithakazelo ezintweni ezakhayo nasekuzilibaziseni okuzuzisayo; gwema ukuzijabulisa okuthuthu-
kisa umoya wokuvukela nemikhuba engahlanzekile (Hu 101:3; w92-ZU 10/15 16)
Yenza intuthuko yakho ibonakale (1Ti 4:15)
Phishekela imigomo engokwasezulwini; sebenzisa amalungiselelo aklanyelwe intsha, njengencwadi ethi Intsha
Iyabuza—Izimpendulo Ezisebenzayo
Thuthuka ezicini ezinjengokuba nolwazi olunembile lweBhayibheli, izimfanelo zobuKristu, nokukhula ngo-
komoya, kanye nasekhonweni lokukhuluma, lokufunda nelokufundisa
Uma ungakabhapathizwa, zimisele ukufanelekela ukubhapathizwa bese uhlanganyela ngokugcwele enko-
nzweni
UJEHOVA UTHEMBISA INTSHA ETHEMBEKILE IKUSASA ELILONDEKILE NELIJABULISAYO (4 imiz.)
Ngokombono kaJehova, intsha ifeza indima ebalulekile enjongweni yakhe
 ́
Nokho, lokhu kuyenza ibe nomthwalo wemfanelo ongathi sına phambi kukaJehova (Shu 12:1)
Bonisa ngezenzo zakho ukuthi uyasazisa iseluleko sakhe sothando nezixwayiso ezinjengezikababa
Kwenze kahle lokho okwenzela uNkulunkulu; mnikeze okungcono kakhulu! (Qhathanisa izAga 22:29 noMala-
ki 1:6-9)
 ́
Lithathe ngokungathi sına iqiniso, futhi uqaphele ukuthi ubuhlobo bakho noJehova buyinto eyigugu kunazo zo-
nke onazo
Uyakumema ukuba ube nekusasa elijabulisayo nelilondekile ngokumkhonza manje (Jer 29:11-14a)
Abantu abasha bangaba nengxenye ebalulekile ekufezekeni kwentando kaJehova uma abantu abadala bebandla
bebasekela ngothando, bebahlonipha futhi babaqeqeshe (Funda iHubo 148:12, 13)

No. 118-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUHLUKA EZWENI KOBUKRISTU
—ISIZATHU SOKUBA KUBE NENZUZO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Kwenze kucace ezilalelini ukuthi kuhilelani ngempela ukuhluka ezweni, futhi ngendlela ekhuthazayo, bonisa
ukuthi kungani kuzuzisa ukuzigcina uhlukile ezweni
UKUHLUKA EZWENI, UPHAWU LOBUKRISTU BEQINISO (4 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu ‘wayengeyona ingxenye yezwe’; abafundi bakhe nabo akumelwe babe ingxenye yezwe (Joh 17:16)
Umlando uyakuqinisekisa ukuthi amaKristu akuqala ayaziwa ngokuhluka ezweni (rs-ZU 311-12)
Izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu azikashintshi; amaKristu namuhla kudingeka ahluke ezweni (Jak 4:4)
UJesu wacela uYise ukuba abheke abafundi bakhe njengoba belwela ukuzigcina behlukile ezweni njengoKri-
stu (Joh 17:15)
AmaKristu eqiniso namuhla ajabulela isiqondiso nesivikelo sikaNkulunkulu, futhi ngokuhlala ehlukile ezwe-
ni azizuzisa wona nabanye
AMAKRISTU AWAZIHLANGANISI NEZINDABA ZEZWE ZEZOMBANGAZWE (12 imiz.)
AmaKristu awathathi hlangothi ezindabeni zezwe zezombangazwe (Joh 18:36; rs-ZU 308-14)
Awahlanganyeli emikhosini yokushisekela izwe, futhi awahileleki ezingxabanweni zobuhlanga noma zezomba-
ngazwe
AmaKristu kumelwe ‘azithobe emagunyeni aphakeme,’ akhona ngemvume kaNkulunkulu futhi afeza injongo
enhle (Rom 13:1, 5-7; w90-ZU 11/1 10-15, 18-22)
Akhokha izintela futhi alalele yonke imithetho engangqubuzani nomthetho kaNkulunkulu (Mar 12:17)
Ayabahlonipha abasezikhundleni zikahulumeni, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi baziphatha kanjani
Ziningi izinzuzo ezitholwa yilabo abazigcina behlukile ezweni
[Cabangela izinzuzo ezithile nokuhlangenwe nakho okunyathelisiwe okuqokomisa ukuba usizo kokuma kom-
Kristu]
AMAKRISTU AZIGCINA EHLUKILE EKUZIPHATHENI KOKONAKALA KWEZWE (12 imiz.)
Izwe lonakele; umbono walo ngokuziphatha awuhambisani nokaNkulunkulu (w93-ZU 2/15 13)
Ngokombono weBhayibheli, ukuziphatha okuxekethile kuwukwaphula ngendlela embi izimiso zikaNkulunku-
lu zokuziphatha ezibekwe ngokucacile (Eks 20:14, 17; 1Ko 6:9, 10)
Ukukhulekela okuhlanzekile nokungangcolile ngokombono kaNkulunkulu kumelwe ‘kungabi nabala elivela
ezweni’ (Jak 1:27)
Kumelwe kugweme imibuthano yokuzijabulisa engakhi, umculo ongcolile, ukuzijabulisa ngokuziphatha oku-
bi nobudlova kanye nabangane ababi
Uma ilungu lebandla liwela ekuziphatheni okuxekethile, liyasizwa ukuba liphenduke futhi liguquke (2Ko
2:5-8; 1Jo 1:9; 2:1)
Abenzi bobubi abangaphenduki kumelwe basuswe ebandleni (1Ko 5:11-13)
Izinzuzo zokuzigcina uhlukile ezweni futhi uqaphela izindinganiso zeBhayibheli zokuziphatha eziphakeme [Bhe-
ka esithi “Bible standards” ngaphansi kwesithi MORALS kuyi-Watch Tower Publications Index 1986-1995]
INKONZO YASOBALA IWUPHAWU OLUHLE LOKUHLUKA KOBUKRISTU (12 imiz.)
UJesu wanikeza umyalo wokushumayela nokwenza abafundi (Mat 28:19, 20)
AmaKristu akuqala ayaziwa ngesibindi sokushumayela obala nasendlini ngendlu (IzE 5:28, 42; 20:20)
Wonke amaKristu kumelwe ahlanganyele ekushumayeleni ngezinga angenza ngalo; kuwukuthunywa kobuKri-
stu (Mat 24:14)
Ukuhlanganyela ngesibindi nangentshiseko enkonzweni kusisiza ukuba sihlale sihlukile ezweni; kuletha izi-
nzuzo zangempela nezanelisayo [Bheka esithi “benefits” ngaphansi kwesithi FIELD MINISTRY kuyi-Watch
Tower Publications Index 1930-1985 neka-1986-1995. Ungasebenzisa nokuhlangenwe nakho kwasebandle-
ni okuqokomisa indlela ukuhlanganyela ngenkuthalo enkonzweni okubasize ngayo abantu ukuba bazigcine
behlukile ezweni]
UKUHLUKA EZWENI KOBUKRISTU KUNENZUZO MANJE NASESIKHATHINI ESIZAYO (5 imiz.)
Yonke imiyalo kaJehova iye yabazuzisa abantu baKhe (Funda iHubo 19:7-11)
Umthandazo kaJesu wokuba uJehova abheke abafundi bakhe uye waphendulwa
Kuyaduduza ukwazi ukuthi akukho lutho olungasihlukanisa nothando lukaJehova nolukaJesu Kristu (Rom
8:35, 38, 39)
Njengoba sizigcina sihlukile ezweni, singaqiniseka ngesiqondiso sothando nesivikelo sikaJehova
Ukuphila ezinsukwini zokugcina zalelizwe kudinga sikuphaphamele ngokwengeziwe ukuhlala sihlukile
Akusensuku zatshwala lelizwe elidala libhujiswe, futhi kuyosala kuphela “amazulu amasha nomhlaba omu-
sha” kaNkulunkulu, okukhona kuwo ukulunga (2Pe 3:7, 13)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ISIZATHU SOKUBA UZITHOBE MANJE
EKUBUSENI KUKANKULUNKULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela izinzuzo zokuzithoba ekubuseni kukaNkulunkulu nenjabulo elethwa ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu
UKUZITHOBA EKUBUSENI KUKANKULUNKULU KUYIMPIKISWANO (4 imiz.)
Kuyimpikiswano enkulu kunazo zonke abantu bezizwe zonke ababhekene nayo manje (Hu 83:18; Mik 4:1)
Ngokwekhalenda likaNkulunkulu, sisondele isikhathi sezinguquko ezinkulu
Ujonge ukubonakalisa amandla akhe, enze igama lakhe laziwe, agxile ezindabeni zomhlaba ukuze kuzuze aba-
ntu abathambekele ekulungeni (Isa 55:10, 11; Rom 9:17, 18)
ABANTU KUMELWE BANQUME UKUTHI YINI ABAZOYENZA NGOKUQONDENE NOKUBUSA KUKANKU-
LUNKULU (4 imiz.)
IHubo 24:1 no-89:11 libonisa ukuthi umhlaba nalabo abahlala kuwo bangabakaJehova ngokufanele; unguMbusi
Ophakeme (Dan 4:17, 35)
NgokweHubo 89:35-37, uJehova wafunga ukuthi uyosimisa phakade isihlalo sobukhosi sikaDavide ‘nenzalo’
yakhe
Kusukela ngo-607 B.C.E. kuqhubeke, wabuyeka ubukhosi bukaDavide banqamuka, baphazanyiswa “izikhathi
ezimisiwe zezizwe” (Luk 21:24)
Ngo-1914 “izikhathi ezimisiwe” zaphela futhi umbuso wezwe lesintu waba “umbuso weNkosi yethu noka-
Kristu wayo” (IsA 11:15)
UJesu Kristu wabe esemukela ubukhosi kuJehova (w95-ZU 11/1 16 isig. 2)
Ngakho lesi isikhathi sokuba abantu bakwazi lokhu nokuthi kungani kumelwe banqume ukusekela noma
ukumelana nokubusa kukaNkulunkulu (IsA 14:6, 7)
UKUBUSA KOMUNTU KUSESIMWENI ESIBUCAYI (4 imiz.)
Abaholi abavelele baxwayisa ngokuthi siyaphela isikhathi sezizwe sokuthola indlela yokusombulula izinkinga
zazo (tp-ZU 11)
Lezi zinkinga zihlanganisa ukuntuleka kokudla, ubugebengu, ubudlova bezizwe, ukutholakala kwezikhali
zenuzi, ukungcola, abantu abaningi ngokweqile, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi nezinye izinkinga zomnotho
(w94-ZU 8/1 3-5; g93-ZU 4/8 3-5)
Okwenza isimo sibe sibi nakakhulu ukuthi imibuso yabantu eyesikhashana
Noma iluphi ushintsho olwenzeka kohulumeni noma kwabaphethe lushintsha izivumelwano nezinqubo,
kukhinyabeze imizamo yokulandelela obese kuqaliwe
Ababusi abangabantu balinganiselwe kulokho abangase bakwenze
Izinhloso zabo ezinhle zingaqedwa ukufa, ukuthatheka kwabantu abavotela ukubakhipha ezikhundle-
ni noma ukuvukelwa kombuso (Hu 146:3, 4)
KUWUKUHLAKANIPHA UKUZITHOBA EKUBUSENI KUKAJEHOVA (10 imiz.)
UNebukadinesari kwadingeka azithobe egunyeni likaNkulunkulu (Dan 4)
Ngesikhathi iBabiloni lisakhomba ngophakathi, uNebukadinesari wayezigqaja ngayekufezile, kodwa ngoku-
phazima kweso konke lokho kwashintsha (Dan 4:29-33)
Waba yini umphumela kuNebukadinesari? (Funda amavesi 34, 35)
Nakuba engazange abe umkhulekeli kaJehova, kwadingeka avume ukuthi ukubusa kukaJehova kungo-
koqobo ngempela
Siyakubona ukufana ezikhathini zethu
Ngokwesibonelo, uHitler wayeqhosha ngokuthi uzomisa umbuso owawuyohlala iminyaka eyinkulungwane,
nokho, wahlala iminyaka cishe engu-12
Nakuba eminye imibuso isuke ithandwa kakhulu lapho iqala ukubusa, ngokushesha iyadumaza
Esinye isici esibonisa ukuhlakanipha kokuzithoba ekubuseni kukaJehova siwukuthi ngokushesha umbusi wa-
ngempela walelizwe uzophonswa ngaphandle (Joh 12:31)
Ngo-1914, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu waqala ukubusa (IsA 12:10)
UJehova unikeze uJesu igunya (Dan 7:13, 14)
Izizwe nabantu bayamenywa ukuba bazithobe ekubuseni kukaNkulunkulu (Hu 2:1, 2, 12; Zef 2:3)
Kuwukuhlakanipha ukwenzenjalo manje, ngoba sincane impela isikhathi esisalele eminye imibuso
(Dan 2:44)
Ngokushesha bonke abenqaba ukuzithoba bayobhujiswa futhi ukubusa kukaNkulunkulu kuyobe ku-
wukuphela kwakho okukhona

6/97INDLELA YOKUZITHOBA EKUBUSENI KUKANKULUNKULU (18 imiz.)

Qaphela isidingo sokungaziphileli (2Ko 5:14, 15)
IZINZUZO ZOKUZITHOBA EKUBUSENI KUKANKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Ezamanje: Uba ingxenye yobuzalwane bomhlaba wonke, iqembu labantu abakahle kunabo bonke emhlabeni
—abangane abaqotho esingathululela kubo izifuba nesingakhulekela nabo uJehova ngobunye (Joh 4:23, 24)
Ukuphila okunenjongo yangempela nenjabulo yokumelela uJehova, sisize abanye bafunde iqiniso
Ukukhululeka ezifweni ezibangelwa ukuziphatha okubi noma ukweqisa ngenxa yokungazilandeli izindinga-
niso zeBhayibheli zokuziphatha
Ingcebo ebisaphazwa emikhubeni emibi manje isisetshenziselwa ukuzuzisa abanye, okuletha injabulo (IzE
20:35)
Inkululeko yokuya kuJehova ngomthandazo nonembeza ohlanzekile obangelwa ukuthethelelwa izono
Ezesikhathi Esizayo: Ukuphila okumi phakade ePharadesi; bungekho ubugebengu, ukungabi nabulungisa, noku-
cindezelwa
Ukuphila ngaphansi kokubusa kukaJesu Kristu okungenaphutha phakathi kwabantu abakhathalelayo (Isa
11:6-9)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBUZALWANE BOMHLABA WONKE BUSINDISWA ENHLEKELELENI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Basize bonke ukuba babone ngokucacile ukuthi buyini ubuzalwane bamaKristu eqiniso kanye nendima ebufeza-
yo ekusizeni abantu ngabanye ukuba basinde enhlekeleleni ezayo yomhlaba wonke
UKUBONA UBUZALWANE BEQINISO (10 imiz.)
IHubo 133:1 liyababaza, libonisa ukuthi ubuzalwane beqiniso abuvamile futhi buyaphawuleka
Kudingeka okungaphezu kobuhlobo begazi ukuze kwakheke ubuzalwane beqiniso
Eminyakeni yamuva, kuye kwaba nezimpi ezichitha igazi kakhulu phakathi kwabantu bohlanga olulodwa
Bakhona yini abantu abanobuzalwane beqiniso nothando phakathi kwabo?
Yebo; oFakazi BakaJehova ‘bayinhlangano yobuzalwane’ bomhlaba wonke (1Pe 2:17; Isa 43:10, 11, 21)
Ngisho nabantu abangebona oFakazi baye basiqaphela isibopho esiqinile esikhona phakathi koFakazi
(w94-ZU 4/15 15)
Ubunye babo abusekelwe ebuhlotsheni begazi noma emfundisweni ethile engokombangazwe
Njengoba behlanganiswa ukulalela kwabo iZwi likaNkulunkulu, bonke balandela izindinganiso ezifana-
yo zeBhayibheli emhlabeni wonke (Isa 54:13)
Bahlanganiswa uthando lobuKristu (Kol 3:14)
‘Bangabangane beqiniso’ abasekelanayo lapho kunezimo ezicindezelayo (IzA 17:17; jv-ZU 310-15)
Ubuzalwane babo bamukela zonke izinhlanga, izizwe nezizinda (IzE 10:34, 35)
Abantu abangebona oFakazi baye bakhuluma ngobunye bezinhlanga ababubona emihlanganweni emi-
khulu (yb87 17)
Ngomsebenzi wokushumayela emhlabeni wonke, oFakazi BakaJehova bamema bonke abanhliziyo ziqotho uku-
ba babe yingxenye yalobu buzalwane bomhlaba wonke (Mat 28:19, 20; IzE 1:8)
Ibaluleke kakhulu indlela osabela ngayo kulesi simemo
Lobu buzalwane ngokushesha buzosinda enhlekeleleni enkulu kunazo zonke ezake zehlela isintu

6/97AmaKristu akubona kuwubuwula ukuzama ‘ukusebenzisa izwe ngokugcwele’ nokugxila ezintweni ezizodlula

nangokwenyama (km-ZU 9/95 2; om-ZU 136)

Kungahlanganisa umuntu nokuthile okungahloniphekile
Ingabe siyashesha ukulingisa izimfashini zezwe ezingenasizotha?
Uma abazali bephawula ukuthi izingane zabo zithonywa umoya wezwe endleleni ezigqoka futhi zizilungise
ngayo, kufanele bazimisele ukufinyelela izinhliziyo zazo bese bezisiza zibone isidingo sokulungisa
Nabo ngokwabo kufanele babeke isibonelo esihle (1Pe 3:3, 4)
Ukuba kwethu nesizotha kuyosivikela ezweni elonakele, elihlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu
IZIBUSISO EZILETHWA UKULANDELA INDINGANISO YOBUKRISTU (4 imiz.)
Ukulondoloza indinganiso yobuKristu nokuhluka ezweni kuletha izibusiso eziningi
Siyakwazi ukukhonza uNkulunkulu wethu ngonembeza ohlanzekile futhi uyosamukela
Siyovikelwa kuSathane, umbusi waleli lizwe, nasemacebweni akhe (Joh 14:30; Efe 6:10-13; 1Jo 5:19)
Kusenza sikwazi ukuhlala endleleni ewumngcingo eyisa ekuphileni okuphakade (Mat 7:13, 14)
Uma sifuna ukwamukelwa uJehova futhi sithole izibusiso, kumelwe sihluke!
Singalokothi sikhohlwe ukuthi, “izwe liyadlula kanjalo nesifiso salo, kodwa lowo owenza intando kaNkulu-
nkulu uhlala kuze kube phakade” (1Jo 2:17)
Kwangathi singayithola leyo njabulo!
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imibhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 123-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ISISEKELO SOKUQINISEKA UKUTHI
IBHAYIBHELI LALOTSHWA NGOKWAPHEZULU
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zicabange ngokuba kweBhayibheli elinokwethenjelwa. Bonisa indlela ukugcwaliseka kwezi-
profetho nesiqondiso esiwusizo esiqukethwe iBhayibheli okufakazela ngayo ukuthi lilotshwe ngokwaphezulu.
Veza indlela oFakazi BakaJehova abazuze ngayo ngokulandela izindinganiso zeBhayibheli, ngaleyo ndlela beni-
keza isisekelo sokuqiniseka ngokulotshwa kwalo ngokwaphezulu.
ABANINGI BAYANGABAZA UKUTHI IBHAYIBHELI LILOTSHWE NGOKWAPHEZULU (4 imiz.)
Abaningi namuhla bayangabaza—noma baphika balale ngomhlane—ukuthi iBhayibheli lilotshwe ngokwaphezulu
Ipheshana labaphika ubukhona bukaNkulunkulu libuza abafundi balo: “Ngeke yini wasiza ekuphuceni izi-
ngane zethu lencwadi [iBhayibheli], uyisuse emizini ehloniphekile nasemagunjini asemahhotela?” (Frank
C. Hughes kwethi Spiritual Guide to Gracious Living) Umlobi ophika ubukhona bukaNkulunkulu wabiza
iBhayibheli ngokuthi “izinganekwane” (The Evening Post, Dec. 11, 1979)
Umbhishobhi wesifunda saseMichigan weSonto LikaMoya wathi: “IBhayibheli linamaphutha, alinembile futhi
liyaziphikisa. Ngakho kuyaqondakala ukuthi kungani amasonto amakhulu obuKristu engalibheki iBhayibhe-
li njengelingenaphutha.” (The Detroit News, April 24, 1982)
Indelakazi engumKatolika yaseDenver, eColorado, yathi ngeBhayibheli: “Lifuze umuntu ngendlela edumaza-
yo. Abalobi abangabantu babonisa ukungayazi ngendlela edabukisayo isayensi, umlando ngisho nezenkolo
. . . UNkulunkulu akazange enze umlobi ophefumulelwe azi isayensi eyayingaziwa abantu bangaleso sikha-
thi.” (Rocky Mountain News, Feb. 26, 1982)
Lemibono inaso yini isisekelo? Yisiphi isisekelo esinaso sokuqiniseka ngokuthi iBhayibheli lilotshwe ngokwaphe-
zulu?
ABALOBI BEBHAYIBHELI BATHI BABEQONDISWA UMLOBI WAPHEZULU (10 imiz.)
Umlobi weBhayibheli uDavide wancoma uJehova ngemibhalo emihle ekumaHubo (2Sa 23:2)
Nakuba umprofethi uDaniyeli engakuqondanga konke akubhala, eziningi zeziprofetho zakhe zigcwalisekile (Dan
12:8)
Iziprofetho zaziqondiswa umoya ongcwele kaNkulunkulu (2Pe 1:20, 21)
Umphostoli uPawulu wathi yonke imiBhalo iphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu (2Ti 3:16, 17)
Uma amaKristu akuqala ayeqiniseka ngokuthi iBhayibheli lilotshwe ngokwaphezulu, akufanele yini nathi si-
qiniseke?
Cabangela indlela (1) iziprofetho zeBhayibheli, (2) izimiso zeBhayibheli (3) izithelo ezivezwa oFakazi BakaJeho-
va ezinikeza ngayo isisekelo sokuqiniseka ngokuthi iBhayibheli lilotshwe ngokwaphezulu
IZIPROFETHO ZIWUBUFAKAZI OBUQAND’ IKHANDA BOKUTHI LALOTSHWA NGOKWAPHEZULU
(15 imiz.)
Cabangela iziprofetho ezagcwaliseka kuJesu
IHubo 22 lineziprofetho ezimayelana noJesu
Ivesi 1 labikezela ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayeyomshiya ezitheni uJesu; amavesi 7 no-8 abikezela ukuthi wa-
yeyothukwa lapho esesigxotsheni; ivesi 16 labikezela ukuthi wayeyobethelwa ezandleni nasezinyaweni;
ivesi 18 labikezela ukuthi kwakuyokwenziwa inkatho ngezambatho zakhe
Zonke lezi ziprofetho zagcwaliseka ngemva kweminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane zalotshwa
Ngamafuphi nje, ziningi kakhulu iziprofetho zobuMesiya ezagcwaliseka kuJesu (it-2 387)
Incwadi ethi Archaeology and Bible History ithi: “Amathuba okuba zonke lezi ziprofetho zigcwaliseke ku-
muntu oyedwa mancane ngokumangalisayo kangangokuba kusobala impela ukuthi azivezwanga neze uku-
qagela kwabantu” (ce 221)
UDaniyeli wabikezela ukuphakama nokuwa kwemibuso yomhlaba (Funda uDaniyeli 8:5-8, 20-22)
Lesi siprofetho sagcwaliseka ngemva kweminyaka engaphezu kuka-200 lapho u-Alexander Omkhulu efa fu-
thi ojenene bakhe abane behlukaniselana ngoMbuso waseGreece (w93-ZU 5/15 6)
U-Isaya wabikezela ngokumgagula ngegama uKoresi ukuthi uyokhulula amaJuda ekuthunjweni eBabiloni nga-
phambi kokuba athunjwe nokuthunjwa (Funda u-Isaya 44:24-28)
Wabikezela ukuthi amasango aseBabiloni ayeyoshiywa evuliwe (Funda u-Isaya 45:1) (w93-ZU 5/15 5)
Wabikezela ukuthi iBabiloni laliyogcina libhujisiwe (Funda u-Isaya 13:19; 14:22, 23)
IBabiloni, elase lishiywe ngokuphelele ngo-200 C.E., nanamuhla liseyihlane, okuqinisekisa ukunemba kwe-
siprofetho sika-Isaya (hp 28-9)
Iziprofetho ezimayelana nezinsuku zokugcina zalesi simiso ziyagcwaliseka esikhathini sethu
Ukufunda eyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-5 kufana nokufunda izihloko eziphambili ephephandabeni lanamuhla
IsAmbulo 6:1-8 sagcwaliseka kusukela ngo-1914 kuza neno (re-ZU 89-99)
Iziprofetho ziqinisekisa ukuthi iBhayibheli lilotshwe ngokwaphezulu (Isa 46:10)
No. 124-ZU
5/97ISIQONDISO ESIWUSIZO SEBHAYIBHELI SIWUBUFAKAZI BOKUTHI LALOTSHWA NGOKWAPHEZULU
(10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli liba ukukhanya endleleni yethu ngokunikeza iseluleko esiwusizo ezicini eziningi (Hu 119:105)
Lisiza ekulungiseni izinkinga zomnotho
Liyabulahla ubuvila, likhuthaza inkuthalo (IzA 6:6-11; Kol 3:23; 2Th 3:10)
Labo abakhuthele bangase bangalahlekelwa umsebenzi
Ligcizelela izinto ezibalulekile; izinto ezibonakalayo akufanele zibekwe kuqala ekuphileni, akufanele zisi-
buse futhi (Mat 6:33; 1Ti 6:6-12)
Lixwayisa ngezindlela zokuphila ezingaholela ebuphofwini (IzA 23:20, 21)
Iseluleko seBhayibheli singaholela esimweni sengqondo esingcono nasempilweni engokomzimba engcono
Njengoba iBhayibheli lingeyona incwadi yezokwelapha, alisho ukuthi linamandla okwelapha izifo zengqo-
ndo ezingamahlalakhona, ezingokomzwelo noma ezingokomzimba
Nokho, izimiso zeBhayibheli ziyayithuthukisa impilo engokomzwelo nengokomzimba; kanjani?
IBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi isimo sengqondo somuntu singathonya impilo yakhe engokomzimba (Funda
izAga 14:30)
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sihlakulele izimfanelo eziwuphawu ‘lwenhliziyo ezolileyo’ (IzA 16:32;
Rom 12:17-21; Efe 4:31, 32)
IBhayibheli liyayilahla imikhuba engalimaza impilo yomuntu engokomzimba
Lixwayisa ngokuminza, ukuphuza kakhulu, ukungcolisa inyama nomoya (Luk 21:34; 2Ko 7:1)
Izindinganiso eziphakeme zeBhayibheli zokuziphatha, ngokwezinga elithile, ziyasivikela ezifweni ezi-
thile (IzA 7:5, 22-27; Heb 13:4)
Labo abaphila ngeseluleko seBhayibheli bayazuza (Isa 48:17, 18)
OFAKAZI BAKAJEHOVA BAFAKAZELA UKUTHI IBHAYIBHELI LALOTSHWA NGOKWAPHEZULU
(6 imiz.)
Izithelo abazivezayo ekuphileni kwabo ngenxa yokubambelela emithethweni nasezimisweni zeBhayibheli zoku-
ziphatha zifakazela ukuthi iBhayibheli livela phezulu
UJesu wathi umuntu angakwazi ukubona umuthi omuhle noma omubi ngezithelo zawo (Mat 7:16-20)
Izimiso zeBhayibheli ziye zasiza abaningi ukuba baguqule ukuphila kwabo (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 6:9-11)
OFakazi BakaJehova bawubufakazi obuphilayo bokuba usizo kwezindinganiso zeBhayibheli
Bawumkhaya onobunye, nakuba bephila emazweni angaphezu kuka-230
Abazithandi izinto ezibonakalayo, bafuna uMbuso kaNkulunkulu kuqala (Mat 6:33)
Bayakugwema ukusebenzisa kabi imilaliso, kuhlanganise nogwayi
Bazama ukuphila ukuphila okuhlanzekile ngokulandela izindinganiso zeBhayibheli eziphakeme zokuziphatha
Iqiniso lokuthi iseluleko seBhayibheli siyasebenza liyisisekelo esiqinile sokuqiniseka ngokuthi iBhayibheli lalo-
tshwa ngokwaphezulu (Mat 11:19)
Sebenzisa iseluleko seBhayibheli ekuphileni kwakho; siza nabanye ukuba benze kanjalo (1Ti 4:16)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45OKWENZA ISINTU SIDINGE ISIHLENGO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zakho ziqonde futhi ziqaphele isidingo sesihlengo. Chaza izinzuzo zaso kanye nezibusiso esizithola-
yo manje nesizozithola esikhathini esizayo ngenxa yalesi sipho sikaNkulunkulu
OKWENZA ISIHLENGO SADINGEKA (5 imiz.)
Isihlengo siyisipho esikhulu kunazo zonke uNkulunkulu azinikeze isintu (w91-ZU 2/15 10)
Siyisisekelo sethemba lethu lokuphila okumi phakade (Joh 3:16)
Isihlengo sadingeka ngenxa yesono sika-Adamu (Rom 5:12)
Inzalo ka-Adamu engaphelele nenesono yayingenakukwazi ukuzikhulula ekufeni noma izikhokhele yona isi-
hlengo (Hu 49:7, 8)
Ngothando, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ukuba ife njengesihlengo (Mar 10:45)
Inkolelo yokuthi uJesu wafa njengesihlengo sesintu esinesono iyisisekelo sobuKristu beqiniso
Nokho, ngokuvamile amaKristu okuzisholo awakwazi ukusho imithombo engokweBhayibheli yale mfundiso
noma yokuyichaza (w91-ZU 2/15 4)
AmaKristu eqiniso akufanele nje ayiqonde kuphela le mfundiso kodwa kufanele akwazi nokuyichaza (Efe 3:18)
Siyini isihlengo? Ubani osilungiselelayo? Sikhokhwa kubani? Ziyini izinzuzo zaso?
INDLELA ELOBUKHOLWA ELIYE LASENQABA NGAYO ISIHLENGO (5 imiz.)
Bambalwa kubefundisi beLobukholwa namuhla abakholelwa emfundisweni yesihlengo njengoba iBhayibheli li-
yifundisa (w91-ZU 2/15 3-7)
Ngemva kokufa kwabaphostoli, abaholi besonto baxatshaniswa izimpikiswano ezingokwenkolo (IzE 20:29, 30;
2Ti 4:3, 4)
Babengavumelani emibuzweni enjengokuthi: Isihlengo sakhokhwa kubani? Kungani kwakudingeka sikho-
khwe?
Ezinye izazi zenkolo zafundisa ukuthi isihlengo sakhokhwa uNkulunkulu kuSathane
Abanye baphikisa ngokuthi ukufa kukaKristu kwakungesona isihlengo noma inani elilinganayo lokwe-
nana—bayakuphika ukuthi ubulungisa babudinga ukuba kufe othile “owayenguNkulunkulu futhi engu-
muntu”
Njengoba le nkolelo-mbono yayamukelwa kabanzi, igama elithi “isihlengo” alibange lisasetshenziswa
Namuhla emasontweni amaningi akufundiswa ngesihlengo
Izazi zenkolo zamaKatolika nezamaProthestani ziyaqhubeka zenza isiko nokuhlakanipha kwabantu kube
okubaluleke ngaphezu kwemiBhalo (Jer 8:9)
Ngokuphambene, umagazini INqabayokulinda uye waba umkhulumeli wesihlengo iminyaka engaphezu kwe-
yikhulu ( jv-ZU 47-8, 619-21)
Ngokuvumela imiBhalo izikhulumele, singayiqonda kangcono le mfundiso
ISIHLENGO ESIHAMBELANAYO (20 imiz.)
Isihlengo siyinani elikhokhwayo lokuthenga noma lokukhulula esibophweni esithile noma esimweni esingatha-
ndeki
EmiBhalweni YesiHeberu, igama elisetshezisiwe elisho isihlengo livela esenzweni esisho “ukusibekela” (w99-ZU
2/15 13-15; w91-ZU 2/15 11-12; it-2 733-4)
 ́
Isihlengo, noma isisibekelo, kufanele sifanelane ncamashı nalokho okwembozwayo, ngokwakheka noma nge-
nani
Ngaleyo ndlela ubulungisa baphezulu bufuna ukuba ‘umphefumulo wenanwe ngomphefumulo‚ iso ngeso‚
izinyo ngezinyo‚ isandla ngesandla‚ unyawo ngonyawo’ (Dut 19:21)
Ukuze kuhlengwe noma kusibekelwe ukuphila okwalahlwa u-Adamu, kwakufuneka ukuphila okuphelele oku-
hambelanayo (w91-ZU 2/15 12-13)
Umuntu onguNkulunkulu wayengeke afanelane no-Adamu; ukufa komuntu onjalo kwakungeke kuvumelane
nezindinganiso zobulungisa
Imihlatshelo yezilwane yayinganele, ngoba abantu baphakeme kunazo (Heb 10:1-4)
Akekho umuntu ongaphelele owayengalungiselela isihlengo (Job 14:4)
UJehova walungiselela isihlengo ngokunikela ngoJesu ukuba abe “isihlengo esihambelanayo sabo bonke” (1Ti
2:6; w91-ZU 2/15 13-16)
 ́
Njengoba uJesu ayehambelana ncamashı no-Adamu, asikho isidingo sokunikela ngezigidi zabantu ukuze nga-
munye ahambelane nomunye oyinzalo ka-Adamu (Rom 5:19; 1Ko 15:21, 22)
UJesu wenza ukuba sisuswe isigwebo sokufa enzalweni ka-Adamu (Heb 2:9)
Amandla abhubhisayo esono anqanyulwa emsukeni wawo
Kodwa-ke, isihlengo sakhokhwa kubani? (w91-ZU 2/15 14)
IHubo 49:7 libonisa ngokusobala ukuthi isihlengo sakhokhwa ‘kuNkulunkulu’
No. 125-ZU
10/99Nakuba kunguNkulunkulu osilungiselelayo isihlengo aphinde asamukele, lokhu akukhona ukushintshise-
lana okungenangqondo nokwenziwa ngokoqobo
Ukuqikelela kukaNkulunkulu ukuba kukhokhwe isihlengo kuqinisekisa ukunamathela kwakhe ngoku-
ngaguquguquki ezindinganisweni zokulunga
Ngo-Nisan 14, 33 C.E., uNkulunkulu wavumela iNdodana yakhe ephelele nengenasono, ukuba ife esigxotsheni,
ngaleyo ndlela ikhokhe inani lesihlengo
Ngosuku lwesithathu ngemva kokufa kwakhe, uJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo njengesidalwa somoya esinama-
ndla (IzE 10:40; 1Pe 3:18)
UJesu waqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe wokukhulula ngokuletha kuNkulunkulu inani elingokomthetho lo-
kuphila kwakhe okuphelele kobuntu (Heb 9:11, 12, 24)
Ukwamukela kukaJehova umhlatshelo wesihlengo kwaba sobala ngePhentekoste lika-33 C.E. (IzE 2:1-4)
IZINZUZO ZELUNGISELELO LESIHLENGO (10 imiz.)
Ngesihlengo, uNkulunkulu angabuyisela kuye ‘izinto ezisemhlabeni kanye nezinto ezisemazulwini’ (Kol 1:14, 20;
w91-ZU 2/15 15-19)
Isihlengo savula ithuba lokumisa “isivumelwano esisha” nabayizi-144 000 ukuba bakhonze noKristu njengama-
khosi nabapristi ezulwini (Heb 8:6-13; IsA 5:9, 10)
Ngabo, izinzuzo zesihlengo ziyosetshenziswa kancane kancane esintwini phakathi nokuBusa Kweminyaka
Eyinkulungwane (1Ko 15:24-26; IsA 21:3, 4)
Isihlengo senza kube khona ukubuyisana ‘nezinto ezisemhlabeni’—labo abanethemba lokuphila phakade ePha-
radesi
Kakade “isixuku esikhulu” siye ‘sageza izivatho zaso sazenza zaba mhlophe egazini leWundlu’ (IsA 7:9-17)
Bajabulela ukubizwa ngokuthi balungile njengabangane bakaNkulunkulu, njengoba kwakunjalo ngo-
Abrahama (Jak 2:23)
Ngemva kokusinda osizini olukhulu, kancane kancane ‘bayokhululwa ekugqilazweni ukonakala futhi
babe nenkululeko ekhazimulayo yabantwana bakaNkulunkulu’ (Rom 8:21)
Isihlengo futhi singasizuzisa ekuphileni kwethu kwansuku zonke
Asikho isidingo sokucindezelwa imizwa yokungafaneleki
UJehova akasibheki nje esimweni sethu sokonakala, sokungapheleli; uyakwazi lokho esingaba yikho lapho
amandla avuselelayo omhlatshelo kaJesu wesihlengo esetshenziswa ngokugcwele (w90-ZU 2/15 23)
Uma sona, kufanele siphenduke futhi sithandazele intethelelo ngesisekelo sesihlengo (IzE 3:19; 1Pe 3:21; 1Jo
1:9)
Yebo, ngomPristi wethu Ophakeme, uJesu, ‘singasondela ngenkululeko yokukhuluma esihlalweni sobukho-
si somusa ongafanelwe, ukuze sizuze isihe futhi sithole umusa ongafanelwe wokusiza ngesikhathi esifa-
nele’ (Heb 4:14-16)
YAMUKELA UMUSA KANKULUNKULU ONGASIFANELE (5 imiz.)
Ilungiselelo lesihlengo linikeza ubufakazi obuqand’ ikhanda bothando uJehova asithanda ngalo (Rom 5:8)

Yiba nokholo emhlatshelweni kaJesu oyisihlengo (Joh 3:16; 17:3)
Bonisa ukuthi uwazisa ngokusuka enhliziyweni ngenkonzo yentshiseko oyenzela uNkulunkulu (2Ko 5:14)
Tshela abanye ngaleli lungiselelo elimangalisayo lensindiso (Rom 10:10)
Londoloza ukuziphatha okuhlanzekile (1Pe 1:14-16)
