No. 125-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUFANELE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBANI ONGASINDISWA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukubaluleka kokusindiswa esonweni, ekuhluphekeni nasekufeni. Yakha ukwazisa nge-
sihlengo njengoba uchaza izinyathelo okumelwe sizithathe ukuze sizuze kuleli lungiselelo lothando. Gcizelela uku-
thi bonke bangakhuthazela futhi basindiswe
YINI ESIDINGA UKUSINDISWA KUYO? (4 imiz.)
Abantu badalwa benesifiso sokuphila phakade (Shu 3:11)
Kwakungeyona injongo kaNkulunkulu ukuba abantu bagule futhi bafe (w99-ZU 4/15 5-8)
Lapho u-Adamu ona, walethela yena nenzalo yakhe yesikhathi esizayo ukuhlupheka nokufa (Gen 3:19; Job 14:4)
U-Adamu wayengasenakho ukuphila okuphelele ayengakudlulisela njengefa ezinganeni zakhe (w99-ZU 3/15
9; 2/15 13-14)
Ibathinta ngokujulile bonke abantu imiphumela yesono sika-Adamu (Rom 5:14; 8:20-22)
Ngisho nezinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezithembekile azigonyiwe (Khetha imibhalo emibili noma emithathu onga-
yicaphuna kwelandelayo: Genesise 27:46; 47:9; 1 AmaKhosi 19:4; Jona 4:8; Roma 7:22-24)
Ngakho, sonke sidinga ukusindiswa ebugqilini besono nokufa futhi sidinga ukukhululeka ezinkathazweni ezi-
vamile kubantu abangaphelele (Job 14:1; Hu 90:10)
ILUNGISELELO LIKAJEHOVA LOKUSISINDISA (10 imiz.)
U-Adamu wadlulisela isono sakhe—futhi ngaleyo ndlela ukufa—kuyo yonke inzalo yakhe (Rom 5:12)
UJehova “uthanda ukulunga nokwahlulela,” futhi uMthetho awunika ama-Israyeli wawufuna ukuba kwenanwe
ukuphila ngokuphila (Hu 33:5; Num 35:20, 21)
U-Adamu walahlekelwa ukuphila okuphelele; ukuze kufezwe ubulungisa, kwakuyodingeka ukuba kunikelwe
ngokuphila komuntu okuphelele (w91-ZU 2/15 12-13)
Njengoba sizalelwe esonweni, akekho kithi ongasinika lokho kuphila kobuntu okuphelele (Hu 49:6-10)
Kunjengokungathi sinesifo esisongela ukuphila kodwa asikwazi ukukhokhela izindleko zokuselapha
Ngothando uJehova walungiselela ukuba ahlenge isintu esinesono ngesikhathi esifanayo ehambisana nokufu-
nwa ubulungisa (Dut 32:4; 1Jo 4:8; w96-ZU 3/15 21-2)
Ngemva kokuvukela kwase-Edene, wamemezela ilungiselelo lensindiso, isithembiso sokuhlenga isintu esiphe-
ndukile (Gen 3:15)
UJehova wenza ukuba iNdodana yakhe inikele ngokuphila kwayo kobuntu okuphelele esikhundleni soku-
phila okuphelele okwalahlwa ngu-Adamu (Joh 10:17, 18; w99-ZU 2/15 14-16; ws-ZU 162-4)
UJesu wazalwa engenasono; enalokho okwakulahlwe ngu-Adamu—ukuphila kobuntu okuphelele
Ngo-Nisan 14, 33 C.E., uJesu wavuma ukuba abulawe abaphikisi bakhe, ngaleyo ndlela ekhokha inani lezono ze-
thu (1Ti 2:5, 6)
Inkambo yakhe yokwethembeka yavula ithuba lokuba sisindiswe esonweni nasekufeni (1Ko 15:45)
Ngokungafani no-Adamu, uJesu wayengesona isoni; ngakho ekufeni kwakhe wayesenelungelo lokuphila kobu-
ntu okuphelele
Lapho ebuyela ezulwini, uJesu wanikela inani lomhlatshelo wakhe kuJehova (Heb 9:24; w99-ZU 2/15 16)
UJesu wathenga isintu esinesono
Futhi waba uBaba wethu omusha, othatha isikhundla sika-Adamu (Isa 9:6)
UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU UNESITHAKAZELO ESIQOTHO EKUSINDISWENI KWETHU (7 imiz.)
Isihlengo siwukubonakaliswa okuvelele kothando nesihe sikaJehova kanye nokuthembeka kwakhe ezindinga-
nisweni zakhe eziphakeme zobulungisa (it-2 19)
Ngempela umhlatshelo kaKristu wawungukubonakaliswa kothando okukwedlula konke okwake kwenziwa
(w87-ZU 2/15 12-14)
UJehova wabonisa uthando lwakhe olukhulu ngokuthumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa (Joh 3:16)
UJesu wabonisa uthando lwakhe ngokwamukela ngenhlonipho isabelo sokuba uMhlengi wesintu (Joh 15:13)
UJehova ufisa ukuba bonke baphenduke futhi basindiswe (Rom 2:4; 2Pe 3:9)
Uye wagcina umnyango wensindiso owumngcingo uvulekile kubo bonke abafanelekayo (Luk 13:23, 24)
OKUMELWE SIKWENZE UKUZE SISINDISWE (10 imiz.)
Izinkolo eziningi zifundisa umbono wensindiso owenziwe lula kakhulu
Abanye bathi okudingekayo nje kuphela ukwamukela uJesu ngengqondo (g90-ZU 5/22 14)
Abanye banamathela enkolelweni yokuthi uma ususindisiwe, uyohlale usindisiwe (w92-ZU 5/1 15)
Abanye futhi bafundisa ngensindiso yendawo yonke, umbono wokuthi uNkulunkulu uzothethelela zonke izo-
ni (rs-ZU 111-13)
IBhayibheli libeka izimfuneko eziqondile zokusindiswa
Okokuqala, kumelwe sithole ulwazi oluqondile ngoNkulunkulu noJesu (Joh 17:3)
Lokhu kumelwe kusiholele ekutheni sibe nokholo kuNkulunkulu (Heb 11:6)
No. 126-ZU
11/00Ukholo luyosishukumisela ukuba siphenduke ezonweni zethu futhi siguquke enkambweni yethu yokuphila
(IzE 3:19)
Futhi ukholo luyosishukumisela ukuba sixoxe nabanye ngalokho esikufundayo, situsa indlela yeqiniso ko-
kubili ngamazwi nangezenzo zethu (Mat 5:15, 16; Rom 10:10)
Uthando ngoNkulunkulu luyosishukumisela ukuba sizinikezele kuye
Emthandazweni wethu wangasese, sitshela uJehova ukuthi sizinikezela kuye ukuze senze intando yakhe
(Heb 10:7)
Ngemva kokuzinikezela, kufanele sibhapathizwe (Mat 28:19, 20)
Ubhapathizo lungolwalabo asebekhule ngokwanele ukuba benze isinqumo sokukhonza uNkulunkulu (IzE
2:41)
UKUKHUTHAZELA KUBALULEKILE UKUZE SISINDE (10 imiz.)
Ngemva kokuba sesizinikezele, uJehova ulindele ukuba sifeze isithembiso sethu (Shu 5:4, 5)
Ukukhuthazela kubalulekile, ngoba uDeveli uyozama ukusiyekisa ukukhonza uJehova (Mat 24:13; 1Pe 5:8)
Ukukhuthazela akuhileli nje kuphela ukulwa nezithiyo kodwa nokuhambisana ‘nendlela emisiwe,’ yemise-
benzi elungile (Hu 50:23, qhathanisa ne-NW)
Kumelwe siphikelele ekubeni abenzi bezwi, singabi abezwayo kuphela (Luk 6:46-49; Jak 1:22-25)
Inkambo yokukhuthazela ayilula (Mat 16:24; w93-ZU 9/15 9-11)
Ngezinye izikhathi kufanele sikhuthazele ngezinyembezi (Hu 126:5, 6)
Noma kunjalo, kubalulekile ukuba sihlale siqinile, siqiniseka ukuthi uJehova uyakuqaphela ukukhuthaze-
la kwethu futhi ukubheka njengokubalulekile (Heb 6:10)
SINGASINDISWA (4 imiz.)
UJehova uyazi ukuthi uyobakhulula kanjani esilingweni abantu abanokuzinikela kokwesaba uNkulunkulu (1Ko
10:13; 2Pe 2:9)
Wasindisa uNowa nomkhaya wakhe kuZamcolo wembulunga yonke (2Pe 2:5)
UNkulunkulu wasindisa ama-Israyeli nengxubevange yabantu abangewona ama-Israyeli besuka eGibithe
(Eks 6:6)
Wasindisa amaKristu lapho kubhujiswa iJerusalema ngo-70 C.E. (Mat 24:15, 22)
UJehova nathi angasilondoloza lapho ebhubhisa izwe likaSathane (Hu 37:29, 34)
Noma ubani owamukela amalungiselelo kaNkulunkulu okuphila angasinda (Dut 30:11-14)
Sondela kuNkulunkulu ngomthandazo (Flp 4:6, 7)
Funda iZwi lakhe njalo (Hu 1:1-3; 94:19)
Sondelana nebandla (Heb 13:17)
Bonke abafisa ukuphuza amanzi okuphila mahhala bangasindiswa (IsA 22:17)
(Namathela ohlakeni, futhi uqaphele isikhathi esibonisiwe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekho-
njiwe okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 126-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45KWENZEKANI LAPHO SIFA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi ukufa kungqubuzana nenjongo kaNkulunkulu nokuthi abafileyo abezwa lutho. Ngemfudumalo,
yenza izilaleli zilazise ilungiselelo likaJehova lothando, lovuko. Zisize zibone ukuthi ukulalela uNkulunkulu ngo-
kusuka enhliziyweni kuyisihluthulelo sokuphila okungenasiphelo
KUNGANI KUFANELE ISITHINTE INDABA YOKUPHILA KWANGEMVA KOKUFA? (4 imiz.)
Umuntu wadalelwa ukuba aphile, angafi
Ososayensi bakuthola kudida ukuguga nokufa (g95-ZU 10/22 4-5)
Umuntu unesifiso esingokwemvelo sokuqhubeka ephila (Shu 3:11)
Bonke abantu bayafa, kuhlanganise nabathandekayo bethu (Funda umShumayeli 3:19, 20)
Ukufa kubangela ubuhlungu nokuhlupheka kulabo abasele (Gen 37:33-35; 2Sa 1:11, 12)
Kungokwemvelo ukukhathazeka ngokuthi kwenzekani lapho sifa
Kudingeka sibuze:
Kuyini ukufa?
Kwaba khona kanjani?
Kukhona yini okuthile kithi okusindayo lapho umzimba ufa?
Likhona yini ikusasa ngabafileyo?
KUYINI UKUFA? (6 imiz.)
Ngokochwepheshe bezokwelapha, ukufa kungase kubhekwe ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene (it-1 596; it-2 246-7)
Lapho inhliziyo namaphaphu omuntu kuyeka ukusebenza, ochwepheshe bezempilo baye bambheke njengo-
sefile
Umuntu onjalo angabuye avuswe uma inhliziyo namaphaphu kungabuye kusebenze ngokushesha
 ́
Uma amangqamuzana omzimba asezithweni ezisekela ukuphila efa, lowo muntu usuke esefe fı
Amandla okuphila ayayeka ukusebenza emangqamuzaneni, futhi umuntu ofileyo akanakuvuswa
Kalula nje, ukufa kuphambene nokuphila (rs-ZU 274)
Ukufa kusho ukuthi yonke imisebenzi yokuphila iyanqamuka
IBhayibheli lisichaza ngokucacile isimo sabafileyo
Abafileyo abezwa lutho (Funda umShumayeli 9:5, 6)
Ukufa kufaniswa nokulala (IHu 13:3; Joh 11:11-14; it-1 597)
Abafileyo abanamandla (Is 26:14)
Lapho efa, umuntu akabe esaphila (Gen 3:19; IHu 146:4)
UKUGUGA NOKUFA KWABA KHONA KANJANI? (10 imiz.)
Ososayensi abanazo izimpendulo ezanelisayo zokuthi ukuguga nokufa kubangelwa yini (g95-ZU 10/22 8-9)
UJehova uNkulunkulu usembulela isizathu sokuguga nokufa (IHu 36:9; 100:3; ie-ZU 21)
Abantu bokuqala ababili badalwa bephelele (Gen 1:31; Dut 32:4)
UNkulunkulu wayehlose ukuba abantu baphile phakade (Gen 2:15)
Ukulalela kwakuyisihluthulelo sokuphila phakade (Funda uGenesise 2:16, 17)
Eshukunyiswa nguSathane, u-Eva akamlalelanga uNkulunkulu, no-Adamu wahlanganyela kulokho (Gen 3:
1-6; IsA 12:9)
Lokhu kwabenza baba izoni (1Jo 3:4)
Ngaleso sizathu, balahlekelwa yithuba lokuphila phakade futhi baqala ukufa (Gen 3:19; Rom 6:23)
UJehova waxosha la bantu bokuqala ekhaya labo eliyiPharadesi (Gen 3:23, 24)
Badlulisela enzalweni yabo ukungapheleli okubangela ukufa emizimbeni yabo (Job 14:4)
Njengoba sinesono esisizuze ngefa kubazali bethu bokuqala, namuhla siyaguga bese siyafa (Funda eyabaseRo-
ma 5:12)
INGABE SINOMPHEFUMULO ONGAFI OSINDAYO LAPHO SIFA? (10 imiz.)
Lifundisani iBhayibheli ngomphefumulo? (ie-ZU 19-20)
Igama lesiHebheru elisho “umphefumulo,” ngokuvamile lisho umuntu ophilayo futhi ophelele (Funda uGene-
sise 2:7) (Hlu 16:16; IHu 119:28)
Igama lesiGreki elisho “umphefumulo,” ngokuvamile lisho umuntu ophelele (Joh 12:27; 1Th 5:14; 1Pe 3:20)
Igama elithi “umphefumulo” liyasebenza nasezilwaneni (Gen 1:24)
Ngezinye izikhathi, “umphefumulo” usho ukuphila komuntu noma kwesilwane (Eks 4:19; IzA 12:10; Mat 20:28)
IBhayibheli alilokothi lichaze umphefumulo njengengxenye engabonakali yesidalwa esiphilayo esindayo lapho
umzimba ufa
No. 127-ZU
8/00Njengoba elithi “umphefumulo” ngokuvamile lisho umuntu uqobo, umphefumulo uyafa (Gen 2:7; Hez 18:4; Mar
3:4; ie-ZU 22)
ELobukholwa lathatha imfundiso yokungafi komphefumumulo kuyifilosofi yamaGreki (ie-ZU 14-16)
Lapho umuntu efa, ‘umoya wakhe uyaphuma’ (Funda iHubo 146:4) (ie-ZU 24)
“Umoya” usho amandla okuphila asekelwa ukuphefumula, akhona kuzo zonke izinto eziphilayo (Gen 7:22)
Umoya ubuyela kuNkulunkulu (Shu 12:7)
UNkulunkulu kuphela ongabuyisela amandla okuphila, kanjalo enze umuntu abuye aphile (IHu 68:20)
Ingabe uNkulunkulu uyobavusa abathandekayo bethu abafileyo? (Job 14:14)
ITHEMBA ELIQINISEKILE NGABAFILEYO (10 imiz.)
Igama lesiGreki elisho “uvuko,” ngokwezwi nezwi lisho “ukuphinda usukume” (ie-ZU 25-6)
Njengoba enokuhlakanipha okungenamkhawulo nenkumbulo ephelele, uJehova angamvusa umuntu (Job
12:13)
UNkulunkulu wanika abaprofethi u-Eliya no-Elisha amandla okuvusa abafileyo (1Kh 17:17-24; 2Kh 4:32-37)
UJesu Kristu wavusa uLazaru (Joh 11:38-44)
UJesu wathembisa ukuthi bonke abasenkumbulweni kaJehova bayovuswa (Joh 5:28, 29; IzE 24:15; ie-ZU 26-7)
Uvuko luyisibonakaliso sothando lukaNkulunkulu (Joh 3:16)
Inani elincane livuselwa ekuphileni ezulwini ukuze liyobusa noKristu (Luk 22:28-30; IsA 5:9, 10; 14:1, 3)
Iningi lalabo abaye bafa liyovuselwa ekuphileni emhlabeni (Funda iHubo 37:29; IsAmbulo 21:3, 4)
Isintu esilalelayo siyoba nekhaya eliwumhlaba phakade (IHu 115:16)
Ukuguga nokufa kuyobe kungasekho
ITHEMBA ELIYINGQAYIZIVELE LALABO ABAPHILA ESIKHATHINI SOKUPHELA (5 imiz.)
Maduze nje, uJehova uzosusa ububi emhlabeni (IzA 2:21, 22; ie-ZU 30-1)
Siphila ezinsukwini zokugcina (2Ti 3:1-5)
Abasinde osizini olukhulu ngeke kudingeke babhekane nokufa (Joh 11:26; IsA 7:9-14)
Uma sifa manje, sinethemba elimangalisayo lovuko
Kufanele wenzeni manje uma ufuna ukuphila phakade ePharadesi emhlabeni?
Ngenisa ulwazi olunembile ngokuphathelene nentando kaNkulunkulu nezinjongo zakhe (Joh 17:3)
Kusebenzise okufundayo, futhi wakhe ukholo (Heb 11:6)
Zihlanganise njalo namanye amakholwa (Heb 10:24, 25)
Yazisa abanye ngalokho okufunde eBhayibhelini (Mat 24:14; 28:19, 20)
Nawe ungabheka phambili ekuphileni okuphakade emhlabeni ohlanziwe
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 127-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE NGEMPELA ISIHOGO SIYINDAWO
YOKUHLUPHA ABANTU NGOMLILO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi uJehova, njengoNkulunkulu wothando, uye wathatha izinyathelo ezidingekayo ukuze abuyise-
le isintu esilalelayo ebuhlotsheni obuhle naye. Ungahlekisi ngemfundiso yokuhlushwa phakade; kunalokho khu-
luma nezilaleli ngemfudumalo, uzisize zibone izimfundiso ezicacile zeBhayibheli
OKUSENZA SIKHATHAZEKE NGESIHOGO (3 imiz.)
Lokho esikukholelwayo ngesihogo kuthinta indlela esimbheka ngayo uNkulunkulu nobuhlobo bethu naye
Kuyathakazelisa ukuthi ngo-1999, uPapa John Paul II wathi igama elithi “isihogo” alisho indawo, kodwa “isi-
mo salabo abazihlukanisa ngamabomu nangokuphelele noNkulunkulu” (g00-ZU 3/8 29)
Noma kunjalo, abaningi ngaphakathi nangaphandle kweLobukholwa bakholelwa ukuthi isihogo siyindawo
lapho ababi bejeziswa khona phakade, futhi abanye bathi siyindawo lapho behlushwa khona ngomlilo
(rs-ZU 135)
Labo abavumelana naleyo nkolelo bangase bakhonze uNkulunkulu ngoba bemesaba ngendlela ekhwanta-
balisayo hhayi ngoba bemthanda (1Jo 4:18, 19)
Leyo nkolelo ingase isilimaze kakhulu isifiso sethu sokusondela kuNkulunkulu (Jak 4:8)
Ukuze sithole iqiniso ngesihogo, kudingeka siphendule le mibuzo elandelayo:
Siyini isimo sabafileyo?
Siyini isihogo, futhi kungani kunokudideka okungaka ngaso?
Banaliphi ithemba labo abasesihogweni?
SIYINI ISIMO SABAFILEYO? (5 imiz.)
AmaHebheru asendulo ayengakholelwa ukuthi umuntu uyezwa lapho esefile
Kunalokho, ayekholelwa ukuthi ukufa kuwukuphela kwayo yonke imisebenzi yokuphila (IHu 146:4; Shu 9:5,
10; rs-ZU 274)
Lapho u-Adamu ona, akajeziswanga phakade, kodwa wabuyela esimweni sokungabi khona (Gen 2:17; 3:19)
Lapho umuntu efa, awukho umphefumulo ohlukana nenyama uye ezweni elithile labafileyo
Kunalokho, iBhayibheli lifundisa ukuthi umphefumulo, noma umuntu, uyafa (Is 53:12; Hez 18:4)
SIYINI ISIHOGO? (5 imiz.)
Ezinguqulweni eziningi zeBhayibheli, elithi “isihogo” lisetshenziselwe ukuhumusha igama lesiHebheru elithi
Sheol nelesiGreki elithi Hades (it-1 1086; it-2 922)
I-Compendious Hebrew Lexicon ithi iShiyoli “indawo evamile yabafileyo” (it-2 922)
Ngakho-ke, isihogo yithuna lesintu elivamile, hhayi indawo yokuhlupha abantu ngomlilo (it-1 1016)
Ngenxa yokuthi u-Adamu wona, inzalo yakhe yesikhathi esizayo yayizokuya esihogweni okukhulunywa ngaso
eBhayibhelini, ithuna elivamile, lapho kungekho kuphila nakwazi khona (Rom 5:12)
Njengoba isihogo simane nje siyithuna, uma ababi nabalungileyo befa, baya khona (Gen 37:35; Job 14:13; IzE
2:25-27)
KUNGANI KUNOKUDIDEKA OKUNGAKA NGESIHOGO? (17 imiz.)
Amaqaba angaphambi kobuKristu asungula imfundiso yokuhlushwa ngemva kokufa (rs-ZU 141)
Ubufakazi bokuqala benkolelo yesihogo somlilo itholakala enkolweni yaseGibhithe lasendulo
Izinkolelo zaseBhabhiloni nase-Asiriya lasendulo zibonisa ukuthi indawo yabafileyo yasenganekwaneni iye-
thusa kakhulu
 ́
UbuBuddha, obaqala le emuva ekhulwini lesithupha B.C.E., bufundisa ukuthi kunesihogo esishisayo nesiba-
ndayo
IBhayibheli alikhulumi yini ‘ngeGehena lomlilo’? (Mat 5:22; rs-ZU 139)
ImiBhalo YamaKristu YesiGreki ikhuluma ngeGehena izikhathi ezingu-12, futhi leli gama ngokuvamile lihlo-
tshaniswa nomlilo
Ngokwesibonelo, uJesu wakhuluma ngokuphonswa ‘komzimba wonke’ womuntu eGehena (Mat 5:29, 30)
Wayala nabalandeli bakhe ukuba ‘besabe lowo ongabhubhisa kokubili umphefumulo nomzimba eGehena’
(Mat 10:28)
IsiGodi SikaHinomu (iGehena) sasingaphandle kwezindonga zeJerusalema futhi sasiyindawo yokukhulekelwa
kwezithombe okunyanyekayo, kuhlanganise nokunikela ngabantwana
Ekhulwini lokuqala C.E., iGehena lase lisetshenziswa njengendawo yokushisa izibi yaseJerusalema, ngisho
nezidumbu zezilwane kanye nezezigebengu ezazibulewe zaziphonswa khona
Njengoba abantu abaphilayo babengalahlwa lapho, iGehena aliyona-ke indawo yokuhlupha abantu ngo-
mlilo, kodwa likufanekisela kahle ukubhujiswa kwaphakade
No. 128-ZU
8/00IBhayibheli alikhulumi yini ngokuhlushwa “ngomlilo nesibabule”? (IsA 14:9-11; 20:10)
Njengoba abafileyo bengezwa lutho, kumelwe ukuba lokhu kungumfanekiso
EBhayibhelini, elithi ‘ukuhlupha’ lingasho ukudalulwa okubangela amahloni (IsA 11:10; rs-ZU 138-9)
Abanye badidwa umfanekiso kaJesu wendoda ecebile ‘eyayisezinhlungwini’ lapho iseHayidesi (“isesihogweni,”
KJ) (Luk 16:23)
Ingabe lokhu kulandisa kwenzeka ngokoqobo, noma kungumfanekiso wokuthile?
Embhalweni waphansi, i-Jerusalem Bible iyavuma ukuthi ‘kuyindaba engokomfanekiso engakhulumi ngo-
muntu othile owaziwayo emlandweni’ (rs-ZU 140)
Lo mfanekiso umelelani? (rs-ZU 141)
Indoda ecebile imelela abaFarisi (Luk 16:14, 22)
ULazaru umelela amaJuda avamile aphenduka futhi alandela uJesu (Mat 21:28-32)
Ukufa kufanekisela ukushintsha kwezimo (Luk 16:16)
Ababekade bedelelwa ngaphambili bathola umusa kaNkulunkulu
Ababebonakala besemseni benqatshwa nguNkulunkulu futhi bahlushwa yimiyalezo yokwahlulela eyayi-
lethwa yilabo ababekade bebadelela ngaphambili (IzE 5:33; 7:54)
Abahumushi beBhayibheli baye bavumela ukuba lokho abakukholelwayo kuthonye umsebenzi wabo kunokuba
bahumushe elithi Shiyoli nelithi iHayidesi ngendlela engaguquguquki (rs-ZU 137; it-1 1086-7)
Imvelaphi yangempela yemfundiso yesihogo somlilo ehlambalaza uNkulunkulu ijule kakhulu kunemibono yaba-
ntu (rs-ZU 141)
USathane uDeveli, lowo uJesu ambiza ngokuthi ‘uyise wamanga,’ unohlelo lokunyundela uNkulunkulu wo-
thando, amveze njengomuntu ononya nophindiselayo (Joh 8:44)
BANALIPHI ITHEMBA LABO ABASESIHOGWENI? (12 imiz.)
Imfundiso yokuhlushwa phakade ayivumelani neze nobuntu bukaNkulunkulu (Jer 7:31; rs-ZU 140)
Ukufa kuyisijeziso sesono (Rom 6:23)
Njengoba ukufa kukhulula umuntu esonweni, uNkulunkulu ubeyobe akabonisi bulungisa uma enezela uku-
hlushwa phakade (Dut 32:4; Rom 6:7)
UNkulunkulu uyokwahlulela isintu ovivinyweni lokugcina ngemva kokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane
kukaJesu Kristu (IsA 20:7-9, 12, 13; rs-ZU 413)
UJehova, uNkulunkulu wothando, uyoqeda bonke omaye besikhathi esidlule (Heb 2:14; rs-ZU 287; dg-ZU 27-8)
Abasesihogweni bayokhululwa; kanjalo kubhujiswe ukufa okwazuzwa ku-Adamu, neShiyoli (iHayidesi) (IsA 20:
13-15; it-2 923)
Ukuvuselwa emhlabeni kwalabo abasethuneni elivamile lesintu kuyobavulela ithuba lokuthola izinzuzo eze-
laphayo zokubusa kukaKristu
Bayofundiswa iqiniso futhi banikwe ithuba lokuphila phakade ePharadesi (Luk 23:43; IzE 24:15)
Umhlaba uyoba ipharadesi, njengoba kwakuhlosiwe ekuqaleni (Gen 1:28; rs-ZU 116-7)
USathane, amademoni akhe, nabo bonke abahlubuka ngamabomu bayobhujiswa phakade (IsA 20:7-10)
KUMELWE SENZENI? (3 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uye wavumela abantu ukuba bazibonele ngokwabo ukuthi unguNkulunkulu wothando hhayi ohlu-
phayo (jv-ZU 10-12)
UJehova usinike ilungelo lokuba oFakazi bakhe
Labo abaye bagqilazwa yimfundiso yokuhlushwa ngemva kokufa kufanele basondele kuNkulunkulu futhi bala-
ndele iNdodana yakhe (Mat 28:19, 20)
Ngaleyo ndlela, bangase bakhululwe ekwesabeni imfundiso yokwedelela uNkulunkulu yokuthi uJehova uhlu-
pha abantu abafileyo, abakhululiwe ezonweni zabo ngenxa yokufa
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 128-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UZIQU-ZINTATHU UYIMFUNDISO ESEKELWE EMIBHALWENI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa lokho imiBhalo ekwembulayo ngoJehova, uJesu, nomoya ongcwele. Ungabagconi abakholelwa kuZiqu-zi-
ntathu. Shukumisa ukucabanga kwabo nothando lwabo ngeqiniso
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UMUNTU AHLOLE IMFUNDISO KAZIQU-ZINTATHU (6 imiz.)
Indaba kaZiqu-zintathu sekuyisikhathi eside kuphikiswana ngayo; abayisekelayo bathi isekelwe eBhayibhelini,
abayiphikisayo bathi cha
Le mfundiso ithi kunabantu abathathu basezulwini—uBaba, iNdodana, noMoya Ongcwele
Ngamunye kuthiwa uphila phakade, ungumninimandla onke, unguNkulunkulu, kodwa bebonke banguNku-
lunkulu oyedwa (w91-ZU 11/1 21; rs-ZU 416)
Le mfundiso iwumgogodla wezinkolo eziningi zeLobukholwa (w91-ZU 11/1 19)
Ezinye izinkolo ezingezona ezobuKristu zifundisa imfundiso efanayo (sh-ZU 115)
Esikhathini esidlule, abantu babebulawa nokubulawa uma bephika imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu (w87-ZU
6/15 4; w84-ZU 7/15 3 [w84 2/1 3])
Kubalulekile ukuba sazi ukuthi le mfundiso isekelwe emBhalweni yini noma cha
UNkulunkulu ufuna ukukhulekelwa ngeqiniso (Funda uJohane 4:24)
Kudingeka sazi ukuthi imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu iyahlangabezana yini nale mfuneko
Lokhu singakuthola ngokuqhathanisa le mfundiso neZwi likaNkulunkulu eliyiqiniso (Funda uJohane
17:17)
IBhayibheli lembula iqiniso ngoNkulunkulu, ngoJesu, nangomoya ongcwele
UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU KUPHELA ONGUMNINIMANDLA ONKE (12 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lithi uNkulunkulu ungumninimandla onke futhi unegama (Gen 17:1; Eks 18:11; Is 42:8; IsA 16:7)
Akekho omunye eBhayibhelini obizwa ngokuthi unguMninimandla onke ngaphandle kukaJehova (it-1 970)
Njengoba enguMdali wazo zonke izinto, uJehova akadalwanga, akanasiqalo (IsA 4:11; 10:6; it-2 13)
IBhayibheli limchaza ngokuthi “ukhona nini nanini” (IHu 90:2; 93:2)
UJehova kuphela ongenasiqalo nasiphetho (IHu 90:2; 1Ti 1:17)
Yomibili imiBhalo, eyesiHebheru neyesiGreki ithi uNkulunkulu munye, uMuntu oyedwa kuphela (g79-ZU 5/22
23-4 [g78 11/22 28])
“Akekho omunye ngaphandle kwakhe” (Dut 4:35; Is 45:5; ti-ZU 13; it-2 511)
Ngisho nangemva kokwenyukela kukaJesu ezulwini, abaphostoli baqhubeka bemchaza ngendlela efanayo
(1Ko 8:4-6; 1Pe 1:3; 1Jo 2:1)
Ngakho-ke, uL. L. Paine, uprofesa womlando wenkolo, uyaphawula: ‘ITestamente Elidala likhuluma ngo-
Nkulunkulu oyedwa kuphela. UNkulunkulu ungumuntu oyedwa ohlukile. Umqondo wokuthi uziqu-zinta-
thu uyatholakala kulo . . . awunasisekelo nakancane. . . . Alikho igebe phakathi kweTestamente Elidala
neLisha. Isiko lokukholelwa kuNkulunkulu oyedwa liqhutshekiselwa phambili.’ (ti-ZU 12-13)
Lokho iBhayibheli elikushoyo ngoNkulunkulu—ukuthi nguye yedwa ongumninimandla onke, ukuthi nguye ye-
dwa ongenasiqalo, nokuthi unguNkulunkulu oyedwa—kuyangqubuzana nemfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu
UJESU—WAPHAKANYISWA KODWA ABALINGANI (12 imiz.)
UJesu unesikhundla esiphakeme (Flp 2:9-11)
Uchazwa ngokuthi “uNkulunkulu Onamandla” kodwa akulokothwa kuthiwe unguMninimandla onke (Is 9:6)
Kuyo yonke imiBhalo YesiGreki, uJesu kuthiwa uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu kodwa aliphathwa elokuthi ungu-
Nkulunkulu iNdodana (w88-ZU 6/1 11-12)
UNkulunkulu ngokwakhe wakufakazela ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana yaKhe (Mar 1:11; Luk 9:35)
UJesu naye wathi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu (Joh 3:16, 18; 10:36)
Abanye nabo bafakazela okufanayo (Mat 14:33; 27:54; Joh 1:34)
UJesu wabiza uYise ngokuthi ‘uwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso’ (Joh 17:3)
UJesu waphila ngaphambi kokuba abe ngumuntu, kodwa ‘unesiqalo’ (Mik 5:2; Joh 3:13; w98-ZU 6/15 24; it-2 52)
‘Wayeyisiqalo sendalo’ kaNkulunkulu (IsA 3:14; ti-ZU 14)
Ubizwa ngokuthi “izibulo” nangokuthi “iNdodana ezelwe yodwa” (Kol 1:15, 16; 1Jo 4:9; ti-ZU 15-16; rs-ZU
419)
Ngokungafani noYise, ‘ongafi,’ uJesu wabulawa (Hab 1:12)
UJesu wathi: “Mina noBaba simunye” (Joh 10:30)
Bamunye ngomqondo wokuthi banenjongo efanayo futhi benza izinto ngobunye (Joh 17:20-23; ti-ZU 24; rs-ZU
436)
Njengoba nje amaKristu engakaJesu, naye ungokaNkulunkulu (1Ko 3:23)
No. 129-ZU
8/00UYise neNdodana abanaso isikhundla esilinganayo sobuNkulunkulu (Joh 14:28; 1Ko 11:3)
Lapho ebona amazulu embonweni, uStefanu akabonanga uJesu eyingxenye kaNkulunkulu onguZiqu-zinta-
thu, kodwa wambona “engakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu” (IzE 7:55, 56)
Wabona abantu ababili abahlukene (w88-ZU 6/1 14)
Ngaleyo ndlela, uJesu akayona ingxenye kaNkulunkulu oyedwa (1Ko 8:6)
Imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu iyangqubuzana nalokho imiBhalo ekufundisayo ngoJesu—ukuthi akayena umnini-
mandla onke, ukuthi waba nesiqalo, nokuthi akahlangene noJehova uNkulunkulu
UMOYA ONGCWELE UNGAMANDLA, HHAYI UMUNTU (8 imiz.)
Akukho ndawo eBhayibhelini lapho umoya ongcwele uchazwa khona njengomuntu
Embonweni, uDaniyeli ubona uBaba, iNdodana, izingelosi, kodwa akawuboni umoya ongcwele ongumuntu
(Dan 7:9, 10, 13; w87-ZU 6/15 5)
UStefanu wabona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu noKristu ovusiwe, kodwa akushiwo lutho ngomoya ongcwele
(IzE 7:55; w88-ZU 6/1 14)
Umphostoli uJohane uchaza umbono wasezulwini obonisa uJehova noJesu njengabantu, kodwa hhayi umoya
ongcwele njengomuntu (IsA 4:2; 5:5, 6; re-ZU 76, 83-5; w87-ZU 6/15 5)
Umoya ongcwele awunagama (w91-ZU 1/15 4)
ImiBhalo ibala umoya ongcwele kanye nezinye izinto ezingaphili (IzE 6:5; 2Ko 6:4-6; w91-ZU 1/15 4)
IBhayibheli lichaza umoya ongcwele njengamandla kaNkulunkulu asebenzayo
UJesu wathola umoya ongcwele lapho ebhapathizwa (Mar 1:10)
Kwakuwumoya kaJehova namandla akhe asiza uJesu ukuba aphulukise ngokuyisimangaliso, avuse abafi-
leyo futhi alawule amandla emvelo (Luk 5:17; 8:22-25, 49-56; g99-ZU 1/8 27; it-1 1056; it-2 1020)
Umoya ongcwele ubizwa ngokuthi ‘umunwe kaNkulunkulu’ ngoba uyithuluzi likaNkulunkulu lokufeza inta-
ndo yakhe (Eks 31:18; qhathanisa uMathewu 12:28 noLuka 11:20) (w87-ZU 6/15 5; si-ZU 10; it-1 832)
Ungamandla asebenzayo uNkulunkulu awasebenzisela izinjongo ezihlukahlukene (IHu 33:6; 143:10; Is 30:27,
28; 2Pe 1:20, 21)
Imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu iyangqubuzana nalokho imiBhalo ekwembulayo ngomoya ongcwele
AMAVESI AMANINGI EBHAYIBHELI AYAYILAHLA IMFUNDISO KAZIQU-ZINTATHU (4 imiz.)
Ekhuluma ngosuku nehora losizi olukhulu kuMarku 13:32, uJesu wathi “akekho owaziyo, . . . ngaphandle kuka-
Baba”
UBaba neNdodana abanakulingana, ngoba iNdodana ayikwazi konke okwaziwa nguYise
Nakuba abakholelwa kuZiqu-zintathu bethi isizathu sokulinganiselwa kolwazi lweNdodana ukuthi yayingu-
muntu, abakwazi ukuchaza ukuthi kungani umoya ongcwele nawo ungazi
KuLuka 10:22, uJesu wathi: “Ukuthi iNdodana ingubani akekho owaziyo ngaphandle kukaBaba; nokuthi uBaba
ungubani, akekho owaziyo ngaphandle kweNdodana”
Njengoba nje umoya ongcwele ungeyena umuntu, awazi
Ukuthi imfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu yadluliselwa isuka ezizukulwaneni ezingaphambili, nakuba kungafundiswa
emiBhalweni, kuphikisana namazwi kaPawulu (Funda eyabaseGalathiya 1:8)
Kusobala-ke ukuthi iBhayibheli liphikisana nazo zonke izici zemfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu
IZIBUSISO ZAPHAKADE ZILINDELE LABO ABAKHULEKELA UNKULUNKULU NGEQINISO (3 imiz.)
Kufanele sizonde amanga futhi sithande iqiniso (IHu 119:163)
Ngakho-ke, yenqaba imfundiso engamanga kaZiqu-zintathu, wamukele iqiniso lokuthi uJehova unguNkulu-
nkulu oyedwa kuphela (IHu 86:11)
NgeZwi lakhe, uJehova, “uMfundisi [wethu] Omkhulu,” usibonisa indlela yeqiniso (“nansi indlela”) yokumkhule-
kela (Is 30:20, 21)
Ngokunezela ukuthi “hambani ngayo,” usinxusa ukuba sithathe isinyathelo
Ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu ngokulandela lo myalo, simkhonze ngeqiniso, kuholela ezibusisweni za-
phakade (1Jo 2:17)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 129-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UMHLABA UYOHLALA PHAKADE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zazise kokubili isipho sikaNkulunkulu esiwumhlaba nokungaguquki kwenjongo yakhe yoku-
ba umkhaya wesintu ophelele uhlale kuwo phakade. Gcizelela ukuthi kuseduze ukuba leyo njongo igcwaliseke,
ubonise ukuthi abaningi abaphilayo manje bangahlanganyela ekuguquleni umhlaba ube ikhaya eliyiPharadesi eli-
yohlala phakade, kube udumo kuJehova
UMHLABA—UYISIPHO ESIHLE UNKULUNKULU ASINIKA ISINTU (5 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu wadala umhlaba futhi wathi ‘muhle kakhulu’ (Gen 1:1, 31)
UNkulunkulu wanika isintu umhlaba njengekhaya laso laphakade (IHu 115:16)
 ́
Umhlaba uklanywe waphelela futhi uklanyelwe ngokuqondile ukuba uhlalwe ngabantu (Is 45:18; g95-ZU 4/22
28; ce 130-1)
Izazi zesayensi ziye zashukumiseleka ukuba zibabaze ukuklanywa okuhle kangaka kwalesi sipho, futhi osom-
khathi baye bachaza lesi sipho esiyingqayizivele ‘njengetshe eliyigugu elisemkhathini’ (g95-ZU 11/22 8-10; ce
129)
SAZI KANJANI UKUTHI UMHLABA UYOBA IKHAYA LETHU LAPHAKADE? (7 imiz.)
Umhlaba “umi kuze kube nini nanini,” okusho ukuthi kuze kube phakade (Shu 1:4)
Uyoba ikhaya elingenaso isici, ikhaya laphakade, elikwazi ukugcina abantu, izilwane nezinye izinto eziphilayo
Uklanyelwe ukuhlala phakade, unemijikelezo eyinkimbinkimbi nezinqubo ukuphila okuxhomeke kuzo (ce
140-1)
‘Isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu semini nobusuku’ ngandlela-thile siwubufakazi bokuthi umhlaba wethu uyohla-
la phakade (Jer 33:20, 25, 26; Gen 1:14-19)
Akakaze ayilahle injongo yakhe yokuqala ngo-Adamu no-Eva (Gen 1:27, 28; Is 55:11; rs-ZU 368; it-1 667-8)
INGABE UMHLABA WONAKELE NGENDLELA ENGENAKULUNGISEKA? INGABE UYOSHISWA? (14 imiz.)
Ezizweni zonke kuye kwakhishwa isixwayiso ngokoniwa kwemvelo emhlabeni wonke (g97-ZU 1/8 3-4; w91-ZU
4/1 6-7)
Ukungcola neminye imiphumela yobugovu kusongela amandla omhlaba okulondoloza ukuphila (g95-ZU 10/8
31; g93-ZU 10/22 11; g93-ZU 11/8 28)
Ukwanda kwabantu okungalawuleki nesidingo esandayo sezinto ezidingwa umphakathi kwandise izinkinga
(g88-ZU 5/8 5-6)
Ukoniwa kwemvelo ngenxa yokuphathwa kabi komhlaba kusengalungiseka
Izimiso zomhlaba zokusebenzelana kwezinto zemvelo zinamandla amakhulu okuzivuselela (w98-ZU 6/15 5)
UJehova waklama umhlaba unamandla okuzihlanza nokuzivuselela (g90-ZU 5/8 10-11)
Ukonakaliswa komhlaba kwembula isimo esibucayi ngokomoya esijule kakhulu—ukungakhathali kwabantu
ngenzalo yabo nangenjongo yoMdali (Dut 32:5; Shu 7:29; g93-ZU 1/22 9; g88-ZU 5/8 7-8)
UNkulunkulu ‘uyochitha abachitha umhlaba’ (IsA 11:18)
Lo mhlaba oklanywe kahle kangaka awusoze wabhujiswa, ushiswe noma wenziwe ungakwazi ukuhlalisa abantu
(IHu 93:1; Is 66:1; Mat 5:35)
Lokho bekuyoba okungenangqondo futhi bekuyophikisana nenjongo kaNkulunkulu embuliwe (IHu 37:29; Jer
27:5)
UJehova akaxabene nomhlaba, kodwa uxabene nalabo abawuchithayo, abazobhujiswa ngokushesha (IHu
37:9; g93-ZU 1/22 10-11)
Ngokuvamile inkulumo yeBhayibheli enjengokuthi izulu nomhlaba ‘kubekelwe umlilo,’ nokuthi umhlaba ‘uyo-
kusha,’ iqondwa kabi njengebonisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyobhubhisa umhlaba (2Pe 3:7, 10, KJ; g97-ZU 1/8
27; rs-ZU 365-8)
Le nkulumo ingokomfanekiso, ikhomba ekubhujisweni komphakathi wesintu esingamhloniphi uNkulunku-
lu emhlabeni, njengoba kwenzeka ngoZamcolo wosuku lukaNowa (Gen 6:5-7; 2Pe 3:5-7)
UNkulunkulu uzosindisa umhlaba ekuchithweni ngabantu ngokubhubhisa lesi simiso sezinto esibi nango-
kuvalela uSathane kwalasha (IsA 16:14, 16; 20:1, 2; rs-ZU 204)
Kuyajabulisa ukuthi kuyoba nabalungileyo abayosinda, abayokwakha isisekelo somkhaya ‘womhlaba omusha’
(2Pe 3:13; IzA 2:21, 22)
UKUBUYISELWA KOMHLABA OYIPHARADESI KUYOKWENZEKA NAKANJANI (12 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu unamandla okwenza izinguquko ezidingekayo, futhi lokho uzokwenza maduzane (Rom 16:20; IsA
21:1-3)
UJehova akadingi ukushintsha injongo yakhe yasekuqaleni, ngokungafani nabantu abantekenteke nabangaphe-
lele, ukuphila kwabo okuthonywa “isikhathi nesenzakalo esingalindelekile” (Shu 9:11; Is 14:24; Mal 3:6)
Nakuba injongo yakhe yaphazamiseka okwesikhashana, iyophumelela nakanjani (w98-ZU 6/15 8)
UNkulunkulu uyoqala ngokubhekana noSathane uDeveli, ongumcekeli phansi omkhulu womhlaba nomngcolisi
wawo (IsA 20:1-3; g88-ZU 5/8 9)
No. 130-ZU
8/00Lapho ithonya likaSathane lingasekho, kuyoqala inkathi entsha ekhazimulayo kwabasindile, abayoba nomse-
benzi ojabulisayo wokuguqula umhlaba ube ikhaya eliyipharadesi elihle (dg-ZU 22-3)
Ububi nokuhlupheka kuyoba izinto esezadlula (IHu 145:16; IsA 21:5; kl-ZU 6-11; pr-ZU 29-30)
Izinkulungwane ezingaziwa—ezisinde e-Armagedoni, abavusiwe nezingane eziyozalwa—ziyozuza ifa lomhlaba
ohlanziwe (Mat 5:5; Joh 5:28, 29; g87-ZU 8/8 30 [g87 7/22 9])
Ngenxa yesihlengo sikaJesu, bonke bayobheka phambili ethembeni elimangalisayo lokungaphinde bafe (Joh
11:25, 26; kl-ZU 68-9)
UKristu nababusi akanye nabo abangu-144 000 ezulwini, bayoqiniseka ukuthi umthandazo wokuba intando
kaNkulunkulu ‘yenzeke emhlabeni’ uyafezeka (Mat 6:10)
Akungabazeki ukuthi umhlaba uyohlala phakade, futhi uyohlalwa abantu abalalelayo njengoba kwakugunyazwe
uJehova ngokwaphezulu (w84-ZU 8/1 4 [w84 2/15 4])
ISENABELO SEZINYAWO ZIKANKULUNKULU SASEMHLABENI SIYOHLALA PHAKADE—NAWE UNGA-
HLALA PHAKADE (7 imiz.)
UJehova unguMfezi Wezinjongo ongalenzi iphutha; noma yini ayishoyo ‘ngokuqinisekile iyokwenzeka futhi iphu-
melele’ (Is 55:10, 11)
Ukuhlubuka kuka-Adamu no-Eva akuzange kuyishafise injongo kaNkulunkulu yokuba nomhlaba onabantu
noyipharadesi; uyoyifeza ngaphandle kwabo (Gen 1:28; Num 23:19)
Phakathi nokuBusa kukaKristu okusondelayo kweMinyaka Eyinkulungwane, izimo ze-Edene ziyosibekela wo-
nke umhlaba, oyogcwaliswa izizukulwane ezilalelayo nezijabulayo zombhangqwana wokuqala wabantu
Umhlaba uyoba iplanethi ehlukile kuwo wonke amanye amaplanethi kuze kube phakade (ws-ZU 184 isig. 10)
Manje, uNkulunkulu uqoqa abantu abathanda ukuthula emhlabeni wonke abafake ebuzalwaneni bezizwe zonke,
isisekelo somphakathi omusha wasemhlabeni, oyohlala phakade (w98-ZU 4/15 19; dg-ZU 28-31)
OFakazi BakaJehova bayakujabulela ukukusiza ufunde ukwenza lokho okudingekayo ukuze ube yingxenye
yalo mphakathi (Joh 17:3; 1Jo 2:15-17)
Iplanethi yethu enhle ewuMhlaba ayiyi ndawo
Iyohlala phakade—nawe ungahlala phakade!
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 130-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UKHONA NGEMPELA UDEVELI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ngokubonisana nezilaleli nokusebenzisa iBhayibheli, zisize ukuba ziqonde ukuthi uDeveli ungokoqobo. Gcizelela
indlela esingazivikela ngayo emacebweni akhe futhi ubonise izinzuzo zokwenza kanjalo
IMIBONO ABANTU ABANAYO NGODEVELI (5 imiz.)
Abaningi namuhla bakholelwa ukuthi uDeveli ‘umane uyinunu eyesabekayo ecatshangwa umntwana’ (g90-ZU
1/8 12-13)
Umbono ovamile uveza uDeveli njengonezimpondo nomsila futhi ephethe imfologo
Ezinye izazi zenkolo zanamuhla zibheka uDeveli njengento esuselwa enganekwaneni, umfanekiso wobubi obe-
nziwe samuntu (w92-ZU 12/1 32)
Abantu abaphika ukuba khona kukaNkulunkulu bayakuphika futhi nokuthi uDeveli ukhona (IHu 10:4; 14:1)
AmaKristu akholelwa ukuthi uDeveli ungumuntu womoya, olawula izwe lonke (1Jo 5:19)
INDLELA ESAZI NGAYO UKUTHI UDEVELI UKHONA NGEMPELA (10 imiz.)
IBhayibheli alimvezi uDeveli njengobubi obenziwe samuntu, kodwa limveza njengomuntu omubi okhona nge-
mpela (rs-ZU 400-6)
IBhayibheli liwumthombo oyinhloko wobufakazi bokuthi uDeveli ukhona
Lisebenzisa igama elithi “Sathane” izikhathi ezingu-52 nelithi “Develi” izikhathi ezingu-33
UJobe isahluko 1 no-2 ulandisa ngokuphikisana phakathi kukaJehova noDeveli
UJesu wakhuluma ngoDeveli ngokuphindaphindiwe (Mat 25:41; Luk 22:31)
Ukulingwa kukaJesu kuyabonisa ukuthi uDeveli ukhona ngempela (Mat 4:1-11; w88-ZU 9/1 13-14)
Abaphostoli bakaKristu bachaza uDeveli njengomuntu (Efe 6:11; 1Pe 5:8; IsA 2:10)
ImiBhalo ichaza imvelaphi namaqhinga kaDeveli (rs-ZU 402)
UDeveli wadalwa ephelele; wavukela ngoba efuna amandla okubusa abanye (dg-ZU 13-14)
`
Umbhali wemidlalo yeshashalazi u-Eugene Ionesco wathi: “Umlando ubungenakuqondakala uma kwakungadi-
ngeka siyikhiphe indima yamademoni”
IZINDLELA UDEVELI ASEBENZA NGAZO (13 imiz.)
Asibona abangawazi amaqhinga kaDeveli (2Ko 2:11)
USathane uheha isifiso senyama, isifiso samehlo nokuzigabisa ngezinto zokuziphilisa (Funda eyoku-1 Johane 2:16)
Isifiso senyama singaholela umuntu ekuziphatheni okubi
Ama-Israyeli anxenxelwa ekufebeni nabesifazane bakwaMowabi (Num 25:1-3; 1Ko 10:8, 11; it-2 419)
Isifiso samehlo nokuzigabisa ngezinto zokuziphilisa kungabangela ukuba abantu babe izigqila zokuphishekela
izinto ezibonakalayo (w86-ZU 5/1 11-12)
Ukugembula, ubudakwa, ukuluthwa ugwayi nezidakamizwa kuyingxenye yamaqhinga kaDeveli acashile
(rq-ZU 20-1)
I-TV, ama-video, amabhayisikobho, umculo ne-Internet kungafeza izinjongo zikaSathane
Inkolo yamanga iwugibe lukaDeveli (2Ko 4:4; 11:14)
Ukujatshuliswa imilingo, ukucabanga kokuzibusa nokwesaba abantu konke kuyingxenye ‘yamaqhinga’ kaDeve-
li (Efe 6:11, umbhalo waphansi we-Ref. Bi.)
INDLELA ESINGAMELANA NGAYO NODEVELI FUTHI SIHLALE SITHEMBEKILE KUNKULUNKULU
(12 imiz.)
Isihluthulelo sokumelana ngokuphumelelayo noDeveli sitholakala eselulekweni sikaJakobe esikabili (Funda uJa-
kobe 4:7, 8)
Ukuze ‘simelane noDeveli,’ kufanele ‘sizonde okubi’ (IHu 97:10)
Zonda lokho okungase kubonakale kujabulisa ngokuthi ucabange ngemiphumela yako
Ukunganaki nokuba manqikanqika kungaba yingozi
Ukuze simelane noDeveli, kufanele siphaphame, siqaphe
‘Sondela kuNkulunkulu’ ngomthandazo, ukulalela nokholo (w97-ZU 11/15 20)
Kumelwe simelane noDeveli futhi sime ‘siqinile okholweni’ (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 5:8, 9)
Lokhu kudinga ukuba sizihlole ukuze sibone ukuthi asinabo yini ubuthakathaka uDeveli angase abusebenzi-
se (w88-ZU 9/1 15-18)
Lawula lokho okuvumela ukuba kungene ekhaya nge-TV nangama-video (Efe 4:27)
Gqoka “isambatho sokuzivikela esivela kuNkulunkulu” (Efe 6:11)
Sihlanganisa ukholo, ukulunga, ukuthula nekhono lokusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu ngendlela ewusizo
Hlela isikhathi sokufunda iBhayibheli nsuku zonke nokuzindla (IHu 1:1, 2)
Yenza umthandazo ube ingxenye yasikhathi sonke yokuphila kwakho (1Pe 3:12; 1Jo 5:14)
No. 131-ZU
3/02Funda izincwadi zamuva zesigaba senceku ethembekile
Yiba khona futhi uhlanganyele emihlanganweni yebandla (Heb 10:23-25)
Hlanganyela ngokunenjongo enkonzweni yasensimini (Mat 24:14)
Siza abanye ukuba bazi izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu zezwe elisha, elingeke libe nethonya lamademoni
Fundisa abantu indlela yokuzivikela manje nendlela yokugwema izingibe eziningi zikaDeveli (2Ko 2:11)
SIYOTHOLA IZIBUSISO UMA SIMELANA NODEVELI (5 imiz.)
Ukumelana noDeveli kuphumela ekuqinisweni kobuzalwane bobuKristu (1Pe 5:9)
Ukwazi ukuthi uDeveli ufuna ukuqeda ubunye babantu bakaNkulunkulu kufanele kuqinise ukuzimisela kwe-
thu ukuba simkhonze ngokwethembeka
Ukuphila ukuphila kokwesaba uNkulunkulu kuletha ukuthula kwengqondo nenjabulo (Flp 4:6, 7)
Futhi kwenza samukeleke kuJehova (IzA 27:11)
Singaba phakathi kwalabo abayosinda “osizini olukhulu” (IsA 7:14)
Sijabulela ithemba lokuphila phakade ezweni elisha lokulunga sibone ukugcwaliseka okukhulu kwenjongo ka-
Nkulunkulu (IsA 21:3, 4)

No. 131-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UVUKO—UKUNQOBA UKUFA!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yakha ukwazisa ngelungiselelo likaJehova lovuko. Gcizelela ukuba ngokoqobo kwethemba lovuko nendlela oku-
fanele lisishukumisele ngayo emisebenzini emihle
OKWENZA KUDINGEKE UKUBA UKUFA KUNQOTSHWE (5 imiz.)
Inkolo ibilokhu iveza ukufa njengomngane, indlela yokudlulela kwesinye isigaba ezigabeni zokuphila
IBhayibheli liveza ukufa njengesitha—‘isitha sokugcina’ (1Ko 15:26)
Ngokuvamile ukufa kunqamula ukuphila kwabesilisa nabesifazane beseyizingqabavu
Ukufa kuletha ubuhlungu, ukushaqeka, usizi, isizungu, ukudideka nomuzwa wokulahlekelwa kubangane nom-
khaya oshonelwe
Ukufa “kungukuphela kwabantu bonke,” okugcina ngokugwinya wonke umuntu (Shu 7:1, 2)
Naphezu kwemizamo yesayensi yokulwisana nakho, ‘ukufa kubusa njengenkosi’ phezu kwesintu (Rom 5:17)
Isintu sikudinga kakhulu ukukunqoba ukufa
INGABE KUNGANQOTSHWA UKUFA? (15 imiz.)
Ukuze siphendule lowo mbuzo, kufanele siqale sisazi lesi sitha, ukufa
Izinganekwane nezinkolelo-ze ngokuphathelene nokufa ziye zagqilaza izigidi zabantu (Heb 2:15)
IBhayibheli lithi ukufa kumane nje kuyisimo esiphambene nokuphila, lithi abafileyo abazi lutho (IHu 146:4; Shu
9:5, 10)
Ngaleyo ndlela ukufa kufaniswa nokulala (IHu 13:3; Joh 11:11-14)
Awukho umphefumulo “ongafi” osindayo lapho umuntu efa (Hez 18:4)
Umuntu akanawo umphefumulo, ungumphefumulo! (Gen 2:7)
Lapho umuntu efa, kufa yena njengomphefumulo, noma umuntu
IBhayibheli lembula imbangela eyinhloko yokufa
Umuntu wayengadalelwanga ukuba afe; u-Adamu wayenikwe ithemba lokuphila phakade (Gen 2:15-17; 3:22)
Ukufa kweza ngenxa yokungalaleli kuka-Adamu futhi kwenabela kulo lonke uzalo lwakhe (Gen 3:1-6, 19; Rom
5:12)
Isimo sethu asisona esingenathemba
UNkulunkulu uthembisa ‘ukuhlenga’ isintu ekufeni, ‘ukugwinya ukufa’ (Hos 13:14; Is 25:8)
Luyini uvuko?
Igama lesiGreki elihunyushwe ngokuthi “uvuko” ngokwezwi nezwi lisho “ukuphinde ume” (w94-ZU 10/15 5)
Ngakho uvuko luhilela ukuvusa umuntu esimweni sokufa sokungaphili (w99-ZU 4/1 18)
UJehova uNkulunkulu angayikhumbula kalula yonke imininingwane yomuntu (Mat 10:30)
UJESU WALUCACISA UVUKO (15 imiz.)
Amadoda okholo asendulo anjengoJobe ayengakuqondi ngokuphelele lokho okwakuhilelekile ovukweni
Nokho, uJobe wabonisa ukholo ovukweni (Job 14:14, 15; w98-ZU 7/1 13)
UJesu Kristu walucacisa uvuko (2Ti 1:10; w98-ZU 7/1 13-14)
Wathembisa “umhlambi omncane” onani lawo lingu-144 000, uMbuso wasezulwini (Luk 12:32; IsA 14:1)
Ngokufa nokuvuselwa ezulwini uJesu wavula indlela yokuya ezulwini (IzE 2:32; Heb 10:19, 20)
Abangu-144 000 bavuswa ngendlela efanayo (Rom 6:5)
Umphefumulo awubuye futhi uhlanganiswe nomzimba wenyama—okuyimfundiso ethathwe kuyifilo-
sofi yamaGreki (w98-ZU 7/1 11-12)
Banikezwa imizimba yomoya engonakali (1Ko 15:43, 44; Flp 3:20, 21)
Iningi lalabo abangu-144 000 kakade seliye lavuswa; kusele insali kuphela
UJesu wathi uzoletha insindiso ‘nakwezinye izimvu,’ eziyophila emhlabeni ePharadesi (Joh 10:16; Luk 23:43)
Wavusa abantu njengesandulela salokho azokwenza ngesikhathi kubusa uMbuso wakhe
Ukuvuswa kwendodana yomfelokazi waseNayini kwabonisa uzwela uJehova noJesu abanalo kulabo aba-
ye bashonelwa abathandekayo babo (Luk 7:11-17; w95-ZU 3/1 7-8)
UJesu wathembisa ukuvusa bonke abasemathuneni (Joh 5:28, 29)
Bahlanganisa labo abaye baphishekela inkambo yokulunga
Bahlanganisa izigidi zalabo abafa bengakalitholi ithuba lokufunda futhi basebenzise amaqiniso eBhayi-
bheli (IzE 24:15)
Kunengqondo ukuphetha ngokuthi uvuko luyobe luhlelekile, labo abayobe besanda kufa bayoba abokuqala uku-
ba bavuswe (1Ko 15:23; w98-ZU 7/1 23)
Asingabazi ukuthi kuyokwenziwa amalungiselelo okunakekela izidingo zabavusiwe (Is 65:21, 22; Luk 8:55)
Yeka indlela okuyojabulisa ngayo ukuphila futhi ujabulele ukubuya kwabathandekayo namadoda athembekile
asendulo!

yokuqala ngesintu yokujabulela ukuphila okuphakade ePharadesi (1Jo 3:8)

8/15 12)
Ngokufunda iBhayibheli nokuzindla ngalo nsuku zonke, siqinisa ukholo lwethu ezithembisweni zikaNkulunku-
lu zovuko (Jude 20, 21)

15:57)
Ngovuko, uNkulunkulu uyakunqoba ukufa
Kwangathi ukukholelwa ovukweni kunganishukumisela ukuba ‘nibe ngabagxilile, abangenakunyakaziswa,

No. 132-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE KUNENDABA UKUTHI YIKUPHI OKUKHOLELWAYO
NGEMVELAPHI YABANTU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukuthi imfundiso yokuziphendukela kwemvelo ilulaza abantu nokuthi ayinikezi ithemba. Bo-
nisa ukuthi iBhayibheli liveza umbono woMdali ngabantu, ukuthi liphakamisa ukuphila kwethu nokucabanga
kwethu, nokuthi linikeza ithemba langempela
KUNEZINKOLELO EZIHLUKAHLUKENE NGEMVELAPHI YETHU (5 imiz.)
Inkolelo-mbono yokuziphendukela kwemvelo inezincazelo ezihlukahlukene: inqubo yokuzikhethela kwemvelo
nokusinda kwabanamandla, ukushintsha ngokofuzo, ukuziphendukela kwemvelo okwenzeka ngezigaba eziyi-
nkimbinkimbi (ce 21-3, 99)
Abefundisi abaningi bamaKatolika namaProthestani bayakwamukela ukuziphendukela kwemvelo (g95-ZU
8/8 5; w86 4/1 12, 19)
IBhayibheli lifundisa ukuthi sadalwa “ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu,” sakwazi zisuka nje ukubonakalisa izimfa-
nelo zoMdali (Funda uGenesise 1:27)
Ngokungafani nezilwane, u-Adamu ‘wayeyindodana kaNkulunkulu’ (Luk 3:38)
Ukuziphendukela kwemvelo kuphikisana nokulandisa kweBhayibheli ngendalo nokuwela komuntu esonweni
UJesu, owayekhona ngesikhathi kudalwa, wayekukholelwa ngokuqinile ukulandisa kukaGenesise, waze wa-
kucaphuna (IzA 8:22-31; Mat 19:4-6; Joh 8:58)
Uhlu lozalo lwakhe luhamba luze lufike kumuntu—u-Adamu (Luk 3:23, 38)
IZINKOLELO ESINAZO NGEMVELAPHI YETHU ZIYASITHONYA (7 imiz.)
Inkolelo yokuziphendukela kwemvelo ithi abantu balingana nezilwane, lokho okuthonya indlela abantu abazi-
bheka ngayo (g98-ZU 6/22 7; g95-ZU 8/8 5-7)
Izazi-mlando ziyavuma ukuthi umbono wokuziphendukela kwemvelo washintsha isimo sengqondo sabantu fu-
thi wakhuthaza ukuziphatha kobulwane (g98-ZU 6/22 4; g95-ZU 8/8 5-8)
Imfundiso yokuziphendukela kwemvelo izama ukuchaza ukuziphatha komuntu isebenzisa imithetho yenkolelo-
mbono yokuziphendukela kwemvelo (g98-ZU 6/22 3-9)
Kucatshangwa ukuthi injongo eyinhloko yokuphila iwukwandisa izakhi zofuzo nganoma iyiphi indlela
Ukuziphatha okubi kubhekwa njengokuyimvelo
Uthando lwabazali lubhekwa njengendlela yezakhi zofuzo yokuqinisekisa ukuqhubeka kokuzalana
Ezinye izincwadi zisekelwe emfundisweni yokuziphendukela kwemvelo
Kodwa kwabona laba abakholelwa ekuziphendukeleni kwemvelo bayayesaba imiphumela engase ivezwe yile
nkolelo entsha
AmaKristu kufanele aqaphele ukuthi awabi izisulu zenkohliso eyize (Kol 2:8)
AMAPHUTHA AMAKHULU EMBONWENI WOKUZIPHENDUKELA KWEMVELO (10 imiz.)

Lesi sibikezelo sivele saba amanga aluhlaza

ISIZATHU SOKUBA SITHAMBEKELE EKWENZENI OKUBI (6 imiz.)

Imiphumela emibi yesono ezakhini zethu zofuzo, hhayi ezakhini zofuzo zezilwane, iyona eyakha izici ezinga-

8:12, 13; Gal 5:22-25)
UMDALI USINIKA OKUWUKUPHELA KWETHEMBA ELIQINISEKILE NGEKUSASA (7 imiz.)
Ngokwenkolelo yokuziphendukela kwemvelo, zonke izinto ziyazenzekela; ngakho-ke, inkolelo yokuziphenduke-
la kwemvelo ayinikezi themba ngekusasa
Inkolelo yokuziphendukela kwemvelo iyingozi ngoba ivuna ukuziphatha kobulwane futhi ingqubuzana none-
mbeza
Ukusebenzisa “imfundiso ephilayo” etholakala eBhayibhelini kungasenza sijabule ngempela (Thi 2:1; Luk 11:28)
NguJehova kuphela onikeza ithemba lokuphila phakade emhlabeni oyipharadesi (IHu 37:11; Is 25:8; IsA 21:3, 4)
Yisihlengo esiyokwenza ukuphila phakade kube yinto engokoqobo, hhayi ukuthuthuka kokuziphendukela
kwemvelo (Mat 20:28; Joh 3:16)
Ngaphansi kokubusa koMbuso, abantu abathembekile bayokhululwa esonweni nemiphumela yaso (Rom 8:21;
IsA 22:1, 2)
Ingqondo nomzimba kuyopheleliswa, kwenziwe kuvumelane ngokuphelele kona ngokwako, kuvumelane na-
nezindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu
Ekugcineni, sonke isintu esilalelayo siyoba ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu basemhlabeni, silingise uYise ngoku-
phelele (1Ko 15:22-26; Efe 5:1, 2)
Hamba endleleni yokuphila manje ngokungenisa ulwazi ngoJehova uNkulunkulu noJesu Kristu (Joh 17:3; Kol
1:9, 10)

ndwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
