KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE AMAKRISTU KUFANELE AGCINE ISABATHA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi iSabatha laliyisikhathi sokujabula nesokudumisa uNkulunkulu. Gcizelela ukuthi amaKristu
angena ekuphumuleni kukaNkulunkulu ngokwethembela ezithembisweni zakhe, ngokubeka izithakazelo ezingo-
komoya kuqala, nangokuphila ngokuvumelana nezindlela zakhe usuku nosuku
IMIBONO EHLUKAHLUKENE NGESABATHA (2 imiz.)
Abaningi kweLobukholwa babheka usuku lwangeSonto njengolungcwele kanti abanye babheka uMgqibelo ka-
njalo (g81-ZU 7/8 28 [g81 1/8 26])
Lezi ‘zinsuku ezingcwele’ sezivame ukuba izinsuku zokuziphumulela nje
Ukuze siqonde ukuthi iSabatha okukhulunywa ngalo eBhayibhelini lisho ukuthini kumaKristu, kufanele sazi
ukuthi ekuqaleni laliyini
ISABATHA LABA KHONA UKUZE KUZUZE UMUNTU (15 imiz.)
Igama elithi “isabatha” livela esenzweni sesiHebheru esisho “ukuphumula, ukupheza, ukuyeka” (rs-ZU 119)
UJehova wamisa iSabatha ‘njengophawu’ phakathi kwakhe nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli (Funda u-Eksodusi 31:
16, 17)
Kwakuwusuku uNkulunkulu ayelubekele eceleni ukuze abantu bakhe baphumule
ISabatha lamasonto onke laliyingxenye yohlelo lwamasabatha (it-2 830-1)
Ukugcina amasabatha ngenhliziyo yonke kwakubalulekile ukuze ama-Israyeli aqhubeke ephila njengesizwe
Ukungayihloniphi imithetho yeSabatha kwakuholela ekuwohlokeni kwesizwe
Izwe lakwaJuda lahlala liyincithakalo iminyaka engu-70 ukuze likhokhe iminyaka yalo yeSabatha (2Kr 36:
20, 21; it-2 834)
Leyo minyaka yanikeza izwe ithuba lokuba libuye lizivuselele futhi
ISabatha lamasonto onke kwakumelwe libe isibusiso, hhayi umthwalo (Mar 2:27)
Lalinikeza umuntu nemfuyo ithuba lokuphumula nelokuqabuleka
Laliwusuku olungcwele, isikhathi sokunakekela izidingo ezingokomoya (Dut 5:12)
Lalikhumbuza ama-Israyeli ngokukhululwa kwawo eGibhithe, lapho ayengatholanga kuphumula khona
(Dut 5:14, 15)
Lalinikeza abazali isikhathi sokufundisa izingane zabo ngoNkulunkulu (Dut 6:6, 7; it-2 831)
Isici esibaluleke nakakhulu selungiselelo lesabatha ukuthi lalivula ithuba lokubonisa ukholo kuJehova nasema-
ndleni akhe okondla (it-2 831)
Kwakungafanele kusetshenzwe ngezinsuku zeSabatha, futhi kwakungalinywa ngeminyaka yeSabatha (Lev
25:4)
Isizwe kwakudingeka sincike kuJehova ukuba asondle (it-2 830)
UJehova wayefuna ukwazisa okusuka enhliziyweni, hhayi isenzo sokugcina icala (Funda u-Isaya 58:13, 14)
Ama-Israyeli ayesuke ebonisa ukholo lapho enikela usuku lweSabatha kuJehova
Wayewabusisa ama-Israyeli lapho elalela ngenxa yokholo nothando
UKUPHELA KWESIMISO SESABATHA (10 imiz.)
Phakathi namakhulu eminyaka, abaholi benkolo abangamaJuda banezela imithetho yeSabatha evimbelayo nesi-
ndayo (w93-ZU 2/15 27)
UJesu wabalahla ngokwenza injongo yeSabatha ibe yize (Mat 12:1-8; Luk 13:10-16)
UMthetho KaMose wathathelwa indawo “isivumelwano esisha” (Jer 31:31-33; Luk 22:20; Heb 8:13)
Umhlatshelo wesihlengo sikaKristu ‘wasusa’ uMthetho KaMose “endleleni” (Kol 2:13, 14)
Ukuba nokholo kuKristu Jesu yikona kuphela manje okuyisisekelo sokulunga (Rom 10:4; w93-ZU 2/15 29)
Akekho ongazenza afanelekele ukwamukelwa nguNkulunkulu ngokumane nje ahambisane nemithetho
ethile (rs-ZU 124)
EmiBhalweni, iMiyalo Eyishumi ayihlukanisiwe nawo wonke uMthetho KaMose (it-2 832)
Sonke isimiso samaSabatha, kuhlanganise nosuku lweSabatha, saphela (Rom 14:5; Kol 2:16, 17)
NAMUHLA AMAKRISTU AYAZUZA NGOKUNGENA EKUPHUMULENI KUKANKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Nakuba u-Israyeli ahluleka ukungena ekuphumuleni kukaNkulunkulu, amaKristu wona enza lokho ngokholo
nangokulalela [Funda amaHebheru 4:8, 9] (w98-ZU 7/15 18)
Ukholo esihlengweni lususa umthwalo wesono, ngaleyo ndlela luphumuze unembeza (Heb 9:14; w99-ZU
5/15 24)
AmaKristu azinikezele ‘aphumula’ ngokubeka izithakazelo zikaNkulunkulu kuqala, kunokubeka izithakaze-
lo zobugovu phambili (rs-ZU 124)
Kufanele senze konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze sigweme ukungamlaleli uNkulunkulu (Heb 4:11)
Themba uNkulunkulu, ungavumeli lutho luphazamise ubuhlobo bakho obuhle naye (Heb 13:5, 6)
No. 134-ZU
8/00Gxila eMbusweni, uzidedisele kude izingcindezi (Mat 6:19, 22, 33; w93-ZU 12/15 27)
Sebenzisa noma imaphi amathuba akhona ukuze udumise uJehova (Efe 5:15, 16)
Imihlangano yobuKristu iyingxenye yesimiso esinempilo esingokomoya (Heb 3:13; 10:24)
Imikhaya eyesaba uNkulunkulu iyazuza ngokomoya ngokusebenzisa isikhathi ngokuhlakanipha
Ukufunda nokuxoxa njalo ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu njengomkhaya kuyasiza kuqaphe ikusasa lezingane la-
phakade (IzA 22:6; Mat 4:4)
UNGAZITHOLA IZIBUSISO ZESABATHA (3 imiz.)
Ngisho kwamanje, singazuza nsuku zonke ngokungena ekuphumuleni kukaNkulunkulu (w91-ZU 2/15 24)
Ukubonisa ukholo nokulalela kuyophumela ezibusisweni njengoba uNkulunkulu athembisa u-Israyeli (Dut
28:13)
UKristu, “iNkosi yeSabatha,” maduze uzoqala aBuse Iminyaka Eyinkulungwane (Mat 12:8; IsA 20:2-4)
Lokho kubusa kuyofana nesikhathi sokuphumula ngesabatha (it-2 833)
Kuyokwenza sizuze ngokugcwele ezinzuzweni zesihlengo (w99-ZU 4/15 12)
Kuyoletha ukuphumula okuphelele emhlabeni nakuso sonke isintu esithembekile (IsA 21:1-4)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okufanele ifu-
ndwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 134-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBUNGCWELE BOKUPHILA NEGAZI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Gcizelela ukuthi ukuphila kuyisipho esimangalisayo nesingcwele esivela kuNkulunkulu, okufanele saziswe usu-
ku nosuku futhi sibhekwe ngendlela uJehova asibheka ngayo. Ubungcwele bokuphila nobegazi buhlobene ngoba
igazi lisebenza kakhulu enqubweni yokuphila. Bonisa ukuthi igazi lingcwele. (Kusetshenziswe amagama esiHe-
bheru nawesiGreki ukuze kucaciswe amagama athile)
UJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU UNGUMTHOMBO WOKUPHILA (6 imiz.)
 ́
Ukuphila bekulokhu kukhona ngoba uJehova naye ubelokhu ekhona selokhu kwathi nhlo (IHu 90:2)
Wasebenzisa “amandla” adingekayo ukuze kudalwe indawo yonke (Is 40:26)
Ukuphila emhlabeni kwaqala lapho uNkulunkulu esebenzisa isimiso sokuphila ezintweni ezidaliwe (Gen 1:11,
12, 20, 24; 2:7; it-2 246)
Ukuphila kwasemhlabeni kwaba khona ngoba uJehova, uMthombo wokuphila, eyale ngokuqondile ukuba
kube khona; ukuphila kuphela okungaveza ukuphila (IHu 36:9)
UJehova wadala imiphefumulo ephilayo—isilwane nomuntu
Le miphefumulo (ngesiHebheru, nephesh; ngesiGreki, psy·khe) kwakuyimizimba yenyama ehlanganiswe no-
moya, noma amandla okuphila (ngesiHebheru, ruach; ngesiGreki, pneuma); lokhu kuphila kwakusekelwa
ngokuphefumula (ngesiHebheru, nesha·mah; ngesiGreki, pno·e)
Libalulekile igazi ekuphileni kwesilwane nokomuntu; lihambisa umoya-mpilo nezakhi zomzimba kuwo wonke
umzimba ukuze kusekele amandla okuphila
Ngokombono woMdali, igazi limelela ukuphila: “Umphefumulo [noma ukuphila] wenyama usegazini” (Lev
17:11-14)
UNkulunkulu wangcwelisa futhi wabusisa ukuphila komuntu negazi (Gen 1:28, 31; 9:6, 7)
Akufanele yini lokhu kuthonye ukucabanga nezenzo zethu?
UJEHOVA UBHEKA IGAZI NJENGELINGCWELE (5 imiz.)
Ngokwazi ukuthi “umphefumulo wenyama usegazini,” uNkulunkulu wamisa umthetho wokuthi igazi lalingase-
tshenziswa kuphela ngokuvumelana nenjongo yakhe
Ngemva kokona komuntu, u-Abela wachitha igazi lesilwane enzela uNkulunkulu umhlatshelo (Gen 4:3-5)
Umnikelo ka-Abela nokholo lwakhe kwenza uJehova wamamukela; inkambo kaKhayini yokuphila yenza uku-
ba abulale u-Abela futhi uJehova wamqalekisa uKhayini (Heb 11:4; 1Jo 3:12)
Endulo, uJehova wanikeza iziqondiso ezingagwegwesi zokusetshenziswa kwegazi, futhi ngokuvamile lokho kwa-
kuhilela ukuphila ngokuqondile
Ngesikhathi sePhasika lokuqala eGibhithe, igazi elalisezinsikeni zemizi yama-Israyeli lalisho ukuthi izibulo
elalingaphakathi laliyosinda ekufeni
Ngaphansi kwesivumelwano soMthetho, uNkulunkulu wayefuna imihlatshelo yezilwane ukuze kuthethelelwe
izono, igazi lifafazwe e-altare (Heb 9:22)
Ngaphandle kwalapho igazi lisetshenziswa emihlatshelweni, kwakufanele lichithwe phansi emhlabathini;
okwakubonisa ukuqaphela ukuthi ukuphila kuvela kuNkulunkulu (Lev 17:13)
Imihlatshelo yegazi eyayikhona ngaphansi koMthetho yayikhomba phambili emhlatshelweni omkhulu owa-
wuseza—isihlengo (Efe 1:7)
Igazi likaJesu lachithwa kwaba kanye njengomhlatshelo wesihlengo wokuthethelela isono, okuholela eku-
phileni okuphakade
Ukwazi ukuthi uJesu wafa kanjani futhi efelani, kufanele kusenze siyazise ngokwengeziwe indima efezwa
igazi ekusindisweni kwethu
UJEHOVA WAKWENQABELA UKUSETSHENZISWA KABI KWEGAZI (11 imiz.)
Igazi lingcwele, njengoba nje uNkulunkulu akubonisa lokho kuNowa ngemva kukaZamcolo (Gen 9:3-6)
Ngaphansi koMthetho, uma umuntu othile echitha igazi lomunye, isihlobo esiseduze sikamufi, “umphindiseli
wegazi,” sasingambulala lowo mbulali (Num 35:21-25)
Uma ebulale engahlosile, umbulali wayengabalekela emzini wesiphephelo ukuze avikeleke (w95-ZU 11/15
10-13)
Indikimba ebusayo yamaKristu ekhulu lokuqala yaphinda yakugcizelela ukwenqatshelwa kokusetshenziswa
kabi kwegazi (IzE 15:28, 29; it-1 345-6)
Lapho othile onakalisa ubungcwele bokuphila komuntu ngokuchitha igazi, wayeba necala legazi
UmKristu angaba necala legazi ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene
Ngokubulala noma ngokwenza ezinye izenzo ezihlanganisa ukufa komuntu, kuhlanganise nokusekela izi-
nhlangano ezinecala legazi (IsA 17:6)
Ngokudla noma ngokuphuza igazi, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi lisekudleni noma lapho welashwa (IzE 15:20)
Ngokwenqaba ukushumayela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso, ugodla ukwaziswa okusindisa ukuphila okuquke-
thwe yilezo zindaba (IzE 20:26, 27; it-1 346-7)
No. 135-ZU
8/00Izwe libheka ukuphila njengokungabalulekile, lokho kubonakala ebugebengwini obunobudlova, izimpi nokuningi
kwalokho elikubheka njengokuzijabulisa
Ukukhipha isisu, okuwukukhipha umbungu noma ihlule ngamabomu, ngokuvamile kumane nje kuthathwe
njengendlela yokuvimbela inzalo noma indaba yokuthi yikona okungcono kunokukuthatha njengokungaku-
hloniphi ukuphila (rs-ZU 296-8)
Ukuphila komuntu kuyigugu ngisho nalapho kusaqala ngemva kokuhlala kwesisu (IHu 139:13-16)
HLONIPHA INJONGO YOKUPHILA (6 imiz.)
Njengoba badalwa “ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu,” abantu banezimfanelo ezifana nezikaNkulunkulu nesifiso se-
ngokomoya; bayakwazi ukumazisa nokumkhonza uMdali wabo (Gen 1:26, 27)
Ukuze umuntu abheke ukuphila njengokungcwele, kufanele aphile ngokuvumelana nentando kaNkulunkulu
(Jak 4:13-17)
Singabonisa inhlonipho ngobungcwele bokuphila ngokuqinisa ingokomoya lethu, ngokungenisa ulwazi ngo-
Nkulunkulu, ngokulalela imiyalo yakhe nangokuhamba ezindleleni zikaNkulunkulu (Mik 4:1-5)
Lokhu kudinga ukuzidela, ‘singaziphileli thina’ (2Ko 5:15)
Kufanele silahle “isifiso senyama nesifiso samehlo nokugabisa ngalokho umuntu aziphilisa ngakho” (1Jo
2:16)
YIBA NOMBONO KAJEHOVA NGOBUNGCWELE BOKUPHILA NEGAZI (13 imiz.)
Ngenxa yokuthi sibheka ukuphila njengokungcwele, sinombono kaNkulunkulu ngabantu futhi sizama ukuboni-
sa uthando komakhelwane bethu
Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukukhathalela abantu ngendlela uJehova abakhathalela ngayo, engafuni noyedwa uku-
ba abhujiswe (2Pe 3:9)
Okuhle kakhulu esingakwenzela abantu akukona ukubasiza ngokwezokwelapha noma ngokwezenhlalo, ko-
dwa ukubasiza bazuze ukuphila okuphakade
Kufanele sixwayise ababi ngesidingo sokushiya indlela embi futhi bamukele indlela kaNkulunkulu eholela
ekuphileni (Hez 3:18, 19)
Sinesibopho sokugwema noma yini engasibangela icala legazi, kuhlanganise ukulahleka kokuphila kwethu noma
kwabanye
Njengomhubi, sithandaza kufanele ukuba uJehova asikhulule ecaleni legazi nakulabo abanecala legazi (IHu
51:14)
Kufanele silwele ukungazihlanganisi nanoma yiluphi uhlobo lwenkolo yamanga (IsA 18:4)
Njengoba igazi lingcwele emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, akulungile ukuphuza noma ukudla igazi noma ukudla
inyama yesilwane esingophiswanga kahle (IzE 15:28, 29)
Uma isilwane siklinyiwe, sigwazwe ngomkhonto, sidutshuliwe noma sibambeke esicuphweni futhi singophi-
swanga ngokushesha, umKristu akanakuyidla inyama yaso ngaphandle kwalokho uzibizela icala legazi
AmaKristu eqiniso ngeke akwamukele ukumpontshelwa igazi (IzE 21:25)
Nakuba izinqubo zokwelapha ezingafaki igazi sezisetshenziswa kakhulu njengendlela yokwelapha, um-
Kristu usengacindezelwa ukuba amukele igazi naphezu kwezingozi ezingokwempilo ezikhona
Uyakufuna ukuphila, kodwa ngeke azame ukusindisa lokhu kuphila kwamanje kwesikhashana ngoku-
phula imithetho kaNkulunkulu (Mat 16:25)
Njengoba ebheka ukuphila negazi njengokungcwele, amaKristu ayakugwema ukwenza izinto ezingafaka uku-
phila engozini ngokungadingekile
Ayaqiniseka ukuthi izimoto nemizi yawo iphephile futhi ahlonipha imithetho yomgwaqo neminye imithe-
tho yokuphepha
Ayakugwema ukufaka ukuphila engozini ngenxa yokuzijabulisa nje nokwesasa, kanti awahlanganyeli na-
semidlalweni enobudlova elimaza abantu ngamabomu (Dut 22:8)
SIBONISA UKUTHI SIBHEKA UKUPHILA NEGAZI NJENGOKUNGCWELE NGENKAMBO YETHU YOKU-
PHILA (4 imiz.)
Sivumelanisa ukuphila kwethu nentando kaJehova, futhi senza imithetho yakhe nokumkhulekela kuze kuqala
(Dut 30:19, 20)
Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukuqapha lapho senza izinqumo, sibeke ukukhulekela kweqiniso kuqala, singamane nje
sihambe nabahambayo ngaphandle kokuzikhandla
NjengoKristu Jesu, siphila ukuphila kwethu ngokuvumelana nentando kaJehova, njengoba sazi ukuthi siyo-
landisa kuye (1Pe 4:1, 2)
Siyazikhathalela izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu esikanye nazo, futhi sisiza abanye bathole ukuphila (Flp 2:17, 18)
UPawulu wenza kahle futhi wenza okufanele ngokuba athululwe ngenxa yabanye; lokho kwakuyisisekelo so-
kwaneliseka ekuphileni
Nathi singathola injabulo yangempela nokwaneliseka ngokusebenzisa ukuphila kwethu enkonzweni kaJe-
hova (IHu 16:11)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okufanele ifu-
ndwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 135-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UNKULUNKULU UYAKUVUMELA UKUSETSHENZISWA
KWEZITHOMBE EKUKHULEKELENI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zikwazise ukuthi sinelungelo elikhulu lokukhulekela uJehova yedwa ngaphandle kokusebenzisa izi-
thombe. Ukukhulekela izithombe kuyingozi okumelwe siqikelele ukuyigwema
UKUSEBENZISA IZITHOMBE KADE KWABA KHONA (6 imiz.)
E-Areyophagu e-Athene, uPawulu wakhuluma nezilaleli ezilukhuni—abantu ababeqhosha ngokuthi bayakhonza
futhi bahlakaniphile
Wakuphawula ngenhlonipho ‘ukwesaba kwabo onkulunkulu’ (IzE 17:22)
UPawulu wakhuluma ngokusebenzisa izithombe ekukhulekeleni, okwakugcwele e-Athene
Izwe alikashintshi kulesi sici (w92-ZU 2/15 3-4)
Ukusetshenziswa kwezithombe kusakazeke nezinkolo eziningi (Khetha izibonelo kuyi-sh-ZU 96, 99, 117, 141,
157, 182)
ELobukholwa lisebenzisa izithombe nemifanekiso yawosanta
Kusetshenziswa izithombe zikaMariya, uJesu, “osanta,” nezinye izinto ‘njengezinsiza’ ekukhulekeleni
(sh-ZU 33, 277)
Nakuba uPawulu asebenzisa amasu okungacunuli muntu lapho ekhuluma nabase-Athene, wayecasukile ngoba
“umuzi wawugcwele izithombe” (IzE 17:16)
Singase sizibuze: ‘UJehova uzizwa kanjani ngokusetshenziswa kwezithombe ekukhulekeleni? Ziyadingeka
yini, noma ingabe ziyingozi?’
SIKHONA YINI ISIDINGO SOKUSEBENZISA IZITHOMBE? (6 imiz.)
Abaningi bacabanga ukuthi sikhona isidingo sokusebenzisa izithombe ekukhulekeleni
Ngokuvamile, abantu abayizidalwa zenyama bafuna ukukubona nokukuthinta lokho abakukhulekelayo; izi-
nto ezibonwayo zingokoqobo kubo kunabantu bomoya
UJehova ungokoqobo; uphakeme ngaphezu kwayo yonke indalo ebonakalayo (1Kh 8:27)
“UnguNkulunkulu ophilayo,” ophila kuze kube phakade (Jer 10:10)
Ngokuphambene nokuningi esikwaziyo ukukubona nokukuthinta, yena akashintshi, futhi ukuhamba kwe-
sikhathi akumthinti ngalutho (Mal 3:6; Jak 1:17)
Ngokungafani nanoma yisiphi isithombe, akadingi ukunakekelwa, ukulondolozwa noma ukusekelwa aba-
khulekeli bakhe (Jer 10:3-6)
Ngaphezu kwalokho, ‘uyakukhathalela’ wena (1Pe 5:6, 7)
‘NjengoMuzwi wemithandazo,’ uyangeneka; sinelungelo elingenamingcele lokusondela kuye (IHu 65:2;
1Thes 5:17)
Uyayiphendula imithandazo yezinceku zakhe ezithembekile (Jak 5:16)
Kusobala ukuthi akekho ongaphika ukuthi izithombe azamukeleki ekukhulekeleni uNkulunkulu weqiniso
Nokho, iBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi le ndaba yimbi nakakhulu
OKWENZA UJEHOVA ENQABELE UKUSETSHENZISWA KWEZITHOMBE EKUKHULEKELENI (12 imiz.)
Isizwe sakwa-Israyeli sanikezwa umyalo ongavamile—ukuba singenzi lutho olufana nanoma yikuphi okudaliwe-
yo ukuze silukhulekele (Dut 5:8-10)
Lo myalo
wenza u-Israyeli wahluka ezizweni ezingamaqaba, lapho ukukhulekela izithombe kwakulokhu ku-
 ́
gxile khona kusukela ezinsukwini zikaNimrode ( it-1 1169)
Ngothando, uJehova uyachaza ukuthi kungani ukukhulekela izithombe kungalungile
Cabangela izizathu ezimbili ezibalulekile
Okokuqala, akunakwenzeka ukwenza isithombe esinembile sikaJehova (Is 46:5, 9)
Ungumoya, akabonakali emehlweni abantu (Eks 33:20)
Izithombe azifani nakancane noNkulunkulu ophilayo—azikwazi ukubona, ukuzwa, ukuthinta noma ukusi-
za abakhulekeli bazo (IHu 115:4-8; Is 44:9-20)
Okwesibili, uJehova ufuna ‘sizinikele kuye ngokuphelele’ (Dut 5:9)
‘Uwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso’ (Joh 17:3)
Akekho omunye umuntu endaweni yonke okufanele akhulekelwe (Is 42:8)
Kuyafaneleka ukuba uJehova abe ‘uNkulunkulu onomhawu’ (Eks 34:14)
Lapho abantu bakhe basendulo bekhulekela izithombe lokhu wakubheka njengokuphinga okungokomo-
ya (Dut 32:21; Is 54:5, 6)
Njengoba nje ukuphinga kudala ukwahlukana phakathi kophingile nomlingani ongenacala, kanjalo no-
kukhulekela izithombe kwasihlukanisa noJehova isizwe sakwa-Israyeli
Ezikhathini zeBhayibheli, ukukhulekela izithombe futhi kwaveza izithelo ezimbi, njengobufebe nokwe-
nza imihlatshelo ngabantwana (1Kh 15:12; Hez 23:37)
No. 136-ZU
11/00Shono kumthukuthelisa kangaka uJehova ukukhulekelwa kwezithombe
Umlando omningi ka-Israyeli noJuda ugcwele izinhlekelele ezalethwa ukukhulekela izithombe (it-1 1169-72)
Zivunyelwe yini izithombe ekukhulekeleni namuhla?
KUTHIWANI NGOKUSEBENZISA IZITHOMBE UKUZE ‘ZISISIZE’ EKUKHULEKELENI? (8 imiz.)
Abaningi kweLobukholwa banezinhloso ezinhle, bathi abazikhulekeli izithombe kodwa bazisebenzisela ukuba zi-
basize ekukhulekeleni uNkulunkulu
Leso sizathu asikwenzi kuthetheleleke ukusebenzisa izithombe (w92-ZU 2/15 5-7; rs-ZU 191-2)
UKorneliyu ongoweZizwe cishe wayenezinhloso ezinhle lapho eguqa phambi kukaPetru (IzE 10:25, 26)
Umphostoli uJohane wayengahlose kukhulekela isithombe lapho ekhothama phambi kwengelosi, nokho wa-
khuzwa (IsA 19:10; 22:9)
Njengoba ingelosi nomphostoli bobabili benqaba ukuvumela izenzo zokukhulekelwa, ingabe kungenziwa
ezithombeni nje, ezingelutho nokwenza?
Umgomo wawo wonke amaKristu eqiniso ukukhulekela uJehova “ngomoya nangeqiniso” (Funda uJohane 4:24)
Asinakuba sikhulekela ‘ngeqiniso’ uma sikholelwa ukuthi izinto ezingaphili zinamandla ezingenawo
Munye kuphela onamandla okumelela umuntu kuNkulunkulu—uJesu Kristu (Joh 14:6, 14; 1Ti 2:5)
Asikwazi ukukhulekela uNkulunkulu ngokwamukelekayo uma sincike entweni ebonakalayo iZwi lakhe eliyi-
lahlayo
Kudingeka sifunde ukuhamba “ngokholo, hhayi ngokubona” (2Ko 5:7)
INDLELA AMAKRISTU NAMUHLA ‘AKUBALEKELA NGAYO UKUKHONZA IZITHOMBE’ (8 imiz.)
Umphostoli uPawulu wanxusa: “Balekelani ukukhonza izithombe” (1Ko 10:14)
Asiyalwa ukuba nje sikugweme kodwa ukuba ‘sikubalekele’—sithi galo yephuka!
AmaKristu angasisebenzisa kanjani namuhla leso seluleko esiphefumulelwe?
Uma lo myalo umusha kithi, kudingeka senze ngokuvumelana nawo (rs-ZU 193-4)
Khumbula ukuthi akuzona zonke izithombe ezikhulekelwayo (g77-ZU 6/22 3-7 [g76 12/22 12-15])
Ezinye izithombe zokuhlobisa ezibonisa indalo enhlobonhlobo azikaze zisetshenziswe ekukhulekeleni noma
kungenzeka azisahlobene nako
Kumelwe sicabangele umphakathi wendawo yakithi namasiko awo, onembeza babanye, nokuthi leyo nto
isetshenziselwani (Rom 14:21)
Sifuna ukuhlukana nanoma yini engasilahlekisela isibusiso sikaJehova nomusa wakhe (Dut 7:25, 26; IzE 19:19)
AmaKristu kumelwe aqhubeke ‘ekubalekela ukukhulekela izithombe’
Ngisho nokukhanuka noma ukuhaha kungaba ukukhulekela izithombe (Kol 3:5)
Igama lesiGreki elihunyushwe ngokuthi “ukukhanuka” lingasho “isifiso sokuba nokwengeziwe” (g79 4/22 6)
Izwe likhuthaza ukuhaha, ukuthanda izinto ezibonakalayo (1Ti 6:10)
Gwema ukwenza noma yimuphi umuntu kwezemidlalo noma kwezokuzijabulisa abe unkulunkulu wakho
Noma yini esiyibeka ngaphezu kukaJehova ekuphileni kwethu iyisithixo
Beka izithakazelo zoMbuso kuqala (Mat 6:33)
KHULEKELA UNKULUNKULU OPHILAYO NGENJABULO (5 imiz.)
UJesu wathembisa: “Iqiniso liyonikhulula” (Joh 8:32)
Ukukhululeka ekukhulekeleni izithombe kuyisibusiso sangempela sokukhulekela okuhlanzekile
Ukukhulekela izithombe kungabiza kakhulu futhi kube umthwalo (Bhekisela esibonelweni somuntu owakhu-
luleka; ngokwesibonelo, i-w92-ZU 1/1 6)
Ukukhulekela izithombe kuthuthukisa ubugovu—abakhulekela izithombe bacela izinto kuzo; ukukhulekela oku-
hlanzekile kukhuthaza ukupha (Jak 1:27)
Ukupha kuholela enjabulweni yangempela (IzE 20:35)
Thokoza ngokukhonza uJehova, ‘uNkulunkulu ojabulayo,’ kuze kube phakade! (1Ti 1:11)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 136-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE IZIMANGALISO ZEBHAYIBHELI ZENZEKA NGEMPELA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukuthi izimangaliso zeBhayibheli zikholeka ngokuphelele uma kucatshangelwa amandla ka-
Nkulunkulu nokuthi zifakazelwe ngofakazi esingabethemba. Ungabeyi noma ubabukele phansi labo abangabaza-
yo. Bonisa ukuthi izimangaliso zeBhayibheli zizodwa azilwakhi ukholo kuJehova uNkulunkulu kodwa ziyingxe-
nye yolwazi olunembile olwakha ukholo kuye
ABANINGI ABAZIKHOLELWA IZIMANGALISO (4 imiz.)
Izimangaliso ziyizenzakalo ezibabazekayo, ezimangalisayo, ezingaphezu kwanoma yini eyake yenzeka ngama-
ndla omuntu noma emvelo
Izenzo eziningi ezenziwa nguNkulunkulu, nakuba zimangalisa kubantu, zimane nje ziwukusebenza kwamandla
akhe (it-2 411)
Ezinye izazi zenkolo azizikholwa izimangaliso zeBhayibheli, ziphikisa ngelithi ziwukulandiswa okuyihaba kwe-
zenzakalo ezivamile (w98-ZU 10/15 3; g84 2/22 17)
Akumangalisi-ke ukuthi amaphesenti angu-50 amaKatolika eFrance, e-Italy nase-Spain awazikholwa izima-
ngaliso zeBhayibheli (g96-ZU 4/8 4)
Eziningi izazi zesayensi, zefilosofi, nabanye abantu banomuzwa wokuthi izimangaliso azivumelani nesayensi no-
kuthi ziwumphumela wokungazi nokukholelwa ezeni (w95-ZU 3/1 3; gm-ZU 72)
Nokho, ukumane ugomele ngokuthi izimangaliso azizange zenzeke akufakazeli ukuthi azenzekanga (w91-ZU
10/1 28; it-2 411-12)
IZIMPAWU EZIHLUKANISA IZIMANGALISO ZEBHAYIBHELI EMLINGWENI (6 imiz.)
Izimangaliso zeBhayibheli azizona izinganekwane zogogo, noma izenzakalo ezaziwayo ezenziwe ihaba, azilona
utalagu noma izenzakalo zomlingo
Izenzo zomlingo zihilela ukusetshenziswa kwezintelezi, ubuciko obuyimfihlo, izimo ezikhethekile, noma imi-
khuba yenkolo ukuze kuvezwe imiphumela ebonakala ingaphezu kweyemvelo
Ngokuvamile umenzi womlingo uzisebenzisela ukuba akhohlise ababukele ukuze bakholelwe ukuthi una-
mandla akhethekile nokuba azandisele ingcebo yakhe nodumo (it-2 293, 413)
Izimangaliso zeBhayibheli ziphawuleka ngokuthi zazenziwa obala, naphambi kukawonke wonke, ngaphandle
kwemicikilisho, ziphawuleka nangenjongo nesisusa ezazenziwa ngaso
Ngokuvamile zazenziwa ngaphandle kokubukisa futhi kaningi ngenxa yesenzakalo esithuke sivela noma
isicelo esithile futhi zazenzeka endaweni engahleliwe (Eks 14:21-31; 1Kh 13:3-6)
Isisusa somuntu owenza isimangaliso sasingekona ukuvelela kobugovu kodwa ukukhazimulisa uNkulunku-
lu (Funda uJohane 11:1-4, 15, 40)
Zazingenzelwa ukushiya abantu bedidekile noma nje ukwanelisa ilukuluku elithile
Ngaso sonke isikhathi zazisiza abanye—ngezinye izikhathi ngokwenyama, kodwa ngaso sonke isikhathi
zazisiza ngendlela engokomoya—ukuguqulela abantu ekukhulekeleni kweqiniso
Imisebenzi kaJesu yayenziwa obala futhi ayikaze yenzelwe ukubukisa (w95-ZU 3/1 4)
Kokubili ukwelapha kwakhe ngokuyisimangaliso nokulawula kwakhe amandla emvelo wakwenza ngendlela
engenamicikilisho (Mar 4:39; 5:25-29; 10:46-52)
Wabaphulukisa bonke, akakaze ehluleke ngesimanga sokuthi abathile bantula ukholo (Funda uMathewu 8:16;
9:35)
OFAKAZI BOKUZIBONELA BAQINISEKISA IZIMANGALISO ZEBHAYIBHELI (10 imiz.)
Ukuhlola ubufakazi bofakazi bokuzibonela nomphumela lezo zimangaliso ezaba nawo kubantu kuyasiza ekuqi-
nisekiseni ukuba yiqiniso kwalezo zenzakalo
Ngokwesibonelo, izimangaliso ezenziwa uMose no-Aroni zazisobala futhi zathinta izigidi (g74 4/8 25-6)
Esokuqala senziwa phambi kukaFaro, izinceku zakhe nabapristi bakhe futhi salandelwa izishayo eziyishu-
mi eziyisimangaliso ezathinta lonke izwe laseGibhithe (Eks 7:8-12, 19-21; w96-ZU 1/15 24)
Ngesimangaliso sesithathu, ngisho nabapristi bakaFaro bavuma: “Ngumunwe kaNkulunkulu!” (Eks 8:16-
19; 9:10, 11)
OLwandle Olubomvu, abaseGibhithe bavuma ukuthi uJehova wayenzela u-Israyeli izenzo zamandla
(Eks 14:25)
Lapho abafundi bakaJesu bebikelwa okokuqala ukuthi uvusiwe, benqaba ukukukholelwa (Luk 24:6-11)
Kwathi lapho bebona uJesu ephila, kwadingeka bakwamukele ukuthi ngempela uvusiwe kwabafileyo (Luk
24:34-43)
UMathewu noJohane bambona uJesu lapho efa futhi bakufakazela ukuvuswa kwakhe (Mat 27:50; 28:16, 17;
Joh 21:24; gm-ZU 82)
UPawulu ‘nabazalwane abangamakhulu amahlanu’ bambona uKristu ovusiwe (1Ko 15:3-8)
Namuhla abekho ofakazi basemhlabeni abazibonela ngawabo ukudalwa komuntu okuyisimangaliso, nokho uku-
ba khona kwethu kuwubufakazi bokuthi kwenzeka (Lmn-ZU 12)
No. 137-ZU
11/00INJONGO YEZIMANGALISO ZIKANKULUNKULU (12 imiz.)
Ziningi izizathu ezenza uJehova wenza izenzo zamandla umuntu aye wazibiza ngokuthi ziyizimangaliso
Ukuvikela kukaJehova ama-Israyeli kwabonisa abaseGibhithe ukuthi unguNkulunkulu noMbusi Wendawo
Yonke (w72-ZU 7/15 333-5 [w72 1/15 38-9])
Ngokuvamile izimangaliso zazisetshenziselwa ukusekela noma ukuqinisekisa iqiniso lokuthi umuntu othile
wayethola amandla kuNkulunkulu futhi emsekela (Eks 4:1-9)
Ababebukele bafinyelela kulesi siphetho esishaya emhloleni ngoMose nangoJesu (Eks 4:30, 31; Joh 9:17,
31-33)
UMose, uJesu, nabanye babengaziwa njengabenzi bezimangaliso kodwa njengabafundisi nabaprofethi aba-
thunywe nguNkulunkulu
Izimangaliso zikaJesu ‘zenza ukuba inkazimulo yakhe ibonakale,’ zimbonakalisa njengoMesiya othenjisiwe
(Funda uJohane 2:11) (it-1 963-4)
Zaqinisekisa ukuthi wayengumProfethi ozayo owathenjiswa ngoMose (Dut 18:18; Joh 6:14)
Le misebenzi yamandla yaqinisekisa ukuthi uJesu wayethunyiwe yafakazela nesigijimi sakhe, futhi yagcwa-
lisa isiprofetho (Joh 5:36-39, 46, 47; 14:11; 20:27-29)
Izimangaliso uJesu azenza ikakhulukazi zazihlobene nezinkinga zabantu futhi zabonisa isithakazelo uNku-
lunkulu anaso endalweni yakhe engabantu
Waphulukisa zonke izinhlobo zokugula (Mat 8:14, 15; Luk 6:19; 17:11-14)
Wavusa abafileyo (Mat 9:23-25; Luk 7:14, 15)
Le misebenzi yamandla yabonisa ukuthi wayeyindlela kaNkulunkulu emisiwe yokukhulula isintu eso-
nweni nasekufeni (Mar 2:5-12)
Izimangaliso ezazihambisana nesigijimi zasiza abantu babona ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayesekela ibandla lama-
Kristu okuqala (IzE 13:12; Heb 2:3, 4)
Ekhulwini lokuqala, umoya kaJehova wasebenza ngamandla, wakha amabandla futhi uqinisa ubuKristu
(IzE 4:4; 16:5; it-2 414)
NAMUHLA, AKUDINGEKI ZIMANGALISO UKUZE KWAKHIWE UKHOLO (8 imiz.)
UJehova akazange ahlose ukuba izimangaliso zibe yisici esihlala njalo sokukhulekela kwamaKristu (Funda eyo-
ku-1 Korinte 13:8) (w97-ZU 3/15 6)
Ngisho noma ngabe izimangaliso bezisenziwa, bezingeke zenze wonke umuntu akholwe
Akubona bonke ababengofakazi bokuzibonela bezimangaliso zikaJesu abashukunyiselwa ukuba bamukele
izimfundiso zakhe (Joh 11:47, 48; 12:37; w97-ZU 3/15 4-5)
Akudingekile ukuba uNkulunkulu enze izimangaliso namuhla ukuze afakazele ukuba khona kwakhe (IHu 19:1;
Rom 1:20)
Ukholo kuNkulunkulu lusekelwe ebufakazini obuqinile bezinto eziseza; izimangaliso zimane zifeza indima
ethile ekwakheni ukholo olunjalo (Heb 11:1)
Asigcini ngokuba nombhalo ogciniwe wezimangaliso kuphela, kodwa sinayo yonke imiBhalo ephefumule-
lwe ukuze siyisebenzise njengesisekelo sokholo lweqiniso (2Ti 3:16)
Ukholo olusekelwe olwazini olunembile lweZwi likaNkulunkulu luqinile futhi lujulile; lunomgogodla futhi
lunamandla
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu namuhla ‘zihamba ngokholo, hhayi ngokubona,’ zikholisekile ukuthi lonke iZwi la-
khe eliphefumulelwe liyiqiniso (2Ko 5:7)
Njengoba uya usazi kangcono isigijimi seBhayibheli, ngeke udumazeke ngokungabikho kwezimangaliso namuhla
Abafuna uNkulunkulu bangamthola ngempela ngokutadisha imiBhalo kuphela (Is 55:6; IzE 17:26, 27)
UKUZUZA PHAKADE EZIMANGALISWENI ZIKAJEHOVA ZESIKHATHI ESIZAYO (5 imiz.)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyinqolobane yolwazi olubaluleke kakhulu ukuze ukuphila kwethu kuphumelele manje na-
sesikhathini esizayo (1Ti 2:3, 4)
Ukuze sizuze, kumelwe siyazi yonke imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu elotshwe kulo (Rom 15:4)
Izimangaliso ezilotshwe eBhayibhelini zisiza ekugxiliseni ukwethembela kuNkulunkulu
Zinikeza isiqinisekiso esinamandla sokuthi uNkulunkulu uyasikhathalela isintu nokuthi uyakwazi ukuvikela
labo abamkhonzayo futhi uyobavikela
Sisazobona lukhulu ngokuphathelene nezenzo zikaNkulunkulu ezikhexisayo
Maduze nje uzobhubhisa lesi simiso sezinto esibi (2Pe 3:7; IsA 16:14, 16)
Izigidi ezinokholo kuNkulunkulu futhi eziphila ngokuvumelana nemithetho nezimiso zakhe zinethemba lo-
kuphila phakade ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu lokulunga (2Pe 3:13)
Lapho, uyophulukisa futhi abusise isintu esithembekile phakade (IsA 21:4)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 137-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45PHILA NGOKUHLUZEKA KWENGQONDO EZWENI ELONAKELE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi :
Siza izilaleli ziqaphele ukuthi uNkulunkulu ulindele ukuba izinceku zakhe zibonise ukuhluzeka kwengqondo fu-
thi zikubonise kuzo zonke izici zokuphila. Yingale ndlela kuphela esinganqoba ngayo izwe njengoba kwenza uJe-
su bese samukelwa nguNkulunkulu futhi sithole isibusiso sakhe
IZWE LIKASATHANE LISANGENE (5 imiz.)
Isimiso sezinto sikaSathane sinjengomkhumbi ophenduphendulwa ulwandle olugubhayo, olimele kakhulu, onga-
lawuleki, futhi obheke enhlekeleleni
Ubudlova obunyantisa umzimba, ubuphekula, nokuziphatha okubi kobulili kuyasibhuqa isintu (w99-ZU 5/15
32; w99-ZU 9/1 10; w97-ZU 7/15 11-12; g97-ZU 1/8 31)
Abaningi balinyazwe ukusebenzisa kabi izidakamizwa notshwala (g99-ZU 11/8 3-14)
Lesi simo sokuwohloka kwesimilo sigqugquzelwa uSathane ukuze aphumelele ekonakaliseni isintu (IsA
12:12)
Ukuze siphumelele ekumelaneni namathonya okuziphatha okubi ezwe likaSathane, kudingeka “siphile ngoku-
hluzeka kwengqondo” (Funda uThithu 2:12)
Sikufinyelela kanjani ukuhluzeka kwengqondo?
LOKHO UKUPHILA NGOKUHLUZEKA KWENGQONDO OKUKUHILELAYO (12 imiz.)
Ukubonisa ukuhluzeka kwengqondo kusho okungaphezu kokuba nengqondo ephilile, ubuhlakani, noma ingqo-
ndo ezinzile (w97-ZU 8/15 17, 22; w93-ZU 6/1 15-16)
Kuhilela ukujwayelana nentando kaNkulunkulu embuliwe, ukwamukela izimiso nezahlulelo zakhe njengezi-
yiqiniso, ngokuthobeka sibonakalise ukucabanga kukaNkulunkulu ekuphileni kwethu, sibe abalinganiselayo
Intando kaJehova embuliwe ichazwe eZwini lakhe eliphefumulelwe ngomoya wakhe (1Ko 2:10-13)
Ngokutadisha, ukuzindla, nokusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu, sifunda ukucabanga nokwenza ngokuvumela-
na nentando kaJehova embuliwe (Jos 1:8)
Lapho kuphakama imibuzo, sinquma inkambo efanele okumelwe siyilandele ngokusemiBhalweni (IzA 3:5, 6)
Siyazibuza: ‘Iyini intando kaNkulunkulu kule ndaba? Iyiphi inkambo eyojabulisa inhliziyo kaJehova? UKri-
stu ubezokwenzani esimweni esifana nalesi? Iziphi izimiso zeBhayibheli ezisebenzayo kule ndaba?’
Akwanele ukwazi nje intando kaNkulunkulu embuliwe ngendaba
Ukuphila ngokuhluzeka kwengqondo kuhilela ukuyisebenzisa ekuphileni kwethu kwemihla ngemihla, uku-
shesha ukulungisa ukucabanga kwethu nenkambo yokuphila lapho intando kaNkulunkulu ngendaba ethile
isobala
Ake sixoxe ngezici ezithile eziqondile lapho ukuhluzeka kwengqondo kubaluleke khona, nalokho okulindeleke
kithi
SONKE KUMELWE SIPHILE NGOKUHLUZEKA KWENGQONDO (23 imiz.)
(Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 3:2, 5)
Ukuhluzeka kwengqondo kuyimfuneko kubo bonke abadala ngoba banomthwalo wemfanelo wokuqondisa ama-
lungu omkhaya namalungu ebandla
Abadala kudingeka bayazi intando kaJehova eyembuliwe futhi baqonde indlela izimiso ezingokomBhalo ezi-
sebenza ngayo ngokufanele (Thi 1:7-9; Heb 5:14)
Amazwi abo ngalokho okufanele nokungafanele kufanele asekelwe emiBhalweni (2Ti 4:2)
Kumelwe bangaxhamazeli kodwa balinganisele (Jak 1:19, 20)
Kumelwe futhi bamukele iseluleko esisekelwe eZwini likaNkulunkulu
(Funda uThithu 2:2-8)
Izinhloko zemikhaya kumelwe zibonise ukuhluzeka kwengqondo ngokuhlela isimiso esihle sokuqeqeshwa oku-
ngokwasezulwini kwemikhaya yazo
Lokhu kuyohlanganisa isifundo somkhaya esiqhutshwa njalo, kanye nokuyifundisa indlela yokwakha ubuhlo-
bo obunokuthula, imikhuba emihle, ukugqoka nokuzilungisa okufanele; ukuba khona njalo nokuhlanganye-
la emihlanganweni; ukuqeqeshwa okuqhubekayo enkonzweni yasensimini (1Ti 5:8)
Abesifazane abangamaKristu bayaziswa ebandleni
Odade asebebadala batshelwa ukuba “basangulukise abesifazane abasebasha ukuba bathande abayeni babo,
bathande abantwana babo, babe abahluzekile engqondweni” (w94-ZU 6/15 20-1)
Odade babonisa ukuhluzeka kwengqondo ngesibonelo nangokubonisa uthando ngamalungu emikhaya yabo
Owesifazane ocabanga futhi enze ngokuvumelana nentando kaJehova futhi osebenzela ukuzuzisa umyeni
wakhe nabantwana ufanelwe ukudunyiswa (IzA 31:10-31)
Kubalulekile ukuzihlobisa ngesizotha (1Ti 2:9, 10; g00-ZU 8/8 19; g98-ZU 8/8 21)
Izinsizwa kufanele zibonise ukuhluzeka kwengqondo ngemisebenzi yazo emihle, ngenkulumo ehlanzekile (1Ti 6:
18, 20; w94-ZU 6/15 21)
No. 138-ZU
11/00Kumelwe zenze intuthuko yazo ibonakale njengoba zizikhandla ukuze zifinyelele amalungelo enkonzo ama-
khudlwana (1Ti 3:1; 4:15)
Sibasha noma sibadala, sonke kumelwe sibonise ukuhluzeka kwengqondo
Kufanele sisheshe ukusebenzisa isiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu asinikeza ngenhlangano yakhe kuzo zonke izici
zokuphila kwethu (IHu 119:60)
Indlela yethu yokuphila kufanele ibonise ukuthi siyakuqonda ukuphuthuma kwezikhathi (1Pe 4:7)
Kungaba iphutha ukuphishekela ngobugovu izinjabulo zomuntu siqu, ngomuzwa wokuthi sinesikhathi esi-
ningi sokulungisa inkambo yethu
Ingabe ‘uhamba ngokuhlakanipha ngakulabo abangaphandle’ ngokugwema ukuzihlanganisa nezwe ngezinga
okungenzeka ngalo? (Kol 4:5; 1Ko 15:33)
Ingabe lokho okhetha ukuzilibazisa ngakho kubonisa ukuhluzeka kwengqondo?
Kumelwe ‘sishisekele imisebenzi emihle’—kuhlanganise nomsebenzi wokwenza abafundi (Thi 2:14; Mat 28:
19, 20)
PHILA NGOKUHLUZEKA KWENGQONDO, UNQOBE IZWE (5 imiz.)
USathane nenhlangano yakhe bafuna ukusilolonga ngenkani, basenze sivumelane nezwe (Rom 12:2; w99-ZU
4/1 21)
Singamelana ngokuphumelelayo nemizamo kaSathane
Ukuze senze kanjalo kumelwe sitadishisise iZwi likaNkulunkulu njalo, sisondele kuJehova, siphikelele em-
thandazweni, sibe khona futhi sihlanganyele emihlanganweni yebandla, sihlanganyele ngokugcwele emse-
benzini wokushumayela, sibonise ukholo, futhi sithembele kuJehova
Ngokuphila ngokuhluzeka kwengqondo, ngeke sigwinywe izwe likaSathane kodwa siyoholwa iZwi likaJehova
nomoya wakhe
Ngeke sibhujiswe kanye nenhlangano kaSathane kodwa siyojabulela isipho sikaJehova sokuphila okuphaka-
de ngoba siye sazi futhi senza intando kaNkulunkulu embuliwe
Siyokwazi ukusho njengoJesu sithi: “Ngilinqobile izwe” (Joh 16:33)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 138-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUHLAKANIPHA KOKWESABA UNKULUNKULU EZWENI LESAYENSI
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yize unikeza umbono olinganiselayo ngesayensi nezobuchwepheshe, gcizelela ukuhlakanipha kweBhayibheli.
Veza izingozi ezingokomoya zokwethemba kakhulu ukuhlakanipha komuntu
ABANINGI BATHEMBE ISAYENSI UKUBA IQEDE OMAYE BABANTU (6 imiz.)
Isayensi kufanele isithakazelise (g93-ZU 4/8 6-8)
Imikhiqizo yesayensi enjengamandla kagesi, izimoto, izindiza, umsakazo, i-TV, ama-computer, nentuthuko ye-
zokwelapha, iyasithinta sonke ngandlela-thile
Abaningi babheka ukusetshenziswa kolwazi lwesayensi njengendlela eyinhloko yokuxazulula izinkinga zabantu
nokuletha impilo yomzimba engcono nokulondeka (g98-ZU 3/8 3-4)
Abanye banomuzwa wokuthi ubuchwepheshe obungalawuleki buwusongo oluyoletha izingcindezi kwezenhlala-
kahle, izinhlekelele endaweni esizungezile, nokungazinzi kwezombangazwe
Kuphakama imibuzo eminingana: Uyini umbono olinganiselayo ngobuchwepheshe besayensi? Ingabe isayensi
ingaliqondisa ngokuphephile ikusasa lethu futhi inikeze amakhambi ezinkinga zesintu? Ingabe iBhayibheli li-
yasikhanyisela kule ndaba?
IZINZUZO NEZINGOZI ZESAYENSI YANAMUHLA (15 imiz.)
Obunye ubuchwepheshe buye baba usizo ezicini ezihlukahlukene zokuphila
Ezokwelapha: ziye zandisa iminyaka yokuphila komuntu, zathuthukisa nempilo
Ezolimo: zandise umthamo wokudla okukhiqizwayo, zathuthukisa nomsoco okukho
 ́
Ezokuthutha nokuxhumana: zenze kwaba lula ukuhamba umhlaba wonke nokusabalalisa izinto nolwazi
AmaKristu eqiniso asebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obuwusizo ekuthuthukiseni umsebenzi woMbuso
Izindlela zokunyathelisa nokulungiselela izincwadi ezithuthukile (w99-ZU 8/15 23-4)
Kusetshenziswa ama-computer ekubhaleni, ekwenzeni imifanekiso, nasekuhumusheni izincwadi ezisekelwe
eBhayibhelini
Izimoto, izindiza nezinye izindlela zanamuhla zokuthutha ziwusizo ekushumayeleni izindaba ezinhle kuwo
wonke umhlaba
Izindlela zanamuhla zokwakha nezinto zokwakha ezisetshenziselwa amaHholo OMbuso
Ukusebenzisa komuntu ulwazi lwesayensi kulinganiselwe (g93-ZU 6/22 21-4; g00-ZU 12/8 18-19)
Ukunganaki nokusetshenziswa kabi kobuchwepheshe banamuhla kuye kwadala izinsongo ekuphileni nase-
mpilweni yomzimba
Ukungcola kusongela zonke izimiso zokuphila emhlabeni
Ukwanda kwezikhali zempi kuyaqhubeka kusongela ukuphila kwesintu
Ukuphishekela ukuhlakanipha komuntu kuye kwabonakala kubhubhisa ingokomoya kwabathile
Kwenza abantu banake indalo esikhundleni soMdali (Rom 1:25)
Kwenza abantu bathembele ngokungafanele ekuphumeleleni komuntu
Kunxenxela abantu ekugxiliseni ukuphila kwabo ezintweni ezibonakalayo kunakuNkulunkulu (1Jo 2:15-17)
Kuyisici esivelele sokuwohloka kwesimilo nezingcindezi zokuhlalisana kwabantu
Kuthuthukisa ukuzinikela kakhulu emisebenzini yezobuchwepheshe, okudala ukudebeselelwa komkhaya oku-
holele enanini elandayo lezehlukaniso nobuhlongandlebe
Ngakho ukuhlakanipha komuntu onesono kuye kwabonakala “kuwubuwula,” kunamaphutha, futhi ngokuva-
mile kuholela encithakalweni (1Ko 3:19, 20)
Ulwazi lwesayensi ngokwalo alubona ubuwula, kodwa izindlela zokuluthola nokusetshenziswa kwalo ngo-
kuvamile kuzishaya indiva izimiso zokwesaba uNkulunkulu futhi kube yingozi (it-2 1192-3)
Khona-ke, umuntu angaphendukelaphi ukuze athole isiqondiso nesivikelo esinengqondo kuleli zwe lesayensi?
UKUHLAKANIPHA KOKWESABA UNKULUNKULU KUYISIQONDISO ESINENGQONDO EZWENI LESAYE-
NSI (19 imiz.)
Ukuhlakanipha kukaJehova kuphakeme kunokwabantu (1Ko 1:19, 20)
IZwi lakhe lisisiza ukuba sibone ukuthi umuntu unokuhlakanipha okulinganiselwe (w00-ZU 5/1 8; g98-ZU 3/8
10-12)
Lisinikeza izindinganiso esingahlela ngazo izinto ngokubaluleka kwazo ngendlela enengqondo
IBhayibheli likhuluma ngezidingo zangempela zomuntu nezinkinga zomhlaba
Libikezela indlela yokuphila ehluke ngokuphelele (Is 65:20, 21)
Lokho uhulumeni woMbuso onoKristu njengeNkosi yawo, oyokwenza, hhayi ubuchwepheshe babantu
Ukuvuselela umhlaba nokususa izimbangela zosizi (IsA 11:18)
Uyoletha inala yepharadesi nokulondeka kubo bonke abantu
Uyophelelisa abantu abalalelayo ngokuqeda izimbangela zokugula nokufa (Rom 5:18, 19; g00-ZU 12/8
18-19)
No. 139-ZU
11/00Ngokungafani nolwazi lwabantu lwesayensi nobuchwepheshe, imiBhalo inikeza isiqondiso sokubhekana nezimo
zanamuhla
IBhayibheli linikeza izindinganiso zokuziphatha ezivumelana nobuntu bomuntu bemvelo, limvikela emafilo-
sofini ezwe (Rom 1:26, 27; 1Ko 6:18; Kol 2:8)
ImiBhalo iqukethe iziqondiso zokuphila komkhaya ezicabangela izidingo zelungu ngalinye
Indoda nomfazi kumelwe babonisane uthando olujulile nenhlonipho (Efe 5:22, 28, 33)
Izingane zifunda ukuthembela kuJehova futhi zizinikele enkonzweni kaNkulunkulu, hhayi emisebenzini
eyize esimisweni sezinto esifayo (1Ko 15:58; Efe 6:4; g98-ZU 3/8 19-21)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu lisimema ukuba sibe yingxenye yobuzalwane obuhlangene babangane beqiniso
IBhayibheli lisifundisa ukuba sithande uJehova, uJesu, nathi sithandane (1Jo 4:7-11)
Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukuzihlanganisa nalabo abantula ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu kungaliqeda ithe-
mba (1Ko 15:33, 34)
Ukuzinikela kokwesaba uNkulunkulu kuvula indlela yekusasa eliqhakazile, kanjalo kusisize saneliseke nga-
malungiselelo akhona manje (1Ti 6:6-8)
 ́
Asiqedi isikhathi namandla ethu sibanjwe ubukhazikhazi bobuchwepheshe banamuhla
UKUHLAKANIPHA KUKANKULUNKULU MAKUKULONDELE IKUSASA ELICHUMAYO (5 imiz.)
AmaKristu eqiniso alwela ukubeka izinhliziyo zawo ekusaseni, izwe elisha ngaphansi koMbuso kaNkulunkulu
(2Pe 3:13, 17)
UMbuso uyosusa isimiso esithembela kumuntu kunokuthembela kuNkulunkulu
Ukuhlakanipha komuntu noma ubuchwepheshe besayensi ngeke kuluvimbele lolu shintsho lwembulunga
yonke
Hlela kahle izinto ngokubaluleka kwazo ngendlela evumelana nethemba lakho (Flp 1:9-11)
Vumelanisa ukuphila kwakho nezindlela ezivumelana neziqondiso zikaNkulunkulu (Thi 2:11-14)
Yenqaba ukuphazanyiswa izinto ezibonakala ziwukuphumelela kwaleli zwe ngokwesayensi
Hlakulela ubuhlobo obuseduze noMdali onothando (Mik 6:8)
Hlala eduze nenhlangano kaJehova engokwasezulwini
Ukuphila okuphakade kuyosinika ithuba lokuvumbulula ezinye zezimfihlakalo ezingenamkhawulo zendalo ka-
Nkulunkulu (Shu 3:11)
EPharadesi, isayensi yangempela nokuhlakanipha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu kuyoletha intokozo enkulu
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 139-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UJESU KRISTU—UMBUSI OMUSHA WOMHLABA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibe nokholo ekubuseni kukaKristu. Yakha ukholo ekubeni ngokoqobo koMbuso KaMesiya. Bashu-
kumise abafowethu ukuba bamemezele lowo Mbuso
OKWENZA KUDINGEKE KUZE UKUBUSA OKUSHA EMHLABENI (8 imiz.)
Izizwe zibhekene nenhlekelele yokungabi nabaholi abakahle
Abaholi babantu bayahluleka noma bakhohlakele; ngokuvamile abantu ababe besabethemba noma babasekele
 ́
Abaholi baholele isintu onqenqemeni lwenhlekelele yenuzi
Yize kuye kwancishiswa izikhali zenuzi, izinqolobane ezisele zingabhubhisa isintu ngokuphindaphindiwe
(g99-ZU 8/22 4-6)
Ngisho noma umholi engaba olungile nohlakaniphile, uyafa ekugcineni (IHu 146:3, 4)
Abantu baye bahluleka ngokudabukisayo ukuba abaholi
Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi akuzange kube injongo kaJehova ukuba umuntu aziqondisele yena izinyathelo za-
khe engancikanga kuNkulunkulu (Jer 10:23; w92-ZU 10/1 27)
Ngakho uNkulunkulu uye wahlela uhulumeni wasezulwini onombusi ophumelelayo ukuba ubuse umhlaba
(Dan 7:13, 14; Mat 6:10)
Ungubani lowo Mbusi? Yiziphi izibusiso ezizotholwa yilabo abasekela lokhu kubusa okunikezwe uNkulu-
nkulu?
UNKULUNKULU UKHETHA UMBUSI OMUSHA WOMHLABA (10 imiz.)
UJehova ukhethe iNdodana yakhe eyizibulo ukuba ibe nendima evelele ekufezekeni kwazo zonke izinjongo za-
Khe (Kol 1:15, 18-20)
Ngokuvumelana nalokhu, uJesu uye wamiswa njengeNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu (IHu 2:6; IsA 19:16)
Futhi ukhonza njengoMahluleli omiswe nguNkulunkulu (IzE 10:42)
UJesu ukufanelekela kahle ukuba uMbusi omusha womhlaba
Ngisho nasekuphileni kwakhe kwangaphambi kokuba umuntu, wayesithanda isintu (IzA 8:30, 31)
Wadela ukuphila kwakhe ngokuzithandela njengomhlatshelo wesintu (Mat 20:28)
Ngakho waba “uMmeli Oyinhloko wokuphila” kwaso sonke isintu (IzE 3:15)
Elithi “uMmeli Oyinhloko” ngesiGreki lisho “umholi oyinhloko” (it-2 61)
Ubuye futhi akhonze njengomPristi Ophakeme, osihlanza esonweni (Heb 7:21-25)
UJesu uye wenzela isintu okuningi kakhulu kangangokuthi kusobala ukuthi nguye okufanelekelayo ukukhonza
njengoMbusi omusha womhlaba
‘Ukuba nokholo egameni likaJesu’ kubalulekile ekuzuzeni insindiso eholela ekuphileni (IzE 10:43; it-2 61)
Ayikho insindiso kunoma yimuphi omunye umthombo (IzE 4:12)
INCAZELO EGCWELE YEGAMA LIKAJESU KRISTU (10 imiz.)
Igama likaJesu lihle kakhulu kunelezingelosi (Heb 1:4-13)
Abalandeli bakaJesu basebenzisa inkulumo ethi “iNkosi uJesu” noma “iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu” (IzE 8:16;
15:26)
Ibhekisela ekumisweni kwakhe njengoMnikazi wethu ngenxa yomhlatshelo wakhe wesihlengo (1Ko 6:20)
Igama lakhe futhi limelela igunya lakhe eligcwele njengenkosi nanjengompristi, abalandeli bakhe abashu-
mayela ngalo (IzE 5:29-32)
 ́
Ukuthi unikezwe lonke igunya ezulwini nasemhlabeni kubonisa ukuthi uJesu uhola uhulumeni obusa yo-
nke indawo (Mat 28:18)
Yilabo abaqaphela lelo gama kuphela, bazithobe egunyeni elilimelelayo, abayozuza ukuphila (Flp 2:9-11)
Ukholo egameni lakhe lusho okungaphezu kokumamukela njengoMsindisi
AmaKristu kumelwe abonise ubuqotho obungenakuphulwa egameni loMbusi omiswe nguNkulunkulu, iNkosi
uJesu Kristu
Akumelwe azinikele kunoma yiliphi elinye igama noma umbusi njengomelela igunya likaNkulunkulu lokubu-
sa umhlaba (Mat 12:18, 21)
Abaphathi begama likaJesu bayaqaphela ukuthi bayoba “izinto zokuzondwa yizizwe zonke” (Mat 24:9)
Lokhu kungenxa yokubusa okumelelwa igama lakhe
ABABUSI ABAKANYE NOKRISTU KUHULUMENI WOMBUSO (9 imiz.)
Ubukhosi bukaKristu bumiswe ezulwini (Joh 18:36, 37)
UNkulunkulu wakubona kufanele ukuba anike abanye esintwini isabelo kulo hulumeni wasezulwini (Luk
12:32)
Uthenga abangu-144 000 emhlabeni ukuze babe ababusi namakhosi nabapristi kanye noKristu ezulwini (IsA
14:1, 3; 20:6)
No. 140-ZU
11/00NjengoJesu, bayoba nozwela nesihe, bakwazi ukusiza abantu bazo zonke izizinda, besebenzisa izinzuzo
zomhlatshelo wesihlengo kaJesu (Heb 2:17; 4:15)
UJesu uyomisa izikhulu ukuba zibe abameleli ababonakalayo basemhlabeni (IHu 45:16)
Indlela uJesu aziphatha ngayo emhlabeni ibonisa lokho esingakulindela embusweni wakhe wasezulwini nase-
zikhulwini zakhe zasemhlabeni (Mat 12:18-20)
Izikhulu ziyobonisa umoya ofanayo wokuzidela oboniswa abadala namuhla (Is 32:1, 2)
Bayobonisa isithakazelo sothando esintwini
Izikhonzi ziyophathwa ngendlela yokuqonda
Ukuthobeka nomusa kaJesu nokumelela kwakhe ukulunga nobulungisa kusiqinisekisa ukuthi ukubusa kwakhe
kuyokwenza okungaphezu kwakho konke ebesikucabanga
UMBUSI OMUSHA WOMHLABA UYOLETHA IPHARADESI LEMBULUNGA YONKE (5 imiz.)
UJesu wanikwa ifa lomhlaba wonke (IHu 2:8-12)
Ubusa zonke izizwe (Dan 7:14)
Ubusa ngengoMeluleki Omangalisayo, uYise Ongunaphakade, iSikhulu Sokuthula (Is 9:6, 7; it-2 69)
Ukubusa kwakhe njengesikhulu kuyoletha ukuthula, ubulungisa, ukulunga
NgoJesu Kristu, uNkulunkulu uyovusa abafileyo (Joh 11:25)
Umhlaba uyobuyiselwa ube ipharadesi lembulunga yonke elifana nensimu yase-Edene
Kuyoba nendathane yezibusiso zoMbuso (IsA 21:3, 4)
Igama likaJehova liyongcweliswa, abantu bayojabula, bonke bayoba munye ngaphansi koMbusi omusha wom-
hlaba
ISIBOPHO SETHU KUKRISTU, UMBUSI OMUSHA WOMHLABA (3 imiz.)
Sekela izindinganiso zikaJesu futhi ulalele imiyalo yakhe (Joh 14:23)
Sibonakalisa ukuthi singabafundi bakhe ngokubonisa uthando lobuzalwane (Joh 13:34, 35)
Siza abanye ukuba babe izikhonzi zoMbuso ngokufakaza ngoMbusi omusha womhlaba (Mat 28:19, 20; IzE 1:8)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe

No. 140-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UKUBUBULA KWENDALO ENGABANTU—KUYOPHELA NINI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Khuluma ngendlela eduduzayo nenika ithemba lokuhle. Gcizelela ukuthi uJehova wakwazi ukulawula izinto kusuke-
la u-Adamu eqeda ukuhlubuka. Labo ngokholo ababambisana nezinjongo zikaNkulunkulu banekusasa elimangalisayo
UBUZE BESIMO SESINTU NAMUHLA (5 imiz.)
Abaningi namuhla banomuzwa wobuze; abaliboni ikusasa langempela
Bonke abantu, abacebile noma abampofu, bayagula bafe
Izinkinga ezinjengokungazinzi kwezombangazwe, ukungcola kwendawo esizungezile, inani eleqile labantu em-
hlabeni, ubugebengu nokungalondeki kwezomnotho, zenza abaningi bazibuze ukuthi likhona yini ithemba la-
ngempela ngekusasa
Umphostoli uPawulu usichaza kahle isimo somuntu (Funda amaRoma 8:22)
Ingabe likhona ithemba lokuthola ikhambi? Yebo, njengoba uPawulu echaza kweyabaseRoma 8:18-25
Ake sicabangele isizinda salokho akusho
KUSUKELA EKUHLUBUKENI KWASE-EDENE, ISINTU BESILOKHU SIHLUKANISIWE NONKULUNKULU
(8 imiz.)
Isintu saba nesiqalo esiphelele, ‘sasingabubuli’
U-Adamu no-Eva benziwe ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu, babekwa epharadesi lasemhlabeni
Zonke izidingo zazinakekelwa, benezabelo zomsebenzi oqabulayo, kungekho kugula, benethemba lokuphila pha-
kade (Gen 1:26-30)
 ́
Umbhangqwana wokuqala weqa imingcele uNkulunkulu ayewubekele yona; wona (Gen 3:1-6)
Ukungena kwesono kwaholela ebuhlungwini, ebunzimeni, ekufeni; u-Adamu no-Eva baqala ‘ukububula’ (Gen
3:16-19)
U-Adamu wadlulisela isono nokufa kubantwana bakhe (Rom 5:12)
Ukuphila kwaba njengoba uSolomoni akuchaza (Funda umShumayeli 1:14)
UJehova wanikeza isisekelo sethemba lapho ethembisa iNzalo (Gen 3:15)
Isithembiso sagcwaliseka kuJesu Kristu, owamiswa njengomPristi Ophakeme neNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu
UJesu wanikela ngokuphila njengesihlengo ukuze kuhlengwe isintu esimweni sokuba nesono
Esebenzisa umoya wakhe, ngendlela emangalisayo, uJehova wamukela abantu abangu-144 000 njengamadoda-
na okutholwa ukuze babuse kanye noJesu njengamakhosi nabapristi (IsA 20:4)
UPawulu wayecabanga ngakho konke lokhu lapho ephefumulelwa ukuba alobe lokho okukweyabaseRoma 8:18-25
Wabhekisela endleleni isintu esasiyokophulwa ngayo ebuzeni
Sizoxoxa ngala mavesi
UKWAMBULWA KWABANTWANA BAKANKULUNKULU (15 imiz.)
Funda amaRoma 8:18
Elithi “kithi” libhekisela kumaKristu agcotshiweyo, uPawulu ayengomunye wawo
Elithi “izinhlupheko” lisho ukushushiswa nobunzima ababhekana nako njengamaKristu agcotshiweyo, okuphe-
tha ngokufa, njengoba kwenzeka kuJesu
‘Inkazimulo eyokwambulwa’ yithemba lawo lokubusa njengamakhosi noKristu eMbusweni wakhe wasezulwini
Ithemba eliqiniseke kanjalo lisho ukuthi kumaKristu agcotshiweyo, ukuphila kunenjongo; anekusasa elima-
ngalisayo neliqinisekisiwe
Funda amaRoma 8:19
Elithi “indalo” libhekisela esintwini sisonke
Elithi “abantwana bakaNkulunkulu” libhekisela kumaKristu agcotshiweyo (Rom 8:16, 17)
“Ukulangazela” kwamadoda okholo angaphambi kobuKristu, ayefisa ukwazi ngensindiso kuhlobene nokwambu-
lwa kwabantwana bakaNkulunkulu (1Pe 1:10)
“Ukwambulwa kwabantwana bakaNkulunkulu” kuyingxenye ebalulekile yokusiza isintu sisonke ukuba siphu-
me ebuzeni
“Ukwambulwa” kuhambisana nosizi olukhulu lapho uJesu, ekanye nabagcotshiweyo abavusiwe, esusa izitha
zikaJehova emhlabeni (2Thes 1:6-10; IsA 2:27)
Ngesikhathi sokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, ezweni elisha lokulunga, isintu siyoqhubeka sithola
izinzuzo zomhlatshelo kaJesu wesihlengo lapho usetshenziswa kuso (2Pe 3:13; IsA 22:1-3a)
Sonke isintu esithembekile siyokwenziwa sifinyelele ekupheleleni, futhi izimbangela ‘zokububula’ ziyosuswa
Leli lungiselelo liyintando kaNkulunkulu, njengoba ivesi elilandelayo libonisa
Funda amaRoma 8:20
Isintu ‘asibekwanga ngaphansi kobuze’ ngentando yaso
Abantu abazalwa ngemva kwesono sokuqala bebengenamandla okulawula isono sika-Adamu, bengazange fu-
thi bazicelele ukuzalwa
No. 141-ZU
11/00UJehova owavumela u-Adamu no-Eva abayizoni ukuba babe nabantwana, okwabeka labo bantwana ngapha-
nsi kobuze
Nokho, lokhu ‘kwakungesisekelo sethemba,’ elanikezwa okokuqala ngesithembiso sikaNkulunkulu senzalo
Amadoda athembekile akudala, nakuba nawo aba nezinkinga ezihlupha isintu, ayenethemba (Heb 11:10)
Funda amaRoma 8:21
Ngomhlatshelo kaJesu wesihlengo, phakathi nokuBusa Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, isintu ‘siyokhululwa
ekugqilazweni’ isono (Joh 3:16)
 ́
Ekupheleni kweminyaka eyinkulungwane, uJesu nabapristi abakanye naye bayobe sebebenze baphelela abantu
abalalelayo
Amagama alabo abayohlala bethembekile ovivinyweni lokugcina ayolotshwa phakade encwadini yokuphila (IsA
20:12-15)
“Ukwambulwa kwabantwana bakaNkulunkulu” kuyophumela ekujabuleleni kwesintu esithembekile ‘inkululeko
ekhazimulayo yabantwana bakaNkulunkulu’
AMAKRISTU ATHEMBEKILE ALINDE NGETHEMBA (5 imiz.)
Funda amaRoma 8:22
Namuhla “yonke indalo iyaqhubeka ibubula”
Sonke isintu sibhekana nokonakala engqondweni nasemzimbeni
Imizamo yomuntu yokuzisindisa—yezenhlalo, ezombangazwe, ezomnotho, noma yesayensi—iyobhuntsha na-
kanjani
Funda amaRoma 8:23
Ngisho nabagcotshiweyo—labo abanethemba lasezulwini—‘bayabubula ngaphakathi kubo’
Babhekana nemiphumela yokungapheleli futhi badinga ukusekelwa ngumoya ongcwele lapho bethandazela
usizo (Rom 8:26)
Nakuba bezelwe kabusha njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu, ‘balindele ukutholwa njengamadodana’
Ukuba kwabo ngamadodana okutholwa ngokugcwele, ukwamukela kwabo umvuzo wasezulwini, kuxho-
meke ekwethembekeni kuze kube sekufeni (Rom 8:17)
Funda amaRoma 8:24
Kuze kube yilapho abagcotshiweyo beya ezulwini, uJehova uhlakulela kubo ithemba eliqinile lokuphila eMbu-
sweni wasezulwini
Ngakho, ‘basindiselwa kuleli themba’
Funda amaRoma 8:25
Abagcotshiweyo baqhubeka ‘belilindele ngokukhuthazela’
Abapheli amandla yize ithemba labo lingakafiki (Heb 12:2, 3)
ISIGABA SASEMHLABENI SINETHEMBA ‘LENKULULEKO EKHAZIMULAYO YABANTWANA BAKANKULU-
NKULU’ (6 imiz.)
EyabaseRoma 8:18-25 ngokuyinhloko ibhekiselwe kwabagcotshiweyo, abalangazela ukubusa noKristu eMbusweni
wasezulwini
Ithemba laso sonke esinye isintu liwukubuyiselwa kwalokho u-Adamu akulahla—ukuphila njengabantu abaphe-
lele emhlabeni oyipharadesi (IHu 37:11, 29)
Cishe iningi lethu uma kungethina sonke esilalele le nkulumo sinaleli themba
Amazwi kaPawulu kumaKristu aseRoma abonisa ukuthi insindiso yesintu ihlangene nokwethembeka kukaJesu
nokwabafowabo abagcotshiweyo
Sikhuluma nje, iningi labangu-144 000 ‘linqobile’ futhi selihlezi ezihlalweni zalo ezulwini (IsA 3:5, 12, 21)
Lokhu kusho ukuthi ukwambulwa kwabo kungaqala noma nini
Izimo zezwe ziyakufakazela lokhu; isibonakaliso sokuphela kwalesi simiso esibi sezinto sisobala kakhulu (Mat
24:3, 7-14, 34)
Maduze nje ukwambulwa kwabantwana bakaNkulunkulu kuzoliqeda izwe likaSathane (1Jo 2:17)
Esimisweni esisha sezinto, bayosebenza noKristu ukusiza isintu sizuze lokho u-Adamu akulahla (IsA 21:3, 4)
IZIBUSISO EZIZA ‘NGABANTWANA BAKANKULUNKULU’ MANJE NASESIKHATHINI ESIZAYO (6 imiz.)
Abaseleyo ‘kubantwana bakaNkulunkulu’ abasesemhlabeni bayisibonelo esihle sokholo
Kwamanje basebenza njengomzila wokudla okungokomoya (Mat 24:45-47)
Zinalolu sizo, ‘ezinye izimvu’ zibonisa ukholo esihlengweni sikaJesu, ngethemba lokuzuza isimiso esisha sezi-
nto kungaba ngovuko noma ngokusinda ekupheleni kwalesi simiso (Joh 5:28, 29; 10:16; IsA 7:9, 14)
Ithemba lethu lingokoqobo, nakuba ukugcwaliseka kwalo kusazokwenzeka esikhathini esizayo
Masihlale eduze kwabagcotshiweyo ngokuhlanganyela nenhlangano kaJehova, ‘siqhubeke silinde ngokukhutha-
zela’ ukugcwaliseka kwethemba lethu (Rom 8:25)
Ekugcineni siyoba phakathi kwalabo ‘abakhululwe ekugqilazweni ukonakala futhi sibe nenkululeko ekhazimula-
yo yabantwana bakaNkulunkulu’
(Bheka futhi i-w99-ZU 5/1 4-7; w98-ZU 2/15 17-22; w98-ZU 9/15 15-20; w97-ZU 5/15 14; it-1 50-1; hs 131-7)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe oku-
melwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 141-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45ISIZATHU SOKUBA UPHEPHELE KUJEHOVA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Bonisa ukuthi isiphephelo seqiniso nesihlala njalo kufanele kube esingokomoya. Basize bonke babone izindlela
esingakuqinisa ngazo ukuncika kwethu kuJehova. Nikeza le nkulumo ngemfudumalo nangokuqiniseka
EMHLABENI WONKE ABANTU BAFUNA ISIPHEPHELO (5 imiz.)
Amakhulu ezigidi ayahlupheka ngenxa yobumpofu, indlala, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi, inzondo engokwebala ne-
ngokobuzwe nezimpi zemibango nezezizwe
Izigidi zibalekela kwamanye amazwe (Sebenzisa amanani ayiqiniso atholakalayo; g02-ZU 1/8 3-4)
Ezizweni zonke, abantu bafuna ukukhululwa ekwesabeni, ekuguleni, ezinkingeni zemikhaya, ekucindezelekeni
okungokomzwelo, ebugebengwini nasemuzweni wokuphelelwa ithemba (g98-ZU 2/22 5; g98-ZU 6/8 3-5)
Ukwesaba ukufa kwenza izigidi zifune isiphephelo ezinkolelweni eziningi eziphikisanayo
Sikuqaphela noma singakuqapheli, sonke isintu sifuna isiphephelo
Nokho, zonke izithembiso zezwe zesiphephelo ziholela ekudumaleni (IzA 14:12; w88-ZU 4/15 12)
Abantu bangaphephelaphi? Badinga hlobo luni lwesiphephelo?
ISIPHEPHELO SEQINISO KUFANELE KUBE ESINGOKOMOYA KUQALA (15 imiz.)
Izwe ligxila ezinkingeni ezihlasele isintu; aliyiboni imbangela yangempela
Ukuphila nenjabulo yangempela kutholakala ngokuphelele kuNkulunkulu nasekulaleleni imithetho yakhe
(Shu 12:13)
Umuntu wadalwa encike kuNkulunkulu futhi enezidingo ezingokomoya
NguNkulunkulu kuphela owenza ukuphila kube nenjongo (Jer 10:23, 24; g80 5/22 24)
Umbhangqwana wokuqala walahla uJehova ngamabomu, waqeda ubuhlobo naye futhi wenqaba ukuba abe yi-
siphephelo sawo (Gen 3:17-19)
Umphumela waba ukuxoshwa e-Edene nokuhlukaniswa noNkulunkulu weqiniso
Umphumela esintwini waba yilo lonke usizi abantu abafuna ukuphunyula kulo, ukufa, impi, ubugebengu,
indlala, ukungapheleli ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo nokuhlupheka (Job 14:1, 2, 4; Rom 5:12)
Ukuzinikela kokwesaba uNkulunkulu kwabanye abazibiza ngokuthi bangamaKristu kusivivi (IsA 3:15-17; re-ZU
67-8)
Ngokwehluleka ukwanelisa izidingo zabo ezingokomoya, abaphepheli kuJehova
Sidinga ukuhlola izinto eziza kuqala
Ingabe ingokomoya lethu kanye nobuhlobo bethu noJehova kuza kuqala?
Ingabe senza uJehova abe isiphephelo sethu?
ISIPHEPHELO SOQOBO SINGATHOLAKALA KUPHELA KUJEHOVA (20 imiz.)
Igama likaJehova lingumbhoshongo onamandla nesiphephelo, futhi ‘ukugijimela’ kulo ukuze sivikeleke kudinga
umzamo nesenzo (IzA 18:10)
Amalungiselelo kaJehova esiphephelo ahlangene ngendlela engenakuhlukaniswa negama lakhe, okusikhu-
mbuza izimfanelo nezinjongo zakhe (w93-ZU 11/1 5)
Ukuze uJehova abe indawo yethu yesiphephelo, kufanele sifune ukulunga kwakhe futhi siphile ngakho (IHu
15:1, 2; Mat 6:33)
UJehova uvula umnyango wesiphephelo ngomhlatshelo wesihlengo weNdodana yakhe
Isihlengo singasihlanza izono futhi sisinike indlela yokuba nobuhlobo obuseduze noNkulunkulu (1Jo 2:1, 2, 4, 5)
Singafuna isiphephelo ngomthandazo ngokusekelwe esihlengweni sikaJesu (IHu 65:2; 66:19)
Singambiza uNkulunkulu, sithulule izinhliziyo zethu kuye, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi silwa namademoni
ngokuqondile, sihlupheka enyameni, noma sicindezeleke ngokomzwelo (IHu 62:8; w92-ZU 4/15 4-6)
Lena akuyona impumuzo engokomzwelo nje kuphela, ngoba uJehova uyayilalela ngempela imithandazo
yethu, angasikhulula kunoma isiphi isimo (Jon 2:2)
Kungenzeka asilindele mpendulo, kodwa uJehova uyosinika impumuzo nokuzola kwenhliziyo uma siphi-
kelela emthandazweni (Flp 4:6, 7; Jak 1:5, 6)
Inhlangano kaJehova eqondiswa umoya inikeza isiphephelo
Yeka ukuthi sijabula kanjani ngezihloko ze-Nqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama! ezishaya emhloleni ezisinikeza
iseluleko esingokomBhalo esisivikela ekubeni izisulu zenyama engaphelele, amademoni nokuhlakanipha
kwaleli zwe okuhlala kushintsha! (Kol 2:8)
Inhlangano kaJehova isisiza ukuba sihlaziye iseluleko esiphuma eBhayibhelini ngendlela efanele
INqabayokulinda yasho kufanele: “Abeluleki nezazi zokusebenza kwengqondo abanakulokotha babe ne-
themba lokufinyelela ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda uJehova akubonisayo. ‘Ukuqonda kwakhe akulandise-
ki.’ (IHubo 147:5) Kunokuba sincike ekuhlakanipheni kwabantu bezwe abavelele noma emizwelweni
yethu engaqondiswa ulwazi, masibheke kuJehova, iZwi lakhe, nakubadala ebandleni lobuKristu ukuze
sithole iseluleko esivuthiwe” (w93-ZU 12/15 13)

No. 142-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45THEMBELA KUNKULUNKULU WENDUDUZO YONKE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Le nkulumo kufanele ikhulume kuphela ngenduduzo nethemba elingokomBhalo. Kumelwe inikeze umbono oqo-
ndile futhi yakhe. Qokomisa ukuthi ukuthembela kwethu kuJehova, emandleni eZwi lakhe, emoyeni wakhe na-
selungiselelweni elihle kakhulu lomhlatshelo wesihlengo elihlanganisa zonke izici kusiduduza futhi kusikhutha-
ze ngayiphi indlela ukuze sihlale siqinile okholweni phakathi nalezi zinsuku zokugcina ezigcwele izinkinga
UJEHOVA UNIKEZA LABO ABATHEMBELA KUYE INDUDUZO ABAYIDINGAYO (7 imiz.)
Sonke isintu sidinga induduzo (Rom 8:22)
Wonke umkhaya wesintu ubhekana nezinkinga eziningi ekuphileni, futhi ukungapheleli kuholela ekufeni (Job
14:1, 2; IHu 90:10)
Yeka ukuthi kufanele sibonge kanjani ngokuthi uJehova unguNkulunkulu wenduduzo!
IZwi lakhe elilotshiwe lisinika induduzo nethemba (Rom 15:4)
Wathumela uJesu njengoMduduzi ephethe umyalezo okhuthazayo (Luk 4:18, 19)
UJesu waqinisekisa abalilayo ukuthi babeyoduduzwa (Mat 5:4; it-1 1033)
Bonke abasindwayo bangeza kuJesu ukuze abaphumuze futhi abaqabule (Mat 11:28-30)
IMPUMUZO EHLALA NJALO IZOFIKA MADUZANE (4 imiz.)
Isiprofetho seBhayibheli sibonisa ukuthi ngokushesha uNkulunkulu uzoqeda ukugula, ukudabuka nokufa kule
planethi (IsA 21:3, 4)
Akekho oyoguga, oyoshonelwa abantu abathandayo, oyocindezeleka noma adumazeke, noma abhekane nezi-
nhlekelele ekuphileni
Umhlaba uyoshintshwa ube ipharadesi, njengoba nje uNkulunkulu ayehlosile ekuqaleni (Is 45:18; 55:11)
UJehova uNkulunkulu uyokwenza zonke izinto zibe zintsha (IsA 21:5)
Lezi zinto zizokwenzeka maduzane, kodwa kuze kube yilapho zenzeka, kudingeka sizigcine siqinile ngokomo-
ya ngokuthembela ngokuphelele kuJehova futhi sibe nokholo kuye
MANJE YISIKHATHI SOKUBONISA UKUTHI SIYAMETHEMBA UJEHOVA (15 imiz.)
Akukaze kube nesidingo esingaka sokuba abantu babonise ukuthi bayamthanda uJehova futhi bayamethemba
Ngokutadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, siyazi ukuthi siphila engxenyeni yokugcina yezinsuku zokugcina (2Ti 3:
1-5)
UNkulunkulu wenduduzo yonke uye wenza amalungiselelo adingekayo ukuze asisize sibhekane nezinkinga fu-
thi sikhuthazele kulezi zikhathi ezinzima (2Ko 1:3)
Ukududuzwa kwethu kuxhomeke ekuthembeleni ezithembisweni zikaJehova nasekusebenziseni amalungise-
lelo akhe
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ziyini izimo zethu ekuphileni, uNkulunkulu usinxusa ukuba sithembele kuye naselu-
ngiselelweni lakhe lenduduzo nensindiso ngoKristu (2Thes 2:16, 17)
Ukholo emhlatshelweni wesihlengo lubalulekile
Uma siphenduka, inani legazi likaJesu elachitheka lisibekela izono zethu (1Jo 2:1, 2)
Lisisiza ukuba sikhuthazele manje, njengoba lisenza sikwazi ukuba nonembeza omuhle nobuhlobo obuhle
noNkulunkulu (1Jo 4:14-16)
Liyisisekelo sokusinda e-Armagedoni nokuthola ukuphila ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu (IsA 7:14)
Ngokwethembela kuJehova, sithola induduzo ngezithembiso nangeziprofetho zakhe ezitholakala eBhayibhelini
Sisizwa ukuba sikhuthazele ngokulindela ngokuqiniseka uvuko nezinye izinto eziyokwenzeka eziyoletha
impumuzo enkulu kubantu abathembekile (IHu 37:9-11; IzA 2:21, 22; IzE 24:15)
Ngokuthandaza ngobuqotho kuJehova, sicele umoya wakhe, sifakazela ukuthi siyamethemba (Luk 11:9-13)
Siyaduduzeka futhi siqine kakhulu lapho ephendula imikhuleko yethu yokucela usizo ngokwentando yakhe
(1Jo 3:22; 5:14)
Kunokususa isilingo, uNkulunkulu angase akhethe ukusinika amandla angaphezu kwavamile ukuze sikwazi
ukusikhuthazelela (2Ko 4:7-10; w92-ZU 2/1 32)
Singaqhubeka sibhekana nanoma yini uNkulunkulu ayivumelayo ngokuthembela kuye, sazi ukuthi ekugci-
neni kuyophela konke okubi nokulimazayo (Is 65:17)
Izibonelo zezinceku ezithembekile zasendulo nezanamuhla ziyasikhuthaza ukuba sikhuthazele (w93-ZU 9/15
11-14)
Inhlangano kaJehova ebonakalayo isinika izikhumbuzo ezifika ngesikhathi ngemihlangano emikhulu neminca-
ne, ngababonisi abajikelezayo nangabadala abamiswe ngomoya ongcwele (2Pe 3:1, 2)
Yeka ukuthi kududuza futhi kuqabula kanjani ukuzuza kula malungiselelo!
No. 143-ZU
11/00LINGISA UJEHOVA NGOKUDUDUZA ABANYE (14 imiz.)
Ukuqaphela indlela uNkulunkulu asiduduza ngayo kusishukumisela ukuba siduduze abanye, sibanike isizathu
sethemba lethu (2Ko 1:4; 1Pe 3:15)
Lapho sazisa abanye izindaba ezinhle zensindiso, nathi siyazizuzisa (IzE 15:3; 1Ko 9:23; w97-ZU 10/15 19; la-
ndisa kafushane ngokuhlangenwe nakho okunyathelisiwe noma ngendaba ebonisa indlela okwamjabulisa
ngayo ummemezeli woMbuso ukuhlanganyela nabanye amaqiniso)
Ukuze ududuze labo abashonelwe ababathandayo, chaza lokho iZwi likaNkulunkulu elikushoyo ngembangela
yokufa; bazise ngethemba lovuko (Joh 5:28, 29; Rom 5:12; 6:23; w00-ZU 7/15 10-20)
Duduza abagulayo, futhi ukhulume ngendlela eduduzayo kwabacindezelekile, abanesizungu nabadangele (1Thes
5:14; w99-ZU 5/15 25-8; w94-ZU 9/15 21-4)
Baqinisekise ngokuthi uJehova unomusa nokuthi akakhohlwa inkonzo yabo yokwethembeka (Heb 6:10)
Izimo zabo zingase zibhekwe njengovivinyo lokholo nokukhuthazela kwabo
Kuyaduduza ukwazi ukuthi uJehova ngeke avume balingwe ngaphezu kwalokho abangakuthwala (1Ko
10:13)
Sebenzisa izincwadi zeNhlangano, njengamapheshana, izincwajana nezahluko ezikhuluma ngaleyo ndaba encwa-
dini ethi Ulwazi
Kwenze kucace ukuthi uJehova akayona imbangela yokuhlupheka, ukuthi uyazi ukuthi siluthuli nokuthi aka-
lindele kithi okungaphezu kwalokho esingakwenza (IHu 103:10-14)
Bonisa indlela uNkulunkulu asinxusa ngayo ukuba siphonse imithwalo yethu kuye (IHu 55:22)
Masihlakulele ukumethemba ngenhliziyo yonke uJehova, sazi ukuthi angasisiza ezimweni esingenakuzishi-
ntsha ngaphambi kwe-Armagedoni (w00-ZU 1/15 24; funda futhi uchaze izAga 3:5, 6)
Njengoba siduduza abanye, nathi siyoba nenjabulo (IzA 19:17; IzE 20:35)

 ́
UJehova unikeze ubufakazi obuningi bokuthi uyasithanda (Joh 3:16)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45IBANDLA ELITHEMBEKILE NGAPHANSI KOKUHOLA KUKAKRISTU

Siza izilaleli zibone ukuthi uJehova ufuna izinceku zakhe zithembeke. Lapho ubonisa ukungefani kwezibonelo ze-
Bhayibheli zokuthembeka nokungathembeki, gcizelela ukuthi labo ababethembekile balondoloza ubuhlobo obuhle
