UJEHOVA UBATHANDA KAKHULU ABATHEMBEKILE BAKHE (4 imiz.)
Ukuthembeka kuwumusa onamathela entweni ngothando kuze kube yilapho injongo yawo ngaleyo nto isifeze-
kile (it-2 280)
UNkulunkulu usebenzelana ngokuthembeka nabathembekileyo (2Sa 22:26)
Lokhu kubonakala endleleni uJehova asebenzelana ngayo ‘noqotho’ wakhe oyinhloko, uJesu (IHu 16:10)
Wavusa uJesu wamphakamisela ‘kwesokunene’ saKhe (IzE 2:24-28, 31-36)
Wamisa uJesu njengeNhloko yebandla (Efe 1:20-22; Kol 1:18)
UJehova ubaphatha ngomusa abathembekile, futhi uphendula imithandazo yabo (IHu 4:3)
Ngenxa yobuqotho babo nokuthembela kwabo kuye, uJehova uqapha indlela yabo futhi abanike umoya wa-
khe (1Sa 2:9; IzE 5:32)
Kuhle ukuba sazi ukuthi ukuthembeka kuhilelani nokuthi singakubonisa kanjani
IZIBONELO EZISEMIBHALWENI ZOKUTHEMBEKA NOKUNGATHEMBEKI (17 imiz.)
Ukuhlola izibonelo zeBhayibheli zokuthembeka nokungathembeki kuNkulunkulu kungathuthukisa ukuqonda
kwethu ukuthembeka kokwesaba uNkulunkulu
UJakobe no-Esawu
U-Esawu ‘wadelela ubuzibulo,’ wayethanda ukuzanelisa yena ‘kunezinto ezingcwele’ (Gen 25:34; Heb 12:
16, 17)
Izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu noma ubuhlobo bakhe naYe wayengakubheki njengokubalulekile; wayenge-
nawo umqondo ongokomoya
UJakobe wayezazisa ngobuqotho izinto ezingcwele, njengelungelo lobuzibulo
Ukuziphatha kukaJakobe nesimo sakhe sengqondo ngokuphathelene nezithembiso zikaNkulunkulu kwe-
nza ukuba uJehova amthande (Rom 9:13)
Waba ngukhokho kaJesu Kristu
UMose noKhora
UKhora wayengamhloniphi uJehova namalungiselelo enhlangano yakhe (w00-ZU 8/1 10-11; w97-ZU 8/1 8-9)
Wakhuluma kabi ngalabo ababehola futhi wazifunela udumo (Num 16:1-3; Jude 11)
UMose wayelihlonipha ngokujulile izwi likaJehova negunya lakhe, wayethobekile futhi enesineke (Eks 18:
17-19a, 24)
Nakuba ayefundiswe konke ukuhlakanipha kwaseGibhithe, akazange azicabangele ngokweqile (Num
12:3; IzE 7:22)
Wafanekisela uJesu njengomprofethi othembekile (IzE 3:22, 23; Heb 3:1, 2, 5; w84 9/15 31)
UFinehasi noBhileyamu
UBhileyamu waphishekela inkambo yobugovu engqubuzana nentando kaJehova, wakhuthaza ubufebe (IsA
2:14)
UFinehasi wayethembekile kuJehova futhi eshisekela ukuhlanzeka kwebandla likaNkulunkulu, kungakha-
thaliseki ukuthi izigilamkhuba zaziziningi noma zivelele kangakanani (Num 25:6-9, 14, 15)
Kubikwa ngaye njengesibonelo esivelele somuntu owayezinikele ekulungeni (IHu 106:30, 31)
UJehova wenza isivumelwano naye sokuthi ubupristi babuyohlala ohlwini lozalo lwakhe (Num 25:10-13)
UDavide noSawule
USawule waqinisa ikhanda wagabadela; akazange anamathele ngokuthembeka ezwini likaJehova ngoku-
phathelene nama-Amaleki nenkosi yawo, u-Agagi
UNkulunkulu wamlahla uSawule (1Sa 15:17-23)
UDavide, indoda eyayivumelana nenhliziyo kaJehova, wathembela kuJehova ngokuphelele
Ngokungafani noSawule, wawavuma ngokuthobeka amaphutha akhe futhi waphenduka ezonweni zakhe
ezimbi (IHu 51:1-4)
Wabonisa uthando olujulile ngoJehova futhi njalo wabonisa isimo esihle senhliziyo (IzE 13:22)
Wakhonza njengomanduleli kaJesu (Jer 23:5, 6; Mat 1:1)
No. 144-ZU
11/00INDLELA ESINGABONISA NGAYO UKUTHEMBEKA KUKRISTU NASEBANDLENI (20 imiz.)
Abathembekile bayazithoba emalungiselelweni angokwasezulwini (1Ko 11:3)
Amalungu ebandla kufanele athembeke kuKristu, iNhloko yebandla lobuKristu (Mat 23:10; Efe 5:23)
Bonke abazihlanganisa nebandla lobuKristu kufanele babonise ukuthembeka okufanayo elungiselelweni li-
kaNkulunkulu (1Ti 2:8; Thi 1:8)
“Inceku ethembekileyo neqondayo” inakekela izithakazelo zasemhlabeni zebandla futhi ibonakala ngomsebe-
nzi ewenzayo (Mat 24:45-47)
Abathembekileyo banamathela ngokuthembeka esigabeni senceku, basisekele ngokugcwele (Mat 25:40; IzE
16:4, 5)
Abathembekileyo bafunda ezibonelweni ezisemiBhalweni (Rom 15:4)
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezithembekileyo zilingisa umoya kaJakobe futhi ziyazikhandla ukuze zibe nomqo-
ndo ongokomoya
Zizazisa kakhulu futhi ziyazisekela izinto ezingcwele, njengeZwi likaNkulunkulu, imihlangano yebandla,
nomsebenzi wokushumayela (w88-ZU 6/15 10-15)
Ziyaqaphela ukuthi ibandla lobuKristu liyithuluzi likaNkulunkulu nokuthi injongo yalo iwukumemezela
ubuhle bukaJehova (1Pe 2:9, 10)
UJehova uyabathanda abathobeke njengoMose, futhi ubapha umusa ongafanelwe (Rom 12:3; Jak 4:6)
Abanjalo abazikhukhumezi noma baphelelwe yisineke (w00-ZU 8/1 12)
Bayaqaphela bangakhulumi kabi ngezinceku zikaJehova nangamalungiselelo enhlangano yakhe
Basamukela ngokushesha isiqondiso esingokwasezulwini (Heb 13:17)
AmaKristu athembekileyo abonakalisa umoya kaFinehasi
Abonisa ukuthembeka ezindinganisweni zikaJehova zokuziphatha futhi aphakamisa ukuhlanzeka kweba-
ndla okungokomoya engayekethisi (Kol 3:5; 2Pe 2:15, 16; 3:11, 14)
Azigcina ehlukile ezweni nasezindleleni zalo (Jak 4:4)
NjengoDavide, abathembekile bazinikele kuNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yonke
Abayeki ukulwa impi engokomoya
Bayashesha ukubonisa abanye umusa nesihawu (Efe 4:32; 1Pe 3:8)
Ukuthembeka kuyosishukumisela ukuba sibazise ngempela ubuhlobo bethu noNkulunkulu, simkhonze ngoku-
thembeka futhi sibhekane nokushushiswa ngokungesabi
Kuyosisiza ukuba sibe nemfanelo evivinyiwe yokholo lwethu (1Pe 1:6, 7)
UKUTHEMBEKA EKUHOLENI KUKAKRISTU KULETHA IZIBUSISO (4 imiz.)
Zazise izinzuzo zokuthembeka elungiselelweni elingokwasezulwini
Phakathi kwezibusiso eziningi, kunesibusiso sobunye ebandleni, esiletha ukuthula nokuhleleka (IHu 133:1; 1Ko
14:33, 40)
Ibandla lobuKristu elithembekile lihluke ngokuphelele ezweni lesintu esinobugovu, esingathembekile nesi-
hlukene phakathi
Njengoba kwaprofethwa, izigidi ziyasibona manje isidingo sokuzihlanganisa no-Israyeli ongokomoya, iba-
ndla likaNkulunkulu (Zak 8:23; IsA 7:9, 14, 15)
Hlanganyela njalo nebandla likaJehova elingcwele futhi ulihloniphe ngokujulile
Zithobe kuKristu, iNhloko yebandla, naselungiselelweni elingokwasezulwini
Qiniseka ngokuthi uJehova noKristu wakhe bayohlala bethembekile kwabathembekileyo babo (IHu 18:25; 97:
10; IzA 2:8)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 144-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UBANI ONJENGOJEHOVA UNKULUNKULU WETHU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yakha ukwazisa ngezimfanelo zikaJehova ezivelele, ubonise ukuthi kufanele sizibonise kanjani lezo zimfanelo
KUNONKULUNKULU ABANINGI BAMANGA (8 imiz.)
Isintu siye sakhonza onkulunkulu abaningi
Ngisho nezinkolo zanamuhla ezinjengobuShinto nobuHindu zithi kunezigidi zonkulunkulu (sh-ZU 97, 191)
Abaningi kweLobukholwa bathi “osanta” babo abaningi ababona onkulunkulu, nokho bahlonipha labo “santa”
ngendlela efanayo nokubakhulekela
Kunezinhlobo eziningi zokukhulekela ezicashile ezihlanganisa izifiso zobugovu (Rom 1:24-27; Kol 3:5)
Into umuntu ayithanda ngokweqile kalula nje ingaphambukisa uthando lwakhe ngoMdali, bese iba isi-
thombe
Ngokwesibonelo, umuntu angaba isigqila sesisu sakhe, okungukuthi, abe isigqila sezifiso zenyama futhi
azenze zibe onkulunkulu bakhe (Rom 16:18; Flp 3:18, 19)
“Unkulunkulu walesi simiso sezinto,” uSathane uDeveli udukisa abantu ukuba bakhulekele onkulunkulu bama-
nga (2Ko 4:4)
UJEHOVA, UNKULUNKULU ONGENAKUQHATHANISWA, UYABAVIKELA FUTHI ABAKHULULE ABANTU
BAKHE (10 imiz.)
Kuyilungelo ukukhulekela uJehova, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso (1Ko 8:5, 6)
Akekho uNkulunkulu ofana noJehova (IHu 86:8)
Umhubi wabuza, “Ubani onjengoJehova uNkulunkulu wethu?” (IHu 113:5)
Onkulunkulu abayizithombe abangaphili abasoze bavikela futhi bakhulule (IHu 115:4-8; w92-ZU 11/15 11)
Onkulunkulu baseGibhithe abazange babavikele abakhulekeli babo (w93-ZU 7/15 3-5)
UJehova ubonisile ukuthi unamandla okukhulula abantu bakhe
UJehova wavikela ama-Israyeli ekuqothulweni lapho ekhuthazelela ubugqila baseGibhithe
UFaro akabanga namandla okuvimbela ukukhululwa kwama-Israyeli (Eks 14:25-28)
Esebenzisa izinhlupho, uJehova wabahlaza futhi wabahlulela onkulunkulu bamanga baseGibhithe (Eks 12:
12; it-1 976)
Inkosi yase-Asiriya yezwa ukuthi uJehova walwela izakhamuzi zaseJerusalema, wazikhulula ezitheni zazo
(2Kh 19:32-35)
Inkosi yaseBhabhiloni uNebukhadinesari kwadingeka ivume ukuthi uJehova mkhulu ngemva kokuba ekhu-
lule amaHebheru amathathu (Dan 3:29)
Njengoba enguMvikeli wabantu bakhe, uJehova uyakufanelekela ukudunyiswa
UDavide wadumisa uJehova njengoMkhululi (IHu 35:10)
Ukuthembela kwethu kuJehova njengoMvikeli noMkhululi kuyosisekela phakathi ‘nosizi olukhulu,’ oluseduze
(Mat 24:21)
IZIMFANELO ZIKAJEHOVA EZIVELELE ZIYABONAKALA KUBANTU BAKHE (22 imiz.)
Abantu bakaJehova bayakulwela ukubonakalisa izimfanelo zakhe ezinhle (Efe 5:1)
Cabanga ngezinye izibonelo
Ubungcwele buyimfanelo kaJehova, abuyona imfanelo yonkulunkulu bamanga (1Sa 2:2)
Buyisimo sokuba ngcwele, sokuhlanzeka ngokomoya (it-1 1127-31)
Sizuza ukuma okungcwele phambi kukaJehova ngokusebenzisa iZwi likaNkulunkulu
Nakuba singaphelele, ukuvumela ukuqondiswa umoya ongcwele kusisiza ukuba sifinyelele ubungcwele
ngezinga elithile
Uthando luyimfanelo kaJehova eyinhloko (1Jo 4:8)
UJehova wabonisa uthando lwakhe ngokwenza umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe futhi afane naye, enekhono
lokuthanda nelokwazisa izinto ezingokomoya (Gen 1:26, 27)
Uthando lobuzalwane luwuphawu lwabalandeli beNdodana kaNkulunkulu (Joh 13:35)
Uthando lusishukumisela ukuba sisize abanye lapho behlelwa inhlekelele ( jv-ZU 712)
Ngothando, sikhuluma “ngezindaba ezinhle zensindiso” (Funda amaHubo 96:2)
Amandla ayimfanelo kaJehova engenakuqhathaniswa
Amandla kaNkulunkulu ‘nobuningi bamandla’ akhe kubonakala endalweni yakhe (Is 40:25, 26)
Usiza abantu bakhe ukuba baphinde bathole amandla (Is 40:28-31)
Sincika emandleni avela kuNkulunkulu ukuze senze inkonzo yakhe (2Ko 4:7, 8)
Ubulungisa bubonakala kuzo zonke izindlela zikaJehova (Dut 32:4)
UnguMahluleli Ophakeme noMniki-zimiso (Is 33:22)
Njengezikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu, kumelwe sibonise ubulungisa (Mik 6:8)
No. 145-ZU
11/00Ezweni elisha, uKristu nalabo abasezikhundleni zokubusa ngaphansi kwakhe bayohlala njalo bebonisa ubu-
lungisa (it-2 140-1)
Ukulunga kuyimfanelo kaJehova ehlobene eduze nobulungisa bakhe (IHu 119:137; IzE 10:34, 35)
Amagama esiHebheru nesiGreki anencazelo yokulunga, ubuqotho
Sifuna ukulunga kukaJehova ngokwenza ngokuvumelana nezindinganiso zakhe (Mat 6:33; it-2 809-11)
Ukuhlakanipha ngomqondo ophelele kutholakala kuJehova (Rom 16:27; it-2 1189-95)
Isibonelo esizidlula zonke sokuhlakanipha kwakhe yindlela axazulula ngayo ukuhlubuka kwase-Edene, eku-
gcineni aqede ngokuphelele imiphumela yako futhi abuyisele ukuthula nokuzwana emkhayeni wakhe we-
mbulunga yonke (1Ko 2:7)
UJehova unikeza ukuhlakanipha, kodwa kufanele sikufune ngokholo (Jak 1:5-8)
AmaKristu alwela ukwenza izinqumo ezihlakaniphile, angenzi ngobuwula, kodwa ‘aqonde ukuthi iyini inta-
ndo kaJehova’ (Efe 5:15-20; Kol 4:5, 6)
Ngenxa yalezi zizathu ezandulele nezinye eziningi, uJehova uvelele futhi kufanele sizinikele ngokuphelele kuye
(Eks 20:4, 5)
MEMEZELA INKAZIMULO KAJEHOVA, OWUKUPHELA KUKANKULUNKULU WEQINISO (5 imiz.)
UJehova unguMdali futhi akanakuqhathaniswa
UbuNkulunkulu bakhe namandla akhe angenasiphelo kubonakala endalweni (Rom 1:20)
Ngakho-ke, asinazaba zokungamkhonzi
IBhayibheli liyasembulela ubuntu bukaJehova ikakhulukazi ngezindaba elizilandisa ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe
yodwa (Joh 1:18)
UJehova uye wavusa oFakazi bakhe ukuba bamemezele inkazimulo yakhe futhi benze igama lakhe laziwe (Is
43:10, 11)
Izinhliziyo zethu zisishukumisela ukuba sidumise uJehova (Eks 15:11)
Kanye nezinye izigidi, masikhamuluke ngamaphimbo ethu sithi akekho uNkulunkulu ofana neNkosi engu-
Mninimandla onke uJehova!
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okufanele ifu-
ndwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 145-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45SEBENZISA IMFUNDO UKUZE UDUMISE UJEHOVA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nikeza le nkulumo ngendlela ekhangayo nenokulinganisela. Siza izilaleli zigxile enjongweni yangempela yoku-
phila—ukwazi uJehova nokumkhonza ngokwethembeka. Imfundo kufanele ithuthukise ikhono namathuba ethu
okudumisa uJehova futhi kufanele isisize siyinakekele ngempumelelo imithwalo yethu yemfanelo yobuKristu
IMFUNDO IYINGXENYE EBALULEKILE YOKUPHILA KOBUKRISTU (5 imiz.)
NjengamaKristu eqiniso, oFakazi BakaJehova bayazisa kakhulu imfundo
Ngemfundo, sifunda indlela yokuphatha abanye (Mat 7:12)
Imfundo isihlomisela ukuba sinakekele imithwalo yethu yemfanelo, engokwenyama nengokomoya (1Ti 5:8;
g98-ZU 3/8 19-21)
Ngemfundo, sifunda ngoNkulunkulu nangezinjongo zakhe
Imfundo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukusisiza silalele futhi sidumise uJehova (Shu 12:13; g99-ZU 7/22 13)
IMFUNDO KUFANELE IQALE KUPHI FUTHI NINI? (6 imiz.)
Imfundo ichazwa “njengenqubo lapho abantu bethola khona ulwazi, amakhono, inhlonipho, izimiso, noma izimo
zengqondo” (The World Book Encyclopedia; it-1 682)
Imfundo kufanele iqale ekhaya lapho abazali befundisa izingane zabo ziseyizinsana (2Ti 3:14, 15; w99-ZU 2/1 32;
g98-ZU 1/22 8; w96-ZU 2/1 12)
Izingane zingayifunda inhlonipho, isimo sengqondo, izimiso namakhono amahle zisencane
Eziningi zifundiswa ukufunda zingakangeni nasesikoleni (w96-ZU 7/15 31; w88-ZU 8/1 13)
Siza abasha bakhe ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu noNkulunkulu (w96-ZU 12/1 15-16)
Fundisa izingane imikhuba emihle, ukuhlonipha abanye nokuziphatha okufanele
Abazali banendima enkulu yokufundisa izingane zabo (Bheka esithi “Imibuzo Yokuzihlola Kwabazali Siqu”
g88-ZU 9/8 12)
Imfundo yobuKristu etholakala ebandleni ayibakhululi abazali emthwalweni wabo wemfanelo (Efe 6:4)
IMIGOMO EYISISEKELO YEMFUNDO ELINGANISELWE (15 imiz.)
Imfundo kufanele ngokuyinhloko isetshenziselwe ukudumisa uJehova
UJesu wabeka isibonelo kule ndaba (Joh 7:16-18)
Ukuze idumise uJehova, intsha kufanele ilandele izimiso ezingokomBhalo lapho isebenza ngenkuthalo ezifu-
ndweni zayo zesikole (IHu 119:9-12; Kol 3:23; w96-ZU 2/1 11-14)
Funda ukufunda kahle
Lifunde kahle ikhono lokubhala ngokucacile
Thuthuka ngokwengqondo, ngokuziphatha nangokomoya
Thola ukuqeqeshwa okuwusizo ekuphileni kwansuku zonke
Abazali banomthwalo wemfanelo wokuqondisa izingane zabo ekutheni kufanele ziphishekele imfundo ye-
zwe engakanani (w97-ZU 8/15 21)
Noma yimuphi umKristu ocabangela imfundo yokwenezela kufanele abhekisise izinzuzo ezingatholakala
nezinkinga (g98-ZU 3/8 20)
Isisusa akufanele sibe udumo noma ingcebo
Umgomo kufanele kube ukuzisekela thina ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza uJehova ngokugcwele ngangoku-
nokwenzeka enkonzweni yobuKristu (w99-ZU 9/1 16-17; w96-ZU 12/1 17-19)
INDLELA UJEHOVA AFUNDISA NGAYO ABANTU BAKHE (15 imiz.)
UJehova unguMfundisi omkhulu kunabo bonke
UNkulunkulu usebenzisa iZwi lakhe nenhlangano yakhe ebonakalayo ukuze anikeze imfundo ebalulekile na-
muhla (Job 36:22; Is 54:13; w00-ZU 5/1 14-16)
Ngokungafani nokuhlakanipha kwezwe, ukufundisa kukaJehova kuhlale kubazuzisa labo abakulandelayo (Is
48:17; w00-ZU 6/1 29-31)
Imfundo yaphezulu ihlanganisa nokufundisa ukucabanga, ukukhuluma, ukulalela, ukubambisana nabanye noku-
bonisa uthando (IzA 2:10, 11)
Ukufunda iBhayibheli njalo kugcina inhliziyo nengqondo kugxile ezintweni ezibaluleke kakhulu futhi kwa-
kha ukholo (IHu 1:1-3; 2Ti 3:16, 17)
Ukufunda izincwadi zeNhlangano, njenge-Nqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama! kunikeza ukuqonda okungokomo-
ya, kuvula ingqondo futhi kuthuthukise ulwazi lwethu (w00-ZU 2/15 32; g00-ZU 5/8 32)
Ngaleyo ndlela, siye safunda ngoJehova, uJesu Kristu, isihlengo, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu, izwe elisha, ithe-
mba ngabafileyo, ukuziphatha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu, njalo njalo
Ukuba khona emihlanganweni yebandla kunikeza umuntu ithuba lokuthuthuka ekhonweni lokukhuluma no-
kufundisa (Mat 28:19, 20; w99-ZU 8/1 7)
No. 146-ZU
11/00Ukuhlanganyela enkonzweni ngokwako kuyimfundo eyigugu
Ukusiza ekulungiseni iHholo LoMbuso, ekwakhiweni kwezakhiwo ezingokwasezulwini nokusiza emihlanga-
nweni kusifundisa ukuhlela nokusebenzelana nabanye
Inhlangano kaJehova ifundisa ukulalela uNkulunkulu, uKristu, ibandla, abazali, ‘amagunya aphakeme’ (Rom
13:1; IzE 5:29; Efe 6:1; Flp 2:10; Heb 13:17)
Imfundo yaphezulu kuphela eholela ekuphileni kwangempela (1Ti 6:17-19)
SEBENZISA IMFUNDO UKUZE UDUMISE UMFUNDISI OMKHULU (4 imiz.)
Siyohlala sifunda kuMfundisi wethu Omkhulu (Is 30:20)
Kuyofundwa izinto eziningi ezintsha “emiqulwini” (IsA 20:12; re-ZU 298-300)
Labo abamagama abo abhalwe ‘emqulwini wokuphila’ bayobe bezuzile emfundweni enikezwa nguJehova
UJehova namuhla usifundisa ukuba sibone impikiswano yendawo yonke ebhekene nesintu sisonke
IZwi likaNkulunkulu nenhlangano yakhe kusisiza ukuba sihlole izinto ezibalulekile ngokuqondene noku-
khulekela kwethu nemigomo yomuntu siqu
Ukuze sibonise ukuthi siyambonga uNkulunkulu, sizama ukugcina iso lilula ngokufuna uMbuso kuqala (Mat
6:22, 33, 34)
NjengoJesu, uMfundisi Omkhulu, masisebenzise imfundo nezinye izinto ukuze sidumise uJehova (Is 2:3, 4)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo okufanele ifu-
ndwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 146-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45THEMBELA EMANDLENI KAJEHOVA ASINDISAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukuthi ukuba nobuhlobo bomuntu siqu noJehova kusisiza ukuba sibhekane nezinkinga. Shu-
kumisa izilaleli ukuba zibonise ukumethemba kakhulu uJehova
BONKE ABANTU BADINGA AMANDLA KAJEHOVA ASINDISAYO (5 imiz.)
Siphila ezweni elinezinkathazo (Rom 8:22)
Izinkinga zomhlaba wonke zisongela ukuphila kwesintu
Impi, ukungcoliswa kwendawo esizungezile, ubugebengu, nodlame kuyaqhubeka
Izinkinga zomuntu siqu nezingcindezi zikhandla abantu ngokwengqondo nangokomzwelo
Abanye babhekene nokugula okungokomzwelo okulandela ngemva kwezinhlekelele
Abaningi balwa nezinkinga zempilo, ubuthakathaka, ukuguga, izinkinga zomnotho, ukuntuleka kwemise-
benzi nokuntenga kwezomnotho
Lokho kuphumela ekulahlekelweni injabulo nokuthula kwengqondo, ekukhathazekeni, ngisho nasekucinde-
zelekeni okukhulu
“Yonke inhlangano yabafowenu ezweni” ibhekana nalokhu kuhlupheka (1Pe 5:9)
Sibhekene nesikhathi sezinkathazo ezinzima ezingakaze zibonwe ngaphambili
“Usizi olukhulu” olusondela ngokushesha luyovivinya ukwethembela kwethu emandleni kaJehova asindisa-
yo (Mat 24:21)
AMANDLA KAJEHOVA ASINDISAYO ABONAKALISWA ENDULO (15 imiz.)
Osukwini lukaNowa, umhlaba wagcwala ubudlova (Gen 6:5, 11, 12)
Kufanele ukuba ukuhlala kulelo zwe elinobudlova kwabangela uNowa olungileyo nomkhaya wakhe ukucinde-
zeleka okukhulu
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, uNkulunkulu walahlulela lelo zwe elibi, waliqeda ngokuphelele (Gen 6:13, 17; 7:
11, 12)
Nokho, uNowa nomkhaya wakhe basinda (Gen 7:23)
Ukukhulekela kweqiniso kwasinda kuZamcolo ngenxa kaNowa olungileyo (Gen 8:20; it-2 507, 660)
Ngemva kwamakhulu eminyaka, abantu ababaziwa ngokuthi abaseGibheyoni nabo babona amandla kaJehova
asindisayo (it-1 930-1)
Ama-Israyeli ayeyalwe ukuba abhubhise aqede zonke izizwe zamaKhanani (Dut 7:1)
Nokho, abaseGibheyoni babemesaba ngenhlonipho uJehova futhi bathumela izithunywa kuJoshuwa
Ngobuqili, benza ukuthula no-Israyeli (Jos 9:3-15)
Ukukholelwa kwabaseGibheyoni emandleni kaJehova asindisayo kwabonakala lapho besongelwa amakhosi
amahlanu aseKhanani; bacela usizo kuJoshuwa
Esebenzisa amatshe amakhulu esichotho futhi ngokumangalisayo elula imini ibe yinde, uJehova wabalwe-
la abaseGibheyoni futhi wabasindisa (Jos 10:1-14; it-2 662)
Ezinsukwini zikaHezekiya no-Isaya, uJehova wasindisa abantu bakhe esandleni sikaSaneheribi, wabasindisa eku-
gconeni nasekudelelweni uRabishake (2Kh 18:17–19:37; Is, izahl. 36, 37; it-2 725-6, 893-5)
UHezekiya wathembela kuJehova nasemandleni omthandazo
UJehova wamlalela uHezekiya, futhi esebenzisa umprofethi u-Isaya, wamqinisekisa ukuthi iJerusalema la-
liyosinda
Ingelosi kaJehova yabulala abase-Asiriya abangu-185 000 ngobusuku obubodwa
USaneheribi kamuva wabulawa amadodana akhe
Kwaba yize ukujivaza kukaRabishake uJehova
Umphostoli uPetru waboshwa nguHerode Agripha, owayehlose ukumbulala (IzE 12:1-11; it-1 1097)
Ingelosi kaJehova yamkhulula uPetru ukuze aqhubeke nenkonzo yakhe (w90-ZU 6/1 20)
UJehova usiqinisekisa ngokuthi labo abambiza ngokholo futhi abamethemba ngokuphelele bayosindiswa (IzE 2:
21; Rom 10:13)
Uselenzile kakade ilungiselelo lokuba sisindiswe
UJESU KRISTU UYITHULUZI LIKAJEHOVA LENSINDISO (10 imiz.)
Kusukela u-Adamu ahlubuka, isintu siye sahlushwa imiphumela yesono nokufa futhi siye sadinga amandla ka-
Jehova asindisayo (Rom 5:12)
Isiprofetho sokuqala esiseBhayibhelini sabhekisela endleleni kaJehova yensindiso, ‘inzalo’ ethenjisiwe (Gen 3:15)
Ukuthi le ‘nzalo’ yayizoba ngubani nokuthi yayiyoyiletha kanjani insindiso, kwahlala kuyimfihlo iminyaka
engu-4 000 (Rom 16:25, 26; it-2 836-7)
Leyo nzalo yaba nguJesu (Gen 22:18; Gal 3:15, 16)
No. 147-ZU
11/00UJehova wabeka isisekelo esiqinile sokuba nokholo eNdodaneni yakhe (Mat 11:2-6)
Manje “imfihlo engcwele” kaNkulunkulu yayisizomenyezelwa kabanzi obala (Kol 1:25-28)
Igama elithi Jesu lisho ukuthi “UJehova UyiNsindiso” (Mat 1:21, umbhalo waphansi we-Ref. Bi.)
Igazi likaJesu Kristu elachitheka liyisihlengo sezono zesintu (Mat 20:28; w91-ZU 2/15 10-14; it-2 733-6)
Uthando lukaJehova lubonakala kakhulu ngokuthi walahlekelwa kakhulu lapho elungiselela isihlengo (Joh
3:16; Rom 5:6-8)
Ukuze sizuze, kufanele sithembele kule ndlela yokubonakaliswa kwamandla kaJehova okusindisa (Joh 3:36)
Njengoba enguMkhululi, uMhlengi neNkosi yoMbuso kaNkulunkulu, uJesu uyobonakalisa amandla kaJehova asi-
ndisayo osizini olukhulu (Mat 24:29-31)
Ukubusa kukaJesu eMbusweni kuyoqeda izinkinga umuntu azibangelwa yisono sika-Adamu (Is 9:6, 7; IsA 21:4)
UKUBONA AMANDLA KAJEHOVA ASINDISAYO EKUPHILENI KWETHU NAMUHLA (10 imiz.)
Singaqiniseka ngokuphelele lapho sithandaza ‘kulowo onamandla okusindisa’ (Is 63:1)
Ukwazi intando kaNkulunkulu kufanele kulawule esikuthandazelayo
Izinkulumo eziphathelene nokucela “noma yini” kumelwe ziqondwe ngokuvumelana nomongo wazo (Joh 16:
23; 1Jo 5:14; it-2 669)
Imithandazo yethu kumelwe igxile ekukhathaleleni izinto ezingokomoya (Mat 9:36-38; Kol 1:9; Jak 5:13)
Singaqiniseka nangokuthi uJehova uyazizwa izicelo zosizo lapho sicindezelekile ngokwengqondo noma
ngokomzwelo (IHu 34:18, 19; Flp 4:7; w94-ZU 12/15 32)
Ukucela ukuthethelelwa kuyafaneleka futhi kufanele kwenziwe ngesisekelo sesihlengo sikaJesu (Efe 1:7)
Singathandazela amandla okuqhubeka sifakaza (Is 40:29-31; IzE 1:8; 2Ko 4:7)
Akudingeki ukuba uJehova aphendule ngendlela eyisimangaliso; unikeza izinceku zakhe amandla, ukukha-
nya nesiqondiso (it-2 670)
Lapho sihlupheka, akufanele sikubheke njengesijeziso esivela kuNkulunkulu, njengokungathi usiphuce amandla
akhe asindisayo
UJehova akasoze abashiya abantu bakhe (IHu 94:14)
Uyosinika ukuhlakanipha okusivikelayo futhi kusigcine (Shu 7:12; Jak 1:2-5)
‘Ukuntula ukholo kanye nokungethembeli kwethu [kuJehova] yikona kuphela okumnqinda izandla kulokho
angasenzela kona,’ kusho inceku kaNkulunkulu yosuku lwanamuhla (w94-ZU 3/1 24)
UJEHOVA UZOBONAKALISA AMANDLA AKHE ASINDISAYO MADUZE NJE (5 imiz.)
Maduze nje singalindela usizi olukhulu (Mat 24:21, 22)
UJehova uyovikela “isixuku esikhulu” phakathi nalo (IsA 7:9, 14)
Kubalulekile ukuba sibone ukuphuthuma kosuku lwethu (2Pe 3:11, 12)
Ungavumeli izinto ezingelutho zikuthiye ungahileleki ngokugcwele ekutadisheni, emihlanganweni nasenko-
nzweni (IsA 7:15)
Ukuzindla ngokulandisa okuphathelene namandla kaJehova asindisayo ezikhathini zasendulo kufanele kuqini-
se ukholo lwethu lokuthi unekhono lokusenzela okufanayo
Kwangathi sonke singaphila size sibone amandla kaJehova asindisayo njengoba ememezela igama lakhe em-
hlabeni wonke (Eks 9:16; w91-ZU 9/15 17-18)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 147-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UNOMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGOKUPHILA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ngokugcwele ukuthi ukuphila kuyisipho esikhulu nokuthi kufanele sikusebenzise ngokuvu-
melana nentando yoMdali. Gcizelela isidingo sokuxwaya umbono waleli zwe wokungakwazisi ukuphila. Ezinda-
beni ezibucayana, bonisa ukubaluleka kwezimiso zeBhayibheli, kodwa ugweme ukwahlulela abanye noma uku-
gxeka
OKWENZA UKUPHILA KUBE NGCWELE (6 imiz.)
UJehova unguMthombo ‘wobuningi bamandla’ ayedingeka ekwakheni indawo yonke (Is 40:26; rs-ZU 90)
Zonke izinto ezibonakalayo neziwumoya, eziphilayo nezingaphili zivela kuye (Gen 1:1)
Ukuphila emhlabeni kwaqala lapho uNkulunkulu efaka amandla okuphila ezintweni ezingaphili (Gen 1:11,
12, 20, 24; 2:7; it-1 526, 528; it-2 246)
UNkulunkulu wenza inqubo yokuzala nokuzalana
Abantu abakwazi ukulingisa lesi simanga senqubo yokuveza ukuphila ezintweni ezingaphili
Njengoba enguMsunguli noMsekeli wokuphila, uJehova unelungelo lokunquma ukuthi kufanele kubhekwe ka-
njani (IHu 36:9; IzE 17:25, 28; w92-ZU 8/1 3-4)
 ́
Selokhu kwathı nhlo, ubheka ukuphila njengokungcwele (Gen 9:3-6; Num 35:9-34; rq-ZU 24-5; it-1 344; w97-ZU
1/15 21; w95-ZU 1/15 5)
Ngisho nokuphila komntwana ongakazalwa kuyigugu kuJehova (Eks 21:22, 23)
Ukuphila kwezilwane nako kungcwele kuMdali
Nakuba izilwane zingase zidliwe, kubi ukuziphatha kabi noma ukuzibulala nje ngenjongo yokuzijabulisa
(IzA 12:10)
Umbono wethu ngokuphila kufanele uvumelane nokaNkulunkulu
INDLELA UKUPHILA OKUBHEKWA NGAYO NAMUHLA (8 imiz.)
Lapho uJehova edala ukuphila kwabantu, wakungcwelisa wakubusisa (Gen 1:28, 31)
Isintu sasiyozalana siphelele nangaphansi kwesibopho somshado esihlanzekile
Lapho u-Adamu no-Eva bengamlaleli uNkulunkulu, sasibafanele isigwebo sokufa (Gen 2:17; 3:19)
‘Ngosuku abadla ngalo’ isithelo esenqatshelwe, bafa emehlweni kaNkulunkulu futhi baqala ukuwohloka
ngokomzimba
Abaphindanga bajabulela ukuphila okusezingeni eliphezulu njengasekuqaleni
Bazala abantwana esimweni esonakele (it-1 480)
Manje, base bezokufa njengezilwane zasendle (Shu 3:19)
Isono saletha usizi olukhulu kakhulu emkhayeni wesintu (Rom 5:12; it-2 964)
UKhayini wabonisa ukuthi wayengabuhloniphi ubungcwele bokuphila lapho ebulala umfowabo u-Abela
(Gen 4:8)
UNimrode waba ‘yiphisi elinamandla’ elaliqothula izilwane nabantu, emelene nombono kaJehova ngoku-
phila (Gen 10:9; w73-ZU 3/15 140 [w72 573])
Njengamanje siphila ‘ezikhathini ezibucayi’ ‘zezinsuku zokugcina’
Ububi sebandile (2Ti 3:1-5, 13)
Izigidi ezibulawa empini nangokukhishwa kwezisu, kuhlanganise nodlame oludlangile, ziwubufakazi bokuthi
ukuphila kubhekwa njengokuyize (tp-ZU 11-12, 80; g95-ZU 2/8 28; g95-ZU 4/22 6; g92-ZU 6/8 28)
Bambalwa namuhla abanombono kaNkulunkulu ngokuphila
INDLELA ESINGABONISA NGAYO UKUTHI SINOMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGOKUPHILA (18 imiz.)
Kufanele siqonde futhi sivume ukuthi thina ngokwethu asinakuyihlehlisa imiphumela elimazayo yesono (Rom
7:24)
Nokho, singathatha izinyathelo zokuba singabi “yizigqila zesono” (Rom 6:6; Efe 4:17, 22-24)
Kufanele siqonde ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubheka ukuphila njengokubalulekile, njengoba kubonakala ngesipho asi-
pha sona seNdodana yakhe (Rom 5:19; 6:23)
Ngokulahlekelwa okukhulu nangobuhlungu obukhulu abuzwa, uJehova walungiselela ukubuyisela ukuphila
kwesintu ekupheleleni ngesihlengo, uMbuso nangovuko (1Ti 2:3-6)
UJesu ufeza indima eyinhloko kulokhu; unguMmeli Oyinhloko wokuphila (IzE 3:15)
Indlela yethu yokuphila kufanele ibonise ukwazisa okukhulu ngesihlengo nangethuba lokuthola ukuphila oku-
phakade
Kungenzeka ukuthi siye senza izinto ezingqubuzana nentando kaNkulunkulu, kodwa akulahlwa mbeleko
ngakufelwa
Ukuphenduka okuqotho kungasilethela ukuthethelelwa nokwamukelwa nguNkulunkulu (IzE 3:19)
No. 148-ZU
11/00Kufanele sihloniphe uMthombo wokuphila nelungelo lakhe lokusibekela izindinganiso (IsA 4:11)
Uma siphila ngokuvumelana nezindinganiso zikaJehova sibonisa ukuthi siyabazisa ubungcwele bokuphila (Is
2:2-4)
Indlela esiphila ngayo yembula umbono wethu ngokuphila
Gwema noma isiphi isenzo noma ukunganaki okungakubangela icala legazi
Lokhu kuhlanganisa izimpi zezizwe, ukushayela budedengu nokuzijabulisa okuyingozi (Dut 22:8)
Senyanye isimo sengqondo esivamile mayelana nokukhipha isisu (rs-ZU 296-8)
Nakuba umuntu engeke nanini abulale umbungu osesiswini awuthole engashadile, kufanele futhi agcine umbo-
no kaNkulunkulu ngokuziphatha okuhle kobulili (it-1 1174; g94-ZU 10/8 22, 24)
Xwaya umbono wezwe okhuthaza ukuziphatha okubi nokukipita
Sibonisa ukuthi sinombono kaNkulunkulu ngokuphila ngokwamukela isiqondiso senhlangano yakhe ngokuco-
phelela
Kufanele sihlanganyele emsebenzini osindisa ukuphila owenziwayo manje (Mat 24:14; 28:19, 20)
Lena indaba ephuthumayo okungafanele ithathwe kalula (2Pe 3:9-11)
Siza abaningi ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba benze isinqumo esifanele
Ngaleyo ndlela, sizikhulula ecaleni legazi (IzE 20:20, 26)
IZIBUSISO ZOKUBA NOMBONO KANKULUNKULU NGOKUPHILA (8 imiz.)
Phakathi nokuBusa KukaKristu Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, isintu siyokhululwa ekonakaleni (it-2 248-9)
UKristu namakhosi ayobusa naye bayosiza isintu ngokomoya nangokomzimba
Ukuphila kuyobuyiselwa ekupheleleni u-Adamu ayenako ngaphambi kokona
Kuyoba khona ukuvuselelwa (Mat 19:28, umbhalo waphansi we-Ref. Bi.; it-1 546-7)
UJesu uyosusa yonke iminonjana yesono esazuzwa ngefa
Labo abayophumelela ekuvivinyweni kokugcina bayokwazi ukujabulela ukuphila okuphelele phakade (IsA 20:
7-10)
Ukuqhubeka kuka-Adamu ephelele kwakuxhomeke ekulaleleni kwakhe uJehova (Gen 2:17; Dut 32:4)
Ngenxa yokuthi wasebenzisa ukuphila kwakhe ngendlela engafanele, akavunyelwanga ukuba adle umuthi
wokuphila
Labo ababonisa ukuthi bayawazisa umbono kaNkulunkulu ngokuphila, amagama abo ayobhalwa angaci-
nywa “encwadini yokuphila” (IsA 20:15; Dan 12:1; re-ZU 298)
Bayobe bezibonakalise belifanelekele ilungelo lokuphila phakade (it-2 251)
SAMUKELE MANJE ISIQONDISO SIKANKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Ngenisa ulwazi olukwenza ukuba ulalele uNkulunkulu (Joh 17:3)
Xwaya isimo sengqondo sezwe esiwubuwula sokungakuhloniphi ukuphila (Shu 6:11, 12; 1Jo 2:15)
Lokhu kuhlanganisa nokuxwaya umoya wokuzibusa owukusebenzisa inkululeko umuntu anayo ngendlela
athanda ngayo (Efe 2:1, 2)
Sebenzisa ukuphila kwakho ngokuvumelana nentando kaJehova (Dut 30:19, 20)
Zinikezele kuNkulunkulu ngomthandazo, uma ungakakwenzi lokho (Mar 8:34-38)
Labo abazinikezele kufanele baqhubeke bephila ngokuvumelana nesiqondiso sikaNkulunkulu sokusebenzisa
ukuphila
UJehova uyabathanda labo abasebenzisa iseluleko sakhe futhi baphile ngezimfuneko zakhe
Uyobavuza kakhulu bonke abanombono ofana nowakhe ngokuphila (1Pe 3:10-12)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE UHAMBA NONKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone isidingo sokugxilisa ukuphila kwazo ekwenzeni intando kaJehova. Gcizelela isidingo sokume-
themba ukuthi uyakwazi okungcono kakhulu okusifanele nokuthi ukuhamba endleleni yakhe kuyosilonda ma-
nje futhi kuphumele ezibusisweni zaphakade
UKUHAMBA NONKULUNKULU YILUNGELO ELINGENAKUQHATHANISWA (5 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lisebenzisa igama elithi “ukuhamba” ukuze lichaze ukulandela inkambo ethile ekuphileni (Efe 4:17;
5:2; it-1 220)
Labo abahamba noNkulunkulu balandela inkambo yokuphila ayimisile futhi bayamukeleka kuye (Gen 5:22-24)
Banikeza ubufakazi bokuba nokholo oluqinile kuNkulunkulu (Heb 11:6; w98-ZU 1/15 13-14)
Ngesibindi banamathela ohlangothini lweqiniso (Flp 1:7; w93-ZU 11/15 12-13)
Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu kusho ukuthi simvumela ukuba aqondise izinyathelo zethu ngendlela ayibona ifa-
nele (Jer 10:23; w98-ZU 1/15 18)
IMIPHUMELA YOKUNGAHAMBI NONKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Iningi lesintu liye laphishekela inkambo engavumelani nentando kaNkulunkulu
Lithambekele ebubini (Rom 3:15-18)
Ukwenqaba uJehova nendlela yakhe kuye kwaphumela esimweni esidabukisayo umphakathi wesintu okuso
njengamanje (IHu 14:1; 2Ti 3:1-5)
 ́
Abase-Efesu lasendulo babefana ncamashı nabantu abaningi namuhla
Babethanda izinto ezibonakalayo, bengalawuleki, bebuswa yizifiso zenyama, beqhosha, bekholelwa ezeni,
njalo njalo (it-1 732-5)
 ́
Behlukaniswe nokuphila okungokukaNkulunkulu, babephokophele ekubhujisweni (Efe 4:17-19; 5:5, 6)
Izwe elibi namuhla liphokophele “osukwini lokwahlulelwa nolokubhujiswa kwabantu abangamhloniphi uNkulu-
nkulu” (2Pe 3:7)
ZUZA NGOKUHLOLA UKUPHILA KWALABO ABAHAMBA NONKULUNKULU (18 imiz.)
UNowa wahamba noNkulunkulu (Gen 6:9)
Yena nomkhaya wakhe bagxila ekufezeni izabelo ababezinikwe nguNkulunkulu (Gen 6:22)
Kusobala ukuthi abazange bakhe umkhumbi ngokubhuduzela noma bahluleka ukuwuqeda ngesikhathi (Gen
7:1, 4, 5, 7)
UNowa nomkhaya wakhe abalibalanga izwe okwase kuseduze ukuba liphele
Abaphishekelanga iminako yansuku zonke eyayiphishekelwa abanye abantu (Mat 24:37-39)
Kunokuba zibajabulise, bazenqaba izenzo zosuku lwabo zokuziphatha okubi nobudlova (Gen 6:5, 11)
UNowa wayeneminye imithwalo yemfanelo ngaphandle kokwakha umkhumbi (w90-ZU 4/15 11-13)
Wayengumshumayeli wokulunga (2Pe 2:5)
Wayeyilinganisela iminako yansuku zonke ebeke ukwakha umkhumbi phambili futhi exwayisa izwe lama-
ndulo ngokuphela kwalo
U-Abrahama wahamba noNkulunkulu
Wahamba ngokholo hhayi ngokubona (Heb 11:8)
Ngesibindi u-Abrahama walalela uJehova futhi wabonisa ukumethemba okuphelele (Heb 11:17-19)
Wabonisa ukuzimisela ukushiya i-Uri lamaKhaledi, umuzi owawuchumile ngezinto ezibonakalayo (Gen 12:
1, 4, 5; it-2 1141-2)
Ngokholo, u-Abrahama “wahlala njengomfokazi ezweni lesithembiso” futhi wayelangazelela ‘umuzi onezi-
sekelo zangempela,’ uMbuso kaNkulunkulu wasezulwini (Heb 11:9, 10)
UJehova wathembisa ukuthi ngenzalo ka-Abrahama “izizwe zonke zomhlaba” zaziyobusiswa (Gen 22:18)
 ́
UNowa, u-Abrahama nabanye abantu basendulo ababethembekile balungiselelwe umuzi, uMbuso kaNkulunku-
lu, oyobusa emhlabeni
UNkulunkulu uyakujabulela ukubabiza ngokuthi izinceku zakhe; akanamahloni ngabo (Heb 11:16)
UJesu wahamba noNkulunkulu
UyiNzalo ka-Abrahama futhi sonke uye wasishiyela isibonelo sokuba silandele izinyathelo zakhe (Gal 3:16;
1Pe 2:21)
UJesu wayethembela kuJehova njalo ukuba amyale (Joh 5:19)
WayenguMshumayeli oyinhloko wokulunga
Wenza kwaziwa ukuthi iqiniso ligxile eMbusweni KaMesiya omiswe nguNkulunkulu (Joh 18:33-37)
Akazange abeke ukunethezeka nezithakazelo zakhe siqu ngaphambi kwezithakazelo zoMbuso (Luk 9:58, 62)
UJesu wayengumuntu onengqondo, ebathanda abantu (Joh 2:1, 2)
Noma kunjalo, wayezazi kahle izinto eziza kuqala kuye, futhi waphila ngazo (Mat 6:33)
No. 149-ZU
11/00INDLELA ONGAHAMBA NGAYO NONKULUNKULU NAMUHLA (12 imiz.)
Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu kudinga ukuba sibe nezinto eziza kuqala njengoba sifeza neminye imithwalo yethu
yemfanelo eminingi
Kumelwe siqonde ukuthi iyini intando kaNkulunkulu ngathi namuhla (1Jo 2:17)
NjengoNowa, kufanele sigcine ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu kuza kuqala ekuphileni kwethu
Intando yakhe iwukuba sishumayele izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso (Mar 13:10)
UJehova uyayamukela iminikelo esiyenzayo ekuqhubekiseleni phambili izithakazelo zoMbuso nokusiza aba-
nye (Heb 13:15, 16)
Intando kaNkulunkulu ihlanganisa nokunakekela izidingo zethu ezingokwenyama nezemikhaya yethu nge-
ndlela enokulinganisela (1Ti 5:8; w97-ZU 8/15 19)
Kufanele silahle ubuntu obudala nomoya wokuzibusa okhuthazwa yizwe, sigqoke ubuntu obusha obenziwe ngu-
Nkulunkulu (Efe 4:22-24; w93-ZU 3/1 8, 10-18)
Zibaluleke kakhulu izimfanelo zobuntu obusha ukuze sihambe noNkulunkulu (Mik 6:8)
Kunokukhuthaza ukuphishekela izinto zezwe zobugovu, ubuntu obusha busishukumisela ukuba sibonise ukho-
lo futhi sihambe ngezindlela zokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu (Jak 2:26)
Zuza umqondo kaKristu, lingisa isimo sakhe sengqondo, futhi ngokuzithoba ulalele iZwi likaNkulunkulu eliphe-
fumulelwe ngomoya (1Ko 2:14-16; Heb 10:7)
Osukwini lukaPawulu, abathile babengaqinile okholweni futhi babengebona abantu abangokomoya
Babephambukiswa kalula yimibono engqubuzana nemiBhalo (Kol 2:8)
Kubalulekile ukuba siqaphele ukuthi sihamba kanjani futhi sibe nengqondo, sibuswe yintando kaNkulunku-
lu (Efe 5:15-17)
THATHA ISINYATHELO MANJE UKUZE UJABULELE ILUNGELO ELINGENAKUQHATHANISWA LOKU-
HAMBA NONKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Lingisa ukholo lukaNowa no-Abrahama, futhi ulandele izinyathelo zikaJesu (Heb 12:1-3)
Yiba njengoNowa, ugxile ekuphileni nasekusebenzeni ngendlela ejabulisa uNkulunkulu neholela ekuphileni
Njengo-Abrahama, kulungele ukulahlekelwa okuthile
Langazelela “umuzi” onezisekelo zangempela, uMbuso
Lingisa uJesu, uphilele ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (Joh 4:34; 6:38)
Umvuzo wethu uwukujabulela ukuphila okungcono kakhulu manje nethemba lokusitshekelwa osukwini lwentu-
kuthelo kaJehova oluzayo (Zef 2:3)
Kwangathi ungazimisela ukuhamba egameni likaJehova uNkulunkulu kuze kube phakade (Mik 4:5)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 149-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UNKULUNKULU UNGUMUNTU ONGOKOQOBO KANGAKANANI KUWE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Khetha futhi ugcizelele imibhalo eyosiza izilaleli zibone ukuthi uJehova ungumuntu ongokoqobo, hhayi nje ama-
ndla angaziwa endaweni yonke. Kwenze kucace ukuthi injongo yethu njengezinceku zikaJehova kufanele kube
ukumjabulisa ngokucabangela umbono wakhe kukho konke esikwenzayo
IMIBONO ABANTU ABANAYO NGONKULUNKULU (3 imiz.)
Labo abaphika ubukhona bukaNkulunkulu bathi akekho (w94-ZU 12/1 5-6)
Labo abakholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu akaziwa bayakungabaza ukuthi ukhona (g84-ZU 9/8 17-19 [g84 3/8 8-9])
Ama-deist ayakholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona, kodwa ayakuphika ukuthi unesithakazelo kubantu
(w94-ZU 12/1 4)
Izigidi ziyakholwa ukuthi kunoNkulunkulu nokuthi angakuthonya ukuphila kwazo
Abaningi banombono ongacacile ngoNkulunkulu; bangase bangazi ukuthi ungubani noma ukuthi uyini (g79-ZU
10/8 3-4 [g79 4/8 3-4])
Abanye baze bakholelwe konkulunkulu abaningi (g89-ZU 1/8 28 [g88 12/22 21])
Abanye bakholelwa kufanele ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungumuntu ongokoqobo ongumoya (Joh 4:24; Heb 9:24)
INDLELA ESAZI NGAYO UKUTHI UNKULUNKULU UNGUMUNTU ONGOKOQOBO (15 imiz.)
Imisebenzi yakhe ebonakalayo iyamfakazela (IHu 19:1, 2; Rom 1:20)
Isitshela ukuthi unguMklami Omkhulu, ukuthi unamandla, uhlakaniphile nokuthi unothando (w97-ZU 1/15
19-20; w93-ZU 6/15 9-12)
Usosayensi waseMelika owazuza uMklomelo kaNobel, u-Arthur Holly Compton wathi: “Yonke indalo ehlele-
kile nesobala iqinisekisa ubuqiniso bamazwi amahle kakhulu ake ashiwo—‘Ekuqaleni uNkulunkulu’ ” (g81-ZU
11/8 4 [w59 328])
Wayecaphuna amazwi okuqala eBhayibheli
UNkulunkulu usinike umlando obhaliwe ngokuphathelene naye
Wenze ukuba utholakale emhlabeni wonke, uphelele noma uyingxenye, ngezilimi ezingaphezu kuka-2 100
(w98-ZU 4/1 11)
Usembulela igama lakhe eBhayibhelini (Eks 3:15; IHu 83:18)
Ngenxa yokuthi uNkulunkulu ungumuntu, unezinto azithandayo nangazithandi kanti futhi unemizwa
Sifunda okuningi ngoNkulunkulu eZwini lakhe
Ukuthi uyasithanda isintu (Joh 3:16; 1Jo 4:9, 10)
Ukuthi uyayijabulela imisebenzi yakhe (Gen 1:31; IHu 104:31)
Ukuthi uyakuzonda ukukhonza izithombe (Dut 7:25; 16:22)
Ukuthi bumphatha kabi ububi (Gen 6:6; IHu 78:40)
IBhayibheli lembula injongo kaJehova uNkulunkulu ngesintu nangomhlaba (Is 45:18; IsA 21:3, 4)
Ukugcwaliseka kweziprofetho kunezela ebufakazini bokuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona
Akekho umuntu okwazi ukubikezela ikusasa ngokunembile, kodwa uNkulunkulu uye wakwenza lokho (Is
45:1-4; Dan 8:20-22; Zef 2:13, 14; g96-ZU 2/8 8-9; w92-ZU 5/15 6-8)
Ukuqaphela ukugcwaliseka kweziprofetho kusisiza ukuba siqonde ukuthi unamandla okufeza izinjongo za-
khe futhi uzimisele ukwenza kanjalo
Kokubili indalo neBhayibheli kufakazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu ukhona nokuthi ungumuntu ongokoqobo oyofe-
za konke ahlose ukukwenza
IZINCEKU EZITHEMBEKILE ZASENDULO ZAZAZI UKUTHI UJEHOVA UNGUMUNTU ONGOKOQOBO
(8 imiz.)
Zalandela iziqondiso zikaJehova kuzo zonke izici zokuphila (Eks 39:32; 40:16)
Lokhu kwakuhlanganisa izinqumo zokuthi zaziyohlalaphi, ukuthi zaziyokwenza miphi imisebenzi nokuthi zi-
shade nobani
Eqondiswa uJehova, uNowa wakha umkhumbi, wafaka kuwo izilwane ezihlukahlukene (Gen 6:14-22)
Wachazwa ngokuthi ‘wayengenaphutha phakathi kwabantu besikhathi sakhe,’ wabizwa ngokuthi “umshu-
mayeli wokulunga,” futhi uNkulunkulu wamlondoloza phakathi noZamcolo (Gen 6:9; 2Pe 2:5)
U-Abrahama walalela uNkulunkulu, washiya ukunethezeka kwase-Uri wayohlala ezweni ayengalazi, wadela
izinto ezibonakalayo ukuze enze lokho (Gen 12:1, 4; 21:34; it-2 1141-2)
Wathembela esiqondisweni sikaJehova ukuze atholele indodana yakhe u-Isaka umfazi (Gen 24:1-7, 12-14;
it-1 1217)
UMose wayefundile, ‘enamandla emazwini nasezenzweni zakhe’ (IzE 7:20-22)
Noma kunjalo, wakwenqaba ukuvelela nengcebo yezwe, wafuna ukwamukelwa uNkulunkulu kunabantu
(Heb 11:23-26)
UNkulunkulu wayengumuntu ongokoqobo kuMose kangangokuba kwakusengathi uyambona (Heb 11:27)
No. 150-ZU
11/00INDLELA YAKHO YOKUPHILA MAYIBONISE UKUTHI UNKULUNKULU UMBHEKA NJENGOMUNTU
ONGOKOQOBO (15 imiz.)
Uma uNkulunkulu engumuntu ongokoqobo kuwe, uyomthanda futhi umlalele (1Jo 5:3)
Ukufuna ukujabulisa uNkulunkulu kuyothinta izinqumo zakho nokukhetha kwakho ekuphileni—kungaba
kwezemfundo, emsebenzini wokuziphilisa, emshadweni, ekuzijabuliseni nakunoma imuphi umgomo onawo
Injongo yakho kuyoba ukujabulisa inhliziyo yakhe njengoba nje kwenza uJesu (IzA 27:11; Joh 8:29)
Kunezindlela zokubonisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungokoqobo kithi
Kufanele sibeke intando kaNkulunkulu kuqala ekuphileni kwethu (IHu 143:10; Mat 22:37, 38)
Silalele amazwi kaJesu ngokugcina iso lilula endabeni yomsebenzi wokuziphilisa nasendleleni esiphila ngayo
(Mat 6:22, 23; w97-ZU 3/15 18-19; w89-ZU 7/15 10-15)
Ngokusebenzisa iseluleko esingokomBhalo ngokuqondene nokuzilibazisa nokuzijabulisa (Mat 6:33; 1Ko 10:31;
15:33; g97-ZU 5/22 8-10; g92-ZU 11/8 8-10; w86-ZU 3/15 23)
Ngokugcina umgomo oqondile lapho siphishekela imfundo (w96-ZU 2/1 9-14)
Ngokubonisa intshiseko enkonzweni, senze konke esingakwenza ngokwezimo zethu (2Ti 4:2; Heb 13:15)
Ngokuba khona njalo kuyo yonke imihlangano (Heb 10:23-25)
MAZI UJEHOVA NJENGOMUNTU FUTHI UBE UMNGANE WAKHE (4 imiz.)
Uma usengumfundi omusha weBhayibheli, ungamane nje waneliswe ukuthi uyakholelwa kuNkulunkulu
Mazi njengomuntu futhi ube umngane wakhe (Joh 17:3; Jak 2:23)
Qhubeka ukhula ngokomoya ngokuba khona kuyo yonke imihlangano yebandla nangokwazisa abanye nge-
themba lakho (Rom 10:10)
Uma unguFakazi ozinikezele wabhapathizwa, qhubeka utadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, futhi ubonise ngenkambo
yakho yokuphila ukuthi ungokoqobo kuwe, ukuthi ungumngane wakho (IHu 16:8)
Yenza konke ongakwenza enkonzweni ukuze usize abanye bafunde ngoJehova ukuze nabo bamazi njengomu-
ntu ongokoqobo
Ikusasa elijabulisayo lilindele labo ababa nobuhlobo obuseduze noNkulunkulu oyedwa weqiniso, uJehova, futhi
babulondoloze (IHu 37:37, 39, 40)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 150-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45UJEHOVA ‘UYINDAWO EPHAKEME ELONDEKILE’ YABANTU BAKHE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Le nkulumo, esekelwe kumaHubo 94, kufanele isishukumise sonke ukuba sifune ukuphephela kuJehova ngoko-
moya. Ngomdlandla, yakha ukuqiniseka kokuthi uyinqaba yabantu bakhe ngabanye nanjengeqembu. Nikeza isi-
qinisekiso sokuthi uma uJehova engakithi, singabhekana nanoma iluphi uvivinyo noma isilingo
UJEHOVA AKANAKUQHATHANISWA (5 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu ungoPhezukonke (IHu 83:18; w91-ZU 2/1 11)
UyiNkosi kuze kube phakade naphakade (IHu 10:16a; IsA 15:3b)
Ulawula zonke izingelosi (IHu 103:20)
UnguMninimandla onke (IsA 11:17)
Amandla akhe awanamkhawulo (Job 42:2)
Akekho ongamelana naye (Dan 4:35)
Nakuba uJehova enesikhundla esiphakeme, akakude nesintu
Usondelene nezinceku zakhe ezithembekile futhi uziphatha ngomusa nangesihawu (Is 63:9; Jak 5:11; w92-ZU
11/15 9)
MADUZE UJEHOVA UZOKHULULA ABANTU BAKHE KULELI ZWE ELINGAMHLONIPHI (15 imiz.)
Siyeza isikhathi lapho uNkulunkulu eyokwenza bonke abantu balandise (Funda iHubo 94:1, 2)
Njengesiqinisekiso, uJehova wavusa uJesu kwabafileyo (IzE 17:31)
 ́
Sonke kufanele siyithathe ngokungathı sina le ndaba!
Kuzodingeka uNkulunkulu angenele maduze nje ngenxa ‘yokuchotshozwa nokuhlushwa’ okuqhubekayo kwaba-
ntu bakhe (Funda iHubo 94:3-6)
[Kafushane nje, landisa isibonelo seBhayibheli esisodwa noma ezimbili sezenzo zikaJehova zesikhathi esidlu-
le lapho ephindiselela abantu bakhe]
Kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi kungani ukungabi nabulungisa kuvunyelwe, kuhlanganise nalokho okuthinta
izinceku zikaNkulunkulu
Kumelwe sikhumbule ukuthi akukuningi okungashintshwa kulesi simiso esidala (IHu 12:8; Shu 1:15)
Ungaphethi ngokuthi ababi abajeziswa (IzA 24:19, 20)
Kubalulekile ukuzigcina sanelisekile lapho sisalindele ukuba uJehova athathe isinyathelo (Mik 7:7)
Kuwubuwula ukuphetha ngokuthi “uJah akaboni” (Funda iHubo 94:7-11)
Abaningi namuhla badelela ubukhosi bukaJehova
Abaningi abamnaki uNkulunkulu (IHu 14:1)
Amehlo nezindlebe zikaJehova kubona futhi kuzwe konke okwenzekayo (Heb 4:13)
Abanye bathethelela ukuziphatha okubi ngokuthi kuwukuzijabulisa nje, noma baphila ukuphila okumba-
xa-mbili, bezitshela ukuthi uNkulunkulu akaboni noma akabuqapheli ububi babo (IHu 10:13; w97-ZU
3/15 13)
Ukuphila kwethu kufanele kubonise ukuthi asithonyiwe ngisho nakancane ukucabanga okunjalo
(w91-ZU 6/15 19-21)
UJehova ngeke abubekezelele phakade ububi
Sekuseduze akhulule abantu bakhe ekucindezelekeni
‘Ukuthinta inhlamvu yeso lakhe’ kuzophela (Zak 2:8)
Ngokusikhulula, oPhezukonke uyozibonakalisa ‘eyindawo ephakeme nelondekile’ yabantu bakhe (Funda iHu-
bo 18:2)
UJEHOVA AKALOKOTHI ABASHIYE ABANTU BAKHE (15 imiz.)
Kubalulekile ukufunda indlela kaNkulunkulu yokucabanga, sifundiswe nguye (Funda iHubo 94:12, 13)
Zikhandle ukuze ube umuntu uJehova angasoze amshiya
Ungakuthathi kancane ukubaluleka kokuya emihlanganweni nokutadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu uwedwa
Ungasedeleli isiyalo uJehova asinikeza ngeZwi lakhe, ngenhlangano yakhe nangabadala
Kunokulondeka okukhulu ekwazini iqiniso
Ulwazi olunembile luyasiqinisa, lusinika injabulo, ithemba—ngisho nasezikhathini ezinzima (Kol 1:9-11)
Sinethemba ngokwazi ukuthi manje uJehova ulungiselela ukulondoloza abantu bakhe
Ungavumeli imizwa ikwenze wenze izinto ngobuwula, uphethe ngokuthi ubhekana nobunzima ngoba wonile ku-
Jehova (Funda iHubo 94:14, 15)
Abantu bakaJehova abanakuyigwema njalo imiphumela yokungapheleli kobuntu nobubi (Shu 9:11; IzE 14:22)
Asigonyiwe ekuhluphekeni (IHu 34:19)
UJehova uNkulunkulu unguMngane oyohlala enawe, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ukuphi, noma ukuthi ungubani
noma ukuthi yini obhekene nayo (Funda iHubo 94:16, 17)

Lokhu kuthula kuwukuzola okulethwa ukuba nobuhlobo obuseduze noNkulunkulu

ndezeleka esibhekene nakho
UJehova uyaziqonda izinto ezisikhathazayo (Funda iHubo 94:18, 19)
Ukuzindla ngeZwi likaNkulunkulu kuyosiza labo abahluphekayo ukuba bathembe ukuthi akukhona ukuthi
uJehova akasigqizi qakala isimo esibucayi sezinceku zakhe ezithembekile (IHu 145:14)
Isimo sengqondo sokuphelelwa yithemba lapho sisosizini singase senze buthaka ukholo lwethu
Kubalulekile ukukhuluma noJehova ngomthandazo oqotho, simtshele esikwesabayo nokusikhathaza kakhulu

AKUYIKUPHUMELELA (6 imiz.)

Jehova
Ngokuvamile, lokhu kuye kwaphumela ekuvinjelweni, ekuboshweni, ekushayweni, ekuhlukunyezweni, ngi-

thelisiwe]
OFakazi BakaJehova abakhwantabaliswanga ukwesaba ngenxa yokuhlaselwa kabuhlungu; baye bakwenqa-
ba ukuthuliswa
Ipharadesi elingokomoya liyachuma emhlabeni wonke njengoba kwenezelwa izixuku nsuku zonke
Lokhu kuyenzeka ngoba uJehova ‘uyindawo yethu ephakeme elondekile’! (Funda iHubo 59:9)
KHONZA UJEHOVA NGOKUTHEMBEKA, UQHUBEKE UPHILA (4 imiz.)

Bonke abangazithobi ngokuzithandela entandweni kaNkulunkulu bayobhujiswa (2Thes 1:8)
Ukuhlonipha igama lakhe nokuthanda izinceku zakhe eziqotho kwenza kube nesidingo sokuba uJehova
alethe ubulungisa
Bonke ababonisa ukumethemba okuphelele uJehova bayosinda (Funda iHubo 62:6)
Khonza uJehova ngokwethembeka ngenhliziyo yakho yonke
Mgcine njalo ‘eyindawo yakho ephakeme elondekile,’ uqhubeke uphila!

No. 151-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45I-ARMAGEDONI YANGEMPELA—NGANI? NINI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibe nomuzwa wokuphuthuma kwezikhathi esiphila kuzo. Yakha ukwazisa kwazo ukuze i-Armage-
doni ziyibheke njengento engokoqobo ezogadla maduzane. Gcizelela isidingo sokuthatha isinyathelo manje futhi
sihlale eduze nenhlangano kaJehova
LOKHO I-ARMAGEDONI EYIKO (5 imiz.)
Kunemibono eminingi nge-Armagedoni
Kwake kwacatshangwa ukuthi iwukuvukela komphakathi okunodlame (jv-ZU 140)
Abanye bahlanganisa leli gama nenhlekelele yemvelo, njengeplanethi encane iphahlazeka emhlabeni (g99-ZU
1/22 24, 26; g99-ZU 9/22 29)
Abanye bayibheka njengokhukhulela-ngoqo wenuzi oyobangelwa yimpi yezizwe (w90-ZU 5/15 3; w86-ZU 2/15
7; g84-ZU 6/8 3 [g83 12/22 3])
Igama elithi Armagedoni, noma “Har–Magedoni,” litholakala kanye kuphela eBhayibhelini (Funda isAmbulo 16:
14, 16)
Leli gama lisho ukuthi “iNtaba Yokuhlangana Kwamabutho” futhi libhekisela emabuthweni ezombangazwe
abuthanele ukulwa noNkulunkulu (rs-ZU 49)
Leli gama liyafaneleka ngoba i-Armagedoni iyisimo somhlaba esihilela amabutho nabanye abasekeli bazo
zonke izizwe (rs-ZU 50)
Iwumvuthwandaba ‘wosuku olukhulu lukaJehova’ (Zef 1:14; Jow 2:11; w96-ZU 3/1 16)
I-Armagedoni iyimpi kaNkulunkulu—impi elwiwa uJehova uNkulunkulu nezizwe zomhlaba (w90-ZU 5/15 4)
I-Armagedoni ayiwubhubhisi umhlaba kodwa iqeda ububi obukuwo
ISIZATHU SOKUBA KUBE NEMPI YE-ARMAGEDONI (9 imiz.)
UJehova, uMbusi Wendawo Yonke, unelungelo lokubusa indalo yakhe
Izizwe azikwamukeli ukubusa koMbuso wakhe (Jer 25:31; IsA 11:17, 18)
Ziye zakwenqaba ukubusa kobukhosi bakhe ngeNdodana yakhe (Hu 2:2-6)
UJehova kumelwe abhubhise abaphikisi boMbuso wakhe abangaphenduki (Hu 2:9; Da 2:44)
USathane namademoni akhe yibona ababangela ukwenqatshwa kokubusa kukaNkulunkulu (IsA 16:13, 14)
Ithonya labo liqhubezela izizwe esimweni somhlaba esibangela ukuba zilwe noNkulunkulu
“Udrako” unguSathane lapho efeza indima yakhe yokuba umholi wezizwe (IsA 12:9)
“Isilo” sibhekisela kuso sonke isimiso sezombangazwe uSathane abusa ngaso isintu (re-ZU 187)
“Umprofethi wamanga” unguMbuso Wezwe WamaNgisi NamaMelika (re-ZU 193-4, 230)
“Izinkulumo eziphefumulelwe ezingcolile” ziyinkulumo-ze yamademoni futhi zisikhumbuza ngezithembiso
zamanga ezenziwa abaprofethi bamanga (1Jo 4:1)
Kuwo wonke umlando, abantu baye basekela baze ngisho bakhulekela uDeveli, bemelana noJehova (IsA
13:4; re-ZU 191)
Ngempi ye-Armagedoni, ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu buyolwelwa (Hez 39:7; w90-ZU 5/15 5-6; re-ZU 234)
Ehola amabutho asezulwini, uKristu usebenzisa igunya lakhe ukuze abhubhise labo abenqabayo ukusekela
uMbuso kaNkulunkulu (IsA 19:11-16)
IZENZAKALO EZIHOLELA E-ARMAGEDONI (7 imiz.)
Ngaphambi kwe-Armagedoni, “izinsuku zokugcina” ziqala lapho uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uqala ukubusa kwawo
kwasezulwini (2Ti 3:1; IsA 12:7-12)
OFakazi BakaJehova baye basakaza ukwaziswa okuningi okuqinisekisa ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu waqa-
la ukubusa ezulwini ngo-1914
“Izindaba ezinhle” zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu kumelwe zishunyayelwe kuwo wonke umhlaba (Mat 24:14)
Lokhu manje kwenziwa emazweni angaphezu kuka-230
Maduzane izizwe zizophendukela inkolo yamanga ziyibhubhise ngokuphelele (IsA 17:12, 16)
Lokhu kuyoba ukuqala ‘kosizi olukhulu’ (Mat 24:21; w99-ZU 5/1 17)
Umvuthwandaba walolo sizi uyoba i-Armagedoni (w94-ZU 2/15 19-21)
Ngemva kokuba iBabiloni selibhujisiwe, ngaphambi nje kokufika kwe-Armagedoni, uSathane uhlasela okokugci-
na ukuze abhubhise abantu bakaNkulunkulu (Hez 38:10-16)
Ukuchuma kwabo ngokomoya kumenza athukuthele agane unwabu, kodwa uJehova uyabavikela (Hez 38:21-
23; w90-ZU 5/15 6; dp-ZU 283)
Lokho kuba ukuqala kwe-Armagedoni (w97-ZU 3/1 14-15)
HLALA ULINDELE UKUFIKA KWE-ARMAGEDONI (15 imiz.)
Isiprofetho seBhayibheli sibonisa ukuthi “usuku” lukaJehova luyofika kungazelelwe (IsA 16:14, 15)
UJesu uyofika njengomahluleli kaJehova ngesikhathi esingamenyezelwe, njengoba nje kwenza ‘isela’ (1Th 5:
2, 3; Mat 24:42, 44; re-ZU 231-2)
No. 152-ZU
10/01Ukubhujiswa kweBabiloni Elikhulu, umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga, kuyofika lingakulindele (IsA 18:7, 8)
Umbango phakathi kwenkosi yasenyakatho nenkosi yaseningizimu usuzophela (dp-ZU 280)
Osekusele nje ukuba kugcwaliseke izigaba zokugcina zokulwa kwawo (Dan 11:44, 45)
Imibiko ephazamisayo evela kuJehova iyoshukumisa inkosi yasenyakatho ukuba ihlasele okokugcina
(dp-ZU 282-3)
Womabili la makhosi ayobhekana nokuphela kwawo e-Armagedoni (dp-ZU 285)
Akufanele sicabange ukuthi i-Armagedoni isekude kakhulu ngenxa nje yokuthi amanye amazwe awakafinyele-
lwa ngokugcwele ngezindaba ezinhle
Asikho isizathu sokulindela ukuba sifinyelele bonke abantu kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba ngaphambi ko-
kuba uJesu afike njengoMahluleli (Funda uMathewu 10:23) (w97-ZU 8/15 14)
Lapho usizi olukhulu lugadla, akungabazeki ukuthi abantu bakaJehova bayobe bematasa kunanini ngapha-
mbili (w77-ZU 6/15 283 [w76 689])
Insali ethile yamadodana kaNkulunkulu agcotshwe ngomoya iyobe isesemhlabeni lapho usizi lugqashuka (Mat
24:22; IsA 7:1-3; w97-ZU 8/15 14-15; re-ZU 116)
Inani labo elincane elisekanye nathi libonisa ukuthi ukuphela kuseduze
Isilo nomprofethi wamanga bayobhujiswa besezwa futhi besabambisene ekumelaneni kwabo nabantu bakaNku-
lunkulu (IsA 19:19, 20; re-ZU 285-6)
Ngemva kwalokho, uSathane namademoni akhe bayovalelwa kwalasha, bangabi nakho nokuncane ukuthinta-
na noMbuso kaNkulunkulu wokulunga (re-ZU 287-8)
KUMELWE SITHATHE ISINYATHELO MANJE UKUZE SISINDE (5 imiz.)
Akumelwe sibe nesimo sengqondo sokuthi uJehova uyephuza (Zef 1:14)
Kumelwe sithathe isinyathelo ngaphambi kokuba usuku lukaJehova lusifice (Zef 2:2, 3; g84-ZU 6/8 10-11 [g83
12/22 10-11])
‘Masifune uJehova’ ukuze asiqondise futhi asibonise umusa (Isa 55:6, 7)
‘Sifune ukulunga’ ngokuvumelanisa ukuphila kwethu nezimfuneko zakhe
‘Sifuna ubumnene’ ngokuba abathobekile nangokuzimisela ukwenza izinguquko
Masihlale siseduze nenhlangano kaJehova njengoba sembulelwa ukwaziswa ngokuqhubekayo mayelana nendle-
la esingasinda ngayo e-Armagedoni
‘Izenzo zokuziphatha ezingcwele nezenzo zokuzinikela kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu’ zibalulekile (2Pe 3:11;
w97-ZU 3/1 13)
Ukungasazi isikhathi esiqondile uJesu ayokuza ngaso ezokhipha impindiselo kaNkulunkulu kusenza sihlale
siphapheme (Mar 13:32, 33)
Kusinikeza amathuba okubonisa ukuthi sikhonza uJehova ngezisusa ezingezona ezobugovu
SILINDELWE YIKUSASA ELIQHAKAZILE (4 imiz.)
Abantu bakaJehova balindelwe isenzakalo esivusa amadlingozi—maduzane usizi olukhulu luzoqala (kj-ZU 286)
Bonke bayokwazi ukuthi oFakazi BakaJehova bebengeyena umprofethi wamanga (Hez 33:33)
I-Armagedoni iyozuzisa ngoba iyovula indlela yokuba kube nokuthula kwaphakade
Kuyogeleza izibusiso kubantu bakaJehova, abayosinda, njengoba beguqula umhlaba bewenza ipharadesi eli-
ngeke lisaba nakho ukungcola, ubuhlungu, izinyembezi nokukhala (IsA 11:15, 18; 21:3, 4)
Uma usindile, uyombonga nsuku zonke uJehova kuze kube phakade (Isa 25:8, 9; w94-ZU 3/1 23)
(Namathela ngokuseduze ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 152-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45LUKHUMBULE NJALO ‘USUKU OLWESABEKAYO!’
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Injongo yale nkulumo ukusiza abazalwane babe nomuzwa wokuphuthuma. Qiniseka ukuthi ulungiselela kahle
futhi udlulisela lokhu kwaziswa ngentshiseko
UJEHOVA USELUBEKILE USUKU LWAKHE OLUKHULU EKHALENDENI YAKHE (4 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi bavame ukugubha izinsuku ezithile onyakeni
Izizwe zikhumbula izinsuku eziyingqopha-mlando ezinjengosuku lokusungulwa kwezwe noma lokuthola kwalo
uzibuse
Nokho, kunolunye “usuku” okudingeka siluqaphele
Lolu suku luseza, kodwa luyothinta bonke abantu abaphila kule mbulunga futhi lushintshe umlando wesintu
IBhayibheli lichaza le nkathi ebalulekile ekuphileni kwesintu ngokuthi ‘usuku lukaJehova olukhulu
nolwesabekayo’ (Jow 2:30, 31; Mal 4:5)
Ngalolo suku, uJehova uyothatha isinyathelo ngokumelene nezitha zakhe nangenxa yabantu bakhe
Lokhu kuyokwenzeka phakathi “nokuba khona kweNdodana yomuntu,” kodwa akekho umuntu owazi
ngokuthe ngqo ukuthi lolo ‘suku nehora’ kuyoba nini (Math 24:36-39, 44)
Ubufakazi obulandelayo bubonisa ukuthi manje siphila phakathi nokuba khona kukaKristu
IZENZAKALO EZIYISIBONAKALISO SOKUBA KHONA KUKAKRISTU (11 imiz.)
UJesu wabikezela ukuthi phakathi nokuba khona kwakhe, kwakuzoba nezingxabano emhlabeni wonke nezinye
izenzakalo eziphawulekayo (Math 24:3, 7, 8; w08 10/1 6-7)
Kusukela ngo-1914 umhlaba uye wabona iMpi Yezwe I neMpi Yezwe II
Ngaphezu kwalokho, izingxabano zamazwe, izimpi zombango nobuphekula kuye kwenza izigidi zabantu
zashiya amakhaya azo (w08 5/15 13-14 isig. 7; g 6/06 4-6; g01 3/22 4)
Kwakuyovela izici ezidukisayo zenkolo (Math 24:11)
Ziye zavela kodwa azibanikezanga induduzo abantu noma ithemba ngekusasa (w94 3/1 9-11 izig. 7-12)
Ukungabi namthetho nobugebengu kwakuyokwanda (Math 24:12)
Lokhu kuye kwabangela ukwesaba nokungalondeki emhlabeni wonke
IBhayibheli lichaza ukuthi abantu babeyoba njani kulezi “zikhathi ezibucayi okunzima ukubhekana nazo”
[Khulumela amaphuzu afanelekayo akweyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:1-5, 13]
Abantu ababi nabakhohlisi ‘bayaqhubeka besuka kokubi baye kokubi kakhulu, bedukisa futhi bedukiswa’
‘Badukiswa’ ubani? [Funda isAmbulo 12:9]
USathane uthonya bonke labo ababonisa umoya waleli zwe (1Joh 5:19)
Leso Sitha sikaNkulunkulu nesabantu sinesikhathi esifushane nje kuphela sokuqhubeka nezenzo zaso
ezimbi zonya (IsAm 12:12)
Ubufakazi obukhona bubonisa ukuthi seluseduze usuku lukaJehova olukhulu nolwesabekayo azokhipha ngalo
izahlulelo zakhe
UJehova ngomusa uye wahlela ukuba kukhishwe isixwayiso emhlabeni wonke ngokuphathelene nalolo suku
(IsAm 14:6, 7)
Abaningi abasinaki isixwayiso njengoba nje kwenza izwe langaphambi kukaZamcolo (Math 24:38, 39)
Izimo zomhlaba eziya ziba zimbi nalokho eziyoholela kukho kufanele zisenze sibe nomuzwa wokuphuthuma
OKWENZA KUPHUTHUME FUTHI KUBE UKUHLAKANIPHA UKULUKHUMBULA NJALO LOLO SUKU
(11 imiz.)
Sinesithakazelo ikakhulu emazwini akweyesi-2 Petru 3:10-13 [Wufunde futhi uwukhulumele] (w10 7/15 3-5
izig. 1-11)
Lesi simiso sezinto siyobhujiswa emhlabeni wonke
Izakhi ziyoncibilika ekubhujisweni kwamazulu nomhlaba okungokomfanekiso okukhona
‘Ukulukhumbula njalo usuku lukaJehova’ kusho ukungalokothi sikhohlwe lokho okuyoshiwo yilolo suku kithi
ngabanye nasesintwini sonke
AmaKristu eqiniso anethemba lokusinda ngalolo suku
Nokho, kulabo abangasinaki isibonakaliso sezikhathi, lolo suku luyofika “njengesela”
UPetru usinxusa ukuba sihlanganyele “ezenzweni zokuziphatha ezingcwele” futhi senze ‘izenzo zokuzinikela
kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu’ (w10 7/15 7-11)
Izenzo ezinjalo zingcwele futhi zibonisa inhlonipho ngoNkulunkulu ngoba zivumelana nalokho uNkulunkulu
akufunayo kumaKristu [Ngaphandle kokubeka imithetho, nikeza izibonelo zokuziphatha okungcwele nezenzo
eziqondile ezihlobene nenkonzo engcwele]
UKULUKHUMBULA NJALO USUKU LUKAJEHOVA KUZOSILETHELA IZIBUSISO (4 imiz.)
Manje yisikhathi sokulukhumbula njalo usuku lukaJehova futhi samukeleke kuye [Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:14]
Ithemba lethu liwukuba ‘sisitshekelwe ngosuku lwentukuthelo kaJehova,’ ukuba asivikele (Zef 2:2, 3)
No. 153-ZU
6/11Njengoba sinikezwe ulwazi ngosuku lukaJehova kusengaphambili, kufanele sishukumiseleke ukuba sibe
nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu futhi sibulondoloze, sithembeke futhi sigxile enkonzweni yakhe (2Pet 3:
17, 18)
Uma senza intando kaNkulunkulu manje siyoba nethemba ‘lokuhlala kuze kube phakade’ nelokusinda kulolo
suku lukaJehova olungasoze lwalitshalwa (1Joh 2:17)

Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zibone ukubaluleka kokuthembela eMbusweni kaNkulunkulu. Gxilisa ukunaka ezibusisweni
eziyokuza kulabo abathembekile manje eMbusweni kaNkulunkulu
OHULUMENI BABANTU BATHOLAKALE BENTULA (6 imiz.)
Izikalo noma izilinganiso bezilokhu zisetshenziselwa ukukala izinto kuyo yonke le minyaka edlule (it-2 874)
Inani legolide nesiliva litholakala ngokusebenzisa izikalo (Gen 23:15, 16; Isa 46:6)
Izikalo zisetshenziswa ngokomfanekiso ukuba zimelele ukwahlulela okuhle (Job 31:6)
Uma imikhiqizo ingazifinyeleli izindinganiso ezifanele, imiphumela ingaba mibi kakhulu
Abantu baye bazama cishe zonke izinhlobo zohulumeni ezikhona nefilosofi yezombangazwe (g85 4/8 3-4)
Lab’ ohulumeni baye baqhuba kanjani?
Imibuso yamakhosi iye yatholakala intula (g90-ZU 8/22 16, 19)
Ukubusa kwezikhulu kuye kwatholakala kunganelisi (g90-ZU 9/8 24, 26-7)
Ukubusa kwentando yeningi kunobuthakathaka obuningi (g90-ZU 9/22 11, 13-14)
Asikho isimiso sokubusa esiye saveza uhulumeni owanelisa zonke izakhamuzi noma ohlangabezana nezidi-
ngo eziyisisekelo zomuntu zokuphila ukuphila okwanelisayo nokuchumayo
Abanye abantu abathembekile baye basebenza kanzima ukuze benze ngcono izinto futhi ngezinye izikha-
thi baye baveza imiphumela emihle
Baye bagcina ngokungaphumeleli ngenxa yokuthi umuntu akadalelwanga ukuzibusa (Jer 10:23)
UJEHOVA UBIZELE IZIZWE EKWAHLULELWENI (12 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu ubize ohulumeni ukuba balandise
Izizwe zifaniswa nothuli esikalweni (Isa 40:12, 15)
Ziye zatholakala zinjani esikalweni sakhe sokwahlulela?
Osukwini lukaDaniyeli, uJehova wabeka esilinganisweni umbuso onamandla wezombangazwe wangaleso sikha-
thi futhi wawuthola untula (Funda uDaniyeli 5:24-28) (dp-ZU 108-9)
Ngokuphazima kweso omunye umbuso wasuswa futhi isikhundla sawo sathathwa omunye (Funda uDaniye-
li 5:30, 31)
UMbuso Wezwe WaseBabiloni walandelwa owamaMede NamaPheresiya, wona walandelwa owamaGreki,
owaseRoma nombuso ohlangene wamaNgisi namaMelika, okungumlando weminyaka engu-2 500
Eminye imibuso yezombangazwe yesiprofetho seBhayibheli imelelwa izilo ezine ezinkulu kuDaniyeli isahluko 7
(Funda uDaniyeli 7:2, 3, 17)
Ngemva kokwethula izilo ezine, umprofethi uDaniyeli uchaza isigcawu senkantolo esiqhubeka ezulwini (Fu-
nda uDaniyeli 7:9, 10)
OMdala Wezinsuku, uJehova, uyahlala ukuze ahlulele le mibuso (Hu 90:2; w95-ZU 10/15 19-20; w88-ZU 6/15
3-4; dp-ZU 144; it-1 105)
Uyithola ifanelwe ukubhujiswa (Funda uDaniyeli 7:11, 12) (dp-ZU 145)
Ivunyelwa ukuba iqhubeke isikhashana, ilinde ukuba ekugcineni ibhujiswe e-Armagedoni (IsA 16:14, 16)
UMBUSO KANKULUNKULU UYOBUSA UMHLABA (20 imiz.)
INkantolo yendawo yonke yanika uMbuso kaMesiya owamiswa ezulwini ngo-1914 amandla okubusa umhlaba
(Funda uDaniyeli 7:13, 14) (dp-ZU 145-6)
Kusukela ngo-1914, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uye wabusa kanyekanye nohulumeni babantu
Ngisho namanje singayibeka esilinganisweni bese sikhetha ngokuhlakanipha
Ukubusa komuntu kuye kwahluleka ukuvikela izikhonzi zako ekonakaleni okunjengokuziphatha okubi,
ukusebenzisa ugwayi nokusebenzisa kabi imilaliso; ukubusa kukaKristu kuyakwenza loko (1Ko 6:9-11; 2Ko
7:1)
Ohulumeni babantu abaphumelelanga ukufundisa izikhonzi zabo ukuba ziphile ukuphila okujabulisayo no-
kukhiqizayo; ukubusa kukaKristu kusifundisa indlela yokuphila manje naphakade (Isa 48:17; 54:13)
Ukubusa komuntu ofayo ngeke kulethe izinzuzo ezihlala njalo; uMbuso kaMesiya uyokwenza (Hu 146:3, 4;
Dan 7:14)
Esikhathini esiseduze esizayo, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyobhubhisa bonke ohulumeni basemhlabeni, ulethe uku-
busa kwawo kokulunga emhlabeni wonke (Dan 2:44)
Cabanga ukuthi lokho kuyosho ukuthini ngesintu (w88-ZU 6/15 6-7; dg-ZU 22-8)
Ubugebengu nobudlova buyophela (Hu 37:9, 10)
Ukuhlukana ngokobuhlanga nangokobuzwe nezimpi okuzibangelayo, kuyophela (Isa 2:4)
Ukuntuleka kwezindlu, ukungabi namakhaya kanye nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi kuyoba izinto zesikhathi
esidlule (Isa 65:21, 22)
No. 154-ZU
3/02Kuyoba nenala yokudla kubo bonke abantu (Hu 72:16)
Kuyobuyiselwa ukuphila okuphelele (Job 33:25; Isa 35:5, 6; IsA 21:3, 4)
Wonke umonakalo owenziwe emkhayeni wesintu uyolungiswa (Isa 65:17, 18)
Imbulunga yonke iyoguqulwa ibe yipharadesi (Lu 23:43)
INDLELA OKUFANELE SENZE NGAYO MANJE UKUZE SIPHILE NGAPHANSI KOMBUSO KANKULUNKU-
LU (7 imiz.)
Yini okufanele siyenze manje ukuze sifanelekele ukuphila ngaphansi koMbuso kaNkulunkulu?
Tadisha iBhayibheli, futhi uzithobe ezimfunekweni zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu (2Ko 5:14, 15)
Hlakulela izimfanelo zokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu (Mik 6:8; Zef 2:3; 1Pe 4:8)
Hlanganyela nabakhulekeli beqiniso (Isa 2:2, 3; Heb 10:23-25)
Hlanganyela ngentshiseko ekumemezeleni izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Mat 24:14)
UJesu Kristu uphila phakade, futhi uhulumeni wakhe ‘uyoma phakade’ (Dan 2:44)
Ngokuphila manje ngokwemithetho kanye nezimiso zawo, singabheka phambili ekuphileni okuphakade epha-
radesi emhlabeni
(Namathela ngokuseduze ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No 154-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45INGABE SELIFIKILE IHORA LOKWAHLULELWA KWEBHABHILONI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi isho ukuthini inkulumo yeBhayibheli ethi “iBhabhiloni Elikhulu.” Zicacisele ukuthi
ukwahlulelwa kwalo kufanelekile futhi sekuseduze. Zisize zibone isidingo esiphuthumayo sokuphuma eBhabhi-
loni Elikhulu elinecala legazi kungakephuzi kakhulu
UKUCHAZA OWESIFAZANE ONGOKOMFANEKISO OKUTHIWA IBHABHILONI ELIKHULU (8 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lichaza “iBhabhiloni Elikhulu” ngokuthi “isifebe esikhulu” nangokuthi “umuzi omkhulu onombuso
phezu kwamakhosi omhlaba” (IsA 17:1, 5, 15, 18)
Umbuso ophezu kweminye imibuso nezizwe uwumbuso ozimele (it-1 240)
Aliwona umbuso wezombangazwe, ngoba lifeba namakhosi omhlaba futhi lidukisa izizwe ‘ngokusebenzela-
na kwalo nemimoya’ (IsA 18:3, 23)
Ukubhujiswa kwalo yizimpondo eziyishumi zesilo esibomvu esingokomfanekiso kulilelwa abangane balo be-
zombangazwe nabezentengiselwano (IsA 17:16, 17; 18:9-19; re-ZU 267-8)
Liyisitha sokukhulekela kweqiniso (IsA 17:4, 6; 19:1, 2)
Zonke lezi zici zibonisa ukuthi iBhabhiloni Elikhulu liwumbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga (re-ZU 235)
Kunesizathu esizwakalayo sokubiza iBhabhiloni Elikhulu ngokuthi liyisifebe
Ngokwesibonelo, isizwe sakwa-Israyeli saxwayiswa ngokuthi ukuzibandakanya nezizwe zaseKhanani kwaku-
fana ‘nokuziphatha okubi ngokobulili [“ukuphinga,” IBhayibheli lesiZulu elidala] nonkunkulu bazo’ (Eks
34:12-16; it-1 240)
UJehova wamlahla u-Israyeli noJuda ‘ngokufeba’ nezizwe zezombangaze nonkulunkulu bazo (Hez 16:15-17,
26-30, 38; Is 1:21; Jer 3:6-10, 13; Hos 6:10; 7:11; 8:9, 10; it-1 1037)
UJakobe waxwayisa ngokuphinga okungokomoya ngokuba nobungane nezwe (Jak 4:4)
IBhabhiloni Elikhulu, elifeba ‘namakhosi omhlaba,’ ngempela ‘lingunina wezifebe [ezingokomoya]’ (IsA 17:2, 5;
re-ZU 237-8, 244)
ICALA LEGAZI LEBHABHILONI ELIKHULU (20 imiz.)
Nakuba igama elithi iBhabhiloni Elikhulu libonisa ukuthi ingokomoya lenkolo yamanga lifana nelomuzi wase-
ndulo waseBhabhiloni, icala lalo legazi laqala ngaphambi kokuba uNimrode amise umuzi waseBhabhiloni (Gen
11:1-4)
Inkolo yamanga kumelwe ilandise ngegazi ‘labo bonke abaye babulawa emhlabeni’ (Funda isAmbulo 18:24)
Lapho elahla abaholi benkolo bobuJuda, uJesu wabonisa ukuthi inkolo yamanga yaqala emhlabeni ngesikha-
thi sokuvukela kokuqala (Funda uMathewu 23:33-36) (w91-ZU 12/1 20)
USathane waqala inkolo yamanga ensimini yase-Edene (g89-ZU 1/8 5)
Ngokukholelwa amanga kaSathane nokuhalela isithelo esasinqatshelwe, u-Eva waba umuntu wokuqala
ongumkhulekeli wezithombe (Gen 3:6, 17-19; it-1 1168)
USathane waba ‘ngumbulali,’ okwaqala umlando wenkolo yamanga wecala legazi (Joh 8:44; Gen 3:1-5)
Umuntu wokuqala owachitha igazi elingenacala kwakunguKhayini, owayelandela inkolo yamanga
(Gen 4:8-10)
Kuyafaneleka ukuba uJehova awahlulelele ukubhujiswa umbuso wezwe wenkolo yamanga (IsA 18:8, 20; re-ZU
256-8)
Kumelwe kuphindiselwe ngecala legazi elibi inkolo yamanga enalo (IsA 18:24; re-ZU 245, 270-1)
Ngokombono kaJehova, inkolo yamanga inecala legazi nangenxa yokuthi ayifundisi iqiniso (Mar 7:7, 8; re-ZU
271)
Imihlambi yayo ayilifundanga iqiniso lothando lwangempela lobuzalwane (Mik 4:3, 5; Joh 13:34, 35; IzE 10:34,
35; 1Jo 3:10-12; w96-ZU 4/15 13-14)
Ukukhulekela ngokuvumelana neqiniso kuyimfuneko yokuthokozisa uNkulunkulu nokuthola insindiso ya-
phakade (Joh 4:24; 2Ko 4:3, 4; 1Ti 2:3, 4; IsA 21:27; re-ZU 310)
Imikhuba nezimfundiso zenkolo yamanga—njengemfundiso kaZiqu-zintathu, umphefumulo ongafi nesiho-
go somlilo—kuhlambalaza uNkulunkulu
UJesu walahla ukukhulekela okunjalo ngokuthi ‘kuyize’ (Mat 15:7-9)
Ngandlela-thile, iBhabhiloni Elikhulu kumelwe lilandise kuJehova ngegazi “labo bonke abaye babulawa emhla-
beni”
Liyobhujiswa futhi ‘lishiswe ngomlilo liphele’ (IsA 16:19; 17:16; 18:8, 17, 21-23; re-ZU 256, 270)
Ukwahlulelwa kwenkolo yamanga kufika “ngehora elilodwa” (IsA 18:10, 17, 19; w97-ZU 4/1 14; w89-ZU 4/15
15-16)
INGABE UKUBHUJISWA KWEBHABHILONI ELIKHULU SEKUSONDELE? (7 imiz.)
“Isibonakaliso [esiyinhlanganisela] sokuba khona [kukaKristu] nesesiphelo sesimiso sezinto” siye sabonakala ku-
sukela ngo-1914 (Mat 24:3; w97-ZU 4/1 5-8; w93-ZU 3/1 4-6)
No. 155-ZU
12/02UJesu wathi izici ezihlukahlukene zalesi “sibonakaliso” “ziwukuqala kwemihelo yokucindezeleka” (“imihelo
yokubeletha,” Kingdom Interlinear) (Mat 24:8)
Njengemihelo yokubeletha, eya isika ngamandla njengoba ukubeletha kusondela, ukucindezeleka kulesi si-
miso sezinto kuyanda njengoba ukwahlulelwa kweBhabhiloni kusondela (2Ti 3:1, 13; w83-ZU 9/15 5-6 [w83
4/1 6])
‘Ukubonakaliswa kokuba khona kukaKristu’ okukhulu sekusondele (Funda eyesi-2 Thesalonika 2:8) (re-ZU
282)
Izenzakalo zezwe zibonisa ukuthi inkolo yamanga isilengela egodini
BALEKELA UKWAHLULELWA KWEBHABHILONI ELINECALA LEGAZI—PHEPHELA ENDAWENI ELO-
NDEKILE! (10 imiz.)
Kufanele silalele isixwayiso sesAmbulo 18:4 (w93-ZU 5/1 24)
Njengoba iBhabhiloni Elikhulu linecala elikhulu lokuchitha igazi, umuntu kumelwe abalekele emzini wesiphe-
phelo ongokomfanekiso (w95-ZU 11/15 15-20)
Ngaphansi koMthetho, ngomusa uNkulunkulu walungiselela imizi yesiphephelo eyayiyizindawo zokulondeka
kubantu ababulele ngokungenhloso (Funda uNumeri 35:11, 12)
Ukuze sizuze emseni kaNkulunkulu namuhla, kumelwe sibalekele futhi sihlale ngaphakathi emzini wesiphe-
phelo ongokomfanekiso (Funda uNumeri 35:26-28)
Ukuxwaya isimo sengqondo sezwe nokuyenga kwalo nokuba nokuningi esikwenzayo emsebenzini weNko-
si kungasisiza ukuba sihlale kulowo muzi (re-ZU 126)
Ngokuqhubeka sibonisa ukholo emhlatshelweni kaJesu nangokuzuza ezinkonzweni zakhe njengomPristi
Ophakeme, siyosinda ekubhujisweni lapho kubhujiswa iBhabhiloni Elikhulu naso sonke lesi simiso sezi-
nto (IsA 7:9, 10, 14)
Ukuphela kwayo yonke inkolo yamanga kuyobonisa ukuqala kwenkathi entsha yokubusa kukaNkulunkulu (Fu-
nda isAmbulo 19:1, 2, 6) (re-ZU 274-5)
Ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, kuyolandela ukuphela kwaso sonke isimiso sezinto sikaSathane (IsA 19:19-21)
Ngokuthatha isinyathelo manje nokuhlala sithembekile kuJehova, siyojabulela izibusiso zezwe elisha lokulunga
eliyolandela (Mat 24:13; IsA 21:1-4)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUSUKU LOKWAHLULELA—ISIKHATHI SOKWESABA NOMA SETHEMBA?
Okufanele kuphawulwe y isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zisuse noma imiphi imibono eyiphutha ngokuphathelene nezahlulelo zikaJehova zokulunga. Zishu-
kumise ukuba zifune ukusinda osukwini oluzayo lwesahlulelo kulesi simiso sezinto futhi zijabulele uSuku Lokwa-
hlulela oluhle lweminyaka eyinkulungwane oluyolandela ngemva kwalokho
USUKU LOKWAHLULELA—UKUCHITHA IZINGANEKWANE (4 imiz.)
Kunemibono eminingi eyiphutha ngokuphathelene noSuku Lokwahlulela
Abaningi bacabanga ukuthi wonke umuntu uyoma phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu ngenkathi
befundelwa ngokuzwakalayo uhlu olude lwamaphutha nezono abazenze esikhathini esidlule (pe-ZU 175)
Le nganekwane esakazekile ephathelene noSuku Lokwahlulela iveza umbono ongemuhle ngoNkulunkulu
‘oluthando’ (1Joh 4:8)
Ukukholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu akasoze awakhohlwa amaphutha ethu akusenzi simthande
Nokho, iBhayibheli libonisa ukuthi uJehova unguNkulunkulu othethelelayo ‘ongazikhumbuli’ izono zalabo
abathethelelayo (Jer 31:34; IHu 86:5; 103:8-14; w97-ZU 12/1 12-13)
Abanye bacabanga ukuthi akukho muntu uNkulunkulu azomahlulela kabi
IBhayibheli alifundisi ukuthi kuyosindiswa bonke abantu (w76-ZU 537-8 [w76 343])
UJehova, onguMahluleli olungile, uyabalahla ababi (IHu 7:8-11)
Akabayeki nje ababi angabajezisi (Eks 34:7; UmSh 8:11)
Ukuze sithole umbono olinganiselwe, ake sicabangele (1) izahlulelo zikaJehova zangesikhathi esidlule, (2) usuku
lwesahlulelo oluzayo (3) noSuku Lokwahlulela
Kunomehluko phakathi kosuku lwesahlulelo noSuku Lokwahlulela, njengoba kuzochazwa kule nkulumo
IZINSUKU ZESAHLULELO ZESIKHATHI ESIDLULE—LOKHO EZISIFUNDISA KONA (12 imiz.)
Ukuze uqonde ukuthi kungani kudingeka ukuba uJehova alethe isahlulelo esibi, cabangela lokho okwenzeka
ngaphambi kweSikhukhula
Kubonakala sengathi inkolo yamanga ehlambalazayo yaqala ezinsukwini zika-Enoshe, umzukulu ka-Adamu
(Gen 4:26; it-1 729)
Izwe lase lonakele ngokwedlulele osukwini luka-Enoke (Gen 5:22-24; Jude 14, 15)
Izimo zaba zimbi nakakhulu osukwini lukaNowa, phakathi neminyaka engu-600 eyandulela iSikhukhula
Izingelosi eziyizihlubuki, amaNefili, nabantu ababi bawonakalisa umhlaba bawugcwalisa ngobudlova (Gen
6:1, 2, 4, 11, 12)
Usuku lukaJehova lwesahlulelo kuphela olwalungaqeda ububi obunjalo
Ingabe uJehova ubhubhisa abantu abalungile kanye nababi?
U-Abrahama wezwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngokubhujiswa kweSodoma neGomora okwakusondela (Gen 18:23)
Impendulo kaJehova ibonisa ukuthi wayezazi kahle izinhliziyo zalabo bantu (Gen 18:24-33; 1Kro 28:9)
Njengoba kwenzeka endabeni kaNowa, abalungileyo banikwa indlela yokuphunyula (Math 24:38, 39; 2Pet
2:5, 7; w98-ZU 8/1 12-13)
Ngothando, uJehova unika ababi ithuba lokuphenduka, njengoba kubonakala kulokho okwenzeka eNineve
(Hez 18:23, 32; Jona 3:4-10)
UJona waxwayisa ngokuthi iNineve lalizobhujiswa ngemva kwezinsuku ezingu-40
Abantu baseNineve baphenduka, uJehova wawuyeka lowo muzi (Jona 4:11)
UJehova ufuna ngobuqotho ukuba ababi baguquke, baphenduke (Hez 33:11)
Izahlulelo zikaJehova zesikhathi esidlule zisifundisa ukuthi isihe siyisici esibalulekile sobulungisa bukaNkulu-
nkulu (it-2 376-7)
Ukulungiselela kukaNkulunkulu isihlengo ukuze kusindiswe isintu kuyisibonelo esivelele salokhu (Math 20:
28; Ro 5:18-21)
LESI SIMISO SEZINTO SISONDELA OSUKWINI LWASO LOKUGCINA LWESAHLULELO (10 imiz.)
Izinsuku zesahlulelo zesikhathi esidlule ‘zaziyisibonelo’ sesahlulelo sokugcina esiyokhishwa kulesi simiso sezi-
nto esibi (2Pet 2:6; 3:7)
Usuku lokugcina lwesahlulelo lubizwa ngokuthi “usuku olukhulu lukaJehova” (Zef 1:14-18)
Izizwe ziyenqaba ukuqaphela ubukhosi bukaJehova, ngakho ziyobhujiswa nakanjani (IHu 2:10-12; 110:5, 6)
UJehova uye wamisa uJesu ukuba ahole lapho izingelosi zihlasela izizwe zomhlaba (IsAm 19:11-15)
Ingabe kumelwe silwesabe lolu suku olwesabekayo lwesahlulelo?
Lokhu kuxhomeke kithi ngokuyinhloko (Funda uZefaniya 2:2, 3)
Abanye bangase besatshiswe igama elithi “mhlawumbe”
Ukungaqiniseki kuyisici sabantu; uJehova akaguquki neze, uzifeza njalo izithembiso (Josh 23:14; Jak 1:
17; w92-ZU 5/1 15-16)
No. 156-ZU
6/03Uma sifunda ezibonelweni zezinsuku zesahlulelo ezidlule, singaqiniseka ngokuthi uJehova uyosivikela
UJesu watshela abalandeli bakhe lokho okwakufanele bakwenze ezinsukwini ezandulela ukubhujiswa kwe-
simiso sezinto samaJuda
Kwakufanele bahlale beqaphile futhi bematasa beshumayela (Mar 13:10, 37)
Kwakumelwe balalele iziqondiso zikaJesu ukuze basinde (Luka 21:20-22)
Uma sisebenzisa lezo zimiso ezifanayo, siyosinda osukwini lukaJehova futhi siphile size sibone uSuku Lo-
kwahlulela
LUYINI USUKU LOKWAHLULELA? (15 imiz.)
Umphostoli uPawulu watshela abase-Athene ngoSuku Lokwahlulela kuzEnzo 17:31 (Ifunde)
UJesu unguMahluleli onozwela, ongakhethi, othobekile (Isaya 11:2-4)
Uthembela esiqondisweni sikaJehova njalo lapho ahlulela (Joh 8:16)
Amazwi kaJesu asisiza ukuba siqonde ukuthi uSuku Lokwahlulela luyoqala nini
Wakhuluma ngoSuku Lokwahlulela, kodwa wayengasho ukubhujiswa kwalesi simiso sezinto esibi (Math 11:
21, 22; 12:41, 42)
Kunalokho, wahlobanisa uSuku Lokwahlulela novuko
USuku Lokwahlulela luhlobene nokuBusa KukaKristu Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane, okuqala ngemva kwe-
Armagedoni
Nokho, okokuqala ‘amazulu’ amadala ‘nomhlaba’ omdala—imibuso yanamuhla nalabo abangaphansi kwayo—
kuyobe ‘sekubalekile’ (IsAm 20:11; 2Pet 3:12, 13)
Khona-ke, abafileyo bayavuswa futhi bahlulelwe (IsAm 20:12, 13)
Akufanele sicabange ukuthi uSuku Lokwahlulela lungamahora angu-24 kuphela
Labo abahlulela noKristu babusa iminyaka eyinkulungwane (IsAm 20:4)
Ngakho uSuku Lokwahlulela ‘luwusuku’ oluyiminyaka eyinkulungwane (2Pet 3:8)
Kungani lulude kangako? Impendulo itholakala endleleni abafile abahlulelwa ngayo
IBhayibheli likwenza kucace ukuthi abafileyo ngeke bahlulelwe ngesisekelo salokho abakwenza ngaphambi ko-
kuba bafe (Ro 6:7, 23; rs-ZU 413)
Ukwahlulelwa kuhlangene nalokho abakwenzayo ngemva kovuko
“Imiqulu” emisha inikeza isisekelo sokwahlulela, futhi ivulwa phakathi noSuku Lokwahlulela (IsAm 20:12;
pe-ZU 181)
Lokhu kukwenza kucace ukuthi kungani uSuku Lokwahlulela luhlanganisa inkathi ende
Ukwahlulelwa komuntu kuxhomeke enkambweni yakhe yokuphila phakathi neMinyaka Eyinkulungwane
Abaningi abayovuswa kwabafileyo bayoyamukela imfundo yaphezulu; abanye bayoyenqaba (Isaya 26:9,
10; re-ZU 292, 300)
Labo abavukelayo bayobhujiswa (Isaya 65:20; IsAm 20:15)
Njengoba iminyaka eyinkulungwane iqhubeka, abantu abalalelayo bayokhushulelwa esimweni esiphelele esake
sajatshulelwa u-Adamu no-Eva
Ekupheleni kokubusa kwakhe kweminyaka eyinkulungwane, uJesu ‘ubuyisela umbuso kuNkulunkulu noYi-
se’ (1Ko 15:24-28)
Ngemva kwalokho, kufika uvivinyo lokugcina (IsAm 20:7-10)
Kulabo abavusiwe abahlala bethembekile kuJehova, uvuko lwabo luba ‘uvuko lokuphila’ (Joh 5:28, 29)
Kulabo abangathembekile, luba ‘uvuko lokwahlulelwa [kabi]’
Umphumela uxhomeke ekutheni simthanda kangakanani uJehova (w98-ZU 11/1 18)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UBHEKE OSUKWINI LOKWAHLULELA NGETHEMBA (4 imiz.)
USuku Lokwahlulela—kanye nosuku lwesahlulelo oluzayo kulesi simiso sezinto esibi—kufanele lusenze sibe ne-
themba, singesabi
Uma sifa sithembekile phakathi nalezi zinsuku zokugcina, sinethemba lovuko eliqinisekile lokuthi sizolubona
uSuku Lokwahlulela (Luka 23:43; IzE 24:15)
Abaningi banethemba lokuba ingxenye ‘yesixuku esikhulu,’ esiyosinda e-Armagedoni (IsAm 7:9, 14; Joh 11:26)
UJesu ‘ungumahluleli wabaphilayo nabafileyo’ (IzE 10:42)
Uyosebenzisa izimiso ezifanayo zokubahlulela ngesihe ‘abaphilayo’—abesixuku esikhulu, abangakaze
bafe noma bavuswe kwabafileyo
Kwabathembekile, uSuku Lokwahlulela luyoba yisikhathi esimangalisayo (IHu 96:12, 13)
Khumbula ukuthi leli themba linesiqinisekiso esikhulu (IzE 17:31)
Yeka ukuthi kubaluleke kanjani ukuba sizimisele ukuba lapho!
(Namathela ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonji-
we okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 156-ZU—ikhasi 2
