KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedINDLELA AMAKRISTU EQINISO AHLOBISA
NGAYO IMFUNDISO YAPHEZULU
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba zilazise ilungelo esinalo lokwenza ukufundisa kukaJehova kugqame kukho konke esikwenza-
yo ekuphileni. Sifisa ukuba abanye babone ukuthi imfundiso yaphezulu ayigcini nje ngokusinikeza izimiso ezine-
ngqondo kodwa inikeza amaKristu eqiniso nendlela yokuphila ekhangayo
UJEHOVA UYAKUJABULELA UKUHLOBISA YONKE INDALO YAKHE (6 imiz.)
Umhlobiso uchazwa njengokuthile “okufakwayo ukuze kuhlotshiswe, okwenza into ibukeke kahle, okufekethi-
swa ngakho futhi kwenze umuntu ngokwakhe, noma lokho akumelelayo, kujabulise noma kukhange” (it-1 51)
 ́
ImiBhalo ichaza uJehova njengozungezwe ubuhle (IHu 104:1, 2; IsAm 4:2, 3)
Yonke indalo kaJehova yomoya ichazwa njengehlobe ngendlela efanayo engcwele, ebonisa inkazimulo yakhe
Inhlangano kaJehova yasezulwini yamadodana ayizingelosi inobuhle obukhazimulayo (Hez 1:4-28; IsAm
12:1)
IJerusalema Elisha lichazwa “njengomlobokazi ehlotshiselwe umyeni wakhe” (IsAm 21:2)
Indalo kaJehova engokwenyama ichichima ubuhle obumangalisayo
Iphakathi kwezinto ezinhle azenzile (UmSh 3:11)
Amazulu agcwele izinkanyezi “amemezela inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu” (IHu 19:1)
Lapho uJehova edala umhlaba, izingelosi zajabulela umbukwane omangalisayo (Jobe 38:7)
Uma siwubhekisisa kahle umhlaba wembula ukuthi uye wahlobisa indalo yakhe yasemhlabeni ngemibala,
ngezinto ezinhlobonhlobo, eziyinkimbinkimbi nezinkulu (IHu 139:14; Luk 12:27, 28)
[Chaza kafushane obunye ubuhle bendalo, njengezintaba ezilele iqhwa, izimpophoma ezigelezayo, imithi
emikhulu ye-redwood, izimbali ezimibalabala, izinto eziphilayo kokubili ezinkulu nezincane]
Indalo kaJehova yasemhlabeni ihlotshiswe kahle futhi iyamkhazimulisa (Gen 1:31)
ABANTU BANEKHONO LOKUHLOBISA INDAWO EBAZUNGEZILE—KOKUBILI ENGOKWENYAMA NE-
NGOKOMOYA (5 imiz.)
UJehova wabeka umbhangqwana wokuqala ongabantu endaweni enhle enokuthula—ikhaya elihle eliyipharadesi
Wayehlose ukuba usebenzise amakhono uNkulunkulu ayewunike wona ukuba uhlobise umhlaba ngokwandi-
sa imingcele yePharadesi embulungeni yonke (Gen 1:28; 2:15)
Isono sonakalisa ubuhle bendalo kaNkulunkulu engabantu
Umhlaba wonakala ngaphambi kweSikhukhula (Gen 6:11, 12)
‘Ukuchithwa komhlaba’ kusaqhubeka nasosukwini lwethu (IsAm 11:18)
Nakuba abantu bengaphelele, banalo ikhono lokuhlobisa
Ukuhloba okungokwenyama: Abantu basebenza kanzima futhi bachithe izindodla zemali, behlobisa imizi yabo
futhi bezilungisa nabo ngokwabo
Ukuhloba okungokomoya: Lapho abantu benza imizamo yokuhloba ngokomoya, uJehova uyathokoza (1Sam
16:7; 1Pet 3:3, 4)
AmaKristu eqiniso anelungelo eliyingqayizivele lokuhlobisa imfundiso kaJehova (Funda uThithu 2:10)
Lokhu kuhilelani?
IZINDLELA UMUNTU NGAMUNYE ANGAYIHLOBISA NGAZO IMFUNDISO YAPHEZULU (24 imiz.)
Imfundiso kaNkulunkulu yinhle, injengetshe eliyigugu (IHu 12:6)
Empeleni uma siphila ngokuvumelana naleyo mfundiso, siyenza ikhange
Siyayicwebezelisa, noma njengoba i-New English Bible ikubeka, “sinezela inkazimulo” kuyo (Thit 2:10)
Ngaleyo ndlela imfundiso yaphezulu yenziwa ibakhange abanye
UPawulu wayala uThithu ukuba akhumbuze amaKristu aseKrethe ngezindlela eziningi ayengayihlobisa ngazo
imfundiso yaphezulu (Thit 2:1-15)
Nathi singayihlobisa imfundiso yaphezulu (w89-ZU 6/1 15-20)
Cabangela izindlela ezilandelayo
Inkonzo yasensimini
Kufanele silwele ukuphumelelisa inkonzo yethu ukuze sidlulisele isigijimi soMbuso ngendlela eyokhanga aba-
nhliziyo-ziqotho (Ro 11:13)
Sigcine izincwadi, izikhwama zokushumayela nezinye izinto kuhlelekile futhi kuhlanzekile
Imihlangano yebandla
Kuyajabulisa ukubona abantu beba khona emihlanganweni naphezu kwezinkinga (IHu 133:1)
Kuyo yonke imihlangano, nalapho siya enkonzweni, kufanele sigqoke kahle nangendlela efanelekayo
Kufanele sithole injabulo ngokugcina amaHholo OMbuso ethu ehlanzekile futhi ecocekile
No. 157-ZU
5/03Umsebenzi wethu wokuziphilisa nesikole
NjengamaKristu, singayihlobisa imfundiso yaphezulu ngokukhuthala nangenhlonipho (w90-ZU 9/15 23;
w73-ZU 335-6 [w73 187-8]; g94-ZU 7/22 27)
Ngokuvamile ukuziphatha esikoleni nasemsebenzini kuyashaqisa
Ngokuziphatha kwethu nangenkulumo, amaKristu eqiniso ahluka ngokuphelele
Umbono ngabangebona oFakazi
Asifuni ukukhuluma kabi ngalabo abanezinkolelo ezingafani nezethu
Isimo sengqondo sokuziphakamisa ngeke sibakhange abanye ukuba bazokhulekela uJehova (w98-ZU 12/1 15)
Ukuhlanzeka ngokomzimba
Ukuhlanzeka kuyisici esihlukanisa amaKristu eqiniso (2Ko 7:1)
Kuhlukanisa abantu bakaNkulunkulu njengeqembu, futhi kufanele kubonakale komunye nomunye wethu
Ukubukeka kwemizi yethu kufanele kuhlobise isigijimi soMbuso esisiphethe (g88-ZU 10/8 26-9 [g88 9/22 8-11])
Akudingekile ukuba umuzi ube ubukhazikhazi, kodwa kudingeka ukuba uhlonipheke, ucoceke futhi uhla-
nzeke
Izimoto zethu kufanele zihlanzeke, ngaphakathi nangaphandle, ukuze ukubukeka kwazo kungasilulazi isigi-
jimi sethu
Kufanele sizigcine sihlanzekile thina ngokwethu nezingubo esizigqokayo ukuze ukubukeka kwethu kungaba-
ngeli isihlamba
Ukugqoka nokuzilungisa
Ukugqoka nokuzilungisa kwethu kufanele kufanelane nalabo “abathi bahlonipha uNkulunkulu” (1Thim 2:10)
Ngokuvamile amaKristu eqiniso abonakala ngalezi zindlela
Ukuzijabulisa
Ukukhathalela okufanele ngohlobo lokuzijabulisa esilukhethayo kuyobonisa isifiso sethu sokuhlobisa imfundi-
so yaphezulu
Uma abantu bakaJehova bebengalingisa leli zwe bebe becabanga ukuthi bahambisana nemfundiso yaphe-
zulu bekuyoletha isihlamba egameni likaJehova
Ngazo zonke lezi zindlela nangezinye, amaKristu eqiniso ahlobisa imfundiso yaphezulu futhi enze isigijimi so-
Mbuso asiphethe sikhange ngokwengeziwe kwabanye
IMIPHUMELA YOKUHLOBISA IMFUNDISO YAPHEZULU (10 imiz.)
Umuntu opholisha amatshe ayigugu usebenza kanzima ukuze aveze ubuhle betshe eliyigugu
Umphumela uba yinto yokuhloba enhle, abantu abayibuka ngokuyazisa
Ngokufanayo, abaningi bakhangwa imfundiso yaphezulu ngoba bebona ubuhle bayo ekuphileni kwabakhu-
lekeli bakaJehova (1Pet 2:12)
Kunezibonelo zosuku lwanamuhla zamaKristu athembekile aye ahlobisa izimfundiso zikaNkulunkulu, enza lezo
zimfundiso zikhange kwabazibonayo (Bheka i-Index ngaphansi kwesithi “Jehovah’s Witnesses, Statements by
Others [OFakazi BakaJehova, Okushiwo Abanye]”)
Imihlangano yesigodi ibilokhu ibahlaba umxhwele abantu abangebona oFakazi (km-ZU 5/93 4; g93-ZU 12/22
11-12)
Abaningi abavakashela amakhaya aseBethel emhlabeni wonke bahlatshwa umxhwele izinga lokuphila kobu-
Kristu eliphakeme labantu abahlala kulezo zakhiwo (w97-ZU 8/1 9)
UJehova uyajabula lapho esibona sizikhandla sikhazimulisa imfundiso yakhe (IzA 27:11)
Uyokujabulela ukusabela umsebenzi wokuguqula umhlaba ube yipharadesi lembulunga yonke
Labo abahlobisa imfundiso yaphezulu manje bayoba phakathi kwezinto ezinhle zikaJehova eziyomlethela udu-
mo nenkazimulo kuze kube phakade
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo
ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedYIBA NESIBINDI, UTHEMBELE KUJEHOVA
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqaphele ukuthi kulesi sikhathi sokuphela kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba sibe nesibindi futhi si-
thembele kuJehova kuphela. Ngokusebenzisa izibonelo zeBhayibheli nokubonisana nazo ngemiBhalo, ziqiniseki-
se ukuthi singaqiniseka ngokusekelwa uNkulunkulu njengoba siqhubeka nesabelo sethu sokushumayela izinda-
ba ezinhle.
ABANTU BAKAJEHOVA BAZIWA NGOKUTHEMBELA KUJEHOVA NGESIBINDI (10 imiz.)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu likhuthaza ukuthembela kuJehova futhi lisinikeza izibonelo eziningi zokulingiswa (IzA 3:
5, 6)
U-Enoshe noNowa babephila ngaphambi kukaZamcolo ezweni elingamesabi uNkulunkulu
U-Enoshe wamemezela izahlulelo zikaNkulunkulu ngesibindi (Jude 14, 15)
Ngokwethembeka, uNowa wasukela umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha, waxwayisa nangoZamcolo (2Pet 2:5)
UMose akazange ayesabe inkosi yaseGibhithe (Heb 11:27)
Wathembela kuJehova futhi wamemezela izahlulelo zikaNkulunkulu ngesibindi phambi kukaFaro futhi
ephindelela (Eks 5:1-3; 9:13-17; 10:3)
UDavide noDaniyeli, bobabili babekusekela ngokuqinile ukukhulekela kweqiniso kusukela besebasha
UJehova wasibusisa isibindi sabo lapho bebhekene nokusongelwa, nalokho okwabonakala kuyisimo esinga-
phezu kwamandla (1Sam 17:4-11, 41-50; Dan 6:6-10, 16-22)
UJesu Kristu akazange asatshiswe uSathane noma abameleli bakhe
Ngesibindi wamlahla uDeveli, walahla abaFarisi, ngaso sonke isikhathi wadumisa uJehova (Math 4:10; 23:
13-15, 33; Mar 10:17, 18; Joh 7:16-18; w03-ZU 3/1 11)
UJEHOVA USINIKEZA ISIZATHU SOKUBA SITHEMBELE KUYE NGOKUPHELELE (15 imiz.)
Imisebenzi yakhe neZwi lakhe kusinikeza isisekelo sokuba simethembe (Dut 32:4; IHu 19:1, 2; Joh 17:17)
Kusisiza ukuba siqonde ukuthi uJehova unguNkulunkulu wothando, weqiniso, nowokuhleleka (1Ko 14:33; Thit
1:2; 1Joh 4:16, 19)
Isihlengo sikaKristu nokuvuswa kwakhe kusinikeza isiqinisekiso sokuthi uJehova uyazinakekela izinceku za-
Khe futhi ngeke azikhohlwe (Math 20:28; 2Ko 5:14; Heb 6:9, 10; w03-ZU 3/1 15)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu labikezela ukuthi ezinsukwini zokugcina abazalwane bomhlaba wonke babeyokhuleke-
la ethempelini lakhe elingokomoya (Isaya 2:2, 3; w02-ZU 7/1 15)
Akukaze ngaphambili kube nabaningi kangaka abahlanganyela ekukhulekeleni okumsulwa njengamaKri-
stu eqiniso (Isaya 60:22; w01-ZU 2/15 26-7)
Inala yokudla okungokomoya nesimo esihle senhliziyo okwabikezelwa ngakho kuphambene kakhulu nezwe
elilambayo ngokomoya (Isaya 65:13, 14; Math 24:45-47)
Ukusabela kwethu ekushushisweni, ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo, kuwubufakazi obengeziwe bokusisekela kuka-
Jehova (Math 5:11, 12; 1Pet 4:13, 14)
KUDINGEKA UKHOLO NESIBINDI UKUZE SIBHEKANE NGEMPUMELELO NOBUTHA BEZWE (12 imiz.)
UJesu wabikezela ngokuba kwethu yizinto zokuzondwa (Math 24:9; w03-ZU 3/1 8; w83-ZU 9/15 12-13)
Lokhu kuwukubonakaliswa kobutha ngeNzalo yengxenye yasezulwini yenhlangano kaJehova (Gen 3:15;
w96-ZU 6/1 12-13)
Siphila esikhathini lapho ukuhlaselwa kobukhosi bukaJehova nokubusa kwakhe ngoMbuso kaMesiya ku-
gcwalisa khona izwi lesiprofetho (IHu 2:1, 2; IsAm 12:10, 17)
Ukuze sikhuthazelele ukuzondwa yizwe, kumelwe siqhubeke sithembela kuJehova ngesibindi
UJesu, esikhumbula ukufa kwakhe minyaka yonke eSidlweni SeNkosi Sakusihlwa, wathembela kuNkulunku-
lu walinqoba izwe (Joh 16:33)
UPawulu, nakuba ayesejele, waqhubeka eshumayela ngesibindi, ekhuthaza abanye ukuba ‘bakhulume izwi li-
kaNkulunkulu ngesibindi’ (Fil 1:13, 14, 27-29)
NjengoJesu noPawulu, bonisa isibindi nokuthembela kuJehova okungenakunyakaziswa, hhayi ngawakho ama-
ndla, kodwa ngamandla avela kuNkulunkulu (2Ko 1:8-10; w03-ZU 3/1 11)
Sidinga ukuthembela ngokuphelele eZwini likaJehova, ukuqiniseka ukuthi umoya wakhe ukanye nathi, ne-
sibindi sokuqhubeka simemezela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso (IzE 20:20-24)
Kuqonde ukuthi izinceku zikaJehova azishushiswa ngoba zenza okubi, kunalokho zishushiselwa ukusekela
ubukhosi bukaJehova nokuba kwazo ngamaKristu angempela, angeyona ingxenye yezwe (IHu 83:18; Math
10:22; 24:9; Joh 15:18-21; w83-ZU 9/15 14-16)
No. 158-ZU
11/03MANJE YISIKHATHI SOKUBONISA ISIBINDI NOKUTHEMBELA KUJEHOVA (8 imiz.)
Impi esikuyo ingokomoya, akuyona eyenyama (2Ko 10:3-5)
AmaKristu eqiniso awabalimazi abanye; siyaqaphela ukuthi ukuphindisela kungokukaNkulunkulu, akukho-
na okomuntu (Roma 12:19)
Ngakho, siyoqhubeka singabantu abanokuthula, abathobekile nabazithobayo kohulumeni babantu noma
ngabe sihlalaphi (Roma 12:18; Thit 3:1)
Njengoba nakanjani siyokwenza yonke imizamo yokuphila ngokuthula noxolo, siyoqhubeka ngendlela efana-
yo sishumayela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Mar 13:10; 1Thim 2:1-4)
Manje yisikhathi sokuba sibonise ukholo lwethu futhi sibe nesibindi, singabesabi abantu (IzA 29:25; Luka 12:4, 5)
Masenze okusemandleni ethu ukuba sihlanganyele ekuqedeni umsebenzi wokufakaza emhlabeni wonke (Math
24:14)
Esikuthandazelayo kuwukuba njengenhlangano yabazalwane bomhlaba wonke, sibe nesibindi sithembele ku-
Jehova kuze kube sekupheleni (Heb 10:39)
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo
ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

All Rights ReservedUKUTHOLA UKULONDEKA EZWENI ELIYINGOZI
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi nakuba sibhekene nezingozi eziningi namuhla, usongo olukhulu esibhekene nalo yi-
nhlekelele engokomoya. Gcizelela isidingo sokuncika ngokuphelele kuJehova ukuze sithole isivikelo. Ukugwema
izingibe zikaSathane kuyosisiza ukuba silondoloze ingokomoya lethu futhi sithole isiphephelo kuJehova
IBHAYIBHELI LABIKEZELA UKWANDA KWEZINGOZI AMAKRISTU AYEZOBHEKANA NAZO NAMU-
HLA (3 imiz.)
Izingozi ezingokoqobo ziyanda, kodwa lezi bonke abantu bayabhekana nazo (Math 24:7, 8)
AmaKristu abhekana nengozi enkulu futhi ecashile yenhlekelele engokomoya (Heb 10:38, 39)
Inhlekelele engokomoya yimbi nakakhulu njengoba ingaholela ekubhujisweni okuphakade (Math 10:28)
Ikhona ngempela le ngozi; isibawisile abanye (yb80 10-11)
Singasitholaphi isiphephelo nesivikelo?
IHUBO 91 LISIQINISEKISA NGOKULONDEKA OKUNGOKOMOYA EZINGOZINI EZANDAYO (7 imiz.)
UJehova uxwayisa ngengozi futhi anikeze isiphephelo nesivikelo
IHubo 91 lisebenzisa ulimi olungokomfanekiso ukuchaza lezi zingozi
[Cela izilaleli zivule amaBhayibheli kumaHubo 91, futhi ziphawule amabinzana anjengelithi ‘isicupho so-
mcuphi wezinyoni,’ ‘isifo esiwumshayabhuqe esibangela izinhlupheko,’ ‘utho olwethusayo ebusuku,’ “umci-
bisholo ondiza emini” emavesini 3, 5, 6, 10, 12 no-13]
Ukuze sizigweme lezi zingozi, kumelwe sazi ukuthi zimelelani
Isivikelo esithenjisiwe sisiqinisekisa ngokuthi asikho isidingo sokwesaba [Funda iHubo 91:1-3] (w01-ZU
11/15 15-16)
USathane, ‘umcuphi wezinyoni’ omkhulu, usibheka njengezinyoni eziwukudla kwakhe (Jer 5:26; it-1 316)
Ngokuvamile izicupho zakhe zifihlwa lapho singalindele khona
Njengoba nje umcuphi wezinyoni esebenzisa okusanhlamvu ukuhehela inyoni esicuphweni, kanjalo noSatha-
ne usebenzisa izinkanuko zenyama ukuze abambe abantu
Kumelwe senze uJehova abe yisiphephelo sethu, simethembe, singalokothi sizethembe
Njengephuphu lenyoni, kudingeka sihlale ngaphansi kwamaphiko kaNkulunkulu avikelayo ukuze sibalekele
ukuyenga kukaSathane futhi silondoloze ukulondeka kwethu okungokomoya [Funda ivesi 4] (w01-ZU
11/15 17)
Ngokuhlala sithembekile kuNkulunkulu, senze intando yakhe, siyojabulela isivikelo sakhe (IHu 15:1, 2; 121:
5-8; 1Joh 2:15-17)
GWEMA UKUBANJWA USATHANE (30 imiz.)
Isicupho sikaSathane yisimiso sakhe esibonakalayo sezinto (1Joh 5:19)
USathane usebenzisa “ukudla kwesicupho” ukuze acuphe izisulu zakhe—ukuyenga kobugovu kwezwe, nje-
ngengcebo, udumo nokuvelela
Isimiso sakhe sikhuthaza ukungamhloniphi uNkulunkulu ngokweqisa okungenakuzithiba nokunxanela
ukujabulisa izifiso zenyama, ngokusebenzisa izinto ezinjengezidakamizwa, utshwala, nobulili
UJehova usisiza ukuba singaweli ezingibeni zikaSathane (2Ko 2:11; Efe 6:11)
Olunye usongo olungaba yingozi ekulondekeni kwethu okungokomoya ‘isifo esiwumshayabhuqe esibangela izi-
nhlupheko’ (IHu 91:3)
Umshayabhuqe yisifo esibulalayo esisakazeka ngokushesha
Inkulumo ethi ‘isifo esiwumshayabhuqe’ isetshenziswe ngokomfanekiso lapha; umhubi uyihlobanisa nesicu-
pho somcuphi wezinyoni
Kubonakala ibhekisele ekushisekeleni ubuzwe, isici esibangela ukwahlukana saleli zwe elisemandleni ka-
Sathane (1Joh 5:19)
U-Arnold Toynbee wathi: “Kusukela ekupheleni kweMpi Yezwe II ukushisekela ubuzwe kuye kwenza
inani lemibuso yezifunda engozibuse yanda ngokuphindwe kabili . . . Isimo sengqondo sabantu samanje
siya sibangela ukuhlukana nakakhulu” (w01-ZU 11/15 16)
Ababusi babantu baye babhebhethekisa amalangabi ombango wezizwe obangela ukwahlukana
Umphumela uye waba “izinhlupheko” ezinjengokucwasana kwezizwe, izintela ezimba eqolo, nezimpi
(w01-ZU 11/15 16; w80-ZU 6/1 6-8 [w79 11/1 6-7])
Singavikeleka kanjani kulesi ‘sifo esiwumshayabhuqe’?
‘Ngokuhlala endaweni esithekile yoPhezukonke’ (IHu 91:1)
‘Iyindawo esithekile’ ezweni; ngeke uyibone ngamehlo enyama
Isiqu esithi ‘oPhezukonke’ sikusiza uqonde lapho ikhona
Elithi ‘oPhezukonke’ libhekisela esikhundleni sikaJehova njengoMbusi Wendawo Yonke
No. 159-ZU
10/03Indawo yokulondeka okungokomoya iwukuma okuthathwe yilabo abangasohlangothini lukaJehova ka-
njalo baba ‘sendaweni esithekile’
Ilondolozwa ngokungathathi hlangothi ngokuphelele (Joh 17:16)
Kumelwe siqaphele ukuba singayengeki sicheme nohlangothi oluthile lwezombangazwe
Kuyaduduza ukwazi ukuthi uJehova uyosifaka ngaphansi “kwamaphiko” akhe asivikele (Ruthe 2:12; IHu 5:11)
Ngokuhlala endaweni kaNkulunkulu yesivikelo engokomfanekiso, ngeke sesabe noma yiliphi icebo elakhelwe
ukumelana nathi [Funda amavesi 5 no-6]
Izenzo ezimbi ezenziwa abanye ngeke zisenze sithothongane ngokwesaba (w01-ZU 11/15 17)
Ngeke sesabe “umcibisholo ondiza emini,” njengokuhlaselwa ngamazwi, ukumangalelwa ngamanga, inkulu-
mo-ze yamanga, ukunyundelwa ngenzondo, ukusongelwa ngobudlova, ukuyiswa ezinkantolo (w75-ZU 5/15
222-3 [w74 12/15 754-5])
UJehova angasivikela kukho konke ukuhlaselwa okunjalo (Isaya 54:17)
‘Isifo esiwumshayabhuqe’ esingokomfanekiso sibangela ukufa okungokomoya kwenhliziyo nengqondo (1Thim
4:1, 2; 6:4, 5)
Izwe lesintu ‘lisesigayegayeni’ mayelana noNkulunkulu nenjongo yakhe
Ngokuhlala esiphephelweni sikaNkulunkulu, amaKristu ajabulela ukukhanya okungokomoya futhi awa-
sesabi ‘isigayegaye’
Izwe licabanga ukuthi likhanyiselwe ngenxa ‘yemini’ yalo, ubuhlakani babantu nombono walo wokuthanda
izinto ezibonakalayo
Ukufunzwa ngenkulumo-ze enjalo kubulala ingokomoya (1Thim 6:20, 21)
‘Bengaphansi komthunzi woMninimandla onke,’ kanjalo besithekile ekukhanyeni kwezwe okudukisayo, labo aba-
hlala ekulondekeni babona kuwa izinkulungwane zifa ngokomoya [Funda amavesi 7 no-8]
Abagcina ubuqotho bayaqinisekiswa ukuthi lokhu ‘ngeke kusondele’ kubo
Njengoba sivikelekile, simane sibone impindiselo enqwatshelaniswa phezu kwababi (Gal 6:7)
Nakuba ukulondeka kwezwe kuvithika, labo abenza uJehova isiphephelo sabo bayaqinisekiswa ngokuthi aku-
kho nhlekelele ezobehlela [Funda amavesi 9 no-10]
Lezi yizinhlekelele osekukhulunywe ngazo ngaphambili kuleli hubo
Ngisho nezinhlekelele “ezingokwemvelo” azilubulali ukholo lwethu noma ziqede ukulondeka kwethu okungo-
komoya (w01-ZU 11/15 19)
Phawula ukuthi ‘ngisho nenhlupho ngeke isondele etendeni lethu’
Kuyoba njalo uma sihlala singeyona ingxenye yezwe, kuhlanganise nokuziphatha kwalo okubi, ukuthanda
kwalo izinto ezibonakalayo, nenkolo yamanga
Ugibe lukaSathane oluphumelela kakhulu ukuziphatha okubi
Amademoni abelokhu esangene ngobulili kusukela ezinsukwini zikaNowa (Gen 6:4)
Ayakujabulela ukugqugquzela ukuziphatha okubi ngemithombo yezindaba
Ukuyenga kokuziphatha okubi kungambamba kalula umuntu, njengoba kwenzeka kuDavide (2Sam
11:2-4)
Abaningi abasuswayo ekuhlanganyeleni kungenxa yokuziphatha okubi
Singalugwema lolu gibe ngokuvikela ingokomoya lethu
UJEHOVA, ISIPHEPHELO SETHU ESIQINILE NENSINDISO YETHU (5 imiz.)
Isitha esikhulu, uSathane, sizama njalo ukukhuba izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ngokubhidliza ingokomoya lazo
Izingelosi zinikwe umyalo wokuba ziqaphe izinceku zikaNkulunkulu [Funda amavesi 11 no-12]
Siqashelwe ukuze singakhubeki ngokomoya siwele ekulandeleni izimiso zensindiso ezenziwe umuntu, futhi si-
ngakhulekeli ‘isilo sasendle nomfanekiso waso’ (IsAm 13:1-18)
Ngisho ‘namatshe’ anjengokuvinjelwa komsebenzi wokushumayela, ngeke asikhube siwe bese silahlekelwa
umusa waphezulu
‘Njengebhongo lengonyama,’ uSathane angase asihlasele ingcaca ngokusebenzisa amanxusa ezwe anamandla
noma agadle esekusithekeni ‘njengemfezi’ ezifihlile [Funda ivesi 13]
Kudingeka siqaphele umthombo walezi zinto, uSathane, nokuthi umgomo wakhe uwukuba asishwabadele
(1Pet 5:8)
Uma sihlala sithembekile kuJehova futhi silondoloza ubuqotho bethu, uyosenzela indlela yokuphunyuka asilu-
ngisele nendawo yesiphephelo [Funda amavesi 14-16]
Siyosindiswa ngokubiza igama likaNkulunkulu ngokholo (Ro 10:11-13; w01-ZU 11/15 20)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

lekeli beqiniso. Siza ikakhulukazi intsha engamaKristu ekhulele emikhayeni yoFakazi ukuba yazise ilungelo lo-
kwaziwa njengamaKristu nesidingo sokulondoloza lokhu kuma
UKUKHONZA NJENGOFAKAZI BAKAJEHOVA KUYILUNGELO ELIKHULU (4 imiz.)
Kuyisibusiso ukubhekwa uJehova njengomuntu okufanelekelayo ukuba amdonsele ebuhlotsheni obukhethekile
naye (Joh 6:44; 2Thim 2:19)
Uphawu lwethu njengabakhulekeli bakaJehova lusenza sihluke ezweni (Mal 3:18; Joh 17:16)
Saziwa ngokulandela umyalo kaJesu wokushumayela ‘izindaba ezinhle zombuso’ (Math 24:14)
Uthando esinalo ngomunye nomunye lusiphawula njengabafundi bakaJesu (Joh 13:35)
Ukuziphatha kwethu okuvelele kusisiza ukuba sikhanye njengezinkanyiso ezweni elimnyama ngokomoya (Fil
2:15)
Nokho, ukulondoloza uphawu lwethu njengamaKristu eqiniso kulezi “zikhathi ezibucayi okunzima ukubhe-
kana nazo” kuyinselele kithi sonke, ikakhulukazi entsheni (2Thim 3:1)
IZINTO EZISONGELA UPHAWU LWETHU LOBUKRISTU (7 imiz.)
Ukuze uJehova aqhubeke esiqaphela njengabantu bakhe, kumelwe silondoloze “izingubo zethu zangaphandle,”
uphawu lwethu njengabalandeli bakaKristu Jesu (IsAm 16:15; re 231-2)
Uphawu lwethu lobuKristu lungasitheka noma lulahleke uma sivumela ukuthonywa yizwe eliqhakambisa ubu-
govu ngendlela engenampilo
Abantu abavumela leli thonya bagcina bengazazi ukuthi bangobani
Babhekana nenkathi yokuzingabaza, belokhu beyihlaziya kabusha imigomo yabo, bethi kufanele ‘bazi-
thole ukuthi bangobani’ noma kufanele ‘babe yilokho abafisa ukuba yikho’
Lokho kuthungatha “ubuwena” ngezinye izikhathi kuye kwaholela ekulahleni umthwalo wemfanelo
nezimiso zokuziphatha okuhle
Uma singaqaphile, izimo zengqondo zezwe zingasithonya
Umlobi weHubo 73 waqala ukungabaza inzuzo yokuphishekela inkambo yobuqotho (IHu 73:1-14; w99 9/1
21-2)
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, lo mhubi waba nombono kaJehova ngezinto futhi waphinde wawazisa ama-
lungelo ayewajabulela njengomkhulekeli kaJehova (IHu 73:23-28)
Kubalulekile ukuba sihlale njalo siluqaphele uphawu lwethu njengoFakazi BakaJehova (Isaya 43:10)
Umuntu ongazazi ukuthi ungubani nokuthi iyini indima yakhe ekufezekeni kwenjongo kaNkulunkulu ngeke
abe nenjongo ekuphileni (Efe 4:14; Jak 1:6-8; IsAm 3:16)
NJENGOFAKAZI BAKAJEHOVA, SIYAZAZI UKUTHI SINGOBANI (7 imiz.)
ImiBhalo iyasitshela ukuthi iyini injongo yethu ekuphileni (IsAm 4:11)
AmaKristu eqiniso aphilela ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (1Pet 4:2)
IBhayibheli lembula izimiso, izimfanelo, izindinganiso nezimpawu ezilindeleke kulabo abafuna ukwaziwa njenga-
maKristu (Efe 4:22-24; 1Pet 2:21)
Okokuqala, sizibheka njengabakhulekeli bakaJehova beqiniso
Sinelungelo lokuba phakathi kofakazi bamuva ohlwini olude lofakazi abathembekile olusukela ku-Abela
(Heb 11:4)
Uphawu lwethu lobuKristu lubaluleke ngaphezu kwanoma iziphi izibopho ezisekelwe emkhayeni, ohlangeni,
olimini noma ebuzweni (Gal 3:28)
Lubaluleke nangaphezu kwezifiso nezinhloso zomuntu (Mar 8:34)
Ukuze sibe nophawu lobuKristu beqiniso, kubalulekile ukuba silondoloze ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu noNkulunkulu
Nina basha ngeke nilindele ukuba namukeleke kuNkulunkulu ngoba nje abazali benu bengamakholwa
Nani ngokwenu kumelwe nimthande uJehova (Math 22:37)
Kodwa singabhekana kanjani nezingcindezi eziningi esihlangabezana nazo zokulahla uphawu lwethu lobuKri-
stu?
OFAKAZI ABALULONDOLOZA UPHAWU LWABO (5 imiz.)
IBhayibheli linezibonelo eziningi zalabo abalondoloza uphawu lwabo njengabakhulekeli bakaNkulunkulu naku-
ba babebhekene nobunzima, noma bebancane ngeminyaka
UJosiya wenza izinguquko ngokwenkolo ezahlala isikhathi eside, walungisa ithempeli, wabuyisela isizwe ku-
Jehova (2Kho 23:24, 25; w01 4/15 25-8)
Akazange athonywe inkohlakalo kayise noyisemkhulu
UDaniyeli namaHebheru amathathu ayethunjwe nawo eBhabhiloni abazange balukhohlwe uphawu lwabo nje-
ngezinceku zikaJehova
Bagcina ubuqotho ngaphansi kokucindezelwa nokulingwa (dp 33-45)
AmaKristu namuhla, amasha namadala, kumelwe azimisele ukulondoloza uphawu lwawo lobuKristu
No. 160-ZU
11/11LUQINISE UPHAWU LWAKHO LOBUKRISTU (5 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba sizihlolele iqiniso ukuze libe ngelethu (IzE 17:11; Ro 12:2; 1Thes 5:21)
Lokhu akwenziwa ngokunambitha izinto ezimbi zaleli zwe, kodwa ngokuba nesifundo seBhayibheli somuntu
siqu, ngokwamukela izimfundiso zalo ngenhliziyo yonke nangokuziphatha ngendlela ebonisa ukuthi ‘simi si-
qinile eqinisweni’ (2Pet 1:12)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyosisiza ukuba sazi amakhono ethu nalokho esingase sikufinyelele
Liyokwembula imizwa yethu ejulile nezisusa zethu (Heb 4:12, 13; Jak 1:22-25)
Ukuzibekela imigomo engokomoya nako kuyosisiza ukuba sizisebenzise ngokugcwele izipho zethu ezingoko-
moya (1Pet 4:10)
Zazise kwabanye ukuthi ungomunye woFakazi BakaJehova; lokhu kungaba isivikelo (w00 11/1 13-14)
Shumayela kwabanye, futhi ulondoloze ukuziphatha okuhle ukuze uhlale uhlukile ezweni futhi umelane ne-
thonya lalo elibi (IzA 20:11; Luka 6:44, 45)
UKULONDOLOZA UPHAWU LWETHU LOBUKRISTU KULETHA IZIBUSISO (2 imiz.)
Lapho silondoloza uphawu lwethu lobuKristu sithola izibusiso eziningi:
Ilungelo lokwaziwa nguJehova (Mal 3:16)
Ubuhlobo bomuntu siqu noNkulunkulu (Jak 2:23)
Imigomo ezuzisayo nenjongo ecacile
Ithemba lekusasa eliphakade (IHu 37:9)
Ngokwenza izinto esixoxe ngazo, ungalulondoloza uphawu lwakho lobuKristu futhi uthole izibusiso zaphakade
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-54, 166-169)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedKUNGANI UJESU AHLUPHEKA FUTHI WAFA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Usebenzisa imiBhalo ngobuciko, siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi yini eyafezwa ukuza kukaJesu emhlabeni, ukuhlu-
pheka kanye nokufa kwakhe esigxotsheni. Chaza ukuthi isihlengo siyilungiselelo lothando likaNkulunkulu no-
Kristu. Cacisela ikakhulukazi abasanda kuhlanganyela ukuthi bangazuza kanjani kuso
IKUSASA LAKHO LIXHOMEKE OLWAZINI OLUNEMBILE NGOJESU (5 imiz.)
Imifanekiso eminingi yenkolo iveza uJesu njengomuntu obuthaka, othwele umqhele okhazimulayo, indoda enge-
namandla futhi elusizi (g98-ZU 12/8 5-6)
Ukuhlolisisa imiBhalo kwembula ukuthi uJesu wayenomdlandla, eyindoda enamandla, ejabule futhi engeye-
na neze umuntu ozishaya olungile (Mar 6:3; Luka 2:52; Joh 2:14-16; IzE 2:26-28)
Njengoba nje imifanekiso eminingi yenkolo idukisa, kunjalo nangezimfundiso eziningi zenkolo mayelana no-
kuthi wayengubani uJesu nokuthi kungani ahlupheka futhi wafa
Uma sifuna ulwazi olunembile ngoJesu, kumelwe siye emthonjeni onokwethenjelwa, iZwi likaNkulunkulu (Luka
1:1-3; 1Thes 2:13; 2Pet 1:16)
Ulwazi olusekelwe eBhayibhelini mayelana noJesu lubalulekile ngoba yilo kuphela olungasilethela ikusasa eli-
jabulisayo nokuphila okuphakade (Joh 17:3)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu liphendula imibuzo ebalulekile, njengethi: Wayengubani uJesu? Kungani ashushiswa?
Ubani owabangela ukuba ahlupheke futhi afe? Ukufa kwakhe kunayiphi indima esemqoka ebuhlotsheni
bethu noNkulunkulu nasethembeni lethu lokuphila?
LOWO UJESU AYENGUYE NGEMPELA (5 imiz.)
UJesu wayezazi ukuthi ungubani nokuthi wayevelaphi
Izikhathi eziningana wakhuluma ngokuphila kwakhe kwangaphambi kokuba abe umuntu (Joh 3:13; 6:38, 62;
8:23, 42, 58; 17:5)
Ngaphambi kokuba izingelosi noma abantu babe khona, uNkulunkulu wadala uJesu ngokuqondile eyisidalwa so-
moya (IsAm 3:14)
Ngakho wayeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, izibulo layo yonke indalo (Kol 1:15-17)
Ngaye, uNkulunkulu wadala zonke ezinye izinto, kuhlanganise nomhlaba kanye nabantu bokuqala, u-Ada-
mu no-Eva
Ngesikhathi esimisiwe, uJehova wadlulisela ukuphila kweNdodana yakhe yasezulwini esibelethweni sikaMari-
ya, intombi emsulwa engumJuda (Luka 1:30, 31, 34, 35; Gal 4:4)
UJesu wazalwa engumuntu ophelele, ongenasono (it-2 56)
Lapho eseneminyaka engaba ngu-30 ubudala, wagcotshwa ngomoya ongcwele, kanjalo waba yiNdodana ka-
Nkulunkulu ezelwe ngomoya esemhlabeni futhi waba nguMesiya owayethenjisiwe (Math 3:16, 17; Luka 3:
23; Joh 4:25, 26)
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UJESU AHLUPHEKE (15 imiz.)
UJesu wayazi ukuthi inkambo yakhe yokuphila ngokuzinikela kuNkulunkulu yayiyomenza ashushiswe futhi
ekugcineni abulawe (Math 16:21)
Kwakubikezelwe ukuthi wayeyobhekana nenzondo echazwe ngokomfanekiso kuGenesise 3:15
Isizathu sokuhlupheka kukaJesu sasihlanganisa nokusekela kwakhe ubukhosi bukaJehova naphezu kwayo yo-
nke imizamo kaSathane yokwephula ubuqotho bakhe (cl-ZU 144)
UJesu wayixazulula ngokuphelele nangendlela eyanelisayo impikiswano yobuqotho bezinceku zikaNkulunku-
lu (Heb 7:26; w91-ZU 2/15 14-15)
Yize aphikiswa ngonya, uJesu wafeza ayekuthunyiwe ngesizotha, ngokuthobeka nangokuzithiba ngenxa
yokuthi wayemthanda kakhulu uNkulunkulu (1Pet 2:22, 23)
Ngale ndlela wabonisa ukuthi uSathane wayengumqambi manga omkhulu futhi wanqoba izwe elibuswa
uDeveli (Joh 16:33)
Ukuhlupheka kukaJesu kwamenza wayifanelekela ngokuphelele indima yakhe njengomPristi Ophakeme wesi-
ntu (Heb 2:10, 18; 4:15)
Wayezondwa ngoba wayekhuluma iqiniso ngoNkulunkulu futhi engeyona ingxenye yezwe (Joh 7:7; 8:40; 15:
18, 19; 17:16)
UJesu wafunda ukulalela ezintweni ahlupheka ngazo (Heb 5:8)
Lapho efa wakwazi ukusho ngomuzwa wokunqoba ukuthi: “Kufeziwe!” (Joh 19:30)
UJESU WAFELA UKUBA AKHAZIMULISE UNKULUNKULU FUTHI ASINDISE ISINTU (15 imiz.)
UJesu akazange afe ngenxa yokwenza okubi, kodwa wafa ngenxa yokumemezela iqiniso nokukhazimulisa uJe-
hova uNkulunkulu (Joh 8:46, 47; 17:4)
Ngokuyinhloko wayefisa ukungcwelisa igama likaNkulunkulu (Math 6:9; Joh 12:27, 28)
Ngokuhlala ethembekile kuNkulunkulu, uJesu wanikeza ubufakazi obuhle kakhulu esekela ukufaneleka ko-
bukhosi bukaJehova bendawo yonke (Jobe 1:6-12; 2:2-6; IsAm 3:14)

 ́
ncamashı nokuphila okuphelele u-Adamu azilahlekisela kona yena nenzalo yakhe lapho ona (Ro 5:12, 18,

Ukube uJesu wayenguNkulunkulu noma engumuntu onguNkulunkulu, wayengeke abe isihlengo esiha-

UJesu wafela bonke abantu (Heb 2:9, 17)
Isihlengo salungiselelwa izwe lesintu (1Jo 2:2)

THEMBA IZWI LIKANKULUNKULU, ULANDELE UJESU UKUZE UZUZE UKUPHILA (5 imiz.)
ImiBhalo Engcwele imchaza ngokunembile uJesu futhi yembula ukuthi “wayegcwele umusa ongafanelwe neqi-
niso” (Joh 1:14)
Ifakazela ukuthi uJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo nokuthi ‘usenguMmeli Oyinhloko wokuphila’ (IzE 3:15; 1Ko 15:
3-8)
‘Ungumlamuleli oyedwa phakathi kukaNkulunkulu nabantu’ (1Thim 2:5)
UJesu akakashintshi kodwa usagcwele isihe nomusa ongafanelwe (Heb 4:14-16)
Umema abantu bawo wonke amaqembu ezizwe nezinhlanga ukuba bamlandele futhi bazuze ezimfundiswe-
ni zakhe (Math 11:28-30; 28:19, 20)
Ukutadisha iBhayibheli kwembula uphawu oluyinhloko oluhlukanisa abalandeli bakaJesu beqiniso namuhla [Fu-
nda uJohane 13:34, 35; 17:25, 26]
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi siyini isimo sengqondo esibusa izwe, oFakazi BakaJehova balingisa uJesu futhi ba-
bonisana uthando (g98-ZU 10/22 6)
Ukuze sibambe ithemba lokuphila okuphakade, kumelwe sitadishe iBhayibheli futhi sifunde okwengeziwe nge-
ndima kaJesu enjongweni kaNkulunkulu [Funda uJohane 20:31]
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedUKUKHULULWA EZWENI LOBUMNYAMA
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqaphele ukuthi naphezu kwentuthuko yalo ezintweni ezibonakalayo nakwezesayensi, leli zwe lise-
bumnyameni obukhulu obungokomoya. Gcizelela isidingo sokungenisa ulwazi lokukhanya kweqiniso nokulusebe-
nzisa. Yakha ukwazisa ngawo wonke amalungiselelo kaNkulunkulu angokomoya
ABANINGI BANOMUZWA WOKUTHI IZWE LANAMUHLA LIKHANYISELWE (2 imiz.)
Kuye kwenziwa intuthuko enkulu ekhulwini elidlule leminyaka
Kuye kwathuthukiswa izinga lokuphila nokunakekelwa kwempilo, kwathuthukiswa ezokuthutha nezokuxhu-
mana (g93-ZU 6/8 19)
Amalungelo abantu aseqashelwa kakhudlwana
Kusenziwa ucwaningo olunzulu kwezokwelapha, ezolimo, ezesayensi, ezobuchwepheshe nakweminye imikhakha
(w99-ZU 10/15 4-5; g89 7/22 10-12)
AMAQINISO ABONISA UKUTHI IZWE LISEBUMNYAMENI (8 imiz.)
Nakuba kuye kwaba nentuthuko ezintweni ezibonakalayo nakwezesayensi, isimilo nengokomoya kuyawohloka
(g99-ZU 12/8 7-12)
Ukuziphatha ngaphambili okwakubhekwa njengokungqubuzana nezimiso zomphakathi futhi kukubi manje
sekwamukelwa njengokuvamile (2Thim 3:1-5)
 ́
Ukuziphatha okubi kobulili kuthe chithi saka
Ukuthembeka emshadweni, ukuthanda umkhaya ngobuqotho, nenhlonipho ngokuphila kuyancipha
Ukufuna injabulo sekuyinto eza kuqala
Izwe ligubuzelwe ubumnyama obungokomoya (w93-ZU 3/1 8-11)
Kwabikezelwa ukuthi babuyogubuzela iningi labantu abakhileyo emhlabeni (Isaya 60:2a)
Amazwe okuthiwa akhanyiselwe aye agqugquzela ukungakholelwa kuNkulunkulu, ukuziphendukela kwe-
mvelo neminye imibono eminingi edidayo futhi engqubuzanayo
Abaningi abafuni nakwazi ngoNkulunkulu; uNkulunkulu neBhayibheli bakubopha ngabhande linye nezimfu-
ndiso ezingenangqondo zenkolo iyonke
Abanye bamukela izinkolelo-ze nezinganekwane ngaphandle kokuthandabuza kanti baphishekela iminako ye-
nyama hhayi engokomoya endleleni abacabanga futhi benze ngayo (Kol 2:8)
Inzondo iye yabangela ukushisekela inkolo ngokweqile, ubuphekula nobudlova emhlabeni wonke
Akukhona nje ukuthi izimo zanamuhla zifana nalezo uPawulu akhuluma ngazo kweyabase-Efesu 4:17-19 kodwa
 ́
zidlulela ngale kwazo (Yifunde bese ubonisa indlela esebenza ngayo ezweni lanamuhla)
UBANI OBANGELA UBUMNYAMA BEZWE? (5 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lithi bubangelwa “ababusi bezwe” (Efe 6:12)
Laba akubona ohulumeni babantu kodwa ibandla lomoya elingabonakali elithonya abantu nezizwe (2Ko 11:
14; IsAm 12:9)
Ithonya elikhulu lobubi uSathane, ophuphuthekisa izingqondo ngezimfundiso zamanga nangenzondo (Gen 3:
4, 5; 2Ko 4:4; 1Joh 2:11; 3:10-12)
Nguye obangela isimo esichazwa ku-Isaya 60:2a (Funda)
Umgomo wakhe uwukuphambukisa wonke umuntu asuke kuJehova naseqinisweni (Jobe, izahl. 1-2)
Izindlela zamademoni ziyaphumelela kwabaningi (1Joh 5:19)
Empeleni, le mpikiswano iphathelene nobukhosi bukaJehova (Eks 9:16)
BUYOPHELA NINI UBUMNYAMA OBUSEMHLABENI WONKE? (5 imiz.)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyasiqinisekisa ukuthi leli zwe lobumnyama lizophela
UJehova uyayilahla imisebenzi yobumnyama eyenziwa yizizwe (1Jo 1:5)
Intukuthelo yakhe iyovuthela bonke abaqhubeka behamba ebumnyameni (Efe 5:6)
 ́
UZefaniya uchaza ngokucacile ukuthi uJehova uyobuqeda kanjani ububi buphele nya (Funda uZefaniya 1:
14-18 bese umchaza kafushane)
Impikiswano yobukhosi iyoxazululwa ekupheleni kwalesi simiso sezinto, ngemva kwezenzakalo ezibikezelwa
emiBhalweni (Math 24:7, 8, 12-14, 21; IsAm 18:21; 19:19-21; 20:1, 2)
UNGABUSHIYA UBUMNYAMA BEZWE UNGENE EKUKHANYENI KUKANKULUNKULU (20 imiz.)
Isiprofetho esifanayo esabikezela ngobumnyama sabikezela nangokukhanya okwenza abantu bakwazi ukukhu-
lulwa (Funda u-Isaya 60:1, 2)
Owesifazane umelela unina wabangu-144 000 abagcotshwe ngomoya (Gal 4:26)
Wavuka ukuze akhiphe ukukhanya kusukela ngo-1919 kuqhubeke (ip-2-ZU 303-6)
Abalungileyo baye bathola ukukhanya okukhulu (IHu 97:11)
No. 162-ZU
12/04Insali yabangu-144 000 isekhona phakathi kwethu
Insali egcotshiwe ‘iyinceku’ enesabelo sokwaba ukudla okungokomoya (Math 24:45-47)
Ukukhululwa kuxhomeke ekuqapheleni umzila kaNkulunkulu wokuletha ukukhanya okungokomoya
Njengoba sishumayela, sibonakalisa ukukhanya kweqiniso (Math 5:14-16; Ro 10:14b; Fil 2:15)
Izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso zinikeza abantu ithuba lokuzibonakalisa ukuthi bakhetha ukukhanya noma ubum-
nyama yini
Abantu kumelwe ‘beze ekukhanyeni’ (Funda uJohane 3:19-21)
Ukulalela okuhle kuphumela ekutholeni ulwazi olwengeziwe ngokwenza izimpindelo
Lapho kuqhutshwa isifundo seBhayibheli, ukukhanya kuthola ithuba lokungena kujule
U-Isaya 60:22 useyagcwaliseka manje (Funda)
UJehova wenza ilungiselelo elifike ngesikhathi esifanele lokuthola ukukhanya ngamalungiselelo ebandla
(Yithi fahla-fahla ngezinzuzo zemihlangano yebandla yamasonto onke, ubonise ukuthi kungani yonke ibalu-
lekile ukuze umuntu akhule ngokomoya)
UPawulu wahlobanisa indaba yokubuthana ndawonye nokusondela kosuku lukaJehova (Heb 10:25; 2Pet 3:10)
Ukuze sikhululwe kudingeka ‘sihambe ekukhanyeni’ (1Joh 1:6, 7)
Kumelwe silahle ‘imisebenzi yobumnyama’ (Efe 5:8-11)
Asinakwenza imisebenzi enjalo silindele ukuthola umusa kaJehova (1Ko 6:9, 10)
Ukukhululwa kuxhomeke nasekumemezeleni igama likaNkulunkulu nenjongo yakhe (1Thim 4:16)
Inhlangano kaNkulunkulu ikuhlomele ukukusiza ukuba uhlangabezane nakho konke okufunekayo
LOKHO OYOKUZUZA NGOKUKHULULWA EBUMNYAMENI (5 imiz.)
Leli zwe elimnyama lizobhekana nosizi olukhulu maduzane
UJehova uthembisa ukuthi uzobavikela abantu bakhe (IHu 91:14, 15; IzA 18:10)
Ukubusa koMbuso kuyosusa bonke ubumnyama, ubudlova, ukuphanga nokucekela phansi (Isaya 60:18-20)
Ukulunga kuyobusa kuwo wonke umhlaba (IHu 37:11, 29; Isaya 60:21)
Sinethemba lokusinda kuleli zwe lobumnyama
Ngisho noma umuntu efa ethembekile manje, unesiqinisekiso sokuvuswa kwabafileyo
Khona-ke, sonke siyophila ekukhanyeni koMbuso kaNkulunkulu kuze kube phakade (Joh 17:3)
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe)
No. 162-ZU—ikhasi 2
 ̆ 2004 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedKUNGANI KUFANELE SESABE UNKULUNKULU WEQINISO?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ukuba ziqonde ukuthi njengezinceku zikaJehova, sinesibopho sokumesaba. Kwenze kucace ukuthi
yini ehilelekile ekuboniseni lokho kwesaba kanye nezinzuzo ezitholakala ngokwenza kanjalo
INCWADI YOMSHUMAYELI IGCIZELELA ISIDINGO SOKWESABA UNKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
KumShumayeli, iNkosi uSolomoni yasinikeza umfanekiso ongokoqobo wesimo isintu esikuso (UmSh 1:13, 14;
2:22, 23)
Ngemva kokubonisa ubuze bokuphila, waqokomisa indlela okuwukuphela kwayo yokuthola injabulo yange-
mpela nehlala njalo (w97-ZU 2/15 10, 13-18)
Kumelwe sesabe uNkulunkulu futhi sigcine imiyalo yakhe (UmSh 12:13, 14)
Okuhlangenwe nakho kukaSolomoni kwamfundisa ukuthi ukugxilisa ukuphila kwakhe kuJehova naseku-
khulekelweni kwaKhe kuwukuphela kwenkambo eletha injabulo ehlala njalo futhi ngempela kusisiza uku-
ba sibhekane nezinkathazo zokuphila
Ukwehluleka ukwesaba uNkulunkulu nokubonisa inhlonipho ngezimiso ezilungile kuyimbangela yokuwohloka
kokuziphatha nokwanda kobugebengu nobudlova
Yilabo abesaba uNkulunkulu futhi bagcine imiyalo yakhe kuphela abayosinda ehoreni likaNkulunkulu lokwa-
hlulela (UmSh 8:11-13; IsAm 14:6, 7; w95-ZU 10/15 9-10, 12)
LOKHO UKWESABA UNKULUNKULU OKUYIKHO NENDLELA YOKUKUHLAKULELA (13 imiz.)
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kuhlanganisa ukwesaba nokuhlonipha uJehova ngokujulile kanye novalo olunempilo
lokwesaba ukumdumaza (w01-ZU 12/1 14-15; w01-ZU 7/1 5-6; g98-ZU 1/8 26-7)
Umuntu owesaba uNkulunkulu uyolwela ukusebenzisa ulwazi ngendlela efanele
Ukwesaba okunjalo kuyomshukumisela ukuba enze ngokuhlakanipha, enze izinqumo ezihlakaniphile (Fil
2:12)
Ngeke enze noma yini engcolisa igama likaNkulunkulu elihle
Sibonisa ukwesaba uNkulunkulu okufanele ngokugwema “imisebenzi yenyama” (Gal 5:19-21)
Kwazise ukuthi imithetho yakhe ilondoloza inhlalakahle yethu (w01-ZU 12/1 20)
Isivikela ezingozini ezingokomoya nezingokwenyama
Ngisho nezijeziso ezihambisana nokuyiphula zilondoloza inhlalakahle yethu
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kuhlakulelwa ngokugxila ezintweni ezingokomoya
Khuthalela ukufunda nokutadisha iBhayibheli nsuku zonke (Josh 1:7, 8)
Bheka izincwadi zeBhayibheli njengezincwadi ozibhalelwe uNkulunkulu; zifunde futhi uzindle njalo ngazo
ngenkuthalo
Zisebenzise ngokugcwele izincwadi zethu ezilungiselelwa yinhlangano kaJehova (w01-ZU 7/1 11)
Yiba khona njalo emihlanganweni yobuKristu futhi ube nengxenye kuyo
Sebenzisa ulwazi lwemiBhalo, ungalokothi uhlale ungakwenzi lokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo (Joh 4:34)
Qaphela ukuthi akukho lutho esingamfihlela lona uNkulunkulu, “esiyolandisa kuye” (Heb 4:13; Luka 8:17)
Ukwazi ukuthi uJehova ubona konke kuyisisusa sokugcina imiyalo yakhe (IHu 11:4; IzA 15:3)
Kungasivikela enkambweni engase isifake enkathazweni
Njengoba uNkulunkulu engokoqobo kithi, igunya lakhe lisenza simesabe
Ngokwesibonelo: Lapho abantu bemi phambi kukamahluleli ongumuntu, baba nokwesaba okuthile ngenxa ye-
sikhundla negunya lakhe
Nokho, ukwesaba uNkulunkulu akungenxa nje yamandla kaNkulunkulu okujezisa abenzi bokubi, futhi ngo-
kuqinisekile akubangelwa ukwesaba isihogo somlilo
Ukwesaba okunjalo okukhwantabalisayo bekuyosidumaza, kushabalalise ithemba lethu
Ukwesaba ukudumaza uNkulunkulu kubangelwa ukuthi siyawazisa umusa wakhe wothando nokulunga
kwakhe (w95-ZU 3/15 10; it-1 818)
Ukwazi izimfanelo zikaJehova nakho konke akwenzile nasazosenzela kona kushukumisa isifiso sethu sokumtho-
kozisa nokumlalela (Jak 1:17)
IZINZUZO ZOKWESABA UJEHOVA (10 imiz.)
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kusigcina siphila ngokomoya
Kusekelwe okholweni, kuhlobene nokuthanda uNkulunkulu nokumethemba
Ngenxa yalokho asesabi ukusondela kuNkulunkulu ngomthandazo (1Joh 4:18)
Ngokuthandaza njalo, sihlala siseduze noJehova futhi sizizwa silondekile
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kuxosha ukwesaba umuntu (IHu 112:7; 118:6; w95-ZU 3/15 19)
Kusishukumisela ukuba sibeke uJehova kuqala futhi senze okulungile singesabi okucatshangwa abanye
Abaprofethi bakaNkulunkulu abangesabi abazange benze okubi, ngisho nakuba ukwenza okubi kwakuva-
mile (Jak 5:10)
No. 163-ZU
6/05Kususa ukwesaba ukufa okukhwantabalisayo lapho usongelwa ngokubulawa (w95-ZU 3/15 20)
Abaprofethi babenokholo emandleni kaJehova okuvusa abafileyo (Heb 11:32-35)
Ukuqaphela amandla kaNkulunkulu kanye nokholo lwethu ovukweni lwabafileyo kusenza siqunge isibindi
sinqobe ukwesaba umuntu
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kusivikela ngokusisiza ukuba sigweme ukuziphatha okubi (w95-ZU 3/15 18)
Ngenxa yokuthi uNkulunkulu wayengokoqobo kuJosefa, wenqaba ukona kuYe (Gen 39:9; w01-ZU 12/1 22)
Uma uNkulunkulu engokoqobo kithi, kuyosisiza ukuba simelane nezilingo
Lokhu kuyosusa usizi nenhlekelele kithi (UmSh 11:10)
Ukwesaba uJehova kuletha injabulo (IHu 112:1)
Kusigcina sinokwazisa njalo ngakho konke uJehova asenzela kona
Uma sithobekile phambi kukaJehova futhi samukela izindinganiso zakhe, uyosivuza ngokuphila okuphakade
(IzA 22:4; UmSh 8:12, 13)
UKUGCINA IMIYALO KANKULUNKULU ESIMESABAYO (15 imiz.)
Ukulalela imiyalo kaNkulunkulu kubonisa ukuthi siyamthanda uJehova futhi siyamesaba (1Joh 5:3; w01-ZU
12/1 16)
UKUZIPHATHA: UNkulunkulu onothando usinikeza izindinganiso zokuziphatha ezibazuzisa kakhulu labo
abazilandelayo
Fakazela ukwesaba uNkulunkulu ngokubonisa inzondo ngokubi (IHu 97:10; 1Ko 6:9, 10; IsAm 21:8)
Gwema ukuphuza utshwala ngokweqile (Ro 13:13; w02-ZU 4/15 17)
Gwema ukuziphatha okubi kobulili (IzE 15:20, 29; 1Thes 4:3)
Thembeka, ungebi noma uqambe amanga (Efe 4:28; Kol 3:9; IsAm 22:15)
Yenza noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo ukuze uzivumelanise nendinganiso yokulunga uNkulunkulu
ayimisile (1Pet 4:3)
Londoloza inkambo ehlanzekile, futhi ubonise ukuhlakanipha kokwesaba uNkulunkulu (Jak 3:17)
UKUNGATHATHI-HLANGOTHI: Namathela ezimisweni eziku-Isaya 2:2-4; Johane 18:36
UKUQEQESHA IZINGANE: Qeqesha izingane kusukela ziseyizinsana, ngoba uNkulunkulu ufuna ukuba izi-
ngane zethu zimesabe (IzA 10:27; 22:6)
Ungaguquguquki lapho unikeza isiyalo, kanjalo ubonise ukuthi uyazithanda izingane zakho (IzA 13:1, 24;
22:15)
Sebenzisa iseluleko esingokwasezulwini esisinikezwa uNkulunkulu (Efe 6:4)
PHISHEKELA UKUTHULA: Kufanele sijabule ngokuthi siyakwazi ukuhlangana nesikholwa nabo abathanda
ukuthula (IHu 119:63; 133:1)
Londoloza ubuhlobo obuhle namanye amaKristu (Ro 14:19; 1Thes 5:13)
Lwela ‘ukuba nokuthula nabantu bonke’ (Ro 12:18; Jak 3:18)
SHUMAYELA IZINDABA EZINHLE ZOMBUSO: Akumelwe sigodlele abanye ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu (Math
5:14-16; 24:14)
Lokhu kudinga ukuba sinakisise ukuthi sichitha isikhathi emsebenzini wokushumayela, kodwa sikwenze
ngoba sithanda uNkulunkulu futhi simesaba (Heb 13:15)
Sifuna ukuba abanye bafunde ngethemba lokuphila okuphakade nalokho okudingekayo ukuze bakutho-
le (1Thim 4:16b)
QHUBEKA UBONISA UKUTHI UYAMESABA UNKULUNKULU (2 imiz.)
UJehova makeze kuqala ekuphileni kwakho
Funda ngezindlela nangezimiso zakhe, futhi umlalele ngaphezu kwabo bonke abanye (Phinda ufunde umShu-
mayeli 12:13)
Wesaba uNkulunkulu, qhubeka ushumayela naphezu kokushushiswa (Joh 15:20; 2Thim 3:12)
Qhubeka umesaba ngendlela enempilo uJehova kuze kube phakade
(Namathela ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akudingekile ukuba ufunde noma
ukhulumele yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe)
No. 163-ZU—ikhasi 2
 ̆ 2005 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedINGABE UNKULUNKULU USABUSA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi nakuba uJehova esinika inkululeko yokubonisa ukuthi singakuluphi uhlangothi empi-
kiswaneni ephathelene nelungelo lakhe lokubusa, nguye osazilawula ngokuphelele izindaba ezithinta umhlaba.
Yakha ukwazisa ngendlela kaJehova yokubusa ukuze ushukumise isifiso sokumfuna nokulandela isiqondiso
sakhe
OKWENZA KUBE UNKULUNKULU OKUFANELE ABUSE (3 imiz.)
Wake wacabangisisa ngalokho okushiwo uGenesise 1:1?
‘UNkulunkulu wawadala’ ngani “amazulu nomhlaba”? (Isaya 40:26; g99-ZU 6/22 6-7; ct 89-91; it-1 526)
UNkulunkulu unelungelo lokubusa lokho akudalile (IHu 36:9; IsAm 4:11; bh-ZU 125)
Indlela yakhe yokubusa izuzisa indalo yakhe (Gen 1:31; 2:8, 9, 15; IHu 19:7-11; Mika 6:8)
UJEHOVA UBUSA NGENDLELA ENOTHANDO (4 imiz.)
Abantu bokuqala babethola injabulo kuzo zonke izici zokuphila
Kwakungekho luhlu olude lwemithetho okwakufanele bayigcine; izimfuneko zikaNkulunkulu zazilula futhi
kungenzima nokwenza akufunayo (1Thim 1:8-11; bh-ZU 48; it-2 160)
U-Adamu no-Eva babengenawo umuzwa wokuthi uNkulunkulu uqondisa noma ulawula zonke izenzo zabo
ngaso sonke isikhathi
UJehova wayefuna ukuba u-Adamu no-Eva baliqaphele ilungelo lakhe lokunquma okulungile nokungalungile
(Gen 2:16, 17; w03-ZU 1/1 4; bh-ZU 61)
Babenalo ikhono lokulalela lowo myalo
Ukulalela kwakungenakusho ukugodlelwa noma yini ezuzisayo
Ukubusa kukaJehova kusekelwe othandweni (it-2 275)
Wabonisa uthando lwakhe ngokwenza umuntu ngomfanekiso waKhe, enekhono lokubonisa uthando, nango-
kuzambula kubantu (Gen 1:26-28)
INDLELA ILUNGELO LIKANKULUNKULU LOKUBUSA ELABEKELWA NGAYO INSELELE (5 imiz.)
USathane walibekela inselele ilungelo likaJehova lokubusa (bh-ZU 109)
 ́
Wasikisela ngobuqili ukuthi uJehova wayekhohlise u-Adamu (Gen 3:1-5; IsAm 12:9)
Ngezenzo zakhe, uSathane wenqaba ukwamukela ukubusa kukaJehova
Washoshozela abanye ukuba balandele ukuhlubuka kwakhe
UDeveli wabuye wangabaza nendlela kaNkulunkulu yokubusa
Wasikisela ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayegodlela izidalwa zakhe izinzuzo ezithile (it-2 963)
Wagomela ngokuthi umuntu angazibusa ngokuphumelelayo ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu
Kwakuyothatha isikhathi ukuxazulula lezi zimpikiswano ezaphakanyiswa uSathane (bh-ZU 110-13)
USathane uye wavunyelwa ukuba amise “izwe” lakhe, noma “isimiso sezinto,” angumbusi waso (bh-ZU 31-2)
(2Ko 4:4)
“Umhlaba nalokho okuwugcwalisile” kusengokukaJehova (IHu 24:1)
Phakathi nalesi sikhathi, uJehova akakangeneli ukuze alungise zonke izinkinga (bh-ZU 112)
Elinye lamaqhinga kaSathane ukusakaza umbono wokuthi uJehova akanawo amandla okubusa
Nokho, uJehova uye wabonisa ukuthi unegunya eliphakeme lokuphatha izindaba zomhlaba
UJEHOVA UYE WALILONDOLOZA NJALO IGUNYA LAKHE NJENGOMBUSI (12 imiz.)
Nakuba umhlaba wawusuyisizinda sokuvukela, uJehova akazange alilahle igunya lakhe lokuwubusa (IHu 103:19)
Enkathini eyandulela iSikhukhula, uNkulunkulu wabonisa ukuthi wayezimisele ukuqondisa labo ababemfu-
na, njengo-Abela, u-Enoke noNowa
ISikhukhula sasiwubufakazi bokuthi uNkulunkulu unamandla okufeza intando yakhe
Ukusebenzelana kukaJehova no-Abrahama nesizwe sakwa-Israyeli kwabonisa ukuthi usabusa phezu komhlaba
(IHu 105:6-15; it-2 161-2)
Wabonisa ukuthi wayenamandla ngokugqugquzela elase-Asiriya nelaseBhabhiloni ukuba athathe isinyathelo
agcwalise lokho ayekushilo (Isaya 10:5-7; Hez 21:18-23)
Lapho ekugcineni esusa isivikelo sakhe kubantu bakhe, lokho kwakuwukubonakaliswa kwesahlulelo sakhe
sokulunga njengoMbusi (Jer 35:17)
Nakuba uNkulunkulu avumela isizwe ukuba siye ekudingisweni, wasebenzisa amandla akhe ukuze aqi-
nisekise ukugcwaliseka kwesiprofetho esiphathelene noJesu (IHu 89:3, 4, 35-37; it-2 663)
Phakathi naleso sikhathi, uJehova wabonisa ngokuphindaphindiwe ukuthi unekhono lokuvikela nokulo-
ndoloza abantu ababencika kuye njengoMbusi (Dan 3:13-29; 6:12-27)
Ngenxa yalokho, sekuyizinkulungwane zeminyaka kungekho lutho oluvunyelwa ukuba luphazamise ukugcwa-
liseka ngokuphelele kwenjongo kaJehova
No. 164-ZU
11/05UMBUSO KAMESIYA ULWELA ILUNGELO LIKAJEHOVA LOKUBUSA (9 imiz.)
UMmeleli kaJehova wasebukhosini wabonisa amandla kaJehova okubusa indalo yakhe ngezindlela eziningi
UJesu wayenamandla okulawula isimo sezulu, izitshalo, izilwane, abantu nezidalwa zomoya (Math 8:26-32;
9:35; 17:27; 21:19)
Lokhu kwabonisa ukuthi igunya wayelithole kuMbusi (Math 9:2-8)
Nakuba ukuboshwa kukaJesu, ukulingwa kwakhe nokubulawa kwakhe kwakwenza kwabonakala sengathi uJe-
hova akanamandla okuqondisa izinto, empeleni lezi zenzakalo zaziwukugcwaliseka okunamandla kweziprofe-
tho zikaNkulunkulu (Luka 24:19-27, 44; Joh 19:10, 11; it-2 169)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu owabikezelwa endulo osezandleni zikaKristu Jesu uyithuluzi uJehova ayolisebenzisa
ukuze alwele ilungelo lakhe lokubusa (Dan 2:44, 45)
Lo Mbuso uyoqeda konke ukuhlupheka okuye kwabangelwa ukubusa komuntu
Lapho uMbuso KaMesiya usuwufezile umsebenzi wawo, uyobuyiselwa ezandleni zikaJehova (1Ko 15:21-28;
bh-ZU 112)
Nokho, lokho oyokufeza kuyohlala kuze kube phakade
Maduzane uJehova uzoqeda bonke ububi, asuse nezwe likaSathane (IHu 37:9-11; 2Thes 1:6-9; 1Jo 2:17; bh-ZU 94)
BONISA UKUTHI UYAYITHANDA INDLELA KAJEHOVA YOKUBUSA (12 imiz.)
Sihilelekile empikiswaneni yobukhosi (Jobe 2:3-5; cl-ZU 124; it-1 1210)
UJehova ufuna ukuba simkhonze ngokuzithandela, ngoba simthanda (Dut 10:12-21; 30:6, 15-20; Isaya 1:18-20; bh-
ZU 113-14)
Unika ngamunye wethu inkululeko yokubonisa ukuthi sikhetha ubukhosi bakhe nokuthi siyamvumela uku-
ba abuse ukuphila kwethu
Kumelwe siqaphele igunya uJesu alinikeziwe, sizithobe kulo (be-ZU 276)
UKristu unelungelo eliphelele lokuba simlalele (Gen 49:10; Math 28:18)
Akekho omunye onikezwe lelo lungelo (Jer 10:23; IzE 4:12)
Lokhu kuthinta izinto esizenza nsuku zonke, izinqumo zethu nemigomo yethu
Uma silalela imiyalo kaKristu lokhu kubonisa ukuthi siyabazisa futhi siyabuhlonipha ubukhosi bukaJehova
(wt-ZU 58-9)
Lapho senza okulungile, inhliziyo kaJehova iyajabula (IzA 27:11; w03-ZU 4/15 14-15)
UJehova uyababusisa labo abathanda ubukhosi bakhe (w94-ZU 11/1 7)
Ngamafuphi, sibonile ukuthi uJehova unelungelo lokulawula lokho okwenzeka kulo mhlaba nokuqondisa uku-
phila kwethu
Leli gunya ulisebenzisa ngendlela enothando
Ngenxa yokuhlubuka kwasekuqaleni, uJehova uye wavumela uSathane kanye nabantu ukuba bazibuse nga-
phandle kobukhosi baKhe
Nokho, usenalo ilungelo lokubusa
Uye wasebenzisa lelo lungelo ngokuvumelana nenjongo yakhe
NgoMbuso KaMesiya, maduzane uNkulunkulu uzophinde aqondise izindaba zesintu ngokuphelele
Ekugcineni, bonke abaphilayo bayovuma ukuthi uJehova unelungelo lokubusa (IHu 83:17, 18; Hez 38:23)
(Ungathola ukwaziswa okwengeziwe kuyi-Insight, uMq. 2, kk. 159-70, 1008-12, kanye nakwethi Okufundiswa
IBhayibheli, kk. 8-17, 27-36, 106-14)
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imibhalo
ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-4)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedEZIKABANI IZINDINGANISO OZAZISAYO?
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi uma singenabo ubuhlobo obuhle noJehova, uMniki wokuphila, noma imiphi imigomo
esiyifezayo iyoba eyesikhashana nje. Njengoba imigomo yethu ixhomeke kulokho esikwazisa kakhulu, ukwamu-
kela izindinganiso zeBhayibheli yikona okuyoletha imivuzo ehlala njalo
ABANINGI BACINGA IZINDINGANISO EZENZA UKUPHILA KUBE NENJONGO (5 imiz.)
Kungokwemvelo ukufuna ukufeza okuthile okunenzuzo nokwanelisayo (UmSh 2:24a)
Abantu baphokophela imigomo ngethemba lokuthi ukuyifeza kuyobanika ukwaneliseka nomuzwa wempume-
lelo
Izindinganiso zethu yizo ezinquma imigomo yethu nezinto eziza kuqala kithi
Uma sinezindinganiso ezinhle, siyozibekela imigomo enenzuzo futhi siyifinyelele (Fil 1:10, 11; w04-ZU 7/15 21-3)
Uma sibheka izinto ezingelutho njengeziyigugu, sizibekele imigomo engasho lutho, nakanjani siyodumazeka
(IzA 12:11)
Kuhle ukuhlaziya izindinganiso zethu ukuze sibone ukuthi zisiholelaphi
IMIGOMO ABANINGI ABAYIFUNAYO IBONISA UKUTHI BANEZINDINGANISO ZEZWE (10 imiz.)
Abaningi baqokomisa ingcebo, okungabenza bazibekele imigomo yezinto ezibonakalayo kuphela, njengokufuna
umsebenzi oholela kakhulu nokutshala izimali ngokuhlakanipha
Uma ukuphila kugxile emigomweni yezinto ezibonakalayo kuba nokudumazeka okuningi (IzA 23:4, 5; 1Thim
6:9, 10; w02-ZU 4/15 5-6)
UJesu wabuveza ubuwula bokuphishekela imigomo enjalo (Luka 12:15-21)
Abanye babheka udumo nokuvelela njengokubaluleke kakhulu futhi bangase bafune ukuqashelwa ngokuba ne-
mfundo ephakeme noma ngokufunda amakhono angavamile
Imigomo yemfundo igcizelela ukufunda ezihlakaniphini zezwe
Ukuhlakanipha kwezwe kuyize, ikakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa nokuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu (1Ko 3:
18, 19; Kol 2:3, 8, 9)
Ukuphishekela udumo kukhuthaza umoya wokuncintisana, odala ukwahlukana nokuxabana (Gal 5:26)
Udumo luyaphela, futhi alunakubanikeza ukuphila labo abanalo (UmSh 2:16)
Izwe liqhakambisa ukuzilibazisa ngokweqile
Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi lintula ithemba (1Ko 15:32)
Abaningi basebenzisa imizimba yabo njengokungathi akekho abayolandisa kuye (2Ko 5:10)
Ukuthanda ukuzijabulisa kwezwe akulethi ukwaneliseka okuhlala njalo; umphumela wokuhahela ukuzijabu-
lisa okunjalo uba ubuze (IzA 21:17)
UBUHLE BEZINDINGANISO ZEBHAYIBHELI (20 imiz.)
Njengoba ngaphandle kokuphila konke kuyize, khona-ke izindinganiso ezibaluleke kakhulu yilezo ezihlobene
nokulondoloza ubuhlobo obuhle noMniki wokuphila (IHu 63:3; w01-ZU 10/15 17-18)
Ukulondoloza lobo buhlobo kudinga:
Ukungenisa ulwazi ngoJehova nezinjongo zakhe, uzuze ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda kukaNkulunkulu (IzA
3:13O18; Joh 17:3)
Ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (Joh 4:34; 1Joh 2:17)
Ukulalela imithetho nemiyalo kaNkulunkulu (IzA 3:1, 2; UmSh 12:13, 14)
Ukuhlakulela izimfanelo zokwesaba uNkulunkulu (Mika 6:8; Gal 5:22, 23)
Izindinganiso zeBhayibheli zigcizelela imigomo engokomoya (w04-ZU 10/15 3-7)
Njengoba izwe likhuthaza ukuqongelela ingcebo, iBhayibheli lona lisifundisa ukuthi ingcebo engokomoya ye-
nza siphane futhi silungele ukwabelana nabanye (1Thim 6:17-19)
Ngakho sibeka imigomo yokunikela ngesikhathi sethu, amandla, nezinto zethu eziyigugu, sifuna uMbuso
kaNkulunkulu kuqala esikhundleni sezinto ezibonakalayo (Math 6:19-34; w99-ZU 4/1 6-7)
Nakuba abantu abaningi abaziwa ngabantu belibaleka ngokushesha, labo abaziwa uNkulunkulu, uyabakhu-
mbula, enombono wokubanika ukuphila okuphakade (UmSh 9:15; Mal 3:16)
Khona-ke umgomo wethu ekuphileni uwukwenza izinqumo eziyosisiza ukuba sibe negama elihle noNkulu-
nkulu (UmSh 7:1; w03-ZU 8/15 3)
Njengoba ukwaneliseka okutholakala ngokuzijabulisa kungokwesikhashana, ukuphishekela izindinganiso zi-
kaNkulunkulu kona kusinika intokozo yangempela manje nethemba lenjabulo engapheli
Ngenxa yalokho, silwela ukuphila nokusebenza nabanye ngomoya wothando nobunye (IHu 133:1; Kol 3:
12O14)
No. 165-ZU
11/05FUNA IZINTO EZIYIGUGU EZILETHA IMIVUZO EHLALA NJALO (10 imiz.)
Kubalulekile ukuba sibheke izinto ngeso elingokomoya hhayi elenyama (1Ko 2:14O16)
Izindinganiso zenyama zigxile emigomweni yesikhashana engazuzisi ngempela
Izinto ezizodlula zibhekwa njengokuyizona ezibalulekile (1Joh 2:15O17)
Ukuphila okugxile ezintweni ezinjalo kuzophela ngokushesha
Umbono ongokomoya wembula lokho okubaluleke ngempela (Fil 3:7, 8)
Kakade ukuphishekela imigomo engokomoya kuye kwaletha ukuthula kwengqondo, uthando, nomsebenzi
owanelisayo phakathi kwabantu bakaJehova (IzA 2:6-9)
Labo abazisa izindinganiso zeBhayibheli baqinisekiswa ngokuba nekusasa elijabulisayo nelilondekile (IHu 16:11)
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)

Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqaphele ukuthi umbono wokuphilela olwanamuhla kuphela awunalo ikusasa. Chaza ukuthi ukho-
lo, olusekelwe olwazini olunembile lweZwi likaNkulunkulu kanye nezithembiso zakhe eziqinisekile, kungasisiza
kanjani ukuba sibheke isikhathi esizayo sinesibindi naphezu kwezimo zezwe eziya ziba zimbi noma izinkinga esi-
nazo. Gcizelela ilungelo esinalo lokwazisa abanye ngethemba lethu
OKWENZA UMBONO WAKHO NGEKUSASA UBALULEKE (7 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi, kuhlanganise nentsha, bacabanga ngokujulile ngekusasa (w01-ZU 5/15 3-4; w01-ZU 8/15 5-6)
Nakuba beqaphela ukuthi kunobugebengu, izifo eziwumshayabhuqe nempi, abanye bazama ukuba nombono
wethemba (g-ZU 1/06 5)
Abanye bayakhungatheka ngenxa yobukhulu bezinkinga zesintu futhi baphilela olwanamuhla kuphela (Isaya
22:12, 13; ip-1-ZU 237)
Ngaphandle kwethemba eliqinile lekusasa elingcono, abantu bathambekela ekuphileleni olwanamuhla ku-
phela (1Ko 15:13, 32; w01-ZU 11/1 7)
Njengoba kungenzeka ukuthi amaKristu okuqala ayethonywe yilesi simo sengqondo esiyingozi, umpho-
stoli uPawulu wakubona kufanelekile ukuba awaqinise ukholo (w97-ZU 8/15 12; w97-ZU 11/1 24)
Wawakhumbuza ukuthi ukufa kukaKristu kwagcwalisa isiprofetho, kanjalo wajulisa ukuqonda kwa-
wo izinto ezingokoqobo ezingokomoya (1Ko 15:3, 4)
Lokhu kwawasiza ukuba abe nethemba ngekusasa
Namuhla, njengoFakazi BakaJehova, sinethemba elihle ngekusasa, kodwa lisekelwephi?
Ukholo lusisiza kanjani ukuba sibheke isikhathi esizayo ngesibindi, sisingathe izinkinga zethu manje, futhi
sikhuthazelele ukushushiswa nezingcindezi njengoba sikhonza uNkulunkulu?
Yini esingayenza ukuze siziqinise okholweni futhi sibe nesibindi?
INDLELA UKHOLO OLUWUTHINTA NGAYO UMBONO WETHU (16 imiz.)
Ukholo lobuKristu luyinto engokoqobo—hhayi ukuthatheka okungenasisekelo (Heb 11:1)
Lusekelwe ebufakazini obuqinile (it-1 804)
Umkhathi esiwubonayo nokuhleleka kwawo kufakazela ukuba khona koMdali ongabonakali nendlela afu-
na ukuba izinto zenziwe ngayo (Isaya 40:25, 26; Ro 1:20)
Ukuthembeka kweZwi likaNkulunkulu nokugcwaliseka ngokunembile kweziprofetho zalo kusinika isiseke-
lo sokukholelwa yizo zonke izithembiso zakhe (Josh 23:14; Ro 10:17)
Ngokutadisha iBhayibheli, oFakazi BakaJehova bayazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu uthembiseni nokuthi ku-
ngani kungekho lutho olungabhuntshisa ukugcwaliseka kweZwi lakhe (cl-ZU 8-11)
Amaqiniso angokomBhalo asisiza ukuba sibheke isikhathi esizayo sinethemba
UNkulunkulu wadala umhlaba ukuba kuhlalwe kuwo (Isaya 45:18)
Ngeke avume ukuba ubhujiswe ngezikhali (IHu 104:5; UmSh 1:4)
Kunalokho, uyoqeda izikhali emhlabeni wonke (IHu 46:9)
UNkulunkulu ‘uyochitha abachitha umhlaba’ (IsAm 11:18)
UJehova ngeke avume ukuba izifo ziqothule uhlanga lwesintu
Ukugula kuyoqedwa (Isaya 33:24)
Izinga lempilo liyothuthuka lifinyelele ekupheleleni (Jobe 33:25)
UJehova uthembise ukulondoloza abalungile empini ye-Armagedoni (Math 24:22)
Njengoba lona kanye igama likaNkulunkulu lihlangene nokugcwaliseka kweZwi lakhe, ngeke ahluleke
ukwenza lokho akushoyo
IsAmbulo 7:9, 14 sisiqinisekisa ngokuthi “isixuku esikhulu” siyobe sisaphila emhlabeni lapho kuqala ‘usi-
zi olukhulu’
UJehova akasoze akuvumela ukuba kuqothulwe abantu bakhe (IHu 116:15; cl-ZU 73-4; ka 408-9)
Ulwazi olunjalo lweBhayibheli luqinisa ukholo lwethu futhi lusinika isibindi lapho sibhekene nezinsizi zamanje
IZINKINGA ESINAZO ZINQOTSHWA NGOKHOLO NESIBINDI (16 imiz.)
Wonke umuntu ubhekana nezinkinga nezinhlekelele ezibangela ukukhathazeka
Abaningi bakhathazeka nsuku zonke ngokuthola izinto abazidingayo, bakhathazeka ngokunakekelwa kwe-
mpilo, noma bakhathazeka ngokushada noma ukukhulisa izingane
Lezi zinto ziyasithinta, kodwa ukunaka zona zodwa bese sidebeselela izinto ezingokomoya kuwukuzigwa-
za ngowethu (Luka 8:7, 11, 14; 21:34-36)
Lapho sibonisa ukholo ngesibindi ezithembisweni zikaJehova siyaqiniseka ukuthi siyokuthola okokuzise-
kela futhi lokhu kusilethela injabulo (Math 5:3; 6:33)

KHULUMA NGETHEMBA LAKHO LESIKHATHI ESIZAYO (6 imiz.)
Uma umuntu azi ukuthi yini ayilindele, angazilungiselela kahle, kanjalo anciphise ukucindezeleka nokukhatha-
zeka

Sifuna ukuhlanganyela leli themba nabo bonke abanye uKristu abafela
Basize nabo bathembele eqinisweni loMbuso elisindisa ukuphila (IHu 145:7, 11-13)
Basize bafunde indlela nabo abangabheka ngayo isikhathi esizayo benokholo nesibindi

Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:

leke ngayo ukuba sikusebenzise ekuphileni kwethu. Gcizelela izinzuzo ezilethwa ukulonda ukuhlakanipha kuka-
Nkulunkulu
SIPHILA EZWENI ELINGENANGQONDO (5 imiz.)
Izwe liziqhayisa ngolwazi olukhulu, ngentuthuko yezinto ezibonakalayo nangobuchwepheshe obuphambili
Kodwa uma sibheka ingokomoya nokuziphatha kwalo, liya licwila obishini lwezenzo zokungamhloniphi uNku-
lunkulu (2Thim 3:1, 13)
Yize kuthiwa likhanyiselwe, izwe liziphatha ngezindlela eziningi ezingenangqondo
Likhuluma ngokuthula kodwa lisagcine izikhali ezibhubhisayo (g04-ZU 3/8 3-9)
Ubuphekula buye bonakalisa ukuphila kwezigidi (g-ZU 6/06 3-6)
 ́
Izifo ezithathelwana ngobulili nokukhulelwa kwentsha kuth e chithi saka (g05 12/22 11; g05 8/8 29; g04-ZU
10/8 4-7, 28; g04-ZU 6/8 27-8 [g04 5/22 11-12])
Kunobhadane lokusetshenziswa kabi kwezidakamizwa (Efe 4:17-19; g03-ZU 4/8 3; g99-ZU 11/8 3-7; g99-ZU 7/8
6-7)
Amasonto asekela amaqembu asempini, abefundisi basolwa ngokuqothulwa kwesizwe, abapristi banukubeza
izingane ngokobulili, amasonto afihla izenzo eziyihlazo (kp-ZU 3)
Ukuphishekela izinto ezibonakalayo kuholela ‘ezifisweni ezingenangqondo nezilimazayo’ (1Thim 6:9)
Izindinganiso zihlanekezelwe (g03-ZU 6/8 3-9)
Singenza kanjani ngokuhlakanipha ezweni elingenangqondo kangaka?
KUMELWE SINCIKE EMTHONJENI WOKUHLAKANIPHA KWEQINISO (10 imiz.)
UJehova unguMthombo wokuhlakanipha kweqiniso (IzA 2:6)
Ukuhlakanipha kwezwe nemicabango yalo, okungqubuzana nokwakhe, ukubheka njengobuwula nokuyize
(1Ko 3:19, 20)
Ukufunda iBhayibheli nsuku zonke, sizindle ngalo, bese sisebenzisa iseluleko salo kuyosisiza ukuba sizuze eku-
hlakanipheni kukaNkulunkulu (Josh 1:7, 8; IHu 1:1, 2)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu lingasihlakaniphisela insindiso futhi lisihlomisele yonke imisebenzi emihle (2Thim 3:
15-17)
Liyasiqondisa endleleni okufanele sihambe ngayo (Isaya 30:21; w03-ZU 2/15 31)
Ukuvumelanisa ukuphila kwethu nentando kaNkulunkulu nezindlela zakhe kuyinkambo yokuhlakanipha (Isa-
ya 48:17, 18)
Izindinganiso zikaJehova zihlale zibazuzisa kakhulu labo abazilandelayo
Ukuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu kuyisipho esivela kuJehova futhi kufanele kulondwe (IzA 3:21)
Uma sisebenzisa ukuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu, singaphila kangcono manje futhi ‘sibambisise ukuphila
kwangempela’ (1Thim 6:19)
UKUSEBENZISA ISELULEKO SEZWI LIKANKULUNKULU KUYINKAMBO YOKUHLAKANIPHA (20 imiz.)
Ukuze sithole ukuhlakanipha kukaJehova, kumelwe sithole umqondo walokho esikufundayo futhi sikusebenzi-
se (IzA 2:2-5; Jak 1:22-25)
Kufanele silalele iseluleko sokuba sihlale sihlanzekile ngokuzihlukanisa nezwe
Singathathi hlangothi kuzo zonke izindaba zezwe (Joh 17:14)
Sigweme ukwenza okubi; siphishekele ukuthula (Ro 12:9, 18; 1Pet 3:11)
Singakuvumeli ukuphila kwethu kubuswe yinzondo, ukuhaha, ukuziphatha okuyihlazo nokuntela okuyi-
chilo (IzA 10:12; 1Ko 6:9-11; Efe 5:3-5; 1Joh 3:15)
Ukulandela iseluleko seZwi likaNkulunkulu kuyisivikelo (UmSh 7:12)
Kusisiza ukuba sigweme ‘izinkulumo ezingenangqondo nalokho okubizwa ngokungeyikho ngokuthi ulwazi’
(1Thim 6:20, 21)
Kusisiza ukuba sigweme inkambo yokuziphatha okubi nehlazo, futhi kusivikela ezifweni ezithathelwana ngo-
bulili, ukukhulelwa ngaphandle komshado nosizi oluhambisana nalezi zinto (IzA 5:1-14)
Kusigcina singangeni ezimpikiswaneni zezombangazwe ezivame ukuphumela ebudloveni nasekulimaleni kwa-
bantu (Joh 17:16; Jak 4:4; w02-ZU 11/1 14-19)
Kusikhulula ekukhathazekeni, okusenza sikwazi ukuphila ngokuzinikela kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu sino-
kwaneliseka (Math 13:22; Thit 2:11-14; Heb 13:5)
Kusisiza ukuba sigweme izinkinga, izihibe nenhlekelele ezokwehlela leli zwe elingenangqondo maduzane (IzA
22:3)
Kusisiza ukuba singalandeli abantu, ngaleyo ndlela sigweme inhlekelele (Math 15:14; w04-ZU 1/15 3-7)

KUYAPHUTHUMA UKUBA SENZE NGOKUHLAKANIPHA MANJE (10 imiz.)

(2Pet 3:11-14)

le egameni lakhe (IzA 18:10; 27:11)
Gcina izinto zoMbuso ziza kuqala (Math 6:33)

Linganiselani eminakweni yokuziphilisa nokuzijabulisa (1Thim 4:8; 2Thim 2:3, 4; w06-ZU 3/1 17-21; w06-ZU
2/1 6)
Qhubekani nigwema isimo sokungamhloniphi uNkulunkulu kuzo zonke izici zokuphila (1Pet 4:3)
Gwemani imidlalo enobudlova, ukuzijabulisa okunokuziphatha okubi nokweqisa otshwaleni
Gwemani izici zezwe ezinjengomhawu, ukubanga, ukuzigabisa nokuqamba amanga (Jak 3:13-15)
Qhubekani niphishekela ukuthula (Heb 12:14)
Uma sesaba uJehova futhi sizuza ukuhlakanipha, siyokugwema ukubhujiswa nokuchithwa kanye naleli zwe eli-
nobuwula nelingenangqondo (IzA 3:13-18; 4:7)

OKWENZA ABANTU BAZIZWE BENGALONDEKILE (3 imiz.)
Abantu abaningi banezizathu ezizwakalayo zokukhathazeka ngokulondeka kwabo siqu nokwemikhaya yabo
(g-ZU 11/06 3) [Uma kungenzeka, caphuna izibonelo zendawo zakamuva]
Isiphepho sibangela ukufa nencithakalo
Ukuzamazama komhlaba kucekela phansi lonke idolobha
Izifo eziwumshayabhuqe zibulala abantu abaningi
Umphakathi wesintu uhlala usengozini yezigebengu eziphangayo
Ukuhlasela kwamaphekula kushintsha usuku olunokuthula lube isiyaluyalu sobudlova
Izikhali zenuzi, ezakhiwa izizwe eziningi ngokwandayo, zisongela ukulondeka
Izimpi neziyaluyalu zomphakathi zibangela ukwesaba ezigidini zabantu
Ingabe ikhona indlela esingazizwa ngayo silondeke ngempela?
UMUZWA WOKULONDEKA WASHABALALA NGO-1914 (15 imiz.)
AbaFundi BeBhayibheli bangesikhathi sokuphela kweminyaka yawo-1800 babazi ukuthi unyaka ka-1914 ubalu-
lekile (jv-ZU 60, 134-5)
Izazi-mlando zezwe ziyavuma ukuthi u-1914 waletha ushintsho oluphawulekayo emlandweni wesintu (w05-ZU
10/1 5; w04-ZU 2/1 20; w92-ZU 10/1 17; rs-ZU 186-7)
UJesu wabikezela izenzakalo ezaziyophuca isintu umuzwa wokulondeka osukwini lwethu [Funda uMathewu 24:
3, 6-8] (w05-ZU 10/1 4-6)
“Niyokuzwa ngezimpi nemibiko yezimpi . . . Ngoba isizwe siyovukela isizwe”
Ekulandiseni kwakhe okufanayo, uLuka ucaphuna uJesu ethi ‘siyokuzwa ngezimpi neziyaluyalu’ (Luka
21:9)
Kusukela ngo-1914, izimpi, izinguquko, iziyaluyalu zomphakathi nezenzo zobuphekula ziye zavama ka-
khulu
Ngenxa yalokho, izigidi ziye zalahlekelwa ukuphila kwazo (w06-ZU 9/15 4; w00-ZU 10/15 16; w97-ZU
4/1 9)
Amanye amazwe lapho abantu babezizwa belondekile khona ngokwesilinganiso esithile, manje asebhe-
kana nosongo lobuphekula nsuku zonke
Abantu kuwo wonke umhlaba bazizwa bengalondekile neze
Ngo-1914 kwagqashuka impi yezwe yokuqala
Kwakungeyona impi ephakathi kwamazwe nje amabili kodwa yayiphakathi kwezizwe zonke, futhi yayi-
thinta nabantu abangabuthiwe (rs-ZU 182)
‘Ukuthula kwasuswa emhlabeni’ ngo-1914 (IsAm 6:4; re-ZU 177-8)
Izimpi nemibango yobuhlanga isadlangile
Ezindaweni eziningi, kusezwakala umsindo wezimpi ezindaweni ezizungezile nemibiko yezimpi ezinda-
weni ezikude (w70-ZU 7/15 319 [w70 43])
Lapho enikeza isibonakaliso sokuba khona kwakhe, uJesu washo la mazwi aphawulekayo: “Qaphelani ukuba
ningesabi” (Math 24:6)
Ukuthula okunjalo kungatholwa yilabo abaqonda ukubaluleka kwamazwi kaJesu kuphela
[Funda uMathewu 24:7]
“Kuyoba khona ukusweleka kokudla”
Namuhla, abaningi abakwazi ukuyondla kahle imikhaya yabo ngenxa yokuswela imali noma indawo yoku-
lima noma ngenxa yemiphumela yempi (w06-ZU 9/15 4; w04-ZU 1/1 4; g00-ZU 5/8 4-5)
Amakhulu ezigidi abulawa indlala engapheli
‘Ukuzamazama komhlaba ezindaweni ngezindawo”
Kusukela ngo-1914 ukuzamazama komhlaba okubhubhisayo kuye kwagadla kuphindelela izikhathi ezilinga-
niselwa kwezingu-20 ngonyaka kunaseminyakeni engu-2 000 engaphambi kuka-1914 (rs-ZU 183-4)
Kusukela ngo-1914, ukuzamazama komhlaba okunamandla ngokwanele ukuba kucekele phansi izakhiwo fu-
thi kuqhekeze umhlaba kuye kwagadla izikhathi ezilinganiselwa kwezingu-18 unyaka ngamunye (w05-ZU
10/1 6)
Ukuzamazama komhlaba kuye kwabulala amakhulu ezinkulungwane zabantu eminyakeni eyikhulu edlule
(w06-ZU 9/15 4-5)
Abasindile bahlushwa amaphupho esabisayo futhi balangazelela indawo elondekile (w95-ZU 10/15 4)
No. 168-ZU
11/06[Funda uLuka 21:11]
“Ezindaweni ngezindawo kube khona izifo eziwumshayabhuqe”
Ekupheleni kweMpi Yezwe I, umkhuhlane waseSpain uwodwa nje wabulala abantu abafinyelela ezigidini
ezingu-50 (w05-ZU 10/1 5)
Naphezu kwentuthuko kwezokwelapha, sonke isintu sisaphila ngokwesaba ukusakazeka kwezifo ezitha-
thelwanayo ezibulalayo (w06-ZU 9/15 5)
UJesu wathi kule nkathi kwakuyoba khona “imibono eyesabekayo” futhi esikhathini esizayo “abantu [babeyo-
ba] nesinxi ngenxa yokwesaba nokulindela izinto ezehlela umhlaba owakhiweyo” (Luka 21:11, 26; w95-ZU 10/15
5-8)
Khona-ke, kungenzeka kanjani ukuba siphile kuleli zwe elinezinkathazo kodwa singesabi?
LAPHO KUNGATHOLAKALA KHONA UKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA (22 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu uyasiqinisekisa ukuthi uyobavikela abantu abamkhulekela “ngomoya nangeqiniso” (Joh
4:24; IHu 46:1)
Igama likaNkulunkulu lingumbhoshongo oqinile [Funda izAga 18:10]
Uma umuntu emazi futhi emethemba ngempela uJehova, unesizathu esizwakalayo sokuzizwa elondekile
(IzA 3:5, 6; cl-ZU 68, 70)
Lapho uzizwa ukhathazekile ngenxa yokuntengantenga kwalesi simiso sezinto, sebenzisa incwadi yabaseFili-
pi 4:6, 7 [Funda]
Ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu kuwukuzola kwengqondo nenhliziyo okusikhulula ekukhathazekeni nasekwe-
sabeni, futhi kusisize sizizwe silondekile (w94-ZU 11/15 22)
Uma sinalokhu kuthula ‘singahlala ngokulondeka,’ sazi ukuthi uJehova ngeke avume sehlelwe izinto ezi-
zosilimaza phakade (IHu 4:8)
Lapho ekhuluma ngezimpawu eziphawulwe ngenhla zesibonakaliso sokuba khona kwakhe, uJesu wafanisa izwe
losuku lukaNowa langaphambi kweSikhukhula nosuku lwethu [Funda uMathewu 24:37-39]
Okwenzeka ngeSikhukhula kuyisibonelo salokho okuzokwenzeka osukwini lwethu [Funda eyesi-2 Petru 2:
5, 6, 9]
Izwe eligcwele ubudlova langaleso sikhathi labhujiswa ngeSikhukhula (2Pet 3:5-7)
Kungani uNowa nomkhaya wakhe basindiswa ekubhujisweni kwangaleso sikhathi?
Ngoba “uNowa wahamba noNkulunkulu weqiniso”; yena nomkhaya wakhe balalela uJehova futhi batho-
la ukulondeka kwangempela emkhunjini (Gen 6:9)
Ngokufanayo, kumelwe sisebenzise wonke amathuba okuzuza emalungiselelweni kaJehova okulonde-
ka kulesi sikhathi—umkhumbi ongokomfanekiso (w97-ZU 3/1 12)
Umelela ipharadesi elingokomoya uJehova abelokhu elakha phakathi kwabakhulekeli bakhe kusu-
kela ngo-1919—okuwukubuyisana noNkulunkulu futhi ube nokuthula naye (w86-ZU 1/1 14-15)
[Yithi qaphuqaphu ngezinye zezici zepharadesi elingokomoya (w01-ZU 3/1 8-11)]
Abantu abanamathuba okusinda sebeyangena kakade “emkhunjini” ukuze balondeke “osizini olu-
khulu” oluyofinyelela umvuthwandaba e-Armagedoni (Math 24:21)
I-Armagedoni iyobhubhisa isimiso esibi nesingalondekile sikaDeveli
Abasindile bayongeniswa ngokulondeka emhlabeni ohlanziwe—indawo engokoqobo efana nepa-
ki, enokuthula nokulondeka (IsAm 7:9, 10, 14-17; 21:4)
Maduze nje uJesu uzofika ‘enkazimulweni yakhe’ ukuze ahlulele isintu [Funda uMathewu 25:31-33] (Joh 5:22, 27;
w95-ZU 10/15 22-3)
“Izimvu,” ‘ezingabantu abalungile,’ ziyonikezwa “ukuphila okuphakade” ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu (Math
25:46; 2Pet 3:13)
Siyobhekwa njengezimvu uma phakathi nesikhathi esithile siye sabasekela ngokoqobo abafowabo bakaKri-
stu—abalandeli bakhe abagcotshiwe—abaphathiswe umsebenzi “wokufakaza ngoJesu” (IsAm 12:17; Math
25:34-40; w95-ZU 10/15 25-8)
FUNA UKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA MANJE (5 imiz.)
Ungakhohliswa! USathane unikeza izithembiso zokulondeka ezingamanga [Funda eyoku-1 Thesalonika 5:2, 3]
Izithembiso zokuthi ohulumeni babantu ekugcineni bazokwenza izakhamuzi zabo zizizwe zilondeke ngempe-
la zingamanga (IHu 146:3)
UJehova uyena kuphela ongumthombo wokulondeka kwangempela
Ngokulalela iZwi lakhe, iBhayibheli, singathola ukulondeka kwangempela
Nakuba kumelwe sibhekane nezingcindezi zaleli zwe elingaphelele futhi kungenzeka sife, uJehova ngeke asi-
shiye (IHu 94:14)
Abathembekile bayolondolozwa enkumbulweni kaNkulunkulu, futhi uyobavusa ngesikhathi sakhe esifane-
le (Joh 5:28, 29; cl-ZU 74)
Namuhla, isimo sezwe siyabesabisa abantu
Kodwa ungase uzizwe ulondekile kuleli zwe elinezinkathazo!
Zamukele manje izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu kungakephuzi kakhulu! (Math 24:14)
(Namathela endabeni esohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imi-
bhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
No. 168-ZU—ikhasi 2

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-45
All Rights ReservedKUNGANI KUMELWE UQONDISWE IBHAYIBHELI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Yenza ukuba amaphuzu ale nkulumo alandelane ngendlela enengqondo ukuze amukeleke kalula; yibeke ngoku-
qiniseka ngendlela ezothinta inhliziyo. Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi iBhayibheli liyincwadi kaJehova eneziqondi-
so ezisindisa ukuphila nokuthi ukusebenzisa iseluleko salo kuletha izibusiso. Lapho ulandisa okuhlangenwe na-
kho okusezincwadini ezikhonjiwe, kwenze kuphile
NJENGOMLOBI WEBHAYIBHELI, UJEHOVA UNIKEZA ISINTU ISIQONDISO (5 imiz.)
Ikhono likaNkulunkulu lokuqondisa libonakala kokubili endalweni yakhe ephilayo nengaphili (g82 7/22 12)
Uqondisa izinkanyezi ngomthetho wokuhamba kwezinto nowamandla adonsela phansi (Jobe 38:32, 33; w05-ZU
4/1 6)
Izinyoni nezinye izilwane ziqondiswa ukuhlakanipha komuzwa wemvelo ezikunikwe uNkulunkulu (Jobe 39:
26; IzA 30:24-28; g-ZU 7/07 3)
Abantu, abangazikhethela inkambo yabo yokuphila, baqondiswa yizimiso ezilotshiwe sonke esizidingayo (IHu 48:
14; Jer 10:23)
Abantu banikezwe iziqondiso eziningi kakhulu ukudlula izinkanyezi nezinyoni ezifudukayo; ngokulandela izi-
qondiso zikaNkulunkulu bangazuza ukuphila okuphakade (w07-ZU 5/1 14, 18)
Ingabe uyomvumela uNkulunkulu ukuba akuqondise ngeZwi lakhe, iBhayibheli? (g-ZU 7/07 5-6)
Ngokufunda amakhasi amane kuya kwamahlanu ngosuku, ungalifunda uliqede lonke iBhayibheli ngo-
nyaka
Ukufunda ingxenye ethile yalo nsuku zonke bese uzindla ngayo kungathuthukisa izinga lokuphila
kwakho
Manje sizohlola izici ezine zesiqondiso esiseBhayibhelini
1. IBHAYIBHELI LINESIQONDISO ESIYINGQAYIZIVELE NGOKUZIPHATHA KWABANTU (8 imiz.)
Izindinganiso nemithetho yokuziphatha eseBhayibhelini akunakuqhathaniswa
Iseluleko seBhayibheli asimlimazi neze umuntu osilalelayo [Funda eyesi-2 Thimothewu 3:16]
Ngokwesibonelo, ake sicabangele izindinganiso zeBhayibheli zokuhlanzeka nokuziphatha
Phawula indlela abantu abazuza ngayo lapho belandela izindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu nendlela abahluphe-
ka ngayo lapho bezishaya indiva
[Njengezibonelo, khuluma ngomkhuba wokubhema ugwayi nokuziphatha okubi ngokobulili, usebenzise
izincwadi ezikhonjiwe ukuze ubonise imiphumela ebuhlungu nezinkinga ezinkulu okubangelwa ukuzi-
shaya indiva izimiso zeBhayibheli. Veza nendlela ukulandela lezi zimiso okwenza ngayo umuntu aja-
bulele impilo enhle, ukuthula nonembeza omuhle (IzA 1:2-4; 3:1, 2)]
Ukubhema ugwayi (w07-ZU 4/1 5; g-ZU 7/07 6-7; gm-ZU 165-6; rs-ZU 164-5)
Ukuziphatha okubi ngokobulili (g-ZU 4/07 3-4; g00-ZU 4/8 6; gm-ZU 168-70; rs-ZU 234)
2. IBHAYIBHELI LIYISIQONDISO ESIWUSIZO EKUTHOLENI INJABULO YANGEMPELA (4 imiz.)
IBhayibheli lanelisa isidingo esibalulekile ngokunikeza iziqondiso ezenza imikhaya izinze nezisiza ekwakheni
ubuhlobo obuhle nobujabulisayo (IzA 3:13, 18, 21, 22; Math 5:3; Luka 11:28; IsAm 1:3)
Ukulandela izimiso zeBhayibheli kuyosiza bonke ukuba bathuthukise imishado yabo (g-ZU 7/06 6-9; rs-ZU
389-90)
Kunobufakazi obubonisa ukuthi isiqondiso seBhayibheli siletha injabulo enkulu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi
(w04-ZU 9/1 6-7; w03-ZU 4/15 17)
3. IBHAYIBHELI
(4 imiz.)
LIYISIQONDISO
ESIQINISEKILE
ESIHOLELA
EMPUMELELWENI
YANGEMPELA
UJehova uphumelela ngokuphelele ngaso sonke isikhathi (Isaya 55:11)
Esebenzisa iBhayibheli, ubonisa abantu indlela abangaphumelela ngayo ekuphileni (Josh 1:7, 8; IHu 1:1-3)
Uxwayisa ngokuphishekela impumelelo yezwe nemali (1Thim 6:9, 10; w90-ZU 4/1 12-13)
4. YIBHAYIBHELI KUPHELA ELIYISIQONDISO ESIHOLELA EKUPHILENI OKUPHAKADE (5 imiz.)
Isiqondiso sokuphila besiyontula ngokudabukisayo uma singanikezi abantu ithemba ngekusasa noma umgomo
wesikhathi esizayo, njengoba umbono esinawo ngekusasa uyithonya kakhulu inkambo yethu yamanje
IBhayibheli liwukuphela kwencwadi engasiholela emvuzweni omkhulu kunayo yonke umuntu angase ayitho-
le, ukuphila okuphakade (Ro 6:23; 1Thim 4:8; g-ZU 7/07 8-9)
Ligcizelela ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uwukuphela kwethemba laso sonke isintu; libonisa indlela lo hu-
lumeni wasezulwini oyosetshenziswa ngayo ekungcweliseni igama likaNkulunkulu nasekulweleni ubukho-
si bakhe (Dan 2:44)
Lichaza inkambo okudingeka siyiphishekele ukuze sisondelane noMenzi noMniki-kuphila wethu (Joh 17:3;
1Thim 6:12; 1Joh 5:20)
No. 169-ZU
11/07Ukuphila okungcono, okujabulisa futhi kwanelise kunakho konke manje empeleni kuphansi kakhulu uma ku-
qhathaniswa nokuphila kwangempela esiyokuthola ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu
Akufanele yini ukwazi injongo kaNkulunkulu ngesintu kusishukumisele ekwenzeni izinguquko ekuphileni
kwethu manje?
Ngokuvumelana nalokho esiye sakufunda, akufanele yini sivumele iBhayibheli liqondise izinyathelo zethu
emgomweni wokuphila phakade?
SETHEMBE ISIQONDISO SEBHAYIBHELI NGOBA SIPHEFUMULELWE UNKULUNKULU (4 imiz.)
Le ncwadi enenzuzo engenakuqhathaniswa akumelwe igcinwe emashalofini ethu, kodwa kufanele siyifunde fu-
thi siyitadishe
Lifunde ngokukhulu ukuqiniseka iBhayibheli; linembe ngokuphelele, ungalethemba futhi lisenjengoba lalinja-
lo ekuqaleni (IHu 78:7; w05-ZU 7/15 4-6; w98-ZU 4/1 14-20)
Zonke izingxenye zeBhayibheli ‘ziphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu’ (2Thim 3:16; 2Pet 1:20, 21; w97-ZU 6/15 6-8;
it-1 1204)
Njengoba uJehova ewukuphela koMlobi walo, iBhayibheli linesigijimi esiyingqayizivele
Bonke abamukela iBhayibheli nesigijimi salo baba munye endleleni yokucabanga, yokukhuluma neyokwe-
nza izinto (Zef 3:9; Ro 15:5, 6)
Ingabe ungathanda ukuqondiswa ungene ekuphileni okuphakade emhlabeni oyipharadesi, njengoba nje izinka-
nyezi ziqondiswa emizileni yazo efanele nezinyoni ziqondiswa umuzwa wemvelo eziwunikwe uNkulunkulu?
Khona-ke, vumela iBhayibheli likuqondise (IHu 119:105)
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe
okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe)
