KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedUBANI OKUFANELEKELAYO UKUBUSA ISINTU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Chaza izizathu ezisobala ezenza uMbuso kaNkulunkulu ube ongcono kakhulu kunabo bonke ohulumeni babantu
ngesikhathi esifanayo ukwenze kucace ukuthi oFakazi BakaJehova abathathi hlangothi ngokuphelele ezindabe-
ni zezwe zezombusazwe. Veza umahluko okhona phakathi kwamandla uJesu Kristu anawo nokulinganiselwa
kwababusi abangabantu.
UKUKALA IMPUMELELO YOHULUMENI BABANTU (3 imiz.)
Abaholi abalangazelela ukubusa balwela ukubonisa ukuthi bayakufanelekela ukubusa—abanye ngokukhankasa,
abanye ngokusebenzisa impoqo
Baphumelela kangakanani ohulumeni babantu ekwaneliseni izidingo zezikhonzi zabo?
Imibuso yamakhosi ibonisa amaphutha ombusi oyedwa (g90-ZU 8/22 19-20)
Imibuso yezikhulu—ohulumeni abakhiwa izicukuthwane, idlanzana labantu abami kahle noma isigaba se-
zitatanyiswa—inababusi ababekwa ngenxa yengcebo noma ngozalo (g90-ZU 9/8 26-7)
Imibuso yentando yeningi ibonisa ukulinganiselwa kwabantu bayo (UmSh 7:20; Jer 10:23; g90-ZU 9/22 13-14)
Zonke izinhlobo zokubusa ezisungulwe abantu ziye zahluleka ngendlela edabukisayo [Funda umShumayeli 8:9]
LOKHO OKUYOFEZWA UKUBUSA KUKAKRISTU JESU (16 imiz.)
UJesu wabonisa lokho angakufeza njengoMbusi
Ngokungafani nokusilela kokubusa kwabantu, izimangaliso ezenziwa uJesu zabonisa amandla akhe okwane-
lisa izidingo zesintu, amazwibela ezibusiso isintu esiyozithola lapho esebusa
Ezomnotho
Ngaphansi kokubusa kwabantu, kufa abantwana abaningi usuku ngalunye ngenxa yendlala
UJesu Kristu uyolungiselela bonke abantu inala yokudla [Funda uMathewu 14:19-21]
Lo Mbuso uyokwenza ukuba yonke imikhaya ibe nezindlu ezinhle
Ngeke kube nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi; wonke umuntu uyoba nomsebenzi owanelisayo (Isaya 65:21-23)
Ukulungela Izinhlekelele
Ngokuvamile ohulumeni babantu abazihlomele kahle iziphepho ezinkulu, kokubili ngaphambi nangemva ko-
kuba zigadle
UJesu angawulawula umoya nolwandle esebenzisa umoya kaNkulunkulu [Funda uMarku 4:37-39]
Lapho esebusa uyolawula amandla emvelo ngokwenzuzo yabantu
Ezempilo
Ohulumeni babhekene nenselele enkulu yokuzama ukulungiselela izikhonzi zabo usizo olwanele lwezempilo
UJesu wabonisa amandla anawo okuphulukisa zonke izifo [Funda uMathewu 15:30]
Uyophulukisa futhi aqede zonke izifo—hhayi nje izifo ezingamahlala khona kodwa ngisho nezinhlungu
namahlaba okwenza umuntu angakujabuleli ukuphila (Isaya 33:24)
Abagugile uyobabuyisela ebusheni babo (Jobe 33:25)
Akekho umbusi ongumuntu onamandla alingana nakaJesu okuvusa abantu kwabafileyo [Funda uMarku
5:38-42]
Ukuvikela
UJesu unamandla ngisho naphezu kwezidalwa zomoya ezinamandla kunabantu [Funda uMathewu 8:16]
Amademoni kwadingeka alalele lapho uJesu ewayala ukuba aphume kubantu ayekubo (it-2 167)
Akukhona ukuthi amademoni anamandla angaphezu kwawabantu kuphela; empeleni asekela imibuso ya-
bantu (Dan 10:13; Luka 4:6; Joh 14:30; Efe 6:12; 1Joh 5:19)
Manje uJesu uvikela izikhonzi zakhe ekulawulweni amademoni futhi ngesikhathi esizayo uyobhubhisa uSa-
thane nayo yonke imimoya emibi (IsAm 20:10)
Ngokubhubhisa izitha zangempela zabantu, uJesu uyobe esetshenziswe uJehova ukuba aqede zonke izimpi
(IHu 46:8, 9)
Imvelo
Ukuwohloka kwemvelo sekuye kwaba into ebakhathaza kakhulu abantu (g03-ZU 12/8 20-24)
UNkulunkulu uyonika uJesu amandla “okuchitha abachitha umhlaba” (IsAm 11:18)
Ukuthula phakathi kwezilwane nabantu kuyoba into engokoqobo (Isaya 11:6-9)
Umhlaba uyoguqulwa ube ipharadesi
Lokhu esesixoxe ngakho kuyingxenyana nje yezibusiso eziyolethwa uMbuso kaMesiya
UJESU KRISTU—UKUFANELEKELA KAHLE KAKHULU UKUBUSA ISINTU (5 imiz.)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu oyobe usezandleni zikaKristu Jesu uyophumelela ngoba awunabo ubuthakathaka obu-
tholakala kohulumeni babantu
No. 170-ZU
12/07Ulwazi lwabo bonke ababusi abangabantu lulinganiselwe; uJesu Kristu unayo “yonke imicebo yokuhlakanipha
neyolwazi” (Kol 2:3)
Ababusi abangabantu bathiywa ukungapheleli futhi ngokuvamile banezisusa ezimbi; uJesu ‘uthembekile, aka-
nabuqili, akangcolile futhi uhlukanisiwe nezoni’ (Heb 7:26)
Ababusi abangabantu bayafa imibuso yabo bayishiyele ababalandelayo; uJesu akafi futhi akadingi muntu ozo-
mlandela (Dan 2:44) [Funda eyoku-1 Thimothewu 6:15, 16]
Ababusi abangabantu bavame ukulingeka ukuba basebenzise amandla abo ngezinjongo zobugovu; uJesu aka-
kaze asebenzise amandla ayewanikwe uNkulunkulu ukuze kuzuze yena, noma asebenzise igunya lakhe uku-
ze aphathe kabi abanye (Math 4:1-4; Ro 15:3)
MELELA UMBUSO KAMESIYA (6 imiz.)
Abaningi bayakholelwa ukuthi uJesu Kristu waba khona, kodwa bambalwa ababonisa ukuthi banokholo lokuthi
empeleni useyabusa njengeNkosi
Buningi ubufakazi obubonisa ukuthi usethathe amandla futhi waqala ukubusa ezulwini (bh-ZU 84-95)
Sikukhuthaza ukuba ulwandise ulwazi lwakho ngala maqiniso
Isiphi isinyathelo okufanele sisithathe mayelana naLowo okufanelekelayo ukubusa isintu? [Funda iHubo 2:12]
Kufanele simamukele ngemfudumalo (w04-ZU 7/15 19-20)
Ngisho namakhosi ayalwa ukuba azithobe kuye (IHu 2:10)
Funda okwengeziwe ngohulumeni kaNkulunkulu obuswa uKristu Jesu, futhi usize abanye ukuba benze oku-
fanayo
Thola izibusiso ezizolethwa maduzane uMbuso kaNkulunkulu osubusa kwamanje
(Namathela ohlakeni, ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe
okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-4, 116-19)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedUNGAKUJABULELA UKUPHILA OKUNOKUTHULA MANJE—NAPHAKADE!
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nakuba uveza izinkinga ezinkulu sonke esibhekene nazo, gcizelela ukuthi ukuthula kungatholakala ngisho kwa-
manje. Basize bonke baqonde ukuthi kunezimfuneko okumelwe sizifinyelele futhi sizilondoloze ukuze sijabulele
ukuphila okunokuthula manje naphakade
IZIGIDI AZIKUJABULELI UKUPHILA (4 imiz.)
Esikhundleni sokuthola injabulo ekuphileni, abantu abaningi ngokwandayo babhekene nobunzima, ukungalonde-
ki, futhi bayesaba (Jobe 14:1; w05-ZU 2/1 4)
Abaningi bahlala emazweni ahlushwa yizimpi nezinxushunxushu zezombangazwe (w04-ZU 1/1 3-5)
Amazwe amaningi asathuthuka akhungethwe yizinkinga zomnotho nokusweleka kokudla (w05-ZU 5/15 3;
g05-ZU 10/8 23-4 [g05 9/22 7-8])
Ngisho nasemazweni acebile, abantu bahlushwa ubugebengu, izinkinga zezidakamizwa, ubudlova nokuswe-
leka kwemisebenzi; izinkulungwane azinamakhaya (w05-ZU 10/15 8; g03-ZU 7/8 3-8)
Ubuphekula manje buntengantengisa amazwe futhi budala ukukhathazeka nokungalondeki okwengeziwe
(g01-ZU 5/22 3-10)
Abaningi ngokwandayo bakhathazwa ukungcoliswa kwendawo nezifo ezinjengengculaza (g05-ZU 2/22 28)
UKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWASUSWA EMHLABENI (4 miz.)
IZwi likaNkulunkulu labikezela izinkinga esibhekene nazo, kuhlanganise nokungabi khona kokuthula
Kusukela ngo-1914, bekulokhu kugcwaliseka isiprofetho esisencwadini yesAmbulo isahluko 6 [Funda ivesi 4]
(w05-ZU 9/1 19-20; w98-ZU 9/15 7; w93-ZU 3/1 4-5; re-ZU 93-4)
Abagibeli bamahhashi abalandela elinombala onjengomlilo baletha ukusweleka kokudla, izifo nokufa (IsAm
6:5-8; w05-ZU 2/15 32; re-ZU 95-8)
Omaye bayanda ngoba uSathane, ovalelwe emhlabeni, uyazi ukuthi unesikhathi esifushane (IsAm 12:7-9, 12)
Ukubusa kabi kwababusi bomhlaba abathonywa uSathane namademoni akhe, kunomthelela ekuntulekeni koku-
thula nokulondeka emhlabeni (g05-ZU 8/8 14-15 [g05 7/22 12-13])
Singalindela ukuba izinkinga ziqhubeke ziba zimbi naphezu kwemizamo yabantu abaqotho (IHu 146:2, 3)
Nakuba isimo sezwe sisibi, singaba nokuthula nenjabulo ngezinga elithile (IHu 146:5)
SINGAPHILA NGOKUTHULA KWAMANJE (5 imiz.)
UJehova unguNkulunkulu wokuthula (1Ko 14:33)
Kwamanje, uJehova ubusisa abantu bakhe ngokuthula (IHu 29:11; w05-ZU 1/1 6)
Phawula ezinye zezibonelo zendlela oFakazi BakaJehova abaphila ngayo ngokuthula
Kwa-Israyeli, oFakazi abangama-Arabhu nabangamaJuda bahlala futhi bakhulekela uNkulunkulu ngokuthu-
la, bebonisa uthando naphezu kokungezwani kwalezi zizwe (Joh 13:35; w97-ZU 8/1 16; w94-ZU 1/15 6)
Lapho kuqubuka ubudlova phakathi kwamaHutu namaTutsi eRwanda, oFakazi bazo zombili lezi zizwe balo-
ndoloza ubuhlobo obunokuthula (w98-ZU 4/1 18-19; w94-ZU 12/15 26, 29)
EMpumalanga Yurophu, izigidi ziye zahlupheka ngenxa yempi ebanga ukwahlukana, kodwa oFakazi Baka-
Jehova banobunye beqiniso (w96-ZU 3/1 28; g00-ZU 4/22 9-10; g93-ZU 12/22 6-13)
E-Ireland, amaKatolika namaProthestani asengoFakazi ayiqedile inzondo ayenayo futhi manje asebenzelana
ngokuthula (w99-ZU 12/15 9-13)
Akudingeki maphoyisa azolondoloza ukuthula emihlanganweni yesigodi yoFakazi (w02-ZU 7/15 25; g97-ZU
3/8 22-4)
Unyaka ngamunye izinkulungwane zabantu abathanda ukuthula zithola indlela yokuphila ngokuthula nange-
njabulo ezweni eligcwele izinkathazo (g02-ZU 5/8 9)
IZIMFUNEKO ZOKUJABULELA UKUPHILA OKUNOKUTHULA MANJE (14 imiz.)
Nawe likuvulekele ithuba lokuba nokuthula manje
Okokuqala, funda ngoJehova eZwini lakhe (Joh 17:3)
Yibe sewuhlakulela ubuhlobo obuseduze noJehova njengoba ufunda imiyalo yakhe futhi uyigcina (IzA 3:1, 2)
Zihlanganise nabantu abagcina imithetho kaNkulunkulu nababusiswa ngokuthula (IHu 119:165; Gal 5:22; Heb 10:
24, 25; w98-ZU 4/1 18-19)
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu kumelwe zikukhuthalele ukuphishekela ukuthula (1Pet 3:11)
Ukwenza kanjalo kuyoholela ekuphileni okujabulisa ngaphezu kwanoma yini izwe elingasinika yona (IzA 3:
13, 17, 18)
Lokho izwe elithi kuyinjabulo kusekelwe ekuhaheni, emhawini, ebugovwini ‘nasekuhlakanipheni kwasem-
hlabeni’ (Jak 3:14-16)
AmaKristu kumelwe enqabe ukuhlakanipha kwezwe futhi abonise ukuhlakanipha okuvela kuNkulunku-
lu, okuletha ukuthula (Jak 3:17, 18)
No. 171-ZU
1/08Njengoba izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zilondekile ngokomoya futhi zinokuthula okuvela kuye, azikhathazeki ka-
khulu ngezinkinga isintu esibhekene nazo (Math 6:31, 32)
Ziyasibona isidingo sokubeka izinto ezingokomoya kuqala ukuze zijabulele ukuthula kweqiniso (IHu 119:
36; Math 6:33)
Ungalokothi uyeke ukuphishekela ukuthula nokukujabulela
Phishekela ukuthula nabo bonke abantu ngokusemandleni akho (Ro 12:18)
Ukuze uqhubeke ujabulela ukuthula okuvela kuJehova, londoloza ubuhlobo obuhle naye ngokumlalela nango-
kukhuluma naye njalo ngomthandazo (IHu 119:93, 97; Fil 4:6, 7)
ITHEMBA LESIKHATHI ESIZAYO LOKUPHILA OKUNOKUTHULA—PHAKADE (3 imiz.)
Ukujabulela ukuphila okunokuthula akugcini manje kuphela
IBhayibheli linikeza labo abakhonza uJehova ithemba eliqinisekile lokuphila okuphelele nokuthula okunge-
nakulinganiswa esikhathini esizayo (IHu 37:10, 11; Isaya 9:7; 1Thim 4:8; 6:19)
Labo abathanda uNkulunkulu wokuthula futhi abakwazisayo ukuthula akunikezayo balindelwe yizibusiso ezi-
nkulu (IsAm 21:3, 4)
Thatha isinyathelo ngokushesha ukuze uthole izibusiso zokujabulela ukuphila okunokuthula manje naphakade
(IHu 37:37; Zef 2:3)
(Namathela ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imiBhalo okufa-
nele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-4, 116-19)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedKUNJANI UKUMA KWAKHO NONKULUNKULU?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone ukubaluleka kokufuna ukwamukelwa uJehova nokugwema ukuwela ogibeni lokwesaba aba-
ntu. Ngendlela ekhuthazayo nenemfudumalo, bonisa indlela esingazuza futhi silondoloze ngayo ukuma okuhle
noNkulunkulu
OKWENZA UKUMA KWETHU NONKULUNKULU KUBALULEKE KAKHULU (4 imiz.)
Ngamunye wethu kufanele akhathalele ukuma kwakhe noNkulunkulu
Sonke siyolandisa kuye (Ro 14:10b, 12)
Abazali bayolandisa ngendlela abakhulisa ngayo izingane zabo
Intsha iyolandisa ngezenzo zayo (UmSh 11:9)
Kumelwe silandise ngendlela esisebenzisa ngayo isikhathi, amandla nezinto zethu
Ukuze azuze futhi alondoloze ukuma okuhle noNkulunkulu, umuntu ngamunye kumelwe asebenzele ukwamu-
keleka kuYe
Kumelwe sifunde ukuthembela kuJehova, okuyothi uma samukeleka kuye sizuze phakade (IzA 3:5, 6; 29:25)
Nakuba siziqaphela izindinganiso namasiko omphakathi alawula izinto ezinjengokugqoka ngokufanele nesi-
milo esihle, asinqotshwa ukwesaba abantu futhi siyekethise lapho amasiko abantu engqubuzana nentando
kaNkulunkulu noma nezindinganiso zakhe (w05-ZU 1/1 30)
LINGISA LABO ABABENOKUMA OKUHLE NONKULUNKULU (21 imiz.)
Ngezikhathi zeBhayibheli, ‘ifu elikhulu lofakazi,’ amadoda nabesifazane, lalifuna ukwamukeleka kuNkulunku-
lu kunokwamukeleka kubantu (Heb 12:1)
Lalondoloza ukuma okuhle naye ngokubonisa ukholo (Heb 11:1, 2)
Nanamuhla kunezibonelo eziningi zamadoda nabesifazane abangamaKristu abaye benza okufanayo
Ake ucabangele izibonelo zesikhathi esidlule nezanamuhla
U-Abela wayefuna ukukhulekela uJehova ngendlela eyamukelekayo futhi amukeleke kuye nakuba abazali ba-
khe base bemhlubukile uNkulunkulu (Gen 4:3, 4; Heb 11:4; it-1 15)
Ngokufanayo nanamuhla, uJehova uye wamukela abaningi abasemikhayeni engakholwa ngenxa yobuqotho
babo ekukhulekeleni kweqiniso (w03-ZU 12/1 25; w99-ZU 2/1 8; yb04-ZU 50; yb98-ZU 99-100)
Uma abomndeni bekuphikisa ngenxa yokuphishekela ukukhulekela kweqiniso, qiniseka ukuthi uNkulunku-
lu uyakuqaphela ukukhuthazela kwakho ngokwethembeka (Math 10:34-39)
U-Enoke ‘wahamba noNkulunkulu,’ futhi nakuba ayeshushiswa, wabeka isibonelo sokumemezela izahlulelo zi-
kaJehova ngesibindi kubantu abangamhloniphi uNkulunkulu (Gen 5:22, 24; Heb 11:5; Jude 14, 15; it-1 729)
Izinceku zikaJehova zanamuhla ziye zamemezela izahlulelo zakhe ngokungesabi naphezu kwezinsongo nobu-
dlova (w01-ZU 9/1 26; yb01-ZU 115-117; yb94 194)
Ezindaweni eziningi lapho kwakudlange khona ushushiso, manje sekunamabandla achumayo (jv-ZU 666-
668, 700-701)
Ngokusobala, uJehova uyabamukela labo abaqhubeka beshumayela “izindaba ezinhle zombuso” nakuba ‘beyi-
zinto zokuzondwa yizizwe zonke’ (Math 24:9, 14)
U-Abrahama noSara babonisa ukholo lwabo ngokushiya umuzi wakubo i-Uri, nakuba lokhu ngokusobala kwa-
kuhilela ukudela izinto eziningi ezibonakalayo (Gen 12:1-3; Heb 11:8-10; it-2 1141-1142)
OFakazi abaningi namuhla baye babonisa ukholo olufanayo ngokudela izinto ezibonakalayo ukuze babe usizo
ngokwengeziwe enkonzweni kaJehova (w97-ZU 9/15 7; w92-ZU 9/15 27; yb03-ZU 251-2; jv-ZU 284-286)
UNkulunkulu uyakujabulela ukuzidela okunjalo (Mar 10:29, 30)
UMose wayefundile, ‘enamandla ngamazwi nangezenzo zakhe,’ kodwa wakwenqaba ukuvelela kwezwe nengce-
bo yalo, efuna ukwamukelwa uNkulunkulu kunokwamukelwa abantu (IzE 7:20-22; Heb 11:23-26; it-2 434)
Ngokombono wezwe, abantu bebeyothi akazange akhethe ngokuhlakanipha, kodwa uJehova wavuza uMose
ngokumenza umholi wesizwe sakwa-Israyeli (Heb 11:6)
Phakathi kwabantu bakaJehova namuhla kunabaningi abaye benqaba ukuvelela ezweni futhi bakhetha uku-
ngaphishekeli indlela yokuphila egxile ezintweni ezibonakalayo (w05-ZU 10/1 28-31; w92-ZU 11/1 18-20)
UJehova uyababusisa labo ababeka izithakazelo zoMbuso kuqala ekuphileni kwabo (Math 6:33; w94-ZU 1/15 23)
URahabi wabeka ukuphila kwakhe engozini ukuze avikele izinceku zikaJehova ngoba wayefuna ukuba yena
nomkhaya wakubo bamukeleke kuYe (Josh 2:9-13; Heb 11:31; it-2 727-728)
Abesifazane abangamaKristu abanesibindi ezikhathini zanamuhla nabo baye bafaka ukuphila kwabo engozi-
ni ukuze baqhubekisele phambili izithakazelo zoMbuso (yb94 232, 235)
Kungase kungadingeki ukuba sonke sifake ukuphila kwethu engozini ngenxa yabafowethu, kodwa kumelwe
sibonise uthando lokuzidela ukuze silondoloze ukuma okuhle noNkulunkulu (Joh 13:34, 35; 1Joh 4:20, 21)
No. 172-ZU
5/08THATHA ISINYATHELO MANJE UKUZE UZUZE UKUMA OKUHLE NONKULUNKULU (5 imiz.)
Ngenxa yesono, abantu bazalwa behlukanisiwe noNkulunkulu (IHu 51:5; Efe 4:18; Kol 1:21)
Ngesisekelo somhlatshelo kaKristu, bangakwazi ukubuyisana noJehova futhi babe nokuma okuhle naye (Joh
3:36; 14:6)
‘Abesixuku esikhulu’ bayazuza esihlengweni futhi bachazwa ‘njengabagqoke izembatho ezimhlophe,’ oku-
fanekisela ukuma okuhle phambi kukaNkulunkulu (IsAm 7:9, 10)
Njengabantu bamandulo abathembekile, laba bayobe bebonise ukholo lwabo ngokumemezela isigijimi so-
Mbuso ngentshiseko
Ingabe uyoba ngomunye wabo?
Hlola isimo sakho esingokomoya futhi wenze ushintsho oludingekayo
Uma usafundelwa, funda ukuthi yini okumelwe uyenze ukuze usindiswe—kungakephuzi kakhulu (Zef 2:2, 3;
Ro 10:13)
Manje yisikhathi esifanele sokubonisa ukuthi uyakukhathalela ukuma kwakho noNkulunkulu
Ukwephuza ukuthatha isinyathelo kungakulahlekisela lukhulu (2Ko 6:1, 2)
Thatha isinyathelo manje ukuze uzuze ukuma okuhle noNkulunkulu!
(Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedINGABE KUNENKOLO EYODWA YEQINISO
NGOKOMBONO KANKULUNKULU?
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Bonisa indlela izimo zengqondo zabantu ezithonywa ngayo ngokujulile izimfundiso zabo ezingokwenkolo. Na-
kuba ukhuluma ngenhlonipho ngabantu abanamathela ezinkolelweni ezihlukahlukene, qhathanisa izimo ze-
ngqondo ezizondwa uJehova nezimo zengqondo azithandayo
KUNGANI KUNGEZONA ZONKE IZINKOLO UNKULUNKULU AZAMUKELAYO? (4 imiz.)
Iningi labantu lilandela inkolo yabazali futhi liyamukela ngendlela elamukela ngayo ubuzwe balo; abanye bathi
inkolo ihlobene nobuzwe
Abanye balandela umbono wabo lapho bekhetha indlela yokukhulekela
Ngokwenhlolovo yamuva nje, abantu abangamaphesenti angu-86 emhlabeni wonke bathi basenkolweni ethile
(w08-ZU 6/1 9)
Bangamalungu ezinkolo ezinkulu ezingu-19
Kunamasonto angu-37 000 athi angawobuKristu
Kodwa ingabe zonke izinkolelo eziphikisanayo zingaba iqiniso?
Kunokuba lifundise ukuthi zonke izinkolo ziyamukeleka kuNkulunkulu, iBhayibheli libonisa ngokucacile uku-
thi kunokukhulekela angakwamukeli (AbaHl 10:6, 7; Mar 7:6, 7; 1Ko 10:20; rs-ZU 99-101)
ImiBhalo ibonisa ukuthi okunye ukukhulekela kuyize nokuthi kunohlobo lokukhulekela olwamukelwa uNku-
lunkulu [Funda uJakobe 1:26, 27]
Indlela abantu abaphathana ngayo ibaluleke kakhulu kuNkulunkulu
Esikukholelwayo kunethonya elikhulu ezenzweni zethu
INJONGO YENKOLO YEQINISO (4 imiz.)
Injongo eyinhloko yenkolo yeqiniso iwukudumisa nokulalela uNkulunkulu (UmSh 12:13; IsAm 4:11)
UJehova uNkulunkulu uyakufanelekela ukuba simdumise; indalo nemiBhalo Engcwele yembula izimfanelo zi-
kaNkulunkulu ezimangalisayo (Joh 3:16; Ro 1:20)
Injongo yesibili yenkolo yeqiniso iwukuqondisa abantu endleleni engcono kakhulu yokuphila (Isaya 48:17, 18)
[Funda uMika 6:8]
Abanye bacabanga ukuthi empeleni zonke izinkolo zinomgomo ofanayo, okungukuthi, ukukholelwa kuNkulu-
nkulu nokwenza okuhle
Nokho, umphumela inkolo eba nawo kubalandeli bayo ungaba isisekelo sokubona ukuthi ngokombono kaNku-
lunkulu ingeyeqiniso yini noma cha
UKUHLOLA IMIPHUMELA YEZIMFUNDISO ZENKOLO (11 imiz.)
Kunokuhlobana okuqondile phakathi kwalokho esikukholelwayo nalokho esiba yikho noma esikwenzayo [Fu-
nda uMathewu 7:16-20] (g95-ZU 7/8 26-27)
Ngokwesibonelo, inzondo, ukudakwa, ukuziphatha okubi ngokobulili neminye imikhuba emibi kwakuvamile
konkulunkulu basendulo baseGrisi naseRoma (it-1 978-979)
Umlando ubonisa ukuthi abakhulekeli abaningi bonkulunkulu abanjalo babethola injabulo ekuzitikeni ngo-
kuziphatha okubi nasekubukeleni abantu belwa nezilwane kuze kufe ofayo eshashalazini (w02-ZU 6/15 28;
w82-ZU 6/15 4-5 [w81 11/1 4-5]; g97-ZU 11/8 26-27)
Labo abakholelwa ukuthi uhlanga lwabo lungcono baye benza izinto ezihlasimulisayo ezicindezela abanye aba-
ntu (g98-ZU 3/8 24; g93-ZU 8/22 6-8)
Umbono wabantu ngokufa unethonya elikhulu ekuphileni kwabo
Abaningi abangenalo ithemba lovuko bagxila ekutholeni injabulo noma izinto ezibonakalayo eziningi nga-
ngokunokwenzeka kulokhu kuphila (1Ko 15:32)
Abakholelwa ekudalelweni abacabangi kangako ngezenzo zabo ngoba banomuzwa wokuthi konke okwenze-
kayo kunqunyelwe kusengaphambili (w96-ZU 9/1 6)
Ukukholelwa ukuthi imimoya yabafileyo ingalimaza noma isize abaphilayo kwenza abantu ukuba benze izi-
nto ezisekelwe ekukholelweni ezeni ezibangela ubunzima nezingamjabulisi uNkulunkulu (w05-ZU 1/1 29-30;
w98-ZU 7/15 21)
Abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyolethwa ukubusa kwabantu
Abantu abacabanga kanjalo balishaya indiva iqiniso lokuthi isici esibalulekile ‘sokukhulekela okuhlanzekile
nokungangcolile’ siwukuhlala singenabala kuleli zwe (Jak 1:27)
Ngaphezu kwalokho, imibono ehlukahlukene kwezombusazwe ibangela ukwahlukana nenzondo
Abantu abaqapheli ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uwuhulumeni wasezulwini ongokoqobo oyobusa wonke um-
hlaba (Dan 2:44; Math 6:10)
Kumelwe sihlole inkolo ngezithelo zayo; uma inkolo ivumela noma ikhuthaza imikhuba elahlwa iBhayibheli,
ingabe iyahlangabezana nezindinganiso zikaNkulunkulu?
Kubalulekile ukuba siphendule lo mbuzo, hhayi ngombono wethu kodwa ngombono kaNkulunkulu
No. 173-ZU
9/08YIBA SENKOLWENI ENGEYEQINISO NGOKOMBONO KANKULUNKULU (11 imiz.)
Ukuphila ngendlela ejabulisa uNkulunkulu kuhlobene nokuba nolwazi olunembile ngaye (Thit 1:1) [Funda eya-
baseKolose 3:10]
Ngakho, inkolo yeqiniso ngokombono kaNkulunkulu kumelwe isekelwe eqinisweni elitholakala emiBhalweni
Engcwele (Joh 8:32; 17:17)
Inkolo yeqiniso iyokhiqiza abantu abenza intando kaNkulunkulu nababonisa ukuhlakanipha kwaphezulu [Fu-
nda uJakobe 3:17, 18]
Kumelwe yenze abantu ukuba bathandane (Joh 13:34, 35; 1Joh 3:10)
Abantu abasenkolweni engeyeqiniso ngokombono kaNkulunkulu badumisa igama lakhe futhi bashumayela ngo-
Mbuso wakhe (IHu 83:18; Math 24:14)
Babonakala kalula ngemisebenzi yabo yokholo
Inkolo yeqiniso ikhuthaza bonke abantu ukuba bahlole imiBhalo futhi bazitholele ngokwabo intando kaNkulu-
nkulu epheleleyo (Ro 12:2)
Lokhu kungenziwa ngokufunda okufundiswa iBhayibheli (Joh 17:3)
Vumela izimfundiso zeBhayibheli ziveze kuwe izithelo ezinhle (1Thes 2:13)
Zihlolele ubufakazi futhi ‘ukhulekele ngendlela ehlanzekile nengangcolile ngokombono kaNkulunkulu noBaba
wethu’
(Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe)

All Rights ReservedUBANI OYOFANELEKELA UKUNGENA EZWENI
ELISHA LIKANKULUNKULU?
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Ngendlela ekhuthazayo kodwa enengqondo, siza izilaleli ukuba zisibone isidingo sezwe elisha likaNkulunkulu
nokuthi kungani lingeke lilethwe abantu. Cacisa ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyabusa njengamanje. Qoko-
misa izinzuzo oyoziletha nalokho okudingekayo ukuze sifanelekele ukungena ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu. Si-
cela usebenzise inkulumo ethi “izwe elisha,” hhayi ethi “uhlelo olusha”
SIYALIDINGA IZWE ELISHA! (5 imiz.)
Emhlabeni wonke, abantu baphila ngosizi nangokwesaba (w06-ZU 9/15 4-6; w03-ZU 6/1 13; g05-ZU 8/8 4-7;
g03-ZU 7/8 3-4)
Naphezu kwezingxoxo nokukhathazeka kwabantu abaningi, izinkinga zomhlaba eziyinqaba ziyaqhubeka
Ingabe singalindela ukuba abantu abangaphelele balethe izwe elisha?
Ohulumeni babantu sebebuse izinkulungwane zeminyaka
Luba khona ushintsho ezintweni ezithile, kodwa ababusi bomhlaba abanawo amandla okuxazulula izinki-
nga zomhlaba ezinkulu nokwanelisa izidingo zesintu eziphuthumayo
Zonke izinhlobo zohulumeni ziye zahluleka ukwanelisa izifiso zesintu (UmSh 8:9, g90-ZU 12/8 23)
ISINTU KUMELWE SITHEMBELE KUJEHOVA UKUBA ALETHE IZWE ELISHA (10 imiz.)
UJehova uNkulunkulu uthembise izwe elisha (2Pet 3:13)
UMbuso uyosigcwalisa lesi sithembiso sikaNkulunkulu (Math 6:10; IsAm 11:15)
UJehova usinikeze lokho esikudingayo ukuze sithembele eMbusweni wakhe (g06-ZU 11 8; bh-ZU 77-9)
Uye wabonisa izimfanelo zakhe ezimangalisayo lapho esebenzelana nesintu
Izimiso okusekelwe kuzo uhulumeni wakhe zicacisiwe
Simazi kahle uMesiya, iNkosi ebusayo (w06-ZU 2/15 5-7)
Kubalulekile ukuba sithembele kuJehova futhi silandele isiqondiso sakhe (IzA 3:5, 6)
UJesu unendima ebalulekile ekulethweni kwezwe elingcono (g06-ZU 12 5-9)
Ukufa kwakhe kwasusa isithiyo esikhulu sokungena ezweni elisha, kwenza kwenzeka ukuba kususwe isono
esazuzwa ngefa nokuba sithole ukuphila okuphakade (Joh 3:16)
UKristu waqala ukubusa njengeNkosi yasezulwini ngo-1914 (IHu 110:1, 2; Dan 7:13, 14)
Maduze uMbuso uzobhubhisa bonke ohulumeni babantu (Dan 2:44)
Ngemva kwalokho, bonke abakhileyo emhlabeni bayoba ngaphansi kokubusa kukaJesu okulungile (IHu
72:7, 8, 11; g06-ZU 12 4)
Amadoda amiswe ngomoya aqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wokwengamela (Isaya 32:1, 2)
UKUFANELEKELA UKUPHILA EZWENI ELISHA LIKANKULUNKULU (12 imiz.)
UJehova ubeka izindinganiso zokungena ezweni elisha (IHu 15:1-5; 24:3, 4; Isaya 35:8)
Ngabantu abanokuthula kuphela abayohlala kulo (Mika 4:2)
Ukuhlanzeka ngokokuziphatha nokuhlonipha ilungiselelo lomshado yizinto ezibalulekile ukuze umuntu ange-
ne ezweni elisha (Efe 5:3-5; Heb 13:4)
Ezweni elisha kuyoba nomphakathi ochichima uthando (Joh 13:34, 35)
Ngeke ibe khona indawo yabantu abangamhloniphi uNkulunkulu, abanobugovu noma abathanda izinto ezi-
bonakalayo (Thit 2:11, 12)
OFakazi BakaJehova banedumela lokuziphatha kahle
Ubufakazi obuqand’ ikhanda bubonisa ukuthi oFakazi baye bathuthuka ngempela ekuhlakuleleni “ubuntu obu-
sha” (Kol 3:8-10; w04-ZU 10/1 13; w02-ZU 11/1 17; w02-ZU 10/1 11; w02-ZU 1/15 19-20)
Kakade sebephila ngezindinganiso zokuziphatha eziyovama ezweni elisha
Manje kwenziwa umsebenzi wokushumayela emhlabeni wonke ukuze kusizwe abanye ukuba babe nethemba lo-
kuphila ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu (Math 24:14)
Abantu kumelwe basizwe ukuba babone ukuthi ulwazi oluphathelene nezwe elisha elizayo lutholakala ngo-
mzila owodwa kuphela (Math 24:45-47)
Kubalulekile ukuba sizivumelanise nezindinganiso zeBhayibheli, sibambisane “nenceku ethembekileyo ne-
qondayo” futhi sihlanganyele emsebenzini wokushumayela ngoMbuso
Kudingeka sithathe isinyathelo esiwujuqu, ngoba “izinsuku zokugcina” sezifinyelela esiphelweni sazo (2Thim 3:1)
UJehova ubonisa ukubekezela okukhulu
Manje akusona isikhathi sokunganaki noma sokuba manqikanqika (2Pet 3:9, 11, 14)
Thatha isinyathelo manje ukuze usinde “osizini olukhulu” (IsAm 7:9, 14)
No. 174-ZU
11/08LABO ABAFANELEKAYO BAYONGENA EZWENI ELISHA LIKANKULUNKULU (3 imiz.)
Izwe elisha liyobuyisela iPharadesi emhlabeni wonke
Izimpi ziyoba yinto yesikhathi esidlule (IHu 46:9)
Ngeke ibe khona indlala (Isaya 25:6)
Ngabantu abalungile nabangasoleki kuphela abayohlala emhlabeni (IzA 2:21, 22)
Umphakathi wezwe elisha owenziwe waphelela uyohlala kuze kube phakade (IHu 37:11, 29)
Thatha isinyathelo manje ukuze ubalwe phakathi kwesixuku esikhulu sabayosinda futhi unakekelwe uJehova
ezweni lakhe elisha
(Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe)
No. 174-ZU—ikhasi 2

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedYINI EPHAWULA IBHAYIBHELI NJENGELINEMBILE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Le nkulumo kufanele iqinise ukholo lwabafowethu, ikhuthaze abasanda kuhlanganyela futhi yakhe ukholo lwa-
bo. Kufanele ibaqinisekise ngokwengeziwe ukuthi iBhayibheli liyiZwi likaNkulunkulu leqiniso eliphefumulelwe
okumelwe liqondise izinyathelo zethu kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ezibucayi
AMAKRISTU EQINISO ANGABASEKELI ABAPHAMBILI BOKUNEMBA KWEBHAYIBHELI (5 imiz.)
Namuhla, abantu abanethonya basemkhankasweni wokuligxibha (gm 31-35)
Abacusumbuli, abefundisi banamuhla, abakholelwa ekuziphendukeleni kwemvelo, nezazi zefilosofi bahlasela
ukunemba kwalo futhi baqamba izimfundiso ezithile ukuze zithathe isikhundla sokukholelwa eBhayibheli-
ni, baze bathi asikho kwasidingo sokukholelwa kuNkulunkulu
Ukuziphatha okuhlambalaza uNkulunkulu kwamaKristu okuzisholo kuye kwahlambalaza iBhayibheli ngapha-
kathi nangaphandle kweLobukholwa (Ro 2:21-24; w05 9/1 30-31)
OFakazi BakaJehova bamemezela ngesibindi ukuthi iBhayibheli liyiZwi likaNkulunkulu elinembile, eliphefumu-
lelwe, nelingenaphutha
Izimfundiso zabo nenhlangano yabo kusekelwe ngokuphelele eBhayibhelini
Balibheka njengelingaphezulu kakhulu kwencwadi yobuciko obukhulu
Kubona, iBhayibheli liyingqayizivele, liyincwadi evelele nenenzuzo kunazo zonke
UJesu Kristu wasekela iZwi likaNkulunkulu njengeliyiqiniso futhi walisebenzisa ukuze anqobe ukulingwa (Math
4:4; Joh 17:17)
Njengabalandeli bakhe, kumelwe siyisebenzise futhi siyibheke ngendlela efanayo imiBhalo
Sazi kokuhlangenwe nakho ukuthi iBhayibheli liwukuphela kwesiqondiso esinokwethenjelwa sokwazi noku-
thokozisa uNkulunkulu (IHu 119:105)
Linikeza isisekelo esihle sokholo (1Pet 3:15)
Sinobufakazi obunamandla bokuthi iBhayibheli liyiZwi likaNkulunkulu elinembile neliphefumulelwe
BUNINGI UBUFAKAZI OBUNGENAKUPHIKWA BOKUTHI IBHAYIBHELI LINEMBILE (20 imiz.)
Ubufakazi bokuthi linembile bubonakala kwelikuqukethe, esimweni sengqondo sabalobi balo, nakwezinye izici
Ukwethembeka kwabalobi beBhayibheli kuwubufakazi obunamandla bokunemba kwalo (w05 5/15 18; w05
7/15 6; si 341; it-1-E 312)
Ubuqotho beBhayibheli bufakazelwa abalobi balo namaKristu okuqala afakazela amaqiniso, azi ukuthi aye-
ngase abulawe ngenxa yobufakazi bawo (si 342; it-1-E 312)
Ukuvumelana kwalo kungobunye ubufakazi bokuthi iBhayibheli linembile futhi liphefumulelwe
IBhayibheli liyavumelana nakuba labhalwa abantu abangaba ngu-40 phakathi neminyaka engu-1 600 (si 341)
Linesihloko esisodwa lilonke—ukungcweliswa kwegama likaJehova ngoMbuso wakhe ngaphansi kukaKri-
stu (si 342; it-1-E 310-311)
Ukusebenziseka kwezimiso zokulunga nezindinganiso zokuziphatha zeBhayibheli kufakazela ukuthi liphefu-
mulelwe uNkulunkulu (w05 7/15 5; si 340; it-1-E 312)
Ukunemba kokulandisa kweBhayibheli, kuhlanganise nokulandisa ngokuma kwezwe, ukwakheka komhlaba,
ukulandelana kwezenzakalo, kusekela ukunemba kwalo (si 339-341)
Nakuba iBhayibheli lingeyona incwadi yesayensi, linembile uma kuziwa ezindabeni zesayensi (w05 7/15 5;
si 340; it-1-E 312)
Ukunemba ngokomlando kwezincwadi zemiBhalo yesiHebheru neyesiGreki kuye kwaqinisekiswa (g01 3/8
8 -11; si 338-9; it-1-E 153-154, 311-312)
Iziprofetho ezigcwalisekile ziwubufakazi obunamandla kunabo bonke bokuthi iBhayibheli linembile
Iziprofetho eziphawulekayo yilezo eziqondene noJesu nokugcwaliseka kwazo (si 343-344) [Khetha ezimbalwa,
njengeziphathelene nokuzalwa, inkonzo, ukufa nokuvuswa kwakhe, ukhulume ngesiprofetho nangokugcwa-
liseka kwaso]
Iziprofetho ezagcwaliseka maqondana nezizwe zasendulo nezimo ezikhona manje ziqinisa ukulethemba kwe-
thu iBhayibheli njengeZwi likaNkulunkulu (si 344-346) [Sebenzisa izibonelo ezilandelayo kanye nezinye kuye
ngesikhathi]
Ukuwa nokuqothulwa kweBhabhiloni (Isaya 13:17-22; 45:1, 2; Dan 5:22-31; gm 122-125)
Ukwakhiwa kabusha kweJerusalema nethempeli ngamaJuda abuya ekuthunjweni (2Kro 36:22, 23; Ezra 1:
1-4; Isaya 44:26-28)
Ukulandelana kwemibuso yezwe (Dan 8:1-8, 20-22; gm 125-128)
Inkathi enkulu yezinkinga ngaphambi kokubhujiswa okuphelele kwalesi simiso sezinto (Math 24:7-14; 2Thim
3:1-5; gm 136-148)
No. 175-ZU
5/09LINAKE IZWI LIKANKULUNKULU ELINEMBILE (5 imiz.)
Iseluleko nemfundiso yeBhayibheli kuyazuzisa futhi kuyavuza (2Thim 3:16, 17)
Mazi uMlobi weBhayibheli ngokungenisa ulwazi olunika ukuphila ngaye nangeNdodana yakhe (Joh 17:3)
Lalela iseluleko seBhayibheli, siyokwenza uhlakaniphe (IHu 19:7b; IzA 2:6; 2Thim 3:15)
Iziprofetho zeBhayibheli zibonisa ukuthi njengoba ukuphela kwaleli zwe kusondela, isikhathi sokuthatha isinya-
thelo siyaphela (1Ko 7:29; w04 2/1 21-22; bh 86-95; wt 175-183)
Sikumema ukuba ufunde iBhayibheli kanye nathi, ‘ukuze uzitholele ngokwakho okuyintando kaNkulunkulu
enhle neyamukelekayo nepheleleyo’ (Ro 12:2)
Ngokuba nokholo ezindabeni ezinhle, uyozuza manje nasesikhathini esizayo (Isaya 48:17; Heb 10:38, 39)
Ukulalela iseluleko seBhayibheli kunikeza ithemba eliqinisekile lezibusiso esiyozithola ezweni elisha likaNkulu-
nkulu (2Pet 3:13)
(Akuyona yonke imibhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe)
No. 175-ZU—ikhasi 2

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedUKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA
—KUYOTHOLAKALA NINI?
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Nakuba uvuma ukuthi abaningi balwela ngobuqotho ukufinyelela ukuthula, chaza ukuthi kungani uku-
thula emhlabeni wonke kuyolethwa uMbuso kaNkulunkulu kuphela nokuthi kungani ukuthula kweqini-
so kuhilela okungaphezu kokungabi khona kwezimpi. Usebenzisa imiBhalo, basize bonke ukuba babone
ukuthi ukuthula nokulondeka kwangempela kuseduze. Lapho ukhulumela eyoku-1 Thesalonika 5:2, 3,
gwema ukusho noma iziphi izinto eziwukuqagela. Siza unamathele kakhulu kulokho okushiwo ohlakeni
OKWENZA KUBE NZIMA KAKHULU UKUTHOLA UKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA (3 imiz.)
Sekungamakhulu eminyaka abantu befuna ukuthula nokulondeka
Zimbalwa futhi zimfushane izikhathi lapho izizwe ezingomakhelwane ziye zakwazi khona ukuhlalisana ngo-
kuthula
Abaziqondi izizathu zangempela ezenza ukuthula nokulondeka kungabi khona kuleli zwe
IZwi likaNkulunkulu linikeza izizathu ezimbili eziyisisekelo ezenza kube nzima ukufinyelela ukuthula kwange-
mpela
(1) Isintu asinakho ukuthula noNkulunkulu, uMthombo wothando nokuthula (2Kor 13:11; w97 1/15 12)
(2) Izwe libuswa uSathane, umthombo wenzondo nempi (Joh 12:31; w90 4/1 6)
Ake sixoxe ngalezi zizathu
UKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA KUNCIKE EKUBENI NOKUTHULA NONKULUNKULU
(5 imiz.)
Umuntu wayedalelwe ukuba athembele kuJehova futhi alalele imithetho yakhe (Jer 10:23)
Lapho u-Adamu ehlubuka kuNkulunkulu, walahlekelwa ubuhlobo obunokuthula ayenabo noNkulunkulu
(Roma 5:12)
Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi, umlando wabantu uye wagcwala inzondo, izimpi nokungayilaleli imithetho ka-
Nkulunkulu
Namuhla, abantu bangase bathi ukuthula nokulondeka kuwukungabi khona kwempi, ukuvikelwa amaphoyisa
nokuhlala ezakhiweni ezinezimiso eziqinile zokulondeka
Lezi zimo azisho ukuthula nokulondeka kweqiniso
Ukuze siphinde sibe nokuthula noNkulunkulu, kumelwe siqaphele isidingo sethu esingokomoya futhi sizithobe
emithethweni yakhe (Math 5:3; Isaya 48:18)
Ukuze sibe nokuthula nokulondeka, kudingeka sithande uNkulunkulu futhi sizihloniphe ngokujulile izimiso
zakhe zokulunga (Isaya 57:21; w99 10/1 11)
UKUSUSWA KUKASATHANE KUCABA INDLELA YOKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA
(13 imiz.)
Namuhla, uSathane uselithonye kakhulu izwe (1Joh 5:19)
Ngemva nje kokuba uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uqale ukubusa ezulwini ngo-1914, uSathane waphonswa emhla-
beni (IsAm 12:9; w06 3/15 13)
Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi, uSathane uye waqinisa imizamo yakhe yokudukisa abantu, futhi kuye kwanda
inzondo, izimpi nabanye omaye (IsAm 12:12)
Ithonya elibi likaSathane elinamandla lenza ukuba yonke imizamo yabantu yokuletha ukuthula ingaphume-
leli (w85 10/15 5)
UJehova uyasiqinisekisa ngokuthi injongo yakhe yokuletha ukuthula okungapheli emhlabeni ayikashintshi (IHu
37:9, 11)
Uyokuletha ngoJesu, “iSikhulu sokuthula” (Isaya 9:6, 7)
Sesifinyelele esikhathini lapho kuzokwenzeka khona izenzakalo ezibalulekile nezizamazamisa umhlaba ezapro-
fethwa eBhayibhelini (Dan 2:33-35, 41-45; dp 57-62)
Esinye isenzakalo okusamelwe senzeke sibikezelwe kweyoku-1 Thesalonika 5:2, 3 [Funda]
Isimemezelo ‘sokuthula nokulondeka’ singase sibe isenzakalo esisodwa noma uchungechunge lwezenzaka-
lo ezihilela abaholi bezombusazwe
Cishe, abaholi benkolo bayohlanganyela kulesi simemezelo (Jer 6:14)
Ngokuphathelene nokugcwaliseka ngokugcwele kwalesi siprofetho, kuwukuhlakanipha ukulinda futhi si-
bone ngalokho okuzokwenzeka emhlabeni
IZwi likaNkulunkulu lisiqinisekisa ngokuthi inkolo yamanga izohlaselwa futhi ibhujiswe ‘isilo sasendle esine-
zimpondo eziyishumi’ (IsAm 17:15, 16; re 255-258)
Abantu abaningi banomuzwa wokuthi inkolo iyisithiyo emizamweni yabo yokuletha ukuthula
Ngemva kokubhujiswa kwenkolo yamanga, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyochoboza yonke imibuso yabantu
e-Armagedoni (Dan 2:44; IsAm 16:16; 19:19-21; w90 5/15 6-7)
Ngemva kwalokho, uSathane uDeveli uyosuswa, bese kuqala iminyaka eyinkulungwane yokuthula no-
kulondeka kwangempela (IsAm 20:1-3)
No. 176-ZU
8/09IZICI EZININGI ZOKUTHULA NOKULONDEKA KWANGEMPELA (5 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu uthembisa labo abayobe bephila emhlabeni ngemva kokususwa kukaSathane ukuthi bayoba no-
kuthula nokulondeka
Ukuthula phakathi kwabantu kanye nezilwane zasendle (Isaya 11:6-9)
IPharadesi (Isa 35:1)
Wonke umuntu uyoba nempilo enhle nenala yokudla (IHu 72:16; Isaya 33:24)
Umsebenzi owanelisayo (Isaya 65:21-23)
Ukufa nosizi ngeke kusaba khona (IsAm 21:4)
THATHA ISINYATHELO MANJE, UFUNDE NGENDLELA ONGAZUZA NGAYO! (4 imiz.)
UMika uchaza indlela uJehova akuletha ngayo ukuthula nokulondeka [Funda uMika 4:3, 4] (w07 11/1 15)
Izinceku zikaJehova namuhla seziphila ngokuvumelana nezimfuneko zakhe ‘ngokungasayifundi impi’ nango-
kuhlalisana ngokuthula (Isaya 32:17)
Nawe ungaba nokuthula nokulondeka
Zuza ulwazi ngoJehova, futhi uhlakulele ubuhlobo obuseduze naye (Joh 17:3; Jak 4:7, 8)
Ukutadisha iBhayibheli noFakazi BakaJehova kuyokusiza ukuba wenze lokho
Ngokulalela imithetho kaNkulunkulu, uyoba nokuthula noJehova uNkulunkulu kanye nabanye abantu, ngi-
sho noma usahlala kuleli zwe elineziyaluyalu (IHu 119:165; 2Pet 3:14)
Maduze kuzoba nokuthula nokulondeka okuhlala njalo emhlabeni wonke
Manje isikhathi sokuba uthembele ngokuphelele kuJehova! (IzA 3:5, 6)
(Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okudingeka ifundwe)
No. 176-ZU—ikhasi 2
 ̆ 2009 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedUNGALUTHOLAPHI USIZO EZIKHATHINI ZOKUCINDEZELEKA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Njengoba uchaza isisekelo esiqinile sokukholelwa ukuthi uJehova ukulungele ukusisiza kuzo zonke izingcinde-
zi zethu, khuluma ngendlela ebonisa ukuzwelana nalabo ababhekene nobunzima
SIPHILA EZIKHATHINI ZOKUCINDEZELEKA (4 imiz.)
IBhayibheli labikezela ukuthi izinsuku zokugcina zaziyoba nezingcindezi eziningi (Mar 13:8)
Ngempela, siphila ‘ezikhathini ezibucayi okunzima ukubhekana nazo’ (2Thim 3:1-5)
Kodwa emhlabeni wonke oFakazi BakaJehova baziwa njengabantu abajabule
AmaKristu athembekile akwazi kanjani ukulondoloza injabulo lapho ebhekene nokuphikiswa noshushiso
olunzima ngenxa yokholo lwawo nalapho ebhekene nokucindezela kwezinkinga zomkhaya, ukugula, ubu-
nzima kwezomnotho nokufelwa abantu abathandayo? (2Thim 3:12)
Lo mbuzo ubalulekile ngoba ukudangaliswa izilingo kunganciphisa ukuzimisela kwethu ukukhuthazela
kuze kube sekupheleni (IzA 24:10)
Ake sixoxe ngendlela esingabhekana ngayo nezimo ezicindezelayo futhi sihlale sithembele kuJehova, “inqaba
[yethu] ngesikhathi sokucindezeleka” (IHu 37:39)
YINI EYOSISIZA NGEZIKHATHI ZOKUCINDEZELEKA? (18 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu wethu onothando, uJehova, uye wasilungiselela indlela esingabhekana ngayo nezinkinga zethu
(IHu 55:22; 1Joh 4:8)
Ngakho, kubalulekile ukuphendukela kuJehova ngomthandazo (1Sam 30:6; Ro 15:5; 2Ko 1:3, 4)
ImiBhalo inemithandazo eminingi eyenziwa abantu abathile lapho becindezelekile (1Sam 1:4-20; IHu 42:6, 8)
Uma ukucindezeleka kukukhulu kuze kube nzima nokuthandaza, khumbula amazwi eHubo 34:18 [Funda]
Umoya ongcwele ungasisiza ukuba sibhekane nokucindezeleka
UJesu wathembisa abafundi bakhe ukuthi umoya ongcwele wawuzoba njengomsizi, noma umduduzi, kuze
kube phakade (Joh 14:16)
NjengamaKristu ekhulu lokuqala, singathembela emoyeni kaNkulunkulu ukuthi uyosinika isibindi (IzE 4:31;
1Thes 2:2)
UJehova angase asebenzise amanye amaKristu ukuba asisize futhi adambise ukukhathazeka esinakho (IzA 17:17)
Lapho uPawulu ekhathazeke ngabaseKorinte, usizo waluthola kumngane wakhe ongumKristu uThithu (2Ko
7:5-7)
Usizo lothando nolungenabugovu luyatholakala ebandleni lobuKristu (w99 5/15 25-28)
Lapho usebunzimeni, yenza umzamo wokuba khona njalo emihlanganweni, futhi umelane nesifiso sokuzi-
hlukanisa (IzA 18:1)
Ngezinye izikhathi, abanye bangase bazizwe bedangele kakhulu ukuba bangajabulela ubudlelwane nama-
nye amaKristu
Kufanele silwe nemizwa enjalo futhi singazincishi induduzo esingayithola kwamanye amakholwa
UJEHOVA UYAZIKHATHALELA IZINCEKU ZAKHE EZITHEMBEKILE (8 imiz.)
NjengamaKristu, kufanele siqaphele ukuba izingcindezi nezinkinga zingabenzi buthaka ubuhlobo bethu noJeho-
va (Ro 8:35, 38, 39; w97 7/1 8-13)
Gwema imicabango engakhi
Uma uzizwa ucindezeleka ngokomzwelo ungaphethi ngokuthi uyagula ngokomoya
Akufanele sibadlinzekele labo abacindezelekile
UPawulu wanxusa abafowabo ukuba ‘bakhulume ngokududuzayo nemiphefumulo ecindezelekile’ (1Thes
5:14)
UJehova uyazi ukuthi ngisho namaKristu athembekile ayabhekana nokucindezeleka (IHu 37:39)
Khumbula ukuthi izingcindezi esibhekana nazo zingezesikhashana (IzA 13:12; 2Ko 4:18)
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, iyoba khona indlela yokuphuma ovivinyweni lwethu, futhi ‘siyokhamuluka nge-
njabulo’ (IHu 126:6)
UJehova uyakuthanda! (Jak 5:11)
Sonke masiqhubeke senza ingxenye yethu, sithembele kuJehova ngobuqotho njengenqaba, isiphephelo nenda-
wo yethu yokukhosela
No. 177-ZU 01/10

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All rights reserved.HAMBA ENDLELENI YOBUQOTHO
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Bonisa indlela iHubo 26 elisebenza ngayo. Bonisa lokho okuyosisiza ukuba sihambe endleleni yobuqotho nezi-
ngozi okumelwe sizigweme
OKUSHIWO UKUHAMBA ENDLELENI YOBUQOTHO (4 imiz.)
Elithi “ubuqotho” lisho ukuziphatha okuhle, ukuzinikela kuJehova ngenhliziyo ephelele (w09 4/15 3; it-1-E 1209-
1212)
Ubuqotho buhlanganisa indlela yokuphila ebonisa ukuthi sizinikele ngokuqinile ekulungeni
Budinga sibe nesisusa esihle senhliziyo nezenzo ezifanele
Sibubonisa ngokulalela umyalo kaJehova wokumthanda ngayo yonke inhliziyo, umphefumulo nengqondo
yethu (Math 22:37)
Ukuhamba ngobuqotho kudinga ukuba sifune ngaso sonke isikhathi ukwazi intando kaJehova bese senza ngo-
kuvumelwana nalolo lwazi [Funda iHubo 119:1-3]
Kumelwe sibubonise kuzo zonke izici zokuphila
Kuyinselele ukububonisa kuleli zwe elinesono, kodwa izigidi zoFakazi BakaJehova zibhekana ngokuphu-
melelayo nale nselele
INDLELA ESINGABULONDOLOZA NGAYO UBUQOTHO BETHU (15 imiz.)
IHubo 26 lisibonisa lokho okuyosisiza ukuba sihambe ngobuqotho (w04 12/1 13-18)
UDavide, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, wayeyindoda eqotho [Funda iHubo 26:1]
Wacela uJehova ukuba ahlole izisusa zakhe futhi amcwengisise [Funda iHubo 26:2]
Mcele njalo uJehova ukuba ahlole inhliziyo yakho
Kwamukele lokho kuhlolwa, bese wenza noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo
UDavide wahamba ngeqiniso likaNkulunkulu [Funda iHubo 26:3]
Wagcina izenzo zikaNkulunkulu zomusa wothando ziphambi kwamehlo akhe
Ukuze ‘sihambe ngeqiniso likaNkulunkulu,’ kumelwe simazi kahle
UDavide wayebazonda abangane ababi [Funda iHubo 26:4, 5]
Nathi siyabagwema abantu abangebona abeqiniso
Abanye bafihla lokho abayikho ngokuzenza abangane bethu
Izihlubuki zingase zifihle izisusa zazo ukuze zisiqhelise kuJehova
Yeka ukuthi kubaluleke kanjani ukugwema abangane ababi! (1Ko 15:33)
Bahlanganisa nalabo abaku-TV noma kweminye imithombo yezindaba
UDavide wakwenza kwaziwa ukuthi wayezinikele kuJehova [Funda iHubo 26:6]
‘Sizungeza i-altare likaNkulunkulu’ ngokubonisa ukholo emhlatshelweni kaJesu
Ukholo olunjalo lwenza uJehova akwamukele ukuzinikela kwethu kuye
UDavide wakhuluma ngomsebenzi osisizayo [Funda iHubo 26:7]
Ingabe nawe ushukumiseleka ukuba utshele abanye lokho okwaziyo ngoJehova?
Ukuhlanganyela emsebenzini wokushumayela kusisiza ukuba singafani nezwe (w98 6/1 6-7)
Imihlangano yobuKristu, imihlangano yesifunda, ekhethekile neyesigodi isisiza ukuba siqinise ubuqotho bethu [Fu-
nda iHubo 26:8]
Lapho ukule mihlangano, zama ngempela ukuzuza kuyo
Zithande izikhumbuzo zikaJehova (IHu 119:167)
Khuthaza abanye, nawe wamukele isikhuthazo sabanye kule mibuthano (Heb 10:24, 25)
HAMBA ENDLELENI YOBUQOTHO, UGWEME INHLEKELELE (8 imiz.)
NjengoDavide, ongazange afune ukuphila nokufa kanye nezoni, sincenga uJehova ukuba asibonise umusa [Fu-
nda iHubo 26:9, 10]
Omagazini, amabhayisikobho nezingosi eziningi ze-Internet zenza ukuziphatha okuyihlazo kubonakale kunge-
nankinga futhi kwamukeleka
I-Internet ingase ibe indlela yokuba nobudlelwane nabenzi bokubi
Ukubuka izithombe ezingcolile zobulili kungaholela ekuziphatheni okuxekethile, noma i-por·neia (w10 4/15
21-22; w04 12/1 17; g03 7/22 6-10)
Intsha ngokukhethekile kumelwe ilwele ukumelana namathonya okuziphatha okubi
Intsha eningi izizwa icindezelwa ukuba ithandane nothile kuyilapho isencane kakhulu ukuba ingashada
Intsha ehamba endleleni yobuqotho iyasinda ebuhlungwini nasekungcoleni okuwumphumela wokuziphatha
kabi ngokobulili

06/10Abantu abadala kumelwe baqaphe ubuqotho babo
Abagcini bobuqotho bagcina imishado yabo iqinile futhi inokuthula
Ukuhamba ngobuqotho kubonakala ngokwethembeka kwezamabhizinisi nasezinqumweni ezithinta intando
kaJehova
Ukuzindla ngezinzuzo zokugcina kwethu ubuqotho kuyosisiza ukuba siwazonde wonke amathonya onakalisayo
(Amo 5:15)
KHAZIMULISA UNKULUNKULU NGOKUQHUBEKA UHAMBA NGOBUQOTHO (3 imiz.)
Akukhuthazi yini ukubona izigidi zamaKristu namuhla zihamba endleleni yobuqotho?
Kwangathi indlela yethu yokuphila ingabonisa ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi siyabuhlonipha futhi siyabazisa ubu-
khosi bukaNkulunkulu
Ungalokothi uvumele uSathane akuyengele ekwenzeni izinto ezingase zilimaze ubuhlobo bakho obuyigugu
noJehova
Ukuphila kwakho makubonise ukuthi uvumelana namazwi eHubo 26:11, 12 [Funda]

All Rights ReservedYENQABA AMAPHUPHO EZWE,
UPHISHEKELE IZINTO EZINGOKOQOBO ZOMBUSO
IZWE LIKHUTHAZA AMAPHUPHO ANGENAKUFEZEKA (2 imiz.)
Izigidi zabantu zithanda amaphupho
Amaphupho avame ukuvezwa kwezokukhangisa, kumabhayisikobho, ezinhlelweni ze-TV, komagazini nasezi-
ncwadini
La maphupho ahlanganisa ukuphishekela ingcebo eningi, isikhundla, ukuvelela, ukufeza zonke izifiso zoku-
zijabulisa, ukuhlanganyela ekuziphatheni okubi kobulili—okungahambisani nazibopho nakulandisa
Ingabe amaphupho anjena ezwe awanangozi?
KUNGANI KUFANELE SENQABE AMAPHUPHO EZWE? (15 imiz.)
Amaphupho ezwe avusa izifiso ezingalungile, ezingaholela emiphumeleni ebuhlungu yesono (Jak 1:14, 15; w92
7/15 13-14)
Kubonakala sengathi ingelosi eyaba uSathane yaqala ngokuphupha, yavumela imizwa yokuzibona ibalulekile
ukuba ikhule enhliziyweni yayo, yabe isiqala ukunxanela ukukhulekelwa okungokukaJehova
Umphumela wenkambo kaSathane uchazwe encwadini yesAmbulo 20:1-3, 10 [Funda]
USathane wakhohlisa owesifazane wokuqala, u-Eva, ukuba adle isithelo esenqatshelwe, ekholelwa ukuthi uku-
sidla kwakuyomenza afane noNkulunkulu (Gen 3:1-6; 1Thim 2:14)
Wamyenga ukuba adle isithelo futhi owesifazane wabe eseyenga indoda yakhe ukuba yenze okufanayo
Inkambo yabo yokona yaletha ubuhlungu, ukungapheleli nokufa (Ro 5:12)
Ngaphambi kukaZamcolo, izingelosi ezithile zaphupha ngabesifazane
Zashiya indawo yazo yokuhlala efanele, zashada futhi zazala inzalo eyingxube eyayinobudlova (Gen 6:1-4)
UJehova wazijezisa lezo zingelosi ezingalaleli futhi ekugcineni uyozibhubhisa (Jude 6)
USathane usaqhubeka ekhuthaza amaphupho ayinkohliso
Abaningi bachitha isikhathi esiningi bezijabulisa ngamabhayisikobho, omagazini, imidlalo ye-TV ewuchunge-
chunge, imincintiswano eku-TV nezincwadi ezikhuthaza ukuphishekela ingcebo ngisho nokuhaha
Lokhu kuye kwaholela abanye ukuba bahlale bematasa bezama ukufeza amaphupho abo ezinto ezibonaka-
layo ngokufuna umsebenzi wesibili, okuye kwaholela ekuphahlazekeni kokholo lwabo (w07 10/1 19)
USathane ugqugquzela abantu ukuba bafune ukulondeka ngokwezimali okuwutalagu! (IzA 11:4; 18:11; w07
8/1 28-29)
IBhayibheli lisikhuthaza ukuba saneliswe (1Thim 6:6-8)
Abanye baphupha ngokuziphatha okubi
Babhebhezela izifiso ezimbi ngokufunda izincwadi ezikhuluma ngothando noma ngokubuka amabhayisiko-
bho noma ama-video angcolile
Abanye baye babanjwa ugibe lwezinhlelo zokuthola abangane ngocingo noma nge-Internet
Lokhu kuye kwaholela ekubeni nezingxoxo eziphathelene nobulili futhi kwezinye izimo abanye baye ba-
wotawotana futhi baqabulana nabantu abangashadile nabo
Kanti abanye baye benza okubi nakakhulu, baphinga futhi bahlukanisa nomngane ongenacala (Mal 2:15, 16;
Heb 13:4; w07 7/15 29; w06 11/15 22-23)
Lokhu kungathembeki kuyisono kuJehova, kumngane womshado nasebandleni
Iseluleko seBhayibheli esicacile siwukuthi ‘jabula ngomfazi wobusha’ (IzA 5:18-20)
Labo abaphishekela amaphupho obugovu bayodumala kabuhlungu
Izwe liyadlula nezifiso zalo zenyama (1Joh 2:16, 17)
PHISHEKELA IZINTO EZINGOKOQOBO ZOMBUSO (9 imiz.)
UJesu wasikhuthaza ukuba siphishekele uMbuso (Math 6:33)
UMbuso uwuhulumeni ongokoqobo, onamandla negunya; uyokwanelisa izifiso ezifanele (IHu 145:16)
INkosi yalo Mbuso, uKristu, yayingumuntu ongokoqobo ekhulwini lokuqala; nanamuhla isenjalo (w01 12/15
5-8)
UMbuso usuye wafeza izinto eziningi
Izikhonzi zawo ezithembekile kuwo wonke umhlaba zimemezela ukumiswa kwawo (Math 24:14) [Ukuze utho-
le amanani amazwe abikayo nengqikithi yamahora asetshenziwe, bheka INcwadi Yonyaka yamuva]
Kuye kwaba nemiphumela ebonakalayo nehlala njalo—uquqaba lwabantu luye lwafunda ulimi oluhlanzeki-
le, lwaba munye othandweni futhi lwaba nokuthula (IHu 29:11; Joh 13:35)
Ithemba lethu kumelwe libe eliqinisekile nezwe elisha libe ngokoqobo kithi
Isithembiso seBhayibheli sokuthi zonke izinto ziyokwenziwa zibe zintsha asilona iphupho (IsAm 21:3-5)
Ingabe uyazindla ngaleso sithembiso?
Ukuzibona usezweni elisha akulona iphupho kodwa kuwubufakazi bokholo (Heb 11:1)
No. 179-ZU
11/10Kumelwe siqhubeke sakha ukholo lwethu ngokutadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu
Izigidi zabanjengezimvu ziyasabela esigijimini soMbuso
Ingabe uyashumayela ngoMbuso?
Ingabe ungahlanganyela ngokwengeziwe enkonzweni?
QHUBEKA UPHISHEKELA UMBUSO (4 imiz.)
Sekungamashumi eminyaka insali yabagcotshiwe ‘iphikelela phambili’ ukuze ithole amalungelo oMbuso (Math 11:
12; it-2-E 168; w05 2/1 11; w92 7/15 18)
‘Abezinye izimvu’ nabo kudingeka bazikhandle ngokufanayo ukuze bafaneleke njengezikhonzi (Joh 10:16)
Siphila enkathini enikeza abantu ithuba elikhethekile
Labo abaphishekela amaphupho ezwe maduze bazosanguluka babone ukuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu uyabusa
nokuthi sekuseduze ukuba lesi simiso esibi sibhujiswe phakade (Isaya 29:8; w92 7/15 18)
Kwangathi singagcina izingqondo nezinhliziyo zethu zigxile ezintweni ezingokoqobo zoMbuso futhi sijabulele
izibusiso zawo zaphakade (Math 25:34)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedKUNGANI ITHEMBA LOVUKO KUFANELE LIBE NGOKOQOBO KUWE?
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Ngokuqiniseka nangekhono lokukholisa, bonisa ukuthi ithemba lovuko lisekelwe ngokuqinile emiBhalweni. Funda
futhi uchaze imiBhalo ngokugcizelela okufanele, uqokomise ukuthi kungani singathembela ngokuphelele kule mfu-
ndiso. Siza izilaleli ukuba ziyiqonde ngokugcwele indlela uvuko oluqokomisa ngayo uthando lukaNkulunkulu ngathi
OKWENZA KWADINGEKA UVUKO (7 imiz.)
Uvuko lubalulekile ekugcwalisekeni kwenjongo kaJehova
Abantu bafa ngenxa yamaqhinga kaSathane (Joh 8:44)
Uvuko luvumelana nenjongo kaNkulunkulu ngomhlaba (Gen 1:28)
Uvuko lubonisa uJehova njengonothando noMlondolozi onamandla wezinceku zakhe (1Sam 2:6)
UJehova uvuza abantu abathembekile ngokuphila okuphakade (Math 24:9; Thit 1:2; IsAm 2:10)
Akekho omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaJehova uNkulunkulu ongalondoloza futhi abuyisele ukuphila (IHu
36:9)
OKWENZA UVUKO LUBE INTO EQINISEKILE (7 imiz.)
UJehova usinikeza isiqinisekiso sovuko (IzE 17:31)
Leso siqinisekiso siwukuvuswa kukaJesu (w83-ZU 4/1 19 izig. 2-3 [w82-E 10/1 20 izig. 2-3])
Ngemva kokuvuswa kwakhe, uJesu wabonakala emakhulwini abantu (1Ko 15:6)
UJesu, lowo uJehova amsebenzisayo ekuvuseni abanye, ubizwa kufanele ngokuthi ‘ungukuvuka nokuphila’ (Joh
11:25)
Ukuvuswa kwakhe kwavula indlela yokuvuswa kwezigidigidi zabantu
UJesu wabonisa ukuthi uvuko luyinto engokoqobo
Wafanisa ukufa nokulala
Ngamandla kaNkulunkulu, uJesu wabavusa kalula abantu ababefile njengoba nje singase sivuse umuntu
esimthandayo ebuthongweni (Joh 11:11-14)
Yingakho uJesu abonisa ukuqiniseka ngokuthi uvuko luyoba khona ngempela! (Joh 5:28, 29; it-2-E 789 izig. 3-6)
AmaKristu ekhulu lokuqala ayenokholo kuleli themba (Heb 6:1, 2)
LUWUMTHOMBO WENDUDUZO EQINISAYO (10 imiz.)
‘Siyinkungu ebonakalayo bese inyamalala’ (Jak 4:14)
Kulesi simiso sezinto esingaqinisekile, ukuphila kungaphela kungazelelwe
Ithemba lovuko liyasiqinisa futhi lidambisa usizi lokufelwa
Labo abathanda uJehova ababuswa ukwesaba ukufa okukhwantabalisayo, ukwesaba okugqilaza abaningi (Heb
2:14, 15)
Ukufa akusona isiphelo kulabo abathembekile kuNkulunkulu
Ukuba ngokoqobo kovuko kuyasiduduza sonke futhi kusiqinise
Ukugula, izingozi nokufa kungehlela noma ubani (UmSh 9:11)
Abaningi asebeneminyaka beseqinisweni bebenethemba lokuthi ukuphela kwalesi simiso kuyobafica besaphila
kodwa manje babhekene nezinkinga zokukhula (UmSh 12:1-7)
Njengoba ukuphila kulesi simiso sezinto kungokwesikhashana, kudingeka sigxile ‘ekuphileni kwangempela,’
okungukuthi ‘ekuphileni okuphakade’ (1Thim 6:12, 19)
NjengoPawulu, ithemba lovuko liyasiqinisa lapho sibhekene novivinyo oluqubuka ngenxa yokukhonza uNkulunkulu
(2Ko 1:8, 9)
Ubunzima obunjalo esibhekana nabo buvivinya ukholo lwethu ovukweni
Uma ukuphila kwethu kusongelwa, ithemba lovuko lisisiza ukuba sihlale sithembekile futhi singahlehli okholweni
Leli themba liye lasiza abaningi ukuba balalele umthetho kaNkulunkulu ophathelene negazi futhi balondoloze
ukuma kwethu kokungathathi-hlangothi njengamaKristu
INDLELA ESIBONISA NGAYO UKHOLO OVUKWENI (3 imiz.)
Ubuqotho bezinceku zikaJehova, ngisho noma zibhekene nokufa, bufakazela ukuthi inkonzo yazo isekelwe okholweni
nasothandweni (IsAm 12:11)
Sizinikela kuJehova kuphela ngenxa yezimfanelo zakhe ezimangalisayo (IsAm 4:11)
Kuyilungelo ukuhlanganyela ekuboniseni ukuthi uSathane unamanga kulokho asimangalela ngakho thina kanye
noJehova (Jobe 2:4; IzA 27:11)
HLALANI NILINDILE “NINOMBONO WOKUPHILA OKUPHAKADE” (3 imiz.)
Sithola induduzo enkulu ngokwazi ukuthi uJehova ulangazelela ukubuyisela abathembekile ekuphileni [Funda uJobe
14:14, 15]
Kumelwe sizigcine “othandweni lukaNkulunkulu,” silinde ngesineke ukugcwaliseka okuqinisekile kwenjongo
kaJehova yokunika abantu abalalelayo ukuphila okuphakade (Jude 21)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-54, 116-119)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedINGABE ISIKHATHI SESIHAMBE KAKHULU KUNALOKHO OKUCABANGAYO?
Okufanele kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Nxusa izilaleli “ngesisekelo sothando,” ikakhulukazi lapho uxoxa ngengxenye yokugcina ebhekiswe kwabapholile
(Filem 9; be 266 izig. 2-4)
“SITSHELE, ZIYOKWENZEKA NINI LEZI ZINTO?” (4 imiz.)
Ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezidlule besikhumbula ukufa kukaJesu, ngaleyo ndlela sibonisa ukumhlonipha yena
noJehova uNkulunkulu
Siye sakhunjuzwa ngothando olukhulu abanalo ngathi nakuba sinesono (Ro 5:8; 1Joh 4:9)
Unyaka ngamunye odlulayo esimemezela ngawo ukufa kweNkosi ngokwenza isiKhumbuzo, usisondeza ekupheleni
kwalesi simiso sezinto (1Ko 11:26)
Sekuyisikhathi eside abantu benesithakazelo esikhulu futhi beqagela lokho okushiwo isiprofetho sikaJesu
esithakazelisayo esiqala kuMarku 13:1-4 [Funda]
UJesu wanika abafundi bakhe isibonakaliso esiyinhlanganisela esiphawula izinsuku zokugcina zesimiso sezinto
esibi sikaSathane [Funda uMarku 13:8]
Lesi siprofetho sinokugcwaliseka okukabili—okwangekhulu lokuqala nokosuku lwethu
Ingabe uMarku 13:8 uyagcwaliseka? Abonisani amaqiniso? Ingabe ngempela sisezinsukwini zokugcina? Ingabe
isikhathi sesihambe kakhulu kunalokho okucabangayo?
ISIBONAKALISO ESIYINHLANGANISELA SEZINSUKU ZOKUGCINA (11 imiz.)
Ake sihlole izici ezinhlanu uJesu azisho ngokuqondile
(1) “Isizwe siyovukela isizwe nombuso uvukele umbuso” (w08 5/15 13-14 isig. 7)
Kusukela ngo-1914, izimpi sezibulale abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyikhulu!
(2) ‘Kuyoba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba ezindaweni ngezindawo’ (w11 5/1 4)
(3) ‘Kuyoba khona nokusweleka kokudla’ (w11 5/1 5)
(4) ‘Ezindaweni ngezindawo kuyoba khona izifo eziwumshayabhuqe’ (Luka 21:11; w11 5/1 6)
(5) ‘Kunokwanda kokwephulwa komthetho’ (Math 24:12)
Ukwephula umthetho kuwukungayihloniphi ingcaca imithetho nezimiso zikaNkulunkulu; bayanda abantu
ababheka izono ezinjengokuphinga nobungqingili njengezamukelekayo (Isaya 5:20; w02 3/1 9 isig. 8)
Sikhulume ngezici ezinhlanu nje kuphela zesibonakaliso esiyinhlanganisela
Ucabangani? Ingabe ngempela siphila ezinsukwini zokugcina?
Lezi zici azikaze zivelele ngale ndlela
Amaqiniso abonisa ukuthi isikhathi sesihambe kakhulu kunalokho abantu abaningi abakucabangayo!
BUYA MANJE FUTHI UMKHONZE NGENKUTHALO UMALUSI WEMIPHEFUMULO YETHU (15 imiz.)
Asazi ukuthi uJehova uyolivala nini ithuba lokubuyisana naye (2Ko 5:18-20; w98 12/15 17-18 izig. 9-11)
Siyazi ukuthi ukubhujiswa kwababi kuzofika maduzane [Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:11, 12]
Senza kahle ngokuzibuza, ‘Ingabe ngiyabonisa ukuthi ngikukholelwa ngempela ukuthi “isikhathi esesisele
sinciphile”?’ (1Ko 7:29-31)
UJehova umema abantu bazo zonke izinhlobo ukuba bangenise ulwazi olunika ukuphila oluvela
eBhayibhelini (IsAm 22:17)
Ukungenisa ulwazi olunjalo nokwenza ngokuvumelana nalo kungaholela ekuphileni okuphakade ePharadesi
emhlabeni
Ingabe lelo themba liyakukhanga?
Kuyaphuthuma ukuba uthathe isinyathelo ngaphandle kokulibala
OFakazi BakaJehova bazokujabulela ukukusiza ufunde indlela ongavumelanisa ngayo ukuphila kwakho
nentando kaNkulunkulu
UJehova ufuna nokuba izimvu zakhe ezipholile zibuyele ezingalweni zakhe zaphakade ezinothando (Dut 33:27;
IsiL 3:40)
Uma wake waba isikhonzi sikaJehova esishisekayo, siza ucabangisise ngamazwi akweyoku-1 Petru 2:25
[Yifunde] (jr 130 isig. 5)
Ukuthi uye wenza umzamo wokuba lapha kuwubufakazi bokuthi awukamkhohlwa uMalusi wakho nemiyalo
yakhe [Funda iHubo 119:176]
Kunezizathu eziningi ezenza abantu baphole (w08 11/15 13-15 izig. 5-13)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi siyini esakho isizathu, sikuncenga ukuba wamukele usizo oludingekayo ukuze
uphinde umkhonze ngenkuthalo uMalusi wethu onothando (jr 73-76 izig. 13-16; 152-153 izig. 22-25)
Vumela iZwi likaNkulunkulu nezincwadi zethu zobuKristu kukusize uthole amandla angokomoya (IHu
119:105)
Uyothola ukusekelwa yibandla likaJehova elinothando (1Pet 5:2; w08 11/15 16 izig. 19-22)
No. 181-ZU
6/11Esikhathini esidlule, abaprofethi banikeza abantu bakaNkulunkulu izikhumbuzo ababezidinga futhi babaxwayisa
ngezahlulelo zaKhe ezazizofika (Amose 3:7)
Namuhla, uJehova usebenzisa izinceku zakhe ezigcotshiwe ukuze akhumbuze ngisho nabalungile ukuthi
isikhathi sesihambe kakhulu kunalokho abaningi abakucabangayo (Hez 3:21)
Lezi zinceku zizibonakalise zingenakunyakaziswa, njengezinsika zensimbi emzini onezivikelo (Jer 1:17-19)
Abagcotshiwe ‘babophe izinkalo zabo’; bavumela iZwi likaNkulunkulu libaqinise ukuze bafeze umsebenzi
abawuthunyiwe
Kwenze umgomo wakho ukubonisa intshiseko efanayo futhi ubasekele
Kubalulekile ukuba “sizinake ngaphezu kokujwayelekile izinto esizizwile” (Heb 2:1; Luka 21:34-36)
Labo abangazange bazinake izixwayiso zembubhiso eyayisondela esikhathini esidlule, babona ngokushesha
ukuthi isikhathi sase sihambe kakhulu kunalokho ababekucabanga
Namuhla, kukhishwa isixwayiso esiphuthuma ngisho nakakhulu, njengoba kunobufakazi obuqand’ ikhanda
bokuthi i-Armagedoni iseduze
Izigidi azifuni ukulalela, kodwa isikhathi siyaphela
Isikhathi sesihambile kunalokho abakucabangayo! Ingabe sesihambe kakhulu kunalokho okucabangayo?
Cabanga ngokujulile ngoBaba wakho osezulwini; ucabanga ukuthi yena usibona sesihambe kangakanani
isikhathi?
Siyakuncenga ukuba uphephele ezingalweni ezifudumele zikaJehova, uMalusi oMkhulu! (Isaya 40:11)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona
yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo,
kk. 52-54, 116-119)
No. 181-ZU—ikhasi 2

Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Nikeza ubufakazi obucacile bokuthi uMbuso kaNkulunkulu ungokoqobo, uyabusa nokuthi uwuhulumeni
omatasa. Bonisa lokho uMbuso okwenzayo manje nalokho okulindeleke kulabo abathanda ukuba izikhonzi zawo
BUNINGI UBUFAKAZI BOKUTHI UMBUSO WAQALA UKUBUSA NGO-1914 (6 imiz.)
UJesu wasifundisa ukuthandaza: “Umbuso wakho mawuze” (Math 6:10)
Nakuba lowo Mbuso wasezulwini uyogcina ulethe iPharadesi emhlabeni wonke, wawuyomiswa kusabusa
ohulumeni babantu emhlabeni (Dan 2:44; IsAm 21:4) [Funda amaHubo 110:1, 2]
Iziprofetho zeBhayibheli nokulandelana kwezenzakalo ngokohlelo lwezikhathi kubonisa ukuthi lo Mbuso
wamiswa ngo-1914 (IsAm 12:10, 12)
“Izikhathi ezimisiwe zezizwe” zaphela (Luka 21:24; Hez 21:26, 27; bh 217)
Isibonakaliso esiyinhlanganisela sokuba khona kukaKristu eMbusweni siyagcwaliseka (Math 24:3; bh 88-92)
Sezifikile “izikhathi ezibucayi okunzima ukubhekana nazo” ezaziyobonisa ‘izinsuku zokugcina’ (2Thim 3:1-5)
Abagibeli bamahhashi abane besAmbulo isahluko 6 bafakazela ukuthi siphila esikhathini sokubusa koMbuso
(IsAm 6:2, 4-6, 8; w86 1/1 1-7)
 ́
‘Umay e ngomhlaba’ owabikezelwa ubonakala ngokucindezeleka kwabantu nezizwe (IsAm 12:12)
LOKHO UMBUSO OBUKWENZA OSUKWINI LWETHU (20 imiz.)
Uye wabutha izigidi zezikhonzi ezithembekile (IzA 14:28)
Nakuba zihlala emazweni ahlukahlukene angaphezu kwangu-235, zisekela uMbuso kaNkulunkulu
ngentshiseko (IHu 110:3)
Ngonyaka wenkonzo ophelile, zachitha amahora angaphezu kwezigidi eziyinkulungwane nengxenye
ekusakazeni isigijimi soMbuso [sebenzisa inani lamuva]
Njengohulumeni wasezulwini, uye wakhipha imithetho elotshiwe
Imithetho elotshiwe elawula labo ababuswa uMbuso iseZwini likaNkulunkulu (IHu 19:7)
Uwukuphela kukahulumeni onomthetho wothando (Joh 13:34, 35)
Imithetho eseBhayibhelini iyakuqaphela ukuthi amaKristu aphila ngaphansi kwemithetho yohulumeni
bezwe, yingakho ezithoba ngokufanele kuKhesari (Ro 13:1, 7)
Izikhonzi zoMbuso kaNkulunkulu ziphakathi kwezakhamuzi ezigcina umthetho (w02 11/1 12-13; g00 6/8
28; g97 8/22 26)
Izikhulu nabanye abantu bavame ukuqaphela ukuziphatha okuhle kwalabo abazithoba ekubuseni koMbuso
(1Pet 2:12; w02 11/1 12-13; g 4/07 27; g00 6/8 28; yb94-E 166-167)
Labo abazithoba ekubuseni koMbuso baphoqelekile ukuba bagcine imithetho kaNkulunkulu
Abephula imithetho kaNkulunkulu ngamabomu futhi bangaphenduki bayaxoshwa ebandleni, ngaleyo
ndlela ligcinwe lihlanzekile (1Ko 5:11-13; w99 6/1 17; w98 8/1 16)
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu unesimiso semfundo
NgeBhayibheli nangezincwadi ezisekelwe kulo, njenge-Nqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama!, uMfundisi Omkhulu
‘usifundisa ukuze sizuze’ (Isaya 30:20; 48:17)
Emkhayeni, ilungu ngalinye liyazuza ngokufundiswa indlela yokufeza indima yalo eliyabelwe uNkulunkulu
Ilungiselelo lokuKhulekela Komkhaya liklanyelwe ukusiza ekubhekaneni nezidingo zelungu ngalinye
Izimiso zemfundo esekelwe eBhayibhelini zikhuthaza imfundo engokwasezulwini
[Bonisa indlela izikole ezihlukahlukene ezisetshenziswa inhlangano ezihlomisa ngayo izigidi ngalokho
okubaluleke kakhulu (be 8; km 10/11 5-6)]
Emhlabeni wonke abantu abathakazelayo baqhutshelwa izifundo zeBhayibheli zamahhala
Masonto onke kuqhutshwa izigidi zezifundo zeBhayibheli
Izincwadi zethu, ezitholakala ngezilimi ezingaphezu kuka-600, ziye zaba usizo kulo msebenzi obalulekile
UMbuso kaNkulunkulu unabameleli ababonakalayo abanakekela futhi bavikele izikhonzi zawo (Isaya 32:1, 2;
w06 7/15 5)
Abadala bakhonza njengabelusi nanjengabafundisi, balethe ukuqabuleka emhlambini (Math 11:28-30)
UKUBUSA KOMBUSO KUSISIZA UKUBA SIKHUTHAZELE MANJE (4 imiz.)
Kuqinisa ukholo ukucabanga ngalokho uMbuso osenzela khona manje (IHu 77:12; 145:11)
Kusishukumisela ukuba sishumayele ngentshiseko (Ro 10:11, 13-15)
Siyaqinisekiswa ukuthi izingelosi ziyasisekela (IsAm 14:6, 7; w09 5/15 24-25)
Kuwo wonke umlando, abantu baye bazidela ngenxa yohulumeni babantu abangaphelele, bagcina
ngokudumazeka kabuhlungu
Ngokuphambene, uMbuso kaNkulunkulu awusoze wazidumaza izikhonzi zawo
Ukubusa kwawo kusizuzisa ngisho kwamanje
Kuye kwasisiza ukuba sisondele kuNkulunkulu futhi sizwe uthando nokusekela kobuzalwane bomhlaba
wonke (Jak 4:8; 1Pet 2:17)

Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Lwela ukufinyelela izinhliziyo zezilaleli zakho ngokufunda imiBhalo eyinhloko ngentshiseko efanele futhi uxoxe
ngayo. Siza bonke ukuba babone izinto ezinhle esingagxilisa amehlo ethu kuzo nokubaluleka kokuzithiba lapho
sikhulekela uJehova.
ESIKUBONAYO KUNGASITHONYA (7 imiz.)
Cishe ayikho into ethonya ingqondo yethu njengamehlo ethu
Lo mzila ophakela ingqondo uyithonya kakhulu imizwelo nezenzo zethu (it-1-E 789)
Esikubonayo kungavusa noma kuqinise izifiso nezinkanuko ezinhle noma ezimbi enhliziyweni yethu (w10 4/15
20-21; w86 5/1 10-14)
Okuhle: Amehlo ethu angasenza sibone ubuhle, sazise izimangaliso zendalo, sibone ubufakazi bokuba khona
kukaNkulunkulu nenkazimulo yakhe, futhi asenze sibe nesifiso sokumlalela (IHu 8:3, 4; 19:1, 2; 104:24; Ro
1:20)
Okubi: U-Eva, izingelosi ezingalaleli no-Akhani abazange badlulise amehlo abo ukuba angaboni izinto
ezazenqatshelwe kubo, babe sebezifisa ezinhliziyweni zabo (Gen 3:6; 6:1, 2; Josh 7:20, 21)
Abakhangisi bezentengiselwano banamuhla bawazi kahle amandla amehlo angaphelelwa isikhathi (w10 4/15 21)
Yeka ukuthi kubaluleke kangakanani-ke ukulawula lokho esikubukayo!
Kudingeka sicabangisise ngamazwi omhubi [Funda iHubo 119:37]
LALELA UNKULUNKULU, UFULATHELE LOKHO OKUNGENANZUZO (18 imiz.)
AmaKristu eqiniso nawo anaso isifiso samehlo nesenyama
Sikhuthazwa ukuba sizithibe ngokuphathelene nezinto esizibukayo nesizilangazelelayo (1Ko 9:25a, 27; 1Joh 2:
15-17)
UJobe wakuqaphela ukuxhumana okukhona phakathi kokubona nokufisa; wenza isivumelwano namehlo
akhe [Funda uJobe 31:1]
Wenqaba ukuthinta owesifazane ngezisusa ezingcolile; wayengavumi ngisho nokuba ingqondo yakhe
ijatshuliswe umcabango onjalo
Okwenzeka ezingelosini ezingalaleli osukwini lukaNowa kuyicacisa kahle ingozi yokukhanuka ubuhlobo
bobulili obungemthetho (Gen 6:4-7)
UJesu waxwayisa ngokwenza lokho [Funda uMathewu 5:28]
‘Ukuqhubeka ubuka’ kubonisa ukuthi unenhliziyo engaqeqeshiwe okusadingeka ibulale izifiso zayo
ezingafanele (Kol 3:5, 6)
Namuhla, abaningi ‘baqhubeka bebuka’ ngasese izithombe ezingcolile zobulili ezincwadini nakuyi-
Internet [Funda eyabase-Efesu 5:3, 4, 12] (w10 4/15 21-22)
Ngisho nokubuka izithombe ezingcolile zobulili okwesikhashana noma ukuzithi shazi kungaba
nemiphumela elimazayo
Imiphumela ingahlanganisa ukuba nonembeza onecala, ukuzizwa ungelutho nobunzima obukhulu
bokususa izithombe ezingcolile engqondweni yakho
Ingqondo yethu kufanele ithunjwe uKristu; lokhu singakwenza ngokondla izingqondo nezinhliziyo zethu
ngokutadisha iZwi likaNkulunkulu, ukuthandaza nokuba khona emihlanganweni yobuKristu (2Ko 10:5;
Kol 3:9, 10)
Okunye ukuzijabulisa kungase kube okwakhayo, kodwa ukuzijabulisa okukhuthaza ukuthanda izinto
ezibonakalayo noma ukulumba noma kubonise ubudlova, ukuchitheka kwegazi nokufa ‘akusizi ngalutho,’
noma akunanzuzo (IHu 101:3; w10 4/15 22)
Abazali abangamaKristu banomthwalo wemfanelo phambi kukaJehova wokukhetha izinto abavumela ukuba
zibukwe emizini yabo
Qaphelani ukulumba okucashile emabhayisikobho, emidlalweni ewuchungechunge ye-TV, emidlalweni
ye-video nasezincwadini zezingane (w02 10/15 11)
Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi sibasha noma sibadala, amehlo ethu akufanele ajatshuliswe imidlalo ye-video
eqokomisa ubudlova nekubonisa ingcaca ukubulawa kwabantu ngesihluku [Funda iHubo 11:5]
(g00 7/8 28)
Kumelwe sigxilise amehlo ethu ezintweni ezinhle nezakhayo futhi senqabe ukugxilisa ingqondo yethu
kunoma yini uJehova ayilahlayo
USathane uhlasela izingqondo zethu (2Ko 11:3)
Ngisho nokuzijabulisa okungase kubhekwe njengokwamukelekayo, ukuchitha isikhathi esiningi kakhulu
sikubuka kuphazamisa ukufunda kwethu iBhayibheli nsuku zonke nokulungiselela kwethu imihlangano
yebandla (Fil 1:9, 10)
ZIMISELE UKUFULATHELA IZINTO EZINGENANZUZO (5 imiz.)

8/12Wasabela masinyane [Funda uMathewu 4:10]
Impendulo yakhe yayivumelana nenjongo yakhe ekuphileni—ukwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (Heb 10:7)
Njengabalandeli bakaJesu Kristu, sizimisele ukuba sifulathele izinto ezingenanzuzo [Funda iHubo 119:101]
Kuwukuzifaka engozini ukulinda kuze kuvele isimo esilingayo andukuba sinqume ukuthi siyokwenzani
ngezinto imiBhalo ezilahla ngokucacile
Kumelwe sinqume kusengaphambili ngokusekelwe olwazini lwethu lwemiBhalo nasesifisweni sethu
sokwenza intando kaNkulunkulu (w10 1/15 3)
Asisoze nanini sazisola ngokulondoloza iso ‘elihle,’ eligxile ngokuphelele ekwenzeni intando kaNkulunkulu,
elingaphazanyiswa ezinye izinto (Math 6:22, 23; Heb 10:36)

ezingenanzuzo
Siyanincoma ngalokho—ngokuqinisekile leyo nkambo iyamjabulisa uBaba wethu olungile osezulwini
Qhubekani nenza kanjalo, ngaleyo ndlela nibekela abasanda kuhlanganyela nentsha esebandleni isibonelo
esihle

kaJehova (IHu 119:37)
