KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedINGABE UMA USUFILE SEKUPHELILE NGAWE?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi isintu ngabe asinathemba nhlobo ukube uJehova akalenzanga ilungiselelo lesihlengo
noMbuso. Qokomisa isidingo sokubonisa ukholo oluqinile emaqinisweni okwakhulunywa ngawo eSikhumbuzweni
“UKUPHELA KWASO SONKE ISINTU” (7 imiz.)
Unyaka nonyaka izigidi zabantu ziyafa emhlabeni
Imizamo yokududuza abashonelwe yembula inkolelo yokuthi abafileyo bayaqhubeka bephila ngandlela-thile.
Izinkolelo ezinjalo ziyehlukahluka (w99 4/1 9-10 izig. 1-7)
Ngisho nalabo abathi ukufa kudaliwe bakuthola kunzima ukwamukela ukuthi uma usufile, sekuphelile ngawe
IBhayibheli lithi ukufa komuntu ‘ukuphela kwakhe’ (Dut 2:15; Jos 10:20)
Ngempela, ukufa “kuwukuphela kwaso sonke isintu” [Funda umShumayeli 7:2]
Kusho ukuthini lokhu? Ingabe ngempela uma umuntu esefile kusuke sekuphelile ngaye?
INCAZELO YOKUFA (7 imiz.)
Ukufa kuyibuyisela emuva inqubo echazwe kuGenesise 2:7 [Yifunde]
Ukuphefumula kuyanqamuka; amandla okuphila ayaphela; imicabango iyashabalala (IHu 146:4)
Ukufa komuntu akungcono kunokufa kwesilwane; kuyefana (UmSh 3:19, 20)
Uma usufile awusakwazi ukukhuluma, ukubonisa imizwelo, ukucabanga; usuke ungasekho (UmSh 9:5, 6, 10)
Leli qiniso liyasikhathaza futhi kube kufanele ngoba sadalelwa ukuphila phakade (UmSh 3:11)
Amaqiniso esawafunda eSikhumbuzweni sokufa kukaKristu saminyaka yonke asinika isizathu sethemba
ISIZATHU SOKUBA UKUFA KUKAJESU KUNGASHO UKUTHI KWASE KUPHELILE NGAYE (9 imiz.)
Ukufa kuyinkokhelo yesono (Ro 6:23)
UJesu akenzanga sono
Ngakho, wayenelungelo elingokomthetho lokuqhubeka ephila phakade njengomuntu (Joh 10:18; IzE 2:24; w09
9/15 29 isig. 15; w81 1/15 29 isig. 25 [w80-E 7/15 28 isig. 25])
Esevuselwe ekuphileni njengesidalwa somoya, uJesu wethula kuJehova inani lokuphila kwakhe okuphelele
kobuntu (1Pet 3:18)
Ngakho isikweletu mina nawe esisikweleta uJehova ngokuba izoni sesakhokhwa (2Ko 5:14, 15)
Manje sekunesisekelo sokususa imiphumela yesono esasithola njengefa
Ingabe ngesisekelo sesihlengo uJehova uvele athethelele noma ubani?
Cha; kudingeka ukulalela (Joh 3:36)
Qhubeka ungenisa ulwazi ngoJehova uNkulunkulu noJesu Kristu, futhi wenze ngokuvumelana nalo (Joh 17:3)
Ukukhulula kukaJehova uJesu ethuneni ‘kuyisiqinisekiso kubo bonke abantu’ sokuthi luyeza uSuku Lokwa-
hlulela lukaNkulunkulu nokuthi luzoba khona uvuko (IzE 17:31; 24:15)
“UKUPHELA” KUYOSHO UKUTHINI NGAWE? (7 imiz.)
Ingabe uma usufile kusuke sekuphelile ngawe?
Bekuyoba njalo ukube bekungengenxa kaNkulunkulu noKristu
Naphezu kobuchwepheshe obuseqophelweni eliphezulu, abantu abakwazi ukudala ukuphila noma ukukubuyisela
(w99 10/15 5 izig. 3-4)
UJehova yedwa okwazi ukwenza lokho
Izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zasendulo zazinethemba ovukweni (Jobe 14:7-15; Dan 12:13)
UJesu wabonisa isifiso namandla kaNkulunkulu okuvusa abafileyo (Luka 7:11-17; 8:49-56; Joh 11:38-44)
Manje njengoba sekudlule isikhathi esanele sokuba bonke bazibonele imiphumela yokungayilaleli imithetho
kaNkulunkulu, ihora elimisiwe lokuba alungise izinto lisondela masinyane
Lokho kuhlanganisa ukuvusa abafileyo nokuqondisa abantu ekuphileni okuphakade emhlabeni (w07 5/15
26-30)
Injongo kaJehova yokuvusa izinceku zakhe iqiniseke kangangokuthi zingase zichazwe ngokuthi ziyaphila (Mat
22:31, 32; cf 106-107 izig. 20-21)
Ukuphila phakade kuyosinika amathuba okufunda okwengeziwe ngoJehova uNkulunkulu nokuba abangane nabo
bonke abamthandayo (Jobe 26:14; UmSh 3:10, 11; w11 5/1 27)
Khonza uJehova ngobuqotho, uthole izibusiso ezicebile manje “futhi ekugcineni ukuphila okuphakade” (Ro 6:22)
(Namathela ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imiBhalo okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-54, 166-169)
No. 184-ZU 7/12
 ̆ 2012 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedINGABE IQINISO LIYAKUTHONYA UKUPHILA KWAKHO?
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi ulimi olusebenzisayo luyaqondakala kulabo abaqalayo ukuba khona emhlanganweni.
Bonisa ukuthi ngisho nakulesi simiso samanje sezinto, ukuphila kwethu kuthuthuka ngezindlela eziningi lapho
sisebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli.
UKUBONA IQINISO (5 imiz.)
Ngaphambi nje kokuba uJesu afe, watshela uPontiyu Pilatu ukuthi injongo yokuza kwaKhe ezweni kwakuwukuba
‘afakazele iqiniso’ [Funda uJohane 18:37]
UPilatu wayengenandaba nokuzwa lokho uJesu ayezokusho ngeqiniso loMbuso (Joh 18:38; w07 10/1 32)
Ngokungefani noPilatu, uJesu wakhuluma ngokungagunci ‘ngeqiniso,’ engabhekiseli eqinisweni elivamile,
kodwa eqinisweni laphezulu, iqiniso ngoJehova uNkulunkulu nezinjongo zaKhe [Funda uJohane 17:17] (w02
3/1 13)
Iqiniso laphezulu litholakala eZwini likaNkulunkulu eliphefumulelwe, imiBhalo Engcwele (2Thim 3:16, 17)
Ulwazi olunembile lwemiBhalo aluholeli nje kuphela ekuboneni iqiniso kodwa futhi nasekukhululweni
ebugqileni (Joh 17:3) [Funda uJohane 8:31, 32]
KuJohane 8:32, uJesu ngokuyinhloko wayebhekisela ekukhululweni esonweni (Ro 8:1, 2)
Iqiniso liphinde lisikhulule nasemiphumeleni ethile yesono
IQINISO LIKHULULA ABAKHOLWAYO EBUGQILENI (20 imiz.)
Sekuphele amakhulu ngamakhulu eminyaka izigidi zabantu zithengiselwa ebugqileni futhi zingenathemba
lokukhululwa (g02 7/8 20-22)
Namuhla, isintu sigqilazwe izinto eziningi ezihlukahlukene, kodwa njengabantu ngabanye singakhetha
ukukhonza uNkulunkulu [Funda uDuteronomi 30:19] (w10 1/15 11)
Phawula ezinye izindlela iqiniso elingathonya ngazo ukuphila komuntu
[Isikhulumi kufanele sikhethe izibonelo ezifanelana nezidingo zabantu abahlala endaweni esinikeza kuyo le
nkulumo]
Ukuphila ngeqiniso kusikhulula ekwesabeni nasekuphelelweni ithemba ngenxa yezimo zezwe zamanje
Iziprofetho zeBhayibheli zibonisa ukuthi maduze ububi buzoqedwa emhlabeni futhi ngemva kwalokho
kuchichime ukuthula (IHu 37:10, 11; 2Thim 3:1)
Ukwazi iqiniso kusikhulula ekugqilazweni izimfundiso zenkolo yamanga, njengalezo eziphathelene nesimo
sabafileyo
Izigidi zabantu ziyabesaba abafile futhi zifuna usizo ezinyangeni, ezangomeni noma kubefundisi (g96 8/8 19)
Iqiniso liwukuthi abafile abanakusilimaza; futhi abahlushwa phakade (Shu 9:5, 6)
Izigidi ziyizigqila zotshwala, ugwayi nezidakamizwa ezingekho emthethweni
Amandla eqiniso kanye nesifiso sokuba nobuhlobo obuhle noNkulunkulu kungamkhulula umuntu
emikhutsheni emibi njengaleyo (2Ko 7:1; g02 7/8 23-24)
Iqiniso liye laletha izinguquko ezimangalisayo kubantu abake baba nesifuthefuthe sentukuthelo, behlambalaza
futhi beziphatha nangezinye izindlela ezibonisa ukungamhloniphi uNkulunkulu (Efe 4:31, 32; 5:25, 33)
Benesifiso sokuhamba noNkulunkulu, baye bafunda ukuthanda umusa nokubonisa izimfanelo zokuhlonipha
uNkulunkulu (Mika 6:8)
Esikhathini esizayo, bonke abakhulekeli beqiniso emhlabeni ‘bayokhululwa ekugqilazweni ukonakala babe
nenkululeko ekhazimulayo yabantwana bakaNkulunkulu’ (Ro 8:20, 21; w99 5/1 6)
Lokhu kuyoba ukukhululwa kwangempela kuyo yonke into eye yabangela ubuhlungu nokucindezeleka
okukhulu esintwini (Joh 8:36; Ro 6:22, 23)
KHETHA IQINISO FUTHI UTHOLE INKULULEKO YANGEMPELA (5 imiz.)
Yeka indlela okukuhle ngayo ukukhonza uJehova uNkulunkulu nokuba nethemba lokuphila ezweni elisha
elinokuthula nokulunga! (2Pet 3:13)
Ukuze siphile ezweni elisha likaNkulunkulu, kumelwe sikhethe iqiniso laphezulu, silamukele ngokusuka
enhliziyweni futhi sigqoke ubuntu obusha (Efe 4:20-24; 1Thes 2:13)
UJehova akalokothi afune okungaphezu kwamandla ethu
Imizamo yethu yokuphila ngokuvumelana neqiniso iyosivikela ngokomoya futhi isenze samukeleke
kuNkulunkulu (IHu 5:11, 12; 3 Joh 3, 4)
Lapho emi phambi kukaPilatu, uJesu wathi wonke umuntu ongasohlangothini lweqiniso uyalilalela izwi laKhe
(Joh 18:37b)
Kwangathi singalimelela ngesibindi iqiniso—iqiniso laphezulu—futhi sithobele uJehova ngokulilalela
ngokucophelela izwi likaJesu (Luka 9:35)
(Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona
yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okumelwe ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-54,
166-169.)
No. 185-ZU 11/12
 ̆ 2013 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
All Rights ReservedZIHLANGANISE NABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU ABAJABULAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Ngemfudumalo nangokuqiniseka, siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi injabulo yangempela nehlala njalo isekelwe
ebuhlotsheni obuhle noNkulunkulu nasekwenzeni intando yakhe njengelungu lengxenye ebonakalayo yenhla-
ngano yakhe
OKUWUKUPHELA KWABANTU ABAJABULA NGEMPELA (4 imiz.)
Injabulo yangempela nehlala njalo itholwa kuphela yilabo abakhonza uNkulunkulu ojabulayo ngokwethembeka
(1Thim 1:11)
Ama-Israyeli ayethola injabulo lapho ekhonza uJehova (IHu 33:12)
Abafundi bakaJesu babejabula ngoba izidingo zabo ezingokomoya zazeneliswa (Math 5:3)
Namuhla oFakazi BakaJehova baziwa njengabantu abahlukile, abanobunye nabajabulayo
Injabulo iqinisekisiwe kulabo abakhonza uJehova ngokwethembeka
Abantu bakaNkulunkulu abajabulayo bayakujabulela ukusiza abanye ukuze bazihlanganise nabo
Izizwe zimenywa ukuba zijabule nabantu bakaNkulunkulu (Ro 15:10)
Isekelwephi injabulo yabantu bakaJehova?
Iziphi izinzuzo ezijatshulelwa yilabo abazihlanganisa nabantu bakaNkulunkulu abajabulayo?
Kungani abasebasha kufanele bazihlanganise nabakhulekeli beqiniso?
IMFUNDISO YAPHEZULU IYASIHLANGANISA NJENGABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU, ISENZE SIJABULE
(5 imiz.)
UJehova unguMfundisi wethu Omkhulu, noJesu unguMfundisi wethu (Isaya 30:20; Joh 13:13)
Siyajabula ngoba senza lokho iZwi likaNkulunkulu elithi asikwenze (Luka 11:28)
Ngokusebenzisa amaqiniso eBhayibheli ekuphileni kwabo, abasanda kuhlanganyela baba munye nathi
Kukhona ubunye nenjabulo phakathi kwabantu bakaNkulunkulu yonke indawo, ngoba sonke sithola ukudla
okungokomoya ngenhlangano kaJehova
Siyajabula ngoba sicabanga ngendlela efanayo futhi sinobunye naphezu kwezizinda ezihlukene (Isaya 2:3)
Njengoba ukuphila kwalabo ababeyizitha sekushintshile ngenxa yokusebenzisa amaqiniso eBhayibheli, ngisho
nabo sebemunye njengengxenye yabantu bakaNkulunkulu abajabulayo [Landisa okuhlangenwe nakho
kwamuva okusezincwadini zethu]
OFakazi BakaJehova banyathelisa izincwadi zeBhayibheli ngezilimi ezicishe zibe ngu-1 000, okusisiza ukuba
sicabange ngokuvumelana (2Ko 13:11)
Isimiso sokufundisa emhlabeni wonke sisiza labo ‘abathambekele ngokufanele ekuphileni okuphakade’ ukuba
bathole ukuhlakanipha okuletha injabuo (IzE 13:48; IzA 3:13-18)
IZINZUZO ZOKUZIHLANGANISA NABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU ABAJABULAYO (12 imiz.)
Ubuhlobo noNkulunkulu bujatshulelwa yibo bonke abanobunye njengabantu bakhe
Labo abenza intando kaJehova uyobasekela nsuku zonke (IHu 68:19)
Bangasondela ngokukhululekile kuMuzwi womthandazo (IHu 65:2)
Banokuthula okungenakuqhathaniswa (Fil 4:6, 7; w80-E 11/1 18, w81 6/1 18)
Ukusebenzisa izimfundiso zeBhayibheli kusenza siqine ngokomoya futhi kusisiza ukuba silondoloze injabulo
Uthando lobuzalwane nezibusiso zalo kujatshulelwa yilabo abazihlanganisa nabantu bakaNkulunkulu abajabulayo
(Joh 13:35; Kol 3:14; 1Pet 2:17)
Babona uthando olunjalo emihlanganweni yebandla, yesifunda neyesigodi
Uthando luboniswa nalapho abanye esikholwa nabo ebandleni beswele nalapho kugadla izinhlekelele nomaphi
emhlabeni
Ithemba lokuphila okuphakade libekelwe labo abazihlanganisa nabantu bakaNkulunkulu
UJehova wenze ukuba ukuphila okunjalo kwenzeke ngomhlatshelo kaJesu Kristu wesihlengo (Math 20:28; Ro
5:8; w92 6/15 4-7)
Abagcotshiwe bayazuza emhlatshelweni kaJesu futhi baba yizindlalifa kanye naye (1Joh 2:1, 2)
“Ezinye izimvu” nazo ziyazuza emhlatshelweni kaJesu futhi zijabulela ithemba lokuphila emhlabeni
oyipharadesi (Joh 10:16; Luka 23:43)
Njengoba izindinganiso ezingokomoya zithatha indawo yezinto ezibonakalayo, ukuphila kuba nenjongo
ngokwengeziwe (Math 6:33; Fil 1:9, 10)
Abantu bakaJehova babeka izithakazelo zakhe kuqala, njengoba noKristu enza (Joh 6:38)
NjengoJesu, banokuphila okunenjongo, ewukudumisa uJehova nokunikeza ubufakazi ngeqiniso (Joh 18:37)
[Landisa izindaba zamuva ezinyatheliswe kumagazini INqabayokulinda ne-Phaphama! ezifakazela ukuthi
ukuphila kwalabo abanobunye njengabantu bakaNkulunkulu kunenjongo ngempela futhi kuyajabulisa]
ISIZATHU SOKUBA ABATHANDI BAKANKULUNKULU BAZIHLANGANISE NABANTU BAKHE (5 imiz.)
Cabangela izizathu ezenza kufaneleke ngabantu abathanda uNkulunkulu ukuba bazihlanganise nabantu bakhe
(w93 5/15 9-10)
No. 186-ZU
3/13NjengoMbusi Wendawo Yonke, uJehova ufanelwe ukuzinikezela kuye kuphela (Eks 20:4, 5)
Ukukhathalela ngokujulile ukulwelwa kobukhosi bukaJehova nokungcweliswa kwegama lakhe kusishuku-
misela ukuba simkhonze
Abantu bangabonisa uthando ngoNkulunkulu ngokuthi bazihlanganise nalabo abenza intando yakhe futhi
abagcina imiyalo yakhe (1Joh 5:3)
Ukwazisa ngothando lukaJehova alubonise ngokulungiselela isihlengo seNdodana yakhe kuyisizathu esihle
sokukhonza uNkulunkulu nabantu bakhe (Joh 3:16)
Ukwazisa amalungiselelo kaNkulunkulu angokomoya awalungiselele ngenhlangano yakhe kufanele
kusishukumisele ukuba simkhulekele
Isifiso esinamandla sokukhuluma ngoMbuso kaNkulunkulu kungesinye isizathu sokukhonza uJehova nabantu
bakhe (IHu 145:10, 11)
ZIHLANGANISE NABANTU BAKANKULUNKULU ABAJABULAYO NGAPHANDLE KOKULIBALA (4 imiz.)
Isiprofetho sikaZakariya sabikezela ukuthi abantu babeyozihlanganisa namaKristu agcotshiwe, noma ‘amaJuda’
angokomoya [Funda uZakariya 8:23]
Manje abaningi bayakwenza lokho ngokwamukela isigijimi soMbuso
Uma ungumthandi kaNkulunkulu nowokulunga, manje yisikhathi sokuzihlanganisa nezinceku zikaJehova
Ubufakazi besibusiso sikaNkulunkulu kubantu bakhe buyanda usuku nosuku njengoba abantu bazo zonke
izizwe bezihlanganisa nalabo abamkhonzayo
“Isixuku esikhulu” sezizwe eziningi esiyosinda “osizini olukhulu” siba yingxenye yomkhaya womhlaba wonke
wabakhulekeli bakaJehova abajabulayo (IsAm 7:9, 10, 14; 21:1, 4, 5)
Ingabe uzoba phakathi kwalabo abazihlanganise ngokugcwele nabantu bakaNkulunkulu abajabulayo?
Njengomunye wezigidi ezikhonza uJehova ngobunye, ulindelwe izibusiso eziningi
(Namathela ohlakeni, futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye. Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe
okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-55, 166-169.)

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30UNKULUNKULU ONOTHANDO ANGABUVUMELA KANJANI UBUBI?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Nikeza izimpendulo ezilula ezizoqondwa abaqalayo ukuba khona. Qinisa ukholo loFakazi BakaJehova abangase
bahlushwe yilo mbuzo lapho inhlekelele ibehlela ngokuqondile
UNKULUNKULU UYABUZONDA UBUBI BEZWE LIKASATHANE (5 imiz.)
Izisulu zezingozi, zobugebengu, zezempi, zobuphekula nezezinhlekelele, zivame ukubuza ukuthi, “Kungani?”
(g 11/06 3-9)
Ingabe uyazibuza ukuthi kungenzeka kanjani ukuba uNkulunkulu onothando avumele izinto ezimbi ukuba
zenzeke?
Ngisho nezinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezithembekile zake zawubuza lowo mbuzo [Funda uHabakuki 1:3]
Abanye abantu baphetha ngokuthi uNkulunkulu akanandaba nabantu
IBhayibheli lembula ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyakuzonda ukuhlupheka nokungabi nabulungisa (AbA 2:18; IzA
6:16-19)
UJehova wezwa ubuhlungu enhliziyweni ngenxa yabo bonke ububi obabukhona ngosuku lukaNowa futhi
inzondo yakhe ngobubi ayikashintshi (Gen 6:5, 6)
Qiniseka ngokuthi uNkulunkulu akayena umthombo wobubi (Jobe 34:10; Jak 1:13)
ISIZATHU SOKUBEKEZELELA KUKANKULUNKULU UBUBI (20 imiz.)
Kungani uNkulunkulu onothando, ubulungisa, nonamandla evumela ububi bezwe likaSathane? (w02 10/1 5-6)
Umbono oyiphutha owandile uwukuthi uNkulunkulu ulawula yonke into ngokuqondile
Nokho, uJesu wachaza uSathane uDeveli ‘njengombusi waleli zwe,’ okunguyena oyimbangela yobubi (Joh 14:
30; 1Joh 5:19)
USathane, ‘onguyise wamanga,’ uye wayenga izingelosi ezimbi kanye nabantu ukuba bahlanganyele naye
ekuvukeleni uNkulunkulu (Joh 8:44; Jude 6)
Sekudlule iminyaka engaphezu kuka-6 000 uJehova evumele ububi ukuze azixazulule unomphela izimpikiswano
ezaphakanyiswa uSathane (Gen 3:1-6)
USathane wangabaza ilungelo likaJehova lokubusa (bh 109-110 izig. 10-11)
Ingabe ukuzibusa ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu kuye kwaletha inkululeko yeqiniso nenjabulo ehlala njalo? Cha!
Ukubusa komuntu kuye kwabangela izimpi, ukucindezelwa, ukuhlupheka nokufa (Shu 8:9; Ro 8:22; w13 9/1 3-5)
UJehova ubazi kahle ubuhlungu esibuzwayo, ngakho usithembisa impumuzo (Eks 3:7; 2Ko 1:3, 4)
UJehova waqinisekisa uHabakuki ngokuthi wayebeke “isikhathi esimisiwe” sokuqeda ukungabi nabulungisa
nokucindezelwa (Hab 2:3-5)
UJesu useqalile kakade ‘ukubhidliza imisebenzi kaDeveli’ (1Joh 3:8)
Yeka ukuthi kududuza kanjani ukwazi ukuthi konke ukuhlupheka kuzophela maduzane! (IHu 37:9-11; 72:
12-14; w13 9/1 6-7)
Ukubekezela kukaNkulunkulu wethu onothando kusho insindiso kubantu “abamnene” (IHu 149:4; Jer 29:11, 12;
2Pet 3:9)
JABULELA “UKUPHILA KWANGEMPELA” OKUNGENAKHO UKUHLUPHEKA (5 imiz.)
Uma uye wathandaza ngobuqotho kuNkulunkulu umbuza ukuthi kungani, khona-ke mlalele ngokwamukela
isigijimi sakhe senduduzo nethemba [Funda isAmbulo 21:4; 22:1, 2]
Noma yimuphi umonakalo okhona kulesi simiso sezinto uzoqedwa [Funda u-Isaya 65:17]
Okwamanje, thembela kuJehova futhi ulingise isimo sengqondo sokubekezela sezinceku ezithembekile zesikhathi
esidlule nezanamuhla (Hab 3:16-18; Heb 6:9-12)
Njengoba uqhubeka usekela ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu, maduzane uzophila “ukuphila kwangempela” okunge-
nabo ububi (1Thim 6:19)
[Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni futhi ugcine isikhathi esabelwe ingxenye ngayinye. Akuyona
yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-55, 166-
169]
No. 187-ZU 7/13

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30INGABE ITHEMBA LAKHO LIKUJEHOVA?
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli zibone indlela okuwukuhlakanipha ngayo ukuncika kuJehova ngokuphelele, nokuthi kusho
ukuthini ukubonisa ukuthembela kuye ngokuphelele
IZIZWE ZIYE ZABEKA ITHEMBA LAZO KOKUNGEYIKHO (4 imiz.)
Ukuze zilawule izenzo zazo, izizwe zincike ekuhlakanipheni nasemandleni azo siqu
Abaholi bezombusazwe bamelene noJehova neNkosi yakhe egcotshiwe (IHu 2:1-3)
Abaholi benkolo bathembela kwezombusazwe kunaseMbusweni kaNkulunkulu [Funda u-Isaya 28:14, 15]
Izinhlangano zezombusazwe zinikeza isivikelo esingenakwethenjwa (ip-1 292-294)
Umphumela ube ukungabi namthetho nokuntuleka kokuthula emhlabeni wonke (Isaya 57:20, 21)
WENA ITHEMBA LAKHO LIKUBANI? (8 imiz.)
Ngokungafani neze naleli zwe elibangela ukwahlukana, izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zibonisa lezi zici ezilandelayo:
Zinobumbano njengabakhulekeli beqiniso kuleli zwe elihlukaniswe ezombusazwe, inhlalo kanye nenkolo (IHu
133:1)
Zishumayela izindaba ezinhle zoMbuso KaNkulunkulu ngentshiseko—okuyisigijimi sokuthula nensindiso
(Math 24:14)
Zinenjabulo, zibonisa ubuntu bukaNkulunkulu (1Thim 1:11)
Ziyaqikelela ukuthi ukuziphatha nezinqumo zazo kusekelwe ezimisweni zeBhayibheli (IzA 3:5, 6)
Zenza ‘okuhle kubo bonke’ ngaphandle kokukhetha (Gal 6:10)
Kunomehluko ocacile ‘phakathi kokhonza uNkulunkulu nongamkhonzi’ (Mal 3:18)
Yini eye yabangela lo mehluko? [Funda iHubo 46:1-3]
Abantu bakaJehova uNkulunkulu bathembela ngokuqinile kuye
Bayazi ukuthi uJehova useduze kwabo nokuthi unamandla angaphezu kwawanoma isiphi isitha
Kubo, uNkulunkulu ‘uwusizo olutholakala ngokushesha ngezikhathi zokucindezeleka’
Ngisho noma izintaba zingagwinywa ulwandle ngenxa yezinhlekelele zemvelo, abantu bakaNkulunkulu
bathembela ngokuqinile kuJehova njengeNqaba yabo
Ingabe nawe umethemba ngaleyo ndlela?
Ingabe ngempela ithemba lakho uye walibeka kuJehova?
UMTHOMBO WETHEMBA LAKHO (13 imiz.)
Singakuthuthukisa kanjani ukuthembela kwethu kuJehova? [Funda izAga 22:19]
Umphumela omuhle wolwazi olunikezwa uNkulunkulu uvezwe kuyincwadi yezAga 1:33 [Funda]
Labo abangasohlangothini lukaJehova akufanele baphazanyiswe ukwesaba inhlekelele
Bayazi ukuthi akukho lutho olungonakalisa isivikelo esitholakala ngokulalela uJehova
UNehemiya wabeka isibonelo esihle sokuthembela kuJehova lapho kuvuselelwa izindonga zeJerusalema
[Funda uNehemiya 4:14 futhi umchaze kabanzi] (w98 10/15 17)
Ingabe ‘uyacabanga ngoJehova’?
Kudingeka sicabange ngaye nsuku zonke
Okunye okufanele sikwenze, ukukhonza uJehova “ngomphefumulo wonke” (Kol 3:23; w97 10/15 13-17)
Lokhu kusho ukuzinikela kwethu ngokuphelele, sisebenzise wonke amandla ethu ngokugcwele ekukhonzeni
uJehova
Sifunda ngombono kaJehova ezibonelweni ezimbili ezingefani
Udadewabo kaLazaru uMariya, ‘wenza ayengakwenza’ ngokugeza izinyawo zikaJesu ‘ngamafutha anamakha
abiza kakhulu’ (Mar 14:3-9; Joh 12:3)
Owesifazane ompofu ‘wakhalakathisela konke ayenakho’ ngokuphonsa ‘izinhlamvu zemali zenani elincane’
ebhokisini lomnikelo ethempelini (Mar 12:41-44)
UJesu akazange aqhathanise umfelokazi noMariya
Wazazisa izinhlamvu ezimbili zemali zomfelokazi ngokulinganayo namafutha kaMariya “ayebiza
kakhulu”
Njengoba owesifazane ngamunye anikela ngokungcono kakhulu ayenakho, iminikelo yabo bobabili
yayibalulekile emehlweni kaNkulunkulu
UJehova ufanelwe okungcono kakhulu esinakho
Kufanele siyigcine njalo imiyalo yakhe (IHu 119:93)
LONDOLOZA ITHEMBA LAKHO KUZE KUBE SEKUPHELENI (5 imiz.)
UJehova usazibekezelele izizwe
Lokhu kusobala ngoba abamemezeli boMbuso basaqhubeka benxusa ababusi nabangaphansi kwabo ukuba
bazithobe ekubuseni kukaKristu (IHu 2:10-12a)
Izigidi zoFakazi BakaJehova zimemezela isigijimi soMbuso kaNkulunkulu ngentshiseko emazweni angu-239
Lokhu sikwenza ngenjabulo ngaphambi kokuba iNdodana kaNkulunkulu iphahlaze izizwe zibe izicucu
“njengokungathi isitsha sombumbi” [Funda iHubo 2:9]
No. 188-ZU
1/14Njengoba uzibonakalisa uyikhuthalele imisebenzi emihle, gcina ithemba lakho likuJehova futhi ubone
ukugcwaliseka kweHubo 46:7-11 [Funda]
[Namathela ohlakeni ngangokunokwenzeka futhi ugcine isikhathi esabelwe ingxenye ngayinye. Akuyona yonke
imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole SeNkonzo, kk. 52-55,

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30UKUHAMBA NONKULUNKULU KULETHA IZIBUSISO
MANJE NAPHAKADE
Okufanele kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi ukuhamba noNkulunkulu kuyindlela yokuphila. Yakha ukwazisa ngelungelo esinalo
lokuhamba noNkulunkulu
SIDINGA ISIQONDISO KULE NKAMBO YOKUPHILA (4 imiz.)
Yibaphi abazali abangavumela ujahidada wabo aqale ukucathula bengamgadile?
Umzali onothando uhlal’ eseduze nengane yakhe, eyinikeza isiqondiso ngezinga elifanele njengoba ikhula
IBhayibheli livame ukusebenzisa ukuhamba njengesifenqo ukuze lichaze inkambo yethu yokuphila (1Kho 22:43;
Shu 12:5)
UBaba wethu osezulwini uyazi ukuthi asibona ojahidada; usinikeza inkululeko ethe xaxa (2Kor 3:17)
Noma kunjalo, uyazi ukuthi kungakhathaliseki ukuthi sibadala kangakanani, sisidinga kakhulu isiqondiso
[Funda uJeremiya 10:23]
Ukuhamba kulezi “zikhathi ezibucayi okunzima ukubhekana nazo” kungaba umshikashika (2Thim 3:1)
Akudingeki sihambe sodwa; singahamba noNkulunkulu
KUSHO UKUTHINI UKUHAMBA NONKULUNKULU? (6 imiz.)
Izibonelo zeBhayibheli ziyasifundisa ukuthi kusho ukuthini ukuhamba noNkulunkulu
U-Enoke noNowa bahamba noNkulunkulu weqiniso (Gen 5:24; 6:9)
Amadoda nabesifazane abathembekile bahamba noNkulunkulu ngomqondo wokuthi bathembela kuye,
bancika kuye ukuze abanike isiqondiso futhi bamlalela
Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu kwabenza baba nyamana-mbana kubantu abaningi bosuku lwabo, kodwa
lokho kuzidela kwakunomvuzo (w01 9/15 29-31)
UNkulunkulu akakashintshi; usasimema ukuba sihambe naye nanamuhla (Mal 3:6)
IBhayibheli labikezela ukuthi abaningi babeyofuna ukuhamba endleleni kaNkulunkulu
[Funda uMika 4:1, 2]
Nokho, abantu abanjalo ababaningi; indlela yabo ayiyona ‘indlela ethandwayo’ (Jer 8:6)
UMika 4:5 uyachaza ukuthi kungani [Yifunde]
Ukuhamba ngegama likaNkulunkulu kusho ukwenza intando yakhe nokuphila ukuphila kwethu
ngokuvumelana nakho konke lokho okumelelwa yigama likaNkulunkulu
UNGAHAMBA KANJANI NONKULUNKULU? (9 imiz.)
Sihamba noNkulunkulu ngokulalela izwi lakhe nokulivumela liqondise izinyathelo zethu
Izimiso eziseZwini likaNkulunkulu kufanele zisiqondise kuzo zonke izinto (IHu 119:105)
‘Ukuhamba eqinisweni’ kufanele kube yindlela yethu yokuphila (3Joh 3)
[Landisa indaba yokuphila yomuntu owashintshwa amaqiniso eBhayibheli. Ngokwesibonelo,
bheka uchungechunge oluthi “IBhayibheli Liyakushintsha Ukuphila,” oluqala kuyi-Nqabayokulinda
ka-August 1, 2008]
Landela ezinyathelweni zikaKristu (1Pet 2:21; w86 12/1 17-18)
UJesu wabeka isibonelo esiphelele sokuhamba noNkulunkulu (w02 8/15 10-14)
Hambisana nabanye abahamba noNkulunkulu (Mika 4:2)
Yonke imizamo esiyenzayo yokuba khona emihlanganweni yobuKristu iyafaneleka (yb99 253-254; yb90-E
244-245; yb89-E 210-211)
Lapho senza izinqumo, senza kahle ngokuzibuza ukuthi uJesu ubezokwenzenjani (1Kor 2:16; w00 2/15 10-11
izig. 2-4)
YIZIPHI IZIBUSISO EZITHOLWA YILABO ABAHAMBA NONKULUNKULU? (8 imiz.)
‘Ukuhamba njengabantwana bokukhanya’ kuyisibusiso esikhulu kakhulu (Efe 5:8)
Isiqondiso esisitholayo siyasivikela ezingibeni zokuziphatha okubi (w00 7/15 28-31)
Labo abahamba ebumnyameni baleli zwe bayakhubeka (Isaya 59:8-12)
Ukuba sebumnyameni kwezwe endabeni yokuziphatha kuchitha imindeni; ukuziphatha okubi kuvame
ukuholela emizweni yecala, ukuzizwa ungelutho nokukhathazeka
Sikhanyiselwe ngokuqondene nalokho okushiwo yizenzakalo zezwe
Abaningi basebumnyameni ngokuqondene nokuthi kungani lezi zikhathi zizimbi kangaka nokuthi kungani
abantu abaningi kangaka behlupheka
Ukuba nokukhanya kweqiniso ezindabeni ezinjalo kusenza sihambe ngethemba nangenjabulo
Umoya ongcwele ungasiqinisa ukuze siqhubeke sihamba noNkulunkulu lapho sibhekene nezingqinamba (Fil
4:13)
Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu kuqinisa ubungane bethu naye, noma ukusondelana esinakho naye
Njengoba sinoMngane onjalo, singakwesabelani nje lokho abantu abangasenza kona? (IHu 118:6)
Uma singase sikhubeke, uNkulunkulu uyosivusa uma sincika kuye ukuze asiqondise (IHu 145:14)
No. 189-ZU
4/14UJehova akasheshi abadikile labo abenza isono; ubathethelela “ngendlela enkulu” labo abaphendukayo
(Isaya 55:7; izA 24:16)
Ukuba nonembeza ohlanzekile kusenza sijabule enkambweni yokuphila
UHAMBO OLUQHUBEKA PHAKADE (3 imiz.)
Ukuphila kuyisipho; ngisho nohambo olufushane kulokhu kuphila luyisibusiso
Noma kunjalo, iZwi likaNkulunkulu linamazwi aphefumulelwe abalisayo ngenxa yobufushane bokuphila
komuntu (Jobe 14:1; IHu 90:10)
UJehova ufuna ukuba sihambe naye kuze kube phakade (Joh 3:36)
Labo abenqabayo ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zikaKristu bazoba nohambo olufushane
Labo abahamba noNkulunkulu bazoqhubeka behamba kuze kube phakade!
[Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni futhi ugcine isikhathi esiboniswe engxenyeni ngayinye.
Akuyona yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka incwadi ethi ISikole
Senkonzo, kk. 52-55, 166-169]
No. 189-ZU—ikhasi 2
KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30
 ̆ 2014 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of PennsylvaniaISITHEMBISO SOMNDENI OPHELELE OJABULAYO
Okumelwe kuphawulwe yisikhulumi:
Injongo kaJehova yokuba nomndeni owodwa omkhulu wabantu abajabule nongenawo amaqembuqembu,
izogcwaliseka maduzane ngoMbuso wakhe. Ngisho kwamanje, umndeni ngamunye osebenzisa izimiso
zeBhayibheli uthola ukuthula nenjabulo. Nikeza izimpendulo abangaziqonda kalula abantu abaqalayo ukuba
khona. Qinisa nokholo lwalabo abangoFakazi BakaJehova
UMNDENI—UYISIPHO ESIVELA KUNKULUNKULU (3 imiz.)
UJehova wazwakalisa injongo yakhe yokugcwalisa umhlaba ngomndeni owakhiwa abantu abaphelele
[Funda uGenesise 1:26-28]
Yeka ithemba elimangalisayo! (w14 1/15 8 izig. 3-6)
Injabulo etholakala ekuphileni komndeni, iyisipho esivela kuNkulunkulu (Ruthe 1:9; IHu 127:3)
INDLELA INJABULO EYAPHAZAMISEKA NGAYO EMNDENINI (5 imiz.)
Injabulo emndenini yaqala ukuphazamiseka lapho uSathane evukela uNkulunkulu
USathane wanxenxa indoda nomkayo bokuqala kanye nezingelosi ezimbi ukuba balahle uYise wasezulwini
Kunokuba ube nobunye nenjabulo uJehova ayeyihlosile ekuqaleni, umphakathi wesintu uwonke uhlukene
ngokwenhlalo, ngokwenkolo nakwezombangazwe
Phakathi kwamalungu omndeni ngamunye, sibona ukungabambisani, ukucindezeleka nokuntuleka
kwenjabulo (2Thim 3:2, 3)
Ukuphuma kuka-Adamu no-Eva emndenini kaJehova wendawo yonke akugcinanga nje ngokuzwisa uMdali
wethu ubuhlungu obujulile, kodwa kuye kwaletha ubuhlungu, ukuhlupheka nokufa kuyo yonke inzalo yabo
(Gen 3:16-19; Shu 8:9; Ro 5:12)
INDLELA INJABULO EYOBUYISELWA NGAYO EMNDENINI (5 imiz.)
UBaba wethu wasezulwini akasoze avuma ukuba injongo yakhe yokuba umphakathi wesintu ujabule phakade
ingaphumeleli ngenxa yezihlubuki ezingathembekile
UJehova wabonisa uthando lukababa ngokuthi njengoba ayekhipha isahlulelo enyokeni enguSathane,
ahlanganise nesiprofetho sokubuyiselwa kwenjongo yakhe [Funda uGenesise 3:15]
UNkulunkulu uzosebenzisa uJesu, oyingxenye eyinhloko ‘yenzalo,’ ekubhubhiseni uSathane nokuqeda
imiphumela yesono sika-Adamu (Joh 3:16; 1Joh 3:8)
Ngomhlatshelo wesihlengo kaJesu, “u-Adamu wokugcina,” yonke inzalo ethembekile ‘ka-Adamu wokuqala’
iyojabulela ukuba ingxenye yomndeni ophelele nojabulayo kuze kube phakade (1Kor 15:22, 45; Math 20:28)
Injongo kaJehova ngemindeni ngaminye iyobe isifeziwe lapho uJesu ebuyisela zonke izinto kuYise [Funda
eyoku-1 Korinte 15:24-28]
UNGABA KANJANI NOMNDENI OJABULAYO KWAMANJE? (14 imiz.)
UNkulunkulu unikeza imindeni iziqondiso okungathi uma izisebenzisa ithole injabulo (IzA 3:5, 6; 4:1-4; fg 18-19)
[Funda eyabase-Efesu 5:28-32] UJehova ufuna ukuba amadoda nomkawo bathembeke komunye nomunye futhi
babonise uthando olungenabugovu futhi bahloniphane (Heb 13:4)
[Funda eyabase-Efesu 5:22-25, 33] Ubunhloko bukaJesu phezu kwebandla buyisibonelo emadodeni
angamaKristu (1Pet 3:7)
Amadoda kufanele abonise uthando lokuzidela ngokunakekela imindeni yawo ngezidingo zokuphila
nangokuhola ezintweni ezingokomoya (Dut 6:5-7; 1Thim 5:8)
[Funda eyabase-Efesu 6:1-3] Izingane zithola injabulo lapho zihlonipha abazali bazo futhi zifunde nendlela
yokusebenzisa izimiso zeBhayibheli (Shu 11:9, 10; 12:1)
[Funda eyabase-Efesu 6:4] Isibonelo somzali sokubonisa uthando ngoNkulunkulu siyoba nomthelela omkhulu
enganeni yakhe
Ukuze izingane zithole injabulo ehlala njalo, kufanele zifunde ukuthi zingamthokozisa kanjani uYise
wasezulwini (2Thim 3:14, 15)
UMNDENI OJABULAYO WOMHLABA WONKE EKUGCINENI! (3 imiz.)
Isithembiso sikaNkulunkulu sokuba nomndeni womhlaba wonke onobunye nenjabulo, sizofezeka (IHu 37:10, 11)
Ungathanda yini ukuba phakathi kwabantu abajabulayo abachazwe kumaHubo 89:15, 16? [Funda]
Uma kunjalo, sikukhuthaza ukuba wena kanye nomndeni wakho niqhubeke nithola ulwazi olunembile
ngentando kaNkulunkulu mayelana nemindeni (Math 5:3; Joh 17:3)
“Zonke izizwe ziyobusiswa” ngoMbuso kaNkulunkulu njengoba zibona ukugcwaliseka kwesithembiso
sikaNkulunkulu sokuthula nenjabulo ehlala njalo (IzE 3:25)
[Namathela kakhulu ekwazisweni okusohlakeni futhi ugcine isikhathi esabelwe ingxenye ngayinye. Akuyona
yonke imiBhalo ekhonjiwe okufanele ifundwe noma ikhulunyelwe. Bheka ethi ISikole Senkonzo, kk. 52-55,
166-169]
No. 190-ZU 7/14

KUMELWE IHLANGANISWE NGEMIZUZU ENGU-30INDLELA UTHANDO NOKHOLO OKUNQOBA NGAYO IZWE
Okumelwe kuphawulwe isikhulumi:
Siza izilaleli ziqonde ukuthi njengoba sifunda okwengeziwe ngoJehova futhi siqhubeka simthanda, ukholo lwethu
ezithembisweni zakhe luyoqina nakakhulu. Lolo thando olukhulu nokholo olungantengantengi luyosisiza
sinqobe izwe njengoJesu
UKRISTU JESU WALINQOBA IZWE (4 imiz.)
Ngasekupheleni kwenkonzo yakhe, uJesu wathi: “Mina ngilinqobile izwe” (Joh 16:33)
Wamelana nemizamo kaSathane uDeveli, ongunkulunkulu waleli zwe, ‘yokumbamba’ (Joh 14:30; 1Joh 5:19)
UJesu wamelana nezilingo zikaDeveli zokufuna izinto ezibonakalayo, ukuzifunela udumo nokwenqaba
ukubuswa uJehova (Math 4:4, 7, 10)
Amaqembu enkolo anonya nawezombusazwe ehluleka ukucupha uJesu ngenkulumo yakhe ukuze
amphazamise ekukhonzeni uNkulunkulu (Math 22:15, 16, 34, 46)
Ukholo lwakhe oluqinile nothando ngoJehova kwasiza uJesu waqhubeka eqotho futhi wawufeza umsebenzi
ayewunikiwe (Joh 17:4)
UKristu wabekela abafundi bakhe isibonelo okufanele basilingise (1Pe 2:21)
UJESU WAHLOMISA ABAFUNDI BAKHE UKUBA BANQOBE IZWE (7 imiz.)
UJesu waxwayisa abafundi bakhe ngokuthi nabo babeyoshushiswa ‘ngenxa yokuthi abayona ingxenye yezwe’
(Joh 15:18-20; Math 10:16-18)
Waveza ukuthi uSathane ungumphikisi oyinhloko weqiniso loMbuso (Joh 8:44)
UKristu wafundisa abafundi bakhe ukuba bathandazele ukuvikelwa ‘komubi’ futhi wacela uYise ukuba
ababheke (Math 6:9, 13; Joh 17:15, 16)
UJesu wagcizelela ukubaluleka kokuthanda uNkulunkulu nomakhelwane (Math 22:37-39)
Wabonisa isihawu nothando lapho esebenzelana nabanye (Mr 1:40, 41; Luka 8:43-48)
UKristu waqinisa ukholo nothando lwabafundi bakhe ngokubasiza bazi uJehova kangcono (Joh 17:3, 26)
Ngokulandela isibonelo sikaJesu eduze, abafundi abathembekile ‘banganqoba ngokuphelele’ (Ro 8:35-39; w99
5/1 7)
ABAFUNDI NAMUHLA BAYALINQOBA IZWE (7 imiz.)
Izinceku zikaJehova namuhla ziye zalinqoba izwe nezindlela zalo
Ngokungathathi hlangothi kobuKristu (w03 3/1 3-7)
Ngokumelana nokuphikiswa okuvela emndenini, komakhelwane, emsebenzini, esikoleni noma ezihlubukini
(w01 12/1 23 izig. 18-19)
Ngokulwa ngokuphumelelayo nomoya waleli zwe wokungalaleli nowokuzikhukhumeza (Efesu 2:2, 8; lv 53-54
izig. 7-8)
Ngokugwema ukuphishekela izinto ezingazuzisi (1Thim 6:6-12)
Ukugxila empumelelweni Yomlingisi wethu neyabanye ofakazi abathembekile kusisiza sikhuthazele (Heb 12:1-3)
UTHANDO NOKHOLO KUSENZA SINQOBE IZWE (8 imiz.)
Namanje leli zwe elibi “lisemandleni omubi” uSathane (1Joh 5:19)
Inzondo, ubudlova, ukuqothulwa kwesizwe, amanga, umona, ukuwohloka kwesimilo, inkulumo eyenga
ngokobulili kanye nokugqoka okuvusa inkanuko kubonisa umoya kaDeveli (lv 50-53 izig. 1-6; 56-57 izig. 11-13)
Abantu abangenalo ukholo nabangalwazi uthando lukaNkulunkulu banqotshwa kalula yithonya elibi likaDeveli
(lv 54-55 izig. 9-10)
Ukuthanda uNkulunkulu nokuba nokholo ezithembisweni zakhe kwenza amaKristu agweme ‘ukubanjwa’
uSathane (1Joh 5:3-5, 18)
Lolo thando lwenza ukulalela iziqondiso zikaNkulunkulu kujabulise kungabi umthwalo (lv 11-13 izig. 13-16)
Ukholo lunqoba ukwesaba abantu, okungabangela ukuba siyekethise izimiso zeBhayibheli (w14 4/15 10 isig. 8)
Njengabanqobi bezwe, abalalela uNkulunkulu, sijabulela ukuphila okungcono ngisho namanje
Ukulalela isiqondiso esithi “masizihlanze kukho konke ukungcola kwenyama nokomoya” kusikhulula ezintweni
ezifana nokuba yisigqila sikagwayi, izidakamizwa nokubuka izithombe zobulili ezingcolile (2Ko 7:1)
Ngokulalela isikhuthazo sokuya emihlanganweni yobuKristu, siyakhuthazana ukuze siqine okholweni (Heb 10:
24, 25)
Ukulalela umyalo kaJesu wokushumayela, ukufundisa nokwenza abafundi kusilethela injabulo yangempela,
kusikhulula ezweni likaSathane elinobugovu (Math 24:14; 28:19, 20; IzE 20:35)
AMAKRISTU ANQOBAYO AZUZA IZIBUSISO ZAPHAKADE (4 imiz.)
UJesu Kristu wanqoba izwe futhi wanikwa igunya elikhulu “ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu” (1Pe 3:22)
Maduzane uzonqoba ngokuphelele e-Armagedoni (IsAm 6:2; 16:16)
Abalandeli bakaJesu abagcotshiwe abathembekile bazuza uMbuso wasezulwini (Luka 12:32; 22:28-30)
“Ezinye izimvu” ziyophila emhlabeni ngaphansi koMbuso kaNkulunkulu (Joh 10:16; Math 25:34)
Ngokuhlala sithembekile njengabanqobi bezwe nangokushumayela ngoMbuso kaNkulunkulu ngesibindi,
singakwazi ukusiza abanye banqobe izwe futhi bathole izibusiso zikaJehova zaphakade (IsAm 12:11)
